# language_name:        Chin, Thado
# closest ISO 639-3:    tcz
# ISO_15924:            Latn
# year_short:           
# year_long:            
# vernacular_title:     
# english_title:        The Holy Bible in Thado
# URL:                  http://www.biblesos.org/tcz/bible/thado-kuki/the-holy-biblein-thado-168/
# copyright_short:      
# copyright_long:       
# notes:                
01001001	Semtil’in Pathenin van le leiset ahinsemtai .
01001002	Ahin leiset chu alim le agong bei , twipi thuh tah a ki khang chule achungnga thim pi jingahin , twipi chu Pathen Lhagaovin a-opkhum’e .
01001003	Pathenin , “ kho hungvah hen , ” atile , ahungvahtai .
01001004	Pathenin khovah chu avetle apha lheh jengin , muthim le khovah asep khentai .
01001005	Pathenin khovah chu “ sun ” asah-in , muthimchu “ jan ” asah-e . Jan akichaijin jingkah ahitan , nikhat alhingtai .
01001006	Pathenin , Twipi lah a chun vanthimjol hung kidal hen , Twipi chu alang langa dalten hen , atin ;
01001007	Vanthimjol ajamdoh-in , twipichu chung le noiya adaltanin asepkhentai .
01001008	Twipi daltenna chu Pathenin “ vanthamjol ” asah-e . Jan akichaiyin jingkah ahitan , ni ni alhingtai .
01001009	Pathenin , “ vanthimjol noiya twipi mun khat’a veikhom hen , tolgo hung doh hen , ” atileh , aseibangin aumtai .
01001010	Tolgo lai chu Pathenin , “ leiset ” asah-in , twipi veikhom chengse chu “ twikhanglen ” asahtai . Aphatdan chu Pathenin amudohtai .
01001011	Pathenin , “ leiset’in hampa , amunei hamphung , agathei thing , achi ding amunei cheh , ama amachi dungjui cheh-in hinsepdohhen , leiset chunga kehdohhen , ” atileh ahung kehdoh tauve .
01001012	Leiset’in hampa ahinsep doh tan , hamphung ama ama chi dungjuiyin akehdoh-in , agathei amunei thingphung achi dungjuiyin ahung kehdoh tauve . Ahoidanchu Pathenin amudoh tai .
01001013	Jan akichaiyin jingkah ahitan , nithum alhingtai .
01001014	Pathenin , “ sun le jan sepkhendin vanthamjol’a avah thei vahho hung kigol’u hen , kum kiheichin kum simtoh nan jong panguhen ;
01001015	Vanthamjol’a konin leiset hinsalvah-u hen , ” atileh , aseibang in aumtauve .
01001016	Pathenin vah len cheh ni asemin , nichang chu sun laiyin avahsah-e . Hiti hin ahsi ho jong asemdoh tai .
01001017	Pathenin , vah cheng chu leiset salvah ding le
01001018	Sun lai le jan laiya vah ding , muthim le khovah sepkhen din vanthamjol’a agoldohtai . Aphatje chu Pathenin amudoh tan ahi .
01001019	Jan akichaiyin jingkah ahitan , nili alhingtai .
01001020	Pathenin , “ twi lah a ahon hona kijot le ding ganhing hiungdimset hen , “ atin ;
01001021	Pathenin twi lah acheng din ganhing lentah tah ho le adang dang ganhing tamtah asemin , akijot le nauva Twi , akidil chet chut jin , chule alha lengthei vachate aloi loiyin asemdoh-e . Aphat dan Pathenin amudoh tai .
01001022	Abonchauvin Pathenin phatthei aboh-in , “ Hinphauvin , pungun , Twikhanglen le twi lah jouse dimset’uvin , chule vachate jong leiset’a pungu hen , ” ati .
01001023	Hichun jan akichaiyin jingkah ahitan , ni-nga alhingtai .
01001024	Pathenin , “ leiset’in ganhinglen le neo , ina vahthei le gamlah alha ding hinsep doh hen , ” atileh , asei bangin aumtauve .
01001025	Pathenin leiset’a ganhing le sa jouse chule tol’a kithol ganhing jouse aloiloiyin asemdoh-in , avet le apha lheh jenge .
01001026	Chujouvin Pathenin , “ Eiho lim le mel pun mihem semu hitin , ama ho twi lah anga jouse le chunga vacha te , leiset’a ganhing namkim , ina kivah le gamlah alha ho , alen aneo jouse chunga thunei vaihomin panguhen , ” atin ;
01001027	Ama lim le mel tobangin Pathenin mihem asemin , numei le pasal asemdohtai .
01001028	Pathenin ama ni chu phatthei aboh-in , “ Chinphan pung lhonin , nason napah lhon leiset hung dimhen , twilah a nga , ju le vachate , leiset chunga ganhing namkim chunga hung vaihomu hen , ” ati .
01001029	Pathenin , “ ven , leiset’a muchi chivo , thingphung gathei jouse naneh lhon din kapen ,
01001030	Leiset’a sa jouse le vachate , tol’a kithol ganhing ho le adang ho nehdin hamhing kapetai , ” atin , hiti chun aumtai .
01001031	Hichun Pathenin athilsemsa chengse avet le ahoi behseh jengin pha asai . Hiti hin jan akichaiyin jingkah ahitan , nigup alhing tai .
01002001	Hiti hin thilsem pumpi akijousoh tai .
01002002	Ni sagi lhinnin Pathenin Athilsem ajousoh-in anatoh acholdotan ahi .
01002003	Athilsem aboncha ajosoh a , ni sagi lhinnia acholdo jeh-in hiche nikhohi Pathenin Phatthei aboh-in asuthengtai .
01002004	Hitia hi thilsempumpi hung kisemdoh ahi . Pakai Pathenin thilsem pumpi ahinsemdoh chun
01002005	Leiset chunga hampa louhing akeh hih laiyin , muchijong adondoh hih laiye . Ajeh chu Pakai Pathenin go ajuh sah hih laiyin , loubol ding mihem jongaum hih laiye .
01002006	Leiset’a konjoh chun meijun ajamdoh jin , chutengle leichung ahinle chapkotjie .
01002007	Pakai Pathenin leiset alan mihem asemin , anahhom sunga hintheina hu ahailut peh le , mihem chu mihing asohdoh paiten ahi .
01002008	Chujouvin Pakai Pathenin niso lam Eden mun’a chun hon khat asemin , hikomma hin amihem sempa chu akoitai .
01002009	Honsunga hin vetnomnom thingphung gapha tahtah Pakai Pathenin akesah-in , alailungtah a chun hintheina thingphung le se le pha hetna thingphung jong akeh-e .
01002010	Edan honlei chap nou din hnleiya konin vadung khat ahung lhongin , honkal’a lhalka lin alongkhenin , vadung li asohdoh paitai .
01002011	Vadung masapen chu pishonahin , Havilah gamkol vel’in alongin ,
01002012	Hiche gama hin sana theng atamin , samphai chang le songval chang jong akimui .
01002013	Vadung nina chu Gihon ahin , Cush gamkol vel’a alongin ahi .
01002014	Vadung thumna chu Tigris ahin , Assyria niso lama alongin , chule vadung li lhinna chu Euphrates ahi .
01002015	Pakai Pathenin mihempa chu aleibol ding le angah din Edanhonsunga akoitai .
01002016	Pakai Pathenin mihempa jah a , “ honsunga thingga jouse naneh thei ahinan ,
01002017	Se le pha hetna thingga vang khu naneh thei louhel dingahi ; naneh ni ni le nathi tei tei ding ahi , ati .
01002018	Pakai Pathenin , “ Mihempa achangseh a aum hi anompoi , aki-thopi ding aki-angtopi thei khat sempeh inge , ” atin ;
01002019	Leiset alan Pakai Pathenin sa namkim le vacha jouse asemin , ipi asah ding vetnan mihempa henga abonchan ahin hoiluttai . Hichea hi mihempan aminsah pen pen chu aminu hijeng ahitai .
01002020	Hiti hin mihempan vacha jouse le sa namkim aminvo cheh tan , ahinla khat cha beh jong ama kithopi thei le aki-angtopi thei aumtapoi .
01002021	Hijeh chun Pakai Pathenin mihempa chu a-ihmut milsah-in , a-ihmut lanin anahgu khat aheh lhan , anung chu aphen atomjol’in ,
01002022	Anahgua kon chun numei khat asemdoh-in , mihempa henga ahinpuilut tai .
01002023	Hichun mihempan : “ Hiche hi kagu kachanga kon , Kaphe kavouva kiladoh ahin ; Pasal’a kona kiladoh ahijeh a ‘ Numei ’ kiti ding ahi , ” ati .
01002024	Hijeh a chu Pasal’in anu le apa alhakanga aji akol chah joh a , chule ama ni phe khat vou khat hilhonahi .
01002025	Hichepet chun mihempa le ajinu asagohkeo ahilhonin , ahivangin akijapi lhonpoi .
01003001	Pakai Pathen thilsem ganhinglah a doha thuh pen chu gul ahi . Gul hin numei nu jah a , ” Honsunga theiga ho khu naneh lhon louhel dia Pathenin akha mongham ? ” atile ;
01003002	Numei nun , ” Theiga dang vang kinetheiye ;
01003003	Honlai lunga vang khu neh jong kaneh thie lhon lou ding , katoh khah lhon jongle kathi tei tei lhondin Pathenin eiseipeh lhon nai , “ ati .
01003004	Hichun gul’in numienu jah a , Thi lhon hih hel’in nate .
01003005	Naneh lhon teng namitlam lhon kikeodoh a Pathen masap’a thilpha thilse nahetdoh lhonding jeh a Pathenin akha ahibouve , “ ati .
01003006	Thingphung chu numei nu mitvet’in ahoi lheh jengin , akineh le mi achihsah ding jeh-in jong aducha cheh jenge . Hijeh chun numei nun theiga chu akilon anen , ajipa jong apen , aman jong anetai .
01003007	Chutah-in amitlamlhon akikeodoh paiyin , asagohkeoahi ahedoh lhonin , theichang na akilmat mat lhonin kaipelengin akikai lhontai .
01003008	Nisa dailhah lamin honlei laiya Pakai Pathen va le husa aja lhonin , mihempa le ajinu hongsung thing lah a akisel lhontai .
01003009	Ahivangin Pakai Pathenin , “ Vo Adam , hoiya um nahim ? ” tin ahinkouve .
01003010	Mihempan , “ Honsunga nahusa kajah le , sagohkeo kahijeh a kichaa kisel kahi , “ ati .
01003011	Pakai Pathenin , “ kon sagohkeo nahi atim ? Neh lou dia kisei thingga chu naneh hitanteong ? ” ati .
01003012	Mihempan , “ Eilenkhompi dia neipeh numei nu hin thingga chu eipeh a kaneh ahitai , ” tin aseiye .
01003013	“ Ibol’a hitobangpi chu nabol ham ? ” tia Pakai Pathenin numei nu adoh le , amanun , “ Gul chun eidohabol’a kaneh hichu me , ” ati .
01003014	Chuphat’in Pakai Pathenin gul jah a , “ Nathilbol jeh a hi gaosap nachan a , ganhing jouse lah atalen namat ding , nahinkho lhumkeiya na-op’a kithol’a leivei naneh ding ahi .
01003015	Numei nu to kakidousah a , ama chilhah le nang chilhah kigal to ding ahi . Ama chilhah pan nalu avoh chip’a , nangin akhotaljum nachuhpeh ding ahi . ” ati .
01003016	Pakai Pathenin numei nu jah a , “ Na-naovop teng gim gentheiyanaum a , nat hahsa thot acha nahinding ahi . Hijongle najipa jeng lhangaiya nahin’a aman nachunga vai ahom ding ahi , “ ati .
01003017	Mihempa jah aPakai Pathenin , “ Naji nu thua nanun aneh lou dia kaseipeh thiega na neh jeh a leiset jeng jong hi gaosap chang ahitai . Nahinkho lhumkeiya tohgim genthei puma tol natuh a neh ding nakihol ding ahi .
01003018	Nakidoupi din leiset’a theimi ling le meithai seltho ling hung keh-in tin , chule tollhanga anche louhing naneh ding ahi .
01003019	Nakisemdohna leiset ” a nakile kit kah a , namaiya ulsa long longa na natohgim a’neh le chah nakihol ding ahi . Leivuiya kisemdoh nahin , Leivui nalesokit ding ahi , “ ati .
01003020	Mihem nankim penna nu ahiphat’in Adamin ajinu chu amin Eve asah-e .
01003021	Pakai Pathenin mihempa le ajinu din savun ponsil asemin asilpehtai .
01003022	Pakai Pathenin , “ Mihemhi ilah-uva khat bangin thilpha thilse hethieyin aumtan , hichea hi hinna thiega khu neh khahsah atonsot’a hinsah louhel ding ahi , ” ati .
01003023	Hijeh chun akisemdohna leiset loubol’a kivah din mihempa chu Pakai Pathenin Edan honna konin asoldoh tai .
01003024	Hinna thingphung lampi ngah din hon niso lama Vantil lhanei chu akoiyin , chemjam deuje ju chu akipei kimvelsah tai .
01004001	Adamin ajinu Eve akitimetpin , amanu agaiyin chapa khat ahinge ; “ Pakai panpi jal’a achapa kahin , ” tin amin Cain asah-e .
01004002	Chujouvin asopipa Abel ahing kit’in ahi . Abel chu kelngoi chingin apangin , Cain chu loubol’in apange .
01004003	Khongnungin Cain chun alhosoh gan Pakaiya kilhaina abol’in ,
01004004	Abel’in jong akelngoi peng masapen , athaopen khat athat’in , kilhai nananeiye . Hichea hin Abel kilhaina chunga Pakai alung lhaiyin , athilbol asanpeh tai .
01004005	Cain thilto vangchu asangpon , ama jong akhohsahtapoi . Cain alunghang behseh-in akaiku jenge .
01004006	Pakaiyin Cain jaha , “ Ibol’a lunghanga kaiku jeng nahim ?
01004007	Thildih bol le chun kipah ding nahin , thilse nabol jeh-in chonsetnan kotphunga nachang lhi jinge ; jotho dia nagot vangin , nangin najotei ding ahinai , ” ati .
01004008	Cain chun asopipa Abel jah a , “ Gamlah a che hite , “ atin ; gamlah agei lhon phat’in Cain asopipa chunga achun athattai .
01004009	Hichejeh hin , “ Nasopipa Abel la em ? ” tin Pakaiyin Cain ahindongtai . Aman , “ Kei kasopipa ching gun set ka hi ong ? ” ati .
01004010	Pakaiyin , “ Ibol’a nahim ? Tol’a kona naopipa thisanin eihinsap sap khu me !
01004011	Hiche leiset hi pohkhia nasopipa thisan achop lut tah jeh hin , nang jong gaosap chang nahitan , leiset jeng jong hi lou va na bol thei lou ding ahitai .
01004012	Muchi tujongle chun hung kehdoh louhelding , chen mun det beiya leiset chunga vah thai ding beiya leiset chunga vah thai ding nahitai , ” ati .
01004013	Chuphat’in Cain chun Pakai jah a , “ Neipeh talen hi alen behseh tan kapoh jouhoi ahitapoi .
01004014	Na-angsunga kona neisoldoh a , leiset’a kona neidelmang ahitan , chen mun det beiya leiset’a kavathai le ding , eitoh khapen penin eitha ding ahitai , ” ati .
01004015	Ahinla Pakaiyin , “ Chuti ponte , Cain hinthat pen pen chunga sagi vei phu kila ding ahi , ” atin ; atoh kha khan atha louhel na din Cain chalpanga melchihna khat akoipeh-e .
01004016	Pakai angsunga konin Cain apotdoh-in , Eden solam gamkai , “ Vahthai gam ” sunga achengtai .
01004017	Cainin ajinu akitimatpi le agaiyin , chapa khat ahingin , Enoch asah-e . Cain chun khopi khat asemdoh-in achapa min aputsah-in , Enoch asah-in ahi .
01004018	Enoch chun Irad ahingin , Irad-in Mahuja-el ahingin , Mahuja-el chun Methusha-el ahingin , Methusha-el’in Lemech ahinge .
01004019	Lemech chun ji ni akop , in Khatnu Adah ahin , khatjonu Zillah ahi .
01004020	Adah hin Jabal ahingin , Jabal hi ponbuh achengte le gancha ching miho penna pa ahunghi .
01004021	Jabal sopipa chu Jubal ahin , semjang saite le theile mutte chengse penna pa ahung hikhai .
01004022	Zillah hin Tubal Cain ahingin , amahin sum-eng manchah ding alhan , thih khengin apange ; Tubal Cain sopinu chu Naamah ahi .
01004023	Lamech chun ajite nijah a , “ Adah le Zillah kasei ngai lhonin , Vo Lamech jie ni kisei hi melchih lhontan ; Gollhang khat’in eiden jeh-in kathat tai .
01004024	Cain tha jeh a sagi vei phu aki lah ding le Lamech tha jeh a som sagi le sagi vei phukila ding ahi , ” ati .
01004025	Adamin ajinu akitimatpi kit le chapa khat ahing kit’in , “ Cain thapa . Abel khel’a chi khai din Pathenin chapa khat eipekit tai , ” tin anun amin Seth asah-e .
01004026	Seth-in chapa khat ahingin Enoch asah-e . Ama khanglaiya pat hin min ‘ Pakai ’ minin chibai ahinboh pantai .
01005001	Pathenin Ama lim bang banga asem mihem-Adam khanggui thusim chu hiti ahi .
01005002	Numei le pasal asemin , phatthei aboh-in , amin jong ‘ Mihem ’ asah tai .
01005003	Adam kum ja khat le somthum alhinin ama lim le melto kilo tah chapa khat ahingin , Seth asah-e .
01005004	Seth pen nungin Adam kum jaget ahinben , chanu chapa tampi ahingin ,
01005005	Kum jako le somthum lhin kumin athitai .
01005006	Seth kum jakhat le nga ahin Enosh ahingin ,
01005007	Enosh pen nungin Seth kum jaget le sagi ahinben , chanu chapa tampi ahingin ,
01005008	Kum jako le som le ni alhin kumin athitai
01005009	Enosh kum somko ahin kenan ahingin ,
01005010	kenan pen nungin Enosh kum jaget le som le nga ahinben chanu chapa tam pi ahingin ,
01005011	Kum jako le nga lhin kumin athi .
01005012	Kenan kum som sagi ahin Mahalalel ahingin ,
01005013	Mahalalel pen nungin Kenan kum jaget le som li ahinben , chanu chapa tampi ahingin ,
01005014	Kumjako le som khat lhin kumin athi .
01005015	Mahalalel kum somgup le nga ahin Jared ahingin ,
01005016	Jared pen nungin kum jaget kum jaget le somthum ahinben , chanu chapa tampi ahingin ,
01005017	Kum jaget le somko le nga lhin kumin athi .
01005018	Jared kum jakhat le somgup le ni ahin Enoch ahingin ,
01005019	Enoch pen nungin Jared kum jaget ahinben , chanu chapa tampi ahingin ,
01005020	Kum jako le somgup le ni lhin kumin athitai .
01005021	Enoch kum som gup le nga ahin Methuselah ahingin ,
01005022	Methuselah pen nungin kum jathum jen Pathen to akivop jingin , chanu chapa tampi ahinben ,
01005023	Kum jathum le somgup le nga lhingin ahinge .
01005024	Enoch ahinkho lhumkeiyin Pathento akivop jingin , Pathenin ahing laiya alah phat’iin akiholmotai .
01005025	Methuselah kum jakhat le somget le sagi ahin Lamech ahingin ,
01005026	Lamech pennungin Methuselah kum ja sagi le somget le ni ahinben , chanu chapa tampi ahingin ,
01005027	Kum jako le somgup leko lhin kumin athi .
01005028	Leamech kum jakhat le somget le ni ahin chapa khat ahingin ,
01005029	“ Pathen gaosapsa , ikhut’uva itoh gim nau hiche leiset’a kona hi hiche naosen hin eitha-ol sah diu ahi , ” tinan amin Noah asah-e .
01005030	Noah pen nungin Lamech kum janga le somko le nga ahinben , cha tampi ahingin ,
01005031	Kum ja sagi le som sagi le sagi lhin kumin athitai .
01005032	Noah kum janga ahin chapa thum ahingin ; Sem , Ham chule Japheth ahiuve .
01006001	Leiset chunga mihem hapunin apungin , cha le nao tampi ahing tauve .
01006002	Van miten mihem chanu hoitah tah ho amudoh phat’un adei dei ji din akipuiyui .
01006003	Ahivangin Pakaiyin , “ Kalhagao mihem sunga tonsot’in chengden deh ponte ; mihem hi tahsaphe bou ahin , ahinkho jong kum jakhat le som ni bou hiding ahi , “ ati .
01006004	Mihem chanu ho le van mite chihlhah ho hi chulai le khonung geiya leiset’a mihatte chu ahiuvin , khanglui laiya mihat minthang ho chu amaho ahiuve .
01006005	Leiset’a cheng mitin gitlu le niseh a thilse jeng agel’u Pakaiyin amudoh tan ,
01006006	Mihem asem’a leiset’a achensah akisih-in , alung na behseh tai ; hijeh chun kasemsa jouse , mihem geiyin leiset’a konin sugam tange , : tin Pakaiyin aseitai .
01006007	Noah chunga vang Pakai alung lhainai .
01006009	Noah hinkho chu hiti ahi : midih , akhang sunga nolnabei , Pathen to kivop jing mihem ahi .
01006010	Noah chun chapa thum ahingin , Shem , Ham , chule Japheth ahiuve .
01006011	Pathen mitmun leiset mihem abonchan aphamon , asegamtan , muntin’a pumhat jengin akinotauve .
01006012	Leiset’a cheng mihemte lam hilouva akihei gamtauvin , Pathenin avet le leiset asetsoh hel chu amudohtai .
01006013	Pathenin Noah jah a , “ Leiset pumpi hi mihemte thilse bol dimsoh ahitan , hijeh a chu abonchauva kasuhgam’a , chitin namtin leiset puma kasuhgam ding ahitai .
01006014	Gopher thingin kong innei khat kisuiyin , kong sunga chu adan danin khah tanin , asung le apo begon loijol’in .
01006015	Kong innei chu adung tong jathu , avai tong som nga chule atun tong somthuma nasem ding .
01006016	kong innei chu inchung nakhua , alhung khu tongkhat bou len ding , kong kotpi asih lama nahon a , lhong danthuma nadoa , achungnungpen , aban’a chule anoinungpen nado ding ;
01006017	leiset chunga haitheiya hing jose sumang dia keiman twiksang kaletsah ding , leiset’a ganhing namkim thisoh hel ding ahi .
01006018	Nangto vang kitepna khat kaphudoh a , naji le nachapte chule namoute chengtoh kong innei sunga nalut diu ahi .
01006019	Chule achikhai dia ganhing namkim-anu khat le achal khat-kop khat cheh kong sunga napui lut ding ahi .
01006020	Vacha hihen ganhing dang hileh , tol’a kithol ho geiya ama ama jat dungjuiya chikhai dia nakoma hung kitol lut diu ahi .
01006021	Neh thei jouse nalo khoma , nang ho le ganhing namkim neh dia nakhol khom ding ahi , ” ati .
01006022	Pathenin aseipeh bang bangin Noah-in aboltai .
01007001	Pakaiyin Noah jah a , “ Hiche khanga midih nang bou kamui , na-insung mite toh kong sunga luttan .
01007002	Satheng jat khat’a konin kop sagi-anu khat le achal khat cheh to , saboh jat khat’a konin vang kop khat bou-anu khat achal khat cheh lan ,
01007003	Vacha jat a konin kop sagi cheh leiset’a achikhai din kong sunga kai lut’in .
01007004	Ni sagi lhinteng nisom le jan som li sunga go kajuh sah-a , kasemsa ahing thei jouse kasuh mang hel ding ahitai , ” ati .
01007005	Pakaiyin aseipeh chan abang bangin Noah-in aboltai .
01007006	Leiset chunga twisanglet chun Noah kum jagup alhingtai .
01007007	Twisanglet’a hoidoh na din Noah le ajinu , achapte le ajiteu kong sunga alut tauve .
01007008	Pathen thupeh bangin satheng le sangboh kop khat che-anu khat le achal khat cheh toh , vachate le tol’a kithol ho geiyin ,
01007009	ni nin Noah to kong sunga akijot lut tauve .
01007010	Ni sagi jouvin leiset’a twisang alentai .
01007011	Noah kum jagup lhin kum , lha ni na , nisom le sagi lhin nin twinah jouse ajal tan , van a gokot jouse jong akihong tai .
01007012	Chutah-in ni som li jan som li sung in go aju ju jenge .
01007013	Hiche nikho le lea chu Naoh le ajinu , achapate-Shem , Ham chule Japheth le ajiteu kong sunga lut ahiuve .
01007014	Ganhing namkim , insa le gamsa , alen aneo , vacha namkim ,
01007015	Akop kop’in kong sunga alut’un ,
01007016	Anu khat achal khat cheh , Pathenin Noah to akijot lut tauve . Noah alut phat’in Pakaiyin kongkot akhah tai .
01007017	nisom li le jan som li sungin leiset’a go ajun , twi apomtou tel tul’in Leiset sanga sang jon kong alet doh tai .
01007018	Leiset chung twi adimtel tul jengin , along matsoh tan , kong jong twi chunga akitol le lei .
01007019	Twi atamval’in van noiya molsang jouse geiyin achupsoh tai .
01007020	Twi chu akhang tou tou nalaiyin , molsang jouse sangin tongsom le ngan asangjoi .
01007021	Hijeh chun leiset ganhing namkim-ju le va , ahon honin , mihem geiyin athisoh heltauve .
01007022	Tolgoa cheng ganhing nah hai thei jouse athisoh tauve .
01007023	Leiset’a hing thei mihem le ganhing namkim , ju le va , tol’a kithol ho le chunga leng jouse Pakaiyin asugamin , Noah le kong sunga aumpi chengse chubou asoh chauve .
01007024	Ni jakhat le som nga sung geiyin twi akemsuh hih laiye .
01008001	Noah le kong sunga aumpi ganhing chengse Pathenin agel khoh jingin , Leiset chunga hui anun sah le twi akemsuh pantai .
01008002	Twinah jouse le van’a go-kot chengse akikhah-in , go ahaiyin kho aphan ,
01008003	Ni jakhat le som nga sungin leiset’a twi akang hei hoitai .
01008004	Lha sagi lhin na , nisom le ni sagi lhin nin Ararat lhanga molvum khat’a kong aki-ngamtai .
01008005	Twi vang akemsuh jing jengin , lha som lhinna , ni masapen nin molvum jouse akimu theitai .
01008006	Nisom li lhin nin Noah-in kong bangkot khat ahongin ,
01008007	va-ah khat alha leh , leiset’a twi akanloulai jeh-in adung avaiyin alenglenahung kile kit tai .
01008008	Twi kan le kan lou hetnan Noah-in vakhu khat alha kit leh ,
01008009	Leiset pumpi twiyin achup nah laijeh-in vakhu chun touna ding aholmon kong lama ahung kile kit ; in , Noah-in agahsang lhan kong sunga achoilut tai .
01008010	Noah ni sagi akho ngaiyin , vakhu chu alha kit leh ,
01008011	Nilhah lamin vakhuchun amuh a olive thing nathah khat ahinpon , ahenga ahung kile kit’e . Hichea hin Noah-in leiset’a twi kan ahe-tai .
01008012	Noah-in ni sagi ma a-ngah-in vakhu chu alhadoh kit leh , hichea vang hin vakhu chu ahenga ahung kile kit tapoi .
01008013	Noah kum jagup le khat lhin kum , lha masapen , ni masa nin leiset’a twi akangsoh-in , Noah-in kong inchung khu ahodoh a avet leh , leiset chung twi akangsoh heltai .
01008014	Lha ni na nisom ni le sagi lhin nin leiset chung twi akang goheltan ahi .
01008015	Pathenin Noah jah a ,
01008016	“ Najinu le nachapate chule ajiteu toh kong sunga konin potdoh tauvin .
01008017	Naumpi ganhing namkim-ju le va , tol’a vah tahsaa hing jouse , apunjal’uva leiset adimsetna diuvin hinkai doh tan , ” ati .
01008018	Hijeh chun konga konin Noah le ajinu , achapate le ajiteu apotdoh tauve .
01008019	Ganhing ho jong , tol’a kithol ho le vachate , leiset’a lhale jouse kong sunga konin akop kop’in ahung potdoh tauve .
01008020	Noah-in Pakai din maicham khat asemin , gancha theng le vacha theng lah akonin khat cheh adongkhomin , maichamphunga pumgo thilton agouvamtai .
01008021	Amuinam chun Pakai alung lhiayin alung sunga , “ Aneocha pat mihem lungthim hi asesa kahet jeh-in , mihem thilse bol man a tukal leiset hi kagaosap kit lou hel ding ahitai . Tua kasuhgam banghin ganhing ho jong sumang ta ponge .
01008022	Leiset aum laisea muchi tuphat , lho lhun phat , gamsat le gamdap phat , nipi laile phalbi lai chule sun le jan um jing ding ahi , ” ati .
01009011	Itih hijongle ganhing namkim twiya kisumang talouding , a-itih geiya jong twisanglenin leiset asuhmang lou ding ahitai .
01009012	Nangho le ganhing namkim dinga mantih neilou kitepna kaphudoh het jingnan ,
01009013	Meilhang lah a kathalpi kakoiye ; hiche hi vannoito kakitep het jingna hiding ahi .
01009014	Vanthamjol’a meilhang kajinsah teng thalpi chu kimudoh ding ,
01009015	Chule ganhing namkim-ahing jouse twilenin asuhmang louna dia nahenguva kakitepna kageldohji dingahi .
01009016	Hitia chu meilhang lah athalpi ahung kilah teng , leiset chunga ganhing jouse le kei kah a mantin neilou kitepna chu kageldoh ding ahi .
01009017	Thalpi hi ganhing namkim to kakitepna malchihna ahi , ” ati .
01009018	Kong sunga hung potdoh Noah chapate chu Shem , Ham chule Japheth ahiuvin , Ham hi Canaan pa ahi .
01009019	Hiche Noah chapa thum ho hi leiset chung cheng mihem chitin namtin penna pului ahitauve .
01009020	Noah hi loubol mi ahin , leiset’a lengpilei bol masapenin apange .
01009021	Noah-in lengpitwi adon le akhamin , aponbuh sunga del cheng louvin alumtai .
01009022	Canaan pa Hamin apa Noah del cheng louva lum amun , polama asopite ni agaseipeh-e .
01009023	Shem le Japhet-in ponsilchol khat ala lhonin , alengkouva akhai lhonin , apa del chenglouva um chu mu lounadin akihei mangin , anunglam ngan pnonbuh sunga atoi lut lhonin , apa lhon chu agakhu khum lhone .
01009024	Noah lengpitwi kham alimdoh phat’in achapa neopenin abolna chu ahedoh-in ,
01009025	Hijeh chun , “ Canaan hi gaosap chang hen , Asopite nin soh-in nei lhon hen .
01009026	Pakai , Shem Pathen vang vahchoiyin umhen , Shemin Canaan hi soh-in hinneihen .
01009027	Pathenin Japheth punsah hen , Achilhahte Shem chilhahto hung chengkhomu hen ; Canaan vang Japheth soh-in hung pang hen , ” ati .
01009028	Twisanglet nungin Noah kum jathum le som nga ahing nalaiyin ,
01009029	Kum jako le som nga lhin kumin athi .
01010001	Noah chapate Shem , Ham chule Japheth chilhah ho khanggui chu , twisanglet nungin athum’uvin chapa tampi ahing cheh-ui .
01010002	Japheth chapate chu Gomer , Magog , Madai , Javan , Tubal , Meshech chule Tiras ahiuve .
01010003	Gomer chapate chu Ashkenaz , Riphath chule Togarmah ahiuve .
01010004	Javan chapate chu Elishah , Spain , Cyprus chule Rhodes ahiuvin ;
01010005	Twikhanglen pang dunga hung cheng ho penna pului ahiuve . Hicheng hi Japheth chilhah ahiuvin , aphung phungin agamkai sung cheh a akichen’uvin , ama pao cheh akithouve .
01010006	Ham chapate chu Cush , Egypt , Libya chule Canaan ahiuve .
01010007	Cush chapate chu Seba , Havilah , Sabtah , Raamah chule Sabteca ahiiuve . Raamah chapate ni chu Sheba le Dedan ahi .
01010008	Cush-in Nimrod kiti chapa khat ahingin , leiset’a gal-hat masapenin apange .
01010009	Pakai panpi jal’in Nimrod hi sathat thei tah ahin , hijeh chun mihon , “ Nimrod bangin Pakaiyin sathat thei nahisah hen , ” akitijiuve .
01010010	Nimrod lenggam chun Babylon , Erech chule Accad , Babylon gamsunga um chengse ahopsoh keiye .
01010011	Hiche gama kon hin Nimrod Assyria gama achen , Nineveh khopi , Rehoboth Ir khopi , Calah khopi ,
01010012	chule Nineveh khopi le khopi minthang tah Calah kikah a Resen khopi aphutdoh-e .
01010013	Egypt chapate chu Lydi , Anam , Lehab , Naphtuh ,
01010014	Pathrus , Casluh chule Caphtor ahin , Caphtor hi Philistine mite penna pului ahi .
01010015	Canaan chapate chu amasan apeng masapen Sidon le Heth ahi lhonin ,
01010016	chule Canaan chilhah chu Jebus mite , Amor mite , Girgash mite ,
01010017	Hiv mite , Ark mite , Sin mite ,
01010018	Arvad mite , Zemar mite le Hamath mite ahiuve . Khonung in Canaan insung kon chengse gamtin’a akithe chan soh keiyun ,
01010019	agamgiu Sidon a pat Gerar lang jonin Gaza geiyin akilhung lut peh-in , Sodom lang jonin akilhungin , Gomorrah aphan , Admah ahinphan , chuin Zeboiim ahopan Lasha geiyin akilhung lut peh-e .
01010020	Hicheng hi Ham chihlhah ahiuvin , aphung phungin agamkai sung cheh a achengun , ama pao cheh akithouve .
01010021	Japheth upa Shem chu Hebrew mite penna pului ahi .
01010022	Shem chapate chu Elam , Asshur , Arpachshad , Lud chule Aram ahiuve .
01010023	Aram chapate chu Uz , Hul , Gether chule Meshkek ahiuve .
01010024	Arpachshad chapa chu Shelah ahin , Shelah chapa Eber ahi .
01010025	Eber hin chapa ni ahingin , khatpa khanga hi leiset mite paocheh jeh a akikhen jeh-un amin Peleg akitin , khatjo pa chu Jokatan ahi .
01010026	Joktan chapate chu Almodad , Shelph , Hazarmaveth , Jerah ,
01010027	Hardoram , Uzal , Diklah ,
01010028	Obal , Abimael , Sheba ,
01010029	Ophir , Havilah , chule Jobab ahiuvin , abonchauva Joktan chapa jeng ahiuve .
01010030	Joktan chapate gamgi chu Mesha a pat Sephar lang jonin solam thing lhang gamsung geiyin akilhung lutpeh-e .
01010031	Hicheng hi Shem chilhah ahiuvin , aphung phungin agakai sung cheh a achengun , apao cheh akithouve .
01010032	Hiche miho hi ama ama jat dungjui le akondoh nau insung dungjuiya kisimtoh Noah insung kon cheh ahivin , twisanglet nunga leiset chung mihem hijat hi amahoa kondoh jeng ahiuve .
01011001	Hiche laichun leiset miten paokhat seh athon , thu cheng jong tha khat amanguve .
01011002	Mihemte chu niso lama akitol leu leh Babylon gama phaicham khat’a ahung lut’uvin , hikoma chun achengtauve .
01011003	Amaho khat le khat akihouvun , ” Hungun , cheh dengu hitin goutah lhengu hite , ” atiuvin ; song panna pangdin cheh adenguvin , song lou din leingan amangui .
01011004	Mihon , ” khopi khat semu hitin , insang , atingvum vanto kibang khat sau hitin imin kithansah-u hite , achutiloule leiset chunga ikimoh thethang gam diu ahi , ” atiuve .
01011005	Mihemte khopi sem le insang sah chu vedin Pakai ahung kum lhai .
01011006	Hichea hin Pakaiyin , “ Mihemte hi jat khat bou ahin , pao khatseh bou athouve ; athilbol’u hi tua bana abol diu apatna bou ahinalaiyin , tukal abolnom nom abol jeng diu dol ahitai !
01011007	Kum lhau hitin apaovu gasucheh leu hen khat le khat kihou mon um’uvin tin atohban haitauvinte , ” ati .
01011008	Hitia hi Pakaiyin miho chu leiset chunga ahtecheh soh phat’in akhopi sah ban ahaitauve .
01011009	Hikoma kona hi Pakaiyin mihemte pao asuh cheh a , leiset chunga athe chehsoh hel jeh-in akhopi min Babylon akisah lot tai .
01011010	Shem chilhah ho hiti ahi . Twisanglet nung kum ni lhin kum , Shem kum jakhat ahin achapa Arpachshad ahinge .
01011011	Arpachshad pen nungin Shem kum ja nga ahingin , chadang tampi ahinbei .
01011012	Arpachshad kum somthum le nga alhinin achapa Shelah ahingin ,
01011013	Shelah pen nungin Arpachshad kum ja li le thum ahingin , chadang tampi ahinbei .
01011014	Shelah kum somthum alhinin achapa Eber ahingin ,
01011015	Eber pen nungin Shelah kum ja li le thum ahing nalaiyin , chadang tampi ahinbei .
01011016	Eber kum somthum le li alhinin achapa Peleg ahingin ,
01011017	Peleg pen nungin Eber kum ja li le somthum ahing nalaiyin , chadang tampi jong ahinbei .
01011018	Peleg kum somthum alhinin achapa Reu ahingin ,
01011019	Reu pen nungin Peleg kum ja ni le ko ahing nalaiyin , chadang tampi jong ahinbei .
01011020	Reu kum somthum le ni alhinin achapa Serug ahingin ,
01011021	Serug pen nungin Reu kum ja ni le sagi ahing nalaiyin , chadang tampi jong ahinbei .
01011022	Serug kum somthum alhinin achapa Nahor ahingin ,
01011023	Nahor pen nungin Serug kum ja ni ahing nalaiyin , cha dang tampi jong ahinbei .
01011024	Nahor kum som ni le ko alhinin achapa Terah ahingin ,
01011025	Terah pen nungin Nahor kum jakhat le som le ko ahing nalaiyin , chadang tampi jong ahinbei .
01011026	Terah kum som sagi alhinin Abram le Nahor chule Haran ahinge .
01011027	Terah chilhah ho khanggui chu hiti ahi ; Terah-in Abram le Nhor chule Haran ahingin ahi . Haran hin Lot ahinjou ,
01011028	Apa Terah hinpet’in Babylon gamsung achena khopi Ur a athitai .
01011029	Abramin Sarai akichenpin . Nahorin Haran chunu Milcah akichenpi : Haran hin Iscah jong ahingin ahi .
01011030	Sarai achingin cha neilouvin aumtai .
01011031	Terah hin achapa Abram le amou nu Sarai-Abram jinu , atupa Lot-Hanran chapa akipuiyin , Babylon gama Ur khopi dalhan Canaan gam jonin achetauve . Amahon Haran ahinphauvin , hikoma chun achengtauve .
01011032	Haran a chun Terah kum ja ni le nga alhinin athitai .
01012001	Pathenin Abram jah a , “ Nagam leiset le naphung nachang , na-insung mite dalhan , keiman kavetsah got gam jonin chen .
01012002	Keiman nachilhah tampi kahisah a , nam lentah kaso ding , phatthei kaboh a min thang tah a ka koi ding , chu teng nangma phatthei bom nihi ding ahi .
01012003	Nangma phatthei na boh te phatthei kaboh a , Nagaosap jouse kagaosap thuh ding ; Nang jeh achitin namtin phatthei kaboh ding ahi , ” ati .
01012004	Abram kum som sagi le nga ahin , Pakaiyin aseipeh bangin , Haran a konin akipatdoh-in , Lot chun akilhonpi .
01012005	Abramin ajinu Sarai le asopipa chapa Lot akipuiyin , Haran a alamdoh gou jouse pon , soh chengse to kilhonin Canaan gam jonin achetauve . Canaan gam ahung lhun phat’un ,
01012006	Shechem muntheng lai , Moreh muna gangpi theng phung ahinphah kahsen Abramin gamsung chu akhol khol jenge . Hichepet hin gamsunga Canaan miho anachenguve .
01012007	Abram henga Pakai ahungkilah-in ajaha , ” Nason nachilhahte kapehgot gam chu hiche hi ahi , ” ati . Hichun ahenga hung kilah Pakai din Abramin maicham phung khat hikoma chun asemdoh tai .
01012008	Chujouvin Bethel khopi nisolam , lhanglam thinglhang gam manon Abram achen , nilhum lama Bethel le niso lama Ai kikah a ngahmun akisemtai . Hikoma jong hin maicham khat asemin Pakai minin ataove .
01012009	Hiti hin Abram muntin’a avah len , Canaan gamsung lhanglam gamkai sung ajontai .
01012010	Canaan gamsunga kel lhah jeh a ahhsat behseh phat’in Abram puhsuiya khopem din Egypt gam jonin achesuh-e .
01012011	Egypt gamsung alut ding konin Abramin ajinu Sarai jah a , ” Veteh , mitvet’a numei mel-hoi tah nahi kahei .
01012012	Egypt miten namu tengu keiji nahi heuvintin , kei eithauva , nang nakihoi diu ahi .
01012013	Nang jeh a eihing hoijuva eibol phatna diuvin kei naovin kiseiyin , ” ati .
01012014	Abram Egypt gamsung alut phat’in Egypt mite mitvet’in jong ajinu chu numei mel-hoitah ahi nget’e .
01012015	Pharaoh leng chapaten amudoh-un , Sarai mel-hoi dan lengpa jah a aseiyui ; hijeh chun Sarai chu leng inpia apuilut tauve .
01012016	Sarai jal’in lengpan Abram abol phan , kelngoi hon , kelchate , bong hon , sa-ngante , soh le kol chule sangonsao tampi apei .
01012017	Ahinla lengpan Abram jinu Sarai akipuijeh-in , Pakaiyin lengpa chung le a-insung mite chunga nat khoh tah alansah tai .
01012018	Hichun Pharaoh-in Abram agakousah-in ajah a , “ Idia hita neibol ham ? Hiche nu naji hitaa idia naseida ham ?
01012019	Ibol’a nanao ahi natia , jia neipuisah mong ham ? Hin hin naji hi , kipuiyin potdoh loiyin ! ” tin anotai .
01012020	Pharaoh-in amite aseipeh-in , amahon Abram le ajinu chule athil keo alokeo pumin gamsunga konin akaidoh tauve .
01013001	Abramin ajinu akipuiyin , anei jouse apon , Lot to kilhonin , Egypt’a konin Canaan lhanglam jonin achetai .
01013002	Abramin kelngoi le kelcha , bong chule sana dangka tampi aneiyinmihao tah ahitan ahi .
01013003	Canaan lhanglam gamkaiya konin akholjin len , muntin achonin , Bethel lang ahinjon’e . Masanga ngahmun asemna Bethel le Ai kikah ahinphan ,
01013004	Masanga maicham asemna muna chun Pakai min ataove .
01013005	Lot’in jong atumtah-in kelngoi le kelcha chule bong tampi le soh tampi aneiyin , a-insung mite toh ahiuve .
01013006	Abram le Lot’in gancha tamtah gel anei lhon phat’in , ganchate neh ding gam aneo behseh tan acheng khom thei lhon tapoi .
01013007	Abram gancha ching ho le Lot gancha ching ho akinahso tauvin , akitohmo tauve . hichepet hin Canaan gamsunga Canaan mite le Periz mite acheng nalaiyui .
01013008	Abramin Lot jah a , “ Insung khat kihi , namite le kamite kina thei pouvinte .
01013009	Kikhenta hite . Na-angsunga gam ongmo ngap lou , nadei dei lai kilhenin ; jetlam nalhen le veilama cheng ting , veilam nalhen le kei jetlama chenge , ” ati .
01013010	Lot akhodaa avet leh , Jordan phaicham pumpi , Zoar geiyin agah mun , twi atha lhingin , Pakai honsung le Egypt gamsung abang jengin ahi . Hichepet ” a chu Pakaiyin Sodom le Gomorrah asuhmang loulai ahi .
01013011	Hi jeh chun Lot’in Jordan phaicham pumpi akilhenin , nisolam jonin akitoldoh tai . Hitia cuh Abram le Lot kikhen ahilhon’e .
01013012	Abram Canaan gama acheng denin , Lot chu Jordan phaichama khopi ho lah a chun apansan , Sodom koma ngahmun asem’e ;
01013013	Sodom kho mite chu a-engseuvin , Pakai dounan achonseuve .
01013014	Lot’in adalhah nungin Pakaiyin Abram jah a , ” Nadin mun laitah akonin najet navei , sah le lhang vegolsoh keiyin ;
01013015	Gam hitepi nang le nason napah kapeh ding , tonsot’a nagamu hiding ahi .
01013016	Nason nachilhah hapuna kapunsah ding , tam behseh jenguva leivui jat pha diu koiman asim jou lou ding ahi !
01013017	Keiman agam pumpia kapeh tah ding jeh-in , kipatdoh-in abonchan gakholsoh keiyin , ” ati .
01013018	Chuphat’in Abram jong achen , Hebron a Mamre thingphung theng ho koma chun apansan , hikoma chun Pakai din maicham khat asemtai .
01014001	Hiche lai hin Babylon lengpa Amraphel le Ellasar lengpa Arioch , Elam lengpa Chaedorlaomer le Goiim lengpa Tidal
01014002	akon’uvin Sodom lengpa Bera le Gomorrah lengpa Birsha , Admah lengpa Shinah le Zeboiim lengpa Shemeber chule Bela ahiloule Boar lengpa chunga gal agabol tauve .
01014003	Tulaiya Twikhanglen thisa , Siddim phaichama hiche leng nga ho hi anapangkhom’uve .
01014004	Kum som le ni sungin leng nga ho hi Chedorlaomer lengpa noiya alut lo tauvin , nah nah-in kum som le thum kumin ahindou pan thei bep’ui .
01014005	Ahinla kum som le li lhin kumin Chedorlaomer le apanpi leng ho ahung kon’uvin , Ashteroth Karnaim a Rephaim mite ajouvun , Ham mun’a Zuzim mite ajouvun , Kiriathaim phaiya Emim mite ajouvun ,
01014006	Edom molsang lhanga Hor mite ajouvun , nelgam pamchim a Elparan geiyin agadel jampeh-uve .
01014007	Chua konin ahung kile kit’uvin , masanga ‘ Enmishpat ’ kiti , tulai Kadesh mun a khun ahunguve . Hikoma hin Hazazon Tamar a cheng , Amor mite le Amalek mite ajouvun agam pumpi alauve .
01014008	Hichun Sodom le Gomorrah , Admah , Zeboiim chule Bela leng ho akikhom’un Siddim phaiya galbol din akigotauve .
01014009	Leng nga hin Elam le Goiim , Babylon , Ellasar-leng li dou din agouve .
01014010	Siddim phai hi bon-ngan bol adimset’in , Sodom le Gomorrah lengpa galmun’a kona ajam lhon le bolsunga alha lut lhontan , leng dang thum vang chu molsang lama ajamdoh tauve . ”
01014011	Leng li hon Sodom le Gomorrah khopi sunga thilkeo ijakai , anneh geiyin akichom’un achetauve .
01014012	Amahon Sodom khoa cheng , Abram sopipa chapa , Lot jong gal-hingin akaiyun , athilkeo jouse jong akipoh thauve .
01014013	Gal’a hung jamdoh mi khat’in thilsoh chengse hi Hebrew mi Abram jah a ahung seitai . Hichepet hin Abram hi Amor mi Mamre thingphung theng ho koma anachenge . Mamre’n sopi Eshcol le Aner aneiyin-Abram to pangkhom cheh ahiuve .
01014014	Asopipa chapa min gal-hinga akaimang jeng ajah phat’in Abramin ainsung mi galbol thei cheh akhop le , jathum le som le get alhingun , ama lamkai nan leng li ho chu Dan geiyin agadel peh-ui .
01014015	Abramin asepaite chu aloi loiyin ahomkhenin , agalte chu janlaiyin anokhumin ajoutai , chu leDamascus sah lam , Hobah geiyin agadel jampeh-uve .
01014016	Abramin asopipa chapa Lot le numei chapang joouse ahin puiyin , athilkeo anei agou chengse le athil chomdoh-u abonchan ahin nungpoh kit’e ,
01014017	Chedorlaomer le leng dang ho agajoa ahung kile kit chun ‘ lengpa phaicham ’ kisah Shaveh phaiya Sodom lengpan Abram analamtoi .
01014018	Chule Pathen Chungnungpen Thempupa , Salem lengpa Melchizedek chun Abram din changlhah le lengpitwi ahinchoipeh-in ,
01014019	phatthei boh nan ajah a , “ Van le leiset sem , Chungnungpen Pathenin Abram phatthei boh hen !
01014020	Nagalte josah Chungnungpen Pathen chu vahchoiyin um hen ! ” ati . Abramin athil chomdoh jat hopsom a hop khat cheh Melchizedek apei .
01014021	Sodom lengpan Abram henga , “ Nathil chomdoh chengse chang denin lang , kamite vang neipen , ” tin athum’e .
01014022	Sodom lengpan jah a Abramin , “ Van le leiset sem , Chungnungpen Pathen , Pakai angsunga khut tunga kihahselsa kahi ,
01014023	‘ Abram kahaosah-e , ’ nati louna din , patse jang cha hihen , kengchot khao jang cha hijongle , nang thil pou pou laponge .
01014024	Gollhang ho nehdoh le kalhonpi ho lahdoh tilou adang ima ding katipoi ; kapanpi Aner le Eshcol chule Mamre’n vang achan ding dol kilah cheh-u hen , ” ati .
01015001	Hicheng nung hin Abramin mu anei pet’in Pakaiyin ajah a , “ Kicha hih-in Abram , nang dial um a kisung kahin , kipaman tampi namu tei ding ahi , ” ati .
01015002	Abramin , “ Thaneitah Pakai , cha le nao neilou kei tobang dinga kipamaan chu ijajong phachom ding ham ? Kagou jeng jong hi Damascus khoa Eliezerin alo ding dan ahibouve .
01015003	Cha la neihinsah pon , kasohte khat hin kanei le kagou jouse alo ding ahitai , ” ati .
01015004	Hichun Pakaiyin ajah a , “ Hiche soh Eliezer khun nanei nagou alo louhel ding , nachapa mong mongin nagou alo ding ahinai , “ ati .
01015005	Pakaiyin inpo lama apuidoh-in , “ Van a ahsite khu gahsim gotemin ; nason nachilhah jong hijat khu hung pha diu ahi , ati .
01015006	hichea khen beihel’a Abramin Pakai atahsan jeh chun , Pakai alung lhaiyin , them achansah tai .
01015007	Pakaiyin Abram jah a , “ Babylon gam Ur khopia pat hinpuiya hiche gam nape goa Pakai chu Keima kahi , ” ati .
01015008	Abramin , “ Thaneitah Pakai , hiche gam keiya ahiding chu iti kahet ding ham ? ” tin adonge .
01015009	Adonbut nan Pakaiyin , “ kumthum lhingsa cheh bongla khat le kel la khat chule kelngoi chal khat hinkaiyin , chule vakhu khat le vapal khat hinchoiyin hungin , ” ati .
01015010	Abramin gancha ho chu Pathen henga din ahinkaikhomin , athat’in ahapsat cheh-in , ahap Langton ajamin , vachate ni vang chu asemkeh poi .
01015011	Sa ho chu muthongten ahinvel tengu Abramin adeldohjie .
01015012	Nisa lhumsuh lamin Abram nguijen juntah-in a-ihmutsoh tan , chule tijat umtah muthim lhangkhal’in ahinjin khumtai .
01015013	chutah-in Pakaiyin Abram jah a , “ Nason nachilhahte gam hi loubeh , kholgam khat’a khopem diu , gasoh changuva kum ja li sunga min genthei hesoh tah a abolgim diu ahi .
01015014	Nachilhah ho soh a vul nam mite chu ken talen kapah a , nachilhah hon nei le gou tampi kipoh a migam chu adalhah diu ahi .
01015015	Nangin hinkho nomtah naman’a , nateh thia kivui ding , napu napate heng najot ding ahi .
01015016	Nachilhahte hi khangli channa a hikoma hung kile kit diu ahi ; ajeh chu tu chan geiyin Amor mite gitlouna akichai hih laiye , ” ati .
01015017	Hiche chu photlot louvin sahap kisat ho kah a chun ahung lengjap jengin ahi .
01015018	Hiche nikho hin hikoma chun Pakaiyin Abram to kitepna asemin , “ Keiman nason nachoilhahte chu hiche gam , Egypt gamgia pat Euphrates luipi dung gei ,
01015019	Ken mite gam jouse pum , Keniz mite gam gei le Kadmon mite gam puma ,
01015020	Hit mite gam jong , Periz te gam , Rephaimite gam ,
01015021	Amor mite gam gei , Canaan mite gam , Girgash mite gam le Jebus mite gam jouse puma kapeh dia kitep kahitai , ” ati .
01016001	Abram jinu Saraiyin cha ahinpeh tapon , ahin Sarai hin Egypte numei Hagar chu soh-in anavul’e .
01016002	Hijeh chun Abram jah a , “ Keila Pakaiyin cha neilouvin eikoitan , cha eihinpeh khat leh , kasoh nu-nugah khutoh galumkhomin , ” ati . Sarai sei chu Abram anomtai .
01016003	Hiti hin Saraiyin asohnu Hagar chu Abram thaikem din apetai . Hiche hi Abram kum som jen Canaan gama achen nunga thilsoh ahi .
01016004	Abramin Hagar agaluppi le amanu agaitai . Hagarin agai akihet phat’in akiletsah-in Sarai anoise boltan ahi .
01016005	Chuphat’in Saraiyin Abram jah a , “ Hibanga eikinoisena gu hi nachunga chuhen ! Kenba nakikoipi din kasohnu kapen , aman agai akihet phat’in eihiti noisetai . Koijoh moa dih am Pakaiyin ikah lhona thu hintan jeng hen ! ” ati .
01016006	Abramin la Sarai jah a , “ Nakhut’a um nasohnu chu me , nadei deiyin bol jeng tang-em , ” atipeh-e . Hijeh chun Saraiyin Hagar chu thohda daa abolgim leh , ajammang lo tai .
01016007	Shur jotna lampia twisam phung khat’a Pakaiya kon Vantil khat’in Hagar akimupin ,
01016008	ajah a , “ Sarai sohnu Hagar , hoiya kona hoilam jon ding nahim ? ” tin adonge . Hagarin , “ Kapi Sarai dalha hung jam kahi , ” ati .
01016009	Vantil chun , “ Napi henga kile kit’in asoh-in gapang kittah , ” ati .
01016010	Pakaiya kon Vantil’in Hagar jah a hitin jong aseiye , “ Keiman koima cha simsen lou son le pah kapeh ding na hi .
01016011	Chapa khat nahin ding ahin , hesoh a nataona Pakaiyin asanjeh a amin Ishamael nasah ding ahi .
01016012	Nachapa vang chug am sa-ngan ngol’a ngol ding , mitin adouva , mijousen ama aledou diu ; ainsung mite to kikhena chang chen ding ahi , ” ati .
01016013	Hagarin ajah a thusei Pakai chu aminin akouvin , “ Mi mudoh thei Pathen nahi , ” ati . Ajeh chu , “ Tahbeh monga ken Pathen kamua ahivanga hing nalai kahim ? ” ati .
01016014	Hijeh a hi mihon Kadesh le Bered kikah a twikul chu , “ Eimudoh a Hing jing Pa twikul , ” atiu ahi .
01016015	Hagarin Abram chapa khat ahinpeh-in , Ishmael asah-e .
01016016	Hichepet hin Abram kum somget le gup alhing tai .
01017001	Abram kum somko le ko alhinin ahenga Pakai ahung kilah-in ajah a , “ Keima Hatchungnung Pathen kahi , kathunnungin thildih bol’in .
01017002	Nangto Kitepna kasema , nachilhah hapuna kapunsah ding ahi , ” ati .
01017003	Hichun Abram tol’a abohkhup jengle , Pathenin ahenga ,
01017004	“ Hiche hi nahenga kakitepna ahi : Chitin namtin penna pa nahi ding ;
01017005	namin jeng jong Abram hitalouva Abraham hiding ahi , ajeh chu chitin namtin penna paa kasem nahi .
01017006	Nachilhah mihem hapuna kapunsah a , abang bang jong leng le lal hung chang diu , nason napah tam behseh jenga nam lentah tah hungsoh diu ahi .
01017007	“ Nang le khonung geiya nachilhahte , akhang khanga , tonsot teiya kakitepna chu kanit jing ding ahi . Nang Pathen jong kahiya , nachihlhahte Pathen jong kahi ding ahi .
01017008	Tua nakhopemna gamsung hi nang le nachilhahte kapeh ding ; Canaan gam pumpi hi chilhah mite changuva , tonsot geiya apua pang diu , chu le Keima a-pathenu kahi ding ahi , “ ati .
01017009	Abram jah a Pathenin , “ Nahenga kakitepna hi nang nahin , khonunga nachilhah ho hijongle nanit soh kei diu ahi .
01017010	Nang le na chilhah ten na lah-uva pasal jouse chep natan cheh diu ahi .
01017011	I-kah lhon a kitepna het jingna dia nangin chep natan ding ,
01017012	nakhang lhumkeiyuva , nachilhah insunga pengden mong hihen , suma kicho soh-midang hijongle , pasal jouse chu niget lhin nia chep natan cheh diu ahi .
01017013	Insung pengden hihen soh a kicho hijongle pasal jouse chap natan diu ahi . Hitia hi kakitepna chu natahsa vuna naput’uva , tonsot’a um jing jeng ding ahi .
01017014	Keito kitepna suhkeh a chep tanlou pasal koi hileh kamite lah a kisimtha louhel ding ahi , ” ati .
01017015	Abraham jah a Pathenin , “ Najinu min Sarai tilouva , tukal Sarah natijohding ahitai .
01017016	ama hi ken phatthei kaboh teng , chitin namtin penna nu hung hi ding , chule achilhahte lah a leng le lal jong hung pengdoh ding ahi , ” ati .
01017017	Abraham tol’a aboh khup’in , “ Kum jakhat lhingsa pasal’in cha anei mong ding hiya , kum somko nunga Sarah-in cha anei thei mong ding ham ? ” tia agel le , amoh nuijat lo tai .
01017018	Abrahamin Pathen koma , “ Ishameal chu kagou nalosah jengle iti-am ? ” ati .
01017019	Ahinla Pathenin , “ Ahipoi . Najinu Sarah hin chapa khat nahinpeh tei tei ding , amin Issac nasah ding ahi . Kakitepna chu ama le achilhahte dinga , tonsot geiya kanit jing ding ahi . Hichu kitepna guitan mo ahi .
01017020	Ishamael ding nasei jong kahenai , phatthei kaboh a cha le nao son leh pah tampi kapeh ding , lengvai pothei cheh pasal som le ni ahin ding , achilhah mite nam lentah kaso ding ahi .
01017021	Ahinla khovei tulai phat’a Sarah-in ahinding nachapa Issace chunga bou kakitepna kaphudoh ding ahi , ” ati .
01017022	Abraham jah a thu aseisoh phat’in Pathen chu akaltoutai .
01017023	Abrahamin Pathen thusei anit’in achapa Ishmael leh a-insung mi pasal jouse , a-insunga pengden hihen suma achoh ho hijongle , soh pasal geiyin , hiche nikho le le chun chep atanpeh soh keiye .
01017024	Chep akitan chun Abraham kum somko le ko alhingtai ,
01017025	achapa Ishmael kumsom le thum alhinge .
01017026	Anilhonin nikhat’in chep akitan lhonin ,
01017027	Abraham soh pasal jouse jong ahiuve .
01018001	Mamre thingphung theng mun achenna a , nisa hahsat jeh a ponbuh kotphungbul’a atoupet’in Abraham henga Pakai ahung kilah-in ,
01018002	Abramham akhodaa agahvet leh , pasal thum anadinguve . Amu mun alamdot din alhaidoh paiye . Tol’a aboh khup’in ,
01018003	“ Kapu , nang jen dia hikoma ki-uma , ka-in hopa louvin neijot pai hih beh-in .
01018004	Nakeng dopna diu twi hindom ing ting , hikom thingphung noiya hin kicholdo’uvin .
01018005	Ka-in hinhopa ngal tauva , ikhat beh jong bolpeh ung ting , najin nauva natha nei theina diuvin na kamkhat beh jong nehsah unge , ” ati . Miho chun , “ Kipa aume , naseibangin hinboltan , ” atiuve .
01018006	Lungkin tah-in Abraham ponbuh sunga alut’in Sarah jah a , “ Nachangbonh neldi phapen dip’a konin atena thum tedoh-in , changlhah phabep hinkang loi temin , ” agatin ;
01018007	chuin bonghon lah a alut’in bongnou hoisel athao khat amanin , sohpa khat apen , aman jong athat’in ahon min loutai .
01018008	Abrahamin bongnoi le theilhum kihal , bongnoi twi chule bongnousa minsa chutoh ahindomin , miho angsunga aluiyin , thingphung noiya chun aneh laiseuvin amatah ajenlen apange .
01018009	Amahon Abraham jah a , “ Najinu Sarah la ? ” atiuleh ; aman , “ Ponbuh sunga khun aum nai , ” ati .
01018010	Jinpan , “ Khovei tulai phat , nahenga kahung kit teng le najinu Sarah-in chapa khat ahinding ahi , ” ati . Anung , ponbuh kotpunga chu Sarah uma angai lhih ahi .
01018011	Abraham le Sarah ateh lheh lhontan , Sarah chu athinei jong atangtai .
01018012	Hichun Sarah-in Alungthimin , “ The nung voi nunga kitimatna ki nei jongle anopje jong imlou ding , kajipa jong tehse voisa hilou haimo ? ” ati .
01018013	Hichun Pakaiyin Abraham jah a , “ I-bol’a Sarah nuiya , ‘ Teh nung voi nunga cha kaneibeh ding hinam ? ’ ati ham ?
01018014	Pakai dia ipi ahah sa um am ? Kaseisa banga khovei tulai phat le ka hung teng Sarah-in chapa khat ahin ding ahi , ” ati .
01018015	Chuphat’in Sarah akichan akilep’in , “ Nuibon kinui louva , ” ati . Ahinla Pakaiyin , “ Ahinpoi , nanui nai , ” ati .
01018016	Amaho akipatdoh-un Sodom khopi gah vetsah theina mun khat ajon’uve ; Abraham jong alhadoh diuvin amaho akilhonpi .
01018017	Pakaiyin , “ Kathil bolgot hi Abraham impehda tange .
01018018	Ajeh chu ason achilhah mite nam hattah le nasatah hung hiya , amajeh a chitin namtin ken phatthei boh ngal ding chu .
01018019	Acha anao , ason achilhah miten kathu angaiyuva thildih le akitoh abol theina diuva hil dinga ama kilhengta . Achilhahten kathu angaivu le ken kathutep aboncha kabolpeh ding ahi , ” ati .
01018020	Hiti chun Abraham jah a Pakaiyin , “ Sodom le Gomorrah dounan thuse akihasei behseh tan , achonset nau jong aval thanghoitai .
01018021	Chesuh ing ting asset nau kisei chengse atah ajou gapho chen tange , ” ati .
01018022	Mi nin chukom adalhan Sodom lang ajon lhontai ; Pakaiyin vang Abraham aumpi .
01018023	Hichun Abrahamin Pakai anailut’in ajah a , “ Mona beiho chu chonsete toh nasuhgam tha tahbeh ding ham ?
01018024	Ijemtia khopia khun themmona bei mihem som nga um jongle akho pumpin nasugam nah nah dem ? Mihem som nga um jongle akho pumpin nasugam nah nah dem ? Mihem som nga huhdohna khopi chu na hinghoi lou ding ham ?
01018025	Nangin midih le migilou kibanga nabol’a nathagel ding , akikhetna beiya nabol ding vang bolda hel le chun kadeiye ! Leiset pumpi thutan Pan adih a atan lou ding ham ? ” ati .
01018026	Pakaiyin , “ Sodom khopia themmona bei mihem som nga bang kamudoh joule , amaho jal’a kho pumpi kahinghoi ding ahi , ” ati .
01018027	Abrahamin asei kit’in “ Pakai , imacha lou , leivui le meivam bep ken ngamtah a na henga thu kaseijom kit ding jeh-in nei-ngaidamin .
01018028	Khosunga chun themmona bei mihem som nga lhing lel hen som li le nga she umta leh , midih nga lhahsam jeh chun kho pumpi nasugam jeng dem ? ” ati . Pakaiyin , “ Midih som li le nga ka mudoh le khopi chu sugam ponge , “ tin adonbut’e .
01018029	Abraham , “ Ijemtin somli she hile la ? ” tin adonge . Pakaiyin , “ Som li she um jongle khopi chu sumang ponge , ” ati .
01018030	Abraham , “ Pakai , lung himo hih beh-in , kasei kit nom’e . Ijemtin somthum sehseh umta leh ? ” ati . Pakaiyin , “ Somthum jeng kamu jongle bolda tange , “ ati .
01018031	Abrahamin , “ Pakai , imacha lou , leivui le meivam bep ken ngamtah a nahenga thu kaseijom kit ding jeh-in nei-ngaidamin . Ijemtin midih som ni seh bou umta leh ? ” tin adong kitleuve . Pakaiyin , “ Som ni she kamudoh jongle khopi chu sumang ponge , ” ati .
01018032	Abrahamin , “ Lung hang hih beh-in Pakai , khatvei seh bou gah sei kit tading’e . Midih som khatseh bou kimudoh le la ? ” ati . Pakaiyin , “ Midih som khatseh um jongle sumang ponge , ” ati .
01018033	Abraham to akihou jouvin Pakai chu achemangtai , chule Abraham jong in lama ahung kile tan ahi .
01019001	Vantil te ni chu Sodom khopia ahung lhun lhon le lot chu khopi kelkot phunga anatouve . Amani amu phat’in Lot chun agalamtoi . A-ang sung lhona aboh khup’in ,
01019002	“ Pu te ni , hikoma nangni kinbol dia umah kahi ; ka-in a hung lhung lhonin . Keng kisil lhonin natin nage khovah thei lhon ahi . Jingpi tah-in thou lhonin natin chepai lhon nan nate , ” ati . Amani adan , “ Ahipoi , kholai dunga geh khovah lhon tange , “ ati lhontai .
01019003	Lot’in amani chu ahajolten phat’in anom lhonin , Lot’in lam ajontauve . Maljin te ni dinga changlhah kanpeh a anneh tuitah sempeh din Lot’in alhacha ho asol’in ahi . Lhachahon neh asem jou phat’uvin an anetauve .
01019004	Maljin ten in lupna ajot masangin , khopi sung mihon in chu ahin-umtauve , In umho lah a khosung gollhang upa apang soh keiyuve .
01019005	Amahon Lot ahinkouvun , “ Tujan na-in a geh dia hung te ni chu hoiya um lhon tam ? Hinpuidoh loiyin , numei bol’a kabol diu ahi ! ” tin asamtauve .
01019006	Lot apotdoh-in kotpi anungkhan ,
01019007	miho jah a , “ Golle paite , hitobang lom hin khang gilou hih beh-uvin !
01019008	Veuvin , pasalto kitimat louhel lai chanu nu kaneiyin , anin hinpuidoh peh-uving ting nanop nop’in bol jengun , maljin te ni vang imacha lodauvin , ka-in a hung lhung kamaljin ahilhon bouve , ” ati .
01019009	Ahinla amahon ahoh lhauvin , “ nei ot’un khopempa ! I-tobang mi nahiya keiho toh ding neihil leu ham ? Nei ot’uvin , ajo le amani sanga melse cheh a nang kabol lo diu ahi , ” ati tauve . Hiti hin Lot chu anung sot’un , kotpi phung phujal ding akigotauve .
01019010	Chuphat’in insunga um ten in Lot chu akailut loi lhonin , kotpi akhah lhontai .
01019011	Kotphunga um mi alen aneo abonchauva Vantil ten in amit’u achotsah lhon leh , suhna ding helouvin akimaitho gamtauvin ahi .
01019012	Mi ten in Lot jah a , “ Hiche khosunga hi heng le kom-chanu chapa , tu le cha-adang koi koi nanei nah laiyam ? Abonchauvin puidoh loidoh loiyin ;
01019013	ajeh chu hiche mun hi kasuh mang lhon ding a hitai . Hiche miho dounaa thuse melse tah kisei chengse chu Pakaiyin ajadoh tan , hijeh a chu Sodom sumang dia eihinsol lhon ahi , ” ati lhone .
01019014	Chuphat’in achanu te nit oh kitepsa pasalte henga Lot achen , “ Kapat’un hikoma konin jamdoh loiyun ; mun hi Pakaiyin asuhmang ding ahitai , ” agate . Ahinla amanin atot danin anagel lhon’e .
01019015	Jingkah khovah lhah-in Vantil te nin Lot anoloi lhonin , “ Khopi hitoh nakisuh mang tha louna diuvin , nachanu te ni le najinu kipuiyin jamdoh loiyun , ” ati lhon’e .
01019016	Lot akinomsot nah lai vangin , Pakaiyin akhohsah jeh-in , Vantil te nin akhut’in akai lhonin , ajinu le achanu te ni pumin khopi pamlama alhoh doh lhontai .
01019017	Hichun Vantil khat chun , “ Nathi louna diuvin jamdoh loiyun ! Kinung hei hih-un , phaicham dunga jong kibangpa hih hel’uvin , thinglhang gam a jamlut’uvin , ” ati .
01019018	Lot’in adonbut’in , Ahipoi kapu , thing lhang lama neisol dauvin .
01019019	Khohsah tah a kahinkho bon huhhing ta , thing lhang lam agamla behseh-in , kalhun masanga manthah nan eihin lap den’a kathi den ding ahibouve .
01019020	Ven hiche khopi khu , naicha bou ahi , hikoma khun neijamlut sah-in , khopi neocha ahivanga hoidohna thei ahinai , ” ati .
01019021	Vantil chun , “ Aphai , hiche khopi khu suhmangda tange .
01019022	Man-gangin ! Lhaiyin ! Khukom nalhun ma imacha kabol thei lou ding ahi , ” atipeh-e . Khopi neo tinaa amin Zoar kisah ahitai .
01019023	Lot Zoar kho alhunin nisa ahung soh tai .
01019024	Phot lot louvin van a Pakaiya konin , Sodom le Gomorrah chunga Pakaiyin Kath le meikong goju bangin ajuhsah-in ,
01019025	phaicham pumpi le khopi te ni , asunga cheng mihem jouse le tol’a keh thingna louna jouse geiyin asugamhel tai .
01019026	Hichun Lot jinu agah kinunghei leh , chilhang asoh-in , songkhom bangin akitungdentai .
01019027	jingkah matah-in Abraham alhaijel’in , Pakai masanga anadin na muna chun agadingin ,
01019028	Sodom le Gomorrah gamkaise se agah vetsuh patep leh , hol kilhut khu bangin meikhu ahung kitungdoh jen jun jengtai .
01019029	Pathenin Lot chenna , phaicham akhopi te ni asuhmang jeng vangin Abraham agel khoh jeh-in Lot chu ahindohna thei muna ajamdohsah nai .
01019030	Zoar khoa chenden ding akichan , achanu te nit oh Lot thing lhang gama acheuvin songko sung khat’a achengtauve .
01019031	Lot cha au-nun anao nu jah a , “ I-pa la atehtan , hiche gamsunga eini kichenpi ding pasal dang jong aumpon ,
01019032	i-pa hi ju donkhamsah hitin , luppia chi khaipeh din bol hite , ” atin ;
01019033	hiche jan chun ju adonkhamsah lhonin , au-nun apa akitimetpi leh , ju akham behseh jeh-in apan ima abollam ahephapoi .
01019034	Ajingin au-nun anaonu jah a , “ Jan nilhah-in i-pa to kalumkhomtan , tujan jong ju donkhamsah hitin , nangin galuppin ; chute leh i-pa to cha inei cheh lhon ding ahi , “ ati .
01019035	Hijeh chun chuche janin jong apa ju adonkhamsah kit lhonin , acha neojo nun apa aluppin akitimatpi tai . Apa ju akham behseh jeh-in ima abollam ahephapoi .
01019036	Hiti hin Lot chanu ten in apaa konin nao avop gel lhontai .
01019037	Au-nun chapa khat ahingin amin Moab asah-e . Moab hi tulai Moab mite penna pului anahi .
01019038	Anao nun jong chapa khat ahingin amin Benammin asah-e . Ama hi tulaiya Ammon mite penna pului anahi .
01020001	Hichea kon hin Abrahamin Canaan lhanglam gam ajonsuh-in , Kadesh le Shur kikah a chengtai . Khonunga Gerar a achenlaiyin ,
01020002	Abrahamin ajinu Sarah chu anao nun alep’in , hijeh chun Gerar lengpa Abimelech chun Sarah hi aji din anapui man’e .
01020003	Jan khat Abimelech mangin Pathen ahung kilah-in , “ Nangin mi jisa hiche numei hi nakipui jeh a nathi tei tei ding ahi , ” ati .
01020004	Abimelech vang chu Sarah koma analut kha loulai ahinai ; hijeh chun aman , “ Pakai , nangin themmona bei miho jong natha jeng ding ham ?
01020005	Abraham jengin jong anaonua aseiya chule aman jong chutimaa asei ahi . Hijeh a chu lung thengsel’a kabol’a , thil dihmo kabol loulai ahi , “ ati .
01020006	Amangin Abimelech chu Pathenin adonbut’in , “ Adih-e , lung thengsel’a nabol ahi kahenai ; hijeh achu kadoumah ten chonsetna chu bolsah louva , tugeiya hiche nu hi tongkha louva kakoi nahi .
01020007	Tun vang ama hi ajipa nungpeh tan . Hichepa khu Themgao ahin , aman nataopeh teng thi tapon nate . Nanungpeh lou vangle , kagih dim demsa nahi , nang jong namiten jong nathilo tei tei diu ahi , ” ati .
01020008	Ajing jingkah matah-in Abimelech chun alhacha chengse akoukhomin thilsoh jouse abonchan aseipeh leh , akinlih leu jengui .
01020009	Hijeh chun Abimelech-in Abraham akouvin , “ I-neilou ham ? Ipi adih louva kabolpeh khah a kei le kalenggam chunga hitobang manthahna hi nahinpoh lut jeng ham ? Eikibolna louhel ding khat’a neibol ahi .
01020010	Idinga hita chu neibol mong mong ham ? ” tin adongtai .
01020011	Abrahamin adonbut’in , “ Hikoms Pathen tahsan mi aum dingla kagel loujeh a kajinu deichatnan eitha louvinte kati ahi .
01020012	Atah beh a jong ama hi kasopi ahinai . Kanu hin mong ahilou vangin kappa chanu ahin , jia kanei jeng ahibouve .
01020013	Hijeh a chu Pathenin kapa insung dalhaa gam choma eihinsoldoh a pat , ‘ Nei ngailut phot chetnan mi jouse henga nasopin neiseiyin ’ tia kahilsa mong jong anahi , ” ati .
01020014	Abimelech-in Sarah chu Abraham anungpeh-in , kelngoi le gancha dang chule soh te jong apeh thai .
01020015	Abraham jah a , “ Ven , namuphah chan hi kei gamsung ahi , nadei lai laiya chengin , “ ati .
01020016	Sarah jah a Abimelech chun , “ Ven , nasopipa dangka sang khat kapen , hiche hi nakoma um chengse mitmua jum ong huhna kapeh ahin , japi angsunga them nakichan ahitai , ” ati .
01020017	Chuphat’in Abrahamin pathen henga ataopeh le , Abimelech le ajinu adamsah-in , soh numei ho geiyin adamsah-in amahon cha ahingtauve .
01020018	Ijeh-inem itile Abraham jinu Sarah jal’a abimelech insung numei jouse chu Pathenin chahingmoa anakoi ahi .
01021001	Sarah chu ateppehsa bangin Pakaiyin phatthei ahungboh-in ,
01021002	Abraham ateh nungin Sarah agaiyin chapa khat ahinpeh tai . Achapa chu Pathenin ateppeh dontah a chu hung peng ahi .
01021003	Abrahamin amin Isaac asah-in ,
01021004	Pathen seibangin apenjou niget lhin nin Abrahamin achapa Isaac chu chep atanpeh-e .
01021005	Isaac pen chun Abraham kum jakhat alhingtai .
01021006	Sarah-in , “ Pathenin eikipehsah a einuisah ahitan , ajapha chan nuiya eikipapi ding ahitai , ” ati .
01021007	Aman , “ Sarah hin cha le nao hinga nao noi chepsah dia koipenin Abraham anaseipeh ngam dem ? Ahin la atehset nungin keiman Abraham chapa khat kahinpeh tai , ” tin jong aseiye .
01021008	Isaac akhondoh a noichep aban phat’in Abrahamin naolop golvah loupi tah abol’e .
01021009	Nikhat Egypt numei Hagar chapa Ishmael le Sarah chapa Isaac akichem lhon’e .
01021010	Akichep lhon aven Sarah-in Abraham jah a , ” Sohnu le achapa hi solmang tan . Sohnu chapa hi kachapa Isaac chan ding nagou halcha jong chang theiponte , ” ati .
01021011	Ishmael jong achapa ahijeh-in Abraham din Sarah thusei hi anommo lheh-e .
01021012	Ahin la Pathenin Abraham jah a , “ Sohnu le chapa din lung gimdan . Sarah sei sei chu boltan , Isaac a kona nachilhah kisimjo ding ahibouve .
01021013	Nacha ahijeh chun sohnu chapa konin jong nam khat semdoh nange , “ ati .
01021014	Jingpi tah-in Abraham athouvin changlhah alan , twipaiya twi akhumin Hagar apen , achapa akipohsaah-in asolmangtai . Hagar achen Beersheba gamthip laiya avah le lei .
01021015	Twipaiya twi adon jou lhon phat’in Hagarin Ishmael chu hampa nang noiya aleh lut’in ,
01021016	meer jakhat jen gamlan ache paiyin , atouvin , “ Kanao thi ding kave ngampoi ! ” ati . Hichepet tah chun anao chu ahung kaptai .
01021017	Nao kagin chu Pathenin ajan , Pathena kon Vantil’in Hagar jah a , “ Hagar , i-bol’a lung gim nahim ? Kicha hih-in , nao kagin chu Pathenin ajatai .
01021018	Chen lang nao khu gadomin , kipomin , lhembi loiyin , keiman ama chilhah akona nam lentah kasemdoh ding ahi , ” ati .
01021019	Pathenin Hagar mit ahasah leh , aman twikul khat amudoh paiyin , achen savun twipai dimin twi agathal’in , nao chu themkhat adonsah tai .
01021020	Nao chu akhangtou touvin , Pathenin akivoppi jinge , Paran gamthip noi jenga apansan , sadel themtah ahin ,
01021021	anun Egypt numei khat jin apuipehtai .
01021022	Hichelai hin Abimelech asepai lamkaipa phicol toh Abraham henga achen , “ Nang hi natohna chan a Pathenin napanpi .
01021023	Khopema nahung chenna hiche gamsunga kei le kachate , kason kalhah chengse chunga hepina neiya naum’a , ken kabolna bang banga nabol’a neijou bol louhelna din Pathen maiya kitep masan , ” ati .
01021024	Abrahamin , “ Kakitep’e , “ ati .
01021025	Twikhuh khat asohten alahpeh jeh-un Abimelech henga Abraham akiphin le ,
01021026	Abimelech-in , “ Twikhuh lahpeh a chu koipen hiuvam kahe hih beh-e . Seila neiseipeh pon , tua chu bou kajah ahi nalaiye , ” ati .
01021027	Hichea hin Abrahamin kelngoi phabep le bongchal phabep Abimelech apen , kinoptona asemdoh lhontai .
01021028	Abrahamin akelngoi lah a konin kelngoi sagi agahoidoh leh ,
01021029	Abimelech chun , “ Idia nagahoi khen ham ? ” tin adonge .
01021030	Abrahamin , “ Hiche twikhuh hi kei semsa ahi nanop phot chet nan hiche kelngoi sagi hi kilah-in , ” ati .
01021031	Hikoma chu ama nin kitepna anasem lhonjeh a Beersheba kisah ahi .
01021032	Hitobang kihoutohna asem chai phat’un Abimelech le Phicol Philistine gama akilekit lhontai .
01021033	Beersheba muna chun Abrahamin chah thing khat aphut’in , Pakai tonsot Pathen henga ataove .
01021034	Philistine gamsunga sottah Abraham akhopem dentai .
01022001	Phat chom khat nungin Pathenn Abraham apatep’in ajah a , “ Abraham ! ” tin akouve . Aman , “ Hikoma ka-um’e ! ” tin ahouve .
01022002	Pathenin , “ Na-ngailut tah nachapa chang khat seh Isaac chu Moriah gama puiyin , kahinko peh ding molsang khatpen pen chunga pumgo thilto kilhai nan ganeitan , ” ati .
01022003	Ajing jingpi tah-in Abraham athouvin , pugo thiltoa manchah din thing achomin sangan apohsah-in , alhacha mi nit oh Isaac apuiyun , Pathenin aseipehna mun jonin achetauve .
01022004	Nithumjen ajot nungun Abrahamin ajot nau mun chu gamla tah-in agah mupha bep nalaiye .
01022005	Lhachate ni jah a Abrahamin , kei le boipu hilampeh a khun gatao lhon ing ting , nahenguva hung kit lhon nange , ” ati .
01022006	Pumgo thiltoa tiding thinglom chu Abrahamin Isaac aputsah-in , meicho na ding song meihol le chemcha aman achoiye . Achepet lhon hin
01022007	Isaac-in , “ Hepa ! ” atileh ; aman , “ I-ham kanao ? ” ati . Isaac-in , “ Hepa , meicho na ding song meihol le tiding thinglomla aumtan , kilhaina ding kelngoi hoiba ham ? ” ati .
01022008	Abrahamin , “ Pathenin kelngoi hin ki-ngaito nante , ” atin , akijotpai lhontai .
01022009	Pathenin akipehna mun alhun lhon phat’in , Abrahamin maicham khat asemin , maicham chunga thinglom agolchan akoiyin , Isaac akantumin , maicham chunga thinglom chunga chun alupsah-e .
01022010	Hichun chemcha asatdoh-in achapa tha din agotai .
01022011	Vana Pakaiya hungkon Vantil chun , “ Abraham , Abraham ! ” tin ahinsamtai . Abrahamin , “ Hikoma ka-um’e ! ” tin ahouve .
01022012	Vantil chun , “ Chapang chu ima lodan , supop hih beh-in , Pathen nagin jeh a nachapa chang khatseh tha na dia jong khut kih louva napan kahetai , ” ati .
01022013	Abraham akiheile leh , kelngoichal khat hampa nangtom lah a aki te nia kihen amudoh-in , agakailut’in achapa khel’in pumgo thilto kilhai nan aneitai .
01022014	Hichelai mun chu Abrahamin , “ Pakaiyin thilto aki-ngaitona mun , ” asah-in , hijeh chun tuni geiyin mihon , “ Pakai molvuma aman thilto aki-ngaitona mun , ” ati jingui .
01022015	Vana Pakaiya hungkon Vantil chun anivei nan Abraham ahinkou kit’in ,
01022016	Pakai amatah kihahsel’a asei chu , “ Neigin jeh a nachapa chang khatseh chunga jong khut kih louva napan hin kei kitep’ah kahitai .
01022017	Nangman phatthei kaboh a , nason nachilhah van a ahsite jat le Twikhanglen panga neldi jat hungpha ding , namelmate ahinjosoh hel diu ahi .
01022018	Kasei nanit jeh a nason nachilhah phatthei kaboh banga hi phatthei kaboh ding deiya chitin namtin kahenga hung tao diu ahi , ” ati .
01022019	Alhachate ni henga Abraham ahung kile kit’in , Beersheba geiyin ahung kilhon’un , hikoma chun Abraham achengtai .
01022020	Phat chom khat nungin Milcah-in asopipa Nahor chapa get jen ahinpeh thu mihon Abraham ahung seipeh tauve .
01022021	Nahor chate aping masapen pa Uz ahin , anaote chu Buz , Aram pa kemuel ,
01022022	Chesed , Hazo , Pildash , Jidlaph chule Bethuel -
01022023	Rebecca pa ahiuvin , abonchan Abraham sopipa Nahor chapate , Milcah hin chengse get ahiuve .
01022024	Nahor thaikem nu Reumah-in jong Tebah ke Gaham , Tahash le Maacah ahinge .
01023001	Sarah chu kum jakhat le som ni to sagi ahingin ,
01023002	Canaan gamsung , Kir-iath-arba kiti , Hebron khoa athin , Abrahamin ajinu pul adouve .
01023003	Ajinu thilong phung dalhan Abraham achen Hit mite jah a ,
01023004	“ Keima maljin , nahenguva hung khopem kahin , kajinu long kavuina din gam leiset mun khat neichohsah-uvin , ” agate .
01023005	Hit miten Abraham jah a ,
01023006	“ Ngaitemin kapu , kalah-uva nangma Pathen tun lamkai lentah hiya , kalhan semsau phapen khat’a khun najilong vui jengin ; koi hijongle naji vuina din kipah tah-in lhan khat pejeng ung kate , ” atiuve .
01023007	Hit mite masang tol’a Abraham abohkhup’in ,
01023008	“ Hikoma kaji neivuisah nomu ahinah leh , Zohar chapa Ephron henga khun ,
01023009	aloupam chin a Machpelah songko khu neithumpeh-uvin . Hiche khu lhanmol’a kanei den din , nang ho maiya leiman lhingset’a eichohsahna din neiseipeh-uvin , “ tin angeh-e .
01023010	Kelkot phung , mipi kikhopnaa hi Hit midang ho chutoh Ephron jong toukhom ahiuvin ; mi jouse jah din ahindonbut’in ,
01023011	“ Kapu ngaitemin , lou pumpi le asunga songko pumin napenge . Najilong navuina din loumun le songko chu kamite angsung laitah a pejeng ing’e , ” ati .
01023012	Ahivang in Hit mite angsunga Abraham akunin ,
01023013	Ephron jah a chun mipi jah thei din , “ Nei ngai themin ikhat dong inge . Loumun pumpin chotange , aman alhingin kilah-in , chule kajilong jong vui inge , “ ati .
01023014	Ephronin Abraham jah a ,
01023015	“ Koi-ngaiyin kapu , dangka shekel ja li man bep leimun chu nang le kei kah a ipi tahpi ham ? Najilong chu kivuina jengin , ” ati .
01023016	Abraham anomin , Hit mite jah changtah a Ephronin aseidohsa dangka shekel ja li chu , kivei miho thiltena dungjuiyin atedoh peh tai .
01023017	Hitobanga hi Mamre niso lam Machpeleh mun a Ephron loumun le asunga songko lhan toh , loupam ching geiya keh , loulai thing jouse jong Abraham changkha ahitai .
01023018	Kikhopna hung pang Hit mi jousen jong loumun Abraham kipehdoh chu ahetpehsoh keiyui .
01023019	Canaan gamsung , chulai songko lhan sunga chun Abrahamin ajinu Sarah avuitai .
01023020	Hiti hin Hit mipa loumun le asunga songko pumin lhan din Abraham achan thatai .
02001001	Egypt jo
02001002	Reuben , Simeon , Levi , Judah ,
02001003	Issachar , Zebulun , Benjamin ,
02001004	Dan , Naphtali , Gad , chule Asher ahiuve .
02001005	Jacob inkonse se abonchauvin som sagi alhingui . Achapa Joseph vang Egypt lhungsa ahitai .
02001006	Phat chom khat nungin Joseph le asopite , chule hiche khanga mite chu athisoh taove ;
02001007	hijongle achilhah-u Israelte chun cha le nao tampi ahingun , apung lheh jenguvin , Egypt gamsung dimset’in ahunei lhehtauve .
02001008	Egypt a Joseph phatna hephalou lengthah khat ahung laltai .
02001009	Amahin amite jah a , “ Hiche Israelte hi atamval’un ahunei behseh jeh-un eiho din kihol lel aumtai .
02001010	Galbolna khat um kha le melmate ajop’uva eisat’uva pang thei , gamsunga kona jamdoh diu ahi . Apunbe be louna diuva alonaje khat het ding ahi , ” ati .
02001011	Hijeh chun Egypt miten Israelte na hahsa tohsah a suhgepsit set din ahunguva toh vaipo akoiyun , lengpa thil kholna munpi din Pithom le Rameses khopi asah sah ui .
02001012	Ahivangin Egyptten Israelte ahabol hesoh cheh-ule ahapun cheh-un , akithejao cheh jengun , gamsung alobe be jengui . Hiti hin Egypt ten Israelte akicha tauvin ,
02001013	gim genthei thoh-in natongin agoiyun ,
02001014	ada acham louvin soh goiyin agoiyun , voujang nalouhel’in insa loubol’in agoiyuve .
02001015	Egypt lengpan Hebrew numeite naodoma pang numei ni Shiphrah le Puah akihoupin ,
02001016	“ Hebrew numei ho nao nadop teng , pasal cha cha that’in , numei ho hinghoi lhonin , ” ati .
02001017	Ahinla naodom ten in Pathen agin lhon jeh-in lengpa thu anit lhonpoi , pasal ho geiyin ahinghoi lhontai .
02001018	Lengpan naodomte ni agakousah-in , “ Idia kasei ngai louva Hebrewte cha pasal ho nathada lhon ham ? tin adonge .
02001019	Naodomte nin , “ Hebrew numei ho hi Egypt numeiho tobang ahipouve , anaopen’u abaiyin , khatjoh sang kalhun masang lhonle aping lhaji tauve , ” ati lhon’e .
02001020	Pathenin naodomte ni akhoton , Israelte apunbe be jengun , ahat lheh tauve .
02001021	Naodomte nin Pathen agin lhonjeh-in Pathenin ainsung lhon phattheina apei .
02001022	Akhonnan Pharaoh-in amite jah a , “ Hebrewte cha naosen pasal peng jouse man khom’un Nile luidunga sep lut’un , naosen numei ho vang hung hoi peh-un , ” tin thu apei .
02002001	Hiche lai hin Levi pasal khat’in Levi chanu khatma akichenpi .
02002002	Ajinu hin cha pasal khat aneiyin , mel-hoi tah ahijeh-in ait behseh-in lha thum jen aseltai .
02002003	Asel lel hel phat’in , pumping nanga kisa pocha khat’a naosen chu akoiyin , twi lut thei louna din gom aloiyin , luipang pumping lah a chun akitolsah tai .
02002004	Naosen u-nun gal’a pangin ave vei .
02002005	Lengpa chanu luidunga kisil din ahungin , vapanga achele len , pumping lah a pocha amudoh phat’in , nu-ngah khat agalahsah-e .
02002006	Lengpa chanun pocha ahondoh le naosen pasal hoitah chu amun , ahung ka phat’in avoujang anan , “ Hebrewte cha hitei ding ahi , ” ati .
02002007	Hichun naosen u-nun lengpa chanu jah a , “ Naosen hi navahpeh dia Hebrew numei ho khat kagakoupeh ding ham ? ” ati .
02002008	Aman jong , “ Neigakoupeh nget-o , ” ati . Naosen u-nun anu ma ma chu agakoutai .
02002009	Hichenu jah a chun lengpa chanun , “ Naosen hi neivah peh-in , nachol man penange , ” ati . Aman jong akilah-in avah-in apangtai .
02002010	Naosen chu akikhan lhit phat’in lengpa chanu henga apuile , aman chapan akisimtai . Lengpa chanun , “ Twi lah a kalahdoh jeh-in amin Moses ah ing’e , ” ati .
02002011	Mose akhanlhit phat’a amite vea ache le , gim hesoh thoh a na hahsa atoh-u agamui . Egypt mi khat hin Hebrew mi khat atha geiyin agamudoh-in , athapa chu Mose insung mite khat ahikhai .
02002012	Mose’n jet le vei , sah le lhang avegol’in , koima amu lou phat’in Egypt mipa chu athah’in nellei lah a avuilut tai .
02002013	Ajinga ache kit le Hebrew mi ni kina kibon agatoh khai . Athemmo jep pa jah a chun Mose’n , “ I-bol’a na-Hebrew mi hipi chu navoh ham ? ” tin aphoh-e .
02002014	Aman ahin donbut’in , “ Kon nang vaipo le thutan a natun em ? Egypt mipa natha banga tha neigot ham ? ” ati . Hichun Mose jong akichan , “ Kamitha hi mihon ahetdoh ahitai , ” ati .
02002015	Pharoah-in ajahdoh phat’in Mose chu tha din aholtai . Mose ajamin Midian gamsugna cheng din achetai . Nikhat Mose chu twikul panga atoupet’in
02002016	Midian Thempupa Jethro chanu sagi jen chu apa kelngoite le kelcha te don ding twi thal’in ahungui .
02002017	Ahin kelngoiching midang phabep’in Jethro Chanute chu anodoh-un , hichea hin Mose’in akithopin , nu-ngahho ganchate chu twi achipsahsoh keiye .
02002018	Nu-ngah ho apa henga ahung lhun phat’un , apauvin , “ I-atile tunia matah a hung nahiuvam ? ” tin anadonge .
02002019	Nu-ngahhon jong , “ Egypt mi pasal khat’in kelngoi chingho eideljam peh-un , ganchate don ding twi geiyin eithalpeh-un ahi , ” atiuve .
02002020	Apauvin , “ Hoiya umtam ? I-bol’a nahin dalhah-u ham ? Gakouvun an beh nekho’u hite , ” ati .
02002021	Mose chengden din akigon , Jethron jong achanu Zipporah to akichensah-in ,
02002022	Zipporah hin chapa khat ahinpeh-e , . Mose’n jong , “ Hiche gam a khopem kahin , amin Gershom kiti ding ahi , ” ati .
02002023	Kum phabep nungin Egypt lengpa athitan , ahivangin Israelte sohchang hesoh genthei thoh-in , panpi ngaichan apeng peng jengui . Aka apen’u Pathen kom alhungin ,
02002024	Pathenin Abraham , Issac chule Jacob to akitepna chu ageldoh-e .
02002025	Pathenin Israelte sohchan , gim hesoh thoh amun athoh lel pi .
02003001	Nikhat Mose’n anupa pa Jethro , Midian Thempupa , kelngoite le kelchate chingin , gancha honte hoiyin , lhang theng , Sinai molsang aphatai .
02003002	Sinai molsanga Pakaiya kon valtil chu hamboh lah a meikouvin ahung kilah-in , hamboh meiya kouva , kavam thei louva um chu Mose’n amui .
02003003	Aman jong , “ Akidang nah-e ! Iti hamboh khu kavampai lou ham ? gave tem’inge , ” ati .
02003004	Mose’n anailut Pakaiyin amu phat’in , hamboh lah a kon chun “ Mose ! Mose ! ” tin ahinkouve . Mosen’n , “ Hoi , ka-um nai , ” ati .
02003005	Pathenin , “ Hin nailutbe tahih-in . Nakengchot kisut’in , munthenga ding nahitai .
02003006	Kei hi napu napate-Abraham , Isaac , chule Jacob Pathen kahi , ” ati . Pathen avet ngam lou phat’in Mose’n amai akitomtai .
02003007	Hichun Pakaiyin , “ Egypt gamsunga kamite engse tah a abol’u kamun , tohvai pote bolsetnaa kon huhdoh ngaicha akau kajatai . Ahesoh genthei nao kahesoh tai .
02003008	Hijeh a chu Egypt mite khut’a kona amaho huhdoh dia hung kumlha kahin , mun lentah , gam phatah , Canaan mite le Hit mite , Amor mite , Periz mite , Hiv mite chule Jebus mite chenna gamsunga puilut ding kagot ahi .
02003009	Kamite ka le pen kaja mong mongin , Egypt miten abol hesoh nau kamudoh tai .
02003010	Agamsunga kona kamite puidoh dia Egypt lengpa koma kasol nahi , ” ati .
02003011	Ahinla Mose’n Pathen kom a , “ Kei bep hi iti Egypt lengpa koma chea Israelte kagapuidoh thei ding ham ? ” ati .
02003012	Ahivangin Pathenin , “ Ken nalhonpi nange , Egypt a kona Israelte nahinpuidoh teng hiche molsang chunga hi neihou diu , hichu kei sol nahi phat chetna hi ding ahi , ” ati .
02003013	Ahinla Mose’n adonbut’in , “ Israelte henga cheng ting ‘ Napu napateu Pathenin eihinsol ahi , ’ gati jong leng , ‘ Ama chu amin ipi ham ? ’ tin eina dongun tin , chuting ipi kaseipeh thei diing ham ? ” ati .
02003014	Pathenin , “ Kei chu Kei kahijingin , naseipeh tei ding chu - ‘ KEIMA kiti chun nahenguva eihinsol ahi ’ nati ding ahi ,
02003015	Israelte jah a apu apateu Pathen , Abraham Pathen , Isaac Pathen , Jacob Pathen chun ahenguva nasol’a naseipeh ding ahi . Hiche hi tonsot’a kamin ahin , khang nu-nunga miten hiche a hi eikou diu ahi .
02003016	Israel lamkaite gakoukhomin lang , apu apateu Pathen , Abraham Pathen , Isaac Pathen chule Jacob Pathen chu nahenguva hung kilah a anseipeh ding ahi . Egypt miten abolsetnau kamu jeh a avil’uva hung kahi hi seipeh-in .
02003017	Egypt’a kona puidoh kagot ahitai , gim genthei thoh a aum nauva kona puidoh a gam phatah-Canaan mite , Hit mite , Amor mite , Periz mite , Hiv mite chule Jebus mite gamsunga puilut ding kagot ahi .
02003018	“ Naseipeh chan chu kamiten angai diu ahi . Chuteng Israel lamkaite to Egypt lengpa henga nacheuva , ‘ Pakai Hebrew te Pathen kahenguva ahung kilah-in , hiche Pakai ka-Pathenu koma chu kilhaina kabolna diuvin nithum sung din gamthip’a neisol’un , ’ nati diu ahi .
02003019	Ada achamlouva akibol ngal loule Egypt lengpan nalhadoh lou diu kahenai .
02003020	Hijongle agama chu tijat um thil datmoa , katha hangsan a Egypt mite talen kamatsah ding ahi . Chuteng Egypt lengpan nalhadoh diu ahi .
02003021	“ Egypt mite naginsah ungting , kamite akitoldoh tengu , khutgoh keova nalhadoh lou diu ahi .
02003022	Israel numei jousen achenpi le aheng akom Egypt numeiho koma nihchen ponsil le sana dangka , sanajem athum diu ahi . Athumdoh chengu chu Israelten achateu numei pasal jouse jepna aneiyuva , Egypt gamsung nei le gou apoh mang diu ahi , ” ati .
02004001	Mose’n Pakai adonbut’in , “ Israelten eitahsan dau hen kasei ngai hih leu , chule nang chu kahenga hung kilah louvin sei taleu ikati ding ham ? ” ati .
02004002	Hichea hin Pakaiyin , “ Nachoi chu ipi ham ? ” ati . Mose’n “ Kakiphu tenggol ahi , ” ati .
02004003	Pakaiyin , “ Tol’a seplha temin , ” atile ; Mose’n ase lhah lhah chun gul asoh paiyin , Mose’n ajamsan tai .
02004004	Pakaiyin Mose jah a , “ Bungin lang ameiyin kimat temin , ” atile ; Mose jong bunga akimat le , kiphu thei tenggol asoh kittai .
02004005	Pakaiyin , “ Pakai apu apateu Pathen , Abraham Pathen , Isacc Pathen chule Jacob Pathen nahenga hung kilah phot chetna dia hiche hi Israelte koma nabol ding ahi , ” ati .
02004006	Pakaiyin Mose jah a asei kit’in , “ Napon noiya nakhut koilut’in , ” ati leh ; Mose’n akoiyin , agah lah doh chun akhut josue anaphah-in , buhbang banin anabangtai .
02004007	Pakaiyin , “ Napon noiya nakhut koilut kit’in , ” atin , Mose’n jong akoiyin , agah lah doh phat’in anadamsel’in ati dang bang bang ahitai .
02004008	Pakaiyin , “ Israelten thil kidang mai maiya natahsan dauva alung nachim louvu jongle , hiche geiya vang lung nachim tei diu ahi .
02004009	Hiche thil kidang te ni geiya jong natahsan dauva nasei angai dau le , Nile vadung twi phabep thaldoh-in tol’a sung lhan . Twi chu thisan soh jeng ding ahi , ” ati .
02004010	Ahivangin Mose’n , “ Ahipoi , Pakai neisol da tan . Thusei them la kahipon , neikihoupia jong hi kam kipeh lou kahi neihet hi-me . Mi paomo , pao gang thei lou , ngongkai chet chot kahi , ” ati .
02004011	Pakaiyin ajah a , “ Mihem kam sempeh koi hiya , na ngong le paomoa koiya koi ham ? Kho musah le mit chotsah thei loi ham ? Kei-Pakai hi kahi .
02004012	Tun che jengin ! Thusei kithoping ting , nasei ding hil nange , ” ati .
02004013	Ahivangin Mose’n , “ Ahipoi Pakai , midang khat soljo tan , ” ati .
02004014	Hiche hin Pakaiyin Mose alhunghan khumin , “ Nasopipa , Levi chilhah Aaron chula em ? Athusei themla kahenan . Nakimupi dia hungtah bah a khu , nakimupi teng kipah lheh veh ta .
