02004015	Sei ding jouse nahil masah thei ahi . Sei ding kithpi lhon ing ting , nasei lhon ding hil nange .
02004016	Nakam sanga panga , nathalhenga mipi akihoupi ding ahi . Nangin Pathen banga asei ding chan nahil ding ahi .
02004017	Kiphuthei tenggol kichoiyin , hichea hin melchihna kidang nabol ding ahi , ” ati .
02004018	Mose , anupa pa Jethro henga agache masan ajah a , “ Egypt’a ka inkote dam le bit a um nauvem , gavil kit tange , neisolin , ” agate . Jethron jong pha asan , lung lhaisel’in asoltai .
02004019	Mose chu Midian gamsunga asum nalaiyin , Pakaiyin ajah a , “ Than ago jouse athisoh tai , Egypt a kile kit tan , ” ati .
02004020	Mose’n ajinu le achapate sanga chunga atousah-in , Egypt jonin akitolpin , Pathenin ahil bangin kiphu thei tenggol chu akichoiye .
02004021	Pakaiyin Mose jah a aseikit’in , “ Egypt gam nalejot kit ahitan , Egypt lengpa angasunga , boltheina tha kapeh banga , thil kidang chengse chu nabol tei tei ding ahi . Hijongle lengpa lung katahsa a , mipi alhadoh louhel ding ahi .
02004022	Chuteng kei Pakai thusei hi naseipeh a , ‘ Israel hi kachapa masapen ahi .
02004023	Kachapa nalhadoh dia kasei ahi . Eihou dia kasol ahin , nalha doh poi . Hijeh a chu nachapa masapen khatha peh ding nahi , ’ tin aseiye , tia nahil ding ahi , ” ati .
02004024	Lampia gebuh khat’a Pakaiyin Mose akimupin tha din agotai .
02004025	Mose jinu Zipporah chun songhemkhat’in achapa chep atanin , Mose kengphanga aloiyin , “ Cheptan chonchan dungjuiya jia kanei nahi , ” ati .
02004026	Hijeh chun Pakaiyin Mose ahing hoiye .
02004027	Pakaiyin Aaron jah a , “ Gamchang noiya Mose gakimupin , ” tin asol’e . Aaron jong Mose kimupi din molsang theng lama achei ; akimupi phat’in achop chuh chuh jengin ahi .
02004028	Hichun Mose’n Egypt gama kile kit dia Pakaiyin asol’a aseipeh chengse abonchan aseipehson tai ; thil kidang bolsah dia ahil chengse jong aseitai .
02004029	Mose le Aaron chu Egypt’a ache lhonin , Israel lamkai jouse akhom lhontai .
02004030	Mose jah a Pakai thusei chengse Aaronin Israel lamkaite aseipeh-in , mipi angsung laitah a Mose’n thil kidang chengse chu abolsoh keiye .
02004031	Israelten atahsan’un , min engse tah a abolset nau amu jal’a avil’uva Pakai hung ahi ajah doh phat’un boh khup’in chibai aboh tauve .
02005001	Mose le Aaron Egypt lengpa koma achen , “ Pakai Israel Pathenin , ‘ Gamchang noiya kut bola eihou theina diuvin kamite sol’in ’ tin aseiye , ” agate lhone .
02005002	Egypt lengpan , “ Pakai kitipa chu koi hiya , athu kangaiya , Israelte kasoldoh ding ham ? Pakai la kahepon , Israelte la soldoh ponge , ” tin aseitai .
02005003	Mose le Aaronin adonbut’in , “ Hebrewte Pathen chu kahenguva ahung kilahtai . Nithum lampi peh a Pakai ka-Pathenu gahouva , kilhaina kabolna diuvin neisolun . Kabol louvule natset ham , gal ham khat jo sanga eithagam diu ahi , ” ati lhone .
02005004	Egypt lengpan Mose le Aaron jah a , “ Mipin tohban iti ngah hen nati lhon ham ? Soh ho khu na tohsahkit’un !
02005005	Nangho Egyptte sanga jong natamjoh tah-u khu ! Aban jop’a na tohda nagot’u ahi-ong ! ” ati .
02005006	Hiche nikho chun Egypt lengpan sohte chunga tohvai pote le Israel lah a toh lamkai ho thu apen ,
02005007	“ Mipi hi cheh a sem ding changpol peh dauvin , amaho gakiholsah-uvin .
02005008	Chuti jongle changpol napeh pet’uva asemdoh-u cheh sanga khat cha jong lhasam deh louhel ding ahi . Toh ding aneilou phat’uva potdoh a a-Pathenu houva kilhai dinga kahenga tao tao ahiuve !
02005009	Na hatohsah-un , ong manlouvin lhauvin , chutile thujou kisei hoihi ngai manlouvin umtauvinte , ” ati .
02005010	Sohte chunga tohvai pote le Israelte toh lamkaite acheuvin Israelte jah a , “ Lengpan changpol napeh lou diuvin aseitai .
02005011	Namu thei thei nauva changpol nahol thu’uva , ahivanga niseh a nasemdoh jat’u chu lhasem thei louhel ding ahi , ” atiuve .
02005012	Hichea hin mipi changpol holin Egypt gamsunga akithe chansoh jengui .
02005013	Sohte chunga tohvai poten changpol apeh laiyuva asemdoh jat’us cheh asemdoh theina diuvin ada acham louvin ano no jengui .
02005014	Egypt mi , sohte chunga tohvai poten Israelte toh lamkai ho chu adeng deng jengui . “ I-bol’a masanga nasemdoh jat jat cheh semdoh jou louva um nahiuvem ? ” atiuve .
02005015	Israel toh lamkaite Egypt lengpa koma acheuvin , “ Vo lengpa , idia hita neibol jengu hitam ?
02005016	Changpol la eipetapouvin , cheh kasemdoh jat jat’u semdohsah eigouve ! Tun eivo vo jengun , hiche hi nang thusah mong ahibouve , ” atiuve .
02005017	Egypt lengpan adonbut’in , “ Thasea natohda jal’a Pakai henga kilhaina boldia kilepdoh dia kahenga kithum thum nahiuve .
02005018	Na gatong loiyun ! Changpol nakipe lou diu , ahivanga cheh nasemdoh jat jat lha louva nasemdoh diu ahi , ” ati .
02005019	Israelte toh lamkaiten cheh asemdoh jat jat asemdoh diuva aseipeh phat’un abolset nom mong mongu ahedoh tauve .
02005020	Lengpa adalhah phat’un , amaho ngah jinga ana-um Mose le Aaron to akimutouve .
02005021	Mose le Aaron jah a , “ Nathilbol lhon Pakaiyin amusoh tai , lengpa le avaitpote neihotsah jeh-uva Pakaiyin talen namatsah lhon ding ahi . Pansatna neiya eitha lo na diu nabol doh lhon ahitai , ” atiuve .
02005022	Pakai lam ngan Mose akiphinin , “ Pakai , idia namite nabolset ham ? Ipi bol dia neisol ham ?
02005023	Namina Lengpa henga thuseiya kache chea pat , Israelte engse sen aboltai . Nangin imacha kithopi din nagopon ! ” ati .
02006001	Hichun Pakaiyin Mose jah a , “ Lengpa khu i-kalom , hinmu nan nate . Tahbeh a kasei ahi-Israelte khu Egypt a kona adeldoh tho dingjoh ahibouve , ” ati .
02006002	Pathenin Mose jah a aseiyin , “ Kei hi Pakai chu kahi .
02006003	Abraham le Isaac chule Jacob henga Hatchungnung Pathenin kakilah-in , ahivangin kamintheng , Pakai hin kakihetsah hih laiye .
02006004	Amaho to kitepna kaneiyin , akhopem nau gam , Canaan gamsung khu peh din kakitep’e .
02006005	Tun Egyptten soh a avul , Israelte ka le mao ogin kajan , kakitepna kageldoh tai .
02006006	Hijeh chun Israelte dia kasei hi ajah-uva seipeh-in , ‘ Kei hi Pakai chu kahi , nasohchan nau Egyptte khut’a nahuhdoh ung ting kajalen sah ding nahiuve . Kaban-gol jeng ting Egyptte talen kamatsah a , nang ho kahuhdoh diu ahi .
02006007	Kamiten nasem ung ting , na-Pathenu kahi ding ; Egypt gam sohchanna muna kona kalhadoh tengu , Pakai na-Pathen kahi hetauvin nate .
02006008	Abraham le Isaac chule Jacob koma giltah a kakitep’a , peh dia kakoisa gamsung kalhut diu , leiset gou dia kapeh ding nahiuve . Kei hi Pakai chu kahi , ’ tin aseiye , tin , ” ati .
02006009	Hiche hi Mose’n Israelte aseipeh-in , ahivangin angaipouve , sohchan hesoh valjeh-in lhung lhalhop’in aum gamtauve .
02006010	Pakaiyin Mose jah a ,
02006011	“ Chen lang Egypt lengpan Israelte khu agamsunga kona asoldoh tei tei din gaseiyin , ” ati .
02006012	Ahinla Mose’n adonbut’in , “ Israelte bon kathu ngailou , lengpan kathu iti angai ding ham ? Mi paomo kei tobang hi ! ” ati .
02006013	Pakaiyin Mose le Aaron thu apen , “ Israelte leh Egypt lengpa jah a chun anng hi Egypt’a kona Israelte puidoh dia kasol ahi seipeh lhonin , ” ati .
02006014	Jacob chapa masa pen Ruebenin chapa li aneiyin-Hanoch , Pallu , Hezron , chule Carmi ahiuvin ; Reuben chilhah phungkhaiya upa cheh ahiuve .
02006015	Simeonin chapa gup ahingin , Jemuel , Jamin , Ohad , Jachin , Zohar chule Canaan mi numeito ahin lhon-Shaul ahiuvin , Simeon phungkhaiya upa cheh ahiuve .
02006016	Levin chapa thum ahingin , Gershon , Kohath chule Merari ahiuvin ; Levi phungkhaiya upa cheh ahiuve . Levi hi kum jakhat le somthum le sagi ahinge .
02006017	Gershon hin chapa ni ahingin , son le pah tampi anei lhone .
02006018	Kohath hin chapa li ahingin , Amaram , Izhar , Hebron chule Uzziel ahiuvin , Kohath hi kum jakhat le somthum le thum ahinge .
02006019	Mararin chapa ni ahingin , Mahli le Mushi ah . Hiche hi phung khai khaiya kisim Levi chilhah ahiuvin , achilhah chengu to ahi .
02006020	Amaram hin apa sopinu Jochebed akichenpin Aaron leh Mose ahinge . Amram kum jakhat le somthum le sagi ahinge .
02006021	Izhar hin chapa thum ahingin , Korah le Nepheg chule Zichri ahiuve .
02006022	Uzziel’sin chapa thum ahingin , Michael , Ezaphan chule Sithri ahiuve .
02006023	Aaronin Amminadab chanu , Nahshon sopinu , Elisheba akichenpin , Nadab le Abihu , Eleazar chule Ithamar ahinge .
02006024	Korah in chapa thum ahingin , Assir , Elkanah chuleAbiasaph ahiuve ; Korah phungkhai sung kihom khenna a amaho hi phung upa cheh ahiuve .
02006025	Aaron chapa , Eleazar chun Putiel chanu akichenpin , Phinehas ahinge . Hichengse hi Levi phunga ama ama insung dola phungkhai upa cheh ahiuve .
02006026	Pakaiyin , “ Egypt’a konin Israelte puidoh lhonin , ” tia asol teni chu Mose le Aaron ahi lhone .
02006027	Mose le Aaron hin Egypt lengpa chu Israelte lhadoh dinga asollhon ahi .
02006028	Egypt gama Pakaiyin Mose jah a thu asei chun ,
02006029	“ Kei hi Pakai chu kahi . Kasei jong Egypt lengpa seipeh-in , ” ati .
02006030	Ahinla Mose’n adonbut’in , “ Kei mi paomo kahi nahet chume , lengpan iti kathu angai ding ham ? ” ati .
02007001	Pakaiyin Mose jah a , “ Lengpa koma chu Pathen tobang kahisah a , nasopipa Aaronin lengpa koma nathemgao tobanga thu asei ding ahi .
02007002	Kaseipeh chengse hi Aaron hilsoh keiyin , aman lengpa chu agamsunga kona Israelte asoldohna din seipeh nante .
02007003	Amavang lengpa lung kasuhtah ding ahin , Egypt gamsunga itobang tijat um thil kidang bolkhum jong leng nathu ngaiponte .
02007004	Chuteng Egypt gamsunga talen gihsa tah chuhsah ing ting , agamsunga kona kamite kapuidoh ding ahi .
02007005	Kaban-gol kajet’a agamsunguva kona Israelte kapuidoh teng , Egypt ten Pakai kahin hedoh tauvinte , ” ati .
02007006	Msoe le Aaronin Pakai thupeh peh chu abol lhon nai .
02007007	Lengpa koma thu aseilai lhonin Mose kum som get alhing tan , Aaron kum som get le thum alhingtai .
02007008	Pakaiyin Mose le Aaron jah a ,
02007009	“ Nathanneina lhon phot chetna dia Pharaoh-in thil kidang nabolsah got lhon le , Aaron chu atenggol lengpa angsunga selhah sah in , gul hungsoh ding ahi , ” ati .
02007010	Pakai thupeh bangin Mose le Aaron lengpa koma chen agabol lhontai . Lengpa le avaipote angsunga Aaronin tenggol aseplhan , gul ahungsoh tai .
02007011	Lengpan jong miching mithemte , mitpheldoi them ho akouvin , amahon jong hitobangma chu abol theiyui .
02007012	Atenggol’u aselhah-ule , gul asohgamtai . Ahivangin Aaron tenggol gul chun amahoa avallhum soh keiye .
02007013	Ahivangin Pakai sei bangin , lengpa alungtah den nalaiyin , Mose le Aaron sei angai deh poi .
02007014	Pakaiyin Mose jah a aseiyin , “ Lengpa alungtah cheh in , Israelte sohdoh ding adai .
02007015	Jingkah teng Nile vadung ajotsuh phat le gakimupin , gul soh theiji tenggol chu choiyin , luipanga ana ngah-in .
02007016	Ahung teng ajah a , ‘ Pakai , Hebrewte Pathenin amite nalhadoh a , gamchang noiya Ama agahouna diuva seipeh dia eihinsol ahi . Ahivangin tu geiyin kasei nangaipoi .
02007017	Vo lengpa , tua hi Pakai chu itobang ahi athilbol’a nahetdoh ding ahi . Ven hiche tenggola hi luidung twi jouse thisan soh ding ahitai .
02007018	Nga jouse thisoh a , twi jouse names ding , Egypte miten adon thei louhel ding ahi , ’ tin gasei peh tan , ” ati .
02007019	Pakaiyin Mose jah a aseiyin , “ Aaronin hiche tenggol chu luidung jouse le twilam jouse , Egypte gamsunga twikul jouse chunga adop sang din seipeh-in . Twi jouse thisan soh ding , gamsung pumpi thisan soh a , thinghom dungle songko dung geiya thisan veisoh ding ahi , ” ati .
02007020	Mose leh Aaronin Pakai thupeh bangin abol lhontai . Lengpa le avaipote angsung tah a Aaronin tenggol alamin , luidung twi ajep le twi josue thisan asoh gamtai .
02007021	Nga jouse athigamin , Egypt miten adon thei tapouve . Egypt gamsung thisan adimsoh jenge .
02007022	Egypt lengpa mitpheldoi themten jong chutobangma abol thei thouvun , lengpa jong angai bep’in alung tah cheh-in , Pakai seisa bangin Mose le Aaron thu angai deh poi .
02007023	Lunghei tah sangin leng inpi akijot’in , thilsoh ho chu nahsah in jong aneipoi .
02007024	Luidung twi adon thei lou phat’un Egypt miten luipang dung twichim holnan alhaiyun don ding ahol’ui .
02007025	Pakaiyin Nile vadung asuh nehna ni sagi alhing tai .
02008001	Pakaiyin Mose jah a , “ Egypt lengpa koma chen , Pakaiyin hintin aseiyin , ‘ Eihou theina diuvin kamite sultan ,
02008002	nada le nagamsung dimset’a uphoh kalha ding ahi .
02008003	Nile luidung uphoh dimset’a , na-leng inpi geiya hung kitol lut diu , nalupna indan , najalkhun , navaipote in jouse , namite in dung , nathuh phung le nakhangbel sung geiya dimset diu ahi .
02008004	Nang chung , navaipote chung le namite chung geiya hung chomdoh diu ahi , ’ ati , tin gaseitan , ” ati .
02008005	Pakaiyin Mose jah a , “ Aaronin luidung jouse le twilam dung , twikul dung tenggol ajap a , Egypt gamsung dimset’a uphoh hungdoh din bolsah in , ” ati .
02008006	Hiti chun Aaronin twi umna jouse tenggol ajapkhum jengle , uphohte ahungdoh-un gamsung adimset tauve .
02008007	Mitpheldoi themten jong chutiman abolun , gamsung uphoh adimsettai .
02008008	Egypt lengpan Mose le Aaron akouvin , “ Uphohte asuh gamna din Pakaiya neitaopeh lhonin , Pakaiya kilhaina abol theina diuvin namite lhon solpeh tange , ” ati .
02008009	Mose’n adonbut’in , “ Kipah tah in taopeh nange , nang le navaipte , namite itih teng kataopeh ding phat chubou neiseipeh lhonin , chuting u-phoh ten dalhan natin , Nile luidung tilouva khatcha jong um taponte , ” ati .
02008010	Egypt lengpan , “ Jing teng neitaopeh-in , ” ati . Mose’n , “ Nasei bangin taopeh nange , chuting Pakai ka-Pathenu tobang pathen dang umlou hedoh tan nate .
02008011	Nang , navaipoho , chule namite u-phohten dalhauvin tin , Nile luidung tilouva u-phoh khat cha jong um lou ding ahi , ” ati .
02008012	Mose le Aaronin lengpa adalha Ihonin , lengpa chunga alonvuh sah u u-phoh te sumang din Pakaiya Mose atao tai .
02008013	Mose ngeh bang bangin Pakaiyin abol’in , in dung le thupi tanna in dung chule loujao dunga u-phohte athitam tauve .
02008014	Egypt miten u-phoh ho chu alhuh lhuh in aseuvin , gamsung khangngam leuvin alhauve .
02008015	U-phohte gamsoh amu phat’in lengpa angaiyin alungtah kit’in Pakaiyin asei bangin aumtai , Mose le Aaron thusei jong angaideh tapoi .
02008016	Pakaiyin Mosel jah a , “ Aaron khu atenggol’in tol jepsah le chun , Egypt gamsung leivui jouse thousi vaibong soh diu ahi , ” ati .
02008017	Hijeh chun Aaronin tenggol’in tol ajep le , Egypt gamsung leivui jouse thousi vaibong asoh-in , mipi le gancha jouse atomjol soh keiyui .
02008018	Mitpheldoi themten thousi vaibong sosah agot vangun abol thei tapouve . Muntin thousi vaibong adimsoh tai .
02008019	Chule mitpheldoi them hon lengpa jah a , “ Hiche hi Pathen bol mong mong ahibouve , ” atiuve . Ahivangin Pakai seisa bangin lengpa alungtah jingin , Mose le Aaron sei angai dehpoi .
02008020	Pakaiyin Mose jah a , “ Jingkah jingpi tah a lengpa luidunga ache teng gakimupin , ajah a Pakaiyin , ‘ Eihou theina diuvin kamite sultan .
02008021	Kagih masah dim dem nahi-thu na-ngailou le nangle navaipote chule namite ka-engbol ding ahi . Egypt mite insung thoulhe dimset ding , toldung jouse dimsoh diu ahi .
02008022	Kamite chenna Goshen gamsung vang tongkha ponge , thoulhe khat cha lengle ponte , chuting Kei Pakai hi hiche gamsunga natong thilbol kahi hedoh tan nate .
02008023	Kamite le namite kah a lamdanga kabol’a hitobang thil kidang hi jing teng hungsoh ding ahi , ’ tin aseiye gatin , ” ati .
02008024	Pakaiyin thoulhe ahon honin leng inpi sungle avaipote insung dimset set’in alhalut tai . Egypt gamsung pumpi thoulhe dimset’in gamsung in amanlo tai .
02008025	Chuphat’in lengpan Mose le Aaron akouvin , “ Cheuvin lang hiche Egypt gamsunga hin na-Pathen kom’uva gakilhai tauvin , ” ati .
02008026	Mose’n , “ Dih ponte , Pakai ka-Pathenu houna katha diu gancha ho chu Egypt miten alunghanlo diu ahi . Hiche ganchate hi Egypt miten amu phahna diuva that ung lunghanlo taleu , songa eise lih jeng diu ahi .
02008027	Ethupeh bang banguva nithum lam kajot’uva , gamchang noiya Pakai ka-Pathenu koma kilhai ding kahibouvui , ” ati .
02008028	Egypt lengpan , “ Nache gamlat behseh lou pouvule gamchang noiya Pakai na-Pathenu koma kilhai din sol nauvinge , neitaopeh pou pouvin , ” tin angeh tai .
02008029	Mose’in , “ Kapotdoh doh le Pakaiya taoving ting , jing teng nangle navaipote , chule namite thoulhe hon dalha taovin nate , amavang neilhep kit lou diu , Pakaiya kilhai dia mipi nasuh tang lou ding ahi , ” ati .
02008030	Lengpa dalhan Mose Pakaiya ataovin ,
02008031	chule Mose ngeh bangin Pakaiyin aboltai . Thoulhe ten lengpa le avaipote chule amite adalhan , khatcha jong aumtapoi .
02008032	Hichan gei jong hin lengpa alungtah nalaiyin , mipi soldoh deh louvin aum nalaiye .
02009001	Pakaiyin Mose jah a , “ Egypt lengpa koma chen Pakai , Hebrewte Pathenin , ‘ Eihou din kamite soldoh-in .
02009002	Nasolda leh ,
02009003	ka-engbol’a naganchate-sakolte le sa-ngan ho , sa-ngongsang ho le bong jouse , kelngoite , chule kelcha ho pul kalha khum ding ahi .
02009004	Israelte gancha ho le Egyptte gancha ho kasekhen a , Israelte gancha khatcha jong thi lou diu ahi .
02009005	Kei-Pakaiyin jing teng hiche hi abol kagot ahitai , ’ tin aseiye gatin , ” ati .
02009006	Ajingin Pakaiyin asei bangin aboltan , Egyptte gancha ho athigamin , Israelte a vang khat cha athipoi .
02009007	Lengpan thilsoh umchan adongtoh-in , Israelte gancha khatcha thilou aseipeh tauve . Ahivangin alungtah nalaiyin Israelte asoldehpoi .
02009008	Pakaiyin Mose le Aaron jah a , “ Thuh phunga vutvam khut dim khattou gaham lhonin , Mose’n lengpa angsunga vanlam ngan thethang hen .
02009009	Egypt gamsunga leivui khu banga leu ding , muntina uilut jangtea panga , mihem le gancha pomchet chut a alha ding ahi , ” ati .
02009010	Mose le Aaronin vutvam phabep ahamdoh lhonin , lengpa angsunga adingin , Mose’n chunglama athe thangle , uilutjang asoh-in , mihem le ganchate pomchet chut in alhaitai .
02009011	Mitpheldoi themho geiyin , Egypt mite dang banga uilut avei jeh-in , Mose masanga ahung thei tapouve .
02009012	Ahivangin Pakaiyin lengpa lungthim atahsah-in , aseisa bangin lengpan Mose le Aaron sei angaidehpoi .
02009013	Pakaiyin Mose jah a , “ Jingpi tah le lengpa kimupin , Pakai Hebrewte Pathenin , ‘ Eihou din kamite sultan .
02009014	Tua vang navaipote le namite keo ka-engbol lou ding , vannoiya Kei tobang pathen umlou nahetna dia nang geiya ka-engbol ding nahi .
02009015	Nangle namite natset lhunkumsah dia khut kalapsa hile , nathigam diu ahitai .
02009016	Kathahat vetsahna , vannoi pumpi kaminthanna dia kahinsah nah lai nahi .
02009017	Hichan hin nahoithon , kamite soldoh ding nadai .
02009018	Jing teng tuphat don le , Egypt miten ahet khah louhellai , huise kalansah a , gellen kalhahsa ding ahi .
02009019	Tun ganhing jouse le tollhanga um thil jouse lim a kilhoh lutsoh loiyin . Tollhanga um ganchate le mihem ho gellenin aselih soh ding ahi , ’ tin aseiye gatin , ” ati .
02009020	Pakai thusei chu lengpa vaipote phabep’in akichan , asohteu le ganchaho in lima ahoilut’uve .
02009021	Adanghon Pakai migihna chu nahsah louvin , asohteu le gancha ho tollhanga amoh lhauve .
02009022	Hichun Pakaiyin Mose jah a , “ Vanlam sangin , Egypt gam pumpia gellen hung lha ding-mihem le gancha chule loulai muchi jouse avoh lih ding ahi , ” ati .
02009023	Mose’n tenggol’a vanlam ako le , Pakaiyin van athingin , gel alhahsah-in , tollhang dung keh-in aseptai . Pakaiyin ,
02009024	huise hattah le gellen alhahsah-in , kol phelah lah jengin alhahsah-in , kol aphelah lah jengin ahi . Hitobang huise lang hi Egypta kisei lah a akhohpen ahi .
02009025	Egypt gam pumpia tolhanga umtapou , mihem le ganchate geiyin , gellenin aseplih jenge . Loulai muchi jouse la avo mat tep jengin , thingphung jouse jong aseplhusoh tai .
02009026	Israelte chenna Goshen gamkol sung seh seh a chun gellen alhapoi .
02009027	Lengpan Mose le Aaron agakousah-in , “ Tua vang chonse kahitai ; Pakai adih-in , kei la kamite themmo kahitauve .
02009028	Pakaiya tao lhonin ! Van kithin ka-ngai chimun , gellen kadou lel tauve ! Nachetei diuva katep ahi ; hi koma chenda jengun , ” ati .
02009029	Mose’n ajah a , “ Khopi kadalhah teng Pakai lam sangin tao ving ting , van ging talou ding , gellen lha lou ding ahitai . Chuteng leiset geiya Pakaiya ahi nahet ding ahi .
02009030	Hinla nangle navaipoten Pakai Pathen nagging hih laiyui , ” ati .
02009031	Sakolchang minlai avoheosoh tan , patbo jouse jong avoheosoh tai .
02009032	Suhlou chang vang agei jep jeh in asuse behseh poi .
02009033	Mose’n lengpa adalhan , khopi polama achen , Pakai lam sangin ataove . vAn gin athip’in gellen atangin , go ajutapoi .
02009034	Thilsoh , kho phat amudoh phat’in lengpa achonse kittan , ama ti avaipote ti angai bep’in alung tah-un ,
02009035	Pakaiyin Mose aseipeh masah bangin , lengpan Israelte asoldoh deh tapoi .
02010001	Pakaiyin Mose jah a , “ Lengpa gakimupi kit’in . Lengpa le avaipote lungtah sah-a thil kidang hicheng hi bol kagot ahin ,
02010002	nangin jong natu nachate khang geiya jong hitobang thil kidang bol’a Egypt mite lung jinga kalha hi nasei theina ding kati ahi .
02010003	Hiti hin Mose le Aaron Egypt lengpa koma ache lhonin , “ Pakai , Hebrew mite Pathenin , ‘ Itih chanpi kasei ngailouva naum ding ham ? Eihou theina diuvin kamite sol tan .
02010004	Kasei na-ngai louhel le jing teng nagamsunga khaokhote kalhah lut ding ahi .
02010005	Khakho jamah hung lhaa , nagamsung atomjol diu , gellen vohlih mooh chengse , thingphung geiyha aneh chaidiu ahi .
02010006	Naleng inpi le navaipote , chule namite insung khaokhote dimsoh diu ahi . Napu napaten anamusah thilse josue sanga khohjo ding ahi , ’ tin aseiye gati lhonin , ” ati .
02010007	Lengpa vaipoten ajah a , “ Iti hichepa hin eidolgim gim jeng diu ham ? Pakai a-Pathenu akihou theina diuvin Israelte hi soldoh tan . Egypt gamsung kichai pai ding ahi helou tahbah nahim ? ” atiuve .
02010008	Mose le Aaron chu Egypt lengpa koma agapui lut kit’un ajah lhona , “ Pakai na-Pathen chu gakihou thei nauvin nate , ahin ache ding pen chu koi koi ham ? ” atiuve .
02010009	Mose’n , “ Kabonchauva , numei chapang , tehse geiya che ding kahiuve . Kachateu numei pasal , kelngoite le kelcha ho , bong jouse geiya kapui diu ahi , Pakai choi-atna kut lentah bol ding kahiuve , ” ati .
02010010	Egypt lengpan , “ Pakai min panna kasei ahi-itih hijong le numei chapang geiyin sol tha hih hel inge ! Edou dia kigo nahiu akichentai .
02010011	Hithei lou hel ding ahi . Pakai hou nom mong nahiule , pasal chengse chethei ahi , ” ati .
02010012	Hichun Pakaiyin Mose jah a , “ Khakhote hung dimsetna din Egypt gamsunga nakhut jah-in , Khakhote hungun tin , Egypt gamsunga hampa louhing gellen voh lih moh geiya aneh chaisoh diu ahi , ” ati .
02010013	Mose’n tenggol ajap khum jengle , Pakaiyin niso lama pat sun nilhum jan khovah geiyin hui anunsah-in , jingkah-in khaokhote ahung kitol tai .
02010014	Ahon honin ahung kitolun , gamsunga alop lop’in atolchai jengui . Khaokhote tamje chu kimu kha loulai hel , mu jong kimu kit louhel ding ahi .
02010015	Leiset atomjolsoh keiyun , avom leouve ; gellen vohlih moh , thing na dum ho geiyin ane chai jengui Egypt gamsung pumpia thingna dum khat’a khat jong akimu tapoi .
02010016	Egypt lengpan Mose le Aaron agakousah loiyin , “ Pakai na-Pathenu le nangni doumah bol’a chonse kahitai .
02010017	Tun kachonset ngaidamna din neitaopeh loi lhonin , gamlhahna hel thei talen eimatsah hi lahdoh sah din thum lhonin , ” ati .
02010018	Lengpa dalhan Mose Pakaiya atao le ,
02010019	Pakaiyin nisolam huipi chu lhumlam khohuiyin akhel’in , khakhote abonchan Suez twikola alhoh lutsah soh tai . Egypt gamsunga khaokhote khat cha akimudoh tapoi .
02010020	Pakaiyin Egypt lengpa lung atahsah-in , lengpan Israelte alhadoh kit tapoi .
02010021	Pakaiyin Mose jah a , “ Vanlam sang le chun , Egypt gamsung tomjol khopset mujin hung lhung ding ahi , ” ati .
02010022	Mose’n vanlam asanle , nithum sungin Egypt gamsung mu athimsoh hel’e .
02010023	Egypt mite khat le khat jong akimu thei tapouvin , insung dalha a potdoh jong aumtapouve . Israelte chenna sungsea vang kho avah jingnai .
02010024	Egypt lengpan Mose akouvin ajah a , “ Pakai gakihou thei tauvin nate ; numei chapang geiyin che jengun . Kelngoi le kelcha , bong ho geiyin vang pui dauvin , hikoma dalhauvin , ” ati .
02010025	Mose’n , “ Achutile Pakai ka-Pathenu houna dia pumgo thilto dia tha ding gancha neipeh diu ahi .
02010026	Achutilou vangle gancha aboncha kapui diu khat cha jong kadalhah lou diu ahi . Ganchate lah a Pakai ka-Pathenu houna dia lom kalhehdoh diu ahi nalaiye . Kilhaina ding mun lhun masanga itobang gancha thapeh ding kihe thei loulai ding ahibouve , ” ati .
02010027	Pakaiyin Egypt lengpa lung atahsah jing jeh-in , Israelte asoldoh deh tapoi .
02010028	Lengpan Mose jah a , “ Kakoma konin potdoh loiyin ! Mu jong neikimusah kit hih-in ! Kamu ni ni le nathi ni kitoh ding ahi ! ” ati .
02010029	Mose’n jong , “ Naseidih bouve , neimu kit louhel ding ahitai , ” ati .
02011001	Pakaiyin Mose jah a , “ Egypt lengpa le amite bolsetna ding talen khat bou kahentai . Hiche talen amat jou teng nalhadoh tauvinte . Nasol nom lot’uva nadeldoh tho diu ahi .
02011002	Tun Israelten aheng akomuva sana le dangka , sanajem pahvui akithum diuvin seipeh tan , ” ati .
02011003	Pakaiyin Egyptte chu Israelte ajabolsah lheh jenge . Ahingmongin vaipote le mipin Mose chu mi nasatah a agel’u ahitai .
02011004	Mose’n Egypt lengpa koma , “ Pakaiyin , ‘ Jan khangkim teng Egypt gamsung kakholsoh ding ,
02011005	chapa peng masa jouse , leng chang ding , lengpa chapaa pat sumheiya chang goi soh numei chapa geiya , Egypt gamsung chapa jouse thisoh diu ahi . Gancha peng masa jouse jong thigam ding ahi .
02011006	Egypt gamsung ka le mao ogin thongsoh ding , hitobang hi kija kha loulai , jajong kija kit lou ding ahi .
02011007	Israelte lah a vang uicha hamgin le ganchate uhpoh jong kija lou ding ahi . Chuteng Kei-Pakaiyin Israelte le Egyptte kadat khen dol nahetdoh ding ahi , ’ ati , tin gaseiyin , ” ati .
02011008	Achainan Mose’n , “ Navaipote ka-angsunga hung bohkhup a , kamite kapuidoh dia hung tao diu ahi . Chutah le kadalhah ding ahi , ” ati . Hiti hin lung hang tah-in Mose’n Egypt lengpa adalhai .
02011009	Pakaiyin Mose jah a , “ Egypt gamsunga thil kidang hijat hi kaboldohna thei dia Egypt lengpan nasei angai deh loulai ding ahi , ” ati .
02011010	Mose le Aaronin Egypt lengpa angsunga thil kidang hijat pi hi aboldoh lhonin , Pakaiyin Egypt lengpa lung asuh tah jeh-in Israelte Egypt gama konin asoldoh deh poi .
02012001	Egypt gama Pakaiyin Mose le Aaron jah a ,
02012002	“ Hiche lha hi kum sunga lha kipatna nasim diu ahi .
02012003	Israel pumpi hitin hilchah lhonin ; hiche lha nisom lhin ni le a-inson a sungsa tha dia kelngoi ham kelchagol ham khat naki-ngaito cheh diu ahi .
02012004	Koi tobang insung chun sungsa kithat aneh lel dingle , a-inhengte to sa chu kihomuva , aneh khop bep dia chang thei ahiuve .
02012005	Kelngoi ham kelcha ham natha theiyu ahin , hoijoh hile kum khat lhingsa , nolnabei achal hiding ahi .
02012006	Hiche lha nisom le ni li lhin ni , nilhah lam teng Israel pumping an atha diu ahi .
02012007	Aganthau sa anehna diu in tin a , kotpi chung inkama thisan aloinat soh kei diu ahi .
02012008	Hiche jan hile sungsa chu ago min’uva , anche kha le cholsolou changlhah to ame diu ahi .
02012009	Asel’a jong , hon thota jong naneh lou diu , apumchang , alu pum , akeng pum , asungsa jouse puma gomin thoa naneh diu ahi .
02012010	Neh moh imacha jong jingkah khovah geiya nakoiden lou diu , neh moh pou pou nagovam jeng dingu ahi .
02012011	Kholjin dia gotsa , tenggol choiya , kengchot busa , chule dinmun pum le kinotah a naneh diu ahi . Hiche hi Pakai-Kei jabolna Kalchuh Kut ahi .
02012012	“ Hiche jan hileh Egypt gamsung kakholsoh hel’a , mihem hihen gancha hile , apeng masa chengse kathagam ding , Egypt gamsung doi le kao jouse kasuhgama talen kamatsah ding ahi . Kei hi Pakai kahi .
02012013	Kotpi inkam chunga thisan kiloi chun nachen nau in eihetsah ding-melchihna ahi . Hiche thisanchu kamu teng kalchuh ing ting , Egypt mite talen kapehna nangho suse ponge .
02012014	Hiche nikho hi , Kei-Pakai thilbol geldohna , sakho kut a nanei diu ahi . Akhang khangin bol jinguvin , ” ati .
02012015	Pakaiyin , “ Ni sagi sungin cholkiso changlhah nehhih hel’un , cholsolou changlhah bou neuvin . Kut kipatni le insunga chol kikoi chengse napai diu ahi , ajeh chu kut sung ni sagi sunga chol sa changlhah nekha chan chu kamite to kisimtha lou ding ahitai .
02012016	Kut kipatni le ni sagi lhin nia Pathen lhai dia nakikhop diu ahi . Hiche nikho te ni le anhon tilou thildang toh dang nabol thei lou diu ahi .
02012017	Hiche nikhoa hi Egypt’a kona kahin puidoh-u melchihna a hiche kut hi nabol jing diu ahi . Khonung jongle , akhang khanga hiche kut hi naman jing dingu ahi .
02012018	Hiche lha masa nisom le li lhin nilhah a pat , nisom ni le ni khatna nilhah geiya cholsosa changlhah naneh thei lou diu ahi .
02012019	Ni sagi sunga koimacha insunga cholsosa changlhah kikoi thei lou ding , cholsosa changlhah koi pen pen gamsung mi hihen , khopem hile-Israelte Houbunga kisimtha lou ding ahi .
02012020	Cholsosa changlhah him him naneh lou diu , na umna jouseuva cholso lou changlhah bou naneh diu ahi , ” ati .
02012021	Mose’n Israel lamkaite akousoh keiyin ajah-uva , “ Kalchuh Kut bolna dia na-inko kouva kelngoi ham kelgol ham nakitha cheh diu ahi .
02012022	Naganthau thisan chu hyssop ponin deovin lang , kotpi khom le inkam jol’a loisan soh keiyun . Jingkah masanga koiman insung nakhokal thei lou diu ahi .
02012023	Egyptte sugam dia Pakaiyin Egypt gamsung achot teng , kot khom dungle inkam dunga thisan kiloi muntin , mi sugam Vantil na-insunguva alutsah daa , nahinghoi diu ahi .
02012024	Nangho le natu nachateu geiyin , hiche Dan hi a-itih a jong anit jing diu ahi .
02012025	Pakaiyin peh dia na teppeh nau gamsung nalhun tengu jongle hiche houdan hi najui diu ahi .
02012026	Nachateuvin , ‘ Idia hiche Houdan ho hi kijui ham , ’ atiu leh ;
02012027	‘ Egypt gamsunga Pakaiyin Israelte in josue akalchuh jeh a Pakai jabolna kimang Kalchuh kut kilhaina gantha ahi , Pakaiyin Egypt mite athaa , eiho eihing hoiyu ahi , ’ tia naseipeh diu ahi , ” ati . Israelte kunin Pathen alhai cheh-ui .
02012028	Acheuvin Mose le Aaron jah a Pakai thupeh chu aboutauve .
02012029	Jan khangkim laiyin Egypt gamsung lengpa goulo ding chapa masa pen apat kulsunga kihen sohchang chapa masapen gei Egypt gamsung chapang masa jouse gancha peng masa ho geiyin Pakaiyin athath gamtai .
02012030	Hiche jan hin lengpa le avaipote athouvun , chapa thi louna in khat beh jong aum tah lou phat’in , Egypt gam pumpi ka le mao o athongsoh hel tai .
02012031	Ajan janin lengpan Mose le Aaron agakousah-in , “ Na-Israelte toh potdooh loi lhonin ! Kagam sung dalhauvin , Pakai chu nadei bangin kihou tauvin .
02012032	Nakelngoi , nakelchau , nabong jouse kikaihyun , cheloiyun , keijong vang neithumpeh-un , ” ati .
02012033	Egypt miten Israelte chu Egypt gam dalha loi din angeh-un , “ Nachedoh vah louvule kathigam pai diu ahitai , ” atiuve .
02012034	Israelten umle bel akigot’un , cholsolou changbong ponin achun’uvin , lengkouva pun akitol tauve .
02012035	Israelten Mose sei bangin abol’un , Egypt mite koma sana le dangka , sanapah jem , chule ponsil akithum’uve .
02012036	Pakaiyin Israelte chu Egypt mite aginsah-in , athum chan’u apehsah-e . Hiti hin Egypt mite gou jouse Israelten apodoh tauve .
02013001	Pakaiyin Mose jah a ,
02013002	“ Chapa peng masa le gancha peng masa achal josue kakoma nakatdoh diu ahi , ajeh chu Israelte chapa masa achal jouse kei ding ahi , ” ati .
02013003	Mose’n mipi jah a , “ Nasoh chan nau mun , Egypt gamsung nadalhah nikhou hiche nikho hi Pakaiyin abangol thahat’a nahin puidoh-u ahi . Cholsosa changlhah naneh htei lou hel diu ahi .
02013004	Lha masa , Abid , hiche nikhoa hi Egypt nadalhah-u ahi .
02013005	Canaan mite le Hit mite , Amor mite , Hiv mite , chule Jebus mite gamsung napeh diuva napu napateu koma Pakai giltah a kitepsa ahi . Hiche gampha sunga nahin puilut tengule , kum seh a lha masa pena hiche kalchuh kut hi naman jing diu ah .
02013006	Ni sagi sunga cholsolou changlhah naneh diu , ni sagi lhin ni le Pakai choi-atna kut nabol diu ahi .
02013007	Ni sagi sunga cholsolou changlhah naneh lou diu , nagam sunguva chol le cholsosa changlhah nakoi da diu ahi .
02013008	Kut kipat teng , Egypt nadalhah-uva Pakaiyin thil nabolpeh jal’uva hiche thil nabol’u chu nachateu hilchen’un .
02013009	Kalchuh kut kinit hi khut’a chao kibut bang le chalpaunga sum-eng kikhai banga nanei diu , Pakaiyin ban-gol hat’a Egypt a nahin puidoh jal’uva , Pakai Danthu sim le lungchina seije nahil jing diu ahi .
02013010	Akitep phat chan kumseh le hiche kut hi mang jing jengun .
02013011	“ Giltah a napu napateu koma napeh diuva akitepnasa Canaan mite gamsunga Pakaiyin nahin puilut tei diu ahi . Gam chu apeh tengu
02013012	cha peng masa jouse Pakai napeh diu ahi . Gancha peng masa achal jouse jong Pakai chan ding ahin ,
02013013	sa-ngan peng masa achal chu kelngoiya nakile chohson diu ahi . Sa-ngan chal chu nalechoh nom loule , alol heh-bongun . Nachau pasal peng masa jouse nakile choh cheh diu ahi .
02013014	Khonung teng nachauvin ibol’a hich ekinit ahi nadoh tengu , ‘ Kasohchan nau Egypt gamsunga kona Pakaiyin ban-gol hat’a eihin puidoh-u ahi .
02013015	Egypt lengpa alungtah a eisolda phat’uva , Pakaiyin Egypt gamsunga chapang peng masa jouse mihem hihen gancha hile athagam a , hijeh a chu gancha peng masa achal jouse Pakaiya kilhaina kithat’a , mihem peng masa ho kile chohson ahi .
02013016	Hiche hi chao kibut bang le chalpang a sum-eng kikhai banga milmao kinut jign ahi ; Pakaiyin ban-gol hat’a Egypt a kona eihin puidoh-u geldohna kinei jing ding ahi , ’ tia nahil chen ding ahi , ” ati .
02013017	Egypt lengpan Israelte asoldoh phat chun , lampi gompen ahivangin , Philisitia twipang lampia Pathenin apuipouve . Pathenin “ Galsatpa ding amudoh tengu Israelten lung khel’a Egypt a kile kit agot diu kadei poi , ” ati . Israelte chu
02013018	Lampi kolvel lam , Twipi san lam joh , nelgam lama apuijoi . Israelte chu galsat pa dia kigosa ahiuve .
02013019	Joseph-in Israelte giltah a akitepsah dungjuiyin , Mose’n Jospeh long apoi . Joseph chun “ Pathenin nahuhdoh tengu hiche mun a kona kalong napoh doh tei diu ahi , ” anati .
02013020	Israelten Sukkoth dalhan nelgam pamchin , Etham a kingauve .
02013021	Sun teng achunguva Pakai meilomin akisongin , alekhun , jan teng amasanguva meikouvin akidal’in asalvah-e ; hijeh chun sun le janin lam ajot theiyu .
02013022	Sun nilhumin Israelte chunga meilom akidal’in , jan khovah vah-in meikouvin akitolpeh-e .
02014001	Pakaiyin Mose jah a ,
02014002	“ Israelte akiletol’uva , Baal Zephon kom , Migdol le Twikhanglensan kikah , Pi-Hahiroth gal a ki-nga din seipeh-in .
02014003	Egypt lengpan Israelte chu gamsunga vah thai leuva , nelgam hung naidol’in ngaiton tin ,
02014004	ken alung tahsah ing ting kahin nungdel sah diu , asepaite le ama kajo teng kamin thang ding ahi . Chutah le Pakai kahi Egyptten hedoh tauvinte , ” ati . Aseipeh banguvin Israelten abol tauve .
02014005	Israelte jamdoh thu Egypt lengpa aseipeh-u le , ama le avaipoten lung akhel’un , “ I-bol kheltauve . Israelte isoldoh-u hi soh a inekhah lou diu ahitai ! ” atiuve .
02014006	Egypt lengpan agalsatna kangtalai akigot’in , asepaite jong akigotauve .
02014007	Lengpa kangtalaiyin akitol’in , sepai them cheh jagup le alamkaiteu to alhone .
02014008	Pakaiyin Egypt lengpa lung asuhtah-in , lengpan Israelte nomtah a kitol ho chu , adel del jenge .
02014009	Egypt sepaiten sakolte le kangtalai ho , kangtalai tolte pumin adel del jengun , Pi-Hahiroth le Baal Zephon kom , Twikhanglensan a aki-ngah nauva aphapa tauve .
02014010	Egypt lengpa le asepaiten ahindel khum amu phat’un , Israelte akichauvin Pakaiya panpi ngaichan ataotauve .
02014011	Israelten Mose jah a , “ Egypt gama kivuina lhankhuh beiya nabol’a , nel gama lup kamsah dia neihin puiyu ham ? I-khoh tah a Egypt a kona nei hin puidoh mongu ham !
02014012	Hiti dia hi ihung kipatdoh masanguva pat kasisau hilou ham ? Neidon dauva Egyptte soh a pang den dia kaseipeh sau nahi . Gamchang noiya lup kam sanga Egyptte soh a pan phajo ta dinga , ” atiuve .
02014013	Mose’n , “ Kicha hih-un , pangdet’un , nahuhhingna diuva ahi . Hiche Egypt mite hi namu kit louhel diu ahi .
02014014	Nangho sat ngailouva Pakaiyin gal nasatpeh diu ahi , ” ati .
02014015	Pakaiyin Mose jah a , “ I-bol’a kithopi ngaiya toa nahiuvem ? Mipi chu malam nodin seipeh-in .
02014016	Twikhanglen chunga natenggol jah-in . Twipi kikehson tin , akah tolgoa Israelte kijotdoh diu ahi .
02014017	Egyptte lung katahsah a Israelte adel lut diu , Egypt lengpa le asepaiteu , kangtalai ho le atolte kasuhgam a minthang ding ahi .
02014018	Amaho kajosoh teng Pakai kahi Egypt ten hedoh tauvinte , ” ati .
02014019	Pathen Vantil , Israel gal lamkaipa chu anung lam’uva achen , meilom jong chu akiletol’in ,
02014020	Egyptte le Israelte kah a akidaltai . Meilom chun Egyptte alejingin , Israelte din avah-e . Hiti hin sepaiho chu jan khovah-in akinailut thei pouve .
02014021	Mose’n Twikhanglen chunga akhut ajah le , Pakaiyin Twikhanglen chu niso lam khohui asemkhensah-in akiting kih tai . Hui anung khovah hel’in , Twikhanglen lai lung tolgo asoh tai . Twipi skihom khenin ,
02014022	Israelten ajet aveiya twipi bangdan a kisung , Twikhanglen lailung tolgon ajotdoh tauve .
02014023	Egypt miten sakolte le kangtalai jouse chule atol ho pumin Israelte nung adel’un , Twikhanglen lailung ageitauve .
02014024	Khovah konchan Pakaiyin meilomle meikouva konin Egypt sepaite ahinven , ameidoisah soh hel tai .
02014025	Kangtalai velkol jouse a-odensah-in , atolchal tapouve . Egypt miten , “ Pakaiyin Israelte panpi eikisatpi tauve . Jamdoh jengu hite ! ” tin aseitauve .
02014026	Pakaiyin Mose jah a , “ Twikhanglen chunga khut jah le chun , twipi hung kichia , Egyptte le kangtalai ho chule atolte achupden ding ahitai , ” ati .
02014027	Mose’n Twikhanglen chunga akhut ajah jengle , khovah lhah-in twipi ahung kichin , aveina ngai ngaiyin aveitan , Egyptte chu twi lah a kon jamdoh agot vangun Pakaiyin twi lailunga laeh lut soh tauve .
02014028	Twipi akichin kangtalai ho le atolte , Egypt sepaite , Israelte nung del Twikhanglen lailunga lutsa ho chu , khat beh jong khen louvin achup lihsoh hel’e .
02014029	Israelte vang chu jet le veiya twipi bangin akisungin , alailung tolgoa akijotdoh soh hel’uve .
02014030	Hiche nikho hin Egypt mite khut’a konin Pakaiyin Israelte ahuhdoh-in , Twikhanglen pamchin a Egyptte thilong akijamchap leu chu Israelten amutauve .
02014031	Pakaiyin tha hangsan taha Egyptte asuhgam amudoh phat’un , Israelten Pakai aging cha tauve .
02015001	Mose le Israelten Pakai vahchoi nan hiche la hi asauve : “ Pakai vahchoi la sange , Aman gal ajoutai ! Sakolte le achunga toute Twikhanglen lailunga aleh luttai .
02015002	Kakulpi detpen Pakai ahin , Eihuhhinga Ama ahi . Ka-Pathen ahi vahchoiyinge , Kapa Pathen loupije sachoi lenge !
02015003	Pakai gal-hang ahin , Amin jong Pakai ahi .
02015004	“ Egypt sepaite le kangtalai jouse Twikhanglena alehlut soh tai . Egypt sepai vaipo them josue Twikhanglensanin achupsoh tauve .
02015005	Twikhanglen thuh alut lhumun , Songtum kileh lutbangin lito ageitauve .
02015006	“ Naban thahat akidange Pakai , Melmate nabottelsoh tai .
02015007	Loupi chung nungin Namelmate najoutai ; Nalunghan chun abonchauvin changpol meiya kileo nabahsah tai .
02015008	Twikhanglen namut le Twipi alhuh lhuh-in akinongin ; Banglai kksung abangin , Twito thuhpen jong leitah asoh jenge .
02015009	Melman , ‘ Kadel’a kamuat ding ; Agouvu kadei dei kachom ding , chemhem hat’a anei jouse kalah ding ahi , ’ ati .
02015010	Vo Pakai nakisem husan Egyptte twiyin ahcuptai ; Twithuh lailunga ngenchang kilehlut abangui .
02015011	“ Vo Pakai Nangto tethei pathen koi ham ? Thengpentah Nang tobang koiham ? Nabol tobang thil kidang datmo boldoh ding koi ham ?
02015012	Nakhut jetlam najahle leiyin namelmate aval lhumtai .
02015013	Kitepna Molson nahuhdohsa mite napuidohtai . Nathahat’in puiyin nagamtheng nalhut tai .
02015014	Namtin vaipin ajauvin akihot lhulsoh tauve ; Philistine mite kicha lih pai diu ahitai .
02015015	Edom mite lamkai ho atijauvin , Moab mihatte akihot hot’ui . Canaan gam mite amei doi gamtauve .
02015016	Tijat kichat’in adimtauvin , Vo Pakai nathahat amu soh tauve ; Sohchang nalhadoh namite kitoldoh soh kahsen atinaje helouvin lungdongin adingden tauve .
02015017	Nahin puilut’in nagamsung Mol le lhang natomjolsah-in ; Nang-Pakaiyin nalhendohsa mun , na-in Houin-nasahsa dung nalhutsohtai .
02015018	Vo Pakai nangma , Tonsot tonsot’a leng chang ding nahi , ” atiuve .
02015019	Israelten Twikhanglen lailung tolgon ajotdoh tauve . Egypt mite kangtalai ho le sakolte chule kangtalai tol ho puma Twikhanglen lailung agei phat’un Pakaiyin twipi akichisah kit’in achupsah soh tai .
02015020	Aaron sopinu Miriamin khutbeh akipat’in , numei dang sen jong ajop’un khutbeh bengin alamtauve .
02015021	Numeiho lamkaiyin Miriamin la asan : “ Pakai vahchoiyun , Minthangtah-in gal ajoutai . Sakolte le achunga tou mihem josue Twikhanglen a aleh luttai , ” atiuve .
02015022	Israelte chu Mose’n Twikhanglensan apat Shur gamthip lama apuitai . Nithum sung nelgam jeng ajot’u le , twi him him amu tapouve .
02015023	Marah kiti lai ahinphauvin , chukoma twi chula akhan adon theipouve . Twikhat jeh a Marah asah lo’u ahi .
02015024	Mipi Mose koma akiphin’un , “ Ipiba kadon diu ham ? ” tin anotauve .
02015025	Mose jong lunggil tah-in Pakaiya ataovin , Pakaiyin thing hal khat avet sah-in , hichu twikha lah a lelut le donthei asohtai . Hikoma hin Pakaiyin achonna diu Danthu apen , pajong apate’e .
02015026	Pakaiyin , “ Thildih a kagel chu thakhen louva nabol’uva , kathupeh chengse nanit jingule , Egypt mite kathagamna nat ho khatcha nachunguva chuhsah ponge . Kei hi nadamsah-uva Pakai chu kahi , ” ati .
02015027	Abanin Elim ahung lhungun , hikoma hin twinah phung som le ni aumin , chahthing hung som sagi akeh-e ; twipanga chun aki-ngauvin ahi .
17001001	Persia gam munpi Susa khopi laltouna muna konin lengpa Xerxes hin India gam a pat Sudan gei ,
17001002	gam ja khat le somni le sagi chunga vai ahom’e .
17001003	Alengvaipoh kal kumthum nan avaipote le vaihom chengse to nehkhom golvah abol’e . Golvahnaa hin Persia le Media gamhop sung sepaite le gamvaipote , milen milalte , akimsoh keiyui .
17001004	Lhagup lhungkeiyin lengpan lenggam haosatna le aloupi minthanje avetsah-e .
17001005	Ijakai avtsah soh phat’in , Susa tolpi sung mite din lengpan golvah chom khat bol’in , mihao mivai akousoh keiye . Golvah chu leng inpi hohnsunga hapta khat sungin abol’uve .
17001006	Leng inpi leitol chu pondum le ponkang adal khum’un , songval khom kiphut hoa chun tupat ponnemin dangka kol’a kitom abol-hom dunga akanbehuve . Leitol pumpia chun touna din sana le dangka kisem jeng akidon , song mantam , akang le asan , songval vahsel jeng , chule a-eng thipjet’in akitomjolsoj hel’e .
17001007	Donthei donna khon jouse sana jeng ahin , chule khon khat le khat kilo lou , lengpan leng inpi sung juneng jel’in ahom’e .
17001008	Judon tan phat umlou , lhacha ho chu min aduchan a donthei dia lengpan thu apehsah ahi .
17001009	Hiche sung hin leng inpi sunga lengnu Vashtin numeite din golvah abol’e .
17001010	Golvah vol kal ni sagi nin lengpan ju adonva set’in lung nomsel’in aumin , sole lhacha , nukiso sagi-Mehuman , Biztha , Harbona , Bigtha , Abagtha , Zethar chule Carkas akoulut’in ,
17001011	Lengnu Vashtin lallukhuh puma akimupi ding agakousah tai . Lengnu hi numei hoitah ahin , lengpan avaipote le maljin ho chu amel-hoi vetsah agot ahi .
17001012	Solle hon lengpa thupeh lengnu Vashti koma aseipeh-ule , ahung nompoi . Hijeh hin lengpa alung hang hangtai .
17001013	Umchan chondan thudol’a thuh le phah hethem ho doh hi lengpa umdol khat ahin , hijeh chun lengnu i-loa pha ding dol doh toh-din thumop themho akouve .
17001014	Lengpan thu adohnom miho chu-Carshenam Shethar , Admatha , Tarshish , Meres , Marsena , chule Memucan ahiuvin , Persia le Media leng gamsunga vaipo thunei chungnung pen vaipo cheh sagi ahiuve .
17001015	Hiche ho jah a hin lengpan , “ Lengpa Xerxes ken , Vashti lengnu kouva sole kasol le , kathu angaipoi ! I-ilo diuva danthun aseiyam ? ” tin adonge .
17001016	Hichun Memucan hin lengpa le avaipote koma - “ Lengnu Vashti hin lengpa keo noi lhah louva , avaipote geiya einoi lhah-u ahitai ; tahbeh-in gamsunga pasal jouse jong anoi lhah ahi !
17001017	Lengnu thilbol ja masa numei tinin jipa noisena aneithu thu diu ahi . Numeihon , ‘ Lengpa Xerxes-in bon lengnu Vasti kouva , koudoh jou lou , ’ ati diu ahi .
17001018	Persia le Media leng inpia vaipote lengnu kisah hi ajahdoh tengu , nilhum masanga ajiteu houna aneipai diu ahitai . Chuteng muntin a numei hon ajabol lou diu , pasal jouse ajite chunga lung hang ding ahiuve .
17001019	Lengpan nadei dingle , lengpa masanga Vasti hung kilah kit louhel din thuphon khat kiso jengle phante . Khel kit thei louhel dia Persia le Media danthua jih lut dia thu napeh din aphai . Chule lengnu khel’in numei hoijo khat lhengdoh le chun ahijenge .
17001020	Hiche thupeh phondohna hilenggam lentah sunga akihetsah soh hel teng , hao hen vai jongle pasal jouse ajiten ajabol cheh diu ahi , ” ati .
17001021	Lengpa le avaipoten thu kiseidoh chu pha asauvin , Memucan seibangin lengpan aboltai .
17001022	Leng gamhop sunga gamkai tin a , apaovu le lekhajem cheh-in hiche thuphon chu ajihdoh-un , pasal jouse hi a-insunga apua pang , aman thu chaina asei dingin alhahsah tai .
17002001	Lengpa alungdam nung geiyin jong Vashti chonchan , chule adouna thupondoh abol chu agel jing nalaiye .
17002002	Lengpa kinaipi , thumop phabep’in akoma , “ Lengpan nu-ngah thah mel-hoi tah nahol’a phalou ham ?
17002003	Lenggam sunga gamkai vaipoten nu-ngah mel-hoi lai jouse , hikom munpi lai , Susa khopi leng inpia ahinpui diuvin seipeh-in , Nu-ngah jouse chu numeite vetup’a nakoi , nukiso Hegai noiya umsah-in , abonchauvin kisemhoisah phat pen .
17002004	Chuteng nu-ngah hoipen chu Vashti khel’in lengnun pansah-in , ” atiuve . Aseiyu hi lengpan thilphan agel’in aboltai .
17002005	Susa khopi a chun Juda mi Jair chapa Mordecai achenge . Mordecai hi Benjamin phunga mi , Kish le Shimei son ahi .
17002006	Babylon lengpa Nebuchadnezzarin Judah lengpa Jehoiachin le sohchang dang Jerusalema kona akaimang chun alah-uva Mordecai jong apange .
17002007	Mordecai hin asopite chanu khat achanu banga akisem , Hebrew paova amin Hadassah kiti Esther , nu-ngah mel-hoi tah le gongso hoitah khat aneiye . Anule apa thi phat’a mordecai hin achanu bang banga avopdoh ahi .
17002008	Lengpan nu-ngah jouse khop dia thuphondoh abol phat’in , Susa khopia nu-ngah ahinpuilut nauva Esther jong apangkhai . Esther jong leng inpia , leng numeiho in vaipo Hegai thu noiya akoitauve .
17002009	Hegaiyin Esther adeiyin , Eshterin jong hegai along lhaisah lheh-e . Hegaiyin man gangtah-in Esther semhoina ding le atahsa thaosah lai din na atongpanin , neh le chah pha pha apetai . Esther chu leng inpi numeiho umnaa mun nompen apen , akibol din leng inpia numei sagi jen apansah tai .
17002010	Mordecaiyin ahilchah masah jen-in , Estherin Judah mi ahi chu aseidoh poi .
17002011	Niseh le Esther chu itobanga , achunga ipi soh ding ti hetdoh gon , Mordecai chu leng inpi numeiho umna maiya adung avaiyin achelejie .
17002012	Numei semhoina phat chu angaiya kum khat ahin , lhagup ma myrrh kinua tahsa mehnou chet ding , chule balsam thao nu na lhagup ma lutbe ding ahi . Hichengse akichaisoh hel teng nu-ngahho chu khat khat a lengpa Xerxes anga puilut ding ahi .
17002013	Numei inpia pat leng inpi ajot teng nu-ngah chun ipi hijongle adei dei akivon ding ahi .
17002014	Nilhah teng lengpa henga lut ding , jingkah teng numei inpi chom khat’a apuilut’uva , lengpa thaikemho vaipo , nukiso Shaashgaz noiya um ding ahi . Hiche a lutsa chu lengpan adeiya amin a akou kit loule lengpa koma lut kit lou ding ahitai .
17002015	Amupha chan seiphat , Abihail chanu , Mordecai chagavopnu , Esther lengpa henga lutna ding phat ahitai . Esther alut phat’in , numei inpi vaipo , nukiso Hedgaiyin von dia aseipeh bangin akivontai .
17002016	Hiti hin Xerxes lengchan kal kum sagi na , lha som lhin , Tebeth lhan , leng inpia Xerxes lengpa angsunga Esther apuilut tauve .
17002017	Lengpan Esther chu nu-ngah dang dang sangin adeipenin , nu-ngah dang sangin aman lengpa sei abol’in angailotai . Lengpan lallukhuh akhuhpeh-in , Vashti khel’in lengnun asemtai .
17002018	Esther jabolnan lengpan golvah abol’in , vaipo vaibol chengse akousoh keiye . Lenggam pumpia choldo nikho aphongdoh-in leng khat peh lomtah thilpeh tampi ahomdoh-e .
17002019	Hichepat hin lengpan Mordecai chu vaipo khat’in apansah tai .
17002020	Esther in Juda mi ahi aseidoh hih laiye . Mordecai hin koimacha aseipeh lou dia ahiljeh a , aneocha lhah thu anun jing banga , athua nunga aseidoh lou ahi .
17002021	Mordecaiyin leng inpia na atoh pet hin , lengpa indan sunga lutna kelkot ngahte ni-Bigthana le Teresh-in lengpa Xerxes adou lhonin , tha din ago lhontai .
17002022	Athilgon lhon hi Mordecaiyyin ahetdoh doh-in Esther ahil le , Mordecai thil het chu Estherin lengpa aseipeh tai .
17002023	Phatah a akholchil’u le , thudih ahin , mithat gote ni thingchunga akhailih tauve . Aumdol hi lenggambua jih lut din lengpan thu apetai .
17003001	Chom khat jouvin lengpa Xerxes-in Haman kitipa chu Semang pipun atung lentai . Haman hi Agag chilhah , Hammedatha chapa ahi .
17003002	Akinbol vaipo jouse kun cheh a Haman jabolna chibai aboh cheh diuvin lengpan aseitai . Abonchan abol cheh-un , Mordecai seh she adai .
17003003	Leng inpia vaipo dangsen , lengpa thupeh anit louna jeh Mordecai adongun ;
17003004	niseh-in anit teina din asol sol jengun , amala anom naisaipoi . Aman , “ kei Juda mi kahin , Haman noiya kun a chibai kaboh thei lou ding ahi , ” ati . Vaipoten athusoh hi Haman aseipeh-un , Mordecai umchan angaidam ding le angaidamlou didng along dong lheh-ui .
17003005	Akoma Mordecai kun a chibai boh ding nop lou ajah phat’in Haman alung hang behseh jengin ;
17003006	chule Mordecai ma Juda mi ahi ahetdoh phat’in , Mordecai seh talen matsah sanga khoh cheh bol agoi . Hiti hin Persia gamsung pumpia Juda mi jouse thagam ding thil agongtai .
17003007	Lengpa Xerxes lengchan kal kum somle ni lhinna , lha masa , Nisan lhan , athilgon molsona ding nikho pha le lha kitoh holdoh didng deinan Haman hin Purim phun san ding aseitai .
17003008	Hiti hin Hamanin lengpa jah a , “ Naleng gamsunga hin mihem nam khat kithecheh a , gamkai jousea chegnsoh kei aum’e . Hiche nam mite hin midangto kitoh louhel chonchan dan aneiyui . Akhoh cheh-in , amaho hin gamsung danthu jong anit pouvin , hijeh a chu amaho hinghoi hoi ding nan gdin hung phaponte .
17003009	Nadeile thugahna khat sunin lang hiche nam mite hi kithatgamle phante . Nanop pou poule , leng gamsung kivaipohna manchah din dangka talent sangsom peng ting , leng thil kholnaa koiyinge , ” ati .
17003010	Lengpan khutjem mohor a kisem , thuphondoh jouse kinamkhumji chu asut lhan , Judate melmapa , Agag chilhah Hamandatha chapa Haman apetai .
17003011	Haman jah a , “ Judate le asum jouseu nanga ahitan , pha nasah lam lamin bol jengin , ” ati .
17003012	Lha masapen nisom le nithum nin Hamanin lengpa lekhajihho jouse akoukhomin , leng gamsunga kimang lekhajem jouse le pao jouse a ledoh a jih ding , chule vaipote le gamvaipo chengse thotsoh hel din , thuphondoh khat ajihsah tai . Lekha chu lengpa Xerxes min a kijih , amohor kinamkhum ahi .
17003013	Solle hon hiche lakha chu gamsunga ahomsoh tauve . Asunga kisun chun-nikhatseh sung , Adar lha nisomle nithum ni le-Judate abonchauva , ateh akhang , numei chapang thagam hel dia asei ahi . Hepi beihel’a thagam ding , anei agou chengseu chomsoh ding ahi .
17003014	Nikho alhin teng miho kigingsa aum theina diuva gamkai jouse thuphondoh chu phonjalsoh ding ahi .
17003015	Lengpa thupeh-in thugahna chu munpipen khopi Susa a aphongdoh-un sole hon athu ho gamkai jouse alhutsoh tauve . Susa khopi sung mipi lung donga kihel lei loi pet hin lengpanle Hamanin nomtah-in toumun ju adon lhon’e .
17004001	Thilsoh jouse Mordecaiyin ajahsoh phat’in lung gimin aponsil chengse abottelsoh tai . Khaodip pon asil’in , lujanga leivui kiloiyin , khopi lailunga avah len , lhase tah-in othongje jun akap’in ,
17004002	leng inpi kulpi kotphung geiyin ahunge . Khaodip ponsil koima lut ding aphal loujeh-un leng inpia alut poi .
17004003	Lengpa thuphondoh kisseidohna gamkai jousea , Judate lah a lunghem ka ogin thong akijai , Judate an ngol le kap le lunghemin aum’un , atamjonkhaodip pon dil’in vutvam lah a akijamtauve .
17004004	Mordecai umchan hi nukiso ho le Esther aseipeh phat’un , alung gim lheh jenge . Khaodip pon kheldohna dia Mordecai hi ponsil athot vangin , Mordecaiyin akilah dehpoi .
17004005	Hichun Estherin alhacha dia lengpan akoipeh , leng inpia nukiso , Hathach chu akouvin , ipi jeh a Mordecai chute chon ahidol photoh din asoltai .
17004006	Hathach chu Mordecai umna , khopi ningkoi , leng inpi lutna kotphunga achei .
17004007	Thilsoh chengse Mordecaiyin aseipeh-in , Judate akithagam le leng inpi thil kholnaa Hamanin akoilut nom sum jat jong aseithai .
17004008	Judate kithagamna dia Susa khopia kona kihomdoh thuphondoh lekha jong pheng khat Hathach apei . Mordecaiyin Hathach hin lekha chu Esther koma apeh a , aumdol hilchet’a , chule Esther asol’a amite chunga lengpan hepina anei theina dia ngeh didn aseipeh-e .
17004009	Hathach chun asei bangin abol’in ,
17004010	Estherin ma Mordecai henga thu lethah kit dingin asol’in ,
17004011	“ Numei hihen pasal hile , kou louva leng inpi sung gil’a lut tapou chu thi jeng ding ahi . Hiche hi Danthu ahin , lengpa thumop ho apat gamkai mitinin ahet cheh ahi . Hiche danthu peldohna ding lam khat aumin , lengpan aleng tenggol adop khumpa vang sohcha ding ahi . Ahinla lengpan eikou louna hi lha khat jen alhingtai , ” ati .
17004012	Mordecaiyin Esther thu thot amu phat’in ,
17004013	gihsalna thu alethot’in , “ Leng inpia naum vangin Juda dang sangin hoidoh nang tin kinep dan .
17004014	Hitobang phat’a hi naum thim le van a konin Judate kithopi ding hunga , huhhinga um tei diu nang vang nathi tei ding , napa khanggui bei ding ahitai . Kon ija ahet’em , ijem itile hitobang phat hung lhun ding jeh alengnua napan khat jong hithei tah ahi ! ” ati .
17004015	Estherin hiti hin Mordecai adonbut’in ,
17004016	“ Susa khopia Judate gakhomin lang , kei din an ngol’in neitaopeh-un , nithum le janthumin neh le chah bolda jengun . Kalhacha nu-ngahho le kenjong chutima kabol diu ahi . Chujoule , Danthu to kikal hijeng jongle , lengpa koma kalut ding , kathilo jeng ding hijongle kathi mai ding ahi , ” ati .
17004017	Mordecai akipatdoh-inEsther sei jouse aboltai .
17005001	A-an ngol nithum lhin nin Estherin leng pochol sil’in , leng inpi sunggil’a lut’in , laltouna indan sung , laltouna touvin , kotphung lam ana ngai .
17005002	polam a lengnu Esther ding amudoh phat’in alung lhaiyin , sana leng tenggol agadop sangpeh tai . Esther ahung lut paiyin , tenggol muh agah thamtai .
17005003	Lengpan , “ Ipi hitam lengnu Esther ? Nadei dei seiyin kapeh ding nahi , kalenggam keh khat hijongle it poge , ” tin aseiye .
17005004	Estherin , “ Lengpan pha nasah le , tuni lhah teng lengpa le Haman nehkhom golvah kabolpi nom’e , ” ati .
17005005	Hichun Esther golvah ankong umpi din lengpan Haman kinloitah-in agah kouve . Hiti chun lengpa le Haman Esther gaovahna ache lhontai .
17005006	Ju anop thim phat’in lengpan Esther jah a , “ Nadei dei kapeh ding nahi , seiyin . Kalenggam keh khat geiyin thum jongle chun penange , ” ati .
17005007	Estherin ,
17005008	“ Lengpa nalung lhai dingle , jing teng jong le hitobang golvah khat bol kit ing ting , Haman to neihung lhah peh kit lhonin . Chuteng kadei chu sei nange , ” ati .
17005009	Haman kipah tah-in golvah mun dalhan achedoh tai . Ahin leng inpi kulpi kot phunga Mordecai ajotpa teng , jabolna dingdoh louva aumji le along hang behseh jengin ahi .
17005010	Hijongle akitim nah nah-in in lam ajon’e . In a aloi agolte akoukhomin , ajinu Zeresh geiya pang din akouvin ahi .
17005011	Amaho hi ahao natsatje avetsah-in , hoitho tah-in chapa tampi aneile , lengpan panmun lena akhandoh thu , lengpa vaipote lah a thupipen ahidol jouse seiyin akiletsah-e .
17005012	Hamanin , “ Ipi dang ngai nalaiyem ? Lengnu Esther geiyin kei le lengpa bou golvah ankong um din eikou lhonin , jinga din jong eikou kit nalai lhon’e .
17005013	Ahivanginla leng inpi kulpi kotphunga Juda mi Mordecai tou kamu jing laisen , hichengpi jong hi imacha ahipoi , ” ati .
17005014	Hichun ajinu le aloi agolten , “ Ahi , thingpel metre somni le ni sang khat nasema , jingkah teng lengpa koma Mordecai khailih dia naseile iti-am ? Chutile lung nom a golvah ankong naum thei ding ahi , ” atiuve . Aseiyu chu Hamanin thilphan agel’in , thingpel chu asemtai .
17006001	Janin lengpa ihmu mon aumtan , hijeh chun leng gamsung lekhabu jouse asimpeh diuvin angeh tai .
17006002	Asimpeh nauva chun lengpa indan kotpi ngah a pang , leng inpia nukiso te ni , Bigthana le Teresh-in lengpa athagot lhon , Mordecaiyin aphondoh jong apangkhai .
17006003	Hichun pengpan , “ Hiche aboljeh a chu itobang gunchena le kipaman Mordecai hi kipetam ? ” tin adongtai . Asohten , “ Mordecai imacha jong akibolpeh khapoi , ” tin aseiyui .
17006004	Lengpan , “ Leng inpia hi kavaipote khatbeh um’uvam ? ” tin ahol’e . Hichepet tah hin Haman leng inpi hongcha ahung keiye ; Haman hi asemsa thingpel chunga Mordecia khailih ding thu lengpa koma sei dia hung ahi .
17006005	Asohten , “ Haman aumin , kimupi din na-ngah-e , ” atiuve . Lengpan , “ Hinpui lut’un , ” ati .
17006006	Haman ahung lut chun lengpan , “ Jabol dia kadeitah mi khat aum’e . Hitobang mi chu i-kalo ding lom ham ? ” tin adonge . Haman akigeltoh masan , “ Lengpan hibanga ajabolnom hi koi ahidm ? Kei hitei veh tang , ati .
17006007	Hiti hin Hamanin lengpa jah a , “ Nangin nasilji mong mong leng ponsandup chol chu galahsah-in lang ,
17006008	leng kijepna sanajem ho chu nasakol jepan ,
17006009	chuteng namihat lah a hatpen khat’in hitobang mi chu jem hen lang , sakol chunga toudohdah hen , aman sakol kaile hen , khopi dung lhungsoh keiyin mihatpa hin , ‘ Veuvin , veuvin , lengpan jabol’a kipaman apeh pa hi ! ’ tin sam le le hen , ” ati .
17006010	Chutah-in lengpan Haman jah a , “ Leng ponsandup chol galan , sakol gakai loiyin , chule hiche Juda mi Mordecai khu hitobang chun jabolna neiyin . Nasei jouse chu ama din bol jengin . Leng inpi kulpi kotpuhnga tou jing ahi , ” ati .
17006011	Hiti chun Hamanin leng ponsandup chol alan , sakol agakaiyin , ponsandup chol Mordecai asilpeh-in , sakol chunga Mordecai atouvin , Hamaninkhopi dung lhungkeiyin akailen , achepum lhonin mipi jah din , “ Veuvin veuvin , lengpan jabol’a kipaman apehnom mi chu iti abol hitam ! ” tin asamle lei .
17006012	Haman jum behseh a mai pon a jel’a in lam ajot chun , Mordecai leng inpi kulpi kotphunga ache kit’e .
17006013	Haman chun thilsoh jouse ajinu le aloi agolte koma aseitai . Ajinu le aloite michingtah tah hon , “ Mordecaiyin nathaneina achulhah pan ahitai . Juda mi ahin , najo louhel ding ahi . Aman najotei ding ahi , ” atiuve .
17006014	Amaho akihou nalaiyun , leng inpia nukisoho , Esther ankong um dia Haman pui din ahung paitauve .
17007001	Hiti hin lengpa le Hamanin Esther to
17007002	aniveina nakong aumkhomtauve . Ju anop thim phat’in lengpan Esther adongkit’in , “ Lengnu Esther , ipi nadei ham , tun seitan ? Seiyin kapeh ding nahi . Kalenggam keh khat hijongle penge , ” ati .
17007003	Lengnu Estherin , “ Lengpan neinop peh dingle nemhaova ka-ngeh nom chu kei le kamite hinghoina ding kadeiye .
17007004	Kei le kamite hi thagam dia johdohsa kahitauve . Soh a kijohdoh mai hiuving , ima dang thu umlou hile , umthim a nang suboi lou didng kahi ; tua vang hi kabonchauva suhgam a , suhmang ding kahitauve ! ” ati .
17007005	Chutah chun lengpa Xerxes chun , “ Hitobang thil bolngam ding chu koi hiya , ama chu hoiya um ham ? ” tin adongtai .
17007006	Estherin , “ Eihehseuva kamelmau , hiche migiloupa Haman hi ahi ! ” tin akoh tai .
17007007	Lengpa lung hangval’in akipatdoh-in , indan sung dalhan , leng inpi polam honleiya agavah lei . Lengpan talen amatsah tei ding amudoh phat’in Haman aumdenin , lengnu Esther koma ahinghoi teina din atao tao jenge .
17007008	Ahepi teina dinEsther jalkhuna akisep lhun ataove . Hichepet tah chun honleiya konin lengpa ahung nungkit’in insung ahunglut’e . Aumchan amudoh phat’in lengpa akisenjah jengin , “ Hichepa hin kaleng inpi sung jenga jong , kamitmu changtah a lengnu geiya suhset aot hitam ? ” tin aseitai . Lengpan asei jou lou laiyin nukiso hon Haman luchang atom paitauve .
17007009	Nukiso ho lah a Harbonah chun , “ Nahuhhinga Mordecai thana din Haman hin thingpel semsan a-in a akoiye . Thingpel lentah , metre somni le ni jen sang ahi ! ” ati . Lengpan , “ Ama khailih nan ganeiyun ! ” ati .
17007010	Hiti hin Mordecai khailihn adinga asemsa thingpel a chun Haman akhailih-un , lengpa jong alungdamtai .
17008001	Hiche nikho chun lengpa Xerxes chun Judate melma Haman thille lo , neile gou abonchan Esther apetai . Mordecai apa-ngah ahichu Estherin lengpa aseipeh-in , hichea pat hin Mordecai lengpa koma alut theitai
17008002	Lengpan Haman khut’a anunglah , akhutjem , mohor umna chu asut lhan Mordecai apetai . Estherin Mordecai chu Haman neile gou jouse chingtup din akoitai .
17008003	Esther lengpa khophangbul ; a lhun akap’in , Agag chilhah Haman thilse gon , Judate thagam dia agot chu suhtangna dia thil khatbeh bolsah din a-ngeh tai .
17008004	Lengpan Esther din leng tenggol adop khumin , amanu dingdoh-in aseitai ,
17008005	“ Lengpan pha nasah a , kei thi ding nadaa , dih nasah le , Agag chilhah , Hammedatha chapa Haman thupeh , leng gamsunga Judate thagam dia thupeh aneisa suh tangna din thuphondoh khat sodoh le chun kati .
17008006	Hitobang manthahna kamite chunga lhunga ka-inkote geiya kithagam ding chu iti kathoh ding hitam ? ” ati .
17008007	Hichun lengpa Xerxes-in lengnu Esther le Juda mi Mordecai jah a , “ Ve-lhonin , Hamanin Judate thagam agotjeh-in kakhailih-in , anei agou jouse Esther kapetai .
17008008	Lengpa min a thuphondoh kisema leng mohor kinam khum vang chu kikhel theiponte , Judate vang chu nadei deiya lekha nathot thei lhon ahi ; kei min a najih lhon a leng mohor nanamkhum thei lhon ahi , ” ati .
17008009	Lha thum lhinna , Sivan lha , nisom ni le nithum nia hiche hi soh ahi . Mordecaiyin lengpa lekhajih ho akoukhomin , Judate le gamvaipote , vaibolte , India pat Sudan gei gamkai ja khat le somni le sagi sunga athot’ui . Lekhaho chu agamkai pao le lekhajem cheh , Judate din jong Judate lekhajem le apaovun ajihsoh keiyui .
17008010	Mordecaiyin lekha thot ho chu lengpa Xerxes minin ajihsah-in , leng mohor anamkhumsoh keiye . Lekha thot jouse chu leng sakolbuh a kihen , sakol jangkhai cheh mangin mi atousah-in agahopsah sohkeiye .
17008011	Hiche lekha thot hoa kisei chu-khopi jousea cheng Judaten akihuhdoh na diuva pangkhom thei din lengpan aphalpeh-e . Gamkai hoilai hihen , itobang manchah choi min hindel khum’u jongle , asat thuh-uva , numei chapang geiya athagam diu , khatcha hing hoi louva , anei agou jouseu geiya akichom diduvin aseiye .
17008012	Hiche thugahna hi lha somle ni lhinna , Adar lha , nisom le nithum ni , Judate thagam pumpia manchah dia kisei ahi .
17008013	Athu hi pondoh a Danthua pang ding , gamkai jousea mitin hetsah ding , hiche nikho chule Judate amelmateuva akihuhdoh theina diuva , kigingsa aumna diuva seipeh ding ahi .
17008014	Lengpa thupeh-in sakol themte leng sakol chunga atouvun , jangkhai vel’in alhaitauve . Thugahna chu munpi pen Susa khopia jong japi ahetsah-ui .
17008015	Mordecaiyin leng inpi dalhan , leng pon loupe , adumle akang , tupat ponnem sil’in , lallukhuh loupe tah khuh-in akondodh tai . Susa khopi sung kipa ogin athongsoh hel’e .
17008016	Judate din kipa lung olle , nopna chule galjona lungthin aumdoh tai .
17008017	Khopi jouse le gamkai jouse , lengpa thuphondoh kisimphah na jousea , Judaten toh bangin kipa golnop abolsoh keiyui . Dihtah-in midang tampi jong Juda mi asoh gamtauve . Ajeh chu mijousen aginlo tauvin ahi .
17009001	Leng thuphondoh manchahna ding , Asar lha , nisomle nithum ni amelmateuvin Judahte matchom agot niu ahung lhungati . Ahinla Judahten amaho ajolotauve .
17009002	Leng gamsung , Judate chenna mun jousea , asat diuva kigochanto kisat jeng din Judate akikhomtauve . Muntin a min Judate akichauvin , koiman adehjou tapouve .
17009003	Tahbeh-in , Mordecai aginjeh-un , gamkai vaipote le , gamvaipo ho , vaibol ho chule leng thalhenga antong jousen , Judahte apanpi cheh tauve .
17009004	Lenggam pumpia , leng inpia Mordecia thenai , aneibe cheh cheh thudol akithangsoh tai .
17009005	Hijeh chun Judahten amelmateu alo nom nom alo thei tauve . Chemjam choiyin adekhum’un , asat chap jenguve .
17009006	Munpi pen Susa khopi sung jenga jong Judahten mihem ja nga athat’uve .
17009007	Amitha lah-uva Judahte melma , Hammedatha chapa Haman chapate som khat jong apangun ,
17009008	Parshandatha , Dalphon , Aspatha , Parmashta , Arisai , Asidai , chule Vaizatha ahiuve .
17009010	Thilkeo ima vang achomtapouve .
17009011	Hiche nikhoa Susa khopia mihem kithah jat chu lengpa aseipeh-uve .
17009012	Lengpan lengnu Edther jah a , “ Susa khopi sung jenga jong Judahten mihem ja nga athat’un , Haman chapa som khat jong apangtai . Gamkai dang danga ijat i-alo dda diu ham ! Ipi nadeibe nah laiyam ? Namu thei ahi . Seiyin , namu jeng ding ahi , ” ati .
17009013	Estherin , “ pha neisah peh dingle , thunia abol banguvin Judahten jing jongle bol kit tadiu hen . Chule Haman chapa som khat chu thingpel a khaisang din noppeh-in , ” ati .
17009014	Lengpan hiche jong hi aphalpeh-in , Susa khopi sunga thuphondoh khat ahomjaltauve . Haman chapa som khat long chu japi vet din aphoujah tauve .
17009015	Adar lha nisomle nile nin , Susa khopia Judahte akikhom’un , khosunga mihem jathum jen athabe kit’ui . Thilkeo vang achomdeh kit pouve .
17009016	Gamkai jousea Judahte jong akikhom’un , akihuh cheh tauve . Avetdauva pang mihem sang som sagi le sang nga athat gam’un , amelmateuva konin aongthol tauve . Thilkeo ima vang achompouve .
17009017	Hicheng chu Adar lha nisomle nithum nia thilsoh ahi . Ajing nikho , nisomle nili nin vang mi athabe tapouvin , kipa golvah nikhon amangjo tauve .
17009018	Susa khopia Judahten vang nisomle nithum , nisomle ni nga nia ahaijeh-un , nisomle ni nga ni choldo nin amanguve .
17009019	Hijeh a chu khote dunga cheng Judahten Adar lha nisomle nili ni hi kipa nihtnega amanjiu ahin ; golvah bolna le khat le khat neh le chah kipetou ahi .
17009020	Mordecaiyin thilsoh hicheng hi ajihdoh-in , Persia gam pumpi , gamla naiya cheng Judahte jouse athot’in ,
17009021	kumseh le Adar lha nisomle nili ni , nisomle ni nga ni nithenga anit diuvin aseipeh-e .
17009022	Hiche nikhote nia hi Judahten amelmateu athagamu ahi ; hiche lha hi lung gim hesoh a kona kipa nopna kiheidohn alha ahi . Hiche nikhote ni hi golnop kut le anlhung nehna , neh le chah kithah toa , vaichate anthahna nei din aseipeh tai .
17009023	Judahten Mordecai thupeh ajuiyun , hiche golnop hi kum vanlhah kut’in aumdoh lo tai .
17009024	Judahte melma , Agag chilhah , Hammedatha chapa Hamanin Judahte suhgamna din Purim kiti mangin phun anasanin , nikho hoipen a suhgam didn ahol’in , thagam hel din anagoi .
17009025	Ahivangin Esther lengpa koma alut’in , lengpan thugahna asemin , Judahte bolna sia thilgon chu Haman chungjoh a achuh lon , amati acahpate ti thingpel a akhaisoh tauve .
17009026	Hijeh a chu hiche nithengte ni hi Purim kisah lo ahitai , Mordecai lekha thot ho jeh le achunguva thilsoh ho jal’in ,
17009027	Judahten Dan akisem lo’uvin , amaho tah le atu achateu , koi hile Judah mi hung hithei , Mordecai thupeh dungjuiya kumseh le aphat phat cha hiche nikho teni ho nit jing din aboltauve .
17009028	Kinoptona asem’un , Judah insung mite jousen , akhang khanga , gamkai jouse le khopi jousea , ahung lhun phat tin a , Purim nikho te ni hi geldoh a nit jing din aseitauve .
17009029	Lengnu Esther , Abihail chanu le Mordecaiyin jong lekha ajih lhonin , masangjep a Mordecia sutse Purim thudol asei chu , thalhingset’in namdetna anei lhontai .
17009030	Hiche lekha chu Judahte jouse athot’un , atobng cheh chu Persdia lenggam gamkai ja khat le somni le sagi sunga athotsoh hel’ui . Lekhaa chun Judahte lah a cham le lungmon len ding akiseiyin ,
17009031	Lungkham lunghem a an ngol’a nit dia kisei bang banga , aphat phat cha Purim nikhote ni chu amaho le atu achateu geiyin anit diuvin aseipeh lhon’e . Hiche thupeh hi Mordecai le Estherin asei cheh lhon ahinai .
17009032	Estherin Purim nit dol Dan kisem namdetna anei chu lekhajol khat’a akisuntai .
17010001	Lengpa Xerxes hin gamgil lama chengho hihen , Twikhanglen pang dunga cheng ho hileu-agamsung pumpia elbol natoh tohsah ding abol cheh-e .
17010002	Thil loupe le mingthang abol ho , Mordecai tohmun len a akhandoh lhingkeiyin Persia le Media lengtebua akijihsoh keiye .
17010003	Judah mi Mordecai chu lengpa Xerxes bantah ajauvin adei cheh-ui . Anam mite phatna dingle atu achateu lungmon theina ding jeng anatonge .
18001001	Uz gamsunga Pathen ginga tahsan Job anachengin , chondih tah ahin , thilse bol louhel ahi .
18001002	Job’in chapa sagi le chanu thum aneiye ;
18001003	kelngoi sang sagi le sa-ngonsao sang thum , bongchal sang khat le sa-ngan ja nga aneiyin , soh tampi avul’in , niso lama mihao pentah ahi .
18001004	Job chapate aban banin kilhan golvah abol jiuvin , adang ho hung lhasoh kei ahiuvin , asopiu numei thum jong akou jiuve .
18001005	Golvah boljou jingkah teng Job jingpi tah-in athouvin , achate suh theng nadin kilhaina aboljin ahi . Job geldol’a achate khattouvin hetoh louva Pathen a-enghoukah diu agin mo ahi .
18001006	Ni khat van mite Pakai anga ahung kikhop nauva Satan jong alah-uva apange .
18001007	Pakaiyin Satan jah a , “ Hoilam galhah nahim ? ” atileh , Satanin , “ Leiset chung kalhah len , dung le vaiyin kachon len , tua hikoma hung kahi , ” ati .
18001008	Pakaiyin , “ Kalhacha Job chu namum ? Ama banga kitah le pha leiset chunga midang aumpoi . Aman chibai eiboh jingin , thilse pou pou bol louhel ahi , ” ati .
18001009	Satanin , “ Job’in ajeh beiya Pathen agin beh ham ?
18001010	Nangin ama le a-insung mite chule anei jouse vettup peh jing chu . Anatoh jouse phatthei naboh-in , gamsung pumpi agancha nadimsah tai .
18001011	Tun ijemtin anei jouse lah peh le chun namai change nagaosap ding ahi ! ” ati .
18001012	Pakaiyin Satan jah a , “ Aphai , anei jouse khu nanop nop gallon , ahinkho vang nasuhset thei lou idng ahi , ” atileh , Satan akondoh paitai .
18001013	Ni khat Job chaten a-upa pen’u in a golvah abol pet tah-un
18001014	solle khat Job henga ahung lhaijel’in , “ Bongchal hon lou kakaiyun , akoma sa-ngante kavah-un ,
18001015	het man louhel’in Sabea miten eihin del khum’un gancha jouse akitol mang tauve . Kei tilou nasohte jouse jong athat gam’un , kachangseh a hung jamdoh a hiche kaseipeh nahi , ” ati .
18001016	Solle pan thu asei chai hih laiyin , lhacha khat ahung lhung paiyin , “ Kelngoite le kelngoi ching ho keh’in asep lihsoh tan , kachangseh a hung jamdoh a kahungseipeh nahi , ” ati .
18001017	Aman asei chai hih laiyin , lhacha chomkhatma ahung lhungin , “ Chaldea sepai loi thum jenin eidel khum’un , kei tilou nalhachate athat gam’un , sa-ngongsao jouse akai mangun , kachangseh a jamdoh a nang kahung seipeh nahi , ” ati .
18001018	Aman jong asei chai hih laiyin , lhacha khat ahung lhung pai kittan , “ Nachaten a-upa pen’u in a kut abol laitah-un ,
18001019	gamthip laiya konin khopi hui ahung langin , ain asem lhun , nachate adel lih soh tai , kachangseh a hung jamdoh a , nang kahung seipeh nahi , ” ati .
18001020	Chutah chun Job akipatdoh-in , aponsil jouse abottel’in , asam avou chaiyin , tol’a amai asulut’in ataotao .
18001021	Job’in , “ Sagoh keova peng kahin , sagoh keova kathi ding ahi . Pakaiyin eipeh ahin , Aman akilah kit ahitai ! Nun nom hen Pakai min ! ” ati .
18001022	Thilsoh hijat jeh hin Job achonse deh pon , Pathen jong amosopoi .
18002001	Pakai angsunga van mite ahung kikhop kit phat’uvin , Satan jong alah-uva apange .
18002002	Pakaiyin Satan jah a , “ Hoilam galhah le nahim ? ” ati . Satanin , “ Leiset chung kalhah len , dung le vaiyin kachon len , tua hikoma hung kahi , ” ati .
18002003	Pakaiyin , “ Kalhacha Job chu namun ? ama banga kitah le leiset chunga midang aumpoi . Chibai eiboh jingin , thilse pou pou bollouhel ahi , ajeh beiya suhmang dia nagot’a nabolset soh tah vangin , Job alung lha hih laiye , ” ati .
18002004	Satanin , “ Mihemin ahinna ding pou pou ahileh imacha dalhah lel neiponte .
18002005	Tun atahsa khu natsah temin , namai changtah a nagaosap jeng ding ahibouve ! ” ati .
18002006	Pakaiyin Satan jah a , “ Aphai , Job khu nanop nop nalo theiye , thavang that thei pon nate , ” ati .
18002007	Pakai koma konin Satan apotdoh-in , Job chu apum alongin aphahsah soh hel tai .
18002008	Job akipatdoh-in vutbouva agatouvin , bel hal khat’in atipat lai ho akhot khot jenge .
18002009	Job jinun ajah a , “ Tugeiya jong lung lhadeh lou nahi ong ? Pathen chu gaosap’in lang thidoh jeng tam-em ! ” ati .
18002010	Job’in ajinu jah a , “ Na-ngol thubuh nasei ham ! Pathenin thilpha eipeh laisea ikipaa , thilse eipeh teng akiphin ding ham ? ” ati . Genthei hesoh chujat athoh vangin , Job’in Pathen dounan thu cheng khat cha aseipoi .
18002011	Job hin gol thum aneiyin , amaho chu Teman khoa Eliphaz , Shuah gama Bildad , chule Naamath gam a Zophar ahiuve . Job hesoh genthei khohje ajah phat’un , alha mon din ahung kontauve .
18002012	Gal’a pang a Job ahin mu vangun , alim amel ahedoh thei tapouve . Ahetdoh phat’un aponsil abottel jengun , lung natah-in aluvum lam’uva leivui aleh thang’un , othongje jun akaptauve .
18002013	Anat hesoh behseh jeng amudoh phat’un , ni sagi sungin sun le janin atoupiuvin , a-uhpoh apaosa aumpouve .
18003001	Akhon nan Job apengjah-in apen nikho agaosap tai .
18003002	Job’in ,
18003003	“ Kapen nikho gaosap chang hen , Kakijil jan chu gaosap chang hen !
18003004	O Pathen , hiche nikho chu thimpi jinsah-in , Sumil del’in , kho vahsah da hel’in !
18003005	Muthim lhangkhal kiheh hen , Mei jing hen , nihu kilah da hen !
18003006	Kakijil jan chu kum sungin simtha dan , Kisimtha kit da hel hen !
18003007	Jan lunghem jan hisah-in , Lhaset jan hihen !
18003008	Kapen nikho chu gaothem hon gaosap hen , Levithan phin hang thei hon phin hang hen !
18003009	Jing valpa vahsah dan , Hiche jan chu khovah mon um hen !
18003010	Hiche jan hin eipensah jeh-in gaosap’in , Genthei hesoh eithohsah jeh-in gaosap’in
18003011	Kanu oisunga kathiden a , Kalong damsa ahung penlhah leh itim ?
18003012	Idia kanun pheichunga eina pom’a , Idia noitwiya einavah ham ?
18003013	Chulaiyin anathi ta leng , Tua kicholdo taing !
18003014	Leng inpi sapha leng le lalte to Lumkhom tange !
18003015	Chutileh sana dangka indim dim akoi , Leng le lal chapate toh lumkhom inge !
18003016	Nimel lhamel mu manlouva Chalam a eikipai tading !
18003017	Vuikhuh a migilou agilou tapon , Thacholte acholdotai !
18003018	Lhankhuh a sohchangte jong a-oltan , Songkul ngahpa hutot jong ajatapouve !
18003019	Milen mineo aumkhomsoh keiyun , Sohho jong achamlhat tauve .
18003020	Idia mihem hesoh gentheiya hinga , Lung nguiyan khovah amu ham ?
18003021	Thikal angah lel lheh jengun , athimo hel’ui ; Neile gou sangin buikhuh adeijo’uve !
18003022	Thia akivuidoh masangsen Nom asadeh pouve !
18003023	Akhonung thuu Pathenin aimpeh-in , Jet le veiya aumkimsoh tai !
18003024	Neh le chah khel’in lunghemin ka-umin , Gim genthei kathoh jinge !
18003025	Kaginpen thil’in eiphan , Katijatna penin eilhun dentai !
18003026	Lungmon le choldona kaneipoi , Kagentheina abei thei tapoi !
18004001	Eliphaz-in Job jah a , “ I-khat kiseileh ngaidan natem ?
18004002	Paopoh louva umna thei la Nahitapon !
18004003	Mi tampi nahildoh-in , Lhasamte bantha nahatsah-e !
18004004	Cholle nanga kisep lhu jouse Natilkhouvin nahatsah me !
18004005	Genthei nan naphah phat’in Imacha dou thei louvin na-um’e !
18004006	Pathen ginga manabei nahin , Kisonna le kinepna nanei ding dol ahi !
18004007	Phate chan gel temin , Hoikom pen a midih-in manthahna atom ?
18004008	Keihet’in vang thilse louma gut’a gut , Thilphalou muchi tua tun aga akilo teiye .
18004009	Hitobang mite chu Pathenin khopihui semmang abahsah jie .
18004010	Migiloute sakei banga akisenlet lut vangun , Pathenin ameh thipjin ahau avopusoh jie .
18004011	Neh ding sahing kimat jou lou sakeite thigam , Anoute vahcheh bangin aum’uve !
18004012	Thip beh chan thu khat ahung lhungin , Guh thim chan kajai !
18004013	Ihmutlan a singdel bangin Kahung kinkhangin ;
18004014	Kakicha behseh jengin , Kapum changing kakithing thinge !
18004015	Kamai ahung kijep dap hoiyin , Katimul athousot’e !
18004016	I-khat ahung ding jang keiyin , Kavet vangin kamuchen theipoi . Athip del jengin , Chuin ogin khat kajai !
18004017	“ Pathen mitmua them chang ding koi hiya , Asempa angsunga theng jou ding koi ham ?
18004018	Pathenin vanmi alhachate jong aging chapon , Avantilte themmona jongaphoh jie !
18004019	Leiset a kisemdohho aginchat dia nabol’a , Nget banga thin lhah thei leivuiya kisem chu aginchat ding ham ?
18004020	Jingkah a damseh mihem chu , Hetman louva nilhah kah a thi thei ahi .
18004021	Ahinlose akilahpeh teng , Ngoljeh-in mihem athiji tai , ” ati .
18005001	“ Kouvin Job , koiham nahou ding ? Nakiheina ding Vantil hoipen ham ?
18005002	Lung gim hesoh nathipi ding vang , Pannabei ngol hoitah ahibouve .
18005003	Mi-ngol lungmong tah a um kamun , Hetman louvin ka-in gapsah jie !
18005004	Achapateu ameidoi gam’un , Thutann aphunga ding ngam jong aumpouve .
18005005	Lingle khao lah a keh jongle , gilkelten mingolte lhoga akilon ; Midang chahten agou adei chauve .
18005006	Thilse hi tol’a hungkeh ddoh ahipon , Gentheina jong Leiset’a hungpeng ahipoi .
18005007	Meilhum sunga kona meisi alentou banga , Gentheina hi mihemin akiboldoh ahibouve .
18005008	Kei hivang leng Pathen heng jon ing ting , Kachung thu akoma sep lhang’e !
18005009	Athilbol loupitah tah ihekhen pouvin , Thil kidang abolla simjou ahitapoi .
18005010	Leiset chunga go ajuhsah jin , Loulai dung twi achap jie .
18005011	Miham domsanga , Lunghemte lhamon chu Pathen ahi .
18005012	Aman doha thuh ho htilgon asunoh-in , Imacha amolso sah hteipon ;
18005013	Kichihsah ho achih nauvin amanin , Angaito jouseu asubei loijie .
18005014	Sun chang laiyin khon ajinden’un , Janlai bangin akimai leuve !
18005015	Pathenin vaichate ahinson , Bolset’a um milhasamte ahuhdoh jie !
18005016	Migiloute aphoh thip’in , Vaichate akinepsah-e !
18005017	Pathenin asuhdih thei mihem chu anun nom’e , Napho teng nagida hih-in !
18005018	Pathenin mi amavona atomjol jin , Navohna chengse aboldam jinai !
18005019	Gupvei jen hahsatnaa nahuhdoh ding , Sagi geiyin vang thilsen phapon nate !
18005020	Kel lhah teng jongle nahinso ding , Gal’a jong nathisah ponte !
18005021	Pathenin koima houset sah pon natin , Manthahnan phajongle chun huhdoh nannate !
18005022	Pumhat le kel nanuisat ding , Gamsa hang jong ging pon nate !
18005023	Hollei lah lhou khapon natin , Gamsa hangin jong sesepon nate !
18005024	Naponbuh a lung monga nachen ding , Nakelngoite jong ima tilou ding ahi .
18005025	Nason napah biha phaiha ja pha ding , Nacha nanao jong hampa jat pha ding ahi .
18005026	Chang minset akoi tobanga , Tehkem geiya nahin ding ahi .
18005027	Job kasei hi phat sotpi kasimtohsa ahi . Adih ahin , tun kisanin ! ” ati .
18006001	Job’in adonbut’in ,
18006002	“ Ohe , kanat thoh genthei jouse Kitetoh thei leh ,
18006003	Twikhanglen a neldi jat sangin gihjon tin , Hibanga kahansetna hi datmo pon nate !
18006004	Hatchungnung Pathen thalpin eikap paiyin , Athalgun eichansoh tai ; Pathenin tijat jatnan eibol jenge !
18006005	Sa-nganin hamhing akimu teng along lhaiyin , Bongchal’in an aneh teng athip’e !
18006006	Koiham chiso lou anche tamne nom ? Ahtui pokang khu almong nam ?
18006007	Chu tobanga anneh kaduchapon , Kaneh jongle kaloh asoh-e !
18006008	Idia Pathenin kadei eipeh da a , I-bol’a kataona eihou lou ham ?
18006009	Akhut’in eituh hen Eijep lih le ahijenge !
