18006010	Eitha ding heleng kichom jeng inge , Itobang nat genthei thoh jong leng , Pathen thenje kahe jingin , Athupeh peh nel ponge !
18006011	Hinjouna ding thala kanei tapon , Athive ve ding ibol’a kahin hin ham ?
18006012	Song tah a tah kahiya , Sum-eng lhouva lhou kahim ?
18006013	Kihinsona thei tha kaneitapoi , Bel ding jong kaneitapoi .
18006014	Pathen heng he hih leng , Hitobang gim genthei teng golpha ka-ngaiye !
18006015	Kagol kapaiten la neilhem chavaiyun , Gotwi bei teng lhanghoh go neibahsah-ui !
18006016	Lhanghoh dunga buhbang alhang lhangin akisen , Thop chet chut’in akikhol’ui .
18006017	Kholum teng leh ajun lhan , Alon mang teng lhanghoh akeovin aumji tai .
18006018	Kholjin miten twi aholmo’uvin , Nelgam save vu lah a athidenji tauve .
18006019	Tema kon kholjinten twi ahol’un , Sheba a hungkonten mutei akinem’ui !
18006020	Akinepnau abei phat’in alhaseuvin , Lhanghoh go lah a akisudong’ui !
18006021	Keidin hiche lhanghoh gosa tobang nahiuvin , Kagenthei namu phat’un na-nung kin’ui !
18006022	I-khat neipeh diu kathumbeh ha , Khattou sumguh neigapeh peh diduva katem ham ?
18006023	Melmapa akona neihuhdoh diu kasei ha , Mibolsepa a kona neilha doh diuva kasei ham ?
18006024	Aphai , kamona iham neihil’un , Thip beh-in nasei ngaiyinge !
18006025	Thutah-in mi athu nuntei me , I-bol’a manlou thujeng naseiyu ham ?
18006026	Ajeh beiya moh pen pen a neigel’um ? Itiba gentheiya kasei neidonbut’u ham ?
18006027	Chaga soh chang ho pou vang san a kihom , Nagol ngaitah tah kiveina nei nahiuve ong !
18006028	Neive changmel’un Jou sei ponge !
18006029	Naval behseh tauve , adihlou bolda jengun ; Mo neichan hih-un , kadih nai !
18006030	Jousei bep’in neigel’un , Adih amo hekhen louva neigel mongum ?
18007001	Leiset mihem hinkho hi namnah a kisol sepai tobang , Thalah soh goiya kigoi tobang ;
18007002	Che phat ni kihei ngah jing soh , Atohman ki-nga jing natong tobang ahi .
18007003	Lha hijat sung hi kahinlo aumpon , Jansim she-in gim genthei kathoh be be !
18007004	Kalup nah vnagin ihmu mon ka-umin , Khovah kal ngah lel’in kakipeh peh jie !
18007005	Katichung tinakhemdimin athansoh tai , Katinakhem akikhodoh leh vousan jeng ahi !
18007006	Kahinkho patphei kilham sangin achaljon , Kinepna beiyin abeiloi jitai .
18007007	O Pathen , kanopna abeitai , Kahinkho chomdan geldoh jingin !
18007008	Tua neimu vangin neimukit pon nate , Neive jongle chunbeipai tange !
18007009	Meilhang kitol mang banga Mihem athi teng hung kile kit lou ding ,
18007010	Ama hesa jousen jong Asuhmil loi diu ahitai .
18007011	Ahipoi , moh umthim thei ponge , Hibanga gentheiya kilung hang Thu kasei tei ding ahibouve !
18007012	Twikhanglen ngapi ngap a neibol ham , Nei nga jing jeng ding ?
18007013	Choldo din lum ing ting , Kanat ol domna ding gel’inge !
18007014	Hinla mangse se neimat sah-in , Mu nei neisah-in , sing neidelsah-e !
18007015	Hitobang nat genthei kathoh sangin , Kikhailih leng katijoi !
18007016	Kachim’e , kahin nompoi ; Kahinlo jong aumpoi , neilimsah dan !
18007017	Mihem hi ija nabol’a hibanga thupia nagel’a , Idia abol chan namelchih keo ham ?
18007018	Jingkah she-in nakholtoh-in , Phatseh-in napatep’e !
18007019	Kachil beh kaval manna dia Neivetda a nakihei mangle iti-am ?
18007020	Vo mihemte Chingpa , kachonset nang dia ipi khoh am ? Idia bidoiya neinei ham ? Nang dia pohgih hahsa mong kahim ?
18007021	Kachonset na-ngaidam joulou mong hiya , Kasuh khel nachulnam mo ham ? Keila lhankhuh akijam loi tang ting , Neihol hol jongle chun Neiholmo tan nate ! ” ati .
18008001	Shuh mi Bildad-in adonbut’in ,
18008002	“ Hamve vua nasei na-ngah lou li ham ?
18008003	Patheninthudih aletun ngaipon , Itih-in jong adihlou abol ngaipoi !
18008004	Nachate jong chonsea hitei diu , Hijeh a chu Pathenin asuhamng ahi !
18008005	Hijongle hung kiheiyin , Tun Pathen henga taovin !
18008006	Lung theng lungdih nahileh , Pathenin hung panpin tin , Nadih man’a nanei kiledoh a Na-in kisah phat namu loi ding ahi .
18008007	Nanei mangjat hi imacha hilou , Pathenin napeh ding chuto tethei hilou ding ahi .
18008008	Golui lai chihna ho ven , Pule paten dih asah-u hi gel temin !
18008009	Kum lhomcha , imacha helou , Ihinkhou jong nilim kihei mang bep ahi .
18008010	Hijongle khanglui lai mite chihna kihilsah-in , Aseiyu nagi phan !
18008011	Sitwi nomna louva pengthei akeh pon , Dop lah louva akimu ngaipoi .
18008012	Sat lhuh amanchah thei ahi masangin jong , Twi kan teng agop masan apang’e .
18008013	Pathen heloute jong chu che pengthei tobang ahiuvin , Pathen asuhmil tengu akinepnau abeijitai !
18008014	Akinepnau achavai jin , Akison nau maimom panjang bep ahi .
18008015	Maimon pan a kingai leu adou jouva , Patjanga kikhaileu atuh jou ding ham ? ’ atiuve .
18008016	Migiloute sunlai loudong abangun , Honsung anche dongpha abangui .
18008017	Ajung kikhon song ho aveichah-in , Songpi khi kah dunga akigol dettai .
18008018	Hinla kibotdoh leh , Koiman akena lam jong heponte !
18008019	Migiloute nopna chu hiti bep chu ahin , Midangin amun alahpehji tai !
18008020	Mi kitah vang Pathenin adonda khapon , Migiloute apanpi khah poi .
18008021	Nolnabei hile chun nui heovin lhan natin , Kipa othongin thu seiyin nate !
18008022	Nahote vetdan tin , Migiloute in-gap diu ahi , ” ati .
18009001	Job’in adonbut’in , Hitin aseiye :
18009002	“ Nasei jouse hi masanga kajahsa ahinai , Hinla Pathen maiya them chang ding koi ham ?
18009003	Koiham Pathen to kinel thei ding ? Koima adonbut joulou asang sang thudoh nei ding chu !
18009004	Pathen chu chingtah le hattah ahin , Koiman kidintepi theiponte .
18009005	Hetman louvin molsang ho atolmang jin , Alunghan teng asumangji tai !
18009006	Pathenin ling akihosah-in leiset akilinge ; Leiset bulpi khom jouse ahot lingjin ahi .
18009007	Nisa athimsah jouvin , Janteng ahsite athimsah theiye .
18009008	Pathein van buhsona ason chun koima panpi angaipon , Twikhanglen ngapi achotphan koima athalah poi .
18009009	Vanlaijol ahsite , Ngambom uichal le Ngambom lungthu , bombel le Lhanggam ahsi jouse Pathen semsa ahicheh-e .
18009010	Athilbol loupe ho hejou poutin , Thil kidang abol jong akhonbei ahi .
18009011	Pathenin eihin hopa nan Kenla kamu thei hih beh-e !
18009012	Adei dei akilah thei , Aphoh tang ding umlou ; ‘ I-bol nahim ? Ti-ngam koi ham ?
18009013	Pathen alunghan teng Amelma amal tel jin ; Adouva Rahab gulpi panpi jouse Asugoiyin asugam jitai !
18009014	Hiti ahijeh hin , Ipi seiya Pathen kadonbut thei ding ham ?
18009015	Monabei hijong leng , Kachung thu tan ding Pathen henga chu Eilungset dia katao tho didng ahibouve !
18009016	Eipaosah mong jong le , Kasei ngaidin katahsangpoi .
18009017	Ajeh beihel’in jong eisuse din , Gopi huipi eidel khumsah bouve .
18009018	Hing gentheiyin eihinsah-in , Haisa theiyin eikoipoi .
18009019	Pumhat’a kano dingle , Koiham Pathen pumhat’a noding ? Kihehpi ding kitijongle , Koiham Ama koulut jou ding ?
18009020	Kitahle monabei kahinan Kasei chan thusen akilan , Kapaodoh chanin Kamona kaseidoh loi !
18009021	Monabei hijong leng khoh kasapoi , Hinjong kahin nom tapoi ;
18009022	Moleng mohih leng imachom ahipoi , Pathenin hoijoh akhendeh poi .
18009023	Monabei mi hetman louva athi teng Pathenin anuisat’e .
18009024	Pathenin vannoi hi agiloupa apedoh tai . Vannoi thutan vaihomte mit achotsah-in , Pathen tilou koidangin Hitia abol thei ding ham ?
18009025	Kahin nikho akitol jeng jungin , Thilpha mu man louvin ka-um’e .
18009026	Kahinkho kong kitol hattah abangin , Jucha man dia mu manlouva hung lenglha muvanlai abange !
18009027	Nui heova kanatna suhmil kagot vangin , Kagimna apong jitan ;
18009028	Pathenin mo eichan kahen , Kichan gim genthei kathoh thou thouve .
18009029	Them channa chom deh lou , Ipi kakhohsah ngaiyam ?
18009030	Buhbang twiyin kisil ing , Cha-ngel’in kisop jong leng ,
18009031	Pathenin eh-khul sunga eileh lut’a , ponse nen sanga kibohjo ding !
18009032	Pathen hi mihem hileh Ddonbut’a kihehpi thei kahi .
18009033	Hijongle Pathen le kei kah thusei ding aumpon , Thu eitanpeh lhon ding aumpoi .
18009034	Talen neimatsah datan Pathen ! Neihoh kichat chat datan !
18009035	Kalungthimin kamona kahepoi , Gin beiyin ngampel’in seiyinge !
18010001	Kahin nom tapoi , Kiphin ing ting kanop nop seiyinge !
18010002	Themmo neichandan Pathen ! Neiseipeh jon iham mo neichanna ?
18010003	Giloutah anasemsa neidonda , Migiloute thilgon phasah hi dih nam ?
18010004	Keiho mihem thilvet banga Nangin jong navet ngap hitam ?
18010005	Kahinkhou chom banga Hinkho chom nahim ?
18010006	I-bola kachonset jouse nakholsoh keiya , Kasuh khel chan namelchih ham ?
18010007	Kathemmo loula nahen , Nakhut’a kona koiman eichulhah lou ding jong nahei !
18010008	Nakhuttah a neisemsa chu Nakhutma maa seisuhmang ahitai !
18010009	Geldoh-in leivuiya neisemdoh ahin , Leivui sosah kit neigot hitam ?
18010010	Kapa thisan a neilhoh lhah a , Kanu naobu sunga neikijilsah ahi .
18010011	Kagu kachang kalhintwi nasemin , Kaguho phe le cunin natomjol’e .
18010012	Neihinsah-in nei ngailui , Neikhohsah jal’a ihngbou kahi .
18010013	Hina hichanpia hi kathemmo le , Thadoh dia guhthimcha neigot kahetai .
18010014	Kachonset leh ngaidam louva Suhmang din neichang lhi jinge .
18010015	Kachonset tih tih neibolgim jin , Thilpha bol jong leng kaphatchompi deh poi . Gin genthei leh jum le Jachat kathoh bep’e !
18010016	Kadinkang khen khe leh , Sakei mibolna bangin neichon lhun , Datmo mo neibol khum jin , Neimavo lo jitai !
18010017	Eihehse ding nanei jingin , Neilunghan jingin suhsetna thei khat nagong jinge !
18010018	Pathen , i-bol’a neipensah ham ? Koiman eimu thei masanga thidoh hitave leng !
18010019	Chutileh hing man louhel’a , Naobua kona lhankhuh jonpai ta ding !
18010020	Thi ding koncha kahitai , Chomkhat beh nom sange , neidondan !
18010021	Hung kile kit lou din chevah tange , Mithim lhangkhal monmo nagam jon tange !
18010022	Muthim lungdon , noimigam , Khovah jeng jong muthim bep hina gam chu !
18011001	Hichun Na-amath mi Zopharin adonbut’in :
18011002	Ngol-thubuh hijat donbut louva kikoiya , Kamtam man a mi them chang mong nam ?
18011003	Kadonbut mou nahim , Job ? Neidai chatvaiyu hi kamoh thip diu ham ?
18011004	Nangsei bou dih nasan , Pathen vet dia thengin nakiseiye !
18011005	Pathen hung paodoh hen , Nahin donbut jengle katitave !
18011006	Pathenin chihna nahil’in tin , Mihem hetdoh theilou giltah tah aum’e . Nathoh ding sanga jangkhaijoa Pathenin talen napeh ahinalaiye !
18011007	Pathen thahat loupije athuh je le agilje Naholdoh jou mong ding hinam ?
18011008	Van sangin asang jon naholdoh jou ahipon , Noimigam sangin athuh jon nahetthei ahipoi .
18011009	Pathen loupina leiset sanga lenjo , Twikhanglen sanga lenjo ahi .
18011010	Pathenin thutanna phunga kailut le chun Kon phoh lha theiyintem ?
18011011	Pathenin pannabei jouse amun , Athilse bol chengseu amusoh-e .
18011012	Gamlah sa-ngan nou akivah ngoi teng Mi-ngol jong chingjep tante !
18011013	Lungdih pun , Job , Pathen lam sangin !
18011014	Thilpha lou chengse paidoh-in , Thil dihlou na-insunga koidan ,
18011015	Chuteng mai lhaisel’a Hangtah a napan ding ahi .
18011016	Nagimna chengse sumil’in natin , Hohtwi kitolmang bep’a nagel ding ahi .
18011017	Nahinkho sunlai nisa sanga vahjoa , Muthim jeng jong jing khovah bang ding ahi .
18011018	Namelmate nagin lou ding , Mi tampin nang panpi ngai chante .
18011020	Migilouten jet le vei veu jongle Jamdohna ding lampi mupon tin , Akinepnau pen tah chu Laicha haisam chubou hitante .
18012001	Hichun Job’in adonbut’in :
18012002	Nangho tamjo jongleur chun Nathi tengu nachihnau jong beitante .
18012003	Keijong nahetchanu hea , lhasam deh kahipon , Nasei jouseu min ahesoh keinai .
18012004	Tunvang kagol kapaiyin einuisat’un , Nolnabei adih hijong leng einuisat bep’ui ; Hinla phat khat teng Pathenin kataona sang nante .
18012005	Hahsatna neilouva neidai thangu ahin , Thi dingkonsa kei neijep beuve ong !
18012006	Athahat nau Pathen banga songte Gucha le pathen heloute mongtah-in aum’ui .
18012007	Hetbe nom chanin ju le va kidoh-un , Chunga leng vachate le ganhing hon hil nauvinte .
18012008	Tol’a ganhing ho le Twikhanglen ngate Chihna kidoh-un , hil nauvinte .
18012009	Hiche ganhing jouse hin Pakai semsa ahiu akihet cheh-ui .
18012010	Asemsa chengse hinsah Pathen ahin , Mihem hinkho jong ama khut’a um ahi .
18012011	Naleiyin antui atekhah cheh bangin Nakhangin thu angai nom’e .
18012012	Tehsete aching theiyin , Ahingsot ten ima ahekhen theiye .
18012013	Chihna le thahat hi Pathena ahin , Thu mopthem , thil hekhen them ahi .
18012014	Pathenin aphet lhah teng kon asah phat’a , Pathenin songkul’a ahen teng kon alhadoh jou idng ham ?
18012015	Pathenin twinah asipbing teng Gotwi akang jin ; Twinah ahondoh teng Twisang alen ji’e !
18012016	Pathen hi hattah , gal lel ngailou , Mihema le alheppa ajotho cheh-e !
18012017	Vaihomte chihna alamangin , Lamkaite angolto abahsah-e !
18012018	Leng ho asu-lha jin , Sohchangin ahenji tai !
18012019	Thempute jong apui chavaiyin , Thahatte jong asu nemjie .
18012020	Son umtah miho aphoh thip’in , Upate chihna alamangjie !
18012021	Thuneite ajumson , Vaihomte hatna asubeijie !
18012022	Muthim lhangkhal kiheh lai ahoh doh-in , Muthim jinglah avahsah theiye !
18012023	Namtin vaipi achoi-an jin , Chuteng gal alelsah-in asu mangjie !
18012024	Alamkaiteu angolsah jin , Lung dongin avamangsah jie !
18012025	Muthim lah a akimai le leuvin , Jukham bangin alonle leuve !
18013001	“ Ven , hijatpi hi kamun , Kajan kahekhensoh nai .
18013002	Nahet jat’u kahen , Nang ho sangin kalhasamjopoi !
18013003	Pathen koma kiphin a Kinelpi hel ding nom kahi !
18013004	Joule nal’a kilep them , Panna bei Thempu jeng nahiuve !
18013005	Umthim beh leu chun Khattouvin michingin geljo’uvinte !
18013006	Ngai phauvin tun , Kachung chang thu seiyinge !
18013007	Idia thujou naseiyu ham ? Najouthuu hi Pathen dia thilpha nagel’um ?
18013008	Pathenchu huh dia go nahiuva , Thutanna in a kinelpi go nahiuvam ?
18013009	Pathein nakholchil’u leh thilpha mun tem ? Mihem lhep’a Pathen nalhep jou diu ham ?
18013010	Guh thimin gingmo jongleur chun Patheninnaphosal tei diu ahi .
18013011	Pathen lal loupina naginlou diu hiya , Ama nakichat lou diu ham ?
18013012	Nathuchih jouseu vutvai bep , Nakihon nau jong leipal chimbep ahi .
18013013	Thip chet’un kadei kagot seiying ting , Asoh soh soh jeng hen !
18013014	Thilo hel ding hijong leng Kagel gel kasei jeng ding ahi !
18013015	Kakiholpoi , Pathenin eitha thei ahi , A-angsunga kakihonna seiyinge !
18013016	Migilou bon Pathen angsunga pao ngamlou , Hangtah-in pang leng kahinlo thei ahi !
18013017	Kasei jouse ngai phauvin , Kaphondoh chan lung nachangin ngaiyun !
18013018	Kadih kahetjeh hin , Kachung thu sei ding kigoa kahi .
18013019	Mo neichan ding ham Pathen ? Mo neichan dingle kihon dang ting thi tange !
18013020	Vo Pathen kachunga thil ni neibolpeh dan , Chutile namai kamu ngam ding ahi !
18013021	Talen neimatsah dan lang , Neihoh kichatsah dan !
18013022	Neikou masan Pathen , nahouvinge ! Ahiloule ken seiyinge neihouvin !
18013023	Kachonset ipi pi hiya bolkel i-kanei ham ? Mo neichanna ipi ham ?
18013024	I-bol’a neidon da a , Melma banga neigel hitam ?
18013025	Thingna bep kei hoh kichat neigot’a , Changpol gosa beo neisel khum got ham ?
18013026	Kaneo lai chonset geiyin neiphul’in , Giloutah tah-in eihehsei !
18013027	Kakeng thihkhaovin nasomin , Kakho-lhah nave-lhi keiyin ; Kakho-ni nung Namelchih jing jenge !
18013028	Hijeh chun thingmot kiloilhu kabangin , Nget nehsa ponsil kabangtai !
18014001	“ Mitin lhasam le panpi ngaiya peng , Hinkho chomcha , gim hesoh dimset ahicheh-e !
18014002	Pahcha banga pah a pulloiji , Nisa lim banga kihei mangloiji ahi !
18014003	Hitobang bep mi hi neivet chil’a , Neikhol’a kathu natan ding ham Pathen !
18014004	Mihem banga thilboh lah a Thil theng khatcha kiloidoh ponte !
18014005	Mihem hinkho kitepsa , lha jat kisimsa , Khelmo hel dia nasuhtohsa ahitai !
18014006	Ahithei le gim hesoh hinkho hi nom asahna din , Vet vet dan , limsah datan !
18014007	Thingphung phuhsa din jong kinep aum nalaiyin , Mit-thah kit’a hingdoh thei ahi !
18014008	Akungbul apkai hen , Leichunga ajung go jong leh ,
18014009	Gotwi lhah teng akeh thah bangin dondoh-in tin , Thingtoi thah banga abah jemdoh didng ahi .
18014010	Mihem athi teng akichai ahitan , Athi teng hoiya um jim ?
18014011	Twi long lai vadung kantan le Damvei lai twi kang bangin ,
18014012	Mihem athi teng athoukit ji poi , Van kitolmang kah a mihem ihmut’a kon thou lou diu ahi .
18014013	Noimigama neiselmanga , Phat khat teng geldoh kit dia Nalunghan beikah a Neiselmang ding kadei lheh-e !
18014014	Mihem athi teng hingkit theiyam ? Kenvang hesoh phat kichai , Phat pha hung lhun ding ngah jing inge !
18014015	Chutia neihin kou teng houving ting , Neisemsa kachunga Lung lhaitan nate !
18014016	Chuteng kakho-lhah melchih jong le chun Kachonset him him holdoh pon nate !
18014017	Mudoh jongle chun ngaidamon natin sumangtan nate , Kabol khel abonchan theh ngaim nate !
18014018	Molsang jouse chimsoh a , songpi lentah tah kitolmang ding ;
18014019	Song jouse twiyin lhoh a , Songpi lentah tah tah kitolmang ding ; Mihem hinkhoa kinepna jong Sumangin nate Pathen !
18014020	Mihem nasu-nemin , itih a din nasolmang jin , Athin amai molsoh ji tai !
18014021	Atu achaten gunche mujongle ahepon , Jum le ja toh jongleu ahetapoi !
18014022	Atahsa nat thoh lel bou ahen , Alung gim hesoh bou ahei ! ” ati .
18015001	Hichea hin Teman mi Eliphaz chun adonbut’in :
18015002	“ Michingin hita hi ahomkeova Khohui nung banga thu asei ding ham ?
18015003	Miching koiman nasei bang aseipon , Lah theilouvin kihonna aseipoi .
18015004	Nadih mong le koiman Pathen ging pontin , Akoma tao nom jong umponte !
18015005	Nathuseiya nagitlou akilangdoh-in , Kilepdohna ding jeng thu naseiye !
18015006	Ken themmo kachan ngailouvin , Nasei chanin themmo nakichantai !
18015007	Mihem lah a peng masapen a kibol nahim ? Mol le lhang hijat sanga kisem masa nahim ?
18015008	Asemdoh masanga Pathen thilgon najah lhih ham ? Mihem chihna nan gbou chang nahim ?
18015009	Kahet louvu imacha nahepon , Kadat khen thei louvu imacha nadat khen thei deh poi .
18015010	Upa tehse tah a kihil ching , Napa sanga upajo koma kihil them kahiuve !
18015011	Pathenin nalhamon chu ida nadonda a , Lung geltah a kaseiyu nadonda ham ?
18015012	Nalung phamo pai jengin , Mitdih mitchangin neive pouve !
18015013	Pathen nalunghan khumin , Nahouse se jenge !
18015014	Mihem hi theng jou mong ding hiya ? Pahenkoma themchang jou um mong ding ham ?
18015015	Pathenin Avantilte jong aging chapoi , A-angsunga them achangjou pouve .
18015016	Mihemin thilse twidonin adonin , Asea le ahomkeobou ahi !
18015017	Ngaiyin kahet chan Kamu chan seipeh inge !
18015018	Im beihel’a apu apateuvin ahil them , Thutah jouse eiseipeh tauve !
18015019	Agamsunguva gamchom mi alut theipon , Pathen a kona pui mang thei koima aumpoi .
18015020	Midang bolsea migilou chu Ahinkho lhumkeiya genthei ding ahi !
18015021	Tijat jatna thu jeng ajan , Nom asah pet tah-in guchan achomjie !
18015022	Muthima jamdoh din akinempon , Chemjam a lou dia um ahitai !
18015023	Muthongten athilong neh din angah jingun , Akhonung thu hahsat akihet’e !
18015024	Leng hattah bangin , Manthah nana del khumgoi !
18015025	Pathen douna khat lam a , Hatchungnung seisea Mihem chu chutobang ding ahi .
18015026	Hi tobang mihem chu , Kiletsah-in doumah mah abol’in ,
18015027	Gal-lum choiyin Pathen jeng jong anakhumjie !
18015028	Amahin khopi jouse alan , In jouse alo teng aneiho ajam’un , Hinla hiche khopi ho le in ho hi Gal’in alah peh doh kei ding ahi .
18015029	Aneila umsot lou ding , haosot lou ding ; Nisa lim bangin kihei mang loitante !
18015030	Muthima jamdoh lou ding , Mei hulgotsa thingphung le Apah jouse hui mutmang Thingphung to bang ding ahi .
18015031	Thilsea ngolman a kinem chun Thilse akisan ding ahi .
18015032	Aphat lhin kah-in gop lhan tin , thingbah gop bangin nou kit ponte .
18015033	Aga min masanga puljou lengpigui tobang , Apah pulsa olive thing tobang ahi .
18015034	Pathen helouten son le pah neiponton , Nehguh a kisa in meiyin kante !
18015035	Thilse bol’a baotam pandoh chu hitobang ahiuvin , Lhep lhah ding bou agel’ui !
18016001	Hichun Job’in adonbut’in :
18016002	“ Hitobang hi kajahsa ahin , Neilhamon’u jong gimna bep ahi !
18016003	Nasei sei jeng ding ham ? Ipi lunghimona neiya neidonbut kit ham ?
18016004	Kei tobangin , nang ho tobang leng , Kalu peikhum ing ting Thu tampi kasei den ding , Nasei seiyu kasei thei ding ahi .
18016005	Nalhamonna diu seiya , Kamchah leuva katilkhou diu ahi .
18016006	I-kisei jongle aphachompon , Umthim jong leng kanat a-olpoi .
18016007	Ka-insung mite la nasubeisoh tan , Neichaisoh ahitai Pathen !
18016008	Neimanin kamelma nasoh tai , Kagu-lheng lhol bou aumtan , Hiche hi kachonset photchetnan Mihon agelsoh tauve !
18016009	Lung hangtah-in Pathenin einoigep’in , Midih michangin eivepoi .
18016010	Mihon anop agot eiseikhum’un , Eiumchah-un ka-ngeiphe abengun ahi .
18016011	Pathenin Pathen hephaloute eipedoh-tan , Migiloute khut’a eisep luttai !
18016012	Thei nop’a ki-umpet eileh kadah-in , Kalol’in eimanin eijep goiyin , Eive lhi jingin , Mitt hip tenin eibol’e !
18016013	Jet le vei sahle lhanga konin thalpi eikap’in , Athalchangin eidotpai jeng vangin eivoujang natpipoi .
18016014	Avel vel’in eimavon , Sepai ngol bangin eidel khumtai .
18016015	Lunghemin khaodip pon kasil’in , Leivui lah a katoutai !
18016016	Maisan hel’in kakap tan , Kamit kamai apomsoh tai !
18016017	Hinla thilse kabol pon , Kataona jong athenge !
18016018	Vo leiset ! Kathisan vuhmang dan , Thudih ka-ngeh jong suthip hih-in !
18016019	Van a eidinpia Eipanpi ding khat aumnai !
18016020	Kagol kapaiten eihouse seuvin , Pathen koma ka-mit lhi alonge !
18016021	Min agol apai ding aseipeh banga Pathen henga eitaopeh ding ka-ngaiye !
18016022	Kakum abei hei hoitan , Thina gam kajonpantai !
18017001	Haisam a thipai ding kahitan , Lhankhuh tilou imadang kaneipoi !
18017002	Ka-kiheina lam lam a Eidaithangun kadoujou tapoi !
18017003	Monabei kahi kasei neilahpeh-in Pathen ! Eiseihu ding koima aumtapoi !
18017004	Alungthimu sumoh tajongle chun Kachunga noplensah hih hel’in !
18017005	‘ Agol apai lhep lhahna sumguh kilah chu Achaten mitchot lonte ! ’ kiti
18017006	Hiche thuchih hi kei housetnan amangun , Ahungun kamaiya chil eiset khum’ui .
18017007	Lunggim lhilonin kamit athimlon , Kakhut kakeng gu-lheng lhon keo ahitai !
18017008	Lungthenga kigel hi atijauvin , Pathen hephalou bangin eiboltauve !
18017009	Gin le ja akigel hon Themjo danin akigel cheh cheh jengui !
18017010	Hinla kamasanga hung idngu jongleh Alah-uva aching khat beh mudoh ponge .
18017011	Kanikho abeihei hoiyin , kathigon ho athontan , Kakinepna jong abeitai !
18017012	Kaloi kagolten janlai jong sun abahsah-un , Muthim jong kho vah loi din aseiyui !
18017013	Noimigam bou kakineppi ahitan , Hikoma chun muthim lah a kijam tange !
18017014	Lhankhuh chu pan neiying ting , Thante chu kanu le kasopinun bol inge !
18017015	Kakineppi ding hoikoma um a , Kakinepna thei kon amun ?
18017016	Noimigam kajotsuh teng Kinepna neitaponge !
18018001	Shuh mi Bildah-in adonbut’in :
18018002	“ Job nang tobang nathip jengle iti-am ? Sei ngaile chun kahil thei diu nahi !
18018003	Nangin keiho cheng hi Gancha ngol neibahsah-u ham ?
18018004	Nalunghan chu nanatlo bep ahi . Nalunghan jeh a leiset kidonda a , Nalungdamna dinga Pathenin molsang jouse atolmang ding ham ?
18018005	Migilou meivah kimut mit ding , Kongdoh kit lou ding ahi .
18018006	Migilou insunga mu athimin , Thaomei vah jong akimut mittai .
18018007	Golkha tah a kal ason jongle achomtan , Athilgon chengsea akipaltai .
18018008	Thangkol achonlut’in , Khuh sunga avah lut tai !
18018009	Akeng thanga a-oh den tan , thangkol a akihen-oh tai !
18018010	Alampia thang akikamin , Leivui akivuh khum’e !
18018011	Jet le vei sahle lhanga tijatna jengin , Akho-nung ajui jinge !
18018012	Mihao tah chunk el athoh tan , toset to akikhen tapoi !
18018013	Thina khop hel’in atipat’in , Akhut le akeng amonpai gotai !
18018014	Amonpi insunga alhop lhan , Thina angsunga akailuttauve !
18018015	Kat meiya akisuh theng teng , A-insunga apu louhel mi chengtante .
18018016	Abulbal ajung agop panin , Abah jouse agopantai !
18018017	Khosungle gamsunga amin thang tapon , Koiman ageldoh him him tapoi .
18018018	Son le pah la aneipon , Achilhah jong abeitai !
18018020	Niso le nilhuma ahinkho japha chan , Tijan akihot lhul soh tauve !
18018021	Migilou , Pathen hephalou chu Hiti chih cheh ding ahi , ” ati .
18019001	Job’in adonbut’in :
18019002	“ Idia neisuh lung jing jing uva , Neiseithan gdeh jengu ham ?
18019003	Neiphin phin jengun , Neihousetnau jong najahcha pouve .
18019004	Bol khel nei mong jong leng , Nang ho dia i-khoh ham ?
18019005	Keisanga phajoa kigel’a , Kagimna hi kachonsetgaa nagel’um ?
18019006	Pathen bol kahi namu louvu ham ? ka-o na ding thang eikampeh chume !
18019007	Pumhat’a eibol kanel vangin koiman angaipon , Thudih kakhohsah vangin koiman angaipoi !
18019008	Pathenin kalampi akhah-in kachepai theipon , Kalamlhah jouse asuchotai !
18019009	Kagou jouse eilahpeh tan , Kaminthanna asubeisoh tai !
18019010	Jetle vei sahle lhanga eijep chinton , Kakinepna thingboh abotdoh tai !
18019011	Pathenin lung hangin eidel khumin , Amelma giloupen abngineiboltai !
18019012	Asepaite eidelkhumsah-in , Ka-inkima apangun eiumchah tauve !
18019013	Pathenin kasopite eijamsan sah-in , Eihesa chengsen het louvin eiboltauve !
18019014	Kasopi , ka-insung mite , kagol ngaitah tah ten Eijamsansoh tauve !
18019015	Ka-in alhung jing maljin hon eisumilsoh tan , Kasoh numeiten hetphah lou maljin bangin eibol’ui !
18019016	Lhacha khat kakou jongle eihoupon , Kamdama katao jongle eidonpoi !
18019017	Kajinun jong kakam-ui ajanompon , Kasopiten jong einailut nompouve !
18019018	Chapangten nahsah mon eibol’un , Nuijat nopnan eineitauve !
18019019	Kagol ngaitah tah ten eivet dauvin , Ka-ngaipen tah hon eidoutauve !
18019020	Kagu le kavun keobou um ahitan , Kapao paojeh a hingdan kahibouve !
18019021	Pathenin eijep lhuh ahitai ! Neivoujang natpiuvin kagolle kapaite !
18019022	Pathenin eibolna kah a idia neibolgim’u ham ? Neibol gim nau chimlou nahiuvem ?
18019023	Khattouvin kaseiho hi melchih din Lekhabua jihlut leh katitave !
18019024	Ahiloule songpheng chunga kijih pol’a Aman louna dia kajihvomsoh hel hileh !
18019025	Ahinla akhonna kheh a eihung panpi ding Van a khat um kahei !
18019026	Kavun jouse patsoh tajongleh Katahsaphea Pathen kamutei ding ahi !

18019028	‘ Keihon iti kabolgim beh-um ? ’ natijeh-un . Neidel khum theina diuvin Kamona ding nahol thu’ve !

18020001	Naamath mi Zopharin adonbbut’in :
18020002	“ Job , neilung hansah tan Kadonbut tei ding nahitai .
18020003	Miphinna thusei nahin , Adonbutje kahenai !
18020004	Khanglui laipeh , Leiset’a mihem kichensah a pat ,
18020005	Mi phinse migilou ahingsot pon , Pathen helou jong anopsot lou nahei !
18020006	Migilou minthang hen , van pha ding , Van a meilah nol’in sang jongleh ,
18020007	Huiya leivui kithe-mang banga , Ahesahon jong ageina lam ahetlou diu ahi .
18020008	Jan-mang banga leng mang ding , Jan-mang banga kimukit lou ding ahi .
18020009	Amusan jong mukit pontin , A-in mun a jong kilulah kit ponte .
18020010	Achaten vaichate henga thumin tin , Apau bat jouse choltah a asah diu ahi .
18020011	Atahsa nouchet jongleh Thia leivui sohvah ding ahi .
18020012	Gitlouna thu ngeitah-in sei hen , Thutah seilep le le hen ,
18020013	Seidoh da hel hen Im mang jeng jongleh ;
18020014	Agilpi sunga aneh jouse sentin , Gulse gu banga sesoh hel ding ahi .
18020015	Migilouvin aguchat gou lodoh-intin , Agilpi sung geisa jong Pathenin akhodoh peh ding ahi .
18020016	Migilouvin aneh chu gutwi tobang , Gul gu tobanga athipi ding ahi .
18020017	Olive thao luiya long amu lou ding , Khoiju le bongnoiya long vadung amu lou ding ahi .
18020018	Atohga chengse apehdoh soh ding , Aneile agou nopsahna anei man lou ding ahi .
18020019	Ajeh chu vaichate achomgamin , Nam nan mi in alahpeh-e !
18020020	Lung nachim tih la aneipon , Gouthil khat cha jong kholdoh ponte !
18020021	Aneh teng nehmoh la akhenpon , Tua hi agou beiloi didng ahitai !
18020022	Alolhin pet tah a hi Manthah nan atupai ding ahi .
18020023	Adu angai jouse nehen , Pathenin save vun hinbol nante !
18020024	Chemham masanga jamdoh jongle , Sum-eng thalchangin kap khante .
18020025	Thalchangin akap paiya athinkha akapjah teng , Thin long kangin tin , thi ding tija kihot ding ahi .
18020026	Agou kholsa aboncha mangthah a , Ama le a-insung mi meiyin akah vam ding ahi .
18020027	Vanin achonset jouse phongdoh-intin , Leiset’in adouna thu seiyinte .
18020028	Pathen chun lung hangtah a Agou chengse asuhmang ding ahi .
18020029	Hitobang thilse hi Pathenin migilou chan dia akoipeh chu ahi , ” ati .
18021001	Job’in adonbut’in :
18021002	“ Kasei hi phaten ngaiyun , Chutileh neilhamon nau hijonte !
18021003	Kasei ngai lhauvin Chuteng atot nom nom tot’un !
18021004	Thi thei mihem to kinel kahipon , Umthim theihoi kahipoi !
18021005	Neivet’uva hi kam kisip a Thip beh a umma kahilou ham ?
18021006	Kachunga thilsoh kagel teng , Kati ajan kithingin kakihotjie !
18021007	Idia Pathenin migiloute ahing hoiya , Ahaosah a ateh thisah ham ?
18021008	Cha le tu anei jong jon’un , Akhan lhit geiyun ahingui !
18021009	Tijat kichat la anei khapouvin , A-in-gap kh apouve !
18021010	Aganchau aphat chan ajangmanin , Hahsa louhel’in anousoh jingui !
18021011	Atu achateu kelngoi noute bangin Alamkai le jengui !
18021012	Semjang kisaigin le Theile kimut gingin alam’uve !
18021013	Cham le lung mongin ahing lhumkeiyun , Nat genthei thoh louvin athijiuve !
18021014	Migiloute Pathen hohdal din agon , Ahinkhouva adeilam het ding anompouve !
18021015	Pathen kinbol phatchom nan agelpouvin , Ahenga tao jong iman agel pouve !
18021016	Athahatsan a pachangin akigel’un ; Kenvang alunggel’u kadeipoi .
18021017	Migilouvin hahsa atojing monga , Manthah nan aphah jing mong am ? Pathenin migilou chu Talen apeh jing mong ham ?
18021018	khopi huiya changpol kithe bang le Chimpeiyin leivui apoh mang bang mong ham ?
18021019	Apa chonset jeh a Pathenin achapa talen apeh-in naseiyin , Ahipoi , achonset akihetna diuvin amaho joh talen pejo hen !
18021020	Chonseten achonset mankipoh-u hen , Hatchungnung Pathen lungsat toh khau hen !
18021021	Mihem athi teng leh Atu acha akhohsah mong em ?
18021022	Lengle lalte thutan ji Pathen chu Mihemin ahil thei ham ?
18021023	Mihem abang khat nei le nga lhing , Tahsa dam theiyin ,
18021024	Tahsa damthei leh hat’in , Adong hoi theiyin , chuteng athin ;
18021025	Abang khatma gim genthei thoh-in , Lung gentheiyin hingin , chuteng athi .
18021026	Hinla hoijoh chu ahin athin akivuiyin , Thanjangten atomlhah deh-un aneuve .
18021027	Nalung gel’u kahen , Themmosah tei neigot’u ahibouve !
18021028	Nang hon , ‘ Thilse bol , Milen milalpa in hoilam ham ? ’ natiuve .
18021029	Kholjinte toh nalhon khah-um ? Ipi thu ahinpoh-u nahet lou ham ?
18021030	Pathen lung hanga talen apeh nil eh , Migilo a-ongtholjo ji bouve !
18021031	Migilou chu athilse bol housea Lethuh ding koima aumpoi !
18021032	Athia phate cha ki-ngahtup Lhanphung jon a akiput teng ,
18021033	Japi asang sangin akijot’un , Along jeng jong leiset’a ol heovin akijam’e .
18021034	Achutileh nanghon iti chutobanga Kahenga lhamonna thu naseiyuva , Jouthu jenga neidonbut’u ham ? ” ati .
18022001	Teman mi Eliphaz chun adonbut’in :
18022002	“ Mihem aching chungnungpen jong Pathen dinga phachom ding hinam ?
18022003	Nathildih bol chu Pathen dia phachom a Naphatna chu Pathen dia phachom mong nam ?
18022004	Nakitah jeh a Pathenin talen napeh hiya , Nahougut jeh a Hatchungnungin nathu atan ham ?
18022005	Ahipoi , nachonset val jeh leh Nathilse boljeh ahibouve !
18022006	Asum betjeh-in nasopi ponsil nahoh lhan , Sagoh keovin dap nathohsah-e !
18022007	Gilkel la an napepon , Dangchah la twi napepoi !
18022008	Nanei nathahat namangin , Gam pumpi chohdoh nagoi .
18022009	Meithaiho la nakithopi pon , Chagate jong nachom gamtai !
18022010	Hijeh a chu nakiheina lam lam nalhuhna ding jeng , Hetman louva kichat tijat dimset nahitai !
18022011	Mu athimin kho namutapon , Twisoh-in nalonvuh tai !
18022012	Pathenchu chunglampeh a cheng hilou ham ? Sangtah a kigel ahsite chunga cheng ahi !
18022013	Nangin , ‘ Pathenin i-het’em ? Meilhangin tomchah a , i-thuu tanthei ponte , ’ nati .
18022014	Van le leiset kah a ava le nah a , Meilhangin tom a kho mulou ding nagel’e !
18022015	Migiloute nung nung jui dia Kigo mong mong nahim ?
18022016	Migiloute chu athi phat lhin masangun Twisoh-in atolmangji tauve .
18022017	Hitobang ho hi Pathen nahsah loute , Imacha alo thei diuva tahsan lou ho ahiuve !
18022018	Aphat theisah-ula Pathen ahi-ngal’in , Migiloute lung gel hi kahethei hih beh-e !
18022019	Migilouten talen amat teng Miphale monabeite kipah-in anuiyui !
18022020	Migiloute nei akisumangtan , Amoh chengse meiyin akavamtai .
18022021	Job , Pathento kichamin lungmongle chun , Aman phatthei boh tan nate !
18022022	Nahilna chengse ngaiyin , Aseiho nalungthimin chingin !
18022023	Lungnem tah-in Pathen hinjon kit’in , Na-insung athilse kibol jouse sebeiyin !
18022024	Nasana jong pai mang jengin , Nasana lupen nelgum lah a vui mangtan !
18022025	Hatchungnung Pathen chu nasanan gel’in , Ama chu dangka kisevum bangin ngaiton !
18022026	Chuteng Pathen jenga ki-ngaiyin natin , Amaa kipana jeijing tan nate !
18022027	Natao teng nahouvin tin , Nakitepnasa nit jing tan nate !
18022028	Natoh jousea lolhingin natin , Nalampia khovah jingtante .
18022029	Kiletsahte Pathenin asu-lhan , Kineosahte achoisangjie !
18022030	Thildih nabol’a monabei nahileh Pathenin huhdoh tei nante ! ” ati .
18023001	Job’in adonbut’in :
18023002	“ Tugeiya lung himoa Pathena kiphin , Kanat thoh lel cheh cheh kahi !
18023003	Pathen umna kahet hihen lang , Aheng jotna lam kahet hitave leh !
18023004	A-angsunga kathu lhut’ing ting , kadeilamin kachungthu kisei tange !
18023005	Ipi eiseipeh a , Iti eidonbut ding kahenom lheh-e !
18023006	Hangsangin einel mong dem ? Ahipoi , kasei nagijonte !
18023007	Monabei kahin , Pathenti kihoutoh ing ting , A-itih a monabeiyin eikoiteiyinte .
18023008	Pathen chu niso lam la kaholmon , Nilhum lama jong kamudoh poi !
18023009	Sah le lhanga na atoh jing vangin Chulama jong Pathen kamudeh poi !
18023010	Hinla Pathenin kakho lhah ahe jingin , Eipatep jongle kamona muponte !
18023011	Akhoni nung kajui jingin , Alampi ka-lho khel ngaipoi !
18023012	Aseichan kabol jing jengin , Ama lung lam jeng kabol’e !
18023013	Kikheltih neilou , nel theihoi ahipon , Abolnom suhtang thei ahipoi !
18023014	Eigonpeh chu amolso tei ding , Eigonpeh chu tamtah lah a khatbou ahi !
18023015	Hijeh chun Ama angsunga Gingkhen chan ka-um jinge !
18023016	Pathenin eisugim behseh jengin , Hatchungnungin eimeidoisah tai !
18023017	Pathenin mu eithim khumsah-in , Muthimin kamit chotlo tai !
18024001	Idia Pathenin thutanna ding phat atepda a , Akinbolte them chan nikho akoida ham ?
18024002	Migilouten gamgi song achon’un gam akeh-un , Kelngoi agu’vin akelngoihon lah a alhauve !
18024003	Chagate sa-ngan akai mangun , Meithai bongchal chu thilman din atunsah-ui !
18024004	Vaichate chan ding lom akhapeh-un , Tahlelte adeljam’un akiseltauve !
18024005	Hijeh hin vaichaten gamlah a sa-ngan bangin neh akihol’un , Achateu neh ding amujou tapouve !
18024006	Milouva neh lon chang a-at’un , Migiloute lengpiga alopeh-ui !
18024007	Janteng ponsil beiyin alum’un , Kihuilumna ding imacha aneipouve .
18024008	Molsanga kitatjal gotwi akotsoh tauvin , Songpi lim dung bel din ahol’uve !
18024009	Migiloute pabei naosen soh-in asem’un , Vaichate chate thilman din alauve .
18024010	Vaichate ponsil beiyin aumsah-un , Kel thoh pumin chang a-atsah-ui .
18024011	Olive thao alhoh-un , lengpiga achil’un , Amaho la dangchah athohsah-ui !
18024012	Khopi sunga mapua thi dingkon ho ataovun , Hinla Pathenin ataonau imab agelpoi !
18024013	Khova deimo mihem aum’un , Het din jong agel pouvin , jui din jong akhohsah pouve !
18024014	Tolthat chu jingpi tah-in athouvin , Tha din vaichate ahol’in , jan teng aguchai !
18024015	Numei jonpi chun khomut ave-lhin , Min amumo na din amai akitom’e !
18024016	Jan teng guchaten inbang aphevangun , Sun khovah teng akiselji tauve !
18024017	Sun khovah agingun , Muthima akichapouve ! ” ati .
18024018	“ Migilou chu twisoh-in alhoh-in , Agam leisset’jong Pathenin agaosap-in , Alengpi leiya jong Natong din akontapoi !
18024019	Buhbang nisan ajolsah a huiyin atolmang bangin , Chonsete jong mihing gamsunga abeijitai !
18024020	Anu jengin jong agelpha tapon , Thinglong lung neh bangin thanjangten anejouji tai !
18024021	Meithaite abolgima , chabei numei akhoto loujeh a Achunga hitobang thil shoji ahi !
18024022	Pathenin athanei nan mihat jong asumangin , Pathenin abol teng migilou athijie !
18024023	Pathenin ahinghoiya alungmon sah thei , Hinla avet lhih jing jeng ahibouve !
18024024	Migilou akhantou vangin , Changpal kisih tan le hampa bangin agop loiji tai !
18024025	Hiche hi kon aseilep theiya , Kasei ho adih louna seichen thei koi ham ? ” ati .
18025001	Shuh mi Bildad chun adonbut’in :
18025002	“ Pathen chu thanei tah ahin , Japin gin cheh ding ahi ; Van a Alenggam sunga jong Cham alensah jinge !
18025003	Pathen kinbol Vantilte simjou ding koi hiya , Pathen khovah-in asalvah loukom hoilai ham ?
18025004	Pathen angsunga dihjou ding koi hiya , Numei sung peng akoma thengjou ding koiham ?
18025005	Pathen mitmun lha jong avah chenpon , Asite jong avah thengpoi !
18025006	Achutileh thanjang le lungtol tobang Mihem hi Pathen angsunga ipi hintem ? ” ati .
18026001	Job’in adonbut’in :
18026002	“ Vaicha le lhasam tah keima Neikithopi nau apha behseh jenge !
18026003	Keitobang mi-ngol hi nahetna neihil’in , Phatah-in thu neimop tai !
18026004	Koipen nagijou dia chujat naseiya , Kon nathumop’a hitobangpi hi nasei ham ? ” ati .
18026005	“ Lei noiya twito jouse akithingin , Twipi le asunga cheng jouse akichauve !
18026006	Pathen maiya noimigam jong akihongsa , Husih beiya akeova kijam ahi !
18026007	Pathenin sahlam vanthamjol ajamdoh-in , Leiset jong onghoma akhaithoi !
18026008	Pathenin twipi hi meilhangin ajeldoh-jin , Aki-ngapna meibol jeng jong apojalsah hih-e !
18026009	Lha jong atomjol jin , Meilhang abol khumsah jie !
18026010	Pathenin twipi chunga velkol ajel’in , Sun le jan ahomkhen’e !
18026011	Pathenin apho tengleh Vanthamjol khompi jouse kichan akithing jiuve !
18026012	Athahat’in Twikhanglen aphoh thip’in , Achihnan kiletsahte asu-thip’e !
18026013	Vanthamjol amut thengsel jin , Akhut’in gulpi kithol janglai athil paiye !
18026014	Hicheng hi athahat kihetna them khat , Athusa kijamai mai bou ahin , Pathen lal loupin akon ahetjou jai ding ham ? ” ati .
18027001	Job’in aseiban ajop paiyin :
18027002	“ Adih a thu eitanpeh nomlou , Hin gentheiya eihinsah Hatchungnung Pathen min a kitep kahi !
18027003	Hai theina hinna hu eipea Pathenin eihinsah laisen ,
18027004	Thu gilou seipong ting , Thujou him him seiponge !
18027005	Nangho la dihsah naisai pong ting , Kathi ni geiya monabeiya kisei ding kahi !
18027006	Kadihna la lhaso pong ting , Lung opkaina him him jong kaneipoi !
18027007	Eidouva eikinahpi jousen Migilou midih lou bangin talen man cheh hen !
18027008	Pathenin ahinkhou athum teng Pathen hephaloute dia kinepna i-um am ?
18027009	Gentheina hung lhun teng Pathenin atao nau ngai nantem ?
18027010	Pathen kipana ngai chaiuvin tin , Ahenga tao jing teiyunte !
18027011	Pathen thahat thilbol thei hil’ung ting , Hatchungnung Pathen thilgon hilchen unge !
18027012	Amavang namusa cheh-u ahitan , I-bol’a ngolpao pao nahiuvam ?
18027013	“ Migilou , pumhat’a mino chu Pathenin hitin bol’inte :
18027014	Chapa tampi nei jongleur galmuna thisoh ding , Ason apah jouseu vaicha tahlel jing diu ahi .
18027015	Ahingdoh cheng jong natset’a thia , Ajiteu meithaihon aka man lou diu ahi .
18027016	Migilouvin dangka simden lou nei hen , Ponsil alhuh lhuh-in sejong leh ;
18027017	Aponsil chu miphahon kisil bep’in tin , Milungdih ho adangka chang bep’inte !
18027018	Migilou insah chu maimom pankai beep , Loubuh kisong bep ahibouve !
18027019	Haotah-in kitalle le jongleh , Athodoh teng vaichat’in tunte !
18027020	Tijatnan alonvuh jeng diu , Jankah a khohuiyin alhoh mang diu ahi .
18027021	Solam khopi huiyin A-inmun’uva konin atolmangtai !
18027022	Jamdoh ding agot vangun , Voujang nalouvin akhup athal’in aleh-in alhoh mangtai !
18027023	Ajamna lam lam’uvah asemlon len , Manthahna thei hel’in ahoh kichai ! ” ati .
18028001	Leithao lah a dangka akilaidoh jin , Sana lhahjolna mun jong aum’e !
18028002	Min leiset’a thih alaidoh-in , Song a konin dah-thih asoldoh-e !
18028003	Min muthim lah a leinoi langpeh alaiyin , Muthim lah a songpi alaidoh doh-e !
18028004	Ganhing lenna lou , mihem kithahna khoh lou , Mihemin leithao lah alaiyun , Khuh sunga khaovin akikhaiyun Nunglen machop thon na atongui !
18028005	Leicuhnga neh thei chah thei ake vangin , Leinoi lam vnag meikouva kileo abange !
18028006	song lah a hin songmantam sapphire akimun , Asongdi jong sanadia jeng tobang ahi .
18028007	Leithao kilhaina lampi chu mubongin amukhapon , Muthong jong aleng lut khapoi .
18028008	Chukom lamthip’a chun Sakei hihen sahang dnag hijongleh alengkhapoi .
18028009	Mihemin hitobang songtah lah hi alaiyin , Molsang bulpi jong akalkang theiye .
18028010	Songpi lah avi nauva hin Song mantam jong alaidoh-ui .
18028011	Twisamphung luinah dung jong alaidoh-un . Itobang thilguh um jong ahedoh-ui .
18028012	Ahile Chihna hoiya kimun tin , Hetkhen themna hoiya kisimdoh tantem ?
18028013	Mihem lah a chihna kiholdoh ponte , Koiman chihna gilje ahepoi .
18028014	Twikhanglen le twipi lithuh laiyin jong , Twithuh laiya chihna kimudeh lou aseibouve .
18028015	Chihna hi sana le Dangka chohjou jong ahipoi .
18028016	Ophir sana le onyx , saphire song mantam Hicheng tojong hin chihna kilheh theiponte .
18028017	Sana sanga jong chihna manlujo , Sana dangka sanga jong mantamjo ahi .
18028018	Chihna hi song mantam carol . crystal chule twikohchang sanga manlujo ahi .
18028019	Chihna hi song mantampen topaz le Sana thengsel tojong tepi thi ahipoi .
18028020	Chihna hi hoiya hungkonba ham ? Hoilaiya ihet khen them diu ham ?
18028021	Ganhing khat chan amukhapon , chungleng vachan jong amupoi .
18028022	Thinale manthah nan jong Chihna thu thang ajah thon asei lhon’e .
18028023	Chihna lampi Pathenin bou ahen , Hoiya chihna kimu ding jong amun ahei .
18028024	Ajeh chu Pathenin van mong geiyin amudoh-in , vannoi thil jouse amusoh-e !
18028025	Pathenin huipi anunsah-in , Twikhanglen atetohsoh keiyin ;
18028026	Go juhna ding mun asemtoh-in , Kolphe lampi asemjange .
18028027	Chuteng chihna umna aphongdoh-in , Angai nom jouse din aseiphonge . Akholtoh chet’in , Aphudet tai !
18028028	Chuin miho jah a Pathenin : “ Chihna dia Pakai chibai boh ding , Hetkhen themna dia thilse bolda ding ahi , ” ati .
18029001	Job’in aseiban ajop kit’in :
18029002	“ O Pathenin eina khohsah lai Kahinkho chu kile kit thei leh kati !
18029003	Pathenin einalhonpi jingin , Muthim lah jot jong leng eisalvah jinge !
18029004	Chulai chu kaphat thei lai nikho ahin , Pathento kakijol’in ka-insung avengtup jinge !
18029005	Hatchungnung Pathenin eina umpin , Kachaten eina-um chah kheh-ui .
18029006	Kabongpi le kakelpi ho noitwi alhingin , Song-hol lah jenga jong ka-olive thing aphattheiye .
18029007	Khosung upate kikhopna chan a Ken jong tou mun kalon kapang jinge !
18029008	Khangdong hon lam ei-ot teiyun , Eija nan upate adin gdoh jiuve .
18029009	Japi lamkaite geiyin athip chet’un ,
18029010	Athupipen ho jeng jong paopoh uhsa aumpouve .
18029011	Ka-umchan ja ho hihen eimu ho hileh , Abonchauvin katoh phat sei ding anei cheh-ui .
18029012	Vaichate atao tengu kapanpi teiyin , Suhna ding helou chagate kapanhui .
18029013	Genthei chungnung ten eipah Chauvin , Meithaite kakithopin along mongui .
18029014	Kitoh tah le dihtah-in Thil kabol’in thu katanjie .
18029015	Mitchote mit’in kapangin , Elbaite kengin kapange !
18029016	vaichate pan kapangin , Maljin gentheiho kakithopi .
18029017	Mi-engsete kasu-lhan , Amibolseteu kahuhdoh jie .
18029018	Sottah hinga inlum a Thi din bou kakinem’e .
18029019	Nanou jing jeng thingphung , Twi nomna leipha lah a keh tobang kahi .
18029020	Mitinin eivah choiyin , Katha alhasam kha hih hel’e .
18029021	Mi thu kamop teng , japi athip chet’un , Kasei phaten angai cheh-ui .
18029022	Kasei chaisoh tengleh seibe ding aneipouvin , kathusei gobah lha abngjie .
18029023	Chavang laiya loubol min gotwi ahomtho bangin , Mitinin kaseiho adei cheh-uve .
18029024	Kinepna aneilou tengu nuiheuvin kaven , Kamail lhaisel chun atilkhouji tauve !
18029025	Thu neitah-in atoh diu kasempeh-in , Lengpan sepaite alamkai bangin kalamkaiyin , Alung lhahna chan’uva kalhamonji’e !
18030001	Hinla kasanga dongjo chengin eidai thangun , Apateu jong pannabei jeng , kelngoi chinga kikoi Uichate toh kivop dia jong kadeimo jeng ahiuve .
18030002	Mi meisan mithabei jeng ahiuvin , Imacha eibolpeh thei jong aumppouve .
18030003	Akelthi diu tengleh Janlaiyin gamlah munthip’a thing jungmot pou aket’uve .
18030004	Gamthip laiya hamjung pou , Tuile al neilou longlao bal pou akibo’uvin aneuve .
18030005	Gucha kihoh dal bangin , Amupha chanin ahohdal’un adeljam’ui .
18030006	Songko dunga achengun , Songpi pang dunga akisel’ui .
18030007	Gamlah a ganhing bangin a-aocheh chuh-un , phaiphung noi dung pouva ageh-ui .
18030008	Pannabei , minbei , imacha hilougol , Gamsunga nodohsa jeng ahiuve .
18030009	Tun eihung nuisat leuvin , Atot nopna diu bep kahi-ong !
18030010	Imacha sah louvin eibol’un , eijamsan’un , Kamaichanga chil eiset khum jengui .
18030011	Pathenin eisuh lhah a panpi beiya eikoijeh hin , Lung hangtah-in eidoutauve !
18030012	Hite ho pi hin sel del’in eidel’un , Nokhong kheh din eidel del jenguve .
18030013	Kajamdohna ding lampi akhah-un suhmang din eigouve ; Aphoh tang diu jong koima aumpoi .
18030014	Kapal vangkah dunga ahung lut’un , Tolte eichil that ha jengui .
18030015	Kakicha behseh tan , kaloupina la abeitan , Kanei kagou jouse meilhang kitolmang bep ahi .
18030016	Tua vnag thi ding kahitan , Kanat oldomna ding jong aumtapoi .
18030017	Jan teng kagu kachangin eichip’in , Kanat jong a-oldom deh poi .
18030018	Pathenin kalochangin eimanin , Kaponsil eivei-lhop peh tai .
18030019	Bon-ngan lah a eileh lut’in , bonlhoh beh kahitai !
18030020	Vo Pathen nahenga kataovin , Nangin neihoupoi !
18030021	Engse tah-in neibol’in , Nathanei sunin neibolgimtai .
18030022	Huipi neilhohsah sah jengin , Khopihuiya neileh lenglei .
18030023	Athi dia neibol kahenai . Mihem thina jon’a neipui ahi .
18030024	Manthahna geisa , thildang beiya lungset thum bep Hitobang mihem hi idia nadel khum khum ham ?
18030025	Akapte kakapi dam ? Angaichate kapehda khah am ?
18030026	Lung navah a nopna kakineppin , Lung jinna le muthimin eilhundentai .
18030027	Nat lung gim a thipai ding kahitan , Ani nin kanat akhoh cheh cheh jenge !
18030028	Lung navahna bei , lung jingin kavah len , Japi lah a kadingin panpi kathum’e !
18030029	Kagim behseh tan kamkei hamin kahamin , Va-ngongsao maovin kamaove !
18030030	Kagu kachang nan kakhosih-in , Katicuhng adupsoh tai !
18030031	Kipana tumging thei gin ka-ngai ngaiya , Tun vang lunghem a kagin bou kajatai !
18031001	Nu-ngah him him jonlunga kavet louna din Kalung giltah-in kakitep’e .
18031002	Hatchungnung Pathenin i-eilo jiuva , Mihem tohman ipi apeh jim ?
18031003	Thildih lou bolte chu Hamsetna le manthahna alhunkhumsah-e .
18031004	Kabol katoh Pathenin ahesoh keiyin , Kakalsonna chan jong amu jinge !
18031005	Thilse bolloudia kihahsel kahin , Midang jou lhep loudia kihahsel kahi .
18031006	Pathenin kitoh chet’in tetoh leh Monabei kahi mudoh tante .
18031007	Lamdih kapeldoh ham , Thilse kabolnom ham Kakhutte ni jong Thilse kibolnasa ahikhah leh ,
18031008	Kamuchi tusa gamlha jeng hen , Kasemsa an midangin nehen !
18031009	Ka-inhengpa jinu kadeichat’a , Akptphunga kachan lhih khah leh ,
18031010	Kajinun pasal dang an honpeh hen , Achunga pasal dang lum hem !
18031011	Ajeh chu hitobang chonset hi Thina thei tale peh dia lom mong ahi .
18031012	Talen chu damun meikong , Kanei kagou kavam thei manthahna ahi .
18031013	Lhacha kiphin aum jongleh Ka-ngaiyin phaten kabolpehjie .
18031014	Bolpeh da leng Pathen iti kamua , Pathenin kathu atan teng iti kihon tang-em ?
18031015	Keima eisema Pathen chun Kalhachate jong asem ahi .
18031016	vaichate la kakithopi jingin , Meithai khatcha jong lung lengvaiyin kakoipoi .
18031017	Keiman kaneh laisen la Chagate nelouvin kakoipoi .
18031018	Apenlhah a anun adalhah a pat , Apau bangin kahinvah khange .
18031019	Vaicha lhasam , Nihchen ponsil cholel kamu leh ,
18031020	Keima kelngoi kul’a kisem mong mong , Samulpon kasilpeh teng eivahchoi cheh-ui .
18031021	Thutamna phunga kajotho ding hesaa Chaga khattou kalep boll eh ,
18031022	Kabanjangte ni kivobang jeng hen , Kalengkoute nia koin kisat lha hen ,
18031023	Pathenin talen eipeh ding kagingin , Hitobang thilse hi bol ponge .
18031024	Neile gou , sana dangka Kakisonpi ngaipon ;
18031025	Kahaona chengse jong hi Hoithonan kanei khapoi .
18031026	Nisa vah jong kahou khapon , Lha mel-hoi jong chibai kabohpoi .
18031027	Nisa lhathah hou din eikilhem lhapon , Ni le lha hounan kakhut kachop khapoi .
18031028	Hita bolna hin Hatchungnung Pathen ataitomin , Abol’a chu thina thei talen matsah lom ahi .
18031029	Kamelmate genthei kakipapi khapon , Hamset atotengu nom kasa khapoi .
18031030	Kamelmate thina dia taova , Hitobang chonset chu bol louhel kahi .
18031031	Maljin ho kalhunsah jing hi Kanatong jousen ahesoh keiyui .
18031032	Kholjin jouse in a kalhunsah jin , Kholai dung tol-lhanga alum khapouve .
18031033	Min achonset asel cheh-un , Kenvang kasel ngaipoi .
18031034	Japin eidem ding jong kagingpon , Mihouset ginnan kot kal lhah louvin kaumthim ngaipoi .
18031035	Koiman kasei eingaipeh lou ding ham ? Adih cheh kaseiye , Hatchungnung Pathenin eidonbut hen ! Min eiheh nau hi kasim thei dia Kijihdoh soh keiya kikoi hileh ,
18031036	Kiletsahpi tah a kalengkouva kaput ding , Kalua lallukhuh banga kakhuh ding ahi .
18031037	kabol chan Pathen seipeh ing ting , A-angsunga kalu kadosangsah le ding ahi .
18031038	Kaloumun leiset hi Aneipaa kona kaguh thoa ,
18031039	Hiche lousoh gilkel kathohsah leh ,
18031040	Suhlou chang le sakol chang khel’in Lingle khao hung keijo hen ! ” ati . Job thusei akichaitai .
18032001	Job chu ama them akichansoh hel phat’in , akinelpi pasal thum chun donbut louvin akoitauve .
18032002	Ahin akihouvu ngaiya pang , Ram phunga Buz insunga Barakel chapa , Elihu chu along hangtai . Ajeh chu Job’in Pathen mo apeh a amajoh them akichan hi nom asapoi .
18032003	Job golte mi thum chunga jong along hange ; ajeh chu Job anel lhah thei louvu hin Pathen chu themmo dol’in akilange .
18032004	Alah a chun Elihu hi adongpen ahin , midang seichaisoh angah-in ahi .
18032005	Mi thumin Job adonbut thei lou phat’un , along hangtan ,
18032006	thu aseipantai . “ Nang ho upa nahitauvin , kei khangdong kahi nalaiye , Hijeh hin kalunggel sei ding jong kati ajai .
18032007	Upa domin naseiyuva , Khanglui domin chihna nahil diuva kagel ahi .
18032008	Hinla Hatchungnung Pathen Lhagao chu Mihem chunga hung chua chihna apeh ahibouve .
18032009	Upat man a mi chinga jong ahipon , Kum tam man a ima kihethem deh jong ahipoi .
18032010	Chapang jong leng kasei ngai leu chun kadeiye , Kalunggel seipeh-unge .
18032011	Naseiyu ka-ngai nagi jengin , Thu ngei ngei nahol’u jong ka-ngah-e .
18032012	Phatah a ka-ngai vangin , Khat chan jong Job nanel lhapouve .
18032013	Iti kachinge nati thei diu ham ? Nanel lel’u ahitan , Pathenin Job donbut nante .
18032014	Job chu nang ho to kihou nahiuvin , kei eihoupoi ; Hijongle nang ho donbut bangin donbut ponge .
18032015	Thu asei khel soh tauve , Job ; Nadonbut thei pouve !
18032016	Sei din gbon neitalou ka-nga nah lai ding ham ? Sei ding helouvin amoh dintauve .
18032017	Kenjong donbut ing ting , kalunggel kasei ding ahi .
18032018	Seikal ka-nga lel thotan , Kalungin kadoljou tapoi .
18032019	Kho-ngaisot leng , lengpitwi thah-in Savun peng atumkeh banga kapojal thei ahi .
18032020	Ka-ngah jou tapoi . Seijeng tange !
18032021	Langkaina jong nei pong ting , Koima jong lhemlha ponge !
18032022	Mi lhep lhahje jong kahepon , Lhem jong leng Pathenin eisuhmanglo ding ahi .
18033001	Ahile tun Job , Kasei ding hi lunglut tah-in nagiphan .
18033002	Ipi hijongle kalunga akgel hi Seidoh jeng dinga kigoa kahitai .
18033003	Lung thengsel’a Thudih tah sei kahi .
18033004	Pathen Lhagoavin einasemin Eina hinsah ahi .
18033005	Naki-nga chat le neidonbut’in , Neinelna ding kigeltoh chet’in .
18033006	Pathen mitmua nang le kei thakhat ihin , Leivuiya kisemdoh cheh ihibouve .
18033007	Neiginna ding jong aumpon , Kenjong jothon bol ponge .
18033008	Nangin naseipen tah Kajahsa chu hiche ahi :
18033009	‘ Bol khel kaneipon , kathemmopoi ; Monabei , chonsetna neilou kahi .
18033010	Pathenin eidouva , Melma banga eibol ahibouve .
18033011	Kakeng thih khaovin ahenin , Kakal chalna ave-lhi keove , ’ nati .
18033012	Naseikhel heltai , Job : Pathen chu mihem sanga chungnungjo ahi .
18033013	Idia mihem kiphinna nahsah loudan a Pathen na-oimo ham ?
18033014	Pathenin avel vel’a asei vangin Asei koiman nagisah-in aneipouve .
18033015	Mihem jan ihmut lanin jong Pathenin amangule Themgao thilmua thu aseiye .
18033016	Athusei mihemte ajahsah teng , Agihsaln aho jal’in atijauve .
18033017	Achonset jom louna diuva Pathenin asei ahin , Akiletsahda na diuva apho ahi .
18033018	Amanthahsah nom lou ahin , Thina theiya kona huhhing agot ahi .
18033019	Mihem adih dohna din Pathenin anatsah jin , Ati pumpi adammosah jie .
18033020	Adam louvin ima aduchapon , Antui tah mu jongle achil pulpoi .
18033021	Atahsa agongte tul’in , Agu aching keobou ahitai .
18033022	Lhankhuh sung jon ding kon , Mithigama kumsuh ding kon ahitai .
18033023	Mihemte toh ding hiljia Pathen Vantil asang sang lah a Khattouvin vang ahung panpi thei ahi .
18033024	Ahepi jeh a Vantil chun , ‘ Lhadoh tan , Alhatdoh man aumnai , mithigam jotsuhda ta hen , ’ ati thei ahi .
18033025	Chuteng ati noudoh kit’a , Atha hung kiledoh kit ding ahi .
18033026	Atao teng Pathenin houvintin , Kipah a Pathen ahou ding , Pathenin ijakai aboltoh peh ding ahi .
18033027	Aman japi lah a , ‘ Kachonsen , thil dihlou kaboltai ; Hichan jong hin Pathenin eihing hoiye .
18033028	Pathenin mithigam a eisol loulai jeh-in , Tugeiyin kahing nalaiye . ’
18033029	Hichengse hi Pathenin Mihem chunga avel vel’a abolji ahi .
18033030	Mikhat ahuhhing jin nomtah-in ahinsahjie .
18033031	Job , kasei hi ngaiyin lang , Umthimin ken seiyinge !
18033032	Seiding nanei vang leh seiyin , Them kachansah nom lheh nahi .
18033033	Seiding nanei loule ngai thimin , Chihje nahil inge , ” ati .
18034001	Elihun asei pai kit’in :
18034002	“ Naching them thei lheh-ui , Tun kei sei ding hi ngaiyun !
18034003	An tui le tui lou kamsungin atep bangin , Thu ngei le ngei lu nabengin angaiye .
18034004	Hijeh chun thildih lhengu hitin , Thilpha datkhen temu hite .
18034005	Job them akichan nah vangin , Pathenin them achan nompoi .
18034006	Job’in , ‘ Monabon kinei lou Jouseiyin bou eikigeltan , kachonset lou vangin Talen hah tah eikipetai , ’ ati .
18034007	Pathen jabol louhel Job tobang mihem umkham ?
18034008	Migiloute to bou akivop’in , Chonset toh akijot lei !
18034009	Pathen lungdei juigot hi A-itih a thilphan aseipoi .
18034010	Ima hethem nang hon kasei ngai phauvin , Hatchungnung Pathenin thil dihlou abol ngaiyam ?
18034011	Pathenin miho atohman apeh cheh a , Achan diu lom achansah ahi .
18034012	Hatchungnung Pathenin itih-in thilse abolpon , Koima adih louvin abol ngaipoi .
18034013	Pathenin athaneina hi koi koma apalah ham ? Kon Pathen chu vannoi poh theina tha apeh theiyam ?
18034014	Pathenin mihema konin alhagao kilah hen , Hat theina hu kinung lah kit leh ;
18034015	Mihing jouse thin tin , Leivui lesokit diu ahitai !
18034016	Miching nahileh Kasei ngaiphan !
18034017	Pathen dihtah chu mo nachansah a , Thudih ahot banga nagel ham ?
18034018	Agitlouva aphatchom lou tengu Pathenin leng ho le vaihomte themmo achansahjie .
18034019	Mitin sempa ahijeh-in Pathenin Vaihomte panpia vaichate douna mihao panpi ahipoi .
18034020	Mihem hi jan ihmut lan a thi thei . Pathenin aden teng dihlhuh a mangthah thei , Mihat lai lai jong Imacha louhel’a atha thei ahi .
18034021	Pathenin mihem kho-lhah Kalson amelchih jinge .
18034022	Chonse kiselna din Khojin muthim jong ajingpoi .
18034023	Itih tah le mihem thu atanpeh ding Pathenin phat tep angaipoi .
18034024	Lamkaite haisah a akhel diu holna din , Het khel kholtoh khoh angaipoi .
18034025	Pathenin mi natoh ahe cheh-in , Jan kah-in akhup athal’in aleh-in asugoijitai .
18034026	Michonsete chu japi mitmun Pathenin ajep cheh jin ahi .
18034027	Ajeh chu Pathen nung ajui tapouvin , Athupeh chengse adonda tauve .
18034028	Vaichate Pathen henga akasah-un , Pathenin ataonau asangin panpi agoi .
18034029	Pathenin ima bolda agot teng Kon a-oimo theiyam Akihei mang tengleh Mihemin suhna ding heponte .
18034030	Pathen hephaloute achunguva avaihom teng , Namtin vaipin jong alonaje hepouvinte .
18034031	Job , nachonset jouse Pathen koma naphondoh a , Chonse kit loudia kitep nahitah em ?
18034032	Namona chengse Pathenin navetsah dia nathuma , Thilse bol loudia nom nahitah-em ?
18034033	Pathen thilbol bon deilou , Nadei nabolpeh ding kinam nahi nah em ? Nathu thu ahi , kei kahipoi ; nagel gel seidoh jengin !
18034034	Lung gel thei jouse nomteiyin tin , Kasei ngaiya miching jousen :
18034035	‘ Job hin hetoh louva asei ahin , Asei jouse lah thei aumpoi , tinte .
18034036	Job sei jouse hi geltoh chet’un , Asei jouse hi migilou thusei tobang ahi .
18034037	Achonset besen Pathen doumah abol’in , Imaichanguva Pathen ataitom jenge ! ” ati .
18035001	Eluhun aseibe nalaiyin :
18035002	“ Job , Pathen angsunga monabeiya Nakisei jeng hi nadihpoi !
18035003	Chule Pathen koma , ‘ Kachonset loule ipi phachom a , Kachonset le na-ilou ham ? ’ nati hi adihpoi .
18035004	Nang jong donbut ing ting , Nagol napaite jong kahouset ding ahi .
18035005	Vanthamjol khu vetemin , Meilhangho khu vena sang thei lheh-e !
18035006	Chonse jongle chun Pathen din ima aloupoi . Thil bol khel jongle chun Pathen asuh khah am ?
18035007	Dih lheh le chun Pathen ahu theiyem ? Nanga konin Pathenin imacha angaichapoi .
18035008	Nachonset teng namihem chanpin athoh lel’in , Thilpha nabol leh aphatchompi ,
18035009	Mihemin bolset ato teng na asauvin , Ahuhhing diu akouvui !
18035010	Agenthei pettah-uva kinepna pethei Asempau Pathen heng ajonpouve .
18035011	Ju le va , ganhing sanga eichihsah thei Chihna eipeu Pathen heng ajonpouve .
18035012	Agit louva akiletsah jeh-un , Panpi angeh vangun Pathenin adonpouve .
18035013	Pannabeiya kap a peng nahiuve ; Hatchungnung Pathenin ajapon angaipoi .
18035014	Job , Pathen namuthei louvin seidan , Lung nengtah-in ngah-in a-ang sunga nathu alhungtai .
18035015	Pathenin chonset khohsah louva , Talen amatsah louvin nagel’e .
18035016	Napao pao jong pannabei ahi , Hetoh louva thusei nahi akichentai , ” ati .
18036001	Elihun aseibe kit nalaiyin :
18036002	“ Lung nengtah-in kho-ngai jep’in , Pathen thalhenga kasei hi ngaiphan .
18036003	Kahetna ajaovin , Eisempa dihje Vetsahnan kahet bangin seiyinge ,
18036004	Najah a jou khatcha kaseipoi ; Namasanga miching tahbeh namutai .
18036005	Pathen itihat hitam ! Koima anahsahmo pon , Ahet lou thil khatcha aumpoi .
18036006	Chonsete ahinghoi ngaipon , Vaichate adih-in abol jinge .
18036007	Midihte ahong jingin , leng bangin vai apohsah-in , Tonsot’in jabol achansahjie .
18036008	Hinla miho achonna dungjuiya Thihkhaova kihen amudoh tengleh ,
18036009	Pathenin achonsetnau leh Akiletsah nau avetsah jie .
18036010	Thilsea kona akihei mangna diuvin Miho chu agihsal jin ahi .
18036011	Pathen thu angaiyuva alhacha apan’u leh , Ahao theiyun along mongui .
18036012	Achutilou leh khopho louvin athiuvin , Mithigam jonin luipi agalkaiji tauve .
18036013	Pathen heloute chu along hang jingun , Talen amat’u jongle panpi ngaiyin atao pouve .
18036014	Khangdong lai laiyin athiuvin , Mi maiya jumle ja thoh-in aum’ui .
18036015	Pathenin vang thoh gimna hi mihil nan amangin , Gentheina hi kho muthei nan amange .
18036016	Pathenin gimna konin napuidoh-in lang mongin nakoiyin , Nadokhang chung neh le chah adimtai .
18036017	Tun nachan ding lomin Talen namantai .
18036018	Nehguh jeh alhep chatvaiya naum louna ding , Hao deichat jal’a navamang louna din ching theiyin .
18036019	Panpi ngaiyin peng jongle chund phachom pontin , Nathahat’in jong ima boldoh peh theiponte .
18036020	Namtin vaipi manthahna ding , Jan hung lhun ding kinem hih-in .
18036021	Thilse nabol louna dia genthei kithohsah nahi .
18036022	Pathen thanei loupije geldoh-in , Ama mihil them chungnungpen ahi .
18036023	Pathen chu thilse bol’a moso thei le Abol ding hil masa thei koi ham ?
18036024	Atohna chung aseiphat aching jingin , Nangin jong navahchoitei ding ahi .
18036025	Mitinin athilbol amucheh-in , Koiman vang ahejou jaipoi .
18036026	Aloupina kihechen joupontin , Akum jong kisim thieponte .
18036027	Leiset’a kona twi chopdoh a , Gotwiya hinjuhsah kitji Pathen ahi .
18036028	Mitin namtin dia hung ju-lha din , Meilhang lah a konin gotwi ajuhsah-e .
18036029	Pathen chenna vanpi kinim le Meilhang kitolle koiman ahetheipoi .
18036030	Vanthamjol’a kol aphetsah nan , Twikhanglen lithuh laila athim jing theiye .
18036031	Hitia hi Pathenin mipi avah jinga Neh le chah neng jeng junga apeh ahi .
18036032	Akhut’in kehchang achoiyin , Adoina mun sepkha din alhai .
18036033	Khopihui hung ding teng van akinimin , Ganchaten ahung ding aheuve .
18037001	Hichea hin keijong kalung ling laovin , kalungchang achomdoh deh deh jenge .
18037002	Nabonchan Pathen ogin khu ngaiyuvin , Akamsunga kon van kinimpi khu !
18037003	Leiset mong langa kon lang khat geiyin , Vanthamjol’a kol aphetsah-e .
18037004	Chuteng a-ogin akijan , Van-gin kithong chutoh keh kisep akimui .
18037005	Pathen thusah jal’in datmo umtah thil asoh-in , Ihet thei louvu thil kidang asoh-e !
18037006	Leiset chunga buhbang alhahsah-in , Gobah le gose ajuhsah jin ahi .
18037007	Pathen natong jing ahi ahetdohna diuvin , Mihemte natoh avohaijin ahi .
18037008	Gamsa jousen jong abusing Akosung , age na akijot cheh-ui .
18037009	Lhanglama konin khopihui ahung nungin , Sahlama konin phalbi dap hui ahung nunge .
18037010	Pathen nahlai husan twipi amut leh , Twiho chu geltwi asohjie .
18037011	Pathenin meilhang lah ameilom asel’in , Meilom ho apokeh teng kol pheji ahi .
18037012	Meilhang ho hi Pathen deiyinakitol len , Vannoi gamtina Pathen lungdei abol’ui .
18037013	Leiset chapnou dia Pathenin go ajuhsah ahin , Mihem bolgimna le lungsetna go amanchah thei ahi .
18037014	Chomkhat kho-ngaiyin phaten nagiton-in .
18037015	Pathenin thu apeh a kol aphetsah Hiti ho hi nahet chet mong nah am ?
18037016	Pathen thilbol kidang tah , Vanthamjol’a meilhang kitol dan nahet the-em ?
18037017	Lhanglam khohuiyin leiset ahinsem hoh teng Gamsa nathoh lel ding chubou nahei .
18037018	Pathen banga nangin vanthamjol Phatvet banga dumje ju khu najamdoh theiyam ?
18037019	Lungthima ima kicop pouvin sei idng kaneipouve . Pathenkoma kasei diu neihil’un .
18037020	Pathen to kihou ding ka-ngap chapoi , I-bol’a kakisuhmangsah ding ham ?
18037021	Vanthamjol avah behseh-in kave-ngampouve , Khopihuiyin amut thengsel’e .
18037022	Sahlama sana vah chansel bangin akimun , Tijat umtah Pathen loupina vah chun eisalvah-ui .
18037023	Pathen thahat anasan kanai ngampouve , Adih-in thudih jengin mi abol’e .
18037024	Mitinin agin cheh ding mong ahi , Kichihsah ho vang iman agelpoi , ” ati .
18038001	Khopihui chimpei lah a konin Pakaiyin Job ahindonbut’e :
18038002	“ Kichihna song lel nang koi nahiya , Khopho louva thu hijat sei nahim ?
18038003	Pasal nahileh dingdoh-in , kadoh chan neidonbut ding ahi .
18038004	Vannoi kasemdoh a chu naum am ? Hijatpi nahet leh neiseipeh temin !
18038005	Vannoi itea sem ding kon aboltoh a , Kon atetoh ham nahet le seiyin !
18038006	Leiset khonpiho ipi chunga kitunga , Vannoi bulpi ning songkhom koi phu ham ?
18038007	Chuche ni jinglah chun ahsi ten la asauvin , Van miten kipah-in asem’ui .
18038008	Twikhanglen twipi akoa kona alonjal ding teng Akotpi kamkhuma ting bingjia koi ham ?
18038009	Twikhanglen meilhanga tomjol a , Muthim lhangkhal a sel chu Kei kahi !
18038010	Twikhanglen gamgi kasempeh-in , Kulpi kot kakam khumtai .
18038011	‘ Hichan gei hin veiyin lang , Hichan a bou natwidil ka-nga ding , ’ katipeh-e .
18038012	Job , mahinkho sunga hi Nikhat beh jong jinglah khovah dia naseipeh-em ?
18038013	Leiset pumpia kho vahsah a , Migiloute kiselna muna deldoh dia naseipeh khah am ?
18038014	Sun khovah hin mol le lhang akimun , Ponsil kijal bang le leingan a mohor kinam bangin akimui .
18038015	Sunlai khovah hi migiloute din akichen behseh-in , Pumhat change thilbol angampouve .
18038016	Twikhanglen laigil twisam putna nache khah a , Twikanglen tonoi lama navale khah tah-em ?
18038017	Noimigam mithikhul kotpi Kelkot pung dung navetsah tah-uvem ?
18038018	Vannoi hi ite pham ? Nahet leh neiseipeh-in .
18038019	Hoiya kona kho hungvah a , Muthim kipatna bulpi nahet-em ?
18038020	I-chan geiya nasol theiya , Nalesol kit thei ding ham ?
18038021	Vanno kisemdoh a bon anaumta a , Hibanga upate bol theiteiyin nate !
18038022	Buhbang le gelchang kakholna Hiche kikholna chu namu khah tah-em ?
18038023	Gim hesoh ni le gal nikhoa Manchah dia kakhol khom ahi .
18038024	Nisa hung konna nagavet khah a , Solam khohui hung nun patna navet khah hitam ?
18038025	Gotwi lonna ding kon asempeh a , Kehchang lhahna ding lampi kon asem ham ?
18038026	Mihem chenna louhel nelgam geiya Go juhsah jing thei koi ham ?
18038027	Hampa louhing hin theina dia Tolgo lah chapnouna dia go juhsah koi ham ?
18038028	Geltwi le daitwi hin Ahinga Pa anei ngap lhon ham ?
18038029	Geltwi le daibang Hinga anu lhon koiham ?
18038030	Geltwi le daibangin twi chu song asosah-in , Twikhanglen chunga akidalsah jie .
18038031	Ahsi bombel ho khu nakan gom theiya , Ngambom lungthu ahsi khu nalhap kang theiyam ?
18038032	Kum kiheichin hetna dia ahsi nalamkai theiya , Ngambom uichal ahsi len le neo nahil thieyam ?
18038033	Vanthamjol’a kimang Danho nahet’a , Hiche Dan ho hi leiset’a naman theiyam ?
18038034	Meilhang ho nahohsal theiya , Twi napehna dia nakou lhah theiyam ?
18038035	Kol naphetsah thei leh Najah a , ‘ Nathun kanunge , ’ ati ding hinam ?
18038036	Nile vadung twilet ding vachate seipeh koi hiya , Gojuh ding ahchal hilmasa koiham ?
18038037	Meilhang simna theiya ching koi hiya , Gotwi sosah theiya ching koi hiya , Gotwi sosah theiya choh chamthei ,
18038038	Gotwi chu leivui chapnou sah a , Bon ngan sosah thei koiham ?
18038039	Sakei te ding neh le chah namupeh a , Sakeinou gilkelte navahna khah em ?
18038040	Akosunga akisel’uva , Akhuh sunga an anga tengu leh !
18038041	Va-ahte gilkel nahol teng vahva koi hiya , Anouten an athum teng pejia koiham ?
18039001	Lhangvuma kolsa nou so phat nahet’a , Sakhi nou so phat nahet-em ?
18039002	Itih chan nou akolpi nahet’a , Anouso ding phat nahet-em ?
18039003	Itih tah leh kol’uva Nousoh diu nahet hinam ?
18039004	Gamlah a anoute akhangdoh-un , Avah mangun ahung kile kitji pouve .
18039005	Koiham gam sa-ngante jalensah a , Lhathanga vathangsah a khu ?
18039006	Gammang lah a chensah a , Chikhuh dunga lhatsah a Kei kahi !
18039007	Khopi husa kijah phah louna aum’un , Koiman vah a natohsah din ajoupoi .
18039008	Lhang sang dunga alhauvin , Neh din hamhing dum ahol leuve .
18039009	Gambong chal’in na natohpeh theiya , Nabongbuh a geh mong nam ?
18039010	Khao nakhia lou nakaisah a , Naloulaiya langkon nakaisah theiyam ?
18039011	Bongchal thahat nason a Na hahsa natohpeh ding naginchat am ?
18039012	Changphal nalo khom peh a Cahngphol a nakaipeh dia nagel ham ?
18039013	Va-ngonsaovin lha ijatvei ajap’a , Patva len alengthei nam ?
18039014	Va-ngongsaovin tol’a tui aop’in , Leihu ahulsat sah theiye .
18039015	Ikhat’in achotkeh peh ding ahephapon , Gamsan aholgoi peh thei jong ahepoi .
18039016	Ama tui lou bangin agel’in , Hahsa tah a athah lhah jong khohsah lou bangin aum’e .
18039017	Hibanga ngolsah a Chihsah lou chu Kei kahi .
18039018	Hinla adin janga kithinga alhai leh , Sakol adeljamin achunga toupa geiyin akichai !
18039019	Hibanga sakol hatsah a , Angongmul bah kesah hi nang nahim Job ?
18039020	Sakolte khaokhopi chop a chopsah a , Nah khon gin hamdeldul sah hi nang nahim ?
18039021	Phaicham tolgo akhot’in , Galmun thal le teng lah anolut jeng jie .
18039022	Kichat tijat ahepouvin , Chemjam masanga gingdan ahipouve .
18039023	Sakol chung touho gal manchah Thal le tengkol nisan akhoval lah lah-e !
18039024	Lung hangtah-in sakolten maanouvin , Sumkon kimut teng adding thim theipouve .
18039025	Sumkon gin chai tengleh ahamin , Galmun aphah masangin Galvui nam ajan , Gal lamkaiten mano dia Lhang asap’u ajauve .
18039026	Mu khu lenje nahil hiya , Lhanglam nga leng thei ham ?
18039027	Muvanlai khu molvum sang laiya Bu asahna dinga nang thupeh anga ham ?
18039028	Songpi vum a bu akisen , Songpi khi kah chu kulpin aneiye .
18039029	Songpi chunga konin gamtin aven , Ganhing thaa neh ding ave-lhi .
18039030	Thilong phunga muthong akikhomun , Anoute thisan achop’ui , ” ati .
18040001	Pakaiyin Job jah a aseitei :
18040002	“ Job , Nangin Hatchungnung Pathen nachouve , Na-ngah didng ham ahiloule nadonbut ding ham ? ” ati .
18040003	“ Ka-ngol thu kasei ahitai Pakai , Ipia kadonbut thei nah lai ding ham ?
18040004	Ima ma jong keiman Seida tang’e !
18040005	Kasei ding abonchan kaseisoh tai , Velsei kit taponge , ” ati .
18040006	Hichun huipi le gopi , chule chimpei lah akonin Pakaiyin Job jah a ahinseiyin :
18040007	“ Pasal nahileh dinginkadoh chengse neidonbut’in .
18040008	Kei hi moso ding neigot’a , Nang kithemsah a Kei mosah neigot ham ?
18040009	Kei banga nahat am ? Kei banga na-oginin van akithisah jouvam ?
18040010	Najo leh , kilsetsah le gunche tah-in dingin , Minthangna le loupe nan kivontemin .
18040011	Mi kiletsahte khu ven lang , Lung hankhumin su-lha temin .
18040012	Ahi , ven lang loilhu , Migiloute adin muna noigep’in .
18040013	Leiset’a vuimangin lang , Mithigam a kanchahsan koiyin .
18040014	Chuteng Ken pahcha masapen ing ting , Najona thu sei masa pen inge .
18040015	Behemoth twisai khu vetemin , Ama jong nang jong kasem cheh ahin , aman bong bangin hampa anei .
18040016	Atahsa khi ichan geiya hat , Aphe avouva itobang thahat kisel ham !
18040017	Amei atun teng cedar thing tobang ahin , Amalphe ho jong atah cheh chuh jenge .
18040018	Agu aching jouse sum-eng tobang ahin , Akeng ho la thiljol abange .
18040019	Kathilsem lah a datmo umpen , Asempa Kenbou kajouve !
18040020	Hamhingin kavah khangin , Thinglhang gamsa lah a alhai ,
18040021	Lingnang noi dunga akol jin , Si lah a pumpeng lah a akiseljie .
18040022	Lingnangho le luipanga huisum phung ho hi Ama din limin apangui .
18040023	Luidung soh jongle aging ppon , Jordan luipi soh jongle iman agelpoi .
18040024	Koipen hin amit chotsah a amat theiya , Nah vupeh a nahkhao avopeh ding ham ?
18041001	Leviathan khu ngakoiya nakoidoh theiya , Alei khu khaova nakan theiyam ?
18041002	Anah hom sunga khao nathil lut theiya , Akhanoi jong thihtul’a nadotvang theiyam ?
18041003	Nalhadohna dia nahenga taova , Nahepina dia nakoma tao ding ham ?
18041004	Nakoma kitep’a aitih a nakinbol dia Kinoptona abol dia nagel ham ?
18041005	Vacha banga nakhi theiya , Nalhacha nu-ngah ho kichepna napeh thei ham ?
18041006	Nga manhon aman jat kidehna aneiyuva , Kiveihon joh dia ahoptel diu ham ?
18041007	Alip khu ngatenga nasut theiya , Aluchang khu tenghema nasut thei ham ?
18041008	Gaphin patep’in , bol kit ngampon nate ; Kisatpi kit nom hih hel’in nate .
18041009	Leviathan mit a mu mai main jong Kinlih leova tol’a kisep lhu jeng ahi .
18041010	Akiphin hang teng akhoh a khoh , Koima kithahna ngam ahipoi .
18041011	Levithan kisatpia ahoidoh aumpon , Vannoi mi koiman thajou ponte .
18041012	Leviathan keng let dan le hatdan Naseipeh ing kate .
18041013	Athivun jeng jong koiman sukoh joulou , Aopvun jong kisunvang thei lou ahi .
18041014	Ahatu chalset sot khubang khu Kon akam akeh peh jou ding ham ?
18041015	Atungtun vun la lumpho tobang ahin , Kimatsoh keiya songtum tobang ahi .
18041016	Alip jouse akijopmat soh keiyin , Alipkah a heojang cha jong lut theilou ahi .
18041017	Alip jouse akikilmat cheh-in , Imachan abokhen theidol ahipoi .
18041018	Anahhai teng meisi apahlah lah-in , Amitchang teni ma ninousoh tobang ahi .
18041019	Akamsunga meisi apah lah lah jengin , Meisi ahung kithotdoh jeng junge !
18041020	Anahhom sunga meikhu akitunglet lut’in , Beltoa tumbo kilhut khu abang jenge .
18041021	Ahai leh meikouvin alengin , Akamsunga mei akouve !
18041022	Alolchang atahbel bul’in , Akitopi akinlih deh deh-ui .
18041023	Avun la anemkom abeihel’in , Thihjol hekon lel hel abange .
18041024	Gin beihel’in alungchang tah-in , Sumhei song tah-in atah-e .
18041025	Adindoh teng mihat tah tah jong akichan , Kichat’a thigam pai diu ahi .
18041026	Asatbut ding chemjamla aumpon , Tengcha hihen thalchang hileh asunbut ding aumpoi .
18041027	Thihjong changpol danin agel’in , Sum-eng jong thingmot bangin agel’e .
18041028	Akap kina thei thalchangla abeitan , Songin kisep jongle changpol’a kisep dol’in ahei .
18041029	Mol jong changpol tobangin angaiton , Tengcha akikho jongleh akidai danin agel’e .
18041030	Aoinem lai lip ho jong bel-hal tobang ahin , Leiset chu thih-kangkuiya kihet abahsah-e .
18041031	Twikhanglen belphul abahsah jin , Belsunga twi sou toh abahsah-e .
18041032	Akhoni nung akichen veng vungin , Twikhanglen phonbem bumin alhai .
18041033	Leiset thil atepi thei aumpon , Gin neilouhel ganhing ahi .
18041034	Sahangtah jong imachan agelpon , Gamsa jouse leng ahi , ” ati .
18042001	Job’in Pakai adonbut’in aseitai :
18042002	“ Thaneipen nahi kahei Pakai ! Nangin nadeichan nabol theiye !
18042003	Khopholou ken Nang chihna Iti kasonlel ding ham ? Kahet chet lou jeng kaseitan , Het dia nasaval ahi kei din !
18042004	Nasei sunga ka-ngai din neihil’in , Neidoh ho kadonbut din naseiye !
18042005	Hinla midangin eihil bep bou kahen , Tun vang kamit tah-in kamutai !
18042006	Kasei jouse kakijapin , Leivui le vutvam tobang hin lung kaheitai ! ” ati .
18042007	Pakaiyin Job jah a thu asei chai phat’in , Eliphaz jah a , “ Kalhacha Job banga , nang le nagol te nin kachung thu nasei loujeh-in nachunguva kalung hange .
18042008	Tun bongchal sagi le kelngoichal sagi Job henga kaiyun lang , kilhaina gabol’uvin . Job’in nataopeh-un tin , vetda lom hijongle chun , ataona chu sanpeh-uvinge . Ama bangin nang hon kachung thu adih-in naseipouve , ” ati .
18042009	Eliphaz le Bildah chule Zopharin Pakaiyin ahilnau bangin abol’un , Pakaiyin Job taona asangtai .
18042010	Job’in agolte thum ataopeh nungin Pakaiyin ama ahaodoh sah kit’in , masanga aneisanga ajat nia tamjon ahaosah tai .
18042011	Job sopi pasal ho le numei ho , chule agol lui ho ahungun , a-in a golvah abolpiuve . Pakaiyin abolgimna jouse chung thudol’a Job din lungmonna thu aseiyui . Mi khat khat’in sum phabep le sana khutjem khat cheh apeuve .
18042012	Ahinkho kipatna lam sangin ahinkho kichailam chu Pakaiyin Job phat thei ahaboh cheh-e . Job’in kelngoi sangsom le sang li avul’in , sa-ngongsao sanggup avul’in , bong sang ni avul’in , sangan sang khat avul’e .
18042013	Chapa sagi aneiyin , chanu thum aneiye .
18042014	Achanu lenpen Jemimah asah-in , aban a nu Keziah asah-in , alhumpen nu Keren Happuch asah-e .
18042015	Job Chanute tobanga numei mel-hoi vannoi leiset’a anaumpoi . Apauvin asopi pasalte toh gou ahop peh soh keiye .
18042016	Job chu kum ja khat le som li ahinbe nalaiyin , tu le tuson anei geiyin ahingin ahi .
18042017	Job ahing lhumkeiyin ateh thitai .
19001001	Migiloute thumop sang lou , Chonsete umchan jomlou , Pathen taitom nomte jop lou chu Mi nun nom tah ahin ;
19001002	Pakai Danthu nit akipapi jon , Danthu chu sun le janin asim jinge .
19001003	Hitobang mi hi luipanga thingphung keh , Aphat cha hung gatheiya , Anan goptih neita lou tobang ahin , Atoh lam jousea alolhing theiye .
19001004	Migiloute vang chuti ahi pon , Huiya vai kithe bep ahiuve .
19001005	Chonset jong Pathenin themmo achan a , Midihte kikhopna lha thei lou diu ahi .
19001006	Midihte chu Pakaiyin apuiyin ahoidamin , Migilouten vang manthahna lam ajontauve .
19002001	Idia namtin vaipin galguh agon’uva , Pannabei thilsea pangkhom hiuvam ?
19002002	Leiset lengten gal abol’un , Avaihomteuvin Pakai adouvun , Pathen lhentum lengpa Adoutauve .
19002003	“ Avaihom nauva konin kiteldoh-u hitin , Eigah nauva konin kisut lhamute , ” atiuve .
19002004	Van alaltouna konin Pakaiyin anuisat’in , Panna beiya agon jouseu adaithange .
19002005	Lung phamon Pakaiyin agihsal’in , Lung hangin ahoh kichasoh tai .
19002006	“ Kalhang theng Zion a , Kalhentum leng laltouna katousah-e , ” ati .
19002007	Lengpan , “ Pakai thugahna phongdoh ing ting , Kajah a , ‘ Nang hi kachapa , Tunia kahinsa nahi ;
19002008	Thumin , namtin vaipi gou losah inge , Leiset pumpi nang ding ahi .
19002009	Namtin vaipi hi thih tenggol a najep cheh a , Leibel banga navohgoi ding ahi , ’ tin aseiye , ” ati .
19002010	Tun hiche thugahna hi leng hon gelphauvin , Hiche kahilna hi leiset vaihomten hethem’uvin .
19002011	Gingkhen chan Pakai kinbol’un ,
19002012	Kithing thingin ahenga boh khup’uvin . Ajo le lung hang loi ding , Namanthah lo jeng diu ahi . Pakaiya kisel jingte chu Anun nom’ui .
19003001	O Pakai , eidouva atamcheh cheh-in , Kamelma atam behseh jengtai !
19003002	
19003003	“ Pathenin panpi taponte , ” tin Kamelmaten aseiyui .
19003004	Hijongle O Pakai , Kalumdal nahin , gal neijosah jin ; Khodah ngamin neilha jingnai .
19003005	Othong leuvin Pakai henga kataovin , Alhang thenga konin eihouve .
19003006	Kalup’a ka-ihmut teng , Pakaiyin eihoidam jeh-in kathoukit jie .
19003007	Kamelma asang sangin eium jongleh Kagingtapoi .
19003008	Hung-o Pakai , neihuhhingin ka-Pathen ! Kamelmate khagu suchip’in , Hapou loubangin koiyin !
19003009	Jo na chu Pakaiya kon ahin , Aman a mite phatthei boh jing hen !
19004001	O them eichan a ka-Pathen , Kahung taove neihouvin ! Kagimpet’in neihu jinge , Neikhoton kataona sangin !
19004002	
19004003	Vo mihemte phat aichan geiya neijumsouva , Ichan geiya pannabei nahol’uva jouthu najui diu ham ?
19004004	Hethem’uvin Pakaiyin midih akilhendoh tai , Ahenga katao teng eisanpeh jie .
19004005	Gingkhen chan um’un chonse hih-un , Janteng thip beh cha nalup naa hiti hi giltah-in gel’un .
19004006	Thil thengin kilhaiyun , Pakai henga ki-ngaiyun .
19004007	Mi tamtah atao teng , “ O Pakai hamphatna neipeh beuvin , Lungset le khoton neiveuvin , ” atiuve .
19004008	Ahinla neipeh kipana hin Neh le chah don ding haotah ho sangin Eikipasah joi .
19004009	O Pakai , damsel’a neihoijeh-in , Kalup teng nomsel’in ka-ihmui .
19005001	O Pakai kaseiho neingaipeh-in , Katao gin ngaiyin !
19005002	
19005003	Kithopi ngaicha kap kahi , Ka-Pathen le kalengpa ! O Pakai nangbou kataona nahi !
19005004	Jingkah seh le kapengin najan , Nisa so teng neihou ding kinemin kataove .
19005005	Thilse kipahji Pathen nahipon , Thil phalouto umkhom thei nahipoi .
19005006	Mi kilsetsahte navetdan , Mi phaloute nahoi .
19005007	Jousei hatte nasu mangjin , Pumhatte le lepchete nakidah-e .
19005008	Nalungset kidang jeh-in Keivang nahouin a hung theiying ting , Nahouin theng sunga boh khup’ing ting Nangma jatah a kahou ding nahi .
19005009	O Pakai , kamelma atam behseh-e ! Nadei bol din neipuiyin lang , Nalampi neijot jangsah-in .
19005010	Kamelmate thusei tahsan thei aumpon , Mi suhmangna ding bou adeiyuve .
19005011	O Pathen , mo sonlang talen pen , Athilgon’uvin kipalsah-in , manthahsah jengin . Nang douna chonset tampi aboljeh-un Na-angsunga konin delmangtan .
19005012	Nalim’a kiselte vang kipah jing hen , Phat tinin kipala sau hen . Nangma jeh a nom sa ahijeh-un , Na-ngailute chu hoidam jingin !
19005013	Pakai , nathu nit chu phatthei naboh jin , Na-ngailut chu lumbangin nadalpehjie .
19006001	O Pakai , lung phamo jongle chun nei-eng boldan , Lunghang jongle chun talen neimatsah hih-in !
19006002	
19006003	Abeipai ding kahitai , neikhoton Pakai ! Kagu kachangin eichip’e , neidamsah-in !
