19006004	Kapumpin kana behseh jenge , Kithopi louva itih chan neikoi nah lai ding ham ?
19006005	Hungin neihuhhingin Pakai , Neikhoton thinaa konin neihuhdoh loiyin !
19006006	Mithi gama nangma geldoh jong aumpon , Navahchoi theiya jong aumpouve .
19006007	Kaha nat behseh jeh-in veipai ding kahitan , Janseh a kaka kanan ka-ulsan kajalkhun alhop jin , Kalukhap jeng jong Kamit lhin alhop jitai .
19006008	Kamelmaten eikasah sah nauva konin Kamit athimlon , kho kamuchen theipoi .
19006009	Pakaiyin kataona asangtai , Kakoma konin migiloute potdoh jengun !
19006010	Panpi ngaicha kakouna ajatan , Kataona asan ding ahitai .
19006011	Kamelmaten thina khop’a jum le ja athoh diu , Kinloi tah a kisudonguva Pathenin adelmang diu ahi .
19007001	O Pakai ka-Pathen , neihoidam din naheng kahinjon’e , Kanung hindeltea konin neihuhdoh-in !
19007002	
19007003	Neihuhdoh loule sakei sakai bangin eikai mangun tin , Koiman eihuhdoh joulou ding , katel kadah a eijanlo diu ahi .
19007004	O Pakai ka-Pathen , keiman thilse kabol khah a ,
19007005	Kagol thilpha bol chu thilsea kathuh a , Ajeh beiya melma kachom leh ;
19007006	Kamelmaten eihindel del jeng hen eiman hen , Eisat lih jengu hen lang , Kalong damsa tollhanga jamu hen !
19007007	O Pakai , lung soutenin hung kipatdoh-in , Kamelmate to kidinten , nangin neipan hun ! Nangin thudih na-ngeh jinge ,
19007008	Mitin mitang koukhomsoh-in Van a konin achunguva vaihomin .
19007009	Namtin thutan vaihom nangma nahi , Kadih dungjuiyin Thu neitanpeh-in O Pakai , Themmona bei kahi nahenai !
19007010	Pathen dih nahi , Kadeiyu le ka-ngaiyu kholtoh-in . Migiloute phatmona sutangin Miphate kipaman pen .
19007011	Pathen chu eihoidampa ahin , Athu nitte ahuhhing jie .
19007012	Pathen chu dihtah a thutan ahin , Niseh-in migilou chunga alung hange .
19007013	Migilouvin lung ahei louleh , Achemjam akinol hem jin ; Thalpi aloiyin kamsalsan akoiyin ,
19007014	Thal’an behsa thalchang kipat’in , Thalpi chang lheleh lah chun adoijie .
19007015	Ven , migilouten itobang thilse agel’u hitam ! Gim gantheina ding agongun jou aseiyui .
19007016	Ahinla mi o-na dia thang akam nauva Amaho a-oh lih jiuve .
19007017	Athilse bol’uvin amaho asukhan , Ahusetnauvin amaho amavo lotai .
19007018	Adih jeh-in Pakai kathangvah-in , Chungnungpen Pakai vahchoi la kasai .
19008001	O Yahweh ka-Pakaiyu , Leiset pumpia naminthangtai ! Navahchoina ogin van a akithongdoh tan ,
19008002	
19008003	Chapangte la naosen geiyin lan asauve . Namelmate dounan kulpi nakaiyin , Nadou jouse nasutang soh tai .
19008004	Nasemsa vanthamjol le Nagoltohsa lha le ahsi ho kavet teng ,
19008005	Mihem hi ipi hiya hibanga nagel khoh a , Mihem chapa hi ipiham hibanga nakhohsah ?
19008006	Nang ban tah a nakoiyin , Loupi tah-in lal lukhuh nakhuhpeh-in jabolna napei .
19008007	Nasemsa thil jouse chunga vai nahomsah-in , Thilsem aboncha ama noiya nakoiye :
19008008	Kelngoite le gancha dang ho , gamsa ho geiyin ,
19008009	Vachate le nga jouse Twikhanglen a ganhing ho geiyin .
19008010	O Yahweh ka-Pakaiyu , Leiset pumpia naminthangtai !
19009001	Pakai , kalungthim pumpin vahchoiying ting , Nabolsa thil kidang ho seichoi lenge .
19009002	
19009003	Nangma jal’in kipa la sang ting , Hatchungnung Pathen navahchoi la sange .
19009004	Nangma nahung kilah teng kamelmate anung jam’un , kisep lhun athidentauve .
19009005	Kitah le thudih-in thu natanin , Keijong them neichantai .
19009006	Namtin vaipi naphohsal’in , Migiloute nasumangjin , Geldoh kit louhel dingin Nanoi mangsohjitai .
19009007	Kamelmateu akichaisoh tan , Akhopi jouseu nasumangin , Koiman amaho ageldoh kit tapoi .
19009008	Pakai chu tonsot din alengchang tan , Thutan din laltouna atoutai .
19009009	Thudih-in vannoi vai apon , Namtin vaipi thu adih-in atanpeh-e .
19009010	Bolgentheiya umte dia Pakai hi kiselna kulpi ahin , Hesoh genthei pet’a hoidohna mun ahi .
19009011	Pakai , namin hesaten ki-ngai nan naneiyun , Naheng hinjon chan nadonda ngaipoi .
19009012	Zion a vaihom Pakai vahchoila sauvin , Athilbol namtin gaseipeh-uvin .
19009013	Phula them Pathenin gentheite agel jingin , Aka ginu asumilpon , abolseteu talen amatsahjie .
19009014	Neilungset’in O Pakai , Ven , kamelmaten eibolset nau hi ! O Pakai , thinaa konin neihuhdoh loiyin !
19009015	Jerusalem mite masanga kadin a , Kavahchoina jeh jouse kaseipeh theina din . Neihuhhing jal’a kipah thanom ding kahitai .
19009016	Namtin vaipin khuh alaiyun , Akhuh laisauva alhalut’un athangkam’uva a-oh tauve .
19009017	Pakai chu adih a thu atanjal’in akiphongdoh tan , Migiloute vang athangkamsauva a-ohden soh tauve .
19009018	Pathen hephalou jouse , Migiloute aboncha thisoh hel diu ahi .
19009019	Angaichate donlouva kikoi koi lou ding , Vaichate kinepna jong kisumil deh lou ding ahi .
19009020	Hungin Pakai , mihem kijosah dan , Na-angsunga namtin vaipi koukhomin themmo pen .
19009021	Mihemte kiginsah-in Pakai , Thi thei mihem ahiu kihetdohsah tan .
19010001	O Pakai , idia kidal khin khin a , Ngaichat pet leh kiselmang nahim !
19010002	Migiloute kiletsah-in vaichate abolseuve , Athang kamsauva osah-in .
19010003	Migilouvin thilse atup akiletsah pin , Mi kilosen jong Pakai ataitomloi .
19010004	Migilouvin Pakai aholpon , Akiletsah jeh-in Pathen agelkhohpoi .
19010005	Migilou chu atoh lam lama akhangtouvin , Pathen thutanna hephalouvin , amelma ahohdal thoi .
19010006	Migilouvin , “ kelel bei hel ding , Gentheina katolou hel ding ahi , ” tin agel’e .
19010007	Gaosap le jousei toh chule hutot to thon thu aseiyin , Geldet det louvin , thuse hotlam jeng aseiye .
19010008	Venglai golchih kah dudnga touvin Monabei miho that din achanglhi . Atha nom miho chu Amit lhi lhan aching jinge .
19010009	Sakei sachan bangin kisel’in Miho achanglhi le len , Tahlelte achang le len , Athanga a-o khah teng amanin akaimangjitai .
19010010	Panpaibei mi chu anoigep jin , Thahat changing avo-lhun ajamdenjitai .
19010011	Migilou chun , “ pathenin bon khohsah lou , amit singta , eimutaponte , ” ati .
19010012	O Pakai migiloute talen pen , Gentheite gelkhoh-in !
19010013	Migilouvin iti Pathen adonda a , “ Talen eimatsah ponte , ” ati thei ding ham ?
19010014	Ahinla nangin namu na , Gim gentheile thoh hahsa namelchih jingin ; Kithopi dinga kigosa jing nahi , Panpibei min nahinbel jin , Ngaicha geova um chu nakithopinai .
19010015	Migilou thilse bolte banjang vobongin , Abolkit louna diuvin thilse bolte talen pen .
19010016	Tonsot tonsot’a Pakai chu leng ahin , Doihoute chu agamsunga kona mangthah diu ahi .
19010017	O Pakai , mi lhasamte taona na-ngaiyin , Natilkhoujin nahatsah jie .
19010018	Bol gentheiya umte le chagate kagin na-ngai lhin , Mihemin asuh genthei kit louna diuvin athuu natan’e .
19011001	Kei-Pakaiya kisonga , I-atileh kajah a , “ Vacha bangin molsang lama leng touvin ,
19011002	Migilouten thalpi akamsal’un , Muthim laiya mipha ho kap din Thalchangin adoitauve .
19011003	Kulpi achimsoh teng Miphan ipi abol thei nah lai ding ahm ? ” natiu ham ?
19011004	Pakai ahouin thenga achengin , Van a laltouna akidoi . Muntin a mitin aven , Athilbol anatoh-u ahesoh keiye .
19011005	Pakaiyin midih le migilou akholtoh jin , Pumhat mang ho vang alungthimin ahoi .
19011006	Pakaiyin migiloute chunga Kat le meikou asun khum ding , huipi savevu chu adousah ding ahi .
19011007	Pakai chu adih-in thildih angailui ; Thildh bolte chu a-angsunga um jing diu ahi .
19012001	Neipanpiuvin Pakai , Pathen gingmi abeitan , mi kitah jong aumtapoi .
19012002	
19012003	Jouthu jengin akihouvun , Muh them kamthemin akilhemto touve .
19012004	O Pakai , muh them kamthema thusei ho sutangin , Sutangin kiletsah tah a thuseiya ,
19012005	“ Kamthema ideichan kisei thei , Inop nop kiseididng , kon rikham thei diu ham ? ” tiho hi .
19012006	Ahinla Pakaiyin , “ Ngaichat neiho nabol gentheiyuva , Nabolsetteu nasatah a aka jeh-un , Hung ing ting amaho hi lungmon kapeh ding ahi , ” ati .
19012007	Pakai thutep jouse tahsan thei ahin , Dangka kisou jolsel , meiphunga kiloidoh , Vel sagi jen kisoujol tobang ahi .
19012008	Muntin amigilou jeng aumin , mitinin thilse bou aseiphauve O Pakai neihoidam jingun , Hiche khang mitea kon hin neihong jingun .
19012009	Neihoidam jingun Pakai , Hitobang mitea kon hin neichingtup’uvin .
19013001	O Pakai , itih chan nei donda a , Ichan geiya vet louva neikoi ding ham ?
19013002	Itih chan genthei kathoh a , Ichan gei sun le jan a lung hesoh a ka-um ding ham ? Ichan geiya kamelmaten eikichepna diu ham ?
19013003	Neiven Pakai ka-Pathen , neihouvin , kamit hasah-in , neithisah hih laiyin .
19013004	Kamelmate chu , “ Kajoutauve , ” tisah dan , Kahamset hi amaho kithang-atna hisah hih-in .
19013005	Nalungset long louvin kaki-ngaiye , Neihuhhingna kipa pinge .
19013006	O Pakai , kadia naphat jal’in Navahchoi la sange .
19013007	
19014001	Mi-ngol’in alunga , “ Pathen aumpoi , ” atin ahi . Mihem jouse asesa ahiuin , Melse tah tah thil abol’un , Thildih bol’a khat cha aumpoi .
19014002	Van a koin Pakaiyin Cingtheiya Pathen hol’a um’am , Tin mihem chate ahinvei .
19014003	Mihemte lam dihlouva achesoh tan , Aphatmo nau akibang cheh-e . Thildih bol khat cha aumpon , Khat a khat cha jong aumpoi .
19014004	Pakaiyin , “ kamite bahgam get gut’a Thilse jeng bolte hin hetna aneilou mongu hiya , Kahenga jong hung tao louhel hiuvam ? ” ati .
19014005	Pathen ngailute vang Pathenin aumpin , thilse bolte hi kichat tijat’a mah thah diu ahi .
19014006	Thilse bolten mi nun nem thilgon dunoh jongle , Ama chu Pakaiya kisel jing ahinai .
19014007	Ohe Zion akona kon Israel ahuhhing ding ham ? Pakaiyin amite apuikhom tengleh Jacob dia iti kipa uma , Israel dia nun nop iti um ding hitam ?
19015001	Pakai , koiham nahouin a lut thei ? Koiham , nalhang theng Zion a Nangma houtheiya ?
19015002	Ijakaiya Pathen thu nit’a , Thildih bol jing jeng ; Thudih le thutah jeng seiji ,
19015003	Midang house louhel mi , Agol apaite alam louva bol lou , Aheng akom seise lou ,
19015004	Pathen isah loumi not thap theiya , Pakai gingte jabol jing , Itobanga hahsa hi jongleh Akitepna tuhcha a khel kit lou mi hiding ahi .
19015005	Amahin akan beiyin sum aphal jin , Themmonabeite hehnan nehguh akilahpoi . Koi hileh hitobanga chona thilbol mi chu Imachan asuh long louhel ding ahi .
19016001	Kahinbel’e Pathen , Neihoidamin !
19016002	Pakai koma , “ Ka-Pakai nahin , Thilpha kanei jouse nangin neipeh ahi , ” kati .
19016003	Pakai dia kitah mite apha thei lheh jengun , alah-uva jao ding kakipana pen ahi .
19016004	Doihouten gimna tampi akiboldoh-un , Akithoinauva pang pong ting , Adoiyu jong houpeh ponge .
19016005	Pakai , kagoulupen nang nahin , ka-ngaichat abonchan neipei ; Kakhonung thu jong nakhut’a aum’e .
19016006	Neithilpeh chengse akidang theiyin , Abonchan apha thei lheh jenge !
19016007	Eithumop jing Pakai kavahchoiyin , Jan teng jongle kalunggil’in eihil chah jinge .
19016008	Pakaiyin eiumpi jing kahen , Naicha aumjeh-in iman eisulong ponte .
19016009	Hijeh hin kakipah-in katha nom’e , Chule lung mongtah-in ka-um’e .
19016010	Thina thahat’a konin neichudoh tan , Na-ngailut mi chu noimigama nadalhapoi .
19016011	Hinna lampi neihil ding , Nei-umpi kakipah-in , a-itih , a din eilung lhaisah tai .
19017001	O Pakai , thudih lenna dia katao ngaiyin , Panpi ngaicha kakougin khohsah-in ! Lung thengsel’a kataona ngaiyin .
19017002	Thildih nahetjeh-in Them neichanin .
19017003	Kalungthim nahei . Janteng neihung vil jin , Neikholchil soh keiyin , kalung sunga thilse namudoh deh poi .
19017004	Midang bangin thuse ka seipon , Nathupeh kanit jingin , Hutot le pumhat kamangpoi .
19017005	Nalampi kajui jingin , kapampot kha hih laiye .
19017006	Neihouji kahen nahenga kataove Pathen ! Hung kihei kit’in kasei neingaipeh-in !
19017007	Nalungset kidangtah hinphongin neihuhhingun , Nakoma ka-um tengu kamelmateuva konin kahoidoh theiyui .
19017008	Namit chang bangin neihuh-in , Nalhaving noiya neisel’in ;
19017009	Migiloutea konin neihuhdoh-in . Mithat ngam melmaten eiumchah tauve ;
19017010	Khotona bei , kiletsah tah a thusei ahiuve .
19017011	Eiumchah kheh tauvin , kakiheina lam lama voh lhuh din eichanguve .
19017012	Sakei sachan bangin eichanguvin , Boteljeng din eigouve .
19017013	Hungin Pakai , kamelmate kadintepin , Akhup athal’in leh-in jouvin ! Nachemjam hemhat panin Migilotea konin neihuhdoh loiyin !
19017014	Vannoi leiset mihaotea konin neihuhhingin , Athoh diuva nagonsa gentheina chu achate diuvin jong thoh khop hihen , Atuteuvin jong hin thoh khopset’u hen !
19017015	Ken vang adih lou kabol pon , Namu tei nange ; Ka-ihmut khahlo teng , nei-umpi jing kipa pinge .
19018001	Vo Kahatna Pakai , Nangma ka-ngailui !
19018002	
19018003	Pakai chu eihoidam Kakulpi dettah bang ahi . Ka-Pathen chu eihoidam ahin , Eiumpi teng kalung monge . Keidin lungdal’in apang jin , Eihuh-in eihoidohjie .
19018004	Pakai kakouvin kamelmatea konin eihuhdoh-e . Vahchoiyun Pakai chu !
19018005	Thina khaovin eikanchalsoh tan , Manthahnan lui bangin eilonvuh tai .
19018006	Noimigam khaovin eihenchalsoh tan , Kamasanga thina thang akikamtai .
19018007	Kagenthei teng Pakaiya kataovin , Eipanpi din ka-Pathen kakouve . Ahouin a ka-ogin angaiyin , Kithopi din ka-kagin ajatai .
19018008	Leiset akilingin akihottai ; Molsang bulpi jouse akithingsoh tai . Ajeh chu Pathen lung hang ahi .
19018009	Pathen nahhoma meikhu akitungdoh-in , akamsunga konin mi leolih thei maikoule mei-am ahungdoh-e .
19018010	Vanthamjol aphetkeh-in , Meilhang jinglet lut chotphan ahungkumlhai !
19018011	Cherub chunga touvin hamvil’in alengin , Khopihui lhavingin mangin akilhohsah-e .
19018012	Meilhang thimlai akitomsah-in , Twi dimset meilhang thimket kut akitomsah-e .
19018013	Meilhang thimlaiya konin gel alhan , Meisi apah lah lah-in kol aphelah lah-e .
19018014	Pakaiyin vanthamjolpi akithinsah-in , Hatchungnungpen ogin thong akijai .
19018015	Thalpi chang akap’in amelmate adeljamsoh tai ; Kolphe vahlap lap’in alhan amelmate anojam’e .
19018016	O Pakai , namelmate naphoa , Lung hanga nahohsal tengleh ; Twikhanglen tochin geiyin akimun , Leiset bulpi jouse geiyin akimudoh-e .
19018017	Chunga konin Pakaiyin eisangin eituh-in , Lithuh laiya konin eikaidoh jie .
19018018	Kadoulel hel melma thahat tah , Hot le mah a eibol chengsea konin Pakaiyin eihuhdoh tai .
19018019	Kagenthei pet’a einokhum vangun , Pakaiyin eihoidam jingnai .
19018020	Kichat tijatnaa jong eipanpin , Eilung lhaijeh-in eihuhdoh tai .
19018021	Thildih kaboljeh-in Pakaiyin kipaman eipen , Themmonabei kahijeh-in phatthei eiboh-e .
19018022	Pakai Danthu kanit jingin , Pathena konin kakihei mang khapoi .
19018023	Adanthu kanitsoh keiyin , Athupeh kanit lou aumpoi .
19018024	Monabei kahiya , adihlou bol lou kahi Pakaiyin ahesoh keinai .
19018025	Thildih kaboljeh leh themmonabei kahijeh a Pakaiyin kipaman eipeh ahi .
19018026	O Pakai nadia kitahte hcunga nakitah-in , Achamkimte chunga nachamkimsoh-e .
19018027	Alung thengte din nalung thengin , Agiloute vang doumah-in nabol’e .
19018028	Mi nun nemho nahuhdoh jin , Kiletsahte vang nasuneove .
19018029	O Pakai , nangin thaomei neivah peh-in , Kavel’a muthim nasalvah soh tai .
19018030	Kamelmate nokhumna thei thaneipen , Akulpiu chop khup theina thahat neipei .
19018031	Hitobang Pathen , atoh jousea chamkimsoh ! Asei jouse ki-ngaina thei ! Ama belte dinga Lumdal apang ahi .
19018032	Pathen kiti chu Pakai bou ahin , Ikiselnau Songpi Pathen bou ahi .
19018033	Hiche Pathen hi eihetsah a , Kalampi suhong jing ahi .
19018034	Kakengto jong sakhi kengto abahsah-in , Molvuma dettah-in eidinsah theiye .
19018035	Kakhutte ni galbolje ahil’in , Kaban thahat’in sum-eng thalvhang kaheh kontheiye .
19018036	Pakai , neihuhhingin neihoidamtai ; Nabanjet’in neituh jingin , Nathahat chun neichoi-an’e .
19018037	Kachotna ding lampi jaotah-in nasemin Kakisap lhu khapoi .
19018038	Kamelmate kadeldel jengin kamanten , Kasuhgam kahsen kahai hih-e .
19018039	Kasat chap soh keiyin athou thei tapouve ; Ka-angsunga akijam’uvin akchotphai .
19018040	Galsatna ding thahat neipen , Kamelmate jona neipetai .
19018041	Kamelmate nadeljamin , Eihotbolte kasumangtai .
19018042	Kithopi ding akou vangun koiman ahuhdoh poi ; Pakai henga atao vangun adonbutpoi .
19018043	Kachilgoisel’in , hui lhoh mang thei Leivui kabahsah tai . Kholai dung bonlhoh bangin Kakengton kachil thang thange .
19018044	Pakai , doumah boltea konin neihuhdoh-in , Namtin vaipi chunga vaihomin neipansah tai ; Kahetphah louhel mite jong Kalhachan napansah-e !
19018045	Gamchom mite ka-angsunga akun’un , Kasei seiyin achon jengui .
19018046	Ameidoi soh tauvin , Akulpiuva konin kihotset sut’in ahung potdoh-ui .
19018047	Hing jing Pakai , kakiselna Songpi chu vahchoiyun ! Eihuhhing Pathen loupina phongjal leuvin !
19018048	Aman kamelmate eijosah tan , Kadougalte eijosah-in ,
19018049	Namtin kanoiya alutsah soh tai ! O Pakai , kamelmate neijosah tan , pumhat mitea konin neihoisamtai !
19018050	Namtin jalah a nachoi-an ing ting , Navahchoi la sang’e .
19018051	Lenga atun chu Pakaiyin minthangtah-in gal ajosah-in , Adeilhenpa chu anailu jing jenge ! Ddavid le ahilhahte tonsot’in angailui .
19019001	Van mun jousen Pathen loupina aphongin , Vanthamjol’in jong akhutsoh aseidoh-e !
19019002	
19019003	Tunin jing nikho aseipeh-in , Tujanin jingnilhah aseison peh-e .
19019004	Hetthei thucheng amansauva , Jah thei oginga apao lou vangun ;
19019005	Ahusau vannoiya akithangsoh tan , Leiset kolkimvel’a min ajasoh tai . Vanthamjol’a Pathenin nichang din ponbuh asonpeh-in ,
19019006	Jingkah teng jinei thah pa kipah tah bangle Kilhaitetnaa pang dingpa bangin ahung soh dohjie .
19019007	Vanmong lang khat’a pat Van mong lang khat ajon’e . Nisa satnaa hin thil akisel thei aumpoi . Pakai Danthu
19019008	Pakai Danthu hi achamkimsoh-in , Tha akidosah jie . Pakai thupeh ho hi tahsan lomtah ahin , Lungthimbeite achihsah jie .
19019009	Pakai Danthu chengse adih cheh-in , Hicheng nit jing hin nom asauve . Pakai thupeh chengse akicheh-in , Lungthim sunga hettheina apetheiye .
19019010	Pakai hou hi thilphapen ahin , Beitih anei louhel ding ahi . Pakai thutan jouse adih cheh-in , Itih-in jong aphasoh keiye .
19019011	Sanathengsel sanga dei umjo ahin , Khoiju thengsel sanga lhumjo ahi .
19019012	Hiche ho hin nasoh keima ima eihetsah jin , Kanit jeh hin kipaman kasang’e .
19019013	Koiman ama themmona akihetdoh loujeh-in , Kathemmona kisel chengsea konin neisil thengin Pakai !
19019014	Hettoh lou chonset chengsea konin neihoidoh-in , Hiche ho chu neijotho sahdan ! Chuteng chonset thilsea ongthol ing ting kachamkimsoh ding ahi .
19019015	Kasei ding chengse le kalunggel jouse hi Nang din santhei hihen , O Pakai , Kasongpi le Eilhandampu !
19020001	Nagenthei nin Pakaiyin nalhamon hen , Jacob Pathenin nahoidam jing hen !
19020002	
19020003	Amunthenga konin panpi hinsolpeh hen , Zion lhanga konin nahu ding hinsol hen !
19020004	Nathilto chengse sanpeh hen , Nakilhaina chengsea lung lhai hen !
19020005	Pakaiyin nadeichan napehen , Nathilgon jouse lolhinsah hen !
19020006	Chuteng keihon nagaljo kipa piuving ting , Pathen vahchoiya naminthan kalop diu ahi . Nathum na-ngeh jouse Pakaiyin nape bukimsoh hen !
19020007	Pakaiyin alhentum lengpa gal ajosah kahen , Avan munthenga konin ahouvin , Minthangtah a galjona ding Thahat nasatah tah apei .
19020008	Mi kon khat’in galsatna kangtalai ho akisonpin , Abangin asakolteu akisonpiuve ; Keiho vang Pakai Ka-Pathenu thahat’a kisong kahiuve .
19020009	Thilmanchah a kisongte kipal’uva lhu lham diu , Keiho vang kipatdoh ung ting kadin jang diu ahi .
19020010	O Pakai , kalengpau gal josah-in , Kakou tengu neihouvun !
19021001	O Pakai , nahatsah jeh-in Lengpa akipah-in ; Gal najosah jeh-in atha nom’e .
19021002	
19021003	Ataona nasangin , Alungdei napetai .
19021004	Phattheina tampi nahinpon , Sana lallkhuh nakhuhpeh tai .
19021005	Lengpan hintheina athumin , Nangman napetai , tonsot tonsot’a hinna !
19021006	Napanpi jal’in aloupi lheh jengin , Leng loupe minthangin nalhai .
19021007	Tonsot’in naphatthei boh achangin , Naumpi jing akipapi lheh jenge .
19021008	Lengpan Hatchungnung Pakai atahsanin , Pakai lungset longlou jal’in phatseh-in along monge .
19021009	Amelmate lengpan mankhom-in tin , Ahoa pang jouse amatsoh idng ahi .
19021010	Ahung kilah teng Meisi kijep cheh banga ajep cheh ding ahi . Pakaiyin lung hanga abahgam diu , Meiyin ahalvamsoh diu ahi .
19021011	Lengpan athagama Achi abo’u kiholmo hel didng ahi .
19021012	Akihoutoh-un lengpa douna asem’un , Ahivanga ajodeh lou du ahi .
19021013	Lengpan ajalah-u thalpia akap’a , Anocheh a adeljamsoh diu ahi .
19021014	Nahat jal’in kavahchoiyui Pakai , Nathahat vahchoiya lakasah diu ahi .
19022001	Ka-Pathen , ka-Pathen ! I-bol’a neidalhah hitam ? Napanpi ngaichan kasam sam jengin , Neipanpi deh hih hel’e !
19022002	
19022003	Ka-Pathen , sunlaiyin kakouvin Neidonbut deh poi ; Jan khovah-in kakouvin , Olnaneipe deh poi !
19022004	Hijongle Nangma nathengin , Laltouna natouvin Israelten navahchoiye .
19022005	Kapu kapateuvin naki-ngai nauvin , Nakisonpi jeh-un nahuhhingtai .
19022006	Nahenga ataovun ahoidoh jiuvin , Nakisonpi jeh-un alungthoi khapouve .
19022007	Keivang mihem tobang kahitapoi , Lungtol bep kahitai . Kidah lenotthap’in kaumin , Mitinin eihouse se jengui .
19022008	Eimupha chanin eidaithangun , Lei eilhah khumun , lu eithin khum’ui .
19022009	“ Pakaiya kisong nahine , Iti Aman nahuhhing lou ham ? Pakai dei nahileh Idia napanpi da hitam ? ” atiuve .
19022010	Pakai , damsel’in neipensah-in , kasenlaiyin jongkanu noitwiyin neivah jinge .
19022011	Kapen a pat kisonna kanei , Ka-Pathen nahi jinge .
19022012	Genthei anaiye neidalha hih-in , Eipanpi ding aumpoi !
19022013	Basan phaiya bongchal hattah ho bangin , Kamelmaten eiumkimsoh tauve .
19022014	Sakeiyin asatha akisenpia abotel bangin , Kam homlet lut’in eikisen khumtauve .
19022015	Twi kisung lha bangin katha alhasamin , Kagu kachang alhoiyin , kalungthim khoiluijol abange .
19022016	Thi dia leivui lah a neidalhah jeh-in , Kalolbuh nelgo abangin , kadanga kalei abeh dentai .
19022017	Uihon bangin thilse bol hon eiumkimsoh tan , Kakhut le kakengphang . asunchen chentauve .
19022018	Kagu kachang adohsoh tan , Nehgam ding bangin kamelmaten eive changmel mol’ui .
19022019	Kaponsil chang ding vang asan’un , kavon chengse akihomtauve .
19022020	Neidalha loujen O Pakai , Neihuhdoh louyin !
19022021	Chemjam masanga neihuhhingin , Ui tobang hoa konin neihuhhingin .
19022022	Sakeite tobang hoa konin neihuhdoh-in , bongchal hang ho tobangte masanga kapang joupoi .
19022023	Nathilbol kamite seipeh ing ting , Akhoppiuva navahchoila sange !
19022024	“ Pakai lhachaten Ama vahchoiyun , Jacob chilhahten choi-an’uvin ! Israel miten Pakai chibai boh cheh-un !
19022025	Pakaiyin vaicha gentheite Donlou le kidah-in aneipon ; Ahenga atao chan’un ahouvin , Akiheimang den khapoi . ”
19022026	Pakai , nathilbol chengse jeh-in , Houbung khoppia vahchoiyinge Nahou dia kikhomho angsunga Katepsa kilhaina chengse penge .
19022027	Vaichaten aduchan aneh diu , Aheng hinjon jousen Pakai avahchoi diu ahi . Alungthimu khangtou jing hen !
19022028	Chitin namtinin Pakai ageldoh-uva , Leiset kolkimvel’a Pakai henga ahinjot diu , Namtinin Pakai chu achibai aboh diu ahi .
19022029	Pakai hi leng achangtan , Namtin chunga vai ahom’e !
19022030	Mi kilsetsahte Pakai angsunga kun a , Thi theimihem jouse angsunga kun cheh diu ahi .
19022031	Khang nununga miten Pakai kin abol’uva , Khang masan khang nukhah jah a Pakai thu asei diu ahi .
19022032	Apeng loulai ho geiya “ Pakaiyin amite ahuhhingtai , ” ti kiseipeh diu ahi .
19023001	Pakai chu kelngoi chin a Eichingpa ahin , Keima lhasam ponge ;
19023002	Aman hamhing dum lah lah a kelngoi kol’in Eikolsah jin , Kiling louva twi veina pang dunga eipui lei .
19023003	Pakaiyin katha akidosah kit’in , Akitepsa bangin lamdih jenga eipuiye .
19023004	Thina phaicham jinglah jotpa jong leng Neilhonpi jeh-in Ima kaging tapoi , Pakai Natenggol’in neihong in , namoljol’in neilha mon nai .
19023005	Kamelmate masang jenga jong , Kaneh ding dokanga neiluipeh-in ; Kalua thao neinu peh-in , Kadon ding khon alet lhai .
19023006	Phatna le hepi nan Kahinkho lhumkeiyin eijuiyin tin , Kahin kumkhoa Pakai in a kachen den ding ahi .
19024001	Vannoi leiset le asunga um thil jouse Pakaiya ahin , Leiset le achung chengte Abonchauva Pakaiya ahi .
19024002	Pakaiyin twipi lailunga leiset asemdoh a , Twikhanglen chunga atundoh ahi .
19024003	Pakai lhangvuma kalthei koi hiya , Ahouin thenga lut thei koiham ?
19024004	Thilse bol lou , milung theng , Doi houlou , jouthua kitep lou mi ahi .
19024005	Amaho hi Pakaiyin phatthei boh-in tin Ahuhhing diu ; Themmonabei ahinau Pathenin phongdoh inte .
19024006	Hitobang mi chu Pathen henga hunguva , Jacob Pathen angsunga lut diu ahi .
19024007	Vo kotpi , nang ho kihong len’un , Kotpilui cheng kihongun ; Loupi leng hung lutna din !
19024008	Hiche Leng loupe hi koi ham ? Pakai Hatchungnung , Galjousoh Pakai ahi !
19024009	Vo kotpi , nang ho kihong ken’un , Kotpilui cheng kihongun ; Loupi Leng hung lutna din !
19024010	Hiche Leng loupe hikoiham ? Galjousoh Pakai , Ama leng loupe ahi !
19025001	O Pakai nahenga kataove !
19025002	Nachunga ki-ngai kahi ka-Pathen , Neijumso dan , kamelmate kipasah hih-in !
19025003	Nanga kisongten ima alel khapon , Nadoumah bolloi minbou aleljie .
19025004	O Pakai , nalampi neihil’in , Abonchan neihetsah soh-in !
19025005	Ka-Pathen nahin , neihuhhinge ; Nadih ddudngjuiya hinje neihil’in , Nanga ki-ngaijingkahi .
19025006	O Pakai , akhang khanga naphondohsa Namikhoto le nalungset long lou geldoh jingin !
19025007	Khangdon lai kachonset ho le katoh khel ho Nei-ngaidam tan . Lungset long lou le naphatna jal’in Neigeldoh jingin Pakai !
19025008	Pakai adih a aphat jeh-in Chonsete achena diu lampi ahil’e .
19025009	Mi nun nemte lamdoh a a puiyin , Alungdei ahiljie .
19025010	Lungsetnan kitah tah-in apuiyin , Akitepna le athupeh nit ho apuiye .
19025011	Pakai , nakitepna nit’in , Neingaidamin kachonset atam behseh tai .
19025012	Pakai thu nit hon amaa kona Achena diu lampi akiholdoh diu ahi .
19025013	Hitobang miho hikhagntou diu , Achateuvin gamsung ahinlo diu ahi .
19025014	Pakai chu athu ngaite jol ahin , Amaho din akitepna asudet jie .
19025015	Phat tinin panpi ngaichan Pakai kaven , Aman tijat kichatna eihuhdohjie .
19025016	Hung kiheiyin neikhoton Pakai , kachangin lhasam tah-in ka-ume !
19025017	Kalung gimna cheng subeiyin , Kagentheina chengsea konin neihuhhing !
19025018	Gentheiya kalunghemna neigel peh-in , kachonset jouse ngaidamin !
19025019	Kamelma ijat pham , vetemin ! Vetan itobang loma eihot’u hitam !
19025020	Neihongin neihuhhingin , Hoidohna din kahinjon’e . neijumsah dan .
19025021	Nang kisonna kanei ahin , Kaphatna le kakitahnan eidamsah hen !
19025022	O Pakai namite Israel khu Agentheina chengseuva konin huhhingin !
19026001	Nanga kisonga thildih bol kahi , O Pakai them neichanin !
19026002	Neikholtoh-in neipatep’in Pakai , kadei le kagel chengse photoh-in !
19026003	Nalungset long louvin eipui jinge , Nakitahnan eilamkai jing ahi .
19026004	Phatchomna bei mito kakiloipon , Miphalhemho toh kakivoppoi .
19026005	Mi phalouto kakiloi nompon , Migilou kapeldoh jinge .
19026006	Monabei kahi tin khut kasop’in , Katao teng namaicham kaveljie .
19026007	Thangvah la kasan , Nathilbol kidang chengse kaseiphonge .
19026008	O Pakai , naloupina ngahmun , Nachenna In chu ka-ngaiye !
19026009	Chonsete tih neisuhmang tha dan , Tol thatte toh neitha thadan !
19026010	Thilse bol jingte , Nehguh kilah jing jengte toh .
19026011	Kenvang thildih kabol’e , Neikhoton neihuhhingin !
19026012	Tijatna jousea kaoidoh-in , Amite khoppi lailunga Pakai kavahchoiye .
19027001	Pakai hi kameivah le eihuhhing ahin , Imacha kagingpoi . Tijatna chengsea Pakaiyin eihoidoh tai , Kicha kit taponge .
19027002	Migilouten einokhum’a eithagot vangun , Akipal’uvin alhutauve .
19027003	Sepai hon khat’in eium’u jongleh Kicha deh ponge . Melmaten eidel khum jongle Pathena ki-ngai jing nange .
19027004	Pakaiya thil khatseh ka-ngeh-in , Hiche thilkhat kadei chu : Kahinkhoa a-Houin a chen ding , Aphatna kidangsa a , ama kipuisah ding ahi .
19027005	Hahsat teng Aman eisel’in tin , Ahouin sunga mongtah a eikoiya , Songpi chunga eikhandoh ding ahi .
19027006	Hitia hi kavel’a um kamelmate kajoa , Ahouin sunga kipa otongin kilhaiying ting , Pakai vahchoi la sange .
19027007	Kakouna ngaiyin Pakai ! Khoto tah-in neihouvin !
19027008	Kalungthima , “ Hungun neihouvun , ” nati teng ,
19027009	“ Pakai kahunge , kisel hih-in , ” katijie . Neilung hand an , Neidel mang hih-in nalhacha . Eipanpi Nang nahin , Neidalhan neidonda hih-in , O Pathen Eihuhhhingpa !
19027010	Kanu le kapan eidalha jongleh Pakaiyin eiching nante .
19027011	Nalampi neihil’in Pakai , Kamelma atame , lampheiya neipuiyin !
19027012	Jouthua eihutot midel khum , Kamelmate kichepna din neidalha hih-in !
19027013	Mihing gansunga Pakai phatna kamuding kahei !
19027014	Pakaiya ki-ngaiyin , Tahsanin , lung lha hih-in , Ahi , Pakaiya ki-ngaiyin !
19028001	O Eipanpia Pakai kahung taove Ngaiyin kataona ! Neihouda leh Noimigam jonte toh kajotsuh ding kahitai .
19028002	Panpi ngaicha nahenga kataova , Nahouin Theng lam kasan teng ,
19028003	Thilse bol migiloute , Kamthem , lungthima hotna jeng dimte Amaho chutoh themmo neichantha dan !
19028004	Thilse bolte chu Abolset jeh-un talen pen . Athilse boljeh-un talen matsah-in , Achandiu dol chansah jengin !
19028005	Pakai natoh iman agelpouvin , Athilsem jong ima asah pouve ; Pakaiyin talen amatsah a Asuhmang hel ding ahi .
19028006	Panpi ngaiya kataona eihoutai , Vahchoiyun Pakai !
19028007	Pakaiyin eipanpin eihoidamtai , Ken Ama katahsan’e . Pakaiyin eipanpin eikipasah-e , Kipah thanomin Ama kavahchoiye !
19028008	Pakaiyin amite ahoidamin , Alhentum lengpa apanpin ahuhhinge !
19028009	Pakai namite huhhingin ! Namite phattheiboh-in ! Kelngaoi chinbangin chingin , Lha louvin ching jingin !
19029001	Van miten Pakai vahchoiyun , Athahat loupina vahchoiyun !
19029002	Pakai min loupe vahchoiyun , Ahung kilah teng Athengpa anga boh khup’uvin !
19029003	Twipi chunga Pakai ogin akijan , Loupi Pathenin van athingin , Twikhanglen chunga a-ogin akithonge .
19029004	Thaneitah le loup tah-in Pakai ogin akijai .
19029005	Pakai ogin husan ceder thing ho alhun , Lebanon lhang ceder thing geiyin alhutai .
19029006	Pakaiyin Lebanon lhang bongnou chom abahsah-in , Hermon lhang bongchalnou kinunkho abahsah-e .
19029007	Pakai ogin husan Kol aphetsah-e .
19029008	Pakai oginin nelgam ahot lhingin , Kadesh nelgam akilingsoh hel’e .
19029009	Pakai oginin gangpi thing jouse athingsoh-in , Athingna jouse amut lhasoh tan , Houin sunga um hon , “ Pathen loupe hen , ” tin asam’ui .
19029010	Twipi chunga Pakaiyin vai ahomin , Tonsot’in leng achangtai !
19029011	Pakaiyin amite ahatsah-in , Phatthei aboh-in along mongui .
19030001	Neihuhhinga kamelmate neikichepna sah loujeh-in Nangma kavahchoiye Pakai !
19030002	
19030003	O Pakai ka-Pathen , neipanpi din kataovin , Nangin neidamsah tai !
19030004	Moimigama neisol tapon , Thikhul’a lut kon kahitan , Nangin neihinsah kit tai !
19030005	Pakai vahchoi la sauvin Amithengte jousen ! Amithengpa thilbol gel jingun , Ama thangvah jinguvin !
19030006	Alunghan phat chomcha bou , Aphatna hinkho lhumkeiya ahi . Kana jamkhat kal hilou , Kipana jing nikho asohjitai !
19030007	Lung mongtah-in ka-umin , “ Iman eijouponte , ” kati .
19030008	Keidin naphai Pakai , Molsang bangin kadin kulpi nahi . Kadia nakiselmang teng Kakichan katijai !
19030009	Kahin kouve Pakai , Napanpi ka-ngaiye !
19030010	“ Thi leng nangdia i-phachom a ? Thilkhul lut leng i-nakan em ? Mithin navahchoiya ? Nakitahje aphonjal thei diu ham ?
19030011	Neihouvin Pakai , neikhoton ! Neipanpin O Pakai ! ” kati .
19030012	Kagimna kon kipah-in neilamsah tan , Kagimna ponsil khel’in kipana neidip tai !
19030013	Hijeh chun umthim louvin Navahchoi la sange . Pakai , nangma ka-Pathen nahin , Itih-in thangvah tange !
19031001	Neihoidam din kahinjon’e Pakai ! Neijumso lou jen-o ! O Pathen dihtah , Kataove , neihuhhingin
19031002	
19031003	Neihouvin , neihuhhing tun ! Kakiselna songpi kahoidamna hin , Eihongin neihuhhingin !
19031004	Kakiselna kulpi nahi , Nikitep bangin neipuiyin neilamkaiyin .
19031005	Min thang eikampehnaa nei-osah dan , Kichatnaa neisel’in !
19031006	Kahinkho nakhut’a kapei , Neihuhhing din , O Pakai ! Kitah jing Pathen !
19031007	Doihou ho nahon , Kenvang nang katahsan’e .
19031008	Nalungset long loujeh-in Kipah thanom ing’e . Kathohna namusoh tan , Kagimna nahesoh tai .
19031009	Kamelmate neimatsah pon , Jalentah-in kanopna chana neichesah tai .
19031010	Kagentheiye , Neikhoton Pakai ! Kaka kanan kamit chopai ding ahitan , Abeipai ding kon kahitai !
19031011	Genthei lih pai ding kahitan , Kap lih didng kahitai ! Hesoh-in kacholtan , Kagu kachang alhoisoh tai !
19031012	Kamelma , kaheng kakom chengin Noise tah-in eiboltauve ; Eihesa hon eiginguvin , Kholai dunga eimutengu ajamji tauve .
19031013	Athisa bangin eisumil’uvin , Leibel keh pai mangsa kabange .
19031014	Melmate kihou lhih , Kavel’a tijatna jeng kajai . Kei dounan thil agongun , Tha din eigouve .
19031015	Nanga ki-ngai kahi Pakai , O Nang ka-Pathen !
19031016	Nakhut’a um jing kahi , Kamelma , eibolsetea konin neihuhdoh-in !
19031017	Khoton neiven nalhachapa , Nalungset long louvin neihuhhingin !
19031018	Pakai tin kakouve , Neivetda loujen-o ! Migilou vetda chang hen , thildel’in noimigam jonsuh-u hen !
19031019	Jousei , kiletsah , kithang-at Midihte noisea thusei jouse phoh tangin .

19031021	Min asuhsetna dia jong Naumpin mongsel’in nakoiye ; Amelmateuvin aphin loh louna din Kiselna phalaiya nasel jinge .

19031023	Pakaiyin akoma kona eidelmang ham , tin Kakicha lheh jengin ; Eipanpi dia kataoteng , Aman eihou jing nai !
19031024	Pakai ngailu’vin amitheng jousen , Pakaiyin mi kitah ahoidamin , Aumchan dungjuiyin kiletsahte Talen amatsah jie .
19031025	Pakaiya kinem jouse Het’uvin hanguvin !
19032001	Achonset chengse ki-ngaidama Asuhkhel jouse kichulnam mi chu anun nom’e !
19032002	Lepche lou , Pakaiyin mo achan lou Mi chu anun nom ahi .
19032003	Kachonset kaphondoh lout eng , Genthei thoh-in kapeng nilhum lhumjie .
19032004	Sun le janin talen neimatsah-e Pakai , Nipi lai nisan daitwi akahgot bangin katha abeitai .
19032005	Pakai , nahenga kachonset kaphon teng , Kasuhkhel jouse ka-imjipoi . Aboncha phondoh kadeiyin , Kachonset chengse nei-ngaidamtai .
19032006	Nigingte ngaichat chanin nahenga taohen , Gentheina twipi kinong bang jongleh Amaho hinpha ponte .
19032007	Kakiselna nahi , Gentheina konin neihuhhingin ! Neihoisamjeh-in Nahuhhhingna othongin lan sange .
19032008	Pakaiyin , “ Nachena ding lampi hil ing ting , Kathumop a kahilchah ding nahi .
19032009	Sakol ham sakolpol ham bangin ngol hih-in , tuhngoina dia kamdal kibupeh bang khun ! ” eiti .
19032010	Migilouvin genthei athoh-in , Pakaiya ki-ngaite vang lungset’in ahoidam’e .
19032011	Vo them change , Kipah thanom’uvin ! Pakai thu ngaite , Kipa la sauvin !
19033001	Vo themchangte Pakaiya kipah-un , Athua nung jousen vahchoiyun !
19033002	Semjang saiyin Pakai thangvah-un , Tumgingto thon Ama vahchoiyun !
19033003	Semjang ngeitah saiyin , othongin , Akoma kipa Lathah sauvin !
19033004	Pakai thusei atah cheh-in , Anatoh nganse thei cheh ahi .
19033005	Pakaiyin adih le atah adeiyin , Alungset longlou leiset adim’e !
19033006	Pakai kamchengin van mun chengse akisemin , Athuseiyin Ni , Lha , Ahsite akisemdoh-e .
19033007	Twipi lai munkhat’a aveikhomsah-in , Twikhanglen lithuh lai jouse akhol khom’e .
19033008	Leiset pumpin Pakai gingun , Vannoi miten Pakai jabol’un !
19033009	Pakai thuseiya konin vannoi akisemdoh-in , Athupeh akonin thil ijakai aumdoh tai .
19033010	Namtin vaipi lunggel Pakaiyin asunoh-in , Athilgonu toh doh louna din asutange .
19033011	Pakai thilgon vang tonsot’a um jing Angaito aboncha beitih neilou ahi .
19033012	A-Pathenu Pakai hikha nam mite Anun nom’ui ; Pakaiyin amite dia alhendoh mite Anun nom’uve !
19033013	Vana konin Pakaiyin ahinven , Mitin mitang amusoh keiye .
19033014	Alaltouna phunga konin ahinven , Leiset’a chengte amusoh-e .
19033015	Mihem lungthim Sempa ahijeh-in Athilbol jouseu jong ahesoh-e .
19033016	Asepaite hat jal’in lengpan gal ajoupon , Hat vangin sepaiyin gal ajoudeh poi .
19033017	Jo na dia sakolte jong pannabei , Athahat’un huhhing pouvinte .
19033018	Pakaiyin athu nitte aching jingin , Alungset long louva ki-ngaite akivettup jinge .
19033019	Amaho hi thinaa jong ahuhdoh jin , Kel le chah a jong ahinsoi .
19033020	Keiho Pakaiya kinem kahiuvin , Eipanpiuva eihoidamu Amabou ahi .
19033021	Pakai al’in kakipah-un , Amintheng katahsan’ui .
19033022	Pakai , Nanga kinem kahiuve , Nalungset long louvin eiumpi jingun !
19034001	Pakai thangvah jing ing ting , Avahchoi la sachim ponge .
19034002	
19034003	Eikhoto jal’in Pakai vahchoiyinge , Bolganthei thoh ten ngaiyun kipah-uvin !
19034004	Pakai loupe phongja’u hitin , Amin choi-an’u hite !
19034005	Pakai kahol len Aman eihoutai , Kagin jousea konin eihuh tai .
19034006	Lengvai gentheiten ven akipah-un , Lungthoi kit louhel diu ahi .
19034007	Panpi beite ataovun Aman ahoutai , Agimna chengseuva anopsah tai .
19034008	Pakai thunitte chu Avantil a-ngasah-in , Kichatna tijatnaa kon ahuhdoh-e .
19034009	Pakai phatje kholtoh-in , Akoma hoidamte chu anun nom’ui .
19034010	Amithengten Pakai thu ngaiyun , Ama thu ngaiten adei chan amui .
19034011	Sakeiten jong an mulouvin kel athoh-un , Pakai thu ngaite vang thilpha alhasam khapoi .
19034012	Hung ngaiyun chate , Pakai ginje nahil’unge !
19034013	Hin noma hin ding nadeiya , Hin nomsel’a the thiding nadeileh ,
19034014	Thuse sei dan lang , Tuhjou seisan .
19034015	Thilse dalhan thilpha bol’in , Nalungthim pumpin chamna hol’in !

19035001	Einel’a chu nel’in lang , Eidouva chu kidoupin Pakai !
19035002	Nalum le napho kengin Neihung huhdoh loiyin !
19035003	Nateng lung leh-in Eihindelte khu khon ! neihuhhing din seiyin !
19035004	Tha dia eigo chengse chu Noinunin lang jumson ! Kathina ding ngaito ho chu Nungjam hen kisulongu hen !
19035005	Pakaiya kon Vantil’in deljam hen , Khohuiya changse kithe bangu hen !
19035006	Alampiu muthim hen nal hen , Pakaiya kon Vantil’in del jing jengu hen !
19035007	Ajeh beiyin thang eikampeh-un , Kalhan lutna din khuh alaiyui .
19035008	Hinla ahet lou kah-uva manthahnan aphah diu , Athangkam’uva oh didu , manthahna chu diu ahi .
19035009	Chuteng Pakai jal’in kipah ing ting , Eihuhhing jeh-in nomsange !
19035010	Kalunggil’in Pakaiyah , “ Vo Pakai Nang banga , Mi huhaman kona tahlel chulha aumpoi , ” tinge , Abolsetea kona tahlel chulha aumpoi , ” tinge .
19035011	Migilouten eidounan thu aseiyun , Kahet phah lou thilse ei-ngoh-ui .
19035012	Thilpha jeng jong thilsen eithuh-un , Kadatmo behseh jenge !
19035013	Adammo tengu lungkhama khaodip pon sil’a , Adamna diuvin an ka-ngol jin ; kunin kataopeh peh jie .
19035014	Kasopi le kagol ngaitah banga taopeh a , Nu pul dou banga Kaikua vah le le jia kahi .
19035015	Kei genthei phat’in akipah jo’uvin , Kavel’a akikhom’uvin eidai thangun ; Hetphah louhel mijengin Eideng deng jenguve .
19035016	Elbai nuisat bangin einuisat’un , Mitt hip tenin ha eigel khum’uve .
19035017	Pakai itih chan namohvet ding ham ? Sakei tobangtea konin neihuhdoh-in , Neihuh hing loiyin !
19035018	Chuteng Houbung kikhopnaa thangvah ing ting , Amasanguva Nangma vahchoi tange !
19035019	Kamelma , jouseiho khu Kalelna chunga kipasah dan ; Ajeh beiya eihote khu Kachunga kipa thanopsah hih hel’in !
19035020	Odamin thu aseipouvin , Cham deite chunga jouthu jeng asemthu’ve .
19035021	Akambem bemin eisam’un , “ Chi , nathilse bol kamutauve ! ” atiuve .
19035022	Pakai , Nangin hiche hi namutan , Otdoh dsn , umthimdan Pakai !
19035023	O Pakai , kipat’in neihung hun , Ka-Pathen keidin hung pangin !
19035024	O Pakai dih , Nangin them neichanin , Kamelmate kachunga kipasah dan !
19035025	“ Idei bangun ama khu isumangtauve , ” tin Kachunga kipasah hih hel’in !
19035026	Kagenthei jal’a kipah thanomte hi Lel’u hen kijumso cheh-u hen , Kasanga phajoa kigel ho chu Jum le ja thoh-in umu hen !

19036001	Setnan migilou lunggil’a thu aseiyin , Hijeh chun Pathen adondan ajabolpoi .
19036002	
19036003	Ama akigel sang val tan , Asetna Pathenin mudoh louva them chang din akigel’e .
19036004	Thuse aseiyin , jou jeng ahi , chihna le thilpha abolpoi .
19036005	Alupna jalkhun jenga jong thilse agon , Thilpha ima bol louvin , thilse jeng abol’e .
19036006	Pakai , nalungset longlou vana akilhungdoh-in , nakitahnan vanthamjol aphai !
19036007	Nadihna molsang bangin akikhangin , Nathutandih Twikhanglen thuh abange Sa le mihem nakhohsah gel’e .

19036009	Neipeh-u an nengtah-in kaneuvin Naphatna twidonin don’uvinge !
19036010	Hinna twinah phung nahin , Navah-in khovah kamu’ve !

19037001	Migiloute jeh-in lungkhamdan , Thil dihlou bolte jong thangset dan ,
19037002	Amaho hampa banging op lhan tin , Hamhing banga gop’a thi loi diu ahi .
19037003	Pakaiya ki-ngaiyin thilpha bol’in , Lung mongin gamsunga chengin .
19037004	Pakaiya kipah thanomin , Aman nalunga nadei chan napeh ding ahi .
19037005	Pakaiya kipen , Ama tahsanin Napanpi ding ahi .
19037006	Pakaiyin nadihna khovah abahsah a Sunlai nisa abahsah ding ahi .
19037007	Thoh hat’in Pakai natoh ngah jingin , Mihao lungkhampi dan , Thilse bol’a lolhing ho jong Lungkhampi hih-in .
19037008	Lungkham lunghan boldan , Gentheina bou nalhut ding ahi .
19037009	Pakaiya ki-ngaiten gamsung alo diu , Migiloute vang kideldoh diu ahi .
19037010	Migiloute beiloi ding , Hol jongle chun mupon nate .
19037011	Mi nun nemin gamsung lontin , Haotah le mongtah a um diu ahi .
19037012	Migilouvin mipha adouvin , Vetdan ha agel khum khum’e .
19037013	Hinla abeivah diu ahetjeh-in , Pakaiyin migiloute anuisat’e .
19037014	Tahlel vaichate , thildih bolte thana din Migilouten chemjam satdoh-in thalpi akamsal’ui .
19037015	Achemjam’uva amaho thi diu , Athalpiuvin amaho akap lih ding ahi .
19037016	Miphan themcha anei chu Migiloute gou sangin aphajoi .
19037017	Pakaiyin migiloute thahat asuhbei ding , Midihte apanpi ding ahi .
19037018	Pakaiyin athu nitte agel khoh-in , Gamsunga tonsot’a cheng diu ahi .
19037019	Phat phatmo teng jongle genthei lou diu , Kel lha jongle nehkhop anei diu ahi .
19037020	Migiloute vang mangthah diu , Pakai melmate pahcha banga pul’a Meikhu banga leng mang diu ahi .
19037021	Migilouvin bat din alan alesah kitpon , Miphan vang hongphal’in thil ahom jinge .
19037022	Pakai vangboh changten gamsung alo diu , Agaosapte kidel doh diu ahi .
19037023	Mi achena lampia Pakaiyin apuiyin , Alung lhainate ahoiddam jinge .
19037024	Kiseplhuu jongle kijamden lou diu , Pakaiyin aphoh ding diu ahinai .
19037025	Tun katehtan , kahing sot lheh tan , Mipha Pakaiyin adonda jong kamu khapon , Achaten jong khutdonneh ahol ngaipoi .
19037026	Miphan manbeiyin thil ahom jingin , Bat din jong ahom thouve ; Achate jong vangbohna ahiuve .
19037027	Thilse jamsanin thilpha bol’in , Chutile nachate gamsunga cheng jing diu ahi .
19037028	Ajeh chu Pakaiyin thildih angailun , Amithengte adalha khapoi . A-itih-in ahoidam jingin , Migilou chate vang adelmang ding ahi ,
19037029	Midihten gamsung alo’uva , Achenpha jing diu ahi .
19037030	Miphan chihhoi thu aseiyin , Itih-in jong akampha jinge .
19037031	Alungthima a-Pathen Danthu aching jingin , Anitda ngaipoi .
19037032	Migilouvin mipha aching lhin , Tha din agojie .
19037033	Hinla Pakaiyin midih chu Migilou kichepnan aneisah pon , Patepna achuh khah tah jongle Themmo achansah ngaipoi .
19037034	Pakaiya kinemin athupeh chengse nit’in , Aman lungset’a gamsunga nachensah ding , Migiloute kideljam namu ding ahi .
19037035	Thoh lel aum migilou khat kahen , Lebanon a Cedar thing bangin mi chungvum a akikhang sange .
19037036	Chomkhat jouva kajotpa leh aumtapon , Kahol vangin kamudoh joupoi .
19037037	Mipha melchih-in , midih ching jingin ; Cham dei min son le pah aneiyin ,
19037038	Chonset vang asu amangun , Ason apah-u jong asubeihel tauve .
19037039	Midihte Pakaiyin ahuhhingin , Gentheipet jongle ahoidam’e .
19037040	Apanpin ahuhdoh-in , Akom abeljeh-un migiloutea konin ahuhhinge .
19038001	O Pakai , nalunghan teng Neibolgim hih-in !
19038002	
19038003	Nathalpichangin neikap khan , Neikap lhutai !
19038004	Neilunghan jeh-in hatah-in kanan , Kachonset ho jeh-in katahsa aveisei .
19038005	Kachonsetnan eilonvuh tan , pohgih hahsa tah-in akneiye .
19038006	Ka-ngol behseh jeh-in Katina anaikolsoh-in akomsoh tai !
19038007	Kakaiku ku jengin kijel lhop pai ding kahitan , Nilhum lhumin lunghem kathoh-e .
19038008	Khosih-in kanan Thipai ding kon kahitai !
19038009	Beipaiya kijel lhop pai ding kahitan , Nat thoh lel’in kalung gimtai !
19038010	O Pakai , kadei ka-ngai nahen , Kataona najasoh keiye !
19038011	Kadip aphu phu jengin kathabeitai , Kamit jong athim tai !
19038012	Hengle kom , golle paiyin einai ngampon , Katinaho jeh-in ka-insungmi jong akidalseuve .
19038013	Eithat nomhon thang eikampeh-un , Eisuse nomten suhmang din einokhum’ui . Suhmang din eigo go jenguve .
19038014	Na-ngong bangin kho la kajapon , paomo bangin thujong kasei theipoi .
19038015	Khojalou mihou lou bangin Keijong ka-umtai !
19038016	O Pakai Nang katahsan’e , O Pakai ka-Pathen , nangin neihouvin !
19038017	Kagimnaa kamelmate kipasah dan , Kalhahsamnaa kamelmate kithang-atda hen !
19038018	Kana na jengten , Lhulham pai ding kahitai !
19038019	Kachonset chengse kaphongin Kakisih lheh jenge !
19038020	Kamelmate damtheiyin ahat theiyui , Ajeh beiya eihoa atam lheh-e .
19038021	Thildih kabolgot jeh hin Thilpha jeh a thilsea eidouvah atam’e .
19038022	Neidalha loujen-o Pakai , Kidal khin khin hih-in ka-Pathen !
19038023	Tun neipanpin , O Pakai eihuhhingpu !
19039001	Keiman , “ Ching theiyin na tong ing ting , Kakamin chonset thu seiponge ; Kavel’a migiloute umlaidsen Imacha sei ponge , ” kati .
19039002	
19039003	Kathip beh-in imacha kaseipoi , Thilpha jeng jong kaseipoi ! Hinla kathohgim akhoh cheh cheh-e .
19039004	Kalung jongle kagimbe cheh-e ; Hijeh chun paolouvin ka-umthei tapon :
19039005	“ Pakai , ichan kahin a itih kathi ding ham ? Kahinkho itih bei ding ham neihil’in , ” kati .
19039006	Iti kahinkho hichanseh a neisempeh ham ! Navetdanin kahinkho imachan namupoi . Tahbeh mongin mihem jouse hi Haikhat kah a hingbou ahi .
19039007	Nilim kahei bep , Anatoh jouse pannabei , Neile gou apokhom khomin Koipen chang ding ahepoi .
19039008	I-baham Pakai kakineppi ding ? Nanga kinem jing kahi !
19039009	Kachonset chengsea neihuhdoh-in , Mi-ngolte neinuiaat sah hih-in !
19039010	Nangin gim genthei neithohsah-e , Paopoh louvin umthim tange !
19039011	Mihem chonset chengse naphoh-in talen napen , Adeipen jong nget neh bangin nasubeijitai . Tahbeh mongin mihem hi Haikhat kah a hingbou ahi .
19039013	Kataona ngaiyin Pakai , kakagin ngaiyin ; Kakateng neipanpin . Kapu kapate banga chom khat kholjin le khopem bou kahi .
19039014	Kathi kah beh a nopna kaneina din Neidondan neichanglha tan !
19040001	Thoh hattah-in Pakai panpi ka-ngah-in , Aman eikhohsah-in kataona asangtai .
19040002	
19040003	Tijat umtah khokhuh a konin eikaidoh-in , Bolsung bon-ngan lah a eiloidoh tai . Songpi chunga mong tah-in eikhangdoh-in , Lung mongin eikoitai .
19040004	I-Pathenu vahchoina la Lathah sahje eihil’e . Amupha chan tijauvin tin Pakai atahsanlo didu ahi .
19040005	Doihou lou , pathen lhem houte jop lou Pakaiya ki-ngaite chu anun nom’e .
19040006	O Pakai ka-Pathenu , Thil tampi neibolpeh peh jengun , Nang tobang koima aumpon , Kadiuvin thilgon kidang tah tah nagong’e . Atam behseh jengtan Ajat mong kaseijoupoi .
19040007	Kilhaina gantha le thilpeh na-ngeh pon , Maicham phunga gan pumgo jong natipoi ; Chonset ngaidamna pumgo thilto na-ngeh dehpoi , Kasei chan phate chan neingaipeh joi .
19040008	Hijeh chun kenjong , “ Hikoma ka-umin , Neihilchahna jouse Danthubua akisunin ,
19040009	Nalungdei bol ding kadeiye ka-Pathen ! Neihilna kalungthima kachinge , ” kati .
19040010	Houbung kakhopnaa neihuhhingnau Thupha kaphongdoh tai Pakai ! Tang louhel’a kasei jing ding Nangman nahei .
19040011	Huhhingna Thupha chu ka-impon , nakitahna le napanpi kasei jinge . Houbung kakhopnaa ka-umthimpon , Nalal loupina le nalungset longlou kaseiye .
19040012	Pakai neikhoto jing ding kahei , Nalungset le nalal loupinan eihoidam jinge .
19040013	Simsen lou hahsatnan eiumkimsoh tan , kachonset hon seimantan kho kamutapoi . Kalujangsam sangin atamjon Kameidoilo tai .
19040014	Neihuhhingin Pakai ! Neipanpin keima tun !
19040015	Tha dia eigote chun Gal lel’u hem kisudongu hen ! Kahahsatna kipah thanomte chu Nungjamu hen jahchau hen !
19040016	Tot nopna eineiho chun Gal lel’u hen jum’u hen !
19040017	Naheng jin jouse kipah thanom hen ! Nahuhhhingna thangvah ten , “ Pakai chu loupe tah ahi , ” Tin sei jing jengu hen !
19040018	O Pakai , vaicha kalhahsam vangin Nangin neisumil deh poi ! Eihuhhingpa ka-Pathen nahi Neipanhu loiyin !
19041001	Vaicha khotote anun nom’ui ! Hahsa atokhah tengu pakaiyin apanpi .
19041002

19041004	Adammo tengu pakaiyin kithopin tin , Adamsah kit ding ahi .
19041005	Keiman , “ Nang dounan kachonsetai Pakai , Neikhoton neidamsah-in , ” tin kataove .
19041006	Kamelmaten setah tah-in eihouvun , kathia suhmil’a kaum ding adeiyui .
19041007	Eihungve ho along thengpon , Kaphatmoa chengse achingun , Apot tengu gamtin a Aseithangsoh tauve .
19041008	Eivetda chengse keithu akihou lhiuvin , Kachunga thilse cheh cheh agel’uve .
19041009	Amahon , “ Amahi athinattan , Damdoh kit taponte , ” atiuve .
19041010	Kaginchat tah , kagol phapen Kaneh khompi geiyin eidoutai !

19041014	Pakai Israel Pathen vahchoiyun , Tonsot tonsot’in Ama Vahchoiyun ! Amen ! Amen !
19042001	Sitwi votjen lha-ngai sakhi bangin , O Pathen Nangma ka-ngaiye !
19042002	Vo hing jing Pathen ka-ngaiye ! Itih leh na-anga chibai kaboh ding ham ?
19042003	Sun le janin kakap’in , An neh khel’in kalhi along longe ! Kamelmaten , “ Na-Pathen hoiba ham ? ” tin Ei dodng dong jengui !
19042004	Phat chesa kageldoh teng kalungnai . Japi toh lhonin Pathen Houin kajonin , Mipi kijot kalamkaiyin , Thanomtah-in Pathen vahchoi la san asam’ui !
19042005	Idia hibang lung nommo Gentheiya um kahim ? Pathen jenga kinem leng , Eihuhhing ka-Pathen vahchoi kit nange .
19042006	Lunghel le lhachomtah-in , Mizar molsang , Hermon molsang Jordan dung lonna gamsunga kadingin , Namikhoto themje kagel jinge !
19042007	Na-ogin komtong te ni kah a athongin , Natwipi dil kinong laiyin eilonvuh tai !
19042008	Sunteng jongle Pakai neilungset’in , Janteng kahinna Pathen henga la sang ting taovinge !
19042009	Eipanpi jing Pathen henga , “ Idia neisuhmil’a , kamelmae gitlouna chengse Kadou dou jeng ham ? ” kati .
19042010	Melmaten ei-enghou hou jengun , “ Na-Pathen hoiba ham ? ” tin eidongui !
19043001	O Pathen them neichanin , pathen heloute neidouhun , Migilou jouseitea konin Neihuhdoh-in !
19043002	Kakiselna Pathen nahime , Idia neidonda ham ? Iti kamelmate gitlouna chengse kadou dou jeng ding ham ?
19043003	Salvah-in nadihan phongin , Nalhangtheng Zion aeipui hen Nachenna Houin eilhut lhon hen !
19043004	Chuteng namaicham phung jontange Pathen ! Nangbou kanopna nahi . Kasem jang saiyin navahchoi la sange . O Pathen ka-Pathen !
19043005	Idia hibang lung nommo Gentheiya um kahim ? Pathen jenga kinem leng Eihuhhing ka-Pathen vahchoikit nange .
19044001	O Pathen , khanglui lai , Kapu kapateu nikho laiya Thil kidang nabol chengse eiseipeh-un , kamit’in kamu’vin kanan kajatauve !
19044002	
19044003	Namtin vaipi nadelmangin Namite gamsunga nachensah-e . Namite nakhantousah-e .
19044004	Gamsung hi chemhem hat’a namiten alah-u ahipon , Athahat man’uva ajo’u jong ahipoi ; Na-ngailut jeh le naumpi jeh , ahibouve .
19044005	Nang kalengpa le ka-Pathen , Namite gal najosah-e .
19044006	Nathahat kengin Kamelmateu kajoutauve !
19044007	Kihinsona din kathalpi jong kasongpon , Kachemjam jong kasongpoi .
19044008	Kamelmateuva konin neihuhdoh tauvin , Eihot bolteu najoutai .
19044009	Nangma kavahchoi jing diu , Tonsot’a kathangvah diu nahi !
19044010	Hinla neipaiyun gal neilelsah tauve , Kasepaiteu to jong gal nakonkhompoi !
19044011	Kamelmateu masanga neideljam’un , Kathil jouseu amahon akilah tauve .
19044012	Kelngaoi kisatchap neibahsah-un , Vannoi gamtina neithecheh doh tauve .
19044013	Man lhomchan nagel’in , Namite man baitah-in najoh mangtai .
19044014	Neibolnau kaheng kakomun amun , Eidaithangun einuisat tauve .
19044015	Namtin vaipi seichah din neibol’un , Lu eithin khumun einuisat tauve .
19044016	Vetda jengin ka-umin , Jum le ja kathot-e !
19044017	Eihotbol kamelmate houset le ohin Ka-ngai ngai jengin ahi !
19044018	Neitepnau kasuh keh dauva , Nang kasuhmil lou vangun Hichengse hi kachunguva Alhungsoh tai .
19044019	Nangla lheptol’in kabol pouvin , Nathupeh chengse kanitda pouve .
19044020	Ahinla gamsahang lah a neidalhauvin , Muthim lhangkhal jing lah a neidondauve .

19044022	Nahetdoh tei ding ahi , Ajeh chu kalungthim jouseu nahesoh-e .
19044023	Tunla Nang kahoujeh-un thading salhemin eikikoiyun , Tha dia koisa kelngoi bangin eikiboltauve .
19044024	Thouvin Pakai ! Idia na-ihmut ham ? Kipat’in , donda hel din neigel hih-un !
19044025	Idia kiselmang nahim ? Kagenthei hesoh nau sumil hih-in !
19044026	Tol’a eichit thangun , Kalel jeh-un leivui lah a kalumden tauve .
19044027	Neihung panpiuvin , Nalungset long loujeh-in neihuhhingun !
19045001	Kalungthima thu ngei adimtan , Lengpa kalachoiye ! Lekhasunpa lekhamol gonsa bangin Labol din kalei akilehgotai .
19045002	
19045003	Pasal mel-houpen nahin , Thusei nathemin , Pathenin vang naboh jinge !
19045004	Nachemjam kikon , Vo leng thahat ! Naminthangin nalal loupi !
19045005	Adih a panga adih a thutan din Galjou din sakol chunga hung touvin ! Nathahat chun minthangtah-in Gal jouvin nate !
19045006	Nathalpi chang ahem theiyin , Namelmate lungchang akap pai jel jel’e ; Namtin vaipi Nakhomuh a aboh khup’ui !
19045007	O Pathen , nalenggamin beitih neipontin , Thudih-in namite vai nahoppeh-e !
19045008	Nangin thilpha nadeiyin thilse nahoi ; Hijeh chun Pathen , na-Pathenin lengdin nalhenge . Leng dang joouse sangin Kipa nopna napei !
19045009	Naponsil jouse myrrh le aloe gimvui anamin , Saihaa kijem leng inpia lathemhon nalem’ui !
19045010	Naleng inpia lhacha numeiho jong Lengte chanu jeng ahiuvin , Nalaltouna jetlama lengnu adingin , Ophir gama sana hoipenin akijem’e !
19045011	Kasei ngaiyin lengpa jia kipuinu ! Namite le na-insung mite geldatan !
19045012	Namel-hoi jeh-in lengpan deichan natin , Napu jong ahijeh a athu na-ngai ding ahi .
19045013	Tyre gam miten thilpeh ding thil hinpon tin , Mihaoten nalung lhaina ahinhol diu ahi !
19045014	Leng inpia leng chanu aumin , amel-hoi lheh-e ! Sana monkenga kijem poncho asil’e .
19045015	Aponchol jempah pumin lengpa henga apuiyun , Alhacha nu-ngah hon ajuiyun , abonin lengpa henga apuitauve .
19045016	Kipah thanomin ahungun , Leng inpia alut tauve .
19045017	Vo nangama kalengpa , Chapa tampi hingin , Leng changu hen napate khel’u hen , Leiset pumpi vaihomin pansah-in !
19045018	Kalabol hin naming seithang jingin tin , Akhang khanga min navahchoi diu ahi !
19046001	I-kiselnau le ihatnau Pathen ahin , Genthei teng kithopi din eigo jingui .
19046002	
19046003	Hijeh chun leiset pumpi kihot ling hen , Molsang jouse Twikhanglena kileh lut jongle I-kichat lou diu ahi .
19046004	Twikhanglen kidil hen kinong hen , Thinglhang jouse hotjal jongle kichapoute .
19046005	Vadung khat alongin , Pathen khopi Chungnungpen Houin thenga kipana ahinlhut’e .
19046006	Khopia chun Pathen apansan , Koiman khopi chu sumangponte ; Jingkah matah a hungkona Khopi chu Pathenin akithopi ding ahi .

19047001	Mitin vaipi kipah-in khut bengun ! Othongin la san Pathen vahchoiyun !
19047002

19047004	Mitin vaipi eijosah-un , Namtin vaipi chunga vai eihomsah-ui !
19047005	Chemun gam eipeuvin , Angailut amite hoithopi gam anapei .
19047006	Pathenin alaltouna ajontouvin , Kipana kholhang akisamin sumkon akimut’e ! Pakai akitol toutai !
19047007	Sauvin Pathen vahchoi la ! I-Lengpau vahchoi la sauvin !

19047009	Pathen alaltouna thenga atouvin , Namtin vaipi vai ahompeh-e !

19048001	Aloupi Pakai chu , I-Pathenu khopi , Alhang theng chunga Loupi tah a vahchoi ding ahi !
19048002

19048007	Kichan akihot lhulsoh tauvin , Numei naosoh ding bangin na asalheh-ui !
19048008	Tarshish kong innei Khopihui kinonglai toh kha abangui !

19049001	Hiche hi ngaiyun mitin vaipin , Muntin aching ,

19049010	Tonsot’a hing jinga Thina lhankhuh ajotda lou ding ahi .

19050001	Pakai , thaneipen Pathen apaovin , leiset pumpi , so le lhuma konin Mi akou kou jenge !
19050002	Khopi hoi chamkimsoh Zion a Pathen avah emsel’e .
19050003	I-Pathenu ahungin athongje jui , Amasanga mi halvam thei mei akongin , Huipi le gopi kithon atomsoh keiye !
19050004	Amite thu atanna hettohsah a pang din Pathenin van le leiset akouve ,
19050005	“ Kilhaina bol’a keito kitepna semdoh , Tansan umtah kamite hung kikhom’un , ” tin akouve .
19050006	Pathen dihtah ahile thutanpa ahi Van mun jousen aphongdoh tai .

19051001	O Pathen neikhoton , Nalungset longlou ahi ; Namikhotona alene , Kachonset jouse theh ngimin !
19051002	
19051003	
19051004	kagitlouna jouse sop lhan , Kachonset’a kon neisuthengin !
19051005	Kamona jouse kahen , kachonset ho kahejinge !
19051006	Nang douna mong monga chonsea , Nahotpen kabol ahitai ! Hijeh chun dihtah-in neibol’in , Mo neichanjeh-in nadih tai .
19051007	Chonsesa kajil’a Themmosa hung peng kahi !
19051008	Nangin kitahna le thutah nadeiyin , Hiche ding hin chihna kalunggil’a neikhumpeh-in !
19051009	Kachonset sumangle chun theng tange . Neisop le chun buhbang bangin bang jonge !
19051010	Neimehgep a neisuhgoisa hijongleh Kipana la thanopna ogin neijahsah kit’in , Chuteng kipah thanom kit tange !
19051011	Kachonset ho neivetpeh dan , Kagitlouna chengse theh ngimsoh-in !
19051012	O Pathen , kalungsung semthah-in , Kasunga tomngaina lhagao thah neikhumpeh-in !
19051013	Nakoma konin neisel mang dan , Kachunga na-Lhagao Theng lamang hih-in !
19051014	Namihuhhing kipana neipekit’in , Thanom tah-in nathua neinunsah-in !
19051015	Chuteng chonsete nathupehho kahil’a , Nahenga hung kilekit diu ahi .
19051016	O Pathen , neihuhhingin neilhing hoiyin , Chuteng kipah-in nadihna seichoi lenge !
19051017	Pakai kathusei neipanpin , Chuteng nangma vahchoiyinge !
19051018	Kilhaina jong nadeipon , Toh jeng jong leng pumgo thilto jong nadeipoi .
19051019	O Pathen , lung lengvaiya kisih hi Kilhaina sangin nadeijon ; Hijeh chun lung lengvaiya kisihte Nahsah mo pon nate !
19051020	O Pathen , Zion khopi khoton panpin , Jerusalem kulpi jouse kaiphan !
19051021	Chuteng adih a kilhaina kibol’in tin Nalungna chim ding ; Namaicham phunga pumgo thilto kipea , Bongchaltea kilhaina kinei ding ahi .
19052001	Vo mihatpa , idia nathilse bol Nakiletsahpi ham ? Pathen mingailut hi tonsot’a ahibouve .
19052002	
19052003	
19052004	Midang suhmangna ding jeng nagon , Namuh themsiu seucin ; Semthu jouthu jeng naseiye .
19052005	Thilpha sangin thilse nadeijon , Thutah sangin jouthu nadeijoi .
19052006	Mijoupa , midang suhgetna jeng naseiyem ong !
19052007	Pathenin nang nasuhmang hel ding , Namat’a na-ina kona nakaimang ding ahi ; Mihing leiset’a kona Napaidoh ding ahi .
19052008	Midihten amuteng tijauvintin , Nanuisat’uva ,
19052009	“ Ven , Pathena kisong loupe , Anei anga jenga kisonga Athilse bol chengse Kisonnaa neipa pi khu , ” tiuvinte .
19052010	Keivang Pathen Houin sunga Olive thing hing kabangin , Atonsot atonsot’a din Pathen lungset long louva kakisonge .
19052011	O Pathen , nathilbol ho jeh a Nangma kathangvah jing ding , Namite angsunga Naphatna kahonjal ding ahi .
19053001	Mi-ngolten , “ Pathen aumpoi , ” atiuvin , Nehguh a kivah jeng , Thet umtah tah bol ho , Thildih bol khatcha aumpoi .
19053002	
19053003	Miching , Pathen hol aum khat leh , Tin Vana konin Pathenin mihemte ahinvei .
19053004	Hinla akiheimangsoh keiyun , Kibang cheh-in aphamouvin , Thildih bol khatcha aumpon , Khat’a khat jong abeihel’e .
19053005	“ Kamite chomgama , Kahenga tao kha louhel , Hiche thilse jeng bolte hi Kho helou khat hiuva , Imacha jong ahetlou tah bah-u ham , ” Tin Pathenin aseiye .
19053006	Anasoh kha louhel Pathenin Amite kidoupi ho gu le chang Athethangsoh tengleh Abonchauva tijat thi diu ahi . Pathenin adonlou ahitan , Amaho mangthah diu ahitai .
19053007	O Ziona konin Pathen hung hen Israelte gal josah tave leh ! Pathenin Isarel ahaodohsah teng Jacob insung iti kipa thanop diu hitam !
19054001	Vo Pathen naminin neihuhhingin , Nathahat’in neihongin !

19054009	Kagimna jousea neihoidoh tan , Kamelmate nasuhmang kamutai !
19055001	O Pathen kataona ngaiyin , Kathum nungsun dan !
19055002	
19055003	Ngaiyin neihouvin , Lunggim lih pai ding kahitai !
19055004	Kamelmaten kindot dot’in eilhan , Migilouten einehgep pai diu ahitai . Gimna jeng eilhut khumun , Eilunghan’un eiho’uve !
19055005	Kakicha behseh jengin , Kathillo paiding ahi !
19055006	Kichan kakithing thingin , tijalih pai ding kahitai !
19055007	Ohe , vakhu bangin lhaving neiying , Leng mangin choldo mun gahol leng !
19055008	Gamla tah aleng ing ting , Gamthip laiya cheng tange !

19055010	O Pakai , kamelmate kihoutoh mon lhan ! Khopi sunga kinah le kidou kamun ,
19055011	Sun le janin khopi aum’uvin , Adihlou le hesohna jeng abol’uve .
19055012	Muntina thil le lo asuseuvin , Kholai dung jousea mi abolseuvin abolgentheiyui !
19055013	Melman eidaithang hileh Kathoh thei ding , Kakidoupin kiletsahna einei hileh Kakisel mang thei ahi .
19055014	Kadoulel hila kahetsa , kaloi kagol ngaitah nang nahibouve !
19055015	Thu ngei ngei iseikhom jin , Houin ikaikhom ji lhon me !
19055016	Kamelmate hi aphat lhon masangin thiu hen , Ahing laiyin noimigam jon’u hen ; A-insunguva jong thilse jeng , Alunguva jong thilse jeng aum’e !

19055020	Tonsot’a vaihom Pathenin Kataona ngaiyintin amaho ajo ding ahi . Ajeh chu amahon lung aheipouvin , Pathen jeng jong agingpouve .
19055021	Masanga kagol’in aloite adelkhumin , Akitepna jouse asukeh tai .
19055022	Athuseiho khoiyu sangin analhumjon , Alungthima vang mi avetdan ahoi ; Asei jouse thao bangin anal’in , Hinla chemjam hem banga mithat thei ahi .

19056001	O Pathen neikhoton , Nilhum lhumin kamelmaten Eibolgentheiyun , Kengton eichil chil jengui !
19056002	
19056003	Nilhum hel’in eidel khum khum jengun , Eidouva atam behseh jengtauve .
19056004	Kakichat phat hin Nanga kakingaiye , O Hatchungnung Pakai !
19056005	Kicha louvin Pathena kakisongin , Athutep jal’in kathangvah-e ! Tahsa mihem mai maiyin I-eilo thei idng ham ?
19056006	Kamelmaten nilhum lhumin eibol gentheiyun , Kei dsuhsetna ding jeng agong’ui ,

19056008	O Pathen , akhanset jeh-un engbol’in , Lung soutenin mitin vaipi tolse nan neiyin !
19056009	Kagimna nahesoh keiyin , Kamit lhilon namelchih jingnan , Abonchan nalekhabua najih lutsoh tai !

19056011	Hiche Pakai hi Athutep chengse kathangvah-in ;
19056012	Kison nan kaneiyin ima kagingpoi , Tahsa mihem mai maiyin I-eilo thei ding ham ?

19058001	Vaihomten adih a thu natanu hinai , Mitin thu kitoh a nabolpeh jiu hinam ?
19058002

19058005	Gul banga gu nei jeng ahiuvin , Gulsum na-ngong bangin akolseh-ui .
19058006	Gulsumin gulsaiho theile gin ajapon , Guldoi choiho phunsam jong ajapoi .

19059001	Kamelmatea konin neihuhhingin Pathen , Eisel khumtea konin neihuhdoh-in !
19059002

19063001	O Pathen , ka-Pathen nahin , Nangbou ka-lha ngaiye ! Kahinkhon ka-ngai jingin , Twi bei , leigo Twi ngaicha geo leiset bangin Kahinkhon nangbou ka-ngaiye !

19064001	Kagentheiye Pathen , Kataona ngaiyin ! Kagalte kakichai , Neihuhhingin !
19064002	
19064003	Migiloute thilsea konin neihoidoh-in , Mi-engsete thilgona konin neiselmangin .
19064004	Aleiguiyu chemjam hem abangin , Athuseiyun thalchang bangin mi adot’e .
19064005	Jum le ja helouvin jouthu aseilouyun , thusen miphaho asuminseuve .

19065001	Vo Pathen , Zion lhanga vahchoi lom nahin , Kakitepnau pehdoh lom nahi .
19065002	
19065003	Nangin kataonau nasangin , Muntina min naheng ahinjon’e .

19065005	Nadeilhen mi , munthenga nahinpui chu Minun nom ahi . Na-insunga thilphaho Nahou-in theng vangbohnan kalungnau chimsah tante .
19065006	Gal neijosah-un neihouvun , Eihuhhingna diuvin thil kidang dang nabol’e ! Leiset kolkimvel mite leh Twikhanglen gal’a miten na-kingainai .
19065007	Nathahat’in mol le lhang natungdoh-in , Nathahat loupe mi namusah tai .
19065008	Twipi kinonglai naphoh thip’in , Twi kidil lai nasuhaitai ; Mipi kinonglul lul jong navohaiye .
19065009	Nathildbol loupiho jeh hin Leiset pumpi akichatai ; Nathilbol ho hin Leiset kolkimvel’a kipana alhut’e .
19065010	Leiset khohsah nan go najuhsah-in , Nachap nouvin leipha nasoi . Luidung jouse twi nadip’in , Leiset ga napunsah-e ! Nathilbol dan chu :
19065011	Leichang tuhnemsa go najuhsah-in , Twiyin nachap nouvin , Go naphinsah-in leiset nachap nouvin , Hamthah louthah nadotsah-e .

19065013	Lungdong lah a kelngaoihon ademset’in , Mol le lhang pang dung vetnom nom aum’e .
19065014	Jaolah jouse kelngoite adimin , Phaicham jouse chang adim’e . Thil ijakaiyin Kipa thanop la asauve !
19066001	Mitinin kipa othongin Pathen vahchoiyun !
19066002	Amin loupe lan sauvin Loupi tah-in vahchoiyun !

19066005	Hungun mihemte lah a Pathen thilbol kidangtah hung veuvin !
19066006	Pathenin Twikhanglen taolgo asosah-in , Ipu ipateuvin vadung longlai tolgo ajotdoh-ui ! Hiche aboljeh hin Eiho ikipah thanom’ui !

19066009	Pathenin eihing hoi nalaiyun , Eikipal lhuhsah hih laiyui !
19066010	Vo Pathen , Nangin keiho neipatep’un , Sana meiya kilhatheng bangin neipatep tauve !
19066011	Pel’a neilhah sah-un , Pohgih hahsa tah neipohsah-ui !
19066012	Melmate neichil thangsah-un , Meipi le twipi kapal galkaiyui ! Tunvang hoidohna mun a neipuilut tauve !
19066013	Nahouin thenga pumgo thilto hinchoiying ting , Kakitepna chengse penge !
19066014	Kagimpet’a kaseisa Kakitepna jat lhingin penge !

19066020	Long louva eilungset jeh le Kataona asanjeh-in Pathen kavahchoiye !
19067001	Neikhoton phatthei neiboh-un Pathen ! Hepitah-in neiveuvin !
19067002	
19067003	Chuteng vannoiyin nadei hentin , Namtinin nahuhhingna hente !
19067004	O Pathen , mitinin navahchoi hen , Mitin vaipin navahchoi cheh hen !
19067005	Mitin thu adih a natanpeh a , Namtin vaipi nalamkaijeh-in Namtin vaipin kipa nop la sau hen !
19067006	O Pathen , mitinin navahchoi hen , Mitin vaipin navahchoi cheh hen !
19067007	Pathen , i-Pathen’un phatthei eiboh-un , Leiset ga alhung tai .
19067008	Pathenin phatthei eiboh tauve , Muntina miten Ama jabol cheh hen !
19068001	Pathen akipat’in amelmate anocheh tai , Ama hotbolten alel’un ajamtauve !
19068002	
19068003	Meikhu kimut mang bangin , Melmate Pathenin adelmangtai ; Meihul’a khoilu jolmang bangin , Pathen masanga migiloute amang thah tai .
19068004	Midihte vang Pathen angsunga akipah thanom’un , Kipah thanomin a-aovui !
19068005	Pathen la sauvin , amin vahchoila sauvin ; Meilhang chunga tou Pathen lampi semjangun , Amin Pakai ahi , a-angdsunga kipah-un !
19068006	Ahouin thenga pansa Pathenin Chagate le meithaiho akhohsah-e !
19068007	Pathenin chenmun beite chenmun apen , Sohchangte kipah a nomlen din alhadoh-e . Pathen doumah bolte vang Hollei lah a achensahjie .
19068008	O Pathen , namite napuidoh a , Nelgam najot galkaipi chun ;
19068009	Sinai pathen ahungin , Israel Pathen ahung jeh-in , Ling akihot’in , go ajui !
19068010	Pathen , nengtah-in go najuhsah-in , Nagam leiset gosa nachapnouve !
19068011	Hikoma chun namite achengun , Naphat jal’in caichate natoi !

19068013	“ Lengho le asepaiteu ajamtai , ” atiuve . Akichomdoh ho in’a numeiho akihom’ui .
19068014	Vakhu lim sana kitomjol , Alhaving geiya sana thengsel’a kiloijol jong ajaove . Galpi nikhoa chu , Ibol’a kelngoi honga moh tou nahiuvem ?

19068020	Niseh a pohgih eipoh hu Pakai vahchoiyun , Eihuhhinguva Pathen Amabou ahi !

19068032	Egypt’a konin palai hungun tin , Sudan mite Pathen lam Sanga tao diu ahi .

19069001	O Pathen neihuhhingin , Twiyin ka-ngong gei achuptai !
19069002

19069004	Panpi kakou kounan kacholtan , kalolbuh apeh-in anai ! Eipanpi didng kavet vet nan kamit thim pai ding ahi !
19069005	Ajeh beiya eihotbolte Kasamjang sangin atmjo’uve ! Melmaten joujeng eiseikhum’un , Ahat’uvin tha din eigo’uve ! Thil kaguh louhel jong Eisah sah-uvin ahi .
19069006	Vo Pathen , kachonset ho nakoma akiselpom , Ka-ngoldan nahesoh keiye !
19069007	Thanei chungnungpen Pakai , Nachunga kisongte neijumsisah san ; Vo Isreal Pathen , Nangma chibai bohte neujumsosah hih-in !
19069008	Nangma jal’a jumle ja kathoh a , Min a-eng alouva eihou ahi .
19069009	Kasopite lah a kholjinmi kabangin , Ka-insung mite lah a gamchom mi kabange !
19069010	Nahouin dia katom ngaival jeh-in Kalungsung meikouva kileu abgnin , Min na-enghouna jouse Keichunga achuh lo tai !
19069011	An ngol’a kakineosah vangin , Mihon enghou nan eineibep’ui !
19069012	Lunghema khaodip pon kasil jongle Nuijat nopnan eineiyui !

19069015	Bon-ngan lah a neiloidoh-in , Kamelmatea konin neihoidoh-in , Twithuh lah a neiloidoh-in !
19069016	Twisoh neichupsah dan , Twitoa neilhahsah dan lang , Lhankhuh a neilhah lutsah dan !

19069018	Nalhacha keidin kiselddan , Neihouvin kagim behseh tai tun !
19069019	Neihung huhhingin , Melmatea konin neichu-lhan !

19069022	Kakel teng thinagu eipauvin , Kadangchah teng lengpitwi thuh eipeuve !
19069023	Agolvah bol’u manthahnan neiyu hen , kuttheng abol’u lhuh lhamnan neiyu hen !
19069024	Amit’u suchon ! Ating akongu doisen tu hen !

19069026	Ingapsih she-u hen lang , Agam ngah diu kaholmo hen !

19069028	Achonset jouseu melchih-in , Them chansah hih hel’in !

19069030	Kenvang na kasan kalhasam’e , O Pathen , neiphong dingin neihuhhingin !
19069031	Pathen vahchoila sang ting , Aminthan phongjal ing ting kathangvah ding ahi .

19070001	O Pathen , neihuhhingin , Neipanpi loiyin Pakai !

19078010	Pathento akitepnau anit pouvin , Adanthua jong anung pouve !
19078011	Thil kidang abol amusau jong Anatoh ho geiyin asumiltauve .
19078012	Egypt gam Zoan phaiya , Pathen thil kidang bol ho Apu apateuvin anavet vet jengu ahi .
19078013	Pathenin Twikhanglen avotanin , Apu apateu apui galakiyin , Twipi bang bangin akitinsah-e .
19078014	Sun teng meilhangin apuiyin , Janteng meikongin apuiye !
19078015	Gamthip laiya songpi apokhitsah-in , Leinoi lampeh a twi amaho adonsah-e .
19078016	Songpia konin tei aputsah-in , Luidung lonin alonsah-e !
19078017	Hinla amahon chonset abol jingun , Gamthip laiya jong Chungnungpen Pathen doumah jen gabol’ui !
19078018	Henasa san Pathen apatep’un , Akel lung changun An neh ding athum’ui !
19078019	Pathen dounan , “ Gamthip laiya Pathenin Neh ding eipeh mong diu hinam ?
19078020	Songpi avokhin , twi aputsah a Luibanga alonsah vangin ; Amite eiho hi bu le sa eipeh thei diu hinam ? ” atiuve .
19078021	Aseiyu ajah hin Pakai along hangin , Alungna behseh-in Amite chu meiyin ahalvamtai !
19078022	Ajeh chu Pakai la atahsan pouvin , Amaho huhhing jou din jong Anatahsan pouve !
19078023	Hinla pathenin Vanthamjol Kotpi chengse kihong din aseiyin ;
19078024	Vana konin buneh aneh thei Manna ahinsung lhai !
19078025	Pathenin aduchat jouseu apen , Israelten vantilte an aneuve .
19078026	Pathenin athahat’in sah le lhanga kon Huipi anunsah-in ;
19078027	Amite din luipanga neldi jat leo Vachate ahinlhon lutsahin ;
19078028	Vahchate chu abonchan Ngahmun lailung ponbuh veldung adimset’e !
19078029	Pathenin aduchat’u apen , Israelten vachate kithan anetauve !
19078030	Hinla agilkel chim masangu , A-an neh laitah-uvin ;
19078031	Achunguva Pathen along hangin , Israel mi , pasal lhentum Mi thahat lai lai athat tai !
19078032	Hitipia aboltah vangin Israel achonse jingun ; Thil kidang chujatpi abol vangin atahsanpouve .
19078033	Hijeh chun ahinkhou asuchomin , Kimlih leo leovin alhai !
19078034	Alah-uva mi phabep atha teng Adang ho ahenga ahungun , Lung aheiyun ahenga Lung laigil’in ataovui !
19078035	Chuteng apanpiuva ahoidamu chu Hatchungnung Pathen ahi ahedoh jiuve !
19078036	Amavang joujeng aseiyun , Lung thengsel’in imacha aseipouve !
19078037	Pathen din akitah pouvin , Akoma akitepnau jong alolhing pouve !
19078038	Pathenin vang amite ahepi jingin , Amaho sumang louvin asetnau angaidam’e ; Alunghan tamtah vei adamin , Alungset akitim nah nah-e !
19078039	Khohui kitolmang banga Thi thei mihing ahiu ahe jinge !
19078040	Gamthip laiya ijat vei Pathen adouvuva , Ijat vei lung himoa alhau hitam !
19078041	Avel vel’in Pathen apatep’un , Israel Pathen theng chu aphinseuve !
19078042	Amelmateuva kona ahuhhing nia Pathen thahat loupije asumil’ui !
19078043	Egypt gam Zoan phaiya thil kidang abol , Anatoh nasatah tah chu asumil tauve .
19078044	Luidung jouse thisan asosah a Egupten don ding ahet lou asumil’ui .
19078045	Egypt thousi vaibong alha khumin , Asugenthei lheh jengun , Uphohte alhan Agamsungu asugam geiyin ahepouve .
19078046	Aloujaovuva khaokhopite alha a , Muchi chivo asuhgam jong ahaitauve !
19078047	Alengpigau gel avohchaisah a , Atheichangu daibang athasah asumil tauve .
19078048	Aganchau gel avoh lihsah a Kelngoi hon jouse keh aselihsah ahetapouve ,
19078049	Egypt alunghan a mithat Vantil asol’a Athasah a alunghemu ahetapouve .
19078050	Alung han gpaiyin , Gamna alha khuma athagam asumil’ui .
19078051	Egypt insung jouse Pasal peng masa cheng athagam ahaitauve !
19078052	Kelngoi chingpa banga amite apuiya , Gamthip laiya apuidoh asumil’ui !
19078053	Kichatsah louvin amite apuiyin , Amelmateu twipi achupsah asumiltauve .
19078054	Gal’a alahsa molsang vum , Amunthenga amite apuidoh jong ahetapouve .
19078055	Amite kitol chun agamsunga chengte adelmangpeh-in , Agam’u Israelte ahoppeh a , a-in’uva amite Achensah geiyin asumiltauve .
19078056	Hinla Pathen Hatchungnung adou jingun , Apatep jiuvin athupeh ho anit pouve .
19078057	Kisonpi mo thalchang kon bang le Kitahna bei apateu bangin Doumah abol jingui !
19078058	Doiphung tampi asemdoh-un Pathen aphin lung hangun , Doilim tamtah asemjeh-un Hatah-in along hansah-ui !
19078059	Athilbol’u amujeh-in Pathen along hangin , Israelte apaimangtai .
19078060	I-lah-uva achenmun Shiloh a Aponbuh geiyin Pathenin adondai .
19078061	Athahat le aloupi melchihna Kitepna thingkong chu imelmateu amatsah-e .
19078062	Amite alunghanin , Amelmateu athagamsah-e .
19078063	Golhang jouse gal’a athitan , Nu-ngah hon ji ding aneitapouve !
19078064	Thempuho gal’in athat’un , Ajiteu jong akasah theipouve !
19078065	Ihmut’a kon thoudoh bangin Pakai ahung kipattan ; Jukham pasal hattah bangin Pakai ahung kisentei !
19078066	A-itih a gal lel a jum din , Amelmate anung non adeljamtai !
19078067	Joseph chilhahte jong apaiyin , Ephriam phung jong alatapoi !
19078068	Adeipen Zion lhanga Juda phung joh alhengtai !
19078069	Zion lhanga van a a-in bangin Ahouin Theng akisah-e ! Itih geiya kilong kit loudin , Leiset bangin asedettai !
19078070	Alhacha Davih alhengin , Akelngoi chinnaa akoudoh-e !
19078071	Kelngoi chingbanpi chu Israel lengpan atungin , Pathen mite chu kelngoi chinin achinsah tai !
19078072	David ama ki-itcha louvin Khut them to thon amite alamakaite !
19079001	Vo Pathen , namdangten Nagam ahindel khumtauve ! Nahouin theng asuhboh-un , Jerusalem asuchimsoh tauve !
19079002	Nalhachate muthong vah nan aneiyun , Atahsa longu sahang vah nan aneiyui !
19079003	Namite thisan tei kisung lha abahsah-un , Jerusalem kholaiya thisan teiyin alonge ! thilong vui ding jong Mihem khatcha beh aumtapouve !
19079004	Kavel’uva chengten eng houle Daichatvai , nuisat’in eineiyui !
19079005	Neilunghan jing diu ham Pakai ! Nalungset meibang kou jing ding ham ?
19079006	chibai naboh lou , nahenga tao lou Namtin vaipi chunga lung hang jon !
19079007	Namite athat gam’un , Nagamsung asumangtauve !
19079008	Kapu kapateu chonset jal’a Telen matsah sangin , Tun neihepiuvin , Akinemlel gam kahitauve !
19079009	Vo Pathen , jabol nachan jingna din Kachonset’u ngaisamin , Neilhatdoh-un , neihuhhingun !
19079010	Ibol’a namtin vaipin , “ Hoiba ham na-Pathen ? ” ati diu ham ? Nalhachate thisan so jeh a Namtin vaipi telen namatsah Neimusah tauvin !
19079011	Tha dia kikoisate , Songkul lute kagin ngaiyin ; Nathahat loupitah chun Amaho hi lhadoh-in jalensah tan !
19079012	Pakai , naphin phin a namdangte hi Sagi veijenin lethuh ten !
19079013	Chuteng , nakelngoihon tobang Namite keihon thangvah jing ung ting , Akhang khanga Nangma Kavahchoi jing diu ahitai !
19080001	Ongiyin , Israel kelngoi chin a chinga , Joseph chilhah kelngoihon hoiya hoile Pa ! Cherubim chunga touva ,
19080002	
19080003	Ephriam , Benjamin chule Manasseh phung hoa hung kiphongin , Thaneo tah-in hungin neihuhhingun !
19080004	Vo Pathen , huhhing kachan na diuvin , Neihepiuvin , neitahsemkit’un !
19080005	Vo , Pakai , thaneipen Pathen ! Itih geiya namite taona nalunghan khum ding ham ?
19080006	Neh le chah khel’in lungdon neipeuvin , Don ding khel’in mitlhi longin neikoitauve !
19080007	Jet le veiya namtinin gal eibol khumun , Melmaten eiphin phin’uve !
19080008	O thaneipen Pathen , Huhhing kachan theina diuvin Neihepiuvin , neithah semkit’un !
19080009	Egypt’a konin Lengpiphung nahinpon , Namtin vaipi nadeljamin , Agamsunguva lengpiphung chu naphuttai !
19080010	Lengpiphung phuna din tol nalaiyin , Ajung leigil’a alut’in abah-in gam leiset alosoh tai !
19080011	Alimin mol le lhang alen , Abahhon cedar thing sangtah tah ho akhui !
19080012	Abahho ajam jamin , Mediterranea Twikhanglen aphan , Euphrates luipi dung geiyin ajam’e !
19080013	Idia atho naphat lhah a , Atohkha chanin aga jouse akiguh ham ?
19080014	Gamvohten achonpeh gamtan , Gamsaten kivahnan aneiyui !
19080015	Hung kihei kit’o thaneipen Pathen ! Vana konin hinven , namite neihuhhingun !
19080016	Naphusa , hiche lengpiphung thah , Hoitah a nakhandohsah hi hinson !
19080017	Kamelmateuvin ahalgep’un aphuh lhutauve ! Lunghan khumin sumang jengin !
19080018	Natundoh a nahatsah nalhensa namite vang Hoidamin vengtup jingin !
19080019	Nakoma konin kihei mangkit tapou vinge , Neihing hoiyun vahchoi jing unge !
19080020	Vo Pakai thaneipen Pathen ! Huhhing kachan theina diuvin Neihepiuvin neithah semkit’un !
19081001	Eipanpi Pathen , Jacob Pathen Vahchoi la othongin sauvin !
19081002

19081004	Lhathah ni le lhalih nin , Kut bolna din sumkon mut’un !
19081005	Hiche hi Israelte lah a Danthu , Jacob Pathen thupeh ahi !

19081007	“ Keiman napohgih-u kadom lhan , Chehtum gihtah jouse ka-ngahsah tai .

19081010	Doi semthu nakoi dauva , Houjong nahou thei lou diu ahi !

19081013	Hijeh chun along katahsah-in , Adei deiyu kabolsah-e !
19081014	O kamiten kasei ngai tavuo leh ! Kathua anun diu iti kadei hitam !
19081015	Chutileh amelmateu kajoa , Agal jouseu kajopeh ding ahi .

19081017	Nangho vang an thuipen kapeh-uva , Gam khoiju jadonsah diu ahi , ” ati .
19082001	Vanmite kikhopna a Pathenin vai ahomin , Pathen mite lailunga thu lhuhna asem’e !
19082002	“ Ddih louva thutan ngauvin , Agiloute din lang neidauvin !

19083001	Umthim loujen-o Pathen ! Moh umthim hih hel’in !
19083002

19084001	O thaneipen Pakai ! Nahouin theng dei le ngai aumin ;
19084002

19084004	O thaneipen Pakai , Kalengpa le ka-Pathen ! Nahouin a vatoute le pelpalep jengin jong Bu asauvin , namaicham phung vel’a nou a-op’ui !
19084005	Nahouin apansaa , Navahchoi la sajingte anun nom’ui !
19084006	Zion jon a kijot’a , Nathahat’a kisongte anun nom’ui !
19084007	Kana Baca phaicham jot jong leu , Go masan twikul adipsoh a Kipana twisam phung ho tobang ding ahi .

19085001	Pakai , nagamsung nahepin , Israel nahaosah kittai !
19085002

19085005	Vo Eihuhhingu Pathen , Neilungdamun neithahsem’uvin !
19085006	Neilunghan jinguva , Lungdam louhel dng nahin ?
19085007	Neihatsah kitleu chun , Namiten vahchoi ki tnau vinge !

19085010	Ama jabolte huhhing nom jing , Huhhing dia igam’uva um jing ding ahi !

19086001	Ngaiyin Pakai neihouvin ! Lhasam le geo chaovin ka-um’e !

19086006	Kataona nagiyin O-Pakai ! Neihouvin panpi ka-ngaiye !

19086009	Nasemsa namtin vaipi nahenga kun cheh diu , Namin achoi-at diu ahi !

19087001	Lhang theng chunga Pakaiyin akhopi aphutdoh-e !

19088001	O Eihuhhinga Pakai Pathen ! Sun nilhum jan khovah-in na-anga kakap’e !
19088002	
19088003	Kataona ngaiyin lang , Panpi ngaicha kakagin ngaiyin !
19088004	Gentheina ten eibomin , Thipai ding kahitai !
19088005	Alaichat chat ho kabangin , Thabei pai ding kahitai !
19088006	Don louva thilong lah a kijam , Thasaa lhankhuh a lum tobang kahi ; Napanhu phah lou , Nasuhmilsa ho tobang kahi !
19088007	Kochong tong lai thimsung , Lhankhuh sunga neileh lut tai !
19088008	Neilunghan anasa behseh jengin , Natwipi kidil’in eichup tai !
