19089001	Vo Pakai , nalungset long lou Tonsot jailan oiying ting ; Nakitahna hi itih-in Phongjal lenge !
19089002

19089005	‘ Nachilhah khat leng chang jing ding , Nalengvai neina koipeh jing ding kahi , ’ tin , ” naseiye .
19089006	Pakai , thil kidang nabol ho Vanin lan asan ; Nakitahna jalan a-oiyui !

19089014	Nakhut tha aham lheh-in , Naban-gol tha ahat’e !

19089016	O Pakai , namaivah a vah lea , Kipa la sa chibai nabohte anun nom’ui !
19089017	Naphatna avahchoiyun , Nilhum lhumin nachunga akipah-ui !
19089018	Minthangtah tah-in gal neijosah-un , Neingailut jal’un hanla neisah sah-ui !
19089019	O Pakai , eihoidam diu nalhengdoh-in , Vo Israel Pathen theng , kalengpau napansah-e !
19089020	Malaiyin nalhacha tahsan umte gaochannaa , “ Sepai minthang khat kapanpin , Mipi lah a kalhendoh Mikhat chu laltona kapei ,
19089021	Kalhacha David chu thao theng kanun , lengin katungdoh tai .
19089022	Kaban thahat’a katuh jinga , kaban-gol tha kapeh ding ahi .

19104001	Ka-lhagao Pakai vahchoiyin ! O Pakai ka-Pathen naloupi ngeiye ! Jabolna le Lal loupinan Nakijem’e !
19104002	Khovah loupin nakivonin , Pondal bangin van nasungin ;

19104005	Leiset bulpi naphutset’in , Kilong kit ponte !
19104006	Leiset chu Twikhangin nakhun , Molsang ho jong twiyin achup’e !
19104007	Napho teng twipi akinongin , Na-ogin ajah tengu akitol tol jiuve !
19104008	Mol le lhang akhotan’un phaichama ahung longun ; nasemna mun jousea alongui !
19104009	Leiset achup kit louna din Akhokal lou diu gamgi nasempeh-e !
19104010	Phaicham dunga twisam naputsah-in , Lhang le lhang kah a luidung nalonsah-e !
19104011	Luidung hao hin gamsaten twi adon’un , Gamlah sa-nganten dang noun an aneiyui !
19104012	Vapang thingphung dunga Vachate busan kipah-in la asauve !
19104013	Van a konin mol le lhang gotwi nachapsah-in , Leiset hi navangboh adimset’e !
19104014	Gancha neh din hamhing napousah-in , Mihemin avatchaiya muchi tuna aneidin hampa nakesah-e !
19104015	Akipana din lengpitwi napensah-in , Athanopna din olive thao napen ; Akithadona din anneh napei !
19104016	Pakai phusa thingphung , Lebanon lhanga Cedar ho Gotwi nengtah-in adou jingui !
19104017	Cedar thing chung dunga vachaten bu asan , Chahthing phung dunga vakangten bu asai !
19104018	Molsang dunga gamkelte achengun , Songkol khikah dunga kolsate akisel’ui !
19104019	Kum kiheichin melchihnan Lha nasemin , Nisa alhum phat akihet’e !
19104020	Jan nasemin , khojin teng Gamsa jouse alhadoh jiuve !
19104021	Sakei noute sadel’in akisen sen’un ; Neh ding Pathena akithum’ui !
19104022	Nisa so teng changsunga akileuvin , Akhosung dunga alum jiuve !
19104023	Hiche kah hin mihem avaikon’un , Nilhah geiyi na atongui !
19104024	Pakai , thil hijatpi hi chingtah-in nasemin , Nasemsa leiset adimtai !
19104025	Twikhanglen lentah le jaotah , Asunga ganhing len le neo adimset’ui !
19104026	Twipi chunga kong innei akitol’un , Nasemsa Leviathanin alamtinjie !
19104027	Ganhing hijat kel le chah khoto din , Abonchannasanglam avecheh-ui !
19104028	Aduchanu napen , aneuvin ; Anneh napen , anevaiji tauve !
19104029	Nakihei mang teng akichauvin , Nahaisam sah teng athiuvin leivuiya akilekitji tauve !
19104030	Nalhagao napeh teng semdoh ahitauvin , Leiset’a amaho hi hinkho thah napei !
19104031	Tonsot’in Pakai loupe jing hen ; Asemsa chunga pakai kipah jing hen !
19104032	Pakaiyin leiset avet teng akilingin , Molsang dung athamleh akhulet lut’e !
19104033	Kahin laisen Pakai choi-at la sang ting , Hinlai damsungin ka-Pathen vahchoi la sange !
19104034	Pakaiyin kipah thanom kahi , Kalasah chunga lung lhai hen !
19104035	Leiset’a chonsete kisugam hen , Migilou kilulah kit da hen ! Ka-lhagaovin Pakai vahchoiyin ! Vahchoiyun Pakai !

19105010	Pakaiyin Jacob to kitepna asemchu , Tonsot tonsot’a um jing ding ahi !
19105011	“ Canaan gam napeng ting , Nagoulo gam hiding ahi , ” ati .

19105014	Hinla Pathenin koima abolgenthei sah pon , Ahoidamna diuvin keng ho agihsal jie !
19105015	“ Kalhentum lhachate suse hih-un , Ka-Themgaote bolse hih-un ! ” ati .
19105016	Pakaiyin gamsunga kel alhan , Neh le chah asumangtai !

19108011	Vo Pathen , kulpi kikaikhum khopia eipuilut ding koi hiya , Edom a eipui ding koi ham ?

19109001	Kavahchoi jng Pathen , Umthim loujenin !
19109002	Migilou jouseihon eidel khumun , Kachunga jouthu jeng aseiyui !
19109003	Kachunga ase se aseiyun , Ajeh beihel’in eidel khum’ui !
19109004	Adiu kakhohsah a kataopeh vangin Eidou doujengui !
19109005	Kaphatna asen eileuvin , kangailutna eihot bol’ui !
19109006	Athutan din migilou pansah-in , Amelma khat hehset sah-in !
19109007	Athu kitannaa mochang hen , Ataona jong chonset’in kisimpeh hen !
19109008	Kithidoh loi hen ! Midangin agou lo hen !
19109009	Achate chaga soh hen ! Ajinu meithai hen !
19109010	Achate in le lou beiyin khut dou hen ! Achen nau ingem lah a min deldoh-u hen !
19109011	Athil khol anei jouse kilah hen , Kholgam min atohga kilo’u hen !
19109012	Koiman khotoda hen , Adalhah chaga ho khohsah da hen !
19109013	Achi abo gamhen , Khangkit teng min lutoa panda hen !

19109015	Achonset jouseu Pakaiyin gel jing hen ! Leiset’a kigeldoh kit da hel’u hen !

19109020	Eihouse sea kamelmate chu Pakai , hitobang hin talen pen !

19110001	Pakaiyin ka-Pakai jah a , “ Namelmate chotpha kaneisah masangsen Kajet lam a tou jingin , ” ati .
19110002	Pakaiyin Zion a thaneitah a Leng tenggol nachoisah a , “ Namelmate chunga Vai homin , ” ati ding ahi !
19110003	Namelmate toh nakisat nil eh Namiten manbeiya napan hu diu ; Lhang thenga jingkah daitwi banga Gollhang ho nahenga hung kikhom diu ahi !
19110004	Khelkit lou din Pakai giltah-in kaitep’in , “ Malchizedek Themput bana Tonsot Thempu ding nahi , ” ati .
19110005	Pakai najetlama atou jinge , Athangtom tengleh Leng jouse asuhmang ding ahi !
19110006	Namtin vaipi thu atan’a , Galmuna thilong ajamchap ding ; Leiset leng jouse Ajosoh ding ahi !
19110007	Lengpan lampam luidunga twi donin tin , Tha kidoa , gal ajo ding ahi !
19111001	Vahchoiyun Pakai ! Amite khoppia kalungthim pumpin , Pakai thangvah inge !
19111002	Pakai thilbol jouse akidangin , Adei jousen het khentei agoi !
19111003	Abolchan ja aum cheh-in Alal loupe ta ngeiye ! Aitih-in adih jing jenge !
19111004	Pakaiyin athilbol ho eisuhmilsah pouvin , Khoto them , hepi lhingset ahi !
19111005	Agingte anneh apen , Akitepna ahaipoi !
19111006	Athanei vetsah nan Midang gam jouse amite apei !
19111007	Abolchan a akitah-in adih-e ! Athupeh chengse kisonpi thei ahi .
19111008	Athupehho adih le atah a kipe , Tonsot’a umdet jing ahi !
19111009	Amite ajalensah-in Tonsot’a din kitepna asempi ! Athengle ahat Pakai ahi !
19111010	Pakai gin hi chih kipatna , Athupeh nit chanin ima ahekhen theme ; Tonsot’a vahcoi ding Amabou ahi !
19112001	Vahchoiyun Pakai ! Athupeh lung lhaisel’a nit jing Pakai jabol jing chu anun nom’e !
19112002	Mipha chate chu gamsunga thanei ding , Achilhahte hampha diu ahi !
19112003	Ainsunga nei le nga adimin , A-itih-in ahao jinge !
19112004	Mipha , khoto them chule midih din Muthim lah jenga jong Kho avah jinge !
19112005	Hongphal tah a thil hom , Lungthengsel’a natong chu anun nom’e !
19112006	Mipha thon lou ding Kigeldoh jing ding ahi ;
19112007	Miphan thuse kithang agingpon , Tahsan det’in Pakaiya aki-ngaiye !
19112008	Tijat lungdon abolpon , Amelmate gal lel ding ahekeove !
19112009	Angaicha chan hongphal tah-in apen , Mi khoto achim hih-e ! Ahunei lheh jengin Min ajabol cheh-e !
19112010	Miilouten hiche hi amuteng along hangui ! Mitsat lhap lhap’in akilep mangun ; Akinepna jouseu abeihel tai !
19113001	Vahchoiyun Pakai ! Pakai lhachaten amin vahchoiyun !
19113002	Tu le tonsot’in Pakai min Vahchoiyin um hen !
19113003	So le lhum a min Pakai min vahchoiyun !

19113005	Pakai i-Pathenu tobang aumpon , Vanchung sanga cheng ahi !
19113006	Ahung kunjin , Van le leiset avei !
19113007	Leivui lah a konin vaichate akaithouvin , Angaicha chan agimnaa konin aphong dinge !
19113008	Amaho chu leng le lalte toh akijolsah-in , Amite milen milal ho toh akivopsah-e !
19113009	Numei ching nao neilou inching theiyin alhan , Cha aneisah-in kaipasah tai ! Vahchoiyun Pakai !
19114001	Israel chaten Egypt adalhah a , Hammah paomah gama Jacob chate apotdoh chun ;
19114002	Judah chu Pakai mitheng ahin , Israel chu agoulo gam ahi !

19114006	Vo Molsang ho , idia kelcha chop’a kichom nahiuvam ? Lhangsang hon idia kelngoi chop nathou ham ?

19114008	Songpi ho twikul sosah Songpi khikah a twisam putsah Pathen !
19115001	O Pakai , keiho joh hilouvin , Nang jeng bou Lungset longlou le nakitahna jal’in Namin choi-anin !
19115002	Ibol’a namtin vaipin , “ Na-Pathenu hoilam hitam ? ” atidiu ham ?
19115003	Ka-Pathenu van a cheng , Adei dei bol jeng ahi !

19115005	Semthu honk am aneiyun apao thiepoi , Mit aneiyun kho amupoi !
19115006	Nabeng aneiyun kho ajapon , Nahhom aneiyun gimnam ajapoi !

19116002	Kakou chanin Pakaiyin eihou jinge !
19116003	Kavel’a thi theina adimin , Lhankhuh kichan ka-umtai !

19118001	Thangvah-un Pakai nun nem , Tonsot kumkhon alungset jinge !

19119001	Nolnabeiya chon , Pakai Danthu jui Mihem chu anun nom’e !

19143012	Neingailut jal’in kamelmate that’in , Nalhacha kahi eidoubolte sumangin !
19144001	Eihoidama Pakai vahchoiyun ! Galbolje eihil’in galkon din eigonge !
19144002	Eipanpia eihoidampu , Kakiselna le huhhing , Hoidamna dia kaki-ngaina ahi ! Namtin vaipi eisotkunpeh tai !
19144003	Pakai , mihem ipi hiya hibanga nagelkhoh , Mihem chapa mai mai jong hibanga nakhohsah ?
19144004	Mihem hi haikhatseh bang hing , Ahin nikho jong nilim kihei mang bep ahi !
19144005	Pakai vanthamjol loikunin hung kumlhan , Molsang ho thamle chun meikhun len gmangunte !
19144006	Keh kisesah-in namelmate nocheh-in ! Nathalchang kap’in deljamin !
19144007	Chunga konin twithuh lah a neiloidoh-in , Namdangte ban thahat’a neichu lhan !
19144008	Amahon thudih la aseipouvin , Akihahselnau jong aseilepji tauve !
19144009	Vo Pathen kipa lathah sang ting , Semjang saiyin nahenga la sange !
19144010	Lengte gal najosah jin , Nalhacha David nahuhdoh-e !
19144011	Kamelma engsetea konin neihuhdoh-in , Namdangte ban thahat’a konin neihuhdoh-in ! Amahon thudih la aseipouvin , Akihahsaelnau jong aseilepji tauve !
19144012	Kachateu gollhang ho Thingtoi dong khanpha bangu hen ! Kachateu nu-ngah ho Leng inpi jepna khompah bangu hen !
19144013	Kachangpangu chang chichom chom dim hen ! Kaloujaovuva kelngoiten nou snagsom cheng hingu hen !
19144014	Bongpite nou pengsol le athol lha beiyin Neng jeng jungin pungu hen ! Kakholai dunguva Ka le mao ogin kija hih beh hen !
19144015	Hitobang vangphat chang Nam mi chu nun nom hen ! A-Pathenu Pakai hikha Nam mi chu nun nom hen !
19145001	Nachoi-an inge ka-Pathen , kelengpa ! Tonsot’in thangvah jing tange !
19145002	Niseh le thangvah ing ting , Tonsot’in vahchoi jing tange !
19145003	Pakai loupipen , loupitah a vahchoi lom ahi ! Aloupije kholsoh dan ahipoi !
19145004	Nathilbolsa akhang khangin vahchoi ding , Nathilbol loupije phongjal’unte !
19145005	Mihon nalal loupije seiyun tin , Keiman thil kidang nabolsagel jing inge !
19145006	Mihon nathilbol natsatje seiyuntin , Keiman naloupije phongjal inge !
19145007	Naphatna jouse seiyun tin , Namikhotoje lan sauvinte !
19145008	Milungset khoto them Pakai , Lungset thingset lung hangvah lou !
19145009	Mitin dia phasoh , Asemsa jouse lainatpi cheh !
19145010	Nasemsaten vahchoiyune Pakai ! Namiten thangvah-un nate !
19145011	Nalal loupe thaneije seiyuntin , Nathahat seichoi leuvinte !
19145012	Chuteng mitinin nathilbol natsatje , Nalenggam lal loupe seichoi leuvinte !
19145013	Tonsot’a vaihom jing , Tonsot len gloupi nahi ! Pakai-atepsa jousea akitah jingin , Abol jouse aphasoh keiye !
19145014	Gim genthei thohte apanpin , Alhute akaidinge !
19145015	Ganhing jousen kinemtah-in naveuvin , Aduchat jouse nape jinge !
19145016	Bulhingin nape jingin , Gilkel jouse navahva cheh-e !
19145017	Pakai hi abolchan a adih-in , Atoh chan a mi ahepi !
19145018	Pakai chu akoma lungthengsel’a Taote henga anai jinge !
19145019	Ajabolte ngaichat chan apen , Ataonai ngaiyin ahuhhingjie !
19145020	Ama ngailu chan ahoidamsel’in , Migiloute vang sumanginte !
19145021	Pakai vahchoi jing inge ; Asemsaten amintheng vahchoi cheh-un !
19146001	Vahchoiyun Pakai ! Kalhan Pakai vahchoiyin !
19146002	Kahinlaisen vahchoiying ting , Kahinkhon ka-Pathen vahchoi la sange !
19146003	Lengle lalte kisonpi dan , Mihemin huhhing joupon nate !
19146004	Mihemte athi teng vut asoh jin , Athilgon jouseu athi ni hin abeitai !
19146005	Jacob Pathen panpi chu anun nomin , Jacob Pakai Pathena ki-ngai chu anun nom’e !
19146006	Aman van le leiset , Twikhanglen le Asunga um jouse asemin ; Atepsa jouse abulhit jinge !
19146007	Bol hesohte khotonan thu atanin , Gilkelte neh ding an apei ! Sohchangte Pakaiyin alhadoh-in ;
19146008	Mitcho kho amusah-e ! Alhute akai dingin , midihte angailui !
19146009	Igamsunguva cheng gamchom mi ahoidamin , Meithai chaga akhoton , migiloute thilgonho asumange !
19146010	Pakai chu tonsot leng ahin , Vo Zion , na-Pathenintonsot din lengvai apoi ! Vahchoiyun Pakai !
19147001	Vahchoiyun Pakai ! I-Pathenu vahchoi la sah thilpha ahin , Avahchoi hi thildih , lung nachimna ahi !
19147002	Pakaiyin Jerusalem asemphan , Sohchang bulpute ahinlepuitai !
19147003	Lung kisihte adamsah-in , Amahau atomjolpeh tai !
19147004	Ahsi jat asimtoh-in , Amin cheh-in akouve !
19147005	Loupitah a thanei i-Pakaiyu ahin , Achihna tejou ahipoi !
19147006	Mi nun nen ho achoisangin , Migiloute tolgoi nan aneiye !
19147007	Pakai vahchoina la asauvin , I-Pathen diuvin tumging thei semjang saiyun !
19147008	Vanthamjol’a mei ajamsah-in , Gotwiyin leiset achap nouve ! Mol le lhanga hamhing apousah-e !
19147009	Gancha hing jouse neh ding apen , Va-ah nouten an athum teng Avahva soh keiye !
19147010	Sakol hattah ho akipapi pon , Sepai hangtah jong along lhaipi poi !
19147011	Alungset longlouva ki-ngaiya , Ama jabolte chunga bou akipah-e !
19147012	Vo Jerusalem Pakai vahchoiyin ! Vo Zion , na-Pathen vahchoiyin !
19147013	Nakulpi kotgol alhousah-in , Namite phatthei aboh jinge !
19147014	Nagamgi jouse ahongbit’in , Suhlou chang tuipenin navah-e !
19147015	Leiset’a thupeh aneiteng , Aseibangin akitongdoh jenge !
19147016	Buhbang ponphan aphan , Daibang vutvai kithejal abahsah-e !
19147017	Gel songchang kisunglha abahsah-in , Adapsah teng koima thoh jouhoi ahippoi !
19147018	Chuteng agahsei leh gel ajun lhan , hui anunsah le twiyin alonge !
19147019	Amite thu aseipeh-in , Danthu le ahilchahna Israelte Amahon jong Adanthu ahepouve ! Vahchoiyun Pakai !
19148001	VahchoiyunPakai ! Van miten Pakai vahchoiyun , Chunga chengten vahchoiyun !
19148002	Vanmi janel , Avantil jousen Vahchoiyun Pakai !
19148003	Ni le lhan vahchoiyun , Ahsi vahtah tahhon vahchoiyun !
19148004	Van chungnung penin jong vahchoiyin , Van vuma twipin jong vahchoiyin !
19148005	Abonchauvin Pakai min vahchoi cheh-u hen ! Ama thusah a kisem jeng ahiuve !
19148006	Pakai thusah a tonsot’a dia amun cheh akigol , Apalkeh lou diu gamgi kisempeh ahiuve !
19148007	Leiset’a konin vahchoiyun Pakai ! Lithuh lai jousea ngapi len lai jousen ;
19148008	Kolphe le gellen , buhbang le meilhang ho , Athupeh a nung huise jousen vahchoiyun !
19148009	Molle lhang sang jouse , Gammang thing gathei jousen vahchoiyun !
19148010	Vahngoisa le gamlah sanamkim , Tol a vah le chunga leng jousen vahchoiyun !
19148011	Mipite le leng jouse , Leng le lal , vaibol jousen ;
19148012	Nu-ngah gollhang , The le khang jousen vahchoiyun !
19148013	Abonchan Pakai min vahchoi cheh-u hen ! Amin loupipenin , aloupinan van le leiset akhokheltai !
19148014	Adeitah amite Israel ahatsah jal’in , Abonchan Pakai avahchoitauve ! Vahchoiyun Pakai !
19149001	vahchoiyun Pakai ! Pakai vahchoina lathah sauvin , Tahsan nei amite khoppi sunga vahchoiyun !
19149002	Nasempa chunga kipah-in Israel ! Nalengpa chunga kipah-un Zion mite !
19149003	Lamin amin vahchoiyun ! Avahchoi nan khong bengun semjang saiyuvin !
19149004	Pakai amite chunga akipah-in , Mi nun nemte choi-atnan gal ajosah tai !
19149005	Gal ajoteng Pathen mite kipah hen , Jan khovah-in kipa la sau hen !
19149006	Chemjam hemtah choiyin , Othongin Pathen vahchoiyu hen !
19149007	Namtin jousoh a Mitin talen matsah din ;
19149008	Alengtau somkonsoh a , Alamkai jouseu thih khaova hen din ;
19149009	Pathen thusah a namtin talen matsah dingin ! Hiche hi Pathen mite galjona ahi ! Vahchoiyun Pakai !
19150001	Vahchoiyun Pakai ! Ahouin a Pathen vahchoiyun ! Van a jong ahatna vahchoiyun !
19150002	Athilbol minthang ho jeh-in vahchoiyun ! Aloupina seithei loujal’in vahchoiyun !
19150003	Sumkon gin to thon vahchoiyun ! Theile mut le selangdah saiyin vahchoiyun !
19150004	Khong beh le lam to thon vahchoiyun , Semjang sai le kuli gin to thon vahchoiyun !
19150005	Khutbengun vahchoiyun ! Hamlah lah-in khut bengin vahchoiyun !
19150006	Ganhing namkimin Pakai vahchoiyun ! Vahchoiyun Pakai !
21001001	Jerusalem khopia leng chang , David chapa , michingthempa thusei ho chu hicheng hi ahi .
21001002	Michingthempan thil ijakai hi pannabei jengin aseiye . Hinkho jong pannabei , ijakai hi pannabei ahi .
21001003	Hinkhon cholle nangin na natongun , ahivangin ipi phatchomna vetsah ding naneiyum ?
21001004	Mihem khang akichaiyin khang chom chom ahungin , leiset la baep’in aum jinge .
21001005	Nisa la asona ngaiya asoh jingin , alhumna ngaiya alhumin , chille nangin ahung kipat kitna ding mun a akile kit’in ahi .
21001006	Hui jong sahle lhang , simle mal , kolkimvel’a avel vel’in anung kimvel vel jenge .
21001007	Vadung jouse Twikhanglen la along lut’in , Twikhanglen la adim deh poi . Twi chu luidung nah dunga ahung kipanlit’in , avel’in ahung kitol kit’e .
21001008	Thil ijakai cholna jeng ahin , chol aum behseh jengin seijou jai ahipoi . Mit la vet achimpoi .
21001009	Asohsa thil chu hung soh kit ding ahi . Akibolsa thil chu kibol kit ding ahi . Vannou pumpia hin thil thah aumpoi .
21001010	Mihon , “ ven , hikoma thil thah aum’e ! ” atiuve . Ahivangin hiche jong hi masang , ipen masangpeh-uva sohsa ahitai .
21001011	Masanglai thilsoh chu koiman ageldoh pon , tulai min jong khonung thilsoh ding le tukah a thilsoh ding geldoh ponte .
21001012	Michingthempa kei hi Jerusalem khopia , Israel chunga , leng kana change .
21001013	Vannoi leiset’a kibol kitong thil jouse hi kholchil ding , phot chet din kakiteptai . Pathenin mihem abolna vang hi nopna him him ahipoi .
21001014	vannoi leiset’a kibol thil jouse kamun , kaseipeh nahi , aboncha pannabei jeng hai . hui leng lai mat ding go bep akihi .
21001015	Akonsa le sujang theipon natin , aum loula simtha theipon nate .
21001016	Kalungthimin , “ kaminthang lheh tan , kamasanga Jerusalem a lengvaippote jouse sangin kachingjoi . Chihna le hetna jong ipi mong mong kiseina ahi kahetai , ” kati .
21001017	Hetna le ngolna kibah lou je , chih le ngol kibah louje hetdoh kagoi . Hichea jong hin hui lenglai mat godol’in kakihei .
21001018	Nachih cheh le nalung gimbe cheh , nahetbe jep le nalung natbe cheh ding ahi .
21002001	Nom satah a uma , nopna hi hatchet tei kagoi . Ahinla hiche jeng jong hi pannabei ahi kamu dohtai .
21002002	Nui ngolna ahiya , nopsah nan thilpha aso sah lou jong kahe dohtai .
21002003	Kachih nom behseh jeh-in , kisuh lipna din ju kadonin nom um ding kagoi . Leiset hinkho chomcha sunga hitia umding hi mihem dia thil phapen din kanegel’e .
21002004	Thil loupe tah tah katongdoh tai : in tampi kakisah-in , Lengpilei tampi kakibol’e .
21002005	Hon le pahcha lei kabol’in , thei gathei jouse kaphut’e ;
21002006	achap nouna ding twikul kalaiye .
21002007	Soh tampi kachon , ka-insunga peng den soh jong tampi kavul’e . Kamsasanga Jerusalema leng ho sangin kahaojon gancha tamjo kaneiye .
21002008	Kavaipohna gamsunga leng inpi thil kholna chengsea konin sana dangka kapokhomin kasevum leove . Kei nopsahna din numeiyin la asauvin , pasal deichat lom numei chamkim keiyin kaneiye .
21002009	Kaloupi lheh jengin , kamasanga Jerusalema cheng leng ho sangin loupin kaumdoh tan , kachihna athon ngaipoi .
21002010	Kadeichan kamun ; nopsahna thei kalhaso ngaipoi . Katohdoh chan kahoithopin , hiche hi katohman ahimaiye .
21002011	Hicheng tohdohna dia hahsa kathoh chengse kagel le imacha pang din aumdoh theipoi . Pannabei hui lenglai mat go bep kahi .
21002012	Akhonna kheh a leng khat’in abol thei chu leng masa ho bolsa chubou ahi . Hijeh chun hcihna le chihgil chule ngolna umdol hi kagel pantai .
21002013	Hiche vang hi kahetai — “ Chihna hi ngolna sangin aphajon , muthim sanga khovah phatchom tobang ahi .
21002014	Michingin kaselna ding akihet’in , mi-ngol’in kho amupoi , ” kati . Chule iboncha ithi cheh diu jong kahe dohtai .
21002015	Kalungin , “ Mi-ngol ho banga kathitei ding ahi . Achutile hibanga kahcih hi ipi kaphat chompim ? ” kati . Kei le ken , “ Thil imcha cha phat chompi kaneipoi , ” tin kaseiye .
21002016	Miching geldohna jong aumppon , mi-ngol geldodhna jong aumppoi . Khonung tengle koiman eigeldoh pouvinte . Miching mi-ngol iboncha itih cheh diu ahi .
21002017	Hijeh hin mihem hinkho hi imacha ding katipoi , ajehc hu hinkhon gim hesoh tilou adang ima eipetheipoi . Pannabei hel ahin , hui lenglai man go bep kanahi .
21002018	Katohsa le kabolsa chengse phatchom nan kaneipon , kakhel’a pang dinga dia kadalhah ding kahei ;
21002019	ama chu miching hithei , mi-ngol hithei-kon ija ahet’em ? Hoijoh hile katohsa , kachihnan hiche leiset’a atohdoh chengse , aman alo ding ahi . Aboncha pannabei jeng ahibouve .
21002020	Hibang hahsa na katoh chu kakisih lheh jenge .
21002021	Nachihna le nahetna , nathepna mangcha natohdoh chengse chu atong louhel khat nadalhah peh didng ahi . Pannabei hel , thil dih lou ahi !
21002022	Hinkhoa lung gim hesoh a na natoh a , ipi tohman nasan ding ham ?
21002023	Nahinlai damsunga natohdoh chengsen thil dang sodoh pontin , lung gimna le lung natna bou asodoh ding ahi . Janin jong lung ol’in naum thiepoi . Aboncha pannabei jeng ahi .
21002024	Mihem toh thei thilpha pen chu-atohga neh a don ding , nomsa tah aum didng hi ahi . Ahinla hiche jeng jong hi Pathen peh a kimubou ahi kahedoh tai .
21002025	Hiche tilou chu thil dang ipi neh a nomsa naum thei ding ham ?
21002026	Pathenin adei bolte chu chihna , hetna chule nopna apeh ahi ; chonsete vang natong sumhol’a apansah a , alodohsah a akholsah kit’a , Pathen lungtohte peh dia akoisah ahi . Aboncha hi pannabei bep , hui lenglai man dia kigo bep ahibouve .
21003001	Hiche vannoi leiset a thilsoh jouse hi Pathenin asosah nom phat dungjuiya soh cheh ahi .
21003002	Pen phat aumsah-in , thi phat aumsah-e ; Thing phu phat aumin , thing bodoh phat aum’e .
21003003	Suhlih phat aumin , boldam phat aum’e . Sahdoh phat aumin , phet lhah phat aum’e ,
21003004	Gim phat aumsah-in , nop phat aumsah-e ; Lunghem phat aumin , lam phat aum’e .
21003005	Kidei phat aumin , kihotphat aum’e ; Kichopto phat aumin , kichop lou phat aum’e .
21003006	Thil holdoh phat aumsah-in , thil mansah phat aumsah-e ; Loidoh phat aumin , semang phat aum’e .
21003007	Bo-eh phat aumin , khuibit phat aum’e ; Umthim phat aumin , paopoh phat aum’e .
21003008	Ki-ngai phat aumsah-in , kihot phat aumsah-e ; Kisat phat aumin , kicham phat aum’e .
21003009	Itoh gimchengseuva kona ipi imudoh-um ?
21003010	Pathenin pohgih hahsa eipohsah-u kahei .
21003011	Aman thil ijakai din phat kitoh che’tin akoiye , Khonung thu ding hetnomna eipeuvin , ahivangin athilbol lhingset’a het’a lung nachimpi ding eiphalpeh pouve .
21003012	Hijeh chun ihinlai damsunguva itoh thei chan toh a nopsah pi ding hi toh thei penin kahei .
21003013	Ibonchauva itohga neh a don ding , nopsah pi ding ahi . Hiche hi Pathen thilpeh ahi .
21003014	Pathen thilbol jouse beitih neilou ding kahei . Bolbe thei jong hilou , lahdoh thei jong hilou ahi . Pathen thilbol khat chu-ibonchauva Ama eiginsah got’u ahi .
21003015	Thilsoh ho le asoh ding ho hi asohsa ahitai . Asohsa chu Pathenin avel vel’a asosah ahibouve .
21003016	Achung chonin , vannoiya hin thudih kiseiya thildih bolna dinga gitlouna namudoh ding kahetai .
21003017	Kachangseh-in , “ Thilsoh jouse le thil kibol chengse hi aphat dungjui cheh a soh ahijeh-in , Pathenin midih le migilou thu kibanga atan ding ahi , ” tin kagel’e .
21003018	Eiho hi ganchate sanga phajo deh lou ihiu vetchetna dia Pathenin eipatep dol’un kahei .
21003019	Hoi hileh-mihem hihen gancha hileh thei cheh ding ahi . Khat thi banga jong thi thou ahi . Ahoi hoi hiya thilsem gel ahi . Mihem jong gancha sangin aphachom dehpoi , ajehc hu hoijoh ding ahin hinlo aumpoi .
21003020	Mun khat ajot lhon a , leivui sohgel ding ahi . Leivuiya kisemgel , leivui sohgel ding ahi .
21003021	Mihem lhagao van a akaldoh mongin , gancha lhagao lei noiya ache monge , ti kon asei thei dang ham ?
21003022	Hijeh chun thilpha pen a kagel chu itohsa chunga lung nom a um ding hi ahi . Bol thei dang ineipouve . Ithi nung tengu ipi aso ding hetdoh theina lampi ineipouvin ahi .
21004001	Vannoi leiset’a thil dihlou kibol chengse kavei . Bolsetna thohte aka vangun koiman apanpi deh poi . Abolsetau chu thanei thu neiloi ahijeh-un koiman apanpi nagmpoi .
21004002	Thia mangsa ka-otchajo tai ; ahing nalaiho sangin amaho chun nom asajouve .
21004003	Athi le ahing sanga phajo cheh kit chu-apen a peng lou , vannoiya thil dihlou kibol mukha louhel ho chu ahiuve .
21004004	Mihon hibanga kihanlhoten a na atoh-u jong kahe dohtai ; midang tohna thangset jal’a abol’u ahi . Hijongle hiche jong hi pannabei ahibouve . Hui lenglai mat ding kigo bep ahi .
21004005	Amahon khut kikhoitum a an ngol’a thia chu angol’in bou aseiyui .
21004006	Dih khat nante , ahivnagin khut ong man louhel’a hui lenglai mat ding goa kiseimo jeng sangin , lung ol heocha themcha bou nei aphajoi .
21004007	Ken hinkho sunga pannabei khat jong kamudoh-e .
21004008	Pasal khat hi achangseh-in achenge . Cha la neipon , sopi jeng jong aneipoi ; ahivangin umthim thei louvin na atongin , anei chasun along lhaipipoi . Koi ding bep ngaitoa kicholdoh man louhel’a hibanga na atoh ham ? Hiche hi pannabei , hinkho hahsa tah ahibouve .
21004009	Khatseh sangin mi ni aphajoi , ajeh chu mi ni akitho theiye .
21004010	Khat joh sang lhu lhon jongle khat’in aphong ding theiye . Mi khatseh vang chu lhu ta le aphong ding aumtapoi .
21004011	Adap teng mi nin lumkhom alum asah thei ahin , nachangseh a iti lum nasah diu ham ?
21004012	Mi khat nan lel chu mi nin ananjou tei ding ahi . Khao jang thum kihel lhop botan hahsa ahi .
21004013	Leng tehse mi-ngol , thumop sang lou hisangin , vaicha khangdodng miching hi aphajoi .
21004014	Hitobang gollhang chu songkul lutsa leng hung chang hijongle , vaicha chaga cha peng hijeng jongle aphajo nalaiye .
21004015	Vannoiya cheng mihem jouse kagel’in , hoikom ham alah-uva gollhang khat pen chu lengpa mun hilo ding umkahedoh tai .
21004016	Lengin vai apohna sunga hin mipi simsen lou unman tin , lengpa athi teng atohsah koiman gelpha ponte . Hiche hi pannabei , hui lenglai mat dia kigoa tobang ahi .
21005001	Houin kaidol ching theiyin . Kho pholou mi-ngolten abol’a kilhaina thil moh to to jeng sanga , thu ngaiya kihil them dia Houin kai aphajoi .
21005002	Napaodoh masangin geltoh masan , chule geltoh louvin Pathen koma kitepna bol jeng dan . Pathen van a um , nang leiset’a um bou nahin , nasei dia lombep kalval’in imacha sei hih-in .
21005003	Nalung gim cheh le mangse naneibe cheh thei , thu nasei tam chan a ngol-hoi thu naseidoh be thei ahi .
21005004	Pathen koma kitepna naneikhah le , tong doh loi jengin , Pathenin mi-ngol adeipoi , bol dia naseisa chu bol jengin .
21005005	Kitepsa bolda sangin , kitepna him him boldan aphajoi .
21005006	Naseisan kipal dan , Pathen Thempu jah a geldoh louva nabol’in seidan . Idia Pathen nakiphin lung hang ding ham ? Nabolse chu i-bol’a nasuh mangsah ding ham ?
21005007	Mangle bul ijat neiyin lang , pannabei na ijat tongin , thu ijat sei jongle chun , Pathen nagin tei tei ding ahi .
21005008	Leiset vaipoten vaichate abol hesoh a , thu dih tanpeh louva , achan diu lom apeh da namu jongle datmo hih-in . Vaihom thunei jouse chu asanga lenjo khat cheh-in ave-lhi , alenpen jong chu alen cheh khat’in avet lhi jing ahi.
21005009	Lengpa jong alalna lhosoh chunga ki-ngam ahibouve .
21005010	Sum nadei behseh le , itih-in jong lung nachimna neipon natin ; hao lung nagul le , nadei chanmusoh pon nate . Pannabei ahibouve .
21005011	Nahao cheh le naneh peh ding jong tambe cheh ahi . Naphat chompi pen chu nahao nahet tho chu ahibep’e .
21005012	Natong jing vang chun neh kham kimu hen kimu hih jongle nomsel’in a-ihmu theiyin , mihao vang chu anei lung jin pin ihmu mon akhovah jitai .
21005013	Vannoiya thil melse tah khat kamui ; mihon khonunga nom neh dingin sum akhol khol’un ,
21005014	ahivangin hamsetna khat jeh hamin amoh suh mang hel jiuvin , atu acha ding khen louhel’in aumlo jitauve .
21005015	Imacha polut louva vannoiya ihung lut bangun , pohdoh neilouvin adalhaji tauve . Tong gim lheh jong leu hen ipohdodh theiyu khat cha aumpoi .
21005016	Dih louhel ahi ! Ihung lut banguva potdoh kit ahiuve . Itong gim’un , hui lenglai mat ding geiyin igo’uvin , ipi ikimu’vem ?
21005017	Mitsin khojin le gim hesoh thoh-in ihingun , lung gim le lung phamo chule nat hesoh ithoh-ui .
21005018	Hiche hi kamudoh bep’e . Thilpha pen chu min Pathenin apeh ahinkho chom cha sunga hi atohga alhosoh ne le don a nop sahna anei hi ahi ; hiche hi mihem chan ahibep’e .
21005019	Pathenin mihem chu haole gou pehen , nop sahnan neisah le atoh lo chu kipa pinte . Hiche hi Pathe thilpeh ahi .
21005020	Pathenin nomsan akoiyin , hinkho chomje chu khohsa behseh ponte .
21006001	Vannoiya hin thil dihlou kibol khat kamui .
21006002	Pathenin mihem khat nei le gou , jabolna , ijakai adeichan apen , ahivangin hicheng chu nop sahnan aneisah hih beh-e . Apeh louhel khat’in nopsah nan aneijie . Hiche hi pannabei hel , thil dih lou tah ahi .
21006003	Mihem khat’in cha ja khat jen nei hen sotpi hing hen , itih chan ahin vangin nop sahna neikha louhel le phate keichan kivui hihle , apenlhah lhah a thipai jeng naosen ma aphajoi , tin kagel’e .
21006004	Hiche naosen chu apenlo vang umlou , mitsin khojin gam alut kit , koiman geldoh kit lou ahitai .
21006005	Nisa vah jong mupha lou , mihem hinkho umje jong helou ahin , kichol dona beh vang akimui .
21006006	Kum sangni jen hing jongle hin nopna hephalou mihem sangin aphajoi . Anigel lhon’a mun khat jon a che lhon ahi .
21006007	Mihemin atoh chan kamsung ding ahin , chimla achimdeh poi .
21006008	I-atile mi-ngol sanga miching phajo ham ? Mi vaichan hinkho manje ahet them chun ipi aphat chomsah mong ham ?
21006009	Pannabei she , hui lenglai mat go bep ahi . I-khat ngaicha jinga um sanga nanei lung lhaipi chu thil phajo ahi .
21006010	Thilsoh jouse hi aso masanga gontohsa ahitan , mihemin asanga hatjo akinelpi thei lou jong ihecheh-ui .
21006011	Nakinelpi sot chan a pha mo cheh ahin , phatchom nan naneideh poi .
21006012	Nisa lim banga kihei mang loi , hiche pannabei hinkho chomcha sunga hi mihemin ahinkho dia thilpha iti akihet thei ding ham ? Athi nung teng leiset’a thilsoh ding kon ija ahet thei ding ham ?
21007001	Min phat hi thao namtui sangin aphajon , napen nikho sangin nathi in aphajoi .
21007002	Golvah na in a lhah sangin lunghemna in a che aphajoi , ajeh chu mihing jousen athi ding sumil louvin aum theiye .
21007003	Nui sangin lungkham aphajoi ; maiso hoimo sah jongle , lungthim he themna apetheijoi .
21007004	Nopsah ding jeng gel mihem chu a-ngol’ah ahi . Michingin thina bou agelkhoh-e .
21007005	Mi-ngolten navahchoi la sah sangun , naphoh ding miching nanei aphajoi .
21007006	Mi-ngol nuigin chu linghema belto kihet tobang ahin , ajeh apol beihel ahibouve .
21007007	Michingin mi alepthol teng ngolchon ahitai . Nehguh nalah teng naming phat kisuhmang nahi .
21007008	Thil ijakai akipatna sangin akichina aphajoi . Kiletsah sangin thoh hat aphajoi .
21007009	Lung han gloi hih-inl lung ul jing hi ngol thubuh bou ahi .
21007010	Itih-in jong , “ Itia tulai sanga masanga thil phajo ham ? ” tin sei hih hel’in . Hiche hi chih hoi thudoh ahipoi .
21007011	Mihing jouse chih lom tah ahi ; chihna hi gou kilamdoh tobang ahin ,
21007012	sumin asemdoh thei banga lungmon napethei ahi . Chihnan nahoidoh sah thei ding ahi-hiche hi hetna phat chomna ahi .
21007013	Pathen thilbolsa gel’in . Pathenin asemkonsa chu kon ahejang thei ding ham ?
21007014	Thil ijakai aphat thei pet le kipah-in , gim hesoh hung lhun teng , nopna le gimna Pathen a kon gel ahi geldoh-in ; akit teng thilsoh ding ipi ahi nahepoi .
21007015	Pannabei kahinkho sung hin thil ijakai kamusoh tai ; mipha thi thi jeng thei , migilou hing hing jeng thei ahi .
21007016	Hijeh chun phat behseh le chih behseh bol dan-idia nang le nang nakitha ding ham ?
21007017	Engset val le ngol val jong boldan-idia naphat masanga nathi ding ham ?
21007018	Chonval tho dan . Hougut nahile lolhing thouvin nate .
21007019	Vaipo som khat’in khopi khat akithopi sangin , chihna hin mi ahatsah joi .
21007020	Leiset’a hin bol khel neilou thildih bol jing koima aumpoi .
21007021	Mi sei jouse ngai hih-in , nasoh pan nahoutom na jong jadoh get’in nate .
21007022	Nangin jong tamtah vei midang nahoutom nakihet chu me .
21007023	Chihnan hicheng hi kapatep soh tai . Chih ding kago lheh nan sophan hoi ahipoi .
21007024	Hinkho umje dol hedoh jou ding koiham ? Eiho din athuh val’in , hetdoh hahsa tah ahi .
21007025	Hijongle het ding gultenin sim kagon ; chihna holdoh tei kagon , kahetnom cheng donbutna mudoh a , ngolna phatmo dan mong mong photchet ding kagoi .
21007026	Hichea hin thina sanga khohjo khat kamudoh-e . Hichu numei ahi . Numeiyin nadeichat teng thangkam kilhopel khah le khaova kihen nabah ding ahi ; numeiyin nakoichah den teng thih khaova kihen bang bang hin nate . Pathen lung deiya chonpa vang jam doh nan tin , chonsepa vang oh den ding ahitai .
21007027	Michingthempan aseiyin , thil ijakai kakhol tohnaa kona hiche hi athem thema kamudoh ahi , tin aseiye .
21007028	Thildang kahol vangin khatcha jong kamudohpoi . Pasal sang khat lah a jabol theidol khat bou kamun , numei khatcha jong kamupoi .
21007029	Hicheng hi kasimdoh ahi ; Pathenin baikhen cha eisemdoh-u ahin , eiho le eiho kisunoh den ahiuve .
21008001	Michingin bou thil ho umdol ahethem’e . Chihnan mail lhaisel’in aumsah-in , amelse aselpeh theiye .
21008002	Lengpa sei sei bol’in , geltoh louvin Pathen koma kitepna neiloi hihin .
21008003	Lengpan abolnom nom abol thei ahi , hijeh chun a-angsunga konin potdoh loiyin , tijat umtah mun ahin umsot dan .
21008004	Thuneina neiya lengpa thil bol ahin , athilbol phoh ngam aumpoi .
21008005	Athupeh nanit chan a nadia pha , michingin bou itih a ipi bol ding akihet thieye .
21008006	Thil ijakai hi adih a bol phat umcheh ahi , eihon imacha ihepouve !
21008007	Thil hungsoh dingla ihepouvin , eiseipeh theiyu jong koima aumpoi .
21008008	Koima thilou thei aumpon , nathina ding nikho vochon thei jong aumpoi . Hiche hi ijamdoh thei lou nau galmun ahi ; lepthol’in jamdoh theipoute .
21008009	Vannoiya thil , kibol na kitong chengse kagel gelle hicheng hi kamudoh-e , vannoiya hin mihem thanei phabep noiya adangsen gim hesoh athoh-e .
21008010	Ahimonge , migiloute thia lhana akivui kamun , lhanphunga konin in lam jot pet’in , masanga thilse tampi abolnau khopia mihon , migilou kavuisa ho pachatna thu aseiyui . Hiche hi mohseh mong ahi .
21008011	Ipi dia mipin thilse amoh bol bol jeng ham ? Thilse bolte talen kimatsah vah vah loujeh ahi .
21008012	Chonsen thilse ja khat cheng bol jongle ahing thei thei nalaiye . Hiche hon asei kahedoh tai , “ Pathen thu nanit pou le ima tiponte ,
21008013	amavang migilouvin hoidohna neiponte . Ahinkhou la nisa lim kihei bep , Pathenthu angai loujeh-uva donthi diu ahi , ” atiuve .
21008014	Ahinla hiche hi ngol thubuh ahi . Vannoiya ipi soh tam ; abang kom le midih-in migiloutalen mat ding amanin , migilouvin midih kipaman san ding asange . Hijeh chun pannabeiyin kaseiye .
21008015	Min nom asah ding bou dihjon kageltai ; ajeh chu ahinkho lung nopna pen chu aneh a adon a nomsa um ding hi adeipen ahi . Hiche beh hi vannoiya Pathenin apeh hinkho anei laisunga abol thei ahi .
21008016	Kichihsah a vannoiya thilsoh hetdoh kagot chanin , sun le jan a hah khovah vah , tou nilhum thei nahi ,
21008017	Pathen thilbol khat beh nahetdoh thei louhel ding kahedoh tai . Itobanga khohsah-in gut jongle chun mudoh jou deh pon nate . Michingten het go nauvin tin , hedeh pouvinte .
21009001	Hiche thudol hi sopi le giltah-in kagel’in , Pathenin michingte le midihte natoh thilbol jouse athu nunin , angailut nau le amihot nau geiyin athu thun ahei theiye . Mihem koiman amsanga thilsoh ding ahepoi .
21009002	Imacha akikhenna aumpoi . Midih le migilou , mipha le miphalou , hougut le houbei , kilhaina thilto pe jingle pelou-kibanga thi cheh diu ahi . Mi chonse sangin mipha aphachom deh pon ; kihahsel bolpa jong abol loupa sangin apha dehpoi .
21009003	Mi jouse kibanga thi cheh diu ahin , hiche jeng jong hi vannoiya thilsoh lah a dih lou thou thou ahi . Mihemte ahin leisen alung sungu thilse le ngolna dim , het man louva thiji ahiuve .
21009004	Amavang mihing gamsunga cheng chun kinepna phabep aneiteiye ; uicha hin ghcu sakei thisa sangin aphachom’e .
21009005	Ahing’an thi ding akihet’in , athisan vang ima ahetapoi . Kipaman san ding jong anei tapouvin , koiman ageldoh tapouve .
21009006	Angailutnau le ahotnau , alung gul’u aboncha thi tha ahitauve . Hiche vannoiya thilsoh lah a pang kit louhel ding ahitauve .
21009007	Chen kipah thanomin an kineh-in ; lengpitwi kidonin lang kisuhal’in . Pathen din aphanai .
21009008	Halpel’in thanom jing jengin .
21009009	Vannoiya Pathenin pannabei hinkho naneisah sungsen nadeitah naji to nomsa lhonin . Pannabei nikho ho hi nomsan mangin , hibou chu nacholman ahibep’e .
21009010	Natoh chan thakhen louhel’in tongin , ajeh chu nachena ding noimigama chun toh dingle lunggel , hetna le chihna jong abeitai .
21009011	Kahetdoh kit thil khat chu-vannoiya hin lhai hatpa jengin jong kilhai tet ajoudeh pon , gal-hangpan jong gal ajo jing ahideh poi . Michingin neh le chah akimuchom a , lungthim chingin haona anei chom a , atongthempan tohmun sang alo chom deh ahipoi . Mitinin toset atoh cheh theiye .
21009012	Itih a i-nati ding phat nakihetpoi . Hetman louva vacha thang-oh bang le , nga len a kijeldoh tobanga igel loupet tah-uva phat gilou khat’a oh denji ahiuve .
21009013	Thilchom beh khat , vannoiya chihna itidol’a kigel vetkah phatah khat jong kamudoh-e .
21009014	Mihem tam beh lou chenna , khopi neo thim khat aum’e . Leng thanei tah khat hin adel khumtai . Khopi chu aum chah kheh-in , pal voh chim din agoi .
21009015	Khopi sunga hin mi vaicha , ahivanga khopi huhdoh theina khop a ching khat acheng’e . Ahinla koiman ama chu iman agelpoi .
21009016	Ken kaei jing chu-chihna hi thahat sanga phachomjo ahin , hijongle koiman vaichapa chu michingin agelpon , asei jong koiman ngaisah-in aneippoi .
21009017	Mi-ngolte kikhopnaa lengpa kisen gin ngai sangin , thip beh cha miching houlim ngai aphajoi .
21009018	Chihnan gal manchah kimang sangin na ahatoh jon , ahin chonse khat’in thilpha tampi bolsa asuse theiye .
21010001	Thicheng phung thoulhen thao namtui kithe jong a-uisah theiyin , ngolna them khat’in chihna loupitah tah asumang hel theiye .
21010002	Michingin thildih bol’a , mi-ngol’in thildih lou bol hi chon ngai dol mong ahi .
21010003	Mi-ngol ngolna chu hephah lou lampi dunga akitopin jong ahedoh theiye ; aman angol chu mitin ahetsah jin ahi .
21010004	Nachunga vaipon nalung han teng , haina lekha peh dan ; umthim beh le chun bol khel melse tah geiya ngaidam um thei ding ahi .
21010005	Vannoiya hin thil dohlou-vaihomten thil dih lou tah abol’u kamudoh tai .
21010006	Mi-ngolte panmun len lai lai apeuvin , mihao ho nahsah louvin aumsah tauve .
21010007	Soh ho sakol chunga touvin , milen milal ho kengin acheuvin ahi .
21010008	Khuh laile chun nang lhalut’in natin , pal tumjal le chun gul’in nachuh ding ahi .
21010009	Songtum tangle chun songin nasekhah ding ahi . Thing ehle chun thinghal’in nasekhah ding ahi .
21010010	Naheicha mol’a nol-hem louvan hatuh a natuh ngai ahi . Thil ijakai gontoh masah chu chihna joh ahi .
21010011	Gul nakihcuh masah sah thei le nagul saithemlo aumpoi .
21010012	Michingin thu aseiteng min agin lon , mi-ngol vang aseisaa thi ahibouve .
21010013	Chapang thu jeng thupat nan aneiyin , ngol thubuh-in achaiye .
21010014	Mi-ngol’in thuchaije helouvin asei sei jengjie . Khonung thilsoh ding koiman ahepon , ithi nung tengu thilsoh ding eihil theiyuva jong koima aumpoi .
21010015	Mi-ngol inlam jotle jong kihet lou mi chu natoh achimvah jin ahi .
21010016	Lengpa achapan behseh a , lamkaiten jan khovah vah agolnop abol teng gamsungin hahsa athoh lo jie .
21010017	Ama chamtah a thu ngahna semdoh thei leng le aphat cha neh le chah kijon thei , kitim them a jukham lou lamkaite neikhaa gamsung chu ahampha ahiuve .
21010018	Mihem athaset behseh a inchungse lai tholbit nom lou chu , go vantin , in lhuh lo ding ahi .
21010019	Golvah hin nakipasah-in , judon hin nalipsah chom nai ; ahivangin sum beiyin khat’a khat jong nabol theipoi .
21010020	Guh thim hijongle lengpa seiset dan , najalkhun thip sung hijongle mihao chu seise hih-in . Naseidoh chu vacha khat touvin pontin agaseipeh thei ahi .
21011001	Gamchom mito kiveikhom nan sum toh le chun , tu tiphat khat le sumkan namu tei ding ahi .
21011002	Muntin gamtin a sum koisoh keiyin , ajeh chu hiche vannoiya hi itobang hamsetna nato ding nakihet masahpoi .
21011003	Thingphung chu hoilam pen ngan lhu jongle , alhuhnaa chu kijam den jeng ding ahi . Meilhang ajin teng go ajuijie .
21011004	Huile go khophat kito phat ngah a natong louva naumle lho lhung ding neipon nate .
21011005	Numei naobu sunga naosen hinkhothah hung kipat nahet thei lou banga thil ijakai sem Pathen natoh thilbolje nahet thei lou ding ahi .
21011006	Jingkah nilhah-in muchi tun , natulut chan pha , khangdoh doh ding ham , alah a khatseh bou khangdoh ding ham nahepoi .
21011007	Sunlai khovah hi nomsahna dinga nomtah ahi .
21011008	Nahinkhon kum lhunseh le kipah-in . Itih chan hing jongle chun sot louva nathi ding geldoh jingin . Kinemtah a nga jing ding jong aum sampoi .
21011009	Vo khangdong , nakhangdon kipapin ! Nakhangdon pat’in kipah jingin . Nabolnom nom bol’in , nadei deiyin chonin . Amavnag ipi hile nabol chan chu Pathenin thu natanpeh ding geldoh jingin .
21011010	Imacha lung gimpi dan , thoh lel jong nei hih-in . Khangdong sot ding naihpoi .
21012001	“ Kahin nomtapoi , ” natina ding-ni le lha kum ho hunglhun masang , nakhangdon pet hin Nasempa geldoh jingin !
21012002	Nateh teng-nisa vah le lha vah , ahsite vah geiyin nang din thimtan tin , namaiya meibol jing tobang dingahi .
21012003	Chuteng nakihonna banjangte ni kithingin tin , tua hatna lai nakengte ni hung thabei ding , naha pulsoh a , lhom behseh ding-an nalhaimo ding , namit thim a namu chen thei lou ding ahi :
21012004	Na-ngongin natin , kholai dung husa jatapon nate . Sumheiya chang kigot gin le tumging thei kitum jacheo cheovin natin , ahivangin vacha hamin kinkhangin nate .
21012005	Khousang laiya kaldoh ngam pon natin , chele vale jong tijat umtante . Nasem kangin tin , kisuh hei kitouhei hahsa nasah a , imacha lung gul naneilou ding ahitai . Ngahmun jon a che ihitauvin , kholai dunga ka le lunghem umtante .
21012006	Dangla khang kobottan ding sana thaomei hung lhaa keh ding twikul’a twi thalna khao tan a twibel lenglhaa kitatjal ding ahi .
21012007	Itahsapheu leiset’a kile kit’a leivui soh ding , hinna hu hi eipeuva Pathen henga kile kit ding ahi .
21012008	Pannabei seh-in michingthempan aseiyin , aboncha hi pannabei hel’in aseiye .
21012009	Michingthempa hi achih jal’in mipi chu ahet jouse ahil jing jeng theiye . Thuchihho kihilna aneiyin , adihjeu apatep cheh-e .
21012010	Michingthempan lungmonna thuh holdoh agon , asutdoh thucheng ho hi thu kitah jeng ahi .
21012011	Michingte thusei ho hi kelngoi chingten kelngoi hoikhomna aman’u tenggol lhoutah tobang ahin , thuchih kidong khom ho jong thilkil’a kikhendet kheh banga umsot ding ahi . Hicheng hi kelngoi chin a Eichingpau Pathen thilpeh ahi .
21012012	Kachapa , kichih theina ding khat auim nalaiye . A-ngahbu ajobu um louva lekha kijih jing ahi , hasim behseh hi nacholsah bep hinte .
21012013	Hijat kalval hin seibe ding thil khat aum’e : Pathen gingin , athupeh chengse nit’in ; ajeh chu hiche dinga hi mihem asemdoh ahi .
21012014	Thil ijakai-apha hihen ase hileh , guh thima kibol ho geiya Pathenin ibol ho’u cuhnga ithuu atan cheh ding ahi .
28001001	Judah gama Uzziah le Jotham , Ahaz chule Hezekiah lal lai le Israel gamsunga Jehoash chapa Jeroboam lal laiya Beeri chapa Hosea kama Pakai thusei chu hiche hi ahi .
28001002	Pakaiyin Hosea henga thu asei masah chun akoma hitin aseiye , “ Ji gakipui le chun numei chavai soh-in tin , nachateu jong anuu to bangunte . Kamiten jong eidalhah-uva kitah lou , chavai soh ahitauve , ” ati .
28001003	Hiti hi Hosea’n Diblaim chanu , Gomer chu akichenpi . Chapa khat anei nung lhonin
28001004	Pakaiyin Hosea jah a , “ Apu Jehun Jezreel phaiya tol atha jeh a Israel lengpa talen kamatsah vah ding jeh-in nachapa min hi ‘ Jezreel ’ sah-in . Jehu leng vai neina kasuh bei ding ahi .
28001005	Chuteng Jezreel phaiya Israel sepai tha neina kasuh bei ding ahi , ” ati .
28001006	Gomerin cha numei khat aneikit’in ahi . Pakaiyin Hosea jah a , “ Israelte ngailu louva , achonset nau jong ka-ngaidam tah lou sing jeh-in nachanu hi amin ‘ Ngailutlou ’ sah-in .
28001007	Judah mite vang ngailu nange . Kei-Pakai , a-Pathen’un amaho huhhing ing ting , galmun a chemjam le thalpi , chule thalchang ham sakolte ham le sakol touthemte ham manchah a bol kagot ahipoi , ” ati .
28001008	Gomer chanun noi aban nungin Gomerin nao avop kit’in chapa khat ahing’e .
28001009	Hosea jah a Pakaiyin , “ Israelte hi kamite ahitapouvin , keijong a-Pathenu kahitapoi , hiijeh chun nachapa hi amin ‘ Kamite-hilou ’ sah-in , ” ati . Israel Pathenin asemphat ding
28001010	Israelte hi mihem simsen lou le tejou lou , Twikhanglen panga neldi jat pha diu ahi . Tun Pathenin ajah-uva aseiyin , “ Kamite nahitapouve , ” atin ; hijongle , “ Hingjing Pathen chate nahiuve ! ” atina ding nikho hung lhung ding ahinalaiye .
28001011	Chuteng Judahte le Israelte kigom kit diu ahi . Achunguva lamkai khatseh kilhen’untin , agamsunguva phatheiya khongtou diu ahi . Ahi , Jezreel nikho chu lamdang tah hinte !
28002001	Hijeh chun name Israelte chu , “ Pathen mite , Pakai ngailut ho , ” tin minvon .
28002002	Vo kachate , kaji bangin umta hih hen lang , keijong aji hita hih jong leng , nanuu gajol’un . Notia apan a mito ajon jon khu jol lhauvin ngahsah-un .
28002003	Angah louhel le avon jouse lahpeh ing ting , apen nikho banga akeova kalha ding ahi . Gamkang golah bahsah ing ting , dangchah a kathisah ding ahi .
28002004	Achate jong khohsah-in hepi ponge , ajeh chu jum helou noti cha ahibouvui .
28002005	Amapi jong , “ Kadongmate koma lut leng , neh le chah eipeuvin tin , samul pon le tupat ponnem eipeh-uva , olive thao le ju eidonsah diu ahi , ” ati .
28002006	Hiche nu hi lingle khao kaikhum ing ting , pal kaget khum ding , alampi kakha bing ding ahi .
28002007	Adongma ho delle le jongle , maipha pon tin , gahol hol jongle muponte . Chuteng , “ Kaji masapa henga kile kit tenge , tulai sangin chulaiyin nom kasajoi , ” tinte .
28002008	Baal hou nan nei jongle , sana la dangka , olive thao , lengpitwi le chang pejing hi Kei kahilam ahedoh hih hel’e .
28002009	Hijeh a chu lho lhun tengle kathilpeh-chang le lengpitwi kile lah ing ting , samul pon le tupat ponnem kapehsa jong kalahpeh a ponsil beiya kakoi ding ahi .
28002010	Adongmate angsunga akeovin jam ing ting , koiman kakhut’a eichu lhah jou louhel ding ahi .
28002011	Kumhei golnop abol chengse , kumlhun kut hihen , lha lhin kut hile , Choldo nikho kut ahiya , houthua kikhopna abol jouse kasuh tang hel ding ahi .
28002012	Ama deichat sum a adongmaten apeh a asei , alengpigui ho le atheichang phung ho kasuhgam peh ding ahi . Alengpilei ho le apahcha lei jouse gammang lai kasosah ding , gamsaten achil thang diu ahi .
28002013	kei eisuh mil a Baal houna gimnamtui ahalnam a , sanapah a kijem a adongmae adelle le lai , chuche phat angolna jeh a chu talen kamatsah tei ding ahi . Pakaiyin aseisa ahitai .
28002014	Hiche nu hi gammang noiya pui lut ing ting , onem heova houva kathu nun ding ahi .
28002015	Hiche nu hi alengpilei nungpeh ing ting , gimna phaicham jong kinepna kotpi kasosah ding ahi . Hikoma hin anu-ngah laiya bangin kasei ngai nante , Egypt’a kona ahungdoh til’a abol bang chun .
28002016	Chutengle ajinpan eikou kit’in tin , ama dinga Baal eiti kit louhel ding ahitai .
28002017	Baal min him him kaphah pohsah lou didng ahi .
28002018	Hiche tengle kamite asuh khah louna diuva gamsate le vachate ti kitepna kasem ding ahi . Gamsunga gal manchah pou pou , chemjam jouse le thalpi jouse kasuhmang ding , kamite lung ol le lung monga kachensah ding ahiuve .
28002019	Vo Israel , jia kanei ding , Nadia kitah tah le dihtah kahiya , Long louvin lungset ing ting , kahepia Katonsot gouva kasem ding kani .
28002020	Kakitepna nit’a Keiya kasem ding , Nangin Pakaiya nei nei ding ahi .
28002021	Hiteng chule kamite Israel taona sang ing ting , Leiset’a gotwi kanensah ding ,
28002022	Leiset’in gaphatah tah , Changle lengpiga , olive apunsah ding ahi .
28002023	Gamsunga kamite chensah ing ting , Kaphat tousah ding ahi . “ Ngailut lou , ” kitiho ngailung ting , “ Kamite hilou , ” kiti ho chu “ Kamite , ” tia kasei ding , Amahon , “ Ka-Pathenu , ” tia eidonbut diu ahi .
28003001	Pakaiyin kajah a aseiyin , “ Akideipi to chonse jing numei khat gahel’in . Doichom chom houvu hen , milimdoi ho hounan lengpithei changlhah toh jingo jongle Israelte ka-ngailut jing banga , hiche numei chu na-ngailut tei tei ding ahi , ” eiti .
28003002	Hijeh chun hiche nu man din dangka som le nga kapen , sakol chang kilogram ja le som nga pen kagachoi .
28003003	Hiche nu hin sotpi ei-nga , notia jong pang lou ding , pasal dangto jong jong lou din kaseipeh-e . Kenjong ama ka-nga jing din kaseiyin ahi .
28003004	Hitobanga chu Israelte jong phat sotpi leng le lamkai bei , kilhaina gan that lou , doikhom song jong phut lou , phunsanna dinga milimdoi ho le milim sem louva um diu ahi .
28003005	Israelte hi Pakai a-Pathenu henga ahung kihei phat khat hung lhungin tin , David chilhah leng khat koma hung kikhom diu ahi . Chuteng Pathen ging’un tin , thilpha apeh chengse kisan tauvinte .
28004001	Hiche gamsunga chengte douna Pakaiyin hehsetna khat apohdoh ahi . Ngaiyin Israel Pakai thusei hi : “ Gamsunga kitahna le ngailutna alengpoi , amiten jong Kei hi Pathenin eigel pouve .
28004002	Kitepna abol chengseu la apal keh jiuvin , jou aseiyun , tol athat’un , aguchauvin , chule akijonbol’ui . Chonval la apung cheh cheh-in , tol la akithat that jengtai .
28004003	Gamsung hung go-lhan tin , ijakai gopsoh ding ahi ; gancha jouse le ganhing ho , ju le va , nga ho geiya thigam ding ahiuve , ” ati .
28004004	Pakaiyin aseiyin , “ Mipi kinah dau hen kihehto dau hen : vo Thempuho , nang ho bou kahehset nahiuve .
28004005	Sunle jan a nakipal lhuh lhuh jeng diu , Themgao ho jong phachaom deh lou diu ahi . Ken nanu Israel hi kasuhmang ding ahi .
28004006	Kei eihet loujeh-uva kamite mangthah ahitauve . Nang ho Thempuhon neihe pouvin , kahil nasang pouve , hijeh a chu kapaidoh diu , nachateu jong Thempua kapansah lou ding ahi .
28004007	“ Thempu natambe cheh-u le Kei dounan chonset nabolbe cheh-ui , hijeh a chu min najabolnau chu vetdana kaheidoh peh diu ahi .
28004008	Kamite chonset bol chu nanghon haodoh nan naneiyun , hijeh chun chonset nabolsah sah nom’ui .
28004009	Mipi thoh gim banga nanghon jong genthei hesoh nathoh diu ahi ! Thilse nabol jal’uva talen kamatsah a kahtohsah ding ahiuve .
28004010	Nachan diu kilhaina gantha sa nejong leu chun , gilkel thoh a naum jing diu ahi . Cha tam neina din doiphunga notin pang jong leu chun , doichom chom nahoujeh-uva cha nanei deh lou diu ahi .
28004011	“ Ju lui jut hah don’in , kamite angol gamtauve !
28004012	Kungbul phung pou phunin asan’uvin , tenggol chun ahetnom’u aseipeh bangin agel’ui ! Eidalhatauve . Notia pang numei bangin , doichom chom kom ajonsoh tauve .
28004013	Molvum doiphung dunga kilhaina abol’uvin , lhangvum vum , thingphung dang nou dunga kithoina gimnamtui ahal’un , ali nom sah jeh-in theoboh adah-uve . “ Hiche kon hin nachanu jouseu notin apangun , namouteu mito ajong tauve .
28004014	Hijongle athilbol jeh-u hin amaho talen matsah ponge , ajeh chu nangho tah jong doiphunga kijoh noti ho to kijot manga chonse , chule kilhaina thil toh khomji nahiuve . Thuchih-in , ‘ Lungthimbei mite chu mangthah diu ahi ’ ati bang diu ahi .
28004015	“ Kei dia Israelte nakitah lou vangun , Judahte vang hitobang thil hin athemmo pouve . Gilgal le Bethel mun a jong doihou din hung dauvin , hikoma chun hing jing Pathen minin kitepna jong bol sauvin .
28004016	Lahlou sakol pol bangin Israelte vang alouchal behseh jengui . Hamhing lah a kelngoi vah banga iti kivah vah ding ham ?
28004017	Israelte hi doihouvin angol tauve . Anop nop’in um jengu hen .
28004018	Ju adon khamset’un , notin apangun , jabol sangin jachatna adeijo’uve .
28004019	Hui lhoh mang bang diu , doichom chom houjeh a jahcha diu ahi .
28005001	“ Vo Thempuho , ngaiyuvin ! Ngai phauvin Israelte ! Leng insung miten ngaiyuvin ! Adih a thutan dia kigelte , nachunguva thu kitan lo ding ahitai ! Mizpah a chun kipalnan napangun , Tabor lhanga lenpel’in nakisongun ,
28005002	Acacia khopia thuh tah khuh kilai nabanguivn , hijeh a chu nabonchauva talen kamatsah ding nahiuve .
28005003	Israel itobang ahi kahenai , kakoma kisel theiponte . Numei kitahlou tobang ahi , amite jong eihou din alolhing pouve , ” ati .
28005004	Mipi thilse bol hin a-Pathen komu ahin jot lutsah thei lou ahitai . Milimdoi ahou nom behseh-un , Pakai ahepha tapouve .
28005005	Mipi kiletsahna chu amaho douvin apangtai . Achonset nauvin akipalsah-in alhuhsah tai , Judah te geiyin alhuh tha tauve .
28005006	Pakai koma kilhaina din kelngoite le bong ho akai nauvin , ahivangin phatchom nan aneippouve . Pakai amudoh jou pouve , ajeh chu Aman adalhatauve .
28005007	Pakaidin akitah pouvin , achateu jong Pakaiya ahipouve . Hijeh a chu amaho jong agamsungu jong kisubei ding ahitai .
28005008	Gilead a gal konna din sumkon mut’un ! Ramah khoa gal khongpi vouvin ! Bethel khoa galsat din kho-lhang sam’un ! Gal kon’uvin , Benjamin chilhah ho !
28005009	Talen matna ding nikho ahung lhunge , Israel mangthah ding ahitai . Vo Israelte , hiche hi soh tei ding ahi !
28005010	Pakaiyin aseiyin , “ Judah lamakien Israel asat’uva , agamsung alahpeh jeh-un kalung ahange . Hijeh a chu achunguva talen twipi kisunglha kabahsah ding ahi .
28005011	Israel hi min abolsen , achanlom tah gamsung geiyin , panpi phachom louhel ho akineppi jal’in , min alahpeh tai .
28005012	Israel sumang ing ting , Judahte manthahna kalhut khum ding ahi .
28005013	“ Israel’in aveiset akimudoh a , Judah-in amaput akimudoh teng , Israel’in Assyria gam kumpipa henga panpi gathumin tin , amanla damsah a amaput boldam peh thei deh lou ding ahi .
28005014	Israelte le Judahte chu sakei midel khum banga kadel khum ding , atel adah-uva kajan a kadalhah ding ahi . Kakai mang teng koiman eichu lha theiponte .
28005015	“ Achonset jeh-uva athoh khopset’uva , eihung ho kahseuva , kamite hi kadonda ding ahi . Athoh gim behseh tengu eimudoh thei maiyu ahi , ” ati .
28006001	Mipin aseiun , “ Pakai koma kile kit taute ! Eibolgimu ahitan , damjong eidamsah teiyunte ; eimavosau ahitan , imahau eitompeh tei lou diu ham ?
28006002	Ni ni nithum jou teng eisuhal’un tin , a-angsunga inom hin diu ahi .
28006003	Pakai het tei din goute . Jing kho avah tei tei bangle , chuh lai gotwiyin leiset achap nou banga , ihenguva hung tei ding ahi , ” atiuve .
28006004	Ahivangin Pakaiyin aseiyin , “ Vo Israel le Judah , i-kalo didng ahiuvam ? Jingkah daitwi kang loi bangin , nei ngailutnau abeiloiji tai , sun nisa daitwi kanghei hoi bep ahi .
28006005	Hijeh a chu thutanna le suhgamna thu pohsah a ka-Themgao te kahinsolpeh nahiuve . Nahenguva ka-ngeh hi akichen jenge ;
28006006	kilhaina gantha sangin ngailutna kadeijon , pumgo thilto eipeh sangun kamiten eihet diu kadeijoi .
28006007	“ Ahinla gamsung ahung lut lut’un Adam mun a kakitepna asukeh tauve .
28006008	Gilead khopi sung mihiloute le tolthat ho adimset’ui .
28006009	Thempuho jong mi changlhi jing gucha hon abangui . Shechem mun theng lampi jenga jongmi athat’uve . Thilse hijatpi hi henasa saa abol’u ahitai !
28006010	Israel sunga kidah dah um kahitan , milimdoi houvin kamite akisubohsoh tauve .
28006011	“ Vo Judah mite , nathilbol chengseu jeh a nang ho talen pehna ding phat khat kakoinai .
28007001	“ Kamite Israel damsah a , haodoh sah kit kanop phat phat le , agitlou nau le thilse abol ho’u kamudohji tai . Khat le khat akilhem to’uvin ; bang aphujal’un , aguchauvin ; kholai dunga mi achom’ui .
28007002	Thilse hijat abol’u kagel jing didng hi lungin jong agel phapouve . Achonset nauvin avuh tauvin , kamu khel aumppoi . ”
28007003	“ Mipin thilse bol’in lengpa le avaipote geiyin alhem lhauve .
28007004	Mijong jeng le mi kitahlou jeng ahiuve . Mi ahotnau meilhum sung meisa abangin , kan ding changlhah kigon jou kah a changlhah kangpan mut kou hih jongle deoje ju tobang ahi .
28007005	Lengpa gaolvah nin lengpa le avaipote ju atul kham’un , asu-ngolsoh tauve .
28007006	Athilse bolnom danu meilhum abangin , along hang khovah vah-un , jingkah teng meikou deojah jeng abangui .
28007007	“ Alunghan val jeh-un avaihomteu athat’un , alengteu aban banin athat’un , ahivangin kahenga taova aum hih hel’ui .
28007008	“ Israelte hi changlhah alang kan minlou tobang ahiuve . Akimvel’uva namtin vaipi akison piuvin ,
28007009	hitobang gamchom mite chunga kison hin athahat alah mang ahilam helouvin aum’ui . Amanna didu nikho dimtohsa ahitan , amahon la ahedoh pouve .
28007010	Israelte kiletsahna amaho douna thu aseitai . Thil hijatpi soh tajongle kahenga hung kile kit ding agel pouvin , Pakai a-Pathenu eihol pouve .
28007011	Israel hi lungthimbei vakhu tobang ahin , amasan amiten apanpi diuvin Egyptte akouvun , chuin Assyria lam asel’ui !
28007012	Ahivanga achenna chan’uva lenpel kason a vacha banga kamatdoh ding ahiuve . Thilse abol chengseu jal’a talen kamatsah tei ding ahiuve .
28007013	“ Ohe ada ahiuve ! Eisalhauvin eidou tauve ! Kasuhgam ding ahiuve . Kahuhhing nom vangin , jou jouvin eihouvui .
28007014	Lungtheng sel’in kahenga atao pouve , chiding namdangte umchan bangin tol dunga akipehle leuve . Chang le lengpitwi athum tengu jongle chiding namdangte umchan atho’uve . Vo doumah bolte !
28007015	Kavahdoh a kahatsah vangin , kei douna jeng abol’uve .
28007016	Eida lhauvin , thabei , semthu pathen abel’ui . Kisonpi theilou thalchang kon tobang ahiuve . Alamkaiteu kiletsah thusei jal’a thisea thisoh diu , Egypt miten anuisat diu ahi .
28008001	“ Gal sumkon mut loiyun , melmaten kagamsung chu , muvanlai lengsuh bangin ahindelsuh tauve ! Kamiten amaho to kakitepna asukeh-un , kahilna thuhil adoutauve .
28008002	A-Pathena eiseiyuva , kamitea akiseiyuva , eihet banga asei vangun ,
28008003	thilpha apaitauve . Hijeh a hi amelmateuvin adel del jeng diu ahi .
28008004	“ Kamiten leng ho akilhen vangun , acham cham a abol’u ahibouve . Kei phatsah louvin lamkai akilhen’ui . Amanthahna diuvin , sana le dangka adongkhom’un milimdoi akisem’ui .
28008005	Samaria kho sung miten sanaa kisem bongchal lim ahouvu kahoi . Acunguva kalung hange . Itih tah le milimdoi ahouda diu ham ?
28008006	Israel mi khut them khat’in asemdoh ahin , pathen ahinaisai poi . Samaria khopia kihou sana bongchal lim chu kisugep ding ahi .
28008007	Huise tu ahiuvin , khopihui aki-at diu ahi . Chang min louna louma changlhah ding kilamdoh ponte . Kilamdoh mong jongle gamchom min nedoh bep’unte .
28008008	Israel jong namdang bep ahitan , pannabei bel kehsa tobang ahitai .
28008009	Lahlou sa-ngan banga louchal Israelte anop nop’in akihei tauve . Assyria mite panpi ngai chan acheuvin , ahuh diuvin namdang ho tohman apeuve .
28008010	Ahivanga abonchauva kakhop ding , talen kamatsah ding ahiuve . Assyria kumpipan abolset tengu nasa asah behseh jeng diu ahi .
28008011	“ Chonset suh beina dia Israelten maicham asembe vangun chonsetna ding mun tampi aneibe cheh-ui .
28008012	Mipi hilna ding simsen lou kajih doh tan , ahivangin datmo le thilchom beh-in agel’un apaitauve .
28008013	Kahenga gam athat’un asa aneuve . Hijongle Kei-Pakai hi achunguva kalung lhaipoi . Hijeh a chu achonset’u kageldoh a , talen kamatsah ding , Egypt gama kanungsol kit ding ahi !
28008014	“ Israelten leng inpi tampi asemdoh-un , ahivangin Asempau asumil tauve . Judahten kulpi kikaikhum khopi tamtah asadoh-un , ahivanga leng inpiho le khopi chengse chu kahal lhahding ahi , ” ati .
28009001	Vo Israelte , doihou ho banga kut nabol chengseu hi ngauvin . Na-Pathenu dalhan navah mangun , Ama din kitahna nanei tapouve . Gamsung pumpia Baal koma noti bangin nakijoh tauvin , aman napeh-uva nagel’u chang nadei lheh-ui .
28009002	Ahivanga nachangu beivah ding , olive thao beisoh a , lengpitwi jong lhasam ding ahi .
28009003	Pakai gamsunga Israelte chengsot lou diu , Egypt gama kile tol kit’uva , Assyria gamsungaanboh aga neh diu ahi .
28009004	Hiche migam sunga chu Pakai koma lengpitwiya kilhai thei lou diu , kilhaina gan jong atha thei lou diu ahi . Aneh chah-uvin anechan asuh boh a , thi-opsa kine tobang hiding ahi . Oivana dia kinebou hi ding , Pakai Houin a kitoh banga kisei thei louding ahi .
28009005	Pakai choi-atna kut bol phat hung lhun teng ipi abol diu hitam ?
28009006	Manthahna hung lhun a mipi kithecheh teng , Egypt miten achop khom diu , alhoh khom’uva Memphis a vui diu ahi ! Agouvu dangka le ain mun jouseu chu lingle khao dimset’a hung keh ding ahi .
28009007	Talen matsah phat ahung lhung tan , athoh ding mipin athoh phat ahunglhungtai . Hiche hi asoteng Israel’in hanante . Nanghon , “ Hiche themgaopa a-ngol’in , Pathen hu-lha khumpa hi atanangtai , ” natiuve . Nachonset behseh jeh-un mipin hibang hin neiho’uve .
28009008	Pathenin amite Israel gihsal dia eihinsol ahi . Ahivangin kachena chan a vacha thang kikampeh bangin kipalsah neigo’uve . Pathen gamsung nah nah aching miten Themgaopa adouvuve ong !
28009009	Gibeah a aumchan bangun , kinepna beihel thilse jeng bol ahitauve . Pathenin achonsetnau gel jingintin , talen amatsah tei ding ahi .
28009010	Pakaiyin aseiyin , “ Israel kamudoh til chun gammang laiya jam lengpigui tobang ahi . Napu napate kamu til chun , aphatcha theichang ga min mudoh kabangin ahi . Ahinla Peor molsang ahung geiyun Baal doi ahou pan’un , aseichat’u doiho bangin kidah dah aumdoh tauve .
28009011	Israel loupina vacha banga leng mang loi ding , cha le nao jong anei kit lou diu , numei naovop la umpon tin , nao peng jong umbe ponte .
28009012	Cha le nao vahdoh jongleu kathagam a khat beh kahoipeh lou didng ahi . Hiche mite kadalhah teng achunguva datmo umtah thil soh ding ahi , ” ati .
28009013	Vo Pakai , achateu min athagam peh kamui .
28009014	Hiche mite hi ipi nabolpeh dia ka-ngeh ding ham ? Anumeite jouseu chinsah-in , vah ding chasen neisau hen ! Israel chunga Pakai thutan
28009015	Pakaiyin aseiyin , “ Athilse bol chengseu hi Gilgal a hung kipan ahi . Gilgal a pat kahinvet da pan ahitauve . Thilse abol jeh-uva kagamsunga kona kadeldoh ding ahiuve . Alamkai jouseuvin eidouvun , lungset kit taponge .
28009016	Israelte hi ajung gosa , gathei lou thingphung tobang ahiuve . Cha le nao nei tapouvinten , nei mongu jongle a-it tah tah-u achateu kathagampeh ding ahi , ” ati .
28009017	Alhacha kapan Pathenin amite paiyinte ; ajeh chu amahon athu ngaipeh aneipouve . Namtin vaipi lah a vah thai ding ahiuve .
28010001	Israelte hi lengpigui ga phatah bang ahiuve . Ahao cheh-ule maicham asembe cheh-ui . Agam gau apun cheh le , doikhom song asemhoi cheh cheh-un chibai aboh-uve .
28010002	Lungthima lepche jing miten achonset man athoh gim tei diu ahi . Pathenin amaicham jouse susen tin , doikhom dong jouse sumanginte .
28010003	Hetman louva hiche mite hin , “ Pakai igin loujeh-un leng inei tapouve . Neijong leu hen leng chun eiho dia ipi aboljou nah ding ham ? ” tiuvinte .
28010004	Thu homkeo aseiyun , jouva kitepna asem’un , chule pannabei kigahna asem’ui . Thudih thudihlou asouvin , lou laiya lounamse pungtel tul jeng abange .
28010005	Samaria khopia chengte kichauvin tin , Bethel a sana bongchal lim kisem manjeh a lungthoi diu ahi . Amaho le milimdoi limbol’a pang Thempuho kap diu ahi . Sana giltah tah akikhodoh teng kapsoh diu ahi .
28010006	Hiche sana milimdoi hi Assyria gam kumpi minthangpa kaiya peh dia apoh mang diu ahitai . Thumop ajui ho jal’a Israel min avetda a , jumle ja athoh ding ahi .
28010007	Twichunga thinghal kilap banga , alengpau min akai mang ding ahi .
28010008	Aven lhangvum doiphung , Israelten milimdoi ahou nau mun chu min asuhmang ding ahi . Amaicham phunguva ling le khao hng keh ding , mipin molle lhang sang ho jah a , “ Neisel’un , neikhu’vin , ” tia asap diu ahi .
28010009	Pakaiyin aseiyin , “ Gibeah a achonset’uva pat Israelten Kei douna chonset atang tapouve . Hijeh a chu Gibeah agal’in alap den diu ahi .
28010010	Hiche mi chonsete hi delkhum ing ting talen kamatsah ding ahi . Amaho dou din namtin vaipi pangkhomin tin , achonset chengseu jal’a talen amat tei diu ahi .
28010011	“ Israel hi phat khat’in bongla gol lahngoisa , chang chil ding gosadema um ahin , angong jolsel’a namkol pohsah a natoh hahsa jo hil kagot anahi . Judah chu lou kaiyin kamangin , Israel thingtum kakaisah-e .
28010012	Keiman , ‘ Louthah thah kaiyun lang , thudih muchi tun tu’uvin , kahenga nakipeh lut jal’uva vangboh chu lhosoh ga bangin kilo’uvin . Na-Pakaiyu Kei henga nahung phat’u ahitai , kahunga vangbohna kabuh lhah khum ding nahiuve , ’ kati .
28010013	Ahinla thilsejo muchi tun natu’vin , aga nalou tauve . Najouseiman naneh-u ahitai . “ Ajeh chu nakangtalaiho le nasepai tampi nakison piuvin ,
28010014	ahinla namite gal’in hindel khumin tin , nakulpi chengseu asuhamng ding ahi . Shalman lengpan Betharbel khopi gal a asuhmanga , nu nao chapang jouse asuhgam hel nikho chutoh bang dingahi .
28010015	Vo Bethel mite , nathilse bol’u melset veng vung jal’a hitobang thil chu nachunguva soh ding ahi . Gal kisat pat pat le Israel lengpa thipai jeng ding ahi , ” ati .
28011001	Pakaiyin aseiyin : “ Israel asen laiyin kalungsen , Egypt’a konin kachapa kakoudoh-e .
28011002	Kahakou cheh le alhai gamla cheh-ui . Kamiten Baal kilhaina abol’un , milimdoi hou nan gimnamtui alhut’ui .
28011003	Ahinla Israel lamjotje hil’a kahin , Kamite ka-angjangin kapomin ; Ahivangin amaho kakhou khahna Amahon ahepha hih hel’ui .
28011004	Hepi le ngailun kakou lut’in , Kabengto kasip beh jingin ; kabungin aneh diu an kapei .
28011005	“ Ahivangin kaheng ahinjon nom pouvin , hijeh a chu Egypt’a kile kit tei tei diu , achunguva Assyria mite vaihom ding ahi .
28011006	Akhopi chengseu galten lonvuh-in tin , kulpi kelkot chengse atumboh diu ahi . Thilpha pena agel’u thil jeng abol jal’uva gal’in kamite asuhmang ding ahi .
28011007	Kakoma kona jamdoh dingbou aseiyun , apoh-u namkol jeh a peng peng diu , koimanla asut peh deh lou diu ahi .
28011008	“ Vo Israel , iti kapaidoh jouva , Iti kadonda thei ding ham ? Admah bol’a kabol theiya , Zeboiim banga kabol thei nahim ? Kalungthimin hiti chu eibolsah ponte , Ka-ngailutna asang behseh bouve .
28011009	Lunghan vangin talen matsah dang ting , Israel suhmang kit da tange . Pathen kahin , mihem kahipoi , Naumpi jing Athengpa chu kahi . Lung hangin hung kit taponge .
28011010	“ Amelmateu chu sakei kisen banga kakisen khum teng , kamiten eijui kit tauvinte . Lhumlam a konin eihin del del jengunte .
28011011	Egypt’a konin vacha len hin thouvin tin , Assyria gama kona vakhu len ahintho diu ahi . Keiman a-inlum’uva kahin puilut kit ding ahi . Kei-Pakaiyin kasei ahitai , ” ati .
28011012	Pakaiyin aseiuin , “ Israelten kajet kavei , kasha kalhanga joule nal jeng eiseikhum’un , Judahte la tugeiyin kitah tah le Atheng Pathen-Kei doumah bol’in apang jingui .
28012001	Jingkah a pat nilhah geiya Israelten abol’u hi pannabei le manthahna bou ahi . Lepthol le pumhatna alah-uva apung jinge . Assyria mite toh kitepna asem’un , Egypt mite to kiveikhom din akihouvui , ” ati .
28012002	Pakaiyin Judah mite douna sei ding aneiye : Israel jong amite umchan khan chah jal’a talen amatsah ding ahi . Athilbol dungjuiyuva alethuh cheh ding ahinai .
28012003	Apuluiyu Jacob jong chu apenkhoppi a-upa Esau toh anu oisung , naobua aumlai lhonin akisato lhone ; Jacob akhandoh phat’in Pathen to akibon’e .
28012004	Vanil to akibonin ajouve , akap’in vangboh athum jenge . Bethel muna ipuluiyu Jacob henga pathen ahungin akihoupi .
28012005	Hiche hi Pakai Pathen Hatchungnung ahi . Pakai kiti min ahin Ama chibai boh ding ahi .
28012006	Chuti ahile tun Jacob son ho , na-Pathenu tansan’un lang adih-in chon’un , na-Pathenu panpina chu thoh hat tah-in ngah jinguvin .
28012007	Pakaiyin aseiyin , “ Israelte jong Canaan mite bangin alepthol’ui ; nahenguva thilcho ho lepthol’in , adih lou thilte nan atepeh-uve .
28012008	Amaho vin , ‘ Ikivei kan’un haodoh ihitauve, lepthol’a ihaodoh-u hi koiman eihehse thei pouvinte , ’ tin aseiyui .
28012009	Hichea hi Kei-Pakai na-Pathenu , gamthip laiya nahung vil pau , Egypt a kona hinpuidoh pan , ponbuh a nachen banguva kachensah kit ding nahiuve .
28012010	“ Themgaote jah a thu tampi kaseiyin , mu tampi kaneisah-e , chule Themgaote mangchan kamite kagihsal jinge .
28012011	Ahivangin Gilead a milimdoi pou ahouvun , hiche houchengse chu thigam diu ahi . Gilagal a Bongchal ho kilhainan aneiyun , chukoma maicham ho jong chu a-onglai jousea songtum alhuh lhuh-in aseuve , ” ati .
28012012	Kapuluiyu Jacob Mesopotamia gama jamlut din aumin , hikoma chun ji kilo nan mi na tongin akelngoite achinpeh-e .
28012013	Pakaiyin Egypt gama sohchang Israelte puidoh avetup din Themgao khat asolpeh-e .
28012014	Israelten Pakai asulung hang lheh jengun , achonset jel’un thi din akilom’uve . Pakai asuh jum jal’uva Pakaiyin talen amatsah tei diu lom ahi .
28013001	Masang laiya Ephraim phung miten thu asei teng , Israel phung dang ho akichauve ; mihon Ephraim phung chu jatah-in aveuve . Ahinla amahon Baal ahouvun achonsetauve , hijeh a chu athilo tei diu ahi .
28013002	Chonset abol jom jingun , hou din milimdoi , dangka akhengun , mihem lung suhtoa kigel doh , mihem khut’a kisem ho pou ahouvui . Amahon , “ Hiche ho hi kithoinan neiyun , ” tin aseiyui . Hitobang milimdoi ho hi min iti achop theiya , bongchal lim a kisemthu chu iti kitahsan theiding ham !
28013003	Hiche mite hi jingkah daitwi banga leng mang diu , sunlai nisa kahgot bang ding ahiuve . Changphol a changpol hui lhoh mangbangle , meikhu longa meikhu kitungdoh tobang bep hi ding ahiuve .
28013004	Pakaiyin aseiyin , “ kei hi Egypt a kona nahinpuidoh-u Pakai na-Pathenu kahi . Kei tilou Pathen dang nanei pouve . Keibou nahuhhingpu kahi .
28013005	Nelgam go lah a kakhou khah-un ahi .
28013006	Ahivangin gampha nalut phat’un naming lhingun na-oiva tauvin , kiletsah hoithon neisumil tauve .
28013007	Hijeh achu sakei mibokhum banga kabokhum diu , lutnu michan banga nalampiuva kachan lhih ding nahiuve .
28013008	Anou mansah savom midel le kabah ding , kabotel ding nahiuve . Sakei mibolna banga amun akaval lhum jeng diu ahi , chule gamsa hang mibolna banga natel nadah a kajan diu ahi .
28013009	“ Kasuhmang ding nahiuve , Israelte ! Kon nakithopi jou ding ham ?
28013010	Leng khat nathum’un , lamaki ding mi tampi na-ngeh-ui , hiche ho hin najet’u iti ahuhhing jou ding ham ?
28013011	Lung phamosa sa kapeh leng ho chu kalunghan phat’in kasumangtai .
28013012	“ Israel chonset le themmona lekha ajihdoh soh tan , phate chan akikoihe tai .
28013013	Israel hin kihinsona thei phat pha khat aneiyi , angol behseh jeh-in akisan thiepon , naosen penglha din naobua hungdoh ding ada tobang bep ahitai .
28013014	Hiche mite hi noimigama lutna dia konin huhdoh pong ting , thina thahat’a konin jong huhdoh ponge . Vo thina namidena hinpo lut tan ! Vo noimigam , manthahna hinlhut loiyin ! Hiche mite hi voujang natpi kit taponge .
28013015	Israel hi pumping bangin nalhasil sel jongle , nelgama kon niso lama kon huisave vuhung nungin tin , teinah phungle twikul jouse asemgot ding ahi . Thil manlu jouse alhoh mang ding ahi .
28013016	Eidou jal’a Samaria khopin talen amat tei ding , amite galmuna thia , naosen ho tol’a chil thang diu , numei gai akhedoh diu ahi , ” ati .
28014001	Vo Israelte , Pakai na-Pathen henga hung kile kit tauvin . Chonset jal’a kipal lhu nahiuve .
28014002	Pakaiya kile kit’un , ahenga hitin taovun : “ Kachonset’u ngaidamin , katao nau sangin , kakitepsau bangin navahchoi unge .
28014003	Assyria miten eihuh joupontin , galsat them dakolten eidal jou pouvinte . Milimdoi kasemho’u chu ka-Pathen danun sei kit hih hel unge . O Pakai Nangin bel ding neiloute nahepiji mong ahi , ” toiuvin .
28014004	Pakaiyin aseiyin : “ Kamite kinungpui kit ing ting , Lung giltah a kalungset ding , Achunguva lung hang kit taponge .
28014005	Israelte dia gamgo lah a Gotwi julhah kabah ding ; Pacha banga pah diu ahi . Lebanon lhang thingphung banga jungkho det chet diu ahi .
28014006	Thing nanou banga hingdiu , Olive thing hoiya hoi ding ahiuve . Lebanon lhang cedar thing banga Muinam jen jun diu ahi .
28014007	Kahoidamna kulpi sunga cheng kit’uva , Honlei phatah bang diu ; Lengpigui ga phatah banga , Lebanon lhang lengpiga pha minthang bang diu ahi .
28014008	Israelten milimdoi ahoukit louhel diu , Ataonau sanpeh a kahoidam ding , Thingna dum jing banga kanou sah ding , Vangbohna amu jouseu Keiya kon ahi , ” ati .
29001001	Pathuel chapa Joel koma Pakai thusei chu hiche hi ahi .
29001002	Ngaiphauvin upate , Judah gama chengten ngaiyuvin ! Nangho khang hihen napu napateu khang hile , Hitobang thil hi soh khan am ?
29001003	Nacha nanaoteu seipeh-un lang , Amahon jong acha anaoteu aseipeh diu , amahon jong khang kit kit’a Mite aseipehson son dingu ahi .
29001004	Khaokhopiten ahon honin andong aneuve , Khaokhopi masaloi neh moh aban banin anetai .
29001005	Vo jukhamho , thouvun kap’un pangun julop ho . Lengpitwi thah thah semna ding Lengpiga chengse asumangtauve .
29001006	Khaokhopi hon jamah-in igamsungu alonvuh tan , Ahuse behseh jengun simsen jong ahipouve . Ahau jong sakei ha bangin ahemtheiye .
29001007	Ilengpiguiyu asumangsoh-un , Itheichangna anechaisoh tauve . Ana anechaisoh-un abah agosh tai .
29001008	Nuh-ngah-in adongma thilong aka bangin , Mipi nabonchan kap jenguvin .
29001009	Houin a to ding chang le lengpitwi abeisoh tai , Pakai koma toding beijeh-in Thempute along dongtauve .
29001010	Loujao la akeovin akijamtan , Chang kisuhgam leiset geiyin adoulel’e . Cahngdong kisuhgam phat’in Lengpigui jouse agop soh tai . Olive thing jouse agamtai .
29001011	Lunghem’uvin loubol jouse , Lengpilei bolte kap’uvin ; Suhlou change sakol chang , Cahngdong mimdong asugamhel tauve .
29001012	Lengpigui le theichang phung agosoh tan , Agathei thing jouse aheovin athitai . Hijeh chun mipi kipana jong abeitan ahi .
29001013	Khaodip pon sil’in kap’un , Maicham phung lhacha Thempuho ! Houin akitol touvn jan khovah-in lung gim’un , Na-Pathen napeh diu chang le lengpitwi abeitai .
29001014	Japi khom’un lang an ngol ding deiyun , Lamkai chengse le Judahte khomsoh-un , Pakai na-Pathenu Houin sunga Kap’un ahenga thum’uvin !
29001015	Pakai Nikho ahung naiye , Hatchungnungin manthahna abol ding Nikho chu ahung naitai ; Hiche hikhon itobang tijatna aso ding hitam !
29001016	Ka-andong jouseu kinechai jeng kamoh vet’un , Ka-Pathen Houin a jong kipana abeitai .
29001017	Leigo lah a muchi athi thu thun , Changsal’a koi ding changla abeitan , Cahngsal keosa ho hi alhenglhona kijam ahitai .
29001018	Neh ding hamhing umlou jal’in , Gancha jouse , bong le kelngoi hon Akel lel soh gamtauve .
29001019	Vo Pakai , meikah banga hamhing le Thingphung jouse got jeh a nahenga tao kahi .
29001020	Luidung joouse akan jeh-in Gamsa ho geiyin nahenga ataovui .
29002001	Sumkon mut’un , Pathen lhang theng Zion a kiginna khongpi vouvin . Kithing thing jengun Judahte , Pakai Nikho hung lhungvah ding ahitai .
29002002	Muthim khojin nikho , Muthim lhangkhal kiheh ni hinte . Molsang meilomin atom bangin , Khaokhote ahon honin ahung kitol’ui . Hitobang thil hi soh kha loulai ahin , Sohjong soh kit lou ding ahi .
29002003	Hamhing jouse meikah bangin anechaiyun , Alut masanguva Eden hon tobang gamsung chu Adalhah nungle akeohel’in , Imacha cha pou louhel’in , aumtai .
29002004	Sakolte lheh lheh ahiuvin , Galsat sakolte lhaiyin alhaiyui .
29002005	Molvuma akichop doh tengule Kangtalai kitagin abangun , Gamkanglai meikah abahsah-un , Galsat dia kigoltoh sepai hon jamah abangui .
29002006	Ahung neitel tul’ule mitin akichan , Mitin mai anguisoh heljie .
29002007	Gal-hangho midel khum abngun , Sepaite bangin pal dunga akal’ui . Malam non akitol tol jengun , Ajotnau khel louhel’in acheuvin ,
29002008	Khat masanga khat asingpoi . Tho kikaiho jong adelpeh jengun , Imacha chan asutang joupoi .
29002009	Khopi alonvuh jengun , Palvum vuma akaldoh-uvin ; Intingvum geiya akaltouvun , Guchate bangin in bangkot Sung dunga alut lut jengui .
29002010	Ahung kitol tengu leiset akiling leuvin , Vanthamjol geiyin akithing jin ahi . Nisa le lha athim leuvin , Ahsite jong avahji tapoi .
29002011	Pakaiyin asepaite kolphe bangin thu apen , Athu ngai sepaite tamtah le hattah ahiuve , Pakai Nikho itobanga kichat um hitam ! Ahingdoh thei idng koiham ?
29002012	Pakaiyin aseiyin , “ Tu hijeng jongle , Thangsel’in lung heiyun lang , Kap le lung kisih chule an ngol thon Kahenga hung kilt kit’uvin .
29002013	Nakisih nau chun nalung gim phongdoh-un , Ponsil botel maimaiyin alhingpoi . Pakai na-Pathen heng hinjon kit’un . Mi khoto them , hepina lhingset ahi ; Athoh hat’in akitepna anit jinge ; Talen matsah louva ngaidam go jing ahi .
29002014	Pakai na-Pathen’un lung akhel’a , Changle mim phatheiya nalha theiyu ahi . Chuteng nang hon chang le Lengpiteiya Ama nahou theiyu ahi .
29002015	Zion lhanga sumkon mut’un lang , An ngol ding seiyun , japi khom’uvin !
29002016	Japi koukhom’uvin , Houbung kikhopna sem’uvin ; Upa cheng koukhom’un , Chapangho le naosen ho koukhom’un . Kichengtil hon jong Indan sung dalha hung diu ahi .
29002017	Houin hongchal le maicham kah a Pakai kinbol Thempu ho kap a tao diu : “ Pakai namite khoton , Namdang ho totna le daithangin neikoi dauvin , ‘ Na-Pathenu hoilamba hitam ? ’ tin seidau hen , ” atiuve .
29002018	Pakaiyin agamsung khohsahna aneitan , Amite ahepitan ahi .
29002019	Ataonau adonbut’in aseiye : “ tua vang change lengpitwi olive thao Kapeh ding nahitauvin , Lung nachima nanei diu , Namdang miten totna le Daithanga nanei lou diu ahitai .
29002020	Sahlama hungkon khaokhote sugam ing ting , phabeppi nelgam sunga kadel lut’a , Amasa chengse Twimanga kalelut ding , Anunung chengse Mediterranea Twikhanglena kalelut ding ahi . Athilongu uijen jun ding , Athilongu uijen jun ding , Athilongu uijen jun ding , Athilbolset chengseu jal’a kasuhmang ding ahi .
29002021	“ Vo loujaoho kicha hih hel’un , Pakaiyin nabolpeh thil ho jeh-un kipah thanomjo’uvin .
29002022	Gancha ho , kicha hih hel’un , Hamhing adumsoh tan , Gathei thingphung ho agatan ; Theichangle lengpithei tampi agatai .
29002023	“ Vo Zion mite , Pakai na-Pathenu Thilbol jal’in kipah thanom’uvin . Chavang go nengsel’in napeuvin , Phalbi gotwi le khallai gotwi nengtah-in napeuve .
29002024	Changphol jouse chang dimsoh ding , Lengpitwi le thao chilna khuh ho let lha ding ahi .
29002025	Khaokhoten na-andongu anehgam kum sunguva Namansah chengseu kapeh kit diu ahi . Khaokhote hinsol’a jong Keima kahi .
29002026	Neh le chah nengtah a naneiyuva , Lung nachimtah a naum diu ahi . Pakai na-Pathenu navahchoi diu , Thil kidangtah nabolpeh Pau nathangvah diu ahi . Kamite kidaithang kit louhel diu ahi .
29002027	Chuteng nalah-uva ka-um jing hetauvin nate , Israel , Koidang umlou Kei-Pakai na-Pathenu kahi hateuvin nate . Kamite daithanga kikoi kit louhel ding ahi .
29002028	“ Khong teng mitin chunga ka-Lhagao bung lhang ting , Nachateu numei pasal’in kathu asei pong diu ; Na-upateuvin mang aneiyuva , Nalhagaoteuvin mu anei diu ahi .
29002029	Chutengle lhacha numei pasal chunga Ka-lhagao kabuh lhah ding ahi .
