29002030	“ Nikho hung lhung ding jeh a hi Vanthamjol le leiset’a hilchahna kapeh ding ; Thisan hung longa , mei ka ding , Meilhang meikhu banga jing ding ahi .
29002031	Nisa hung thim a , Lha jong thisan banga san ding ; Tijat kichat umtah Pakai Nikho Hung lhun masanga hicheng hi soh ding ahi .
29002032	Chuteng Pakai panpi holchan huhinga um ding , Pakaiyin asei banga , Jerusalema um phabep jamdoh a , Kalhendohsa cheng hingdoh ding ahi , ’ ati bang , ” ati .
29003001	Pakaiyin aseiyin : “ Hicheteng chule Keiman Judah gam le Jerusalem Hamphatna kasem phat peh ding ahi .
29003002	Namtin vaipi khom ing ting , Thutanna phaicham kalhutsoh ding ; Hikoma chu kamite abolnau jal’a Athuu katanpeh ding ahi . Israelte gamtin a athe thenguvin , Kagamsung , Israel akihomtel tauve .
29003003	Sohchangho vangsanin akihom’un , Noti le ju chohna din nu-ngah gollhang soh-in ajoh-ui .
29003004	“ Vo Tyre , Sidon chule Philistia gam pumpi , ilo neigot’u ham ? I-khat khat lethuh neigot’u ham ? Neigot’u le mangangtah a kalethuh ding nahiuve !
29003005	Kasana dangka nachomgam’un , kagou chengse nahouin sunguva napolutsoh tauve .
29003006	Judah gam le Jerusalem mite chu agamsunguva konin gamla tah a nakai mangun , Greekte koma soh-in najoh mangtauve .
29003007	Tua hi najohna muntin chenguva kona kahinpuidoh kit ding ahitai . Amaho nabol bang banguva nangho kabol ding nahiuve .
29003008	Nachateu numei pasal jouse Judah mite koma soh dia kajohsah diu ; amahon gamla tah , Sabea mite koma ajohson diu ahi . Kei Pakaiyin kaseisa ahitai .
29003009	“ Hiche thupeh hi namtin lah a gaphong leuvin , ‘ Galkon din kigouvin , gal-hang jouse koukhom’un , Nasepaiteu abonchan khom’un , Galsat din kijot’uvin !
29003010	Langkon tupeh chu chemjamin kikhen’uvin , Thih kangkui chu teng chan khengun , Mi thabei geiyin dal asat ding ahi .
29003011	Kinoloiyun hunguvin , Jetle vei , sah le lhanga kon namtin vaipi Phaichama hung kikhom loiyun , ’ tin seiyun , ” ati . Vo Pakai , hiche ho sat din Nasepaite hinsol lhan !
29003012	“ Namtin vaipi kigouva , Thutanna phaichama hung kikhom diu ; Hikoma chu jetle vei , sahle lhang Namtin vaipi thutan dia Kei-Pakai katou ding ahi .
29003013	Agilou behseh jengui , Chang-at’in at’un lang ; Lengpitwi let lhah geiya Lengpiga chilna khuh akichil bangin chil’uvin , ” ati .
29003014	Mi asang sangin thutanna phaiya akitit’un , Hikoma hi Pakai Nikho hung lhung loi ding ahi .
29003015	Nisa le lha athimtan , Ahsite jong avah tapoi .
29003016	Zion mol’a konin Pakai akisenin , Jerusalema konin othong leuvin thu aseiye ; Lei le van a kithing leuvin , Pakaiyin vang amite ahuh ding ahi .
29003017	“ Chuteng Pakai na-Pathen kahi nahet ding ahi Israel . kalhang tehng Zion cheng kahi . Jerusalem chu khopi theng hintin , Gamchom miten gal’a ajo kit louhel diu ahi .
29003018	Chuteng molsang jouse lengpilei dimsoh a , Molle lhanga gancha dimsoh ding ; Judah gam luidang twi dimsoh ding ; Pakai Houina kona luiding khat hung longa , Acacia phaicham achapnou didng ahi .
29003019	“ Egypt gam nelgam soh a , Edom gam ahomkeova kijam ding ; Judah gam adelkhum’uva Themmonabei mi athagam jeh-uva chute ding ahi .
29003020	Amithengteu phu kalah ding , Themmona nei chu kakhen lou ding ahi .
29003021	Judah le Jerusalem tonsot chenna kineiya , Kei-Pakai hi Zion molsanga cheng ding kahi , ” ati .
30001001	Hiche ho hi Tekoa khoa kelngoi ching mi Amos thusei ho ahi . Ling kiho masang kum ni na , Judah gama Uzziah lal lai , Israelgama Jehoash chapa Jeroboam lal laiyin , thil hijat hi Pathenin Israel thudol’in aphongdoh tai .
30001002	Amos’in aseiyin : “ Zion lhanga Pakai akisenin , Jerusalema konin a-ogin akithonge . Hamhing jouse agopsoh tan , Carmel molsang hampa ageosoh tai , ” ati .
30001003	Pakaiyin asiyin , “ Damascus kho mite achonse se jengun , hijeh a hi talen kamatsah tei didng ahi . Galead mite sei theilouvin abolseuve .
30001004	Hijeh a chu Hazael sahdoh leng inpia mei kahal’a , Benhadal lengpa kulpi jouse akahvam ding ahi .
30001005	Damascu khopi kelkot jouse tumbong ing ting , Aven phaiya chengte le Betheden a vaihompa kadeldoh ding ahi . Syria gama chengte chu Kir gama sohchanga min akai diu ahi , ” ati .
30001006	Pakaiyin aseiyin , “ Gaza mite achonse se jengun , hijeh a chu talen kamatsah tei didng ahi . Mihem nam khat apumpin Edom langa soh-in ajoh chai hel’uve .
30001007	Hijeh a hi Gaza kulpi pal jouse kahal’a , akulpi jouse akah lhah ding ahi .
30001008	Ashdod khopi le a Ashklon khopia vaihom ho kalahdoh ding ahi . Ekron khopi talen kamatsah a , Philistinete amoh chengse thigam ding ahiuve , ” ati .
30001009	Pakaiyin aseiyin , “ Tyre mite achonse se jengun , hijeh a chu talen kamatsah tei ding ahi . Mihem nam khat apumpin soh-in Edom gama ajoh chai hel’uvin , jol le gol’a kitepna asemsau jong anit pouve .
30001010	Hijeh a hi Tyre khopi pal jouse kahal’a , akulpi chengse akah lhah ding ahi , ” ati .
30001011	Pakaiyin aseiyin , “ Edom mite achonse se jengun , hijeh a chu talen kamatsah tei ding ahi . Asopiteu Israelte chu sadel’in adel’un , voujang natpina aneipeh pouve . Alung hang han gjengun , lung damlou hel’in aum’uve .
30001012	Hijeh a chu Teman khopi kahal’a , Bozrah kulpi chengse akah lhah ding ahi , ” ati .
30001013	Pakaiyin aseiyin , “ Ammon mite achonse se jengun , hijeh a chu talen kamatsah teiding ahi . Gam keh letna dia gal asat laiyun Gilead nupi gai geiyin ache jengui .
30001014	Hijeh a chu Rabbah khopi pal jouse kahal’a , akulpi chengse akah lhah ding ahi . Chuteng gal kisat khosam kithonga , kisatgin chu huise le gose kitho bang ding ahi .
30001015	Alengpau le avaipote chengse sohchang dia kitol diu ahi , ” ati .
30002001	Pakaiyin aseiyin , “ Moab mite achonse se jengun , hijeh a chu talen kamatsah tei didng ahi . Noise manjen she-in Edom lengpa gabuh jouse ahalvam’un vutdi asohsah-ui .
30002002	Moab gamsung kahal ding , Kerioth kulpi jouse kalhasoh didng ahi . Sepaiten sumkon mut’a kholhang asap tengu , Moab mite chu gal husa thigam diu ahi .
30002003	Moab gamsung vaihomte le gamsung lamkai jouse katha ding ahi , ” ati .
30002004	Pakaiyin aseiyin , “ Judah mite achonse se jengun , hijeh a chu talen kamatsah tei didng ahi . Kahilna la angaipouvin , kathupehho jong anit pouve . Apu apateu hou Pathen dihlou hon apui chatvaiyu ahitai .
30002005	Judah gam kahal’a , Jerusalem kulpi jouse akahvam ding ahi , ” ati .
30002006	Pakaiyin aseiyin , “ Israelte achonse se jengun , hijeh a chu talen kamatsah tei ding ahi . Abat salel milungdih ho le kengchot to khat man jeng jong lepeh joulou vaichate soh-in ajoh-uve .
30002007	Mi lhasam le panpi ngaite chotphan aneiyun , vaicahte lampia aneh doh-ui . Apa le achapan soh-nungah khat akitimatpi gel lhonin , hitobang hin kamintheng asuboh tauve .
30002008	Pathen lhaina muntin a vaichate thil tun man a alah-u pon sil’in alum’ui . A-Pathenu Houin sunga jong sum batman a alah-u ju adon jiuve .
30002009	“ Ahivangin kamite , nang ho khohsah jal’a , gangpi tah a tah , cedar thing san a sang Amor mite geiya kasuhmang ahi .
30002010	Egypt’a konin kahin puidoh-un , kum som li sungin gamthip noiya kapuilen , Amor mite gam chu nangho kapeuve .
30002011	Nagollhangteu phabep Themgaovin kapanssah-in , adang phabep jong Nazirin kapansah-e . Kasei hi dih lou ham Israel te ? Kei-Pakaiyin kasei ahitai .
30002012	Ahinla Nazir ho ju nadonsah-un , Themgaoten kathu aseiphong diu nakhah-ui .
30002013	Tua vang toljepna kanei diu , changing kangtalai adelnem kabehsah ding nahiuve .
30002014	Mi kaljangtah jong jamdoh lou ding , thahat’a jong thabeiya , sepaite jong kihinso jou lou diu ahi .
30002015	Thal thempa jong pang jou lou ding , kaljang jong jamdoh man louva , sakol touthemho jong kihinso jou deh ponte .
30002016	Hiche nikho chule sepai hangpenin jong manchah paiya jamding ahi , ” ati .
30003001	Vo Israelte , Egypt’a kona ahinpuidoh nam pumpi , nachung changuva Pakaiyin asei thu hi ngaiyuvin .
30003002	“ Leiset namtin vaipi hijat lah a kahet le kakhohsah-nang ho bou nahiuve . Hijeh a chu nachonsetnau jong khoh deh a kigel , hicheng jeh tah a chu talen kamatsah tei ding nahiuve , ” ati .
30003003	Kihoutoh masa louva mi ni kholjin khom nam ?
30003004	Sa manlou gamthip’a sakei kitum nam ? Mat khah neilou sakei nou akosunga kithol lem ?
30003005	Thang kampeh louva vacha thanga oh ngaiyam ? I-toh khah louva thang jangkam kipel ngaiyam ?
30003006	Khopi sunga gal sumkon kimut teng mipi kicha louva um theiyem ? Pakai sol tilouva khosunga manthahna lut ngaiyam ?
30003007	Alhacha Themgaoho koma phongdoh masa louvin Hatchungnung Pakaiyin athilgon ima atongdoh ngaipoi .
30003008	Sakei kisen teng kicha lou didng koi ham ? Hatchungnung Pakaiyin thu asei teng , athusei phongdoh lou ding koi umngaiyum ?
30003009	Egypt le Ashdoh khopi leng inpi dunga chengte koma gaphongun , “ Samaria kimvel lhang sang joudsea hung kikhom’un , akhosunga kinahla le kitonona , thilse kibol chengse khu veuvin , ” tiuvin .
30003010	Pakaiyin aseiyin , “ Hiche miho hin ain jouseu pumhat le dih louva kichom doh thilkeo adip’un , lungthenje jong ahepouve .
30003011	Hijeh a chu melma khat’in agamsungu umchah-in tin , akulpi chengseu asuhmanga , a-in ho’u jong achomgam ding ahi , ” ati .
30003012	Pakaiyin aseiyin , “ Kelngoi chingpan sakei nehmoh kelngoi keng ni ham ahiloule abilkol khatseh ham amudoh banga , tua insung choldo mun nomtah tah a aning anop’a chon Samaria khosung mite amoh themcha bou hingdoh diu ahi .
30003013	Tun ngaiyuvin , Jacob chilhah ten , Thanei Hatchungnung Pakaiyin aseiyin ,
30003014	‘ Israel achonset jal’uva talen kamatsah ni le Bethel a maicham sumang ing ting , maicham ningli saki chengse kiheh bonga tol’a lhamang diu ahi .
30003015	Phalbi lai le nipi lai in jouse jong lhu lhama inngem soh diu , in len chengse jong kisumang ding ahi , ’ tin aseiye , ” ati .
30004001	Hiche hi ngaiyuvin Samaria khosung numeiho , Bashan phaiya kivah thao bongpi banga kivah thao ho , tahlelte bolsea , vaichate sugenthei , najipateu henga jut hum jing jeng ho !
30004002	Hatchungnung Pakai hi athen bangin akihahsel’in , “ mihon thihkoiya nakoiyuva , amichang cheh thihkoiya nga kiman banga namatna diu nikho hung lhung ding ahi .
30004003	Pal chim anaipen koma nakailut’uva polama napai mang diu ahi , ” ati .
30004004	Hatchungnung Pakaiyin aseiyin , “ Vo Israelte , Bethel a namuntheng phunguva cheuvin , deilheh nahiule gachonsetau ! Gilgal’a cheuvin najochanin chonseuvin ! Cheuvin , jingkah seh a kilhaina din gancha hintol tol jengun , nithum lhinseh le hopsom toh toh jenguvin !
30004005	Kipat’un thangvahna din changlhah thilto toh toh jengucin , chule natoval jeh-un kithang-at at jengun ! Hitobang thil ho holnom nahiuve .
30004006	“ Nakhopi jouseu kel lhahsah Kei kahin , ahivangin kaheng nahin jon deh pouve .
30004007	Na-anche louhingun gotwi lhahsah lou Kei kahi , Khopi khat din go kajuhsah-in , achom khat din kavotangin , loujao khat din go kajuhsah-in , achom khat din kavotange .
30004008	Dangchah a thi din naum’un , khopi tam tah a min kho chom khat’a twi thal ding kinemin acheuvin , donkham cha jong amupouve . Hichan geiyin jong neihin jon deh pouve .
30004009	“ Nalhosoh ga chengseu semheo din huise kalansah-in , nahonlei jouseu le nalengpi lei jouseu , natheichang phungu , chule olive thingna jouse khaokhoten anegamtan , hichan gei hin jong neihinjongpouve .
30004010	“ Egypt a kalansah tobang gamna hise kalansah-in , nagollhangteu galmuna kathat gamin , nasakolteu kalahpehsoh hel’in , na-ngahmun dunguva thilong monsa uithe thu kanahsah-un , ahivangin neihin jondeh pouve .
30004011	“ Sodom le Gomorrah kabolna bangin abang bang kasumangun , ahingdoh cheng jong gamkang ka akiloidoh mei leoheosa molkang nabangun , hichan gei hin jong neihinbel deh pouve , ” tin Pakaiyin aseiyin ;
30004012	“ Vo Israelte , hijeh a chu talen kamatsah ding ahiuve . Hita kabolgot’u ahitan , kathutanna thoh din kigo jengun , ” ati .
30004013	Pathen hi molle lhang huile go sempa ahin , Alunggel mihemte ahetsah jin ; Senlai nisa jong jan asohsah theiye . Leiset sanglai molvum vuma kengto angam’e . Pakai Pathen thaneipen kiti hi Ama min ahi !
30005001	Vo Israel , hiche thivui la kasha khumu hi ngai tem’un :
30005002	Nu-ngah tobang Israel alhutai , Kiphongdoh kit louhel ding ahi ! Donlouvin tol’a akijamtan , Akaithou ding abeitan !
30005003	Hatchungnung Pakaiyin aseiyin , “ Israel sung khopi khat’a galkon sepai sang khat soldoh thei chun , ja khat bou ahung kile kit’e . Khopi khatman jakhat asoldoh le som khat she ahung kilei , ” ati .
30005004	Pakaiyin Israelte jah a aseiyin , “ kaheng hinjon’un kihinsouvin !
30005005	Pathen hou didn Beersheba a chedauvin , Bethel’a jong neihung hol dauvin , Bethel chu mohseh soh iddng ahi . Gilgal’a che dauvin , amite min gal-hinga akai mang diu ahibouve , ” ati .
30005006	Pakai kom jon leu chun hinlo jo’uvin nate . Nache daule Israelte chunga mei-am kisunkhum hung bang ding ahi . Hiche meiam chun Bethel khosung mite kavamin tin , aphelmit jou umponte .
30005007	Mipi achan ding lom lepthol’a , thudih dunghei vaihei tho loi ada nahiuve !
30005008	Pakaiyin ahsi hijat asemin , Bombel le ngambom lungthu jong asem’e . Muthim jinglai avahsah-in , Sunlaipi mu athimsah theiye . Twikhanglen twi achopdoh-in Leiset tolhanga aphi lhai . Amin jong Pakai ahi .
30005009	Ahat apaote le akulpi jouseu asumangtai .
30005010	Vo thutanna phunga thudih seite hotbol’a , thudih lou nelkal ho kidintepi jing ho !
30005011	Mi vaichate bolsen , aching jouseu inhoi tah tah nasah-uva cheng thei louva , lengpilei hoitah tah a naphusau lengpitwi nadon lou diu ahi .
30005012	Nachonset melsetjeu le naboljat’u thilse kahe jinge . Mipha bolsen , nehguh nalauvin , thutanna phunga vaichate themchan ding napheltan’ui .
30005013	Hitobang phat pha lou laiya umthim beh chu chihhoijo ahitai .
30005014	Nahin theina diuvin thilse boldan , thilphajoh bol’uvin . Chutile nasei bangun Pakai Pathen thaneipen chun naumpi tahbeh diu ahi .
30005015	Thilse hotbol’un , thilpha boljo’uvin , chule thutanna phunga thudih lensah-un . Chutile tegeiya hingna lai hiche nam mite hi Pakaiyin ahepi thei mai ahi .
30005016	Hiti hin Pakai thaneipen Pathenin aseiyin , “ Kholai dung jousea ka le mao o-thong ding . Thi-opte lunghempi dinga loubolte geiya kikoulo ding ahi .
30005017	Lengpilei lai tina mi kap’intin , nangho talen kamatsah ding jeh a hicheng hi soh tei ding ahi , ” ati . Pakaiyin aseitai .
30005018	Akineppite din Pakai Nikho chutijat umtah ahi ! Hiche Nikho chun ipi thilpha nasodoh peh diu ham ? Nangho din khovah hilou , muthim khojin nikho ahibouve .
30005019	Sakei ginna jam’an savom ato tobang ahibouve . Insunga jamlut tobang atuhnaa gul’in achuh tobang ahi .
30005020	Pakai Nikhoa chu mu thim ding , kho vah lou ding ahi ; lung navah bei , lung jin nikho ahi .
30005021	Pakaiyin aseiyin , “ Nakut bol jouseu kahon , kathoh nampoi !
30005022	Pumgo thilto bol’un , changing kilhai jongleur chunsang ponge ; kahenga to dia navah thaochet’u ganchate jong sanpeh pouvinge .
30005023	Thumje jua la nasah-u jong ngauvin , naselangdah gin’u jong kangai nompoi .
30005024	Chusangin thudih chu vadung twilong bahsah-un , adih chu kantih bei vadung long bahsah tau .
30005025	“ Vo Israelte , kum somli sunga gamthip laiya kapui leu chun kilhaina gantha le thilto ka-ngeh poi .
30005026	Ahinla tua doilim kisem Sakkuth Pathen leng le ahsi pathen Kaiwam milimho nahou phat’un ,
30005027	Damascus khopi kalpeh a gal-hinga kakai tengu nakipohle diu ahitai , ” tin asieyin ahi , Pakai , amin thaneipen Pathen kiti chun .
30006001	Ohe nadau ahi-Zion lhanga nomtah a chengte , Samaria khopia lung mongtah a um , hiche nam lentah Israel milen milalte , mipin akithopi dia angaichat jing ho !
30006002	Calneh khopi gaveuvin . Hamath khopi minthang gaveuvin , kitolsauh-un Philistinete khopi Gath gaveuvin . Hicheng hi Judah le Israel lenggam te ni sanga phajo mong am ? Agamu khu nang ho gam sanga lenjom ?
30006003	Manthahna nikho hung lhung lou din naseiyun , nathilbol chengseu hinla anaisah tel tul’e .
30006004	Ohe nadau ahi-saihaa kisem jalkhun chunga kijaole lea , kelngoi thao lailaiya kivah ho !
30006005	David boldan danin la nabol’un , semjang saiyin nasaiyuve ong !
30006006	Khon letlha hel hel ju nadon’un , gimnamtui pen nakinu’vin , Israel manthahna lung gimpi louvin na-um’uve .
30006007	Hijeh a chu min gal-hinga akai masah pen ding nahiuve . Chuteng nakut’u le golvah kibol kit lou ding ahitai .
30006008	Thaneipen , Hatchungnung Pakaiyin hitin aseiye , “ Israelte kiletsah hi kahoi , a-in’u loupe tah tah jong imacha ding katipoi . Akhopiu le asunga thil jouse amelmateu kapeh ding ahi , ” ati .
30006009	Insung khat’a mi som hingdoh nah nah jong thi thou thou ding ahi .
30006010	Mithipa hengle kom , thivuiya pang chun alongu insunga akaidoh thoding ahi . Thivui pan insunga umpen pen jah a , “ Khatbeh to naumkhom lou ham ? ” ati ding ahi . Chuteng ogin khat’in , “ Aumtapoi , ” tinte . Chutah le thivuipan , “ Paopoh hih-in ! Pakai min geiya iphah poh lou diu ahi , ” tia asei ding ahi .
30006011	Pakaiyin suhmang dia asei teng ni lentah tah hihen neocha cha hijongle ahalsi sia leng mang jeng thei ahi .
30006012	Songpi chunga sakolte lhai theiya , min Twikhanglen langkon a akai theiyum ? Nanghon akaleh beh-in thudih gutwi nasouvin , thildih dih lou nasouve .
30006013	Lodebar khopi nalah-u nahoithopiuvin ahi . Kiletsah tah-in , “ Karnaim khopi ilah jengu iha lheh-ui , ” natiuve .
30006014	Pakai thaneipen Pathenin , “ Vo Israel nagamsungu lo dia gamchom mi sepaite kahinsol ding ahi . Hicheho hin sahlam Hamath lamlen a pat lhanglam Arabah phaicham geiya nabol hesoh diu ahi , ” ati .
30007001	Hatchungnung Pakaiya konin mu kaneiye . Kathilmu naa hi-lengpan hamhing a-at nung , hamdong thah hung kepat dontah-in Pakaiyin khaokhote simsen lou asemdoh tai .
30007002	Hiche mu kaneinaa hin-khaokhoten gamsunga ipi hile adong lai lai-hamhing jouse anechaiyun , hijeh chun kenjong , “ Hatchungnung Pakai , mipi hi ngaidam jengin ! Athigam lo diu ahitai ! Alhom’un lhasam tah ahibouvui , ” tin kaseiye .
30007003	Pakaiyin lung aheiyin , “ Namu bang hin kabolda tante , ” ati .
30007004	Hatchungnung Pakaiya kon thil khat kamu kit’e . Hichea hin Pakaiyin amite maiya halgam agoi . Meipi hin vannoi Twikhanglen lentah geiyin akavam jengin , gam leiset jong akapantai .
30007005	Chuphat’in kenjong , “ Vo Pakai Pathen , namiten iti addoujou ding ham , nga jengin-alhom behseh-un lhasam tah ahiuve ! ” tin kataove .
30007006	Pakaiyin lung aheiyin , “ Hiche jong bolda ding hitante , ” ati .
30007007	Pakaiya kon mu khat kanei kit’e . Hichea hin Pakai chu songkhai intenaa kitetoh a kigen bang koma adingin , songkhai intena chu achoiye .
30007008	Pakaiyin kajah a , “ Ipi namun , Amos ? ” tin eidonge . Kenjong , “ Songkhai intena khat , ” kati . Hichun Aman , “ Bang onsa tobang kamite tetohna dia hiche songkhai intena hi Kaman ahi . Amaho talen matsah kagot hi lung hei lou ding kahi .
30007009	Isaac chilhahte doiphung jouse suhmang ding ahi . Israel muntheng geiya ahomsa kijam ding ahi . Jeroboam lengpa leng vai neina kasuhbei ding ahi , ” ati .
30007010	Bethel a Thempu Amaziah hin Israel lengpa Jeroboam henga thu athot’in , “ Mipi jalah a Amos hin nang demna jeng aseiyin , athusei hi gamsungin adou jou tapoi .
30007011	Amos sei chu , ‘ Jeroboam galmuna thi ding , Israelte hi agamsunga thi ding , Israelte hi agamsunguva kona min gal-hinga akai mang diu ahi , ’ tia asei ahi , ” ati .
30007012	Amaziah hin Amos aphoh-in , “ Vo mitva neipa navaltai ! Judah gam a kile kit’in chukoma thu gaseitan . Chule mihon tohman penauvinte .
30007013	Bethel a vang thu hung seikit hih-in . Nampi Houin , lengpa pathen houna mun ahi , ” ati .
30007014	Amos chun , “ Kei hi tohman neiya gaothusei Themgao kahipoi . Kelngoi chingmi , theipi na kivei kahi .
30007015	Ahinla Pakaiyin kelngoi ching kahinaa eikoudoh a amite Israelte koma gaothusei dia eisol ahi .
30007016	Hijeh chun Pakai thusei ngaiyin . Israelte kaphoa , gaothu kasei ding najah dai .
30007017	Ngaiyin Amaziah Pakaiyin hiche hi naseipeh ahi , ‘ Najinu kholai dunga notia panga , nachate galmun a thisoh diu ; nagamsung kihomtel tel’a midang kipedoh ding , nangtah jeng jong chiding namdangte gamsunga nagathi ding ahi . Thon louhel’a Israelte hi agamsunguva kona min gal-hinga akaimang tei diu ahitai , ’ tia asei ahi , ” ati .
30008001	Hatchugnung pakaiya konin mu khat kanei kit’e . Hichea hin theiga dimset paipeh khat kamui .
30008002	Hichun Pakaiyin , “ Ipi namun , Amos ? ” tin seidonge . Ken jong , “ Theiga dimset paipeh khat , ” kati . Hichun Pakaiyin , “ Kamite Israel beina ding ahung lhungtai . Talen matsah kagot hi hai taponge .
30008003	Hiche nikho chuleh leng inpia la kisa jouse lunghem kana kaheidoh ding ahi . Muntin a thilong jeng thilong jeng akijam ding , min thip beh cha apai pai jeng diu ahi , ” ati .
30008004	Gamsunga vaichate sumanga , neilelte kengchotpha neihom hiche hi ngaiyuvin .
30008005	Nangho pin , “ Choldo nikho ho beivah vah hen chang kijoh leu hen . Choldo Nikho beivah hen thil kijoh loi leh . Thil manval val lah a , thiltena lhem a te ding , thil cho le thiljoh ho lepthol’a thiltena dih lou kimang ding ahi .
30008006	Suhlou chang manmo jong manlu tah a kijoh a , a bat salel , kengchot to khat man jeng jong pejou lou vaichate chu soh dia ikichoh diu ahi , ” natiuve .
30008007	Pakai Israel Pathen kahisel’in aseiyin , “ Thilse abol chengseu sumil ponge .
30008008	Ling kihot’a gamsung mi abonchauva lung hesoh diu ahi . Gam pumpi kihot ding . Nile va dung banga kinuh lap lap ding ahi .
30008009	Sun laiya nisa kalhumsah a , khovah laiya leiset kathimsah ding phat hung lhung ding ahi . Kei-Hatchungnung Pakaiyin kasei ahitai .
30008010	Golnop kut nabol jouseu thivuina kaheidoh a , kipa la nasah chengseu lunghem kana kaehidoh ding ahi . Sam vouchaiya khaodip pon kasilsah diu , chapa khatseh thi kapi minu le mipa kabahsah diu ahi . Hiche nikho chu a chai ni geiya thoh lel hi ding ahi .
30008011	“ Gamsunga kel kalhahsahna ding phat ahung lhunge . Mipi kel thoh ding chu neh le chah ngaichat hipontin , twi ducha dangchah jong hipouvinte . Pakai thusei ngaicha gilkel le dangchah hiuvinte . Kei-Hatchungnung Pakaiyin kasei ahitai .
30008012	Mipi hin sah le lhang simle mal adel le jeng diu ahi . Muntin a Pakai thusei del leuvin tin , mu la mudoh deh pouvinte .
30008013	Hiche nikho tengle numei pasal khangdong thahat lai lai jong dangchah a lhu lham soh diu ahi .
30008014	Samaria khopia milimdoi pan a kihahsel ji , ‘ Dan a pathen jeh , Beersheba pathen jeh , ’ tia sei chengse chu dinlhuhsoh hel diu , thou kit lou diu ahi , ” ati .
30009001	Maicham phunga Pakai din jing kamun , thu apen , “ Houin khompi chengse luvum chu havoh voh-in von lang , in pumpi kilingsoh hen . Vojal’in mipi luvum a kitajalsah tan . Athimoh chengse galmun a kathagam ding ahi . Ahin gdodh ajamdoh beihel ding ahi .
30009002	Noimigam geiyin jamsuh jongleur , kamatdoh tei tei ding , vanchung geiya kaldoh jongleur , kaloi lhahsoh ding ahi .
30009003	Carmel molvum a kisel jongleur , kaholdoh a kamasoh didng ahi . Twikhanglen noiya kisel jongleur gul-lhempi sol ing ting kachuhsah ding ahiuve .
30009004	Amelmateuvin gal-hinga akai tengle , athagam diuva kaseipeh ding ahi . Kithopi daa suhgam kagot mong mong ahitai , “ a ti .
30009005	Hatchungnung , thaneipen Pakaiyin Leiset atham leh ling akihot’in , Leichung chengte alunghemsoh tauve . Leiset pumpi Nile vadung bangin akinuh lap lap’e .
30009006	Pakaiyin van a in asan , Leiset chunga vanthamjol adal’e . Twikhanglen twipi achopdoh-in , Leiset chapnou nana mange . Ama hi amin Pakai ahi !
30009007	Pakaiyin aseiyin , “ Vo Israelte , nangho hi midang to ichomin kagelpon , Sudan mite bangin kagel’e . Nangho Egypt a kahin puidoh bang hin Crete a konin Philistinete kahinpuidoh-in , Kir a konin Syria mite kahin puidoh-e .
30009008	Kei-Hatchungnung Pakaiyin hiche chonset dimset Israel lenggam hi kave vei , leiset chunga kasuhgam hel ding ahi . Jacob chilhahte vang abonin sugam ponge .
30009009	“ Israelte hi tengsa changchi kiloh chil banga kalosah ding , namtin vaipi lah a kalothangsoh a , pannanbei chengse kapaidoh ding ahi .
30009010	Kamite lah a chonse chengse galmun a thiden diu - ‘ Pathenin thilse eiphahsah pouvinte , ’ ti jouse thisoh diu ahi , ” ati .
30009011	Pakaiyin aseiyin , “ Ingemsa tobang David lenggam kasemphatna ding Nikho khat ahung lhunge . Apal jouse semphang ting , katundoh kit ding ahi . Kasah phat’a masang laiya tobang kahisah ding ahi .
30009012	Chutengle Edom gamsung jolou chengse Israelten ajo diu , Keiya hisa namtin vaipi ajotho diu ahi , ” ati . Hiche sosah ding Pakai chun aseitai .
30009013	“ Nikhoho chu ahunglhunge , ” tin aseiye Pakaiyin ; Loukaipan chang-atpa aphah thu ding , Lengpitwi childo pa Lengpiga loupan aphah thu ding ahi . Mol le lhang jouse lengpitwi dimsoh a , Alhang lhganga hoh a long ding ahi .
30009014	Kamite agamsunguva kahin puilut kit’a , Khopi gemsa jouse sephaa cheng kit diu ahi : Lengpilei bol’a kivah diu ; Honlei bol’a kivah ding ahiuve .
30009015	Kapehsa gamsunga kamite kachensah ding , Kikalkang kit lou diu ahitai , ” ati . Pakai na-Pathen’uvin aseitai .
31001001	Obadiah gaothusei chu hiche hi ahi : Edom mite chung thudol’a Hatchungnung Pakai thusei chu hiche hi ahi . Pakaiyin asolle chu namtin henga asol’in , keihon athusei kajatauve : “ Kigouvin , Edom sat din kontaute , ” atiuve .
31001002	Pakaiyin Edom jah a seiyin , “ Lhasamin nalhang ting , Namtinin nanoise ding ahi .
31001003	Nahoi tho nan nalhem lhan , Nakhopi kulpi songthum jeng ahin , Molvum a in kisah nahi ; Hijeh hcun naseiyin , ‘ Eisu lhu jou ding koi ham ? ’ nati .
31001004	Na-in chu muvanlai bu banga sangtah a nasah a , Ahsite to akivet chep jeng vangin , Kaloilhah a kakai lhah ding nahi .
31001005	“ Janteng gucha ahungle alahnom bou alai . Mihon lengpiga alo teng them khat asalhateiye . Nang vang namelmaten nasuhgam hel ding ahi .
31001006	Esau chilhahte , nagou jouseu min achomsoh tai .
31001007	Napanpi ten nalepthol’un , nagamsunga konin nadelmangtauve . Chamdel’a nalenpiten gal’in nabol’un najoutauve . Ankong khat naso khompiten kipalna thang nakampeh-ui . Amahon nathudol aseiyun , ‘ Achihna hoiya um hitam ? ’ atiuve .
31001008	“ Edom talen kamatsah ni leh amichingteu kasuhgam a , achihnau aboncha kasuhbei ding ahi .
31001009	Teman gal-hangte tija lih diu , Edom gamsung sepaite aboncha min athagam ding ahi .
31001010	“ Nasopite , Jacob chilhah ho nachomgama natha jal’a , nakisugam hel ding , a-itih a jum thoh a na um ding ahi .
31001011	Melmaten akelkot jouse aphutjal nikho , nangin jong napeldoh ni leh , Jerusalem gou jouse pomanga kihomsoh gamchom miho chutoh nabah ding ahi .
31001012	Judah gama nasopite hamset chu nakipapi lou ding dol ahi . Ahamset nikhouva chu nakipa lou ding , agim nau chu nuisat hoh a nanei lou ding ahi .
31001013	Kamite khopi sunga chu agenthei hesoh nau nuisat a , ahamset nikhouva agou jouseu chomgam dia nalut lou diu dol ahi .
31001014	Ajamdoh go ho mantan dia lamsom ajong nadin lou ding ahi . Ahamset nikhouva amaho hi amelmatau khut’a napehdoh lou ding ahi . Pathenin namtin vaipi thu atan ding
31001015	“ Kei-Pakaiyin namtin vaipi thu Katanna ding nikho anaiye . Vo Edom , mi nabol banga nakibol ding ahi . Napehsa chu nachan kit ding ahi .
31001016	Kamiten talen ju kha tah adontauve , ka lhang theng chunga chun , ahinla akimvel’a cheng namtin vaipin akhacheh talen ju adon diu ahi . Ju donchimset’untin leng mang jel diu ahi .
31001017	“ Zion molsanga phabep hung jamlut’un tin , alhang jeng jong muntheng soh ding ahi . Jacob chaten agoulo gamu chu alo kit diu ahitai .
31001018	Jacob chate le Joseph chate chu meikou bang jeng diu , meiyin changpol akah banga Esau chate asuhgam diu ahi . Esau chilhah khatcha hingdoh ponte , Kei-Pakaiyin kasei ahitai .
31001019	“ Judah gam lhanglama chengten Edom gamsung alo diu ahi . Lhumlam thinglhang bul’a chengten Philistia gam alah diu ahi . Israelten Ephraim le Samaria alah diu , Benjamin chaten Gilead alah diu ahi .
31001020	Israel gam sahlam a sohchang sepaite hung kile kit’untin Phoenicia alah diu , Zarephath geiya alah diu ahi . Sardis a sohchang Jerusalema umten Judah gamsung lhanglam khopi chengse alah diu ahi .
31001021	Jerusalema galjouten Edom delkhumintin achunga vaihom diu , Pakai amatah leng chang ding ahi , ” ati .
32001001	Ni khat hi Amittai chapa Jonah koma Pakaiyin thu aseitai .
32001002	Aman , “ Khopi lentah , Nineveh a chen lang , khopi dounan thu gaseitan ; khosung mite gitlou engsetna jouse kahetai , ” ati .
32001003	Ahivangin pakai thupeh peldohna din Jonah lamchom beh a akiheitai . Joppa achen , Spain gam jon ding kon gkhat amudoh-in , Pakaiya kona gamlat ding ngaoti nan , kong touman pen , Spain gam jon din gkong tol ho to akilhontai .
32001004	Ahin Pakaiyin Twikhanglen chu huise hattah anunsah-in , huise chu ahat behseh jengin , kong inneichu apeichip pai ding ahitai .
32001005	Kongtol ho atija lih gamtauvin , amichan cheh-in ama ama pathen kom cheh a ataovun , panpi athumtauve . Chujongle kong innei chu ajandomna din kong sunga thilkeo chu apaidoh doh tauve . Hichepat tah hin Jonah chu kong tolam indan sunga alut’in khomang meiyin a-ihmui .
32001006	Jonah chu kongtol lamkaipun amudoh-in ajah a , “ I-atileh hitobanga ihmu a nahim ? Thouloiyin na-Pathen henga panpi thumin tao loi tang-em . Chutile eilungset’uva eihinso theiyu hichu men , ” ati .
32001007	Kongtol ho akihouvun , “ hitobang hamset itolo nau hi koipen ahiding vang san’uhitin holdoh temu hite , ” akitiuve . Hitia abol’u le Jonah min ahung potdoh tai .
32001008	Hijeh chun amahon jong ajah a , “ Ngoh thei mong nahim neihil’un . Hikoma ipi bol’a jong hung nahim ? Hoiche gama hungkon , ipi jat mi nahim ? ” tin adongtauve .
32001009	Jonah-in adonbut’in , “ Kei Hebrew mi kahin Twikhanglen le leiset Sempa Pakai Van Pathen hou mi kahi , ” ati .
32001010	Pakaiya kona jam ahijong chu Jonah hin aseipeh tai . Kongtol ho chu atija lih jel jengun ajah a , “ Tijat umtah thil nabol hita chu men ! ” atiuve .
32001011	Huise Chula akhoh cheh cheh jengin , hijeh chun kongtol hon , “ Huise thipna dia nang hi i-kalo diu ham ? ” tin adongui .
32001012	Jonah-in adonbut’in , “ Twikhanglen a neisep lut leu chun huise hi thip tante . Kei jal’a hiche huise nato khah-u kahenai , ” ati .
32001013	Hijongle kongtol hon kong inneichu twi pamchin a toldoh tei din thahangsanin apangui . Ahinla huise chu akhoh cheh cheh tan , suhna ding ahetapouve .
32001014	Hijeh chun Pakai henga akap jengun , “ Vo Pakai , hichepa tha nagot jeh-in keiho jong neitha tha dauvin ! Hitobangpi hi Nang bol ahin , Nang mopohna bou ahi , ” tin ataovui .
32001015	Hiti hin Jonah chu Twikhanglen a aselut’u le , apet pet’in huise chu athip del tai .
32001016	Hiche hin Kongtol ho akichatsah tan , pakaiya akilhaiyun , Ama kinbol din akitep lo tauve .
32002001	Pakai thupeh jal’in ngapi lentah khat’in Jonah aval lhumtai , chule ngapi oisunga hin Jonah nithum le janthum aum’e .
32002002	Twito lam ngapi oisunga konin Jonah chu Pakai a-Pathen koma ataovin :
32002003	“ Vo Pakai , kagimpet’in kakouvin , Nangin jongneihouve . Noimigama konin kahin kouvin , Panpi ngaiya katao najai .
32002004	Twikhanglen tothuh laiya neileh lut’in , Twipin eichupsoh tan , Natwipi kinonglaiyin Eilonvuh soh tauve .
32002005	Na-angsunga kona paidoh a um , Na-Houin theng mukit dia kinem lou kahitai .
32002006	Twipin wichuptan , akichisoh tai , Twikhanglenin eichupsoh hel ahitai , Twipi kidil’in eilonvuh tai .
32002007	Molsang bulpi kaheitan , Kot kihontih umlou Gamsung kageitai . Hijongle vo Pakai ka-Pathen , Lithuh laiya konin kahingin neipuidoh-in !
32002008	Kahinkho beihel kahetan , Hijeh chun nahenga kataovin , Na-Houin theng sunga Kataona ogin najai .
32002009	Pananbei milimdoi houten , Nang dia akitahnau apaitauve .
32002010	Kenvang navhachoi la sang ting , Nakoma kilhaiying ting kakitepna molsonge . Huhingna chu Pakaiya kon bou ahi ! ” tin ataove .
32002011	Hijeh chun Pakaiyin ngapi chu Jonah lodoh din asol’in , ngapin jong aseipeh bangin twi pamchin a alodoh tai .
32003001	Pakiyin Jonah koma thu asei kit’in ,
32003002	“ Kaseipeh thu hi Nineveh khopi minthang tah dudnga gaseitan , ” ati .
32003003	Hijeh chun Jonah hin Pakai sei angaiyin , Nineveh khopi lentah , nithum sunga jong jotdoh lel a chun achei .
32003004	Jonah hin khopi chu ajot panin , nikhat lhumkei ajot nungin lhang asamin , “ Nisom li sunga hiche Nineveh khopi hi kisumang ding ahitai , ” ati .
32003005	Nineveh khopi miten Pathen thusei cu atahsan tauve . Hijeh chun alungheiyu vetsahnaa mitinin an ngol’a , alen aneo aboncha khaodip pon sil cheh din pha asatauve .
32003006	Nineveh khopi lengpan ajahsoh phat’in alaltouna akipatdoh-in , aponchol hoh lhan , khaodip pon sil’in , leivui lah a atoutai .
32003007	Nineveh khopi mite koma phonjal ding thu khat alhan , “ Hiche lengpa le avaipote thupeh ahi Koimacha cha , mihem hihen bong ho hile , kelngoiho geiya an nei twidon um thei louhel ding ahi .
32003008	Mihem jouse le gancha jousen jong khaodip pon asilsoh hel ding ahi . Mitinin thilse bol angah a , chonthanghoi angah diu , lung giltah a Pathen henga tao cheh diu ahi .
32003009	Chutile Pathenin lung aheiya , eihinso theiyu jong ahi ! ” ati .
32003010	Lungheiya athilbol’u hi Pathenin amutai ; achon gitlou nau angah jengu chu amudohtan ahi . Hijeh chun Pathenin lung aheiyin , aseisa bangin talen amatsah tapoi .
32004001	Jonah hin nommo san along hangtai .
32004002	Hijeh hin ataovin , “ Vo pakai , hitia hi nabol dia kaseisa hilou ham ? Hijeh a chu Spain langa jamsoh tei kanagot ahi ! Milungset them le mihepi them , thoh hat jing , khoto jing lunghei ding go jing talen matsah lougo nahi kahei .
32004003	Vopakai tunvang kahin sangin neithat le chun phajonte , ” ati .
32004004	pakaiyin adonbut’in , “ nalunghanpi thei ipi ham ? ” ati .
32004005	Jonah chu apotdoh-in khopi niso lama agatouve . Hikoma hin lim kisonin alim noiya atouvin , Nineveh khopia e-aso ding ve-lhi jingin aum’e .
32004006	Hichun Pakaiyin Jonah limbel din umphung khat akesah-in ahi . Jonah-in umphung akipapi lheh jenge .
32004007	Ahinla ajing khovah lhah-in umphung chu Pathen thusah-in lungin anen athitai .
32004008	Nisa son Pathenin niso lam huisa alansah-in , nisan aluchang asah peh behseh phat’in Jonah chu alhu lham pai ding a hitai . Jonah chuathi nom leo jengin , “ Thi leng kadeijoi , ” tin aseitai .
32004009	Ahivangin Pathenin ajah a , “ Hiche umphung jeh a lunghanna thei ipi naneiyem ? ” ati . Jonah chun adonbut’in , “ Lunghang dia kilom mong , thi geiya lung hang thei kahi ! ” tin aseiye .
32004010	Pakaiyin ajah a aseiyin , “ Hiche umphung hi jankah a hung kehdoh , ajinga thi kit ahin , nang kesah jon ghilou nathisah hilou-ahivangin nalung natpi lheh-e !
32004011	Achutile Nineveh khopi lentah khu Ken ichan geiya ka-itjoh ding hitam ! Ahimongin jong akhosunga khun monabei chapang mai mai jong milhing sang ja khat le sang som ni lahingin , gancha simsen lou to aumthai ! ” ati .
34001001	Hichea kisun cheng hi , Elkosh khoa mi Nahumin Nineveh khopi thudol’a themgao thilmua amu thu kisun ahi .
34001002	Pakai Pathenin kidoupi koima anop lensah pon , Adouva pangte talen amatsah cheh-e . Alunghan tengleh Alethusoh keiye .
34001003	Pakai chu along hangvah pon , Hinla thahat tah ahin , Themmona nei chengse Talen matsah louvin akoipoi , Pakaiyin lam ajot teng leivui akitungin , Meilhang jouse jong Ama chot khut leivui ahi .
34001004	Aman asei teng Twikhanglen jong kang jeng , Luiddung jouse jong twi bwiya alupsah ahi . Bashan phaiya lou ho tei kanga , Carmel molsang jong go jeng , Lebanon lhanga pahcha jouse Gosoh hel jeng ahiuve .
34001005	Pakai angsunga molle lhang jouse killing jeng , Lhang sang jouse amasanga jolsoh jeng ahi . Pakai hung kilah teng leiset kithinga , Leiset le amite kithing jeng ahi .
34001006	Pakai lunghanna hingdoh jou ding koiham ? Alungset tijat umtah a hingdoh thei koi ham ? Alunghan mei-am kisunglha abangin , Amasanga songpi ho geiyin leivuiyin aleng’ui !
34001007	Pakai hi anun nemin , Gim hesoh nikhon amite ahoidamin ; Aheng jon chan avetup theiye .
34001008	Amelmate chu twisoh laiyin atolmang abhsah-in , Ama doute chuathagam jin ahi .
34001009	Ibol’a Pakai douna nagonu ham ? Aman nasuhmanglo diu ahi . Adou chan chu khatvei she a asuhgam ding ahi .
34001010	Lingnang kihel lhop le changpol gosa banga Meiya nahalvam diu ahi .
34001011	Vo Nineveh , nakhosunga hi thilse jeng bol mi , Pakai dou khat hun gpeng doh ding ahi .
34001012	Pakaiyin amite Israel jeh a asei chu hiche hi ahi : “ Assyria mite hi hat hen lang tam jong leu , kisugam a amngthah diu ahi . Vo kamite , hesoh genthei kathohsah nahiuvin , avel’in bol kit taponge .
34001013	Nachunguva Assyria mite tha neina su lhang ting , nakan nau thih khao kabotan ding ahi , ” ati .
34001014	Assyria mite gahna Pakai thusei chu hiche hi ahi : “ Amin pu siu son le pah anei lou diu ahi . Adoi hounau houin dunga milimdoi ho kasuhmang ding ahi . Hing dia kilom ahitapouvin , Assyria mie din lhan kalaipeh tai , ” ati .
34001015	Ven , molsanga hung sole pa khun kipana thupha ahinpoi ! Ama hi gajo thu phongdoh dia hung ahi ! Vo Judate , kut bol’uvin lang , giltah a nakitepnau chu Pathen peuvin . Migilouten nagamsungu gal’a abol kit lou diu ahitai . Abonchauva kisugamsoh ahitauve !
34002001	Vo Nineveh , min nahindel khumtai ! Nasucheh ding thaneipa ahungtai ! Kulpi geiya mi pansah-in , Lamlen dung nga sah-in ! Galte to kisat din kigon !
34002002	Israelte hi min achomgam , masang laiya aloupina tobanga semphat kit din Pakaiyin agotai .
34002003	Melma sepaiten lumsan achoiyun , Avon jouseu jong asan jeng ahi . Hindel khum jeng din ago’uvin . Asakol kangtalaiyu Meisi pah lah lah abangin , Asakolteu kengto jaten ten ahiuve !
34002004	Kholai dunga kangtalai eijon junin alhaiyun , Kholai sunga adung avaiyin akitol’uve . Meikap bangin avahjep jep’in , Kholphe bangin akikhojen jun’e !
34002005	Vaihomte akoukhom’un , Malam noa kijotna kisep lhun alhuh lhuh-in alum’ui . Ahindelkhumten pal lam ajon’un , Lumho leiyin ado’uvin ahi .
34002006	Luipanga kelkot phung ho atumjal’un , Leng inpi sung tijat lungdon aumtai .
34002007	Lengnu soh-in akai tauvin , Alhachate vahui maovin amaovui . Chule dip le lai kidop’in aumtauve .
34002008	Twito kiting phujal abngin , Nineveh khopia konin ajam cheh tauve ! “ Kho ngaiyun ! Kho ngaiyun ! ” tin akisam nan , Akinungheiya koimacha aumpoi .
34002009	Dangka sana kichoi’uvin ! Khopi sunga gou dimset’in akikhol’e .
34002010	Nineveh khopi asumangun , min adalhan , akeovin akijamtai ! Mihem lung kichat’in anemsoh tan ; Thabeiyin khupbuh kithing thingin , Mihem mai adangsoh tai !
34002011	Sakei kokhuh tobang khopi hoiba hitam ! Sakei noute tobang ho kivahna , Sakei challe pi kijot le na , Anoute mong tah a umtheina khopi chu !
34002012	Sakeichal’in sa athat jin , Sakeipi le anoute ahal hal’in aoppeh-in , akosung chu athasa Agu aphe adimset’in ahi .
34002013	Thaneipen Pakaiyin aseiyin , “ Nakidoupi Kei kahi . Nakhangtalai jouse hall hang ting , naseipaite min galmun a athagam diu , midang nalahpeh thil aboncha kalahpeh ding nahi . Vannoiya nahusa hin hin kijadoh ki tlouhel ding ahitai , ” ati .
34003001	Vo thisan sohat khopi nada ahi ! Nanei nagou mi kichomgam ding bep ahitai !
34003002	Ngaiyun , sakol kijep gin , Kangtalai kitah gin , Sakolte lhai gin le kangtalai kipei gin pi khu !
34003003	Sakol tou themten adel chum’un , Chemkol aval lah lah-in tengkol aphelap lap’in , thilong akisevum the thu jengin , Mithi long simsen ahitapoi . Thilong chunga mi akipal thu thu jenguve .
34003004	Noti tobang Nineveh khopin talen amantai ! Manthahna lam a mijol heo hou nu !
34003005	Thaneipen Pakaiyin aseiyin , “ Vo Nineveh khopi , talen kamatsah ding nahi ! Nakeovin jam ing ting namtin vaipi kavetsah ding , Najamo jouse amudoh diu ahi !
34003006	Noise se le kidah dah a kabol’a Thilboh jouse kanot khum ding nahi . Namupha cham mihem chu Tija kinlih leu leu diu ahi .
34003007	namudoh chan nungjam a , Nineveh khopi khogem asoh tai ! Voujang natpia koi ham ? Alhem lung mong nom koi ham ? ’ tia asei diu ahi , ” ati .
34003008	Vo Nineveh , Egypt khopi Thebes sanga naphatjoh beh am ? Thebes chu Nile luidung alongin , pal’in akikhang’e .
34003009	Sudan le Egypt chunga vai apon , athahat akhonbei ahi ; Libya jong akigolpi .
34003010	Ahivangin Thebes kho mite jong sohchangin min akaitauve . Kholai lamkon tin a achateu minavo lih lih jengin ahi . Alamakiteu thihkhaovin akaiyun , sohchangte lah a ahomthanguve .
34003011	Vo Nineveh , nang jong ju khamin ngol’in natin , melmatea konin jamdoh gon nate .
34003012	nakulpi chengse jong theichang ga minsa tobang ahin , theichang phung chu loh le chun aga nakamsunga lenglut jel ding ahi !
34003013	nasepaite jong asildap soh tan , namelmate masanga pang jou ding abeitai . Nakelkot gol jouse meiyin akahvam ding ahi .
34003014	Min naumchah teng don ding twi kikhol’in , nakulpi chengse kaiphan ! Leingan ho chu cheh a den din chilgoi loiyin , cheh denna ding gonsan koiyin .
34003015	Hinla ipi bol’in tong jongle chun meiyin halvaminnatin , ahiloule galmun a min that teiyin nate . Khaokhote banginnapunge !
34003016	Van a ahsite sanga tamjo kivei mi nasepdoh tai ! Tunla khaokhoten lhaving jah a alen mang hel bangin , abeisoh tauve .
34003017	Navaibolte jog khodap nikhoa bang dunga kibemchal chul khaokhote ahiuvin , nisa sat ten glen gmang jel’a , hoilam agei koiman ahet lou tobang bep ahiuve !
34003018	Vo Assyria kumpipa , nagam vaipote athisoh tai , namilen milalte jong akijamddap soh tauve . Namite molle lhanga akithe thangsoh-un , in a puilut jou koima aumtapoi .
34003019	Namaha a nu didng damdoi aumpon , namaha damtheiponte . Namanthah japha chan kipah-in khut abeng beng jengui . Tang louhel’a thilse nabolnaa hoidoh jou koi ham ?
36001001	Judah gama Amon chapa Josiah lengpa khanga Pakaiyin Zephaniah henga asei thu hiche hi ahi . ( Zephaniah hi Hezekiah lengpa son ahin , Hezekiah cha Amariah ahin , Amariah cha Gedariah , Gedaliah cha Cushi , chule Cushi cha chu Zephaniah ahi . )
36001002	Pakaiyin aseiyin , “ Keiman leiset thil jouse kasuhmang ding ahi .
36001003	Mihem jouse , ganhing jouse , vachate le nga namkim , migiloute manthahna didng kabol ding ahi . Mihem namkim kasuhgam a , hinghoi kanei lou didng ahi . Kei-Pakaiyin kasei ahitai .
36001004	“ Jerusalem khosung mite le Juhdah gamsung mite abonchauva kasuhgam ding ahi . Baal doi houna halsi sia kasuhmanga , koiman Baal kinbol Thempuho jong ageldoh louhel ding ahi .
36001005	Intingvuma kaldoh a nisa , lha chule ahsite chibai boh ho jong kasuhgam ding ahi . Kei eihouva , Kei dia tahpan dia kihalsel , chujou teng Milcom pathen mina kihahsel chan jong kasuhmang ding ahi .
36001006	Nungjam a hung kile kit lou , kaheng hinjon lou , apui hoi diuva kahenga taolou jouse jong kasuhmang ding ahi , ” ati .
36001007	Pakai Nikho anaitai , Pathenin thil bola got nikho chu ; hijeh chun thip beh chan um’in . Pakaiyin amite hi kilhaina gamtha banga athagot ahi .
36001008	Pakaiyin aseiyin , “ Mi kathagam got nikho le vaipote le leng chapate chule namdangte chonchan jop jouse talen kamatsah ding ahi .
36001009	namdangte doi houva le adoi houvu in dimset dia miho that gama anei chasun chomgam ho chengse chu talen kamatsah soh ding ahi , ” ati
36001010	Pakaiyin aseiyin , “ Hiche nikho le chun Jerusalem khopi nga-kelkot’a ka ogin kija ding ahi . Khopi sah thahna mun a jong ka le mao ogin kija a , thinglhanglama jong ogin husa nasa tah kija ding ahi .
36001011	Kivei mi ho thigam ahijeh-in , ka le mao ogin najah tengu , khoto lama change kap’uvin !
36001012	“ Hiteng chule thaomei devah a Jerusalem khosung kakhol ding , kisongtah a aning anop’a paova , ‘ Itilam lam ahin Pakayin ipi abol ngaipoi , ’ tia seiho chu talen kamasah soh ding ahi .
36001013	A-in jouseu kisuchim a , anei chengseu kichomgam ding ahi . Asah sau in a cheng lou diu , abolsau lengpi leiya lengpitwi adon louhel diu ahi , ” ati .
36001014	Pakai nikho loupe tah chu anaitai-anai behseh jengtan , ahung kitol jel jul jengtai ! Thohmo hel nikho , sepai hangpen jong lha lhop’a kap a pengjah ding ahi .
36001015	Hiche nikho chu lungsat nikho , gim gentheina , manthahna le mah thahna , muthim lung jinna , mitsin khojin ,
36001016	galkon dia sumkon kimut ni , kulpi kaisa khopi ho le inchungsang ho delkhum dia gal-lhang kisap nikho hi didng ahi .
36001017	“ Namtin mihem chunga hitobang manthahna kalhut khum ding jeh hin mitin mitcho banga kimail ele diu ahi . Kei dounan achonseuvin , tua hi athisanu teisih kisung lha bang ding , athilong , monsau tol’a kijam chap ding ahi , ” ati .
36001018	Pakaiyin lungsat amusah nikho le asana dangkauvin jong ahuhhing lou diu ahi . Vannoi pumpi hi alunghanna meiyin akahvam ding ahi . Leiset chung cheng jouse hetman louva haisama alha ding ahi .
36002001	Vo jumle ja helou nam mite ! Hung kikhom loi tau ,
36002002	pahpul’a napul kah-u , pakai lunghan deoje jun naphah masangu , Pakaiyin lunghan aphondoh masang hin !
36002003	Pakai thupeh nit jing , gamsung mi nun nemte , Pakaiya hung kiheilut loiyuvin . Thildih bol’un , pakai angsunga kineosah-uvin , chutile ijem tia Pakai lunghan nikho teng talen man louva nahoidoh theiyu ahi .
36002004	Gaza kho sung a koima kikhen lou ding ahi . Ashkelon kho min dalha soh-intin , Ashdod kho mite nilanga kideljamsoh ding ahiuvin , Ekron khosung mite khosunga kona kinodoh ding ahiuve .
36002005	Vo Twikhanglen pamchin dunga cheng Philistinete ada nahiuve . Pakaiyin nachung thuu atantai . Khat beh jong khen neilouva nasuhgam hel diu ahi .
36002006	Twikhanglen pang dung gam nanei joouseu gamchangnoi soh a , kelngoi chingho ngahmun sonna le kelngoite dia neh thei hamhing dimset ding ahi .
36002007	Judah mi ahingdoh hon nagamsung alo diu , kelngoihon vahna aneiyuva , Ashkelon khosung in hoa jan geh diu ahi . Pakai a-Pathen’un umpintin , ahaodohsah kit diu ahi .
36002008	Thaneipan Pakaiyin aseiyin , “ Moab le Ammon miten kamite aphin’uva ahoutom nau kajan , agamsungu jong lahpeh dia hoitho tah a hamhoi tho’u kajai .
36002009	Kikhel lou Hing jing Israel Pathen kahinaa kihahsel kahi-Moab le Ammon hi Sodom le Gomorrah banga kasuhgam ding ahi . Akhomun jouseu jong chikhuh soh didng , tonsot khogem a kijam a , lingle khao keh dimset ding ahi . Kamite ahingdoh chengin amaho hi chomgam’untin , agamsungu alahpeh diu ahi , ” ati .
36002010	Thaneipen Pakai mite aphin’uva , kiletsah hoitho abol jal’uva Moab mite le Ammon mite hitobanga hi talen kimatsah ding ahiuve .
36002011	“ Pakaiyin hoh kichantin , leiset mite doihou jouse imacha lou aso ding , chutah le namtin vaipin Pakai bou houva , agamsung cheh a chibai aboh diu ahi .
36002012	Pakaiyin Sudan mite jong athagam ding ahi .
36002013	Pakaiyin Assyria suhamngna din tha jedoh-intin , Nineveh khopi chu khogem lah asosah a , twi bwina nelgam ahisah ding ahi .
36002014	Kelngoite le bong ho chule satinin kolle na bou anei diu ahi , khogem lah a hin simbupi hung chengin tin , bangkot dunga ham ham diu ahi . Kotpi phung dunga va-ahte hung hamlah lah-uvinte . Inthing cedar thinga kimang jouse jong alheng lhol a kijam a , akeova um ding ahi .
36002015	Athahat kisonpia hamhoitho , lung mongtah a kigel khopi chu hitia hung um sing ahi . Khosung miten akhopiu chu vannoiya lengpen le minthang penin agel’ui . Itobang melsea gamsate kititna le gamthip lai hungdoh ding hitam ! Ajotpa jouse kinleh leu leu diu ahi .
36003001	Ohe ada ahi-chonset le doumah bol , mite bolgim khopi !
36003002	Pakai thu la angaipon , gahna jong asangpoi . Pakaiya ki-ngai lou , apanpi jong ngeh lou ahi .
36003003	Avaibolte sakei kisen abngun , thutan ho jong kamkei gilkelte nehmoh dagu khovahsah lou tobang ahiuve .
36003004	Themgaoten la khohsah neilou , mi lhem chavai bep ; Thempuho jong thil theng suboh a , Pathen Danthu geiya adeilama kihei jen gahiuve .
36003005	Ahinla khopi sunga Pakai pansaa itih a jong thildih jen gbol ahi . Niso she le amite din thudih-in na atong jingin ahi . Hiche jong hin midih louten kumle ja helouvin thildih lou jeng abol jinguve .
36003006	Pakaiyin aseiyin , “ Namtin vaipi kasugamin , akhopiu le kulpi pal ho , intingvum sang jouse kasumangtai . Khopi jouse akamdel’in lamlen ho keovin akijamin , mihing abeihel tai .
36003007	Kabol gimna hi kamiten gel jinga , kagahna asan diu , chuteng eija lheh diuvin kanagel’e . Ahinla chomkah louvin chavai bubah-in alamkittauve , ” ati .
36003008	Pakiyin aseiyin , “ Namtin vaipi hehse dia kakipat ngah-un . Kalunghan husa thamsah dia namtin vaipi le lenggam jouse khop khom dia kagel lhuh ahitai . kalunghanna meikouva leiset pumpi kahalvam ding ahi .
36003009	“ Chuteng namtin vaipi lung heidah ing ting , kei tilou Pathen dang koma tao louhel ding ahiuve . Kei thubou ngaitauvinte .
36003010	Sudan gam lang peh a thechehsa kamiten jong kahenga kilhaina thilto ahinchoi diu ahi .
36003011	hiteng chule neidou jal’uva mit le maim oh aum lou din gnahitauve . Kelietsah hoitho chengse tolmang ing ting , kalhang theng chunga neidou kit louhel diu ahi .
36003012	Mi nun nem le kineosah chengse khen in gting , kahenga panpi ngaiya hun gjing diu ahi .
36003013	Israel ahin gdoh chengin mi koima dih louvin bol pouvintin , jou sei lou ding , lhep lhah thu jong sei pouvinte . Lung mong le khangtouva um a , gin nei lou didng ahiuve , ” ati .
36003014	Vo Israelte , kipa la sauvin ! Vo Jerusalem nalungthim pumpin kipah-in !
36003015	Pakiyin nathohna asubeitan , Namelmate atolmangdoh tai . Pakai , Israel Lengpan naumpiuve , Kichatna ding him him aumtapoi .
36003016	Phat ahung lhunge mihon Jerusalme jah a , “ Kicha hih-in Zion khopi ! Ban-gol jesal jingin !
36003017	Pakai na-Pathenin naumpi jinge , Athahat’in gal najosah tai . Pakaiyin kipapin natin , Alungset jal’in hinkhothah pen nate , Nachung changa kipa la sante .
36003018	Kut laiya kipah ho bang ding ahi , ” ati diu ahi . Pakaiyin aseiyin : “ hutotna ka-ngatan , Vetda nachan kasubeitai .
36003019	Phat ahung lhungtai ! Nabolse talen matsah ing ting , Elbai chengse kahuhdoh ding , Sohchangte inlama hin puiyinge . Jumle ja athohna chengseu Ginle jabolna kaheidoh a , Vannoi miten apachat diu ahi .
36003020	Phat ahung lhunge ! Namite cheh chaosa puikhom ing ting , Vannoi minthang kihisah ding , Naphat theiya nahaodoh kit ding ahi , ” ati . Pakaiyin aseitai .
37001001	Darius Persia gamvaipoa apan kal kum ni lhinna , lha gupna , ni masapen nin Haggai Themgao kamin Pakaiyin thu ahinseiye . Athusei hi Judah gam vaipo Zerubbabel , Shealtiel chapa le Thempu chungnung Joshua , Jehozadak chapa ding ahi .
37001002	Thaneipen Pakaiyin Haggai jah a aseiyin , “ Hiche ho hi Houin sah phatna ding hilou laiyin aseiyui , ” ati .
37001003	Hijeh chun Pakaiyin mipi dingin hiche thu hi Haggai Themgao kamin aseiye :
37001004	“ Vo kamite , idia nang ho , in phatah tah a chenga , Kei Houin asesa kijam ham ?
37001005	Nachunguva thilsoh mulou nahiuvem ?
37001006	Muchi tampi natu vangun lhosoh ga themcha bou namu’uve . Neh ding nanei vangun oivana kham ahipoi . Lengpitwi don ding naneiyun , chimna kham ahipoi ! Ponsil naneiyun , lum nasahpi khamu ahipoi . Natong’an oivana amujoupoi .
37001007	I-tile hiti ho hi soh ahi namudoh louvu ham ?
37001008	Tun thinglhang lama kaltouvun ; inthil gajongun Houin saphauvin ; kalung lhai ding , eikihou dol’a eikihou ding ahi .
37001009	“ Lhoga tampi mu ding nakinem’un , amala lhomcha ahiji . Lhosoh in a nahinpoh lut tengu jongle kamut mangpehjitai . Idia kabol ham ? Ka-Houin sesa um a , nading cheh bolna nakisah lel jal’u ahi .
37001010	Hijeh a chu gotwi lha louva muchi chivo phalou-keh lou ahi .
37001011	Gamsunga gotwi kang a , molle lhang gosoh , bulei le lengpilei jouse go a , olive honlei jouse gosoh , muchi chivo jouse gotwi ngai , mihem le gancha chule thil ijakai gotwi ngaiya umsoh ahitai , ” ati .
37001012	Babylon a sohchang hung kile kit-Zerubbabel le Joshua chule mipin Pakai a-Pathen’un bol dia aseipeh-u chu aboltauve . Pakai sole Themgao Haggai chu aging cheh-un asei angaiyui .
37001013	Hichun Haggaiyin Pakai thusei chu mipi aseipeh-in : “ Kakitep ahitai-kaumpi jing ding nahiuve , ” ati .
37001014	Sohchang hung kile kit-Zerubbabel , Judah gam vaipopa , Thempu chungnung Joshua , chule mipi abonchauvin Houin sapha din Pakaiyin atildoh tai . Hijeh chun thaneipen Pakai a-Pathenu Houin asapantauve .
37001015	Asah patnau chu Darius gamvaipoh kal kum nina , lhagup lhin , nisom ni le li ni ahi .
37002001	Darius leng chankal kum ni lhinna , lha sagi lhin , nisom ni le khat nin Pakaiyin Haggai Themgao kamin thu ahinsei kit’e .
37002002	Aman Haggai chu Judah gam vaipo Zerubbabel le Thempu chungnung Joshua , chule mipi jah a thu sei din asol’in ,
37002003	“ Houin loupije chu geldoh theiya nalah-uva mihem khat beh umlou ham ? Itobanga namujiu vem ? Tunvang imacha ahitapoi .
37002004	Hijongle khatchan jong lungthoinan neidauvin . Tongpan’un , Ka-umpi jing nauve .
37002005	Egypt’a kona nahungdoh-u chun ka-umpi jing diuvin kakiteptai . Tunjong kaumpi jingui kicha hih-uvin .
37002006	“ Phat chomkah louva van le leiset , Twikhanglen kaholingsoh ding ahi .
37002007	Namtin vaipi lehkhup soh ing ting , anei agou chengseu hikoma kahin poh khom ding , Houin hi nei le gou dimset ding ahi .
37002008	Vannoiya sana dangka jouse aboncha Keiya ahi .
37002009	Houin luipa sanga Houin thah loupijo cheh ding , chuteng kamite chamle lungmon , haona kapeh ding ahi , ” ati . Thaneipen Pakaiyin asei ahitai .
37002010	Darius gamvaipoh kal kum ni na , lha ko lhin , nisom ni le ni li lhin nin thaneipen Pakaiyin Haggai Themgao kamin thu ahinseiyin ,
37002011	“ Aban a kisei thudol’a hin Thempuhon ilo ding agot’um dong temin :
37002012	Mihem khat touvin kilhaina sathenga kithat sahal khat tou aponsil’in kichundoh hen , hiche ponsil hin ipi thil hijongle : changlhah ham , an minsa ham , lengpitwi ham , olive thao ham , khat pen pen tongkha le , atoh khah pen pen chu sutheng theiyin tem ? ” ati . Hiche thudoh hi adoh phat’un thempuhon , “ Theng theiponte , ” atiuve .
37002013	Haggaiyin adong kit’in , “ Mihem khat’in thilong tongkhan kisuboh taleh , aman atoh khah khah neh le chah ho chu boh thei ding ham ? ” ati . Thempuho , “ Boh theiyinte , ” atiiuve .
37002014	Haggaiyin aseiyin , “ Pakaiyin aseiyin , hitobanga chu hiche nam mite chunga jong chuti ding ahin , atohdoh aboldoh chengseu jong chuti ding ahi ; hiti hin maicham phunga atodoh chengseu jong abohsa jeng ahibouve , ” ati .
37002015	Pakaiyin , “ Nachunguva thilsoh hi nahetdoh thei louvu ham ? Houin sah phat napat masangun ,
37002016	chang kilogram ja ni jen tedoh din che leu chun kilogram jakhat bou umintin , lengpitwi litre jakhat thaldoh din lengpitwi bel gave leu chun litre som li bou um ding ahi .
37002017	Ke dohsah tei dia natu anche louhing jouse semchai din khohui hamve vun kalansah-in , lungnaheideh pouve .
37002018	Tuni hi lha ko na , nisom ni le ni lhin na , Houin inmun kilaijou nikho ahi . Tua pat ipi hungsoh ding vetem’uvin .
37002019	Changsal keosoh hen , lengpiga heosoh hen lang , theichang ga heo hen , kolbuthei le olive thing ga heo ta jongle , tua pat vang phatthei kaboh diu ahitai , ” ati .
37002020	Chuche lha , nisom ni le ni li lhin nin Pakaiyin Haggai kam a , thu asei kit’in ,
37002021	athusei hi Judah gam vaipo , Zerubbabel ding ahin , “ Ken Van le leiset kaholing a ,
37002022	lenggam jouse le athaneina chengse akhup athal’a kakoi ding ahi . Kangtalai ho le atol ho akhup athal’a kale a , sakolte thigam a , achung toute kithat to diu ahi .
37002023	Hiche nikho tengle kalhacha Zerubbabel , nang hi kamin a vaihom dia kalhendoh ding nahi . Kalhendohsa nahitai , ” ati . Thaneipen Pakaiyin aseitai .
38001001	Darius hin Persia gamvai apoh kal kum ni na , lha get nan Iddo tupa , Berechiah chapa , Zechariah Themgao henga Pakaiyin hiche thu hi aseiye .

38001003	hijongle nang ho hi , ‘ hung kit’un , Keijong nahenguva hungkit nange . ’
38001004	Napu napateu umchan jop dauvin . Masangin themgao hon thilse boldin ail’un , chonse lou din asei peh-ui . Ahivangin kasei ngailou , kathu nit louvin aum’ui .
38001005	Napu napateu le Themgao ho chu abeisoh tai .
38001006	Kalhacha Themgao ho mang chan-napu napateu thu kapen , kagisaljie , ahivangin nahsah mon aum’un gim genthei athoh lo’uve . Chutah le thaneipen Pakai Ken talen matsah lom ahi banguva kabol hon , lung aheiji tauve , ” ati .
38001007	Darius gamvai poh kal kum ni na , lha som le khat , Shebat lha , nisom ni le ni li lhin nin , jan a mu kaneinaa Pakaiyin sei ding thu khat eihil’e .
38001008	Pakai Vantil khat hi sakolsan chunga atouve . Vantil chu phaicham a huisum thing lah a adingin , anunga hin sakol dang-asan le abong , akang tampi aum’uve .

38001010	Leiset gakholtoh dia Pakaiyin asol ho chu ahiuve , ” ati .

38001012	Hichun Vantil’inaseiyin , “ Vo Thaneipen Pakai , Jerusalem khopi le Judah gamsung khopi jouse chungakum som sagi sungin nalung hangin , itih tah le ba nahepi ding ham ? ” ati .
38001013	Pakaiyin Vantil chu lungmon na thun adonbut’in ,

38001016	Hijeh a chu Jeruslem khopi hepi dia hungkile kit ahi . Jerusalem khopi kisapha a , Ka-Houin kisemthah didng ahi , ” ati .

38001018	Kagao chan naa bongchal ki li jen kamui .

38001020	Pakaiyin thih khengthem she choiya pasal li eivetsah-e .

38002001	Kagaochan na a thilte-na jol choi pasal khat kamui .

38002004	Vantil masan khatjoh jah a , “ Thilte-na choi gollhangpa khu gaseipeh-in , Jerusalem khopi sunga mihem le gancha tamval’a kulpin adol lou ding ahi .

38002010	Pakaiyin , “ Vo Jerusalem mite , kipa la sauvin ! Nalah-uva cheng din kahunge ! ” ati .
38002011	Hiteng chule namtin vaipi Pakai henga hungun tin , amite hi diu ahi . Nalah-uva chenga , nahenguva eihinsol nahetdoh diu ahi .
38002012	Agamtheng sunga Judah hi agou lhantum hiya , Jerusalem hi angailut pen khopi hi didng ahi .
38002013	Achenna munthenga konin Pakai ahunge , amasanga mitin thip chet’in um’uvin .
38003001	kagaochanna khat’a Pakaiyin Thempu chungnung Joshua , Pakai Vantil masanga ding eivetsah-e . Joshua koma chun Satan adingin , ahehse din gonsan aum’e .

38003003	Joshuan ponsil nen sil’in hikoma chun adinge .

38003006	Vantil chun Joshua jah a
38003007	Thaneipen pakaiyin aseitai , “ Kadanthu nit’a nganse na cheng natohdoh le , Ka-Houin lhachan pangin natin , hongcha dung limbol’a napan ding , chule kamasanga um jing Vantilte taona kasan banga nataona kasan ding ahi .
38003008	Ngaiyin Joshua , nang thempu chungnung nahin , chule a Themputpi dang hon jong ngaiyun-khonung hamphatna ding dol’a um nang hon : kalhacha-Abah kiti chu kaphondoh ding ahi !
38003009	Joshua masanga maisagi jen a kisem song khat kakoiye . Song chunga hin lekhajem jih in gting , nikho khatseh sunga hiche gamsung chonsetna kasuhmang ding ahi .
38003010	Hiche nikho chu ahung lhun teng , nanghon nahenga nakom kouva , lengpilei le theichang ga thalhingset chu kipa lungmon pi dinga natem didu ahi , ” ati .
38004001	Kajah a thusei Vantil chu ahungin , a-ihmu kibolna bangin eihung suthouve .
38004002	Chule kajah a , “ Ipi namun ? ” tin eidonge . Kenjong , “ Sanaa kisem thaomeikhom kamun , achunga khun thaokhon khat akikoiye . Thaomeikhom chunga khun thaomeikhom chunga khun thaomei sagi aumin , thaomei khat khat’in meijang sagi cheh aneiyui .
38004003	Thaomeikhom koma hin olive thing phung ni cheh akeh-in , ajet aveiya khat khat’in akeh-e , ” kati .
38004004	Vantil chu kadongin , “ Hiche ho hi ipito tekah ham , kapu ? ” kati .
38004005	Aman , “ Nahet lou ham ? ” eiti . Kenjong , “ Kahepoi , ” tin kadonbut’e .
38004006	Hichun Vantil’in Pakaiya konin hiche hi Zerubbabel seipeh din eihil’in , “ Sepaite le thahat vang hilouva , Ka-Lhagao vanga najo tei ding ahi .
38004007	Kisuhmona ding molle lhang kikhangsang bang jongle , namasanga kitol mangsoh diu , Houin nasah phat’a , Inmun song nukhah pen nakoiteng , mipin sam’untin , ‘ Ahoiye , ahoiye ! ’ tia aseidiu ahi , ” ati .
38004008	Pakaiya konin kahenga thu khat ahung lhung kit’in ,
38004009	Zerubbabel’in Houin mun asep joutai , Houin jong asah jou ding ahi . Asah jou teng kamiten ahenguva nang sol’a Kei kahi hedoh tauvinte .
38004010	tohban chalmo jeh-in lung himon aum’un , Zerubbabel’in Houin sah ban ajop jing amudoh tengu kipah thanom lheh-unte , ” ati . Vantil chun kajah a , “ Thaomei sagi hileiset pumpi musoh hel Pakai mit sagi ahiuve , ” ati .
38004011	Kenjong , “ Thaomeikhom jet le veiya olive thingphung te ni khu ipito tekah ba ham ?
38004012	Chule olive thaotwi lonna sana-long te ni kom a olive thing bathe ni khu ipito tekah ham ? ” tin kadonge .
38004013	Aman , “ Nahet lou ham ? ” tin eidonge . Kenjong , “ Pu kahepoi , ” kati .
38004014	Hichun aman , “ Hiche te ni hi , leiset pumpi Pakaiyin alhachaa pang dia alhendoh te ni chu ahi , ” ati .
38005001	Kagah vet kit le , vanlaijol’a leng lekhajol khat kamui .
38005002	Vantil chun ipi kamu eidonge . Kenjong , “ Vanlaijol’a lengle , metre ka sao , metre li le keh len , lekhajol khat kamui , ” kati .
38005003	Aman kajah a aseiyin , “ Hichejol’a khu leiset pumpi chunga thejal ding gaosapna kisun ahi . Lekhajol lang khat’a khu gamsunga gucha jouse nodoh ding kisun a , alang khat’a khu jou pan a kihahsl chengse tolmang ding kisei ahi .
38005004	Thaneipen Pakaiyin hiche gaosapna lhadoh ding aseiyin , gucha jouse le jou pan a kihahsel’a thusei jouse insunga lut didng ahi . A-insunguva pansan tin , asuhgam hel’a adalhah ding ahi , ” ati . Pocha sunga numei khat gaochanna kimu
38005005	Vantil chu ahung kilah kit’in , “ Ven , thil chom beh khat ahungdoh kit’e ! ” ati .
38005006	Kenjong , “ Ipi ham ? ” tin kadonge . Aman , “ Pocha khat ahin , gamsung pumpi chonset to tekah ahi , ” ati .
38005007	Pocha sin chu hahngeh a kisem ahi . Kavet le asin ahongdoh-un , pocha sunga chun numei khat atouve !
38005008	Vantil chun , “ Hiche numei hi gitlouna to tekah ahi , ” ati . Hichun numei nu chu pocha sunga asonlut’in asinkhumtai .
38005009	Kagah vet le vasai lhaving tobang neiya , numei ni kaheng lam ngan ahung leng lhone . Pocha chu akhaidoh lhonin , alen mangpi lhontai .
38005010	Kenjong Vantil chu kadongin , “ Hoilam lhut agot lhon ham ? ” kati .
38005011	Aman eodonbut’in , “ Houin asahna diuva Babylon gama apoh mang lhon ahitai . Houin chu asah jou tengu , pocha chu koiyuntin , chule hichu ahou diu ahi , ” ati .
38006001	Gaochan nan mu kanei kit’e . Sum-eng molsang ni kah a konin kangtalai li ahung kitoldoh-e .
38006002	Kangtalai masapen chu sakolsan in akaiyin , anina chu sakolvomin akaiyin ,
38006003	thumna chu sakolvomin akaiyin , li lhinna chu sakolpol’in akaiye .
38006004	Vantil jah a hin kenjong , “ Pu , hiche kangtalaiho hi ipito tekah ham ? ” tin kadonge .
38006005	Aman , “ Amaho hi kolkimvel ning lia khopihui ahiuvin , leiset pumpi Pakai ang sunga hung kondoh ahiuve , ” ati .
38006006	Sakolvom ho kai kangtalai chun sahlam Babylon lang ajonin , sakolkangte kaiyin lhumlam ajonin , sakolpolte kaiyin lhanglam gamsung ajon’e .
38006007	Sakolpolte akijotdoh phat’in leiset gakholtoh loi ding a-ngah lel’ui . Hijeh chun Vantil’in , “ Leiset gakhol loiyun ! ” tin aseiye . Hiti chun agakhol tauve .
38006008	Hichun Vantil’in eihin kouvin , “ Sahlam Babylon lang jon sakolten Pakai lunghan asuthip tauve , ” ati .
38006009	Pakaiyin hitin thu eiseipeh-e ,
38006010	“ Sohchang mi Helsai le Tobijah , chule Jedaiah thilpeh ho hi choiyin lang , Josiah , Zephaniah chapa koma gache loiyin , Amaho hi abonchauva Babylon gama sohchang hung kile kit ahiuve .
38006011	Athilpeh-u dangka le sana ho hin lallikhuh khat semin , Thempu chungnung , Joshua , Jehozadak chapa khu khuhpeh-in .
38006012	Ajah a Thaneipen Pakai thusei seipeh-in , ‘ Abah kitipa chu hung phattheiya , Pakai Houin asah phat ding ahi .
38006013	Ama hin Houin saphan tin , leng khat chanlom tah change , amite chunga vaihom ding ahi . Alaltouna koma Thempu khat ding jingin tin , lung khat le chamnan na tong lhoninte , ’ tin .
38006014	Lallukhuh hi Helsai le Tobijah , chule Jedaiah le Josiah het jingna dia Pakai Houina kikoi jing ding ahi , ” ati .
38006015	Muntin le gamtin a chengte hunguntin , Pakai Houin sapha hung pan gdiu ahi . Houin kisah phat jou teng , nahenguva Thaneipen Pakaiyin eihinsol hi nahetdoh diu ahi . Pakai na-Pathenu thupeh chengse nanit’u le thil hijetpi hi guilhung ding ahi .
38007001	Darius lengvaipoh kal kumli na , lha ko , Kislev lha , ni li nin Pakaiyin thu khat eiseipeh-e .
38007002	Bethel kho miten Sharezer le regemmelech chu amiteu to Pakaiya vangboh thum din , Thaneipen Pakai Houin a asol’un ,
38007003	chule Thempuho le Themgaote chu thu gadonga , “ Kum hijat sunga kahinbol jingo , lha nga lhin she le houin kisuhmang jal’a an ngol’a lunghem kabol’u hi kajom nah lai diu ham ? ’ ti din asol’uve .
38007004	Pakaiyin kajah a sei thu chu hiche hi ahi .
38007005	“ Gamsung mite le Thempuho seipeh-in , kum som sagi sunga , lha nga le lha sagi lhinseh le an ngol’a lunghem athoh jui khu , Kei jabolna abol’u ahipoi .
38007006	Aneh-uva adon tengu jongle oiva na dinga nea don ahibouvui , ” ati .
38007007	Jerusalem khopi phatthei lai , khosung dimset’a mihem chen lai , khopi kimvel kholen dunga mihem chen dimset , lhanglam le lhumlam thinglhang bul dung geiya mihem chen dimset laiya Themgao masate koma Pakai thusei chu hiche hi ahi .
38007008	Pakaiyin Zechriah jah a aseiyin ,
38007009	“ Masanglaiyin kamite kaseipeh-in , ‘ Thildih bol’uvin , khat le khat khoton kihepi to cheh-un .
38007010	Meithai le chagate , nalah-uva cheng gamchom mi , chule koi hile neilel tapou bolse hih-un . Khat le khat kisuhsetna ding thil gon dauvin , ’ kati .
38007011	Ahivangin kamiten lungtah tah-in ajadauvin ahi . Lungkot hong louvin aum’un ,
38007012	alungthimu songtah-in atahsah-ui . Masang lai Themgaote kama kaseisa thu ho angai loujeh-un kalung hangtai .
38007013	Thu kaseipet’a angai loujeh-un , atao tengu jongle kasangpoi .
38007014	Twisoh thil lhoh bangin abonchauvin gamchom a cheng din kalhoh mangtai . Gam phatah hiche gam hi ahomkeovin akijamin , koimachan chennan aneitapoi , ” ati .
38008001	Thaneipen Pakaiyin Zechariah jah a hiche thu hi aseiye .
38008002	“ Kamite kakhohsah beh seh , khohsah val jeh a amelmate chunga kalunghan lo nah in Jerusalem kithopi nom jinga um kahi .
38008003	Kakhopi theng , Jerusalema hung cheng kit ding kahi . Khopi kitah , Thaneipen Pakai lhang chu lhang theng kiti ding ahi .
38008004	Numei pasal tehse kembet net , tenggol phut’a lamjot ho chu kholai nin gkoi dunga hung tou kit diu ahi .
38008005	Kholai lemlen dunga kichem ding nu-ngah golhang hung dimset ki tdiu ahi .
38008006	“ Hitobang thilsoh ding hi tua amoh cheng na mite lah a hingdoh ho gel din soh dia kilomlou hel ding ahin , Kei didn imacha ahimo poi .
38008007	Kamite min ahen nau gamsunga konin huhdoh ing ting ,
38008008	Jerusalema cheng dia niso le nilhum a kona kahinlepui kit ding ahiuve . Kamite hiuvintin , a-Pathenu , kitah le dih tah a chunguva vaihom kahi ding ahi .
38008009	“ Hanguvin ! Ka-Houin sah phatna dia inmun kiset phat laiya themgaote thusei ho ma ma chu najah kit’u ahi .
38008010	Hiche masang chun mihem hihen gancha hile thalah didng akimujoupoi , melmate masanga hoidoh thei jong ana umpoi . Ken miho chu khat le khat kakisousah-e .
38008011	Tunvang hiche nam mite lah a ahingdoh chengse hi lamchonbeh-in kaboltai .
38008012	Chamle lung mongin vaikon’untin , alengpiguiyu gatheiya , leiset’in muchi chivo asemdoh ding , gotwi nengsel sing ahi . Kamite ahingdoh chengse vangbohna hijatpi hikapeh ding ahi .
38008013	Vo Juddah le Israel mite ! Malaiyin gamchom mite khat le khat akigaosap’un , ’ Hitobang hamsetna Judah le Israel lhunkhum hin nang jong lhun khum hen ! ’ akitiuve . Ahivangin nahuhhing ung ting , hiche gamchom mite chu khat le khat , ’ Judah le Israel chunga lhung vangbohna cheng nang jong changing , ’ kiti diu ahi . Hijeh chun hangtah-in pangun , kicha hih hel’un , ” ati .
38008014	Thaneipen Pakaiyin aseiyin , “ Napu napateuvin eiphin lung hang phat’un , sumang din kagon , khelchom louvin kasumangtai .
38008015	Tua vang Jerusalem le Judah mite vang boh kagot ahi . Hijeh chun kicha hih-un .
38008016	Hitobanga hi naum diu ahi : Khat le khat thutah-in kihouvun . Thutanna phunga thudih mong mong , cham len theina seiyun .
38008017	Khat le khat susuhsetna ding thil gon dauvin . Jouvin kihahsel dauvin . Jousei le thudihlou , pumhat kahoi , ” ati .
38008018	Thaneipen Pakaiyin Zechariah jah a hiche thu hi aseiye ;
38008019	“ Lha li , lha nga , lha sagi , chule lha som lhin na an ngol kibolji ho hi Judah mite dia kipa thanopna kut akiheidoh ding ahi . Thudih le chamna khohsah-uvin , ” ati .
38008020	Thaneipen Pakayin aseiyin , “ khopi tina miten Jerusalem ahinjotna diu phat ahung lhunge .
38008021	Khopi khat’a hungkon hon khopi choma hung kon ho jah a , ‘ Thaneipen Pakai chibai boh a ahenga vang thum ding kahiuve . Hungin kilhonute , ’ ati diu ahi .
38008022	Namtin a mi , nam hunei tah tah ho thaneipen Pakai chibai boh dia Jerusalema hung diu , ahenga vang athum diu ahi .
38008023	Hiteng chule gamchom mi som jen Judah mi khatseh koma hunguva , ‘ Patheninnaumpiu kajauvin , Najotna mun’uva din kihon jengute , ’ tia asei diu ahi , ” ati .
38009001	Pakai thusei chu hiche hi ahi : Hadrach gamsung le Damasus khopi talen man din akoitai . Israelte khopi maiseh hilouvin , Syria khopi maiseh hilouvin , Syria khopi jong Paakiya ahibouve .
38009002	Hadrach to kigamgi Hamth jong Pakaiya ahin , Tyre le Sidon chule athepna chengseu jong Pakaiya ahi .
38009003	Tyre hin kulpi akisemin , dangka sana ahao behseh-in imalou bangin aumtai !
38009004	Hinla anei chasun Pakiyin alah mangpeh ding ahi . Anei agou jouse Twikhanglen a leh lut’intin , akhopi kavamhel ding ahi .
38009005	Hiche thilsoh hi Ashkelon khopin amudoh teng tija ding ahi . Gaza khopin mudoh-intin , a thoh lel lheh ding ahi . Ekron khopi jong chute ding , akinepna chengse beisoh ding ahi . Gaza lengpa thi ding , Ashkelon khopi ahomkeova um ding ,
38009006	Ashdod khopi jong nam choplop hung chengkhom diu ahi . Pakaiyin aseiyin , “ Hiche Philistine mi kiletsahte hi kasuhnem ding ahi .
38009007	Sa jong thisan puma aneh lou diu , nehmo ho jong aneh da diu ahi . Ahingdoh amoh cheng chu kamite lah a kisimtha a , Judah phungbah khat banga um diu ahi . Ekron jong , Jebua mite banga kamite to kisimtha diu ahitai .
38009008	Kagamsung ki-ngang ting , sepaite kajotpa sah lou ding ahi . Vaipo giloute kamite bol gentheisah ponge . Itobanga kamiten ganthei hesoh athoh kamudoh tai , ” ati .
38009009	Vo Zion chate , hachangpan kipah-un ! Kipah-in khosam’un , Jerusalem mite ! Ven , nalengpau ahunge ! Galjo minthangin ahungin ; Nun nemtah-in sa-ngan chunga touvin , Sa-ngan nou lagol chunga touvin ahunge !
38009010	Pakaiyin aseiyin : “ Israelte galsatna kangtalai jouse sumang ing ting , Jerusalema sakolte kakai mang ding ; Galmuna manchah thlpi kaheboh doh ding ahi . Nalengpauvin namtin vaipia chamna semintin , Twikhanglen lang khat’a pat langkhat geiya vai ahoma , Euphrates luipia pat leiset mong geiya vai ahom didng ahi , ” ati .
38009011	Pakaiyin aseiyin : “ Kilhaina thisan a mohor namkhumsa Eikitepnau jal’a , Namiteu chamlhatsah ing ting , Twi beina sohchanna muna ongthonl diu ahi .
38009012	Vo Sohchang kinem jing ho , hung kile kit’un ; Nalungmonna mun hinjon’uvin ! Nathohgim nau jat nia vangboh dia Tua hi kateppeh nahitauve !
38009013	Judah hi sepai Thalpin mang ing ting , Isdrael hi Thalchanga Kaman ding ahi . Zion mite chamjam banga kaman’a , Greek mite satna kanei ding ahi , ” ati .
38009014	Pakai amite chungvuma kitahdoh-intin , Athalchang kolphe banga alensah ding ; Hatchungnung Pakaiyin sumkon mut’in tin , Lhanglama pat go le huipia hung kitol ding ahi .
38009015	Thaneipen Pakaiyin amite ngah-intin , Amahon amelmateu asuhgam diu ahi . Galmuna jukhan pen-ohjen jun banguntin , Amelmateu thisan alonsah diu ; Kilhaina gan thisan long banga , Maicham phunga khona kisunglha bang ding ahi .
38009016	Hiche nikho hi haung lhun teng . Pakaiyin amite ahuhhing ding ; Kelngoi chingpan akelngoite Thidingsa ahuhdoh bang ding ahi . Lallukhuh a sum-eng pah banga Agamsunga vah jing diu ahitai .
38009017	Gamsung phat ding le hoi ding je chu ! Cahngle lengpitwi vanga khangdong thahat diu ahi .
38010001	Chavang laiya go juhna din Pakaiyin taovun ! Mei kaisah , dai lhahsah chule go juhsah Pakai ahin , mitin dia louma phatsah Amabou ahi .
38010002	Mihon doi asan’un , phunsan ho pou adongun , jouthu le ngol thubuh bou akimu’ve . Abang bangin mang aleuvin , lam hilou lama napuitauve ; nalhamon nau jong pannabei ahi . Hijeh chun mipi hi kelngoi mangsa bangin suhna ding helouvin avah le leuve . Lamkai beiyin hesoh genthei athoh tauve .
38010003	Pakaiyin aseiyin , “ Kamite chunga vaipo gamchom miho chunga kalung hange , amaho khu talen kamatsah ding ahi . Jusahte kami ahin , Kei-thaneipen Pakaiyin kivet tep nange . Galsatna sakol hattah banga kanei ding ahiuve .
38010004	Kamite chunga vaipo ding alah-uva vaihom le lamkai , sepai lamkai sing hung pengsoh ding ahi .
38010005	Kholai dunga amelmateu bon-ngan lah a chil thang thang sepaite banga Judah miten gal ajo diu ahi . Pakaiyin apanpi jeh-uva gal asat diu , melma sakol touthem ho geiya ajo diu ahi .
38010006	“ Judahte hatsah ing ting , Israelte kahuhdoh ding ahi . Abonchauvin voujang natping ting , In a kahinlepui doh kei ding ahiuve . Kapaidoh khah louhel bang diu , Pakai a-Pathenu kahi , atao nau sang inge .
38010007	Israel sepai hattah bang diu , Lengpitwi donchima kipah ho bang diu ahi . Hiche agaljo’u hi ason apah-un geljingun tin , Pakai thilbol hi akipapi diu ahi .
38010008	“ Kamite kakoukhom ding , Huhdoh ing ting angaiya katamsah didng ahi .
38010009	Namtin vaipi lah a thecheh jong leng , Gamla tah a kona eigeldoh diu ahi . Amaho le achateu ahingdoh cheng , In a hung kile kit diu ahi .
38010010	Egypt le Assyria kona In a kahinpui ding , Agamsunguva kachensah ding ahi . Gilead gam le Lebanon a chensah ing ting , Gamsung pumpi midim ding ahi .
38010011	Gim hesohna Twikhanglen kinong bangin jot’u jongle , Kei-Pakaiyin twi kinonglai kaphothip ding ahi . Nile lithuh geiya kansah a , Assyria hoitho tah nemlhan tin , Egypt hunei tah jong thabeiya um ding ahi .
38010012	Kamite hatsah ing ting , Chibai boh a kathua nung diu ahi , ” ati . Pakaiyin asei ahitai .
38011001	Vo Lebanon , cedar thing jouse halvamna din Nakotpi chengse hongdoh loiyin !
38011002	Kap’in maovin , thinggi jouse le Cedar thing ho alhusoh tai ; Thing minthangtah tah ho asugamtauve . Bashan phaiya gangpi thing hokap’in maovun ! Gammang thimlai atuchaitauve .
38011003	Vaipote lunghemin akap’ui , aloupi nau amangtai ; Sekeie kisen ginpi khu ngaiyun ; Achen nau gammang lai Jordan pang atuchaitauve !
38011004	Pakai ka-Pathenin kajah a , “ Thangam dia kikoi kelngoi hon chingpa bangin umin .
38011005	Aneihon kelngoite thatgam’untin , talen man louva umdiu ahi . Asa kijoh-untin , ‘ Vahchoiyun Pakai , ihaodoh tauve ! ’ tiuvinte . Kelngoi chingho jengin jong adipdappi pouve , ” ati .
38011006	Pakaiyin aseiyin , “ Leiset mi khat cha jong khoto taponge . Mihemho hi achunguva vaipote noiya kalutsah ding ahi . Hiche vaipoe hin leiset sugamhel’untin , akhut’uva konin chu-lha ponge , ” ati .
38011007	Kelngoi choa joh hon eithalah-un , thadia kikoi kelngoite kachinge . Tenggol ni kalan , khat chu , “ Deichom , ” katin , khat chu , “ Kipumkhatna , ” kati Chuin kelngoi hon kachinge .
38011008	Kelngoi chingma ma midang thum , eiho jing chunga kalung hangjah-in , lha khat sungin athum’un kasumangtai .
38011009	Hichun kelngoihon jah a , “ Ken naching tapouvinge . Athi thi ding kithi hen . Suhgam ding ding kisugam hen . Amoh ahing cheng jong khat le khat kisumangu hen , ” kati .
38011010	Chuin “ Deichom , ” kisah tenggol chu kalan , Pakaiyin namtin vaipi to akitepna suhkehna din kahehbongtai ,
38011011	Hiti hin hiche nikho hin kitepna chu akisuhkeh tai . Kelngoi choa le joh hon eive lhi jingun , kathilbol chu Pakaiyin thuseina anei ahe jingui .
38011012	Ken ajah-uva , “ Nanop’u le katohman neipeuvin , nadaule kikoitauvin , ” kati . Hijeh chun katohman din dangka somthum eipeuve .
38011013	Pakaiyin kajah a aseiyin , “ Sum chu Houin goukholnaa koiyin , ” eiti . Hijeh chun sum dangka somthum hi-manlu tah a agel’u chu-Houin goukholnaa kakoitai .
38011014	Chuin tenggol nina , “ Kipumkhatna , ” kiti chu kahehbongin , Judah le Israel kipumkhatna akehtai .
38011015	Pakaiyin kajah a aseiyin , “ Kelngoi chingin pang kit’in , tua napan vang hi pannabeiya napan ding ahi .
38011016	Mi khat kakelngoite ching din kakoiyin , ahivangin aman mangthah goa kelngoite akithopi poi ; amangla ahol pon , mapu jong aboldam poi ; ahing cheng jeng jong avahva pon ahi . Athao lai lai akithan , atin kikah abottel kelngoi chingpa chu adana-e ! Kelngoi hon adalhatai ! Athaneina gal’in asuhbei hel ding , aban tha ngoiya , amitchang jetlem cho ding ahi , ” ati .
38012001	Mihem hinsah a , Leiset semdoh , vanthamjol jaldoh Pakai , hiche Pakaiyin Israel thudol asei chu hiche hi ahi .
38012002	“ Jerusalem hi judonna khon tobanga kasemdoh ding ahi ; akimvel’a namtin vaipin don’un tin , jukham banga lonle le siu ahi . Jerusalem khopi aumchah tengu , Judah gamsung khopi dang jouse jong min aumchah ding ahi .
38012003	Hiche phat hi ahung lhun teng , Jerusalem hi songtum gihtah kabahsah a , dopkhang dia doa nammite chu kisanchat diu , vannoi namtin vaipi kithouva adel khum didu ahi .
38012004	Hiteng chule asakolteu hoh kin ing ting , achunga toute ka-ngolsah soh didng ahi . Judahte vetup ing ting , amelmateu sakolte mit kachotsah ding ahi .
38012005	Chutah le Judah phunga miten , ‘ Jerusalema cheng Thaneipen Pakai Pathenin amite thahat apei , ’ ati diu ahi .
38012006	“ Hiteng chule Judah phunga mite hi gamkang le changkung go lah a kihal meikou kabahsah a , akimvel’a namtin vaipi asuhgam ding ahi . Jerusalem kho mite vang khosunga lung monga cheng diu ahi .
38012007	“ Kei-Pakaiyin amasaa Judah sepaite gal kajosah a , David son le pah , chule Jerusalem sn lom jabolna chu , Judah gamsung san ding sanga thupijo deh lou ding ahi .
38012008	Chutengle Jerusalema chengte Pakaiyin ngah-intin , alah-uva lhasampen jong David hat’a hat ding ahi . David chilhahten miho chu Pakai vantil , Pathen tah tah banga alamkai diu ahi .
38012009	Chuteng Jerusalem delkhum dia kigo namtin vaipi koi hile kasuhmang ding ahi .
38012010	“ David chilhahte le Jerusalema cheng midang ho jong hepina le taona Lhagao kasipsoh ding ahi . Mihem asutlihoh chu veuvintin , cha khatseh thijal’a laina tah a kap ho banga alainatpi diu ahi . Chapa peng masapen thi jal’a kap ho bangin lhase tah-in kap’unte .
38012011	Hiteng chule Jerusalem lunghem ka le mao chu , Migiddo phaiya Hadadrimmon dia lunghema kap ho kagin husa bang ding ahi .
38012012	Gamsung miten a-inko koa pul adou didu , David insungin a-insung pul adouva , ajiu numeihon pul adou diu ; Nathan insungin Nathan insungpul adouva , numeihon jong adou diu ;
38012013	Levi insungin jong Levi insung pul adouva , ajiu numeihon jong adou diu ; Shimei insungin jong Shimei insung pul adouva , ajiu numeihon jong adou diu :
38012014	insung dang dangin jong hitobanga hi ainsung cheh-u pul adouvuva , anumeiteuvin jong pul adou cheh diu ahi .
38013001	“ Hiche phat hi ahung lhun teng , David chilhahte le Jerusalem mite chonset le doi houva kona sop theng dia twsam hung put ding ahi .
38013002	Chuteng gamsunga milimdoi min him him kaphahpoh sah lou ding ahitai . Ki-Themgaosah ho kasuhmanga , milimdoi hou nomna kasuhamng ding ahi .
38013003	Gaothu seitei tei aumle , Pakai thu seiya kigel’a , ou jeng seipan atilo tei ding chu anule apan aseipeh ding ahi . Gaothu aseipet tah a anule apan asutlih jeng ding ahi .
38013004	Hiteng chule mu nei Themgaovin ahoithopi lou ding , themgao umchan thoa , mipi lhep lhahna dia Themgao von jong avon lou ding ahi .
38013005	Hisanga chu , ‘ Themgao kahipoi , loubol mi , kahinkhoa lou natong kahibouvin , ‘ Na-op le natungtuna mapon ho chu ipijeh ham ? ’ tia adoh khah le ; ‘ Kagol kapaite in a eivohnau ahibouve , ’ ti hen , ” ati .
38013007	Thaneipen Pakaiyin aseiyin , “ Vo chemjam , thouvin kakelngoi chingpa delkhumin . Thet’in , kelngoite kithe cheh nante . Kamite delkhum ing ting ,
38013008	gamsung mi hop thuma hop ni thigam diu ahi .
38013009	Chuteng hop khat hingdoh chengchu , meiya dangka kilhatheng bangin , sutheng inge . Sana kipatep bangin patep ing ting , chuteng kahenga hung tao diu , ataonau kasan ding ahi . Kamite ahiu seipeh ing ting , a-Pathenu kahi phongdoh tauvinte , ” ati .
38014001	Thupi tannaa Pakai touna ding nikho anaitai . Chuteng Jerusalem khopi min chomgamintin , namit mu tah a thil chomdoh kihom diu ahi .
