38014002	Jerusale sat din Pakaiyin namtin vaipi koukhomintin , khopi alah diu in jouse achom’uva , numeiho abol thang diu ahi . Mipi keh khat hel sohchanga kitol diu , adangse vang khopi sunga konin kaidoh pouvinte .
38014003	Chuteng Pakai kipat’a hiche namtin vaipi ho chu asat ding , gollui laiya asat banga asat ding ahi .
38014004	Chuteng olive molsang , Jerusalem niso lama hung pansantin , olive molsang chu pohkeh a , akah a phaicham lentah umdoh ding ahi . Molsang keh khat sahlama kitolsuh ding ahi .
38014005	Molsang kehni soa phaichama hi najamdoh diu ; Judah lengpa Uzziah khanga ling kihopet’a napu napateu jamdoh banga najam diu ahi . Pakai ka-Pathen chu Vantilto lhonna hung ding ahi .
38014006	Hiche phat hile dap lou didng , geltwi kai lou ding ,
38014007	mujong thimponte . Janteng jongle khovah jing ding ahi . Itih phat le hitia um ding hi Pakaiyin bou ahei .
38014008	Hiche teng hile Jerusalema kona twitheng hung longa , akeh khat Twikhanglen twimang dunga lon glut’a keh khatma Mediterranea Twikhanglena long lut ding ahi . Kum lhung hel , chuh le khal’a jong long jing jeng ding ahi .
38014009	Chuteng leiset pumpia Pakai leng chang ding ; mitinin Ama Pathen ahina bangin chibai boh-umtin , min khat’a ahet diu ahi .
38014010	Sahlam Geba pat lhanglam Rimmon gei , gamsung pumpi kilai Jerusalem kikhang sangpen ding ; khopi chu Benjamin kelkot’a pat , masanga kelkot kisem nasa , inning kelkot phungpeh gei ding , Hananel intingvuma pat lengte lengpitwi chilna phung gei ding ahi .
38014011	Hikoma hi manthah ding ging louhel’a , mipi ho lung mongtah a cheng diu ahi .
38014012	Jerusalem khopi sat namtin vaipi chunga Pakaiyin natset alansah a , ahing laiya atahsau natset’a monlha ding ahi . Amit’u le aleiguiyu vang monponte .
38014013	Hiteng chule Pakaiyin abonchauvin kisuh dongsah-intin , kichatmana min akinaipi pen pen abokhum jeng diu ahi .
38014014	Jerusalem huhna Judahten gal abol diu ahi . Namtin vaipi neile gou-sana , dangka , chule nihchen ponsil-thalhingset’a akichomdoh diu ahi .
38014015	Sakolte le sakolte , sa-ngongsaote le sa-ngante , melmate ngahmun a gancha jouse chunga tijat umtah natsat lang ding ahi .
38014016	Jerusalem delkhum namtin vaipi lah a hingdoh amoh chengsen , kumseh le Thaneipen pakai , Leng chu Jerusalema chibai ahung boh diu , lhambuh kut ahung manji diu ahi .
38014017	Koi to bang nam min Thaneipen Pakai , Leng chu chibai ga boh ding adaule , agamsunguva gotwi lha lou ding ahi .
38014018	Egypt miten lhambuh kut abol dau le , Jerusalem ache nomlou namtin vaipi chunga lang natseh chu Pakaiyin achunguva alhunsah ding ahi .
38014019	Lhambuh kut abol daule Egypt mite le namtin vaipi chunga bol hesohna dia hiche natset chu chucheh ding ahi .
38014020	Hiche nikho chule sakolte khaova jong , “ Pakaiya kikatdohsa , ” tia kijih cheh ding ahi . Houin sunga anhonna bel ho jeng jong , maicham a khon ho banga theng ding ahi .
38014021	Jerusalem le Judah gamsunga anhonna bel ho geiya Thaneipen pakai chibai boh teng man dia kikhen ding ahi . Mipin kilhaina sa honna aneidiu ahi . Hiche teng hileh Thenneipen Pakai Houin a kiveimi umlou ding ahitai .
39001001	Pakaiyin Israel mipi seipeh dia Malachi jah a asei thu chu hiche hi ahi .
39001002	Pakaiyin amite jah a , “ nangho ka-ngalu jingui , ” ati . Amahon , “ Iti nei-ngailut’u ham ? ’ atiuve . Pakaiyin adonbut’in , “ Esau le Jacob sopi ahi lhonin , ahivangin Jacob le achilhahte ka-ngailun ,
39001003	Esau le achilhahte vang kahoi . Esau chenna thinglhang gamsung kasuchaiyin , gamsate chenna din kapetai , ” ati .
39001004	Esau chilhah , Edom miten , “ Ka-khopi jouse kisuse jongle kisah phat kit tauvinge , ” tijongleu ; Pakaiyin donbut’intin , “ Sapha kit’u hen , kaphet lhah peh diu ahi . Mihon , ‘ Migiloute gam , ’ atiuve , ‘ Tonsot’a Pakai lunghan nam mite , ’ ati diu ahi , ” tin te .
39001005	Israelten hiche hi amit tah a amu diu , chuteng amahon , “ Israel gam kalpeh a jong Pakaiyin eilunghan’u ahi ! ” tiuvinte .
39001006	tahneipen Pakaiyin thempute jah a aseiyin , “ Chapan apa ajabol teiyin , soh-in apu ajatei me . Na Pau Kei idia neijabol dau ham ? Nahsah mon neibol’un , ‘ Iti nahsah moa kabol’um ? Pou neitiuve .
39001007	kamaicham phunga manmo thil jeng nato jeh-uva nei nahsahmou ahi . Nangho pin , ‘ Iti nang jabol louva kakoi diu ham ? ’ natiuve ! Kamaicham thang le dol’a nabol jeh-uva neija louvu ahi .
39001008	Kakoma kilhaina dia gancha mitcho ham , dammo ham , elbai ham khat nahin kaiyu hi thildih bol’a kigel nahiuvam ? Hitobang gancha hingmo hi gam vaipo katnan ganeitem’un ! Nakipia nathum thum napeh ding hinam ? ” ati .
39001009	Tun themgaopuho , ichunguva Pathen lung lhaina din taovun . Nataonau asan lout eng , nang ho themmo ahibouve .
39001010	Thaneipen Pakaiyin aseiyin , “ Pannabeiya akamaicham phunga mei natikou kou sangun , khattouvin Houin kotpi jouse gakamchah le katitave ! Nachunguva kalung lhaipoi ; neithilpeh-u sang ponge .
39001011	Vannoi kolkimvel lhungsoh min eijabol cheh nauve . Muntin a gimnamtui alhuntan’un , santhei dol tah kilhaina thil atoh nauve . Abonchan eijabol cheh-uve !
39001012	Nanghon vang kamaicham isah louva nabol’uva , deimosa neh le chah todohna nanei jeh-un nahsahmon neikoitauve .
39001013	Nanghon , ‘ Thilto to jong kachimtai ! ’ natiuvin , nanah neikhon khum’uve . Kahenga to dia nahin kaiyu jong gancha naguh thou ham , adammo ham , a-elbai ham ahi . Hitiho hi kasan peh dia nagel’um ?
39001014	kei peh dia tepsa kelngoi hon lah a kelngoi hoitah tah sel’a , kelngoi hingmoa kilhina boljia eilhem ho chu gaosap chang hen ! Ajeh chu Leng loupe tah kahin , namtin vaipin eiging cheh-uve ! ” ati .
39002001	Thaneipen Pakaiyin thempuho jah a aseiyin , “ Hiche thupeh hi nangho ding ahi .
39002002	Natoh nabol chan’uva neijadiu ahi . Kasei na-ngai louvu le kagaosap ding nahiuve . Nachan diu thil ho geiya kagaosap ding ahi . Kathupeh nagel khoh loujeh-uva kagaosapsa jong nahitauve .
39002003	Natu nachateu telen matsah ing ting , namaiyuva kilhaina gan nathau eh kaloikhum diu-gancha eh puma kakaidoh ding nahiuve .
39002004	Chutah le Thempuho le Levite to kakitepna suhkeh louna dia hiche thupeh hi kapeh nahetdoh diu ahi .
39002005	“ Kakitepnaa hin hinnop le damtheina kateppeh-in , eijabolna diuva hiche chu kapeh ahi . Hiche lai chun eigingun eijabol nauve .
39002006	Mi thudih ahil’un , adih lou ahil pouve . Keito kitoh del’in aum’un ; amaho she-in thildih abol pouvin , midang ho geiyin thilse abolsah dauve .
39002007	Min Pathen adih a ahet ding hi thempuhon ahil diu ahi . Kalungdei chu mipin Thempuho koma agahetdoh diu ahi , ajeh chu amaho hi Thaneipen Pakai sole ahiuve .
39002008	“ Tunla Thempuhon lamdih napel tauve . Namihil’un mi tamtah apuisei . Nanghon kakitepna nasukeh tauve .
39002009	Kalungdei nadondauve , kamite nahil tengu langkaina nanei jeh-un , Kenjong Israelte mahsahmoa ka-umsah ding nahiuve , ” ati .
39002010	Pa khat lhah ihi louvu ham ? Pathen semcheh ihi louvu ham ? I-bol’a kha le khat kitepna isuh keh-uva , ipu ipateu le Pthen kitepna nahsahmoa ibol’u ham ?
39002011	Judahten Pathento kitepna asukeh-un , Jerusalem le Judah gam pumpia tijat umtah abol tauve . Pakaiyin a-it pen Houin asuhboh tauve . Pasal hon douhou numeiho akichenpiuve .
39002012	Hitobang thil bol jouse Pakaiyin Israel lah a konin kaidoh hen , Thaneipen Pakai dia thilto inam miteu lah a pang hih hel’u hen .
39002013	Hitobang jong hi nabol’ui . Nathilto chengseu asan lou phat’in kap le maovin na-um’un , Pakai maicham phung chu lhi le nap nadiptauve .
39002014	I-atile nathiltou asanlou nadatmo’uve . Nasenji nakikhenpi jal’uva asan lou ahi . Najinu hcu natibah ahin , Pathen angsunga achunga kitah jing dia kitep ngalta , nakitepna nasukeh tai .
39002015	Pathenin hiche numei chuto tahsa le lhagao khat’a nagopsa hilou ham ? Ipi ngaitoa abol hitam ? Pathen midih tah hidia cha le nao naneipi ding ahi . Hijeh chun koiman ajinu kikhenpida hen .
39002016	Pakai Israel Pathenin , “ Nupa kikhen hi kamah ahi . Pasal’in abol thang jong kaseipoi . Hijeh chun najinu chunga kitah jing dia nakitepnau sukeh hih hel’un , ” tin aseiye .
39002017	Nakam tam behseh-un Pakaiyin ajadai . Nangho pin , “ Iti eithei chim diu ham ? Thaneipen Pakaiyin thilse bolte mipha agel’a , amaho chubou adeijoh ahi , ” natiuve . Chuma le , “ Thildih bol dia kigel Pathen chu hoiba hitam ? ” tin nahol’ui .
39003001	thaneipen Pakaiyin , “ Kalampi semtoh din kasolle sol nange . Chutah le nahol jingo Pakai chu hetman louva a-Houin hun glut jeng ding ahi . Na-nga jingo sole chu hunga kakitepna aphonjal ding ahi , ” ati .
39003002	Ahinla hiche nikho hunglhun tang thoh jou didng koi ham ? Ama hung kilah ten ghingdoh ding koi ham ? Ama chu ponsop theng dabon hattah le thih gojolna mei-am hatah tobang ahi .
39003003	Dangka goujol’a suthengpa banga thutam dia hung ding ahi . Thih-khengpan dang ka le dana agojol banga , Pakaiyin thildih apha ato theina diuva , Pakai sole pan Thempuho asuh theng ding ahi .
39003004	Chuteng masang laiya banga , Judah gam le Jerusalem miten Pakai dia thilto ahinchoiyu chu lung lhaina anei ding ahi .
39003005	Thaneipen Pakaiyin aseiyin , “ Thutan din nalah-uva hung kiphong ing ting , mitpheldoi themho le numei jonpi ho , jouva hettohsah ho , mi tohman lepthol ho , meithaiho le chagate , gamchom mi maljin ho-kinopsahna nei ho , Kei jalou chengse kahehset ding ahi .
39003006	“ kei hi Pakai , kikhel lou kahi . Hijeh chun nnangho Jacob chilhahte namangthah hel hih laiyui .
39003007	Malai napu napateu bangin nan ghon jong Kadanthu jouse napeldoh-un nanit tapouve . Hung kile kit’un , nahengu hinjon inge . Nanghon , ‘ Naheng kahinjot theina diuva ipi kabol diu ham ? ’ tin naseiyui .
39003008	Kadoh nahiuve , min Pathen alepthol theiyam ? Alhem ngaipoi , nang hon vang neilhem’ui . Nanghon , ‘ Iti kalhep’um ? ’ natiuve . Hopsoma hop khat le htilto peh dol’in neilhem’ui .
39003009	Nam pumpin neilepthol jeh-un nabonchau chunga gaosapna achutai .
39003010	houin a neh le chah lhingset’a koi din hopsom ahop khat lhingkeiyin hinchouyun . Neive patep’un , van a bangkot chengse hongdoh ing ting thilpha jouse nang jeng junga kasun lhah peh ding anhiuve .
39003011	Nachangdong laiyu ganhingte duhmang sah pong ting , nalengpiguiyu gaboh keikoi ding ahi .
39003012	Chuteng nagamsungu chen mun pha soh a , namtin vaipin min nun nom nahisah diu ahi .
39003013	“ Kachung change tijat jat um thu naseiyui , ” tin Pakaiyin aseiye . “ Ahivangin nanghon , ‘ Nathudol ipi kaseibeh-um ? ’ natiuve .
39003014	Nanghon , ‘ pathen kinbol jong pannabei ahi . Asei sei bol jong i-phachom a , i-bolse chunga thaneipen Pakai koma kisih thusei jong ipi phachom ham ?
39003015	Mi hoithote anompen a pang imuukhu me . Migiloute la hao thei keo hilouvin , Pathen phinna monga thilse abol’u jongle ahoidoh thouvui , ’ tin naseiyui , ” ati .
39003016	Pakai gingte akihou lim’un , aseiyu Pakaiyin ajatai . Pakai angsunga , Pakai ginga jabolte thudol lakhabu khat’a ajih luttauve .
39003017	Thaneipen pakaiyin aseiyin , “ Amaho hi kamite hi diu , kachaloh ni nil eh , kalhentum chom beh hi di ahi . Akinbol jing chapa chunga mipa hepina dingahiuve .
39003018	Chuteng kamiten avel’a , midih le migilou kibah louje , kakinbol pa le bol loupe kah a thilsoh amudoh ki tdiu ahi , ” ati ,
39004001	Thaneipen Pakaiyin aseiyin , “ mi kiletsah le giloute changpol kavam banga halvamna ding nikho ahung lhunge . Hiche nikho chule kavam’untin , khendoh beihel diu ahi .
39004002	Nangho kathu nit chengse vang , kamihuhingna thahat nachunguva nisa banga vah-in tin , nisalum midamsah banga nadomlo diu ahi . Bongnou kul’a kilhadoh navah banga najalen diu ahi .
39004003	Kachaloh ni nil eh migiloute najotho’uva , leivui banga nachotpha diu ahi .
39004004	“ Israelte jui ding Sinai mongsanga kalhacha Mose kapeh kihilna chengse le Danthu ho chule thupeh chengse chu geldoh jingun .
39004005	“ Amavang tijat umtah Pakai ni loupe hung lhun masangin , Elijah Themgao hinsol peh nauvinge .
39004006	Elijah hin pate le chate akichamsah din gahi ; achutiloule nagamsungu kasumanglo ding ahi , ” ati .
40001001	Abraham chilhah David guiya peng Jesu Christa khanggui hitia kisun ahi .
40001002	Abrahamin Isaac ahingin , Isaac chun Jacob ahinge ; Jacob hin Judah le asopi pasal dang ho ahinge .
40001003	Judah hin Tamara konin Perez le Zerah ahingin , Perez hin Hezron ahinge ; Hezron chun Ram ahingin ,
40001004	Ramin Aminadab ahinge ; Aminadab chun Nahshon ahingin , Nahshonin Salmon ahinge ;
40001005	Salmonnin Rahab’a konin Boaz ahingin , Boaz hin Ruth a kon in Obed ahinge ; Obed hin Jesse ahingin ,
40001006	Jessen David lengpa ahinge . David hin Uriah jinua kon in Solomon ahingin ,
40001007	Solomonin Rehoboam ahinge ; Rehoboamin Abijah ahingin , Abijah chun Asa ahinge ;
40001008	Asan Jehoshaphat ahingin , Jehoshaphat’in Joram ahinge ; Joramin Uzziah ahingin ,
40001009	Uzziah chun Jotham ahinge ; Jothamin Ahaz ahingin , Ahaz chun Hezekiah ahinge ;
40001010	Hezekiah hin Manasseh ahingin , Manasseh chun Amon ahinge ; Amonin Josiah ahingin , Babylon lama gal-hinga akai laiyun Josiah chun Jechoniah le asopi pasal dang ho ahinge .
40001011	
40001012	Babylon lama gal-hinga akai nungun Jechoniah chun Shealtiel ahingin , Shealtiel chun Zerubbabel ahinge ;
40001013	Zerubbabel hin Abiud ahingin , Abiud chun Eliakim ahinge ; Eliakimin Azor ahingin ,
40001014	Azor chun Zadok ahinge ; Zadok hin Achim ahingin , Achimin Eliud ahinge ;
40001015	Eliud chun Eleazar ahingin , Eleazarin Matthan ahinge ; Matthanin Jacob ahingin ,
40001016	Jacob chun Joseph ahinge ; hiche Joseph hi Messiah kiti Jesu hingnu Mary jipa ahi .
40001017	Hiti hin Abraham a pat Davin gei khang som le khang li ahin , David a pat Babylon lama gal-hinga akai mang geiyu chu khang som le khang li ma ahi kite’e ; chule Babylon lama gal-hinga akai manguva pat Messiah pen gei chu khang som le li ahi .
40001018	Jesu Christapen um chan chu hiti ahi . Anu Mary cu Joseph to kicheng dinga kitepsa ahinm ahinla akigop masang lhonin Lhagao Thenga kona agai chu Mary hin akihet doh tai .
40001019	Ahin ajipa joseph hi midih tah ahijeh-in Mary hi lhangphonga mipi seithanga umsah ding a nompon , guh thim cha akitepna lhon suh keh a kikheni din agoi .
40001020	Joseph-in hitobang lung agel laitah hin Pakaiya kon Vantil khat’in mangin akimusah-in , “ David chilhah Joseph , Mary khu kipuiya jia nei ding tija hih hel’in ; ijeh-inem itile Lhagao Thenga kona gai ahibouve .
40001021	Chapa khat ahinding , amin Jesu nasah ding ahi ; ajeh chu amatah hin amite achonset’uva klna ahuhhing ding ahi , ” tin aseipeh-e .
40001022	thil chicheng hi Pakaiyin Themgao kama aseisa gui lhun theina dinga soh ahin , asei chun ,
40001023	“ Ven , nu-ngah chu gaiyin tin chapa khat ahin ding , amin ‘ Emmanuel ’ kiti ding ahi , Amin hi , ‘ Pathenin eiumpiuve , ’ tina ahi ” ati .
40001024	Joseph a-imut khah phat’in Pakaiya kon Vantil’in ahil bang bangin abol’in , Mary chu ji dingin akipuitai ;
40001025	ahin Maryn chapa ahin masangsen nupaa kitimatpina vang aneipi khah hih hel’e , Naosen ahung pen phat’in amin chu Jesu asah tai .
40002001	Judah gama Herod lengpa lal laiyin Bethlehem khopia Jesu ahung pengin , niso lama ahsi umdol hethem mihoJerusalem khopia ahungun ,
40002002	“ Judate chunga leng chang dia hung peng naosen chu hoiya um tam ? Ama pen jeh a niso lama ahsi hung kilah kamu-va naosen chu chibai boh dinga hung kahiuve , ” tin aseiyui .
40002003	Athudoh-u ajah phat’un Herod lengpa ti Jerusalem mite ti along jing lheh tauve .
40002004	Hejeh chun Herod’in Thempu pipu ho leh mipi lah a Danthu lekha them ho akoukhom loiyin , “ Messiah chu hoiya hung peng ding ham ? ” tin adonge .
40002005	Amahon , “ Judea gamsung Bethlehem khopia peng ding ahi ; ajeh chu Themgaopan hitin asun’e ”
40002006	‘ Vo Judea gama Bethlehem ! Judah vaipote lah a itina ma jongleh aneopen nahipoi ; Nanga kona kamite Israel lamkai ding khat Hung peng doh dong ahi , ’ ati . ” Atiuve .
40002007	Chuphat’in Herod chun ahsi umdol hethem miho chu atimin akimupinm itih phat tah a ahsi hung kilah chu aphochentai .
40002008	Chujouvin amaho chu Bethlehem lama asol’in , “ Cheuvin lang naosen che phat chan gahol doh-un , keijong ka chea chibai kagabohna dinginm namudoh tenguleh neihung seipeh tauvin , ” tin athu lhah-e .
40002009	Lengpa thsei ajah pha’un akipatdoh paiyun , ahin mupeh sau niso lama ahsi chu amasanguva achepeh-in , naosen umna chung aphah phat’in aki-ngai .
40002010	Ahsi amudoh kit phat’un akipah behseh jenguve !
40002011	Chuin insunga agalut’u leh naosen chu anu Mary toh agamu thauvinm boh khip cheh-in chiabi aboh tauve . Chujongle agoubomu hongin thil manlu cheh-sana , bego chule myrrh atoh-un , thilpeh hicheng hi apetauve .
40002012	Herod henglam ahopa kit louhelna diuva Pathenin amanguva ahilchah phat’in lamchom khat ajuiyun agam olanguva akile kit tauve .
40002013	Ahsi umdol hethem miho che nungin , Pakaiya kon Vantil khat Joseph manga akilah-in , “ Thouvin , naosen le anu puiyin lang Egypt langa jampinm kahinkou masangsen ta-umpi tan ; ajeh chu herod’in naosen hi suhmang din angaiton ahol’e , ” ati .
40002014	Joseph jong athouvin naosen le anu apuiyin janlaiyin Egypt langa ajampin ,
40002015	Herod thi kahsen aga-umpitai . Hitobang thil hi Pakaiyin themgao kama aseisa , “ Egypt’a konin kachapa kakoudoh tai , ” ati chu guilhunna dinga soh ahi .
40002016	Ahsi umdol hethem mihon alhim lhah ahetdoh phat’inHerod along hang behseh jeenginm mi asol’in ahsi umdol hethem mihoa kona naosen pen ahetdoh phat chutoh kitoh chet’in asimin , Bethlehem khopi le khovel dunga naosen pasal kum nia lhah noi lames se athagam sah tai .
40002017	Hechea hin Jeremiah Themgao kama kiseia -
40002018	“ Ramah koa lhaset lunghem Ka le mao ogin nasatah akijan , Rachel in achate aka ka jengin , Athigam tah jeh-un lhepbi jou ahita poi , ” kiti chu agui lhung tai .
40002019	Herod thi nungin Pakaiya kon Vantil khat’in , Egypt gama aumna a Joseph chu amangin kimusah-in ,
40002020	“ Thouvin , naosen le anu puiyin lang Israel gam jontan , naosen tha dinga hol ho athigam tauve , ” ati .
40002021	Joseph athoupaiyin , naosen le anu apuiyin Israel gamsung jonin ahung kile kit tai .
40002022	Ahin Judea gama apa Herod khel’a Archelaus leng chan ajah doh phat’in Judea gama chenden ding Joseph akichanm amang ma akihil chah jeh chun Galilee gamsung joh ajonin ,
40002023	Nazareth khopia achengtai . Hiche hi Themgaohon , “ Nazareth mi kiti ding ahi , ” atiu gui lhunna dia chute ahi .
40003001	Hiche lai hin John Baptist thu ahil lhang len ,
40003002	“ Nachonset lung khel’unm ajeh chu van a lenggam chun hikom ahinpha tai ! ” tin asam’e .
40003003	John hi Isaiah Themgaovin anaseisa ; “ Gamthip laiya khosam ogin khat’in , “ Pakai lampi semtoh-un lang , Alamlen semjangsan koiyinm tin aseiye , ” ati chu ahitai .
40003004	John pon-ah chu sa-ngongsao mul ahin , akonggah savunm a-anneh khaokhote le gam khoiju ahi .
40003005	Jerusalem khomite leh Judea gam pumpia mi , chule Jordan gamkol sung pimpia konin miho John henga acheuvin ,
40003006	achonset nau aphong cheh-un , Jordan vadunga john khut’in baptize achangtauve .
40003007	Pharisee ho leh Saducee ho tamtah ama khut’a baptize chang dia hung amu phat ; in Johnin ajahuva , “ Vo gulse son ho , kho nunga hung lhung ding Pathen lungsatnaa kona jamdoh dia thu namop’u koi peh ham ?
40003008	Nalung khel’u natohgan phongdoh-un ;
40003009	‘ Abraham son kihina chu , ’ tin nalah-uva kiholim nan neidauvin ; kaseipeh nahiuve , Pathenin hiche song ho geiya Abraham chilhah a asemthei ahi .
40003010	Thingphung bul tin’a heicha aki phutsoh tai , aga pholou chengse kiphuh lhua meilhum sunga kileh lut ding ahi .
40003011	Nalung khel’u phot chetna twiya baptize kachansah nahiuvinm kei bana hungpa vang khu keisanga gamchenga chungnung jo ahinm kei hi akengchot te ni sut dinga kilom jong kahipoi ; ama chun Lhagao Teng le meikonga baptize nachasah diu ahi .
40003012	Akhut a chang japna achoiyin , phola chang jap ngimsel ; in tin , chuteng achangtah ho changsal’a akhum tip ding , asi chengse vang mit thie lou meilhim sunga agovam ding ahitae , ” ati .
40003013	Hichepet hin Glilee gama konin Jesun Jordan lui ahin jonin , John khut’a bapize chang din ahung tai .
40003014	Ahivangin John anathu phan , ‘ Keijoh nang khut’a baptize kachan dingsih a kei henga nahung tan’e ! ” anati .
40003015	Jesun adonbut paiyin , “ tun hit hin molso pou pouvinm ajeh chu hitobanga hi Pathen dei chan ibol bulhingsoh ding ahi , ” ati , Hichen John jong anomtai .
40003016	baptize achan jouva Jesu twiya kona apotdoh chunm ama din van akihongin Pathen Lhagao vakhu bang a hung kumlha achunga chu amui .
40003017	Chuin van a konin o-khat ahung ginginm “ Ama hi kachapa deitah ahinm achugna kalung alhai ta ngeiye , ” ati .
40004001	Hiche jou hin Diabol lhep patep dingin Jesu chu Lhagaovin gamthip’ah apui toutai .
40004002	Nisom li le jan som li geiya an ngol’a aum jouvin Jesu agilkeltai .
40004003	Hichun alhempatep chu ahungin ajah a , “ Pathen chapa nahileh hiche song ho hi changlhah so na dingin seipeh-in , ” ati .
40004004	Jesun adonbut’in “ Pathen lekhabua kisun chun Mihem hi changlhah keova hing theilou ding , Pathen kamsoh thuhoa bou hing dinga kisei ahi , ” ati .
40004005	Hichun Diabol’in Jesu khopi thenga apui yin , Houin tingvum asang laiya adinsahin ,
40004006	“ Pathen chapa nahileh keleh lha jengin , ‘ songa nakisuh khah louna dingin Pathenin a-Vantilte thu pentin akhut’uvin nadom nauvinte , ’ tin Pathen lekhabua akisun nai , ” ati .
40004007	Jesun aseipeh paiyin , “ Hitin jong , ‘ Pakai na-Pathen patep a na-lhep chatvai louhel ding ahi , ’ tin akisun’e , ” ati .
40004008	Chujouvin diabol chunmolsang tah khat chunga Jesu apui touvin vannoi leiset lenggam jouse le aloupina chengseu avetsah soh keiyin
40004009	ajah a , “ Kahenga naboh khup’a chibai neiboh le hichengpi hi peng kate . ” ati .
40004010	chutah chun Jesun ajah a , “ Chedohin Satan ! ‘ Pakai na-Pathen chu chibai naboh a , ama jeng bou nahou ding ahi , ’ tin Pathen lekhabua akisun bouve ! ” atitai .
40004011	Chuphat’in Diabol chun adalhatai . Hichun Vantilte ahungun Jesun angaichatna jouse ahung jenle tauve .
40004012	John songkul a akhum’u ajah phat’in Jesu jong Galilee gam langa akikhindoh tai .
40004013	Amavang Nazareth kho dalhan achen , Zebulun le Naphtali gamsung , Galilee dillen pang , Capernaum khoa apansai .
40004014	Hitia aum hi Isaih Themgao kama kiseisa ;
40004015	“ Zebulun gam le Naphtali gam , Jordan gal’a Twikhanglen lampi ; Namtin vaipi chenna Galilee ,
40004016	Muthim lah a chengten Khovah vah tah amutauvin ; Thina muthim gama chengte chunga Kho ahung vah tai , ” kiti chu gui lhunna dinga chuti ahi .
40004017	Hichelaiya pat chun Jesun thu ahil lhanglen , “ Van a Lenggam chun ahinphatai , nachonset lung khel’uvin , ” ati .
40004018	Galilee dillen panga Jesu ava le le pet’in nga man mi ni Peter kitipa Simon le anaopa Andrew Twikhanglen a lensep pet amui .
40004019	Chuin ajah lhona , “ Neijui lhonin mihem matje hil lhon inge , ” atileh ;
40004020	alen lhon dalhan Jesu ajui pai lhontai .
40004021	Ache kit leh ucha chom dang ni , Jacob le anaopa John kiti Zebedee to len anakhui phat pet’u amun , amani jong akouve .
40004022	Jacob le Johnin kong le apa Zebedee dalhan nung ajui lhontai .
40004023	Galilee gam pumpia Jesu ache le len japi houkhomna in tin ah thu ahil len , Lenggam Kipana Thupha aseiphong len , mipilah a nat jat chom choma na ho aboldamin ahi .
40004024	Chutah chun Syria gam pumpia achung chang thu athangsoh tan , nat jat chom choma naa , natthoh lel , thilhavop , buh thi chule langthi ho jouse Jesu henga ahinpuiyun aman aboldamsoh keitai .
40004025	Chutjongle Galilee , Decapolis , Jerusalem , Judea gam le Jordan gal langa konin mipi tamtah-in Jesu nung ajuitauve .
40005001	Mipi amu phat’in Jesu molvuma akaltouvin atou leh aseijuite ahenga ahung kikhomtauve .
40005002	Hichun Jesu apaodoh-in mipi thu ahil’in hitin aseiye :
40005003	“ Lhagaova chimthih neilou ho anun nom’ui , Van a Lenggam chu amahoa ahi !
40005004	Lung lengvai ho anun nom’ui , Pathenin alhamon diu ahi !
40005005	Milung neng ho anun nom’ui , Amahon leiset alo diu ahi !
40005006	Pathen dei holna gilkel dangchah thoh ho anun nom’ui , Pathen deiya lung nachim diu ahi .
40005007	Mi hebol ho anun nom’ui , Pathenin amaho ahebol ding ahi .
40005008	Milung theng ho anun nom’ui , Amahon Pathen amu diu ahi .
40005009	Mi sucham ho anun nom’ui , Pathen chate kiti diu ahi .
40005010	Pathen dei boljeh a bolset thoh ho anun nom’ui , Van a Lenggam amahoa ahi .
40005011	“ Keima jal’a min nabolset , nahouset’uva chule nang ho douna jouthu le thu gilou ijakai naseikhum tengu leh anun nom nahiuve .
40005012	Hitobang tah a hi nang ho sanga masajo Themgao ho jong anabol setsau ahitai ! Kipah-un tha nom’un , van a nasan diu kipaman tampi akikoiye .
40005013	“ Nang ho leiset chi nahiuve . Chi khu tamtah le ipia ki-alsah kit ding ham ? A-al lou teng panna bei ahitan , akipai mang jin , min keng chotphan aneijitai .
40005014	“ Nang ho vannoi salvah nahiuve . Molchunga khopi kisem chu akisel theipoi .
40005015	Koiman thaomei avah-in lo akhu khum ngaipoi , thaomei khom chunga atungin insunga um jouse asalvahsoh keijie .
40005016	Hitobang chun navah-u miho masanga kilang hen , chutileh min natoh phat nau muntin , van a um na-pau avahchoi diu ahi .
40005017	“ Kei hi Mose Danthu leThemgao ho thuhil sumang dia hungin neigel hih hel’un , asumang ding hilouva amolso ding joh a hung kahibouve .
40005018	Dih tah a kaseipeh nahiuve , van le leiset man kahse le thil jouse bei kahsea Danthu kisun lekhajem neopen le ahalsi khat jeng jong mang lou ding ahibouve .
40005019	Hijeh a chu hiche thupeh lah a aneopen khat susea , midang jong chu tibol dinga hilchan chu van a Lenggama aneopen a pang ding , chu tobangma a anit them le midangin anit themna dinga hilchan chu van a Lenggama alen a kisei ding ahi .
40005020	Chuti ahijeh a kaseipeh nahiuve , Danthu them ho le Phrisee ho sanga nathem chan nau achung nun joh loule van aLenggamma nalut louhel diu ahi .
40005021	“ ‘ Tol natah lou diu ahi , koi hijongle tol that chu achung thu kitan ding kicha jing ding ahi , ’ tia malai mite jah a kiseisa chu najtauve .
40005022	Kenvang kaseipeh nahiuve , koi hijongle asopi chunga lung hang chan chu achung thu kitan ding kicha jing ding ahi ; chu jongle koi ahi asopi jah a , ‘ Pananbei ’ tia house jouse chu hou vaipoloi kikhopnaa athu kitan ding kipha lam jinga , chule asopi jah a , ‘ Panabei mi-ngol ’ tia house chan jong damun neidil’a lut ding kicha geova um ding ahi .
40005023	Hijeh chun maicham phunga thiltoh din hung ta jongle chun , chua chu nasopi nachunga lung himona nageldoh leh ,
40005024	maicham maiya nathilto ding dalhan , nasopi chutoh gakicham masan , chujou teng hung kit’in lang thil chu Pathen koma toh-in .
40005025	“ Naheh pan thutanpu heng nalhut masangin lampia kichampin , achuti loule thutanpa koma nakai lut’in tin , thutan pan songkul ngah pa pehdoh-in natin , aman songkul’a nakhum lo ding ahi .
40005026	Tahbeh a kaseipeh nahi , paisa nongnai geiya napeh theng hel masangin songkul’a koin potdoh thei pon nate .
40005027	“ ‘ Mito najon lou ding ahi , ’ tia kisei chu najatauve .
40005028	Ken vang kichentah a kaseipeh nahiuve , koi hijongle numei jon lung gul’a vea chun alungthima ajonpi ahitai .
40005029	Hijeh chun namit jetlamin nachon setsah le kaldoh-in lang pai mang jengin ; tahsa pumpia damun a nakile lut sangin , natibah khat lhin lel ding aphajoi .
40005030	Nakhut jetlamin nachonset sah jong le sat lhan pai mang jengin , tahsa pumpia damun a nakile lut sangin natibah khat lhin lel ding aphakoi .
40005031	“ ‘ Koi hileh ajinu daa chun jida na lekha pehen , ’ kitisa ahi .
40005032	Kenvang kaseipeh nahiuve , mito ajonjeh tilouva jida chan chun ajinu ajonso ahin , dasa numei kichenpi jong chu mito jong-ah ahi .
40005033	“ Chukit leh , ‘ Nakitepna sukeh hih-in , nakitepna jat chu Pakai koma molson , ’ tia malai mite kiseipeh chu najatauve .
40005034	Kenvang nahihahsel louhel diuva kaseipeh nahiuve ; van panin kihahsel dauvin , Pathen laltouna mun ahi ,
40005035	Leiset panin jong kihahsel hih-un Pathen kengto ngapna ahi , Jerusalem panin kihahsel dauvin , Leng loupi khopi ahi ,
40005036	naluchang jong panin kihahsel dauvin , nasamjang khat jeng jong nakansah navomsah theipouve .
40005037	Naseiyu chu ahile hijeng hen , ahida le hida jeng hen ; hiche kalval vang chu Agiloupaa kon ahibouve .
40005038	“ ‘ Mit khel’a mit , ha khel’a ha , ’ tia kiseisa chu najatauve .
40005039	Kenvang kaseipeh nahiuve , Agiloupa chu lethuh hih-un , chusangin nangeiphe jet lem benga chu naveilam jong dopeh-in .
40005040	Hehset’a nasongkhol sung nung lah peh ding gopa chu nasangkhol ponungalenpa geiyin peh than .
40005041	Koi hile nada nacham louva mile khat napuigoa chu mile ni geiyin kilhonpin .
40005042	Nahenga thil thuma chu pen , bat ding deiya jong peh louvin koidan .
40005043	“ ‘ Naheng nakom ngailut’a melma vang nahot ding ahi , ’ tia kiseisa chu najatauve .
40005044	Kenvang kaseipeh nahiuve , Namelmateu ngailu’vin , nabolse jouseu taopehun ;
40005045	chutilh van a um na-Pau chate nahi theidiu ahi . Ajeh chu Aman migilou le mipha chunga kibangin nisa asat sah gel’in , midih le midih lou chunga go ajuhsah gel’e .
40005046	Ahimonga jong na-ngailute bou na-ngailut’u leh ipi kipaman namu diu ham ? Kaidong chonse hon jong chutia abol’u hi louham ?
40005047	Chule nasopi bou nasalam’u leh midang sanga nachungnun nau ipi um am ? Pathen heloute jengin jong chutia abol’u hilouham ?
40005048	Hichejeh chun vana um na-Pau chamkimsoh banga naphat chamkimsoh diu ahi .
40006001	“ Houva nakitah nau miho mu ding deina nabol louna diuvin ching theiyun . Chutia nabol vangu leh van a um na-Pava kona kipaman nanei lou diu ahi .
40006002	“ Mi thil napeh teng , mipha lhem hon pachat deinaa Hou thua kikhopna in tin le lam lhong tin’a abol bangun , namasang sanga sumkon kimut bahsah hih hel’in . Dihtah a kaseipeh nahiuve , amahon kipaman akisanu ahitai .
40006003	Mi thil napeh tengleh , nathilpeh chu guh thim ahi theina din nakhut jetlama napeh chu veilam jeng jong hetsah dan .
40006004	Chutileh guh thima vejing na-Pan kipaman napeh tei ding ahi .
40006005	“ Natao tengu leh mipha lhem ho toh bang hih-un , amahon mi mu ding deinan Hou thua kikhopna in tin a dindoh a tao le kholai lamkon dunga din a tao ding bou adeiyui . Dih tah a kaseipeh nahiuve , amahon kipaman akisanu ahitai .
40006006	Nang vang natao teng , na-indan sunga lut’in , kotpi kikam khumin , mit’a mu thei lou na-Pa hengah guh thimin taojon ; chutileh guh thima vejing na-Pan kipaman pejon nate .
40006007	“ Natao tengu le chidang namdang ho bangin tampi kisei chu ajah chom ding ngaiton thu hom keo tamtah seidauvin .
40006008	Amaho umchan tho hih-un ; ajeh chu nathum masanguva jong na-pauvin na-ngai chat jouseu ahetsa ahitai .
40006009	Hijeh chun hiti hin taovun : ‘ Van’a um ka-Pau , namintheng kijabol jing hen ,
40006010	Nalenggam hung lhung hen , Van’a bangin leiset’a nalungdei kim soh hen ;
40006011	Tunia kaneh khop diu an neh neipeuvin ,
40006012	Eibolseteu ka-ngaidam bangun , Kasuh khelnau ngaidamin ;
40006013	Chonset lona thei patepna neilhut dauvin , Agiloupaa konin neihuhdoh jo’uvin , ’ tin .
40006014	“ Ajeh chu mi suhkhel na-ngaidamu leh van a um naPauvin jong nasuh khel nau ngaidamin te .
40006015	Mi suh khel na-ngaidam lou vanguleh , na-pauvin jong nasuh khel’u ngaidam ponte .
40006016	“ An na-ngol tengu mipha lhem ho bangin ki-nguisah dauvin . Mipha lhem hon vang an angol’uvin , mi het ding deinan amaisou achom sah jiuve . Tahbeh a kaseipeh nahiuve , amahon kipaman akisanu ahitai .
40006017	Nangin vang an na-ngol teng nalu thao kinujol’in , namai kiphet ngimjon ;
40006018	na-anngol chu miho hetsah louvin , guh thima um , na-Pa hetsah in ; chutileh guh thima vejing na-Pan kipaman pejon nate .
40006019	“ Nget le thih-eh suhmang theina , guchan aphet vanga aguh mang theina leiset chunga gou khol hih-in ;
40006020	chusangin nget le thih-eh suhmang thei louna , guchan jong aphet vanga aguh mang thei louna van a gou khol jo’uvin .
40006021	Ijeh-inem itile nagou umnaa chu nalung cheng jing ding ahi .
40006022	“ Mit hi tahsan meivah ahin , namit chim leh natahsa pumpi vahsoh ding ahi .
40006023	Namit aphat lou vang leh natahsa pumpi thim jeng ding ahi . Hijeh chun nasunga vah thim taleh iti khoh ding hitam !
40006024	“ Soh koiman Pakai ni kin abolkop joupoi , kop taleh khat hotbol’in tin , khat joh alungset ding , ahiloule khat’a hakaiya khat joh anahsahmo lo ding ahi . Hijeh chun Pathen kinbol le sum hol kop thei pouvin nate .
40006025	“ Hichejeh a chu kaseipeh nahiuve , hinkhoa neh le chah chunga lungkham bol dauvin , tahsa sille chen dingin jong lungkham hih-un ; anneh twidon sanga hinkho thupi joa , nihchen ponsil sanga tah sa khoh jo hilou ham ?
40006026	Vanlai jol’a akhol sampouvin , hijongle changsal’a akhol sampouvin , hijongle van a um na-Pauvin avah nauve . Vachate sanga khu nang ho manlu jo nahi louvu ham ?
40006027	Nalah-uva lungkham hat’a ahinkho tong khat jopbe thei koi nahiuvam ?
40006028	I-bol’a nihchen ponsil jal’a lungkham nahiuvam ? Gamlah apahcha ho khu iti khandoh ham gel phauvin , na la atong pouvin , sil ding patse bol’a ponkhong jong ahipouve ;
40006029	ahinla kaseipeh nahiuve , Solomon jeng jong ahao dungjui tah akijep vangin hiche pahcha ho khat hoi bangin ahoi joupoi .
40006030	Gamlah hampa tunia kimu , jing teng gop’a meilhum sunga kileh lut ta ding bon Pathenin achuti jep hoi leh , Aman hiche ho sanga najep hoijoh lou diu ham ? Vo tahsan lhomho !
40006031	Hijeh chun , ‘ Ipi kanehuva ipi kadon diu , ipi kasil’uva akchen diu ham ? ’ tin lungkham dauvin .
40006032	Hicheng hi Pathen hepha louten ahol’un , Nang hon na-ngai chat’u jong van a um na-Pauvin ahesoh keiye .
40006033	Hijongle amasan Pathen dei le alenggam hol masauvin , chuteng adang ho chengse hi nakipehbe dingu ahinai .
40006034	Jing dingin lungkham hih-un , jing chun anikhoa ding hinkigel nan e . Nikho khat cheh-in agimpi khop cheh anei nai .
40007001	“ Oimo nachan louna diuvin midang oimo dauvin ;
40007002	mithu nakhol bang banga nathu kikhol cheh ding ahin , midang nabol nau dan dungjuiya kibol ding nahiuve .
40007003	Ipi dinga nasopi mit’a bohsi chu namelchih keova , nang mit’a thing long tejen chu mulouva um nahin ?
40007004	Iti jong nasopi jah a , ‘ Namit’a bohsi chu neilahdoh sah-in , ’ tia nasei ngam a , nang mit’a thing long tejen chu don louva um nahim ?
40007005	Vo mipha lhem , namit’a thinglong tejen chu kilahdoh masah le chun nasopi mit’a bohsi chu muchenin natin , ladoh thei tan nate .
40007006	Thil theng chu uichate peh dauvin , hung kiheiya nape lou diu ahi ; vohchate masanga jong natwikoh chang sep lha hih-un , akengtoa achil thang bep diu ahi .
40007007	“ Thum’un kipauvin nate , hol’un namudiu ahi ; kiuvun nakihonpeh diu ahi .
40007008	Ijeh-inem itile athum chan kipe ding , ahol’an amuding akiuva kihonpeh ding ahi .
40007009	Nalah-uva achapan neh ding changlhah athum le song pea ,
40007010	nga athum leh gul peding koiham ?
40007011	Migiloutah nang hon bon nachateu thilpha pehje nahet’uleh , van a um na-Pauvin ahenga thumte chu itobang tah a thilpha apeh ding hitam !
40007012	Hijeh chun min iti nabol le nadeiyum , nang hon jong hitobnagma chun bolpeh-uvin , hitia bolding hi Danthule themgaote thuhil to kitoh ahi .
40007013	“ Kot jim a lut’un , ajeh chu manna lam chu akot lentah ahin , alampi alenin , mitamtah hichea chun alut’ui .
40007014	Hinna lam chu akot jong akichin , alampi ahah-in , hijeh chun alut’a mi lhomcha ahiuve .
40007015	“ Kelngoi phat’a kiphatsah , asung lam ngeihang tah tobang Themgao lhem nahenguva hungji ho koma kichih theiyun .
40007016	Itobang ahiu atohgauva nahet diu ahi . Ling phunga lengpi theiga kilouva , meithai seltho linga theichang ga ikilou ngaiyam ?
40007017	Hitobang hin thing phung phalou ga aphapoi .
40007018	Thingphung phaa ga pha lou ga ngai lou , thing phung phalouva jong ga pha ga ngai lou ahi .
40007019	Aga phalou thingphung jouse chu akiphuh lhun meilhum sunga akileh lutjitai .
40007020	Hijeh a chu mi atohgauva nahetdoh diu ahi .
40007021	“ Pakai , Pakai eiti chan chu van a lenggam lut lou ding , van a um ka-Pa deilam bol’a bou lut ding ahi .
40007022	Hiche Nikho chuleh mi tamtah hunguva , ‘ Pakai , Pakai , keiho namin a gaothu seisa , thilha nodohsa chule thil kidang bolsa kahilouuvu ham ? ati diu ahi .
40007023	Chuteng ajah-uva phong tah a , ‘ Vo Dan dih lou bolte , kakoma konin potdoh louyun , nang ho kahe kha hih hel’ui , ’ kati ding ahi .
40007024	“ Chuti ahijeh chun kathusei hiche hi ja a bol’a chu mi lungthim pha , song chunga in kisah to kitekah ding ahi .
40007025	Gon ajuh khuma , vadung in aso den a , huipin ahin mut vangin , hiche in chu aluden poi ; ajeh chu a-inbul khom songpi chunga kiphut det chet ahi .
40007026	Kathusei hicheng hi ja abol lou vang chu milungthimbei , nellei chunga in kisah toh kitekah ding ahi .
40007027	Gon ajuh khuma , vadungin aso den a , huipin amut tengleh in chu alhujitan , alhuh chu melse tah ahi , ” ati .
40007028	Jesun chujat asei chai chaiyin mipin athuhil chu kidang asa lheh jenguvin ahi .
40007029	Ijeh-inem itile aman Danthu themho hil banga hil louva thunei tah banga ahil jeng thei ahi .
40008001	Jesu molvuma ahung kumsuh chun mihonpin ahin juiyui .
40008002	Hichun miphah khat ahungin akoma bohkhup’in , “ Pakai , nalung ahileh neidam theng sah thei ahi , ” ati .
40008003	Jesun athamin , “ Kalung ahinai damthengtan , ” ati leh , apettah chun aphahnat adamthengtai .
40008004	Chuphat’in Jesun ajah a , “ Koimacha henga seidoh hih hel’in , amavang chen lang Thempu gakivetsah-in , nadamtheng hi phot chetna din Mose thu peh dungjuiyin nathilto ding lom gatoh tan , ” tin ahil’e .
40008005	Jesu Capernaum khoa alut chun sepai jalamkai khat ahenga ahungtaovin ,
40008006	“ Pakai , in a um kalhacha chapang khat langthin agen thei lheh jenge , ” ati .
40008007	Jesun , ajah a , “ Hung damsah nang’e , ” atileh ;
40008008	jalamkaipan adonbut’in , “ Pakai , nang hi kei in sunga lut dinga kilom nahipoi , thu mai mai sei jong le chun kalhacha chapang chu dam jeng thei ahinai .
40008009	Ajeh chu kei jong thunei ho noiya um kahin , kei noiya jong sepaite aum’uvin , khat pen pen jah a , ‘ Chen , ’ katile achen ; achom dang khat jah a , ‘ Hungin , ’ katil eahunge ; chule kalhacha jah a , ‘ Hiche hi bol’in , ’ katileh , abolji nai , ” ati .
40008010	Athujah hi Jesun kidang asa behseh jengin , anunga hung ho jah a , “ Dih tah a kaseipeh nahiuve , Israelte lah jenga jong hitobnag tahsan len kamudoh hih laiye .
40008011	Hi jeh a chu kaseipeh nahiuve , niso lam le nilhum lama kon a mitamtah hung kikhom’uva van a Lenggam a Abraham le Isaac chule Jacob toh ankong aumkhom diu ahi .
40008012	Ahin lenggam chate dia kigel ho joh chu polam muthim lah a kileh lut diu , hikoma chu ka le hagel um ding ahi , ” ati .
40008013	Chuin Jesun jalamkaipa jah a , “ Chetan , natahsan banga lhung ding ahinai , ” atipeh-e .
40008014	Jesu Peter insunga alut leh , Peter nupanu nat lhut’a na a lum agatoh khai .
40008015	Jesun akhut agah tham leh anat lhut chun alhan , amanu ahung thoudoh paiyin ajen len apangtai .
40008016	Nilhah lamin thillhavop mi tampi Jesu henga ahin puiyun , Aman thu cheng khatseh seiyin thilhaho anodoh-in , damloute adamsah soh keitai .
40008017	Hitobang kiseisa , “ Aman inatna jouseu le iveiset chengseu akilah-in apomangtai ’ ” kiti chu guilhunna dinga chutiso ahi .
40008018	Akimvel’a mipi kikhom amudoh phat’in Jesun dil gal lang khat’a galkai ding asomtai .
40008019	Hichun Danthu lekha them khat ahungin ajah a , “ Houhil , nache che naa juiyinge , ” ati .
40008020	Jesun ajah a , “ Gam-uiten ko aneiyun , chunga leng vachaten bu aneiyui ; mihem Chapan mun aneipoi , ” ati .
40008021	Seijuiho lah a khat’in , “ Pakai amasan kapa vui din neisol tadin , ” ati .
40008022	Jesun ajah a , “ Neijui jengin , mithi hon athilongu kivui nauvinte , ” ati .
40008023	Jesu kong sunga alut’in aseijuiten akilhonpiuve .
40008024	Hetman louva dilpi chu khopihui hattah-in ahin nuh leh , twi kinongin kong chu achup pai ding ahitai . Jesu vang aihmu nalaiye .
40008025	Seijuiten agasukhang loiyun , “ Pakai neihuhhing loiyun twiyin eichup lih diu ahitai ! ” atiuve .
40008026	Jesun ajah-uvah , “ Vo tahsan lhom ho idia chuti kichat nahiuvem ? ” atin , athoudoh-in khopihui le dillen chu haphoa apho leh athip del jenge !
40008027	Mihon adatmo soh keiyun , “ Ipi mi bep hiya hui le dillen geiyin athu angai jeng hitam ! ” atiuve .
40008028	Jesu agalkaiya Gadara gamsung alhunin , lhankhuh lah a hung kon thilhavop mi nin akimutopi lhon’e . Thilhavop te ni chu kichat aum behseh jeh-in aumna lhon lampi chu koiman ahopa ngampoi .
40008029	Amani apengjah lhonin , “ Vo Pathen Chapa , ilo ding neitiu ham ? Akitep Phat lhin masanga keiho bolgentheiya hung nahim ? ” ati lhon’e .
40008030	Akom’uva kon chun muphah don khat’a hin vohcha tampi hon khat alhai .
40008031	Thilhahon ahenga , “ Neikaidoh tei diu leh hiche vohchate sunga khun neisol’uvin , ” tin ataovui .
40008032	Jesun “ Lut tauvin , ” ati phat’in , ahung potdoh-un vohchate sunga aluttauve . Chutah chun Vohhonpi chu ha-lhaiyin alhaiyun , kol’ah a alhai lhauvin , dil sunga achomlut soh hel’auvin , twi lah a athidentauve .
40008033	Chuphat’in vohcha ching ho kho sunga ajamlut’un , thilhavop te ni chunga thusoh le athilmu jouseu agaseisoh tauve .
40008034	Chutah chun kho sung mite abonchan Jesu henga ahungun , Ama chu agamsunguva kona potdoh din ajoltauve .
40009001	Jesu konga alut’in , ahung kile tol galkaiyin khopi sung ahung lhungtai .
40009002	Hichea hin mihon pasal langthi khat alupna pumin Jesu henga ahinpuiyui . Jesun atahsanu amuchet phat’in langthipa jah a , “ Kihol lel hih-in chapa , nachonset jouse ki-ngaidam ahitai , ” ati .
40009003	Hichun Danthu lekha them phabep’in , “ Hichepan Pathen ataitom’e , ” tin agel’ui .
40009004	Alung gel’u Jesun ahen , “ Idia hitobang thilse nagel’u ham ?
40009005	‘ Nachonset aki-ngaidamsoh tai , ’ ti leh “ Thouvin lam jottan , ’ ti hoijoh seibai jom ?
40009006	Leiset chunga Mihem Chapan chonset ngaidamna tha anei kavetsah nahiuve , ” atin , lang thipa jah a , “ Thouvin , nalupna kilah-in na-inlam jontan , ” ati .
40009007	Langthipa akipatdoh paiyin inlam ajontai .
40009008	Mipin hiche hi amu phat’un akichauvin , ahinvangin mihemte chunga hitobang thaneina pea Pathen avahchoitauve .
40009009	Jesun hikom chu dalhan ache leh Matthew kiti mi khat a kaidonna mun a tou amun , ajah a , “ Neijuiyin , ” atileh ; Matthew akipatdoh-in ajuitai .
40009010	Matthew in a Jesun ankong aum phat’in kaidong ho tamtah le thet umtah tah miho ahungun Jesu le aseijuite toh ankong aumkhom’uve .
40009011	Pharisee hon hichu amuphat’un aseijuite jah a , “ I-bol’a na Houhil pauvin kaidong ho le thet um tah tah ho to an aneh khom ham ? ” tin adongui .
40009012	Jesun aseiyu ajan , “ Midamin louthem angaipon , adam louvin bou angaiye .
40009013	Keiman hepina bou kangeh-in , kilhaina ka-ngeh poi , ’ kiti hi ipi kiseina ham gakhiltoh-un . Ajeh chu midohho kouva hung kahipon , chonset kouva hung joh kahibouve , ” ati .
40009014	John seijuite Jesu henga ahungun , “ I-atileh keiho le Pharisee hon an-ka-ngol mat chet juva , nang seijuiten an ngol khah louvu ham ? ” tin ahung dongui .
40009015	Jesun adon but’in , “ Kichen golvahna hung lha ho chu aji neipan alenkhomi laisea lunhham ngaiyam ? Amavang aji neipa akom’uva kona akipui mang nikho hung lhung ding ahin , chutengleh kichen golvah a hung lha hon an ngol diu ahinai .
40009016	“ Koiman sopnem loulai ponhal’in ponlui abeh ngaipoi , beh leh abehnan pon lui chu bot-eh jontin , haset cheh lo ding ahi .
40009017	Chujongle min savun peng lui sunga jong lengpitwi thah akhum ngaipoi , khum ta leh alengpitwi pen gchu tumkeh intin , lengpitwi long jal’a apeng jong mang lo ding ahi . Hijeh chun lengpitwi thah chu savun peng thah a akikhum jin , lengpitwi le apeng anigel’in ahoidoh theiye , ” ati .
40009018	jesun hiche hi asei nalaiyin , vaihom pasal khat akom’a ahung bohkhup’in , “ Tutah chun kachanu athitai , hinla hungin achunga na khut ngamle chun hingkit teiyinte , ” tin ataove .
40009019	Jesu akipatdoh paiyin vaihompa to akilhon phat’in aseijuiten jong ajuitauve .
40009020	Lampia chun kum som-le kum ni thi longa dammi numei khat hi Jesu nunga ahungin apon mong kai atham’e .
40009021	Amanu kigel’a chu , “ Apon mong jeng jong thamkha len gdam inge , ” ati ahi .
40009022	Jesu agah kihei leh numei nu chu amun , “ Kihol lel hih-in chanu , natahsanin nadamsah ahitai , ” ati . Hiche pet tah chun ama nu adamsel tai .
40009023	Jesu vaihompa in a alut leh thi-opna a kuli mut ho leh mipi poh chei choiya um amun ,
40009024	“ Nabonchan potdoh-un , chapangnu hi athi-ah ahipoi , a-ihmu ahibouve , ” atileh amahon amoh nuisat atauve .
40009025	Hinla mipi adeldoh phat’in Jesu insunga alut’in , chapangnu chu akhut’a akaileh chapangnu athudoh tai .
40009026	Hiche thusoh hi chuche gamsungse sea akithangsoh tai .
40009027	Chukom dalha a Jesu acheleh , mitcho mi nin ajui lhon’in , “ Vo David chapa neilungset’in , ” tin asam lhontai .
40009028	Insung khat’a agalut phat’in mitcho tenin jong ajuilut lhontai . Hichun Jesun ajah lhon’a , “ Namit lhon hahsah thei ding monga neitahsan lhon ham ? ” atileh ; amanin jong , “ Henge Pakai ! ” ati lhon’e .
40009029	Chuphat’in Jesun amit lhon athampeh-in , “ Natahsan lhon bang in mit hah lhontan , ” atileh ;
40009030	hichun amitlhon ahah paitai . Jesun amani akham chah kheh-in , “ Koima hetsah-lhon hih beh-in , ” ati .
40009031	Mitchote ni chula apotdoh lhonin chuche gamkol sungse seah Jesu thudol athechansoh lhontai .
40009032	Agah potdoh-u leh thilhavop mi paomo khat Jesu henga ahinpuiyui .
40009033	Jesun thilha anodoh peh phat’in paomopa apaothei paitai . Chutah chun mipin kidang asauvin , “ Israelte lah jenga jong , hitobang thil akimu kha hih laiye , ” atiuve .
40009034	Pharisee hon vang , “ Thilha lengpa vanga thilhate adeldoh hichume , ” atiuvin ahi .
40009035	Jesun khopi jouse le khoneo jouse achonsoh keiyin , Houthua kikhopna intin a thu ahil len , Lenggam Kipana Thupha ahil lhangin , veise dammo jouse aboldamin ahi .
40009036	Jesun mipi avet leh alainatpi lheh-e . Ajeh chu achingbei kelngoite bangin gim le da athoh-un , apan hu diu aumpoi .
40009037	Hijeh chun Jesun aseijuite jah a , “ Chang-at ding atam lheh nan , natonga alhom’e ,
40009038	chang-at ding mi ahinsol be na din chang-at thunei Pakai henga taovun , ” ati .
40010001	Jesun aseijui som le ni chu akoukhomin , lhagaoboh ho deldohna ding le dammo veiset jouse boldam theina tha aei .
40010002	Solchah som le ni ho min chu : amasapenin Peter kisah Simon le asopipa Andrew ahin , adang Zebedee chapa te ni Jacob le asopipa John ,
40010003	Philip le Bartholomew , Thomas , kaidongpa Matthew , Alpheus chapa Jacob , Thaddaeus ,
40010004	Canaan mi Simon , chule Jesu matsah a pang Judas Iscariot-hicheng hi ahiuve .
40010005	Som le ni asoldoh chun Jesun hitin ahilchah-e : “ Chidang nam dangte gamsung le Samaria mite khoi ho jot dauvin .
40010006	Kelngoi mang sa tobang Israel insung mite henga chejo’uvin .
40010007	Nache pum pum’un , ‘ Van a Lenggam chun hikom ahin phatai , ’ tin samleuvin .
40010008	Ana damsah-un , mithi kaithouvun , aphah suthengun , thilha nodoh-un , manbeiya nakisanu ahi , manbeiyin homjal’un .
40010009	Nasum dip sunga sana , dangka sumsan kipoh sauvin ;
40010010	cholam ding sum thumna din sakhao jen gjong kendauvin , sangkhol tho ni ah hih-un , kengchot hihen tenggol hileh kendauvin . Ajeh chu natong’an aneh ding amu lom ahi .
40010011	“ Khopi hihen khoneo hileh naphah phah nauva nalhunsah nom miu holdoh-un , chukom nadalhah kahseuvin umpiuvin .
40010012	Nalut lut nau insung jah a , ‘ Lungmon leng hen , ’ tin salam cheh-uvin .
40010013	Insung khattaouvin lamtoa nalhunsah-u leh salam’un lang , nalhunsah nom lou vangu leh salam datauvin .
40010014	Insung khattou le khopi khattouvin lamto loule lhunsah da akop’uva , nathu seiyu jong angaidau leh , nakengphanguva leivui geiyin thin lhah khum’un dalhauvin .
40010015	Tahbeh a kaseipeh nahiuve , Thupi tan nikho leh chuche mun mite thoh ding sanga Sodom le Gomorrah khopi thoh baijjo ding ahi .
40010016	“ Veuvin , ngeihon lah a kelngoi kilha lut banga kasol nahiuve . Hijeh chun gul bangin ching theiyun , vakhu bangin lung nem’un .
40010017	Chingtheiyun , mihon man’uvin natin Hou vaipoloi kikhopna nakai lut diu , Houthua kikhopna in dunga najep diu ahi .
40010018	Keima jal’in vaipote le leng ho anga kailut’un tin , hinla amaho le chidang namdangte henga kathupha hettohsah a napan diu ahi .
40010019	Hitia nakailut tengu leh nasei diu le nasei ding dol’un lung kham hih-un , apettah leh kipenauvin nate .
40010020	Ajeh chu nalunggel mai mai nasei diu ahipon , nasunguva cheng na-Pau Lhagao chun naman chah-uva asei ding ahibouve .
40010021	“ Pasal’in asopite aheh lih a , mipaten achate chutima abol diu , chaten jong anu apa adouva athiso cheh diu ahi .
40010022	Keima jal’a mitin hot le paiya na-um diu , hinla akhon ni geiya thoh lhumpa bou huhhinga um ding ahi .
40010023	Khopi khat’a nabolset tengu khopi chom khat’a jam lut’in , tahbeh a kaseipeh nahiuve . Mihem Chapa hung kah a Israelte khopi jouse nachotsoh louhel diu ahi .
40010024	“ Seijui chu ahilpa sangin achungnungjo pon , soh jong apu sangin achungnung ngaipoi .
40010025	Seijui chu ahilpa tobang bep ahiya , soh apu toh abah joule aphaset ahi . Ainneipa bon Beelzebul ahisah ngamu leh a-insung mite ipi ahisah da diu ham ?
40010026	“ Mihem kichah hih-un . Ajeh chu phondoh louva sel mang ding aumpon , hetdoh louva im-mang ding jong aumpoi .
40010027	Muthima kaseipeh-u hi khovah a naphonjal diu , guh thima kahil’u hi intingvuma naphonjal diu ahi .
40010028	Tahsa sunmang thei jongle lhagao that thei lou chu kichat dauvin , chusangin tahsa le lhagao akop’a damun a sol a sumang thei Pathen joh ginguvin .
40010029	Vasah ni paisa khatseh man a kijoh ji lou ham ? Ahivangin na Pau phatsah louva khat jeng cha jong tol’a kimoh selhah lou ding ahi .
40010030	Nang ho jong nalujang sam jouseu geiya simtohsa kikoi ahitai .
40010031	Hijeh chun kicha hih-un , vahsah ho sanga manlujo nahiuve .
40010032	“ Koi hile japi lah a Christa mi ahi kiphongdoh chan chu Ken jong van a um ka-Pa angsunga kaphondoh ding ahi .
40010033	Koi hi leh Christa mi ahina japi lah a immang chan chu Ken jong van a um ka-Pa angsunga kaseilep ding ahi .
40010034	“ Leiset chunga chambol’a hungin neigel dauvin , chambolma lah chemjama kidouna dinga hung kahibouve .
40010035	Ajeh chu pa le chapa kidohsah a , nu le chanu kidohsah ding , tehpi leh mounu kidohsah dinga hung kahibouve .
40010036	Mihem dia amelma khohpen tahchu a-insung mi ma ma hiding ahi .
40010037	“ Koi hile Kei sanga anu apa lungset jo jong kaseijui lom ahipoi .
40010038	Athingpel kiput’a kanung jui lou chu kaseijui lom ahipoi .
40010039	Koi hile kihinso nom chun athilo ding , keijal’a thilo chanin kihinsona anei ding ahi .
40010040	“ Koi hileh nang ho lem a lhunsah chanin Kei eilem a lhunsah a kila ding , Kei eilem a lhunsah jouse chu Eisolpa lema lhunsah a ahi .
40010041	Pathen Themgao lem a lhunsah chun Themgao kipaman akihoppi ding ahin , mipha lem a lhunsah jong chu mipha kipaman amuding ahi .
40010042	Dihtah a kaseipeh nahiuve , kaseijuite lah a aneopen khat hijong leh seijui ahina jeh a twidap khon khat pejeng jong chu kipaman akisan tei ding ahi , ” ati .
40011001	Jesun aseijuite som le ni ahilchahsoh phat’in chukom dalhan , naivel khopi dunga thuhil’a seiphong le din achetai .
40011002	Akihenna songkul’ah Messiah natoh thilbol kithang ajan , John chun aseijui phabep Jesu henga asol’e .
40011003	Amahon Jesu jah a , “ Hung dia kisei chu nahim , achom dang khat ka-nga nah lai diu ham ” atiuve .
40011004	Jesun ajah-uvah , “ Kile kit’un lang najah chengseu le namu chengseu hi gaseipeh tauvin ;
40011005	mitchon kho amun , elbaiyin lam a jot tan , miphah suhthengin aumin , na-ngongin kho ajan , mithi kaithouvin aumtai , chule vaichate Kipana Thupha akiseipeh tai .
40011006	Kachunga lung opkaina neilou chu anun nom’e , ” ati .
40011007	John seijuite kile phat’in , John thudol mipi jah a Jesun aseiyin ; “ Gamthip laiya ipi vetnom’a che nahiuvem ? Hui mut ling peng venom nahiuvam ?
40011008	Ipi vedia che mong nahiuvem ? Kile lah ponsil mi ham ? Pon kikhel sil miho leng inpia achengbouvui !
40011009	Ipi vetnoma cheba nahiuvem ? Themgao ham ? Ahinai , Themgao mai mai ahi poi , thupitah Themgao ahi .
40011010	Pathen Lekhabua Pathenin , ‘ Nalampi sem toh din namasanga kasolle kasol masai , ’ tia asei chu John hi ahitai .
40011011	Tahbeh a kaseipeh nahiuve , numei sung peng cheh ahivangin John Baptist sanga lenjo mihem apeng kha hih laiye ; hinla van a lenggama neopen jong ama sangin alenjo nalaiye .
40011012	John Baptist thuseiphong nikhoa pat tuni geiyin van a lenggam hi min pumhat jengin anon , mi huseten pumhat’a lah din agouve .
40011013	John khang geiya Themgao jouse le Mose Danthun Lenggam thudol aseiyu ahin ,
40011014	nakisan nom’u leh John hi hung dia kisei Elijah chu ahitai .
40011015	Nakhang neiyan ngai hen !
40011016	“ Hiche khang mite hi ipi to kitekah theiyin tem ? Kailhang dunga tou chapang ho loikhat’in adang ho jah a ,
40011017	Kipana kuli kamut vangun nalam pouvin , thi lhah la kasah-u jongle nakap pouve , ’ tia kihouho tobang ahiuve .
40011018	Ajeh chu John hi mineh neloule midon don louva aumle ‘ Thilhavop ahi , ’ atiu vin ;
40011019	mihem Chapan mineh ngai aneh a midon ngai adon vangin , Neh het le lengpitwi lop , kaidong ho le chonsete jol le gol , ’ tin asei kit’ui . Hoi hileh chihna chu atohgan them achan ahibouve , ” ati .
40011020	Jesun thil kidang ahabol dehna mihon lung ahei loujeh-un aphohsal’in ,
40011021	“ Ohe Chorazin khopi nada ahi ! Ohe Bethsaida khopi nada ahi ! Nakhosunga thil kidang kibol chengse hi Tyre le Sidon kho sunga kibol hileh , khomiten kisihin khaopon sil’a vut kinu’vintin achonset lung heisoh tauvinte .
40011022	Tahbeh a akseipeh nahiuve , thupi tan nikho le nang ho thoh sanga Tyre le Sidon kho mite thoht oljo ding ahi !
40011023	Chule Capernaum nang hi ! Van geiya kichoisang go nahim ? Noimigam a nasot lhah diu ahibouve . Nakho sunga thil kidang kibol sengse hi Sodom kho sunga kibol leh mangthth hih laiyinte .
40011024	Tahbeh a kaseipeh nahi , thupi tan nikho leh nang thoh sanga Sodom thoh oljo ding ahi , ” ati .
40011025	Hichepat hin Jesun , “ Pa van le leiset Pakai ! Michingte le mi themte dia na-impeh chengse mimol ho naseipeh jeh-in kathangvah-e !
40011026	hiti dinga hi nadeimong hinte he-Pa !
40011027	“ Ka-Pan thil ijakai eippedoh tai . Pa tilou koiman Chapa ahepon , Chapa le aman aphondoh peh nom ho tilou koima dangin Pa ahepouve .
40011028	“ Tong gimte leh pohgihte kahenga hungun , Keiman choldoh sah unge !
40011029	Kanamkoljon kilah-un pouvin , Keiya kihil’un , Keima lung nengtah le nun nemtah kahi , Keiya hinjouna nanei diu ahi .
40011030	Ijeh-inem itile kanamkoljon apoh anop’in , kapoh jong ajang’e , ” ati .
40012001	Chom khat jouvin Choldo nin Jesun bulei lai ajotpai . Aseijuiten gilkel jeh-in changvui asih pantauve .
40012002	Athilbol’u hi Pharisee hon amu’uvin Jesu jah a , “ Ven , naseijuiten Choldo nin dan ngailou abol’ui ! ” atiuve .
40012003	Jesun adonbut’in , “ David le aloite agilkel’uva chu ipi abol’u nasim khah louvu ham ?
40012004	I-atileh Pathen Houin a lut’a , Thempu tilou neh ngai louhel , Pathen um jing hetna kitohsa changlhah aloite toh aneh jengu ham ?
40012005	Ole Choldo niseh leh Houin sunga lutji Thempu hon Choldo nikho asuhkeh vanguva themmo achanda diu Danthu chu nasim khah louvu ham ?
40012006	Kaseipeh nahiuve , Houin sanga thupijo khat hikoma aum’e !
40012007	Pathen lekhabua , ‘ Gan alhai ka-ngeh poi , hepina bou kadeiye , ’ kiti chu heleu chun monabei miho themmo nachan lou diu ahi .
40012008	Ijeh-inem itile Mihem Chapa hi Choldo nikho Pakai ahi , ” ati .
40012009	Hikom chu dalhan Houthua kikhopna in khat’a Jesu aluttai .
40012010	Kikhopn ain a chun pasal khut lang ngoi khat ana umin , alah-uva chun Jesu thilbol dihsah lou jeh a hehse nom mi phabep jong aum’e . Amaho hin , “ Choldo nikhoa damlou boldam hi Danthu to kikal hilou ham ? ” tin adongui .
40012011	Jesun adonbut’in , “ Choldo nikhon nalah-uva koiham khat kelngoi kokhuuh a lahlut taleh aneipan agakaidoh lou ding ham ?
40012012	Mihem hi Kelngoi sanga gam chenga mantamjo ahi ! Hijeh chun i-Danthuu hin Choldo nikhoa mi kithopi ding aphal’e , ” ati .
40012013	Hijeh chun Jesun khut lang ngoipa jah a , “ Nakhut langin , ” ati . Khut ngoipan alhandoh jen gleh adamtan , adamlang bep bep ahitai .
40012014	Chuphat’in Pharisee ho apotdoh-un Jesu thana ding akihousomtauve .
40012015	Ama than ding akihousomu ahet doh phat’in Jesu chukom dalhan apotdoh le japin ajuitauve . ana jouse aboldamin
40012016	Ama chu midang aseipeh da diuvin ahilchah-e .
40012017	Hitobang thil hi Isaiah Themgao kama kiseisa :
40012018	“ Ven , kalhentum lhacha deitah , Kadeitah le kalung lhaina pen ! Achunga ka-Lhagao chensah ingting , Chitin namtin lah a kathutan aphondoh ding ahi !
40012019	O-sanga mi anelkal lou ding , Kholai dunga jong lhang asap lou ding ;
40012020	Tahlelte dia nun nem ding , Panpibeite akhoto ding ahi ! Dan dihtah a thu akitan kahsea Adou dou jeng ding ahi !
40012021	Chule namtin vaipin akineppi diu , ” kiti chu guilhunna dia soh ahi .
40012022	Hichepet hin thilhavop mitcho paomo mi khat hi Jesu henga ahin puiyun , Jesun aboldam phat’in apao theiyin kho amutai .
40012023	Jesu thil kidang bol hi japin adatmo behseh jengun , “ Hichepa hi David Chapa hi-ngap ding hitam ? ” akitiuve .
40012024	Pharisee hon ajahdoh phat’un , “ Thilha lengpa Beelzebul thahat’a thilahte anodoh hichu me ! ” atiuve .
40012025	Alunggel’u ahet phat’in Jesun ajah-uvah , “ Kilang khen a kidouto lenggam tapou mangthah ding , ki lang khen a kidouto khopi hihen insung hi jong le mangthah vah ding ahi .
40012026	Satanin Satan anodoh leh akilangkhen ahitauvin , alenggam beivah ding ahitai .
40012027	Thilha lengpa Beezebl thahat vanga thilhate nodoh a neiseiyu leh naseijui teuvin koi thahat vanga anodoh-u ba ham ? Namo nau phongdoh a naseijuiteu pang diu ahi .
40012028	Pathen Lhagao vanga thilhate nodoh kahi vang leh Pathen Lenggam chu nalah-u lhung ahitai .
40012029	“ Mihat insunga lut chun ama somkon masa louva kon anei achom thei ngaiyam ? Inneipa asomkon jou tengle bou anei achompeh ding ahi .
40012030	“ Koi hileh eipanpi lou chu eidou mong ahin , eilhoh khomhu lou mi chu athecheh a pang ahibouve .
40012031	Hijeh a chu kaseipeh nahiuve , mihemte chonsetna le Pathen ataitom nai itobang hijongl eki-ngaidam thieyin tin , Lhagao Theng taitom vang ngaidam chang louhel ding ahi .
40012032	Mihem Chapa douna thusei jong ki-ngaidam thieyin tin , Lhagao Theng taitom vang hcu itih chan a jong ngaidam chang louhel ding ahi !
40012033	“ Thingga pha deiyan thing phung pha nei angaiye , nathing phung aphat loule thingga phalou nanei ding ahi . Ajeh chu thingphung hi agan akihei .
40012034	Gulse guiya peng ho , gitlou puma iti thupha nasei theidiu ham ? Ajeh chu lungsung alet teng kamsunga hungpotdoh ahibouve .
40012035	Miphan athilpha kholna lung sunga konin thipha asodoh jin , misen athilse kholna lungsunga konin thilse asodoh jie .
40012036	“ Kaseipeh masah nahiuve , thupi tan Nikho leh mintinin manlou thu asei jouseu geiya asuhto soh kei diu ahi .
40012037	Naseisau thu hoa chu nathem namo nahcung thu kitan diu ahi , ” ati .
40012038	Danthu them phabep le Pharisee phabep’in Jesu jah a , “ Houhil , thil kidang nabol kavetnom’ui , ” atiuve .
40012039	Jesu a-eojah-in , “ Pathen hephaloute leh khang gilouva miten melchihna nahol’um ? Jonah Themgao melchihna itlou melchihna dang kipelou ding nahiuve .
40012040	Ngapi oisunga Jonah nithum le janthum athamden banga Mihem Chapa jong leiset Lailunga nithum le janthum thamden ding ahi .
40012041	Thupi tan nikho leh Nineveh kho mite chu hiche khang mite toh hung ding khom’uva themmo achan diu ahi ; ijeh-inem itile Nineveh kho miten Jonah thuseu ajah phat’un chonset lung aheiyui ; hinla veuvin Jonah sanga lenjo khat hikoma aum’e !
40012042	Thupi tan nikho leh Sheba lengnu chu hiche khang mite toh idng khoma themmo achan ding ahi ; ajeh chu leiset kolmang lang peh a konin Sheba lengnun Solomon chih thusei ahung ngai gunset theiye ; tunla veuvin Solomon sanga lenjo khat hikoma aum’e !
40012043	“ Lhagaoboh hi mihem sunga apotdoh teng gamgo lah a avah len choldo mun ahol lelen , mu la amuji poi .
40012044	Chutengleh , ‘ Kahung potdoh namun ma ma a lut kit tange , ’ atin , ahung kile kit leh , mihem chu sagoh keova kithen ngimsel’a um amun ,
40012045	ache kit’in ama sanga khohjo lhagaoboh sagi ma agapui ben , mihem sunga chun alut’un achenpha tauve ; chutah chun mipa umchan hi amasa sangin akhoh cheh tai . Hiche khanga migiloute jong hung chuiti diu ahi , ” ati .
40012046	Jesun mipi jah athu asei nalaiyin anu le asopite ama to kihou nomin ahungun inpo-ah angah-ui .
40012047	Hijeh chun mi khat hin Jesu jah a , “ Ven , nanu le nasopite nang to kihou nomin ahungun inpo-ah na-ngah-ui , ” atipeh-e .
40012048	Ajah a thuseipa jah a Jesun , “ Kanu koi hiya , kasopite koi koi hiuvam ? ” atin ,
40012049	aseijuite akoh-in , “ Ven kanu le kasopite hi !
40012050	Ajeh chu koi hileh van a ka-pa lungdei bol’a chu kasopipa , kasopinu chule kanu ahiuve , ” ati .
40013001	Hiche nikhoa hi Jesun in dalha dil pang lama chea atou phat’in
40013002	mipi ahung kikhom’un , Ama kong sunga alut’in atouve . Mipi vang vaokam a adingui .
40013003	Hichun Jesun mipi ajah a thu tampi thulemin aseiye : “ Pasal khat muchi the din akontai .
40013004	Muchi athephat’in abang lamsih a achun , vachaten akilogam tauve .
40013005	Muchi phabep jong song lheo chung , lepatnaa achun , aleiphat jeh-in ahung keh doh loiye .
40013006	Hinla nisan asah phat’in leipat jeh a ajungkho thuh loujeh chun asang gop jitai .
40013007	Muchi phabep ma ling lah a achukhan , ling ho akhandoh phat’in adep lih jin ahi .
40013008	Muchi phabeppi vang leipha laiya achun , akhangdoh-in agatan , abang jakhat cheng , abang somgup cheng chule abang som thum chengin apunge ,
40013009	“ Nakhang neiyan ngai hen . ” ati .
40013010	Seijuiten anailut’un Jesu jah a , “ I-bol’a mipi koma thulem jenga thu nasei ham ? ” atiuve .
40013011	Jesun adonbut’in “ Nang ho hi van a lenggam thuguh hetna kiseipeh nahitauvin , amaho vang kisepeh nailou lai ahi .
40013012	Aneiya chu anei let setna dia kipeh be ding , aneilou vang themcha nei jongle kilahpeh ding ahi .
40013013	Ijeh-inem itile amaho hin veu jongle muthei lou ding , ngai jongle ajah thei lou diu ahi jeh a thulema kisei ahi .
40013014	Hichea hin Isaiah Themgao seisa : ‘ Ja jong leu nahet khen thei lou diu , Ve jong leu chun namu chet thei lou diu ;
40013015	Ijeh-inem itile hiche nam mite hi alungthimu amoh-in , Akolseh gam’un , amit’u achosoh tai ; Chutilou leh mit’in mu’vin tin naa ajah diu , kadamsah diu ahi , ’ ati chu guilhung ahitai .
40013016	“ Nanghon vang namu’va najah tah jeh-un hampha tah nahiuve !
40013017	Tahbeh a kaseipeh nahiuve , namu chengseu hi Themgao tampi le midih tam tah-in amu nom vangun amupouvin , ajah nom lheh vangun ajapha pouve .
40013018	“ Hijeh chun muchi thepa thulem hi ngaiyuvin .
40013019	Lenggam thu kiseipeh la ja a hekhen thei lou miho chu lamsih a chu muchi tobang chu ahiuve . Alung sunguva kikhum lutsa jong Agiloupan ahung lah mangpeh jitai .
40013020	Lenggam thu kisei ajah teng kipah tah a kisan pai jeng ho chu songlheo chung leipatna a chu muchi tobang ahiuve .
40013021	Asunguva alut gil loujeh-in chom khat aum jin , akisansau thu jeh a bolsetna ahung teng adonda paijitauve .
40013022	Ling lah a chu muchi hi lenggam thu ja a , ahivanga leiset khan khoa lungkhamna le haova nopsah ding deinan adep lihji miho ahiuvin , galouvin aumjitauve .
40013023	Leipha laiya chu muchi hi lenggam thu ja a hetthem miho ahiuvin , ahung gaphan , abang ja khat cheng , abang somgup cheng chule abang somthum chengin apungjie , ” ati .
40013024	Jesun ajah-uva thulem khat aseikit’in : “ Van a Lenggam chu mi khat loulaiya muchi pha thea to bang ahi .
40013025	Jan khat mi ihmut thip nungin melma khat ahungin chang lah achun changlhem athen ache mangtai .
40013026	Chang kung kikhan lhit’a changpah do phat’in changlhem ho jong akilangdoh tai .
40013027	Hichun in neipa sohte ahungun ajah a , “ Kapu , lolaiya muchi pha jeng nahte me , hoilam kona changlhem ho keh ham ? ” atiu leh ,
40013028	aman , ‘ Melma khat touvin abol hinte , ’ ati . Hichun asohten , ‘ Changlhem ho khu kagabo doh diu nadeiyem ? ” atiuve .
40013029	Aman ajah-uva , ‘ Gabodoh datauvin , changlhem nabodoh nauva changtah jong bodoh tha khauvin nate ,
40013030	Chang-at phat kah-in changtah le changlhem keh khom tante , chang-at phat tneg keiman chang-at ho chu changlhem chengse meiya govam di akankhom’uva chule changtah chengse kachangpang sunga akhum diuvin seipeh nange , ’ tin aseiye , ” ati .
40013031	Jesun thulem khatma aseipeh kit’in , “ Van a Lenggam chu mi khat’in loulaiya ankam mu athe to bang ahi .
40013032	Ankam mu hi muchi lah a aneo pen ahivangin akhandoh phat’in thingphung tejen aphan , chunga leng vacha ten jong bu sahna le ge nan aneitauve , ” ati .
40013033	Jesun thulem khat asei kit’in , “ Van a Lenggam chu numei khat’in changbong danthum leh a chol avuiya , apomsoh kahsea abil tobang ahi , ” ati .
40013034	Jesun mipi jah a thulem hijat hi aseiyin , thulem louvin thucheng khat cha aseipoi .
40013035	Thulem asei hi , “ Thulem seinan pao ving ting , Lei set bul kiphu til’a pat kisei thuguh chengse phongdoh inge , ” kiti Themgao seisa chu gui lhunna dia asei ahi . Jesun changlhem thu ahilchet
40013036	Mipi dalhaa Jesu insung agalut leh aseijuite ahungun , “ Lou laiya changlhem chu ipi kiseina ham neihil chen’un , ” atiuve .
40013037	Jesun adonbut’in , “ Muchi pha thea chu Mihem Chapa ahin ,
40013038	loulai chu vannoi leiset ahi ; muchipha chu Lenggama lut chate ahiuvin , changlhem chu Agiloupa mite ahiuve ;
40013039	chule changlhem thepa chu Agiloupa ahiye . Chang-at phat chu Vannoi khang kichaina ahitan , chang-at ho chu Vantilte ahiuve .
40013040	Changlhem chengse akhop khom’uva meiya ahalvam banguva vannoi leiset khang kichai nikho jong hiding ahi .
40013041	Mihem Chapan avantilte sol’in tin Alenggam sunga kisuhmo na bolte leh akhangse jouse akhop khomsah a ,
40013042	meilhum deuje ju sunga alelut diu , hikoma chu kap le hagel gel’a um diu ahi .
40013043	Midih chengse vang a-Pau lenggama nisa banga vah emsel diu ahi . Nakhang neiyan ngai hen !
40013044	“ Van a lenggam chu loulaiya gou kiselguh , mi khat’in amudoh a , ima akhu khuma kipah tah a chea anei jouse joh a hiche lou chu kichoh jeng tobang ahi .
40013045	“ Van a Lenggam chu sumkolvei min twikohchang manlu tah ahol tobnag ahi .
40013046	Twikohchang chu amudoh phat’in acheloiyin anei jouse ajoh-in twikohchang chu achotai .
40013047	“ Van a Lenggam chu min Twikhanglen lai lunga len aseuva nga tin nga tang amat khomu tobang ahi .
40013048	Len chu nga adim phat’in akaidoh-un , atoupin nga pha jouse paipeh sunga akhol’un , manmo chengse apaitauve .
40013049	Vannoi khang kichai nikho jong chutobang ding , Vantilte kon’un tin midih lah a migiloute alhendoh diu ,
40013050	meilhum deuje ju sunga alelut’uva , hikoma chu kap le hagel gel’a um diu ahi .
40013051	Jesun , “ Hicheng hi nahet chet tah-um ? ” atileh ; Mihon , “ Henge , ” atiuve .
40013052	Hichun Jesun ajah-uvah , “ Hijeh a chu Danthu them mi Van a Lenggam dia seijuiya pang chu akholna in a kona thil thah le alui hinpo doh doh jeng in neipa to bang ahi , ” ati .
40013053	Thulem hijat asei jou phat’in chukom dalhan
40013054	Jesun akho ajonin , Houthua kikhopna in dunga thu ahil le leh , mihon kidang asauvin , “ Hitobang chihna le thaneina hi hoiya akilah ham ?
40013055	Ama hi thingthem bolpa chapa hilou haimo ? Anu min jong Mary kitia , asopite Jacob , Joseph , chule Simon le Judas hilou ham ?
40013056	Asopi numei ho jong ilah-uva cheng ahimeu ? Hijat chihna le thaneina hi houya akilah hintem ? ” atiuvin ,
40013057	asanda gam tauve . Hijeh chun Jesun ajah-uva , “ Themgao chu akho sung le a-insung tilou mundanga vang akija bol tei nai , ” ati .
40013058	Atah san loujeh-un hikoma chun Jesun thil kidang tampi abolpoi .
40014001	Hiche lai hin gambih vaipo Herod-in Jesu thudol kithang ajan ,
40014002	alhachate jah a , “ Hichepa hi athisa John Baptist chu thoukit hitei ding ahitai ; hijeh a chu hitobang thil kidang ho hi abol thei ahi , ” ati .
40014003	Herod hin anaopa Philip jinu Herodias thumop jal’a John chu songkul’a anakhum ahi .
40014004	Ajeh chu John hin Herod jah a , “ Herodias nakichenpi hi Dan ngai ahipoi , ” tia anaphosa ahi .
40014005	Herod-in John anatha nom vangin mipin John hi Themgaova agel jeh-un tha jeng ding akichai .
40014006	Herod pen nikhon Herodias chanu japi lah a ahung lamin , Herod alung lhaisah lheh-e .
40014007	Hijeh chun Herod-in , “ Ipi hijongle nadeipen pen kapeh jeng ding nahi , ” tin aki hahselin akiteptai .
40014008	Anu thumop dungjuiyin Herodias chanun , “ Tutah-in John baptist luchang chu kongin hindomin neipen , ” tin athumtai .
40014009	Lengpa alung kham lheh jeng nan , ankong phunga atoupi ho angsunga akitepna jeh chun John luchang apeh tei din anomtai .
40014010	Mi asol’in Songkul’a John luchang agatansah-in ,
40014011	John luchang chu ahindop’uva nu-ngah chu agapeh-u leh , aman anu agapetai .
40014012	John seijuite hunguva John long chu agavuiyu ahi ; chujouva hunguva Jesu ahung hetsah-u ahiye .
40014013	John kibolna ajah phat’in Jesun chukom dalhan achangseh-in gamthip laiya din kongin akitol tai . Mipin achedoh ahet phat’in akhopi chenguva konin ahungun Jesu nung ajuitauve .
40014014	Jesu konga kona vaokama ahung potdoh leh mipi atoh paiyin , avet leh alainatpi lheh kengin , adamlou ho chu aboldamtai .
40014015	Nilhah phat’in aseijuite Jesu henga ahungun , “ Hikom la gam thip lai ahin , nisa ma lhum pai ding ahitan , akho khoa acheuva neh ding agakichoh na diuvin mipi hi sol ngap tan , ” atiuve .
40014016	Jesun ajah-uva , ‘ Ache louvu akhoh poi , nang hon neh ding peuvin , ” ati .
40014017	Seijuiten ajah a , “ Changlhah pheng nga le nga ni seh bou kanei yui , ” atiuve .
40014018	Jesun , “ Changlhah le nga chu hinchoiyun , ” atin ;
40014019	chule japi chu hampa dum lah a tou din asol’e . Chuin changlhah pheng nga le nga ni chu alan , van lam ven Pathen athangvah-in , changlhah ho chu aheh bal bal’in seijuite apen seijuiten mipi ahoppeh tauve .
40014020	Japin anevaset cheh-un , anehval chengseu paipeh som le paipeh ni dimset alohdoh-ui .
40014021	Anea chu numei chapang sim louvin pasal sang nga jen ahiuve .
40014022	Jesun Mipi alhah doh phat’in aeijuite chu masaa gal lang khat kai masa din kong kha tsunga alut sah-in asoltai .
40014023	Mipi asoldoh nung in achangseh a mol chunga tao din akaltouve . Nilhah geiyin mol chunga Jesu achangseh-in aum’e .
40014024	Hiche don hin kong chu dil lailung ageitai . Huiyin ale lama anuh jehin twi kinongin kong chu aleh le jengin ahi .
40014025	Jingkah lam nidan thum le nidan gup kikah-in seijuite heng jonin dil’a twi chunga Jesun lam ahinjot’e .
40014026	Twichunga lam ahinjot chu seijuiten amudoh phat’un , “ Lhadam ahi , ” tin kichan a-aosot jengui .
40014027	Jesun ahin houpaiyin , “ Lung linglao hih-un Kei kahibouve , kicha hih-un , ” ati .
40014028	Peterin ahin houvin , “ Pakai nang nahi nah leh twi chunga naheng kahinjotna din neiseipeh in , ” ati .
40014029	Jesun , “ Hungin , ” atileh ; Peter jong konga akumlhan , twi chunga achen Jesu heng ajontai .
40014030	Hinla huiyin twi anon amuphat’in akichan alha lut pantan , apeng jah jengin , “ Pakai , neihuhhingin ! ” tin asam tai .
40014031	Jesun akhut’in agah manloiyin , “ Vo tahsan lhom ! I-bol’a natahsan lel ham ? ” tin aphoh-e .
40014032	Jesu le Peter kong sunga alut lhon phat’in hui jong athip tai .
40014033	Chuphat’in kong sunga um seijuiten Jesu chu chibai aboh-un , “ Pathen Chapa mong mong nahibouve , ” tin aphongtauve .
40014034	Akitol gal kaiyun Gennesaret gamsunga akum lhauve .
40014035	Agam miten Jesu anahe masauvin , mi asol’un gamsunga ana damlou jouse jesu henga ahin puikhom’un ,
40014036	apon mongkai beh atham diuvin ataovui . Apon mong jeng tham kha a jong adamhel hel’uve .
40015001	Jerusalema konin Pharise ho le Danthu them ho Jesu henga ahungun ,
40015002	“ Ipi dia nasei juiten an aneh tengu khut sil louva puchon pachon apal keh-u ham ? ” tin adongui .
40015003	Jesun adonbut’in , “ I-bol’a ba nang hon jong puchon pachon khohsah jal’a Pathen Danthu napal keh-u ham ?
40015004	Ajeh chu Pathenin , ‘ Nanu napa jabol’un , ’ chule , Koi hile anu le apa house jousen , athilo diu ahi , ’ ati ahi .
40015005	Nang hon la , ‘ Koi hile anu ham apa ham jah a , “ Kavanga naphat chomna thei thil ho chu Pathen thilto ding ahitai , ” atileh ,
40015006	ama hin anu apa aja bol khoh angaipoi , ’ natiuvin ; hiti hin puchon pachon khohsah nan Pathen thujoh nathai mil jiuve .
40015007	Mipha lhem ho ! Isaiah-in nachung changu gaothua asei :
40015008	‘ Hiche nam mite hin kamsungin jabol thu aseiyun , Alunghtimu la Keiya konin agamla lheh-e !
40015009	Thujong mihem thupeh jeng ahil jeh-un Eihouvu jong mohseh ahi , ’ ati chu adih lheh jenge , ” ati .
40015010	Jesun mipi akoulut’in ajahuvah , “ Phaten ngaiyun hechen’un .
40015011	Mihem suboh thei chu akamsunga lutjoh ahipon , akamsunga hung potdoh joh chun asuhboh ahibouve , ” ati .
40015012	Jesun seijuite ahungun , “ Nathusei jeh a Pharisee ho lung himo khu nahet’em ? ” atiuve .
40015013	jesun adonbut’in , “ Van a um ka-Pa phu hilou changphung jouse chu kibotdoh ding ahi .
40015014	Hite ho khu limsah hih-un , mitcho ahiuvin , mitcho ma man alamkaiyu ahi . Mitchom mitcho alamkai leh kokhuh a lhalut tei ding ahi , ” ati .
40015015	Peterin Jesu jah a , “ Ipi thu lema nasei ham neihil chen’un , ” ati .
40015016	Jesun , Tugeiya nahet khen thei louvu ham ?
40015017	Ipi hijongle kamsunga lut jousen gilpi ahopaa chujou teng kithadohji ahi helou nahiuvam ?
40015018	Lunggil’a kona kamsunga hung potdoh vang chun mihem asuboh theiye .
40015019	Ijeh-inam itile lunggil’a konin lung gilou , thilse , mi thana , mito jon na , huhna , guhchatna-hicheng hi ahungpot jie .
40015020	Hicheng hin mihem asuhboh thieyin , khut sil louva an neh vang in koima aboh theipoi , ” ati .
40015021	Jesun chukom dalhan Tyre le Sidon gamkol alhah tai .
40015022	Chu che gamsunga cheng Canaan numei khat ahungin , “ David chapa kapu , neilungset’in kachanu thilha gilou tah khat ti akivop’in akhoh lheh tai ! ” tin ahinsam’e .
40015023	Jesun la kamcheng khat’in jong adonbutpoi . Aseijuite ahung un , “ Hichenu hi kanung nunguva ahungin apen gpeng jenge , sol mang loiyin , ” atiuve .
40015024	Jesun agah houvin , “ Israel insung kelngoi mangsa ho henga bou eikisol’a kahi , ” ati .
40015025	Chutah chun numeinu akeng bul’a aboh khup’in , “ Kapu , neikithopi tei teiyin ! ” tin ataotai .
40015026	Jesun adonbut’in , “ Chate neh ban lahpeh a uichate peh ding aphapoi , ” ati .
40015027	Numei nun , “ Ahinai kapu , hijongle uichaten jong dokang chunga apu anmal lhathang anehji khu me ! ” ati .
40015028	Chutah chun Jesun adonbut’in , “ Numei natahsan alen’e ! Nadei banga kibolpeh ding nahi , ” ati . Hichepet tah chun achanu adamtai .
40015029	Jesun chukom dalhan Galilee dillen pang alhah-in , molvum khat’a akaldoh-in atouve .
40015030	Ahenga mipi ahungun , ana damlou elbai , mitcho , paomo , lhemvei , chule adang dang hivei tampi vei mihem ahinpuiyun , Jesun aboldamsoh hel’e .
40015031	Paomo paothei , lhemvei damhel , elbai lamjot , mitcho khomu – mipin amudoh phat’un Israel Pathen avahchoi choi jenguve .
40015032	Jesun aseijuite akoulut’in , “ Kakoma mipi nelou chalouva aum nau hi nithum alhingtan , kalung asei ; mohsol ding la nelou chalouva lampia lha lhoppa diu ahin kasol nompoi , ” ati .
40015033	Aseijuiten , “ Gamthip laiya japi hijat neh ding hoiya kalah diu ham ? ” tin adongui .
40015034	Jesun , “ Changlhah ijat nanei yum ? ” ati . Amahon , “ Changlhah phengsagi le nga them khat kaneiyui , ” atiuve .
40015035	Jesun mipichu tol’a tousah din aseiyin ,
40015036	chuin changlhah pheng sagi le nga them khat chu alan , Pathen athangvah jouvin aheh bal bal’in aseijuite apeh leh , seijuiten mipi ahoppeh tauve .
40015037	Mipin vaset cheh-in aneuvin , aneh noh-u anong nai longkai sagi dimset aloh doh-ui .
40015038	An nea chu numei cha pang sim louvin pasal cheh sangli alhinge .
40015039	Mipi alhah doh phat’in Jesu kong khat’a alut’in Magadan gam kol ajontai .
40016001	Pharisee ho le Sadducee ho Jesu henga ahungun , akipal sah nom jeh-un , van a kona melchihna khat avetsah diu a-ngeh ui .
40016002	Jesun adonbut’in , “ Nilhah teng , ‘ Vansan asoh-e , kho pha ding ahi , ’ natiuvin ;
40016003	jingkah leh , ‘ Vansan asoh-in , van anim’e , kho phalou ding ahi , ’ natiuve . Vandang gongso bon nasuhto theiyu leh phat kiheichin melchihna ho nasuhto thei louuham ?
40016004	Agilou le Pathen helou khang miten melchihna ahol ‘ un , Jonah melchihna tilou adang kipe louhel ding ahi , ” ati . Chuin amaho dalhan achemangtai .
40016005	Dil gal lang khat akaidoh-un Seijuiten changlhah anapo haitauve .
40016006	Jesun ajah-uva , “ Chang theiyun ; Pharisee ho le Sadducee ho chol phalou lah a kihong phauvin , ” ati .
40016007	Seijuite akihou lhiuvin , “ Changlhah ihai jeh-uva asei hinte , ” akitiuve .
40016008	Aseiyu ahe-lhin jesun ajahuvah , “ Changlhah nanei loujehuva idia kihou khohten nahiuvem-tahsan lhom ho !
40016009	Nahet thei lou mongu ham ? Pasal sang nga lah a changlhah pheng nga nahop’uva chu amoh paipeh ijet nalo doh-uva ,
40016010	chule pasa sang li lah a changlhah pheng sagi nahop’uva chu amoh long kai ijat nalodoh uvam ?
40016011	Najh-uva changlhah thu bon kisei lou iti nahet khen thei louvuham ? Pharisee ho le Sadducee ho gu phalou lah a kichih thie dia kaseipeh nahibouvui , ” ati .
40016012	Hichun changlhah lah a kisoji chol asei hilouva , Pharisee ho le Sadducee ho thuhil gu phalou lah a kichih thei dia asei joh ahi Seijuiten ahedoh tauve .
40016013	Jesu chu Caesarea Philippi gamkol ageiyin , “ Mihem Chapa hi mihon koi ahisah-um ? ” tin asei juite adonge .
40016014	Amahon , “ Mi kim khat’in John Baptist ahisah-un , adangin ma Jeremiah ahiloule Themgao dang khat hiei din aseiyui , ” atiuve .
40016015	Amahon jah a , “ Nang hon koiba neihisah-uvam ? ” tin adonge .
40016016	Simon Peterin , “ Pathen hing jing Chapa , Messiah chu nahi ! ” tin adonbut’e .
40016017	Jesun adonbut’in , “ John chapa Simon nanun nom’e ! Hiche thudih hi tahsa mihema kon ahipon , vana um ka-Pan naphondohsah ahibouve !
40016018	Hijeh a hi kaseipeh nahi Peter : nangma songpi nahin , hiche songpi inbul’a hi ka-Houbung kasah doh a , mithi kul kotpin jong anan joulou ding ahi .
40016019	Keiman van a Lenggam kot-heh kapeh ding , leiset’a nakha chan van’a jong kikhah ding , leiset’a nahon chan van a jong kihong ding ahi , ” ati .
40016020	Chujouvin Jesun ama Messiah ahi chu mikoma aseidoh louna diuvin aseijuite akham chah kheh-in ahi .
40016021	Hichea pat hin Jesun aseijuite jah a kichentah-in aseiyin , “ Jerusalem a kachetei ding , upate le Thempu pipu ho chule Danthu them hon eibol gentheiyuva , eitha diu , hijongle nithum lhin nia Pathenin eikaithou ding ahi , ” ati .
40016022	Hichun Peterin achangseh-in apuidoh-in , akihan lhon , “ Pathen lungset’a hitobang hi nachunga chulou hel ding ahi Pakai ! ” tin aseiye .
40016023	Hitah chun Jesu akiheiyin Peter jah a , “ Kinung che jengin Satan ! Neikipalsah lo ding ahi , Pathen deibanga lung gel louvin mihem deilam joh nagel’e , ” ati .
40016024	Hichea hin Jesun aseijuite jah a , “ Koi hi le eijui nom chu ama ki-ngaitom a , athingpel kiput’a eijui ding ahi .
40016025	Ijeh-inem itile kihinso nom chun athiloa , amavang Keima jal’a thi loa chun hinna anei ding ahi .
40016026	Ajeh chu min vannoi leiset pumpi nei jongle ahinkho akisuh mang teng ipi phat chompi tem ? Ahiloule min ahinkho lhenga ipi apeh ding ham ?
40016027	Ijeh-inem itile Mihem Chapa chu a-Pa loupinaa a-Vantilte toh hung ding , mitin atoh dungjui cheh tohman apeh ding ahi !
40016028	Tahbeh a kaseipeh nahiuve , hikoma ding ho lah a mi phabep hi Mihem Chapa leng loupia ahung amu masang seuva thina tep kha lou ding aum’uve , ” ati .
40017001	Nigup jouvin Jesun Peter le Jacob chule Jacob naopa John toh apuiyin amaho seh molchunga akal toupi .
40017002	Amaho thum angsunga Jesu vou akikheltan , amai nisah vah bangin avah-in , avon jouse jong avah emsel jenge .
