40017003	Mose le Elijah Jesu henga ahung kilah lhonin akihou lim’uve .
40017004	Hichea hin Peterin Jesu agah houvin , “ Pakai , hikoma i-umu anom lheh jenge , pha nasah le nang ding khat , Mose ding khat chule Elijah ding khat-lhumbuh thum song inge , ” ati .
40017005	Pater thusei pettah hin meibang lhang khat’in amaho chu alekhun , meibang lah a konin ogin khat hin , “ Hiche hi ka-Chapa deitah ahi , achunga kalung alhai ta-ngeiye , athu ngaiyun , ” ati .
40017006	Ogin ajah phat’un seijuiho akicha behseh jengun , tol’a mai asulut gamtauve .
40017007	Jesu ahungin agah thamin “ Dah doh-un , kicha hih-un ! ” ati .
40017008	Agah dadoh phat’un Jesu changseh bou aumin koima dang amupouve .
40017009	Molchunga kona ahung kumsuh phat’un Jesun amaho hi ahilchah masan , “ Mihem Chapa thinaa kona kaithouva aum masangsen nathilmuu hi koima seipeh hih hel’un , ” ati .
40017010	Hichun seijuiten , “ I-bol’a ba Danthu them hon Elija hung masa tei dia aseiyu ham ? ” atiuve .
40017011	Jesun , “ Elijah chu hung masa ahinai , aman thil ijakai agontoh masah ding ahi .
40017012	Kaseipeh nahiuvee , Elijah ahung tan , mihon ahettoh loujeh-un anop aningin aboltauve . Mihem Chapa jong chutobangma abol tei diu ahi , ” ati .
40017013	John Baptist thudol aseipeh-u ahi seijuiten ahedohtauve .
40017014	Mipi lah ahung geiphat’un pasal kha tJesu masanga ahung boh khup’in ,
40017015	“ Kapu , kachapa lung set’in ! Abuh thi ahin , abang le meilhum sung’ah , abang kom le twilah a aleh lut jin , athoh gim behseh tai .
40017016	Naseijuite henga kahin pui vangin aboldam theipouve , ” tin ataove .
40017017	Jesun , “ Vo tahsan bei khang lamvai mite ! Itih chan ka-umpia kakho ngaiding nahiuvem ? Chapang pa chu hinpuiyun ! ” ati .
40017018	Lhagaoboh chu Jesun haphoa apho leh , hichepet tah chun chapang a konin ahung potdoh paiyin chapang pa adamtai .
40017019	Seijuite guh thim chan Jesu henga ahungun , “ I-ati leh keihon kanodoh jou louvu ham ? ” tin adongui .
40017020	Jesun , “ Natahsan lhom je-u ahi , tahbeh a kaseipeh nahiuve , tah sanna ankam mu te neijong leu chun hiche molsang jah a hin , ‘ Hikoma konin khukoma kichonin , ’ tijongleu chun kichon jeng ding ahin , imacha bolmo nanei lou diu ahi .
40017021	( hitobnag hi an ngol’a taona beiyin asoh doh theipoi , ) ” ati .
40017022	Seijui chengse le Jesu Galilee gamsunga akilhon khom pet’un Jesun ajah-uva , “ Mihem Chapa hi mite khut’a kipedoh ding ahin ,
40017023	amahon atha diu , amavang nithum lhin ni le kikaithou kit ding ahi , ” ati . Seijuite alung kham lheh jengui .
40017024	Jesu le aseijuite Capernaum a ahungu leh Houin kaidong ho ahungun Peter jah a , “ Nahouhil pau hin Houin kai apehji lou ham ? ” tin adongui .
40017025	Peterin , “ Apeji nai , ” ati . Peter insung agalut leh Jesun ahin hou masan , “ Simon iti nagel’em ? Leiset lengte hin kai hihen sumlam man hijongle koi lah a don jiuvem ? Gamsung mite lah a adon’um ? ” tin anadonge .
40017026	Peterin , “ Gamchom mite lah a , ” ati . Jesun , “ Achutile gamsung mite ongthol’a hita chula .
40017027	Hijongle kaidong ho lung himo louna din Twikhanglen achen nga gakoi le chun , nakoi doh masah pen chu akamsung kel le chun itokham bep sum namu ding ahin , hichu choiyin gapetan , ” ati .
40018001	Hichepet hin seijuite Jesu henga ahungun , “ Van a lenggama lenpen chu koi ham ? ” tin adongui .
40018002	Jesun chapang khat akoulut’in , alai lunguva adinsah-in ,
40018003	“ Dihtah a kaseipeh nahiuve , nakikhel hel’uva chapang ho toh nabah louvu leh van a Lenggama lut pouvin nate .
40018004	Hiche chapang te bep a kigel’a kineosah a ki-ngaitom chan chu van a Lenggama alen a pang ding ahi .
40018005	Chule kamin a hitobnag chapang khohsah chun Keima eisan ahi .
40018006	“ Koi hile aneocha hokhat tansan sudoiya chu angonga sumhei song lentah kikhai hen Twikhanglen akileh lut le ama din aphajoi .
40018007	Ohe vannoi mite nadau ahi ! Ajeh chu mihemte tansan suhoi thei thil tampi aum’e . Kipalna chu hung umtei ding van gahin , hichea kipal lhuhna bol’a chu ada na-e !
40018008	“ Nakhut ham nakeng hamin natahsan asuh doi leh tan bong in paimang jengin . Khut le keng kim a tonsot mitmo meidil’a nakile lut sangin khut lang le keng lang beiya hin naa lut ding aphajoi .
40018009	Namit’in nakipalsah jong lekaldoh in pai mangin ! Mit ni neiya damun meidil’a nakile lut sangin mit lang chon hin naa lut le chun aphajoi .
40018010	“ Hiche aneocha ho khat nahsahmoa nabol louna diuvin vhing theiyun ; kaseipeh nahiuve , van a um avantilteuvin ka-Pa mai amu jingui .
40018011	( Ijeh-inam itile Mihem Chapa chu amangsa huhing dia ahi . )
40018012	“ Iti nagel’um ? Mi khat’in kelngoi ja khat neihen , khat pen pen che mang taleh , somko le ko chu molvuma dalha a che mang khatseh chu aahol lou ding ham ?
40018013	Kaseipeh nahiuve , agamudoh teng ache mang lou somko le ko sangin amukit khatseh chunga akipah joi .
40018014	Hiche bangchun hiche aneocha ho khat man ding hi van a um naPau lungdei ahipoi .
40018015	“ Nasopi nachunga achonset tah leh , chen lang achangseh a aumpet’in athemmona gaphoh-in . Napho angai leh sopi neikit nahitan ;
40018016	angai lou vang leh , Pathen lekhabua , ‘ Mi ni le thum hettohsah a kichai thei ding , ’ kiti dungjuiyin michom khat le ni puiyin chen .
40018017	napuiho thu geiya angai loule Houbung henga thulhut’in . Houbung thu geiya angai lou vang leh chidang namdang le kaidong ho bolna bangin bol tan .
40018018	“ Dihtah akaseipeh nahiuve , ipi hijongle leiset’a nakhau chu van a jong kikhah ding , leiset’a nahon’u chu van a jong kihong ding ahi .
40018019	“ Kaseipeh kit nahiuve , leiset’a mini lung kitoh tah a nataovu leh van a um ka-Pan nabolpeh tei diu ahi .
40018020	Ajeh chu hoikom hileh kamin a ni le thum nakikhopna chan’uva ka-umpi jingui , ” ati .
40018021	Peter Jesu henga ahungin , “ Pakai , kasopi kachunga chonse se jeng tahleh ijat vei ka-ngaidam ding ham ? Sagi vei gei ham ? ” tin adonge .
40018022	Jesun adonbut’in , “ Ken , ‘ Sagi vei gei ’ katipoi , sagi mun som sagi geiyin katibouve .
40018023	Ijeh-inem itile van aLenggam chu asohte sum chin suhto ding goa lengpa to tekah thei ahi .
40018024	Sum asuto pantan , talent sangsom bat soh khat ahinkai lut’un ,
40018025	soh pan sum sahna ding aneilou hel phat’in ama jong ajinu le achate , anei jouse jong joh a abat sah doh sah tei din apupan thu alhuhsah tai .
40018026	Chutah chunsohpa jong akoma aboh khup’in adilsun , ‘ Nei ngah ta din abonchan sadoh kit nange , ’ tin ataotai .
40018027	Chuphat’in apupan sohpa chu alungsen abat jouse angaidamin , alhadoh tai .
40018028	“ Hiche sohpa hi apotdoh doh-in asoh chanpi ama denarii ja khat bat’a chu atoh khan , atuh chah denin , alol ameh peh-in , Nabat chu neipen , ’ tin anotai .
40018029	Asoh chanpi pa jong boh khup’in adil sun , ‘ Nei ngah ta din sadoh kit nange , ’ tin ataove .
40018030	Ahivangin aman anop peh pon , abat chengse asahdoh kahsea din songkul’a agakhumtai .
40018031	Aumchan hi soh dang hon amu phat’un alung himo lheh jengun , athilsoh ho chu apu pau aseipeh tauve .
40018032	Apupan hiche sohpa chu akoulut’in ajah a , ‘ Soh gilou , kahenga natao tao jeh a nabat chengse kamoh ngaidam nahita me !
40018033	Ken kalai natpi banga nang in jong nasoh chanpi chu nalai natpi ding hilo ham ? ’ tin aphoh tai .
40018034	Hiti hin apupa alung hang jah-in abat chengse asahdoh kahsea din mi bol genthei ho khut’a apedoh tai .
40018035	“ Nang hon jong lung giltah a nasopi na-ngaidam louvu leh van a um ka-Pan hitobanga chu nabol diu ahi , ” tin Jesun aseiye .
40019001	Jesun thu hicheng asei jouvin Galille gam dalhan Jordan luigal Judea gamsung alhungtai .
40019002	Mi tamtah-in ajuiyun , hikoma chun Aman ana jouse aboldamtai .
40019003	Pharisee mi phabep ahungun apatep nan thu khat adongun , “ I-lou them a min ji ada jeng ding hi Dan ngai hinam ? ” atiuve .
40019004	Jesun adonbut’in , “ Hiche thua hi ‘ Semtil’a pat Asempan pasal le numeiya asemsa ahi , ’ kiti Pathen lekhabu nasim khah louvu ham ?
40019005	Chule “ Hijeh a hi min anu le apa dalha a ajito kigom ding ahin , amani tikhat hilhon ding ahi , ’ kiti ahi .
40019006	Hichea hi amani pum ni hita louva pumkhat hilhon ding ahi . Hijeh chun Pathen gopsa chu mihemin sukhen hih hen , ” ati .
40019007	Pharisee hon , “ Ahile i-bol’a Mose’n , ‘ Min ajinu ada leh da na lekha pehen sol hen . ’ atiham ? ” atiuve .
40019008	Jesun adonbut’in , “ Nalungtah jeh-uva Mose’n jida ding naphal peh-u ahibouve , semtil’a chuti ahipoi .
40019009	Kaseipeh nahiuve , mito ajon jeh tilouva aji daa numei dang kichenpi chan chu mito jong ahi bouve , ” ati .
40019010	Jesu seijuiten ajah a , “ Pasal le ajinu chung changa chuti ahi vang leh jinei da phajoi , ” atiuve .
40019011	Jesun adonbut’in , “ Mi jouse jop thei ahipoi , Pathenin chuti dia agon hon bou ajop theiye .
40019012	Ajeh chu apen a thaidepsa peng aumin , mihem semthua nukiso loi aumin , chule van a Lenggam jal’a ama kibol aumin , koi hile ajop thei dol’in jop hen , ” ati .
40019013	Achunga khut ngap’a taopeh din mihon chapang phabep Jesu henga ahin puiyui . Chapang hinpui ho chu seijuiten haphon anaphoh ui .
40019014	Hinla Jesun , “ Chapang ho chu kahenga hinsol’un jada hih-un , ijeh-inem itile van a Lenggamchu amaho tobangte bou chang diu ahi , ” ati .
40019015	Jesun chapang ho chunga khut angamin apotdoh tai .
40019016	Veuvin pasal khat Jesu henga ahungin , “ Houhil tonsot hin na kanei theina dia thilpha itobang kabol ngaiyam ? ” tin adonge .
40019017	jesun , “ Itobnag thilpha nei doh ham ? Apha Khatseh bou aum’e ! Tonsot’a nahin nom le Thupeh chengse nit’in , ” ati .
40019018	Aman Jesu jah a , “ Hoipen chu am ? ” ati . jesun adonbut’in , “ tol that hihin , mito jong hih-in , gucha hih-in jouvin hettohsah dan ,
40019019	nanu napa jabol’in , chule nang naki-ngailut bangin naheng nakom ngailun , ” ati .
40019020	Khangdongpan adonbut’in , “ Hichengse chu kahin nit jing nai , ipi kabol lou um nalaiyam ? ” tin adonge .
40019021	Jesun ajah-ah , “ Chamkimsoh ding nadeileh chen lang nanei jouse gajoh-in , sum chu vaicha gentheite to nan neiyin , chutileh van a gou nanei ding ahi ; chujo tneg neihin juitan , ” ati .
40019022	Khangdongpan athusei ajah phat’in , gou haotah ahijeh-in lung himo tah-in ache mangtai .
40019023	hijeh chun Jesun aseijuite jah a seiyin , “ Tahbeh a kaseipeh nahiuve , mihoa dia van a Lenggam alut hah sa lheh ding ahi .
40019024	Kaseipeh kit nahiuve , mihao Pathen Lenggam a lut sangin heobil hom a sa-ngongsao lut ding abaijoi , ” ati .
40019025	Seujuiten athu chu adatmo behseh jengun , “ Achutile koi huhhinga umjou ding hitam ! ” atiuve .
40019026	Jesun avechang mel’in ajahuvah , “ Mihem bol dia vang hithei louhel ahin , Pathen din ijakai ahithei doh keiye , ” ati .
40019027	Peter apotdoh-in , “ Ven , keihon ima jouse dalhan nanung kahin juiyun , achutile keiho i-kati diu ham ? ” tin adonge .
40019028	Jesun ajah-uva , “ Dahtah a kaseipeh nahiuve , ahug lhung khangthah a chu Mihem Chapa loupitah aLaltouna atou teng , nang ho kanung jui chengse laltouna som le nia touva , Israel phung som le ni thu natan diu ahi .
40019029	hitia chu koi hijongle kamin jal ‘ a in le lou , sopi ule nao , nu le pa , cha le nao chule gam leiset geiya dalha jousen ajat ja khat cheng amubea , tonsot hin na aneitei ding ahi .
40019030	Amavang amasa tamtah nkhah ding , anukhah tamtah masa ding ahi .
40020001	“ Van a Lenggam chu mihao khat jingpi tah a kondoh a alengpi leiya natong dia tha hol’a chepa tobang ahi .
40020002	Thahol pa chu natong ding ho to , nikhat tohman Denarii khat din akinop touvin , alengpi leiya natong din asoltai .
40020003	Vai nunga apotdoh kit leh kailhang dunga mohseh a ding ho amun ,
40020004	‘ Nang ho jong lengpi leiya kon’uvin natoh man diuva kilombep pe nang’e tin asol kit’e .
40020005	Amaho akontauve . Sunkim don le nilhangkai donin jong apotdoh kit leuvin hito bangma chun agabol kit’in ahi .
40020006	Vaiche kontah a jong apotdoh leh midang hitobanga ding ho agamudoh kit’in , amaho jah a jong , I-bol’a nilhum keiya hikoma mohjeh seh a ding nahiuvem ? ’ atileh ;
40020007	amahon , ‘ Koima eigoi diu um louva , ’ atiuve . Hiche ho jah a jong , ‘ Nang ho jong lengpi leiya kon’uvin , ’ ati .
40020008	“ Nilhah phat’in lengpi lei nei pan natoh vaibolpa jah a , ‘ Natong ho koukhomin , akon nukhah pen a pat akon masa pen geiyin atoh man’u petan , ’ ati .
40020009	Vaiche phat’a kon ho ahungun Denarii khat cheh akisantauve .
40020010	Akon masa pen hon asan tam tei diu gingcha ahunguleh , amahon jong Denarii khat cheh akisan bouvui .
40020011	Akilah vangun mihaopa chunga aphun cheh-un ,
40020012	“ Keihon sun nilhum keiya na kitonga nisa hah lai kithoh lhum keiya , hiche nidan khat seh tongho toh kibangin tohman neipeuve , ” tin aseiyui .
40020013	“ Mihaopan adonbut’in alah-uva mi khat jah a , ‘ Golpa , ken adih lou kabolpoi , Denarii khat bou lo dinga ikinopto lhon hilouham ?
40020014	Natohman kilah-in chetan . Akon nukhah pen pa jong nang kapeh jat jat kapeh nom ahin ,
40020015	kanei chu kadei dei ya kabol thei lou ding ham ? Kaphat jeh a hi neimit thip ngap hitam ? ’ ati .
40020016	“ Hitobanga chu amasa tamtah nukhah ding , anukhah tamtah masa ding ahi , ” ati .
40020017	Jesun Jerusalem ajonin lampi dunga seijuite chu achomin apuidoh-in achepum pum’un ajah-uva ,
40020018	“ Veuvin , Jerusalema icheuvin , hikoma chu hihon Mihem Chapa hi Thempu pipu ho le Danthu them ho apeh doh diu , amahon tha ding pha asah-uva ,
40020019	kichepna anei diu , ajep’uva thingpel’a khetbeh dia chi dang namdangt eapeh doh diu ahin , hijongle nithum nia ama kaithouva umtei ding ahi , ” ati .
40020020	Zebedee chapate ni anun apuiyin Jesu henga aboh khup’in ngeh khat neiyin ataove .
40020021	Jesun , “ Ipi nadeiyem ? ” tin adonge . Amannun , “ Leng nahi tneg hiche kachapate ni najet naveiya tou sah idn teppeh-in , ” ati .
40020022	Jesun , “ Nathumu hi nahet louvu ahi . Nangin kadon ding khon a hi nadon ngam lhon idng hinam ? ” ati . Amanin , “ Ka-ngam’e ” ati lhon’e .
40020023	Jesun kakhon a hi nadon tei lhon ding vang ahinan , hijongle kajet kaveiya tousah ding vang hi Kei peh thei ahipoi ; hiche touna hi ka-Pan gonsa akoipeh miho tou ding ahibouve , ” ati .
40020024	Seijui somni hichu ajah doh phat’un ucha te ni chugna alung himotauve .
40020025	Ahivangin Jesun amaho akouvin , “ Chidang namdangte lah a vaipoten amite chunga thu aneiyuva , alamkaiteuvin atha neinau ajedoh jing naheuve .
40020026	Nang ho lah avang chuti lou ding ahi , koi hileh nalah-uva alenpen hinom chu nalha chauva panga ,
40020027	achungnung pen hinom chu nasohuva pang ding ahi .
40020028	Hitobanga chu Mihem Chapa jeng jong jen dinga hung ahipon , ajen ding le mitamtah lhatdamna a ahinkho toh doh dia hung ahibouve , ” ati .
40020029	Jesu le aseijuiten Jericho khopi agah dalhah-u leh mi tamtah in ajuiye .
40020030	Mitcho ni lampama anatouvin , Jesun ahin hopa chu aja lhonin , “ Vo David Chapa kapu , neilungset’in , ” tin asam lhon’e .
40020031	Amani chu mipin pho thip din agouve . Amanin la ahasap cheh kit lhonin , “ David Chapa neilungset’in ! ” ati kit lhon’e .
40020032	Jesu adingin amani chu agah kouvin , “ Ipi eibolpeh-in nati lhon ham ? ” ati .
40020033	Amanin , “ Kho neimusah lhonin kapu ! ” atilhone .
40020034	Jesun alainat pin , amit lhon akhoipeh leh , kho amu thei pai jeng lhonin , Jesu nung ajui lhontai .
40021001	Jesu le aseijuiten Jerusalem anai lam tauvin , Olive lhanga Bethphage kho ahung geitauve . Hichea hin Jesun seijui ni asol masan ,
40021002	“ Namasang khoa khun lut lhon le chun sa-ngan khat anouto kihen tha mupai lhonin nate ; hinsut’in hinkai lhonin .
40021003	Mi khat touvin i-khat asei leh , ‘ Aneipan angaichat ahi , ’ ti lhon le chun , aman hinlhah peh lhontannate , ” ati .
40021004	Hiche hi Themgao kama kiseisa :
40021005	“ Zion khopi seipeh-un , Ven , na-Lengpan na hinjon’e ! Lung nengtah-in sa-ngan chunga atouvin , Sa-ngan nou chunga atouve , ” kiti chu guilhung ahitai .
40021006	Seijuite ni achen , Jesun ahil bang bangin agabol lhon’e .
40021007	Sangan le anou ahinkai lhonin , achunga pon aphauvin Jesu atouve .
40021008	Mitamtah-in lampi dunga pon aphauvin , abangin theoboh alham’un , lam dunga aphauve .
40021009	Jesu nung le maa kijot mipin , “ Pakai min a hung pa anun nom’e ! David Chapan huhing hen ! ” atiuve .
40021010	Jesu Jerusalem khopi sung alut phat’in , “ Hiche Pa hi hoi , koi hitam ! ” atiuvin , khopi sung akiloh soh jengui .
40021011	Japin , “ Galilee gam Nazareth khoa hung kon Themgao Jesu ahi , ” atiuve .
40021012	Jesu Houin a alut’in , asunga thiljoh ho leh thil cho ho anodoh soh keiyin , sum lheng ho dokhang jouse alekhup peh-in , vapal joh ho touna jong alekhup peh soh keiye .
40021013	Chule miho jah a aseiyin , “ Ka-in chu taona in kiti ding ahi , tia kisun ahin , nang hon michom ho gebuhin nasemtauve , ” ati .
40021014	Jesu Houin a aumpet chun mitcho ho le elbai ho ahenga ahungun , Aman abonchan aboldam soh keiye .
40021015	Thempu pipu ho le Danthu them hon thil kidang aboldoh chengse chu amu’vin , chule Houin sunga chapang hon kho asap’uva , “ David Chapan huhing hen ” atiu chu ajah phat’un alung hangun ,
40021016	Jesu jah a , “ Hite ho hin ipi aseiyu najah nah em ? ” atiuve . Jesun , “ Kaja nai , ‘ Naosen ho le noi chep lai ho kamsunga konin vahchoina nachamkimsah tai , ’ kiti Pathen lekhabu chu nasim khah louhel’u ham ? ” ati .
40021017	Jesun mipi adalhan , khopia konin apotdoh-in Bethany kho ajonin , aga jan geh tai .
40021018	Jingkah a Jesun khopi lam ahinjot leh agilkel pantai .
40021019	Hichun lampam a theichang phung khat amun , agavet leh ana tilou aga amupoi . Hijeh chun theichang phung jah a , “ Imatih chanin ga kit hih beh-in , ” tia agaosap leh , hichepet tah chun agop jenge .
40021020	Seijuiten amudoh phat’un kidang asa behseh jengun , “ I-atileh theichang phung gop jeng hintem ? ” atiuve .
40021021	Jesun ajah-uva , “ Dih tah a kaseipeh nahiuve , lung opkai louhel’a natahsanu leh theichang phung kibolna tobang keo hilouva hiche molsang jah a khun , ‘ Kichon doh-in lang Twikhanglen a kileh lut tan , ’ tijongleu chun hithei jeng ding ahi .
40021022	Hitia chu tahsan tah a nathum chan namu jeng diu ahi , ” ati .
40021023	Jesu Houin a alut’a thu ahil pet’in Thempu pipu ho le upate ahungun , “ Ipi tha neina a hiti ho hi nabol’a , hiche thuneina hi koipenin napeh ham ? ” tin adongui .
40021024	Jesun adonbut’in , “ Kenjong thu khat dong ung ting naseidoh theiyu leh ipi tha neina kaneiye hiti ho hi kabol seipeh nau ivnge .
40021025	John baptize bolji pa hin bol theina van a kon alah ha mihem a kona alah ham ? ” ati . Chuphat’in amaho le amaho akinel’un , ‘ Van a kon ahi , ’ tileu hen la , ‘ Achutile i-bol’a natahsan dau am ? ’ tin tin !
40021026	‘ Mihem a kon ahi , ’ ti ding la japi kichat aumin , ajeh chu mi jousen John chu Themgaova agel cheh ahi , ” atiuve .
40021027	Hijeh chun Jesu jah a , “ Kahepoi , ” atitauve . Jesun ajah-uvah , “ Kahepoi , ” atitauve . Jesun ajah-uvah , “ Kenjong ipi thaneina jeh a hiche ho kabol sei peh deh pou vinge .
40021028	“ Iti nagel’um ? Pasal khat’in chapa ni aneiyin , apeng masa pa jah a , ‘ Chapa , tunin lengpi leiya konin lang na gatongin , ’ ati .
40021029	Achapan , ‘ Kon ponge , ’ ati . Ahinla chom khat jouvin lung aheiyin akontai .
40021030	Mipa chu achapa khat joh henga achen hitobangma a chu agaseileh , ‘ Kon nange hepa , ’ atin , konla akonpoi .
40021031	Amani koi joh hin apa dei abol ham ? ” ati . Amahon , “ Apeng masapan , ” atiuve . Jesun ajah-uvah , “ Tahbeh a kaseipeh nahiuve . nang ho sangin kaidong ho le noti ho Pathen Lenggama alutmasajo tauve .
40021032	Ijeh-inem itile John chun adih a hinje lampi nahil’u ahitan , natahsan pouve ; hichea hin kaidong ho le noti hon anatahsan’ui . Ama namutah vangun lungheiyin natahsan deh pouve .
40021033	“ Thulem khat ngai kit’uvin : mihaotah khat’in lengpi lei khat abol’in , akimvel’a tho akaiyin , lengpiga chilna leiko alaiyin , loubuh asan , kemsang adoi . Chuin lengpilei chu aleibol ho ngansen kholgama achetai .
40021034	Theiga lo phat’in lengpiga po din aleibol ho ngansen kholgama achetai .
40021035	Lengpilei bol hon asoh te chu aman’un abang avouvin , abang athat’un chule abnag songin asep’ui .
40021036	Chuin asol masah sohte sanga tamjo asol kit vangin , amahon abol ngai bang bangin anabol’ui .
40021037	Akhon na keiyin , ‘ Kachapa beh jabol teiyunte , ’ tin lengpilei bol ho henga achapa asoltai .
40021038	Ahinla lengpilei bol hon achapa amudoh phat’un , ‘ Hichepa hi agoulo dingpa ahi , ’ that’u hitin agou eiho changute , ’ akitiuvin ,
40021039	aman’un lengpilei polama akaidoh-un athat tauve .
40021040	“ Lengpilei neipa chu ahung teng aleibel ho chu i-lotan tem ? ” ati .
40021041	Amahon , “ lengpilei neipan hiche migilou ho chu engbol’in tin asuhgam ding , lengpilei chu aphat cha aga pethei lengpilei bol thei dang khat petante , ” atiuve .
40021042	Jesun ajah-uva , ” Pathen lakhabua : ‘ Insa hon deimoa apaiyu song chu . In-ning songkhom det penin apangtai ! Hiche hi Pakai thilbol ahi , Imit mu’vin thil kidangtah ahi , ’ kiti lai chu nasim khah louvu ham ?
40021043	“ Hijeh a chu kaseipeh nahiuve , Pathen Lenggam chu nakilah peh-uva apunbe sah thei nam mite kipedoh ding ahitai .
40021044	Koi hile hiche song chunga kitat kha chan chu kisep chip jeng ding ahin , alhah khah pen pen jong atagep jeng idng ahi , ” ati .
40021045	Thempu pipu ho le Pharisee hon Jesu thulem sei ajah phat’un , amaho gotna asei chu ahedoh tauve .
40021046	Ahinla mat dia agot vangun mipi akichauve . Ajeh chu mipin Jesu chu Themgaova angaito cheh u ahi .
40022001	Jesun mipi henga thulemin aseikit’in ,
40022002	“ Van a Lenggam chu achapa dinga jinei golvah bol ding goa lengpa khat tobang ahi .
40022003	Golvahna lha dia ki-ngeh chengse koukhom dia lengpan asohte asol vangin koima ahung pouve .
40022004	Soh dang phabep asol kit’in , ‘ Akikou ho jah a , “ Bongchal ho le gancha thaotah tah kathat’in golvah ankong akigong tupsoh tai , golvahnaa hung lha cheh-un , ” ati gatiuvin , ’ ati .
40022005	Ahinla akikouhon imachan agelpouve , abang louva akonin , abang ma kinchom choma achen ,
40022006	adangin ma asohte chu aman’un , melse tah-in avouvin athat tauve .
40022007	Lengpa alung hang behseh tan , asepaite asol’in mithat ho asugamin , akhopiu ahalvamtai .
40022008	Hichun asohte jah , ‘ Kichen golvah akigong soh tai , ane dia kikouho la ahungpon ,
40022009	cheuvin lan gkhopi kelkot phunga namuphah chanu koi hileh golvah an ne din hinkhom’un , ati .
40022010	Sohte chu lamlen dunga acheuvin , amu phah chan , mise mipha ahinpuiyule kichen golvahna ami adimset tai .
40022011	“ Lengpan akikou jin ho ahung vet leh moupui golvah vonbei khat amudoh-e .
40022012	Ajah a , ‘ Jol , moupui golvah vonbeiya iti hung lut nahim ? ’ ati vangin , ama la athip beh jenge .
40022013	Hichun lengpan lhacha ho jah a , “ Akhut akeng kan’un lang polam muthim lah a paidoh-un , hikoma chu kap le hagel gel’a um ding ahi , ’ ati .
40022014	“ Akikou atam lheh nan lhen doh vang lhomcha ahi , ” ati .
40022015	Pharisee ho apotdoh-un Jesu chu alona je khat het’a kinelpia kipalsah din akihou lhiuve .
40022016	Pharisee hon aseijuiteu phabep le Herodia loi phabep asol thauvin , “ Houhil , nang hi midih nahin , Pathen lampi dih tah nahil’in , mile mi kah a dat naneipoi , chule mihem polam maiput gin nanei lou kaheuve .
40022017	Ahile Caesar henga mikai kipe hi dih hai dih lou ham ? Iti nagel’em ? ” tin adongui .
40022018	Athilse gonu chu Jesun ahen , “ Mipha lhem ho ! Ibol’a kipalsah ding neigot’u ham !
40022019	Mikaiya napeh-u sum chu neivetsah-un ! ” ati .
40022020	Jesun “ Hiche suma hi koi lim le koi min chong-am ? ” ati .
40022021	Amahon , “ Caesar lim le min , ” atiuve . Hijeh chun Jesun “ Ceasar a chu Caesar peuvin , Pathen a chu Pathen petau , ” ati .
40022022	Hiche hi ajah phat’un kidang asa lheh jengun , Jesu dalhan achetauve .
40022023	Hiche ni ma ma chun mithi thokit tahsan lou Sadducee loi Jesu henga ahungun ,
40022024	“ Houhil , ‘ Pasal khat cha neilouva athi leh asopipan ajinu avetpeh a chi akhaipeh ding , ’ tin Mose’n aseiye .
40022025	Kalah-uva sopi pasal sagia peng aum’un , a-upapen ajine leh cha neilouvin athin , ajinu anaopa vet din adalhatai .
40022026	Asopite chu nina pa , thumna pa , aban bain sagina geiyin athisoh hel tauvin ahi .
40022027	Achaina keiyin numei nu jong athitai .
40022028	Hichea hin thokit nil eh numeinu hi koipen ji hitan tem ? Ajeh chu aboncha jia anei cheh-u ahi , ” atiuve .
40022029	Jesun adonbut’in , Pathen lekhabua thu hihen , Pathen thahat hijongle nahet pen’u aum loujeh a nakhel del’u ahitai .
40022030	Ijeh-inem itile thokitnaa chu nu le pa kichen jong umlou , chen jong akichensahlouvu ahitan , van a Vantilte tobang ahitauve .
40022031	Hiti hin mithi thokit thudol ahileh Pathenin naseipeh sau chu nasim khah louvu ham ?
40022032	‘ Keima Abraham Pathen , Isaac Pathen , chule Jacob Pathen kahi , ’ atilou ham ? Pathen chu mithi ho Pathen ahipon , miheng ho Pathen joh ahi , ” ati .
40022033	Mipin hiche hi ajah phat’un athuhil kidang asa behseh jengui .
40022034	Jesun Sadducee ho anel khup del jeng phat’in Pharisee ho akikhom’un ,
40022035	alah-uva Danthu them khat’in apatep nan ,
40022036	“ Houhil Danthu lah a thupeh lenpen hoiche ham ? ” atin adonge .
40022037	Jesun adonbut’in , “ Nangman Pakai na-Pathen chu nalungthim pum pia , nahinkho pumpia chule nahet theina pumpia na-ngailutding , ’ kiti ahi .
40022038	Hiche hi thupeh lenpen leh amasapen ahin ,
40022039	thupeh lenpen nina chu : ‘ Nang naki-ngailutbanga naheng nakom na-ngailut ding , ’ kiti ahi .
40022040	Thupeh hiche te nia hi Danthu pumpi le Themgaote thuhil ki-ngamsoh kei ahi , ” ati .
40022041	Pharisee ho ahung kikhop phat’un Jesun amaho chu adongin ,
40022042	“ Messiah thudol iti nagel’um ? Koi chilhah ham ? ” ati . Amahon , “ David chilhah ahi , ” atiuve
40022043	Jesun “ Iti hinte ahile , Lhagao haikhum jal’in David jengin jong Ama chu , ‘ Pakai , ’ asah-in ;
40022044	‘ Pakai chun ka-Pakai jah a , namelmate nakeng chotpha kakoisoh masangsen Kajet lama tou jingin , ’ atin ;
40022045	David-in Ama chu ‘ Pakai atileh , Messiah chu achilhah a iti pen thei ding ham ? ” ati .
40022046	Jesu thudoh chu koman cheng khat chan jong adonbut thei pon hiche nia pat chun koiman jong ima adong ngam tapouve .
40023001	Jesun mipi le aseijuite jah a ,
40023002	“ Danthu themho le Pharisee ho hi Mose Danthu hilchen a pang ahiuvin ,
40023003	ipi hijongle naseipeh-u nit’un bol jong bol’un , amaho chon bangin vang chondauvin .
40023004	Amahon pohgih hahsa akan’un milengkouva aputsah-uvin , akhut jung jeng chan jong akhoiloh dong agoupouve .
40023005	Abol atoh chanu mi mitmu din bou abol’un ahi . Danthuchih bom akibuu le akibeh chengseu chu apeh aletsah-ui .
40023006	Golvahna le Houthua kikhopna in dunga touna pipen adeiyun ,
40023007	kailhangdunga min salam abol’a , ‘ Rabbi , ’ ati diu bou adeiyui .
40023008	Nang hon vang mi , ‘ Rabbi , ’ kitisah hih-un , ajeh chu Houhil khat bou naneiyun , naboncha sopi cheh nahiuve .
40023009	Leiset chunga koima , ‘ Pa , ’ sah hih-un , van a na-Pau khat bou aum’e .
40023010	Miho , ‘ Lamkai , ’ kitisah dauvin , lamkai khatseh , Messiah chu nanei nauve .
40023011	Nalah-uva alenpen chu nalhachauva pang ding ahi .
40023012	Mi ama kichoi sang chu kisunem ding , ama kineosah chu kichoi sang ding ahi .
40023013	“ Ohe , danthu them ho le Pharisee mipha lhem ho nadau ahi ! Mipha lhem ho ! Miho din van a Lenggam kot nakhah tan’un , nang ho la nalut thei deh pouvin , lut dia kigo ho geiyin nalutsah pouve !
40023014	( Ohe Danthu them ho le Pharisee mipha lhem ho nadau ahi ! Meithai ho in dunga sottah tah nataovun nabahgam jiuve . Hijeh a chu genthei hesoh chungnung nathoh diu ahi . )
40023015	“ Ohe , Danthu them ho le Pharisee mipha lhem ho nadau ahi ! Mi khatseh jong Juda hou housah din Twikhanglen jousea nakitol’un , gamkai jouose nachonsoh-un , nahousah tengule nangho sanga ajat nijen khoh jon Damun jon din nasemdoh jiuve .
40023016	“ Ohe nadau ahi , ‘ Koi hile Houin pan a kihahsel chu ajeh pon , Houin a kikoi sana pan a kihahsel vang ajeh theiye , ’ tia mihil lamkai mitcho ho !
40023017	Mitcho mi-ngol ho ! Houin jeh a sana athenga kisimpi chu hoijoh thupi jom sana ham Houin ham ?
40023018	Chuma leh , ‘ Maicham pan a kihahsel vangin akijeh pon , maicham chunga kitoh thil-ho pat jeh-in je na aum theiye , ’ na tiuve .
40023019	Mitcho ho ! Maicham jeh a a thilto thenga kisimpi chu hoijoh thupijom-maicham ham thilto ham ?
40023020	Ajeh chu maicham pan a kihahsel chanin maicham chunga kitoh thil geiya apat tha a kihalsel ahitai .
40023021	Hitobanga chu Houin pan a kihahsel jong chun Houin sunga Chenga Pathen apat’a kihahsel ahi .
40023022	Chule van pan a kihahsel’an jong Pathen laltouna min le achunga Toupa pan a kihahsel ahi .
40023023	“ Ohe , Danthu them ho le Pharisee mipha lhem ho nadau ahi ! Nang hon pudina le pa-thikhom chule jira-hicheng hi som a khat na toh jiuvin , Danthua thil khoh cheh , adih a thu tan ding , mi hepi ding le tahsan ding hicheng hi don louvin nakoi jiuve . Adang nabol’u chutoh kilhon a hicheng jong hi nabol diu ahi .
40023024	Lamkai mitcho ho ! Nang hon thou vaisi nalhiuvin , sa-ngongsao napum val’ui .
40023025	“ Ohe , Danthu them ho le Pharisee mipha lhem ho nadau ahi ! Khon le lheng polam nasil ngim’un , asunga la phumhat’a nathil lah-u le papsetna adimset’e !
40023026	Pharisee mitcho ho ! Khon chu asung silngim leu chun apolam jong ngim ding ahi !
40023027	“ Ohe , Danthu them ho le Pharisee mipha lhem ho nadau ahi ! Nang ho hi lhan kiloi bang , polam vet dia hoi , asung la mithigu le aboh anen ijakai dimset tobang nahiuve .
40023028	Hitobang hin polam vet din dihtah bangin na-um’un , nasungu vang phat lhemna le chonsetna dimse nahiuve .
40023029	‘ Ohe , Danthu them ho le Pharisee mipha lhem ho nadau ahi ! Nang hon Themgaote lhan nasem’un , midih ho lhan khuh najem jem’un ,
40023030	‘ Kapu kapateu khang laiya hing lileu vang Themgaote atha nauva pang kha pou vinge , ’ tin na seiyui .
40023031	Hitobang hin Themgaote that’a pang ho chihlhah nahi nau nang hon naphongdoh tauve .
40023032	Napu napateu toh ban chu tong molso ngal’un !
40023033	Vo gulse son , gulsete ! Damun a talen namat diu chu iti otdoh theiying natiu ham ?
40023034	Veuvin Themgaote le miching ho chule Danthu them ho kahinsol peh-e , abang nathauva , abang thingpel’a nakhet beh diu , abangma Houthua kikhopna in dunga najep’uva , khotin a nadel le diu ahi .
40023035	Hiche naboljeh-uva hi monabei Abel thisan kisoa pat , muntheng le maicham kah a nathau Berechiah chapa , monabei Zechariah thisan kiso geiya themmona bei miho thisan , tol’a long lha ho jeh a themmona chengse nachunguva chuh lo ding ahi .
40023036	Kichentah a kaseipeh nahiuve , hicheng jeh a themmona chu hiche khang mite chunga chu ding ahi .
40023037	“ O Jerusalem , Jerusalem ! Themgao ho that’a , akisolpeh jouse songa a sep lih-ah ! Ahpin anoute ahuikhom banga ijatvei nachate huikhom ding kagot hitam ! Hinla neinoppeh poi !
40023038	Hijeh a chu na-in kamdel’a kidalhah peh ding nahi !
40023039	Kaseipeh nahiuve , tua pat , ‘ Pakai min a Hungpa anun nom’e , ’ nati masangseuva neimukit lou diu ahitai , ” ati .
40024001	Houin dalha apotdoh chun Jesu henga aseijuite ahungun , Houin kisah loupije vetsah agouve .
40024002	Jesun ajah-uva , “ Ahinai , aloupije hi vesoh keiyun , amavang kaseipeh nahiuve , song khat chunga khat kisethom hung umlou hel ding , kipehsoh kei ding ahi , ” ati .
40024003	Olive molchinga Jesu atoupeh’in guh thim chan aseijute ahungun , “ Hitobang thilse ho chu ith hung lhunga , nahung kit ding phat leh lseiset kichai ding chu ipia kimel chih ding ham ? ” tin adongui .
40024004	Jesun adonbut’in , “ Ching theiyun koima kilhep lhahsah dauvin .
40024005	Mihem tamtah kamin a hunguva , Keima Messiah kahi , ’ atiuva mitampi alhep lhah diu ahi .
40024006	Gal kisat husa le gal kisat thukithang najah tdiu , hi jongle kicha hih-un ; hitobang ho hi soh tei ding , amavang achaina hilou lai ding ahi .
40024007	Gam khat le gam khat kidouva , lenggam khat le lenggam chom khat kisat ding , muntin a kel lhantin , ling kihot ding ahi .
40024008	Hicheng hi naoso nat bang da kipatna ahi nalaiye .
40024009	Min namat’uva midang ho khut’a napeh diu , talen namatsah uva natha diu ahi . Keima jal’a namtinin nahotlo diu ahi .
40024010	Chutah le mi tampi tahsan a pull ha a , khat le khat kipedoh toa kihoto diu ;
40024011	Themgao lhem tampi sohdoh-in tin , mi tamtah alhep lhah diu ahi .
40024012	Chon chatvaina pung cheh cheh-in tin , mi tamtah ngailutna dailha diu ahi .
40024013	Hinla akhon ni geiya thoh lhumkeiya chu huhhinga umtei ding ahinai .
40024014	Chule hiche Lenggam Kipana Thupha hi vannoi pumpia kiseiphonga kihettohsah ding , chu jou tengleh kichai ding ahibouve .
40024015	“ Hichejeh chun mi sumang thet umtah , Daniel Themgao kama kiseisa chu muntheng phunga adin namu tenguleh ! ( asim sim an he hen )
40024016	‘ Judea gama um chengse molsang sanga jam’u hen .
40024017	Inting vuma um jong insunga thilkeo kilah din kumlhah da hen .
40024018	Loukon jong ponsil kilah din kile da hen .
40024019	Ohe , chulai ta a numei agaiya le nao noi chepsah nalai ho chu ada na-e !
40024020	Najam cheh nau phat chu phalpi lai le Choldo nikho ahilouna din taovun !
40024021	Chutengle hesoh genthei chungnung hung um ding , hitobang hi vannoi kisemtil’a pat tulai geiya soh kha louhel lai ahin , hung jong hungsoh kit lou ding ahi .
40024022	Hiche niho chu Pathenin asuhchom lou hileh tahsa mihing khat cha jong soh cha lou ding ahi , hijeh a chu lhenchomte jal’a hiche nikho hi kisuchom ding ahi .
40024023	“ Hichepet hileh min najahuva , ‘ Ven , hiche hi Messiah ahi , ’ ati ham , ahiloule ‘ Hiche hi Ama ahi , ’ ati ham hijongle tahsan hihuvin .
40024024	Ajeh chu Messiah lhem le Themgao lhem tampi hung kisem doh-un tin , ahithei le bon thenchomte geiya pui mangna dia melchihna le thil kidang nasa tah tah ahinbol diu ahi .
40024025	Veuvin , ahung lhun masanga kahil masah dem nahiuve .
40024026	“ Ahilouva , ‘ Veuvin , Messiah gamthip laiya aum’e , ’ atiu jongle chedoh a vet din gel dauvin ; ‘ Veuvin indan sung nunga aum’e ’ tijongleu tahsan hih-un .
40024027	Ajeh chu kolphe nisolama ahung phet leh nilhom lam geiya asalvah banga Mihem Chapa hung kit ding chuti ding ahi .
40024028	“ Hoikom hileh thilong phunga muthong kikhom tei ding ahi .
40024029	“ Thoh genthei hesoh nikho kichaisohtengleh nisa thim a , lha jong vah talou ding , vanlaijol’a kona ahsite pul lhan tin , van a thaneina jouse kihot lingsoh ding ahi .
40024030	Chutah le vanlaijol’a Mihem Chapa melchihna hung kilang ding ahin vannoi leiset phungtin a min dip le lai kidoh’uva , van meilhang lah a Mihem Chapa thanei tah le loupe tah a hung amu dingu ahi .
40024031	Mihem Chapa sumkon gin nasatah ho thoa Avantilte’asol ding , lhenchomte chengse van mong lang khat’a pat among lang khat geiya , kolkimvel ning lia akhop khom diu ahi .
40024032	“ Theichang phung hin thulem kihil’un . Ajih adot’a ana anou teng nipi naidol naheuve .
40024033	Hihe chun hichengse hi namu tengu leh naiya hung ding koncha ahi heuvin .
40024034	Tahbeh a kaseipeh nahiuve , thil hicheng hi aguilhun masangsea hiche khang hi kichai lou ding ahi .
40024035	Van le leiset mang ding ahin , kathusei ho vang mang lou ding ahi .
40024036	“ Hiche Nikho hi Pa tilou van a Vantilte le Chapan jong chule koimachan ahepoi .
40024037	Mihem Chapa hungkit hi Noah nikho lai thilsoh banga hungsoh ding ahi .
40024038	Noah nikho lai twisang let masang , Noah kong alut ni geiyin , mihon aneuvin adon’un , akichengun , chen jong akichensah-ui ;
40024039	twisang lenin achup mang kahseuvin , kho helouvin aum’uve . Mihem Chapa hungkit jong chute ding ahi .
40024040	Chuteng mi ni louva umkhom jong khat kila khat kida lha ding ,
40024041	numei ni sumhei khat’a chang goikhom te ni jong khat kila khat kida lha ding ahi .
40024042	Hijeh chun na-Pakaiyu hung ding nikho nahet loujeh-un kiging phauvin .
40024043	Gucha itih a hung ding inneipan heleh kiging jinga um ding , a-in aphet vangsah lou ding naheuve .
40024044	Hichejeh chun kiging jingin um’un , nakigin loupet tah-uva Mihem Chapa hung ding ahi .
40024045	“ Soh tahsan um le chingtah , a-insung mite aphat cha neh le choh hoppeh dia , insung vaipoa apun anganse chu koi ham ?
40024046	Apu hung teng hitobanga anatoh atokhah soh chu anun nom’e !
40024047	Tahbeh a kaseipeh nahiuve , ama chu apun anei jouse chunga vaipoa akoi ding ahi .
40024048	Soh gilou chun alung gel’in , ‘ Kapu hungvah ponte , ’ tin
40024049	asoh chanpi chengse deng panta hen , anop nop nehen don taleh ,
40024050	hiche sohpa chun agel lou nikho le ahet loupet tah a apu hung ding ,
40024051	asohpa chu tum ni asoa , mipha lhem ho talen amatsah ding , hikoma chu kap le hagel gel’a um ding ahi
40025001	“ Hiche phat hileh van a Lenggam chu athaomeiyu kichoi cheh a ji nei dingpa lamto goah nu-ngah som tobang ding ahi .
40025002	Nu-ngah nga chu lungthimbei ahiuvin , nga chu lungthim pha ahiuve .
40025003	Lungthimbei hon thaomei aken vangun thaotwi akeng pouve ;
40025004	lungthim pha hon vang athaomeiyuva det kham thaotwiya akenthauve .
40025005	Ji nei dingpa ahung geibehseh phat’in nu-ngah ho alu lhu’uvin , a-ihmusoh tauve .
40025006	“ Jan khangkim laiyin ji nei dingpa ahungtai ! Hungun galam touvin ” akiti .
40025007	Chutah-in nu-ngah ho athouvun thaomei akigot tauve .
40025008	Hichun lungthimbei hon lungthim pha ho jah a , ‘ Kathaomeiyu thaotwi aumtapoi , thaotwi them khat beh neipeuvin , ’ tin athum tauve .
40025009	Ahinla lungthim pha hon adonbut’un , ‘ Igom’uva din lhing ponte , chusangin cheuvin lang ajoh ho koma gakichoh vah tauvin , ’ atiuve .
40025010	Lungthimbei ho thaotwi choa ache lan’un ji nei dingpa ahung paiyin , kigingsa um chengsen kichen golvahna mun’ah akijot lut piuvin , kot kikhah tai .
40025011	“ Chom khat jouvin lungthim bei nu-ngah ho ahungun , ‘ Kapu , kapu , kot neihon’un ! ’ tin asamtauve .
40025012	Ji nei dingpan , ‘ Tahbeh a kaseipeh nahiuve , nang ho kahe khapoi , ’ ati tai .
40025013	“ Anikho le anidan tah nahet loujeh-un kigingun .
40025014	“ Hiche phat hileh van a Lenggam chu khol gamla tah chedoh goa , asohte koukhoma , anei jouse asohte ngansepa tobang ding ahi .
40025015	Soh khat chu talent nga apen , khat talent ni apen , khatma chu talent khat apen , athan ajokhop cheh-in ahoppeh-in khol’a achetai .
40025016	Talent nga sangpa akipat’a kiveina aneileh talent nga ma aveikan bei .
40025017	Talent ni sangpa akipat’a kiveina aneileh talent ni ma aveikan bei .
40025018	Talent khat sangpan vang lei alaiyin apupa sum chu asel tai .
40025019	“ Phat sotpi nungin hiche soh ho pupa hi ahung kile kit tan , asohte toh som asutouve .
40025020	Talent nga sangpan talent nga ma ahinchoi ben , ‘ Kapu , talent nga neipen , talent nga ma kavei kan bei , ’ tin apetai .
40025021	Apun , ‘ Tahsan umtah soh pha , nabol pha lheh jenge ! Thil themcha chunga kitah nahin , tampi chunga vai kahomsah ding nahi . Hungin napu kipana a hung kipah-in , ’ ati .
40025022	Talent ni sangpan , ‘ Kapu , talent ni neipen , talent ni ma kaveikan bei , ’ tin apetai .
40025023	Apun , ‘ Tahsan um soh pha , nabol pha lheh jeng ! Nang jong thil themcha chunga kitah nahin , tampi chunga vai kahomsah ding nahi . Hungin napu kipana a hung kipah-in , ’ ati .
40025024	Talent khat sangpa jong ahungin , ‘ Kapu , mi kikhel nahikahen , natuna louva at theiya , nathe na louva jong chomkhom thei nahin ,
40025025	nang kagin jeh-in kachen natalent chu lei noiya kaseltai . Hiche hi nasum ma ma nakilah kit ahi , ’ tin apetai .
40025026	Apun jong , ‘ Vo soh gilou le thase ! Katuna louva ka-atjia kathe na louva kachomkham ji nahet ahiye ong !
40025027	Kasum chu sumkolvei ho koma apung dia nanakoi leh itim ? Chutileh kahung phat’a kasumpi le akan kilah that a ding !
40025028	Hichepa talent chu lahpeh-un lang taleng som neipa chu petauvin ,
40025029	ijeh-inem itile aneiya kipehbea anei letset ding , anei lou vang aneisun jong kilahpeh ding ahi .
40025030	Chule hiche soh phachomlou hi polam muthim lah a gapai mangun , hikoma chu kap le hagel gel’a um ding ahi , ’ ati .
40025031	“ Mihem Chapa aloupinaa Vantilte toh ahung teng leh alaltouna loupe tah a tou ding ,
40025032	namtin vaipi a-angasunga kikhom kimsoh keiya , kelngaoi chingpan keltah lah a kelngoi chengse alhendoh bang , Ama jong miho alhen khen a , achom khen ding ,
40025033	kelngoi chengse ajet lama akhindoh a , keltah chengse aveilama akhindoh ding ahi .
40025034	Chutha le lengpan ajet lama umte jah a , ‘ Hungun ka-Pa phatthei boh change , vannoi kisemtil’a pat nang ho dia gonsa kikoi Lenggam chu hung lo’uvin ,
40025035	ajeh chu kakel pet’in neh ding neipeuvin , kadangchah pet’in don ding neipeuve ; Kakholjin naa nei lhunsah-un ,
40025036	ponbeiya ka-umin jong pon neisilpeh-ui . Kadammon nei hung veuvin , songkul kalut’in jong neihung vil’ui , ’ ati ding ahi .
40025037	“ Chuteng midih hon , ‘ Pakai , itih a nakel pet toh khan eh ding kapeh-uva , chule nadangchah toh kha don ding kapeh khah-uvam ?
40025038	Hoikom nakholjin na kalhunsah khah-uva , itih a ponbeiya naum kamu’va pon kasilpeh khah-u ham ?
40025039	Itih nadammo veiset pet’a kahung vet’uva , itih a nasongkul lutpet kahung vil’uvam ? ’ ati diu ahi .
40025040	Lungpen adonbut’a , ‘ Kichentah a kaseipeh nahiuve , hiche kasopite lah a aneopen khat nabol nau chu kei neibol nau ahi , ’ tinte .
40025041	“ Chuteng aveilama umho jah a , ‘ Gaosap chang ho , kakoma konin potdoh’un lang Satan le avantilte dia gonsa kikoi tonsot mitmo meilhum sunga lut tauvin ,
40025042	ijeh-inem itile kakelpet’in neh ding neipepouvin , kadangchah-in don ding neipepouvin ,
40025043	kakholjin na a neilhunsah dauvin , ponbeiya ka-um jong pon neisilpeh pouve ; kadammo la neihung ve pouvin , songkul kalut’in la neivil pouve , ’ ati ding ahi .
40025044	“ Chutah le amahon donbut’un tin , ‘ Pakai , itih a keihon nagilkel , nadangchah , nakholjin , ponbeiya naum , nadammo chule songkul’a na-um kamu’va don louva kakoi khah-um ? ’ tin sei yunte .
40025045	Lengpan ajah-uva , itobang ijase loupen hijongle hiche ho lah a khat nabol lou nau chu Keima neibol louvu ahi , ’ ati ding ahi .
40025046	Chuteng amaho hi tantih neilou talen man dia cheuva , midih ho vang tonsot hin naalut diu ahi , ” ati .
40026001	Hicheng hi ahilchaisoh phat’in Jesun aseijuite jah a ,
40026002	“ Nahet banguva ni ni jou teng Kalchuh kut hi ding , Mihem Chapa hi thingpel a khetbeh dia min apehdoh ding ahitai , ” ati .
40026003	Hichepet hin Thempu pipu ho le upate Thempulen Caiaphas inpia akikhom’un ,
40026004	Jesu chu doha bol’a mat ding , chule tha theina ding akihou somtauve .
40026005	Ahivangin , “ Kut lai hida le phante , ajo le japi lah a boina um khante , ” atiuve .
40026006	Jesu chu Bethany khoa Simon mipha pa ina aum pet’in ,
40026007	numei khat’in songval hai khat’ah thao namtui manlu tah ahinchoiyin , Jesun ankong aum pet’in aluchanga asun khum’e .
40026008	Athilbol hi seijuiten amu phat’un alung hanguvin , “ I-bol’a thao namtui hi amoh suh mang ham ?
40026009	Sum tampi man a joh a vaicha gentheite peh khamset hi la ahin , ” atiuve .
40026010	Jesun akihou nau ahen ajahuvah , “ Idia numei nu chu nasuh lung gim’u ham ? Aman thilpha tah eibolpeh ahi ,
40026011	ajeh chu mivaicha gentheite chu nakom’uva um jing ding ahin , Keivang nakomu’va um jing ding kahi poi .
40026012	Aman thao namtui eisun khum hi vui ding lima eisem ahitai .
40026013	Tahbeh a kaseipeh nahiuve , hoikom hijongle vannoiya hiche Kipana Thupha kiseiphongna chan a athilbol jong hi amanu het jingna dia kiseitha jing ding ahi , ” ati .
40026014	Seijui som le nil ah a khat Judas Iscariot kitipa chu Thempu pipu ho henga achen ,
40026015	“ Jesu khu matsah leu veng ipi neipe nom’un natem , ” atileh , amahon , dangka somthum apeuve .
40026016	Hichea pat hin Judas-in Jesu matsahna thei phat kitup kom ave-lhi jingtai .
40026017	Cholsolou changlhah kut ni masa nin seijuite Jesu henga ahungun , “ Kalchuh kut an nanehna ding hoikom gago leu veng nadeivem ? ” tin adongui .
40026018	Jesun , “ Khopi sunga lut’uvin pasal khatpen jah a , “ Houhil’in Keidia phat kiteppeh ahung naitai , kaseijuite toh na-in a kalchuh kut an kaneh diu ahi , ’ tin aseiye gatiuvin , ” ati .
40026019	Jesun ahil bangun seijuiten abol’un kalchuh kut an chu agagong tauve .
40026020	Nilhah phat’in Jesun seijui som le nit oh ankong aumtai .
40026021	Aan neh laitah-un aman , “ Tahbeh kaseipeh nahiuve , nalah-uva khat’in mi eimatsah ding ahi , ” ati .
40026022	Seijuite alung dong lheh jengun , khat khat’in , “ Keivang kahilou ahina ong Pakai ? ” atiuve .
40026023	Jesun adonbut’in , “ Lheng sunga changlhah kadekotpi pa tah hin eimatsah ding ahi , .
40026024	Mihem Chapa aumchan ding Pathen lekhabua kisun banga soh tei ding ahin , hinla Mihem Chapa matsahna dia manchah a pangpa chu ohe adana-e ! Ama chu apen a peng lou hileh ama dia phajo ta dinga ! ” ati .
40026025	Jesu pehdoh a matsah dingpa Judas chun adonbut’in , “ Kei neisei ahipoi ong Houhil ? ” ati . Jesun adonbut’in , “ Chutia nasei ahi , ” ati .
40026026	An neh laitah-in Jesun changlhah alan , phatthei aboh jouvin aheh bal bal’in seijuite apen , “ Kilah-un neuvin , hiche hi katahsa ahi , ” ati .
40026027	Chuin khon chu alan , athangvah jouvin seijuite apen , “ Nabonchan donsoh keiyun ;
40026028	hiche hi chonset ngaidamna dia mi tamtah dinga kilhoh lha kathisan ahi .
40026029	Kaseipeh nahiuve , ka-Pa Lenggama nang ho to athah a kadon khom nikho hung lhun kit kahsea lengpiga twi hi kadon kit lou ding ahitai , ” ati .
40026030	Chuin la khat asauvin Olive mol jonin achetauve .
40026031	Jesun aseijuite jah-a , “ Tujan teng kachunga nakisuhmo soh hel diu ahi , ajeh chu , ‘ Kelngoi chingpa kavoh lhuh teng kelngoite cheh soh diu ahi , ’ tin Pathen lekhabua akisun’e .
40026032	Hijongle hinga eikikaithou teng Galilee gama nang ho sangin masajo tange , ” ati .
40026033	Peterin Jesu jah a , “ Midangin nadalhah soh hel jongle kenvang dalha hih hel inge , ” ati .
40026034	Jesun Peter jah a , “ Tahbeh a kaseipeh nahi , tujan ah khon masanga thumvei neiseilep ding ahi , ” ati .
40026035	Peterin ajah a , “ Nangto thitha ding hi jong leng naseilep hih hel inge , ” ati . Seijui dangsen jong chutin asei cheh-ui .
40026036	Jesu le seijuite chu Gathsemani kiti laiya acheuvin , Jesun ajah-uvah , “ Khu koma kachea kaga tao sungsen hikoma hin anatou jingun , ” ati .
40026037	Jesun Peter le Zebedee chapa te ni akipuiyin , chuin lung gim hesoh nasa tah-in ahinphan ,
40026038	ajah-uva , “ Thina khop hel’in kalung hesoh behseh tai , hikoma hin um’un neikiginpi jngun , ” ati .
40026039	Chuin themkhat ache chonin , tol’a mai asulut’in , “ Hepa ! Ahithei leh hiche khon hi Keiya konin tolmangin , hinla Kei dei hilouvin Nang lungdei joh hihen , ” tin ataove .
40026040	Chujouvin seijui thum henga ahung leh ana-ihmut’u atoh khan , Peter jah a , “ Iti nidan khat jeng jong neikiginpi jou louvu ham ?
40026041	Lhepna nalhah louna din kigingin tao jingun , lhagaovin ago nan tahsa lahasam behseh jenge ! ” ati .
40026042	Anivei nan Jesu ache kit’in , “ Hepa ! Hiche khon hi kadon lousea kitol mang thei lou ahileh Nangma lung got got hita hen ! ” tin ataove .
40026043	Ahung kile kit leh , seijuite ihmutsoh behseh a ihmut mildel ahungtoh-e .
40026044	Seijuite dalhan athumvei chan nan agataovin , asei ngai ngai agaseiyin ahi .
40026045	Chuin aseijuite henga ahungin , “ Ihmua kicholdo nalai nahiuvem ? Veuvin phat alhingtan , Mihem Chapa hi mi chonsete khut’a apehdoh diu ahitai .
40026046	Kipat’un chetaute . Veuvin ! Eipedoh pan kakom ahin phatai ! ” ati .
40026047	Jesun thu asei nalaiyin , seijui som le nil ah a Judas chu Thempu pipu ho le , Thempulen ho le upate hinsol , chemjam le moltum thoa hung kon , mipi toh lhonin ahung lhungtai .
40026048	Jesu pedoh a pangpan miho chu melchihna ahilmasah a , “ Kachop pen pen chu Ama ahi , man jengun ! ” ati ahi .
40026049	Judas chun Jesu ajon jangkeiyin , “ Chibai , Houhil ! ” tin achoptai .
40026050	Jesun ajah a , “ Golpa , nahung lo na bol jengin , ” ati . Chutah chun mipin ahindelvuhun Jesu man’un akantauve .
40026051	Jesu to umkhom ho khat’in chem . jam asatdoh-in Thempu pipu soh pa asat jengleh , abilkol lang khat asat lhai .
40026052	Jesun , “ Nachemjam chu apaiya khum jengin , chemjam pan jouse chemjama lou ding ahi .
40026053	Tutah jenga jong ka-Pan Vantilte sang som sagi le sang ni val jen eihinsolpeh dia kathummo a nabol ham ?
40026054	Chutin kibol leh Pathen thu hitobanga thilsoh dia asei chu iti guilhun thei ding ham ? ” ati .
40026055	Hichea hin Jesun mipi jah a , “ Gucha michom man ding banga , chemjam le moltum thoa Kei man dia hungkon nahiuvam ? ” ati . Niseh-in Houin a katouvin mi kahil jin la nei man pouvin , ” ati .
40026056	Hoi hileh Pathen lekhabua Themgaote sutsa jouse guilhunna dinga hicheng hi soh ahi , ” ati . Chutah chun seijuiten adalhauvin ajam mang tauve .
40026057	Jesu man hon Jesu chu Thempu chungnung Caiaphas in a akaiyu leh , hikoma chun Danthu them ho le upate anakikhom’ui .
40026058	Peterin Jesu chu galkangin ahinjuipeh-in , Thenpu chungnung inpi leitol geiyin ahunge ; hichea hin , “ Achaina munge , ” tin alut’in lhacha ho lah a atouve .
40026059	Thempu len chengse le Hou vaipoloi chengsen Jesu tha theina din adou nan jouthu jeng hettohsah ahol’un ,
40026060	mitampin jou thua hettohsah abol vangun athina thei lom khat cha aseidoh pouve . Akhon nan mi nin ,
40026061	“ Hiche Pa hin , ‘ Pathen Houin kaphet lhah a nithum sunga kasahdoh thei ahi , ’ tin aseiye , ” atilhone .
40026062	Thempu Chungnung akipat doh paiyin , “ Nahehset na cheng seu hi nadonbut lou ding ham ? ” tin Jesun adonge .
40026063	Jesu la athip beh jeng . Hichun Thempu chung nungin ajah a , “ Hing jing Pathen min a kahahsel’a kasol nahi , Pathen Chapa Messiah chu nahi nahilou ham-seiyin ? ” tin anoi .
40026064	Jesun adonbut’in , “ Chutia nasei ahi ! Hinla kaseipeh nahi , tua pat Mihem Chapa hi Thaneipen jet’a touva , vanlaijol , meilom lah a hung namu diu ahi , : ati .
40026065	Chutah chun Thempu chungnungin aponsil akibo-eh paiyin , “ Pathen ataitomtai . Hettohsah dang angai tapoi ! Tutaha Pathen ataitom najah cheh tah-u chu me !
40026066	Iti nagel’um ? ” ati . Mihon , “ Athemmoi , thi tei tei ding ahi , ” atiuve .
40026067	Chutah chun mihon Jesu maiya chil asetkhum’un , achum’un , gaovin lang seitemin , koiham na denga chu ? ” tin ahouseuve .
40026068	“ Messiah , gaovin lang seitemin , koiham nadenga chu ? ” tin ahouseuve .
40026069	Peter chu polam leitol’a atouve . Soh nu-ngah khat ahungin , “ Nang jong Galilee mi Jesu to kiloi nahibouve , ” ati .
40026070	Hinla Peterin japi angsunga aseilep’in , “ Ipi nasei ham kahepoi , ” ati .
40026071	Kelkot polam a agapotdoh leh , soh nu-ngah khatman amudoh kit’in chukoma um ho ja a chun , “ Hichepa jong hi Nazareth Jesu toh kivohsa ahi , ” ati .
40026072	Peterin kihahsel to thon aseilep kit’in , “ Hichepa khu kahe khapoi , ” ati kit’e .
40026073	Chom khat jouvin chu koma ding miho ahungun Peter jah a , mong nahibouve , napao dan hin nakiphong doh tai , ” atiuve .
40026074	Hiche phat vang hin Peter jong kigaosap le kihahsel thon , “ Hiche pa him him kahe kha hih hel’e ! ” tia aseilep pet tah-in ah ahung khongtai .
40026075	Hichun , “ Ah khon masanga thumvei neiseilep ding ahi , ” tia Jesun asei chu Peterin ageldoh tan , polama apotdoh loiyin lhase tah-in akaptai .
40027001	Jingpi tah-in Thempulen ho le upate Jesu than a thei ding akihousom tauve .
40027002	Jesu chu thihkhaovin akan’un , akaiyun Rome gam vaipo Pilate apedoh tauve .
40027003	Jesu matsah a pang Judas chun , Jesu tha dia thu kitan ahetdoh phat’in akisih behseh jengin , dangka somthum chu Thempu len ho le upaho alepeh kit’in ,
40027004	“ Themmonabei tha dinga kapehdoh chu kathemmotai ! ” ati . Amahon la , “ Keiho i-kin hiya ong ? Nangin kivet tange , ” atiuve .
40027005	Judas-in sum chu Houin sunga aseplhan , apotdoh paiyin agakikhai lihtai .
40027006	Thempulen hon dangka chujat chu alauvin , “ Hiche sum hi thisan man ahin , Houin sung sumkholnaa koi ngai ahipoi , ” atiuve .
40027007	Akihoutoh phat’un gamdang miho lhan mol din , beldengpa lou mun achoh natauve .
40027008	Hijeh a chu tuni geiya hiche mu khu , “ Thisan mun , ” kiti ahi .
40027009	Hichea hin Jeremiah Themgao seisa , “ Israel miten man tuh a atepsau dangka somthum chu mihon alauvin ,
40027010	Pakaiyin eithupeh bangin beldingpa loumun choh nan anei tauve , ” kiti chu aguilhunge .
40027011	Jesu chu Rome gamvai popa angsunga adinsah tauvin , gamvaipon ajah a , “ Judate lengpa nahim ? ” tin adonge . Jesun , “ Chutia nasei ahi , ” ati .
40027012	Thempulen ho le upaten ahehsetna thudol’a vang imacha adonbut poi .
40027013	Pilate’in Jesu jah a , “ Mihon hijat’a nahehset nau hi najah lou ham ? ” ati .
40027014	Jesun thu cheng khat cha jong adonbut lou phat’in gamvaipopan kidang asa lheh jenge .
40027015	Kalchuh kut sunga hi sohchang koi hileh japi dei pen pen khat Gamvaipon alhadoh peh ji ahi .
40027016	Hichepet hin sohchang minse tah Jesu Barabbas-khat akihen’e .
40027017	Mipi hung kikhop phat’in Pilate’n ajah uvah , “ Jesu Barabbas kalhadoh peh diu ha , Messiah kiti Jesu joh kalhahdoh peh diu ham ? ” tin adonge .
40027018	Ijeh-inem itile Juda lamkaiten thangset suma Jesu apehdohu chu ahet ahi .
40027019	Thutanna muna Pilate atoupet man ajinun thu ahin thot’in , “ Themmona bei hichepa chu limsah hih-in , ama jeh hin tunin kamangin kathoh gim lheh jenge , ” ati .
40027020	Ahin Thempulen ho le upa ten Jesu asuhmanga Barabbas joh alha na din mipi atilseuvin , angeh sah tauve .
40027021	Gamvaipopan mipi adongin , “ Hite ni kah a hoijoh kalhadoh peh ding nadeiyum ? ” ati . Mipin , “ Barabbas ! ” atiuve .
40027022	Pilate’n , “ Ahile Messiah kiti Jesu hi iba kalo ding hitam ? ” ati . Mipin , “ Thingpel’a khenbehtan ! ” tin asamtauve .
40027023	Pilate’n , “ Ipi suhset aneiyam ? ” tin adonge . Miho la a-olheh lheh-in apengun , “ Thingpel’a khenbeh-in ! ” tin asam’ui .
40027024	Athilbol phat chomlou , boina asohjoh amu phat’in Pilate’in twi alan mipi angsunga khut asil’in , “ Hichepa thina chung change mona po ponge , nang hon kivet tauvin , ” ati .
40027025	Mipin adonbut’un , “ Hichepa thisan phu chu keiho le katu kachateu chunga chu nante , ” atiuve .
40027026	Pilate’n Barabbas alhadoh peh in , Jesu vang chu ajep’in thingpel’a khetbeh din apedoh tai .
40027027	Gamvaipopa sepaiten Jesu chu gamvaipo inpi sunga apui lut’un , sepia hon lhingset’in akikhomui .
40027028	Jesu ponsil ahoh lhauvin , pon sandup asilpeh-un ,
40027029	ling lukhuh apheh-un akhuh peh-uvin , akhut jet lama peng tenggol khat achoisah-un , tot nan aangsunga aboh khup’un , “ Judate lengpa hingsot’in ! ” atiu ve .
40027030	Chil set khumun , atneggol’in aluchang ajep’un
40027031	tot nopna anei jou phat’un asilpeh-u ponsan chu ahoh lhauvin , ama pon asilpeh-un , thingpel’a khetbeh din apui mang tauve .
40027032	Akijotdoh-u leh sepia hon , Cyrene gam mi Simon atoh khauvin , Jesu thingpel put hu did nada acham louvin aman’ui .
40027033	Golgotha , “ lugu mun , ” kiti lai ahung ge phat’un ,
40027034	adon din cheikha toh kihal lengpitwi chu Jesu apeh-u leh , aman la atep’in adon nompoi .
40027035	Sepaihon Jesu chu thingpel’a akhenbeh-un , vang asan’un apon sil chengse akihomtauve .
40027036	Hikoma chun atouvun Jesu chu angah-ui .
40027037	Jesu luvuma ahehsetna , “ Hichepa hi Jesu Judate lengpa ahi , ” tia kisun chu atah-uve .
40027038	Gucha michom ni jong Jesu jet le veiya akhetbeh thauve .
40027039	Ache le avah le jouse Jesu chu ataitom nan akhasuh khum khum’ui .
40027040	“ Houin phelha a nithum sunga sadoh ding Pa ! Pathen Chapa nahileh Nangma kihuhhingin lang , thingpel’a konin hung kumlhan ! Atiuve .
40027041	hitobangma chun Thempulen ho le Danthu them ho chule upaten jong a-eng houvun ,
40027042	“ Midang bon huhhinga , ama akihuhhing theipoi ! Israel leng ahi-ong ! Tutah-in thingpel’a konin hung kumlha hen tahsan unge !
40027043	Pathen a kisong ahi me , Pathen lungdei ahileh tutah-in huhdoh hen ; ajeh chu , ‘ Pathen chapa kahi , ’ ati me , ” atiuve .
40027044	Akikhetbeh pi gucha michom te geiyin jong chutobangma chun ahouse lhon’e .
40027045	Nidan gup a pat nidan ko geiyin leiset pumpi chunga mu athimtai .
40027046	Nidan ko donin Jesu hapenin apengin , “ Eli , Eli , lemasabachthni ? ” ati . Hichu “ Ka-Pathen , i-bol’a neilha hitam ? ” tina ahi .
40027047	Chukoma ding mi phabeh’in apen gin ajauvin , “ Hei , Elijah akouve , ” atiuve .
40027048	Alah-uva mi khat alhaijel’in , twichop phon khat alan , lengpitwithuh adekot’in , tenggol leh a atah-in Jesu chu donsah ding agoi .
40027049	Midang hon , “ Limsah hih-un , ahuhhing dia Elijah hung nam , veu hite , ” atiuve .
40027050	Jesu hapenin apengin ahaitan paitan .
40027051	Chutah chun Houin pondal chu achunga pat anoi geiyin keh ni akison , ling akihot’in , songpi jouse apoh keh gamtai ;
40027052	hijeh chun lhankot tampi akihongtan , mitheng thisa ho kaithouvin aum’ui .
40027053	Amahon lhan adalhauvin , Jesu thodoh nungin khopi thenga alut’un , mi tamtah henga akilah-ui .
40027054	Sepai jalamkai pa le aumpi sepia , Jesu ngah a pang hon , ling kihot le thilsoh chengse amu’vin , akicha behseh jengun , “ hiche Pa hi Pathen Chapa tahbeh ahi , ” atitauve .
40027055	Galilee gama pat Jesu nung hinjui , ajen lea pang numei ho chun galkanga konin Jesu ave-lhi jingui .
40027056	Alah-uva hin Magdalene khoa Mary toh , Jacob le Joseph nu Mary chule Zebedee chapate ni nu jong apanguve .
40027057	Nilhah phat’in , jesu seijuisa , Arimathea khoa amin Joseph kiti mihao tah khat ahungin ,
40027058	Pilate henga achen Jesu long chu agathumtai . Pilate’n Jesu long chu Joseph din aphalpeh tai .
40027059	Joseph-in Jesu long chu adom lhan , tupat pon ngimseh-in atomin ,
40027060	songpi akhet homa akisemsa , ama lhan thah beh sunga chun alupsah-in , lhankot’ah song lentah khat atnag lut’in asing chah-in achetai .
40027061	Magadalene khoa Mary le Mary khat joh chu hikoma chun lhan lam ngan atou lhone .
40027062	Ajing nikho , kigot ni kichai jouvin thempulen ho le Pharisee ho Pilate henga ahungun ,
40027063	“ Pu , hiche milhem chavai pa hin , ahinlaiyin , ‘ Nithum jou le kaithouva ka-um ding ahi , ’ ati kageldoh-uve .
40027064	Hijeh chun nithum geiya kitup tah a lhan ngah din mi koiyin , achutiloult aseijuite hunga atahsa longdamsa aguh mang diu , miho jah a , ‘ Thina konin kaithouvin aumtai , ’ atiuva , amasa eilhep chatvai sanguva anukhah tneg khoh cheh a eilhep diu ahi , ” atiuve .
40027065	Pilate’n adonbut’in , “ A-ngah ding naneiyu chu me , cheuvin lang pha nasah bangun lhan chu gaki-nga tup tau ! ” ati .
40027066	Amahon acheuvin . Lhankot song chu mohor anam khum’un , angah ding akoitauve .
40028001	Choldo nikho kichai , hapta kipatna ni masa jingkah khoovah thin thenin Magdalene khoa Mary le Mary khat nu chu lhan vedin ahung lhone .
40028002	Phulou helouvin ling hahon akihot’in , van a konin Pakaiya kon Vantil khat ahung kumlhan , lhankot sin song chu atangdohin , song chu kolphe vah-in avah-in , aponsil meibang banin abnage .
40028003	Vantil vouso chu kolpha vah-in avah-in , aponsil meibang banin abnage .
40028004	Lhan ngah hon akicha behseh jengun athisa abnag jengui .
40028005	Vantil chun numeiho ahin houvin , “ Kicha hih-un , thingpel’a kikhetbwh Jesu chu nahol’u ahin , kahenai .
40028006	Ama hikoma aumtapoi , Aman aseisa bangin athoudoh tai . Hungin alupna hung veuvin .
40028007	Cheloiyun aseijuite jah a , ‘ Ama thinaa konin athoudoh-in , Galilee gama nang ho sangin amasajotai , hikoma chu nakimupi diu ahi , ’ tin gaseiyun . Ngai phauvin kaseipeh nahitauve , ” ati .
40028008	Numeihon kichat le kipa thon lhan phung dalhan , seijuite gaseipehdin lhaijel tauve .
40028009	Phulou helouvin jesun numeiho chu akimupin , “ Lung monguvin ! ” ati . Numeihon ahin nailut’un , akeng phang atuh-un aboh khup tauve .
40028010	Jesun ajah-uva , “ Kicha hih-un , kile kit’uvin , kasopite chu Galilee gama che din gaseipeh-un , hikoma chu eimu diu ahi , ” ati .
40028011	Numeho lamkai agei nalaiyun , lhan ngah sepia hokhopi sunga alut’un , thilsoh chengse abonchan Thempulen ho kom alhut tauve .
40028012	Thempulen ho le upaho akihou toh loiyun , sepia ho hi sum tampi apeuvin ,
40028013	“ Nang hon , ‘ Jan ka-ihmut lan’un aseijuiten along ahung gu mang tauve , ’ tia nasei tei tei diu ahi .
40028014	Hiche thu hi Gamvaipon ajah tah jongle keihon houjol’ung ting , nang ho lung olmosah pou vinge , ” atiuve .
40028015	Lhan ngah sepaihon sum chu akilah un , ahil nau bangin abol tauve . Hitobang thujou
40028016	Jesun che dia atepeh nau Galilee lhanga chun seijui somle khat chu anachetauve .
40028017	Abang bang along opkai vangun , seijuihon Jesu amu phat’un chibai aboh tauve .
40028018	Jesun ahin nailut’in ajah-uvah , “ Van le leiset’a tha neina jouse eikipetai .
40028019	hijeh chun cheuvin lang muntin a mi jouse seijuiyin gasem tauvin , amaho chu a-Pa , a-Cha chule Lhagao Theng minin baptize galbol’un ,
40028020	chule kathupeh chengse anitna diuvin hilun ; veuvin leiset khang kichai ni geiyin Keiman nang ho ka-umpi jing nauve , ” ati .
41001001	Pathen chapa Jesu Christaa Kipana Thupha chu hitia kipan ahi .
41001002	Isaiah Themgao lekhabua kisun : “ Ven keiman kasolle chu namasang’ah kasol’e , Aman nalampi semtohsa akoi ding ahi ,
41001003	Gamthip’a khosam ogin khat’in , ‘ Pakai lampi semtoh-un leng , Alamlen semjang san koiyun , ’ tin akiseiye , ” kiti bang chun ,
41001004	gamthip’a John ahung kilah-in , chonset lung heiya baptize chan ding thu ahil lhang len chule baptize achansah-e .
41001005	Judea gam mun tin’a miho le Jerusalem khopia mi jouse John henga acheuvin , achonset chengse aphongun , Jordan vadunga ama khut’a baptize achang tauve .
41001006	John chun sa-ngongsao mul ponin akivonin , savun konggah aki-gah-in , chule khaokhote anen , gam khoiju adon’e ;
41001007	lhang asamin , “ Kei sanga hatjo khat ka-nunga ahunge , kei hi kun’a akengchot khao sut lham dinga kilom jong kahipoi .
41001008	Ken nang ho twiya baptize kachansah ahin , Aman vang Lhagao Thenga baptize nachansah diu ahi , ” ati .
41001009	Hiche lai chun Galiee gam Nazareth khoa konin Jesu ahungin Jordan vadunga John khut’a baptize achangtai .
41001010	Twi lah a ahung dindoh doh chun van akikehson Lhagao Theng vakhu banga hung lenglhaa achunga chu amui .
41001011	Chule vana konin O-khat’in , “ Nangma kachapa deitah nahin , nachunga kalung alhai ta-ngeiye , ” ati .
41001012	Lhagaovin Jesu chu gamthip’a anolut paiyin ,
41001013	hikoma chun nisom li jan som li athamin , Satan lhep patep’in aume ; chule gamsate toh alha khomin , chuin Vantilten ahung jen’uve .
41001014	John amat nungun Jesu Galilee gama ahungin Pathenna kon Kipana Thupha alhangsam len ,
41001015	“ Phat alhinge , Pathen lenggam chun hikom ahinphatai ; nalung heiyun lang Kipana Thupha hi tahsanun , ” tin aseiye .
41001016	Jesun Galilee dillen ajotpan nga man mi ni Simon le asopipa Andrew dillena lensep amui .
41001017	Jesun ajah lhon’ah , Neijui lhonin , mi manin pansah lhon inge , ” atileh ;
41001018	ama nin alen dalhan Jesu nung ajui pai lhontai .
41001019	Them khat achebe kit leh Zebedee chapa Jacob le asopipa John jong kong sunga len anakhui phat lhon amun ,
41001020	ama ni jong akou kit leh , kong sunga chun apa Zebedee le thalah soh chengse dalhan Jesu nung ajui lhontai .
41001021	Capernaum kho ahung lhun phat’un , Choldo nikhon Jesu Houthua kikhopna in’ah alut paiyin thu ahiltai .
41001022	Athuhil japha chanin kidang asa lheh jengui ; ijeh-inem itile Aman Danthu sun ho hil banga hil louvin thu neitah-in mi ahil’e .
41001023	Houthua kikhopna ina chun mi lhagaoboh vop khat anaumin , amah in ahinsam pai jengin ,
41001024	“ Nazareth Jesu , iti taute nati ham ? Eisu mang diuva hung nahim ? Nang koi nahi kahenai , Pathena kon Atheng chu nahi , ” ati .
41001025	Jesun lhagaoboh chu aphoh in , “ Thip’in , amaa kon chun hung potdoh-in ! ” atileh ;
41001026	lhagaoboh-in amapa chu aveingol’in , hapenin apengin amaa koin ahungpotdoh tai .
41001027	Chutah chun mipin kidang asa soh keiyun , khat le khat akidong touvin , “ Hiche hi ipi thu hitam ! Thuhil Thah beh leh thu neitah a Aman lhagaoboh ho apho le angai jengui ! ” akitiuve .
41001028	Hiti chun Galilee gam kim vel’a gangtah-in Jesu min akithang soh tai .
41001029	Amahon houthua kikhopna in chu adalhanvin Jacob le John toh kilhonin Simon le Andrew ina alut paitauve .
41001030	Simon nupa nu chu nat lhut a nan alumin , mihon anat thudol Jesu jah a aseipeh paiyui .
41001031	Hichun Jesu achen akhut atuh-in akaithou leh , anat lhut’in alha paitan , amanu jong ajen leuvin apangtai .
41001032	Nilhah nisa lhum lamin Jesu henga adammo jouse leh thilhavop chengse ahin puiyun ,
41001033	khopi sunga mi abonchan kot phung bul’a akikhom tauve .
41001034	Hichun Jesun hivei chom chom veiya dammo tampi aboldamin , thilhavop ho jong anodoh peh-in , thilha hon Jesu ahetjeh-un apao poh a-uhsa aumpouve .
41001035	Jingpi mahtah , khovah lhah masangin Jesu athouvin , gamthip’a achen hikoma chun agataove .
41001036	Hichun Simon le aloiten anung ajuiyun ,
41001037	amudoh phat’uvin ajah a , “ Mi jousen Nang nahol cheh-a ! ” atiuve .
41001038	Jesun ajah-uvah , ” Anaivel kholen dom doma jong Thupha kaseiphong theina din cheu hite , hiche dinga chu hung vaikon kahi , ” ati .
41001039	Hiti hin Galilee gam a akholsoh keiyin kikhopna in tin’a thupha aseiphongin , thilha ho anodoh-e .
41001040	Miphah khat Jesu henga ahungin aboh khup’in ajah a , “ Nalung ahileh neidam thengsah thei ahi , ” tin ataotai .
41001041	Hichun Jesun alainat pin akhut alhangin athamin ajah a , “ Kalung ahi damtheng tan ! ” atileh ;
41001042	chupet tah chun atiphah chu apha paiyin ama adam thengtai .
41001043	Apet tah chun Jesun agihsal paiyin
41001044	ajah a , “ ven , koima cha jah a seidan ; amavang chen lang Thempu gakivetsah-in , miphah chu adamtheng tai ti phot chetna Mose’n kilhaina thilto peh ding aseisa chu gapetan , ” atin asoldohtai .
41001045	Ahinla mipa chu apotdoh-in athu hi muntin’a aseiphong pantai ; athusoh hi ahaseiphong behseh phat’in Jesu kholen hoa lhang phongin alut thei tapon , gamthip thip’a achangin akitheh doh le len ; mipin vang muntin’a kon in aheng ahinjon jon jenguve .
41002001	Nikho phabep nugnin Jesu Capernaum khoa ahung kitleh in’a aum ajasoh tauve .
41002002	Hijeh chun mitamtah ahung kikhom’un , aum na diu mun , kotphung jeng jong a-ong tapoi . Hichun Jesun miho thu ahiltai .
41002003	Miphabep’in langthi mi khat ahenga ahin puiyun , lin ahinpou’ve .
41002004	Mipi jeh chun Jesu henga apulu thei pouvin , aumna don inching aphet vangun , lang thipa chu alupna pumin akhai lhauve .
41002005	Jesun atahsanu amudoh phat’in langthipa jah-a , “ Chapa nachonset chengse aki-ngaidam tai , ” ati .
41002006	Chukoma tou Danthu them phabep chun agel’un ,
41002007	“ Ibol’a hi chepan hitobang thu asei jeng ham ? Pathen ataitome . Pathen tilou koi dang chonset ngaidam jou umam ? ” atiuve .
41002008	Alungthim’uva chutobang agel’u hi Jesun alungin ahepai jengin ajah-uvah , “ Ibol’a nalung gil’a chutobang nagel’u ham ?
41002009	Langthipa jah a , ‘ Nachonset chengse ki-ngaidam ahitai , ’ ti leh , ‘ Thouvin , nalupna kilah-in lam jot tan , ’ ti hoijoh baijom ?
41002010	Hoi hileh leiset chunga Mihem Chapan chonset ngaidamna thahat anei nahetna diuvin , ” atin langthipa jah a chun ,
41002011	“ Kaseipeh nahi , thouvin nalupna kilah-in na-in langa kile kit tan , ” ati .
41002012	Ama jong akipatdoh paiyin alupna akilah-in japi mitmu tah a apotdoh jeng leh , amahon kidang asa behseh jengun Pathen athangvah-uvin , “ Hitobang thilsoh kamu kha hih hel’e , ” atiuve .
41002013	Jesu dilen lam jona apotdoh kitleh mipi aheng’ah ahung kikhomun , aman thu ahiltai .
41002014	Hitia ache naa hin Alphaeus chapa Levi , kaidonna inmuna tou amun , ajah a , ” Neijuiyin , ” atileh ; akipatdoh-in ajuitai .
41002015	Jesun Levi ina ankong aum phat’in kaidong ho le chonse ho tampin jong Jesu le aseijuite toh ankong aum khomun ahileh atam lheh tauve . Hichun anung jui
41002016	Danthu them ho le Phariseehon , chonse ho le kaidong ho toh an anehkhom amu’vin aseijuite jah a , “ Itidana Aman kaidong ho le chonsete toh an aneh khom ham ? ” atiuve .
41002017	Jesun hichu ajah phat’in ajah-uvah , “ Atidamten louthem angaipoi , adamlouten bou angaiyui ; Keijong adih ho kouva hung kahipon , chonse ho kouva hung kahi bouve , ” ati .
41002018	John seijuiho le Pharisee hon an angolji jeh-un miho Jesu henga ahungun ajah a , “ Itidana John seijuiho le Pharisee hon an angol jiuva , nang seijuihon angol ji louvu ham ? ” tin adongui .
41002019	Jesun ajah-uvah , “ Kichen golvahna hung lha ho chu ajinei pan alenkhompi laisea an ngol’a um theiyum ? Aji neipan alenkhompi dung seuva an ngol thei lou diu ahi .
41002020	Amavang alah-uva kona aji neipa akipui mang nikho hung lhung ding ahin , hiche teng chuleh amahon an angol diu ahi .
41002021	Koiman sopnem loulai pon hal’in ponlui abeh ngaipoi ; beh leh abehna chun ponlui chu kaieh jon tin haset lo cheh ding ahi .
41002022	Chujongle min savun peng lui sunga lengpitwi thah akhum ngai poi ; khum taleh lengpitwi peng chu tumkeh intin , alengpitwi le apeng ho geiya manlo ding ahi . Hijeh a chu lengpitwi thah chu peng thah a khum ding ahi , ” ati
41002023	Choldoh nikhon Jesun bulei lai ajotpa naa aseijuiten ache pum pum’un changvui akisiuve .
41002024	Hichun Pharisee hon ajah a , “ Ven , hiche ho khun itidana choldo nikhoa bol ngailou abol’u ham ? ” atiuve .
41002025	Jesun ajah-uvah , “ David le aloite gilkel’a an ngaicha aum pet’uva chu ipi abol’u nasim khah louhel’u ham ?
41002026	Abiathar Thempu chungnung ahilaiyin David chu Pathen Houin sunga alut’in , Thempuho tilouvin aneh ngailou , Pathen umjing hetna changlhah katdohsa chu anen aloite jong apei , ” ati .
41002027	Chujongle ajah-uva aseiyin , “ Choldo nikho hi mihem khohsahnaa kisem ahin , Choldo nikho khohsahnaa mihem kisem ahipoi ,
41002028	hijeh chun Mihem Chapa hi Choldo nikho Pakai jong ahi , ” ati .
41003001	Jesu houthua kikhopna ina alut kit leh , pasal khut langthi khat anaume .
41003002	Mihon ahehset theina diuvin langthipa chu Jesun Choldo nikhoa aboldam got le got lou aching lhiuve .
41003003	Jesun khut langthipa jah a , “ Alailunga hung dingin , ” atin ;
41003004	miho jah a , “ Choldo nikhoa thilpha bol ngai ha , thilse bol ngai ham ? Hinkho huhhing ngai ha suhmang ngai ham ? ” atileh ; Amahon la athip chet jengui .
41003005	Jesun miho chu lung hang pumin avegol’in , alung tah jeh-uvin alung gimpeh jon , lang thipa jah a , “ Nakhut lhangdoh-in , ” atileh , akhut alhandoh phat’in adamhel’e .
41003006	Chutah chun iloa Jesu suhmang theina ding Herodian ho toh kihou som din Phariseeho apotdoh paitauve .
41003007	Jesu le aseijuite twikhanglen jona acheu lah , Galilee gama hung kon mipin jong ajuiyui ; Judea gama hung kon ,
41003008	Jerusalema kon , Idumea gam le Jordan lui gal’a kon , chule Tyre le Sidon gamkol sunga hung kon mipin anatoh ho ajah jeh-uvin ahenga ahunguve .
41003009	Mipi atam behseh jeh chun aneh chinto louna diuvin Jesun aseijuite chu kongneo khat gotsa anakoipeh diuvin aseipeh-e .
41003010	Mi tamtah aboldam ahitah jeh-in dammona nei jousen Ama chu toh khah tei ding dei nan ahindel jengun ahi .
41003011	Lhagaoboh ho hin Jesu amu tengu leh amasanga aboh khup’un , “ Nangma Pathen Chapa nahi , ” tin asamu’vin ;
41003012	ahin la Ama aphondoh louna diuvin Jesun hakhamin akham chah-e .
41003013	Jesu mol chunga akaltouvin angaichat chengse akouleh , amaho ahenga achetauve .
41003014	Hichun mi som le ni alhengdoh-in , aminu solchah asah-in , akoma aum jingu va chule thuhil lhanglea jong asol doh theina dingin ,
41003015	thilha ho nodoh theina tha jong apei .
41003016	Hitia alhendoh som le ni chu : Peter tia aminvo Simon ahin ,
41003017	Zebedee chapa Jacob le John , ‘ Van gin chate , ’ ti naa amin lhon Boanerges asah te ni ahin ,
41003018	Andrew le Philip , Bartholomew le Matthew , Thomas le Alphaeus chapa Jacob , Thaddaeus le Canaan mi Simon ,
41003019	chule ama matsah a pang Iscariot Juda toh ahiuve .
41003020	Jesu ina ahung lut tai ; mipi ahung kikhop kit phat’un an jeng jong anethei tapouvve .
41003021	A-inkoten ajahdoh phat’un mat tho jeng din ahung kon’ui ; ijeh-inem itile a ngol’a agel’u ahi .
41003022	Jerusalema kona hungsuh Danthu themhon jong Beelzebul vop hiya , thilha ho anodoh jong chu avaihompau thahat vanga anodoh-in aseiyui .
41003023	Jesun amaho akouvin ajah uvah thulemin aseiyin , “ Satanin satan iti anodoh thei ding ham ?
41003024	Gamsung khat atum apaiyin kikhentel hen kidouto taleh , hiche gamsung chu dingdoh thei lou ding ahi .
41003025	Insung khat jong kikhentel leh ding jou lou ding ahi .
41003026	Hijeh chun Satanin Satan adouleh akikhentel ahitan , ding jou louva bei ding ahiye .
41003027	Koiman mihat ina lut’a ama kan masa louvin anei achom theipoi , akan jou teng le ain achom ding ahibouve .
41003028	Tahbeh a kaseipeh nahiuve , mihemte achonsetna chengseu le Pathen ataitom nau aboncha ngai dam chang diu ahin ,
41003029	Lhagao Theng taitom vang chu ngaidam chang louhel ding ahi ; tonsot’a chonset themmo changa um ding ahitai , ” ati .
41003030	Lhagaoboh vop a aseijeh-uva chutia asei ahiye .
41003031	Jesu nu le asopite ahunguvin inpo’ah adingun , mi asol’uvin Jesu agakousah-ui .
41003032	Akimvel’a tou mihon ajah a , “ Ven , nanu le nasopite polama adingun nahol’ui , ” atiuve .
41003033	Jesun miho chu adonbut’in , “ Kanu chu koi hiya chule Kasopite chu koi koi hiuvem ? ” atin ;
41003034	akim vel’a tou chengse avegil’in , “ Hiche ho hi kanu chule kasopite ahiuve .
41003035	Koi hijongle Pathen lungdei bol jouse chu kasopipa kasopinu chule kanu ahiuve , ” ati .
41004001	Jesun dil pang’a mi ahilpan kit leh , mipi ahung kikhomun , Ama dil laiya um kong khat sunga alut’in atouve . Mipi chengse vang twipam chin tol’a atouvui .
41004002	Jesun mipi chu thu tampi thulem jengin ahil’in , athuhilnaa chun ajah-uva aseiyin :
41004003	“ Ngaiyun ! Muchi thepa chu muchi then akondoh tai .
41004004	Hitia muchi athe naa hin muchi phabep lamsih a achun ahileh vachaten akilogam tauve .
41004005	Muchi phabep ma songlheo chung , leipatnaa achun , leiset asa loujeh-in akedoh loi vangin
41004006	nisan ahinsah teng jung anei lou jeh-in agopjitai .
41004007	Muchi phabeh jong ling lah a achun , ling ho ahung khandoh teng adep lih jin , ga louvin aumlo jitai .
41004008	Muchi phabepse vang leipha laiya achun , akehdoh paiyin , akhangin , agan , somthum cheng , somgup cheng , chule ja khat chengin agai , ” ati .
41004009	Chuin aman ajah uva , “ Angai na ding na neiyan ngai hen , ” ati .
41004010	Jesu achangseh a aum pet’in athuhil ja ho phabep le seijui som le ni chun thulemho thudol adongui .
41004011	Aman ajah-uvah , “ Nang ho vang Pathen lenggam thuguh chu kiseipeh nahitauvin , polama umte vang ijakai thulem jenga kisei ahi ,
41004012	hitia chu ‘ Ve jong leu amu chet thei lou diu , Ja jong leu ahet khen thei lou diu , chutilou hileh hung kihei kit’uva ngaidam chang ding ahiuve , ’ tia kisei ahi , ” ati .
41004013	Jesun ajah-uva , “ Hiche thulem hi nahet khen louvu ham ? Achutile thulem dang ho iti nahet thei diu ham ?
41004014	Muchi thepan Thu athe ahi .
41004015	Thu kithea lamsih a chu kiti ho hi thu ajah tah-u leh Satan ahung pai jenin asunguva lutsa thu chu alah mang pehji tai .
41004016	Chule songlheo chunga chu muchi kiti ho hi , thu ajah tah-u leh thanom tah a kisan jeng ho ahiuvin ;
41004017	ahinla jung neilou ahiuvin apangsot pouve , athujah jeh-uva gim genthei nan ahinphah tengu leh akipal thu paiji tauve .
41004018	Chujongle linglah a chu muchi kiti ho hi , thu ajatauvin
41004019	amavang hiche hinkho lungkhamna le hao ding deina , chule thil dang dang deichat nan thu chu adep lih jin , gadoh louvin aumloi .
41004020	Leipha laiya chu kiti ho vang hi , thu jaa kisan ho ahiuvin , abang somthum cheng , phabeh ma somgup cheng chule phabeh jong ja khat chengin apunguve , ” ati .
41004021	Jesun ajah-uvah , “ Thaomei kivah khu pocha kikhu khum ngai lou , jalkhun noiya jong kitung ngai lou hilou ham ? Thaomeikhom chunga tun dia kivahji hilou ham ?
41004022	Phondoh lou dinga kiselguh aumpon , chule hodoh lou dinga kikhu khum jong aumpoi .
41004023	Koi hileh a-ngaina ding nakhang neiyan ngaihen , ” ati .
41004024	Jesun ajah-uvah , “ Nathujah u hi melchih-un . Nate bang banguva nakitepeh diu , akhohjoa bon nakibol diu ahi .
41004025	Ajeh chu aneiya kipehben tin , aneilou vang aneilou vanga aneichasun jong kilahpeh ding ahi .
41004026	Jesun aseiyin , “ Pathen leng gam chu min loulaiya muchi athe tobang ahi ;
41004027	jan leh a-ihmun , sun teng athouve ; ahin muchi chu anakeh-in akhangdoh tai , aman vang iti kea iti khan ahi ahepoi .
41004028	Leiset’in acham chamin ahin gasah jin , amasan ananou ahin , abanin avui , chujou kit leh avuiya konin achang lhingjie .
41004029	Achang chu amin phat leh a-at phat ahitah jeh-in koiten a-at paijitai , ” ati .
41004030	Jesun aseiyin , “ Pathen leng gam chu iti itekah-uva , ipi thulema isei diu hitam ?
41004031	Ankammu tobang vang ahi , leiset’a akithe teng vannoiya muchi dang jouse sangin aneo pen’e ;
41004032	ahin akithe jou teng akehdoh-in , akhangin muchi dang sangin alenjoi , abah lentah tah asepdoh jin , chunga leng vachate jong aboh lim noiya ageh theiyui , ” ati .
41004033	Hitobang hin miho het thei kham khamin Jesun ajah-uva thu ahil’e .
41004034	Thulem louvin vang ajahuva imacha asei khapoi ; aseijuitevang atumin ijakai ahil chensoh nai .
41004035	Hiche ni hin nilhah ahiphat’in Jesun aseijuite jah-a , “ Dil gallang khat’a galkaiyu hite , ” ati .
41004036	Hijeh chun mipi adalhauvin , Jesu umna konga alut’uvin akitolpi tauve ; hia chun kong dang jong aumin ahi .
41004037	Chuin khopihui hattah ahung nungin , kong sunga twi akinong lut mat chattan ahileh , kong sung twi dim mai ding ahi tai .
41004038	Jesu la kong meilama lukhap khap’in a-ihmui . Seijuiten asukhangun ajah a , “ Houhil , keiho thigam ding kihita , khoh nasah lou ham ? ” atiuve .
41004039	Jesu athoudoh-in khopi hui chu haphon aphoh-in , twikhanglen jah a “ Thip hel’in , umthimin , ” atileh ; huipi athip hel’in aumthimbeh tai .
41004040	Hichun ajah-uva , “ Ibol’a chute kichat nahiuvam ? Tahsanna nanei loulai hel’u ham ? ” ati .
41004041	Amaho la akicha behseh jengun , khat le khat akihouvun , “ Hichepa hi hoi koibep hitaa , huipi le twikhanglen geiyin athu angai jeng ham ? ” atiiuvin ahi .
41005001	Amaho twikhanglen gal langa Gerasa gamsung’ah ahung tauve .
41005002	Jesu konga kona apotdoh doh-in lhan lah a hungkon lhagaoboh vop mikhat’in akimutopi paijen’e .
41005003	Lhagaoboh vop pa hi lhan lah jenga pansa ahin , koiman thih khaova jong ahen jou lou ahitai .
41005004	Bul akituh a thih khaova akikan vangin , thih khao jouse atumtan jin , bul ho aphukeh jin , koiman abol ngoi jou lou ahi .
41005005	Sun le janin lhan lah a avah len mol chung dunga a-ao le a-ao len , songin aki-at chen chen jengin ahiye .
41005006	Gamla tah a konin Jesu ahin mun , ahung khaiyin a-ang’ah aboh khup tai .
41005007	Chuin going tah-in asam in , “ Pathen chungnugnpen Chapa Jesu , ilo ding neitiu ham ? Pathen mina ka-ngeh nahi neisu genthei hih beh-in , ” ati .
41005008	Jesun , “ Mipa sunga kon chun hung potdoh-in , lhagaoboh , ” atijeh a chutia asei ahiye .
41005009	Chuin Jesun , “ Namin ipi ham ? ” atileh ; aman , “ Tamtah kahijeh-un kamin , ‘ Janel , ’ ahi , ” atin ;
41005010	chuche gamsunga kona asoldoh louna dingin hataovin ataove .
41005011	Akoma lhang panga chun vohcha tampi honk hat alhan ,
41005012	lhagai ho chun , “ Hiche vohchate sunga khu kalut theina diuvin nei sol tauvin , ” tin Jesu henga ataovui .
41005013	Jesun asol tai . Chuin lhagaoboh ho apotdoh-un vohchate sunga alut’u leh vohcha sang nijen , hon khat chu kol’a alhai lhauvin , twilena alha lut’un athi gamtauve ,
41005014	Vohcha ching ho chu ajam uvin thusoh hi khopi sung le loujao dunga aglhutsoh tauve . Hijeh chun athilsoh umchan vedin miho ahung uleh ,
41005015	Jesu kom ahung lhun’un thilha janel voppa pon kisil’a lung lima anatou amu’vin , akicha lheh jenguve .
41005016	Thilha voppa le vohchate chunga thilsoh amit tah a muhon ahung ho chu aseipeh-uvin ahi .
41005017	Chuphat’in mihon Jesu chu agamsunguva kona potdoh din ajoltauve .
41005018	Jesu konga alut pet’in ma sanga thilha voppan akoma aum jing na ding athume .
41005019	Jesun ajadan , “ Na-ina chen lan gPakaiyin nakhotoa thil nasatah nabolpeh chu na-inkote gasei peh tan , ” atipeh-e .
41005020	Hijeh chun ama achen Jesun thil nasatah abolpeh chu khopi som sunga aphongjal len , ajapha chanin kidang asasoh keiyuve .
