41005021	Jesu konga akile tolgalkai kit phat’in , ahenga mipi ahung kikhop jeh-un Ama twikhanglen panga aumden’e .
41005022	Hichun houthua kikhopna in vaipo ho lah a Jairus chu ahungin , Jesu amu phat’in akhomuh a aboh khup paiyin ,
41005023	“ Kachanu thi ding koncha ahitai , adamdoh a ahinthei teina din , hungin achunga nakhut hung ngamin , ” tin ha-ngeh-in angeh tai .
41005024	Jesu amato kilhonin achei . Ahin mipin ajuiyun , ajet aveiya aneh chinto jenguve .
41005025	Numei khat hikum som le kum ni jen athi longa damlou ,
41005026	louthem mi tamtah akijensah a , anei chasun asuh mangsoh ahitan , ahivanga damdoh louva khoh cheh cheh jo ahi .
41005027	Hiche nu hin Jesu thudol ajan , mipi lah a Jesu nung’ah ahungin aponsil athamtai .
41005028	Ijeh-inem itile , “ Aponsil ho jeng jong tham kha leng damteiyinge , ” ati ahi .
41005029	Athi long chu akang heltan , aman jong atahsa natnaa kona adamtheng chu akihet paitai .
41005030	Apet tah chun Jesun atichunga kona thaneina apotdoh ahe paiyin , mipi lah avekimvel’in , “ Kaponsil ho thamkha koiham ? ” tin ahol’e .
41005031	Aseijuiten ajah’a “ Mipin naneh chinto jing mua iti , ‘ Eithama koiham ? ” natiham , ” atiuve .
41005032	Hichun Jesun aponsil tham mi chu muleng tin ave-lei .
41005033	Numeinun achunga thilsoh chu ahen , kichasa san ahungin kithing thingin a-anga aboh khup’in adih tah aseidoh tai .
41005034	Chuphat’in Jesun ajah a , “ Chanu , natahsanin nadamsah ahitai , lung mongin chen lang nanat genthei naa konin damtan , ” ati .
41005035	Jesun thu asei nalaiyin , houthua kikhopna in vaihompa ina konin mi phabep ahungun , “ Nachanu athitai , ibol’a Houhilpu nasuh lung gim ding ham ? ” atiuve .
41005036	Jesun aseiyu chu ijasep louvin , houthua kikhopna in vaihompa jah a , “ Olmo hih-in , tahsan poutan , ” ati .
41005037	Jesun Peter le Jacob chule Jacob naopa tilou midang akijuisah nompoi .
41005038	Houthua kikhopna in vaihompi in ahung lhun phat’un miho akap amao pohchei choiya um amun ,
41005039	asung lhan ajahuvah , “ Ibol’a pohchei choiya kap nahiuvem ? Chapangnu hi athi ahipoi , a-ihmu ahibouve , ” ati .
41005040	Mihon anuisat tauve . Ahi vangin abonchauvin adeldoh-in , chapangnu nu le pa toh akilhonpi chengse toh chapangnu um naa alut tauve .
41005041	Chapangnu chu akhut’in atuh-in ajah a , “ Boinu thouvin kati nahi , tinan , “ Tilitha koum , ” ati .
41005042	Chapangnu chu athou paiyin lam ajottai ; ama hi kum som le ni chapang ahi . Hichun mihon adatmo behseh jenguve .
41005043	Hichun jesun koimacha ahetsah louna diuvin akham chah kheh-in chule , “ Chapangnu chu neh ding peuvin , ” tin aseiye .
41006001	Jesun chukom dalhaa achenna khoa ahung leh , aseijuiten ahin juiyui .
41006002	Choldo nikho lhin phat’in houthua kihopna ina thu ahil’in athuhil ngaiya mi tampin adatmouvin , “ Hichepan hichengpi hi hoiya alah hi-nga na ? Ama kipea hi itobang chihna hiya , hibanga bolmo kidang abol ham ?
41006003	Jacob le Joseph , Judas le Simon sopipa , Mary cha thingthembolpa chu hilou ham ? Asopi numeiho jong ilah-uva aching meu ? ” atiuvin , kipal nan aneilo tauve .
41006004	Jesun ajah-uvah , “ Themgao chu mun dang danga akijabol vangin agamsung le amite lah chule a-inkote lah a kijabolji lou mong ahi , ” ati .
41006005	Hikoma chun ana damlou phabep chunga khut angap’a adam sah tilouvin , thil kidang ima abol thei tapoi .
41006006	Atahsan louvu chu kidang asa lheh jenge . Jesu anaivel kho hoa achen thu ahil le tai .
41006007	Seijui som le ni chu akouvin , lhagaoboh nodohna thei tha apen , mini nin asoldoh panin ahi .
41006008	Amaho chu lamkah a dinga tenggol tilou changlhah hihen , sakhao hijongle , sumdip sunga jong sum apoh lou diuvin aseipeh-e .
41006009	Kengchot vang aseuva sangkhol chol tho ni aki-ah lou diuvin aseiye .
41006010	Ajah-uva aseiyin , “ Hoikom hijongle nalhun nauva kona napotdoh kahseuvin chukoma umden jingun ;
41006011	hoimun hijongle min nalhunsah dauva nathu jong angai louvu leh , dalhauvin lang , ahettohsah nan nakengphanguva leivui thin lhah khum’uvin , ” ati .
41006012	Amaho apotdoh-uvin min chonset lung ahei teina din ahil lhang leuve .
41006013	Thilha tampi anodohun , adamlou tamtah thao anu’vin , aboldam tauve .
41006014	Gamtina Jesu min kithang hi Herod lengpan ajadoh tai . Mi phabep’in , “ John baptist chu thinaa kona thoukit’a hitobang thil kidang bol theina thahat hi anei hiya chu , ” atiuvin ;
41006015	kon khat’in , “ Elijah ahi , ” atiuvin ; adangsen vang , “ Malai Themgao ho tobang khat hinah ta , ” atiuve .
41006016	Herod vang chun , “ Alu katansa John chu hiya thoudoh kit hichu , ” ati ahi .
41006017	Ijeh-inem itile Herod hin asopipa Philip jinu Herodias aki chenpi ahin , hiche nu jal’a hi mi asol’a John hi amasat a asongkul’a anakhum ahi .
41006018	Ajeh chu Johnin Herod jah a , “ Nasopipa ji nakichenpi hi dan ngai ahipoi , ” tia aphosa ahi .
41006019	Hijeh a hi Herodias hin John ahot’a athanom jing ahin , athat theipoi ;
41006020	ijeh-inem itile Herod’in John hi midih le atheng ahi ahetjeh-in akichan apanpijitai . Athuhil ajah jongle along akichiah lheh jin , ahivangin kipah tah-in angaipehji nai .
41006021	Chuin nikho gomkom cha khat ahung um khan , Herod so nikho lhin nin golvah abol’in , amite lamkaiho le sepai vaipo ho chule Galilee gama milen milalte akouve .
41006022	Hichun Herodias chanu ahung lut’in alam leh , Herod le a-ankong umpi chengse akitaisah lheh-e . Lengpan nu-ngah jah achun , “ Nadei jouse kahenga thumin , Peng , kate , ” atitai .
41006023	Herod akihahsel’in , “ Kahenga nathum jouse kagamsung keh khat geiyin penge , ” ati .
41006024	Nu-ngah chu apotdoh-in anu henga , “ Ipipen kathum dingham ? ” agatileh ; “ John Baptist luchang , ” tin aseipeh-e .
41006025	Apet tah chun nu-ngah jong lengpa henga ahungin , “ Tutah hin John Baptist luchang ankong khat’a neipe le chun kadeiye , ” ahung ti .
41006026	Lengpa chu alung gim lheh jengin , ahivangin a-ankong umpi ho ansunga akihahselna jeh chun adathei tapoi .
41006027	Hiti hin lengpan a-ngah a pang sepia ho khat John lu la dingin asoltai . Ama achen songkul’a John lu agatanin ,
41006028	ankong sunga ahindomin nu-ngah chu apetai . Nu-ngah chun anu agapen ahi .
41006029	Athu hi John seijuiten ajah phat’un along ahung pu’vin lhan’a avuitauve .
41006030	Solchah ho Jesu henga ahung kikhom’un , athilbol jouseu le athuhil’u aseipeh soh keiyui .
41006031	Mi ahung le ache le atam behseh phat’in an jeng cha jong ane man tapouvin , hijeh chun Jesun , “ Abung in hung kikhin doh-un lang munthip lai khat’a kicholdouvin , ” ati .
41006032	Hijeh chun kongin akitol’un gam thip lai khat ajontauve .
41006033	Mi tamtah-in acheu amu’va ahet phat’un akimvel khopi jousea konin kengin anacheuvin , amaho sangin analhung masatauve .
41006034	Jesu kong ahung potdoh le mipi kinonglul lul chu amun , achingbei kelngoite toh abah jeh-uvin alungset’in thu tampi ahil pantai .
41006035	Agei behseh phat’in aseijuite ahungun , “ Agei behseh tan , ium nau ma gamthip lah ahin ,
41006036	miho hi cheuva akimvel loujao ho le kho dunga neh le chah akichohna diuvin soltan , ” ahung tiuve .
41006037	Jesun adonbut’in ajah-uvah , “ Nang hon neh ding peuvin , ” ati . Amahon , “ Kacheuva changlhah denarii ja ni man kachoh-uva mipi neh dia kapeh diu ham ? ” atiuleh ;
41006038	Jesun ajah-uvah , “ Changlhah pheng ijat naneiyum , gaveuvin , ” ati . Agavet chet phat’un , “ Pheng nga le nga ni ahi , ” atiuve .
41006039	Hichun mipi chu hamhing chunga aloi loiya tousah din aseijuite aseipeh-e .
41006040	Miho chu agol gol’in ja khat cheng som nga chengin atoutauve .
41006041	Chuin changlhah pheng ngale ngani chu alan , van lam aven , phatthei aboh jouvin aheh bal bal’in mi ang’a luipeh din aseijuite apen , nga ni jong ahoppeh soh keiye .
41006042	Mipin aneuvin avasoh keiyui ;
41006043	changlhah chu anong nai amoh paipeh som le ni dim le nga nong phabep toh aloh doh-uvin ahi .
41006044	Changlhah ne ho chu Pasal sang nga alhinguve .
41006045	Jesun mipi alhah dohpet chun agallang khat , Bethsaida ache masa din aseijuite kong sunga alutsah loi jengin ahi .
41006046	Amaho hi alhah doh soh phat’in tao din molchunga akaltoutai .
41006047	Nilhah ahi phat’in kong la dil lai lung ageitan , ama changseh-in tol lhaga aum nalaiye .
41006048	Seijuite dil’a akitol nauva huiyin ale lama anuh jeh-uva alung gimu ahin mun , jingkah nidan li donin dil’a twi chunga kengin lam ahinjot’in , amaho khel din agoi .
41006049	Twi chunga lam jot’a ahung amu phat’un joumi danin agel’un a-aosot jengui .
41006050	Ajeh chu Ama amu cheh-uva kichasoh kei ahiuve . Chutah chun Jesun ahinhou paiyin ajah-uva , “ Olmo hih-un , Kei kahi , kicha hih-uvin , ” ati .
41006051	Aum nau kong sunga Jesu akaldoh phat’in hui athip del’in ahileh adatmolheh jenguve .
41006052	Ijeh-inem itile changlhah chunga thilsoh jong gelpha talouva lungmoh chehjo ahiuve .
41006053	Agal kaiyuva tolgo agei phat’un kong angauvin , Gennesaret lam ajontauve .
41006054	Kong adalhah lhah-uvin mipin Jesu anahepai jenguvin ,
41006055	agamsunga alhai leuvin , Jesu aumna ajah phahna chan’uva adamlou jouse alupna pumin ahin pupu jenguve .
41006056	Khote sung hihen , khopi sung hijongleh , loujao dung geiyin , ache na chan’ah kailhang dung jenga jong adamlou ho alupdsah-uvin , apon mong kai beh atham sah din angeh-uve . Ama tongkha chan vang adamsoh keiyui .
41007001	Jerusalema konin Pharisee ho le Danthu them phabep Jesu henga ahungun ahi .
41007002	Jesu seijuiten khutnen sil lha louva an aneh-u amutauve .
41007003	Ijeh-inem itile Pharisee ho le Judaten puchon pachon amangun , khut phatecha silngim masa louvin neh le chah abol ngaipouve .
41007004	Kailhang dunga kona ahungkile tengu jong le kisil lha louvin an anepouve . Chondan dang , khon ho , belcha ho , sum-eng bel ho , lupna ho geiya sop theng ding Dan tampi aneiyui .
41007005	Hijeh chun Pharisee ho le Danthu them hon , “ Itidana naseijuiten puchon pachon jui louva khut sil masa louva an aneh jiu ham ? ” tin Jesu adongui .
41007006	Aman ajah-uva , “ Mipha lhem nang ho thudol hi Isaiah-an kitoh chet’a gaothu aseiya , hitia kisun ahi : ‘ Hiche nam mite hin akamsung’uvin eijabol’un , Alungthimu la keiya konin agamla lheh jenge ;
41007007	Athuhil’u jong mihem thupeh jeng ahil jeh-un , Eihouvu jong hi mohseh ahi , ’ tia asei chu .
41007008	Pathen thupeh napaiyun , mihem chondan joh nanit’uvin ahi , ” ati .
41007009	Hiti jong hin ajah-uvah , “ Pathen thupeh phatah-in napaiyun , nachondanu joh nitna ding na-ngaitouve ong ?
41007010	Ajeh chu Mose’n ‘ Nanu napa jabol’un , ’ chule ‘ koi hile anu apa douna thuse sei jouse chu thihel hen , ’ ati ahin ,
41007011	nang hon la , ‘ Mi khat touvin nu ham pa ham jah a , ‘ Keivanga naphat chomna ding thil ho chu Pathen dinga thilpeh ahi , ’ atileh ,
41007012	ama hin nu hihen pa hileh akithopi lou akhoh poi , ’ tin
41007013	akhang khanga nahin juipeh-u puchon pachon jeh chun Pathen seisa nathaimil’uve . Hitobang hin thil tampi nabol’uvin ahi , ” ati .
41007014	Jesun mipi chu ahenga akou kit’in ajah-uvah , “ Nabonun kasei ngaiphauvin , hetoh-un .
41007015	Thil imacha polama kona mihem sunga lut’a ama suboh thei aumpoi , asunga kona potdoh bou chun asuhbohji ahi !
41007016	( Angaina ding nakhang neiyan ngaihen , “ ) ati .
41007017	Jesun mipi adalhah a insunga alut chun aseijuiten hiche thulem hi adong chen’uve .
41007018	Hijeh chun Jesun ajah-uva , “ Nang ho jong midang banga hetna lhasam nahiuvam , polama kona mihem sunga lut chun ama asuboh poi ,
41007019	ijeh-inem itile alung sunga lut louvin , a-oi sunga lut’a aposo naa ahung potdohji dol hekhen theilou nahiuvem ? ” ati . ( Hichea hin neh thei jouse athengin aseiye . )
41007020	Aman , “ Mihem sunga kona hung potdoh bou chun mi asuhboh ahi .
41007021	Ajeh chu mihem lung sunga konin lung gilou , jon thanhoi , guchatna , tolthana ,
41007022	mito jonna , papsetna , gitlou , engsetna mi doha bol , huhna ,
41007023	thilse hichengpi hi misunga kona hung potdohjia mi asuhbohji ahi , ” ati .
41007024	Jesun hikom chu adalhan Tyre gamkai jonin achetai . In sunga alut’in , koimacha akihetsah nompoi . Ahinla akisel thei dehpoi .
41007025	Achanu lhagaoboh vop numei khat’in ajahdoh phat’in ahungin akhomuh-a aboh khup jenge .
41007026	Numei chu Greek mi ahin , Syria gam Phoenicia khoa peng ahi ; aman achanu sunga thilha nodoh peh dingin athume .
41007027	Jesun ajah-a , “ Chate va masa ta diu hen , chate neh ban lahpeh a uichate se-lhah peh ding aphapoi , ” ati .
41007028	Aman adonbut’in a jah a , “ Pakai , uichaten jong dokang noiya anmal lhathang aneh jiu khu me , ” ati .
41007029	Numei nu jah a hin Jesun , “ Hiche nasei jeh chun chetan , nachanu sunga konin thilha chu apotdohtai , ” atipeh-e .
41007030	Numei chu acheleh anao jalkhuna lum agatoh-in , asunga konin thilha anapotdoh tai .
41007031	Jesun Tyre gamkai ajot’in , khopi som ajotpeh-in , Galilee dillen ahung lhung tai .
41007032	Ahenga mi na-ngong paojong paochen theilou khat ahinpuiyun achunga khut angap din ataovui .
41007033	Jesun mipi adalhan achangseh-in apuidoh in akhut jungin anakhang te ni akhoipeh-e ; chuin chil aphikhumin aleigui jong athampeh-in ,
41007034	chujouvin van lam aven , akhoisan , ‘ Kihongin , ’ ti nan ajah a , “ Ephphatha , ” ati .
41007035	Apet tah chun ana avangin , aleigui akilhamin , oh louhel’in thu asei theitai .
41007036	Hichun koimacha jah a aseidoh louna diuvin akham chah kheh-e ; ahinla ahakham cheh le ahaseiphong cheh-un ahi .
41007037	Ajapha chanin kidang asa behseh jengun , “ Ijakai abol phasoh keiyin , nangong la kho ajah sah tan , paomo jong apaotheisah tai , ” atiuve .
41008001	Hichelai chun mipi nasa tah ahung kikhop kit leh neh ding anei lou phat’un Jesun seijuite akouvin ajah-uvah ,
41008002	“ Mipi kakoma nelou chalouva aumnao hi nithum alhingtan , kalungset lheh jenge .
41008003	Abang hi gamla tah a hung ahuvin , gilkel dangchah pumin kisol jengleh lampi dunga lha lhop pe tei diu ahi , ” ati .
41008004	Aseijuiten adonbut’un , “ Hikom gamthip’a mi hichengpi vahna kham changlhah kon hoiya alah ding ham ? ” atiuve .
41008005	Jesun “ Changlhah ijat naneiyum ? ” atileh ; “ Pheng sagi , ” atiuve .
41008006	Hichun mipi tol’a tou din asol’in , changlhah pheng sagi chu alan , phatthei aboh jouvin mipi ang’a luipeh din aseijuite apetai .
41008007	Amahon nga phabep jong anei yun , hijong chu phatthei aboh jouvin miho ang’a luipeh din aseipeh-e .
41008008	Mihon anevasoh keiyuvin , aneh moh-u anong longkai sagi dim aloh doh-uve .
41008009	Anea pasal sang li jen ahin , Jesun amaho chu alhadoh tai .
41008010	Chuin aseijuite toh konga alut paiyun Dalmanutha gamsung alhung tauve .
41008011	Pharisee ho ahungun thu adong pan’uvin , apatep nan van’a konin melchihna ahol’uve .
41008012	Jesu along gil’in nasa tah-in akhoisan , “ Ibol’a hiche khang mite melchihna ahol’u ham ? Ddih tah a kaseipeh nahiuve , hiche khang mite hi melchihna kipe louhel ding ahi , ” ati .
41008013	Chuin miho adalhan konga alut kit’in gallang khat’a achetai .
41008014	Seijuiten changlhah apo haiyun , kong sunga neh thei dan gneilouvin , changlhah pheng khat she bou aneiyuve .
41008015	Jesun ajahuvah , “ Ching theiyun , Pharisee ho le Herod chol lah a kihong phauvin , ” ati .
41008016	Seijiute akihou lhiuvin , “ Changlhah inei pouve , ” akitiuve .
41008017	Hichu Jesun ahen ajah-uva , “ changlhah nanei lou jeh-uva ibol’a kihou lhi chet chut nahiuvem ? Tugeiya hejong hekhen louva lungmoh gam nahiu hitam ?
41008018	Mit nineiya namu thei lou , nakhang nineia najah thielouvu ham ? Gel jong nageldoh lou mong uham ?
41008019	Mi sang nga lah a changlhah pheng nga kahoppeh a chu anong paipeh ijat nalodoh um ? ” atileh ; “ Paipeh som le ni , ” atiuve .
41008020	Mi sang li lah a changlhah pheng sagi kahopeh a Chula anong longkai dim ijat nalodohuvem ? ” atileh ; amahon , “ Longkai sagi ” atiuvin ,
41008021	hijeh chun ajah-uvah , “ Nahet khenu hitam ? ” ati .
41008022	Bethsaida ahung lhung rauve . Hichun mitcho mi khat Jesu henga ahinpuiyun , atham din ataovui .
41008023	Jesun mitchopa chu khopam langa apuidoh-in , amit te nia chil aphin achunga khut angapjouvin ajah a , “ Ipi pi na mun ? ” tin adonge .
41008024	Ama adah-in , “ Mihem kamun , thingphung holheh lheh ahin , ahivangin ava leu kamui , ” ati .
41008025	Amit te ni thampeh leh kichentah-in kho amutai . Ama jong adamin gamla tah a thil ho geiyin kichentah-in amutheitai .
41008026	Hichun , “ Khosunga lutda tan , ” tin , ainlama asol mangin ahi .
41008027	Jesu le aseijuite Casarea Philippi khoneo hoa ache leuvin , lampia Jesun aseijite jah a , “ Mihon Keima hi koi ahi , eitiuvem ? ” tin adonge .
41008028	Amahon , “ Mi phabep’in , ‘ John Baptist ahi , ’ atiuvin ; pha bep’in ma , ‘ Elijah ahi , ’ atiuvin ; kon khat sen vang , ‘ Themgao ho khat pen ninah ta , ’ tin aseiyui , ” atiuve .
41008029	Jesun adongin , “ Nang hon la koiba ahi neitiuvem ? ” atileh ; Peterin adonbut’in ajah a , “ Nangma Messiah chu nahi , ” ati .
41008030	Hichun aman koima jah a asei louna diuvin hakhamin akham chah-e .
41008031	Jesun ajah-uva Mihem Chapan genthei hesoh tamtah athoh a upate le Thempu pipu ho , Danthu them hon asan dauva , atha diu chule nithum jouva athodoh kit tei ding thu ahilpanin ,
41008032	ajah-uvah phongtah-in aseiye . Hichun Peterin atumin apuidohin abelhatai .
41008033	Jesu akiheiyin aseijuite aven Peter chu haphon aphohin , “ Kinung le jengin Satan , ajeh chu nangin Pathen gel bang gel louvin mihem lung gel jeng na gel’e ” ati .
41008034	Jesun aseijiute le mipi akou vin ajah-uva , : Koi hile eijuinom chu amatah kisumil hel’a athingpel akiput’a eijui ding ahi .
41008035	Ijeh-inem itile koi hile akihinso nom chun athi lo ding , amavang Keijal le Kipana Thupha jal’a thi lo jousen kihinso na anei ding ahi .
41008036	Ajeh chu min vannoi leiset pumpi neihen lang ahinkho kisuh mang ta leh ipi phat chompin tem ?
41008037	Chujongle min ahinkho lhenga ipi apeh ding ham ?
41008038	Ijemtia mikhat touvin hiche chonse lekitah lou khanga hi Kei le kathuho ajachat pi leh Mihem Chapan jong Vantil thengte toh Apa loupinaa ahung teng leh ama chu ajumso ding ahi , ” ati .
41009001	Jesun ajah-uva , “ Dih tah a kaseipeh nahiuve , hikoma ding ho lah ahin Pathen lenggam thu neitah a hung amu kah seuva thina tep kha lou ding aum’uve , ” ati
41009002	Nigup jouvin Jesun Peter le Jacob chule John toh achanguvin molsang chunga apuitouve . Chuin a-ang sunguvah avou akikhel’in ,
41009003	aponsil ho chu abanlot lot’in alhelah alh jengin , leiset’a koiman hitobangin asop bang theipoi .
41009004	Hichun Elijah le Mose ahenguva ahung kilah lhonin Jesu toh akihou lim’uve .
41009005	Hichea hin Peterin Jesu adonbut’in , “ Rabbi , hikoma ium’u hi anome , Nang ding khat , Mose ding khat chule Elija ding khat , lhambuh thum song ung kate , ” ati .
41009006	Akichat behseh jehuva sei ding hetmoa asei ahibouve .
41009007	Chuin meilhang khat’in ahile khu’uvin , meilhang lah a kon chun ogin khat hin , “ Hiche hi kachapa deditah ahi , athu ngaiyun , ” ati .
41009008	Akimvel’u avetu leh koima dang amu tapouvin , Jesu le amaho changseh bou aumtauve .
41009009	Molchunga kona ahung kumlhah pet’un Jesun amaho chu akham chah-in , “ Mihem chapa thinaa kona thodoh kit kahsen nathilmu hi koimacha jah a seidoh hih hel’un , ” ati .
41009010	Asei chu amelchih jingun , “ Thinaa kona thodoh kit ati hi ipi aseina hintem , ” tin akidong touve .
41009011	Hijeh chun Jesu adongun , “ Ibol’a Danthu them hon Elijah hung masatei ding ahi , tia aseiyu ham ? ” atiuve .
41009012	Jesun adonbut’in , “ Elijah chu ahungin ijakai got tohsan ahung koiye ; ahile i-atileh , Mihem Chapa chun gim genthei athoh a hot le paiya kibol ding ahi , tia asumchan ding dol kisun hintem ?
41009013	Kenvang kaseipeh nahiuve , Elijah chu ahungtan , aumchan ding kisun bangin miho aning anop’in aboltauve , ” ati .
41009014	Seijuite henga ahung phat’un mipin seijuiho chu ana umchah kheh-un , Danthu them phabep’in anakinelpiuve .
41009015	Mipin Jesu amu phat’un abonchan kidang asauvin , ahenga alhai lut’uvin chibai aboh tauve .
41009016	Jesun seijuite jah a , “ Amaho khutoh ipi kinel nahiuvem ? ” atileh ;
41009017	mipilah a khat’in , “ Houhil , kachapa paomo lhagaoboh vop khat nahenga kahinpuiye .
41009018	Ama hi lhagaoboh in amat khah na chan’ah aheh lhujin , achilphon alhan , aha geljin , atahsa jong agongsuh suh jenge ; naseijuihon einodoh peh diuva kasei leh ajoupouve , ” ati .
41009019	Jesun amaho ahousal’un “ Vo tahsan bei khang mite ! Itih chan ka-umpi dding nahiuva , itih chan geiya kakho ngai ding nahiuvem ? Chapng chu kahenga hinpuiyun , ” ati .
41009020	Mihon ahenga ahinpui phat’un , lhagaoboh-in Jesu amun , chapang chu avei ngol’in aheh lhu pai jengin , achil phon alhan , tol’a chun akilih le le jeng tai .
41009021	Jesun apa jah a , “ Ahitina itih chan hitam ? ” tia adoh leh ; “ Aneova pat ahitan ,
41009022	hiti hin suhmang din agon , abang le meilhum sung , abang le twi lah a aleh lut jin ahi . Alo naje khat nahet le neikho ton neikitho piuvin , ” tin aseiye .
41009023	Jesun ajah , a “ Alo naje nahet leh ! Atahsan din ijakai ahitheisoh keiye , ” ati .
41009024	Chutah chun chapangpa pa chun ahinsam jengin , “ Katahsan’e , kalhahsamna neikithopin , ” ati .
41009025	Mipi ahenga hung lhaikhom amu phat’in Jesun lhagaoboh chu haphon aphoh-in , “ Lhagao paomo le na-ngong , amaa konin potdoh-in lang lut kit lou hel dia kaseipeh nahi , ” ati .
41009026	Hichun hatah-in apengin , chapang chu avei ngoiyin apotdoh tai . Chapang chu athi abang jengin ahileh , mi atamjon athi tahbehin agel’uve .
41009027	Jesun atuh-in akaithou leh adding jang tai .
41009028	In’a ahung lut phat’in aseijuiten guh thim chan adongun , “ I-atileh keihon kanodoh jou louvu ham ? ” atiuve .
41009029	Jesun ajah-uvah , “ Hitobang hi taona tilouvin akinodoh theipoi , ” ati .
41009030	Hikom chu adalhauvin Galilee gam ajot’un ahi ; Jesun aumna mi ahetsah nompoi .
41009031	Ajeh chu aseijuite ahilpeh-in , ajahuva , “ Mihem Chapa hi miho khut’a kipedoh ding , , amahon athauva , atha jouvu nithum nung leh toudoh kit ding ahi , ” tin aseiye .
41009032	Seijuiten asei chu ahethei pouvin , doh ding la akichauve .
41009033	Capernaum ahung lhuna insunga aumpet’un seijuite jah a , “ Lampi dunga chu ipi kinelji nahiuvem ? ” atileh ;
41009034	amaho chu lampi dunga alenpen koi hiding thu kinel ahijeh-uvin athip chet jenguve .
41009035	Jesu atouvin som le ni chu akouvin ajah-uva , “ Koi hileh amasapen hinoma chu nukhah pen a , japi lhacha pang ding ahi , ” ati .
41009036	Chuin Jesun chapang khat akeiyin amasanguva adinsah-in , akoiyin ajah-uvah ,
41009037	“ Kamin a hiche cha pang tobang khat sanga chun Eisan ahi ; Eisang chan chun Kachanga Eisan ahipon , Eisolpa geiya asana hi , ” ati .
41009038	Johnin Jesu jah-a , “ Houhil , naming a thilha nodoh pasal khat kamu’vin eiho lah a apanda jeh-in abolda din kaseipeh tauve , ” ati .
41009039	Jesun ajah-uva , “ Kham dauvin . Kamin a thil kidang bol’a koiman eiseise loi ponte .
41009040	Ajeh chu eidoulouva chu eipanhu-vah ahi .
41009041	Phatah a kaseipeh nahiuve Keiya nahijeh-un don ding twi khon khat na pechanin kipaman asantei ding ahi .
41009042	“ Hiche chapang tobang ho khat eitahsanda sah chan chu a ngonga sum hei song kikhai hen Twikhanglen a kileh lutle phajonte .
41009043	Hijeh chun nakhut’in nakipalsah le tanbongin ! Khutni neiya damun nalut sangin , khut lang beiyin hinna lutle chun aphajoi .
41009044	Damun chu alungla thimo meikong jong mitmo ahi .
41009045	Nakengin nakipalsah le , tanbongin ! Kengni neiya damuna nalelut sangun , keng lang beiya hinna nalut aphaajoi .
41009046	Damun chu alongtol jouse la thimo , amei kong jong mitmo ahi . )
41009047	Namit’in nakipal lhuh sah le kaldoh jengin , mit ni neiya damuna nalelut sangin mit lang beiya Pathen leng gama lut nang din aphajoi .
41009048	Ddamun chu alungtol jouse la thimo , ameikong jong mitmo ahi .
41009049	“ Mi jouse meiya chisoa kiso cheh ding ahi .
41009050	Chi hi aphai ; ahin chi hi alta hih leh iti naalsah kit diu ham ? Nasunga chi nei cheh-un , kichamdel’in um’uvin , ” ati .
41010001	Jesun chukom dalhan Judea gama ahungin Jordan lui agalkaitai . Mipi ahenga ahung kikhop kit phat’un , angaiyin thu ahil kittai .
41010002	Pharisee ho ahenga ahungun apatep nan , “ Pasal’in ji ada hi Dan ngai hinam ? ” atiuve .
41010003	Jesun adonbut’in ajah-uvah , “ Mose’n ipi thu napeh-uvem ? ” atileh ;
41010004	amahon , “ Mose’n kidana lekha sutpeh a da sing aphel’e , ” atiuvin ahi .
41010005	Jesun ajah-uvah , “ nalung tah jeh-uva Mose’n hiche thupeh chu anasut ahibouve .
41010006	Amavang semtil’a pat Pathenin amani pasal le numeiya a semsa ahitai .
41010007	Hijeh a chu min anu le apa adalhah a aji toh kigom ding ,
41010008	pum nimi ni hita louva tikhat pum khat hi-lhon ding ahitai .
41010009	Hijeh chun Pathen gopdsa chu mihemin sukhen hih hen , ” ati .
41010010	Insung alut kit phat’un aseijuiteen hiche thudol hiJesu adongui .
41010011	Aman ajah-uvah , “ Koi hile aji daa numei dang kichenpi jousen aji ajonkhum ahi ;
41010012	numeiyin jong aji adaa pasal dang akichenpi le ajong’ah ahi , ” ati .
41010013	Hichun atham din mihon chapang phabep Jesu henga ahin puiyui . Ahin sseijuiten ahinpuiho chu haphon anaphoh-ui .
41010014	Jesun amudoh phat’in along phamon ajah-uvah , “ Chapang ho chu kahenga hungsah-un , jada hih-uvin ; ijeh-inem itile Pathen lenggam chu hitobangte hoa bou ahiye .
41010015	Tahbeh a akseipeh nahiuve , koi hi jongle chapang thilsan banga Pathen lenggam kisan lou chu asunga lut louhel ding ahi , ” ati .
41010016	Chuin chapang ho chu apomin , achunguva khut angamin phatthei aboh tai .
41010017	Jesu lampia ahug pet’in pasal khat ahenga alhai touvin , a-ang’ah aboh khup’in ajah a , “ Houhil pha , tonsot hinna kanei theina dia ipi kabol ding ham ? ” tin adonge .
41010018	Jesun ajah a , “ Ipi dia apha neiti ham ? Pathen tilou koimacha apha aumpoi .
41010019	‘ Tol that hih-in , mitoh jong hih-in , gucha hih-in jouthun hettohsah-in pandan , dohan mi boldan , nanu napa jabol’in , ’ kiti thu peh chengse nahet chume , ” ati .
41010020	Mihaopan ajah a , “ Houhil , hichengse hi kaneocha pat kahin nit jingsa ahitai , ” ati .
41010021	Jesun avechen chet’in ahileh alungset’in , “ Bat khat nanei nalaiye , van’a gou naneina din chenlang nagou abonchan gajohin , sum chu vaichate hoppeh tan ; chutengle hungin neijuiyin , ” ati .
41010022	Mihaopan achutisei ajah phat’in amai thimkut jengin , gou haotah ahijeh chun lung himo tah-in ache mangtai .
41010023	Jesun aseijuite avegol’in ajah-uvah , “ Gou haoho dia Pathen langgama lut hahsa lheh ding ahi ! ” ati .
41010024	Jesu thusei ho jeh chun aseijuite along dong lheh jengui . Ahivangin Aman adonbut’in ajahuvah , “ Chate , Pathen lenggama lut ding chu iti hahsat hitam !
41010025	Mihao Pathen lenggam alut sangin heobil hom sunga sangongsao lut ding abaijoi , ” tin aseikit’e .
41010026	Amahon kidang asa cheh jenguvin , “ Achutile koi huhhinga umjou ding ham ? ” tin akihoutauve .
41010027	Jesun amaho aven , “ Mihem din vang hitheihoi ahipoi , Pathendin ahimopoi , ajeh chu Pathen din ijakai ahithei sohkeiye , ” ati .
41010028	Peterin , “ Neiveuvin , keihon ijakai dalhaa Nang kijuitaa , ” tin aseipantai .
41010029	Jesun adonbut’in , “ Tah beh a kaseipeh nahiuve , Leima jal le Kipana Thupha jal a in , sopi pasal numei jouse , nu le pa , chate , gam leiset ham dalhaa
41010030	bolsetna jouse jong thoh ham ham a chun tukhang jenga jong ajat jaa in , sopi numei pasal , nu , chate , chule gam leiset kimube lou ding koima aumpoi ; chujongle ahung lhung ding khanga jong tonsot hinna chang louvin umponte .
41010031	Amavang amasa tamtah nukhah ding , chule anukhah tamtah masa ding ahi , ” ati .
41010032	Jerusalem jon’a acheuleh lampi dunga Jesu amasapeh-e . Hijeh chun amahon kidang asau-vin chule anung jui ho jong akichauve . Hichun aman som le ni chu atumin apuidoh kit’in Ama chunga thilsoh ding aseipeh masah-in ,
41010033	Ven , Jerusalem jona che ihiuvin , Mihem chapa hi thempu pipu ho le Danthu them ho apehdoh diu ahin , amahon thana dia themmo achan’uva chiding namdangte apehdoh diu ahi .
41010034	Chidang namdang hon tot nopna aneiyuva chil asset khum diu , hijongle Ama nithum jou teng thoudoh ding ahi , ” ati .
41010035	Zebedee chapa te ni Jacob le John Jesu henga ahung lhonin ajah a , “ Houhil , nahenga kathum chan neibolpeh ding kadeiye , ” ati lhone .
41010036	Aman , “ Ipi bolpeh leng nadei lhon em ? ” tin adonge .
41010037	Amanin ajah a , “ Naloupinaa anjet naveiya neitousah-in , ” ati lhone .
41010038	Jesun amani jah a , “ Nathum hi nahe lhonpoi . Kadon ding khona nadon ngama , kachan ding baptize nachan ngam lhon nah em ? ” atileh ;
41010039	amanin , “ Kangame , ” ati lhontai . Ahivangin Jesun amani jah-ah , “ Kadon ding khona chu nadontei ding , kacha ding baptize jong nachantei lhon ding ahinai ,
41010040	kajet kaveiya tousah ding vang Keima peh thei ahipoi , akigonpeh ho dinga kikoi ahibouve , ” ati .
41010041	Seijui som khat’in hichu ajah phat’un Jacob le John chungah along phamo tauve .
41010042	Jesun akouvin ajah-uvah , “ Chidang namdangte lah a vaihoa kigel hon achunguva thunei tah-in vai ahomun , amilen amilalteu jong khun achunga atha neinau ajedohuve .
41010043	Nang ho lah a vang vhutilou ding ahi ; nalah-uva alen hinom chu nalhachauva pang ding ,
41010044	amasapena pan nom chu mi jouse soh apang ding ahi .
41010045	Ijeh-inem itile Mihem Chapa jeng jong jen dia hung ahipon , ajena pang ding le mi tamtah lhatdohna dia ahinkho tohdoh dinga hung joh ahibouve , ” ati .
41010046	Amaho Jerichoa ahung tauve . Aseijuite le mipi nasatah toh kilhona Jesun Jericho adalhah chun Timaeus chapa mitcho Bartimaeus khutdopa chu lampama antouve .
41010047	Mitchopan Nazareth Jesu ahi ahetdoh phat’in apengjah jengin , “ David chapa Jesu , neikhoton ! ” tin asamtai .
41010048	Mihon umthim beh din aphohsl cheh-un , ahinla ama ahapen chehjengin , “ David chapa , neikhoton , ” tin aseiye .
41010049	Hichun Jesu adingin , “ Gah kouvun , ” atileh ; mihon mitchopa akouvun ajah a , “ Kinemin , kipatdoh-in nakouve , ” atiuvin ahi .
41010050	Chutah chun apon aleh lhan , akichom jang khaileh-in Jesu henga ahung tai .
41010051	Jesun adonbut’in ajah’a , “ Ipi neibolpeh-in nati ham ? ” atileh ; mitchopan , “ Rabboni , kho neimusah-in , ” ati .
41010052	Jesun jah a , “ Chetan , natahsanin nadamsah tai , ” ati . Chutah chun aman kho amu paiyin lampia chun Jesu ajuitai .
41011001	Jerusalem kho koma Olive mol’a Bethphage le Bethany ageiyun Jesun aseijui mi ni asol’in ,
41011002	ajah a , “ Nagah galmu kho sunga khun lut lhon le chun mitouna khah lou sa-ngan nou kihen khat namupai lhon ding ahin , hinsut lhan hinkai lhonin .
41011003	Mi khat touvin , ‘ Idia nabol lhon ham ? ’ ati leh , ‘ A-Pakaiyin manna nom aneiye , hinthah vahkit tante , ’ tin seipeh lhonin , ” ati .
41011004	Amani ache lhon lehkot polam , khopi dsung lamlena sa-ngan nou kihen chu amun asut lhontai .
41011005	Chukoma ding ho khat’in , “ Ibol nahiya sa-ngan nou chu nasut lhon ham ? ” ahinti .
41011006	Amanin Jesu ahil banga asei lhon leh alhatauve .
41011007	Chuin sa-ngan nou chu Jesu henga ahinkai lhonin , achunga pon aphauvin , Jesu atoutai .
41011008	Mihon phabep’in loulaiya theoboh alhamun lampia aphauve .
41011009	Chuin anung le ama kijot chengsen : “ Huhhing hen ! Pakai min a hungpe anun nom’e !
41011010	I-Pao David lenggam hung lhung chu nun nom hen ! ” tin asamtauve .
41011011	Hichun Jesu Jerusalem khopi alut’in Houin a aluttai . Thil ijakai avetgolsoh leh nilhah lam ahitan , som le ni chutoh Bethany jonin apot dodh tauve .
41011012	Ajinga Bethany a kona ahung ki le kit phat’un Jesu agilkeltai .
41011013	Gamla thima theichang phung dod nei khat amun , aga um ding ging cha nave din achei . Ahinla aga phat ahiloujeh-in ado tilou ima dang amudoh tapoi .
41011014	Jesun theichang phung chu , “ Tukal’in koiman naga nekit hih hel hen , ” atileh ; hichu aseijuiten ajauve .
41011015	Jerusalem ahung lhungun Jesu Houina alut’in asunga thiljoh le thil cho ho anodoh-in , sum lheng ho dokhang joouse le vapal joh ho touna alikhup peh-in ,
41011016	Houin sunga koi ma thil apoh le sah tapoi .
41011017	Miho ahil’in , “ Ka-in chu namtin dia taona in kiti ding ahi , ’ tia kisun hilou ham ? Nang hon gucha michomho kikholnan nasemdoh tauve , ” ati .
41011018	Thempu pipu ho le Danthu them hon ajauvin , suhmangna ding lampi aholtauve . Ahinla amihil chu mipin kidang asah cheh jeh-un akichauvin ahi .
41011019	Nilhah ahi phat’in Jesu le aseijuite khopia konin apotdoh tauve .
41011020	Jingpi tah-in thiechang phung chu ahinho paule , ajung ajaa agop jeng chu amu’uve .
41011021	Thilsoh chu Peterin agel doh phat’in Jesu jah a , “ Rabbi , ven , theichang phung na gaosap chu agoptai , ” atileh ;
41011022	Jesun ajah-uva , “ Pathen tahsanun .
41011023	Tahbeh a kaseipeh nahiuve , koi hile alungthima ginchat lelna beihel’a hiche mol khu ‘ Kitol’in twikhanglen’ah kileh lut jengin , ’ tia asei banga soh tei dia tahsan chun , asei bang banga soh ding ahi .
41011024	Hijeh a chu najah-uva kasei ahi , nataovuva thil nathum jouseu namusen gel leu chun namu diu ahi .
41011025	Tao dia nadin pet le van’a um na-pan Jong nasuh khel jouseu angaidam theina din , koi itobang hijongle nalungdou chu ngaidamin .
41011026	( Nang hon mi na-Pauvin jong nasuh khel’u angaidam lou ding ahi ) .
41011027	Jerusalema ahungkit tauve . Jesu Houin sunga ava le pet’in Thempu pipu hole Danthu themho chule upa ho ahenga ahungun ajah-ah ,
41011028	“ Ipi tha neina a hiti ho hi nabol ham ? Hicheng bolna ding hi kon tha napeh ham ? ” tin adongui .
41011029	Jesun ajah-uvah , “ Nang ho thu khat dong inge , neidonbut’un , chutengleh ipi tha neinaa hiti ho hi kabol seipeh nauvinge .
41011030	John Baptist chu van’a kon ha mihema kon ham ? Neidonbut’un ” ati .
41011031	Amaho akinelden tauvin , ” ‘ Vana kon ahi , ’ tileu hen la , ‘ Ahileh ibol’a natahsan louvu ham ? ” tin tin ;
41011032	Mihema kon ahi , ’ iti diu ham ? ” akitiuve . Ahinla mipin John hi Themgao dih a agel jeh-in akichauvin ahi .
41011033	Hijeh chun Jesu jah a , “ Kahepouve , ” atiuve . Chuphat’in ajah-uva , “ ken jong ipi tha neinaa hichenghi kabol ahi naseipeh pouvinge , ” atitai .
41012001	Jesun ajah-uvah thulemin thu aseipanin , “ Pasal khat’in lengpilei abol’in , tho akaikhumin , lengpiga chilna din khuh alaiyin , thing chung buh asan , chuin aleilhouho apedodh-in khol’a achetai .
41012002	Lengpiga lhun phat donin achan ding lengpiga la din aleilhouho henga soh khat asol’e .
41012003	Aleilhou hon sohpa chu amanun avouvin khutgoh keovin asoltauve .
41012004	“ Ahin asoh khat asol kittai . Hichepa hi aluchang mapun alhauvin , jachat umtah-in anbol’ui .
41012005	Soh , chom khatma asol kit leh , amahi athat tauve . Hitobang hin soh tampi , abang avouvin , adangse athat’ui .
41012006	Aman Chapa chang khat bou aneitai . Akhon nan , ‘ Kachapa hi anajabol khat’u leh , ’ tin ahenguva asol tai .
41012007	Ahinla lengpilei lhou ho chun , ‘ Hichepa hi agoulopa ahi , hungun that’u hitin agoulo ding eiho change hite , ’ akitiuvin ;
41012008	amanun atha jou phat’uvin lengpilei polam’ah apaidoh tauve .
41012009	Lengpilei neipan ipi bol tantem ? Ama hung kona aleilhouo ho asuh mang ding , lengpilei chu mi chomdang apeh ding ahi .
41012010	Nang ho , ‘ In sahon adeimouva apaiyu song chu , In ninga khomdetpenin apangtai ;
41012011	Hiche hi Pakai bol ahin , Imit vet’uva thil kidangtah ahi , ’ tia kisun Pathen lekhabua chu nasim khah lou laiyu ham ? ” ati .
41012012	Amahon athulem sei chu agot nauva asei ahi aheuvin , mat din agouve ; ahinla mipi agin jeh-un ada lhauvin ache mangtauve .
41012013	Jesu chu kinelpia gaman din Pharisee loi phabep le Herodias loi phabep ahenga asoltauve .
41012014	Amaho chu ahungun ajah a , “ Houhil , midih tah nahin , koi mai jamana thilbol jong hilou Pathen lamdih bou nahilji kaheuve . Caesar henga mikai kapeh-u Dan ngai hi na hilou ham ? Kapeh diu ha kapeh da diu ham ? ” atiuve .
41012015	Jesun akiphat lhemsah-u ahen ajah-uvah , “ Idia neilung lah-u ham ? Denarius khat hinchoiyun venge , ” ati .
41012016	Ahinchoi phat’un , “ Hiche hi koi lim le koi min ham ? ” atileh ; amahon , “ Caesar’a , ” atiuve .
41012017	Hichun Jesun ajah-uva , “ Caesar thil chu Caesar pauvin , Pathen thil chu Pathen peuvin , ” ati . Hichun amah on adatmo lheh jengui .
41012018	Mithisa thokit tahsan lou sadducee loi Jesu henga ahungun ajah a ,
41012019	“ Houhil ’ Mose’n ‘ Pasal khat’in cha anei masanga aji athi le asopipan meithaini chu avet’a asopipa chu akhaipeh ding ahi , ” tin ei sut peh-ui .
41012020	Sopi pasal sagite aumun , a-upapen ajinei jouvin chikhai louvin aumtai .
41012021	Anichanna pan avetpeh kit leh amajong chikhai louman athin , chuin athum lhinna pa jong chutiman aumtai .
41012022	Hiti hin khat chan jong chu akhai apouve . Achainan numeinu jong athitai .
41012023	Mithi thikitnaa athodoh tengu leh hiche nu hi koipen ji hitan tem ? Ajeh chu asagiuva jia anei cheh-u ahi , ” tin adongui .
41012024	Jesun adonbut’in ajah-uva , “ Pathen lekhabu le athahat nahetjoh sangu aum loujeh a hiba nakheljiu hilouham ?
41012025	Ijeh-inem itile mihem thinaa kona athodoh tengleh kichen abol paovin , kicheng din jong akilato tapouve ; van’a Vantilte tobang ahitauve .
41012026	Mithi thokit thudol kisutna , Pathenin , ‘ Keima Abraham Pathen , Isaac pathen chule Jacob Pathen kahi , ’ atina nasim khah lou laiyu ham ?
41012027	Ama mithi ho Pathen ahipon , mihing ho Pathenjoh ahi . Nagel khel lheh-ui , ” ati .
41012028	Danthu them ho khat ahung leh akinel’u ajan , Jesun kitoh tah a adonbut amun ajah a , “ Thupeh lah a amasapen ipi ham ? ” atileh ;
41012029	Jesun adonbut’in , “ Thupah masapen chu , ‘ Ngaiyuvin vo Israel , Pakai i-Pathenu chu Pakai khatseh bou ahi ;
41012030	hijeh a chu nangman pakai na-Pathen chu nalungthim pumpia , nahinkho pumpia , nalung gel jouse leh natha neina jousea na-ngailut ding ahi , ’ kiti ahin ;
41012031	anina chu , ‘ Nangma naki-ngailut banga naheng nakom na-ngailut ding ahi , ’ akiti . Hiche te ni sanga thupijo thupeh dang aumpoi , ’ ati .
41012032	Hichun Danthu thempan ajah a , “ Adih-e Houhil , Pathen khatseh tilou adang aumpoi , nati hi adih-in ,
41012033	Ama chu lungthim pumpi le hetna pumpia chule tha neina jousea ngai lut’a chule eima ki-ngailut banga heng le kom ngailut kiti ho hi pumgo thilto le kilhaina gantha jouse sangin athupijoi , nati hi naseidih lheh-e , ” ati .
41012034	Hetoh thema adonbut hi Jesun ahen ajah a , “ Pathen lenggam to nakilat poi , ” ati . Chukal’in koiman thu adong ngam tapoi .
41012035	Houin a thu ahil pet’in Jeun , “ I-atileh Danthu themhon Messiah chu David guiya peng ding ai atiu ham ?
41012036	Lhagao Thenga konin David amatah-in , ‘ Pakai chun ka-Pakai jah a , Keiman namelmate nakeng chotpha kakoisah masangsen , Kajet lama tou jingin , ’ atin ;
41012037	David amatah-in ‘ Pakai ’ asah leh , iti ama guiya peng hithei ding ham ? ” tin adonge . Mipin Jesu thuhil chukipah thanom tah-in angaiyui .
41012038	Jesun athuhilnaa chun , “ Ching theiyun , thepna sangkhol chol ki-ah a vah le nom kailhang dunga min asalam ding deiya ,
41012039	Houthua kikhopna in dunga touna pipen dei , golvahna mun jousea munpha hola ho ,
41012040	mei thaiho bahgama , mi mu dia sottah tah taoji hoa konin kihong phauvin , amaho hithemmo chugnnung chang diu ahi , ” ati .
41012041	Jesu Houin sum kholna maitah a atouvin , mihon sumkholna sunga sum alhah-u chu avei . Mihao hon sum tampi pi alhah lut’ui .
41012042	Meithai vaicha khat ahungin , paisa kha ttoh kikot sumsan nongsi ni alhah lut’e .
41012043	Jesun aseijuite akouvin ajah-uvah , “ Tahbeh a akseipeh nahiuve , hiche meithai vaichanu hin midang jouse sangin sumkholna sunga atoh tam pen’e .
41012044	Ajeh chu mihon aneival’u atou ahin , hiche numei hin avaichat lheh vangin akivah hingna ding anei chasun aboncha ato ahitai , ” ati .
41013001	Jesu Houina apotdoh pet’in aseijuite khat’in ajah a , “ Houhil ven , ipi song kimanga hitobang inhoi kisa hitam ! ” ati .
41013002	Jesun ajah a , “ Hiche in loupitah kisa hinamu ong ? Kisumanga song khat chunga song kise-thom him him umlou ding ahi , ” ati .
41013003	Houin to kigalsai Olive mol’a Jesu atoupet’in Peter le Jacob , John le Andrew’in guh thim chan adongun ,
41013004	“ Naseiho hi itih le hung lhunga , hichengse kichaisohna ding hi amelchihna ipi hiding ham , neiseipeh-un , ” atiuve .
41013005	Jesun ajah-uvah , “ Koiman nalhep chatvai louna diiuvin ching theiyun .
41013006	Mi tampi kamin’a hunguva , ‘ kei ama chu kahi , ’ tia mi alhep chatvai diu ahi .
41013007	Gal kisat husa le thuthang najah tenguleh kicha hih-un . Hichu soh tei ding ahi , achaina hilou lai ding ahi .
41013008	Ajeh chu nam le nam hung kidouva , lenggam le lenggam kidou ding ; muntin’a ling kihot’a , kel lha ding , hicheng hi gim genthei kipatna ahitai .
41013009	“ Nang ho ching theiyun ; min namat’uva houvaipoloi kikhopna nakailut diu , Houthua kikhopna in dunga navoh-uva , gamvaipo ho le leng ho ang sung jenga jong hettoh sah-a pang dinga nakidinsah nalai diu ahi .
41013010	Amavang namtin vaipia Kipana Thupha kiseiphong masa tei ding ahiye .
41013011	Min namat’uva napeh doh tengu le ipi sei ding lung kham masa hih-un , amavang apettah a nakiseipeh pen pen sei jengun ; ijeh-inem itile aseiya nang ho hilouvin Lhagao Theng ahibouve .
41013012	Sopin asopipa , pan acha tha dia ahinpeh doh idng , chate anu le apa chunga chungsoh a atha lo diu ahi .
41013013	Keima min’jal’a mi jousen nahot diu , hi jongleh akhonna geiya thoh lhumpa bou huhhinga um ding ahi .
41013014	“ Misumang thet umtah chu adinna dol louva ding namu tengule ( asim sim’an he hen ) , Judea gama um ho thinglhang lama jamu hen ;
41013015	intingvuma umpa jong kum lhah da hen , a-insunga thil kilah din jong galut da hen ;
41013016	loujaova um jong avon kilah din kile kit hih hen .
41013017	Ohe , chulaiya numei gai le nao noichep neiho ada ahiuve !
41013018	Hiche phat hi phalbi lai ahilouna din taovun ,
41013019	ajeh chu hiche hi hesoh gen theina nasatah hiding ahin , hitobang hi Pathenin vannoi asemtil’a pat soh khalou lai ahin , soh jong soh kit lou idng ahi .
41013020	Pakaiyin aphat hi asuh chomlou hileh mihing koima sohcha louhel ding ahi , hijeh a chu alhenchomte jal’a aphat asuh chom ahi .
41013021	“ Hiche phat hileh khat touvin najah-uva , ‘ Ven , hikomah Messiah aume , ’ atia , ‘ Ven khukomah aume , ’ atijongle tahsan hih-un .
41013022	Ijeh-inem itile Messiah lhem ho le Themgao lhem ho hungsoh dodh-un tin , mi lhep lhahna ding le ajochan a lhen chomte geiya lhep lhahna dia melchihna tampi le thil kidang tampi abol diu ahi .
41013023	Ching theiyun ijakai kahil masah dem nahitauve .
41013024	“ Chulaiya gim genthei kichaijou tah le , ‘ Nisa thimin tin , Lha jong vah lou ding ,
41013025	vanlaijol’a ahsite pul lhantin , Van’a thaneina chengse kihot lingsoh ding ahi , ’ akiti .
41013026	Chutah le Mihem Chapa tha neitah le loupe tah a meiloma hung mihon amudiu ahi .
41013027	Chuteng Aman a-Vantilte sol’in tin kol kimvel ninglia leiset monga pat van mong geiya alhen chomte akhop khom diu ahi .
41013028	“ Theichang phunga konin thulem kihil’un : abah adot’a ajih akilhap teng nipi nai naheuve .
41013029	Hitobanga chu thilsoh hicheng hi namu tengu le phat anaiya kotbul ahung gei nahet diu ahi .
41013030	Tahbeh a kaseipeh nahiuve , thil hichengse hi aso kahsea tukhang hi kichai lou ding ahi .
41013031	Van le leiset mang ding ahin , kathusei ho vang mang lou ding ahi .
41013032	“ Pa tilou anikho le anidan tah chu va’a Vantilte le Chapan jong , koiman ahepoi .
41013033	Aphat nahet loujeh-uvin ching theiyun , kiging jingun .
41013034	Hiche hi mikhat’in asohte atoh ding cheh a ngansea , kotngah pa jong kiging jing dia seipeh a , chujouva a-insung dalhaa kholgamla tah a che mang tobang ahi .
41013035	Hijeh chun kiging jingun , in neipa itih le hung ding nahepouve ; nilhah ham , khangkim ham , ah-khon ham , jingkah ham a hung thie ahi .
41013036	Photlot louva hunga na-ihmut pet’u atokhah louna dia
41013037	najah-uva kaseipeh hi mi jouse kaseipeh ahitai , kigingun , ” ati .
41014001	Kalchuhkut le cholsolou changlhah kut bolna ding ni nibou aumtan , Thempu pipu ho le Danthu themhon Jesu chu doha bol’a mat’a chule thana thei ding aholtauve .
41014002	Amahon , “ Ajo le japi lah a boina um get’inte , kut sung hida hen , ” atiuvin ahi .
41014003	Bethany khoa Simon miphahpa in’a Jesun ankong aumpet’in numei khat’in songval hai kaht’in nard thao namtui man tamtah ahin choiyin , ahai avokeh-in thaotwi chu Jesu luchunga asun khume .
41014004	Alah-uva mi kon khat along himouvin , “ Ibol’a hitobang thao namtui hi komoh suh mang ham ?
41014005	Denarii jathumval a joh a mivaichate peh thei khula ahin , ” atiuvin , amanu chunga aphuntauve .
41014006	Jesun vang , “ Hiche nu chu limsah dauvin , ibol’a nasuh lunggimu ham ? Aman thilpha tah eibolpeh ahi .
41014007	Ajeh chu vaicha gentheite nakom’uva aum jingin , nagot chan’a thilpha nabolpeh theiyu ahi , Keivang nakom’uva um jing ponge .
41014008	Aman ajokham kham ahung bol’a , kalong hi vui dia thao einu masah ahi .
41014009	Tahbeh a kaseipeh nahiuve , vannoiya Kipana Thupha kiseiphongna chan’a athilbol hiamanu het jingna dia kisei thapeh ding ahi , ” ati .
41014010	Seijiu som le nil ah a khat Judas Iscariot chu Jesu pedoh din Thempu ho henga achetai .
41014011	Amahon ajah phat’un akipah-un sum peh din atep’ui . Judas chun amat theina din agomkom aching lhi’e .
41014012	Cholsolou changlhah kut ni masa kalchuhkut gantha nin Jesu seijuiten ajah a , “ Kalhchuhkut an naneh na ding hoikom mun gago leu veng nadeiyem ? ” tin adongui .
41014013	Aman aseijui mi ni asol’in ajah lhona , “ Khopi sunga lut lhon le chun twibel pua pasal khat toh lhonin natin , ama chu jui lhonin ,
41014014	alutna in-neipu jah a , ‘ Houhil’in , “ Kaseijuite toh kalchuhkut an kanehna ding ka-indan chu hoilai ham ? ” tin ahol’e , ’ gati lhonin .
41014015	Chuteng aman inching dan lentah , suhngimsa gotsa kikoi khat navetsah lhonin tin , hikoma chun ibonchauva din anagong lhontan , ” ati .
41014016	Seijuite ni achen , khopi sunga alut’in , thil ijakai asei bangin agatoh-in , kalchuhkut anagong lhone .
41014017	Nilhah ahiphat’in Jesu som le ni chutoh ahungtai .
41014018	Chuin touva an aneh laitah-un Jesun , “ Tahbeh a akseipeh nahiuve , nalah-uva khat , kaneh khompipa tah hi eipedoh a pang ding ahi , ” atitai .
41014019	Hichun alungkham pantauvin , khat khat’in ajah-ah , “ Keivang kahilou ahinai ong ? ” tin adonguve .
41014020	Jesun ajah-uvah , “ Som le nilah a khat , lhenga changlhah kadekot khompi pa hi ahi .
41014021	Miihem Chapa vang chu aumchan didng kisun banga chetei ding ahin , ahivangin amajeh a Mihem Chapa kimat lo dingpa chu , ohe , ada na’e ! penglou hileh ama dia phajo ta dinga ! ” ati .
41014022	An aneh laitah-un Jesun changlhah alan phatthei aboh jouvin aheh bal bal’in amaho apen , “ Kilah-un , hiche hi katahsa ahi , ” ati .
41014023	Khon jong chu alan athang vah jouvin amaho apen , abon Chauvin khona chun adonsoh keiyui .
41014024	Chuin ajah-uvah , “ Hiche hi mi tamtah dinga kilhoh lha , kathisana kitepna ahi .
41014025	Tahbeh a kaseipeh nahiuve , Pathen lenggama athah kadon kit ding nikho hung lhun kahsea lengpiga twi hi kadon lou ding ahitai , ” ati .
41014026	Chuin la asah jouvun Olive mol lam jonin achedoh tauve .
41014027	Jesun ajah-uva , “ Nang ho nakipal lhuhsoh diu ahi , ajeh chu , ‘ kelngoi Chingpa kavoh lhuh a kelngoite chehgam diu ahi , ’ tin akisune .
41014028	Hijongle kathodoh jou teng Galilee gam lhung masajo ding kahi , ” ati .
41014029	Peterin adonbut’in “ Khat khat’in kipal lhu jong leu keivang kipal lhu ponge , ” ati .
41014030	Jesun ajah a , “ Tahbeh a kaseipeh nahi , tujanle lea ah nivei akhon masanga thumvei neiseilep ding ahi , ” ati .
41014031	Ahinla Peterin , “ Nang to kathi tha tei ding , kaseilep louhel ding ahi , ” atichang mel’e . Abonchauvin achutisei cheh-uve .
41014032	Gethsemane kiti mun ahinphah phat’un Jesun aseijuite jah a , “ Kagatao sungsen hikom’ah anatou jingun , ” ati .
41014033	Chuin Peter le Jacob chule John apuiyin , kidang asa behseh-in nasatah-in alunghem pantai .
41014034	Hijeh chun ajah-uvah , “ Thina khop hel’in kalung hesoh tai , hikoma umun kiging jinguvin , ” ati .
41014035	Chule masang lama phabep ache chonin , tol’ah akhup boh-in alhun , ahitheile hiche phat chu akoma kona kitol mang din ijakai ahitheiye , hiche khon hi keiya konin tolmang tan ; hinla Kei dei hilouvin Nang deijoh hihen , ” ati .
41014037	Ahung phat’in khatte ho a-ihmut lhuh-u atoh khan , Peter jah a , “ Simon , na-ihmut hitam ? Nidan khat jeng jong kiginga umjou lou nahim ?
41014038	Lhepna nalhah louna diuvin kigingin tao jingun . Lhagaovin ago lheh nan , tahsa alhasame , “ ati .
41014039	Achedoh kit’in asei ngai bang seiyin agataove .
41014040	Chuin ahungkit leh a-ihmut lhuh-u ahung toh khan , mit phah chet’a anaum jeh-un adonbutje jong ahetapouve .
41014041	Thumvei channa ahung chun ajah-uvah , “ Ihmua kicholdo nalai nahiu ong ? Aphasettai ! Nidan alhinge ! Mihem Chapa hi michonsete khut’a pehdoh a um ahitai .
41014042	Kipat’un chetaute . Ven , eipedoh pan eihin phatauve , ” ati .
41014043	Jesun thu asei nalaiyin , som le nil ah a khat , Judas chu Thempu pipu ho le Danthu themhoa kona , chemjam le moltum thoa hung miho chutoh ahung paitai .
41014044	Apedoh pan miho melchihna ahil masan , “ kachop pen pen chu Ama ahi , manun lang kitup keichan kai mang tauvin , ” ati .
41014045	Judas ahung lhunin Jesu ajon paiyin , “ Rabbi , ” tin achoptai .
41014046	Mihon achung’ah khut alhauvin amantauve .
41014047	Akoma ding ho khat chun chemjam asatdoh-in Thempulen sohpa asat jeng leh abilkol asat lhai .
41014048	Hichun Jesun ajah-uvah , “ Gucha michom man ding banga , Kei man dia chemjam le moltum thoa hungkon nahiu ong ?
41014049	Niseh a Houina thu kahil chunla neiman pouvin . Ama vang Pathen lekhabua kiseisa thu guilhung hiya hi , ” ati .
41014050	Chutah-in aloiten adalhauvin ajamtauve .
41014051	Tupat ponnem khatseh sil gollhang khat jesu nungjui ahin , ama hi amat’u leh ,
41014052	tupat ponnem chu dalhan asagoh keovin ajam mangtai .
41014053	Jesu chu Thempulen henga apuiyun , Thempu pipu ho le upa ho chule Danthu them chengse akikhomsohkeiyui .
41014054	Peterin galkanga ajuipeh-in Thempulen leltol geiyon ajui luttai . Chuin lhacha ho to atoukhomin mei a-oiye .
41014055	Thempupipu hole Hou vaipoloise sen Jesu thana thei hehsetna hettohsah ahol’un amu joupouve .
41014056	Ajeh chu mitampin Jesu hehsetna hettohsah asei vangun , akitoh hih-ui .
41014057	Chuin miphabep adingdohun jouthun ahehseuvin ,
41014058	“ Amahin , ‘ Hiche khut’a kisa Houin hi suseng ting , nithum sunga khut’a sah lou achom khat katundoh ding ahi , ’ tia asei kajaove , ” atiuvin ahi .
41014059	Hichea jong hin akitoh kit pouve .
41014060	Chuphat’in Thempulen chu alah-uva adingdoh-in Jesu adongin , “ nadonbut lou ding ham ? Hite hon nahehset nau hi ipiba ham ? ” atileh ;
41014061	Jesu athip behin , adonbut poi . Thempulen chun adong kit’in ajah a , “ Nangma nun nom Chapa , Messiah chu nahim ? ” atileh ;
41014062	Jesun , “ Kahi ; Nang hon Mihem Chapa chu Tha neipen jet lama touva , Vanlaijol meilom lah a hung namu diu ahina laiye , ” ati .
41014063	Chutah chun Thempulen chun athemputna sangkhol abot eh-in , “ Hettohsah dang iding ititah diu ham ?
41014064	Pathen ataitom na naja cheh tauve . I-lo ding natiuvam ? ” atileh ; abonchauvin athi dia lomin athemmosah tauve .
41014065	Abangin chil asset khumin , chuin amai atomun avouvin , ajah-ah , “ Gaovin , ” atiuvin ; chuin lhachahon amanun angeiphe abengun , hiti hin abolpan tauve .
41014066	Peter noiolam leitol’ah aum nalaiyin , Thempulen soh nu-ngah khat ahungin
41014067	Peter mei oi chu amui . Peter aven , “ Nang hi Nazareth Jesu toh kiloisa nahi , ” ati .
41014068	Peterin aseilep tan , “ Kahepoi , ipi nasei ham kahe chenpoi , ” atin , leitol maiya apotdoh le ah akhongtai .
41014069	Soh nu-ngah chun amudohin avel’a ding ho jah din , “ Hichepa vang hi amaho loi khat ahi , ” ati pan kitai .
41014070	Paterin aseilep kit’e . Chomkhat jouvin akoma ding hon Peter jah a , “ Nang hi amaho loi khat mong mong nahibouve , ajehchu Galilee gam mi nahi , ” atiuve .
41014071	Ahivangin Peterin kigaosap le kihahsel athopanin , “ naseipau hi kahekhpaoi , ” ati .
41014072	Chutah-in ah lailha akhongpaitai . Hichun Peterin , “ Ah nivei akhon kah a thumvei neisilep ding ahi , ” tia Jesun asei chu agel doh-in alungna behseh-in hakan akaptai .
41015001	Jingpi tah-in Thempuho le upaho , Ddanthu them ho le Hou vaipolai chengse akihoutoh paiyun , Jesu akan’un Pilate henga akaitauve .
41015002	Pilate chun Jesu adongin , “ Judate lengpa nahim ? ” atileh ; Aman adonbut’in ajah a , ‘ Nangsei ahi , ” ati .
41015003	Thempu pipuhon jong thu tampin ahehse se jengui .
41015004	Pilate chun adong kit’in , “ Nadonbut lou ding ham ? Ven , nahehset set jengu khu ? ”
41015005	Jesun adonbut louhel phat’in Pilate’n adatmo lheh jenge .
41015006	Kut sunga mihon athumpen pen sohchang khat Pilate’n alhadoh pehji ahi .
41015007	Kivaipoh deimoa galbol mithah ho toh songkul’a kihentha amin Barabbas kiti anaume .
41015008	Mipi akitol touvun Pilate’n sohchang alhadohpeh nagi banga bolpeh din angeh pantauve .
41015009	Pilate’n adonbut’in ajah-uva “ Judate lengpa hi lhadoh peh leng nadeiyum ? ” ati .
41015010	Ajeh chu Thempu pipuhon thangset suma apehdoh-u ahet ahi .
41015011	Ahinla Thempu pipuhon Barabbas joh alhadoh pehna diuvin mipi atilseuve .
41015012	Pilate chun adonbut kit’in ajah-uva , “ Acutile Juddate lengpa ahi natipau hi i-kalo ding ba ham ? ” atileh ;
41015013	“ Thingpel’a khenbeh-in ! ” tin asamtauve .
41015014	Hichun Pilate’n ajah-uvah “ Ibol-inem ? Ipi suhset aneiyem ? ” atileh ; amahon , “ Thingpel’a khen beh-in ! ” tin ahasap cheh tauve .
41015015	Mipi along lhaisah nom jeh-in Pilaate’n Barabbas alhadoh peh-in , Jesu joh chu ajep jouvin thingpel’a khetbeh din apedohtai .
41015016	Sepaihon Jesu chu gamvaipopa inpi thutanna lhong laiya akailut’un , sepia hon pumpi akoukhom tauve .
41015017	Chuin Jesu chu ponsandup asilpeh-un , ling lukhuh apheh’un akhuh peh-uvin ,
41015018	salam abol’un , “ Hingsot’in Judate lengpa ! ” atiuve .
41015019	peng tenggol khat’in alu avouvin , chil asset khum’ui ; a-anga dilsun akun’uve .
41015020	A-el el-a tot nopna anei jouvun ponsandup chu ahoh lhauvin Ama pon asilpeh tauve . Jesu chu thingpel’a khetbeh din apuidoh tauve .
41015021	Loujaova kona hintoh kha , Cyrene gam mi , Alexander le Rufus pa , Simon chu sepaihon acham louvin aman’un Jesu thingpel aputsah-ui .
41015022	Jesu chu “ Lugu mun ” Kiti Golgotha alhut tauve .
41015023	Myrrh le lengpitwi kihal apeh vangun Jesun adonpoi .
41015024	Hichun thingpel’a akhenbeh-un aponsil jouse chu koi ipi chang dingahmtin vang asanun akihomtauve .
41015025	Thingpel’a Jesu akhetbeh nau chu jingkah lam nidan ko ahi .
41015026	Achung thu hehsetna kisun chu , “ Judate lengpa , ” tia kijih ahi .
41015027	Gucha hi , Jesu jet le veiya akhetbeh thauve .
41015028	( Hichea hin , “ Aman Dan sukeh ho toh akisim thatai , ” tia kisei Pathen lekhabu thuchu aguilhung tai . )
41015029	Ajotpa jousen akhasuh khumun , a-engkal nan , ‘ Kadah , Houin susea nithum sunga tungdoh ding pa ,
41015030	kihuhhingin lang thongpel chunga koin hung kumlha tang-em ! ” atiuve .
41015031	Hitobang hin Thempu pipu ho le Danthu themhon kidai naa aneiyun , “ Midang la ahuhingnan , Ama akihuhing joupoi ,
41015032	Kamu’uva katahsan theina diiuvin Israel lengpa Messiah chu tutah hin thingpel chunga konin hung kumlhan tem hen , ” atiuve . Ama toh thingpel’a kikhetbeh tha te ni geiyin ahouse lhontai .
41015033	Nidan som le ni sunkima pat nilhah nidan thum geiyin leiset pumpi chunga mu athimtai .
41015034	Nilhah nida thum chun Jesu hapenin apengin , “ Ka-Pathen , Ka-Pathen , ibol’a neilha hitam ? ” tinan “ Eloi , Eloi lema sabachthni ? ” atileh ;
41015035	akoma ding ho phabep’in ajauvin , “ ven , Elijah akouve , ” atiuve .
41015036	Hichun mikhat alhaijel’in lengpitwi thuh lah a twichoppon ase-lhop’in , peng tenggol leh a atah-in adon din agah pen , ‘ Limsah hih-un , adomlha dia Elijah hung nam veu hite , ” ati .
41015037	Hichun Jesu hapenin apengin atantai .
41015038	Chutah chun Houin pondal len chu ahunga pat anoi geiyin kehni akison , a-eh lhangtai .
41015039	Akoma ding sepia jalamkaipan hitobanga athi amun , “ Hichepa hi Pathen Chapa mong mong ah ! ” tin aseitai .
41015040	Numei phabep’in jong galkanga pat’in aven , alah-uva Magdalene Mary le Jacob neojo le Joseph nu Mary , chule Salome apangin ,
41015041	Jesu Galilee gama alenlaiya juilea alhacha ho ahiuve ; Chule numei dang tampi Jesun Jerusalema ahin lhontoupi hojong ahiuve .
41015042	Nilhah lam ahitan , Choldo nikho dia kigot ni ma ahin ,
41015043	Arimathea khoa vaipo gin le ja umtah , Pathen lenggam ngah jinga um Joseph chu achen , Pilate henga ngampel’in alut’in Jesu long chu agathume .
41015044	Athivah jeng chu Pilatein kidang asan , sepia jalam kai chu akouvin , athina sottam tin adonge .
41015045	Sepai jalamkaipaa kona het chet phat’in Pilatein Jesu long chu Joseph apetai .
41015046	Josephin tupat ponnem khat achon , Jesu long chu adom lhan , atomin songlhan kilao dsunga chun alupsah-in , lhankot achun song khat atang lut’in asingtai .
41015047	Magdalene Mary le Joseph nu Mary Jesu alupsahna chu avelhi jinglhone .
41016001	Choldo ni akichai phat’in Magdalene Mary le Jacob nu Mary chule Salome hicheng hi chea Jesu long nu nam din lou namtui achouve .
41016002	Hapta ni masa ni , jingpi matah , nisa so-thin thenin numeiho chu lhan phung’ah ahungui .
41016003	Numei ho chun , “ Lhankot sin song kon eitahdoh peh diu ham ? ” tin akihouvun ahi .
41016004	Song chu lentah ahin , agah vet’u leh tahsohsan aumtai .
41016005	Lhan sung a agalut’u leh ponbang sil’a gollhang khat jet lama anatouvin , akinlih deh jenguve .
41016006	Ama chun ajah-uvah , “ Kicha hin-un , thingpel’a kithahsa Nazareth Jesu nahol’u ahin , Ama athoudoh-in hikom’ah aumtapoi . Ven , hikoma hi alupsah-u ahi .
41016007	Chule kile kit’un langa aseijuite le Peter jah a , “ Ama nang ho sangin Galilee gam alhung masatai . Najah-uva aseisa banga chua Ama namu diu ahi , ’ tin gaseipeh-un ati .
41016008	Amaho lhana konin ahung potdoh-un helouvin ajamtauve . Atijat behseh jeh-un koima imacha aseipeh pouvin ahi .
41016009	Hapta ni-masapen ni , jingpia athodoh jouvin masanga asunga thilha sagi anodohnanu Magdalene Mary henga Jesu akilah masapen’e .
41016010	Amanu achen Jesu kiloipisa , ahijeh a lunghema kapte ho agaseipeh-e .
41016011	Amahon Jesu ahindoh a Mary akimusah ajah vangun atahsan pouve .
41016012	Hiche nung hin Jesun alah-uva mi ni gamlang jon’a ache na lhona lim chombeh pun akimusah-in ahi .
41016013	Amani chea adang ho agaseipeh lhon vangin , amani thusei geiyin atahsan deh pouve .
41016014	Chujouvin som le khat’in ankong aum laitah-un Jesu ahenguva akilah-in , athodoh jouva amuho thusei atahsan loujeh-u leh alungtah jeh-un aphoh-in ahousal’e .
41016015	Aman ajah-uva , “ Vannoi gamtin’a cheuvin , Kipana Thupha gaseiphongun .
41016016	Atahsan baptize chang jouse huhhinga um ding , atahsan lou vang chu them changa kikoi ding ahi .
41016017	Atahsante chu melchihna hicheng hin ajuiya ; Keima min a thilha anodoh diu , paochom chom athouva ,
41016018	khut’a gulte adop sang diu ; thina thei gutwi don jong leu imatilou diu ahi ; ana dammo chunga khup angap’u leh dam ding ahi , ” ati .
41016019	Pakai Jesun ajah-uva thu asei chai phat’in van’a lah touvin aumtan , Pathen jet lama atoutai .
41016020	Miho vang chu acheuvin muntin’a alhangsam leuvin , athuseiyu chu Pakaiyin akithopin , melchihna tampin aphu det peh-e .
42001001	I-lah-uva hung guilhung chengse sutdohna mi tamtah-in abol pan banguvin ,
42001002	athilsoh kipat’a pat amit tah a mua athu lhachaa pang hon eihil bangun ,
42001003	michungnung Theophilus , thilsoh ho hi ken jong kahet themsa banga ban neicha le kitoh tah a hinsut doh peh ding kaseiye ;
42001004	chutileh nakiseipehsa thilsoh ho hi nahet chet thei ding ahi .
42001005	Judea gama Herod lengpa vaipoh laiyin Abijah themput dol’a thempu , Zechariah kiti khat aume . Ajinu chu Aaron chilhah ahin , amin Elizabeth akiti .
42001006	Anupa lhonin Pathen vet dia midih gel , nolnabeiya Pakai thupeh jouse le chondan chengse nit bukimsoh ahilhone .
42001007	Elizabeth achinjeh-in cha vang anei lhonpon , teh la atehse lheh lhontai .
42001008	Thempu chon ngaiya Zechariah loiho panna ding nikhon , Pakai Houin thenga lut’a gimnamtui lhutnam na dia
42001009	vang kisan chu Zechariah chunga achuh khah jeh-in aman Pathen angsunga themput kin anabol’in ahi .
42001010	Gimnamtui kilhutnam laisen mipi polama adingun ataovui .
42001011	Hichun Zechariah henga Vantil khat ahung kilah-in , gimnamtui kilhut namna maicham jet lama chun ahung dinge .
42001012	Vantil amu phat’in Zechariah alungkhamin kijong akichai .
42001013	Ahinla Vantil chun ajah a , Zechariah , kicha hih-in , nataona akisangin , najinu Elizabeth in chapa khat ahin’a , amin John nasah ding ahi ;
42001014	kipah thanom lheh in natin , chule ama penjal’a mitampi kipah diu ahi .
42001015	Ajeh chu ama hi Pakai mitmua nasatah hiya , lengpitwi hihen khamna thei ju hijong leh adon louhel ding , apenlhah a pat Lhagao Theng dimset ding ahi .
42001016	Chule Israelte tamtah Pakai a-Pathenu henga alepui lut kit ding ahi .
42001017	Elijah Themgao Lhagao le thahat aken’a , Pathen sol lea panga , mipate lunggel chate lama aheidoh a , thua nung loute chihna thudih agelsah-a Pakai dia miho kigosadema akoipeh ding ahi , ” ati .
42001018	Zechariah chun Vantil jah a , “ Keila kateh lheh tan , kajinu jong tehsesa ahitan , cha kanei mong lhon ding chu iti kahet thei ding ham ? atileh ;
42001019	Vantil’in , “ Keima hi Pathen angsunga ding jing Gabriel kahin , hiche thupha hi najah a seipeh dia eihinsol ahi .
42001020	Ven , hichengse hi akitep phat cha hung guilhung tei ding ahin , kaseipeh natahsan loujeh a aguilhun nikho geiya paomoa naum ding ahitai , ” ati .
42001021	Mipin Zechariah chu a-ngah jingun , munthenga achuti sotden adatmo lheh jengui .
42001022	Ahungdoh phat’in apaomo tan , muntheng sunga mu nei ahi mihon aheuvin , aman jong thilsoh umchan chu akhut’in athon , paomon aumtai .
42001023	Chuin thempu kin abol chaisoh phat’in Zechariah in lama ahung kile kittai .
42001024	Nikho phabep nungin ajinu Elizabeth chun nao avop tan , lha nga sungin akiselgun , hiti hin ,
42001025	“ Teh nunga Pakaiyin nao eivopsah a , japi maiya kajachatna lahmang peh eigot ahi , ” ati .
42001026	Elizabeth gai kal lhagup lhin nan Vantil Gabriel chu Pathena konin Galilee gam Nazareth khoa
42001027	David chilhah Joseph toh kicheng dia kitepsa nu-ngah Mary henga akisol’e .
42001028	Vantil chu alut’in ajah a , “ Nun nomin sah chungnung nu , Pakaiyin naumpi jinge ! ” ati .
42001029	Mary chu alung kichi-ah lah jengin , ipi thudol’a kilemna ahiding giltah-in agel’e .
42001030	Hichun Vantil’in ajah a , Mary kicha hih-in , Pathen lungdei namui .
42001031	Na gaiya chapa khat nahin ding , amin Jesu nasah ding ahi .
42001032	Ama thupi tah hiya Chungnungpen Chapa kitia , Pakai Pathenin apu David laltounaa atousah ding ahi .
42001033	Jacob chihlhah te chunga lengvai pontin , alenggam chun beitih neita lou ding ahi , ” ati .
42001034	Ahinla Maryn Vantil jah a chun , “ Iti cha kanei thei ding ham , keila pasalto kakitimat khapon ? ” atileh ;
42001035	Vantil’in ajah a , Lhagao Theng nachunga hung chun tin , Chungnungpen tha neinan nahinlekhu ding , hijeh a hi apeng ding naosen theng chu Pathen Chapa kiti ding ahi .
42001036	Nanulamnu Elizabeth-in jong teh nungin chapa khat avop’in , achinga kiseinu agaiyin lhagup alhingtai ;
42001037	ajeh chu Pathen dingin imacha ahimopoi , ” ati .
42001038	Chuphat-’in Mary , “ Ven , Pakai nalhachanu kei , nasei bangin kachunga guilhung hen , ” ati . Hichun Vantil’in Mary adalhatai .
42001039	Hichelai hin Mary akipat paiyin Judea thinglhang gam khopi khat’ah thanom tah-in achei .
42001040	Zechariah in’a alut’in Elizabeth salam agabol’e .
42001041	Mary salam chu Elizabeth-in ajah pet tah-in aoisunga naocha akichomin , Elizabeth chu Lhagao Theng adimtai .
42001042	Chuin Elizabeth chun othongin asamin , Numei jouse lah a nunnom nu , nanaobu sunga um jong anun nome !
42001043	I-atile ka-Pakai hungnu lomlom kahenga hung jeng hitam !
42001044	Ajeh chu salam thu nasei kajah jah chun ka-oisunga naocha kipah-in akichom jenge .
42001045	Ahenga Pakai thusei guilhung ding tahsan nu anun nome , ” ati . Maryn vahchoi la asah
42001046	Hichun Maryn aseiyin : “ Kahinkhon Pakai kachoi an’in ,
42001047	Eihuhhing Pakai Pathen chunga Kalhagao akipah-e .
42001048	Ajeh chu alhacha nu lhasam tah eigeldoh-in , Ven , tua pat akhang khanga miten Nun Nom nua eisei diu ahitai .
42001049	Ijeh-inem itile Hatchungnungin thil nasatah eibolpeh-in , Amin jong athenge .
42001050	Ama gingte chu akhang khangin alungset jinge .
42001051	Aban thahat ajesal’in thanei tah-in thil abol’in , Alunggel’uva kiletsah hoithote athecheh soh tai .
42001052	Vaihom thanei tah ho alaltouna konin aloilhan Tahlel chagate achoisangtai .
42001053	Agilkelte antui tuiyin avah van , Mihaote khutgoh keovin asolmang’e .
42001054	Alhacha Israel henga akitepna , I-pu i-paute Abraham le achilhahte henga aseisa ,
42001055	Tonsot kumkhoa alungset long lou chu Ageldoh jing jenge , ” ati .
42001056	Mary chu Elizabeth koma lha thum jen anichongin , chuin in lama akile kittai .
42001057	Elizabeth naoso phat alhingin chapa khat ahingtai .
42001058	Aheng akom ho leh aphung gol hon Pakaiyin nasatah a Elizbeth alungset hi ajauvin akipapi cheh-uve .
42001059	Niget lhin nin naosen chep tan din ahungun , apa min putsah a Zechariah hisah ding agouve .
42001060	Ahinla anun ajadan , “ Amin John kiti ding ahibouve , ” ati .
42001061	Amahon Elizabeth jah a , “ Naphung sunguva chutobang minneikha bon um louva , ” atiuve .
42001062	Chuphat’in mihon apan ipi asah nom chu mit heiyin adongui .
42001063	Zechariah chun asutna ding pheng khat athumin , “ Amin John ahi , ” tia ajih leh abonchan adatmo soh hel’uve .
42001064	Hichepet tah chun Zechariah apaodoh jeng theiyin , Pathen avahchoiye .
42001065	Aheng akom jouse akichauvin , hiche thusoh hi Judea thinglhang gamsung athangsoh tai .
42001066	Athusoh japha chanin alungthim’ah , “ Hiche naosen khu ipi hungsoh ding ham ? ” ati cheh-ui . Ajeh chu Pakai ban thahat’in naosen chu aumpi jinge .
42001067	Naosen Pa Zechariah Lhagao Theng adimin gaothu aseitai :
42001068	“ Pakai , Israel Pathen vahchoiyute , Aman amite akithopin jalenna amusah tai .
42001069	Alhacha David insunga konin Huhhing hattah khat saki bangin atungdoh tai .
42001070	Hiche hi masang laiya Athemgao theng ho kama aseisa ahi .
42001071	Imelmateu le eihot bolteu khut’a kona Eihuhdoh jing diuva thu atepsa ahin ;
42001072	I-Pu i-Pateu alungset tei tei ding , Akitepna theng suhmil lou dia aseisa ahi .
42001073	I-Pu luiyu Abraham henga kihahsel’a , Imelmateu khut’a kona eihuhdoh diu ,
42001074	Gin neilouva Ama kin ibol theiyuva ,
42001075	Ihinkho lhumkeiyuva dih tah a akin ibol diu ati ahi .
42001076	Naosen nang jong Chungnungpen Pa Themgao nakitia , Pakai masanga chea alampi nasempeh ding ;
42001077	Amite hi achonsetnau ki-ngaidama Huhhingna chang dia naseipeh ding ahi .
42001078	I-Pathenu hi lung nemtah lungset them ahin , Thina muthim jing lah a touho chunga
42001079	Nisa loupi tah avahsah a , chamna lampi jon’a akijotsah diu ahi , ” ati .
42001080	Naosen chu ahung khang khangin tahsa le lhagaova hattah ahitai . Israelte henga lhang phonga akilah masangsen gamthip lah jenga apansai .
42002001	Hiche lai chun Caesar Augustus in leiset chung cheng mijouse simtoh a min sutdoh din thu apei .
42002002	Hiche hi min kisim masah pen ahin , hichepet hin Quirinius Syria gamvaipon apange .
42002003	Mihem jouse ama ama khopi cheh a min kisut din acheuve .
42002004	Joseph jong David insung chilhah ahijeh-in Galilee gam Nazareth khoa konin Judea gam David khopi , Bethlehema achetouve .
42002005	Min kisut dia ache hin ajihol Mary gai hamset chutoh alhon’e .
42002006	Chukoma aum pet lhonin Mary navah phat alhing’in ,
42002007	achapa masapen ahingtai . Jin lhun in’a amani ding mun onlou jeh-in Maryn naosen chu ponin ajel’in gan ankong-ah alupsah-e .
42002008	Hiche gama chun kelngoi ching phabep loujaova ageh-un , janin kelngoi hon ngah akilha lhauve .
42002009	Chuin Pakaiya kon Vantil khat akom’uva ahung dingin , Pakai loupi nan akimvel’u asalvah soh jenge ; amaho akicha behseh jengun ahi .
42002010	Vantil chun ajah-uvah , “ Kicha hih-un , ajeh chu ve , nang ho dia hachangpa kipana Thupha kahinpoh peh nahiuvin , mi jouse kipana hi ding ahi .
42002011	Ijeh-inem itile tunin nang ho din David khopia huhhingpa Pakai Messiah chu apengtai .
42002012	Naphot chetna diu chu : naosen pon’a kijel’a gan ankong sunga lum nagamu diu ahi , ” ati .
42002013	Phot lot louvin Vantil chutoh vanmi janelten Pathen avahchoiyun hiti hin ,
42002014	“ Chungnungpena Pathen loupi hen , Leiset’a alungdei mite chunga cham leng hen , ” atiuve .
42002015	Vantilte chu van lam jona akile kit phat’un kelngoi ching ho khat le khat akihouvun , “ Bethlehema cheu hitin Pakaiyin eihetsah-u hiche thilsoh hi gaveu hite , ” akitiuvin ahi .
42002016	Kinloi tah a acheu le Mary le Joseph toh naosen gan ankonga lum chu agamu’ve .
42002017	Amu phat’uvin naosen chung chang thudol ajah-uva kisei chengse chu miho aseipeh tauve .
42002018	Ajah-uva kelngoi ching ho thusei japha chanin kidang asa lheh jengun ,
42002019	Maryn vang hichengse chu achingin alung gil’in agel jinge .
42002020	Kelngoi ching hon akiseipeh banguva thil amu jeh-un Pathen choiat le thangvah thon akile kittauve .
42002021	Niget lhin nin naosen chep tan phat ahitan , naobua akijil masanga Vantil’in amin asahsa Jesu asah tauve .
42002022	Mose Danthu dungjuiya kisuh theng phat alhinin Jesu chu Pakai henga din Jerusalema ahinpui touvui .
42002023	Pakai Danthua , “ Naobu tumkeh masa pasal tapou Pakaiya atheng ding ahi , ” tia kisei bangin ,
42002024	chule Pakai Danthua kisei , “ Vakhu kop khat ahiloule vapal nou ni ham , ” kiti dungjuiyin kilhaina bol din agouve .
42002025	Ven , Jerusalema chun amin Simeon kiti pasal khat , midih le hougut tah , Israel kilhatdoh ding ngah jinga um ahin ; Lhagao Theng vop ,
42002026	Pakaiya kon Messiah amu kahsea thilou dia Lhagao Thengin aphondoh mi khat aume .
42002027	Simeon chu Lhagaovin Houin’a ahinpui lut’in , Danthua kisei banga naosen Jesu kin abolpeh lou khoh ho bolpeh dia anu le apan ahinpui lut lhon phat’in
42002028	Simeonin naocha chu akipomin , Pathen vahchoiyin aseiye :
42002029	“ Pakai tua hi nasei banga Nalhachapa lung monga neilhadoh ahitai ;
42002030	Ijeh-inem itile kamit tah-in Nahuhhingna kamutai .
42002031	Hiche hi namtin mitmua Gontohsa nakoi ,
42002032	Chidang namdangte henga nadei chu vah a kiphongdoha Namite Israel loupina dia nabol ahi , ” ati .
42002033	Naosen chung changa Simeon thusei chu anu le apan adatmo lheh jeng lhone .
42002034	Simeonin amaho phatthei aboh-in , anu Mary jah a , “ Ven , hiche naosen hi Israel sunga mi tamtah kipal lhuhna ding le hindohna dia kitung , nahsah moa kikoiji ho khel’a melchihna pang ding ,
42002035	nang jeng jong nalung chang chemjama kidotpai abahsah a , mi tamtah lunggil selguh geiya aphondoh ding ahi , ” ati .
42002036	Asher phunga Phanuel chanu Anna themgaonu chu aji nei nunga ajipa toh kum sagi seh bou cheng khom lhona , tehse lheh jeng ,
42002037	kum som get le li meithaiya um , Houin dalha kholou , sun le jan’a Pathen kinbol’a pang anngol’a tao jing jeng ahi .
42002038	Hichepet tah hin ahungin Pathen athangvah-in , Jerusalem lhatdoh ding kat jingte jah a naosen thudol hi aseipeh tai . Jesu Nazareth khoa ahung kile kit
42002039	Pakai Danthua kisei kinkhoh jouse abol chai phat’un Galilee gama akhou Nazareth a ahung kile kittauve .
42002040	Naosen chu akhang khangin ahatdoh tan aching lheh jengin , Pathen phattheinan aumpi jinge .
42002041	Jesu nunle pa kumseh leh kalchuh kut’a din Jerusalema acheji lhone .
42002042	Jesu kum som le ni alhinin angaiya kal chuh kut mang din achetou kit’uve .
42002043	Kut kichaiua in lam ahinjot phat’un chapang Jesu chu Jerusalema aumdenin , anu le apanla ahedoh lhonpoi .
42002044	Amanin mihon lah a chedanin agel lhonin nikhat nilhum keiyin ahung tauve ; chuin aheng akomte leh akihetpi ho lah a Jesu ahol lhon leh
42002045	amudoh jou lhon tapoi . Hijeh chun Jerusalema ahung hol lhontai .
42002046	Nithum nungin Houin sunga agamudoh lhonin , houhite lah a anatouvin , athuseiyu angaiyin dong jong adongjie .
42002047	Athusei japhan chanin achih dan le athu donbut themdol chu kidang asalheh jenguve .
42002048	Anu le apan amudoh lhon chun adatmo lheh jeng lhonin , anun ajah a , “ Naosen , idia neihitibol jeng lhon ham ? Veta , napa le ken lung dong tahin kahol hol lhone , ” ati .
42002049	Aman ajah lhona , “ Idia neihol khoh lhon ham ? Ka-Pa insunga kaumtei ding nahet lhon lou ham ? ” atipeh-e .
42002050	Ajah lhona asei chu ahedoh thei lhonpoi .
42002051	Chuin amani toh lhonin Nazareth khoa ahungin athu thu lhonin anunge . Anun thilsoh chengse hi alung gil’in aching jinge .
42002052	Jesu chu tahsa le chih nan akhang tou touvin , Pathen le mihem deiyin aumtai .
42003001	Tiberius Caesar lengchan kal kum som le nga lhin chun Pontius Pilate’n Judea gam vai apon , Herod-in Galilee gambih vai apon , asopips Philip’in Iturea le Trachonnitis gambih vai apon , Lysanias chun Abilene gambih vai apon ,
42003002	Annas le Caiaphas them pulenin apang lhone . Hichepat hin gamthip’a um Zechariah chapa John henga Pathenin thu ahinseitai .
42003003	John Jordan luipang gamkol’a achelen , mihon lung aheiyuva batize chang diu , chuteng achonset’u ki-ngaidam ding thu alhangsam lei .
42003004	Isaiah themgao lekhabua chun akisunin : “ Gamthip’a khosam ogin khat’in , Pakai lampi semtoh-un lang , Alamlen semjangsen koiyun .
42003005	Damkom jouse kidip chama , Mol le lhang jouse kilai cham ding , Lamkon jouse kisujanga aboh laise jong kisunam ding ahi .
42003006	Chutengle tahsa mihing jousen Pathen huhhingna amudoh cheh diu ahi , ” akiti .
42003007	Ahenga baptize chang dia hung ho jah a chun Johnin , “ Vogulse son ho , ahung lhung ding lunghanna jamdohna ding thu namop’u chu koiham ?
42003008	Nachonset lung nakhel’u phot chet nan nachon nauvin phongun ; ‘ Abraham chilhah kihina chu , ’ tin kisonghih-un ; ajeh chu Pathenin hiche song ho hi alah a Abraham chilhah a asemdoh thei ahi .
42003009	Thingphungbul tin’a heicha kiphutsoh ahitan , aga phalou thingphung jouse kiphuh lhua meilhum sunga kileh lutsoh ding ahi , ” ati .
42003010	Mipin John chu adongun , “ Achutile ipi kabol diu hitam ? ” atiuleh ;
42003011	aman ajah-uvah , “ Sangkhol chol ni neiyan aneilou hophen anneh neiyan jong chutiman bol hen , ” ati .
42003012	Kaidong ho geiyin ahenga baptize chang din ahungun ajah a , “ Houhil iti kachon diu ham ? ” tia adoh-u leh ,
42003013	Johnin ajah-uvah , “ Nakiteppeh kalval’un lah dauvin , ” ati .
42003014	Sepaihon jong , “ Iti kachon diu ham ? ” tin adongun , aman ajah-uva , “ Sum hihen ipi hi jongle alam louvin koima ima lahpeh dauvin , nasandoh jat jat’in lung lhaiyuvin , ” ati .
42003015	Mipin alungthimuva John akatjingu Messiah hitheiya agel laith-un ,
42003016	Johin adonbut’in ajah-uvah , “ Ken twiya baptize kachansah bou nahiuvin , keisanga hatjo khat ahunge , kei hi akengchot khao sut lham dia kilom jong kahipoi , aman Lhagao Theng le meikonga baptize nachansah diu ahi .
42003017	Akhut’a chang japna achoiyin , phol’a chang jap ngimsel’in tin , chuteng achangtah ho changsal’a akhum tup ding , asi chengse vang mit theilou meilhum sunga agovam ding ahitai , ” ati .
42003018	Johnin tilkhouna tamtah toh thon mipi chu Kipana Thupha aseiphongpeh-e .
42003019	Gambih vaipoa pang Herod jong chu asopipa Philip jinu Herodias akichenpi jeh le thilse dang tampi aboljeh-in aphoh-e .
42003020	Hichea hin Herod chun John hi songkul’a akhumin thilse khoh cheh khat abolbe kit’e .
42003021	Miho baptize achansah phat’un Jesu jong baptize achange . Chuin atao leh van akihongin ,
42003022	Lhagao Theng tahsa vouvin vakhu bangin achunga ahung leng lhan , van’a konin ogin khat’in , “ Kadeitah kachapa nahin , Nachunga kalung alhai ta-ngeiye , ” ati .
