42004001	Jordan luiya konin Jesu Lhagao Theng dimset’in ahung kile kit’in , lhagaovin gamthip’a apuilut’in ,
42004002	nisom li sungin Diabol lhep patep’in aga-ume . Nisom li sunga imacha nelou ahin , akhonnan agilkeltai .
42004003	Hichun Diabol’in ajah a , “ Pathen Chapa nahileh hiche song hi changlhah sosah-in . ” ati .
42004004	Jesun adonbut’in , “ Pathen lekhabua kisun chu , ‘ Mihem hi changlhah keova hing theilou ding , ’ kiti ahi , ” ati .
42004005	Diabol’in Jesu apuitouvin mitphet kah louvin vannoi mihemchenna lenggam jouse avetsah-in ,
42004006	“ Hicheng chunga thu neina le aloupina abonchan napenge , ajeh chu kapeh nom nom kapeh dia eikipe-ah ahitai .
42004007	Hijeh a chu naboh khup’a chibai neiboh leh aboncha nanga hi ding ahi , ” ati .
42004008	Jesun adonbut’in “ Pathen lekhabua , Pakai na-Pathen chibai naboh a Ama kinbou nabol ding ahi , ” tin akisune , ” ati .
42004009	Jerusalema apui kit’in Houin tingvuma adinsah-in ajah a “ Pathen Chapa nahi leh hikoma kon hin chomlha jengin ;
42004010	ajeh chu Pathen lekhabua , ‘ Pathenin Avantilte hinsol peh-in tin Amahon nachang nauvinte ,
42004011	Chule akhut’uvin nadom nauvinte ; Achutiloule songa nakeng kisuh khah get’in nate , ’ tin akisune , ” ati .
42004012	Jesun adonbut’in , “ Pathen lekhabua , ’ Pakai na-Pathen nalhep patep lou ding ahi , ’ tin akiseiye , ” ati .
42004013	Diabol’in Jesu alhep patepna ding achaisoh phat’in phat khat’a din adalhatai .
42004014	Jesu Lhagao thahat kengin Galilee lama ahung kile kittai . Chuin Ama thudol gamsunga akithangsoh tai .
42004015	Houthua kikhopna in tina miho ahil len , mihon Ama aseipha soh keiyui .
42004016	Ahung seiletna Nazareth khoa Jesu ahungin , achon na ngai bangin Choldo nin houthua kikhopna in’a achen , Pathen lekhabu sim dingin adingdoh tai .
42004017	Hichun Isaiah Themgao lekhajol apeuvin , lekhajol alhap lhah a amudohna laiya chun ,
42004018	“ Pakaiya kon Lhagao kachunga aumin , Tahlelte henga Kipana Thupha seipeh ding , Sohchangte lhadohna thu seipeh a , Mitcho ho khomuna ding seipeh ding , Nehchintoa um ho lha-ong ding seipeh a ,
42004019	Pakai deilhen kum seipeh dinga thao einu ahitai , ” tin akisun’e .
42004020	Jesun lekhajol chu ajeldoh-in lhachapa apen atoutai . Hichun houthua kikhopna insunga um mi jousen Ama avesoh keiyui .
42004021	Jesun ajah-uva , “ Hiche najah-u Pathen lekhabua thu hi tunia guilhung ahitai , ” tin aseipantai .
42004022	Mihon Ama aseipha soh keiyun , akamsungsoh thu ngai ngai ho jeh chun kidang asalheh jengui . “ Hichepa hi Joseph chapa hilou haimo ? ’ atiuve .
42004023	Jesun ajah-uva , “ Thuchih a kisei , ‘ Louthem nangma kiboldam’in , kiti hi naseiyuva , “ Nakhosunga jong Capernauma thil kidang kibol kajah ho’u tobang bol tangem , ’ neiti khum diu hina hi , ” ati .
42004024	Aman , “ Dih tah a kaseipeh nahiuve , Themgao chu akhosunga i-kisahji lou mong ahinai .
42004025	“ Ahinla dihtah a kaseipeh nahiuve , Elijah nikho laiya vankot akikhaa kumthum le lhagup gotwi kanjeha gamsung pumpia kel laiyin Israelte lah a meithai numei tamtah aum vangun
42004026	Elijah chu amaho khat cha henga akisolpoi , Sidon gama Zarephath khoa meithainu koma akisoljo bouve .
42004027	Elisha themgao khangin jong Israelte lah a miphah tampi aum nan , Khat cha jong suh thengin aumpoi , Syria mi Naaman suh thengin aume , ” ati .
42004028	Jesu thusei ajah-u chun houthua kikhopna in’a um chengse alung hang behseh jengun ,
42004029	akipatdoh-un khosunga koin Jesu alhoh doh-uvin , achen nau molvum , koldeh a sot lhah dingin agouve .
42004030	Ahinla Jesu akah lah-uva akiheh doh-in ache mangtai .
42004031	Jesu Galilee gama Capernaum khoa ahung suh-in , Choldo nin miho thu ahil leh ,
42004032	athuhil tha neije chu mihon kidang asa lheh jengui .
42004033	Houthua kikhopna in’a chun lhagaoboh vop pasal khat aumin , amahin oging tah-in ahinsamin ,
42004034	“ Vo Nazareth Jesu , I-lo ding neigot ham ? Eisu manguva hung nahim ? Koi nahi kahenai , Pathen solchah theng chu nahi , ” ati .
42004035	Jesun haphon aphoh-in , “ Thip’in ! Mipaa kon chun hung doh-in ! ” atileh ; thilhan mipa chu a-angsung laitah-uva aheh lhun ima suse louvin asunga konin ahung potdohtai .
42004036	Mihon adatmo soh keiyun , “ Ipipen asei khum hitam ? Thu neitah le thahat tah a lhagao boh ho thu apeh le ahungdoh doh jengui , ” tin akihouvui .
42004037	Hiti hin akimvel gamkol’ah Jesu thudol akithangsohtai .
42004038	Jesun houthua kikhopna in dalhan Simon in-ah aluttai . Simon nupanu hatah-in khosih nat’in ana nan , mihon Jesu henga aseipeh-ui .
42004039	Jesu amanu jalkhun panga adingin khosih nat chu haphoa apho leh , akhosih chun alhan , amanu athou paiyin amaho jenlen apangtai .
42004040	Nisa lhumin hivei chom chom veiya damlou neihon Jesu henga ahinpuiyun , Aman achung cheh-uva khut angamin aboldamsoh keiye .
42004041	Mi tamtah sunga konin thilha ho apotdoh-uvin , “ Pathen Chapa nahi , ” tin asamui . Jesun amaho chu haphon aphoh-in apaopoh sahpoi , ijeh-inem itile amahon Messiah ahi ahe cheh-ui .
42004042	Khovah phat’in Jesu apotdohin munthip lai khat’ah achetai ; ahinla mipin Ama ahol hol jengui . Hiti hin ahenga ahunguvin adalhah louna dingun alhotauve .
42004043	Ahinla Jesun ajah-uvah , “ Kho dang danga jong Pathen lenggam Thupha hi kaseiphong tei tei ding ahi . Hiche dia chu hung kisol kahi , ” ati .
42004044	Hijeh chun Judea gam Houthua kikhopna in hoa jong ahil lhanglei .
42005001	Jesu Gennesaret dil panga adin pet’in Pathen thu ngai nom hon akimvel’a aneh chinto jengui .
42005002	Jesun twipam chin’a kong ni kihen amui ; ngaman kong neiho chu potdoh a len asoppet’u ahiye .
42005003	Jesu Simon kong’a alut’in twipam chin’a kona kong chu tol lut jep din asol’in , chuin atouvin kong’a pansan mipi chu thu ahiltai .
42005004	Athusei jouvin Simon jah a , “ Twithuh laiya tol lut’in nga matna din len sep lhauvin , ” atileh ;
42005005	Simonin adonbut’in , “ Pu , jan khovah hel’a imacha man lou kahiuvin , nang thupeh-in len septem unge , ” atin ,
42005006	len aseu leh nga tampi aman khauvin alen jouseu a-ehpai ding ahitai .
42005007	Hichun kong danga pang aloiten ahung kithopi diuvin agah jap’ui . Amaho ahungun kong te ni chu nga akhol dimset’un ahileh alhalut deh deh jenguve .
42005008	Athilsoh hi Simon Peterin amuchet phat’in Jesu khomuh a aboh khup’in , “ Pakai , neidalha jengin , michonse kahibouve , ” atitai .
42005009	Peter le akiloipi chengsen nga chujat amat jengu chu kidang asabehseh jenguve .
42005010	Simon loite ni , Zebedee chpa te ni Jacob le John jong chutima chu ahilhone . Jesun Simon jah a , “ Tija hih-in , tua lhah mi man’a napan ding ahi , ” ati .
42005011	Amahon kong te ni chu vaokama ahintoldoh-un ijakai adalhauvin Jesu ajuitauve .
42005012	Jesu khopi khat’a aumpet’in akhosunga chun apum changa phah pasal khat aumin , Jesu amudoh phat’in a-angsunga aboh khup’in amaitol’a asulut’in , “ Pakai , nalung ahileh eisutheng thei nahi , ” tin atao tai .
42005013	Jesun athamin ajah a , “ Kalung ahinai , damtheng tan , ” atileh ; apet tah chun aphah atheng jenge .
42005014	Koima jah a asei louna din Jesun akham chah-in , “ Chen , Thempu gakivetsah-in , nadam theng hettohsah nan Mose thupeh banga thilto ding gatoh tan , ” tin asol’e .
42005015	Ahinla aumchan thudol akihathanjal cheh jengin athu ngai ding le aveiset kiboldamsah din mipi ahungbe cheh cheh jenguve .
42005016	Ahinla Jesu gamthip’a achangin achedoh jin agataojie .
42005017	Nikhat Jesun thu ahilpet’in Galilee gam le Judea gam khotin’a kon le Jerusalema hung kon Pharisee ho leh Danthu hil ho hikoma chun atouvui . Hichea chun Jesun mi adamsah theina din Pakai thahat’in aumpi .
42005018	Hichepet tah hin mihon pasal langthi khat alupna pumin ahinpu’vin , put lut paiya Jesu angsunga jam din ago’uve .
42005019	Japi jeh a aput lut thei louhel phat’un inchunga akaldoh-uvin cheh pheng vang kah a alupna pumin , mipi lailung , Jesu angsung dontah a agah khai lhauve .
42005020	Atahsanu amu phat’in Jesun mipa jah a chun , “ Golpa , nachonset jouse ngaidam ahitai , ” ati .
42005021	Athuseijeh chun Pharisee ho le Danthu themhon , “ Hichepa hi koibeh hiya Pathen taitomna thu asei hi nga na ? Pathen tilou koidangin chonset angaidam jou ding ham ? ” tin agel pantauve .
42005022	Agel’u hi Jesun ahedoh paiyin ajah-uva “ Ibol’a chutobang nagel’u ham ?
42005023	‘ Nachonset jouse ngaidam ahitai , ’ ti leh , ‘ Thouvin lamjot tan , ’ ti hojoh baijom ?
42005024	Hoi hileh leiset chunga mihem Chapan chonset jouse ngaidamna thahat anei nahetna diuvin , ” atin , langthipna jah a , “ Kaseipeh nahi , thouvin , nalupna kilah-in inlama chetan , ” ati .
42005025	Langthipna mipi maiya ahung dingdoh paiyin , alupna akilah-in inlam jonin achen Pathen athangvah peh-e .
42005026	Mihon adatmo soh keiyuvin Pathen thangvah to thon , atija thei lheh jengun , “ Tunin thil kidang datmo umtah imutauve , ” tin aseiyui .
42005027	Hiche nung hin Jesu apotdoh leh kaidonna muna tou Levi , kaidongpa , chu amudoh-in ajah a , “ Neijuiyin , ” ati .
42005028	Levin ijakai dalhan akipat’in Jesu ajuitai .
42005029	Levin a-in’a Jesu vah nan golvah lentah abol’in kaidong ho tampi le midang hon ankong aumpiuve .
42005030	Hichun Pharisee ho leh danthu them ho Jesu seijuite chunga aphun’un , “ Ibol’a kaidong ho le chonsete toh naneh khomu ham ? ” atiuve .
42005031	Jesun amaho hi adonbut’in , “ Adamin louthem angaipoi , adamlouvin bou angaiye .
42005032	Keijong midihsa kouva hung kahipoi , chonsete lungheisah dinga hung kahibouve , ” ati .
42005033	Mihon Jesu jah a , “ John seijuihon an angol matchet’un taojong atao jiuvin , Pharisee seijuihon jong chutiman abol’ui ; nang seijui hon vang aneuvin adon’ui ” tin aseiyui .
42005034	Jesun ajah-uvah , “ Kichen golvahnaa hung lha ho chu aji nei pan aumpi pet’a an na-ngolsah theiyum ?
42005035	Amavang alah-uva kona aji neipa kipui mang phat hung lhung ding ahin , hiche sungsea chu an angol diu ahinai , ” ati .
42005036	Jesun amaho chu thulem khat jong aseipeh-in , “ Koiman pon thah abot-eh jin ponlui behnan anei ngaipoi ; behna taleh ponthah jong abo-eh ding ahin , chule ponthah hal jong chu ponlui chutoh alhoukitoh ponte .
42005037	Koiman lengpitwi thah jong savunpeng luiya akhum ngaipoi ; khum taleh lengpitwi thah chun savunpeng atumkehding , lengpitwi moh lon kanga , savunpeng jong kisuh manglo ding ahi .
42005038	Hijeh a chu lengpitwi thah savunpeng thah a khum ding ahi .
42005039	Koiman lengpitwi lui adon nungin lengpitwi thah adon nompoi ; ajeh chu , “ Lengpitwi lui bou alhume , ’ tin aseijie , ” ati .
42006001	Choldo nia Jesun buleijao ajotnaa aseijuiten changvui asih-un , akinoiyun abah pantauve .
42006002	Hichun Pharisee ho phabep’in “ Ibol’a Choldo nia bol ngailou abol’u ham ? ” atiuve .
42006003	Jesun amaho chu adonbut’in , “ David le aloite agilkel’uva chu ipi abol’u nasim khah louvu ham ?
42006004	David chu Pathen insunga alut’in Pathen umjing hetna changlhah kitoh , Thempu tilouvin aneh ngailou chu anen aloite jong apei , ” ati .
42006005	Ajah-uvah , “ Mihem Chapa hi Choldo ni Pakai ahi , ” ati .
42006006	Choldo nidang khat man Jesu Houthua kikhopna in’a alut’in thu agahil’e . Hikoma chun pasal khut jetlam ngoi khat ana umkhai .
42006007	Danthu them ho le Pharisee hon ahehset theina diuvin , Choldo nia mi aboldam aboldam lou achang lhiuve .
42006008	Jesun alungthimu ahen khutlang ngoipa jah a chun , “ Kipatdoh-in alailunga hung dingin , ” atileh ; ama akipatdoh-in ading tai .
42006009	Hichun Jesun ajah-uva , “ Kadoh nahiuve , choldo nia apha le ase hoijoh bol ngai ham ? Huhhing ding ha suhmang ding ham ? ati .
42006010	Jesun abonchauvin avegolsoh keiyin khutlang ngoipa jah a , “ Nakhut lhangdoh-in , ” atileh ; alhandoh phat’in akhut adamhel’e .
42006011	Chutah chun amaho athangtom behseh jengun Jesu i-lo ding thu akihousom tauve .
42006012	Hichelai hin Jesu tao dingin molchunga achen , jan khovah geiyin Pathen’ah ataove .
42006013	Khovah lhah phat’in aseijuite akouvin , alah-uva konin mi som le ni alhengdoh-in amaho chu amin’u solchah asah-e .
42006014	Amaho chun Peter asahpa Simon , asopipa Andrew , Jacob le John , Philip le Bartholomew ,
42006015	Matthew leh Thomas , Alphaeus cha Jacob , gam ngailu atiu Simon ,
42006016	Jacob chapa Judas , chule amatsah apangpa Iscariot Judas ahiuve .
42006017	Jesu amaho hitoh ahung kumsuh-in jangcham lai khat’a adinge ; hia chun seijui tamtah le Judea gama kon , Jerusalema kon , chule Tyre le Sidon twikol pang dunga hung mipi nasatah toh ahiuvin ,
42006018	abonchauva Jesu thuhil ngai nom le adammo veiset nau kibol damsah dia hung ahiuve . Chule Lhagaoboh suh genthei ho jong aboldam soh keiye .
42006019	Jesu tahsaa kona thahat hungpot’a amaho adamsah theijeh chun japin Ama tham khah tei din ago’uve .
42006020	Jesu akhodah-in aseijuite aven aseiye : “ Vaichate anun nom nahiuve , Ijeh-inem itile Pathenlenggam nang hoa ahi .
42006021	Tulaiya gilkelte anun nom nahiuve , Ijeh-inem itile nakivahva diu ahi . Tulaiya kapte anun nom nahiuve . Ijeh-inem itile nui ding nahiuve .
42006022	Mihem Chapa jal’a min nahot bol’uva , Migilouva nahouset , nadonda tengu leh anun nom nahiuve .
42006023	Hitia nahou niu chuleh kipah thanomin lam’un , ven , vana nasan diu tohman alen’e . Apu apateuvin jong Themgao ho hitobanga chu anabolsau ahi .
42006024	Ohe mihaoho ada nahiuve , Ijeh-inem itile hinkho nom naneitauve .
42006025	Ohe tulaiya oivaho ada nahiuve , Ijeh-inem itile gilkel nahin thoh diu ahi . Ohe tulaiya nuihi ada nahiuve . Ijeh-inem itile lunghema nakadiu ahi .
42006026	Ohe mi jouse seiphat chang ho ada nahiuve . Apu apateuvin jong Themgao lhem ho chutia anaseiyu ahi .
42006027	“ Kathu ngaiho kaseipeh nahiuve , namelmau ngailu’vin , nahot bolteu thilpha bolpeh-un ,
42006028	nagaosapteu phatthei boh-un lang , nabolseteu taopeh-uvin .
42006029	Nangeiphe lang khat beng chu lang khatjong dopeh-in , nasangkhol len lahpeh a chu nasangkhol sung nung jong peh than .
42006030	Nahenga thil thum chan pen , mi lahsa nathil ipi hijongle nung thum kit hih-in .
42006031	Min iti bol le chun nadeiyam chutobang chun miho bol’in .
42006032	Na-ngailuteu bou na-ngailut’u le ipi pachat nachan diu ham ? Chonsete jengin jong angailuteu angailu’ve .
42006033	Nabolphateu jeng nabolphat’u leh ipi pachat nachan diu ham ? Chonsete jengin jong chutia abol’u ahi .
42006034	Mukit ding nakinep nau miho bou napeh-u leh ipi pachat nachan diu ham ? Chonsete jengin jong apeh jat amukitna diu chonseho henga apejiuve .
42006035	Amavang namelmateu ngailu’vin , thilpha bolpeh-un , mukit ding imacha gel louvin thil homun ; chutile kipaman nasatah nasan diu , Chungnungpen chate nahi diu ahi ; ajehchu Ama chu khohsahna heloute le Migiloute khoto them ahi .
42006036	Napau mi khoto them bangin mi khoto them’uvin .
42006037	“ Mi oimo hih-un , chutile oimo nachan lou diu ahi ; mi them mosah hih-un , chutile themmo nakichansah lou diu ahi ; ngaidamun , chutile ngaidam nachan diu ahi .
42006038	Peuvin chutile nakipe diu ahi ; atena dimset , hongphal tah a kipea kiloh det kheh-a kison chah kheh alet lha hel’a kipe ding nahive ; ijeh-inem itile mi natepehna ma maa nakitepeh diu ahi , ” ati .
42006039	Jesun miho chu hiche thulem hi aseipeh-in : “ Mitchon mitcho alamkai theiyem ? Anilhona kokhuh alha lut lhonlou ding ham ?
42006040	Ahilpa sangin seijui achungnung ngaipoi , akihil themsoh teng vang leh seijui tapou ahilpa tobang bang ahiji nai .
42006041	“ Ibol’a nasopi mit’a bohsi chu namelchih keova , nang mit’a inkam tejen chu mulouva um naham ?
42006042	Namit’a inkam tejen mudoh louva nasopi jah a , ‘ Sopi , namit’a bohsi chu neilahdoh sah-in , ’ nati theiham ? Vo mipha lhem ! Namit’a inkam tejen chu kilahdoh masah le chun nasopi mit’a bohsi chu kichentah a namutheiding ahi .
42006043	“ Thingphung phan gaphalou asep ngaipon , thingphung phalouvin jong gapha asep ngaipoi .
42006044	Hijeh chun thingphung agan akihei . Min lingphunga theichang ga aloupon , lingboh lah a jong lengpithei ga aloujipoi .
42006045	Miphan thilpha akholna alung gil’a konin thilpha asosah jin , misen thilse akholnaa konin thilse asodoh jie . Ajeh chu mihem lung gil’a kikhol chu athusei naa hung potdohji ahi .
42006046	“ Kaseibon bol louva ibol’a , ‘ Pakai , Pakai , ’ neitiu ham ?
42006047	Ka henga hunga kasei ngaiya bol’a michu itobang ham vetsah unge .
42006048	Ama chu lei thuh tah laiya abul songpi chunga tunga insapa tobang ahi . Twisang alet’a vadungin asokhum vangin phatah a kisadet ahijeh-in hiche in chu asulong jou tapoi .
42006049	Koi hileh ja la ja naa bol lou chu abulpi bei leiset’a insapa tobang ahi . Vadungin asokhum teng hiche in chu alhupai jin , ain setdol chu amelse lheh jenge , ” ati .
42007001	Jesun mipi aseipeh nom jouse aseisoh phat’in Capernaum khoa aluttai .
42007002	Sepai jalamkai khat hin sahtah soh khat aneiyin , asohpa hi ana lel lheh jengin athi pai ding ahitai .
42007003	Jesu thudol ajah phat’in sepai jalamkaipan Jesu chu hunga asohpa boldam din akouding Juda mi upaho asol’e .
42007004	Upaho hi Jesu henga ahungun khohsah tah-in ataovun , “ Hichepa hi nabol-peh dia kilom mong ahi ;
42007005	ajeh chu ijat’u alungset’in Houthua kikhopna in jong eisah peh-ui , ” atiuve .
42007006	Hijeh chun Jesu amaho toh ahung kilhontai . In kom ahung gei phat’in sepai jalamkaipan aloite asol’in ajah a , “ Pakai , hung kigimbol datan , ajeh chu ka-insung nahung lut ding hi kakilompoi .
42007007	Hijeh a chu katahsa tah a nahenga hung dia jong kilom kisalou kahi ; thun seitho jongle chun kasohpa chu dam jeng nante .
42007008	Keijong mi thu noiya natong kahin , kanoiya natong sepaiho aum kit’e . Khat jaha , ‘ Chen , ’ katileh achen , achom khat jah a , ‘ Hungin , ’ katileh ahungjin ; kasohpa jah a jong , ‘ Hiche bol’in , ’ katileh aboljin ahi , ” agatisah-e .
42007009	Jesun hiche hi ajah phat’in amapa chu kidang asa behseh jengin , anung jui mipi lama akiheiyin , “ Kaseipeh nahiuve , Israel lah a jong hitobang tahsan len kamudoh poi , ” ati .
42007010	Ahung kisol ho in lama ahung kile kit’u leh sohpa chu adamsan agatoh tauve .
42007011	Hiche nung hin Jesu Nain khoa alut’in , aseijuite leh mi tampin akilhonpiuve .
42007012	Khopi dongkot phung agah phah konchan ven , mithilong khat ahung kipudoh-in , athipa chu anun chapa chang khatseh a anei ahin , anu jong meithaisa ahitai . Khopi sunga pat mipin meithainu chu ahin lhonpiuvin ahi .
42007013	Pakaiyin meithainu hi amudoh phat’in alai natpin ajah a , “ Kap hih-in , ” ati .
42007014	Anai lut’in thilong kong atham leh alongpu ho ading tauve . Aman , “ Vo golhang , kaseipeh nahi , thoudoh tan , ” atileh ;
42007015	mithipa chu atoudoh paiyin thu aseiyin , chuin Jesun ama chu anu apetai .
42007016	Mi jouse atija behseh jengun Pathen avahchoiyun , “ Pathenin amite ahung vil’in , i-lah-uva Themgoa nasatah khat asohdoh tai , ” atiuvin ahi .
42007017	Hiche Jesu chung chang thudol hi Judea gam pumpi le akimvel gamkol dunga akithangsoh heltan ahi .
42007018	Aseijuiten John jah a thilsoh hicheng hi aseipeh uleh Johnin aseijuite mi ni akouvin
42007019	Pakai henga asol’in , “ Ahung ding chu Nang nahi hitam , ahilouleh achom dang khat ka-nga nah lai diu ham ? ” tin agadohsah-e .
42007020	Solle teni Jesu henga ahung lhonin , “ John baptist chun , ‘ Ahung ding chu Nang nahi hitam , ahiloule achomdang khat ka-nga nah lai diu ham ? ’ tia dong dinga nahenga eihinsol lhon ahi , ” ati lhone .
42007021	Hichepet tah a hi Jesun amaho , hivei chom chom veiho , lhagao gilou vop ho aboldama mitcho jong kho amusah ahi .
42007022	Hijeh chun Jesun solle te ni adonbut’in , “ Kile kit’in John jah a chun nathilmu le najah lhon , mitchon kho amu’uva , elbaiin lam ajot’u , miphah ho suh thenga auma , na-ngongin kho ajah , mithisa kaithouva auma tahlelte Kipana Thupha akiseipeh hi gaseipeh lhonin ;
42007023	chule keiya kipal lhuhna neilou mi chu-anunnom ahi , ” ati .
42007024	John solle te ni che nungin Jesun John thudol aseiyin , “ Gamthip’a ipi vedia cheji nahiuvem ’ ? Huiyin peng amut ling ham ?
42007025	Ipi vedia ba chadoh ji nahiuvem ? Ponnem sil mi ham ? Ven , von hoitah a kivona nom satah a um ho chu leng inpi dunga aumbouvui .
42007026	Achutile ipi vetnoma ba chedohji nahiuvem ? Themgao ham ? Ahi , najah-uva kasei ahi , Themgao sanga thupijo ahiye .
42007027	Ama thudol hi , ‘ Ven , kasolle Nang sangin kasol masai , Aman nachena lampi semsa anakoi ding ahi , ’ tia kisun chu ahitai .
42007028	Kaseipeh nahiuve , numei sung peng cheh ahivangin John pen geiyin ama sanga lenjo aumpoi , ahinla Pathen lenggama aneopen ama sangin alenjo nalaiye .
42007029	Mipi le kaidong hon asei ajah phat’un , John baptist chansah dol’a baptize changsa ahijeh-un , Pathen apah chauve .
42007030	Pharisee ho le Danthu them hon vang John baptist khut’a baptize achan lou jeh-un adiuva Pathen thilgon chu apaituve .
42007031	“ Tukhang miho hi ipi to kitekah ding hi tam ? Itobang mi hiuvem ?
42007032	Amaho hi kailhanga tou chapang ho khat’in achom khat jah a , ‘ Kuli kamutpeh-u le la nalam pouvin , Lapi kasah-u jongle nakap deh pouve , ’ tia kihou ho bep ahiuve .
42007033	Ijeh-inem itile John baptist chu ahungin changlhah la nelou leng pitwi jong don louvin aum nan , ‘ Thilhavop ahi , ’ atiuvin ;
42007034	Mihem Chapa ahungin changlhah anen lengpitwi adon leh , ‘ Ven , neh hat le lengpi twi loppa , kaidong ho jolpa hi , ’ atiuve .
42007035	Ahinla chihna chu achaten adihna aphot chet ahibouve , ” ati .
42007036	Pharisee khat’in Jesu chu nehkhompi din akouvin , Ama Phariseepa in’a alut’in atoutai .
42007037	Hiche khopi sunga hin chonse numei khat aumin , Jesu Phariseepa in’a anne dia tou ahen songval bom khat’a thao namtui choiyin ahungin ,
42007038	Jesu nung , akhotaljum koma dingin , akap’in akengphang chu amitlhin asop’in , chuin asamin atheh ngimin , achop’in thao namtui chu anui .
42007039	Neh khompi dia kou Phariseepan hiche hi amu phat’in alung sunga , “ Hichepa hi Themgao ahinah le ahung thama numei khu itobang mi ahi hentin , chonse ahijong he nah ta , ” tin gel’e .
42007040	Jesun ajah a , “ Simon nahenga seinom khat kaneiye , ” atileh ; aman , “ Seijengin Houhil , ” ati .
42007041	Aman , “ Mi nin sumpa hom mikhat sum abat lhone . Khat’in denarii ja nga aban , khat pan som nga abai .
42007042	Asah lel lhon phat’in aman abat lhon angaidam tai . Hiche te ni koijoh hin ama chu hangailut jon tem ? ” atileh ;
42007043	Simon in adonbut’in , “ Atamjo angaidam peh pa hin te kati , ” ati . Jesun ajah a , “ Naseidih lheh-e , ” ati .
42007044	Numei nu lam angan Simon jah a , “ Hichenu hi ven ! Na-ina kahung lut tan , kakeng silna din twibon neipe poi ; hiche nu hin kakengphang te ni amit lhia asop’a asama atheh ngim ahi .
42007045	Nangin chop jong neichop pon , hichenu vang kahung lut’a pat tang louhel’in kakeng phang te ni achop chop jenge .
42007046	Nangin kalu jengbon thao nu louva , hichenun kakengphang te ni geiyin thao namtui anui .
42007047	Hijeha chu najah a kasei ahi , hichenun hibanga angailutna hi achonset tampi ki-ngaidam phot chenna ahin , lhomcha ki-ngaidampeh chun angailu lhome , ” ati .
42007048	Jesun amanu jah a , “ Nachonset chengse ki-ngaidam ahitai , ” atipeh-e .
42007049	A ankong umpihon , “ Chonset geiya ngaidam thei Ama hi koibep ham ? ” akitiuve .
42007050	Jesun numeinu jah a , “ Natahsanin nahuhhing ahitai , lung monin chetan , ” ati .
42008001	Phatchom khat nungin Jesun khopi jouse le khote jouse aban banin achonlen , Pathen lenggam Kipana Thupha ahil lhang len , seijui som le nin jong alhonpiuve .
42008002	Numei phabep , lhagao gilouvop’a kona adamsa ho le natna chom chom kona adamsah hon jong alhonpiuvin , hiche ho lah a hin Magdalene kiti Mary , asunga kona thilha sagi anodoh pehnu ,
42008003	Herod neichingpa Chuza jinu Joanna , Susanna le adang ho tampi ahiuve . Numeiho hin Jesu le aseijuite chu amaho neiya konin ajenjiuve .
42008004	Khopi jousea konin mi ahung hung jengun Jesu koma mi tamtah akikhomun ahile Jesun thulemin thu khat aseiyin ;
42008005	“ Muchi thepa alouva muchi then akonin athe leh muchi phabep lamsih a achun , min achonlih-in , chunga leng vachaten akilodoh tauve .
42008006	Phabepma songlheo chunga achun , ahintheina ding leithao aum loujeh-in ahung kedoh vangin agop paijitan ahi .
42008007	Phabep jong ling lah a achun , ling hon adep lihji tauve .
42008008	Phabep vang leipha leiya achukhan , ahung khangdoh in ajat jakhat chengin agai , ” ati . Hicheng asei hin asamin , “ A-ngaina ding nakhang neiyan ngai hen ! ” ati .
42008009	Hiche thulem hi ipi kiseina ham , tin aseijuiten Jesu adongui .
42008010	Hijeh chun Aman , “ Nang ho hi Pathen lenggam thuguh chengse het dia kipea nahitauvin , adang ho vangin vejong leu amuchet thei lou diu jajong leu ahet khen thei lou diu jeh a a thulem jenga kiseipeh ahiuve , ” ati .
42008011	“ Thulem chu hiche kiseina ahi ; muchi chu Pathen thupha ahi .
42008012	Lamsih a chu kitiho chu Pathen thupha jataa , ahivanga atahsan dauva huhhinga aum louna diuva , Diabol hunga alung gil’a Thupha chu alahmang pehji miho ahiuve .
42008013	Songlheo chung leipatnaa chu kitiho chu thupha ajah tenguleh kipah tah a kisanpai jenga , ahivanga jungbei ahijeh-uva chomkhat tahsan jong le patepna phat ahung lhun phat le pul lhaji miho ahiuve .
42008014	Linglah a chu kitiho chu thupha ajatauvin , ahinla hinkhoa lungkhamna tin cheng , haona le leiset nopsahna chengsen alonvuh a , aga pilhing thei louva um miho ahiuve .
42008015	Leipha laiya chu kitiho vang chu thupha ajah tengu leh lungthim phatah le dih tah akolchahkheh a aga pilhin kahsea pangdet jing miho ahiuve .
42008016	“ Koiman mei avah-in bel akhu ngaipon , jalkhun noiya jong atung ngaipoi . Ahung lut chanin meivah chu amusoh din thaomei akikhu khum jong ima aumpoi .
42008017	Ajeh chu khovah a kiphong doh lou ding ima akiselguh aumpon , phondoh a hetdoh lou ding akikhu khum jong ima aumpoi .
42008018	Iti najah-um ching theiyun ; ajeh chu aneiya kipah bea , aneilou chu aneiya agel chengse jong kilahpeh ding ahi , ” ati .
42008019	Jesu nu le Jesu sopi pasal ho ahenga ahungu leh mipi jeh chun akom alut theipouve .
42008020	Mihon , “ Nanu le nasopi pasal hon namu nomun pama adingui , ” tin Jesu jah a aseipeh-ui .
42008021	Aman ajah-uva , “ Kanu le kasopite chu Pathen thu jop’a bol ho chu ahiuve , ” tin adonbut’e .
42008022	Nikhat Jesu aseijuite toh kong sunga alut’in , chuin ajah-uva , “ Dil gallang khat’a galkaiyu hite , ” atijeh chun akitol tauve .
42008023	Akitolnauva Jesu a-ihmutai . Hichun huipi hatah-in dil chu anuh leh kong sung twi dimpai ding ahitan , seijuite akicha lheh tauve .
42008024	Seijuite ahungun Jesu athou khangun , “ Kapu , kapu , amangthah kahitauve ! ” atiuvin ahi . Jesu athouvin huipi le twi kinonglai chu haphoa apho leh , huisepi chu athip’in , abeihel jenge .
42008025	Jesun ajah-uva , “ Natahsanu hoilam ba hitam ? ” atileh ; amahon kidang asauvin atijauvin , khat’in khat jah a , “ Hichepa pi hi hoi koi hitam , huipi leh twikinong jeng jong apho leh athun anung jenge , ” atiuve .
42008026	Jesu le seijuite chu Galilee to kigalsai Gerasa agamkol’a akitol lut tauve ,
42008027	Konga ahung kumlhah lhah-in khopia hungkon pasal khat’in akimupin , ama chu phat sotpi thilhavop ahitan , pon pona sil lou , in’a cheng jong hilou lhan lah jenga cheng ahitai .
42008028	Amahin Jesu amudoh phat’in oging tah-in ahinsamin , “ Pathen chungnungpen Chapa Jesu , itile nati ham ? Nahenga katao ahi , neibol gim hih-in ! ” ati .
42008029	Ajeh chu Jesun lhagaoboh hi mipaa kona hung potdoh dia asol ahi . Tamtah vei lhagaoboh hin mipa chu amatjia , bul atuh-uva thih khaova ahen vangun , bul atumkeh-in akihenna abot tanjin , lhagaoboh chun gam thip laiya anolutji tai .
42008030	Jesun , “ Namin ipi ham ? ” ati leh , asunga thilha tampi lut ahijeh-in , “ Janel kahi , ” tin adonbut’e .
42008031	Hichun noimigama asol louna diuvin Jesu henga atao tauve .
42008032	Vohcha tampi hon khat lhang chunga chu lha ahiuvin , vohcha ho sunga chu alutsahna diuvin thilha ho chu Jesu henga ataovu leh , anoppeh tai .
42008033	Thilha ho chu mipaa koin ahung potdoh-un , vohchate sunga alut’u leh , vohchate chu songkol’a alhai lhauvin twikhanglena alha lut’un athigamtauve .
42008034	Vohcha ching hon thilsoh hi amuphat’un ajam’uvin khopi sung le loujao dunga thu alhutsoh tauve .
42008035	Mipi athilsoh vedia Jesu henga ahungu leh , asunga kona thilha potdohna mipa chun pon kisil’a lung lima Jesu kengbul’a tou amu’vin , atijatauve .
42008036	Thilha voppa kidamsah amittah a muhon aseipehui .
42008037	Akimvel Gerasa gamkol’a cheng jouse atija behseh jengun Jesu chu akom’uva kona potdoh din angeh-uvin ahi . Hijeh chun Jesu konga alut’in akile kittai .
42008038	Thilhaho potdohnapa chun Jesu koma aum jingna dia athumleh , aman asol’in ajah a ,
42008039	“ Na-in lama kile kit’in , Pathenin nabolpeh thil chu gaseijon , ” ati . Hijeh chun ama achen , Jesun abolpeh thil chu khopi sung thongsoh-in agaphongjal tai .
42008040	Jesu hung kile kit chu mipin ana ngah jingun alamtouve .
42008041	Hichun ven , Houthua kikhopna in vaipo Jairus kitipa chu ahungin , Jesu kengbul’a aboh khup’in a-in’a hungpeh din a-ngeh tai .
42008042	Ajeh chu achanu khatseh , kum som le ni lhing bep chu alaichat chat’in ahi . Jesu achephat’in mipin aneh chinto jengui .
42008043	Numei khat hi kum som le ni athia long , anei chasuna louthem ho akijensah vanga koimachan ajen dam joulou ahitai .
42008044	Hichenu hi Jesu nung lama ahungin apon mongkai atham leh athi lon atang hel’e .
42008045	Hichun Jesun , “ Koiham ei tham’ah ? ” atileh ; Koimachan kahi atipon , Peterin , “ Pipu , mipin toma neh chinto jinga , ” ati .
42008046	Ahivangin Jesun , “ Mi khat’in eitham monge , ajeh chu keiya kona thilbol theina thahat apotdoh kahei , ” atichang mel’e .
42008047	Numeinun aki-imthei louhel ding ahet phat’in kihot pum pumin ahungin Jesu angsung laitah a Jesu athamkhahna jeh ahil chenin , chule apettah a damhel thu aphongdoh tai .
42008048	Hichun Jesun ajaha a , “ Chanu , natahsanin nadamsah ahitai , lung mongin chetan , ” ati .
42008049	Jesun thu asei nalaiyin Houthua kikhopna in vaipopa in’a hungkon mi khat’in , “ Nachanu athitai , Houhil chu sulung gim ta hih-in , ” ati .
42008050	Asei hi Jesun ajan , “ Olmo hih-in , tahsan poutan , chutile kihinsah tei nante , ” atipeh-e .
42008051	Jesu vaipopa in alhunin Peter le John chule Jacob , chapangnu nu le pa tilou midangin ajui lut ding anompoi .
42008052	Mipin chapangnu akauvin , adip abeng beng jenguvin ahi . Jesun , “ Kap hih-un , athi ahipoi , a-ihmu ahibouve , ” ati .
42008053	Ahinla athi ahetjeh-un amoh nuisat tauve .
42008054	Jesun akhut’in abanin , “ Boinu , thouvin , ” tin akoutai .
42008055	Hichun alhagao ahung kile kit’in ahileh chapangnu athoudoh pai jenge . Chuin Jesun neh ding apeh diuvin aseiye .
42008056	Anu le pan kidang asa behseh jeng lhonin , ahivangin athilsoh chu koimacha jah a aseipoh louna diuvin Jesun akham chah kheh-e .
42009001	Jesun som le ni chu akoukhomin thilhaho nodohna ding thu nei na le hivei chom chom boldam na thei thahat apei ;
42009002	chuin amaho chu Pathen lenggam phongjal ding le adammo boldam din asoltai .
42009003	Ajah-uvah , “ Lampi dunga din thil imacha , tenggol hihen , sakhao hileh , changlhah le sum jeng jong kiken dauvin , sangkhol jong tho ni ah dauvin .
42009004	Itobang in hojongle nalut nauva chun pansauvin ,
42009005	Nalhunsah lou ho vang chu khosung nadalhah tengule gihsal hetsah nan nakengphanguva leivui thing lha dentauvin , ’ ati .
42009006	Amaho akipatdoh-un akho khoa Kipana Thupha ahil lhang leuvin muntina ana aboldam’uve .
42009007	Gambih vaipo Herod chun nakitong thil kibol chengse ajan , mi kimkhat’in John athia kona thoudoh kit a aseijeh-un Herod alung gimin ,
42009008	abangman Elijah hung kilah kit’in aseiyun , kon khat’in jong gol luilai Themgao ho khat pen thoudoh kit bangin aseiyui .
42009009	Herod chun , “ John la alukatan tan , athudol kajah pahi koiba hintam ? ” tin aseiyin mujong amunom lheh-e .
42009010	Solchah ho ahung kile kit-un athilbol anatoh jouseu Jesu aseipeh tauve . Jesun amaho chu Bethsaida khopia atumin apuidoh tai .
42009011	Ahinla mipin amudoh-uvin anung ajuitauve . Jesun amaho jong hi alamdot cheh-in ajah-uvah Pathen lenggam thudol aseipeh-in , dam ding ngaicha chan aboldamin ahi .
42009012	Nisa lhumtel tul phat’in som le ni chu ahungun ajah a , “ Eiho gamthip laiya um ihiuvin , akimvel kho dung le loujao dunga acheuva ge-na ding le neh le chah akiholna diuvin mipi hi solmang tan , ” atiuve .
42009013	Jesun ajah-uvah , “ Nanag hon nah ding peuvin , ” atileh ; amahon , “ Keihon changlhah pheng nga le nga ni val kinei louva , kacheuva mi hijatpi neh khop ding kaga choh diu ham ? ” atiuve .
42009014	Miho chu sang nga jen ahiuve . Jesun aseijuite jah a , “ Miho hi som nga chengin aloi aloiyin tousahun , ” atileh ;
42009015	amahon hiti chun abonchan atousah tauve .
42009016	Chuin changlhah pheng nga le nga ni chu alan , van lam aven , phatthei aboh jouvin ahehbal bal’in mi ang sunga luipeh din seijuite apetai .
42009017	Mihon avaset geiyin aneuvin , aneh moh alokhomu leh paipeh som le ni adimset’e .
42009018	Phat khat hi Jesu atuma ataopeh’in seijuite ahung kikhomun , Aman ajah-uva , “ Mipin Kei hi koi ahi , eitiuvem ? ” tin adonge .
42009019	Amohon , “ John baptist , ’ tiloi aumin , abangin , ‘ Elijah ahi , ’ atin , konkhatsen vang , ‘ Gollui laiya Themgao hokhatpen thoudoh kit hiya chu , ’ tin aseiyui , ” atiuve .
42009020	Amaho jah a , “ Nang hon koiba ahi neitiuvem ? ” atileh ; Peterin , “ Pathen hungkon Messiah nahi , ” ati .
42009021	Hiche thu hi koima jah a asei louna diuva Jesun seijuite ahil chah-in
42009022	“ Mihem Chapan genthei tintang athoh a , upate le Thempu ho chule Danthu themhon apaidohuva atha diu , hijongleh nithum ni leh kaithouva um ding ahi , ” tin aseiye .
42009023	Jesun miho jah a , “ Keima eijui nom chu ama ka-ngaitoma niseh a thingpel kiput’a eijui ding ahi .
42009024	Ijeh-inem itile ama kihuhhing nom chun athilto ding , Keima jal’a thilto chun kihinsona aneiding ahi .
42009025	Ajeh chu min vannoi leiset pumpi neihen lang ahinkho kisuh mang leh ipi phatchompin tem ?
42009026	Mi khattouvin Kei le kathu ajachatpi leh Mihem Chapan jong Ama loupina le Pa le Vantil Thengte loupina ahung teng ama chu ajumso sing ahi .
42009027	Dihtah akaseipeh nahiuve , hikoma ding ho lah a miphabep hi Pathen lenggam amu kahseuva thina tep kha lou ding aum’uve , ” ati .
42009028	Thu hicheng aseijou niget nungin Jesun Peter le John chule Jacob apuiyin tao din molchunga akaltouve .
42009029	Ataopet chun amaiso vou akikhel’in aponsil abanlot lot’in alhe lah lah jenge .
42009030	Ven , mi ni toh akihou linm’in , amani hi Mose le Elijah ahin ,
42009031	loupi tah-in ahung kilah lhonin , Jerusalema Jesu athia Pathen thilgon asuh bulhit ding thu akihouvui .
42009032	Peter le aloite ni chu a-ihmut soh ngui ngui jengun ; ahung lipdoh phat’un Jesu loupina le akoma ding te ni chu amu’ve .
42009033	Mose le Elijah chun Jesu adalhah pet lhonin Peterin Jesu jah a , “ Pipu , hikoma i-umu hi anom’e , Nang ding khat , Mose ding khat chule Elijah ding khat lhambuh thum song ung kate , ” tin ipi aseilam helouvin aseiye .
42009034	Aman hiche aseipet chun meilhang khat’in ahinle khu’vin , meilhang lah a akitol lut jengu chun akichauve .
42009035	Meilhang lah a konin ogin khat hin , “ Hiche hi kadei lhen Ka-chapa ahi , asei ngaiyun , ” ati .
42009036	Ogin kichai phat’in Jesu chu achangseh ahitai . Seijuiten athilmi hi hichepet hin koimacha seipeh louvin a-im chah kheh-uve .
42009037	Ajing nikhoa molchunga kona ahung kumsuh leh mi tamtah-in analamdot’uve .
42009038	Mipi lah a konin mi khat ahung pengjah-in , “ Houhil , lungset’in kachapa neivetpeh-in , chapa chang khatseh a kanei ahin ,
42009039	lhagao khat’in amatji teng phot lot louvin apengjah jin , aveilhuh teng chilphon alhan , lhalel lel’in alha jin , ama la abeipai ding ahijitai .
42009040	Naseijuiten eideldoh peh diuva ka-ngeh vangin anodoh joupouve , ” ati .
42009041	Jesun adonbut’in , “ Vo , tahsanan bei khang lamvai mite ! Itih chan ka-umpia kakho ngai ding nahiuvem ? Nachapa chu hikom’ah ahinpuiyin , ” ati .
42009042	Ahungpet tah-in thilhan aheh lhun avei ngoi jenge . Hichun Jesun lhagaoboh chu haphon aphoh-in , chapangpa chu aboldamin , apa koma anungsol pehtai .
42009043	Mihon Pathen Thahat chungnung chu kidang asalheh jenguve . Mihon athilbol kidang asah laitahun Jesun aseijuite jah a ,
42009044	“ Hicheng thu ho hi nang ho dia kisei ahi , lung nachangin ngaiyun ; Mihem chapa hi mihemte khut’a pehdoh aum ding ahi , ” ati .
42009045	Seijuiten asei chu ahechenpouve , ipi kiseina ahi ahetdoh louna diuva kiselpeh ahin ; athusei doh chet ding la akichauvin ahi .
42009046	Seijuite lah a alenpen ding thua kinelna asohtai .
42009047	Jesun alung gil’uva akikal nau chu ahen , chapang khat akaiyin akoma atousah-e .
42009048	Chuin seijuite jah a , “ Koi hijngle Keima min’a hiche chapang kisan chan chun Keima eisan ahin , Keima eisanga chun Eihinsolpa asan ah ; ajeh chu nalha-uva aneopen chu alenpana pang ding ahi , ” ati .
42009049	Johnin adonbut’in , “ Pipu , mikhat namin a thilha nodoh kamu’vin , keoho toh lhona nang najui loujeh-in kakhamtauve , ” ati .
42009050	Jesun ajah a , “ Kham dauvin , nadou lou pouvu chu nang ho lama pan gahi , ” ati .
42009051	Jesu lah touva aumna ding phat anai jep jep phat’in Jerusalema che din akiheitai .
42009052	Jesun solle ho asol masan , aamho chu acheuvin alhunna ding gonsa koipeh din Samaria miho kho khat’a alut’uve .
42009053	Samaria mihon Jesu chu Jerusalema jon a chego ahijeh-in asang tapouve .
42009054	Aseijuite ni Jacob le Johnin asandau hi amudoh lhon phat’in , “ Pakai , vana kona meikou kakou lhah lhona kakahvamsah diu nadeiyem ? ” ati lhone .
42009055	Jesu akiheiyin amani chu haphon aphoh-e .
42009056	Chuin khodanga achetauve .
42009057	Alamjot laiyun pasal khat’in Jesu jah a , “ Nache na chan a jui ing kate , ” ati .
42009058	Jesun ajah a , “ Gam-ui hon koaneiyun , chunga leng vachaten jong bu aneiyui , Mihem Chapan vang alu ngapna ding mun jeng jong aneipoi , ” ati .
42009059	Michom khat jah a jong , “ Neijuiyin , ” ati . Ahinla aman , “ Pakai , amasan cheng ting kapa gavui ta dinge , ” ati .
42009060	Jesun ajah a , “ Mithi chu mithi kivui din dalhan lang , chen Pathen leng gam thu seiphongjon , ” ati .
42009061	Midang khat’in jong , “ Kenvang najui jeng inge Pakai , ahin amasan ina umho ga-lha tadinge , ” ati .
42009062	Jesun ajah a , “ Loukai dia langkon tuhsa haidia kihei kit chu Pathen lenggam din aphachompoi , ” ati .
42010001	Hiche nung hin Pakaiyin misom sagi le ni alhengdoh-in , chedia agotna khopi jouse le muntin’a ni nin asol masai .
42010002	Amisol ho jah a , “ Chang-at ding atam lheh jengin , natong’ah alhome ; chang-at ding mi ahinsol na din chang-at na Pakai henga taovun .
42010003	Cheuvin , ven , ngeihon lah a kelngoinoute kilhalut banga kasol nahiuve .
42010004	Sumbom hihen sakhao hileh kengchot ho geiyin kiken dauvin , lampi dunga jong koima salam bol dauvin .
42010005	Nalut nau in tin’a amasan , “ Hiche in’a hin lung mon leng hen , ” tiuvin .
42010006	Hikoma chu chamna dei mi aum leh ama chunga chu nalungmonu chun tin , aumlou vangleh nahenguva hung kile kit ding ahi .
42010007	Hiche in’a chun pansauvin , amahon napeh peh-u chu neuvin don’un ajeh chu natong’an atohman asan lom ahi . In khat’a konin inchoma kichon dauvin .
42010008	Khopi sung nalut’uva mihon nalamdot’u jong leh , na-anga aluiyu chu ne jengun ;
42010009	chukoma adamlou ho boldamun , ajah-uvah , “ Pathen lenggam chun nakomu ahinphatai , ’ tin seiph-un .
42010010	Khopi sung nalut’uva mihon nalamdot lou vangu leh akhosung lamlen dunga potdoh-un lang ,
42010011	‘ Imacha kitimatna inei louvu ahitai , nakhopi sunguva leivui kakengphanguva beh geiya kathin lhah khum nahiuve ; hijongleh Pathen lenggamin hilai ahinphatai , ti nahet diu ahi , ’ tin seipeh-uvin .
42010012	Najah-uva kasei ahi , thupitan nikhoa chuche khopi thoh sanga Sodom khopi thoh oljo ding ahi .
42010013	“ Ohe Chorazin khopi nada ahin , ohe Bethsaida khopi nada ah ! Ajeh chu nakhosunga na kitong thil kibol thahatna ho hi Tyre le Sidon a kibol hileh sot’a lungaheiyuva , vutvam kinu’va khaodip pon kisil’a tou diu ahitai .
42010014	Thupi tan ni leh nathoh diu sanga Tyre le Sidon thoh oljo ding ahi .
42010015	Capernaum nangma van geiya choisanga um ding nahim ? Noimigama kikai lhading nahiubouve .
42010016	Koi hileh naseiyu ngaiya chun Kei seijong angai ahin , nang ho pamsea chun Keijong eipamse ahi ; Keima eipamsea chun Eihinsolpa geiya apai ahitai , ” ati .
42010017	Som sagi le ni ho chu kipah thanom tah-in ahung kile kit’uvin , “ Pakai , Nangma min jal’in thilha ho geiyin kathu’uva anung jenguve , ” atiuve .
42010018	Jesun ajah-uvah , “ Vana kona Satam kolpha banga hung lhasuh kamui .
42010019	Ven , gul ho le aipi ho chotphana thei , chule melmapa chunga thahat kapeh nahiuvin , imachan nasuhset lou diu ahi .
42010020	Chule lhagao ho nathu’va anunjeh seh chun kipah hih-un , vana naminu akisutjeh-in joh kipahuvin , ” ati .
42010021	Hichepet chun Lhagao Thengin Jesu kipana adimin hijeh chun aman , “ Hepa , van le lei Pkai ; thil hicheng hi michingte le lungthim themte na-impeh a , milham ho hengjoh a naphondoh jeh-in kapah chai . Henge , Hepa hitia bol hi nadeilam ahiye .
42010022	“ Thil ijakai ka-pan eipehdoh ahitai ; Pa tilouvin Chapa aheon , Chapa le Chapan aphodoh peh mi tilou koiman Pa ahepoi , ” ati .
42010023	jesun seijuite lama akiheiyin atumbeh-in , “ Nang ho thilmu hi amu jouse vangpha ahiuve .
42010024	Kaseipeh nahiuve , nathilmun hi Themgao tamtah le leng tamtah-in mu atup lheh vangun amupha tapouvin , jehding adei lheh vangun najah tobangu ajapha tapouve , ” ati .
42010025	Jesu patepna din Danthu themho khat adingdoh-in , “ Houhil , tonsot kmelou hinna kanei theina dia ipi kabol ding ham ? ” atileh ;
42010026	Jesun ajah a , “ Danthua ipi kisun nasimdoh-em ? ” ati .
42010027	Aman adonbut’in , “ Nangman nalungthim pumpi le nahinkho pumpi , nathahat pumpi le nalung gil pumpia Pakai na-Pathen na ngailut’a chle nangma nakingailut ding ahi akiti , ” ati .
42010028	Jesun ajah a , “ Nadonbut dih lheh-e , hiti chun bol le chun nahin ding ahi , ” ati .
42010029	Ama them akichan nomjehin Jesu jah a , “ Kaheng kakom chu koipen ham ? ” tin adonge .
42010030	Adonbutnan Jesun , ’ Pasal khat Jerusalema konin Jericho lama avah lut’in , amahon aponsil ahoh lhauvin , avouvin athibang bangin adalha tauve .
42010031	Hichepet tah hin Thempu khat’in hiche lampi chu ahokhan , mipa chu amudoh phat’in lamchom langa apeldoh tai .
42010032	Hitobang hin Levi mi khat man hikom chu ahinjot pan , mipa chu amudoh phat’in lamchom lang khatma apeldoh kittai .
42010033	Ahin Samaria mi kholjin vah le khat’in ahintoh khan , amudoh phat’in alainatpi lheh jenge .
42010034	Mipa chu anailut’n amaha chengse atompeh-in , thaotwi lw lengpitwi anun , atouna gancha chunga adomtoh-in , jinlhunin’a ahinpo lut’in ajentai .
42010035	Ajing nikhon denarii ni alan , jinlhun inngahpa apen , ‘ Hichepa hi analimbol’in , sum nasuh mangbe leh kahung kit teng sa-nange , ’ ati .
42010036	Hicheng mi thum lah a hi gucha michomho lah a vah lutpa heng le kom chu koipen hinte natim ? ” atileh ,
42010037	aman , “ Ama hepi tah a bolpa chu , ” ati . Jesun ajah a , “ Nang jong chen lang chutin gabol tan , ” ati .
42010038	Jesu le aseijuite akholjin nauva kho khat’a alut tauvin , Martha kiti numei khat’in a-in’ah alhunsah-e .
42010039	Ama hin sopi numei Mary kiti khat aneiyin , ama chu Pakai kengbul’a atouvin aseichan angai ngai jenge .
42010040	Martha vang atoh idng tamjeh-in thu ngai manin aumpon , ahungin , “ Pakai , kasopiun kachangseh a na eitohsah hi khoh nasah lou ngap ham ? eikithopi din seipeh tang-em , ” ati .
42010041	Pakaiyin Martha adonbut’in , “ Martha , Martha , thil tampi ngaitoa lung gim nahi .
42010042	Khohsah ding thil khatseh bou ahin , Maryn aphalai akilhentan , kilahpeh kit louhel ding ahitai , ” ati .
42011001	Munkhat’a Jesu ataovin , atao jouvin aseijuite khat’in ajah a , “ Pakai , Johnin aseijuite taoje ahil bangin taoje neihil’un , ” ati .
42011002	Jesun ajah-uvah , “ Natao teng hitin seiyun : ‘ Pa namin theng kijabol jing hen , Nalenggam hung lhung hen ;
42011003	Niseh a kaneh diu anneh neipeuvin ,
42011004	Eiba jouseu ka-ngaidam bangun Kachonsetnau jouse ngaidamin ; Chonset lo na thei petepnaa neilhut hih-un , ’ tiuvin , ” ati .
42011005	Jesun ajah-uva , “ Nang ho khatpenin jol neihan , ama chu jan khangkimin ahenga chehen lang ajah a , ‘ Kajol , bat din changlhah pheng thum neipen .
42011006	Kajol kholjin khat ahun lhungin aneh dia a-ang a luipeh ding ima kaneipoi , ti hen ;
42011007	aman insunga konin , ‘ Neisu gim hih-in kot akikhah tan , kachate jong kei jong jalkhuna aklumtauve , hung thouva nang ima pethei kahipoi , ’ ati .
42011008	Kaseipeh nahiuve , ajol ahijeh chun thova ima peh ding go hih jeng jong leh , khatpan jummo tah a athum tun tun jeh chun thouvintin angaichat jat chu apeh tei ding ahi .
42011009	“ Kaseipeh nahiuve , thumun namu diu ahi , kiuvin kihonpeh ding ahiuve ;
42011010	ijeh-inem itile athum chan achangin , ahol’an amun , akiuva akihonpehji .
42011011	Nalah-uva mipa koipen nahiuvem achapan nga athum leh akhel’a gul pea ;
42011012	ahtui athum teng aipi peding’ah ?
42011013	Migiloutah nang hon bon thilpha pehji nahet’u leh ichan geiya phajoa vana Pa Pathenin ahenga thumte Lhagao Theng apeh ding hitam ! ” ati .
42011014	Jesun thilhavop paomo khat anodoh leh , thilha apotdoh phat’in paomopa chu apao theiyin , mipin kidang asalheh jengui .
42011015	Mi phabep’in vang , “ Thilha ho nodohna dinga thilha lengpa Beelzebul’in tha apeh hibouva hi , ” atiuve .
42011016	Konkhat man apatepnan vana kona melchihna avetsah diuvin a-ngeh-ui .
42011017	Alung gel’u ahen Jesun ajah-uvah , “ Lenggam kikhentel’a ama le ama kidouva chu amangthah jin , insung kkhen tel jong alhujin ahi .
42011018	Satan jong kikhentel hen kidouto leh alenggam iti dinjou ding ham ? Beelzebul kamanchah a thilha ho nodoh a neisei jeh-uva kasei ahi .
42011019	Ken thilha ho nodohna dia Beelzebul kamanchah leh nachateuvin koiba amanchah hiu ham ? Hijeh a chu nachatauvin thammo nachan diu ahi .
42011020	Thilha ho nodohna dinga Pathen khutjung kaman ahivangleh Pathen lenggam nalah-uva hung lhung ahitai .
42011021	Mihat’in manchah akipat’a a-in aki-nga laisen anei chengse ahoiye ;
42011022	mihatjon abulna ajotho teng vangleh akisonna galvon alahpeh jin , athil ho chompeh-in ahomjaljitai .
42011023	Koi hile Keilama pang lou chu eidouvah ahin , eikhop khompi lou chu athecheh ahiye .
42011024	“ Lhagaoboh chu mihem sunga kona apotdoh tengleh twibeina muntin’a avah len , choldo mun aholjie . Mun amu lou teng leh , “ Kahung potdohna ka-in’a chun kile kit tange , ’ atiji .
42011025	Ahung leh akitheh ngima akigontoh amui .
42011026	Chuin achen ama sanga gilou cheh lhagao sagi agapuiyin , mipa sunga chun alut’un achengtauve ; chutah chun mipa um chan hi amasaa sangin akhoh cheh jon ahi , ” ati .
42011027	Jesun hiche hi asei nalaiyin , mipi lah a pangin numei khat’in ahinsamin , “ Navop’a noitwiya navahdoh numei chu anun nom’e , ” ati .
42011028	Jesun vang , “ Pathen Thupha ngaiya nit ho chu anun nomjoi , ” ati .
42011029	Mipi ahung kikhopsoh phat’un Jesun , “ Hiche khang hi khang gilou ahi , melchihna ahol vangun Jonah melchihna tilou adang kipe louhel ding ahi .
42011030	Jonah Nineveh kho mite dia melchihna ahibanga , Mihem Chapa hiche khanga dia melchihna pang ding ahi .
42011031	Lhang gam lengnu chu hiche khang mite toh hung thoudoh khoma thupi tannaa amaho themmo achansah ding ahi ; ijeh-inem itile ama chu leiset kolmonga konin Solomon chih thu ngai din ahungin , ahinla ven , Solomon sanga loupijo khat hikoma aume .
42011032	Nineveh kho mite toh chu hiche khang mite toh hung thoudoh khoma thupi tannaa hiche khang mite hi themmo achansah diu ahi ; ajeh chu amahn Jonah thusei phongin lung aheiyuve ; ahinla ven , Jonah sanga loupijo khat hikoma aume .
42011033	“ Koiman mei avah-in ningchong muthim’ah akoi ngaipon , lo jong akhu khum ngaipoi ; ahung lut chan muthei din meivah khom chunga atungji bouve .
42011034	Namit hi natahsa meivah ahin , namit achim laisen natahsa pumpi avah-in , achim lou teng natipumpi athimjitai .
42011035	Nasunga um vah chu thim am avephan .
42011036	Athimkom beihel’a natahsa pumpi avah leh meivah vah tah-in nasalvah banga apumpia vah jeng ding ahi .
42011037	“ Jesun thu asei chai phat’in Pharisee khat hin an nehpi din akouve ; ama achen ankong aumtai .
42011038	Ahin an neh kona akisil lou chu Phariseepan adatmo lheh-e .
42011039	Pakayin ajah a , “ Tun ahile Pharisee nang hon khon le lheng apolam nasil ngim’un , nasungu la hunamalah le gitlou dimset ahi .
42011040	Lungthimbei ho , apolam sempan asung lam jong asem hilou ham ?
42011041	hijeh chun asunga thil ho chu vaichate peuvin , chuteng ven , nang ho dia thil jouse theng ding ahi .
42011042	“ Ohe , tun vang Pharisee nadau ahi ! Nang hon pudina le louna kha geiyin , anche louhing jousea soma khat napeuvin , thu adih-in natanpouvin , Pathen ngailut ding nadonpouve . Adang ho nabol’u toh kitoh a hiche te ni jong nabol diu ahi .
42011043	“ Ohe Pharisee ho ada nahiuve ! Nang hon Houthua kikhop na indunga touna pha pha nalhengun , kailhanga min nasalam diu nadeiyui .
42011044	Ohe ada nahoiuve ! Heshen louva mihon achotpeh peh buikhuh ho tobang nahitauve , ” ati .
42011045	“ Danthu them ho khat’in adonbut’in , “ Houhil , hiche naseiho hin keiho nei-engkal’uve , ” ati .
42011046	Jesun , “ Ohe , Danthu them nang ho jong ada nahiuve ; Poh jouhoi hilou pohgih hahsa mi nagonpeh-un , nang hon nakhut muh jenga jong khoiloh din nagopouve .
42011047	Ohe nadau ahi ! Napu napateuvin Themgao ho athat’un , nang hon alhanu nasempeh-ui .
42011048	Napu napateu thilbol chengse chu phatsah a ahettohsah nahiuvin , amaho athat’a pang’a nang hon alhan nasempeh-u ahi .
42011049	Hijeh chun Pathen chihnan aseiyin , ‘ Keinan nalha-uva Themgao ho le solle ho kasol ding , hiche ho chu abang bang athauva , adang abol hesoh diu ahi , ’ ati .
42011050	Hichu vannoi kisemtil’a pat Themgao ho thisan kiso jouse hiche khang mite chunga hi ,
42011051	Abel thisana pat , maicham le muntheng kah a Zechariah thisan kiso geiya phu lahna ding ahi . Henge , kaseipeh nahiuve , hiche khanga hi aphu kila ding ahi .
42011052	“ Ohe Danthu themho nadau ahi ! Hetna kot-heh nala mangun , nang ho geiyin nalut pouvin , lutkigo ho jong nalutsah pouve , ” ati .
42011053	Jesu chukoma kona apotdoh phat’in Danthu them ho le Pharisee ho alung himo lheh jengun thu tampi adong lhoiyun ,
42011054	athuseiya mat din achang lhigeh jenguvin ahi .
42012001	Mi asang sang akikhop’a khat’in khat chunga lam ajot leu phat’un amasan Jesun aseijuite jah a aseiyin , “ Pharisee ho phat lhemna chol lah a kiging phauvin .
42012002	Hodoh lou dia kikhu khum aumpon , hetdoh lou dia kiselguh jong aumpoi ;
42012003	ajeh chu muthima naseiyu khovah akija ding , indan sung nunga mi nabenga naseiyu chu intingvuma kisap tho ding ahi .
42012004	“ Kagol kapai nang ho jah a kasei ahi , tahsa thah theiya abana ima bol thei louho kicha hih hel’un .
42012005	Gin ding pentah vetsah unge : mithat’a da muna lelutna tah neiya Pathen bou gingun . Henge , kaseipeh nahiuve , Amabou ginguvin !
42012006	“ Vasah nga khu Paisa ni man a kijohji lou ham ? Ahin alah-uva khat jeng cha jong Pathen ang’ah suhmil’in aumpoi .
42012007	Nalu chunguva nasamjang jouseu geiya simtohsa kikoi ahi ; kicha hih-un , vasah tampi sanga jong nang ho manlujo nahiuve .
42012008	“ Kaseipeh nahiuve , koi hi le mihem angsunga Keima eiphongdoh chan chu Mihem Chapan jong Pathen Vantilte angsunga aphondoh sing ahi .
42012009	Koi hi le mihem angsunga eiseileppa chu Pathen Vantilte angsunga seilep’a um ding ahi .
42012010	Koi hi le Mihem Chapa douna thusei chu ngaidam chang ding , Lhagao Theng taitom vang chu ngaidam chang louhel ding ahi .
42012011	Mihon Houthua kikhopna in dung le vaibol ho angsung , chule thunei ho angsunga nakailut tengu leh iti nakihon’a ipi nasei diu lungkham hih-un ,
42012012	ipipen nasei diu apettah le Lhagao Thengin nahil nauvinte , ” ati .
42012013	Mipi lah a konin mi khat’in Jesu jah a , “ Houhil , kasopipan gou eikihoppi din seipeh-in , ” ati .
42012014	Jesun ajah a , “ Jol , nangni chunga thutan ding le thil hoppeh dia kon eitun beh em ? ” ati .
42012015	Jesun ajah-uvah , “ Chingtheiyun neipap kiloset’a konin kikangseuvin , ajeh chu nei le gou bulhin jeh a mihem hing’ah ahidehpoi , ” ati .
42012016	Aman thulem khat aseiyin , “ Mihao khat louva neh le chah apung lheh-in ,
42012017	hijeh chun aman , “ Ipi kabol ding ham ? Kalhosoh kholna idng mun a-ong tapoi , ’ atin ,
42012018	Hitin bol inge , kachangsal ho phe lhang ting asanga lencheh sange ; hikoma kasuhlou chang jouse leh thil dang jouse koitange ;
42012019	chutengleh , “ Kahinkho , kum tamtah nahding thil lhing set’in nakholsoh tai , choldon , nen , donin nomsa tah-in um tan , ” tinge , ’ ati .
42012020	Ahinla Pathenin ajah a , Mi-ngol , tujan teng nahinkho kisubei ding ahitai , hichea kholsa thil jouse hi koi chang ding hitam ? ’ ati .
42012021	“ Hitobang mi hi ama chang dia gou khol’a Pathen lama hao lou ahi , ” ati .
42012022	Jesun seijuite jah a , “ Hichejeh a chu ipi naneh-uva chule ipinasil’uva nachen diu natahsa din lungkham hih-un kati ahi .
42012023	Hinkho hi neh le chah sanga thupijo ahin , tahsa jong nihchen ponsil sanga thupijo ahi .
42012024	va-ahte khu gel’un ; muchi la atupouvin , atjong a-at pouvin , akholna ding in hihen changsal hijongle aneipouve ; ahinla Pathenin avah nauve . Nang ho vachate sanga thupijo nahiuve .
42012025	Nang ho koipen hin lungkham hat vanga ahinkho tong chan ajopbe theiyem ?
42012026	Chutia aneopen bon nabol thei louvu leh , thil dang dia iti lungkham nahiuvem ?
42012027	Lily pah ho khu iti khan ham ngaitouvin ; natong jong ahipovin , thilkhuijong ahipouve ; ahinla kaseipeh nahiuve , Solomon jeng jong athil loupi chengsea akijep vangin hiche ho khat sangin akijemhoi joupoi .
42012028	Pathenin hitobanga tunia loujaova keh jing teng meilhum sunga kileh lut tading hampa bon achuti jep hoi leh , vo tahsan lhom ho , nang ho ichan geiya nakhohsah-uva nihchen ponsil napeh diu hitam !
42012029	Hijeh a chu neh le don ding gel’a nalunggim louhel diu ahi .
42012030	Vannoi namtinin hichengse hi abol’u ahin , nang ho ding vang napauvin ahesoh nai .
42012031	Alenggam joh hol masauvin , chuteng hichengse jong nakipehbe nauvinte .
42012032	“ Kicha hih-un hon lhom ho , nang ho na-Pauvin lenggam napeh nom’ui .
42012033	Nanei chengse joh-un lang vaichate to nan neiyun , guchan anailutna thei lou , nget’in jong asuhset thei louna vana kemlouva akikholna din sum bei theilou sumbom kisemun .
42012034	Ajeh chu nagou umnaa chu nalungthimu jong cheng jing ding ahi .
42012035	“ Nakong kigah-un nathaomei devah jingun .
42012036	Kichen golvahna ahung kilea kot akiu leh honpeh dia apu hung ding kho the ngai-geh miho tobang hiuvin .
42012037	Apupa ahung kit teng kiging jinga um ahung tokhah lhacha ho chu anun nom’ui . Tahbeh a kaseipeh nahiuve , apun kong kigah-in tin , amaho ankong phunga atousah a , amatah ajenleuva pang ding ahi .
42012038	Jan khangkimin hung hen , jing lam nida thumin hung jong leh , kiging jinga um atokhah ho chu nun nom ahiuve .
42012039	Inneipan gucha hung ding phat heleh a-in chu aphetvang sah louhel ding kichentah-in naheuve .
42012040	Naginchat loupet tah-uva Mihem Chapa hung ding jeh-in nang ho jong kigingsa demin umun , “ ati .
42012041	Peterin , “ Pakai , hiche thulem hi keiho dia naseiha , mipi jah dia naseiham ? ” tin adonge .
42012042	Pakaiyin , “ Tahsan um lemiching , apun aphat cha soh dang ho neh le chah hopehji dia anganse ding neiching michu koi hitem ?
42012043	Apu inlama ahung teng anatoh pet atolhah soh chu anun nom’e .
42012044	Dihtah akaseipeh nahiuve , ama chu apun anei jouse chunga vaipoa apansah ding ahi .
42012045	Ama vang sohpa khat hin , ‘ Kapu ahung gei lheh tai , ’ tihen lang soh pasal ho le numei ho vopan hen , aneh nom nehen adon nom don kham leh ,
42012046	hiche soh chun agel loupet tah le ahet loupet tah a apu hunga ama chu tumin aso ding , tahsanbei ho toh kibanga abolding ahi .
42012047	“ Apu dei chengse hea , ahivanga adei banga gonpeh lou , toh jong tohpeh loupa chu tamtah vei kijep ding ahi ;
42012048	amavang apu dei helouva kivoh lo na thei boldohpa chu kivo lhomjo ding ahi . Tamtah kipea chu tampi kibeng ding , thil tamtah a ki-nganse paa kona jong tampi ki-ngeh ding ahiye .
42012049	“ Leiset’a mei hal’a hung kahi , hung kadoh jeng ta leh kati nave !
42012050	Keiman baptize chan ding khat kaneiyin , akimolso kah a iti kaning noh hitam ! !
42012051	Leiset’a chambol’a hunga neigal’um ? ahipoi , kaseipeh nahiuve , kikhenna boljoh kahibouve .
42012052	Ajeh chu tua pat mi nga chenna insung chu kikhentel’a , mithumin ni adouva , nin thum adou ding ;
42012053	pan achapa adouva , chapan pa adou ding ; nun chanu adouva , chanun nu adou ding ; tehpin amou nu adouva , mou nun tehpi adou ding ahi , ” ati .
42012054	Jesun mipi jah a , “ Lhumlama meilom kikhom namu tengu ‘ Go ju ding ahi , ’ natipai jengun , jujong ajuji nai .
42012055	Lhang lam hui nun namu tengu ‘ Sa ding ahi , ’ natiuvin , sajong asai .
42012056	Vo vanthamjol um ehan bon nasuhto theiyu leh iti tulai thil um chan nasuhto thei louvu ham ?
42012057	“ Ibol’a thildih bolje kihil lou nahiuvem ?
42012058	Nahehpa toh thutanpa heng najot lhon teng le lampia kihouchampi din gel’in , ajo le thutanpan vaibol henga napehdoh a , vaibol pan songkul’a nakhum ding ahi .
42012059	Kaseipeh nahi , nabet jat nasah thenghel masanga nahung potdoh thei louhel ding ahi , ” ati .
42013001	Hichepet tah chun mi phabep ahungun Pilate’n Galilee miho athaa athisanu doihouna thil toh achopel thu Jesu jah a aseiyui .
42013002	Jesun ajah-uva , “ Hitobang thi gentheiya athijeh-uva chu Galilee midang ho sanga chonsejoa nagel’uvem ?
42013003	Ahipoi , najah-uva kasei ahi , lung nahei louvu leh ama ho banga namanthah soh hel diu ahiye .
42013004	Ahiloule Siloam intingvum achima adel lih mi som le get ho chu Jerusalema cheng midang jouse sanga chonsejoa nagel’uvem ?
42013005	Ahidehpoi , kaseipeh nahiuve , lung nahei louvu leh amaho banga chu namanthah cheh diu ahiye , ” ati .
42013006	jesun miho chu hiche thulem hi aseipeh-in , “ Mi khat’in alengpi leiya theichang phung khat aneiyin , aga ahung hol leh amupoi .
42013007	Aman honbolpa jah a , ‘ Kumthum alhing tan , hiche theichang phung hi kahungvet le aga khat cha kamudohpoi , hijeh chun phuh lhu tan , leiset pamaisah a ikhoh a kihoi hoi ding ham ? ’ atileh ;
42013008	honbolpan adonbut’in , ‘ Pakai , tukum jong hoitadin keiman akimvel leiying ting leiphatna lou sung nange ;
42013009	chujou teng ahung ga nah leh aphan , aga lou vang leh phuh lhu tan nate , ’ tin aseiye , ” ati .
42013010	Choldo nin Jesun Houthua kikhopna in khat’a thu ahil’e .
42013011	Hichun ven , hikoma hin kum som le get lhagao boh vop’a chatmo numei khat aumin , amanu hi ating bong ahin , achama ding jang theilou ahi .
42013012	Jesun amudoh phat’in akoulut’in ajah a , “ Numei , nachamonaa kona kilhadoh nahitai , ” atin ;
42013013	chunga khut a-ngap leh , apettah chun ading jang paiyin , Pathen athangvah tai .
42013014	Jesun Choldo nia mi aboldamjeh-in Houthua kikhopna invaihompa alung himon , mipi jah a , “ Natohna ding nigup jen uma chu , hungun hiche sung chun kiboldamah tau , Choldo nin vang hung dauvin , ” ati .
42013015	Amapa donbut nan Pakaiyin aseiyin , “ Mi pha lhem ho , nang hon Choldo nia nabongchal’u hihen na-sa nganu hijongleh nalhadoh jiuva , twi donsah dia twikhuh geiya nakaijiu hilou ham ?
42013016	Achutileh hiche Abraham chilhah numei , Satanin kum som le get ahen hi akihennaa kona Choldo nia lhadoh ding hilouham ? ” ati .
42013017	Jesun hiche asei hin ama douho ajah chauvin , mipi vang thil loupi tah tah abol ho jeh-in akipah cheh-uve .
42013018	jesun , “ Pathen lenggam chu ipi toh katakah ding ham ?
42013019	Min honsunga atheji ankam mutobang vang ahi ; ankam mu chu ahung khangin , thingphung te aphan , abah lah a chunga leng vachate geiyin ageh theiye , ” ati .
42013020	Jesun , “ Pathen lenggam chu ipitoh katekah ding ba ham ?
42013021	Pathen lenggam chu suhlou chang changbonga kisem chahlhah danthum noiya numeiyin avuiya achansoh kahsea akoi chol tobang ahi , ” atikit’e .
42013022	Jesun khopi chengse le khote chengse ajotsoh keiyin , Jerusalemlam ajot pumin thu ahilpeh-e .
42013023	Mi khat’in ajah a , “ Pakai , mithemcha bou huhhinga um ding hitam ? ” tin aseiye . Aman ajah-uva ,
42013024	“ Kotjima lutding gel khoh-un , ajeh chu kaseipeh nahiuve , mi tampin lut agot diu , lut thei lou ding ahiuve .
42013025	Inneipu akipatdoh a kotpi akha tengleh polama pansan kot kiuvun , ’ Pakai , kot neihonun , ’ ti jong leu chun , aman , ‘ Nang hi kahepouve , hoiya hungkon nahiuvem ? ’ tia asei ding ,
42013026	chutengle nang hon , ‘ Keihon na-angsunga an kinea twi kidona , nangin kakholai lamlen dunguva thuhil lea , ’ nati diu ahi .
42013027	hijongleh aman najah-uva , ‘ Nang ho kahe khapoi , hoiya hungkon nahiuvem ? Thil gilou bolte , neidalha loiyun , ’ ati ding ahi .
42013028	Abraham , Isaac chule Jacob chule Themgao dang jouse Pathen lenggama aum namu diu , nang ho vang polama na-um’uva hikoma chu ka le hagel um ding ahi .
42013029	Niso lam , nilhum lam , sah lelhang kona miho hung Pathen lenggama ankong aum diu ahi .
42013030	Chule ven , anukhah abang masan tin , amasa kon khat nukhah ding ahiuve , ” ati .
42013031	hichepet hin Pharisee mi phabep Jesu henga anungun , “ Hikoma konin potdoh-in nakholjin ban kijintan , Herod-in tha din nagoi , ” atiuve .
42013032	Jesun ajah-uva , “ Cheuvin hiche se-al chu gaseipeh-un , “ Keiman tuni le jinga thlha ho kanodoh a , Mi kadamsah ahin , nithum lhin ni vang leh kanatoh molso tange , ’ atitin .
42013033	Kakholjin vang tuni le jing chule thaini geiya kachepeh ding ahinai , ajeh chu Jerusalem khopama Themgao mah thah ngailou ahi .
42013034	“ Vo Jerusalem , Jerusalem , themgao ho thatgama , ahenga kisol ho songa seplih , ahpin anoute lhaving noiya ahiukhom banga ijat vei nachate hiukhom dia kagot hitam , ahinla nangin nadeipoi .
42013035	Ven , na-in’u chu thip del’a kidalhah peh ding nahiuve . Kaseipeh nahiuve , ‘ Pakai min a hungpa chu anun nom’e , ’ nati phat’u hung lhun kahsea neimu kit lou diu ahitai , ” ati .
42014001	Choldo nin Jesu Pharisee vaihom khat in’a an ne din achen , amahon ave lhi jingui .
42014002	Hichun ven , amasanga thongpoh veiya na mi khat aume .
42014003	Hichea hin Jesun Danthu hilthem ho le Pharisee ho jah a , “ Choldo nia mi damsah ngai ham hilou ham ? ” atileh ;
42014004	amaho athip beh-uve . Aman mipa chu atuh-in aboldam phat’in asolmangtai .
42014005	Jesun amaho jah a , “ Choldo nin nachapau ha nabongchal’u ham twikul sunga lhalut taleh nagakaidoh jeng lou diu ham ? ” atileh ;
42014006	amahon adonbut thei tapouve .
42014007	Mi kikouhon touna pha pha akilhenu amu phat’in Jesun ajahuva thulem khat aseiyin ,
42014008	“ Mi khattouvin moupui golvahnaa nahung kouvu leh , toumun phapena tou dauvin . Inneipa chun nang sanga thupijo midang akou mai thei ahi ,
42014009	nani lhona koupa chu hunga najah a , ‘ Hichepa ji toumun ot’in , ’ ati ding ; chuteng nalungdon man’a toumun nu nungpenaa natou lo ding ahi .
42014010	Hijeh chun nakikou teng toumun nukhahpena touvin , chutileh nakoupa hunga , ‘ jol , toumun sangjep’a kikhangdoh-in ’ ati ding ahi . Chutengle natoupi chengse maiya jabolna anchan ding ahi ;
42014011	ijeh-inem itile mi ama le ama kichoisang chan kisu nem’a , ama le ama kisunem chan chu choisanga um dingahi , ” ati .
42014012	Aman inneipa jah a jong “ Jan an neh khom hihen golvah hileh nabol teng najol nagol le nasopi , , naphung nachang le naheng nakom mihao ho jeng koudan , koule chun amahon lekou kit’un tin nasahsoh diu ahi .
42014013	Neh khm nabol teng vaichate le tikim loute chule mitcho elbai ho bou kouvin ,
42014014	chutile anun nom nahi , ajeh chu amahon nalepeh lou diu ahin , midih thodoh kit ni leh nakilepeh ding ahi , ” ati .
42014015	A-ankong umpi ho khat’in hiche hi ajah phat’in Jesu jah a , “ Pathen lenggama an neidingpa chu anun nom’e , ” ati .
42014016	Jesun ajah a , “ Pasal khat’in golvah loupitah abol’in mi tamtah akouve .
42014017	Golvah kipat phat’in akikousa ho henga asohpa asol’in , ‘ Hung tauvin thil ijakai akigongtoh tai , ’ agatisah-e .
42014018	Ahinla amahon ahilelnau khat cheh aseiyun , amasapan , ‘ Lou khat kachom kagavet lou akhoh-e , kiphatlam thu kasei jeh-in neilha ongin , ’ atin ;
42014019	khat’in jong , ‘ Bongchal to-nga kachon , hicheng chu gapatep kagoi , kiphatlam thu kasei jeh-in nei lha ongin , ’ atin ;
42014020	khatpa man , ‘ Tu le lea jinei kahin , hung thei ponge , ’ ati .
42014021	“ Sohpa ahungin apu jah a hichengse hi aseitai . Hichun innei-pu alung hangin sohpa jah a , ‘ Potdoh loiyin , kholai lamlen dung le khopi veng ningkoi dunga vaicha genthei le tikimlou , mitcho eilbai ho gakoutan , ’ ati .
42014022	Sohpan , ‘ Kapu , nasei bangin kabol’in , ahivangin mun a-ong nalaiye , ’ ati .
42014023	Inneipun sohpa jah a , ‘ Potdoh-in lang lam-lhong dung le daipama um ho ka-in dimset din gakoutan .
42014024	Kaseipeh nahi , aki kouho khat chan jong kagolvah an atep khah louhel diu ahi , ’ gatin tin aseiye , ” ati .
42014025	Mi tamtah-in akilhonpi pet’un Jesu akiheiyin ajah-uvah
42014026	Kahenga hunga anu apa , ajinu le achate , asopi pasal ho le numei ho chule ama hinkho geiya itcha louva bol lou mi chu kaseijui hithei lou ding ahi .
42014027	Athingpel kiput’a eijui lou chu kaseijui hithei louhel ding ahi .
42014028	Nang hi koipen hi insang sah ding go’a aman lut ding jat suto masa lou na-um um ? Asa nom chun ajo na kham sum anei aneilou avet toh masah ding ahi ,
42014029	chutilouvin abul phutdoh hen joulel taleh amupha chanin tot nopna aneiyuva ,
42014030	‘ Hichepan in sah din apanin ajoulel ta ong , ’ ati diu ahi .
42014031	“ Ahiloule midangto kidou ding sepai sangsom seh neiya lengpan amasat dia sepai sang som ni toh hungkonpa chu atinjou atinlel ding touva ageltoh masah lou ding ham ?
42014032	Ajo lou ding leh palai asol’a leng chompa gamla tah a aumpet’a kichamna thu agaseisah ding ahi .
42014033	Hitobanga chu nang ho lah a jong anei agou chengse dalha lou chu kaseijui hithei louhel ding ahi .
42014034	“ Chi hi thilpha ahi , amavang a-al hi al ta hih leh iti ki-alsah kit ding ham ?
42014035	Leining din jong leiset semphatna din jong pannabeiji tauve . A-ngaina ding nakhang neiyan ngai hen , ” ati .
42015001	Kaidong ho le chonsehon athuhil ngai din Jesu ahin nailut’ui .
42015002	Pharisee ho le Danthu them ho aphun’un , “ Hichepan michonse ho aloiyin aneh khompi , ” atiuve .
42015003	Hichun Jesun ajah-uva thulem khat aseiyin :
42015004	“ Nalah-uva khat’in kelngoi jakhat neihen lang khat mansah leh , aman som ko le ko chu gamthip’a adalhah a amangpa chu amu kahsea agahol lou ding ham ?
42015005	Amudoh teng leng kouva apun kipah thanom tah a
42015006	in’a ahung teng jong leh agol apai , aheng akom akoukhomin ajah-uva , ‘ Neikipa piuvin , kakelngoi mansah chu kamudoh tai , ’ ati .
42015007	Kaseipeh nahiuve , hitobang hin lunghei ngai cha lou midih som ko le ko chunga sangin michonse khat lunghei jehin van’a kipa thanop um ding ahi , ” ati .
42015008	“ Numei khat’in dangka som neihen lang khat mansah leh , thoamei kidet’a , muntheh kipat’a amudoh kahsea in theh a ahol hol jeng lou ding ham ?
42015009	Amudoh phat’in agol apai , aheng akom akoukhomin , ‘ Kasum mansah chu kamudoh tai , neikipa piuvin , ’ ati .
42015010	Kaseipeh nahiuve , hitobang hin michonse khat lunghei jeh-in Pathen Vantilte lah a kipa thanopna aume , ” ati .
42015011	Jesun “ Pasal khat’in chapa ni aneiye .
42015012	Anaopan apa jah a , ‘ Hepa , gou kachan ding chu neipetan , atin , hijeh chun apan agou chu achate ni ahopeh tai .
42015013	Ni phabep jouvin chapa neojopen anei jouse achomkhomin kholgam la tah a ache mangin , chukoma chun anei jouse aning anop’in agamange .
42015014	Anei jouse aneh jousoh hel tah-in hiche gamsunga chun kel nasatah ahung lhan , aman neh le chah angaicha pantai .
42015015	Hijeh chun achen agam miho khat agabel’in , mipa chun alouva vohchate vah din asoltai .
42015016	Hichea chun vohchate an neh chu neh jenga oiva ding ago lhehin , koiman la neh ding apepoi .
42015017	Chutah chun ahung khangdoh lap’in , ‘ Kapa thalah sohten neh le chah khujat neng jeng junga neiyuva , kei hikoma kel thi dinga um kahim !
42015018	Kipatdoh ing ting kapa henga cheng ting ajah a , “ Hepa , van houna le nangma dounan kachonsetai ,
42015019	nachapa tidin jong kakilom tapoi , nasoh thalah ho khat bangin neisemtan , ” gatinge , ’ ati .
42015020	Akipatdoh-in apa heng jonin achetai . “ Gamla tah ahung gei nalaiyin apan agalmun , alaina behseh jengin , alhaijel’in akoiyin achop chuh chuh tai .
42015021	Achapan ajah a , ’ Hepa , van douna le nangma dounan kachonsetai , nachapa tidin jong kakilom tapoi , ’ atileh ;
42015022	apan asohte jah a , ‘ Von phapen tah galauvin vonpeh loiyun , khutjem bupeh-un , kengchot sepeh loiyuvin .
42015023	Bongnou thaotah chu gaman’un lang that loiyun , neu hitin kipa thanop bol’u hite ,
42015024	ajeh chu hiche kachapa hi athisa hing kit’a amangsa kimudoh kit ahitai , ’ ati . Hiti hin kipa thanop abol’uve .
42015025	“ Ahin a chapa aupajo loukon pa chu ahung vailhunin inlam ahungnaijep jep leh tumging kitum leh mi lamgin ajan ,
42015026	soh ho khat akouvin adonge .
42015027	Sohpan ajah a , ‘ Nasopipa chu ahung lhungtai , hijeh a chu napan hing le dama amikit jeh a bongnou thaotah chu athapeh ahi , ’ ati .
42015028	“ Hichun apa ahung potdoh-in ajol jol jenge .
42015029	Aman apa adonbut’in , ‘ Ven , kum hijat hin sohbangin na katohpeh-in , khatvei jeng cha jong nasei ngailouvin kaumpoi , ahinla kagol kapaite toh kakipa thanop khomna din kelnou khat jeng cha jong neithapeh khah poi .
42015030	Ahinla hiche nachapa , natiho toh nanei nagou chengse sumangpa , ahung phat’in bongnou thaopen nathapeh-e , ’ ati .
42015031	Apan ajah a , ’ Chapa , nangma kakoma um jing nahin , kanei aboncha nanga ahi .
42015032	Hiche nanaopa hi athisa hing doh kit , amangsa kimudoh kit ahijeh a ikipa thanop diu mong ahibouve , ’ tin ajol’e , ” ati .
42016001	Jesun seijuite jaha , “ Mihao khat’in neiching khat aneiye . Neichingpan anei aman chatvai jeh-in min aheh-in ahi .
42016002	Mihaopan ama chu akouvin ajah a , ‘ Nachung chang thu kajah hi ipi iti ham ? Nanei chinjat sutohnloiyin tukal neichinga napan theilou ding ahi , ’ ati .
42016003	Hichun neichingpa akigel’in , ‘ Kapun kaneichin , eilahpeh dingla ahitan , ikati ding hitam ? Loubol’a lei lai ding la kathan ajoupon , khutdo dingjong kajah achai .
42016004	“ Kaneichin kahai teng mihon a-in’uva eilhunsahna diu bol ding khat kahetai , ’ atin ;
42016005	apupa sumba ho akouvin , amasapen pa jah a , ‘ Kapu sum ijat nabat’em ? ’ atileh ;
42016006	aman , ‘ Thao tae-na dim jakhat , ’ ati . Aman ajah a , ‘ Nathil simna hinchoiyin , tou loiyin ate-na som nga bou aunin , ’ ati .

42016008	Hichun chondih lou neichingpan ching theitah a thil aboljeh-in apupan apahchai ; ajeh chu hiche khang mite hi akibahpi houlah a khovah chate singin achingjo’uve .
42016009	“ Kaseipeh nahiuve , leiset gouvin gol le pai semun , gou abeiteng mihon tonsot chenmuna nalhunsah diu ahi .
42016010	Thil neochaa kitah lou mi chu thil lenpia jong kitah lou ahiye .
42016011	Leiset gouva bon tahsan naum louvu leh goutahbeh chu kon nachinsah diu ham ?
42016012	Midang gou neichinga ankitah louvu leh nang ho gou ding kon napeh diu ham ?
42016013	“ Insung lhacha khatseh-in pipu ni ajenkop theipoi ; jenkop taleh khatjoh ahot’a khat jog angailut ding , ahiloule khat chu akolchah joa a khat chu donlouva akoiding ahi . Nang ho Pathen le sum soh a napankop thei lou diu ahi , ” ati .
42016014	Sum ngailu Pharisee hon Jesu thusei ho ajauvin anelpah khum’uve .
42016015	Jesun ajah-uva , “ Nang ho hi mihem mitmua them kichan loi nahiuvin , Pathenin vang nalungthimu ahenai ; ijeh-inem itile mihemte lah a sang tah a kijabol chu Pathen mitmue thet umtah ahibouve .
42016016	“ John khang geiya chu Danthu le Themgaoho thu che ah ahi . Ama hunga pat Pathen lenggam Thupha kiseiphong a ahin , amitakip’in asunga thahat san’a lut tei agouve .
42016018	“ Koi hile ajinu daa achom khat kichenpi chan mito jong ahin , chule ajipan adasa numei kichenpi jong mito jong ahi .
42016019	“ Mihao khat hin , ponsandup le tupat ponenm jeng asil jin , niseh-in aning anop’in aum jin ahi .
42016020	Apum changa phah mivaicha Lazarus kiti chu akotbul’a alumin ,
42016021	mihaopa ankong dokang chunga lhajah anmal chu aducha tun tun jenge ; akhoh cheh kit chu , uichaten atipat laiho chu aleh-uvin ahi .
42016022	“ Chujouvin mivaichapa chu athin , Vantilten Abraham jet lama din apotauve . Mihaopa jong athin avuitauve .
42016023	Aman Damuna gim genthei athohna konin chunglam avet leh gamla tah a Abraham amun , ajet lama Lazarus jong amui .
42016024	Akouvin jah a , ‘ Kapa Abraham , neikhoton , Lazarus hin sol’in akhut jungin twi ga dekot han lang kalei beh eihung dedap peh hen , ajeh chu hitobang meikou leh a gim genthei thoh-in kaum tai , ’ ati .
42016025	“ Abrahamin , ‘ Chapa , naleiset hinkhon thilpha chengse namun , Lazarus chun thilse amui , tun aman kikoma nom asan , nangma chukoma gim genthei thoh-in naume .
42016026	hiche kal jong chun i-kah-uva onghom lentah akikhangin , hikoma kona nang ho hin jon nom jong hung theilou ding , chukoma kona jongkoima hilama hung galkai theilou dinga kibol ahi , ’ ati .
42016027	Aman , ‘ Hepa achutileh Lazarus chu ka-inkote henga nasolna din kataove ,
42016028	ajeh chu sopi pasa ; nga kaneiyin , Lazarus chehen lang amaho chu gahil chah masa leh kati , achuti lou leh hiche danmuna hi hung kit diu ahitai , ’ ati .

42016031	Ahinla Abrahamin ajah a , ‘ Amahon Mose le Themgaoho thu angailouvu leh mithi leh a konin mi khat thoudoh kit jong leh kithu nundeh pouvinte , ’ tin aseiye , ” ati .
42017001	Jesun aseijuite jah a , “ Kipal lhuhna thei thil chu soh thei ahinai , ahin kipalna bol chu ohe ada ahi !
42017002	Ama chun hitobang aneocha ho khat akipal lhuhsah sangin a-ngonga sumhei song lentah ki-opeh hen lang Twikhanglena kileh lut le phajo ding ahi .
42017003	Chingtheiyun ! “ Nasopi achonset leh phoh-in , lung ahei leh ngaidamin .
42017004	Ni khat sunga nachunga sagi vei , chonse hijongleh , nahenga ahunga sagi vei jen , ‘ Kalung kaheiye , ’ atileh na-ngaidam tei ding ahi , ” ati .
42017005	Solchah hon pakai jah a , “ Katahsanu khansah ben , ” atiuve .

42017011	Jesu Jerusalema achen Samaria le Galilee kah ahopeh-e .

42017020	Pharisee hon Jesu jah a Pathen lenggam hung lhung ding phat adoh nauva aman , “ Pathen lenggam chu melchih theiyin ahungpoi .

42017022	Jesun seijuite jah a , “ Nikhatle Mihem Chapa nikho namu nom lheh diu , ahivanga namu thei lou diu ahi .

42017024	ajeh chu kolphen kolmong lang khat’a pat kolmong lang khat geiya vanthamjol asalvah jeng banga Mihem Chapa hung ni jong leh chuti ding ahi .
42017025	Amavang amasa hesoh genthei tampi athoh a , hiche khang mite not thap’a um tei ding ahi .
42017026	Noah nokholai bang a Mihem Chapa nikho ho jong chuti ding ahi .
42017027	Mihon aneuvin adonun , akichengun , Noah kong sunga alut ni geiyin kicheng din akipetouvin , chutah-in twisang ahung lenin abonchauvin asumangtai .

42017029	Sodom khoa Lot apotdoh nikhon vang vana konin meikou le kat ahung julhan abonchauvin asumangtai .
42017030	Mihem Chapa kiphondoh nikho jong chuti ding ahiye .
42017031	Hiche nikhoa chu inchunga uma inusunga thilkeo kilah din kumlhah da hen , chule loujaova um jong hung kile kit da hen .
42017032	Lot jinu chu geldoh-un .

42017036	( Loujaova bung pasal te ni jong khat kilaa khat kidalha ding ahi ) ” ati .

42018001	Lhadah louhel’a tantih neilouva atao jing theina din Jesun aseijuite chu thulem khat ahil’e .
42018002	“ Khopi sung khat’ah Pathen ging lou mihem jong jalou thutan khat aume .

42018006	Pakaiyin aseiben , “ Midih lou thutanpan ipi aseiyem ngaiyun .

42018020	Thupeh chengse nahet chu me . ‘ Mito jong hih-in , tol that hih-in , gucha hih-in , jouthun hettphsah-in pandan , nanu napa jabol’in , ’ kiti chu , ” ati .

42018023	Hiche hi ajah phat’in mihao tah ahijeh-in alung nom mo lheh jenge .

42018031	Jesun som le ni atumin apuidoh-in ajah-uva , “ Ven , Jerusalem ijon touvun , chule Mihem Chapa thudol’a Themgao ho lekhabu kisun chengse guilhung ding ahi ;
42018032	ajeh chu Ama chidang namdangte khut’a pehdoh a um ding , tot nopna aneiyuva , a-eng eng a abol diu , chule chil aset khum diu ahi ;

42018034	Seijuiten aseiho hi khat cha jong ahechen theipouve . Ajeh chu akisei ho hi amaho dia kiselguh ahin , hijeh chun ipi kiseipen ahiding ahedoh theipouve .
42018035	Jesu Jericho khopi ahung naichun , lamlen panga mitcho khat touvin khut adoi .
42018036	Mitchopan lampia mipi kitol husa ajah phat’in ipithu ahi ding adonge .
