42018040	Jesu ading denin mipa chu ahinpui diuvin aseiye . Mitchopan ahin naiphat’in ajah a ,
42018041	“ Ipi eibolpeh le nati ham ? ” atileh ; aman , “ Pakai , kho neimusah-in , ” ati .
42018042	Hichun Jesun ajah a , “ Mu tan . Natahsanin nadamsah ahitai , ” ati .
42018043	Apettah chun mitchopan kho amutan , Jesu ajuiyin Pathen athangvah tai . Mipin hichu amuphat’un Pathen athangvah chehuve . Jesu chule Zacchaeus
42019001	Jesu Jericho alut’in kho sung ajotpeh-e .
42019002	Khosunga hin Zacchaeus kiti kaidong pasal khat ahengin , ahaova hao ahiye .
42019003	Amahin Jesu chu amu nom lhehin , ahinla mi nem ahijeh-in mipin alen amupha poi .
42019004	Hijeh chun analhai masan , amuteina din ahung na ding lampia chun theiba chung khat’a anakaldoh-e .
42019005	Jesun hikom chu ahinphah phat’in agada doh leh amun , “ Zacchaeus , hung kumlha loiyin , tunia na-in’a kalhun tei ding ahi , ” ati .
42019006	Zacchaeus , chu kinloi tah-in ahung kumlhan kipah tah-in Jesu alamtoi .
42019007	Mipin amu’uvin , “ Hiche michonsepa in’a khu lhung din ache teget’e , ” tin aphuntauve .
42019008	Zacchaeus vang chu adingin Pakai jah a , “ Ven , Pakai kanei chengse akeh khat vaichate peng ting , ada acham louva mi kalahpeh aum jong leh ajat lin leng’e , ” ati .
42019009	Hichun Jesun ajah a , “ Tunin hiche insunga huhingna ahung lhungtai , ama jong hi Abraham chilhah ahiye .
42019010	Ijeh-inem itile amangsa holdoh a huhing dia Mihem Chapa hung ahi , ” ati .
42019011	Jesu Jerusalem ahung lhung deh deh tan , mihon ma Pathen lenggam hung lhung jeng dia agel jeh-uvin Aman thulem khat ahil’in ,
42019012	“ Milun tah khat leng tha neina gakisana hung kile kit din kholgamla tah a cheding agon ;
42019013	asohte som khat akouvin Mina khat cheh apen ajah-uvah , Kahung kile kit kah-in kivei nan anamangun , ’ ati .
42019014	Ahinla agam miten ama ahot bol’in anunga palai asol’uvin , ‘ hichepa hi kachunguva leng chang din kadeipouve , ’ agati sah-ui .
42019015	“ Aman leng tha neina kenga ahung kile kit phat’in kivei dinga apeh asohte chengse ijat cheng aveikan’u ahet nom jeh-in gakou khom din thu apei .
42019016	Ahung ma sapan , ’ Pakai , nang Mina khat chu Mina som kalhinsah-e , ’ ati .
42019017	Aman ajah a , Nabolpha lheh-e , sohpha nahi ! Themcha chunga tahsan thei nahijeh-in khopi som chunga tha neiyin pang tan , ’ ati .
42019018	Anilhinnapa ahungin , ’ Pakai , nang Mina khat chu nga kasosah-e , ’ ati .
42019019	Aman , ‘ Nang jong khopi nga chunga vaipo ding nahi , ’ ati .
42019020	“ Thumnapa ahungin , ‘ Pakai , nang Mina chu ponin kajel’in kakoi hen hiche hi ahi ,
42019021	ajeh chu nakoin alouva loi doh theiya , natuna louva atdoh thei , acham louva milahpeh jeng nahijeh-in nangma kakichai , ’ ati .
42019022	Aman , ‘ Soh gilou ! Nakamsoh a nathu katan ding ahi . Kakoina louva kalahdoh theiya , katunalouva ka-at theiya , acham louhel’a mi kalahpeh thie nahet ahiyeong ?
42019023	chuti-an ibol’a kasum chu sumkholpungnaa nakoida ham ? Koile chun kahung kile teng ken apung puma kilah thata dinga ! ’ ati .
42019024	“ Akoma ding ho jah a chun , ‘ Mina khat chu lahpeh-un lang , Mina som neipa chu gapeuvin , ati .
42019025	Mihon , ’ Pakai , aman Mina som khat jen neina chu , ’ atiuleh ;
42019026	aman , ’ Kaseipeh nahiuve , aneiya chu kipeh ben tin , aneilouva chu anei chasun jong kilahpeh ding ahi .
42019027	chule achunguva lengvaipo dinga eideimo hiche migilou melmate hi kakoma hinkai lut’uvin kamitmun that gam’uvin , ’ tin aseiye , ” ati .
42019028	jesun hiche aseijou hin amasan jerusalem ajon toutai .
42019029	Olive thinglah kiti mol’a Beth phage le Bethany aphah koin seijui ni asol’in ,
42019030	“ namasang jon lhona kho’a khun lut lhon le chun komacha tou khahna louhel sangan nou kihen khat namu lhon ding ahi ; sut lhan hinkai lhonin ;
42019031	mi khattouvin najah lhona , ‘ Ibol’a nasut lhon ham ? ’ atileh ; ‘ Pakaiyin aman nom’e , ’ ti lhontan , ” ati .
42019032	Solle te ni ache lhon leh ijakai asei bangin agatoh lhone .
42019033	Sa-ngan nou chu asut lhon leh aneiten , “ Ibol’a sa-ngan nou chu nasut lhon ham ? ” tin adongui .
42019034	Amanin , “ Pakaiyin aman nom’e , ” ati lhone .
42019035	Hichun Jesu henga ahinkai lu tlhonin , chiin sangan nou chunga aponsil jouseu aphasoh phat’un Jesu chu achunga adom doh tauve .
42019036	Jesu ahung chun lampi chunga aponsil jouseu aphauvin ahi .
42019037	Jesun khopi ahinphah ding kon , Olive mol’a kumlhahna huang geiin seiyui mipin abonchauvin tha neitah a thil kibol amu chengseu jeh chun ogin sang tah-in asamun kipah thanom tha-in Pathen vahchoinan
42019038	hitin aseiyui : “ Pakai min a hung lengpa anun nom’e ; Van’a cham leng hen , chung nungpena loupina hihen , ” atiuve .
42019039	Mipi lah a Pharisee mi phabep chun Jesu jah a , “ Houhil , naseijuite phoh-in , ” atiuve .
42019040	Jesun adonbut’in , Najah-uva kasei ahi , hite ho thip leu song ho aojah jeng diu ahi , ” ati .
42019041	Ahung naijep jep’a khopi amu phat’in Jesun akachamin ,
42019042	“ Ohe , nangin tunia hi lung monna thei ngaichat nakihet hitave leh ! Tunla namuthei tapoi !
42019043	namelmaten nahin umkhuma , galpal nakai khum’uva , akimvel lhung keiya natin chah niu hung lhung ding ;
42019044	huhhing dia nakivil nikho nahet loujeh a nangle nasunga nachate kisugam ding , song khat chunga khat kise-thom beihel’a alha diu ahi , ” ati .
42019045	Jesu Hoiin a alut’in thiljoh ho anodoh panin ajah-uvah ,
42019046	“ Hiti hin , ‘ Ka-in chu taona in kiti ding ahi , ’ tin akisun me , nang hon la gucha michomho kikholnan nasemdoh tauve , ” ati .
42019047	Jesun niseh-in Houin a thu ahiljin , Thempu pipu ho le Danth themho , chule mipi lamkaihon vang ama suhmangna ding ahol jingui .
42019048	Ahivangin la angai lhihgeh jeh-un alonaje ding aholdoh thei pouve .
42020001	Ni khat Jesun Houin a mipi thu ahila Kipana Thupha aseiphong pet’in , Thempu pipu ho le Danthu themho chule upaho ahungun ,
42020002	ajah a , “ Ipi thu neinaa hicheng hi nabol’a , kon hiche thu neina hi napeh ham , neiseipeh tem’un ? ” atiuve .
42020003	Jesun ajah-uva , “ Kenjong thu khat dongunge , neiseipeh-uvin ;
42020004	John Baptist chu van’a kon ha mihema kon ham ? ” atileh ;

42020009	Jesun mipi chu hiche thulem hi ahil panin , “ Mi khat’in lengpilei abol’in , aleilhouho abolsah-in phat sotpi um din kholgama achetai .
42020010	Aga lhun phat donin lengpitga ahinpohsah diuvin aleilhouho henga soh khat asol’e ; ahinla aleilhouhon sohpa chu avouvin khut gohkeuvin asolmang tauve .
42020011	Soh khatma asol kit leh ; ama jong hi avouvin , noise tah-in abol’un khut goh keman asolmang kit tauve .
42020012	Soh thum lhinnapa asol kit leu leh , amahon amavouvin ahi nleh doh kit tauve .
42020013	Lengpilei neipan , ‘ Ipi kalo ding hitam ? Kachapa chang khat seh hi sol tange , amahi jabol teiyunte , ’ ati .
42020014	aleilhouhon achapa amu phat’un akihou lhiuvin ‘ Hichepa hi agoulo dingpa ahi , agou ichan theina diuvin ama hi thatdoh jengu hite , ’ akitiuve .
42020015	Hijeh chun ama chu lengpilei polama alehdoh-un athat tauve . Hiche lengpilei neipa chun amaho hi i-lotan tem ?
42020016	Ama hunga hiche lengpilei chu midang apeh ding ahi , ” ati . Hichu ajauvin amahon , “ Achuti louleh ! ” atiuve .
42020017	Jesun amaho chu aven , “ Ahile , ‘ Insa hon deimoa apaiyu song chu , In ning khomdet penin apangtai , ’ tia Pathen lekhabua kisun chu ipikiseina ba ham ?
42020018	Koi hileh hiche song chunga chukha chan chu kitah ngem’a chule songin alhah den jong chu adelngem ding ahi , ” ati .
42020019	Hiche thulem hi amaho gotna asei aheuvin Danthu themho le Thempu pipu hon hichepet tah a chu Jesu chunga khut lhah din agouvin , ahinla mipi akichauve .
42020020	Amahon Jesu chu athuseiya kipalsah a , mat ding gamvaipo tha neina le athu noiya peh thiena dingin phat kitup kom achang lhiuvin , chonpha lhemin changlhi phabep achinsah-ui .
42020021	Changlhi ho hin Jesu jah a , “ Houhil , nathusei le namihilna hi adih-in , maipha velouvin Pathen lampi dihtah a nahil kaheuve ;
42020022	Caesar kai kapeh-u hi dan ngai himong nam ? ” tin adongui .
42020023	Jesun alungthim bol’u ahen ajah-uvah ,
42020024	“ Denarii khat neivetsah temun , koi lim hiya koimin chong am ? ” atileh ;
42020025	amahon , ‘ Caeasar’a , ” atiuve . Hichun Aman “ Chuti ahile Caeasar’a chu Caesar peuvin , Pathena chu Pathen petau , ” ati .

42020028	“ Houhil , Mose’n ‘ Pasal khattou ji neiya cha hing man louva athi leh , ajinu meithai chu asopipa akichenpia asopipa chi akhai peh idng ahi , ’ tia eisutpeh-u ahi .
42020029	Pasal sagite aum’un , aupapenin ji aneileh cha hing louvin athitai .
42020030	Ani lhina pan jong ,
42020031	thum lhinna pan jong , aban banin amanu chu jin anei cheh-un , asagiuvin cha hinglouvin athisoh tauve .
42020032	Achaina keiyin numeinu jong thu athitai .

42020035	thinaa kona thudoh , ahung lhung ding khang mu dia kilomho vang chu akicheng pouvin , kicheng din jong akipeto tapouve .

43001001	Semtil chun thu anaumtan , thu chu Pathento umkhom ahin , chule thu chu Pathen masap ahi .
43001002	Thu chu semtil’a Pathento umkhom ahi .
43001003	Ama jeh a thil jouse hung umdoh ahin , Ama louva um dohkhat cha aumpoi . Aumdoh chengse jong hi
43001004	Ama hinkhoa hingson cheh ahiuvin , hiche hinkho chu mihem dia khovah ahi .
43001005	Vah chun muthim lah ahinsaltan , muthimin anahe joupoi .
43001006	Pathena kona hung kisol amin John kiti khat aumin ,
43001007	ama hi hettohsah a hung pang , ama jeh a mitinin atahsan theina dia vah thudol hettohsah ahung ahi .
43001008	Ama chu vah ahipon , vah thudol hettohsah a hungjoh ahibouve .
43001009	Vah tahbeh mitin salvah chu vannoi leiset’a hung ahitai .
43001010	Ama jeh a vannoi leiset hung umdoh ahin , Ama vannoiya ahungin , ahinla vannoiyin anahepoi .
43001011	Agamsunga hung ahin amitenla Ama anasang pouve .
43001012	Ahin amina tahsana Ama kisan chengse chu Pathen chate hitheina thu apetai .
43001013	Amaho chu mihem thisan gui le tahsa dei chule mihem deiya peng hilouvin , Pathen guiya peng joh ahibouvui .
43001014	Thu chu tahsaphe ahungdsoh-in , i-lah-uva ahung chengin , keihon aloupina , Paa kon Chapa chang khatseh loupina chu lungset le thutah lhingset’in kamutauve .
43001015	Johin Ama thudol hettohsah nan lhang asamin “ Keiman kaseipa , ‘ Kanunga hungpa khu aum Jingsa ahijeh-in kei sangin achungnung joi , ’ kiti chu Ama hi ahi , ” ati .

43001029	Ajing nikhon Jesu ahenga hung amun Johin , “ Ven , Pathen kelngoi nou vannoi chonset pamang khu .

43001037	Aseijuite nin John thusei hi aja lhonin Jesu nung ajui lhontai .
43001038	Jesu akihei leh amanin ahinjui lhon amun ajah lhona , “ Ipi nahol lhon ham ? ” atileh amanin ajah a , “ Rabbi ( Hichu Houhil tina ahin , ) hoiya nalhun em ? ” tin adong lhone .
43001039	Jesun ajah lhona , “ Hung in hung ve lhonin , ” ati . Hijeh chun amani ache lhonin alhunna agamudoh-in , hiche ni chun amatoh aum khomtauve . Aphat hi nilhah lam nidan li don ahiye .
43001040	John thusei jaa Jesu nungjuite ni lah a khat chu Simon Peter naopa Andrew ahi .
43001041	Aman asopipa Simon akimupi masah-in ajah a , “ Keinin Messiah ( hichu leng chang dia thao nusa kiti ) chu kamudoh lhontai , ” ati .

43001043	Ajing nikhon Galilee gama che ding akigon , Philip amudoh-e . Jesun ajah a , “ Neijuiyin , ” ati .
43001044	Philip hi Andrew le Peter chenna Bethsaida khoa mi ahi .
43001045	Philip’in Nathanael amun ajah a , “ Achung thu Mose’n Danthua asut , Themgaohon jong autpa chu keihom kamu’uvin , Nazareth khoa Joseph chapa Jesu ahi , ” ati .

43001047	Nathanael aheng lama hung Jesun amun , achung thu aseiyin , “ Ven , Israel midih tah , phat lhem nabei mi khu , ” ati .
43001048	Nathanael’in ajah a , “ Hoiya kona iti neihet ham ? ” atileh ; Jesun adonbut’in ajah a , “ Philip’in nakou masang , theichang phung noiya naum pet’a chu kamu nahitai , ” ati .

43001051	Chujongle ajah a , “ Kichen tah a kaseipeh nahiuve , van kihonga Mihem Chapa chunga Pathen Vantilte kaltou le kumsuh namu diu ahi , ” ati .
43002001	Nithum lhinin Galilee gama Cana khoa moupui golvah akibol’in , Jesu nu jong apange .
43002002	Jesu le aseijuite jong hiche moupui golvahnaa chun akouvui .
43002003	Lengpitwi alhahsam phat’un Jesu nun ajah a , “ Lengpitwi anei tapouve , ” atileh ;
43002004	Jesun ajah a , “ Numei , nang le Kei i-kin um am ? Kaphat lhing loulai chu , ” ati .
43002005	Anun lhacha ho jah a chun , “ Najah-uva asei chan bol jengun , ” ati .
43002006	Hikom chu Judate chonna ngaiya kisuh thengna ding tia songbel twi atena ni ham thum ham dol cheh bel gup kitung ahi .
43002007	Jesun ajah-uvah , “ Bel ho chu twi sung dim’uvin , ” ati . Amahon abelgei let cheh-in asung dim’ui .
43002008	chujouvin Jesun ajah-uva , “ Tun phabep thal’un lang golvah lamkaipa henga dom’un , ” atileh ; amahon adomtauve .
43002009	Golvah lamkaipan twisih lengpitwi kiso sah chu atep’in , hoiya kila ham , ti ahepon , twi hinthal’a hindom lhachahon vang ahenauve . Hijeh chun aman aji neipa chu kouvin ,
43002010	ajah a , “ min lengpitwi chih ahom masan , mi achim tengleh tugeiyin lengpitwi chih nakoi nalaiye , ” ati .
43002011	Jesun hiche hi Galilee gam Cana khoa melchihna abol patna ahin , aloupina aphongdoh tai ; hijeh chun aseijuiten Ama tahsanlo tauve .
43002012	Hiche jou hin Jesu le anu chule Jesu seijuite Capernaum khoa achesuh-un , hikoma chun nikho phabep anichonguve .
43002013	Judate kalchuh kut anai phat’in Jesu Jerusalema achetoutai .
43002014	Houina bong le kelngoi chule vapal joh ho , sumlheng ho agol gol’a tou agatoh khai .
43002015	Chuin Jesun khao alan ajepna ding akisemin abonchauvin Houin a konin bong ho le kelngoite pumin ajepdoh than , sum nong lhenga pang ho anocheh-in , adokhangu alekhup peh-in ,
43002016	vapal joh ho jah a , “ Hiche ho hi hikoma konin podohun , ka-pa in chu kiveina mun naso lou diu ahi , ” ati .
43002017	Aseijuiten , “ Na-in din katompanin einechaiye , ” tia kisun chu ageldoh tauve .
43002018	Hichea hin Judaten adonbut’in , “ Thil hicheng nabol theina ding hi melchihna ipi neivetsah diu ham ? ” atiuleh ;
43002019	Jesun adonbut’in aj ah-uva , “ Hiche Houin hi sumangun , nithumin tungdoh inge , ” ati .
43002020	Hichun Judahon aseiyun , “ Hiche Houin sahnaa kum som li le gup jen lut chu nangin nithuma natundoh ding ong ? ’ atiuve .
43002021	Jesun Ama tahsa chu Houin dol’a aseina ahibouve .
43002022	Jesu thinaa kona athodoh chun aseijuiten hiche asei hi ageldoh bep’ui ; hijeh chun Pathen lekhabua thu le Jesu thusei chu atahsantauve .
43002023	Kalchuh kut sunga Jerusalema aum sungin melchihna abol ho amu’vin mi tampin Ama atahsantauve .
43002024	Jesun vang mitin lung thim ahetoh-in amaho chu akisonpi poi ;
43002025	mi lung sunga ipi um ahet sa ahijeh-in mihem chu hitobang ahitia min ama ahettohsah angaipoi .
43003001	Pharisee ho lah a amin Nicodemus kiti Judate vaipo mi khat
43003002	janin Jesu henga ahungin ajah a , “ Rabbi , Nangma Pathena hungkon Houhil nahi kaheuve , ajeh chu Pathento kivoplou min melchihna nabol ho hi abol theipoi , ” ati .
43003003	Jesun adonbut’in ajah a , “ Kichentah a kaseipeh nahi , peng kit louvan koiman pathen lenggam amu theipoi , ” ati .
43003004	Nicodemus chun ajah a , “ Mi ateh teng iti pen thei ding ham ? Anu oisunga lut’a anivei nap eng theila ahipon ? ” ati .
43003005	Jesun adonbut’in , “ Kichentah-a kaseipeh nahi , koi hileh twi le Lhagaova peng lou chu Pathen lenggam alut thei poi .
43003006	Tahsaphea kona peng chu tahsaphe ahin , Lhagaova kona pengchu Lhagao ahi .
43003007	Najah a , “ Abul’a kona napentei tei diu ahi , ” kiti chu dat mo hih-in .
43003008	Hui khu anun anomna lam lam’ah anungjin , nangin agin naja nan hoiya hungkon hoilama kitol ahi nahepoi ; Lhagaova peng tapou chuti chu ahiuve , ” ati .
43003009	Nicodemus chun adonbut’in ajah’a , “ Hiche ho chu iti hithei ding ham ? ” atileh ;
43003010	jesun adonbut’in ajah a , “ Israel Houhil khat hiya hiche ho hi nahet lou ham ?
43003011	Kichen tah a kaseipeh nahi , keihon kahettohsah-u hi nasangpouve .
43003012	Najah-uva leiset thil umdol kaseiya nahet thei louvu le vana thil umdol seipeh-u leng iti natah san diu ham ?
43003013	Vana kona hung kumlha Mihem Chapa tilou koima vana akaltou khapoi .
43003014	“ Gamthip noiya Mose’n gul adop sang banga Mihem Chapa hi kidom sang ding ahin ,
43003015	atahsan chanin Amaa tonsot hinna anei ding ahi .
43003016	Ajeh chu Pathenin hi banga hi vannoi angailut ahin , Koi hijongle atahsan chan chu mangthah louva tonsot hinna anei theina din a-Chapa chang khat chu apetai .
43003017	Ijeh-inem itile vannoi themmosah ding hilouvin , Ama jeh a vannoi huhhinga aumtheina dia Pathen Chapa chu vannoiya ahinsol ahbouve .
43003018	Ama tahsanna chu themmo chang louva , atahsan lou vang chu Pathen Chapa chang khat min a tahsan loujeh a themmo kichansah ahitai .
43003019	Themmo channa chu hiti ahi , vannoiya khovah ahungtan , anatoh-u aphat loujeh-in mihon khovah sangin muthim adeijo’uve .
43003020	Ajeh chu thilse bol jousen khovah ahoi , athilse bol chu akiphonjal louna didngin khovah a ahingji poi ;
43003021	thildih bol’a vang chu abolchan Pathen dia bola hi , ti akiphondoh theina din khovah a ahungjin ahi , ” ati .
43003022	hicheng nung hin Jesu le aseijuite Judate gama ahungun , hikoma chun amahotoh aumkhom in baptize achansahjie .
43003023	Salim koma Aenon kiti laiya chun twiatam jeh-in Johnin jong mi baptize aboljin , miho ahungun baptize achangjiuve .
43003024	ijeh-inem itile John chu songkul’a akhum hih laiyuve .
43003025	John seijui phabep le Juda mi khat houthua kisuh theng thudol’in akineltauve .
43003026	Amaho John henga ahungun ajah a , “ Rabbi , Jordan gal’a naumpi , athudol nahettohsahpa khu ve , baptize achan sah jin , mihon Amah eng ajon cheh tai , ” atiuve .
43003027	Johnin adonbut’in , “ vana kona akipeh loule min ima akilah theipoi .
43003028	Keiman , ‘ Kei hi Messiah kahipoi , ama sanga eihung kisol masa kahibouve , ’ tia kasei chu nang ho tah ahettoh nahiuve .
43003029	Mou change chu aji neipa ahin , aji neipa jol , a koma dinga athusei ngaiya chun a-ogin ajah leh hachangpan akipahjie . Keijong kakipahna achamkimtai .
43003030	Ama thupi cheh cheh ding , keima lhasuh jep jep ding kahi .
43003031	“ Chunga hungkon chu mi jouse sanga chungnungpen ahin , leiset’a kon vang chu leiset ahin , leiset thubou aseiye . Vana hungkon vang chu achungnungpen ahi .
43003032	Aman ajahsa le amusa ahettohsahji ahin , ahinla koima athu hettohsah asangpoi .
43003033	Ama hettohsah kisan chun Pathen chu adih-e tia anamdet ahitai .
43003034	Pathen hinsolpan vang Pathen thuho aseiye ; ijeh-inem itile Pathenin tepten Lhagao apepoi .
43003035	Pan Chapa angailun thil ijakai akhut’a apetai .
43003036	Chapa tahsana chun tonsot hinna anei ahitai ; Chapa thu ngai lou vang chun tonsto hinna chu amu louhel ding , Pathen lungsatna achunga umden ding ahi , ” ati .
43004001	John sangin Jesun seijui atam semjon baptize abol’e , ti Pharisee hon ajah-u chu Jesun ahedoh tan ,
43004002	( Jesu mongin baptize abolpoi , aseijuiten bou abol’ui ) .
43004003	Judea gam dalhan Galilee lama akile kittai .
43004004	Hichea hi Samaria gam ajotpa tei ding ahin ;
43004005	Samaria gama Sychar kiti khoa chun ahungtai ; hikom chu Jacob’in achapa Joseph lou mun khat apehna kom ahiye .
43004006	Hilaiya hi Jacob twikul um ahi . Sunkim don ahitan , Jesu chu alamjot thachol’in twikul koma atouve .
43004007	Samaria mi numei khat twi thal din ahunge . Jesun amanu henga , “ Twi don ding neipen , ” ati ;
43004008	ajeh chu seijui ho ma neh cho dinga khopi sung lama cheuvah ahitai .
43004009	Samaria mi numeinun ajah a , “ Iti Juda mi nangin Samaria mi numei kei koma don ding twi nathum ham ? ” ati . ( Ijeh-inem itile Juda mi le Samaria mi ima kimangto lou ahiuve ) .
43004010	Jesun adonbut’in ajah a , “ Pathen thilpeh hen lang chule nahenga , ‘ Don ding neipen , ’ tipa chu kihet le chun , nang joh-in ahenga thuma , Ama hinna twi pe ta dinga , ” ati .
43004011	Numeinun ajah a , “ Pakai , athalna dingla naneipon , twikul ma thuh tah ahin , hinna twi chu hoiya nalah ding ham ?
43004012	Hiche twikul eisempeh-uva , ama jengin jong anadon , achate le aganchad ho geiya donsah , kapuu Jacob sanga chung nungjo nahim ? ” ati .
43004013	Jesun amanu adonbut’in ajah a , “ Koi hileh hiche twi don chan chu dang-chah kit ding ahin ,
43004014	Ken kapeh ding twi dona vang chu dangchah kit louhel ding , kapeh ding twi chu asunga tonsot hinna twinah soh doh ding ahi , ” ati .
43004015	Numeinun ajah a , “ Pakai , kadangchah louna ding leh hichan geiya twi thal’ kahung louna din hiche twi chu neipen , ” ati .
43004016	Jesun ajah a , “ Chen najipa gakouvin hikoma hung kit’in , ” atileh ;
43004017	Numeinun adonbut’in ajah a , “ Keiman ji kaneipoi , ” ati . Jesun ajah a , “ Nangin , ‘ Ji kaneipoi , ’ nati chu naseidih nai ;
43004018	ajeh chu ji nga jen nanei ahitan , tua naneipa khu naji ahipoi , hichu nasei dih-e , ” ati .
43004019	Numeinun ajah a , “ Nangma Themgao khat nahi , ti kahe-tai .
43004020	Kapu kapateuvin hiche molchunga hin Pathen ahoujiuvin , nang hon ‘ Jerusalem muna bou min ahou ding ahi , ’ natiuve , ” ati .
43004021	Jesun amanu jah a , “ Numei neitahsanin , anng hon Pa chu hiche molchung jong hilou Jerusalem jong hideh louva nahou theina diu phat ahung lhunge .
43004022	Nang hon nahet lou nahouvu ahin , keihon vang kahet kahouvu ahi ; ajeh chu huhhingna hi Judate lah a konbou ahi .
43004023	Ijeh-inem itile Pa chu ahou tahbeh hon lhagao le thutah a ahouna diu phat ahung lhungtan , tun hikomah aume ; ajeh chu Pan hitobang miho chu bou Ama hou dia ahole ahiye .
43004024	Pathen chu Lhagao ahin , Ama houten Ama hina Lhagao va ahou mong diu ahi , ” ati .
43004025	Numeinun ajah a , “ Keiman , ‘ Thao kinu kiti , ’ Messiah hung ding vang kahenai . Ahung teng leh ijakai eiseipeh nauvinte , ” atitai .
43004027	Hichepet hin Jesu seijuite ahungu leh numei khat toh anakihou chu adatmo lheh-un , ahivang in , “ Ipi nadoh hiya , ” ahiloule , “ Hichenu khutoh ibol’a kihou nahim ? ” tia khat cha aumpouve .
43004028	Numeinun atwibel dalhan khopi sunga chen miho jah a ,
43004029	“ Hungin kathilbol kachonna jouse eiseidoh peh jeng mi khat hung veuvin , hiche hi Messiah hikhat ding hi tam ? ” agati .
43004030	Miho khopia konin apotdoh-un Jesu henga ahungui .
43004031	Hiche kah lah a hin seijuiten , “ Rabbi , an nen , ” tin a-ngeh-ui .
43004032	Jesun ajah-uva , “ Nang hon nahet louvu neh ding an kanei nai , ” ati .
43004033	Hichun seijuite khat le khat akihouvun , “ Mi khattouvin neh ding ahinchoipeh ham ? ” akitiuve .
43004034	Jesun ajah-uva , “ Keima anneh chu Eihinsolpa dei bol’a natoh molso ding hi ahi .
43004035	Nang hon , ‘ Chang atna ding lha li aum nalaiye , ’ natiji hih-um ? Ven najah-uva kasei ahi , khodahun loujao dung veuvin , agusoh-in aminin a-at phat ahitai .
43004036	atupa le a-atpa akipa khom theina didngin a-atpan tohman akisanin aga ronsot hinaa akhol’e .
43004037	Hijeh chun khat’in atun chom khat-in a-atji kiti hi adih-e .
43004038	Ken natoh gim lou nauva at dia kasol nahiuve , midangin atoh gim aatohgauva lut mahiuve , ” ati .
43004039	Chuche khopi sunga Samaria mi tamtah-in jong , “ Kathilbol kachonna chengse eiseidoh peh-e , ” tia nameinun ahettohsah jeh chun Jesu atahsantauve .
43004040	Samaria miho ahungun akom’uva nichong din angeh u leh , Aman chukoma ni ni aninchonge .
43004041	Ama thusei jal’in mi tampin atahsan beuvin ,
43004042	numeinu jah a chun , “ Nangma thusei keova katahsanu ahitapoi , keiho tah-in kajauvin , chule hiche Pa hi Vannoi huhingpa ahi , kahetauve , ” atiu vin ahi .
43004043	Ni ni jouvin Jesu chukom dalhan Galilee gama achetai .
43004044	Ajeh chu Jesu amatah-in Themgao achenna gama akijabol lou thu ahettohsah ahi .
43004045	Galilee gam ahung lhun leh agam miten anasang cheh-ui ; amaho jong kut a che ahijeh-un , kut laiya Jesun Jerusalema thil abol jouse amusoh keiyu ahiye .
43004046	Galilee gama twisih lengpitwi asosahna
43004047	Hichepa hin Judea gama kon Jesu Galilee gama hung ajah phat’in ahenga achen , achapa athipai ding phat chun , hungsah a achapa dam sah din a-ngeh-e .
43004048	Jesun ajah a , “ Melchihna le thil kidang namu lousen tahsan pouvin nate , ” ati .
43004049	Lengvaipoa pangpan ajah a , “ Pakai , kachapa thi kah-in hungsuh jengin , “ ati .
43004050	Jesun ajah a , “ Chetan , nachapa ahingtai , ” atileh ; aman ajah a Jesu thusei chu atahsanin achetai .
43004051	Ama achesuh nalaiyin asohten ahung lamton achapa hindoh thu aseipeh tauve .
43004052	Aman achapa itih don tah a phadom ahi adoh leh , amahon ajah a , “ Jan hi nil hah lam nidan khat chun khosih-in alhatai , ” atiuve .
43004053	Hichun apan , “ Nachapa ahingtai , ” tia Jesun ajah a aseipeh pet tah chu ahi , ahedoh tan , ama le a-insung pumpiuvin atahsan tauve .
43004054	Hiche hi Judea gama kona Galilee gam ahunglhun kal’a Jesun melchihna abol aniveina ahi .
43005001	Hicheng nung hin Judate kut khat aumin , Jesu Jerusalema aga chetouve .
43005002	Jerusalema chun kelngoi kotphunga Hebrew paova , “ Bethzada ” kiti twikul khat aumin , leibuh nga aume .
43005003	Hiche dunga hi ana damlou mitcho , elbai , nakong chatmo tampi um ahiuve . ( Amaho hin twi kilin angau ahi ;
43005004	ijeh-inem itile phat khat khat leh Vantil twikul’a hi hung kumlhaa twi chu ahinsuh lingjia , hiche twi kicholong joutah leh chomlut masapen pen chu itobang hiveiya na hijongleh damhelji ahi . )
43005005	Hikoma hin mi khat kum som thum le get jen na chatmo aume .
43005006	Ama chua alup Jesun amun , phat sotpi hichea hi lum ahi , ahen ajah a , “ Nadam nom em ? ” atileh ;
43005007	anapan adonbut’in ajaih a , “ Pakai , twi hung kicholoh teng twikul sunga eidomlut dingla koima kaneipon , kacheleh kalhun kah-in min eikheljin achimlut masajitai , ” ati .
43005008	Jesun ajah a , “ Thouvin nalupn apheh kilah-in lamjot tan , ” ati .
43005009	Apettah chun mipa chu adamhel’in alupna akijeldoh-in lam ajottai . Hiche nikho chu Choldo ni ahi .
43005010	Hijeh chun Judah on adamdohpa jah a , “ Tuni hi Choldo ni ahin , nalupna nakiput jeng chu dan ngai ahipoi , ” tin aphoh-ui .
43005011	Aman adonbut’in , “ Eidam sahpan kajah a , ‘ Nalupna pheh kilah-n lam jottan , ’ eiti chume , ” ati .
43005012	Amahon , “ Najah a , ‘ Nalupna kilah-in lang lam jot’in , ’ tia chu koipen ham ? ” tin adongui .
43005013	Ahinla adamdohpan amuna mi atam beheh phat’a , Jesu ache mang tah jeh-in , aboldampa chu koiham ahetapoi .
43005014	Hicheng nung hin Jesun ama hi Houin a amudoh-in ajah a , ‘ Ven , adam nahitai ; akhoh chehjo nachunga achuh louna din chonse kit ta hih-in , ” ati .
43005015	Mipa chu achen Judda miho jah a adamsah chu Jesu ahi agaseitai .
43005016	Hitia agaseidoh phat hin Choldo nikhoa hitiho aboljeh chun Judah on Jesu abolsetauve .
43005017	Jesun amaho hi adonbut’in , “ Tu chan geiya hi ka-Pan na atoh jing jeh a Ken jong katoh ahi , ” ati .
43005018	Hichea hin Juda hon Jesu chu tha din ahahol cheh tauve ; ijeh-inem itile aman Choldo nikho asuhkeh keo ahipon , Pathen chu Amaseh Paa aseiya , pathento kibanga akiseijeh ahi .
43005019	Jesun miho chu adonbut’in ajah-uva , “ Kichentah a kaseipeh nahiuve , Chapan achamin ima abolpoi , Pa bol amuchan abol ahi ; ajeh chu ipi hileh Pan abol chan chu Chapan jong abol ahi .
43005020	Ijeh-inem itile Pan Chapa angailun , atoh chan avetsah jin , nadatmo helna diuva hicheng sanga thupijo jong ahinvetsah ding ahi .
43005021	Pan mithi ho athodoh a ahinsah banga , Chapan jong ahinsah nom chan ahinsah ahi .
43005022	Pan koima thu atanpoi , thutan ding jouse apumpia Chapa apehdoh ahitai ;
43005023	hitia min Pa ajabol banguva mitinin Chapa ajabolna ding ahi . Chapa jabol lou mi chun asol’a Pa geiya ajabol lou ahi .
43005024	“ Kichentah a kaseipeh nahiuve , kasei ngaiya Eihinsolpa tahsan chun tonsot hinna anei ahitan , thupi tan naa lut louva thinaa kona hinna galkai ahitai .
43005025	Kichentah akaseipeh nahiuve , mithihon Pathen Chapa ogin ajah-uva , ajaph chanin hina aneidiu phat ahung lhunin , tun hikoma aume .
43005026	pa Amatah hinna bulpi ahibangin , Aman Chapa jong hinna bulpi hina apetai .
43005027	Mihem Chapa ahijehin jong Pan thupi tanna apetai .
43005028	Hiche hi datmo hih-un , ajeh chu lhankhuh dung alum mithihon aogin ajahna diu phat ahung lhunge ,
43005029	mithiho lhankhuh hoa kona hung potdoh-uva , thilpha bol chengse kikaithouva hing diu , thilse bol chengse vang kikaithouva athuu kitan ding ahi , ” ati .
43005030	“ Keiman kachamin ima kabolpoi ; pan eihil banga thu katanjeh-in kathutan adih-e ; ijeh-inem itile keima dei khohsah louva Eihinsolpa lungdei kaholjoh ahi .
43005031	“ Keiman kachung thu kakiseihileh kathu hettohsah chu dih lou ding ahi .
43005032	Kei chung thu hettohsah achom khat aumin , ama hettohsah chu adih kahei .
43005033	Nang hon John henga mi nasol’un , aman adih ahettohsah-e .
43005034	Ken mihem hettohsah chu kison nan kaneipoi , huh hinga naum theina diuva kasei ahibouve .
43005035	John chu thaomei kivah vahchansel ahin , ama vah a chun nang hon chom khat nomsah ding nadeiyui .
43005036	Keima hettohsah vang hi John’a sanga thupijo ahi , ajeh chu ka-pan molsa dinga eipeh toh ding ho katoh chengse hin pan eihinsol kahi thudol ahettohsah ahi .
43005037	Eihinsol’a Pa chun kachung thudol ahettohsah ahin , nang hon a-ogin jong najapouvin , alim jong namupouve .
43005038	Ahinsolpa natahsan loujeh-un nasunguva jong athu achengpoi .
43005039	Pathen lekhabu hoa chu tonsot hinna neithei din nagel’un nasim jiuvin , hiche ho chun Kei thudol ahettohsah-u ahibouve .
43005040	Nahinna diuvin kakoma nahung nompouve .
43005041	“ Keiman mihem choi-at kakisonpipoi ,
43005042	nalung sunguva Pathen na-ngailut louvu kahenai .
43005043	Keima ka-pa min’a hung kahin , nang hon neisang pouve ; achomdang khat ama le ama minin hung le amajoh chu sangun nate .
43005044	Nang hon mihem choi-at kisonpiuva Pathen khatseh pachat didngjoh holl ou chu iti natahsan thei diuba ham ?
43005045	Ama vang Keihin Pa henga kaheh-in gel hih-un , nang hon nakineppiu Mose chu naheh-uva pang ahi .
43005046	Mose natahsanu le Keijong neitahsan tei diu ahi , ajeh chu aman kei thudol asut ahibouve .
43005047	Aman asut thuho natahsanlou vangu leh kathuseiho jong natahsan lou diu ahi , ” ati .
43006001	Hicheng nung hin Jesu Tiberias dillen kiti , Galilee dillen agal kaitai .
43006002	Jesun adammo ho aboldama melchihna kidang tampi abol amujeh-un mupin ajuitauve .
43006003	jesu mol chunga akaltouvin , aseijuite toh atouve .
43006004	Hichun kalchuh kut kiti Judate kut anaitai .
43006005	Jesu akhoda leh mipi ahenga hung amun , Philip jah a , “ Mipi hicheng neh khop ding hi changlhah hoiya ichoh diu ham ? ” ati .
43006006	Hiche hi Aman patepna asei ahi ; ajeh chu ipi abol ding Aman akihetnai .
43006007	Philip chun adonbut’in , “ Denari ja ni man changlhah kicho jongleh them kha khat’in jong chang pouvinte , ” ati .
43006008	Aseijuite lah a khat , Simon Peter sopipa Andrewn ajah a ,
43006009	“ Hikoma hin pasal chapang khat’in sap change kisem changlhah pheng nga le nga ni vang aneiyin , mi hijat lah a ipi khama pang ding ham ? ” ati .
43006010	Jesun “ Miho chu tousah-un , ” ati . Hikoma chu hamhing tampi umah ahin , miho chu atouvu leh amijat sangnga bang ahiuve .
43006011	Jesun changlhah pheng ho chu alan athangvah jouvin miho chu atou nauva ahoppeh-in , nga te nijong chutiman abol’in , amahon agot chanin aneuve .
43006012	Mihon anehva soh phat’un Jesun aseijuite jah a , “ Nehval anong nai geiyin , amang thah beihel’in loh khom’uvin , “ ati .
43006013	Hiti chun aloh khomun ahileh , sap change kisem changlhah pheng ngaa kon mihon anehmoh nong siu chu paipeh som le ni aloh dim’uve .
43006014	Thil kidang abol mu hon , “ Hichepa vang hi vsnnoiya hung dia kisei Themgao chu ahimong mongtai , ” atiuve .
43006015	Hichea hin mihon hunga achamlouva leng chansah din ago’uve , ti Jesun ahen , achangseh-in molchunga akitheh doh tai .
43006016	Nilhah ahiphat’in Jesu seijuite dillen lama achesuh-un ,
43006017	kong khat’a lut’in Capernaum join dillen chu apal’uve . Kho ajing lheh tan , Jesu la ahenguva ahung hih laiye ;
43006018	chule huipi hattah ahung nungin twipi akinong sang tul tul jenge .
43006019	Kilometer thum le li ham akitol’u leh Jesun twichunga lam ajot’a kong lang ahinjot amu’vin akicha lheh jengui .
43006020	Jesun ajah-uva , “ Kei kahibouve , kicha hih-un ! ” ati .
43006021	Hichun Ama kong sunga puilut ding agot’u leh , kong chun ajotnau tol aphapaitai .
43006022	Ajing nikhon dillen gal lang khat’a um mipin chukoma kong dang beiya khatseh um chu amu’vin , chule hiche konga chun Jesu seijuite toh lut khom louvin , asdejuite achanguva chea Ama adalhah-u aheuve .
43006023	Pakaiyin athangvah jouva changlhah aneh nau mun kom , Tiberias a kona vang kong dang jong hung ahinai .
43006024	Hijeh chun Jesu le asei juite chukoma aumtapouve , ti ahet phat’un mipi chu acham chamin kong sunga alut’uvin Capernauma ahungun Jesu ahol’uve .
43006025	Mihon Jesu chu dillen gal langkhat’a amudoh phat’un ajah a , “ Rabbi , itih a hikoma hung nahi tah em ? ” atiuve .
43006026	Jesun amaho adonbut’in , “ Kichentah a kaseipeh nahiuve . Nang hon melchihna ho namu jeh-uva neihol’u ahipon , changlhah nachan’uva nanehva jeh-uva neihol’u ahibouve .
43006027	Amangthah ji anneh holnan tong gim hih-un , Mihem Chapan napeh diu a-itih a um jing , tonsot hinna thei anneh holnan tong gim jo’uvin , ajeh chu Pa Pathenin Chapa chu tha neina mohor anamkhum ahi tai , ” ati .
43006028	Amahon jah a , “ Pathen na katoh thiena diuva ipi kabol diu ham ? ” atiuve .
43006029	Jesun adonbut’in ajah-uva , “ Pathen na toh ding kiti chu ahin solpa natahsan diui hi ahiye , ” ati .
43006030	Hichun amahon , “ Nang katahsan theina diuva melchihna ipi nabol’em ? I-ham nabol ?
43006031	Ka pu kapateuvin Pathen lekhabua kisun , ‘ Aman aneh diuvin vana koin changlhah apei , ’ kiti dungjuiyin gamthip noiya Manna anneuvin ahi , ” atiuve .
43006032	Jesun ajah-uva , “ Kichentah a kaseipeh nahiuve , Mose’n vana konin Manna napepouve , ka-Pan vana kon changlhah dihtah chu napeh-u ahibouve .
43006033	Ijeh-inem itile Pathen changlhah chu vana kona hung kumlhaa vannoi dia hinna pepa chu ahi , ” ati .
43006034	Amahon Jesu jah a , “ pakai , hiche changlhah chu neipe jing jengun , ” atiuleh ;
43006035	Jesun ajah-uva , “ Kei hi hinna changlhah kahin , kaheng hinjon jouse gilkel lou ding , chule Keima eitahsan chu dang chah kit lou hel ding ahi .
43006036	Amavang kaseipeh nahiuve , nang hon neimu tauvin , neitahsan pouve .
43006037	Pan eipeh chengse kahenga hungin tin , kaheng hinjon chu koi hileh kaledoh lou ding ahi ,
43006038	ajeh chu Keima chama vana kona hung kumlha kahipon , Eihinsolpa lungdeiya hung kahibouve .
43006039	Eihinsolpa lungdei chu Aman eipeh chengse khat cha mansah louva , phatchai nikhoa kakaithou ding hi ahiye .
43006040	Ijeh-inem itile ka-pa dei chu Chapa mu jousen atahsan’a tonsot hinna anei ding , phat chai nikhoa Keiman kakaithou ding hi ahi , ” ati .
43006041	Jesun , “ keima vana kona hung kumlha changlhah kahi , ” atijeh chun achunga Judate aphun’un ,
43006042	“ Hichepa hi Joseph chapa , anu apa i-hetsau Jesu chu hilou haimo ? I-tileh aman , ‘ Vana kona hung kumlha kahi , ’ ti ham ? ” atiuve .
43006043	Jesun adonbut’in ajah-uva , “ Kihou lhi chet chut’in phun dauvin ,
43006044	Eihinsol’a Pan aloilut lou chu koiman kaheng ahinjon theipoi ; ahunga chu phat chai nikhoa Keiman kakaithou ding ahi .
43006045	Themgaoho lekhabua chun , ‘ Abonchauva Pathenin ahil diu ahi , ’ tin akisun’e . Pa thu ngaiya Amaa kihilna neichan kahenga ahungjie .
43006046	Mi koiman Pa chu amukhapoi , Pathena kona hungpa , amanbou Pa chu amu ahi .
43006047	Kichentah a kaseipeh nahiuve , atahsana chun tonsot hinna anei ahitai .
43006048	Keima hinna changlhah kahi .
43006049	napu napateuvin gamthip’a Manna aneh vangun athigam tauve .
43006050	Vana kona hung kumlha cahnglhah chu min aneh teng thi lou ding ahi .
43006051	Keima vana hung kon changlhah hing kahi , min hiche changlhah hi aneh leh tonsot’a hing jing ding ahi ; Keiman kepeh ding changlhah chu katahsa ahin , vvannoi hina dinga kapeh ahi , ” ati .
43006052	Judaho lung phamo tenin akihouvun , “ Hichepa hin neh dia atahsa iti eipeh didu ham ? Atiuve .
43006053	Jesun ajah-uva , “ Kichen tah a kaseipeh nahiuve , nang hon Mihem Chapa sa naneh louva athi nadon louvu leh nasunguva hinna naneipouve .
43006054	Kasa nea kathi don’a chun tonsot hinna anei ahitan , phat chai nikhoa Keiman kakaithou ding ahi .
43006055	Ajeh chu kasa hi neh ding mong ahin , kathi hi don ding mong ahi .
43006056	Kasa nea kathi don’a chu kasunga aumin , keima ama sunga kaume .
43006057	pa hing jing chun eisol’a Keijong pa vanga kahin banga , Keima einea jong chu Keivanga hing ding ahi .
43006058	Vana kona hung kumlha changlhah chu hiche hi ahi : pute paten aneh-uva thi khemlouva aum nau tobang ahipoi , hiche changlhah nea vang chu tonsot’a hing ding ahi , ” ati .
43006059	Jesun hicheng hi Capernaum khosung Houthua kihopnaina thu ahilpet’a asei ahi .
43006060	Jesu seijui tampin hiche hi ajah phat’un , “ Asei hi ahahsa behseh jenge , kon angai thei ding ham ? ” atiuve .
43006061	Aseijuite hiche thua aphun chu Jesun along gil’in ahen ajeh-uva , “ Kasei hin nakipalsah-u hita ong ?
43006062	Mihem Chapa hi masanga aumna ngaiya akaltou muleu chun iti tauvin natem ?
43006063	Hinna pea Lhagao ahin , tahsaphen ima atahpoi ; najah-uva kathuseiho hi Lhagao le hina ahi .
43006064	Ahinla nalahuva atahsan lou jong naum’uv , ” ati . Ijeh-inem itile Jesun abul’a pat atahsan lou ding koi koi hiuva chule Ama matsah dingkoiham , ahet jingsa ahi .
43006065	Aman aseiyin , “ Hichejeh a chu , ‘ Pan aphalpeh tilouvin koiman kaheng ahinjon theipoi , ’ ti najah-uva kasei ahi , ” ati .
43006066	Hichea pat hin Jesu seijuitampi akinung leuvin , Amatoh akilhon le tapouve .
43006067	Hichun Jesun som le ni jah a , “ Nang ho la nakinungle nom louvu ham ? ” atileh ;
43006068	Simon Peterin adonbut’in , “ Pakai koiheng kabel diu ham ? Nangin tonsot hinna thu hijat neiya ;
43006069	chule Pathena hung kon Athengpa chu nahi katahsan kihe ta chu , ” ati .
43006070	Jesun amaho adonbut’in , “ Nang ho som le ni kalhen chil hilou ham ? Nalah-uva khat Dia bol nanalai ong ? ” ati .
43006071	Jesun Iscariot Simon chapa Judas aseina ahi ; ajeh chu som le nil ah a apan vangin Jesu matsah a pang ding chu ama ahi .
43007001	Hicheng nung hin Juda lamkai hon tha dia aholjeh-un Jesu Judea gamsunga avahle nom tapon Galilee gamsunga bou akholjin lei .
43007002	Juda ho lhambuh kut ding phat anaitai .
43007003	Hijeh chun asopiten Jesu jah a , “ Nathilbol natoh ho hi naseijui hon jong amu theina diuvin hikom dalhan Judea gama chetan .
43007004	Ijeh-inem itile minthan dei mi koiman guh thimin thil abol ngaipoi . Thil hicheng nabol ahileh vannoi kimusah ngal’in , ” atiuve .
43007005	Ajeh chu asopite jengin jong atahsan pouve .
43007006	Hijeh chun Jesun ajah-uva , “ Nang ho didnga phat ahijing vangin Keidin phat ahi hih laiye .
43007007	Anatoh chengse phat louna kahettohsah jeh-in vannoiyin Keima eihon nang ho vang naho pouve .
43007008	Nang ho kut’a chun chetauvin , Keivang kaphat alhin loulai jeh-in hiche kut’a hin cheponge , ” ati .
43007009	Hicheng hi aseiyin Ama Galilee gamsunga aumdentai .
43007010	Asopi kut’a dia ache nungun Jesu jong lhang phong hilouvin guh thimin achetouve .
43007011	Kut laiyin Judah on Jesu ahol’uvin , “ Ama chu hoiya um ham ? ” atiuve .
43007012	Japi lah a chun Jesu thudol’a kinel baotamna asoh-in , loi khat’in , “ Ama hi mipha ahi , ” atiuvin ; abangin , “ Ahipoi , mipi apui chavai boue , ” atiuve .
43007013	Juda ho agin jeh-un koiman vang athudol lhang phongin asei ngampouve .
43007014	Kut lai tah-in Jesu Houina achetouvin thu agahil’e .
43007015	Hichea hin Judah on adatmo lheh jengun , “ Hichepan kahilna bon nei louva iti lekha hiti thep hi nga na ? ” atiuve .
43007016	Jesun amaho adonbut’in , “ Kathuhil hi Keiya ahipoi , Eihinsolpaa ahibouve .
43007017	Eihinsolpa lung dei bolnom mi chun thu kihil hi Pathena kon ha , kachama kasei ham , ahet didng ahi .
43007018	koi hileh achama thuseipan Ama kichoi atna ding bou aholjin , ahinsolpa choi tana ding holpa vang chu adih ahin , ama sunga chun adih lou aumpoi .
43007019	Mose’n danthu napeh-u hilou ham ? Ahinla nang ho khat cha beh-in danthu chu namangpouve . I-bol’a tha dia neihol’u ham ? ” ati .
43007020	Mipin adonbut’un , “ Nang hi thilhavop nahi . Kooiham tha dia nahol’ah ? ” atiuve .
43007021	Jesun adonbut’in ajah-uva , “ Ken na khat katongin nabonchauvin nadatmouve .
43007022	Amaa kon ahilou vangin pu le patea konin Mose’n chaptan ding thu napeuvin , hijeh chun Choldo ni jeng jongleh mihem chep natanjiuve .
43007023	Mose Danthu suhkeh louna dia Choldo mikhoa mikhat chep akitan leh , Choldo bikhoa mikadamthengsah hel jeha i-bol’a kachunga lung hang nahiuvam ?
43007024	Polam mitvet’a thu tan louvin adih bangtah-in tan’uvin , ” ati .
43007025	Jerusalem Kon miphabep’in “ Mihon tha dia ahol’u chu hichepa hi hilou naimo ?
43007026	ahinla ve , aman lhang phongtah-in thu asiyin , amahonla ajah a imacha aseipouve . Vaipoten ama hi Messiah ahi tia ahet chet mongu hitam ?
43007027	Keihon hichepa ahung kina kihea , Messiah ahung teng vang leh koiman akonna ahet lou ding ahi , ” atiuve .
43007028	Jesun hitea Houina thu ahilpet hin asamin , “ Nang hon Keima neiheuvin , kahung konna geiyin naheuve . Ahinla Keima kachama hung kahipoi , Eihinsolpa chu dih tah ahin , nang hon Ama nahepouve .
43007029	Kenvang Ama kahei , ajeh chu Amaa hung kon Ama sol kahi , ” ati .
43007030	Hichun mihon mat dingago’uvin , aphat lhin loulai jeh-in koiman achunga khut alhapouve .
43007031	Mipilah a tampin Ama atahsanun , “ Messiah hung teng jongle hichepa bol sanga tamjo melchihna abol mong ding hinam ? ” atiuve .
43007032	Jesu thudol’a mipi akinel baotam nau chu Pharisee hon ajauvin , hijeh chun thempu pipuho leh Pharisee hon Jesu man din lhacha ho asoltauve .
43007033	Jesun , “ Phat chomcha ka-umpiuva , chutengleh Eihinsolpa henga kache ding ahitai .
43007034	Nang hon neihol’uvaneimu lou diu , Kei umnaa la nahung thei lou dingu ahi , ” ati .
43007035	Judaho akihouvun , “ Hoiya che ding kigo hiya , eihon i-hol’uva imu lou diu ham ? Chi dang namdang lah akithecheh Judate lah a chea , chidang namdang ho gahil ding agot khat ham ?
43007036	Athusei , ‘ Neihol’uva neimu lou diu , Kei umna la nahung thei lou dingu ahi , ’ ati hi ipi atina mong ham ? ” atiuve .
43007037	Kut kichai ni , ni loupe nin Jesu adingin o-ging tah-in asamin , “ Koi hileh adangchah a chu kahenga hung hen lang don hen ,
43007038	Pathen lakhabun , ‘ Keima eitahsana chu along sunga hintwi put’a luiya long ding ahi , ’ ati banga um ding ahi , ” ati .
43007039	Jesun Ama tahsanhon Lhagao akisan diu aseina ahi , ijeh-inem itile Jesu choi-at a aum loulai jeh a hiche ni geiya hi Lhagai kihom loulai ahi .
43007040	Hiche aseiho hi mipi phabep’in ajauvin , “ Hichepa hi Themgao tahbeh ahibouve , ” atiiuvin ahi .
43007041	Adang hon ma , “ Hichepa hi Messiah ahi , ” atiuvin , konkhat’in vang , “ Galilee gama Messiah sohdoh din gong ? ”
43007042	Pathen lekhabun , ‘ Messiah chu David guiya kona Bethlehema hung sohdoh ding ahi , ’ ati lou ham , David chenna khopia chu ? ” atiiuve .
43007043	Hijeh chun Ama jehin mipi akibung khentauve .
43007044	Abang bangin mat din ago’uvin , koi manla achunga khut alhapouve .
43007045	Lhachaho chu Thempu pipu ho le Pharisee ho henga ahung phat’un amahon , “ I-bol’a nahin kaidiu ham ? ” tin anadongui .
43007046	Lhachahin adonbut’un , “ Khu cheap thusei tobangin koiman thu asei khapoi , ” atiuve .
43007047	Pharisee hon adonbut’un , “ Doha nalhah-u hitalou ong ?
43007048	Vaipo ho lah a khat beh le Pharisee mikhat beh-in atahsan em ?
43007049	Danthu hetoh lou hiche mipi vang hi sapset chang hiuva khu , ” atiuve .
43007050	Alah-uva mikhat , masanga Jesu henga hungsa , Nicoddemua vang chun ajah-uva ,
43007051	I-danthu’vin mi athu ngai masa loule athilbol muchen louva achung thu eitahsanji nah um ? ” ati .
43007052	Amahon adonbut’un ajah a , “ nang jong Galilee mi nahim ? Hol’in vetang , Galilee kona Themgao sohdoh ngai lou chu , ’ ” atiuve .
43007053	Mihon inlam ajon cheh-un ,
43008001	Jesu chu Olive mol lama achei .
43008002	Jingkah matah-in houina agache kit’e . Ahenga mipi abonchan ahung kikhomun , Ama atouvin miho thu ahiltai .
43008003	Danthu them ho le Pharisee hon ajon pettah a kimandoh numei khat ahin kailut’un , Jesu to akah-uva adinsah-un ,
43008004	ajah a , “ Houhil hiche nu hi ajon petah a kimandoh ahi .
43008005	Danthua chun Mose’n hitobang numei ho songa selih dinga asei ahi . Nangin iti na-ngaitom ? ” atiuve .
43008006	Ama hetsahna theiya akipalna dia aseiyu ahin , ahinla Jesu abungin akhut jungin tol ajih tai .
43008007	Amahon adoh tei tei jeng phat’un Jesu adding jangin ajah-uva , “ nalahuva chonsetna neilou pen chun amanu hi songin sep masapen hen , ” atin ;
43008008	abungin tol ajih kittai .
43008009	Hiche hi ajah phat’un a-upapen hoa pat’in khat khat’in adalhauvin Jesu le numeinu chubou alailunga aumtai .
43008010	Hichun Jesu adahdoh-in ajah a , “ Numei , hoiya umtauvem ? Koiman themmo nachan lou hitam ? ” tin adonge .
43008011	Amanun , “ Pakai , koiman themmo eichan tapoi , ” ati . Jesun , “ kenjong themmo kachan poi , chen lan gchonse kit ta hihin , ” ati .
43008012	Jesun ajah-uva aseikit’in , “ Keima vannoi slvah kahin , kanung juiya chun muthima lam’ajot lou ding , hinna khovah anei idng ahi , ” ati .
43008013	Pharisee hon ajah a , “ Nangin nachung thu nahettohsah jeh-in nahettohsah chu adihpoi , ’ atiuve .
43008014	Jesun adonbut’in jah-uva , “ ken kachung thu hettohsah jong leng kahettohsah hi adih-e ; ajeh chu hoiya hung kona hoi lam kajot kakihet’in , nang hon hoiya hungkona hoi lam kajot nahepouve .
43008015	Nang hon tahsa dol’in thu natan jiuvin , Ken koima thu katanpoi .
43008016	ijehtin tan jeng jong leng kathutan adih-e , ajeh chu kachang kahinpon , Eihinsol’a pa chun eiumpi .
43008017	Ajeh chu nadanthu va jong mini thu hettohsah chu adihna akisune .
43008018	Kachung thu hettohsah a pang Kei kahin , chule Eihinsol’a panjong kachung thu ahettohsah-e , ” ati .
43008019	Amahon ajah a , “ Napa hoiya um ham ? ” atiuleh ; Jesun adonbut’in , “ Nang hon Keila neihepouvin , ka-pa jong nahepouve ; Keima neihetsau hileh ka-Pa jong nahet diu ahi , ” ati .
43008020	Hicheng hi Jesun Houina athuhil pet’a thil kholna muna asei ahin , Ama phat ahung lhun loulai jeh-in koiman aman pouve .
43008021	Jesun ajah-uva asei kit’in , “ Keima che mang ing ting , nang hon neihol diu , ahinla nachonset’a nathiden’uvaa kache naa nahung thei lou dingu ahi , ” ati .
43008022	Juda hon , “ Ama le ama kithat ngap ding ham , ‘ Kache naa nahung thei lou diu , ’ ati khu ? ” atiuve .
43008023	Jesun ajah-uva , “ Nang ho hoiya kon nahiuvin , Keima chunga kon kahi ; nang ho hiche vannoiya nahiuvin , Keima vang hiche vannoiya kahipoi .
43008024	“ Hichejeh a chu nachonset ho’uva nathi diu ahi , tia kasei ahi ; nang hon Kei hi , ‘ Ama chu ahi , ’ tia natahsan louvu leh nachonset ho’uva nathi tei diu ahi , ” ati .
43008025	Hichun amahon ajah a , “ Nang koi nahim ? ” atiuleh ; Jesun ajah-uva , “ Atil’a pat koi kahi kaseipeh-u chu la ?
43008026	Nachung change thu Pathena siya tan ding tampi kaneinan , Eihinsolpa amatah Adih ahijeh-in Amaa kona kajah cheng chu Vannoi mite kaseipeh ahibouve , ” ati .
43008027	Pa thudol’a ajah-uva asei chu ahdoh thei pouve .
43008028	Hijeh chun Jesun ajah-uva , “ Nang hon Mihem Chapa hi nakhai san gtengu leh Kei hi Ama chu kahi nahetdoh-uva , imacha kachama bol louva , hicheng kaseiho jong hi Pan eihil’a kasei ahi , nahet diu ahi .
43008029	Chule Eihinsolpa chun alungdei kaboljeh-in eiumpin , kachangin eidalhapoi , ” ati .
43008030	Aman hicheng hi asei nalaiyin mi tampin ama atahsantauve .
43008031	Ama tahsan Jusa hojah a Jesun , “ Nang hon kasei najom jingo leh kaseijui tahbeh mong nahiuvin ,
43008032	chuteng atah chu nahet’uva , atah chun najalensah diu ahi , ” ati .
43008033	Amahon adonbut’un ajah a , “ Keiho Abraham chilhah kahiuvin itih-in jong koima koma soh-in kalut khapouve ; ati dan a nangin ‘ Najalen diu ahi , ’ natiham ? ” atiuve .
43008034	Jesun amaho chu adonbut’in , “ Kichen a kaseipeh nahiuve , koi hileh achonsea chu chonset’a kihen soh ahi .
43008035	Soh chu tonsot’in in’a acheng pon , Chapa vang acheng jinge .
43008036	Hijeh chun Chapan jalensah leu chun najalen tahbeh diu ahi .
43008037	Abraham chilhah nahiu kahenai ; ahinla nasunguva kathun mun anei lou jeh-in tha din neigo’uve .
43008038	Ka-pa koma kamu chukasei ahin , nang hon jong na-pauva kaona najah chan nabol’u ahi , ” ati .
43008039	Amahon Jesu adonbut’un ajah a , “ Ka-pau Abraham ahi , ” atiuleh ; Jesun ajah-uva , “ Abraham chate hileu chun Abraham thilbol ho nabol diu ahi .
43008040	Tunla Pathenna kona thutah ja a nahenguva sepia Kei hi tha din neigo’uve , Abrahamin hitobang hi abolpoi .
43008041	Nang hon napau thil bol nabol’u ahi , ” ati . Amahon ajah a , “ Keiho bolam kahipouve , ka-pau khat Pathen ahi , ” atiuve .
43008042	Jesun ajahuva , “ Pathen na-pau hile Kei nei ngailut diu ahi , ajeh chu Kei hi Pathena hung kon hikoma um kahi , kacham hung kahipon , Aman eihinsol ahi .
43008043	Idinga kasei nahet khen thei louvu ham ? Kahil hi-na-ngai jou loujeh-u ahibouve .
43008044	Nang ho napau Diabol’a nahiuva napauva hung kon alungdei chu namolso namu ahi . Ama chu semtil’a pat tolthat ahin , thutah aum loujeh a atah a pang ngailou ahi . Aman thujou asei teng along chama aseiji ahi ; ajeh chu jousei ahin , jou penna pa ahi .
43008045	Kenvang atah kasei ahin , ahinla neitahsan pouve .
43008046	Michonse ahi eiti thei ding koipen nahiuvem ? Atah kasei ahileh ibol’a neitahsan dau ham ?
43008047	Pathena kon chun Pathen thu angaiyin , nang hon thu na-ngailouvu hi Pathena kon nahilou jeh-u ahi , ” ati .
43008048	Judahon adonbut’un ajah a , “ Nangma Samaria mi nahin , thilhavop nahi katiu hi dih lou ham ? ” atiuve .
43008049	Jesun adonbut’in , “ Keima thilhavop kahipon , ka-Pa kajabol ahin , nang hon Keima neijabol pouve .
43008050	Keiman kaloupina ding kaholpon , ahol’a athutan khat aum nai .
43008051	Kichentah a kaseipeh nahiuve , kathu nit chun itih chan hijongle thina atep khah lou ding ahi , ” ati .
43008052	Juda hon ajh a , “ Thilhavop nahi tun kahetauve . Abraham athitan , Themgao jouse jong athitauvin , ahinla nangin , “ Kathu nit chun itih chan hijongle thina atep khah lou ding ahi , ’ nati .
43008053	Kapu luiyu Abraham athitan , asanga lenjo nahim ? Themgao jouse jong athigamtan , koipenba kahi nakitim ? ” atiuve .
43008054	Jesun adonbut’in , “ Kei kichoi-an kahileh kaloupina chu ima ahipoi , nang hon , “ Ka-pau ahi , ’ natiu hiche ka-Pa chun eichoi-at joh ahibouve .
43008055	Ama chu nang hon nahe hih laiyun , Kenvang kahenai ; Ama chu kahepoi tileng nang ho banga jousei kahi ding ahi , Ken ama kahen athu kanit’e .
43008056	Na-pau Abraham chu Keima nikho mu ding athanomin , amun akipah lheh jenge , ” ati .
43008057	Juda hon ajah a , “ Nakum som nga bon lhing lou laiya Abraham namusa hiya ong ? ” atiuve .
43008058	Jesun ajah-uva , “ Kichentah a kaseipeh nahiuve , Abraham pem masanga jong um jing Keima kahi , ” ati .
43008059	Amahon ase na didng song akilo phat’un Jesu achamin akiseldoh-in , Houina kon chun ache mangtai .
43009001	Jesu ache naa mi apen’a pat mitcho khat amui .
43009002	Aseijuiten ajah a , “ Rabbi , hichepa mitchoa apen hi ama chonset jeh ha anu le apa chonset jeh ham ? ” tin adongui .
43009003	Jesun adonbut’in , “ Hiche hi ama chonset vang jong ahipon ; Pathen natoh ho kiphondoh theina dinga ama hi mitchoa peng ahibouve .
43009004	Sun ahipet’a Eihunsolpa na i-tih tei diu hiveh ta , koiman na atoh thei louna ding jan hung lhung ding hita hi .
43009005	Vannoiya kaum laisea vannoi salvah kahi , ” ati .
43009006	Jesun hiche hi aseiyin , tol’ah achil aset lhan , achil’in bonlhoh asemin , mitchopa mit te nia aloiyin
43009007	ajah a , “ Chen lang Siloam ( Siloam hi ‘ sol ’ kiti ahi ) twikul’a gakiphet lhah tan , ” ati . Ama achea agakiphet lhah leh kho amun ahung kile kittai .
43009008	Mitchopa heng le kom ho , khutdoa apan lai musa hon , “ Touva khutdoji chu ama hi hilou haimo ? ” atiuve .
43009009	Abangin , “ Ama ahinai , ” atiuvin , kim khat’in , “ Ahipoi , amato lim kilo ahibouve , ” atiuve . Mitchopa ama tah-in , “ Kei ama chu kahinai , ” ati .
43009010	Amahon ajah a , “ I-atileh namit te ni hah hitam ? ” atiuve .
43009011	Aman adonbut’in , “ Jesu kitipa khun bonlhoh asemin , kamit te nia aloiya , ‘ Siloam a chen gakiphet lhah tan , ’ atia , kachea kagaphet lhah leh kho kamu ahitai , ” ati .
43009012	Amahon ajah a , “ Ama hoiya umtam ? ” atiuleh ; aman , “ Kahepoi , ” ati .
43009013	Amahon masanga mitchopa chu Psarisee ho henga apuitauve .
43009014	Jesun bonlhoh asema mitchopa mit te nia aloiya ahasah ni chu Choldo nikho ahi .
43009015	Pharisee hon amapan kho amu thudol chu akhol kit’uvin ahileh aman ajah-uva , “ Aman bonlhoh asemin kamit te nia aloiya kagasop lhah phat’a kho kamuthei ahi , ” ati .
43009016	Pharisee ho phabep’in , “ Choldo ni anit loujeh-in hichepa hi Pathena kon loujeh-in , ” atiuvin ; abangman , “ Michosen hitobang thil kidang ho abol thei ngai ong ? ” tin , hitobang hin alah-uva kibung khenna asohtai .
43009017	Amahon mitchopa jah a avel’in , Amahon namit ahasah jeh a chu nangin Ama chu koi ahiba natim ? ” atiuleh ; aman , “ Themgao ahi , ” ati .
43009018	Juda hon ama chu mitchosa ahi kho amu kit hi anu le apa kouva ,
43009019	amani jah a , “ Hichepa hinachapa lhon , amitchosa peng niti lhonpa lhon , amitchosa peng nati lhonpa chu himong nam ? Ahileh iti kho amu kitham ? ” tia adoh masang seuvin atahsanpouve .
43009020	Anu le apan adonbut lhonin , “ Amahi kachapa lhon ahiya chule mitcho anahi chu kahe lhon nai ;
43009021	i-atileh kho amu kit’a , koipenin amit te ni ahasah ham vang kahe lhonpoi . Ama dongun , upa hita chu achung thu aman kisei nante , ” ati lhone .
43009022	Judaho aginjeh lhona anule apan hiche hi asei lhon ahi ; ajeh chu Jesu hi Messiah ahi tia phongdoh pen pen Houthua kikhopna ina kona pamse ding tia Judahon dettah a kilolna aneisau ahi .
43009023	Hichejeh a chu anu le apan , “ Upa hita chu ama dongun , ” ati lhon ahi .
43009024	Anivei nan amahon masanga mitchopa chu akouvun ajah a , “ Pathen choi-atnan adih seiyin , hichepa vang hi michonse ahi , keihon kahei , ” atiuve .
43009025	Ama adonbut’in , “ Michonse ahi ahilou kahepoi ; masang chun kamit achon tun kho kamui , tibou kahei , ” ati .
43009026	Amahon ajah a , “ Aman i-nalom ? Namit te ni iti ahasah ham ? ” atiuleh ;
43009027	Aman amaho adonbut’in , “ Nakiseipeh tauva na-ngaipouvin , i-bol’a najah nom kit’u ham ? Ama seijuiya napan nom’uvem ? ” ati .
43009028	Hichun ama ahouseuvin , “ Nang chu ama seijui nahi Chula em , keiho Mose seijui kahiya chu .
43009029	Pathenin Mose henga thu asei kihea , hichepa hoilam kon ahibon kahepha lou , ’ atiuve .
43009030	Mipa chun adonbut’in ajahuva , “ Aman kamit te ni geiya hasah taa , hoilam kon ahi nahet louvu chu datmo aum lheh-e !
43009031	Pathenin michonse ho thu angaipon , amavang khattouvin houguttah a Pathen lungdei abol leh athu a-ngaipehjie , ti ihesoh keiyui .
43009032	Semtil’a pat koiman mi mitchoa peng mit ahasah-w , ti akija khapoi .
43009033	Hichepa hi Pathenna kon ahilouleh imacha bol theiponte , ’ ati .
43009034	Amahon adonbut’un , “ Napum changa chonsea peng nangin keiho neihil’um ? ” atiuvin , anoddoh tauve .
43009035	Hichepa chu anodoh-u ahen Jesun akimupi kit phat’in , “ Nangman Mihem Chapa chu natahsanem ? ” ati .
43009036	Aman adonbut’in , “ Pakai , katahsan thei ding ama chu koiham ? ” atileh ;
43009037	Jesun ajah a , “ Ama chu namutan , najah a thu seiya hi Ama ahi , ” atipeh-e .
43009038	Aman adonbut’in , “ Pakai katahsane , ” atin ; a-angsunga aboh khup’in chibai aboh tai .
43009039	Chuin Jesu , “ Khomu louhon kho amu a , khomu ho mit chotna dinga vannoiya thutana hung kahi , ” ati .
43009040	Asei hi avel’a um Pharisee hon ajauvin , “ Keiho mitcho kahilouvu hinai ? ” atiuleh ;
43009041	Jesun ajah-uva , “ mitcho hileu chun chonsetna nanei lou diu ahi , tun vang , ‘ Kho kamui , ’ natijeh-un nachonsetnau aum cheh-e , ” ati .
43010001	“ Kichentah a kaseipeh nahiuve , kot’a lut louva mundanga kal’a kelngoi hong sunga lut mi chu gucha le michom ahi .
43010002	Kot’a lut’a vang chu kelngoiho chingpa ahi .
43010003	Kotngahpan ama chu kot ahonpeh jin , akelngoite chu amin cheh a akouteng kelngoiten a-ogin aheuvin , abonchan apuidoh jin ahi .
43010004	Aboncha ahoidoh soh teng ama alamkaiyin , a-ogin ahet jeh-uvin kelngoiten anung ajuiyui .
43010005	Midang nung vang ajui louhel diu ahi , a-ogin ahet loujehuva akoma kona jamming jo diu ahibouve , ” ati .
43010006	Jesun hiche thulem hi miho aseipeh-in , ahinla ipi aseipeh-u chu amahon ahepouve .
43010007	Jesun asei kit’in , “ Kichentah a kaseipeh nahiuve , Keima kelngoite hongkot kahi .
43010008	Keima masanga hung jouse chu gucha le michom jeng ahiuvin , kelngoiten jong athuu a-ngaipouve .
43010009	Keima kot chu kahi ; Keiya hung lut chu huhhinga uma , lut le pot lea neh thei ham hing akimu ding ahi .
43010010	Gucha chu agu ding le athat ding chule asumang ding tilouvin ahung ngaipoi ; Kei vang hinna aneiyuva , bukim keiya aneina diuva hung kahibouve .
43010011	Keima kelngoi chingpha chu kahin , kelngoi chingpha chun kelngoite din ahinkho aphal ngam’e .
43010012	Thalah mi , kelngoi chingpa hilou , aneipa jong hilou mi nei chingpa chun ngei hung amu teng kelngoite dalhan ajamjitai ; chutah le ngeiyin kelngoi akimat’in athechehjitan ahi .
43010013	Thalah ahijeh chun kelngoite ding ima agel khoh poi .
43010014	Keima kelngoi chingpha chu kahin , kakelngoite kahen , amahon jong eiheuve .
43010015	hitobanga chu Pan keima eihet’a , kenjong Pa kahet ahin , chule kelngoite dinga chu kahinkho kaphal jeng ahi .
43010016	Hiche hong sunga pang lou kelngoi dang kanei nalaiye ; hicheng jong chu kahin puilut tei ding , amahon kaogin ahet’uva , kelngoi honkhat aching khat hidoh ding ahi .
43010017	“ Kahinkho hi kalah kit theina dinga kaphal doh jeng jehin Pan keima eingailui .
43010018	Khattouvin eilahpeh thei ahipon , kachamtah a kaphaldoh ahibouve . Phaldoh a chule kilah kit theina thu kaneiyin , hiche thupeh hi ka-Paa kona kalah ahi , ” ati .
43010019	Jesun thu chucheng aseijeh chun Judaho abung bungin akikhen lo kit tauve .
43010020	Alah-uva mi tampin , “ hichepa hi thilhavop le mi-ngol ahibouve ! I-bol’a asei na-ngaiyu ham ? ” atiuve .
43010021	Adangsen , “ Aseiho hi thilhavop thusei ahipoi ; thilhan mitcho ho mit ahasah ngaiyem ? ” atuve . 22 Phalbi ahitan , Jerusalema Houin thenso kut phat ahung lhungtai ;
43010022	Jesu chu Houina Solomon hongcha chun avah lei .
43010024	Hichun Judahon ahin umkimvel’un ajah a , “ Itih chan lung gima neilha got’u ham ? Messiah nahileh phongtah-in neiseipeh-un , ” atiuve .
43010025	Jesun amaho chu adonbut’in “ Nakiseipeh tauva neitahsan pove ; ka-Pa min a thil kabol ho hin Kei koi kahi ahettohsah ahin ,
43010026	nang ho kakelngoi lah a nahiloujeh-un natahsanpouve .
43010027	Kakelngoiten ka-ogin ajauvin , Kenjong amaho kahen , amahon eijuiyui
43010028	Ken amaho tonsot hina kapen , a-iti a mang thah lou diu , ka-khut’a kona koiman jong eilahpeh theilou ding ahi .
43010029	hicheho eipe ka-Pa chu ima jouse sanga chung nung jo ahin , Pa khut’a kona koiman alahmang thei louhel ding ahi ,
43010030	kapa le Kei khat kahi lhone , ” ati .
43010031	Chutah chun Judahon Jesu se na ding song akilo kittauve .
43010032	Jesun amaho chu adonbut’in , “ Pa thusah a konin natohpha tampi kavetsah tauvin , hiche kabol ho hoipen jeh a chu songa sedinga neigot’u ham ? ” atileh ;
43010033	Juda hon adonbut’in , “ Thilpha boljeh a seding kagot’u ahipon , mihem hiya Pathen nakihisah a Pathen nataitom jeh a kasegot’u ahibouve , ” atiuve .
43010034	Jesun amaho adonbut’in , “ Nadan lekhabu’va , “ Nang ho pathente nehiuve kati ahi , ’ tia kisun lou ham ?
43010035	Pathen thu lhunna mai maiho bon Pathente akitiu jouthei lou ahin ,
43010036	pan athensoa vannoiya ahinsol Keiman , ‘ Pathen kataitoma naseiyu ham ?
43010037	Keiman ka-Pa na katoh lou leh neitahsanda jengun ;
43010038	katoh vang leh Keima neitahsan hih jongleu chun Keisunga Pa apansat’a chule Keima Pa sunga kapansat hi nahet chet vang nadiuvin , na kitong chengse beh hi tansan’uvin , ” ati .
43010039	Hichun amahon mat din ago kit’un , Ama la akhut’uva konin atoldoh tai .
43010040	Jesu Jordan luigal lam , amasa Johnin mi baptize abolna muna chun achen , hia chun agathamtai .
43010041	Mi tampi ahenga ahungun , “ Johnin melchihna ima abol hih nan , ahin hichepa chung thudol’a John thusei jouse vang adih soh keiye , ” atiuve .
43010042	Chukoma chun mi tampin Jesu atahsantauve .
43011001	Mary le asopinu Martha chenna Bethany khoa amin Lazarus atiu chu adammoi .
43011002	Anapa chu , Pakai thao nua asama akeng thehgim nu , Mary sopipa Lazarus ahi .
43011003	Asopi numei ten in ahenga mi asol lhonin , “ Pakai , ven nalungset nagolpa asammoi , ” agatisah lhone .
43011004	Jesun hichu ajah phat’in , “ Hiche nat hi thina ding ahipoi , Pathen Chapa choisanga aumnadinga Pathen loupina ding ahi bouve , ” ati .
43011005	Jesun Martha le asopinu chule Lazarus chu alungset lheh-e .
43011006	Lazarus dammo thu ajah vangin aumnaa chun ni ni anichonbe nalaiyin ;
43011007	chujouvin aseijuite jah a , “ Judea gama gachekit tauhite , ” ati .
43011008	Seijuiten ajah a , “ Rabbi , tutah a Judah on songa sedia nahol’uva , hikoma chu nagache kit ding ham ? ” atiuve .
43011009	Jesun adonbut’in , “ Nikho khat sunga nidan som le ni um hilou ham ? Sun laiya vah le mi chun vannoiya khovah amujeh-in akisunpoi ;
43011010	jan laiya vah le mi vang amasanga khovah aum loujeh-in akisuijie , ” ati .
43011011	Hicheng hi aseiyin , hiche jouchun ajah-uva , “ Igolpau Lazarus chu a-ihmutai , ahin ama sukhanga che ding kahi , ” ati .
43011012	Seijuiten ajah a , “ Pakai aihmuttah le damtante , ” atiuve .
43011013	Jesun la athitai tia aseina ahin , amahon angaiya ihmut aseinan agel’uve .
43011014	Hichun Jesun ajahuva aseichanin , “ Lazarus , chu athia ahitai ;
43011015	natahsan theina diuva chukoma ka-umlou chu nang ho din kakipah-e , ahenga gacheu hite , ” ati .
43011016	Apengkop ahi , tia Thomas kitipan aseijui chanpi ho jah a , “ Eiho jong amatoh i-thi than a diuva gacheu hite , ” ati .
43011017	Jesu ahung leh Lazarus lhana alupsah nau chu ni li alhingtai ti aphotoh tai .
43011018	Bethany chu Jerusalem komcha , kilometer thum tobang ahi .
43011019	Asopipa lhon chung change lhamon dingin Juda hotampi Martha le Mary henga ahungui .
43011020	Jesu hung ajah phat’in Martha chu alamdot din achen , Mary vang in’a atouve .
43011021	Marthan Jesu jah a , “ Pakai , nangma hikoma um hile chun kasopipa thi lou dinga ,
43011022	tujengin jong ipi hileh Pathen henga nathum chan Pathenin peteiyin nete ti kahei , ” ati .
43011023	Jesun ajah a , “ Nasopipa thoudoh kit ding ahi , ” ati .
43011024	Marthan ajah a , “ Achai nikhoa thokitnaa athodoh ding chu kahenai , ” ati .
43011025	Jesun ajah a , “ Keima thokit na le hinna kahin , keima eitahsana chu thijongle hing ding ahi ;
43011026	chule mihing eitahsan chan a-itih a thilou hel ding ahitai ; hiche hi natahsan em ? ” ati .
43011027	Amanun , “ Henge Pakai , Nangma Pathen Chapa Messiah , vannoiya hunga chu nahi katahsane , ” ati .
43011028	Marthan hiche asei jou hin achen asopinu Mary guhthimin akouvin , “ Houhil chu hikoma aumin nakouve , ” agate .
43011029	Maryn ajah phat’in akipatdoh loiyin Jesu henga ahungtai .
43011030	Jesu chu khosung hung lut loulai , Marthan aga lamdotna muna chu um nalai ahi .
43011031	In’a Mary umpia lhamon Judah on ama kinloitah a achedoh chu amu’vin , lhanphunga gakap ding hinte , tin ajuitauve .
43011032	Mary chu Jesu umna ahung lhuna Ama amu phat’in akengbul’a aboh khup’in ajah’a , “ Pakai , nangma hikoma umle chun kasopipa thi lou didnga ! ” ati .
43011033	Jesun Mary lunghem amun , ahin lhonpi Juda ho ma alunghem cheh-u leh , adip alai adap jengin ahimsan ,
43011034	“ Hoiya navuiyum ? ” atileh ; amahon , “ Pakai , hungin hungven , ” atiuve .
43011035	Jesu akaptai .
43011036	Hichun Juda hon , “ Ven , iti alungset hitam ! ” atiuve .
43011037	Alah-uva phabep’in vang , “ Mitchopa mit te nibon hasah thei hichepan ama hi athida sah thei lou ham ? ” atiuvin ahi .
43011038	Jesu adip adap kit jengin , lhanpunga ahung le lhan chu songko ham khat ahin , akot chu song khat’in akisinge .
43011039	Jesun , “ Song khu tangdoh-un , ” atileh ; Mithipa sopinu Marthan ajah a , “ Pakai , ni li alhingtan uitante , ” ati .
43011040	Jesun ajah a , “ Natahsan le Pathen loupina namuding ahi , tia kaseipehsa hilou ham ? ” ati .
43011041	Hijeh chun song chu atangdoh tauve . Hichun avan dah-in , “ Panangin kataona nasanjeh-in kathangvah-e .
43011042	Kenvang kataona nangai jinge , ti kahenai , ahin hiche kavel’a ding mipi hin Nangma sol kahi atahsan theina diuva amaho khohsahna akasei ahi , ” ati .
43011043	Hiche hi aseiyin hatah-in asamin , “ Vo lazarus , hungdoh-in , ” ati .
43011044	Hichun mithipa chu akhut akeng kitoma , amai ultheh pon , a kijel pumin ahungdoh tai . Jesun ajah-uva , “ Lhamun lang chesah-un , ” ati .
43011045	mary henga hung Juda ho tampin Jesu thilbol chu amu’vin Ama atahsanlo tauve .
43011046	alah-uva kimkhat vang acheuvin Jesu thilbol chu Pharisee hojeh a agaseitauve .
43011047	Hijeh chun Thempu pipu ho le Pharisee hon Houvaipoloi kikhopna khat asomun , “ Hichepa hin melchihna tampi abol’e , ipi i-bol diu ham ?
43011048	Hitin ama khu amoh lhaleu hen mi jousen tahsanin tin , Rome mite hungkona imunpiu le ijat’u asumang diu ahi , ” tin aseiyui .
43011049	Alah-uva chuche kuma Thempu chungnunga pang Caiaphas kiti pan ajah-uva , “ Imacha nahepouve ;
43011050	vaipi amanthah louna dinga khat thi chu nang ho dinga thilphajo ahi , tijong nagel hih hel’uve , ” ati .
43011051	hiche hi ama chama asei ahipon , chuche kuma Thempu chungnunga pang ahijeh a vaipi khel’a jesu thi ding thu gaomasa ahi ;
43011052	vaipi keo ding jong hilouva akithechehsa Pathen chate pum khat’a akhop tupna ding jong ahiye .
43011053	Hiche nikhoa pat chun Jesu tha nadin Judate akiloltauve .
43011054	Hijeh chun Jesu jong Juda ho lah a lhangphongin avahle tapon , chua konin gamthip lam naiya gambih sunga Ephriam kiti khopia chun achen , hikoma chun seijuite toh aum jing tauve .
43011055	Juda ho kalchuh kut anai phat’in agam gama konin mi tampi kalchuh kut masanga kisutheng din Jerusalema achetauvui .
43011056	amahon Jesu ahol’un , Houina adinguvin amaho akihouvun , “ Ipi nagel’um ? Ama chu Kut a hung lha louhel ding ham ? ” akitiuve .
43011057	Thempu pipu ho le Pharisee hon Amachu amat theina diuva , aumna hepen penin ajah-uva seipeh dinga thu apeh-u ahitai .
43012001	Kalchuh kut ding nigupp aum nalaiyin Jesun thinaa kona akaithou Lazarus chenna kho Bethanya chun Jesu ahungtai .
43012002	Hikoma chun Jesu din anneh asemun , Martha ajen leuvin apangin , ankong umho lah a Lazarus jong apange .
43012003	Maryn halpi beihel nard a kisem thao namtui man tamtah kilogram keh ahin domin Jesu kengphang tenia anun asamin akengphang teni atheh ngim’e ; thao namtui gimnam chun insung achansoh jengin ahi .
43012004	Jesu seijuiho lah akhat , ama matsah a pang dingpa Judas Iscariot chun ,
43012005	“ I-bol’a hiche thao namtui hi denarii jathun man’a kijoh a vaichate kipelou ham ? ” ati .
43012006	Hiche asei hi vaichate khohsahna asei ahipon , sumdip ma avop le asunga kikoi chu akiguhji jeh ahi .
43012007	Jesun , “ Hiche nu hi limsah dauvin , kakivui nikhoa din amanun kikoi nante ;
43012008	ijeh-inem itile vaichate chu nang ho toh umkhom jing ahin , Keivang a-itih a nang ho toh umkhom lou ding kahi , ” ati .
43012009	Juda ho tampin chukoma Jesu um aheuvin , Jesu keoseh hilouvin thinaa kona athodoh Lazarus jong vetnomin ahunguve .
43012010	thempu pipu ho chu Lazarus jong tha din akilol tauve ,
43012011	ajeh chu Lazarus jeh a Juda ho tampin alamkaiteu adalhah-uva Jesu atansanlo’u ahi .
43012012	Ajing nikhon Kut’a dia hung mi tamtah-in Jesu Jerusalema hung aajauvin ,
43012013	Iusuna akidop’un alamto din achauvin ; “ Huhhing hen ! Pakai min a hungpa Israel lengpa chu anun nome , ” tin asam sam jenguve .
43012014	Jesun sa-ngan khat amun achunga atouvin , Pathen lekhabua kisun ,
43012015	“ Kicha hih-in Zion chanu , Ven , nalengpa sa-ngan nou chunga touvin ahunge , ” kitibangin abol’in ahi .
43012016	Hiche hi amasan aseijuiten ahepouvin , Jesu choi-at’a aum phat chun Ama thudol’a kisunsa hi chengse abol’u ageldoh tauve .
43012017	Jesun lhana kona Lazarus akouva thina kona athodoh pet’a aumpi mipi chu athu hettohsah-in apangtauvin ahi .
43012018	Hiche melchihna abol ajah jeh-uva jong chu mipin aga lamtou ahi .
43012019	Pharisee ho khat le khat akihouvun , “ Veuvin ima nalo thei louvu ahitai ! atiuve .
43012020	Kut laia Pathen hou dinga Jerusalema hung lah a chun Greek mi phabep jong apangui ;
43012021	amaho hi Galilee gama Bethsaida khoa hungkon Philip henga acheuvin adongun , “ Pu , keihon Jesu kamu nom’ui , ” atiuve .
43012022	Philip achen Andrew jah a aseiyin , Andrew le Philip ahung lhonin Jesu jah a asei lhontai .
43012023	Jesun amani adonbut’in , “ Mihem Chapa choi-at’a aumna ding nidan ahung lhungtai .
43012024	Kichentah a kaseipeh nahiuve , chang hum khat tol’a alhah a athi lou le chang khat chun aum jingin , athivangleh tampi ahinsep doh jin ahi .
43012025	Ahinkho it chan chun asumang lon , hiche vannoiya ahinkho hotbol vang chun tonsot’a hinkho anei ding ahi .
43012026	Kakin bolnom chun eijui hen , Keima umnaa chu kalhacha jong um ding ahi ; koi hile Keima kinbol’a pang chu Pan apachat ding ahi .
43012027	“ Tun kalung agimtai . Ipi kasei ding ham ? Pa , hiche nidan akon hin neihuhdoh-in ong ? Ahin la hiche ding hi hiche nidan a hung lut kahi .
43012028	Pa , naming , choianin , ” ati . Hichun vana kona ogin khat’in , “ Kachoi-an’e , kachoi-at kit ding ahi , ” ahinti .
43012029	Akimvel’a ding mipin hichu ajauvin , “ Van aginge ” atiuve . Adang hon , “ Vantil’in aki houpi ahibouve , ” atiuvin ahi .
43012030	Jesun adonbut’in , “ hiche ogin hi Keima ding ahipon , nang ho ding joh a hung ging ahi .
43012031	Hiche vannoi hi tua athu kitan ahitan , vannoiya vaihompa chu tua kidelmang ding ahitai .
43012032	Leiset’a eikitah sang teng mitin kahenga kaloikhom ding ahi , ” ati .
43012033	Jesun hiche hi itobanga athi ding dol aseina ahi .
43012034	Hijeh chun mipin adonbut’un , ‘ Keihon la Messiah chu tonsot’a um jing ahi , ti danthua kisei kajauvin , i-atileh nangin Mihem Chapa chu kikhaisang ding ahi nati ham ? Hiche Mihem Chapa chu koiba ham ? ” atiuleh ;
43012035	Jesun ajah-uva , “ Phat chom khat nalah-uva khovah um nalai ding ahi , muthimin najin den louna diuvin , khovah umpet’in vah leuvin ; muthima vah le min che na ding akihetpoi .
43012036	Khovah nanei pet’un khovah chate nahi theina diuvin , khovah chu tahsan’un , ” ati . Jesun hicheng hi aseiyin apotdohin amahoa konin akiseldoh tai .
43012037	amasang tah-uva melchihna chujat abol vangin atahsan deh pouve ;
43012038	hiche hi Isaiah themgao seisa : “ Pakai keiho thujah tahsan’a koi hiya , Koipen henga Pakai ban thahat kiphongdoh em ? ” ati chu guilhun na dinga chute ahi .
43012039	Hijeh chun amahon atahsan theipouve ; ajeh chu Isaiah themgaovin asei kitnaa chun ;
43012040	“ Pathenin amit’u asuchon , Alungthimu amohsah tai ; amu’uva alungthima ahetkhen diu , Hung kile kit’uva kadamsah ding ahi , ” ati .
43012041	Isaiah chun hiche asei hi Jesu loupina amujeh a Ama thu dol’a asei ahi .
43012042	Achuti vangin vaipoloi lah a jong mi tampin Jesu atahsantauve ; amabou Pharisee hon Houthua kikhopna in’a eikaidoh khauvinte , tin atahsanu chu aphongdoh
43012043	Ijeh-inem itile amahon Pathen pachat sangin mihem choi-at addeijo’uve .
43012044	Jesun hatah-in asamin , “ Keima eitahsana chun Keibou eitahsan ahipon , Eihinsolpa geiya atahsantha ahi ;
43012045	Keima eimua chun Eihinsolpa jong amu ahi .
43012046	Keima khovah kahin , eitahsana chu muthima aumden louna dinga vannoiya hung kahi .
43012047	Mi khattouvin kaseiho hi ja naa anit lou jongleh achung thu katanpoi ; ajeh chu vannoi thutana hung kahipon vannoi huhhinga hungjoh kahibouve .
43012048	Koi hile eidei louva kaseiho jong sang lou chun athutan ding anei nai ; kasei hi phat kichai nikhoa athutana pang ding ahi !
43012049	Ijeh-inem itile Keiman kachama kasei ahipon , Eihinsol’a Pa ama tah-in ipi iti kasei ding ham ti thu eipeh ahibouve .
43012050	Ama thupeh chu tonsot hinna ahi kahei . Hijeh a chu kasei hi Pan eiseipeh banga kasei ahi , ” ati .
43013001	Kalchuh kut masangin Jesun vannoia kona Pa henga ache na ding phat ahung lhun ahen , vannoiya um amite chu alungset’in akhon ni geiyin angailui .
43013002	Jan an aneh laitah-un Diabol chun Simon chapa Iscariot Judas lungthima Jesu matsahna ding akhumtan ,
43013003	Jesun ijakai Pan akhut’a apehdoh a , Pathena kona hung ahiya Pathen henga kilekit ding ahi ahen ;
43013004	ajan ankonga konin akipatdoh-in , aponsil len ahoh lhan tinot ponin kong akigahtai .
43013005	Chuin kisilna konga twi alheiyin , seijuite keng asilpeh-in , konga akivei tinot pon chun atheh pantai .
43013006	Simon Peter kom ahin phai . Peter chun ajah a , “ Pakai , nangin kakeng neisilpeh ding ong ? ” atileh ;
43013007	Jesun adonbut’in , “ Tupet tah-in kabol hi ipi ahi nahepoi , ajo teng henan nate , “ a ti .
43013008	Peterin ajah , “ Nangin a-itih a jong kakeng nasil louhel ding ahi , ” ati . Jesun adonbut’in , “ Nangma kasil louleh Keiya nangin chan naneipoi , ” atipeh-e .
43013009	Simon Peterin ajah a , “ Pakai , kakeng te ni keo hilouvin kakhut te ni le kalu jong’e , ” ati .
43013010	Jesun ajah a , “ Akisil’a chu akeng tilou adang angaipoi , ajeh chu apumpin a-ngim nai ; nang ho nangim nauve , nabonchau vang ahi poi , ” ati .
43013011	Ijeh-inem itile aman apedoh dingpa chu ahetsa ahin , hijeh a chu , “ Nabonchauvin vang na-ngimpouve , ” ati ahi .
43013012	Jesun akengu asil jou phat’in aponsil len akilah-in , atou kit’in chuin ajah-uva , “ Ipi kabolpeh-u nahet nah um ?
43013013	Nang hon , ‘ Houhil , ’ le ‘ Pakai , ’ neitiuvin , naseiyu hi apha lheh-e , ajeh chu kahinai .
43013014	Achutile Keima ‘ Pakai ’ le ‘ Houhil ’ pan bon nakengu kasilpeh leh nang ho khat’in khat keng nakisilpeh to diu ahi .
43013015	Ijeh-inem itile Ken nang ho kabol banga nang hon jong nabolna dinguva kalampat peh nahiuve .
43013016	Kichen tah a kaseipeh nahiuve , soh chu apu sangin achungnungjo pon , asol’a sangin solchah achungnungjo poi .
43013017	hiche hi nahetdoh-uva natoh molsou leh anun nom anhiuve .
43013018	Nabonchauva thudol’a kasei ahipoi ; Keiman kalhendohsa chu kahenai ; ahinla Pathen lekhabun , ‘ Kachanlhah ne pan kachunga akengto alamtai , ’ ati chu guilhung jo hen , ” ati .
43013019	Ahung guilhun teng leh Kei hi Ama chu kahi nahet’uva natahsan theina diuva ahung lhun masang tupet pet’a kaseipeh nahiuve .
43013020	Kichentah a kaseipeh nahiuve , kamisol sanga chun Keima eisan ahin , Keima eisanga chun Eihinsol pa asan ahi , ” ati .
43013021	Hicheng hi aseiyin Jesu alung agim behseh-in ahettohsahin , “ Kichentah a akseipeh nahiuve , nalah-uva khat eipehdoh a pang ding ahi , ” ati .
43013022	Seijuite chu khat le khat akivetouvin , koipen asei ham ti adetmo lheh jengui .
43013023	Aseijuiho lah a Jesun a-ngailutpa chu Jesu jetlama atouve .
43013024	Simon Peterin ama chu koipen aseina ham aseipeh diuva adoh din agah khasuh-e .
43013025	Ama jong Jesu chunga aki ngai bang bangin akinung ngaiyin ajah-a , “ Pakai kon namatsah ding ham ? ” ati .
43013026	Jesun adonbut’in , “ hiche changlhah hi lhenga kadekot’a kapeh penpa chu ahi , ” atin ; chang lhah hal asekot’in , a ; alahdoh phat chun Simon chapa Judas Iscariot apetai .
43013027	Hiche aneh neh chun asunga Satan alut’in , Jesun jong ajah a , “ Nabol ding chu ipiham bol loiyin , ” ati .
43013028	I-bol’a Jesun amapa jah a hiche hi aseiham ti ankonga touho khat chan jong ahepoi .
43013029	Kim khat’in Judas chun sumdip avop jeh a Jesun kut’a manchah ding khat tou choa asol ham , ahiloule vaicha genthei thil pea asol danin agel’uve .
43013030	Judas chun changlhah hal akilah-in apotdoh paitan , ahinla jan ahi .
43013031	Judas chedoh phat’in Jesun , “ Tun Mihem Chapa choi-at’in aumtan , Ama jeh-in Pathen jong choi-at’in aume .
43013032	Ama jeh a Pathen choi-at’a aumleh , Pathenin jong Ama achoi-at ding , apettah a choi-at ding ahi .
43013033	Chate , phat chomcha bou kaumpi ding nahitauve , nang hon neihol diu , ahinla Juda ho jah a , ‘ Kei che naa nang ho nahung thei lou diu , ’ kati banga , tupet tah ajong kaseipeh nahiuve .
43013034	Nang ho khat le khat naki-ngailutto na diuva thupeh thah kapeh nahiuve , khat le khat naki-ngailutto chehna diuva Keiman nang ho kangailut nahiuve .
43013035	Khat le khat naki-ngailutto cheh-u leh kaseijui nahiu mijousen ahet ding ahi , ” ati .
43013036	Simon Peterin ajah a ” Pakai hoiya nache ding ham ? ” atileh ; Jesun adonbut’in , “ Hoiya che jong leng tun nangin neijui theipon nate , khonung teng neijui nan nate , ” ati .
43013037	Jesun adonbut’in , “ keijlal’a nahinkho naphal ngam ong ? Kichentah a kaseipeh nahi , thumvei neiseilep masanga ah khong lou ding ahi , ” ati .
43014001	“ Nang ho lungkham hih-un , Pathen tahsanun , keijong neitahsanun .
43014002	Ka-Pa in’a chena mun tampi a-ong’e , umlou hileh seipeh pouvinge .
43014003	Nang ho ding mun kagon jouteng hung kit ing ting keima umna naum thei diuva kahenga dinga kahung pui ding nahiuve .
43014004	Nang hon kachena didng lampi nahenauve , ” ati .
43014005	thomas chun ajah a , “ Pakai , nache na ding bon kihe louva alampi iti kahet diu ham ? ” ati .
43014006	Jesun ajah a , “ Keima hi Lampi le Atah chunle Hinna chu kahi , Keiya kona chelou chu koima Pa kom alhung theipoi .
43014007	Keima neihe leu chun ka-Pa jong nahet diu ahin , tukal’in vang Ama chu namutauvin hejong nahetauve , ” ati .
43014008	Philip’in ajah a , “ Pakai , Pa chu neimusah-un , chutileh kalungnau chim ding ahi , ” ati .
43014009	Jesun ajah a , “ Vo Philip , hitih chan nang ho ki-umpia neihet loulai ham ? Keima eimua chun Pa chu amu ahitai ; iti nangin , ‘ Pa neimusah-un , nati ham ?
43014010	Keima Pa sunga ka-uma , kei sunga Pa aum hi natahsan lou ham ? Ken najah-uva kasei hi kachamtah a kasei ahipoi , kasunga cheng pa chun atoh ding dol kin abol ahibouve .
43014011	Keima Pa sunga ka-uma Pa kei sunga aum hi tahsan’un ; ahilou jongleh na kitong chengse jeh beh hin tahsan’un .
43014012	Kichentah a kaseipeh nahiuve , Keima eitahsan chun katoh chengse hi atoj thei ding , Pa henga kache ding jeh hin eitahsana chun hisanga lenjo jong abol thei ding ahi ;
43014013	Pa chu Chapa jal’a choi-at’a aum theina dinga kamin a nathum chan’u chu kabolpeh ding nahiuve .
43014014	Ipi hijongle Keima min a nathum chan’u kabolpeh ding nahiuve .
43014015	“ Nei-ngailut’u leh kathupeh chengse nanit diu ,
43014016	Keiman Pa henga kathuma Aman naumpi jing diu Kithopi khat nahinpeh diu ahi ,
43014017	hichu kicheh tah lhagao , vannoiyin sang thei lou , mu jong mukha lou ahi . Nang hon ama naheuvin , aman na umpiuvin nasunguva acheng’e .
43014018	“ Nang ho dalhan chaga bangin koi pouvinge , nahenguva kahung kit didng ahi .
43014019	Chom khat jouteng vannoiyin eimu diu ahinai . Ajeh chu Keima kahingin nang jong nahin diu ahiye .
43014020	Hiche nikhoa chu Keima Pa sungankachen chule nang ho Kei sunga nachen’uva , nang ho sunga Kei kachen nahetdoh diu ahi .
43014021	Kathupeh chengse neiya nit’a chun eingailut ahi , eingailua chu ka-Pa ngailut’a chenga Kenjong ama ka-ngailut’a ahenga kakiphondoh didng ahi , ” ati .
43014022	Iscariot hilou Judas chun ajah a , “ Pakai , iti keiho henga nakiphon’a vannoi mite henga nakiphondoh lou ding ham ? ” atileh ;
43014023	Jesun adonbut’in ajah a , “ Mi eingailua chun kathusei anit ding , ka-pan ama angailut’a ahenga kahunguva kachenpi dingu ahi .
43014024	Eingailu lou vangin kathuseiho anitpon ; nathujah-u hi Keikeo thu ahipon , Eihinsol’a Pa thu ahibouve .
43014025	“ Nalah-uva ka-umpet’a hi cheng hi kaseipeh nahiuve ;
43014026	amavang Pan keima mina ahinsol got Kithopi lhagao Theng chun kaseipeh chengseu hi aboncha nageldoh kitna diuva ijakai nahilsoh kei dingu ahinai .
43014027	keima chamna mong kapehuva , chamna kadalhah peh nahiuve ; kapeh-uhi vannoi mi peh tobang ahipoi ; nalungu donsah hih-un , kijong kicha dauvin .
43014028	Dalha jong leng nahenguva kahung kit ding ahi , ’ tia najah-uva kaseipeh chu najatauve . Pa chu Keisanga chung nung jo ahijeh-in , neingailut mongu leh Pahenga kache hi nakipa thanoppi diu ahi .
43014029	Hichengse hi ahung guilhun teng natahsan theina diuva aso masanga tua kasiepeh masah dem nahiuive .
