43014030	Najah-uva tampi sei taponge , ajeh chu vannoi vaihompa ahunge ; ahinla aman kachunga ima tha aneipoi ;
43014031	hijongleh Keiman Pa ka-ngailut jeh a eithupeh chan kabolji hi vannoiyin ahet tei ding ahi .
43015001	“ Keima lengpigui tahbeh kahin , ka-Pa aleilhou ahi .
43015002	Aman Keiya keh abah galou chengse vang chu ahaga chehna din amal ngimjin ahi .
43015003	Najha-uva kathusei chengse jeh a nang ho a-ngimsa nahitauve .
43015004	Kasunga cheng jingun , keijong nasunguva cheng jing inge . Lengpibah achanga aga thei lou banga , keisunga nachen louvu leh nang ho jong napun thei lou diu ahi .
43015005	Keima lengpigui kahin , nang ho abahho nahiuve . Ama sunga kacheng banga keisunga cheng mi chu apung lheh jie ; ajeh chu kei louvin nang hon ima nabol theipouve .
43015006	Mi keisunga cheng lou chu thingbah kiheh lhaa kipaidoh agopji bangin akipaidohji ; abah gopsa chengse chu akichom khomjin meiya akileh lut’in akavamjitai .
43015007	Keisunga nachen’uva , kasei chengse hi nasunguva achenleh nagot chan thumun kibolpeh ding nahiuve .
43015008	Kaseijui kicheh nahiuva hapun’a napun’u leh ka-Pa choiat’a umah ahi .
43015009	Ka-Pan eingailut banga kenjong ka-ngailut nahiuve ; ka-ngailut sunga cheng jingun .
43015010	Ka-pa thupeh chengse kanit’a a-ngailut’a kachen jing bang hin kathupeh chengse nit leu chun ka-ngait’a nachen diu ahi .
43015011	Nanguva kakipana achen jinga apilhinsetna dia hiche hi najah-uva kasei ahi .
43015012	Kathupeh chu ken ka-ngailut banguva nang ho khat le khat naki-ngailutto cheh diu hi ahi .
43015013	Agol apaite dinga ahinkho phaldoh sanga lenjo ngailutna koiman aneipoi .
43015014	thu kapeh cheng seu hi nabol’u leh kagol kapai nahiuve .
43015015	Soh kati louding nahitauve , ijeh-inem itile soh chun apu thilbol ahepoi , gol le paite katijoh ding nahiuve , ajeh chu Paa kona kajah chengse ijakai kahetsah soh keiyu ahi .
43015016	Nang hon neilhenu ahipon , nacheuva napunbe na diu leh , apungdoh chengse alhou theiya kamin’a nathum chan’u Pan napeh theina diuva keiman kalhen’a kapansah nahibouvui .
43015017	Nang ho khat le khat naki-ngailutto chehna diuva thu hicheng hi kapeh nahiuve .
43015018	“ Vannoiyin nahot’u leh , nang ho nahot masanguva Keima eihot masahsau ahi heuvin ,
43015019	vannoiya hileu chun vannoiyin amite alungset dingdol ahin , Keiman kalhendohsa , vannoiya nahilou phat’uva vannoiyin nahot’u ahiye .
43015020	Najahuva , ‘ Soh apu sangin achungnungjopoi , ’ kati chu geldoh jingun . Mihon Kei eibolset’u leh nang ho jong nabolset tei diu ahi , kathu nit leu nang ho thujong anit diu ahi .
43015021	Eihonsol Pa ahet loujeh-uva Keima min jal’a hicheng hi nachunguva abol diu ahi .
43015022	Hunga ajah-uva kaseipeh lou hileh themmona aneilou diu ahin , tunvang achonset’u paomea akilepna diu aumtapoi .
43015023	Keima eihoa chun ka Pa jong ahoi .
43015024	Alah-uva koima bol khah lou thil kabol lou hileh themmona anei lou diu ahin , tunvang kanatoh chengse amu nasauva Kei le ka-Pa eihot thau ahitai .
43015025	Ahinla adanthu bu’uva , ‘ Ajeh beiyin eiho’uva , ’ tia kisun chu guilhung tei ding ahi .
43015026	“ Paa hung kon Lhagao theng , Keiman Paa kona kahinsol ding Kithopi chu ahung teng leh kachung chang thudol ahettohsah ding ,
43015027	akipat til’a pat neikivop piu ahijeh a nang ho jong kathu hettohsah a napan diu ahi .
43016001	“ Nakipal lhuh louna diuva hicheng hi kaseipeh nahiuve .
43016002	Houthua kakhopna in’a nakaidoh diu , nathat’uva pangpa chu Pathen natong’a aki-ngaito phat hung lhung ding ahi .
43016003	Pa le Kei eihet loujeh-uva amahon hicheng hi ahinbol diu ahi .
43016004	Hicheng so na ding phat hi ahung lhun teng athudol’u kahilchah masahsau nageldoh theina diuva najah-uva thil hi chenghi kaseipeh nahiuve . “ Kaumpi jing jeh-uva atil’a thil hicheng hi kanaseipeh lou nahiuve .
43016005	Tua vang Eihinsolpa henga che ding kahitan , koiiman , ‘ Hoiya che didng nahim ? ’ tia dong’a jong naumpouve ;
43016006	amavang hicheng kaseipeh jeh-uva hi lunghem gam nahitauve .
43016007	Koi hileh atah kaseipeh nahiuve ; nang ho phat chomna dia Keima che mang ding kahi ; kache louva ahileh Kithopi chu nahenguva hung lou ding , kachea ama chu kahinsolpeh ding nahiuve .
43016008	Kithopi chu ahung teng vannoi mite hi chonset thudol , adih thudol chule thutan thudol ahettohsah ding ;
43016009	chonset thudol chu keima eitahsan lou thu’u ahin ,
43016010	adih thudol ahileh Pa henga kachea nang hon neimu lou diu thu ahin ,
43016011	thutah thudol chu hiche vannoi vaihompa thu kitan hi ahi .
43016012	Najah-uva sei ding tampi kaneiyin , ahinla nang hon tuta din nadol joupouve ;
43016013	ahin atahbeh lhagao chu ahung teng , ama cham chama thu seilouva , ajah cha cha asei ding , kitahna lampi jenga napui hoiyuva , ahung lhung ding thil ho geiya naseipeh diu ahi .
43016014	Aman Keiya chu alah a nahenguva aphondoh ding jeh chun Keima eichoi-at ding ahi .
43016015	Pa nei changse chu Keiya jong ahijeh a Keiya chu alah a nahenguva aphondoh ding ahi kati ahiye .
43016016	“ Chom khat jou teng neimu lou diu ahin , chom khat jou teng vang le neimu kit diu ahinai , ” ati .
43016017	Aseijuite lah a mi phebep , khat le khat akihouvun , “ Aman , ‘ Chom khat jou teng vang le neimu kit diu ahinai , ijeh-inem itile keima Pa henga che ding kahi , ’ ati hi ipi aseina ham ? ” akitiuve .
43016018	Hijeh chun amahon , “ Aman , ‘ Chom khat jou , ’ ati hi ipi aseina ham ? Ipi aseina ham ihepouve , ” akitiuve .
43016019	Adoh nomu hi Jesun ajah-uva , “ Nang ho le nang ho ipi kidongto nahiuva , ‘ Chom khat jou teng neimu lou diu ahin , chom khat jou teng vang le neimu kit diu ahinai , ’ kati chu
43016020	Kichentah a kaseipeh nahiuve , nang ho nakauva namao diu , vannoi mite vang kipah diu ahi ; lunghem jong leu chun nalunghem chu kipana soh ding ahinai .
43016021	Numei naosoh ding khu aso phat alhin teng athoh gim lheh jin , nao aso lhah teng vang leh vannoiya mihem khat penlhah jeh a kipa jal’in athot gimna chengse chu asumiljitai .
43016022	Tun nang ho jong nalunghem’un , ahinla keiman kahung vilkit diu ahinai , chutengle nalungthimu kipah a , nakipanau chu koiman nalahpeh thei lou diu ahi .
43016023	Hiche nikhoa chu nang hon ima neidoh lou dingu ahitai . Kichentah a kaseipeh nahiuve , ipi hijongle keima min pan’a Pa henga nathum chan’u napeh diu ahi .
43016024	Tugeiyin kaminin ima nathum hih laiyui ; nakipanau achamkimsohna din thumun namu diu ahi .
43016025	“ Najah-uva hicheng hi alem’a kasei ahin , Pa thudol chu alem hilouva kichentah a kaseipehna diu phat khat hung lhung ding ahi .
43016026	Nang ho thalhengin Pa henga taopeh nauvinge kati ahipoi , hiche nikhoa chu Kei min pan’a natao diu ahi ;
43016027	ijeh-inem itile Keima neideiyuva Pathena hungkon kahi natahsan jeh-un Pa amatahin nadeiyu ahi .
43016028	Keima Paa hung kon vannoiya hung lut kahin , vannoi kadalhan a Pa henga che kit ding kahi , ” ati .
43016029	Chutah-in aseijuiten , “ Vent un nangman alem’a thu seilouvin phongtah-in naseidoh tai .
43016030	Tun kahetauve Nangin ijakai nahen , koiman ima nadoh ding angaipoi , hichea hin Pathena hungkon nahi katahsantauve , ” atiuve .
43016031	Jesun amaho chu adonbut’in , “ Tubep’a natahsan’um
43016032	Ven , nang ho nakithecheh-uva , na-inlam cheh nakijot’uva kachangseh a neidalhahna diu phat chu hung lhung ahitai ; hijongleh Pa chun ei umpi jing jeh-in kachangseh kahi dehpoi .
43016033	Keima sunga nachen’uva chamna nanei theina diuva hicheng hi najah-uva kasei ahi ; vannoiyah gim genthei nathohui ; amavang hangtah-in pangun Keiman vannoi kajoutai , ” ati .
43017001	Jesun hicheng hi aseijouvin akhodah-in vanlam aven , “ Pa , phat chu ahung lhungtai ; Chapan nachoi-at theina din na Chapa choi-anin ;
43017002	Ama napeh chengse chu tonsot hinna apeh theina dia Nangin Ama chu tahsan hing mihem jouse chunga thu neina napeh ahi .
43017003	Pathen tah khatseh Nang le nahinsol Jesu Christa ahet diu hitonsot hinna ahi .
43017004	Leiset chunga toh ding neipeh chengse kachoisoh-in Nangma kachoian tai .
43017005	Pa , tun Nangin vannoi umdoh masanga ineisa Nangma loupina mong mongin neichoianin .
43017006	“ Vannoiya kona neipeh miho henga naming kaphongdohtai . Nangman neipeh amaho hi nang mi ahiuvin , amahon nathu anit tauve .
43017007	Tunvang , Nangman neipeh thil chengse hi Nanga hungkon ahi ahetauve ;
43017008	ijeh-inem itile neithupeh chengse amaho kapen , amahon hicheng chu akisanun , Nanga hungkon kahi kichen tah-in aheuvin , Nangmannei sol ahi atahsantauve .
43017009	“ Nangman neipeh ho hi namite ahijeh-uva amaho dia tao kahin , vannoi dinga tao kahipoi ;
43017010	Keiya chengse Nanga ahin , Nanga chengse jong Keiya ahi ; hijeh chun hiteho jal hin choi-at’in ka-ume .
43017011	Keima nahenga hunga vannoiya umlou ding kahitan , amaho vang vannoiya um nala ahiuve . Pa Theng , eini tobanga amaho pumkhat ahi theina diuvin neipeh naming chun amaho hi hongin .
43017012	Amaho ka-umpilaiyin neipeh naminin amaho kahongin , ka-ngah tup’in , Pathen lekhabu thu gui lhunna dia amang thah dia pengpa tilou , alah-uva khatcha amangthah poi .
43017013	Tua vang nahenga hung ding kahitan , asunguva kakipana anei chamkim soh theina diuva leiset’a hicheng hi kasei ahiye .
43017014	Amaho hi nathu kapeh leh vannoiyin ahotauve ; ajeh chu Keima vannoiya kahilou banga amaho jong vannoiya ahitapouve .
43017015	Amaho hi vannoiya kona nalahdohna dia tao kahipoi . Agiloupaa konin hongbit’in katijoh ahibouve .
43017016	Keima vannoiya kahi lou banga amaho jong vannoiya ahi pouve .
43017017	Atah chun amaho hi suthengin ; nathu hi atah chu ahi .
43017018	Nangin vannoiya neisol banga amaho hi vannoiya kasol ahin ;
43017019	amaho jong atah a chu akiphal theng theina diuva amaho jal’a keijong kiphal theng kahi .
43017020	“ Hite ho keo dia tao kahipoi , amaho thuseiya kona eitahsan ho didnga jong ,
43017021	Pa , nang Kei sunga nachen’a , Nang sunga keima kachen banga amaho jong eini sunga achen’uva , vnnoiyin nang sol kahi atahsan theina din abonchauvin pumkhat hileu kati ahi .
43017022	Eini pumkhat ihi banga amaho jong pumkhat ahina diuvin Nang man neipeh loupina chu aamaho kapetai ;
43017023	Nangin nei-ngailut banga amaho ka-ngailut jeh a Keima neisol hi vannoiyin ahetdoh a , chu le chamkimdel’a amaho pumkhat ahi theina dinga asunguva kachen’a Keima sunga Nang cheng nahi .
43017024	“ Pa , vannoi kisemdoh masanga jong nei-ngailut jeh a neipehsa hiche kaloupina chu Nangin neipeh mite hin amu theina diuvin Kei umnaa chun amahojong umleu kaseiye .
43017025	Vo Pa dih tah , vannoiyin nahet lou vangin Keiman Nang kahen , Nang sol kahi hite ho hinahetauve .
43017026	Nangin nei-ngailutna hiche ngailut chu asunguva achen’a , Keijong asunguva kachen theina din amaho hi naming kahetsah tan , kahetsah jing ding ahi ” ati .
43018001	Hicheng hi asei jouvin Jesu aseijuite toh alhondoh-in , Kidron hohlam gal’a honk hat um na-a chun Ama le aseijuite aluttauve .
43018002	Hia chu Jesun aseijuite akikhoppi jing ahijeh-in amun chu ama mat sah a pang Judas jong chun ahei .
43018003	Hijeh chun Judas chun Thempu pipu ho le Pharisee hoa kona hung sepia loi khat le Houin ngah sepia ho chu ahinpuiyin , thaomei le mei sel den , manchah choiyin hikoma chun ahungtai .
43018004	Jesun achunga hung lhung ijakai ahesoh keiyin ahung potdoh-in ajah-uva , “ Koi nahol’u ham ? ” atileh ;
43018005	Amahon adonbut’un , “ Nazareth Jesu chu , ” atiuve , Ama ajah-uva , “ Kei ama kahi , ” ati . Ama matsah a pang Judas chu amaho toh dingkhom ahi .
43018006	Jesun ajah-uva , “ Kei Ama kahi , ” atitah chun amaho anung chon’un tol’a alhu mat jengui .
43018007	Jesun adong kit’in , “ Koiba nahol’u ham ? ” atileh ; amahon , “ Nazareth Jesu chu , ” atiuve . ahileh hite ho hi lhadoh jengtau , ” atin ;
43018009	hiche thu asei chu , “ Nangman neipeh chengse lah a khat cha kamansahpoi , ” kiti chu guilhunma dinga asei ahi .
43018010	Simon Peterin chemjam khat anei chu asatdoh-in Thempu chung nung sohpa asat jeng leh abilkol jetlam asat lhai ; sohpa min chu Malchus ahi .
43018011	Jesun Peter jah a , “ chemjam chu apaiya khum jengin , Pan eipeh khon chu kadontei ding hilou ham ? ” ati .
43018012	Sepai loi le alamkaipau , Judate Houin ngah sepai hon Jesu chu aman’un , akan’uvin ,
43018013	chuche kuma thempu chungnunga pang Caiaphas nupapa Annas henga akai lut masauve .
43018014	Mipi dinga mikhat thi aphajoi , tia Judate thumop chu hiche Caiaphas hi ahiye .
43018015	Simon Peter le seijui dang khat’in Jesu ajuiye . Hiche seijui dang kitipa hi Thempu chungnungpa hetsa mi ahin , Jesu toh kilhonin thempu chungnung inpi tolsunga aluttai .
43018016	Pater vang chu lotpi polama adding dentai . Hijeh chun seijui dang Thempu chung nung hetsapa chu ahung potdohin , kotphunga ding nu-ngah nu jah aaseilep Peter chu ahinpui luttai .
43018017	Kotphunga ding nu-ngah nun Peter jah a , “ Nang hi hiche mipa seijui khat nahilou haimo ? ” atileh ; aman , “ Kahipo , ” ati .
43018018	Adap jeh a hikoma chu soh ho le Houin ngah sepai hon song meihol akitiuva din mun’a mei a oiyu ahin ; Peter jong alah-uva dinga mei oiya kisanglum ahiye .
43018019	Thempu chungnungin Jesu chu aseijuite thudol le athuhil umchan adodngtai .
43018020	Jesun adonbut’in , “ Keiman vannoi jah aphongtah-in kaseiyin ; Judate kikhop khomna jose Houthua kikhopna in le Houin a kahil jingin , guhthimin imacha kasei khapoi .
43018021	I-bol’a nei doh ham ? Ajeh-uva kasei ja ho chu dodngin , ven , ipi kasei ahenauve , ” ati .
43018022	Jesun hiche asei hin akoma ding Houin ngah sepai loi lah a khat’in a-ngeiphe abengin . “ Thempu chungnung hitia chu kidonbut ngaiyem ? ” ati .
43018023	Jesun adonbut’in , “ Kasei khel leh adih lou chu photchetna vetsahin ; adih kasei leh i-bola neidenham ? ” ati .
43018024	Annas chun Jesu akikan pumin Caiaphas henga asoltai .
43018025	Simon peter chu adingin mei a-oiyin ahi . Mihon ajah a , “ Nang jong hichepa seijui khat nahilou haimo ? ” atiuleh ; aman aseilep’in ; “ Kahipoi , ” ati .
43018026	Thempu chungnung soh Peterin abilkol asat lhah pehpa inkote khat’in , “ Hon sunga ama hitoh kamu tha nahilou haimo ? ” atileh ;
43018027	Peterin aseilep kit’in , hichepet tah chun ah akhongtai .
43018028	Mihon Jesu chu Caiaphas in’a konin gamvaipopa inpi lama akaitauve ; jingpi matah ahi nalaiyin , miho chu akisuh boh dauva kal chuh kut an aneh theina diuvin gamvaipo inpia chun alutpouve .
43018029	Hijeh chun amaho toh kimuto din Pilate apotdoh-in , “ Hichepa hi ipi thua nahehset’u ham ? ” atileh ;
43018030	amahon adonbut’un , “ Thilse abol lou hileh nahenga kahin kailut lou diu ahi , ” atiuve .
43018031	Hichun Pilate’n ajah-uva , “ Kipuiyun lang nang ho danthu dungjuiyin athu kitantau , ” ati . Judah on ajah a , “ Mi tha theina ding eikiphal peh pouve , ” atiuve .
43018032	Jesun iti thia athi ding asei chu guilhunna dinga hiche hi soh ahi .
43018033	Pilate chu gamvaipo inpi lama akile kit’in , Jesu chu akou lut’in , “ Nangma Judate lengpa nahim ? ” tin adonge .
43018034	Jesun adonbut’in “ Nangman hiche hi nachama naseiha , mikhat touvin kachung thu naseipeh khah ham ? ” atileh ;
43018035	Pilate’n adonbut’in , “ Kei ho Judate mi kahibeh ong ? Na nam mite leh Thempu pipu hon kahenga nahin kailut’uva chu , ipiba nabol ham ? ” ati .
43018036	Jesun adonbut’in , “ Keima lenggam chu hiche vannoiya kon ahipoi , kalenggam vannoiya kon hileh Judate henga eikipehdoh louna dia eivengtup’a pang hon asat diu ahi ; tunla Keima lenggam chu hichea kona kisemdoh ahipoi , ” ati .
43018037	Pilate’n ajah a , “ Achutile leng nahi ong ? ” atileh ; Jesun adonbut’in “ Nangin , Leng nahi , ’ neiti . Atah chu kahettohsah theina dinga Keima hung penga hiche vannoiya hi hung kahi ; koi hileh atah a kon tapouvin Keima ogin angai cheh-e , ” ati .
43018038	Pilate’in ajah a , “ Atah chu ipi ham ? ” ati . Pilate’in hiche hi aseiyin Juda hohenga agapotdoh kit’in ajah-uva , “ Ama hi themmosahna ding achunga imacha kakholdohpoi ;
43018039	chujongle kalchuh kut nikhoa mi khat kalhadoh peh tei diu chonna dank hat naneiyun ; hijeh chun Judate lengpa hi lhadoh pen leng nadeiyum ? ” ati .
43018040	Chutah chun alesap kit-un , “ hichepa hilouvin Barabbas joh bouve ! ” atiuve . Barabbas chu gucha michom ahiye .
43019001	Chujouvin Pilate chun Jesu amanin ajeptai .
43019002	Sepai hon ling lukhuh apheh-un alua akhuh peh-un , ponsandup asilpeh-ui .
43019003	Ahenga ahungun , “ Judate lengpa hingsot’in , ” atiuvin , Ama chu adengtauve .
43019004	Pilate chu agapotdoh kit’in ajah-uva , “ Ven , themmosahna theiima achunga kamudoh lou nahetna diuva nahenguva kahin puidoh kit ahi , ” ati .
43019005	Hiti hin Jesu chu linglukhuh khuh le ponsandup pumin ahung potdoh-e . Pilate’n ajah-uva , “ Ven , Mihem hi , ” ati .
43019006	Thempu pipu hole Houin ngah sepai hon amudoh tah-un , “ Thingpel’a khenbeh-in , thingpel’a khenbeh-in , ” tin asamtauve . Pilate’n ajah-uva , “ Nang hon kaiyun lang khanbeh tauvin ; kenvang Ama themmona imacha kamudohpoi , ” ati .
43019007	Juda hon adonbut’in , “ Keihon Dan khat kaneiyun , hiche dungjuiya hi ama Pathen chapa akihidsah jeh a thi dinga kilom ahi , ” atiuve .
43019008	Hiche thu hiPilate’n ajahdoh phat’in akicha cheh kit’in ,
43019009	gamvaipo inpia alut’in Jesu jah a , “ Nangma hoiya hungkon nahim ? ” atileh ; Jesun la adonbutpoi .
43019010	Pilate chun ajah a , “ Neidonbut lou ding ong ? Nangma lhadohna ding tha kaneiya , thingpel’a khetbehna ding jong tha kanei hi nahet lou ham ? ” ati .
43019011	Jesun adonbut’in , “ Chunga kona kipe lou hile chun nangin kachunga thu nanei nanei louhel ding ahi ; hijeh chun nakoma eipehdohpa themmona achungnungjoi , ” ati .
43019012	Hichejeh tah chun Pilate’n Ama lhadohna ding aholtai ; ahinla Judah on , “ Hichepa nalahdoh leh Caesar jol nahilou chu Caesar douna thusei ahi , ” tin asamtauve .
43019013	Thu hicheng hi ajah phat’in Pilate chun Jesu chu polama ahinpuidoh-in , Hebrew paova , ‘ Gabbatha ’ kiti song lhongnal laiya kido thutan touna muna atoutai .
43019014	Hichu kalchuh kut dia kigot ni sunkim don nidan som le ni lem ahitai . Pilate chun Judate jah a , “ Ven , nalengpau hi , ” ati .
43019015	Chutah chun amahon , “ Thah’in , thingpel’a khenbeh-in ! ” tin asamtauve . Pilate’n ajah-uva , “ Nalengpau thingpel’a kakhetbeh ding ong atileh ; thempu pipu hon adonbut’un , “ Caesar tilou keihon leng dang kaneipouve , ” atiuve .
43019016	Chuphat’in aman Jesu thingpel’a khetbeh din amaho apedoh tai . Amahon Jesu chu akaiyun ,
43019017	aman athingpel akiput’in , Hebrew paova , ‘ Golgotha ’ kiti , ‘ Lugumun ’ kiti lai jonin apotdohtan ahi .
43019018	Hikoma chun Jesu thingpel’a akhenbeh-un , midang ni jong asih langto gel’ah akhaiyun Jesu alai lhai .
43019019	Pilate’in amain chan ajih-in thingpel chunga atah-in , “ Nazareth Jesu , Judate lengpa , ” tin asune .
43019020	Jesu thingpel’a akhetbeh nau mun chu khopi nai ahijeh-in , amin chan Hebrew pao le Latin pao chule Greek paova kijih chu Juda ho tampin asimsoh keiyui .
43019021	Hichea hin Judate Thempu pipu hon Pilate jah a , ‘ Ama hi , ‘ Judate lengpa , ’ tin sutdan lang , aman , ‘ Keima Judate lengpa kahi , ’ tin aseiye , tin sunjon , ” atiuve .
43019022	Pilate’in adonbut’in , “ Kasutsa chu kasutsa ahitai , ” ati .
43019023	Sepaihon Jesu chu thingpel’a akhetbeh jou phat’un aponsil chu alauvin , sepai khat cheh din hal li asouvin akihomtauve . Asangkhol chol chu akilah-u leh khui lou ahin , alua pat ato geiya kikhong lhung kei ahi .
43019024	Hijeh chun amaho khat le khat akihouvun , Pathen lekhabua , “ Kaponsil chengse akihomun , Kasangkhol chol chang ding vang vetnan vang asantauve , ” kiti chu gullhunna din , “ Hiche hi bot-eh poute , koipen chang ding ham , vang santhou hite , ” akitiuve . Sepai hon hitia chu abol’u ahiye .
43019025	Jesu thingpel phung koma chun Jesu nu le anu sopinu , Clopas jinu Mary chule Magdala Mary adding jingui .
43019026	Jesun anu le anu koma dinga ngailut seijui chu amun , anu jah a , chun , “ Numei , nachapa chu kivet’in , ati .
43019027	Seijuipa jah ajong chun , “ Nanu chu kivet’in , ” atileh ; hichea pat chun seijuipan amanu chu a-in’a chenpi din apuitai .
43019028	Hiche jou hin Jesun ijakai akibulhitsoh tai , ti ahen , Pathen lekhabu thu guilhunna din , “ Kadang achah-e , ” ati .
43019029	Hikoma chu theitwi thuh bel khat’a kitung ahin , twichoppon theitwi thuh dimset’in achopsah-un hyssop molleh a atahuvin , akamtoh agah sutouve .
43019030	Jesun thietwi thuh chu achop’in , “ Ijakai akibulhuttai , ” atin ; akaikun alhagao alhadohtai .
43019031	kigot ni ahitan , Choldo ni ma chu ni loupe ni ahi ding jeh-in , Choldo nia thingpel chunga thilong aumden louna din , thingpel’a kikhenbeh ho chu akengu heboh a along lah alhahna dingin Judah on Pilate henga athumtauve .
43019032	Hijeh chun sepaiho ahungun Jesu toh kikhetbeh tha te ni amasapa le khatjopa kengho chu aheh bongtauve .
43019033	Jesu ahinphah phat’un athisa ahitah chu amu’uvin , akeng te ni aheh bong tapouve ,
43019034	sepai lah akhat vangin anah tenga agahsut leh thisan le twisih ahung longdoh pai jenge .
43019035	Nang hon jong natahsan theina diuva athilsoh hi amupa tah-in ahettohsah ahin , ahettohsah hi tahbeh ahin , asei hi atahmong ahi , ti ahechen khat aumnai .
43019036	“ Agu khat cha kiheh bong lou ding , ” tia kisei Pathen lekhabu thu guilhunna dinga thil hicheng hi soh ahi .
43019037	Pathen lekhabu mun kha man , “ Asut pau chu avet diu ahi , ” ati .
43019038	Hicheng nung hin Judate gin jeh a guhthima Jesu seijuiya anapang , Arimathea khoa Joseph chun Jesu long chu lah lhahna din Pilate henga agathum leh aman aphelpeh tan , hijeh chun ahungin along chu alalhan apoddohtai .
43019039	Amasa janlaiya ahenga hungsa Nicodemus jong ahungin myrrh le aloes kihal thao kilogram som thum ahinchoiyin ahi .
43019040	Jesu long adomlha lhonin , Judate thivui ngaidol’in , gim namtui anun lhonin , tupat ponnemin atom lhontai .
43019041	Jesu thingpel’a akhetbeh nauva chun honk hat aumin , hon sunga chun lhan kisemthah koimacha kivuina khah louhel khat aume .
43019042	Juda ho kigot nima ahileh , lhan chu anailam jeh-in Jesu chu chukoma avuitauve .
43020001	Choldo jou ni masa ni jingkah kho athim nalaiyin , Magdala Mary chu lhanphunga ahung leh song chu tahdohsan ana-ume .
43020002	Amanu jong Simon Peter le Jesun a-ngailut seijui henga ahung lhaijel’in ajah lhona , “ Pakai chu lhana konin apomangun hoilam alhut’u hitam akahettapouve , ” ati .
43020003	Hijeh chun Peter le seijui dangpa chu apotdoh lhonin lhan lama ahunglhone .
43020004	ani lhona hung lhai khom ahi lhon vangin seijuidangpan Peter adalhan lhanphung ahung lhung masai .
43020005	Akuna lhansung agah vet leh tupat ponnem tol’a um chu amun , asung vang alutpoi .
43020006	Simon Peter jong ahunjuipeh-in ahungin , lhan sunga alut’in ahileh tupat ponnem tol’a um bou amun ,
43020007	alu tomna pon chu tupat ponnem toh umkhom lou , kijel’a atumbeh a aum amui .
43020008	Hichun lhanphung lhung masa seijui dangpa jong lhan sunga alut leh amu chenin atahsantai .
43020009	Ijeh-inem itile Pathen lekhabua thinaa kona thoudoh kit ding ahi , kiti chu ahetkhen loulaiyu ahi .
43020010	Seijuite ni a-in lama akile kit lhontai .
43020011	Mary chu lhanpama adingin akap kap’e . Akapuma lhansung kuna agah vet leh ,
43020012	Jesu long ajam nauva alulama khat akeng lama khat ponbang sil cheh Vantil ni atou lhon agah mui .
43020013	amanin ajah a , “ Numei , i-bol’a kap nahim ? ” ati lhon leh ; aman ajah lhona , “ Amahon ka-Pakai apomangun , hoiya akoiyu kahetapoi , ” ati .
43020014	Hichun aseiyin , agah kihei leh , Jwsu adin amun Jesu ahilam ahepoi .
43020015	Jesun ajah a , “ Numei i-bol’a kap , nahim ? Koi nahol ham ? ” atileh amanun honlei ngahpa chu ahisah-in , ajah a , “ Pu , nangin napoh mang ahileh , ken kipoh tnege , hoiya nalupsah ham neihil’in ” ati .
43020016	Jesun amanu jah a , “ Mary ! ” atileh ; amanu akihei loiyin Hebrew paova houhil tin an , “ Robboni ! ” ati .
43020017	Jesun amanu jah a , “ Neituh chah hih-in , ka-Pa henga kakaltou hih laiye ; ahin kasopite henga chen lang ajah-uva , “ keima ka-Pa , nang ho pa chule ka-Pathen , nang ho Pathen henga kakaltouve , tin aseiye gatin , ” ati .
43020018	Magdala Mary chu achen seijuite henga chun , “ Pakai chu kamutai , ” atin chuleh thil dang amanu jah a aseiho jong chu agaseiye .
43020019	Choldo jou nimasa ni , nilhah lamin Judate gin jeh a seijuite umna in kotpi chengse kikha khumsoh ahin , ahinla Jesu ahungin alah-uva adingin , ajah-uva , “ nalahuva cham leng hen , ” ati .
43020020	Hiche asei jou chun seijuite chu akhut te ni le anah avetsah-e . Seijuiten Pakai amu phat’un akipah lheh jengui .
43020021	Jesun ajah-uva aseikit’in , “ Nalahuva cham leng hen , ” atin ; Pan keima eisol banga nang ho kasol nahiuve , ” ati .
43020022	Hichu aseiyin amaho ahu alha khumin ajah-uva , “ Lhagao kisan’un .
43020023	Nang hon michonset ho na-ngaidamu leh ngai dam chang diu , themmo nachansahu leh themmo chang ding ahiuve , ” ati .
43020024	Jesu hung kilah pet chun som le ni lah a khat , Thomas pengkop kitipa chu anaumpoi .
43020025	Seijui dang hon ajah a , “ Keihon Pakai kamutauve , ” atiuleh ; aman ajah-uva , “ Akhut phang te nia thingkil maha chengse kamua , thingkil maha ho chu kakhutjunga kakhoiya , anah kakhut tah a katham lousen tahsan ponge , ” ati .
43020026	Niget jouvin aseijuite chu insunga aumun , Thomas jong alah-uva apange . Kot jouse akikha vang chun Jesu ahungin alah-uva adingin , “ Nalah-uva cham leng hen , ” ati .
43020027	Abanin Thomas jah a , “ Nakhutjungin hikom hi khoiyin , kakhut te ni hi ven , nakhut hin lhangin kanah thamin , tahsan lel ding ahipoi , tahsan jengin , ati .
43020028	Thomas chun adonbut’in ajah a , “ Ka-Pakai le ka-Pathen ! ” ati .
43020029	Jesun ajah a , “ Neimu jeh a natahsan hiyah ong ? Mu louva tahsan ho chu anun nom’ui , ” ati .
43020030	hiche lekhabua kisun lou Jesun asiejuite mitmua melchihna abol tampi aum nalaiye ;
43020031	akisun cheng jong hi Jesu chu Messiah , Pathen Chapa ahi , ti natahsan’uva hiche natahsan jeh-uva chu hinna nanei theina diuva kisun ahibouve .
43021001	hicheng nug hin Jesu amatah Tiberias dillena seijuite henga akilah kit’in , hiti hin akilahin ahi .
43021002	Amaho chu Simon Peter , pengkoppa kiti Thomas , Galilee gam Cana khoa Nathaniel , Zebedee chapa te ni chule aseijuite lah amidang ni jong ahiuve .
43021003	Simon Peterin ajah-uva , “ Keima nga manin kiche tange , ” ati . Adang hon ajah a , “ Keiho jong nang to kilhon cheh tah tau hen , ” atiuve . Hijeh chun apotdoh-un kong sunga alut’un , ahivangin hiche jan chun imacha amanpouve .
43021004	Khovah lhah lhah in Jesu vaokama adingin , seijuiten Ama ahilam ahepouve .
43021005	Jesun ajah-uva , “ Gollhang , nga matsa nanei louvu ham ? ” atileh ; amahon adonbut’un , “ Aumpoi , ” atiuve .
43021006	Aman ajah-uva , “ Kongsih jetlama chun len sep leu chun namat diu ahi , ” ati . Hijeh chun aseu leh nga atam mat behseh phat’un len chu akaijou tapouve .
43021007	Chuphat’in Jesun angailut seijui chun Peter jah a , “ Pakai chu ahibouve , ” ati . Simon Peterin Pakai ahibouve , ti ajah phat’in , dsagoh keova um ahijeh-in sangkhol aki-ah loiyin dil’a achom lhan ,
43021008	seijui dang ho vang chu konga ahung kitol’un , tola kona gamla lou , tong ja ni tobang bou kilat ahiuvin , nga dim set len chu ahinkaipeh-ui .
43021009	Tolgo ahung geiphat’un , song meihol meiya kitih a nga kigou leh changlhah amu’uve .
43021010	Jesun ajah-uva , “ Tutah a namat’u nga chu phabep hinchoiyun , ” ati .
43021011	Simon Peter chu konga akaldoh-in nga len jeng dimset len chu tolgoa akaidoh leh , nga ja khat le som nga le thum ahin , achuti tam lheh vangin len chu a-ehpoi .
43021012	Jesun ajah-uva , “ Hungun jing an hungneuvin , ” ati . Pakai ahi ahetjeh-un seijuiho khat chan jong , “ koi nahim ? ” tin adong ngampouve .
43021013	Jesu ahungin changlhah chu alan amaho apen , nga jong chuo bangman abol’e .
43021014	Hiche hi Jesu thinaa kona athodoh nunga seijuite henga akilah athumveina ahi .
43021015	Jingan aneh jouvun Jesun Simon Peter jah a , “ John chapa Simon , hiche ho sanga hi nei-ngailut joh hinam ? ” atileh ; aman ajah a , “ Kakelngoite vah-in , ” ati .
43021016	Ani vainan ajah a , “ John chapa Simon , nei-ngailut’em ? ” ati kit leh ; aman ajah a , “ Heng’e , Pakai kalungset nangman nahenai , ” ati . Aman ajah a , “ Kakelngoite chingphan , ” ati .
43021017	Athum veinan ajah a , “ John chapa Simon , nei lungset’em ? ” atileh ; thumvei jen chutia ajah a , “ Neilungset’em ? Atijeh chun Peter along gimtan , ajah a , “ Pakai nangman ijakai nahenai ; nang kalungset hi nahejinge , ” ati . Jesun ajah a , “ Kakelngoite vahin ,
43021018	Kichentah a kaseipeh nahi , naneo laiyin nakong nakigah jin nadeina lam lama nachen , na-upat teng vang leh nakhut te ni najah a midangin nakong nagah peh ding , nadeilou lam lama napui ding ahi , ” ati .
43021019	Hiche asei hi itobang dol’a iti thia Pathen achoi-at ding ham atina ahi . Hiche asei jou hin ajah a , “ Neijuiyin , ” ati .
43021020	Peter akihei leh Jesun angailut seijui chun ahinjui amui ; hiche seijui hi ahi Jan anneh laiya Jesu ap’a ki-nung ngaiya , “ Pakai , napedoh ding chu koiham ? ” tia donga chu .
43021021	Ama hi Peterin amudoh phat’in Jesu jah a , “ Pakai , ama khu iti ding ham ? ” atileh ;
43021022	Jesun ajah a , “ Ama khu kahung kahsen umsah nom leng nang dia ipitiam ? Nangin neijui thimin , ” ati .
43021023	Hijeh chun athu hi sopite lah a akithangin hiche seijui chu thi lou ding in akiseiye . Jesun ama chu thi lou ding ahi , tia asei ahipon , “ Ama khu kahung kahsen umsah nom leng nang dia ipi iti-am ? ” atijoh ahibouve .
43021024	Hichengse hettohsah a panga sundoh hi hiche seijui chu ahin , ama hettohsah hi atahbeh ahi keihon kaheuve .
43021025	Jesu thilbol adang dang tampi aum nalaiyin , khat khat’in kisun soh keileh , keima ngaiton sut ding chengse chu vannoi leiset jengin jong adolponte kati .
44001001	Vo Theophilus , thu masa chu Jesu thilbol le thuhil aboncha akipattil’a pat
44001002	alhensa Solchahho , Lhagao Theng jal’a thu apeh a , Ama laltouva aum ni gei thu ahin ;
44001003	gim hesoh athoh jou kal nisom li sungin ahing monge ti hetchetna tampi toh thon Solchahho henga akilah jin , Pathen lenggam thudol aseijie .
44001004	Amaho toh aumkhompet’un ahilchah-in ajah-uva , “ Jerusalema kon in potdoh louvin kasei najahsau Pa thutep chu ngah jo’uvin ;
44001005	ijeh-inem itile Johnin twiya baptize achansah vangin nangho vang ni phabep jouleh Lhagao Thenga baptize nachan diu ahi , ” ati .
44001006	Seijuiho akikhop khomsoh phat’un ajah a , “ Pakai , tua hi Israel Lenggam nasemphat peh ding hi tam ? ” tia adoh-u leh ;
44001007	Jesun ajahuva , “ pan achamtah a atha neina’a gotsa akoi phat nikho chu nang ho het ding dol ahipoi ;
44001008	hintin Lhagao Theng nachunguva ahung lhun teng thahat naneiyuva , Jerusalem le Judea gamsungsea jong Samaria le leiset kol kimvel geiya Keima het tohsah a napan dinguahi , ” ati .
44001009	Hicheng hi aseiya amahon avet pettah-un lah touvin aumtan , amit mu’va konin meilhang khat’in atolmangtai .
44001010	Jesu hitia akitol manga amahon van lam avet vet pettahuvin ven , ponbangleh sil mi ni akom’uvah ahung ding lhonin ,
44001011	amani chun , “ Galilee gam miho , ibol’a dinga van lam navet vet’u ham ? Hiche Jesu nakom’uva kona van’a kilatou hi , van lama akaltou namu bang banguva hung kit ding ahi , ” ati lhone .
44001012	Seijuiho chu Jerusalem komcha kilometer khat bang gamla Olive lhang kitia konin Jerusalem lama ahung kilekit tauve .
44001013	Seijuite chu Peter le John , Jacob le Andrew , Philip le Thomas , Barthomew le Matthew , Alphaeus chapa Jacob le gam ngailu Simon chule Jacob chapa Judas hicheng hi ahiuvin , ahung lhun’uvin aum nau indan chungnunga akaltoutauve .
44001014	Abonchauvin numeiho le Jesu nu Mary toh Jesu sopi pasal ho pumin akiloiyun ataojom jing uve .
44001015	Hitia aum laiyu hin sopite lah aPeter akipatdoh-in , ( mipi akikhom jat chu ja khat le somni jen ahiuve )
44001016	“ Sopite ho , Jesu manho hinlamkaiyah Judas thudol Lhagao Thengin David kam’a asei masah Pathen lekhabua thu chu guilhung tei ding ahin ;
44001017	ijeh-inem itile Judas chu eiho lah a khat’a kisim’a , hiche lhacha mun jong chang ahi .
44001018	“ Judas hin akhan gitlou man sum chun leimun khat achon , ahnla atumpi ahung pomin jalah tah a apoh jal’iin , asung alai jouse aleng cheh tai .
44001019	Athu hi Jerusalema cheng jouse het’in aumdoh tan , hijeh chun amaho paovin hiche leimun chu , ‘ Thisan leimun ’ tin an Akeldama asah tauve .
44001020	“ Chujongle Labua chun : ‘ Ama mun chu ong hen lang Koiman loda hen , ’ akitin ; Amavang : ‘ Atohmun chu midang khat chang jo hen , ’ akiti .
44001021	Hijeh chun eiho lah a Pakai Jesu avaikon availhun laiya eiho toh umkhom jing ho lah a mi ,
44001022	John phat laiya pat i-lah-uva kona Jesu lahtouva aum ni geiya thudol hethemkhat chun athodoh thu hi eiho toh hettohsah a pangkhom ding ahi , ” ati .
44001023	Chuphat’in mi ni , Justus tia kikouji Barabbas kiti Joseph le Matthias chu atungdoh tauve .
44001024	Chutah-in ataovun , “ Pakai , nangman mitin lungthim nahesoh keiye , hiche te ni kah a hin lhengdoh tan ,
44001025	koipen hin , ama mun kijot’a che mang Judas panna lhacha mun le Solchah mun hi lo le natim ? ” atiuve .
44001026	Chuin amani ding hin vang asan’u leh , vang kisep chu Matthias chunga achun , hijeh chun ama hi Solchah som le khat chutoh akisimthatai .
44002001	Pentecost lhin nin abonchauvin mun khat’a aum’uve .
44002002	Chuin phulou helouvin van lama konin hui hattah gin bangin ahung gingin atou nau in chu apumin adimsoh jenge .
44002003	Hichun meikou bangin lei tampi ahung kilah-in achung chehuva aki-ngan aumden leh ,
44002004	abonchauvin Lhagao Theng adimsoh keiyun lhagavin seidoh theina apeh bang cheh-in paochom paochomin thu aseipantauve .
44002005	Hichea chu vannoi chitin namtin’a kona hung khom Juda mi houva gunchu ho Jerusalema aum laiyu ahin ,
44002006	hiche o chu ahung gin phat’in ahon ajanga ahung lhai khom cheh-u leh ama ama pao cheh a athuseiyu akihettoh jengu chu adatmo lheh jengui .
44002007	Mihon datmo le kidang asauvin , “ Ven , hechea thusei ho hi Galilee gam mi jeng hilou ham ?
44002008	 I-atileh eiho khat cheh-in ipen nau gamkai pao cheh a ijah theiyu ham ?
44002009	Eiho Parthia , Media , Elam gam mi , Mesopotamia gama cheng , Judea gam le Cappadocia gama cheng , Pontus le Asia gama kon ,
44002010	Phrygia le Pamphylia , Egypt le Cyrene naiya Libya lhanga cheng , abang jong Rome a kona hung kholjin
44002011	Juda mik le Juda kisosah ihiuvin , Crete le Arabia hung kon jong auminm Pathen natoh nasatah aseiyu khu ipao chom cheh-in ikijah theiyui , ” tiuve .
44002012	Abonchauvin datmo le lung kichi-ah tah-in khat le khat aki houvun , “ Hiche hi ipi tin a hin tem ? ” atiuvie .
44002013	Midang hon vang ajontaiyun , “ Hiche ho hi lengpitwi kham hiuva hi ! ” tin aseiyui .
44002014	Peter chu som le khat chutoh adding khomin , going tah-in japi lam ngan thu asetai ; “ Vo Juda miho le Jerusalema cheng te , nabonchauvin hiche hi heuvin lang kasei chengse hi lung nachangin ngaiyun .
44002015	Na-ngaito banguva hiche miho hi lengpitwi kham ahipouve , ajeh chu tu hi jingkah nidan ko bou ahinalaiye ;
44002016	amavang hiche hi Joel Themgaova kona kiseia :
44002017	‘ Pathenin “ Ni nunung lam teng hiti ding ahi , ” atin ; Tahsa mihem pumpi chunga ka-lhagao kabuh lhah a , Nachapateu le nachanu teuvin gaothu asei diu ; Nakhangdong teuvin Themgao thilmu tampi amu’va , Na-upateuvin mang tampi anei diua hi
44002018	Chule kasoh pasal ho le numei ho chunga jong Hiche nikho laiya chu kalhagao ka buh lhah ding ahin , Hijeh a chu amahon gaothu asei diu ahi .
44002019	Chunglam van’a thil kidang dang kabol’a , Noileiset chunga melchihna tampi kabol ding ; Thisanm meikou muthim lhang khalkiheh ding .
44002020	Nisa hung thim ding , Lha thisan banga san ding ; Pakai nikho nasatah le kiphondohna ding Hung lhun masanga chute ding ahi .
44002021	Chuteng koi hileh Pakai minphah chan Huhhinga um ding ahiye , ” tia’asei chu ahitai .
44002022	“ Israel mite , hiche thu ho hi ngaiyun ! Nang hon nahet banguvin , Nazareth khoa Jesu kit mipa chu Pathenin aphatsah photchetna nalah tau-uva thil kidang ho le datmo tin cheng chule melchihna tampi abolsah ahi .
44002023	Pathen in ahet masah a aontohsa dungjuija hiche Jesu pehdoh a aum chun nang hon Dan neiloute khut’a thingpel’a na khehbeh-un nathat tauve ;
44002024	Ama chu thinan ahenhoi ahi loujeh-in , thi genthei nana hen chu Pathenin asut lhan , akai thoutai .
44002025	Ajeh chu David-in jong ama thudol asei chun : ‘ Keiman kamasanga Pakai kamu jing in , Suh lingjou kahilouna din kajetlama apang jinge ;
44002026	Hijeh chun kalungthim akipah-in , Kaleiyin thanop thu aseyie ; Katahsaphe jeng jong hi Kinem’a um jing dina ahi ;
44002027	Nangin ka-lhagao jong noimigama dalhapon natin , Namithengpa jong mon mangsah pon nate .
44002028	Hinna lampi chengse neihetsah tan Namaiya kipana lhingset’a neipeh ding ahi , ’ ti .
44002029	“ Sopite ho olmo louhel’in iphung bupiu David thudol hi najah-uva ka sei nga’e ; ama athin avuiyuvin , avuikhuh chu tuni geiyin ilah-uva aum jing nalaiye .
44002030	Thengao ahijeh-in Pathenin achilhah lah a khat alaltouna atousah dia akihahselna chu ahe jingin ,
44002031	ahet masah jeh chun Christa thodoh kit ding hi asei masan : ‘ Ama chu noimigama akidalha denpon , Atahsaphen jong mon mangna amupoi , ’ ati .
44002032	Hiche Jesu hi Pahtenin akaithoutai , keiho chengse hi hettohsah kahiuve .
44002033	Ama chu Pahten jetlama choisangin aumtan , Paa kona thutep Lhagao Then galah chu ahin bung lhan , nagn hon namu’va najah-u hi ahi .
44002034	Ijehinem itile David chu Van’a akalpon , hitjoh hin aseiye : ‘ Pakai chun ka-Pakai jah a , Kajetlama tou jingin
44002035	Keiman namelmate chengse Nakengot chotpha kaneisah masangsen , ’ ati .
44002036	“ Hijeh chun Israel insung miten kihet cheh hen , nang hon thingpel’a nakhetbeh-u hiche Jesu hi Pathenin Pakai le Messiag a sem ahitai , ” ati .
44002037	Asei ngai chengse chu alungu hem’a kidot abang jengin , Peter le Solchah dang ho jah a , “ Ipi kabol diu hitam sopite ? ” atiuve .
44002038	Peter in ajah-uva , “ Nachonset lung heiyun lang , khat cheh-in na chonset’u ngaidamna ding in Jesu Christa mininbaptize chang cheh-uvin , chuteng Lhagao Theng Pathen thilpeh hi nachan diu ahi ;
44002039	ijeh-inem itile thutep chu nang ho le nachateu chule gamla tah a um Pakai i-Pathenuvin akouho jouse dinga ahi , ” ati.
44002040	Peterin Thudang tamtah-in jong ahettohsah-in tilkhouto thon ajah-uva , “ Hiche khang gilouva kon hin kihuhhingun , ” ati .
44002041	Hijeh chun asei jop chengse chu baptize achangunm hiche nikho chun mi sang thum jenin abetauve .
44002042	Amaho chu solchah ho thuhil’in jong , antheng jongin jong chule taovin jong gunchutah-in apangdet jing tauve .
44002043	Thil kidang le melchihna tampi Solchah hoa kona kiboldoh phat’in amitakip chunga kichatna achutai .
44002044	Atahsan ho abonchauvin thukhatseh kisauvin , ijakai neilhangin aneikhomun ,
44002045	aneiyu athilkeo chengseu ajoh-un , a-ngaichat dungjui cheh-in akihom jiuve ;
44002046	niseh le lung khatseh pun Houin a gunchu tah-in akikhom jiuvin , in tin’a changlhah helbal’in akikhomun , lung lhaisel le kipah tah-in an anekhom jiuvin ;
44002047	Pathen avah choiyun mipi pumpi seiphat achangui . Hichun Pakaiyin niseh leh huhhinga umdoh ho chu aloi lah-uva abejing jin ahi .
44003001	Peter le John chu tao phat nilhah lam nidan thumin Houin a achetou lhone .
44003002	Chuin Houin kaiya cheho henga khutdoa thil thum dinga ahinpoh-uva ‘ Kotkhah hoi ’ kiti Houin kelkot bul’a kiseh leh kitousahji , anusunga kona elbaiya pengpa chu aumin ,
44003003	amahin Peter le John Houin a lut kigo amun , i-khat khat apehna lhon din thil athume .
44003004	Peterin John toh ama chu avechang mel’in “ Keini lam hinven , ” ati .
44003005	Hijeh chun aman i-khat khat mu ding kinemin amani phatah-in avei .
44003006	Hichun Peterin , “ keiman dangka le sana kaneipon , kanei hiche hi napenge , Nazareth Jesu Christa minin lam jot tan ! ” ati .
44003007	Hiti chun akhut jetlamin atuh-in akaithou leh , apettah chun akenghang te ni le akhochang dung jouse ahatdohin ,
44003008	ama akichomin adding jangin lam ajot’in , amanitoh Houin a alut’in , avah len , akichom chomin Pathen avahchoi choi jenge .
44003009	Mipin jong ama ava le lea Pathen avah choi choi jeng chu amu cheh-uvin ,
44003010	Houin ‘ Kotkhah hoi ’ kiti laiya kitousahjia khutdo pa chu ahi ahet doh phat’uvin hichepa chunga chu ipi thilsoh hitam , tin lung dongin akicha gamtauve .
44003011	Elbai kidamsah pan Peter le John akolchah jing phat’in mipin adat mouvin , Solomon hongcha kiti laiya chun ahenguva ahung lhai khom’uve .
44003012	Peterin amu phat’in mipi agah houvin , “ Israel mite , ibol’a hiche thilsoh hi nadatmouva , keini thahat le houdih jeh a ama hi lam kajotsah thei lhona nagel’uva , neivet vet jengu ham ?
44003013	Nang hon napehdoh-uva Pilate’n lhadoh dinga thu atan jouva jong a-angsung laitah a napaisau , alhacha Jesu chu i-pu i-pateu Pathen , Abraham Pathen , Isaac Pathen , chule Jacob Pathenin achoi-at ahin ,
44003014	nang hon Atheng le Adihpa chu napaiyun tolthatpa joh chu nalhadoh peh diuvin nathum’ui ;
44003015	hinna Bulpi chu nathat’uvin , ahinla Pathenin Ama chu thinaa konin akaithou kittai , keihohi ahetoh kahiuve .
44003016	Ama min a tahsan vanga hiche namu’va nahetsahpau hi ama tahsanna chun ama hi adamthengsah hel jenga , hiche ama min’a chu nabonchau angsunga kidinsah ahitai .
44003017	“ Tun sopite , nang hon jong navaipoteu banga hetoh louva nabol’u ahi kahenai ;
44003018	chujongle Pathenin a-Messiah chun gim hesoh athoh ding thu Themgao jouse kamsunga ‘ anaphondoh masah chu hitia hi guilhung ahitai .
44003019	Hichejeh chun chonset lung heiyun lang nachonset chengseu suhmanga aumna din hung kile kit’un ,
44003020	chutileh Pakai angsunga konin lhagao haldoh kitna thei umdoh-intin , Aman nang ho dia lhendohsa akoi messiah Jesu chu ahinsol thei ding ahi .
44003021	Hiche Jesu chu Pathenin akhang khanga a-Themgao theng ho jouse kama ahinsei jing banga thil ijakai akiledohsah kit phat kah a van’a lahtouva umtei ding ahi .
44003022	Mose’n jong , ‘ Pakai na Pathen’uvin keibanga hi nasopiteu laha kona Themgao khat natundoh peh diu ahi ; ipi hileh aman nasei peh chanu aboncha na-ngaisoh kei diu ahi .
44003023	Koi hileh hiche Themgaopa thusei ngailou chu mipilah a kona kisumang ding ahi , ’ ati .
44003024	Samuel a pat ama nunga thusei Themgao chengsen jong tu hiche nikho ho didng hi anaphon masah sau ahitai .
44003025	Nang ho hiche Themgao ho leh , Pathenin napu napauteu apeh a Abraham jah a , ‘ Nangma chilhah vanga vannoi phungtin phatthei chang diu ahi , ’ tia ateppeh hiche Kitepna chate chu nahiuve .
44003026	Pathenin amasaa nang ho dia alhachapa chu akaithouva , nagit louna chengseuva kona leheisoh keiya phatthei naboh diuvin nahenguva ahinsoltai , ” ati .
44004001	Peter le Johnin mipi jah a thu asei nalai lhonin , Thempu ho le Houin ngah sepai lamkaipa chule Sadducee hon ahindel vuh-un ,
44004002	mipi thu ahilnalhona Jesu jal’a thinaa kona thokitna aseiphong lhon chu athi mah ten jengun ,
44004003	amani chu aman’uvin nilhah ahipai phat’in ajinga din mihenna in’a akhumtauve .
44004004	Ahinla athusei lhon jaa mi tampin atahsanin , amijat jong sang nga jen alhingtauve .
44004005	Ajing nikhon avaipoteu le upaho chengse le Danthu themho Jerusalema akikhomun ,
44004006	( Thempu chungnung insung lhah jeng , Thempu chungnung Annas le Caiaphas toh John le Alexander ahiuve , )
44004007	amani chu alailunguvah adinsah-un , “ Ipi tha neina neiya , kei min pan’a hiche hi nabol lhon ham ? ” tin adongui .
44004008	Chutah chun Peter Lhagao Theng adimset’in ajah-uva , “ Japi vaipote leh upate ho ,
44004009	tunia elbaipa thilpha kibolpeh chung chang a eikidong lhona , ama iti kihuhdoh ham , kiti ahileh ,
44004010	Israel mipi leh nang ho nabonchauvin kihet chehun , Nazareth Jesu Christa , nang hon thingpel’a nakhetbeh-uva , Pathenin thinaa kona akaithou kitpa min kipana , hichepa jeh a chu ama damthenga na angsunguva ding’ah ahi .
44004011	Hiche hi , ‘ Insa hon napaiyu Song , ‘ Inning khomdet pen’a pang , ’ kiti chu ahitai .
44004012	Chule koima dang’ah ‘ huhhingna ‘ aumpoi ; ‘ ijeh-inem iti le vannoiya mihem lah a huhhinga i-umna diuva kipea min dang him him aumpoi , ” ati .
44004013	Mihon Peter le John hanje chu amu’uvin , lekha them lou , mimol ahi lhon aheuvin adatmo lheh jengui ; amavang Jesu toh kiloisa ahi lhon ahenauve .
44004014	Aboldam lhonpa ma amani toh adin khom jing amu’u leh asuhsetna din imacha abol theipouve .
44004015	Chuin amani chu akouvun Hou vaipoloi kikhopnaa kona potdoh din asol’uvin , amaho achangin akihou khomun ,
44004016	“ hiche mi te ni hi iba ilo diu ham ? Ijeh-inem itile ama ni jeh a melchihna dsoh hi la Jerusalema cheng jouse het’a kiphongdoh ahitan , eihon jong iseilep thie pouvin ,
44004017	hijongleh athu mipi lah a akithejeh be louna dingin , miho koimacha jah a hiche min’a hi thu asei kit lhon louna din gihsal’u hite , ” akitiuve .
44004018	Chuin amani akouvun Jesu min’a thu aseiphong thei lhon lou ding , mijong ahil thei lhon louhelna din akhah chah tauve .
44004019	Ahinla Peter le Johnin amaho adonbut lhonin ajah-uva , “ Pathen thu sanga nang ho thu ngaijoh Pathen mitmua din jom , nang hon ngaitouvin ;
44004020	keinin vang kamusa le kajahs alhon chu kaseida thei lhon louhel ding ahi , ” ati lhone .
44004021	Thilsoh chung chang jeh a mihon Pathen avahchoi cheh-u leh , mipijeh chun talen peh na thieya thepmona imala amudoh pouvin , hijongleh amani chu nasatah-in agihsal kit leuvun alhadoh tauve .
44004022	Achunga damsah theina thil kidang kibolpehpa ma chu akum som li val ahitai .
44004023	Alhadoh phat’un Peter le John jong aloite henga ahung lhonin Thempu pipu ho le upahon ajah lhona agih nau thu chu asei peh lhontai .
44004024	Amahon ajah phat’un lung khat tah-in ogin khat’in Pathen akouvun , “ Vo Pakai , van le leiset , Twikhanglen chule asunga um jouse Sempa nangma nahi ,
44004025	Lhagao Thenga kona kapuluiyu nalhacha David kama ‘ Ibol’a chiding namdangte lung hanguva , Mipin pannabei thil angaitou ham ?
44004026	Leiset lengte akigol’un , avaipoteu jong akikhomun Pakai le a-Messiah dou din agouve , ’ tia kiseisa chu
44004027	atahbehin hiche khopi sunga hin thao nanusa nalhacha theng Jesu dou din , Herod le Pilate , chiding namdang toh chule Israel mipi geiyin akikhomun ,
44004028	bo dinga nakhut tah a nagontohsa le nalungthima na-ngaito chengse chu bol ding agatauve .
44004029	Chule tun Pakai , ami gihsal nau hi vetan , chujongle nalhachate hin hangtah a nathu asei ngamna diuvin lung ngamna pen ,
44004030	nalhacha Theng Jesu min’a dammo veiset akiboldama , melchihna tampi akiboldoh a chule thil kidang dang akisodohna din nakhut hin lhangin , ” atiuve .
44004031	Hitia chu ataovu leh aum nau mun chu ahung kilingin , amaho abonchauvin Lhagao Theng achangun lung ngamtah-in Pathen thu aseitauve .
44004032	Atahsan loise chu lung khat she le hinkho khat’in aumun , koiman anei athilkeo chu amaa tuma sei louvin , abonchan akikop cheh-uve .
44004033	Thahat nasatah kengin Solchah hon Pakai Jesu thokit thu ahettohsah-un , achunguva phat theina lentah-in aume .
44004034	Ijeh-inem itile alah-uva khat cha jong alhasam aumpouve , lou le in neihon jong ajoh-un aman jouse chu ahin choi khom’uvin
44004035	Solchah ho kengbul’a akoiyun , mihon angaichat bep cheh-in ahoppeh jiuvin ahi .
44004036	Mi tilkouva pang ahi , tia Solchah hon Barnabas asah-u , Cyprus aping Levi mi Joseph chun
44004037	lou ching khat aneiyin agajoh-in sum chu ahinchouyin Solchah ho kengbul’a akoiye .
44005001	Amin Ananias kiti pasal khat hin ajinu Sapphira jong anomin anei thil khat ajoh-in ,
44005002	ajinu het’in thilman akeh khat akikoiyin , akeh khat chu ahinchoiyin Solchah ho kengbul’a akoiye .
44005003	Hichun Peterin , “ Ananias , ibol’a nalung sung Satan nalo dimsah a Lhagao Theng najoulhep’a , gam man akeh khat chu nakoiden hitam ?
44005004	Najoh masanga nanga ahibanga najoh nunga jong nanga chu nathu thu hilou ham ? Ibol’a hitobang thil hi nalungthima navop ham ? Mihem hilouva ! ” ati .
44005005	Ananias chun thu hicheng hi ajah jah chun alhun athitai ; hichea hin ajapha jouse chunga kichatna lentah ahung lhungtan ahi .
44005006	Gol-lhang ho adding doh-un along chu atom’uvin chule apodoh-un agavuitauve .
44005007	Nidan thum don nungin thilsoh umchan hepha louvin ajinu ahung lut’e .
44005008	Peterin amanu anahouvin , “ Seitemin , hijat man a bou hi gam chu najoh lhon ham ? ” ati leh ; amanun , “ Henge , hijat ahinai , ” ati .
44005009	Chuphat’in Peter ajah a , “ Ibol’a nangnin Pakai Lhagao patep dia nagot lhon ham ? Ven , najipa vuiho kotpi phung ahung geitauve , nang jong napohdoh pai diu ahtai , ” ati .
44005010	Amanu jong alhu paiyin Peter kengbul’a athidentai . Gollhang ho ahung lut’u leh amanu athisan ahung toh-un , along chu apodoh-uvin ajipa koma agavuitauve .
44005011	Chutah chun Houbung pumpi le athilsoh ho japha chan chunga kichatna lentah ahung lhungtai .
44005012	Mipi lah a melchihna le thil kidang tampi Solchah hon akhut tah-uvin aboldoh doh jengun , chujongle lungkhat tah-in Solomon hongchaa chun aum cheh-ui .
44005013	Midang koiman amaho jop dinga ngap chatapon , ahinla mipin aseipha jing nauvin ,
44005014	hijeh chun mipilah a Pakai tahsan tahbeh ho pasal’in jong numeiyin jong abejingun ,
44005015	Peter ahungle tengleh alebeh achunguva achuh khahna din , dammo veise jouse khosung lamlen dunga ahinpohdoh-un khunpeh chung le pheh dunga alupsah-ui .
44005016	Jerusalem kimvel khopi dunga mipi ahung kikhom’un , dammo veise jouse le lhagaoboh vop ho ahinpuiyun , abonchan aboldamsoh keiyui .
44005017	Thempu chungnung chu chu pet’a Sadducee loi lah a aloite chengse chutoh akipatdoh-in , athang tom behseh jengun ,
44005018	Solchah ho chunga khut alhauvin , aman’un , lhangpi kihenna in’a akhumtauve .
44005019	Ahinla hiche jan chun Pakaiya kon Vantil khat’in songkul kotkhah aongin amaho apuidoh-in ajah-uva ,
44005020	“ Cheuvin Houin a ga dingun lang hiche Hinna thudol hi abonchan gaseipeh tauvin , ” ati .
44005021	Hiche ajah phat’un khovah lhah-in Houin a alutuvin thu agahiltauve . Thempu chungnung chunla aloi te chengse toh ahungin Israel chate Hou vaipoloi upa changse toh Houthua kikhopna abol’un , amihenho’u gakailut dingin songkul’a mi asol’ui .
44005022	Vaihom asol ho’u ahungu leh Solchah ho chu songkul sunga agamu tapouvin , ahung kile kit’uvin athudol aphongun ,
44005023	“ Songkul kaga lhun’un kotheh chengse phatechan akiheh-in songkul ngah ho jong kotpi phung dunga adding cheh-un , kot kahondoh phat’un la asunga koima kamupouve ’ ” atiuve .
44005024	Athuseiyu hi Houin ngah sepai vaipopa le Thempu pipu loiyin ajah phat’un Solchah ho chu iti hiuva hichea hi ipi hungsoh hitam , tin alunggel’u abeihel tai .
44005025	Hichepet hin mikhat ahenguva ahungin , “ ven , songkul’a namihen ho’u khu , Houin a adingun mipi thu ahil’uve , ” ati .
44005026	Chuphat’in Houin ngah sepai vaipopa le vaipoloi chengse akon’un amaho agakailut’uvin , mipi akichauvin songa ase louna diuvin pumhat’in vang abolpouve .
44005027	Solchah ho ahinkailut phat’un Hou vaipoloi kikhopna adinsah-un , Thempu chungnungin amaho adongin ,
44005028	“ Hiche min pan’a mi nahil louhelna diuva hachang khama nakikhamu ahin , ahinla ven , hiche nathuhil’u hi Jerusalem nadipsoh hel’in , hiche mipa thisan phu hi keiho chunga lhut khum din neigouve ! ” atiuve .
44005029	Ahivangin Peter le Solchah hon adonbut’un , “ Mihemho thu hilouva Pathen thu joh a kanun tei tei diu ahi .
44005030	Ipu ipateu Pathenin thinga nakhai sanguva nathasau Jesu chu akaithouvin ,
44005031	Israelte achonset chengseu ngaidama aumna dia chonset lung heina apehna din ama chu Pathenin ama jetlama vaipo le huhhingpan achoisangtai .
44005032	Hiche thu ho ahetoh a chu Pathenin athua nung ho apeh Lhagao Theng le keiho kahiuve , ” atiuve .
44005033	Ajapha chan alung hang beseh jengun Solchah ho chu thadoh jengdia akiloltauve .
44005034	Hichun Hou vaipoloi lah a Pharisee mi , amin Gamaliel kiti , Danthu hilthem , mi jousen ajasohkei , ama chu adingdoh-in Solchah ho chu phat chom khat polama soldoh dingin aseiyin ,
44005035	chuin Hou vaipoloi jah a , “ Hiche miho chunga hi ipi bol ding natiu ham kichih theiyun .
44005036	Ijeh-inem itile tu masngin jong Theudas kiti mi khat anaumin , ama le ama i-khat hidainnin akiseiyin , pasal phabep jen , ja li bangin ajop’uvin , ahinla ama atha phat’un anungjui chengse akithe chehsoh-in , imacha lou asoh tai .
44005037	Hiche nung hin leiset mi kisim laiyin Galilee mi Judas ahung kipan kit’in , mipi phabep geiyin akijuisah-e ; ama jong hi amang thah tah , anungjui chengse jong akithecheh tauve .
44005038	Hijeh a chu tu hiche thua jong kaseipeh nahiuve , hiche mihoa kon hin kikangseuvin lang don dauvin , ijeh-inem itile hiche jong hi mihema kon le lunggel chule natoh ahile kisumang thou ding ahi ;
44005039	Pathena hungkon ahivangleh nasuh mang joulou diu ahi , ajo leh Pathen kidoupi nahilo diu ahi , ” ati . Gamaliel thun anungun ,
44005040	Solchah ho chu akou lut’uvin , avoh juvun Jesu min’a thu asei louhelna diuvin hatah-in agihsal’un alhadoh tauve .
44005041	Solchah ho chu Hou vaipoloi kikhopna maiya konin achedohun , chuche Min jal’a hesoh genthei thoh a kiloma akibol’u chu akipah lheh jengui .
44005042	Niseh-in Houin le a-in tin’uva tang louhel’in thu ahil’un , chule Jesu chu Messiah ahi Kipana Thupha asiphong jingui .
44006001	Hiche lai chun seijuih mijat apunbe cheh cheh phat’un niseh a thil kihopnaa ameithaiho’u anah sah peh pouve , tin Greek pao tho Juda-numeiho chu Hebrew mite chunga aphun’un , akah-uva kinahna asodoh tai .
44006002	Chuphat’in som le ni chun seijui jouse akoukhom’un , “ Keihon Pathen thu seiphong kangah-uva dokhanga ankong sem’a kapan diu adihpoi ;
44006003	hijeh chun sopite , hiche kin’a kapansah diuvin , nalah-uva konin Lhagao le chihna dim mia nahettohsau sagi lhengdohuvin ;
44006004	chuteng keiho tah vang taona le hill hang kin’a kipumpeh jo’uvinge , ” atiuve .
44006005	Athu chu mipi maiya lung lhai aumin , hijeh chun tahsan le Lhagao Thenga dim Stephan toh , Philip le Prochorus , Nicanor le Timon , Parmenas le juda houva kilalut chiding namdang mi Antioch khoa hung Nicolaus alhengdoh-un ,
44006006	amaho chu Solchah ho angsunga adinsah-u leh , Solchah hon ataopeh-uvin achunguva khut a-ngamtauve .
44006007	Hichun Pathen thu achaljah tan , jerusalema seijuiho mijat hapunin apungin , Thempu ho lah a tamtah jong tahsan thun anung tauve .
44006008	Stephen chu lungset le thahat adamtan , mipi lah a melchihna le thil kidang lentah tah aboldoh tai .
44006009	Hichun akiminvo na banga chamlhat miho Houthua kikhopna in kitia konin mi phabep , Cyrene gama , Alexandria , Cilicia le Asia a hung kon ho akipatdoh-un Stephen chu akinelpiu leh ,
44006010	aman chihna le Lhagao thu asei chu anel thei tapouve .
44006011	Chuphat’in amahonmi phabep , “ Amah in Mose le Pathen taitomna thu asei kajauve , ” tia sei dingin atlseuvin ahi .
44006012	Hiti chun mipi le upa ho , Danthu themho aban tilset’uvin , amaho achunga achu’vin , aman’un Hou vaipoloi kikhop naa akailut’un ,
44006013	jouthua hettohsah-uvin , amahon , “ Hichepa hin Muntheng le Danthu douna thu tang louhel’in asei sei jengin ,
44006014	Nazareth Jesun hiche mun hi asuhmanga Mose’n eipeh-u chondan ho hi akheldoh ding ahi , ’ tia asei jong kajauve , ” atiuvin ahi .
44006015	Hichun Hou vaipoloi kikhopnaa tou chengsen Stephen chu avesoh keiyun ahileh amai chu Vantil maiso bangin amu’uve .
44007001	Thempu chungnungin , “ Hichengse hi hiti mong ham ? ” atileh ;
44007002	Stephenin adonbut’in , “ Ngaiyuvin sopite le pate ho : Penna bulpipa Abraham chu Haran aching dia ache masang , Mesopotamia gama achen laiyin loupina Pathen ahenga ahung kilah-in
44007003	ama jah a , ‘ Nagam leiset le naphung mite dalhan potdoh-in lang keiman kavetsah ding gam jonin chetan , ’ ati .
44007004	Hijeh chun ama Chaldea gama konin achen Haran a achengtai . Apa thi nungin tua nachen nau hiche gamsunga hin akichon lutsah-in ,
44007005	ahinla agam leiset halsi khat , kengpeh thol jeng cha jong ama din apepoi ; cha anei lou vangin , agam chu ama le anunga achilhahpa apeh din thu anatep’e .
44007006	Pathenin hiti hin achilhah te chu mi gama gapem’uva , mihon sohna atohsah diu , genthei hesoh a abol diuvin aseiye .
44007007	Pathenin aseiyin , ‘ Amahon sohna agatoh peh-u nam mite chu thu katan khuma , chujou teng Abraham chilhahte hung kitoldoh-uva hiche lai mun’a Keima kinbol’a eihou diu ahi , ’ ati ahi .
44007008	Chuin Abraham chu cheptan ding kitepna thupeh apen , hijeh chun Isaac ahingin niget nin chep atanpeh-in , Isaac-in Jacob , Jacob’in penna pate somle ni ahingin chep atanpeh-e .
44007009	“ Penna pate chu Joseph chunga athang thip’un Egypt gama ajoh mangun , ahile Pathenin aumpi jingin ,
44007010	ahesoh genthei tin tanga konin ahinhuhdoh pehin , Egypt lengpa Pharaohang’a lungset le chihna apen , hijeh chun lengpan Egypt gam pumpi le ama insung pumpia vaipon asemtai .
44007011	Hichun Egypt gam punpi le Canaan gam pumpia nahiuve kel alhan , gentheina lentah ahung , lhungin , i-puteuvin neh le chah akimu joutapouve .
44007012	Hichea hin Jacob’in Egypt gama anneh aume , ti ajah phat’in i-puteu chu khatvei chan nan agah solpai jenge .
44007013	anivei chan na Joseph-in asopite akihetdohsah tan , Jacob insung chu Pharaoh geiyin ahetai .
44007014	Chuphat’in Joseph-in jong apa Jacob le a-inkote mihem som sagi le nga jen chu gakou din mi asol’in ,
44007015	Jacob jong Egypt’a ahung suh tai . Hichun ama ahin i-puteu ahin athitauvin ,
44007016	alongu chu Shechema alepoh-uvin , Shechem muna Abrahamin Hamor chatea kona dang kaa achohsa lhan’a chun avuitauve .
44007017	“ Pathenin Abraham koma akihahsel’a a thupeh phat chu ahung lhinpai ding phat’in , Egypt gama mipi apungtel tul jengun ,
44007018	Joseph hephalou leng chom khat hung letdoh geiyin apunguve .
44007019	Lengchompa hin ijat miteu heltah-in dohan abol’in , i-pu i-pateu chu achasen jouseu ahing aum louna din acham louvun polama apaidoh sah jenge .
44007020	Hiche lai tah hin Mose apengin Pathen din it aum lheh jenge ; lha thum sungin apa insunga avah-un ,
44007021	ama jong apaidoh phat’uvin Pharaoh chanun akilah-in achapa vah-in ahin kivahdoh tai .
44007022	Mose chu Egypt mite chihna jouse ahil’un , athusei jouse le antohna chan a pheltah ahiye .
44007023	“ Mose chu kum som li alhin phat’in asopi Israel chate gavil ding alungthima aumdoh tai .
44007024	Mi khat hi adih loutah a kibol amun , ama chu akithopin aphu lahnan Egypt mipa chu athattai .
44007025	Mose gel’a chu Pathenin ama khut mangchaa ama hochu huhhingna apeh got ahi asopiten kihetnah tau atileh , amahon ahepouve .
44007026	ajingin ahenguva ahung kit leh mi ni akina lhonin , aman akah lhona chamna thu aseiyin , ‘ Mi te ni , sopi cha hlhona ibol’a khat’in khat adih louva kibol nahi lhon ham ? ’ ati .
44007027	Ahinla a-inhengpa adih louva bolpa joh chun Mose chu asondoh-in , ‘ Keiho chunga vaipo le thutana kon natun beh am ?
44007028	Janhia Egypt mipa natha banga chu tha ding neigot ham ? ’ ati .
44007029	Hiche athusei jeh hin Mose ajamin Midian gama agapemin , hikoma chun chapa ni agahinge .
44007030	“ Kum som li lhinin Sinai mol gamthip laiya Vantil khat hamboh lah meikongin Mose henga ahung kileh-e .
44007031	Hiche thil amu hi Mose’n adatmon , ga ve chen dia anailut leh Pakai o ahung gingin ,
44007032	‘ Keima napu napate Pathen , Abraham le Isaac chule Jacob Pathen kahi , ’ ati .
44007033	‘ Nakeng te nia konin nakengchot te ni sut lhan , ijeh-inem itile nadinna chu muntheng ahi .
44007034	Egypt gama kamite kibolsetna kaven kamu chentai , chule apen gin’u kajan apuidoh diuva hung kumlha kahi ; hijeh chun tun hungin Egypt’a kasol ding nahi , ’ ati .
44007035	“ Hiche Mose amahon apaidal’uva , ‘ Vaipo le thutan a kon na tun beh am ? ’ atipau , hichepa tah hi Pathenin hamboh lah a ahenga hung kilah Vantil ban thahat’a ama ho vaipo le huhdoh din asoltai .
44007036	Amahin Israelte ahinpuidoh chun Egypt gama jong Twikhanglen san mun le gamthip noiya kum som li sungin thil kidang dang le melchihna tampi anabol’e .
44007037	Hiche Mose hi ahiye Israel chate jah a , ‘ Pathenin nasopiteu lah a kei tobang Themgao khat natundoh peh diu ahi , ’ tia sei chu .
44007038	Gamthip laiya Houbunga anapanga , i-pu i-pateu toh pang khoma Sinai mol’a Vantil toh kihouva , eiho pehson dia hinna Thupeh lapa chu ama hi ahin ,
44007039	i-pu ipateu ama noiya alut nom pouvin , asondoh-un alungthimun pouvin , asondoh-un alungthimun Egypt lam angai cha jingun ,
44007040	Aaron jah a , ‘ Kamasanguva lamkai din Pathen lim tobang ho neisempeh-un , ajeh chu Egypt’a kona eihin puidoh pau hiche Mose chu achunga ipi soh hitam kahetapouve , ’ atiuvin ahi .
44007041	Hiti chun amahon hiche lai hin bongnou lim asemun , hiche lai hin bongnou lim asemun , hiche koma hin kilhaina abol’uvin , akhut’a asemsau thi ho ja nan golnop abol’uve .
44007042	Hijeh chun Pathenin akihei mang khumin van’a ahsite hou din amaho chu apedoh-in , Themgao ho lekhabua kisun bangin : ‘ Vo Israel insung mi , kum som li sung gamthip laiya Sa thao le kilhainaa neihou louvu hilou ham ?
44007043	Moloch houna ponbuh po leuvin , Rephan ahsi pathen limsemthu napo leuvin Hiche nasemsau thil ho hi houdin nago meu ! Hijeh a chu Babylon kal’a katolmang diu nahiuve , ’ akiti .
44007044	I-pu i-pateuvin gamthip laiya , Alim kigon namu bang bangin ponbuh san , ’ tia Mose jah a thusei Pathenin avetsah hettosah na Houbuh chu neiyun ,
44007045	hiche hi i-pu i-pateuvin alason’un , Joshua lamkainaa Pathenin i-pu i-pateu masanga chiding namdangte anodoh a amahon gam alo lai geiyun ahinpo lut’uvin , David nikho lai geiyin aume ;
44007046	David chu Pathen angsunga lungset achanjeh-in Jacob Pathen Inmun amudoh din athume .
44007047	Ahinla in chu Solomonin asahpeh bouve .
44007048	Ahinvangin Chungnungpen chu khut’a kisa in’a achengpoi , hichea hin Themgaopan :
44007049	‘ Pakaiyin , “ van kalaltouna ahin , Leiset kakengto ngapna ahi ; Nangin itobang in neisah peh ding ham ? Kacholdo mun ding hoikom ham ?
44007050	Ijakai Keiman kakhut tah a Kasemsa hilou ham ? ” tin aseiye , ’ ati .
44007051	“ Milou chalet , lungthim le nabeng te nia cheptanlou ho tobang , napu napateu bangin nang hon Lhagao Theng nadoudal jing jengui .
44007052	Napu napateuvin Themgao koipen bolset louva akoiyum ? Alhacha Theng hung masanga anaseiphong masa chengse athat’uvin , nang hon tuna ma najoh doh-un nathattauve ,
44007053	chule Vantiltea kona Danthu kilahsaon nang ho nahiuvin , nit la nanit pouve , ” ati .
44007054	Asei chengse ngaiho chu alungthimu atongkhan athimah cheh-un Stephen chu ha agoikhum cheh-uve ,
44007055	Stephen vang chu Lhagao Thengin adim pai jengin , van lah agah vet leh Pathen loupina le Pathen jetlam a Jesu adin amun ;
44007056	“ Ven , van akihon’a Mihem Chapa chu Pathen jetlama ding kamui ! ” ati .
44007057	Chutah chun amahon hahohin ahoh-uvin anabeng akisip cheh un , ahonjangin adel lut’uvin ,
44007058	khopi polama aleh doh-un songin aseptauve . Ahetoh a pang hon Saul kiti gol-lhang khat kengbul’a aponsil’u akoiyuve .
44007059	Mihon Stephen songa asepet’u chun aman ahin samin , “ Pakai Jesu , ka-lhagao lan ! ” tin aseiye .
44007060	Hichun aboh khup’in going tah-in asamin , “ Pakai , hiche chonsetna hi amaho chunga simdan ! ” ati . Hiche hi aseiyin akijamdap deltai . Saul’in Stephen athau hi aphat sah-e .
44008001	Hiche nikho hin Jerusalema Houbung chunga hesoh gentheina lentah achutan , Solchah ho tilou adangse Judea gam le Samariagama ajamchehsoh heltauve .
44008002	Hougut mi phabep’in Stephen chu avuiyun , hakan akauve .
44008003	Saul vang chun Houbung suhmangna din in tin’a alut’in numei pasal aman’in ajendoh doh jengin songkul’a akhum thu thui .
44008004	Mi ajamcheh ho chu avah leuvin Kipana Thupha thu aseiphongin apangjo tauve .
44008005	Philip jong Samaria khopia achesuh-in miho jah a Messiah chu aseiphongtai .
44008006	Mipi hon asei chengse ajah uva melchihna abol ho amu phat’un lung khat tah-in Philip thuseiho chu lung lut cheh-in angaiyui .
44008007	Ajeh chu mi tamtah a konin lhagaoboh ho hapenin apengun ahung potdoh doh jengun , langthi ho le elbai ho geiya damdoh dodh jeng ahiuvin ,
44008008	khopi sunga chun kipana tampi asohdoh tai .
44008009	Khopi sunga hin amin Simon kiti mitphel doithem khat aumin , Samaria jat mite chu mitpheldoi avetsah a ama le ama i-khat hiya kiseilen lheh ahin ,
44008010	ama hi aneova pat alen geiyin lung lut tah-in athu angaiyun , “ hichepa hi pathen tha hat chungnung kiti chu ahi , ” atiuve .
44008011	phat sottah amitpheldoi chu amaho kidang tah a avetsah jingjeh-in lung khat tah-in angai nasauve .
44008012	Ahin Philip’in Pathen Lenggam le jesu Christa mina Kipana Thupha aseiphong tahsan chengse chu numei jong pasal jong baptize achansahtai .
44008013	Simon amatah jengin jong atahsanin , baptize achan jouvin Philip toh akiloiyin , melchihna le tha neina nasatah tah a thil kidang abol ho amu leh adatmo lheh jengin ahi .
44008014	Jerusalema um solchah hon Samaria khopin jong Pathen thu akisantauve , ti ajah phat’un ahenguva Peter le John asolpeh-un ,
44008015	amani ahung suh lhonin amaho chu Lhagao theng achan theina diuvin ataopeh lhone ;
44008016	ajeh chu Pakai Jesu min’a baptize chang bep ahinalaiyun , alah-uva khat beh jong Lhagao Theng chang loulai ahi .
44008017	Chunin Peter le Johnin achunguva khut a-ngap lhon leh Lhagao Theng achang tauve .
44008018	Solchah te ni khut ngap’a kona Lhgao Theng kipeh chu Simonin amun amani chu sumapen ,
44008019	“ Ken jong koi hileh achunga khut ka-ngap chan Lhagao Theng achanna din hiche tha neina hi neipe lhonun , ” ati .
44008020	Ahinla Peterin ajah a , “ Nasumle nangma manthan , Pathen thilpeh suma chohjou dol’in nagel’in ahi !
44008021	Pathen maiya nalungthimput adih loujeh-in hiche thua hin namu jong aumpon , chan jong naneipoi .
44008022	Hijeh chun hiche nathilse gel’a kon hin lung heiyin , nalungthima hitobang nagel hi angaidam theina din Pakai henga taovin .
44008023	ijeh-inem itile cheikha khaveng vung banga kha adih louva kihen nahi kamui , ” ati .
44008024	Simonin adonbut’in , “ Nasei chengse hi khatcha kachunga achuh louna din nangmin Pakai henga kei khel’in neitaopeh lhonin , ” ati .
44008025	Peter le Johnin Pakai thu ahettosah lhona aseisoh phat lhonin Jerusalema ahung kile kit lhonin , Samaria miho kho tamtah a Kipana Thupha asei phong peh lhone .
44008026	Pakaiya kon Vantil khat’in Philip jah a thu aseiyin , “ Kipatdoh-in lang Jerusalema kona Gaza jotna lamlena khun lhanglama chesuh temin , ” ati ; alam len chu donlouva kikoithip ahitai .
44008027	Philip jong akipat’in acheleh ven , Ethiopia mi nukiso , Ethiopia lengnu Candace Semangpa , agou chengse chunga vaihom , Jerusalema Pathen hou dia ‘ hung ,
44008028	akile kit lamin akangtalai chunga atounaa Isaiah Themgao lekhabua asim’e .
44008029	Hichun Lhagaovin Philip jah a , “ Chen lang hiche kangtalai khu lhonpin , ” ati .
44008030	Hijeh chun Philip alhailut jeng leh Isaiah themgao lekhabu asimgin ajan , hichun , “ Nasim chu nahet hinai ? ’ atileh ;
44008031	aman , “ Hoiya , mikhattouvin eihilchet lou leh iti kahet ding ham ? ” atin , Philip chu hung ‘ kaldoh a amatoh toukhom din agah kouve .
44008032	Aman Pathen lekhabu asimna laimun chu hiche hi ahi : “ Ama chu tha dinga kikai kelngoi bang le Kelngao nou amulvoupa ang’a paopoh lou bangin kam cheng khat jong keh louvin aum’e .
44008033	Kineosahnaa thu adih-in atanpeh pouvin , Ama khaggui hi kon asei ding hitam ? Ajeh chu leiset’a kona ahinkho kiladoh ahitai , ” kiti lai ahi .
44008034	Nukisopan Philip agah houvin , “ Neihil chen temin , Themgaopan ama chung chang thua ha , midang khattou thua hiche hi asei ham ? ” ati .
44008035	Chutah-in Philip apaodoh-in Pathen lekhabua panin Jesua Kipana Thupha aseipeh tai .
44008036	Lampia ahung kijot jot lhon leh twi veina khat’a ahung lhonin , nukisopan agah houvin , “ Ven twihi , baptize kachanmona ding ipi um am ? ” atileh ;
44008037	Philip’in ajah a , “ Nalungthim pumpia natahsan leh baptize chang theiyin nate , ” ati . Aman , “ jesu Christa chu Pathen Chapa ahi , ti katahsan nai , ” ati .
44008038	Chuin nukisopan kangtalai chu angah din aseiyin , anilhonin akumlha lhonin twi lah a chun Philip le nukisopa alut lhonin , Philip’in nukisopa chu baptize achansah tai .
44008039	Twi lah a kona ahungkaldoh phat lhonin Pakaiya kon Lhagaovin Philip chu alhoh mangin nukisopan amukit tapon , ahivangin ache na lampia kipah tah-in achepaitai .
44008040	Ahinla Philip chu Azotus khopia akimudoh-in , chule aman Caesatea alhun kahsen achepeh-in Kipana Thupha asei phongpeh-e .
44009001	Saul Chula Pakai seijuite gihsal le that din ahai let lut nalaiyin , Thempu chung nung heng a achen ,
44009002	chuche lampia kai jouse chu koi koi hijongleh numei pasal amudoh chan kan’a Jerusalema ahinkai lut theina din Damascus khopia Houthua kikhopna in dudnga peh din lekha agathume .
44009003	Acheleh Damascus khopi ahin phah ding konin phot lot louvin van’a konin vah khat’in akimvel asalvah soh jengtai .
44009004	Hichun ama tol’a akileh lhan , ogin khat’in ajah a , “ Saul , Saul , ibol’a nangin neibol set set ham ? ” ati .
44009005	Ahinla aman , “ Vo Pakai nang koi nahim ? ” atileh ; Aman , “ Keima nabolset jing Jesu chu kahi ;
44009006	hijongleh kipatdoh-in lang khopi sunga khun lut’in , chuteng ipi nabol ding kiseipeh nan nate , ” ati .
44009007	Alhonpi miho chu paopoh uhsa beihel’in adding thip chet’un , ogin chu aja nauvin koima amupouve .
44009008	Saul chu tol’a konin ahung ding doh-in amit te ni ahasah vangin imacha amutapon , hijeh chun mihon akhut’in akaiyun Damascus khosunga apuilut tauve .
44009009	Nithum sungin khomu louvin aumtan , nelou donlouvin aumtai .
44009010	Damascus khopia hin amin Ananias kiti seijui khat aumin , Themgao thilmua mu aneinaa Pakaiyin ajah a , “ Ananias , ” atileh ; aman , “ Ven Pakai ka-um’e , ” ati .
44009011	Hichun Pakaiyin ajah a , “ Kipat’in lang , ‘ Lamjangpet kiti khosung lamlen khu jonin , Judas in’a tarsua a lungkon Sual kitipa chu gaholin ; ven , ama ataopet ahin ,
44009012	aman Themgao thilmua mu aneina Ananias kiti mikhat hunga kho amukit theina dia achunga khut a-ngap ding amui ’ , ’ ati .
44009013	Ahinla Ananias chun adonbut’in , “ Pakai , hiche mipa thudol itobang tah aJerusalema name thengte ijat’a abolset hitam , ti mi tamtah a kona kijataa ;
44009014	chule hichea nangma min pan’a tao jouse jong matna ding Thempu pipu hoa kona thu neina anei ahi , ” ati .
44009015	Ahivangin Pakaiyin ajah a , “ Chen , ama hi namdangte le leng ho , chule Israel chate angsunga kamin po le dia manchah a kalhen ahi ;
44009016	ijeh-inem itile Keima min jal’a ijatvei hesoh genthei athoh ding jong kavetsah ding ahi , ” ati .
44009017	Ananias chu achen insunga alut’in Saul chunga khut a-ngamin , Sopi Saul , Pakai , Lampia nahenga hung kilah Jesu chunk ho namukit theiya Lhagao Theng nadimsetna dinga eihinsol ahi , ” ati .
44009018	Apettah chun amit te nia konin nga lip tobang ahung lup lhan ahileh kho amukittan , chuin akipatdoh-in baptize achangin ,
44009019	an aneh le atha akilt kittai . Saul chu nikho phabep Damascus khopia seijuite toh aumkhomin ,
44009020	apet pet chun Houthua kikhopna in dung jousea Jesu kiti hichepa chu Pathen Chapa ahi , tin asamle tai .
44009021	Ahin asei japha chanin adatmo lheh jengun , “ Jerusalema hiche min’a tao jouse subei hei hoi chu hichepa hi hilou hiya , chule amaho chu kanchom’a thempu pipuho henga akailut theina dinga hung hilou ham ? ” atiuve .
44009022	Ahinla Saul chu asei ahattou tel tul tan , Jesu chu Messiah ahimongtai , tin Damascus khopia Juda ho chu anelkhupsoh keiye .
44009023	Nikho sot thimpi nungin Saul that din Juda ho akihousom’un ,
44009024	athilgonu hi Saul’in ahedohtai . Saul thana din khopi dongkot jouse asun ajanin a-ngah-un ,
44009025	ahivangin janin aseijuiten pollanga akhumun kulpi pang’a akhai lhatauve .
44009026	Jerusalema ahung phat’in seijuite toh kiloikhom ding agon , ahinla amahon Saul chu seijui khat hi dia atahsan lou jeh-un akichauve .
44009027	Hichun Barnabas-in Paul solchah ho henga apuiyin , ajahuva itobanga lampia chu Pakaiamu’a , Pakaiyin ajah a thu aseiya , chule Damascus khopia chu aman itobang tah a hangsan’a Jesu min’a thu asei ahilchentai .
44009028	Hichejeh chun Saul jong amahotoh Jerusalema alut le apot len , hangsan tah-in Pakai minin thu asei len ,
44009029	Greek chon’a chon Juda ho akihoupin akinel pin , hi jeh chun tha din agot lotauve .
44009030	Ahinla sopiten ahetdoh phat’un Saul chu Caesarea ahinpuisuh-un Tarsus lama asolmang tauve .
44009031	Judea le Galilee chule Samaria gam pumpi Houbunga vang chamna alengtan , akiphut det cheh cheh-in , Pakai gingin aumin , Lhagao Thengin lhamonin , panpin amija apungtel tul’e .
44009032	Peter chu gamtin’a ava le naa Lydda a mithengte heng geiyin ahungtai .
44009033	Hichea chun Aeneas kiti mi khat amudoh-in , ama chu langthia kum get jen jalkhun’a kijam ahi .
44009034	Amapa jah a hin Peterin , “ Aeneas Jesu christen nadamsah ahitai , kipatdoh-in lang nalupna kigot’in , ” atileh ; ama akipatdoh pai jenge .
44009035	Hichu Lydda le Sharon a cheng jousen amu’vin Pakai lama akiheisoh tauve .
44009036	Joppaa chun seijui numei amin Dorcas ahi tia Tabitha kiti , thipha bol le thilpeh a thalhingtah khat aum’e .
44009037	hiche lai hin amanu anan athitai ; mihon asil jou phat’uvin indan chungnunga alupsahui .
44009038	Lydda hi Joppa komcha ahijeh-in seijuihon Peter Joppa aum ahet phat’uvin mi ni asol’un , “ Lungset’in kinomsot louhel’in kahenguva hung jengin , ” tin aga ngehsah-uve .
44009039	Hijeh chun Peter jong akipatdoh paiyin amanitoh akilhonin , ahung lhun phat’in mihon indan chungnunga chun apuitouvun , meithai jouse athinu kim’vela adingun akap-un , Dorcas-in ahin laiya akhuipeh-u sangkhol ho le sangkhollen ho chu Peter avet sah-uve .
44009040	Ahin Peterin amaho chu abonchauvin polama anodoh-in aboh khup’in ataovin , chuin along lam ngan akiheiyin , “ Tabitha thouvin , ” ati . Chutah-in amanun amit te ni ahasah leh Peter amun , athoudoh tai .
44009041	Chuin Peterin akhut apen akaidingin , mithengte le meithaiho chu akouvin amanu chu ahingin amaho apetei .
44009042	Athu hi Joppa gam pumpia akihesoh tan , mi tampin Pakai atahsanlo tauve .
44009043	Peter chu Joppa khoa savun sempa Simon in’a nikho tamtah anichonge .
44010001	Caesarea chun amin Cornelius kiti , Italy sepailoi atiu sepai jalamkai khat aumin ,
44010002	ama hi hougut tah , ama le a-insung mi aboncha Pathen gingte , miho thilpeh a hongphal tah , chule Pathena tao jing ahi .
44010003	Amahin nikhat nilhah lam nidan thum donin Themgao thilmua mu aneinaa hunga ajah a , “ Cornelius , ” ahinti kichentah-in amui .
44010004	Cornelius-in kicha tha-in mit lha louhel’in Vantil chu aven , “ Ipi ham Pakai ? ” tia ahouleh , aman ajah a , “ Nataona ho leh mi nakhotona ho chu het jing din Pathen angsunga alhung toutai .
44010005	Chule tun Joppaa mi sol’in lang Peter kiti Simon chu gapuisah tan ;
44010006	ama chu Twikhanglen panga cheng , savun sem Simon in’a alhunge , ” ati .
44010007	Ajah a thusei Vantil chu apotdoh phat’in Cornelius-in insung lhacha mi nil eh hougut tah , ama vengtup’a pang sepai ho lah a khat akouvin
44010008	thilsoh ijakai ahilchensoh phat’in amaho chu Joppaa asoltai .
44010009	Ajing nikhoa amahon Joppa khopi ahinphah ding kon’un sun nidan som le ni donin Peter chu inchunga tao dingin akaldohtai .
44010010	Peter agilkel’a an aneh nom phat’in , neh ding agotpeh-u leh agaochangin ,
44010011	van kihonga thil phenghep hopkhat aning lia kikhit’a leiset’a hung kikhai lha amun ,
44010012	asunga chun leiset’a ganhing namkim , avah le akithol tho chule chunga leng adimset’uve .
44010013	Hichun ahenga o-khat ahung gingin , “ Peter , kipat’in that’in lang nen , ” ati .
44010014	Ahinla Peterin , “ Hithei hih hel’in te Pakai , keiman itih-in jong thilbol le atheng lou ho kane ngaipoi , ” ati .
44010015	Ahinvangin o-gin chun anivei nan ajah a , “ Pathenin asuh thengsa chu bohsah hih-in , ” ati .
44010016	Hitobang hin thumvei akibol’in chuin thil chu van lama akitol toutai .
44010017	Peter agaochan’a thil amuchu ipi tin a hintem tia aki-ngaito pet tah-in ven , Cornelius misol ho chun Simon in ahol’un kelkot maiya adingun
44010018	ahinkouvun , Peter kiti Simon chu chukoma alhun alhun lou adongui .
44010019	Peterin agaochan thudol agel pettah hin Lhagaovin ajah a , “ Ven , mi thumin naholui ;
44010020	dingdoh-in kumlhan lang lung sa-ih louhe’lin amaho khutoh kilhonin , ajeh chu keiman kahinsol ahiuve , ” ati .
44010021	Chuphat’in Peter chu miho henga ahung kumsuh-in , “ Ven , nahol’u chu keima kahi , nahung lo nau jeh ipiba ham ? ” ati .
44010022	Amahon , “ Sepai jalamkai Cornelius , midih le Pathen ging , Juda vaipi seiphat mi chun nangma a-in’a kousah a nathusei ngai dia Vantil Thengin ahil ahi , ” atiuve .
44010023	Hichun Peterin amaho akoulut’in alhunsah tai . Ajing nikhon Peter akipatdoh-in amaho chutoh akilhonin Joppa khoa sopite phabep’in jong aki-lhonpeuve .
44010024	Ajingin amaho Caesarea khopi alhungun , Cornelius chun aphunggol ho le agol apai ngaitah tah ho akoukhomin ana ngah jinge .
44010025	Peter ahung lut phat’in Cornelius chun analamdot paiyin , akengphang bul’ah aboh khup’in chibai aboh tai .
44010026	Ahinla Petein ama chu akaiding loiyin , “ Dingdoh-in keijong mihem kahibouve , ” ati .
44010027	Hitia akihoupi pum hin insunga alut leh mi tampi kikhom agatoh-in ,
44010028	hijeh chun aman ajah-uvah , “ Juda min jatchom mi kiloipia ahenga kholai leh hi Dan toh akitolou nang hon jong nahecheh-ui ; ahinla Pathenin mihem koima aboh le atheng lou kiti louna din eivetsah tai ;
44010029	hijeh a chu eihung kisol’a lung sa-ih louhel’a hung kahi . Hichejeh a chu kadoh nahi , ipi thua neihung kou sahba ham ? ” ati .
44010030	Cornelius chun adonbut’in , “ Tu phat gei hin ni li alhingtan , nilhah lam nidan thum don’a kainsunga katao pet’in ven , kama sanga ponbang leh sil mi khat ana dingin ,
44010031	‘ Cornelius , nataona akisangin , mi thil napeh chengse chu Pathen angsunga akigeldoh jinge .
44010032	Joppaa mi sol’in lang Peter kiti Simon chu gakousah tan ; ama chu Twikhanglen panga cheng savun sem Simon in’a lhung ahi , ’ ati .
44010033	Hijeh a chu nakou ding kahinsol pai jengle , hitia nahung jeng hi apha lheh-e . Tua keiho chengse hi Pathen mitmua kikhoma , Pakaiyin ipi naseisah ding ham ngai dia um kahiuve , ” ati .
44010034	Peter apaodoh-in , “ Tahbehin Pathenin mi le mi kah a lang kaina aneipoi , ti kahedoh tai ;
44010035	chitin namtin lah a koi hileh Ama ginga adih bol jouse chu ama dia santhei ahicheh-e ,
44010036	Aman mi jouse Pakai , Jesu Christaa chun Israel chate henga dingin chamna Kipana Thupha thu chu ahinthot’in ,
44010037	Johnin baptize chandol lhang asap jouvin Galilee gama pat Judea gam pumpia athu athangsoh tai , ti naheuve ;
44010038	Nazareth Jesu chu Pathenin Lhagao Theng le thahat abuh lhah khumin , Pathenin akivopi jeh-in Ama achelen Diabol bol gentheiya aumte adamsah-in napha atong lei .
44010039	Judea gamsung le Jerusalema thil hichengse abol hetoh a pang keiho kahiuve ; ama chu thinga akhaiyun athat tauve .
44010040	Ahinla Pathenin Ama chu nithum lhin nin thinaa konin akaithouvin , akiphondohsah chu
44010041	japi heng ahilou vangin Pathenin hettohsah a pang dia alhentum keiho heng ahin ; hiti chun thinaa kona athodoh nungin Amatoh kanekhom kadon khom’uve ;
44010042	chule mipi henga Ama hi Pathenin mihing le mithi thutan dinga atun ahitai ti kasap leuva kahettohsah diuvin eithu lhah-uve .
44010043	Themgao jousen Ama thudol ahttohsah-u ahin , koi hileh Ama tahsan jouse chu Ama min jal’a chonset ngaidamna amu ding aseiyui , ” ati .
44010044	Peterin hiche hi asei nalaiyin thu ngaiho jouse chunga Lhagao Theng achutai .
44010045	Chidang namdang ho chung geiya Lhagao Theng kipe akibuh khum jeng chu Peter toh hung lhon cheptan mi atahsan loiyin adatmo lheh jenguve .
44010046	Ijeh-inem itile paochom chom thoa Pathen avahchoiyu chu ajah-u ahi . Chutah chun Peterin adonbut’in ,
44010047	“ Eiho chan banga Lhagao Theng changtaa hite ho Baptize channa ding twi kham theididng koiham ? ”
44010048	Hiti chun amaho chu Jesu Christa min a baptize chang din aseitai . Amahon Peter chu niphabep beh nichong dingin alhoutauve .
44011001	solchah ho le Judea gamsunga sopiten chiding namdangten jong Pathen thu akisanu hi ajatauve .
44011002	Peter Jerusalema agalhun touleh cheptan loiyin ama ana oimouvin ,
44011003	“ Ibol’a cheptan lou miho henga chea an nehkhompi nahim ? ” atiuve .
44011004	Hichun Peter akipanin aban chan ajah-uvah aseipeh-in ,
