44011005	“ Joppa khopia katao leh gao kachangin , Thengao thilmua mu kanei na-a thilpheng hep hop khat van’a kona aninglia hung kikhai lhaa , keima komcha hung ki-nga kamun ,
44011006	phatecha kavet chenset leh neh thei ganhing nam kim , chunga leng vachate kamui .
44011007	Hichun ogin khat hin kajah a , ‘ Peter , kipat’in that’in lang nen , ati kajai .
44011008	Ahinla keiman , ‘ Hithei hih hel’inte Pakai , thilboh le atheng lou imacha kakamsunga lut kha louhel ahi , ’ kati .
44011009	Ahivangin ogin chun van’a konin nivei chan nan eihindohbut’in , ‘ Pathenin asuh thengsa chu bohsa hih-in , eiti .
44011010	Hitobang hin thumvei ahung kibol’in van’a akitol toutai .
44011011	Hichun ven , hichepet tah ahi Caesarea kona kahenga hung kisol mi thum chu kalhunna in maiya ana ding tauve .
44011012	Lhagaovin ma lung sa-ih louhel’a amaho chutoh lhona kache din eiseipeh-e . Hicheng sopi gup ho jong hin eilhonpuiuvin , mipa insunga chun kaluttauve .
44011013	Mipa chun kajah-uva a-in a Vantil ding amun , ‘ Joppa mi sol’in lang Peter kiti Simon chu gakousahtan ,
44011014	aman nang le na-insung pumpi huhhinga naum na diu Thupha naseipeh dingu ahi , ’ ati thu aseitai .
44011015	Ajahuva thusei kagah kipat panbep leh abul’a eiho chunga achuh bang chun amaho chunga jong Lhagao Theng achutai .
44011016	Hichun kenjong Pakaiyin , ‘ Johnin twiya baptize achansah ahin , nang ho vang Lhagao Thenga baptize nachansah diu ahi , ’ ati chu kageldoh-e .
44011017	Chutia Pathenin Pakai Jesu christa itahsanuva eipeh-u thilpeh tobang chu amaho jong apeh leh , kei koi kahiya Pathen kakham thei ding ham ? ” ati .
44011018	Amahon hiche hi ajah phat’un aneldauvin , Pathen avahchoiyun , “ Ahile Pathenin chiding namdang te jong hinna dia lung heina apeh ahita ong ! ” atiuve .
44011019	Thoh hahsa asoa Stephen kitha lo jeh a jamcheh chengse chu Phoenicia le Cyprus chule Antioch geiyin acheuvin , koima dang jah a seilouvin Judate henga Thu chu aseileuve .
44011020	Ahin alah-uva phabep Cyprus le Cyrene miho , Antioch ahung lhun phat’un Greek miho toh akihouvun Pakai Jesu aseiphongtauve .
44011021	Amaho chu Pakaiyin aban thahat’in ahu jingun , hijeh chun Pakaiya atahsan mitamtah akihei luttauve .
44011022	Hiche thu hi Jerusalema Houbungin ajatan , hijeh chun Barnabas chu Antioch geiyin asol’un ,
44011023	ama ahungleh Pathenin alungset nau amun akipah lheh jengin , ama ho chu Pakaiya lunggil tah a um chah jing din atilkhouvin ahi ;
44011024	ajeh ch Barnabs hi mipha le Lhagao Theng dimset chule tahsan det mi ahi . Mi tampi Pakaiya alutbe tauve .
44011025	Barnabas chu Saul hol din Tarsus a achen ,
44011026	Saul amudoh phat’in Antioch a ahinpuiye . Kum khat lhingset amanin miho chu Houbunga akikhoppi ji lhonin , mi tampi ahil lhonin , hiche Antioch khoa hi seijuite chu ‘ Chritian ’ ahinsah masah pen’u ahi .
44011027	Hiche lai hin Themgao phabep Jerusalema konin Antioch a achesuh-ui ;
44011028	chuin alah-uva amin Agabus kitipa chu akipatdoh-in Lhagao thahat’in vannoi pumpia kel lhah ding asei masan , hiche hi Claudius nikho laiyin aguilhunge .
44011029	Hijeh chun seijuite chu ajikham cheh a thil tokhoma Judea gama sopite thot dingin akiloltauve ;
44011030	adongkhom’un Barnabas le Saul khut’ah Houbung upate agah thot’ui .
44012001	Hiche lai hin Herod lengpan Houbung mi konkhat chunga ban-gol khautah-inna atongin abolsetai .
44012002	John upa Jacob chu chemjamin athattai .
44012003	Amitha hin Juda miho along lhaisah amun , Peter jong amatbe kit’e , aphat hi cholsolou changlhah kut lai ahiye .
44012004	Peter amat chun songkul’a akhumin , mi li lia kiloi sepaiho chun kilhauva a-nga diduvin apedoh-in , kalchuh ku tkichai tang mipi ang’a puidoh dingin agoi .
44012005	Hiti hin songkul’a akhumtan , ahinla Houbungin ama din lung luttah-in Pathen henga ataopeh-uve .
44012006	Herod-in Peter chu puidoh dinga agotin jan chun Peter , a-ngah sepaite kah a a-ihmun , thih khao nin akihenin , kotpi bul’a jong a-ngah a pang sepaiho adding jingui .
44012007	Hichun ven , Pakaiya kon Vantil khat ahung kilah-in , akikhumna bom sung avahcahnsel’e ; Vantil chun Peter pang abengin asukhangin , “ kipatdoh loiyin ! ” ati . Chutah chun akhut te nia akihenna thih khao te ni chu akilhamtai .
44012008	Chuin Vantil chun ajah a , “ Nakong kigahin nakengchot te ni kise loiyin , ” ati . Aman chutin aboltai . Chuin ajaha , “ Naponin kihiutup loiyin neihin juiyin , ” ati .
44012009	Peter apotdoh-in ama chu ajuitai ; hichea chun Vantil thilbol chu atahbeh a soh-in agelpon , gaochanga mu aneiyin agelbouve .
44012010	Vantil le Peter chun kotngah masa le ani na akhel lhon leh khopi sung lutna thih kotkha apha lhonin , kotkhah chu ama ni dingin acham tah-in akihong jengin , apotdoh lhonin khosung lamlen khat ajui lhonleh Vantil chung Peter adalhapaitai .
44012011	hichun Peter akhangdoh lap’in “ Tua vang Pakaiyin avantil ahinsol’a Herod ban thahat le Judate kinepna chengsea eihuhdoh ahitai , ti kahedoh tai , ” ati .
44012012	Ahetdoh phat hin Peter chu aminchom Mark kiti John nu Mary in’a ahungleh mi tampi kikhomin anataovui .
44012013	Aman kot pi nung chu akiu leh donbut din amin Rhoda kiti lhacha numei khat ahunge ,
44012014	ahin Peter ogin ahi ahetdoh phat’in akipah behseh jengin kot honta louvin alhai lut’in kot po lama Peter din thu chu agaseiphong jo tai .
44012015	Ahinla mihon amanu jah a , “ A-gol’a nahi , ” atiuve . Amanun atah mong ahi thu asei tei tei vangin , amahon , “ A-Vantil hiya chu , ” atibep’ui .
44012016	Ahinla Peterin kot akiu kiu jeng phat’in agah hon’u leh ama amu cheh-un kidang asalheh jenguve .
44012017	Hichun Peterin athip behna diuvin khut ajap’in , Pakaiyin itobanga kidangtah a songkul’a kona ahin puidoh ham , ti thu aseiyin , “ Hicheng thusoh hi Jacob le sopite gaseipeh tauvin , ” atin , apotdoh-in munchoma achetai .
44012018	Khovah vah-in Peter chung change thusoh jeh chun sepaiho lah a boina lentah asodoh tai .
44012019	Herod chun Peter ahol’a amudoh jou lou phat’in a-ngah a pang ho thu atantai . Amavang chu Judea gama konin Caesarea achesuh-in chukoma aumdentai .
44012020	herod chu Tyre le Sidon mite chunga along hang lheh jenge ; hijeh chun agam miho loikhat ahungun , lengpa Semanga pang Blastus chu athu nun’un cham lensah din athum’ui ; ijeh-inem itileh agam miteu chun Herod lengpa gama neh le chah akilah-u ahiye .
44012021	Akitepniuvin Herod chun lengpon chol akisil’in , laltouna atouvin , ajah-uva thu aseiye .
44012022	Hichun mipin asam’un , “ Mihem ogin ahibouve , ” atiuve .
44012023	Aman loupina chu Pathen pelouva aumjeh-in hiche pettah chun Pakaiya kon Vantil khat’in adengin , lungin anen athitai .
44012024	Pathen thu vang achal jal’in akhatou cheh tai .
44012025	Barnabas le Saul vang chu kin achaisoh lhon phat’in aminchom Mark kiti John chu ahinpui lhonin Jerusalema konin ahungkile kit lhontai .
44013001	Antioch khoa Houbunga chun Themgao le mihilphabep aumun ; amahon chu Barnabas , Nigerkiti Simeon , Cyrene gam mi Lucius , gambih vaipo Herod toh seilet tha Manaen chule Saul ahiuve .
44013002	Amaho chu Pakai kinbol’a an a-ngol laitah-un Lhagao thengin , “ Kakouna natong din Barnabas le Saul neipedoh-uvin , ” ati .
44013003	Hijeh chun an ngol’a atao jouvun achung lhona thenso khut ngap abol’un asoldoh tauve .
44013004	Lhagao Theng sol’a konin Barnabas le Saul chu Seleucia ajonsuh lhonin , chua pat’in Cyprus lama akitol lhontai .
44013005	Salamis kho alhun phat lhonin Judate Houthua kikhopna in hoa Pathen thu aseiphong lhonin , akithopi lhon ding John jong ahiuve .
44013006	Twikol gamsung achotsoh-uva Paphos kho ahung gei phat’in Juda mi Temgao lhem , mitpheldoi them Bar-Jesu kitipa chu amudoh tauve ;
44013007	ama hi twikol gamvaipopa , Sergius Paulus , milung chingtah chutoh kihe ahin , gamvaipopan Pathen thu asei lhon ngai dingin Barnabas le Saul chu akouve .
44013008	Hichea chun mitpheldoi thempa Greek paova amin Elymas jong atipau chun amani thusei adoudal len gamvaipopan atahsan louna ding aboltai .
44013009	Chuin Paul kitipa Saul chu Lhagao Theng adimset’in amapa chu ave changel’in ,
44013010	“ Vo thilpha jouse doudal , lhep lhahna le nambolna dimset , Diabol son , Pakai lampi dih heikonle ding nabol hi natat lou lai ding ham ?
44013011	Tun ven , Pakaiyin nachunga khut alhatai , phat chom khat sunga nisa vah him him namu loudidng ahi , ” atileh ; apettah chun meijing le muthimin ahintomin , kho amulou jeh chun akhut’a kaile ding mi aholtai .
44013012	Hichun Gamvaipopan thilsoh chu amun Pakai thudol kihilna kidang asan atahsantai .
44013013	Paul le aloite ni chu Paphos a konin akitol’un Pamphylia gama perga kho alhungun , Johnin amani dalhan Jerusalema ahung kile kittai .
44013014	Paul le Barnabas vang achepai lhonin Pisidia gama Antioch kho alhung lhonin Choldo nikhon Houthua kikhopna in’a alut’in atou lhontai .
44013015	Danthubu le Themgao lekhabu akisim chaiyin Houthua kikhopna in vaihonpan miho asol’in ajah lhona , “ sopite ni mipi tilkhouna ding thu nanei lhon leh sei lhonin , ” agatisah-e .
44013016	Hijeh chun Paul adingdoh-in khut ajah-in aseiyin : “ Israel mite le Pathen gingte jousen ngaiyun .
44013017	Hiche Isreal mite Pathen chun i-pu i-pateu analhengdoh-in , Egypt gama apemlaiyun achoi len lheh jengin , aban thahat panin ahinpuidohtai .
44013018	Kum som li tobang sungin pa naovah bangin gamthip noiya akhan chah-u aven ,
44013019	chuin Canaan gamsunga mihem nam sagi asuhmang phat’in agam’u chu agoulo diuvin apen ,
44013020	kum ja li le som nga geiyin achenguve . Hiche nung chun Samuel Themgao nikho lai geiyin amaho chu Thutan vaibol ho apen ahi .
44013021	Chuin amahon leng athum’u leh Pathenin Benjamin phunga Kish chapa Saul chu kum som li geiyin akoipeh-e .
44013022	Pathenin Saul chu apaidoh nungin aleng thudol’a hin Keiman kalung dei tah David , Jesse chapa kamudoh tai , aman kalungdei chan abol ding ahi , ’ tin hettohsahnan aseitai .
44013023	David chilhah a kon hin thutep dungjuiyin Pathenin Huhhingpa Jesu chu ahinlhut tan ahi .
44013024	Jesu kiphondoh masang hin Johnin lungheiya baptize chan ding thu Israel mipi henga aseiphonge .
44013025	John chun atoh achaisoh ding konin , ‘ Nang hon kei hi koiya neigel’um ? Keima Ama chukahipoi ; amavang ven , kanunga khat ahunge , kei hi Ama kengchot khao te ni sut lham dia jong kilom kahipoi , ’ ati .
44013026	“ Abraham chilhah sopite le nalah-uva Pathen ging miho , hiche Huhhingna thu hi eiho henga hung kithot ahitai .
44013027	Ijeh-inem itile Jerusalema ilengteu le avaipouteuvin Ama chu anahedoh pouvin , Choldo niseh le kisimji Themgao thuseiho hcu guilhunsah nan hekhen louvin Ama chu themmo achan’un ,
44013028	athina thei lom themmona amudoh jou lou geiyun jong Pilate henga atha na din a-ngeh-uve ;
44013029	achung chang thudol kisei jouse asuh bulhingsoh phat’un thing chunga akikhainaa konin adom lhauvin avuitauve .
44013030	Ahinla Pathenin Ama chu thinaa konin akaithouvin ,
44013031	nikho phabep pi sungin Galiee gama pat Jerusalem lama alhonpi miho henga akilah jin , amaho chu tua hi mipi henga hettohsah a pang ahiuve .
44013032	Chule pu le pate henga hungsoh dinga kiteppeh thutep chu keihon kipah tah a kaseiphongu ahi ,
44013033	hiche chu Pathenin achateu eiho henga aguilhunsah nan Jesu chu akaithouvin , athudol hi labu ninaa akisunin : ‘ Nangma kachapa , Tunia kahin nahi , ’ akiti .
44013034	Mon mangna mu louhel dinga Pathenin thinaa kona akaithou thudol chu hiti jong hin aseiye : ‘ Keiman David kipe thonlou le atheng Phattheina kapeh ding nahiuve , ’ akiti .
44013035	Aman labu munchom khat’a jong aseiyin : ‘ Nalhentum lhachapa chu Nangin mon mang dia naphaldoh lou idndg ahi , ’ akiti .
44013036	David vang chun ama khang laiyin Pathen toh akivuithan , mon mangna amutan ,
44013037	Pathenin akai thou kitpan van gmin mangna amupoi .
44013038	Hijeh a chu hiche hi nahet cheh diu ahi sopite , Jesu jal’a chonset jouse ngaidamna thudodl nahenguva kaseiphongu ahin , Mose Danthua kona them nachan jou louna jouseuva chu
44013039	koi hile atahsan chan them chang’ah ahi .
44013040	Hijeh chun Themgaoho thusei nachunguva ahung chuh louna din ching theiyun :
44013041	‘ Veuvin nahsahmo ho , Kidang sauvin lang mangthah-un ; Ajeh chu nanikho laiyun thil Hitobang thil hi min seipeh jong leu chun natahsan lou hel diu ahi , ’ tia asei chu , ” ati .
44013042	Akikhendoh phat’un mihon Choldo nikit jongleh ajah-uva hiche ho aseipeh kit diuvin a-ngeh-uve .
44013043	Houthua kikhopna in’a akikhendoh dodh-uvin Juda mi tampi le Juda houva kilalut ah hougut tampin Paul le Barnabas nung ajuiyun , amanin amaho chu Pathen lungset naa umdet jing din atilkhou lhone .
44013044	Choldo nikit’in akhothing hel tobangin Pakai thu kisei ngai didngin akikhomtauve .
44013045	Mipi kihonlel lul’a akikhop jengu chu Juda hon amudoh phat’un athangseuvin , Paul thuseichu ataitom’un anel kale tauve .
44013046	Ahinla Paul le Barnabas hangtah-in thu asei lhonin , “ Pathen thu hi amasaa nang ho seipeh lou khoh ahin , nang hon napai manguva tonsot hinna chang dia kilom nakisah louvu leh , ven chiding namdangte henga kihei tauvinge .
44013047	Ijeh-inem itile Pakaiyin keiho hitia hi eiseipeh-u ahi : ‘ Keiman nang hi chidnag nam dang salvah dia katun’a , Vannoi pumpia sochatna lampi dia katun nahi , ’ tia asei ahi , ” ati .
44013048	Chidang namdang hon hicheng hi ajah phat’un akipah-un Pakai thu kisei chu achoi-an’un tonsot hinna chang dia kigosadema um hon atahsan tauve .
44013049	Chuin Pakai thu hiche gamkol sungsea chun achalsoh tai .
44013050	Amavang Juda mihon hougut numei lal ho le khopi sunga lamkaiho atilseuvin , Paul le Barnabas abolset sah-uvin agamkol sunguva konin adeldohsah tauve .
44013051	Amanin amaho dounan akeng phanga leivui athin lhah khum lhonin Iconium lama ache lhontai .
44013052	Seijui ho vang chu kipana le Lhagao thengin adimsetu’ve .
44014001	Iconium khoa Juda ho Houthua kikhopna in’a alut khom lhonin , hitima chun thu asei lhon le Judate le Greek mi tampin atahsan tauve .
44014002	Hichun Juda mi atahsang lou hon sopite dounan chiding namdang ho atilseuvin adsulung hangtauve .
44014003	Ahivangin ama ni sotpi anichong lhonin , alungsetna thu hettohsah a amani khut’a melchihna thil kidang tampi bolsah Pakaiya hangtah-in thu asei jom jing lhone .
44014004	Hichun khopi sung miho chu kehni akisouvin , abang Juda miho langa apangun , abang solchah te ni lama apangui .
44014005	Ahinla chiding namdang ho le Juda mi phabep’in alamkaiteu toh kithon amani chu nahsahmoa bol’a songa seding agouvin ahile ,
44014006	amanin ahetdoh lhon phat’in Lycania khopi Lystra le Derbe chule akimvel gamsunga ajamlut lhontai ;
44014007	hikom dunga jong chun Kipana Thupha aseiphong lhone .
44014008	Lystra khoa chun apen’a pat kengbai , itih a jong lamjot louhel , akeng chasah thei lou hel pasal khat atouvin ahi .
44014009	Amahin Paul thusei angaiyin , Paul’in avechangmel’in ahileh damsah theina kham tahsan anei chu amun ,
44014010	oging tah in , “ nakeng te nin ding jangin , ” ati . Mipa chu ahung kichomdoh jengin avah le paitai .
44014011	Mipin Paul thilbol chu amu phat’uvin Lycaonia paovin oging tah-in , “ Eiho lah a Pathen ho chu mihem lim’a hung kumlha ahitauve ! ” tin asamtauve .
44014012	Barnabas chu Zeus asah-un , Paul chu thusei lamkai ahijeh-in Hermes asah-uve .
44014013	Chule khopi maiya ahouin kisa Zeus doi Thempupan bongchal ho ahinkaiyin pahvui ho jong ahinchoiyin dongkot phunga mipi chutoh amani hounaa kilhaina gan tha din agouve .
44014014	Ahinla solchah te ni Barnabas le Paul’in ajahdoh lhon phat’in aponsil abottel jeng lhonin mipi lah a alhai lut lhonin apengjah lhontan ,
44014015	“ Miho , idia hiti ho hi nabol’u ham ? Keini jong nang ho banga mihem kahi lhonin , hitobang pannabei thil hoa kona hi van le leiset chule Twikhanglen le asunga um jouse Sempa , Pathen hing jing henga nakiheina diuva Kipana Thupha kaseipeh lhon nahibouvui .
44014016	Aman khang masa laiyin chitin namtin hi Ama dei cheh a chon din alhan ,
44014017	ahivangin Ama ipi ahichu hettohsahna beiyin akoidehpoi , ajeh chu thilpha aboljin , van’a konin gotwi napeuvin , muchi chivo gaphat , kumkihei chin nakoipeh-un , neh le chah napeuvin , nalungthimu kipa le thanopna adim jinge , ” ati lhone .
44014018	Hicheng hi asei lhonin amani houna dinga gan athagot’u chu asutang nah nah lhone .
44014019	Hichea chun Antioch le Iconiuma kona hung Juda mihon mipi chu athu anun’un Paul chu songin asesah-un , athi ahitai , tin khopi polama akaidohtauve .
44014020	Ahinla akoma seijuite adin pet’uvin Paul athoudoh-in khopi sunga aluttai ; ajing nikhon Barnabas toh Derbe lama ache lhontan ahi ,
44014021	Hiche khopia chu Kipana Thupha aseiphong lhona , seijuitampi asemdoh jou lhonin Lystra le Iconium chule Antioch lama ahung kile kit lhonin ,
44014022	genthei hesoh tampi thoh a Pathen lenggama ilut mong diu ahi tin tahsana pang det jing dingin seijuiho atilkhou lhon in alungu asuhal lhon’e .
44014023	Houbung jousea Houbung upa alhenpeh lhonin , an ngol’in ataovun , atahsanpau Pakaiyah upa ho chu apedoh doh jenguve .
44014024	Paul le Barnabas-in Pisidia ajotpa lhoin Pamphylia alhung lhonin ,
44014025	Perga thu aseiphong jou lhonin Attalia achesuh lhontai .
44014026	Chua konin kongin akitol lhonin , ahintoh chaisoh lhon hiche natoh tong dinga Pathen lungsetnaa akipehdohna lhon khopi , Antioch jonin ache lhontai .
44014027	Ahung lhun lhon phat’in Houbung mi abonchan akhom lhonin , Pathenin amani amanchah a atoh jouse aseidoh lhonin , chiding namdangte dia tahsan lam kihon thu asei lhon’e .
44014028	Antioch khoa seijuite toh sotpi aumkhomna lhon chu phat chomcha ahipoi .
44015001	Judea gama konin mi phabep ahungun sopite chu , “ Mose Danthu dungjuiya chepnatan louvu leh huhhingin umthei pouvin nate , ” tin ahiltauve .
44015002	Hiche thudol’a chun Paul le Barnabas toh akihanel lheh jengun akinahso phat’un athu ngaito khom din Paul le Barnabas to midang phabep toh Jerusalema chea Solchah ho le upaho toh kihoutoh din alhengdoh tauve .
44015003	Houbung sol’a konin amaho acheuvin Phoenicia le Samaria ajot pepeh-un , chidnag namdang ho Pathena akiheilut thu aseipeh-u le sopite cheng akipah lheh-ui .
44015004	Jerusalem alhun phat’un Houbung miho le Solchah ho chule Houbung upahon analamtouvin , ama hon ajah-uva Pathenin amaho amanchah a na atoh chengse aseiyuve .
44015005	Hichea hin atahsansa ahivanga Pharisee loi hinalai mi phabep akipatdoh-un , “ Amaho chu chep tanpeh a Mose Danthu anit tei diu ahi , ” tin asei yui .
44015006	Solchah ho le Houbung upaho hiche thu ngaito ding hin akikhom tauve .
44015007	Tamtah a kholtohna anei nungun Peter akipatdoh-in ajahuva , “ Sopite , masang chun nang ho lah a kona keima kama hi chiding namdangten Kipana Thupha ajah-uva atahsanna diuva keima Pathenin eilhendoh chu naheuve ,
44015008	chule mei lungthim hesoh Pathenin ahenguva ahettohsah-in , eiho eipeh bangun amaho jong Lhagao Theng apei ;
44015009	ei ho le amaho kah a dat neichom louvin tahsanin alungthimu asuthengtai .
44015010	Chuti ahileh ibol’a tua ipu ipateu leh eihon jong ipoh jou louvu namkoljon chu seijuite lengkouva naseuva Pathen napatep’u ham ?
44015011	Keihon vang Pakai Jesu lungset vanga tahsan jal’a huhhinga eiho i-um diu banga amaho jong chute dinga katahsanu ahi , ” ati .
44015012	Akikhom mipi chu athip chet jengun , Barnabas le Paul’in Pahtenin amani amanchah achidang namdangte lah a melchihna ho le thil kidang aboldoh ho asei lhon chu angaisoh keiyuve .
44015013	Amanin thu asei chai lhonin Jacob’in adonbut’in , “ Sopite kasei ngai ta diuvin !
44015014	Simonin chiding namdangte Pathenin avil’a alah-uva kona ama min’a ding mi alhendoh thu aseitai .
44015015	Hiche hi Themgaoho thusei toh akitoh soh keiyin hitin akisune :
44015016	‘ Hiche nung hileh Keima hung kile kit’ing ting , Alhusa David houbuh chu kasah phat’a ; A-in gem jouse kasah phat ding , Katundoh kit ding ahi ;
44015017	Chutia chu mihem amoh chengsen Pakai ahol theiyuva , Kamin a kikou chiding namdang jousen jong ahol thei ding , atin ,
44015018	khanglui laiya pat hicheng thil ho hetsah Pakaiyin aseiye , ’ kiti ahi .
44015019	Hijeh chun chidang namdang ho lah a kona Pathen lama hung kiheiho lah a kona Pathen lama hung kiheiho chu bolgenthei dau hite , tin ka-ngaitoi ;
44015020	amavang amaho chu lekha thot’u hitin , doi houna thil thenglou neh , jon thanghoi , alol kimeh a kithatsa le thisan neh a kona kitim them din hil’u hite ;
44015021	ijeh-inem itile khanglui laiya pat Mose’in khop jouseah athusei ding anei jingin , Choldo nikho seh leh ama thudol Houthua kikhopna in jouse akisim jenge ; ” ati .
44015022	Solchah ho leh Houbung upaho chule Houbung pumpi lung gel’in alah-uva kona mi lhendoh a Paul le Barnabas toh Antioch khoa sol din pha asauvin , Barsabbas kiti Judas le Silas , sopiten ajabol cheh te ni chu alhengun ,
44015023	aban’a kisei bang hin asun’un amani khut’a athot tauve ; “ Solchah ho leh Houbung upa , sopite chengsen , Antioch leh Syria chule Cilicia gama um chidang namdang ho lah a sopite chengse kasalam’ui .
44015024	Keiho lah a konin mi koi koiham kei ho thupeh louhel’in ahungun thu tampin nahung sulung jingun lung ling laovin nakoiyui , ti kajauve ;
44015025	hijeh chun keihon lung khat tah-in mi lhendoh a amaho chu nahenguva i-ngailut tah-u Barnabas le Paul toh hinsol tha ding pha kasauve ,
44015026	amaho hi i-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa min’a ahinkho phal ngam cheh ahiuve .
44015027	Hijeh a chu Judas le Silas kahinsol’u ahin , amanin jong hiti amaho hi thuchangin seipeh nauvinte .
44015028	Ijeh-inem itile Lhagao Thengin jong keihon jong akhoh cheh ho tilou pohgih hahsa dang na chunguva koi lou ding pha kasauvin ,
44015029	limsemthu houna doisa , hicheng hi neh dauvin , jon thanhoiya konin kikangse leu chun pha ding hi , damsel’uvin , ” atiuve .
44015030	Amaho chu alhah doh phat’un Antioch khoa achesuhuvin , mipi akhop khomsoh phat’uvin lekha thot chu apetauve .
44015031	Miho chun asimu leh tikhouna thuho chu akipapi lheh jenguve .
44015032	Judas le Silas hi anilhona Themgao gel ahilhonjeh-in sopite chu thu tampin atikhou lhonin ahatsah cheh lheh lhon’e .
44015033	Chukoma chom khat set aum jou lhonin ahinsol ho henga dingin sopiten amani chu lung mongin alhadoh tauve .
44015034	Silas vang chu anichon ding joh aphat jeh-in aum den tai .
44015035	Paul le Barnabas chu Antioch khoa mi tamtah toh aum khom lhonin , Pakai thu ahil chenin aseiphong lhon’e .
44015036	Phat chom khat nungin Paul chun Barnabas jah a , “ Hungin Pakai thu i-naseiphongna khopi jousea chekit hitin sopite chu itobanga iti nauvem gave hite , ” ati .
44015037	Hichun Barnabas-in Mark kitipa John chu amani toh kilhona pui din angaitoi .
44015038	Ahinla Paul’in Pamphylia amani dalhaa na toh-khompi nom lou mi chutoh kilhon khom lou ding thilpha pen ahisah-e .
44015039	Hijeh chun Paul le Barnabas akihanel ten lhon phat’in akikhenlo lhonin , Barnabas chun Mark akipuiyin Cyprus lam jonin kongin akitol’in ,
44015040	Paul’in vang Silas akilhenin , sopiten jong Pakai lungsetnan alhadoh-un , ama jong akipatdohtai .
44015041	Paul chun Syria le Cilicia ajotpeh-in Houbung jouse atilkhoupeh-in ahi .
44016001	Paul chu Derbe kho le Lystra khoa ahunge . Ven , Lystra khoa chun apa Greek mi , atahsan Juda numei khat cha amin Timothy kit seijui khat aumin ,
44016002	ama hi Lystra kho le Iconium khoa sopite jousen aseipha lheh jengui .
44016003	Paul’in Timothy hi kilhonpi ding adeijeh-in , chuti dunga um Juda hon apa Greek mi ahi ahetjeh-uvin apuiyin chep atanpeh-e .
44016004	Hichun amahon khopi jouse achonsoh keiyun , Jerusalema Solchah ho le upaho kilolna chengse chu nit din miho apeleuvin ahi .
44016005	Hijeh chun Houbung ho chu tahsan lama ahat cheh cheh jengun , niseh-in amijat apun be be jenguve .
44016006	Amahon Asia gamsunga thu asei diu Lhagao Thengin akham jeh-in Phrygia le Galatia gamkol sungse ajotsoh keiyun ,
44016007	Mysia gam gal ahung gei phat’uvin Bithynia lut ding akigot’u leh Jesu Lhagaovin aphalpeh pouve ;
44016008	hijeh chunMysia gam ajot paiyun Troas a achesuh tauve .
44016009	Hiche jan chun Paul agaochan naa mu aneiyin , Macedonia mi khat hi ahungna dingin ataovin , “ Macedonia hung galkaiyin neihung kithopiuvin , ” ati .
44016010	Paul’in gaochan naa mu anei jou jou hin Pathenin Kipana Thupha chu miho hil dinga eikouvu ahi , tin kagel’uvin Macedonia gama chelut ding kasompaitauve .
44016011	Troas a pat kakitol’uvin paljangin Samothrace kajon’un , ajing nikhon Neapolis kalhunguve ;
44016012	hichea kon chun Macedonia gam kolsunga khopi minthang pen , Rome mite tolpi Philippi kalhung tauve . Hiche khopia hin nikho phabeppi kanichongui .
44016013	Choldo nikhon taona mun khat aume , ti kaginchat nau khopi dongkot polam vadung panga chun kacheuvin , katouvun numei hung kikhomho jah a thu kaseitauve .
44016014	Kathuseiyu ngaiya numei khat chu amin Lydia ahin , Thytira khopia hung kon , ponsandup joh a pang , Pathen hou khat ahi , Paul thuseiho lung luttah a angaina din Pakaiyin along kot ahonpeh tai .
44016015	Amanu hi-ainsung mite to baptize achan phat’in , “ Pakai tahsan tah beh a neigel’u leh ka-in’a hung lhunguvin , ” tin eijol’uvin , eithu nun tauvin ahi .
44016016	Taona muna chu kacheu le khonung thusoh ding seiya apute dinga phatchomna lentah mupeh lhagaoboh vop soh nu-ngah khat hin eitoh khauvin ahi .
44016017	Hiche nu hin Paul le keiho nung ajuiyin , “ Hiche miho hi Pathen chungnung pen lhachate ahiuvin , huhhingna lampi nahung hil’u ahi , ” tin asam sam jenge .
44016018	Hitobang hin nikho tampi sungin abol jinge . Paul’in athei chimjeh phat’in akiheiyin lhagao jah achun , “ Hiche nua koon chun hung potdoh jengin , tia Jesu Christa min a kasol nahi , ” atileh ; hichepet tah chun lhagao chu apotdoh tai .
44016019	Aputeu akinepnau phatchom na aneidiu sum mu na ding abeitai , ti amudoh phat’un Paul le Silas chu aman’uvin kailhang mun’a vaipoho ang sunga akailutauve ;
44016020	hitia hi thutan vaihomho heng alhut phat’un , “ Hiche mi te ni hi Juda mi ahi lhonin , i-kho sungu asuboi lheh jeng lhontai .
44016021	Ama nin Rome mi eiho dinga jop thei lou le lah thei lou chondan sodoh dingin ago lhon’e , ” atiuve .
44016022	Mipin ma amani anokhum jeng phat’uvin , vaipoten aponsil lhon ahoh lhauvin mol’a voh din thupeh aneitauve .
44016023	Mol’a tamtah vei avoh jouvun songkul’a akhum’uvin , songkul ngahpa chun kitup keiya a-nga din ahilchah tauve .
44016024	Hitobanga hil chahna aneijeh-uvin songkul ngahpan songkul sung nung lama akoiyin , akhochong lhon’a bul atuh-in ahi .
44016025	Jan khangkim donin Paul le Silas Pathen henga atao lhona la asah lhon le sohchang dang hon angaiyuve ;
44016026	hichun photlot louvin lingnasa tah ahung kihot’in ahile songkul bul ahot kangsoh tan , apettah chun kotpi jouse akihong don tan , akihen nau bul jouse geiyin akilhamsohtai .
44016027	Songkul ngahpa ahung kin khah le kotkhah jouse kihongsa um chu amun , sohchang jouse jamdoh hitante , tin ama kithah din achemjam asatdoh jenge .
44016028	Hichun Paul’in going tah-in asamin , “ Kithat didng kigo hih hel’in keiho ka-umsoh keinauve , ” ati .
44016029	Chuphat’in aman meivah athum loiyin alhai lut’in , kichaa kithing thingin Paul le Silas angsunga alhu jengin ,
44016030	chuin amani chu ahinpuidoh-in , “ Pu te ni , huhhinga ka-umna dinga kabol khoh-pen ding ipi ham ? ” atileh ;
44016031	Amanin , “ Pakai Jesu tahsan le chun nang le na-insung mi huhhinga naum diu ahi , ” ati .
44016032	Hiti hin ama le a-insunga um chengse jah a Pakai thu aseipeh lhontai .
44016033	Hiche nidanle le hin janlaiyin songkul ngahpan amani chu apuiyin , avoh nau maha jouse asop theng peh-in , a-insung mite le ama baptize achangtai .
44016034	Chujouvin amani chu ain’a ahinpuitouvin a-angsung lhona ankong aluipeh-in , Pathen atahsan jeh chun a-insung mite jouse to kipah thanom khom-uve .
44016035	Khovah phat’in vaipoten mi man sole ho asol’uvin , “ Mi te ni chu lhadoh tauvin , ” agatisah-ui .
44016036	Hichun songkul ngahpan athu sei chengsu hi Paul jah a aseiyin , “ Vaipoten nangni lhadohna thu sei din mi ahinsoltai ; hijeh chun tun hungdoh lhonin lang lung mongin ch lhontan , ” ati .
44016037	Ahi vangin Paul’in miho jah achun , “ Rome mi kihiya themmona beiya amahon japi maiya eivouva songkul’a eikhum’uva , tua guh thim’a iti tilhadoh diu ham ? Hitheiponte , amahon eihung puidoh-u hem , ” ati .
44016038	Mi man sole hon athu hi vaipote heng alhut’u le , Rome mi ahi ti ajah phat’un akicha cheh kit’un ,
44016039	hijeh chun aheng lhona kiphat lam thu ahung seiyun , apuidohuvin khopia kona potdoh dingin ajoltauve .
44016040	Hiti chun amani songkul’a apotdoh-in Lydia avepa lhonin sopite to akimuto’uvin , atil khou lhonin apotdoh lhontai .
44017001	Amphipolis le Apollonia jotpaiya Thessalonica khoa ahung lhon leh hia chun Juda ho Houthua kikhopna in khat aum’e .
44017002	Achonna ngai banga Paul chu ahenguva alut’in , Choldo nikho thum sungin Pathen lekhabua konin mipichu akinelpi jin ,
44017003	Messiah chun gin genthei athoh tei ding le thinaa kona atodoh tei ding thu ahilchenin phot chena aseipeh-in , “ Nahenguva kaphondoh hiche Jesu hi Messiah chu ahitai , ” ati .
44017004	Hichun alah-uva mi phabep’in dih asauvin paul le Silas ajop’un , Pathen ging Greek mi tampin chule numei lal ho lah a jop’a jong atamuve .
44017005	Chutah chun Juda miho athangseuvin , khopi sung lamlen dunga pananbei mithase phabep akhomun , khopi sunga boina lentah asosah-uvin , Jason in abulu’vin , Paul le Silas ahol’un mipi lah a kaidoh din ago’uve .
44017006	Amani amu lou phat’un Jason le sopite phabep pi khopi sung vaipote angsunga akailut’un , “ Hiche ho hi vannoi akhup athal’a leh ho chu ahiuvin , hikom ahinphah-u ahitai ,
44017007	Jason hin amaho alhunsah-in , ‘ Jesu kiti leng chom khat aum’e , ’ tin Caeasar thupeh chengse kal lhahnan abonchan na atongui , ” tin asam’uve .
44017008	Hicheng hi ajah phat’un mipi le khopi sung vaipote jong anoh lheh jenguvin ,
44017009	hijehchun Jason le midang hoa kilhadoh man alauvin amani chu alhadoh tauve .
44017010	Sopiten kinloi tah-in ajan janin Paul le Silas chu Berea khoa asoltauve ; alhun lhon phat’in Juda ho Houthua kikhopna in’a alut lhon’e .
44017011	Berea khoa Juda miho chu Thessalonica khoa ho sangin along lenjo’uvin , lung opkai louhel’in thu asangun , athilsoh ho chu chute mong nam tin niseh le Pathen lekha to avetoh jiuve .
44017012	Hichea hin mi tampin atahsan lo tauvin , Greek mi numei lel ho le pasal ho jong atahan atam’uve .
44017013	Thessalonica khoa Juda mihon Barea khoa jong Paul’in Pathen thu asei phong ahet phat’un chukoma jong mipi ahung tiles kit tauve .
44017014	chuphat’in sopiten Paul chu Twikhanglen pamlama asol pai jengun , Silas le Timothy vang chua aumden lhon’e .
44017015	Paul gathah hon Ahen khopi geiyin apuiyun , Paul’in Silas le Timothy chu ahenga hung loi ding adeina thupeh kengin ama ho ahung kile kittauve .
44017016	Paul’in Athen khopia Silas le Timothy a-nga pet’in khopi sunga limsemthudoi dimset’a kikoi amudoh-in alunng nalheh jenge .
44017017	Hijeh chun Houthua kikhopna in’a miho le Pathen ging ho toh akinel’in , kailhangdunga jong niseh leh ato phah chant oh akinel nel ji’e .
44017018	Hichea hin Epicurea loi le Stoic loi chihgut mihon Paul akinelpiuvin , alah-uva mi kon khat’in , “ Hiche kamtam belbulpa hin ipi asei ding hi-nga na ? ” atiuvin , adang hon ma , “ Gamdang miho hou , doi le kao asei ahitoh-e , ” atiuve . Hiche hi ama Jesu le athodoh kit thu aseiphongjeh ahi .
44017019	Mihon Paul chu aman’un Areopagus molvum kikhopnaa apuiyun , “ Hiche nasei thuhil thah hi kahetbe thei diu ham ?
44017020	Ajeh chu kajah-uva nasei abang bang hi alamdang lheh jengin , hijeh a chu hiche ho hi ipi kiseina mong ham ti kahet chet nom’u ahi , ” atiuve .
44017021	Athens kho mite le akhosunga cheng gamdang mi abonchauva ima dang gel louva thuthah thah seina le ngai naa phat amanjiu ahi .
44017022	Hichun Paul Areopagus lai lunga adingin miho adonbut’in , “ Athen kho mite , ima lam jousea nang ho hi hougut tah nahiu kamui .
44017023	Ijeh-inem itile nahou mun chengu kavet le naa ‘ Hetphah lou Pathen ding , ’ tia kijih maicham khat kamu doh-e . Hiche nang hon het louva nahouvu hi keiman nahenguva kahung seiphong ahi .
44017024	Vannoi leiset le asunga um thil jouse sem Pathen , van le leiset Pakai chu mihem dem thu doiphung dunga apansapoi ;
44017025	thil ngaichat nei banga mihem khutsoh a jen lun glhai thei jong ahipoi ; Amatah-in mi jouse ahinsah , ahaitheisah a chule thil ijakai apeh joh ahibouve .
44017026	Aman mihem khat’a kona leiset chunga chang ding chitin namtin hijat asemdoh a , gamgi asekhenpeh cheh a aphat teppeh a achensah ahi ;
44017027	amahon Pathen chu kinemtah a hol’uva amaikhah thei na diuva ahol ahin , ahinla Ama chu eiho koimacha dia jong gamla lou ahiye ;
44017028	ijeh-inem itile : ‘ Eiho Ama jal’a hinga , Chatloh , chule Amaa ihiuve , ’ tin nalah-uva chiguh sun hon aseiyui ; ‘ Tahbeh-in eiho ama chilhah ahiuve , ’ tin aseinauve .
44017029	Eiho jong Pathen chilhah ihijeh-uva chu mihem lunggel le khut them man chah a sana ham , dangka ham , song ham a limsemthu tobang chu Pathen hinte tia igel lou diu ahi .
44017030	Het loulai khang chu Pathenin avet thim ahin , tun vang mutin’a mi jouse lung aheina diuvin thu apei ,
44017031	ipijeh-inem itileh aman amilhendohpa amanchah a thudih a vannoi leiset hi thu atanna dinga nikho khat atepsa ahitan , hiche hi tahsan din amilhendohpa chu thinaa konin akaithoutai , ” ati .
44017032	Thinaa kona thodoh kit thu ajah phat’un , mi phabep’in anuisat uvin , adang hon vang , “ Hiche nasei hi ka-ngaikit nom’ui , ” atiuve .
44017033	Hichun Paul alailunguva konin apotdohtai .
44017034	Mi phabep’in vang akilhonpiuvin atahsan tauve , alahuva hin Areopagus a kikhomji lah a mi Dionysius le Demaris kiti numei khat le adang ho jong ahiuve .
44018001	Hiche jou vin Paul’in Athens dalhan Corinth ajontai .
44018002	Hichea hin Claudius lengpan Judate aboncha Rome a kona potdoh dia thu apeh jeh a Italy gama kona ajinu Priscilla toh hung lhungtil , Pontus gama peng Juda mi amin Aquila kiti chu akimupin , aheng lhona achen ,
44018003	pon in sem ahicheh jeh-uvinm akiveinau akitha khat ahijeh chun akom lhona apansan na atongkhom’uve .
44018004	Choldo niseh leh Houthua kikhopna in’a Juda ho le Greek mite chu thu asuitohpi jin jol lut tei din agoji’e .
44018005	Macedonia gama kona Silas le Timothy ahung lhun phat’in , Paul chu thu seiphongin bou apangin , Juda ho henga Jesu chu Messiah ahidol ahettohsah-e .
44018006	Ahinla amahon adoudal’un , ataitomuleh , Paul’in aponsil ho athingin ajah-uva , “ Manthaina naneiyu leh nang hon ma nakipoh diu ahi ! Keiman themmona kaneipoi ! Tua kalvang chiding namdang te henga kachei ! ” ati .
44018007	Hiti chun chua konin achen Pathen ngaisah tah mi amin Titus Justus kitipa in’a aluttai ; ama in chu Houthua kikhopna in bantah ma ahi .
44018008	Houthua kikhopna in vaipo Crispus chun a-insung mi chengse toh Pakai atahsanin , chule athu ja Corinth mi tampin jong atahsanun baptize achangtauve .
44018009	Jan’a Paul’in Themgao thilmua mu aneinaa Pakaiyin , “ kichat dan , umthim louhel’in seijom jingin ;
44018010	ajeh chu Keiman ka-umpi jingin , koiman suhset dia nanokhum lou ding ahi ; ijeh-inem iti le hiche khopi sung jenga jong mihem tampi kaneiye , ” ati .
44018011	Hijeh chun Paul kum khat le lhagup alah-uva apansan Pathen thu ahil hil jenge .
44018012	Achaia gam gamvaipoa Gallio apan laiyin Juda ho apangkhomun Paul aman’uvin thutannaa ahinkailut’un ,
44018013	“ Hichepa hin chonna dan nagilouva Pathen hou din miho ajol lha lhai , ” atiuve .
44018014	Hichea hi Paul pao akigot leh Gallio chun Juda ho jah a , “ Vo Juda ho , namiheh nau hi suhkhelna ham khan gitlouna ham thu hileh kangaipeh ding nahiuvin ,
44018015	nang ho Danthua le min ho thudol vang nang hon kivet tup tauvin , hiche hoa hin keima thutanin pang ponge , ” ati .
44018016	Hiti hin thutanaa konin aban nodohtai .
44018017	Amahon Houthua kikhopna in vaipo Sothenes chu aman’un thutanna in mai laitah a avoh jeng vangun , Gallio chun donin aseppoi .
44018018	Paul chu nisot tah sopite toh aumkhomin , chuin amaho chutoh akilhan , Priscilla le Aquila toh lhonin Syria lam ajontai . Cenchreas khoa kitepna anei jeh-in sam akivoi .
44018019	Ephesus kho ahung lhun’un Paul’in amani dalhan , Houthua kikhopna in’a alut’in Juda ho toh thu asuitoh-ui .
44018020	Amahon nichong sot jep dia alho vangun anompon ,
44018021	amaho toh akilhan , “ Pathen lungdei ahileh nahenguva hung kit nange ” atin , Ephesus khoa konin apotdohtai .
44018022	Paul Caesarea khopia akumlhan , Jerusalema achetouvin Houbung miho salam agabol’in , Antioch lama achesuh paitai .
44018023	Chukoma chomkhat aum nungin akipatdoh-in Galitia le Phrygia gamkol muntin akhol len , seijuite aphutdet len ahi .
44018024	Juda mi Alexandria peng , amin Apollos kiti khat Ephesus khopia ahungin , amahi thusei them le Pathen lekhabua themtah jong ahi .
44018025	Apollos chu Pakai lampi kihil themsa , Lhagaova gunchu tah ahin , Jesu thudol aseiyin kitoh chet’in ahilnan , ahivangin John baptize chandol chubou anahei .
44018026	Ama hi akipat’in Houthua kikhopna in’a hakattah-in thu aseiye ; ahinla Prisilla le Aquilan athusei ajah lhon phat’in apui lhonin Pathen lampi chu kichentah-in ahilchen lhone .
44018027	Apollos chu Achaiiiia gama ache nom phat’in sopiten atilkhou’un seijuiten anasan theina diuvin phatseina lekha jong asutpeh-ui . Ahung lhunin lungset vanga atahsante chengse hatah-in akithopi ;
44018028	ijeh-inem itile Jesu chu Messiah ahidol Pathen lekhabua konin phot chetna tampin Juda ho chu japi maiya anel khuptai .
44019001	Apollos Corinth khopia aumpet’in Paul chun sahgam lam alhahpeh-in Ephesus khopia ahungle hikoma chun seijui phabep amun ,
44019002	hiche ho jah achun “ Natahsan’uva chu Lhagao Theng nachanu hinam ? ” atileh ; amahon ajah a , “ Lhagao Theng aum’e , tobon kija kha loulaiya , ” atiuve .
44019003	Chuphat’in Paul’in , “ Ipipen tah a ba baptize chang nahiuvem ? ” atileh ; amahon , “ John baptize chansah bangin , ” atiuve .
44019004	Hichun Paul’in , “ John chun lung heina dinga baptize achansah a , anunga hung dingpa , Jesu chu atahsan theina diuva miho aseipeh ahibouve , ’ ati .
44019005	Hichu ajah phat’un amaho Pakai Jesu minin baptize achangun ,
44019006	Paul’in achunguva akhut te ni a-ngap le Lhagao Theng achunguva ahung chun , amahon paochom chom thon gaothu aseitauve .
44019007	Abon’un mi som le ni tobang bep ahiuve .
44019008	paul chu Houthua kikhopna in’ah alut’in , kicha louhel’in lha thum sungin miho chu Pathen leng gam thu asuitohpin , jollut tei din agoi .
44019009	Ahinla mi phabep alouchal’a atahsan louvu toh chule mipi maiya chuche Lampi chu aseiset phat’uvin Paul’in amaho chu adalhan , seijuite apuidoh-in , niseh le Tyrannus kihilna in’a akihoulimpiji’e .
44019010	Kum ni sunga hitia hi abol lehAsia gama cheng , Juda ho le Greek mite geiyin Pakai thu ajasoh tauve .
44019011	Pathenin thil kidang seithei louhel hel Paul khut’in aboltan ,
44019012	Paul ultheh pon le a-op tomna pon ho san achoiyun ana damlouho henga apoh lut’u leh anat nauvin alhauvin lhagaoboh jo jong apotdohjitai .
44019013	Hichun Juda mi vahvei doithemnaa kivah loiyin jong lhagaoboh vopte chunga Pakai Jesu min apan’un , “ Paul’in aseiphongle Jesu jal’a kahahsel nahiuve , ” atitauve .
44019014	Hitia bol ho chu Juda mi thempu pipu Sceva chapate ahiuve .
44019015	Ahinla lhagaoboh chun adanbut’in ajah-uva , “ ken Jesu kahen Paul jong kahenai ; nang ho koi nahiuvam ? ” ati .
44019016	Chuin lhagaoboh voppa chu achomin achunguva achuh jengle mi ni athajo paiyin , abonchauva athajosoh phat’in in’a kon chun sagoh keo le mapun ajamdoh tauve .
44019017	Athusoh hi Ephesus khopia cheng Juda mi jouse le Greek mi jousen ahesoh tauvin , akicha lheh jenguve ; hijeh chun Pakai Jesu min aloupi cheh tai .
44019018	Atahnsan ho jong ahungun japi maiya atahsanu chu aphongdoh-un athilbol’u aseidoh tauve .
44019019	Mitpheldoi them tampin alekha jouseu ahinpo khom’un mitin mitmun ahalvam’uve ; ahalvam sangsom nga alhinge .
44019020	Hiti hin Pakai thu hahattah-in akhang touvin ajousohtai .
44019021	Thilsoh hicheng kichai nung hin Paul’in alungthimin Macedonia le Achaia gam chotsoh a Jerusalema chepai ding . “ Hiche kichai soh teng Rome kagamutei ding ahi . ” Ati .
44019022	Ahivangin alhacha Timothy le Erastus Macedonia gama , asol’in , ama Asia gama chom khat aum nalaiye .
44019023	Hiche lai hin chuche Lampi thudol’a boina chu thuneo them ahitapoi .
44019024	Ijeh-inem itile dang ka kheng them Demetrius kiti mi khat hin Artemis doilim houna inlim dangkaa asemdoh a , dangka kheng themho dia kiveina asohdoh chu thil neocha ahipoi .
44019025	Hiche miho hi le asumkol veinau kibahpi chengse akoukhomin , “ Mihem ho , hiche akiveinauva kona haodoh ihiunahecheh-ui .
44019026	Ephesus khopi sung goh hilouvin Asia gam pumpi chansah pai ding ahitan , hiche Paul hin mihem khut’a kisemthu ho hi Pathen ahipoi , tia mi aloi loiya tamtah ajol lhah a aheimang gam ahitai , ti mujong namu’uvin he jong naheuve .
44019027	Hichea hi ikiveinau manlou asoding kichat aumgoh hilouvin ipathen len nu Artemis houin geiya nahsahmoa hung kibol’a , Asia gam pumpi le vannoi pumpin ahou cheh Pathen len nu geiya suhjuma hung umtah bah ding ahi , ” ati .
44019028	Mihon hichu ajah tah-un along hang lheh jengun , “ Ephesus mite Artemis alen’e , ” tin asam cheh-ui .
44019029	Hiti chun akhothingiin alingsoh jengun , mihon Paul toh hung jinkhom Massssedonia gam mi Gaius le Aristarchus chu aman’un japi lemkhomna in’a alhoh lut jengui .
44019030	Paul chu japi lailunga agalutnom vangin seijuiten aphal pouve ;
44019031	Asia gam vaipo aloite phabep man japi lenkhomna in’a ahunglut louhelna din mi ahinsol’un ahung kham’ui .
44019032	Akikhom chengse chun ipi jeh a kikhom ahiu ahetchet loujeh-un aboi lhehjengun , abang in thu khat asamun , kimkhat man thuchom khat asam’ui .
44019033	Mipi phabep’in vang Judah on japi maiya ahinsot lut’u Alexander chu a ngoh-un , hijeh chun Alexanderin japi maiya akihonna seidin khut ajep’e .
44019034	Ahin mihon ma chu Juda mi ahi ahetdoh phat’un , “ Ephesus mite Artemis alen’e ! ” tin o-khat tah-in nidan ni jen asam sam jengui .
44019035	Hichun khopi sung lekha sunpan mipi aphoh thip’in , “ Ephesus kho mite , Ephesus khopia hi Artemis len nu le van’a kona hung lenglha song theng kikoi ahi kon ahetmoa nabol’u ham ?
44019036	Hiche thil ho hi seitoh ahilou het’a thip beh a na-um’uva kholtoh louva jong chu namoh bol lou diu ahi .
44019037	Hichea nahinkai lut jengu miho jong hi houin choma la ahipouvin , Pathen nu taitoma jong ahipouve .
44019038	Hichejeh chun Demetrius le atoh khompi khut them hon mi khattou chunga lung lhai louna aneiyule kihehna in honsa ahin , thutan vaihom ho jong aum nauve , akiheh nom nom gakiheh tauhen .
44019039	Hiche kalval’a thudang nahol’u aum vangleh angaiyin khoppilen teng seitoh ding ahibouve .
44019040	Ajeh chu tuni boina thua hi mipi tilsea eiki-ngoh diu tijat kichentah a seithei ding jong i-umpouvin ahi , ” ati .
44019041	Hiche hi aseiyin khoppi chu alhadohtai .
44020001	Khopi boina athip phat’in Paul’in seijuite akoukhomin , amaho atilkhou nungin akilhahpin Macedonia gam jonin akipatdohtai .
44020002	Macedonia gamkol sungse se achotsoh a tilkhouna nasatah anei jouvin Greek gama ahung lhungtai .
44020003	Hiche gama chun lhathum achamin , Syria gam jon’a achegot leh Judah on achanlhih jeh-un , Macedonia gam jot lhungkei kit din akigotai .
44020004	Hichun Beroea khoa Pyrrhus chapa Sopater chun alhonpin , Thessalonica khoa Aristarchus le Secundus , Derbe khoa Gaius le Timothy , Asia gam mi tychicus le Trophimus jong ahiuve .
44020005	Amaho hi anacheuvin troas khoa eina ngah-ui ;
44020006	keiho vang cholsolou changlhah kut jouvin phillippi khopia konin kongin kakitol’un ni-nga lhin nin Troas khoa ahengu kalhungun , hikoma chun ni sagi kanichongui .
44020007	Choldo nikho jou ni masa nia changlhah nekhom din kakikhop’u le Paul’in ajing nikhoa che ding agot jeh-in jan khangkim geiyin miho thu ahil hil jenge .
44020008	Chungnung indan kakikhop nauva chun meivah tampi akivah-e .
44020009	Hichea chu gollhang amin Eutychus kiti khat bangkot geiya tou ahin , Paul’in thu aseisot jeh chun golhangpa hi aihmut asoh behseh jengin , anaihmu lhutan , chungnung indan thumnaa konin alha mangin ahileh athisan agaphongdoh-ui .
44020010	Hichun Paul akumlhan golhangpa akoichah denin , “ Tija hih-un , ajeh chu asunga ahinkho aum nalaiye , ” ati .
44020011	paul akaltouvin changlhah ahehbal bal’in , anen , jingkah khovah lhah geiyin miho to akihoulimin , chuin apotdohtai .
44020012	Mihon gollhangpa chu ahingin akipuiyun seithei louhel’in along mongui .
44020013	Keihon kong lam kajon’un , Paul chu kong sunga lalut din Assos lama kakitol’ui ; ijeh-inem itile aman hiche geiya chu kenglama che ding agot ahiye .
44020014	Paul’in Assos mun’a eikimupi phat’un konga kalalut’uvin Mitylene lang kajontauve .
44020015	Chua konin konga kakitol’un ajing nikhon Chios gal kalhungui ; athai nin Samos kalhungun , athai nin Miletus kalhung tauve .
44020016	Ijeh-inem itile Paul’in ahithei leh Pentecost nikhoa Jerusalema lhun tei ding agot jeh-in , Asia gama umsot louna din konga kitol’a Ephesus khopi chu palam ajotpa ding agot ahitai .
44020017	Paul’in Miletus khoa konin Houbung upaho kou din Ephesus khoa mi asol’e .
44020018	Upaho ahenga ahung phat’in Paul chun ajah-uvah , ” Asia gam kahin chotlut’a pat hitih chan’a hi itobanga nang ho toh kalhat khom umchan naheuvin ,
44020019	Juda hon eichan lhih jinguva thoh hesoh tampi kachunga alhunvangin nun nemtah le mit lhi pumin Pakai kin kabol jing jin ;
44020020	itobang tah a in beihel’a thil phachom ding chu japi lah hihen intin hijongle nang ho kahilji hitam !
44020021	Juda ho hihen Greek mite hijongle kibang cheh-in Pathen lama lung aheiyuva i-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa atahsanna diuvin kahetsahji’e .
44020022	Chule tan ven , Lhagaova kigahna jeh-in Jerusalem lam kajonin , chukoma kahcunga ipi ahung lhun ding kahepoi ;
44020023	khopi jousea kanchalna le hesoh gentheinan ei-nga jing bou Lhagao thengin eihetsah ahi .
44020024	Ahivangin Pathen lungset Kipana Thupha hettohsah ding Pakai Jesua kalah katoh ding kin hi kamolso poule kahinkho jeng jong hi imacha man din ka-it chapoi .
44020025	Nalah-uva chelae Pathen langgam seiphongle kahin , ahinla ven , nang hon kamai namukit louhel diu tan kahetai .
44020026	Hijeh a chu tunia kichentah a kaseipeh nahiuve , amangthah um jongleur chun mi kapopoi ;
44020027	ijeh-inem itile nahenguva Pathen lungdei apumpia hetsah lou in mang kaneipoi .
44020028	Kichih thieyun lang nachin diuva Lhagao Thengin napeh-u kelngaohon chunga jong ching theiyun , Pathenin athisana achohsa a-Hobung chu ching them’uvin .
44020029	Kache nungle ngei giloutah tah nalah-uva hung lut’a kelngoihon hi adep louhel dingkahetai ;
44020030	nang ho lah akona jongmi hung kipat’uva thu akaleh akalouva seiya seijuite phabep geiya apui manguva akijuisah diu ahi .
44020031	Hijeh chun kiging phauvin , kum thum sunga tang louhel’a sun le jan’a mit lhi puma nachang cheh-uva katilkhou jing chu geldoh jingun .
44020032	Chule tua hi nang ho khantousah thei le suh thengsa ho lah a gou chankhomsah thei Pathen le alungset thua nang ho kakhum lut nahitauve .
44020033	Koima dangka sana , nihchen ponsil kadeipoi .
44020034	Kei le kaloi ho ngaichat chan hiche kakhut te ni hin abol bulhit jing nang ho tah-in nahet’u ahi .
44020035	Pakai Jesu amatah-in , ’ Lah sangin peh nopnajo ahi , ’ ati chu geldoh jinga na hatoh a alhasam chatmo ho kithopi theina dia thil ijakai najui diuvin kavetsahsoh tauve , ” ati .
44020036	Paul’in thu hicheng aseiyin dilsun abonchauvin ataopitai .
44020037	Chutah-in abonchauvin akap-un , Paul akoiyun achop’uve ;
44020038	ajahuva , amai amukit lou diu aseijeh tah jong chun na asa behseh jengun ahi . Chuin kong mun geiyin ahung thah-ui .
44021001	Upaho toh kakilhauvin jangkeiyin kongin kakitol’un Cos kalhungui ; ajingin Rhodes kalhungun , chua konin Patera kalhunguve ;
44021002	chuin Phoenica jotpa ding kong khat kamu’vin , kong chun katouvun kakitoltauve .
44021003	Cyprus twikol akimu phah phat’in veilam ngan kapel’un Syria lam jonin kakitol paiyun , konga thil solhah ding aumjeh-in Tyre khopia ka-ki-ngauve .
44021004	Seijuiho kaholdohun hikoma chun ni sagi kanichongui ; Lhagaova konin amaho hin Paul Jerusalema ache ding ajadauve .
44021005	Nikho chujat kanichon jouvun kakipatdoh-uvin kholjin ban kamasot tauve ; hichea hin seijuite chu ajite achateu pumin khopi kulpamgeiyin eihung thah-un , Twikhanglen pamchin’a dilsun kataovun , khat kaht’in kakilhauvin ,
44021006	keiho kong sunga kakaldoh-un , amaho inlama akiletauve .
44021007	Twichung kholjin chainan Tyre a konin Ptolemais gei kaki tol’un , hikoma chun sopite salam kabol’un akom’uvah nikhat kanichongui .
44021008	Ajing nikhon kakipatdoh-un Caeasarea kalhungun , sagi lah a Philip Evangelist pu in’a kalut’uvin amatoh ka-um khom’uve .
44021009	Philip hin cha nu jinei loulai cheh li aneiyin , amaho hi gaothuseiyin apangui .
44021010	Nikho phabeppi chukoma ka-um laiyu hin Judea gama konin amin Agabus kiti Themgao khat ahungsuh-in ,
44021011	kahengu ahinjonin Paul konggah chu alan akhut te ni le akeng te ni akikanin , “ Lhagao Thengin hitia hi , Jerusalema Juda mihon hiche konggah neipa akan’uva chiding namdang ho khut’a apehdoh diu ahi , ’ tin aseiye , ” ati .
44021012	Hichu kajah phat’un keiho le chukoma um mihon Paul chu Jerusalema chetou lou din kaholtauve .
44021013	Ahinla Paul’in adonbut’in , “ Ibol nahiuva kap’a kalung nasuhdoiyu ham ? Ajeh chu kanchal ding keo hilouva Jerusalema Pakai Jesu min’a thi dinga kogosadema um kahi , ” ati .
44021014	kathu nun joulou phat’un kahaiyun , “ Pakai lunggot got himai hen , ” katitauve .
44021015	Nikho phabep jouvin kakigouvin Jerusalema kachetouvun ,
44021016	Caesarea konin seijui phabep’in eilhonpiuvin , amaho hin kalhunna dingpau , Cyprus twikol’a mi Mnason kitipa in’a chun eipuilut’uve .
44021017	Jerusalem kalhun’u le sopiten kipah tah-in eina sangui .
44021018	Ajingnikhon keiho toh lhonin Paul chu Jacob kimupin achen , upaho chengse jong akimkeiyui .
44021019	Amaho asalam soh phat’in Paul’in alhacha natohnaa kona chiding namdangte lah a Pathen thilbol chengse chu abonchan aseitai .
44021020	Amahon hichu ajah phat’un Pathen avahchoiyuvin ajah a , “ Sopi , atahsan te lah a Juda mi sang ijat pang tam ti namui , abonchauva Danthua tom ngaitah ahiuvin ,
44021021	nang hin chiding nam dan glah a cheng Juda mihon Moses Danthu apaiyuva , achateu chep tandaa chule puchon pachon adonda diuvin ahil’in asei lei tin min aseipeh-uve .
44021022	Ipi iti ding hitam ? Nahunghi la ajah tei diu ahitan ;
44021023	Hichea hin i-khat seipeh unge hichu bol’in ; kitepna neisa mi li kaneiyun ,
44021024	amaho hi puiyin lang acholamu topeh-in , nangma jeng jong amaho hitoh kisuthengin , chutile sam akivo thei diu ahin , chuteng nangma nasa tah-a chondan nit mi nahi , nachung change thu kithang jou ahidol mitinin ahet soh diu ahi .
44021025	Atahsan chiding namdang ho thudol vang hi limsemthu houna doithil neh lou ding , thisan neh lou ding , alol kimeh a kithatsa neh lou ding le jonthanhoi bol lou ding thua lekha ithotsu ahitai , ” atiuve .
44021026	Chuphat’in Paul’in miho chu apuiyin , ajing nikhoa amatoh kisuh thengna kin abolsoh phat’uvin itih tah le kisuh thengna nikho kichaiya chule amaho mi khat khat dia chu kilhaina gantha itih a kibol ding ham , ti hetsah din Houin agalut’e .
44021027	Nisagi alhin ding konchan Asia gama hungkon Juda mihon Houin sunga Paul amudoh-un , japi atilseuvin achunga khut alhauvin aman’un ,
44021028	“ Israel mite , neipanhu’uvin , muntin’a mipi le Danthu chule hiche mun douna thu hil lepa ama hi ahi ; hiche keo chu hilouvin Houin sunga Greek miho ahinpuilut’in hiche Muntheng phung ho asubohtai , ” tin asamtauve .
44021029	Miho chun Paul le Ephesus gam mi Trouphimus khopi sunga akiloile amujeh-uva Houin sunga jong apuilut tei dia agin mou ahi .
44021030	Chutah chun khopumpi akithingun , mipi alhaikhom loiyun Paul chu aman’uvin Houina konin akaidoh-un , kotpi chengse akhah paitauve .
44021031	Mihon Paul tha dia agot lai tah-un Jerusalem kho pumpi boi thu hi sepai vaipipo kam ahung lhungin ,
44021032	aman jong apettah chun sepai jalamkaiho le sepaihon apuiyin aselsuh jengu leh , mihon sepai vaippipo le sepaiho amuphat’un Paul avohda tauve .
44021033	Hichun sepai vaipipon anailut’in Paul amanin , thih khao nia kan din aseiyin , chuin , koihiya ipi asuhset ham ti akholtoh-e .
44021034	Ahin mipi lah a abangin thuchom asamun , phabep khat man thuchom beh asamui ; hitia chu aboi behseh jeh-u chun ipi mong iti ham ti ahetdoh thei lou phat’in Paul chu kulpi sunga kailut din aseijotai .
44021035	Japi aphut deng dung phat’un kalbileiya alempet’in jong Paul chu sepaihon adop thobouvui ;
44021036	ajeh chu mipin ahinjuipeh-un , “ Sumangun ! ” tin asam jengui .
44021037	Paul kulpi sunga akailut kon’un aman sepai vaipopa jah a , “ Nahenga thu them khat sei theiying em ? ” ati leh ; aman , “ Greek pao nahet’em ?
44021038	Nang hi Egypt mi , tu masang jep’a mihem sang li jen gamthip laiya loidoh a jelen gal bolsah chu nahilou ham ? ” ati .
44021039	Hichun Paul’in , “ Keima Cilicia gam Tarsus khoa cheng Juda mikahin , khopi mai maiya mi kahipoi ; nahenga kataove mipi jah a thu neiseisah-in , ” ati .
44021040	Sepai vaipipon aphalpeh phat’in Paul kalbileiya adingin mipi akhutjap leh , athip chet phat’uvin Paul’in Hebrew paovin thu aseiyin :
44022001	“ Sopite le pate ho tua na angsunguva kakihonna thu kasei ding hi nei ngaipeh-uvi , ” ati .
44022002	Paul’in a jah-uva Hebrew paova thu asei ajah phat’un ahathip chehuvin , hichun aman :
44022003	“ Kei hi Cilicia gam Tarsus khopia cheng Juda mi kahin , hiche khopia Gamaliel khonung juiya , ipu apateu Dan dungjuiya kikheltah a them , tunia nang ho banga hi Pathen dinga tom ngaitah kahi ;
44022004	hiche Lampi juiho chu thina geiyin kabolsen , numei pasal’in kakanin songkul’a din kapedoh doh jin ,
44022005	athu hi Thempu chungnung le upa chengse ahetoh ahiuve ; amahoa kona hi Damascus khoa um sopite gamat’a kanchal jenga Jerusalema hinpuiya talen matsahna ding lekha kipoh-in kachei .
44022006	“ Ddamascus kho kom kageiyin , sunkim don hin phulou helouvin van’a konin vah nasatah ahung vahin kakimvel asalvah soh jenge ,
44022007	keila tola kalhutan , kajah a , “ Saul , Saul , ibol’a neibolset set ham ? ” ti ogin khat kajai .
44022008	Kenjong kadonbut’in , ‘ Koi nahim Pakai ? ’ katile , aman kajah a , ‘ Nabolset set Nazareth Jesu chu kahi , ’ ati .
44022009	Kalhonpi hon vah chu amu’vin kahenga thuseipa ogin vang chu ajapouve .
44022010	Hichun keiman , ‘ Ipi kabol ding hitam Pakai ? ’ katile , Pakai chun kajah a , ‘ Kipatdoh-in lang Damascus khopi sunga lut’in , hikoma chu natoh dia kigo chengse aboncha nakiseipeh ding ahi , ’ ati .
44022011	Vah loupe behseh jeh-in kho kamutapon , kalhonpi hon khut’in eikaiyun Damascus khosung kaluttai .
44022012	“ Damascus khoa chun Juda mihon aseiphat cheh-u , Danthu dudngjuiya Pathen ngaisah tah , Ananias kiti mi khat aumin ,
44022013	ama hi kahenga ahungin kakoma adingin kajah a , ‘ Sopi Saul , kho mutan , ’ eitileh , hichepettah chun kamit akikeovin ama kamutai .
44022014	Chuin aman , ‘ Ipu ipateu Pathen chun alunggot he ding le Adihpa mua akamsoh ogin ja dinga nalhen doh ahitai ;
44022015	ijeh-inem itile nang man nahin mu le najahsah chu Ama dinga mitin henga nahettohsah ding ahi .
44022016	Hijeh chun tua ibol’a kho ngai ngai nahim ? Kipatdoh-in baptize changing lang , nachonset soplhahna din Ama minin taovin , ’ eiti .
44022017	“ Jerusalema kakile kit phatin Houina katao le Themgao thilmun mu kaneiyin ,
44022018	hichea chun Pakaiyin kajah a , ‘ Kinloi tah-in Jerusalema konin potdoh loiyin , ajeh chu mihon Kei chung chang thudol nahettohsah hi asan lou diu ahi , ’ ati .
44022019	Kenjong , ‘ Pakai , amaho tah-in nangma tahsan ho Houthua kikhopna intin’a kalut’a kamatjia chule kavohji chu aheuve ;
44022020	chule nathu hettohsah Stephen thisan kiso jong chun akoma kadidngin pha kasan , athat ho ponsil jouse kachoipeh ahi , ’ kati .
44022021	Hichun Aman kajah a , ‘ Chen , ijeh-inem itile gamla tah a chiding namdang ho henga kasol ding nahi , ’ eititai , ” ati .
44022022	Thu hicheng asei athip nauvin , chutah-in a-o khoset’in lhang asam’un , “ Hitobang mi chu leiset’a konin sumang jengin , ama chu ahing dia kilom ahipoi ! ” atiuve .
44022023	Chutitah chun kho asam’un aponsil’u aleh-un , van lama leivui akitunsah jengun ahile ,
44022024	sepai vaipi pon Paul chu kulpi sunga kailut’a , ama douna chutobang tah akho asap jengu chu phot chetna dinga jep din asol’e .
44022025	Sepaihon savun khaova akan phat’un Paul’in akoma ding sepai jalamkaipa jah a , “ Themmosahna bon um loulaiya Rome mi jep ding chu nang dia dan ngai hinam ? ” ati .
44022026	Sepai jalamkaipan hichu ajah phat’in sepai vaipipo henga achen a jah a , “ Ipi bol kigo nahim ? Ajeh chu hichepa khu Rome mi hibouva khu men ! ” agate .
44022027	Hijeh chun sepai vaipipo chu ahungin ajah a , “ Rome mi nahi mong-em neiseipeh-in ? ” atileh ; aman , “ Kahinai , ” ati .
44022028	Hichun sepai vaipipo adonbut’in , “ Ken Rome mi hina hi sumtamtah a kichoa , ” atileh ; Paul’in , Keivang pen’a hisa kahitai , ” ati .
44022029	Apettah chun achung thu kholchil kigo ho chu ahaiyun alhamkangun , sepai vaipipopa jong Paul Rome mi khat ahi ahetdoh a chule ama anakan jeng chu akichatai .
44022030	Ajing nikhon sepai vaipipon ipijeh pen’a Judah on Paul aheh-u chu hetdohna din Paul akanna alhamin , Thempu pipu ho le Houvaipoloi chengse kikhomsoh din aseiyin , chuin Paul chu ahinpuidoh-in a-angsunguva adinsah-e .
44023001	Paul’in Houvaipoloi chu avechangmel’in , “ Tuni geiya hi Pathen angsunga lung sa-ihna beihel’a hing jing kahi , ” ati .
44023002	Chutah chun Thempu pipu Ananias chun Paul koma dingho chu akam behpeh din asol’e .
44023003	Chuphat’in Paul’in jong ajah a , “ Vo bang kiloibang , Pathenin nang nadenjoh ding ahi ! Dan toh kikal’a keima deng dia mi nasol ham ? ” ati .
44023004	Akoma ding hon , “ Nangin Pathen Thempu chungnung chutia nahouset jeng ong ? ” atiuleh ;
44023005	Paul’in , “ Ama Thempu chung nung ahilam kahetlou ahi sopite , ajeh chu , ‘ Namite chunga vaipo chunga thuse nasei lou ding ahi , ’ tinakisun nai , ” ati .
44023006	Paul’in miho chu akehkhat Sadducee ahiuva akeh khat Pharisee ahiu ahetdoh phat’in , Houvaipoloi kikhopnaa chun ahinsamin , “ Sopite , keima Pharisee chapa Pharisee kahin , mi thi thokit kinepna thu dol’a kathu kibol’a ahi , ’ ati .
44023007	Paul’in chutia aseiphat’in Pharisee ho le Sadducee ho kah a kinel khenlotauve .
44023008	Ijeh-inem itile Sadducee loiyin mi thi thokit hihen Vantil hileh chule lhagao geiya aumsah louvu ahin , Pharisee loiyin vang aboncha aumsah-u ahinai .
44023009	Hiti tah chun apoh veng vung jengun , Pharisee loi lah a Danthem ho phabep adingdoh-uvin mipi anellun , “ Keihon hichepa chunga thildih lou ima kamupouve , lhagao ahim Vantil ahim khattouvin ajah a thu asei hi hih ding ham ? ” atiuve .
44023010	Akihanelten phat’un sepai vaipipon Paul chu abotel diu ham ti akichan , sepaiho chu chesuh a alah uva kona pumhat’a Paul chu gakaidoh a kulpi sunga lhoh lut jeng din aseipeh-e .
44023011	Ajing nilhah-in Paul koma Pakai adingin , “ Lung ngamin , Jerusalema kathu nahettohsah banga Rome khopia jong nahettohsah tei ding ahi , ” tin aseiye .
44023012	Khovah lhah-in Judaten thilgon aneiyun Paul atha masangseuva anneh twidon abol louhel diuvin akihahsel’un akihan lho cheh tauve .
44023013	Hitia mi philna thil gong ho chu mi som li val ahiuve .
44023014	Amaho hi Thempu pipuho le upaho henga acheuvin , “ keihon Paul katha masangseuva neh le chah bol louhel dia khoh tah a kihahsel’a kihan lho kahitauve .
44023015	Hijeh chun tun nang hon Houvaipoloi toh kithoa Paul thudol kholchil’a bol dingveh kisauvin , sepai vaipipon nahenguva ahin puina din gahetsah-un ; hikom ahinphah kah a that dia kigosadem’a um kahitauve , ” agatiuvin ahi .
44023016	Ahinla anachan lhih-u thilgon hi Paul sopinu chapan ajadoh-in , hijeh chun achen kulpi sunga alut’in Paul jah a agaseitai .
44023017	Chuphat’in Paul chun sepai jalamkaiho khat akouvin , “ Hiche gollhangpa hi sepai ding khat aneiye , ” ati .
44023018	Hijeh chun aman agollhangpa chu apuiyin sepai vaipipo heng alhut’in , “ Sohchang Paul khun eikouvin hiche gollhangpa hin nakoma seiding khat aneijeh a nahenga eihin puisah ahi , ” ati .
44023019	Sepai vaipipon ama chu akhut’in atuh-in munchoma apuidoh-in guh thim chan adongin , “ Kakoma sei ding ipi naneiyem ? ” atile ,
44023020	aman , “ Jing teng Houvaipoloi kikhopnaa achung chang thudol kichen cheh a kholtoh idng banga Paul hi napuisuhna didnga nahenga ngeh ding tin Juda ho akiloltauve .
44023021	Hijeh chun athu’u lahpeh hih-in , ajeh chu mi som li valjen Paul atha masangseuva um’uva nangma thupeh ngah maiya um nahitauve , ” ati .
44023022	Chuphat’in sepai vaipipon gollhangpa chu alhadoh-in , “ Hiche neihung seipeh hi koimacha naseipeh louhel ding ahi , ” tin agah chah tai .
44023023	Sepai vaipipon sepai jalamkai ni akouvin , “ Tujan nidan koa Caesarea che din sepai ja ni le sakol sepai som sagi toh , teng choi sepai ja nit oh gonsan koi lhonin ;
44023024	chule gamvaipo Felix henga bitkeiya pui lhungna din Paul touna ding sakol ho jong ngaitopeh lhonin , ” atin ;
44023025	hiti chun athu dol hi lekha ajih-in :
44023026	“ Lal chungnungpen gamvaipo Felix , Claudius-in salam kahinboh-e .
44023027	Hichepa hi Juda hon aman’un , atha ding kon’uvin sepai ho toh kakon’un , Rome mi ahi kahetjeh-in kagahuhdohtai .
44023028	Ahehnau ajeh kahet nompeh-in ama hi Houvaipoloi kikhopnaa kapuisuh leh ,
44023029	thina thei le kanchahna thei ima abolset jeh a aheh nau kamupon , amaho Danthu dol’a aheh-u ahitohe .
44023030	Ama hi tha dia agot’uva achan lhih-u eikiseipeh phat’a khongai louhel’a nahenga kahinsol pai jenga , aheh ho jong nangma maiya aheh nau asei diuva kahil ahitai , ” ati .
44023031	Sepaihon akiseipeh bangun ajan janin Paul chu apuiyun Antipatris alhut tauve .
44023032	Ajing nikhon sakol sepai chengse chutoh kilhon pai din adalhah thauvin , sepai dangse vang kulpi lama ahung kilekit tauve .
44023033	Caesarea ahung lhun phat’un lekha thot chu gamvaipo apeuvin , Paul jong akoma adinsahui .
44023034	Gamvaipon lekha thot chu asim jou phat’in hoigam poh mi ha ti adoh a Cilicia gam mi ahi ahetdoh phat chun
44023035	“ Naheh ho ahung lhung teng nathu ngai nange , ” atin , Herod inpi thutanna in’a kaiya hentup din aseipeh tai .
44024001	Ni nga jouvin thempu chung nung Ananias le upa phabep chule thusuitoh them Tertullus kitipa toh ahungsuh-un , Paul aheh nau thudol chu gamvaipo henga aseiyuve ;
44024002	chuin agah kouphat’un Tertullus chun aheh nau thu aseipanin : “ Lal chungnungpen , nangma jeh’in cham le lung ol’in ka-um’un , chule navaihom them jal’in jong hiche nam mi ding hin phatna tampi akisemdoh-e ;
44024003	Ima lam jouse le muntin’a thilbol ho hi keihon kipah tah-in kasangui-pu Felix !
44024004	Hijongleh tampi seiya nangma phat suhmang din kadeipon , kathuu paltan’a kaseiyu hi lungset’a nei ngaipeh diuva kataotho ahi .
44024005	Ijeh-inem itile hichepa hi mi sunoh phah tah , vannoi gamtin’a Juda ho chohsea pang , Nazareth chon’a chonho lamkai pipu ahi ti keihon kamandoh-un ,
44024006	houin geiya suh boh ding agot’jeh a kahin mat’u ahi ; keiho Dan dungjuiya athu katan nomu ahin ,
44024007	ahinla sepai lamkai Lysias hunga thahat san’a ka khut’uva kona ahung lhoh mang ahi ;
44024008	aheh ho ma aanga ding din thu apen , nangman dongtoh le chun kahehnau hi adih adih lou abonchan hesoh keinan naete , ” ati .
44024009	Juda ho jong chun ahunan asei chengse chu adih cheh-in aseiyui .
44024010	Gamvaipon thusei didnga akhasuh pha’in Paul’in adonbut’in : “ Kum sotpi hiche nam mite chunga thutan vaihom nahi kahen , kipah tah-in keima kihonna thu seiyinge ;
44024011	nangman nakhol chet thei ahi , keima Jerusalema Pathen hou dinga kache na hi nisom le ni aval hih laiye ;
44024012	Houin sung hihen Houthua kikhopna in hijongle , kholai dung jeng cha jong mikhattou kakinahpi ham ahiloule jap katilset ham hijongle hiche ho hin eimandoh pouve ;
44024013	tua eihehna jengu jong hi aphot chetna kichentah-in seithei pouvinte .
44024014	Ahin nahenga kaphondoh nom chu hiche ahi , amahon houdan loitum asah-u Lampi dungjuiya kapu kapateu Pathen houva , Dan thu le themgao lekhabua kisun jouse katahsan’a ,
44024015	amahon jong dih asah cheh , midih hihen midih lou hileh mi thi thokitna aum’e , ti katahsan ahi ;
44024016	hitia chu Pathen lam hihen mihem thudol hijongleh lung theng lung navah a um jing dinga kihabol kahi .
44024017	Kum phabeppi nungin kanam mite din thilpeh le thilto kahinpon kahung leh ,
44024018	hiche kinbol’a Houin a kakisuh theng pet’a eihung mudoh-u ahin , hichea chu mipi kikhom jong aumpon , japi noh phahna jong aumpoi .
44024019	Asia gama hung kon Juda mi phabep vang aum’un , amaho chun hehna ding eineiyu leh hikoma nangma angsunga hung ding dol ahiuve .
44024020	Ahilouva Houvaipoloi kikhopna kadinpet’a chu ipi suh khel toh khel kachunga amudoh-um hiche ho hin seileu hiding ahi ;
44024021	a-angsunguva kadinpet’a othong leuva kasei thil khatseh , “ Tunia hi na-angsunguva mi thi thokit thudol’a kachung thu kikhol’ah ahi , ’ kati chubou ahiye , ” ati .
44024022	Ahin Felix chun hiche Lampi thudol chu ahetchetsa ahijeh-in thutan ding avochonin , “ Sepai vaipipo Lysias ahung tengleh nathuu ngaito chen nange , ” atitai .
44024023	Felix in sepai jalamkaipa chu Paul songkul’a ahen din aseipeh-in , amavang achamlhatdom theiya , agol apaiho jong ajenle nomchan alutsdah din ahil’e .
44024024	Nikho ijat ham nungin Felix chu ajinu , Juda numei Drusilla toh ahungin Paul agakousah-in Christa Jesua tahsan thudol aseisah-in angaiye .
44024025	Paul’in thutandih le kitim them chule khonunga thupi tanna thudol adsei phat’in Felix atija jah tan , “ Tun chetan , phat kanei kom khat leh hinkousah kit nange , ’ ati .
44024026	Chujongle Paul chun sumguh apeh din agel’in phiveng vungin akousah-in akihoupi piji’e .
44024027	Ahinla kum ni jen alhin chun Porcius Festus chun Felix ahinkhel’in , Felix chun Juda ho dei abolnom jeh-in Paul songkul’a kihen nalaiyin adalhai . Caesar henga Paul’in achung thu alhut
44025001	Hiche gamkaiya ahung lhun kal nithum jouvin Festus chu Caesarea konin Jerusalema achetouve .
44025002	Jerusalema chun Thempu pipu ho le Juda lamkaihon ahenga Paul hehsetna thu anaseiyui ; Festus chu a-ngeh-un ,
44025003	ahinpui jeng khat leh lampia chanlhih a Paul chu thadohna didn , Jerusalema ahinpui dingin athum’uve .
44025004	Festusin adonbut’in , “ paul Caesarea akikoiyin chule keimatah jong chu koma che ding kahi ;
44025005	hijeh chun keito lhonin nalah-uva athu neidom chengse cheu hitin , hichepa hin suh khel tohkhel anei leh amahon aheh nom nomin heh-u hen ” ati .
44025006	Festus chu alah-uva niget ham nisom ham anichongin Caesarea achesuh-in ; ajing nikhon thutanna mun’a atouvin Paul gapui din aseiye .
44025007	paul ahung lhun phat’in , Jerusalema kona hungsuh Juda ho akimvel’a adingun , phot chetna apeh thei louhel hel’u thuse tamtah-in ahehseuvin ahi .
44025008	Hichun Paul’in akihonan thuaseiyin , “ juda Danthu douna hihen Houin douna hileh , chuleh Caesar douna hijongleh keiman imacha suhset tohset kaneipoi , ” ati .
44025009	Hichea hin Festus-in Juda ho lung lhaina abolnom jeh-in paul adonbut’in ajah a , “ Jeruaselema chetouva keima angsunga hiche thudol ho hi nachung kikhol ding nadeiyem ? ” atileh ;
44025010	paul’in , “ Keima kathu kitanna ding sol Caesar thutanna mun’a ding kahi ; Juda ho chunga bol khel ahi .
44025011	Keima bol khel nei kahiya , thina thei lom suh khel toh khel kanei leh thi ding kadapoi ; amavang eihehna chengseu hi ima ahilouleh koiman amaho khut’a eipehdoh theiponte , Caesar henga kathu kalhuttai , ” ati .
44025012	Festus chu avaibolpi chengse toh akihoutoh phat’in adonbut’in , “ nangin Caesar henga nathu anlhutsa ahitan , Caesar henga nache ding ahi , ” ati .
44025013	nikho phabep jouvin lengpa Agrippa le Bernice chu Festus vailhun din Caesarea ahung lhontai .
44025014	Caesarea sotpi anichon lailhonin Festus chun lengpa koma Paul thu chu apodoh-in , “ Felix dalhah soh chang kihen khat aumin ,
44025015	Jerusalema ka-umpet chun Thempu pipu ho le Juda ho upaten achung thu eihetsah-un , chule ama mochansah a athu tan din a-ngeh-ui .
44025016	Ahivangin akihehpa le aheh ho kimaitoa akinel’uva aheh apauvin akihonna thu asei masanga koi hileh moh pehdoh jeng chu Rome mite chondan ngai ahilou kaseipehin kanadonbut’e .
44025017	Hijeh chun abonchauva ahung kikhopsoh phat’un geisang louhel’in ajing nikhoma man thutanna amun’a katou mun kakijot’in mipa chu hinpuidoh din kaseitai .
44025018	Ahinla aheh a pang ho adindoh-uva athudol aseiyu chun ahehpauvin kagel bangin ima thilse abolpoi ;
44025019	akinel nau chu amaho houthudol le Paul’in ahinga asei mithisa Jesu kiti khat thudol mai mai ahibouve .
44025020	Atanna je kahetvah loujeh-in ahehnau thuho jeh a hi Jerusalema chea kholchil ding adeiyem adei hih-em ti Paul kadonge .
44025021	Hichea chun Paul’in Kumpipa henga thu chaina a-nga dingin kihenan in’a koi din a-ngeh-in , hijeh chun Caesar henga kasol thei kah a koi dingin kaseitai , ” ati .
44025022	Hichun Agrippan Festus jah a , “ Hichepa thu chu keima tahin jong ngai leng kadeiye , ” atileh , aman , “ Jing tng jana veh ta chun , ” atipeh-e .
44025023	Ajing nikhon Agrippa le Bernice loupe tah a sepai vaipo ho le khopi sunga japi lamkai ho toh thu ngaina inpia ahung lut phat’uvin Festus thusah-in paul ahinpui lut tauve .
44025024	Chutah-in Festus chun aseiyin , “ lengpa Agrippa chule keiho toh umkhom chengse , veuvin hichepa hi Juda mi jousen , Jerusalema ahin , hikoma ho ahiuvin , ama ahinga hoisot louhel ding dol’a asap sap jenguva kahenga angeh-u ahiye .
44025025	Ahinla keiman amah in thina thei lom thilse aboldoh kamupoi , aman ma Kumpipa henga thu alhut tahjeh-in sol dinga thu kalhuhsah ahitai .
44025026	Hichea hi achung chang thudol’a Kumpipa henga sutding ima kichentah-in kahe theipon , hijeh a chu na-angsunguva kahinpuidoh ahi ! Athu doh toh nunga sut idng kati ahiye .
44025027	Ijeh-inem itile akihehna thudol kichen a sun louva sohchang gahsol jeng chu kitoh din kagelpoi , ” ati .
44026001	Agrippan Paul jah a , “ Nakihonan thusei theiyin nate , ” ati . Chutah-in paul chun akhut ajah-in anoiya banghin akihonna thu aseiye :
44026002	“ Lengpa Agrippa , Judahon eiheh na jouseu thua tunia nangma angsunga kakihonna thu sei dia ka-um hi lungnom kakisa lheh jenge ;
44026003	ajeh chu Judate puchon pachon Dan jouse le akinel nohna nangin nahe themsoh keiyin , hijeh chun lung nengtah-in kasei nei ngaipeh-in tia tao kahi .
44026004	“ Keima kaneocha lhah kanam mite lah a Jerusalema kachen a kanun kakhan aboncha Juda miten ahetsoh keiyu ahi ;
44026005	amahon asei nom’uva ahileh phat sotpi sunga eihetsau ahijeh chun kahoudanuva chon kakhelpen tah a Pharisee mi kahin ,
44026006	chule tua hi kapu kapateu henga pathen tepsa kinepna thudol’a kathu khol dinga hikoma ding kahiye .
44026007	Hiche kinepna thudol’a hi kaphungbul piu som le nijenin gunchu tah a sun le jan a Pathen ahouvu anahi . Vo lengpa hiche kinepna thudol’a hi Juda mi hon eiheh-u ahbouve .
44026008	Juda mi nang hon Pathenin mi thisa athodoh kit thudol hi natahsan ding hahsa nasah-u ham ?
44026009	“ keijengin jong kajo chan’a bol’a Nazareth Jesu min douna thil ijakai bol ding kagotsa ahi .
44026010	Hitobang hin Jerusalem khosunga kabol’in Thempu pipu hoa konin thu neina kalan , minthengte tampi songkul’a kakhumin , chule athau jong chun pha kasai .
44026011	phat atamjon Houthua akikhopnau in tin’a talen kamatsah-in , atahsanu ataitom teina diuvin ka-engbol’in , achunguva kalung hangten tun jengin gamdang miho khopi dung geiyin kagabol sen ahi .
44026012	“ Hitobanga amaho bol genthei ding chun Thempu pipu hoa kona thu neina kengin Damascus khopi jonin kachen ,
44026013	vo lengpa , sumkim dontah-in lampia nisa sanga vahjo van’a konin vahkhat kamun , vah chun keima kimvel chengse le ka lhonpi ho chengse asalvah soh keiye ;
44026014	hichun tol’a kalhunsoh phat’uvin Hebrew paovin kajah a , “ Saul , saul , ibol’a neibolset set ham ? Nang dia thihtul monghem lho chu bongchal’in apu mol-hem anungsai beh ahi , ’ eiti .
44026015	Hichun keiman , ‘ Pakaiyin , ‘ Nabolset set Jesu chu kahi .
44026016	Hijongle thouvin nakengin pansan dingin , nahenga kahung kilahna jeh chu nangma kalhachaa pansah din gle nathilmu chengse le nahinmu kit ding chengse hettohsah a pansah dinga hung kilah kahi ,
44026017	kasolna mi Israeltea kon le chiding namdang hoa kona khovah a ahung kiheidoh theiyuva Satan tha neinaa kona Pathen henga ahung kihei theina diu chule Keima eitahsan jal’uva chonset ngaidamna amutheiyuva , lhat thengsa ho lah a goulo chan anei theina diuva amit’u hasah dinga ahenguva kasol ding nahi , ’ eiti .
44026019	“ Hijeh chun volengpa Agrippa , van’a kona themgao thilmu kamu chu athua nu glouvin kaumpoi ;
44026020	amasan Damascus khopia umho henga kaseiyin , Jerusalem le Judea gam pumpia jong , chiding namdang holah geiyin lung heiya Pathen lama akiheiyuva chule along heiyu toh kiloma natohpha atohna diuvin kaseipeh soh keiye .
44026021	Hichejeh a hi Judah on Houin sunga eimat’uva tha dinga eigot’u ahi .
44026022	Ahivangin tuni chan geiyin pathenin eikithopin , hkoma kadingin milen mineo hengah hettohsahna thu hi kaseiye ; kasei hi Themgaoho le Mose’n hung guilhung dinga anaseisau chu ahin ,
44026023	Christan hesoh genthei athoh tei ding , thinaa kona thoudoh maspen’a panga , Juda mi le chiding namdang ho henga khovah thuaphondoh dingahi , ” ati .
44026024	Paul’in hitia kihonna thu asei chun Festus-on othongin akouvin , “ Vo Paul a-ngol nahitai ; nalekhathem sang chun na-ngolsahjoh ahitai , ” ati .
44026025	Ahivangin Paul chun , “ Vo lalchungnung Festus , a-ngol’a kahipon , kicheh tah athu dih kaseijoh ahibouve .
44026026	Ijeh-inem itile leng Agrippan hiche hi ahet ahijeh a ajah angamtah a kasei ahiye ; ajeh pentah chu athil hi ningkoiya kibol ahiloujeh-in ama hetlou um louhel din katahsan’e .
44026027	Lengpa Agrippa , Themgao ho natahsan em ? Natah san kahei , ” ati .
44026028	Hichun Agrippan Paul jah a , “ Hiche chomkah cha sunga hin Christian hisah neigoi ! ” ati .
44026029	Hijongle Paul’in , “ Phat chom hen sao leh tunia karhusei ngai chengse hi thihkhaova kakihenna ho tilouvin keima tobang hisoh keiyu leh tin Pathen henga kathum’e , ” atitai .
44026030	Hichun lengpa le gamvaipo Bernice chule atoukhompi chengse akipatdoh-in
44026031	adalhah phat’un khat le khat akihou lhiuvin , “ Hichepa hin thina thei lom hihen songkul’a henna thei lom hijongleh ima abol set atohset aumpoi , ” akitiuve .
44026032	Hichea hin Agrippan Festus jah a , “ Hichepa hin Kumpipa henga thu alhut lou hileh lhadoh thei ahitai , ” ati .
44027001	konga kitol’a Italy gam kajot diu akichet phat’in Kumpipa sepai lhentum lah a sepai jalamkai Julius kitipa khut’a paul le sohchang dang ho apedoh tauve .
44027002	Adramyttium a chun Asia gam kongkai mun jouse jotpa ding kong khat’a kalut’un , Macedonia gam Thessalonica khoa hung kon Aristarchus chutoh kilhonin kakitol’uve ;
44027003	ajing nikhon Sidon kaimun kalungun , Julius chun Paul along set’in agol apai ho henga che angaichat chan apeh diuvin asol’e .
44027004	Chua konin keiho lam ngaa hui anun Jeh-in Cyprus twikol lesun sun’ah kakitol’uvin ,
44027005	Cilicia le Pamphylia Twikhanglen thuh lai kagal kaiyun Lycia gama Myra kho kalhungtauve .
44027006	Hikoma hin sepai jalamkaipan Italy jon ding Alexandria kong khat aga mudoh-in hia chun eikhumtauve .
44027007	Nikho sotpi sungin olcha chan kakitol’un hahsa tah-in Cnidus kho kalhungvin , huiyin kajotna lam’uva chetheiya eilha lou phat’uvin Cretetwikol lesun sun’ah kakitol’un Salmone jon kajot’un ,
44027008	twi pamchim chin kalhah peh-uvin , nah nah-in Lasea khopia kona gamla behseh lou kongkai munhoi kiti khat kalhungtauve .
44027009	Phat sottah kanichon nungun Thoidamna anngol phat jong akichaitan , konga kitol’a kholjin banjop dingla kachat aumtah jeh-in Paul’in miho athumop’in ,
44027010	ajahuvah , “ Miho , konga akitol’u hi toset ito tei didu thil le lo mai hilouva ihinkho diuva jong manthahna um ding kichat tijat aum’e ti kamui , ’ ati .
44027011	Ahinla sepai jalamkai chun Paul thusei sangin kong lamkai pa le kong neipa thujoh alajoi .
44027012	Kongkai mun chu phalbi sunga umna dia aphat loujeh-in , mi atamjon Twikhanglena kitoldoh a ahithei chan a Phoenix lhun tei ding asom’ui ; Phoenix chu Crete gama kongkai mun khat ahin , lhanglam lhum le sahlam-lhum angat ahi , hichea chu phalbi sunga cham ding atiu ahiye .
44027013	Lhanglam hui olcha cha ahung nun phat’in mihon along ngaito bang molso thei din agel’un , kong khaopi alhauvin Crete twikol pamchin chin’ah atoltauve .
44027014	Ahivangin chom khat jouvin sahlam-niso hui kiti hui hattah twikol gam lama konin ahung nungsuh paiyin ,
44027015	hui chun kong ahinsem khath phat’in anang joutapon , kamoh lhau le ei-lhoh lhoh jeng tauve .
44027016	Hichun Cauda kiti twikol neocha khat lesun sun’a ka lhaiyun nah changsal’in kong inneiya kong neochu kahendet nah nah-ui .
44027017	Kongneo chu kong innei kimvel’a chun akanbeh-un ahunan amangun , Libya twipam chin nel lah a kilenglut khante , ti gin nan pondal kipeina chu aloi lhauvin hui amoh lhohsah sah tauve .
44027018	Hui tahtah chun eisuh gim behseh phat’un ajing nikhon kong sunga thil le lo apai pan tauve .
44027019	Nithum nin kong manchah ho geiyin akhut’a uvin apai kit tauvin ahi .
44027020	Nikho tamtah sunga nisa mel le ahsite mel kimudoh louhel’a hui hattah tang louhel’a anun nun jeng phat’in kasochatna diuva kinepna jouse abeitai .
44027021	Phat sottah miho nelou chalouva aum nungun Paul alah-uva adingin , “ Vo miho , nang hon kathusei na-ngaiyuva Crete a kona ihung kitoldoh lou diu , hitobang settona le manthahna hi itokhah lou diu dol ahi .
44027022	Hijongle tua jong nahenguva katao ahi , hang tah-in pang un ! Ijeh-inem itile nalah-uva komacha athi amang na-um lou diu , kong innei vang mang ding ahi ;
44027023	ajeh chu Amaa kahia alhachaa kapan Pathena kon Vantil khat tujan chun kahenga ahung kilah-in
44027024	“ Vo Paul , kicha hih-in , Kumpipa ang’a nadin tei tei ding ahi chule ven nalhonpi chengse hi Pathenin nang napeh ahitai , ’ eiti .
44027025	Hijeh chun hangtahin pangun miho , ajeh chu eikiseipeh bang banga chu hung guilhing tei dinga Pathen katahsan in ahi .
44027026	Amavang twikol gam sung khat’a igalkai tei diu ahi , ” ati .
44027027	Kakisuhtol kakitoutol’uva jan som le li lhin jan Adria Twikhanglen kagalkaiyun jankhangkim in kongtol hon gam leiset kinaiyah hitam ti agingmouve .
44027028	Hijeh chun thilgih khat khaovin akan’un twite na dia ale lut’u leh twi chu lam som ni thuh ate doh ui ; phabep acheuva atekit’u leh lam some le lam nga atedoh-uvin ahi .
44027029	Song lah a kilenglut khante ti ginmo nan kong tom lam’ah konghenna khao li aleh lhauvin khovah loi nadin ataovui .
44027030	Kongtol ho chu jamdoh ding akigo’uvin , kong mai lama chu kong henna khao sep lha ding veh kisan twi lah a kongneo chu akhai lhauvin lungthim aboltauve .
44027031	Paul’in sepai jalamkaipa le sepaite jah-a , “ Hiche kongtol ho hi kong sunga aumden louvu leh nang ho sohcha jou pouvin nate , ” atitai .
44027032	Hijeh chun sepai hon kongneo kikhaina khao ho chu asat tanpeh-un akitolmangsah tauve .
44027033	Khovah niso ding phat’in Paul’in an ne din asol’in abonchauva jah a , “ Sei ding get ding helouhel’a nelou cha lou , tep lou don louva na-um kal’u tuni nisom le ni li alhingtai ;
44027034	hijeh a chu anne dinga ka-ngeh nahiuve , nakihinso theina diuva natha nei dom nadiu vin , ajeh chu nalu chunguva samjang khat jeng cha jong mangthah louhel ding ahi , ” ati .
44027035	Hitia asei jou hin changlhah chu alan mi jouse angsunga Pathen athangvah jouvin aheh bal’in anepantai .
44027036	Hichun miho ahung lung ngam tauvin amahon jong an anepantauve .
44027037	Kong sunga um chu mihing jani le som sagi leh gup kahiuve .
44027038	Mi jousen an anehva phat’un kong chu ajankhai domna din kong sunga suhlou chang chu Twikhanglen a aleh lut tauvin ahi .
44027039	Khovah phat’in kongtol hon gam leiset chu ahetapouvin , ahin twilen pang ningkoi khat amu’vin , ahithei leh hikoma chu kong tol lut’a galkai din akihousomtauve .
44027040	Hijeh chun konghenna khao chengse alha lhauvin Twikhanglena aleh lut’uvin , chule kongkhe kanna khao asut lhauve ; chutengleh huiyin aputlut theina diuvin ponjal atungdoh-un twiningkoi lam chu ajontauve .
