44027041	Ahinla kong chu twikinong ni kisuhtonaa alut khan kong mong chu nel lei lah a akiphut lutdentan , achalbe thei tapoi , chuma leh twikinong chun hanuh a anuh jeh-in anung lama ahal hal’in aleng lhan akeh pan tai .
44027042	Sohchang ho chu akijap galkaiyuva ajamdoh thei louna diu tin sepaihon abonchauva tha ding thilgon aneitauve .
44027043	Ahivangin sepai jalamkai chun Paul ahuhdoh nom jeh-in athilgon u chu asutangin , twijap thei chan jap galkaiya tolgo anakai masa din aseiyin ,
44027044	adang amohse chu khunpeh le konghalse pouva kitol galkai din aseiye . Hitia chu aboncha tolgo geiya kishinso na um ahi .
44028001	Kakihonso phat’uvin twikolgam chu Malta akiti ti kahedoh tauve .
44028002	Koitoh kisamkai khah loulai agam mihon datmo tah-in eikhoto’uvin , go juh jeh a adap phat chun mei eitipeh-un eilamdot chehui .
44028003	Paul’in thingkang lom khat achomdah-in meiya atileh , meisa hul chun gulse khat ahungdoh-in akhut achun akikhaiden jenge .
44028004	Koitoh kisamkai khah lou agam mihon paul khut’a gul kikhai chu amudoh phat’un khat le khat akihou lhiuvin , “ hichepa vang hi tolthat mong mong ahin , Twikhanglen setto naa ahindoh jeng vanga thudih chun ahing hoi lou dingsam ahiye , ” akitiuve .
44028005	Ahinla Paul’in gulse chu meilhum sunga athing lhan a-ima aloudeh poi .
44028006	Agam mihon vang hung pom ding ham ahi loule phulou helouvin lhua thi didng ham , tin a-ngah jingui ; sotpi chutia angauva imacha atilou phat’in along gel akhel’uvin Paul chu Pathen khat danin aseitauve .
44028007	Hiche kona gamla behseh lou mun khat’a hin twikol haosapu amin Publius kitipan loumin aneiyin , amahin thanom tah-in eisangun nithum sungin eivah gunset’uve .
44028008	Publisu pa chu khosih le eithit veiya dammoa lum ahin , Paul’in agaven , achunga khut angamin ataopeh-in aboldamtai .
44028009	Hitabong thilsoh aumdoh phat hin twikol gamsunga cheng ana damlou neichanin ahinpuiyun abonchan adamsoh keiyuve .
44028010	Agam mihon keiho jabolnan thilpeh tampi eipeuvin , konga kitol kagot phat’un kangaichat ding dol jouseu kong sunga eihung thah peh-uve .
44028011	Lha thum jouvin Alexandria hung kon kong , ‘ Pathen cha pengkop , ’ tia kiminvo , phalbi sungsea chukom twikol gama nichong denpaa chun kakitol kit tauve .
44028012	Syracuse kaimun’a kaki-ngauvin nithum kanichonguve .
44028013	Chua konin kakitol velkil leuvin Rhegium kalhungun , nikhat jouvin lhanglam hui ahung nungin , ni ni lhin hin Puteoli kalhungu .
44028014	Puteolia chun sopite phabep kamudoh-un , akom’uva ni sagi nichong din eikouvui . Hitia chu Rome hung lhung kahiuve .
44028015	Rome a um sopiten kathuu ajah phat’un Appius kailhang le Jinlhun in thum geiyin keiho lamto din ahungun , amaho amu phat hin Paul’in Pathen athangvah-in along ngamtan ahi .
44028016	Rome kalhun phat’un Paul chu a-ngah a pang sepai chutoh ama changseh a cheng din phalna aneipeh tauvin ahi .
44028017	Nithum jouvin Paul’in khosunga Judate lamkaiho akoukhomin , ahung kikhopsoh phat’un ajahuvah , “ Sopiho , i-nam miteu douna hihen ipu ipateu chondan douna hijongle imacha kabolset aum lou vangin Jerusalema pat Rome mite khut’a sohchanga eihung kipedoh ahitai .
44028018	Kachung thu akhol chil’u chun thina thei lom ima kabolset aumdoh loujeh-in eina lhadoh nom tauve .
44028019	Ahina Juda mihon aneljeh-un , ka-nam mite douna imacha sei ding kanei lou vangin Kumpipa henga kacham louvinthu kalhuttai .
44028020	Hichejeh tah a hi nang ho toh kimutoa kihoulimpi dia kakou nahiuve ; ijeh-inem itile Israel kinepna ijeh a keima hiche thih khaova hi kihen’ah kahibouve , ” ati .
44028021	Hichun amahon ajah a , “ Keihon jong Judea gama kona nathudol lekha thot la kimu louva , hikoma sopite khatcha beh-in jong nagit louna thudol thulhut’a le houlima jong umlouva ,
44028022	hi jongle la nalung ngaito mong mong nanga konin kajahbe nom nauve ; ajeh chu hiche Houbih vang hi muntin gamtin’a seiset’in aumtin ahi ti kei hon jong kanaheuve , ” atiuvin ahi .
44028023	Nikho khat ateppeh-un , apansatna ina’a chun mi tampi ahung kikhom’uve ; Paul’in amaho chu jingkah a pat nilhah geiyin Mose Danthu le Themgaoho lekhabua konin hilchetna abol’in , Pathen Lenggam thudol ahettohsa-in , Jesu chu tahsansah tei din ajoltai .
44028024	Paul thuseiho chu abangin atahsan lou vangun abang vang anomtauve .
44028025	Amaho chu akihoutoh thei loud phat’uvin Paul’in anoiya thu khat hi asei jou phat’in apotdoh tauve ; athusei chu : “ Lhagao Thengin Isaiah Themgao kamin napu napateu henga phatah-in anaseiyin ,
44028026	hitin : “ Hiche mite henga hin chen lang gaseiyin , ‘ Ja vang najah tei diu ahin nehetkhen thei lou diu , Mujong namu tei diu navet chen thei lou diu ahi .
44028027	Ijeh-inem itile hiche mite hi alungthimu amoh-in , Anabenguvin thu angaichimtan , Chutilou hileh amit’uva avet chet theiyuva Alungthim’uva ahetkhen them diu , Kadamsahna dia kahenga hung kilekit diu ahi , ’ ati bang chun ;
44028028	hichu kihet cheh-un , hiche Pathen mihuhhingna thu hi chiding namdangte henga kithot ahitan , amahon angai tei diu ahi , ” ati .
44028029	( Paul’in hicheng asei jou hin Judah on ada lhauvin hanel’in akineltauve . )
44028030	Hikoma chun Paul’in inman akipeh-in kum ni sung in achengin , ahenga hung jouse lamdot’in
44028031	Pathen Lenggam thu aseiphongin , koima asunoh beihel’in phongtah in Pakai Jesu thudol ahil lhang lei .
46001001	Pathen lungdeiya Christa Jesu solchah dinga kikou Paul le sopi Sosthenes-in ,
46001002	Corinth khoa Pathen Houbung , Christa Jesua kisuthenga , atheng dinga kikou ho le muntin’a um miho , amaho le eiho dinga i-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa min’a kikou chengse henga ,
46001003	i-Pau Pathen le i-Pakaiyu Jesu Christaa konin lungsetna le chamna nahenguva hung lhung hen !
46001004	Christa Jesu ti nakigop jeh-uva nachunguva kipe Pathen lungsetna jeh chun nang ho jel’in phat jousen ka-Pathen kathangvah jing’e ,
46001005	ajeh chu , Amato nakigop’u hin ima jousea , thuseina hihen hetna hijongle nahaosah-u ahitan ,
46001006	nang hoa hi Christa thudol hettohsahna phudet’a aum banga ,
46001007	i-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa hung kiphondoh ding na-ang nauva Lhagao thilpeh chan khel nanei louna diu ahi .
46001008	Aman nang ho akhon ni , i-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa nikho geiya natuh chah jinguva monabeiya nakoi diu ahi .
46001009	Achapa Jesu Christa , i-Pakaiyu vanga kiloikhomnaa nakoulut’u Pathen chu kitah tah ahiye .
46001010	Sopite , nabonchauva nakinopto cheh-uva , nasei jouseu akitha khat’a , lunggel le ngaito kitha khat nahina diuva i-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa min jal’a ka-ngeh nahiuve .
46001011	Ijeh-inem itile kasopite , nalah-uva kinah baotam alen chu Chloe insung miten kajah a kichentah-in eiseipeh tauve .
46001012	Kasei chu hiche ahi , nang ho amitakip , “ Keivang Paul loi kahi , keima Apollos loi kahin , keima Peter loi kahi , chule keima Christa loi kahi ” natiuve .
46001013	Christa chu kihomtel hitam ? Paul la nang ho din thingpel’a akikhet beh pon , ole Paul min’a baptize chang ngap nahiuvem ?
46001014	Cripus le Gaius tilou nang ho khat beh baptize kachansah loujeh-un kakipah-e ,
46001015	hiche hi koima kei min’a baptize changa nakisei thei louna diu ahiye .
46001016	Stephanas insungmite vang baptize kachan sah nan , hiche kalval vang midang koima baptize kachansah kahepoi .
46001017	Christan baptize kachansah dinga eisol ahipon , Kipana Thupha sei phong dingjoh a eisol ahibouve , Christa thingpel thu chu ahomkeo ahilouna dinga chihna thujong kasei lou ahi .
46001018	Thingpel thu hi amangthah ho dia ngol kai tah ahin , huhhinga um eiho din vang Pathen thahatna ahi .
46001019	Ijeh-inem itile Pathen lekhabua kisun chun , “ Keiman miching ho chihna kasuh manga , het themna neiho hetna moh kahisah ding ahi , ” ati .
46001020	Miching hoiya uma , lekhathem hoilam ham ? Tukhang minel them hoiyaba um ham ? Pathenin hiche vannoi chihna hi ngolna ahisah lou ham ?
46001021	Ijeh-inem itile Pathen chihnaa hin hiche chihna vannoiyin mangcha Pathen ahetdoh thei lou phat’in , ngol kai thua kigel hiche thu kisei phong tahsan ho joh huhhing ding hi pha asai .
46001022	Judaten melchihna a-ngeh-uvin , Greek mihon chihna ahol’ui ,
46001023	Keihon vang thingpel’a kikhenbeh Christa chu kaseiphongu ahi ; hiche hi Judate din kipalna ahin , chidnag namdang ho dia ngolna ahi ;
46001024	ahinla Juda mi hihen Greek mihijong le akikoute dinga Christa chu Pathen thahat le Pathen chihna ahiye .
46001025	Ajeh chu Pathen dia ngol kei chu mihem chihna sangin achingjon , Pathen dia hatmona chu mihem hatna sang in ahatjo nalaiye .
46001026	Sopite nakikou dol’u chu vetem’un , tahsaphe dol’a chingtah jong nahipouvin , thahat tahbeh jong nahipouve ; phunglun laiya mi jong nahideh pouvin ahi ;
46001027	amavang Pathenin vannoiya mimol ho hi miching ho jumso dia alhendoh a , vannoiya mihatmo ho hi mihat ho jumso dinga Pathenin alhendoh ahiuve .
46001028	Pathenin vannoiya mi lhasamho le nahsahmoa kikoi ho alhen’a , aumsa thil ho imacha lou sosahna dinga aumlouhel thil ho geiya aumsah ahi .
46001029	Hitia hi Pathen angsunga mihing khat cha kiletsah thei louhel ding ahiuve .
46001030	Pathen vanga nang ho hi Christa to hingkhom nahiuvin Christa chu Pathena kon eiho chihna , them chamna , kisuh thengna le lhatdamna ahin ,
46001031	Pathen lekhabua , “ Akisonga chu Pakai vangin kisong hen , ” tia kisun banga um ahi .
46002001	Sopite , nahenguva Pathen thuguh phongjal dia kahung chun kamthem le chihna manga hung kahipoi .
46002002	Ijeh-inem itile nang ho lah a thingpel’a akhetbeh pau Jesu Christa tilou ima dang helou hel dinga kihan lho kahitai .
46002003	Keima nahenguva lhasam tah le kichatah chule kihot hot’a hung kahin ,
46002004	kathusei le kathuseiphong chu chihna thugil tah akisei ahipon , lhagao le athahat phondohna joh ahibouve ;
46002005	hiche hin natahsan’u chu mihem chihna vang hilouva Pathen thahat vanga ahijoh photchetna ahiye .
46002006	Apilhingsa ho henga vang chihna thun jong kaseiji nauvin , amavang hiche leiset chihna le amang thah ding leiset vaipote chihna jong ahipoi ;
46002007	amavang leiset um masanga Pathenin iloupina diuva gotsa akoi , kiselguh , Pathen chihna thuguh joh chu kaseijiu ahibouve .
46002008	Hichu hiche leiset vaipote khat chan jong ahepouve , ajeh chu heule loupina Pakai chu thingpel’a akhetbeh louhel diu ahi .
46002009	Ahinla Pathen lekhabua kisun : “ Mit mukhah lou , naa jah khah lou , Mihem lungthima jong lutkha loulai , Pathenin ama ngailuho dinga agonsa chu , ” tia kisei bang chun ,
46002010	lhagao amangchan Pathenin eiho henga aphongdoh tai ; ajeh chu Lhagaovin thil ijakai akholchil jin , Pathen selguh ho geiyin ahildohjie .
46002011	Ama sunga cheng mihem , lhagao tilou mihem umdol thil ho chu koipen ham ahea ? Hitobang chun Pathen umdol thil ho chu Pathen Lhagao tilou koiman ahepoi .
46002012	Pathena kona manbei thilpeh eipeh ho’u ihet theina diuva vannoi leiset lhagao ikisanu ahipon , Pathen Lhagao joh ahibouve .
46002013	Hiti ho chun hilson chihna thu hoa seilouva , lhagaova kihilna dungjuiya Lhagao neiho henga Lhagao thudih kahilchet’uva kaseijoh-u ahi .
46002014	Tahsa lam mihemin vang Pathen Lhagao thil ho chu akisanjipoi ; ajeh chu ama din hichu ngolna ahin , Lhagao dol’a phot chet ding ahijehin hejong ahe theipoi .
46002015	Lhagaova hingmi vangin ijakai aphochen theiyin , midangin vang ama chung thudol atan theipoi .
46002016	“ Ajeh chu koiham Pakai lungthim hea , Ama hil thei ding mi chu ? ” akiti . Eihon vang Christa lungthim ineiyui .
46003001	Sopite , Lhagao chenna miho henga bangin keiman nang ho henga thu kasei theipon , tahsaphe mihem , Christa sunga cheng naosen henga sei banga kasi ahibouve .
46003002	Keiman noitwiya kavah-uva anham kapeh loulai nahive , ajeh chu nahe theihih laiyuve . Tujengin jongnahe thei hih laiyui ,
46003003	ijeh-inem itile tahsaphe mihem nahi nalaiyuve . Nalah-uva kithangsetto le , khat le khat kinah kiphun aum laisea chu tahsa mihem hiya mihem chon chon’a chon nahiu hilou ham ?
46003004	khat’in , “ Keima Paul loukahi , ” atia ; adang khatman , “ Keima Apollos loi kahi , ” ati laisea chu namihem chon’u hilou ham ?
46003005	Ahimonga Apollos chu ipi hiya , Paul chu ipi ham ? Amani hi lhacha natong , amani jal’a natahsan’u ahin , koijoh ahilhona Pakai thilpeh nei cheh ahilhon’e .
46003006	Keiman kaphu ahin , ahin Apollos-in twi achap’a , Pathenin akhansah ahi .
46003007	Hichejeh chun aphutpa jong ima ahidehpoi ; akhansah Pathen bou thupi ahi .
46003008	Aphutpa le atwichappa akibang lhonin , atohgim dungjui cheh a tohman asancheh lhon ding ahinai .
46003009	Keini Pathento tongkhom kahi lhonin , nang ho Pathen loulai , Pathen insah nahiuve .
46003010	Eikipe Pathen lungsetna dungjuiya , insa themtah banga abul kaphu ahitan , midangin achunga asahjom ahi . Asachanin iti asah kivet them hen .
46003011	Abul kiphutsa Jesu Christa tilou koiman abul dang phutdoh theiponte .
46003012	Koi ahin hiche abul kiphut chunga chun san an ashen , dangkan ashen , dong mantamin , ashen lang , thingin ashen , hampa ham changpol hamin sajong le ,
46003013	min atoh cheh chu hung kiphongdoh cheh a , min atoh cheh chu meiya kipatep ding ahiye .
46003014	Mi khat natoh a-insah chu adin jou nah leh tohman asan ding ;
46003015	mikhattou anatoh meiyin akahvam vangle tohman asan lou ding ama tah vang huhhing chang ding , mei pi pal galkaipa tobang hiding ahi .
46003016	Pathen Houin nahiuva nasunguva Pathen Lhagao achen chu nahet louvu ham ?
46003017	Khattouvin hiche Pathen Houin chu asuhmang le Pathenin ama asuhmang ding ahi ; ijeh-inem itile Pathen Houin chu atheng ahin , nang ho a-Houin chu anahiuve .
46003018	Koima ama kilhen lha hih hen ; nalah-uva khattou tulai khanga dia chinga kigel aumle , achihna din ngoljo hen .
46003019	Ijeh-inem inem itile hiche vannoi chihna hi Pathen koma ngolna ahibouve ; ajeh chu Pathen lekhabua akisunin : “ Aman miching ho chu Ajonchih nauva amudohji , ” akitin ;
46003020	Chule avel’in : “ Pakaiyin miching ho lung gel jouse Aboncha pannabei ahi ahenai , ” akiti .
46003021	Hijeh chun koima mihemin kisonda hen ; ajeh chu ijakai aboncha nang hoa jeng ahin ,
46003022	Paul hihen Apollos hile , Cephas ahin , vannoi ahin , hinna hihen thina hijongle , tupet le khonung geiya aboncha nang hoa ahibouve .
46003023	Nang ho Christa mi nahiuvin , Christa chu Pathen’a ahi .
46004001	Keiho hi Christa lhacha , Pathen thuguh chingin min eingaitou hen .
46004002	Hichea neiching ding kihol’a chu tahsan um hiding ahi .
46004003	Keidin vang nang hon kachung thu nakhol diu hihen mihem thutan nikhoa kikhol ding hijongle , thu neochan bou kagel’e ; keiman bon kachung thu kakikholsampoi .
46004004	Keiman kiphat lamna ding kahepon , hijongle themmona beihel kahi tina ahidehpoi , hichea kahcung thu khol chil’a pang Pakai ahi .
46004005	Hiti ahijeh a chu aphet tep phat , Pakai hung kahsen nang hon koima thu tandauvin , aman muthima kisel thiljouse khovah a a phondoh a , mihem lungthim ngaoto chengse jong aphondoh ding ahinai . Chutah le amitakip’in Pathena kona achan ding lom pachatna akisan cheh ding ahi .
46004006	Sopite , hichengse hi nang ho khohsah jal’a kei le Apollos pan’a nang ho kheldoh goa , Pathen lekhabua “ Akisun kalval’in akichon ngaipoi , ” ti hi keinia kona nakihil’uva , chule mikhat sonnaa mi khat chun midang khat anahsahmo louna dinga kasei ahi .
46004007	Ajeh chu koiham nang nachom khen a ? Mia nalah lou ipi naneiyem ? Nalah ahile ibol’a alallou banga hoithoa kiletsah nahim ?
46004008	Tun nalung nau achimset’in , nahulhingsoh tauve ; keiho beiya leng chang gam nahitauvin , keiho to leng ichan khom theina diuvin leng chang tahbah hileu chun kati tave !
46004009	Ipijeh-inem itile vannoi le Vantilte chule mihemte vetchah bep dia amangthah dia umsa mihem ho banga Pathenin keiho Solchah ho hi anukhah pen’a eikoidan’uvin kagel’e .
46004010	Christa khohsah jeh a keiho a-ngol kahiuvin , Christa sunga cheng nang ho vang nachingui ; kei ho kadoiyun , nang ho nahat’uve ; nang ho gin le jabol nahiuvin , keiho mi not thap’in ka-um’ui !
46004011	Tugeiyin jong gilkel dangchah kathoh-un , nihchen ponsil bei , mi khut thah lhauna , chenna intum neilou kahiuve ;
46004012	kakhut nin chol le nangin na katong gim’un , eihousete phat thei kaboh-un , min eibol genthei tengu kathoh ham ham’un ,
46004013	min kallah a eihou tengule lungdamsel’iin kahouvun vannoi kithenhonna bang in ka-umdoh tauvin , tugeiyin mitin kilepnan ka-umdoh tauve .
46004014	Nang ho jumsona ding hilouva kasha tah kachate banga nang ho hilchahna joh ahicheng hi kahindut ahibouve .
46004015	Christa dinga nail’uva sangsom neijeng jong leu chun patampi naneipouve ; ajeh chu Kipana Thupha jeh a Christa Jesu dinga kahinsa nahitauve .
46004016	Hichejeh a chu ka-ngeh nahiuve , keima umchan jom hiuvin .
46004017	Hiche dinga hi Timothy nahenguva kahinsol ahi , ama hi Pakaiya tahsan um kasahtah kachapa ahin , aman muntin le Houbung jousea kahilleji , Christa Jesu hinkhoa kachon namlhah aboncha nageldohsah diu ahi .
46004018	Nahenguva kei hi hung lou dia gel’a nalah-uva kiletsah hoitho mi na-um’uvin ,
46004019	Pakai lungdei ahile keila nahenguva hungvah jel didng kahi ; chutengle hiche mi kiletsah ho thusei mai hilouva atha neina geiyuva kahetdoh idndg ahi ,
46004020	ajeh chu Pathen lenggam chu thuhomkeo ahipon , tha neina ahi .
46004021	I-ham naseiyu ? Mol choiya nahenguva kahung ding ha , ngailut neiya lhagaova lungnemtah a kahungjoh ding ham ?
46005001	Nalah-uva jon thanhoi um kichentah-in akijan , hitobang jon thanhoi hi chiding namdangte lah jenga jong umji lou ahi ; hichea hinmi khat’in apa ji jin aneiye .
46005002	Hitobang thilbol natongpa chu nalah-uva kona paidoh ahitheina dinga lunggimpijo talouva ibol’a kiletsah hoithojo nahiuvem ?
46005003	Tahsaa ka-um lou vangin lhagaovin nalah-uva kalhan , nalah-uva lha mong bangin hitobang thilbolpa chung thu chu katan chaiyin ,
46005004	i-Pakaiyu Jesu minin nang ho to kalungthimin ikihou khom’un , i-Pakaiyu Jesu thahat’in
46005005	Pakai nikho ni le alhagao huhhinga aumtheina din hitobang mi hi atahsa suhmangna dia Satan henga napehdoh diu ahi .
46005006	Nakiletsah-u hi aphapoi . Chol themchan changlhah lhon pumpi achansohji nahet louvu ham ?
46005007	Cholsolou nahijeh-un , changlhah lhon thah nahitheina diuvin chollui chu then ngimsel’uvin . Ijeh-inem itile i-kalchuh kut’uva din Christa kelngoi tha’n akithattai .
46005008	Hichejeh chun chollui le gitlouna le thilse bolna chol mang louvin , cholsoloi , thenna le thutah changlhah joh-in kut bol’u hite .
46005009	Kalekha thotnaa chun jon thanhoi bol ho to nakivop khom louna diuvin kahinsuntai ;
46005010	hiche vannoiya jonthanhoi bol ho le neipap kilose ho chule misumang ho le doihouho kati ahipoi , achutilou le vannoiya kona napotdoh diu ngai ding ahi .
46005011	Tua nakivoppi lou diuva kasut ho chu sopia kisimsa khattouvin jongthanhoi , neipap kiloset abol’a , doi ahouva , Pathen ataitoma , ju akham’a chule mi anambol le , hitobang mi chu kiloikhohmpi louding kati ahi .
46005012	Polam miho thutan ding ka-ilouna ham ? Asunga umho thubou natan jiu hilou ham ?
46005013	Polam mite thu Pathenin tannante . Pathen lekhabua kisei bangin , thilse bolpa vang nalah-uva konin paidoh jengun !
46006001	Nang ho koi nahiuva khat’in achom khat chunga thu aneitengle mitheng ho angsunga kiheh ding go louva mithenglou chiding namdang ho henga heh ding nangap chat jeng jiu ham ?
46006002	Mithengten vannoi thu geiya atan diu jong helou lai nahiuvem ? Chutia vannoi thubon natan diu ahile thu neocha tan dia kilommo nahiuvem ?
46006003	Leiset hinkho thu titah louva Vantilte thu geiya itan diu nahet louvu ham ?
46006004	Chutia leiset hinkho thudol’a thu tanding nei nahiule Houbung sunga pamse miho chu thutan dia natousah jengu leh iti am ?
46006005	Najachatna diuva hiche hi kaseikhum nahiuve . Nalah-uva sopicha kah a thu chai thei miching khatbeh umlou hitam ?
46006006	Chutia chu sopi khat chun sopi khat aheh a atahsanlou ho ang’a kiheh jenglhon ham ?
46006007	Hitia khat le khat nakihehtosau sauvu hin apumthon nahiu aphongtai ; dih hih jongle nathoh gimjoh-u phalou ham ? Kitoh lou hijongle nakido jenguva phalou ham ?
46006008	Hichea hi nangho adih louva kibolgim’a kitoh louva kichom gam , sopite geiya chutibol nahiuve .
46006009	Midih louvin Pathen lenggam alo lou diu ahi nahet lou laiyu ham ? Lhep chatvaiyin um hih-un ; jonthanhoi bol ho , doi houho , mito jong ho , pasal le pasal , numei le numei jongho ,
46006010	gucha ho , neipap kilose ho , jukham ho , mihanse ho , michomhat ho khat chan jong Pathen lenggam alo louhel diu ahi .
46006011	Nang ho abang bang hitobang chu nahiuvin , hijongle Pakai Jesu Christa min le i-Pathen’u lhagaova kisop ngim’a kithensoa them kichansah nahitauve .
46006012	Keidin thil ijakai bolngai ahin , ahinla abonchan thilpha asohdoh deh poi . Keidia thil ijakai bolngai ahivangin imacha noiya lut pong’e .
46006013	Khattouvin an hi oisunga lut , oisung hi ankholna ahi tinte ; ahinla Pathenin agoma asuh bei ding ahi . Mihem tahsa hi jonthanhoi bolna ding ahipon , Pakai ding joh ahi , chule Pakaiyin jong tahsaa ding agelnai .
46006014	Thinaa kona Pakai kaithou Pathen chun eiho jong athahat pan’a eikaithou diu ahi .
46006015	Natahsau chu Christa tibah khat ahi naheuve . Hichea hi Christa tibah chu kalah manga noti tibah a kasemdoh ding ham ? Hithei naisai ponte !
46006016	Notinu toh kijopmatpa chu amanu to tikhat ahilhon helou lai nahiuvem ? Ajeh chu Pathen lekhabun kichentah-in , “ Amani chu tikhat hilhon ding ahi , ” tin aseiye .
46006017	Hichea hin Pakai to kijopmatpa jong chu Amato Lhagao khat ahilhontai .
46006018	Jonthanhoiya konin jam’un ; mihemin chonsetna abol adang jouse chu atahsa polam ahin , jonthanhoi bolpa vang chu ama tahsa chunga chonse ahi .
46006019	Natahsau hi Pathena kona naneiyu nasunguva cheng Lhagao Theng Houin ahi , chule nang ho hi nang hoa nahilou lam helou nahiuvem ?
46006020	Nang ho man kipea chohsa nahitauvin , hijeh chun natahsauvin Pathen choianuvin .
46007001	Lekha nahinsut thudol’uva hin , pasal’in numei amai louhel ding thilpha ahi ;
46007002	Jonthanhoi atamtai , pasal’in numei , numeiyin jong pasal ji kinei cheh hen ,
46007003	pasal’in numei chu achan ding lom pehen lang , hitobangma chun numeiyin jong ajipa pehen lung nachim lhonhen .
46007004	Numeiyin ama tahsa chunga tha aneipon , pasal’in aneijoi ; chutobangma chun pasal’in jong ama tahsa chunga tha aneipon , numeiyin bou aneiye .
46007005	Phat chom khat taonaa nakipeh theina diuva nakidondauva nahung kivop khom kit loi diu nakinopto gel’u tilouvin khat le khat don louvin kikoi hihun , chutile kitimlel jeh a Satanin nalhep lhah lo diu ahi .
46007006	Hiche hi phatsah thua kasei ahin , thupeh dungjui ahipoi .
46007007	Mihem jouse keima tobang hicheh le kadeiyin , ahinla min Pathen Lhagao thilpeh ama chan anei cheh-ui , khat’in hitobang , achom khatman khutobang aneiye .
46007008	Jinei louho le meithaiho kasei ahi , amaho chu kei bangin umleu aphai ;
46007009	amavang akitimjou lou diu le ji aneijoh diu ahi , moh huh sangin jinei aphajoi .
46007010	Jineisa ho chu thu kapeh nahiuve , ( Keima hijo louva Pakaiahi ) numeiyin ajipa ajamsan louhel ding ahi ,
46007011	ajamsan tah bah jongle jinei louva um ding , ahiloule ajipa to kihoucham kit lhon hen , chule pasal’in numei ada louhel ding ahi .
46007012	Adang ho henga , Pakai hilouva , keisei ahi , sopi khatouvin a tahsan lou numei jia aneiya , numei chu amatoh chen khom jing ding anop le , ajipan da hih hen ;
46007013	chule numei khattouvin jong atahsan lou pasal jia aneiya , pasal chu amato chenkhom jing ding anop le , aman pasal chu da hih hen .
46007014	Atahsan lou pasal chu numeinu to ahinkhom jeh a akithenso ahitan , atahsan lou numei jong chu sopipa to ahinkhom jeh a kithenso ma ahitai , chutilou hile nachateu chu boh diu ahin , tua vang akithenso ahitai .
46007015	Ijemtia atahsan loupan adalhah vangle dalha jeng hen , hitobang thua hin sopipa hihen sopinu hijongle akikan lou ahitai , ahinla Pathenin kichamdel dia eikouvu ahi .
46007016	Hijeh a chu ipi nahet em numei , pasal nahoidohsah ding hinam ? Chule pasal’in ipinahet em , numei nahoidohsah ding hinam ?
46007017	Mitakip Pakaiyin chan ahoppeh dungjui le mitakip Pathenin akoudoh hungjui banga achonlou khoh ahi , hiti dinga chu Houbung jousea chondan kasem ahitai .
46007018	Cheptansa kikou koiham ? Selmang dahen . Cheptan louva kikou koiham ? Cheptan din gotda hen .
46007019	Cheptan jong ima ahipon , cheptan lou jong imachom ahidehpoi , Pathen thupeh nit bou thu ahi .
46007020	Mitakip akikou pet’a bang cheh-in um cheh hen .
46007021	Nakikouva chu soh nahim ? Ima gel khoh dan , amavang nachamlhatdoh thei le hichu mangcha jon .
46007022	Ijeh-inem itile soh ahipet’a Pakai dia kikou chu Pakaiya chamlhat ahin , hitobangma chun chamlhat ahipet’a kikou chu Christa soh ahi .
46007023	Man pea kichosa nahitauve , mihem soh-in pangkit hih-uvin .
46007024	Sopite , amitakip akikoupet tobang cheh-in hiti chun Pathen angsunga um cheh hen .
46007025	Nu-ngah ho thudol vang Pakaiya konin thupeh kaneipoi , hijong le Pakai hepina jal’a tahsan tah a keiman kagel khat kasei ahi .
46007026	Pha kasha chu ahile tulai hesoh gentheina jal hin mihem ama aum bang banga aum jeng ding pha kasai .
46007027	Numeito kisomlhopsa nahim ? Onthol ding gotdan ; numeiya kona ongdoh nahim , numei holdan ,
46007028	Jinei jongle chun achonsea vang nahipoi , nu-ngah jeng jong ajineiya chu chonsea ahipoi . Amavang jinei hon tahsa genthei hesoh athoh diu ahin , hichu kapeldohsah nom nahiuve .
46007029	Ahinla hiche hi kaseipeh nahiuve sopite , phat anaitai , tukal’in jineisa chengse jong jinei lou bangin ,
46007030	akapte chu kap lou bangin , akipahte kipah lou bangin , thil kichohten jong imacha nei lou bangin ,
46007031	vannoiya natong thilbol’an jong imacha bol louhel bangin um hen ; ijeh-inem itile hiche vannoi hi alim-agong akitolmang jing’e .
46007032	Lungkham louva naum diu kadeiye . Jinei loupan Pakai jeng agel’in Pakai lung lhai ding bou agel’e .
46007033	Jineisan vang vannoi thil ho agel’in , ajinu lung lhai ding agel’in ;
46007034	hijeh chun akikhenna aum’e . Numei jineilou nu-ngah chun Pakai kinbol ding jeng agel jin , tahsa le Lhagaova kithenso ding adeiye ; ahin jineisa numeiyin vang vannoi thil ho jeng angaiton ajipa along lhaina ding angaitoi .
46007035	Hicheng hi nang ho khichahna ding hilouva naphat chomna diu le khen beihel’a Pakaiya kitup keicha naum jing theina diuva kasei peh nahiuve .
46007036	Koiham khat’in kitimatpi lou dia akiloipi agolnu akivoppidol kitoh lou asah a , akitimlel behseh a , ikhat aso tei ding le , kicheng lhon hen , alungdeiyin bol jeng hen , chonsea ahipoi .
46007037	Amavang koi hile along sunga dettah a dinga , kitim lelna neilou , alunggul se thununtheiya , alunggil’a pangdet’a agolnu kitimatpi louva koijou chu thilpha bola hi ;
46007038	hiti hin agolnukichenpi pa jong thilpha bol ahinan , ahivangin akichenpi loupan thilpha cheh abol ahiye .
46007039	Ajipa ahin laisea numei chu akihen ahin , ajipa thi teng vangle a-ongthol ahitan , Pakai lungdei adei dei to kicheng thei ahitai .
46007040	Ahinla keima ngaiton vang achuti moh um jeng thei le nomsa jonte , ajeh chu keijong Pathen Lhagao change kigel kahi .
46008001	Doihouna kinei neh le chah thudol’a vang , ijakai hetna inei bukimsoh-un ihesoh keiyui . Hetna vang hin mi kiletsah hoithona apensah jin , ngailut nan vang mi akhantousah ji’e .
46008002	Mi khattou i-them khat hea akigel le ama chun ahet ding dol jeng jong akihet lou lai ahibouve .
46008003	Amavang koi tobang khat’in Pathen angailut le ama chu Pathen hetmi ahitai .
46008004	Doi houna kinei neh le chah thudol’a vang vannoiya limsemthu doi hi ima ahipon , chule Pathen khatseh tilou adang aumlou jong i-hesoh keiyui .
46008005	Ijeh-inem itile vanlaijol le leiset chunga Pathen kisah ho um’u hen lang , hiti chun pathen tampi le Pakai tamtah hijong leu ,
46008006	eiho din vang thil jouse konna le eiho geiya Amaa ihiu Pa Pathen khatseh le thil jouse amavanga um eiho jong Amavanga hing Pakai khatseh Jesu Christa bou ahi .
46008007	Ahinla mi jousen hiche hetna hi aneipon , abang khat’in doihou lai umchan tugeiya achinjeh-un aneh achah-u chu doihouna kinei mongin agel’un , alung gelnau tha alhemjeh-in hichea hin akisuhboh lo jitauve .
46008008	Ahin anneh chun Pathen kom einaisah chom diu jong ahipon , ne hih jongleu hen kemchom lou nejongleu hen phatchompi deh lou ihiuve .
46008009	Hijongle hiche natha neinau hi alhasamte dia kipal lhuhna ahilouna din ching theiyun .
46008010	Ijeh-inem itile hetna neisa nangin doihouna ankong naum chu lhahsamna neimin namudoh le , lhasam tah ahivanga alung gel’a doihouna an neh ding katilkhou lou ding ham ?
46008011	Hijeh a chu hiche sopi hetnaa lhasam , ajal’a Christa thipeh mi chu nang hetnan asuhmang ahitai .
46008012	Hitobang hin sopite dounan chonseuvin lang along gel’u hat lou chu suhnat peh leu chun Christa douna chonse nahiuve .
46008013	Hijeh chun kasopi kipal lhuh louna din , neh le chah a kasopi akipal lhuh ding le a-itih chan geiyin sa asan neh dange .
46009001	Chamlhat kahilou ham ? Solchah kahilou ham ? I-Pakaiyu Jesu mu lou kahim ? Nang ho hi Pakai dia katohga nahilouvu ham ?
46009002	Midang din solchah hi hih jong leng nang ho din kahi ; ajeh chu solchah kahina mohor chu Pakai hinkhoa nang ho hinna hi ahi .
46009003	Hiche hi einelkal ho henga kakihonna ahi .
46009004	Nehna dingle donna dia thunei mo kahiuvem ?
46009005	Solchah dang ho le Pakai sopite chule Cephas banga atahsan numei jia kipuile dia thanei lou kahiuvem ?
46009006	Ahiloule kei le Barnabas hin natong louva kivahna thei tha kanei lhon lou ham ?
46009007	Ama sum kisan’a sepai natong koiham ? Lengpilei bol’a aga nelou koiham ? Ahiloule kelngoi hon ching’a panga kelngoi noitwi nelou koiham ?
46009008	Hicheng hi mihem ngaidol’a kasei hilou ham ? Ahiloule hicheng hi Danthun jong aseihilou ham ?
46009009	Ijeh-inem itile Mose Danthua chun , “ Bongchal chang chilpet muh nakan lou ding ahi , ” tin akisun’e . Pathenin bongchal ho akhohsah mong ham ?
46009010	Hichengpi keiho khohsahna asei hilou ham ? Ajeh chu keiho jal’a kisun ahi ; ajeh pen tah chu loukaiyan kinepna neiya akaitei ding , chang chil’an jong chan akisan ding kinem’a achil ding ahi .
46009011	Keiin nang ho dia Lhagao muchi kitupeh a , nang hoa kon’a leiset thil kakisan lhon didng chu keini dia thupi tah ham ?
46009012	Midang hon nachunguva thu anei theile keihon kahanei cheh joh lou diu ham ? Ahivangin keihon hiche thuneina chu kamangpouve ; Christa thudol Kipana Thupha imachaa kasuhmo louna diuvin ijakaiya kathoh ham ham jo’uve .
46009013	Houin lhacha kinbol hon Houin’a kona neh le chah akijon’uva , chule maicham phunga lhachasen jong maicham’a kitoh thil hoa chan aneijiu khu helou nahiuvem ?
46009014	Hitobanga chu Kipana Thupha lhangsam hon jong Kipana Thuphaa kona kivah hingna anei diuva Pakaiyin thu alhuhsah ahi .
46009015	Ahinla ken hiche ho hi khat cha jong kamangchapoi . Hichengse chu hitia chu kachan theina dia jong kahinsut ahipoi ; ajeh chu kakisonna hi khattouvin ahomkeo asosah sangin thileng keidin aphajoi .
46009016	Kipana Thupha seiphongle jong leng keidia kisonna ahidehpoi , kabollou khoh eikisekhum ahibouve ; ajeh chu Kipana Thupha seiphong louva um hileng keidia iti khoh a khoh ding hitam !
46009017	Ijeh-inem itile keima lungchama bol’a kahile tohman kasan ding hitin , ahinla kachama tong kahiloujeh-in katoh ding lom kin eikisekhumjo ahi .
46009018	Ahile katohman chu ipiba ham ? Kipana Thupha chu manbeiya seiphonga aum theina ding le hiche Kipana Thuphaa keiman katha neina kachan lom chu lhingset’a kangeh louna ding ahi .
46009019	Keima mi jousea kona chamlhat kahitah vangin mi tamcheh kalah lut theina din kei le kei mitin soha kisemdoh kahin ,
46009020	Judate lah lut theina din Judate lah a Juda mi umin ka-umin , Danthu noiya um miho kalah thei nan , Danthu noiya ka-um lou vangin Danthu noiya umte bangin ka-umjie ;
46009021	Danneiloute kaloilut theina din Dan nei loute henga Dan neiloute henga Danneilou bangin ka-umjin , amavang Christa Danthua um kahin , Pathen Dan mang lou kahipoi ;
46009022	mi lhasamte kalah lut theina din alhasamte henga alhasam bangin ka-umjin ahi ; hitia hi mi phabep kahuhhing theina dia mitin henga ijakai kahiji ahi .
46009023	Aboncha hi Kipana Thupha khohsah jal’a kabol’a , hichea chu chan kaneidoh theina ding ahi .
46009024	Lhaitet golseh mun’a khu mi jouse alhai cheh vanga mi khat’in bou hatman asanji nahet louvu ham ? Hitia chu nasan theina diuvin lhaiyun .
46009025	Golseh bol jousen ijakaiya atibah chengseu atimhat jiuvin , hiche ho hin kem mangthei lallukhuh san na dia abol’u ahin , eihoa vang kem thei lou ahi .
46009026	Hitia chu lhaiya kahin , abidoi kicheh neilou kahipon , onghom lai khuttum’a sua jong kahipoi .
46009027	Midang henga thu kiseiphonglea ajo le kei ma lah louva ka-um louna dia katahasa hi kachup’a thua kanunsah ahi .
46010001	Sopite ima hetoh louva naum diu kadeipoi , ajeh chu ipuipateu chu abonchauva meilhang noiya kijot’a , Twikhanglen pal galkai ahiuvin ,
46010002	chule abonchauvin Mose nungjui ahiu hetnan meilhang lah le Twikhanglena baptize achangui ;
46010003	abonchan Lhagao an thakhat anekhom’un ,
46010004	abonchauvin lhagao twi thakhat adonkhom’ui ; ajeh chu anung jui jing Lhagao songpia kon in twi adon’un , hiche Songpi hi Christa chu ana hi .
46010005	Ahinla alah-uva mi kon khat chunga Pathen alung lhai loujeh-in gamthip laiya alhukamtauve .
46010006	Amahon alung gul banguva thilse ilung gul louna diuva thilsoh hichengse hi eiho hilchahna soh ahitai .
46010007	Pathen lekhabua , “ Mipi chu anne ding le twidon din atouvun ahinla lam din akipatdoh kittauve , ” tia kisun bang chun alah-uva kon khat bangin limsemthu doi houdauvin .
46010008	Alah-uva mi phabep’in jonthan hoi apat jeh-uva nikhat sungseh a mihem sang som ni le sang thumin athi lo jeh-in jonthanhoi bol poute .
46010009	Alah-uva mi konkhat’in Pakai apatep jeh-uva gulsen achuh lihgam jeh-in eihon patep pou hite .
46010010	Alahuva abang bang akiphin jeh-uva misumang Vantil’in asuh mangjehin kiphin hih-vin .
46010011	Achunguva thilsoh hichengse hi vetkah dinga soh ahin , chule khang nu nunga mi eiho pho tangna dinga kisundoh ahiye .
46010012	Hichejeh chun koi hile adinga kigel’an alhuh louna din ching thei hen .
46010013	Mihem doulel lhepna na chunguva achukhapoi , Pathen tahsan umtah ahin , Nathan adoujou kalval’in lhepna anchunguva chuh sah ponte , chule lhepna chuto kilhon’a nathoh jouvuva nahoidohna diu lampi nasempeh diu ahi .
46010014	Hichejeh chun ka-ngai tahte , doihou jamsan’un .
46010015	Lung khomto mi nahijeh-uva kasei ahi , nang hon kigel toh-uvin .
46010016	Phatthei channa khon’a phattheiboh i-ngeh tengu , hiche hi Christa thisan donkhomna hilou ham ? Chu le changlhah ihebaljiu khu Christa tahsa changkhomji ihilouvu ham ?
46010017	Hichea hin changlhah pheng khatseh ahin , eiho tampi jong hi tahsa khatseh ihiuve ; ijeh-inem itile ibonchauva changlhah pheng khat changkhom ihiuve .
46010018	Tahsa dol’a Israel khu veuvin ; maicham thilto neho khu maicham thil changkhom cheh hilou ham ?
46010019	Ipi kaseiyem ? Doi houna kinei neh le chah chu ikhat ahi katia ; ahiloule limsemthu doi khu ikhat ahi katim ?
46010020	Katipoi , chidang namdangten kithoina aneiyu chu thilhaho apeh-u ahin , Pathen apeh-u ahipoi , hijeh a chu thilhaho to chan naneikhom diu kadeilou ahiye .
46010021	Nang hon Pakai khon le thilhaho khon’a nadonkop thei lou diu , Pakai dokhang le thilhaho dokhanga ankong na-umkhom thei lou diu ahi .
46010022	Ahiloule Pakai chu thangset sahna dia iphin lung hang diu ham ? Ama sangin la ihatjo pouvin !
46010023	“ Ijakai bolngai ahi , ” akitin , ahinla aboncha khantouna ahidehpoi .
46010024	Koiman ama changseh phatna ding hol louvin midang phatna ding holjo hen .
46010025	Kailhang sajohna mun’a thil kijoh ipi hile hetchetna dia dongtoh le louvin nejengun .
46010026	“ Ijeh-inem itile leiset le asunga um jouse hi Pakaiya ahi , ” tin akiseiye .
46010027	Pathen tahsanlou min an nea nakouva nache nom’u le na-angsunguva aluichan chu hetchetna dongtoh le louvin nejenguvin .
46010028	Amavang , “ Hiche hi doiphunga kithoina sa ahi , ” atile , naseipeh pau jeh le lung gel’a hetchetna aumtah jeh-in neh dauvin ,
46010029	nang lung gel’a hetchetna mai kasei ahi pon , khatpa joh a chu kasei ahi . “ Iti keima chamlhatna chu mi dang lung gel maiyin atuh oh thei ding ham ?
46010030	Keiman lunglhaisel’a kisanga , thangvah puma kasan chu kon eitaitompeh ding ham ? ” tin nate .
46010031	Hichea hinneuvin don jong leu chun nabol jouseu Pathen loupina din bol’uvin .
46010032	Judate hihen Greek miho hile chule Pathen Houbungmite dia kipal lhuh nan um dauvin lang ,
46010033	keiman kachangseh a phatchomna ding hol louva , ijakaiya mitin lunglhaina kahol’a huhhinga aum theina diu kabol bangin bol’uvin .
46011001	Keiman Christa umchan ka-jop bang hin keima umchan jom-uvin .
46011002	Keima neigeldoh jinguva nang ho kapeh kihilna chengse natuh chah jing jeh-uvin nang ho kaseiphai .
46011003	Hichea hin Christa mitin luchang ahiya , pasal numei luchang chule Christa luchang Pathen ahidol hinahet diu kadeiye .
46011004	Pasal koi hile lukhuh khuh puma taova ha , ahiloule gaothuseiya ham chun aluchang Christa i-asah lou ahin ;
46011005	numei koi hile lukhuh louva taova ha , ahiloule gaothuseya ham jong chun aluchang ajipa i-asah lou ahi , ama nu chu alikiveltol nu tobangma ahibouve .
46011006	Numeiyin lukhuh akhuh lou ngal ding le asam kivotol hen , sam kivotol chu numei dinga jachatna ahile lukhuh akhuh a pha jeng ahi .
46011007	Pasal vangin Pathen lim le loupina aput jeh a lukhuh akhuh lou ding ahi ; numeiyin pasal thupi na aphondoh ahi .
46011008	Ijeh-inem itile Pasal hi numeiya kondoh ahipon , numeijoh pasal’a kondoh ahibouve .
46011009	Chule numei khohsahnaa pasal kisem ahipon , pasal khohsahna joh numei kisem ahi .
46011010	Hijeh a chu Vantilte jal’a numeiyin ajipa noiya ahichu aluchanga achin ding ahi .
46011011	Ahinla Pakaiya hinkhoa hin pasal beiya numei ima ahipon , numei beiyin jong pasal ima ahipoi .
46011012	Ajeh chu pasal’a numei akondoh banga Pasal jong numeiya peng ahi , ahinla thil ijakai Pathena kon cheh ahiye .
46011013	Nang hon geltoh-uvin , numei lukhuh khuh louva Pathen henga ataoji chu kilom nam ?
46011014	Pasal dia sam hoisao hi ama dinga nahsahmona ahi , thil umdol mongin jong nahil louvu hiya ,
46011015	numei dia samsao hi thupina ahi umchanin nahil louvu ham ? Ipijeh-inem itile samsao chu akhujol dinga kipe ahi .
46011016	Ahinla koitobang anel’a aumle , hiche thudol’a hin eihon chonna lhongpi mong ineipouvin , Pathen Houbungten jong aneipoi .
46011017	Hiche hilchahna kapeh diuva hin kaseipha pouve , ajeh chu phat jep jepna dia kikhom hilouvin setna cheh joh dia kikhom nahiuve .
46011018	Amasa penin nang ho Houbunga nahung kikhopji tengle loitum tuma nakikhenjiu thu kajan , tahjong katahsan thim thim’e .
46011019	Nalahuva lah thei tah miho ahung kiphondoh a hetdoh a aum theina diuva nasunguva lung gel ngaito chom jong um ding mong ahinai .
46011020	Ahinla mun khat’a nahung kikhop khom tengule Pakai jan anjon nehna dingdol ahipoi ,
46011021	ajeh chu amitakip’in ama jan an cheh akineh masah jin , abang khat’in kel athoh jin , adang khatma akham avan aum’e .
46011022	Nehna ding donna ding in neilou nahiuvem ? O-le Pathen Houbung chu nahsahmoa bol’a aneiloute jachatsah nahiuvem ? Ipi kaseipeh diu ham ? Kaseiphat diu ham ? Hiche thua vang pahcha pouving’e .
46011023	Pakaiya kona kalah nang ho kapehson’u thuhil chu hiche ahi , Pakai Jesu apehdoh jan chun , aman changlhah alan ,
46011024	phatthei aboh jouvin aheh bal bal’in , “ Hiche hi nang ho khel’a pang katahsan chu ahi , neihet jingna diuvin bol’un , ” ati .
46011025	Hitobangma chun jan anneh jouvin khon chu alan , “ Hiche khon hi kathisan’a kitepna thah ahi , nadon chan’uva keima neigeldoh jing na diuvin bol’un , ” ati .
46011026	Ijeh-inem itile hiche changlhah naneh-uva hiche khon’a nadon laiseuva ahung kit kahsea Pakai thina chu naphondoh jingu ahi .
46011027	Hijeh chun koi hile alam louva changlhah chu nea ha , ahiloule Pakai khon’a kona don hamchu Pakai tahsa le thisan douna chonsea kisim ding ahi .
46011028	Mihem amacheh kikhol chil hen lang akikhol dungjuiyin changlhah chu nehen , khon’a konin jong don hen .
46011029	Ijeh-inem itile Pakai tahsa chu ipi kiseina ahi helouva nea don’a chun , aneh a adon’a kona achung thu akitan ahi .
46011030	Hichejeh a chu nalah-uva mi tamtah chatmoa na-chea ahin , aihmu mil’a jong atam lheh tai .
46011031	Eiho kikhol chil masa leu hen thutanna ichuh khah lou diu ahi ;
46011032	hijongle vannoi to ithuu akitan tha louna din Pakaiyin eikholchil’uvin eigah chah tauve .
46011033	Hijeh chun kasopite , anedinga nahung kikhop tengule khat le khat ki-ngah khom’uvin .
46011034	Nahung kikhop tengule thutanna na-chuh louna diuvin , koi hile agilkel’a chun a-in’a hin kineh hen . Thudang dang ho thudol vang kahung tengle sutoh nang’e .
46012001	Sopite , Lhagao thilpehdol helouva na-um diu kanompoi .
46012002	Chidang namdang nahi laiyuva chu limsemthu doi paomo ho noiya kun’a , hiche ho chun napui mangjiu naheuve .
46012003	Hijeh a chu kahetsah nahiuve , Pathen Lhagao puihoi mi koiman , “ Jesu gaosap chang hen , ” atipon , chule Lhagao Thenga konlouvin koiman , “ Pakai Jesu , ” ati thei poi .
46012004	Lhagao thilpeh tampi aumnan , ahinla apea Lhagao khat bou ahi ;
46012005	chule lhacha natoh tampi aumvangin Pakai khatseh bou ahiye ;
46012006	chuma le natoh gotchom chom aumin , ahinla Pathen khatseh bou ahin , aman thil hichengsea chu na atohji ahibouve .
46012007	Amitakip hi japi phat touna dia Lhagao kiphondoh na hetna thilpeh khat cheh kipea ahi .
46012008	Ijeh-inem itile hiche Lhagaova kona chu mi khat chihna thu kipea , michom khat chu hiche lhagaoma maa kona chu hettheina thu kipea ,
46012009	chom khat jong hiche Lhagaova kona hi tahsan kipea , hiche Lhagaova kon kit’a hi midang khat damsah theina Lhagao thilpeh kipea ,
46012010	midangkhat chu thil kidang bol theina kipea , adang khatma gaothu seitheina kipea , mikhatma chu Lhagao le Lhagao dat khen themna kipea , khat jong paotin tang hetna kipea , khatma paotin tang ledoh jouna kipea ahin ,
46012011	ahinla hichengse bol’a chu hiche Lhagao khatseh chu ahin , aman angaito le adei dungjuiya amichan cheh a ahoppeh ahi .
46012012	Tahsa pumkhat sunga tibah tampi aumin , tahsa tibah tampi ahivangin tipum khat bou ahi , Christa jong chuti ahiye .
46012013	Ajeh chu eiho Juda mi hiu hen Greek mi hijongleu hen , soh hiu hen chamlhat hijongleu hen , Lhagao khat’a dia ibonchauva tahsa khat’a baptize changkhom , Lhagao khat’a dia ibonchauva donkhom ihiuve .
46012014	Ijeh-inem itile tahsa hi tibah khatseh ahipon , tampi ahibouve .
46012015	Kengphang hin , “ Khut kahiloujeh-in keima tipuma kahipoi , ” tile hiche vanga chu tipuma hida deh lou ding ahi .
46012016	Chule bilkol hin , “ Mit kahiloujeh-in keima tipuma kahipoi , ” tile hiche vanga chu tipuma hida deh lou ding ahi .
46012017	Tahsa pumpi hi mit hita le hoiya khojahna um ding ham ? Apumpin khojahna hita le hoiya gimnam jahna um ding ham ?
46012018	Tua vang Pathenin tibah ho hi khat khat’a tahsa puma adeina laimun cheh a aphulut ahi .
46012019	Aboncha hi tibah khat seh hita le tipum hoiya umtan tem ?
46012020	Tua vang tibah atam vangin tipum khat bou ahi .
46012021	Mit hin khut jah’a , “ Nangma ka-ngai chatna aumpoi , ” ti theilou , chukit le luchang hin kengphang te nijah a , “ Nang ni ka-ngai chapoi , “ ti thei lou ahi .
46012022	Chuti titah sanga tahsa pumpia um tibah hatmoa kigel chengse hi akhohjo a pang cheh ahiuve .
46012023	Eihon jong nahsah louva kigel tibah ho chu ikhohsah jo’uvin , itibah hoimoa um lai jouse jong ijemhoijo jiuvin ,
46012024	hiche kijepna ho chu itibahhoi ho hin angai chapoi . Ahinla Pathenin tahsa pum hi asuton , alhasam tibah ho chu akhohsah cheh joi ,
46012025	hitia chu tahsa pum sunga kikhenna aumdaa , hisanga chu tibah ho khat le khat akigel khoh to cheh na diu ahijoi .
46012026	Hijeh a chu tibah khat’in athohgim le tibah jousen athoh gimpia , tibah khat seiphat achan le tibah dang jouse jong kipah khom ihiuve .
46012027	Nang ho Christa tipum nahiuvin , khat cheh chu atibah nahiuve .
46012028	Pathenin Houbung sunga hi amasatah a Solchah ho , aninaa themgao ho , thum channaa mihil ho , chuban’a bolmo kidang bol ho , abankit’a damtheina lhagao thilpeh chang ho , thilphachom bol ho , vaipo them ho , paochom chom tho thei ho atun ahi .
46012029	Aboncha Solchah hiuvam ? Abonchauva themgao hiuvam ? Abonchauva mihil hiuvam ? Abonchauva bolmo kidang bol thei hiuvem ?
46012030	Abonchauva damsah theina Lhagao thilpeh neila hilouva ong ? Aboncha pao chom thoa hi-ngal louva ong ? Aboncha pao ledoh theila hilouva ong ?
46012031	Amavang Lhagao thilpeh lencheh ho hadel’un . Lampi phachehjo kavetsah diu ahinalaiye .
46013001	Keiman mihempao jouse le Vantilte pao tho thei jong leng , ngailut kanei loule sum-eng dah kivonging le khutbeh kibeng ging bep kahi .
46013002	Keiman gaothu sei dohna kaneiya thil imguh jouse jong seidoh a hetna jouse kanei thei , mol tolmang helna thei tahsan geiya kanei thei ahin , ngailut kanei loule imacha kahipoi .
46013003	Vaicha gentheite vahna kanei jouse kato thei , katahsa geiya meiya govam jeng dia kaphal ngam thei ahinan , ngailut ka nei loule phatchomna kaneideh poi .
46013004	Ngailut nan athoh hat jingin , hejong ahepin , athangsepon , akithang-at pon , akiletsahpoi ;
46013005	alam louvin achonpon , ama chang phat chomna aholpon , alung hang baipon , thil phalou jat amelchihpoi ;
46013006	thildih louva akipahji pon , thudih akipapijie ;
46013007	imajousea athoh hat’in , imajousea atahsanin , ima jousea akinemin , ijakaiya athoh tun tun’e .
46013008	Ngailutnan beitih neiponte . Gaothu seidoh um jongle beiding , paochom chom tho um jongle hai ding , hetna um jongle bei ding ahi .
46013009	Ijeh-inem itile ihetnau le gaothu iseidoh nau hi bukim lou ahi ;
46013010	abulhing chamkim ahung tengle akimlou chengse bei ding ahi .
46013011	Kachapan laiyin chapang thuseiyin kaseiyin , chapang lung gel’in kagel’in , chapang thil ngaiton ka-ngaitoi ; pasal lhing kahiphat’in vang chapan lai thil jouse kapaitai .
46013012	Ajeh chu eihon tugeiya phatvetsunga lim kichen louva imu’u ahin , ajo tah le kimaitoa imudiu ahi ; tu chan geiya kahet kimlou ahin , ajo tah le eihet kimsoh banga kahet kimsoh ding ahi .
46013013	Tun tahsan , kinep , ngailut hicheng thum hi um jing ahin , hicheng lah a ngailut athupipen’e .
46014001	Ngailutna del jingun , Lhagaothilpeh ho tup’un lang , ahideh-in Pathen thu seidohna ding hatup’uvin .
46014002	Paochom thoa thusei chun mihemte koma sei ahipon , Pathen henga asei ahi , ajeh chu koiman ahetpeh poi , aman Lhagaova thuguh asei ahibouve .
46014003	Pathen thu seidoh vang chun mihemte koma khantouna ding le tilkhouna chule lungmonna sei ahi .
46014004	Paochom thoa vang ama khantouna ding bou akisei ahin , Pathen thu seidohpa vang chun Houbung akhantousah-e .
46014005	Paochom thoa thu nasei cheh diu kadeiyin , ahinla Pathen thu naseidoh diu kadei cheh-e , Houbungin akisan’a khantouna anei theina dia aledoh aum loule paochom thoa thusei sangin Pathen thu seidohpa chu gamchengin aphachomjoi .
46014006	Tun sopite , nahenguva hunging paochom thon thuseiying , thu phondoh ham , hetna ham , gaothu seidohna ham ahiloule hilchetna ham mangin seipeh dau leng ipi naphatchompi diu ham ?
46014007	Hitobang chun hinna bei thil ging thei , kuli ahim , selangdah ham akimut teng agin akicheh loule ipi kitho ahi kon iti ahetdoh ding ham ?
46014008	Ijeh-inem itile sumkon mutgin akichet loule koi galkon dia kigo thei ding ham ?
46014009	Hitobanga chu paochom thoa thu nasei tengu nasei cheng akicheh loule ipi naseiyu kon iti ahetdoh ding ham ? Hui lhoh mang ding bep’a aseiyu ahibouve .
46014010	Vannoiya hin aging thei ogin atam lheh jengin , khat cha jong ajeh bei aumpoi .
46014011	Keiman hiche ogin chu ipi kiseina ham he hih leng aseipa dia keima pao helou kahitan , amachu kei dinga pao helou ahitai .
46014012	Hitobang hin nang hon jong aban’a Lhagao thilpeh hol nahiuvin , hichea chun lolhin chehna din Houbung khantouna ding ho hahol’uvin .
46014013	Paochom thoa thusei chun ipi kisei ham aledoh theina din tao hen .
46014014	Ajeh chu keima paochom thon tao leng kalhagao vang atao nan , kalung gil’a van aga aumpoi .
46014015	Ahile iti dingba ham ? Lhagaova katao tengle lung gil’a katao tei ding , Lhagaova la kasha teng lung gil’a jong kasah tei ding ahi .
46014016	Nangin phattheiboh ngeh nan Lhagaovin tao le chun kikhopna mun’a um milham chun ipi naseila helouva nang thangvahnaa chu , “ Amen , ” iti ati thei ding ham ?
46014017	Nangin phatah-in thangvahna sei jong le chun khatpa chun akhantoupi lou ahi .
46014018	Nang ho sei sanga paochom thoa thu kaseitamjoh jeh-in Pathen kathangvah-e .
46014019	Ahivangin Houbung sunga paochom thoa thu cheng asang sang kasei sangin mihil chah na dia kalunggil’a thu cheng nga seh sei kadeijoi .
46014020	Sopite , lung gel’in chapang hih-un , nunsetna lama chapangun lang , lung gel’in vang pilhinguvin .
46014021	Pathen lekhabua Danthu kisun : “ ‘ Paochomhel tho ho , Michom beh ho kamsunga Keiman hiche mite henga thu kasei ding , Hijongle amahon kasei ngaipouvinte , ’ tin Pakaiyin aseiye , ” akiti .
46014022	Hichejeh a chu paochom tho hi tahsan loulai ho dinga melchihna ahin , atahsansa ho ding ahipoi ; Pathen thuseidoh vang hi atahsansa ho ding ahin , atahsan loulai ho ding ahipoi .
46014023	Houbung pumpi kikhom hen lang amitakip’in paochom thoa thu aseipet’in milhamho ham atahsan lou lai hoham hung lut jengle , a-ngolgam dol’a namudoh lou diu ham ?
46014024	Amavang mi jousen Pathen thu aseidoh pet’in atahsan loulai ham milham khat hung lutkha ta le , ajah chengsen asosol’a aboncha chu a-oimoa pang ding ,
46014025	alungthim selguh jouse kiphongjal’a , chutah le amai tol’a asuh lut jenga Pathen chibai aboh ding , “ Tahbeh mongin nalah-uva Pathen aum’e ” tia aphonjal ding ahi .
46014026	Ipi iti dingba ham sopite ? Nakikhop khom tengu amitakip , la sah dingnei jong , thuhil ding nei jong , thuphon ding nei jong , paochom tho ding nei jong , ledoh ding neiyan jong , aboncha chun khantousahna jeng hihen .
46014027	Koiham khat paochom thoa thuseiya na-umu le , mi ni ham , atam penin thum geiyin , khat khat’in kilhau hen chule mi khat’in akisei chu ledoh hen .
46014028	Pao ledoh ding aum lou vang le Houbung kikhopna ama chu umthim hen , ama changseh le Pathen henga seijo hen .
46014029	Gaothu seidoh ho jong chu mi ni ham thum ham geiya aseiyuva , adang hon aseiyu ageltoh diu ahi .
46014030	Amavang mi atou thim khattou henga thu ahung kiphondoh le amasapa chu thip hen .
46014031	Ijeh-inem itile mi jouse akitilkhouva aboncha alung mon theina diuva nabonchauva khat khat’a gao thu naseidoh theiyu ahi .
46014032	Themgao ho gaotheina chuThemgao ho thu noiya um ding ahi ;
46014033	ajeh chu Pathen hi lungnoh phahna ding hilouva chamnajo ahibouve . Mithengte Houbung jousea chonna bangin ,
46014034	Houbung kikhopna numeiho umthim beh-u hen , ajeh chu amaho hi thuseina kipelou ahiuve ; chusangin Danthun asei bangin thua nungjo diu ahi .
46014035	I-khat khat hetnom aneiyu jongle a-in’uva ajiteu akidoh diu ahi , ajeh chu numei dia Houbung kikhopna thusei chu jachat um ahi .
46014036	O-le Pathen thu hi nang hoa kona hungjah doh pan ha , ahiloule nang ho komseh a bou hung lhung ham ?
46014037	Khattou Themgaova kigel’a Lhagao thilpeh changa kibol aumle nahenguva kalekhasut hi Pathen thupeh ahi kihet them hen .
46014038	Koitobang khat’in anahsah loule ama nahsah louva kikoi ding ahi .
46014039	Hijeh chun kasopite , gaothu seidoh ding gut’un lang , chule paochom thoa thusei ding jong khamhih-un ;
46014040	amavang ijakai hoitah le kitup keiyin kibol cheh hen .
46015001	Sopite , nahenguva kaseiphong Kipana Thupha , nakisan’uva pansatna naneiyu chu kahetsahnom nahiuve ;
46015002	nahenguva kathusei phonga chu napandet jingu le hiche vanga chu huhhinga um ding nahiuve , achutiloule mohseh a natahsan’u ahibouve .
46015003	Ajeh chu amasapen’a nang ho kapeh , kathulah chu ahile Pathen lekhabua kisei dungjuiyin eiho chonset chengse khel’in Christa athin ,
46015004	ama chu avuiyun , chuin Pathen lekhabua kiseibangin nithum nin kaithouvin aumtai ;
46015005	hichun Cephas henga akilah-in , chujouvin som le ni henga ,
46015006	hiche ban hin sopite mi ja nga valjen henga khatvei lah-in akilah-in , alah-uva atamjo tugeiyin ahing nalaiyun , phabep vang athitauve ;
46015007	abanin Jacob henga akilah-in , chule solchah jouse henga jong akilah-e ;
46015008	Akhon nan aphat louva peng tobang kei henga jong ahung kilah-in ahi .
46015009	Keima Solchah ho lah a alhumpen kahin , Pathen Houbung kabolset jeh chun Solchah tiding jong kakilompoi ;
46015010	hijongle Pathen lungset jal’a keima hiche hi hikha kahibouve , chule alungsetna hi kei dia ima pang lou ahipoi , amaho chengse sangin kaha toh gim cheh jon , keivang kahipoi , eiumpia Pathen lungsetna joh chu ahibouve .
46015011	Hijeh chun amaho hiu hen kei hileng hitia hi kaseiphonuva , nang hon chutima chun natahsantauve .
46015012	Christa thinaa kona kaithouva aumdol kiseiphong lea , itia nalahuva koi koihamin mithiho thokitna umlouva aseiyu ham ?
46015013	Mithi thokitna aum loule Christa jong kaithouva umlou hinte ;
46015014	chutia Christa kaithouva aum lou mong le kathuseiphongu jong moh ahin , natahsanu jong pannabei ,
46015015	mithiho kaithouva aum loule Pathenin Christa akaithou lou ahin , akaithouva akiseijeh a Pathen douna hettosaha pang Pathen dia jouthua hettohsah a pang mia eikimandoh diu ahi .
46015016	Ijeh-inem itile mithiho kaithouva aum loule Christa jong kaithouva umlou ahin ,
46015017	chutia Christa kaithouva aum loule natahsan’u jong phachom lou , tugeiya nachonset chengseuva um jing nalai nahiuve .
46015018	Chule Christa hinkhoa ihmu milsa chengse jong amangthah gam ahitai .
46015019	Chutia Christa to hingkhom dia ikinepnau hi tu hinkho sung mai maiya ding ahile , mi jouse lah a eiho hi voujang natna theipen ihiu diu ahi .
46015020	Tun vang Christa thina konin kaithouvin aumin , a-ihmu milsa ho thokit tei ding photchehnan apangtai .
46015021	Mihem khat jeh a thina aumdoh bangin , mihem khatjeh-in thina kona thokitna aumdoh tan ,
46015022	Adam sunga pen jeh-in mi jousen athilon , hitobanga chu Christa sunga um jeh a mi jouse kicho hing ding ahiuve .
46015023	Hiche hi amichang cheh ama phat phat’a kilhah tho ding ahi ; Christa hung teng amite hintin ,
46015024	achaina hipaiya , Christan vaihom na jouse le tha neina jouse chule thahat tin cheng asuhmangsoh teng Lenggam chu Pa Pathen apeh ding ahi .
46015025	Ijeh-inem itile Pathenin agalte jouse ajoa akengto noiya alutsah masangsea Christan lengvai apoh tei ding ahi .
46015026	Suhmang ding gal nukhah pen chu thina ahi ;
46015027	ajeh chu Pathen lekhabun , “ Aman ijakai akengto noiya akoisohtai , ” ati . Ijakai athu noiya kikoisoh lah a hi ijakai athu noiya koisohpa tah vang chu kisimtha lou ahi akichen’e .
46015028	Pathenin ijakai Christa thu noiya alutsah soh teng , Pathen chu abonchakei chunga ahitheina dinga , thil ijakai aboncha anoiya lutsahpa noiya chu Chapa jeng jong lut ding ahi .
46015029	Mithi ho dia baptize chanpeh ho , ahile ititauvintem ? Chutia mithi ho kaithouva aum loule ibol’a amaho dia baptize chang hiuvam ?
46015030	Chule keihon jong ibol’a nidan telchan’a kichat tijat kathoh jingu ham ?
46015031	Sopite , i-Pakaiyu Christa Jesu hinkhoa kanei , nang hoa um kakisonna pan’a niseh a thijing kahi .
46015032	Mihem hina maiya Ephesus khoa gamsaho to kisat kahile kei dinga ipi phachom ham ? Mithi ho kaithouva um lou mong ahile : “ Neu hitin dontah tau hene , Jingteng eiho kithita ding’an , ” kiti bang chun boltah tau hen .
46015033	Ima kipui chatvaisah hih-un : “ Kivoppi phalouva Minunphat asusei , ” akiti .
46015034	Lung dihtah pu’uvin chule chonset dauvin , ajeh chu abang bang Pathen hetna neilou na-um’ui ; najahchat diuva kasei ahi .
46015035	Mi abang khat’in , mithi ho kaithouva iti uma , chule itobang tahsavou pua kikaithou diu ham ? ” tinte .
46015036	Lungthimbei ! Nangin muchi natu chu athi loule akehdoh ngaipoi .
46015037	Nangin natu chu khonunga hung khangdoh aphung lhingset chu ahipon , suhlou chang hihen muchi dang hijongle muchi chang mai mai natulut hibouve ;
46015038	Pathenin adei banga tahsa asempeh a amuchi jat dungjui cheh a tahsa apeh ahibouve .
46015039	Tahsaphea hing jouse tahsaphe jong akibangpoi ; mihem’a achomin , gancha tahsaphe achomin , vachate tahsaphe achomin , nga hoa achom’e .
46015040	Van tahsa ho aumin , leiset tahsa ho jong aum’e ; ahinla van’a ho loupina achomin , leiset’a hoa jong achomin ahi ,
46015041	Nisa loupina achomin , lha loupina achomin , ahsite loupina jong achome . Ahsi khat loupina jong ahsi dang khat sangin achomin ahi .
46015042	Athi ho thokit jong hitobang chu hi ding ahi . Mon mang theiya kivuilut ahin , mong mang thei louva kikaithou ding ahi ;
46015043	jum le ja thoha kivuilut ahin , loupina kikaithou ding ahi ; longdamsa kivuilut ahin , thahat tah a kikai thou ding ahi ;
46015044	tahsavou pua kivuilut ahin , lhagao tahsavou pua kikaithou ding ahi .
46015045	Chule Pathen lekhabua hitobang hin , “ Mihem masa Adam chu tahsa hing khat ahidoh-in , Adam ninapa vang lhagao chohing ahi , ” akiti .
46015046	Amasa chu lhagao vou ahipon , tahsavou joh ahin , aban’a chu lhagaovou ahi .
46015047	Mihem masa chu leiset leivuiya kon ahin , Mihem ninapa vang van’a kon ahi .
46015048	Leivuiya chengse chu leivuiya konpa tobang ahiuvin , van’a chengse jong chu van’a konpa tobang ahiuve ;
46015049	leivuiya konpa lim ilo banguva van’a konpa lim jong ilo cheh diu ahi .
46015050	Hiche hi kasei ahi sopite , tahsaphe le thisanin Pathen Lenggam alo theipon , mon mang theiyin jong monmang theilou alo thei poi .
46015051	Ven , thuguh kaseipeh-ui , ibonchauva i-na ihmut milsoh lou diu , ibonchauva
46015052	sumkon gin nukhah pen’a chu mitphet kah , hai khat sunga ikikheldoh soh diu ahi ; ijeh-inem itile sumkon hung ging ding chule mithi ho mon mang thei lou dia kikai thoudiu , eiho jong ikikhelsoh kei diu ahi .
46015053	Ajeh chu mon mang thei hin mon mang lou akivon’a , thi thei hin thi thei lou chu akivon ding ahi .
46015054	Hitia chu mon mang thei hin mon mang thei lou chu akivon’a , thi thei hin thi thei lou chu akivon teng le Pathen lekhabua kisun thu cheng ; “ Jo nan thina aval lhumtai ,
46015055	Vo thina , najo na hoiba ham ? Vo thina , hoiba ham namidena ? ” kiti chu guilhung ding ahi .
46015056	Thina midena chu chonset ahin , chonset thahatna Danthu ahi .
46015057	I-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa jal’a jo na eipeuva Pathen chu thangvah-in um hen !
46015058	Hichejeh chun kasopi deitahte , dettah-in suhlong hoi hilouvin pangun , Pakai hinkhoa natoh jouseu chu pannabei ahilou nahetjehuvin , phat jousen Pakai kinbol nan thalhing jing jenguvin .
46016001	Mithengte dia sumto khom thudol vang chu Galatia gama Houbung ho kathu lhah banga nang hon jong nabol diu ahitai .
46016002	Kahung teng sumdon khom bol louna din Choldo jou nikhat ni le nang ho amichang cheh-in atojou kham dungyin sepkhen hen khol hen .
46016003	Kahung teng kilom nasahpen pen’u chu lekha sutpeh ing ting nathilto’u chutoh Jerusalem solnang’e .
46016004	Keima tah chea aphat jongle keima eikilhonpi nauvinte .
46016005	Macedonia gam kachotsoh teng nahenguva hung nang’e , ajeh chu Macedonia gam chonle dinga kigo kahi ;
46016006	kache na chan’a neithah le theina diuva ijem itile nahenguva phat chom khat ka-uma , phalbi sungsea bon kachamden thei ahi .
46016007	Ijeh-inem itile tuchunga hi palama jotpa ding kadeipon , Pakai phatsah ahile phat chom khatpi nakom’uva nichonding kakinem’e .
46016008	Ephesus khoa Pentecost geiyin nichong ing’e ;
46016009	ajeh chu keima din natoh machalna din kot lentah-in akihongin , eidouva jong atam lheh jeng’e .
46016010	Timothy nahenguva ahungle nalah-uva kiphalam louhel’a alhah theina din vephauvin ; ajeh chu keibanga ama jong Pakai natong ahi ;
46016011	hijeh chun koiman nahsah mon bolda hen . Kaheng ahung lhun theina din lung mongin hinthah leuvin , ajeh chu kei le sopiten ama ka-anga jingo ahiye .
46016012	Sopi Apollos thudol vang , sopite to lhon’a nahenguva ahungna dia katem jing ahinan , tupettah a ding vang anompoi , akimandom teng hung nante .
46016013	Kigingphan , tahsan’a pang det’un , pasal umchan thon , hat’uvin .
46016014	Nabol jouse ngailut neiya kibol hihen .
46016015	Sopite , nang ho kangeh nahiuve . Stephanas insung mite hi Achaia gamsunga Pathen tahsan ga masa ahiuva , achamtah-uva mithengte kinbolna kipeh-u naheuvin ,
46016016	nang hon jong hitobang miho le atohgimpi chengseu umchan najop theiyu ahi .
46016017	Stephanas le Fortunatus chule Achaicus te ho hilama ahungu kakipah lheh-e ; ajeh chu amahon nalhin lelna jouseu abulhit’un ,
46016018	ahungu hin kei le nang ho lhagao akidosah lheh jeng’e . Hijeh chun hitobang ho hi hethem’uvin .
46016019	Asia gama Houbung jousen nasalam’ui . Pakaiya hinkhompi Aquila le Prescilla , chule a-in lhona kikhom Houbung miten hatah-in nasalam’ui .
46016020	Sopite chengsen nasalam’uve . Kisopi chop thengin khat le khat kisalamto cheh-duvin .
46016021	Hiche salamna hi keima Paul khut tah a hung kon ahi .
46016022	Koi hile Pakai ngailu lou chu gaosap chang hen ! Maranatha .
46016023	Pakai Jesu milungset nan umpiuvin .
46016024	Christa Jesu hinkhoa ka-ngailutnan nabonchauvin umpiuvin .
47001001	Pathen lungdeiya Jesu Christa Solchah Paul le sopi Timothyn Corinth khoa Pathen Houbung le Achaia gamsung pumpia mitheng jouse henga ,
47001002	i-Pau Pathen le Pakai Jesu Christaa konin lungset le chamna hung lhung hen .
47001003	Pakai Jesu Christa Pa Pathen , hepina chengse Pa le lungmon konna Pathen chu phattheiboh chang hen .
47001004	Aman genthei hesoh kathotna chan’uva eilha mon’uvin , keihon jong Pathen’a kamu’u hiche lungmonna chun genthei hesoh toh kha jouse kalhamsah theiyui ;
47001005	Christa thoh gentheina twikhanglen tobang chun keiho jong eichup jengu leh , Christa jal’a kakisun’u lungmon nan jong eichup diu ahi .
47001006	Keiho genthei hesoh thoh a eikilhau le , hichu nang ho lhamonna ding le huhhing nachanna diu ahi ; keiho eikilhamon’u le keiho thoh hesoh tobang nathoh nauva lung nengtah a nathoh jeh-uva Pathenin nalhamonsah theina diu ahiye .
47001007	Chule hesoh gentheinaa chan naneiyu le lungmonnaa jong chan nanei diu kaheuvin nang ho dinga kakinep nau adet jinge .
47001008	Sopite , Asia gam’a kachunguva hesoh gentheina hung chu hi helouva naum diu kanompoi ; kathauvin ajo kalval’a genthei hesohna nasa tah-in eidelpha jeng phat’un hing din jong kakihol tapouve .
47001009	Keihon kachunguva hi thina dinga thu kitan ngap’a kagel leuvu ahitan , amale keiho le keiho kisong louva mithi ho kaithou Pathen’a kakisonna joh diuva chute ahibouve .
47001010	Pathen chun hitobang , thina khoh tah a kona chu eina huhdoh-u ahin , ei huhdoh kit diu ahinai , tukal’a jong eihuhdoh diuva kakinep nau hi ,
47001011	nang hon taonaa neihu diu ahin , chutia chu mi tamtah-in eitaopeh nau donbutna eikipeu phattheina chengse jal’a chu mi tampin thangvahna anei diu ahi .
47001012	Kakison nau chu hiche hi ahi : vannoiya kachon namlhah-u le nang ho kabolnau hi tahsaphe chihnaa kabol’u ahipon , lung thengsel le lung navahpel’a Pathen lungset jal’a bol kahiu kahet themnau lung gil hi hettohsah a pang ahi .
47001013	Ijeh-inem itile keihon nasim thei diu le nahet diu tilou ima kasunpouve , nahet khongsoh diuva kakinepna chu ,
47001014	keihon jeng jong neihet phol phah vangun , keihon nang ho kakisonpi banguva hi Pakai Jesu Nikho ni vang le neikisonpi dingu ahi .
47001015	Hiche ginchatna jal’a hi lungsetna avel vel’a nanei theina diuva nang ho henga hung masah ding kanatup ahin ,
47001016	Judea gam’a neihung thah theina diuva nang ho hinhopaa Macedonia gam jot ding , chule Macedonia gama kona hinhopa kit ding kagot ahi .
47001017	Hiche bol kagot’a doi beiya lung linglao beh kahim ? O-le tahsaphe lunggel’a , “ Heng’e , heng’e , ” moh tia , “ Ahipoi , ahipoi , ” moh ti ding kagot beh ham ?
47001018	Pathen tahsan umtah ahin , nahenguva kathuseiyu chu , “ Ahinai , ahipoi , ” moh ti thei ahipoi .
47001019	Ajeh chu kei le Silvanus chule Timothy , keiho seiphong jal’a nasunguva cheng Pathen Chapa Jesu “ Ahinai , ahipoi , ” moh ti ding ahi pon , ama sunga chu , “ Kanom nai , ” tina umdoh jeng ahi .
47001020	Ijeh-inem itile Pathen thutep chengse chu amasunga hi , “ Ahinai , ” kitia ; hichejeh tah a chu Ama jal le eiho jeh a choi-at ahichehna dia Pathen henga , “ Amen , ” kitiji ahi .
47001021	Christa hinkhoa dia keiho le nang ho gom’a eisudet’uva thao einu’va chu Pathen ahin ,
47001022	Aman eiho mohor einamkhum’uva , lhagaova khamgahna chu i-lungthim sunguva eipeh-u ahi .
47001023	Nang ho kakhohsah jeh a tugeiya Corinth a kahung lou hi kahinkhoa ahetoh Pathen pan’a ka kou ahi .
47001024	Natahsan thu’uva kipuchansah kahipouve , nakipana diuva natoh khonpiujoh kahiuve , ajeh chu tahsanin nadingdet nauve .
47002001	Lung phatmo sah dia nahenguva hung kit lou dinga kei le kei kiphatsah kahitai ;
47002002	ajeh chu nasulung hangu leng , hiche kalung phatmo sah ho tilou chu konba eikipasah tan tem ?
47002003	Hijeh a chu kahung teng le eikipasah dinghon eilung phat mosah louna diuva hiche hikahinsut ahi , ipijeh-inem itile kei kipana chu nang ho nabonchauva nakipa nauva kaginchat tahbeh ahiye .
47002004	Nang ho lung phatmosahna ding hilouva thalhingset’a nang ho dia ngailutna kanei hinahetdoh theina diuva , lung hesoh genthei tampi , lungkham chule mit lhi long longa hiche hi kahinsut ahibouve .
47002005	Koiham khat’in lung phatmona aboldoh le kaima eilung phatmosah ahipoi , nabonchauva nabol khoh behseh louna diuva miphabep nalung himosah-u ahibouve .
47002006	Hitobang thua hi japin ama a-oimo chu phaset ahin ,
47002007	nang hon ama chu lung gim behseh a , alhah lhop pailouna dinga na-ngaidam’uva natil khoujoh diu ahi .
47002008	Ama dia ngailutna nakicheh sah diuva ka-ngeh nahiuve .
47002009	Nangho imalam jousea thua nungte nahiu photchetnaa akipatepnau chu hetdohna dinga hiche hi kahinsut ahinai .
47002010	Nang hon mi khattou na-ngaidamu le kenjong ama chu ka-ngaidam thouve , hitia chu khattou ka-ngaidam le Christa angsunga nang ho jal’a kabol ahin ,
47002011	Satanin eijotho louna diu ahi , ajeh chu eihon ama dohna lungthim ihaiyu ahipoi .
47002012	Christa Kipana Thupha seiphong dia Troas a kahung chun Pakai dinga katohna dingkot lent ah-in akihonge ;
47002013	ahivangin kasopi Titus kamudoh loujeh-in kalungthim akicholdo theipon , hijeh chun miho kalhadoh-in Macedonia lama kahungtai .
47002014	Christa hinkhoa galjonaa eikijotkhompi jinguva , keiho mangchaa Christa hetdohna le phondohna chu muntin’a gim namtui banga either chansoh-uva Pathen chu thangvahin um jing hen .
47002015	Pathen koma kei ho hi Christa dinga huhinga umsate heng le amangthah ding ho heng geiya jong gim namtui kahiuvin ,
47002016	athi dingin thipo kanam’un , ahin gdin jong gim namtui kanamuva . Hicheng dinga chu akhomto soh thei koiham ?
47002017	Keiho vang Pathen thu kiveina mang miho tobang kahipouve , lung thengseljoa Pathena kona Pathen angsunga Christa to hingkhoma thusei kahi bouvui .
47003001	Keiho le keiho kiseipha pan kit kahiuvem ? O-le konkhat banga nahenguva ding hihen nang hoa kon hijongle seiphatna lekha thot neilou khoh mi kahibeh-um ?
47003002	Nang ho hikeiho dinga lekha thot , ka lunggil’uva kisun’a , mitinin asim’a ahet nahiuve ;
47003003	keiho lhacha kapan’uva nang ho hiChrista lekha thot kichentah nahiuvin , songpheng chunga lekha twiya kisun ahipon , mihem tahsa lung chang’a Pathen hing lhagaova kisunjo ahi .
47003004	Hiche kisonna hi Christa jal’a Pathen henga kaneiyu ahi .
47003005	Keihoa kona bulhing dinga seithei , keiho chamin ima kahipouvin , kabulhin nau hi Pathena konjo ahin ,
47003006	Aman keiho hi jih tho Danthu hilou Lhagaova kitepna Thah kinbol lhacha theiya eisem’u ahi ; ajeh chu jih tho Danthu chun thina asodoh-in , Lhagaovin vang mi ahinsoi .
47003007	Thi lo na ding bep’a akin kibol songpheng chunga kijih tho Danthu jeng bon chubanga aloupia , amaivah loupina chu amolsuh suh ahi vanga , Israel chaten Mose mai avet chang ngam louvu le ,
47003008	Lhagaova dinga lhacha kinbolna chu ijat’a loupe da ding ham ?
47003009	Themmo chan na dinga lhacha kinbolna bon aloupi le them channa dinga lhacha kinbolna loupina chun tamtah a akhokheljoh ding ahi .
47003010	Hichejeh a chu loupe tah akigel chu hiche hin aloupina adeh lhah phat’in aloupi thei tapoi .
47003011	Ijeh-inem itile aloupina molsuh suh bon athupi le tonsot’a loupe den jing jeng ding chu gamchenga thupijo ahi .
47003012	Hiche kinepna hi kanei jehuva hijat vei hi phongtah a hakatji kahiuve .
47003013	Amaivah molmang hel Israel chaten amu louna diuva ponlu kikhuhji Mose tobang kahipouve .
47003014	Ama ho chu alunggel’u atah jo cheh tai . Tuni chan geiyin Kitepna Lui asim tengulehiche ponlukhuh chu kihohdoh louvin aumden jing nalaiye ; ijeh-inem itile Christa to hinkhom tengle bou kihohdohji ahi .
47003015	Tuni geiya hiche Mose Danthu chu asim tengu le alungthimu pon lukhuh kikhujol banga kikhu khumji ahi .
47003016	“ Aman Pakai heng ajot lut teng ponlukhuh chu ahohdohji , ” akiti .
47003017	Ahin Pakai chu Lhagao ahin , Pakai Lhagao umna chan acham-lhat aum’e .
47003018	Keiho maikhu lou chengse , phatvet’a kive banga Pakai loupina kimusah ho hi Pakai kisah Lhagao chun loupina khat’a kona loupina cheh lim khat’a eikheldoh-u ahitai .
47004001	Lungset vanga hiche lhacha kinbolna kanei khah jeh-uvin keiho kalhadah hih hel’ui ;
47004002	jachatna thilguh chengse kapai lhauvin , doha lungthima chon lou , Pathen thu seilep louvin Pathen maiya mitin vetchah dingin phongtah-in thudihin kachon’uvin , keiho le keiho kiseiphatna kabol’uve .
47004003	Ijentia ka Thupha seiphongu jong hi akikhu mang akisel ahijongle amangthah dia bou kikhu mang hiding ahin ,
47004004	amaho chu hiche vannoi pathenin Pathen lim mong monga hung um Christa loupina Kipana Thupha khovah amu thei louna diuva atahsan lou nau lungmit asuhchot peh ahi .
47004005	Ijeh-inem itile keiho le keiho kiseiphongle kahipouvin , Jesu Christa chu Pakai ahije kaseijuva , chule Jesu jal’a keihojoh hi lhachaa pang kahidolu kaseiyu ahi .
47004006	Ajeh chu , “ Muthim lah a konin kho hungvah hen , ” tia Pathen ma ma chun Christa meiya Pathen loupije hetna khovah chu keiho lungthim ahinsalvah sah ahitai .
47004007	Keihon hiche leibel’a gou kachin’u hi thaneina chungnungpen chu keihoa kon hilouva Pathena hungkon ahije photchetna ahi .
47004008	Hoima lam jousea eikineh chintouvin , ahivangin eikisu ngem deh pouve ; lung dongin ka-um’uvin , ahinla kalung lhadeh pouve ;
47004009	eikinojam leuvin , ahivangin donlouvin ka-umdeh hih-ui ; eikijep lhu-vin , ahinla eikisumang deh pouve ;
47004010	Katahsauva hi Jesu hinna akiphondoh theina dingin katahsauva hin Jesu thin achu kapole jingui .
47004011	Thitheina katahsauva hi Jesu hinna akiphondoh theina din , kahin vangun Jesu jel’in athi dingin eikipedoh jinguve .
47004012	Hichejeh a chu keiho sunga thinan na atoh jinga , nang ho sunga hinna um’ah ahi .
47004013	Pathen lekhabun , “ Katahsan jeh a thu kasei ahi , ” ati bang chun , keihon jong tahsanna Lhagao chu kaneiyuva , hijeh a chu keihon katahsan’uva thu kaseiyu ahi ;
47004014	ajeh chu Pakai Jesu kaithoupa chun Keiho jong Jesu to eikaithou thauva nang ho to eihin dinkhomsah diu kaheuve .
47004015	Lungsetna ahapunbe cheh a mihon Pathen loupina athangvahbe chehna diuva ijakai aboncha nang ho jal’a ahisoh keiye .
47004016	Hichejeh chun kalung lhapouve , kamihem tahsau po nung hi akem jing vangin , kasung lam’u hi ani nin athah cheh cheh jeng’e .
47004017	Ijeh-inem itile hiche jangkhai cha phat chom khat kathoh gim nai hin hachunga chungnungjoa tonsot’a ding loupina eisemdoh peh diu ahi ;
47004018	ajeh chu mithei thil kakat pouvin muthei lou thiljoh kakatjo’uve ; ijeh-inem itile muthei thil chu phat chom khat’a ding ahin , muthei lou thil chu tonsot’a ding ahiye .
47005001	Ajeh chu hiche ponin tobang kaleiset in’u hikiphe lha jongle khut’a sah lou Pathen’a kon tonsot in van’a kaneiyu kahenauve .
47005002	Hiche ponin sunga kap le penga ka-umu hi khut’a sah lou van in’a chen kal ngah lel kahiuve ;
47005003	hichea chu kachen tengu le sagoh keova eiki-imsah lou diu ahitai .
47005004	Ijeh-inem itile hiche ponin a kachen laiyuva hi pohgih hahsa pao kap a peng kahiuvin , hichu katahsan in hi paidoh jeng ding deina ahipon , van in’a chenjoh a hin nan thina aval lhum ding deina ahijoi .
47005005	Hiche dinga chu Pathenin eigontoh-uva khamgahna Lhagao geiya eipeh-u ahiye .
47005006	Hichejeh a chu lung ngam’a um kahiuvin , chule hiche tahsaa kachen laiseuva hi Pakaiya kon’a gamla tah a kihindal kahi kaheuve .
47005007	Ajeh chu tahsan’a khosa kahiuvin , mitvet maiya kahipouvin ahi .
47005008	Kalung ngamlo nau chu hiche tahsa in’a kachenu hi dalhaa Pakai in’a chen ding gam chenga deijo kahi tauve .
47005009	Hijeh a chu hikom in’a cheng ung , chukom in’a chensa jong leuveng Ama lung lhaisah dingbou katuppi pen’u ahi .
47005010	Ijeh-inem itile mitinin tahsaa athilbol pha le se tohman akisan chehna dinguva ibonchauva Christa thutanna masanga ikilah cheh diu ahinalaiye .
47005011	Pakai ginje kahetjeh-uva miho katemu’va thunun kagot’u ahin , Pathen dia vang hetsa kahiuvin , chule nang hon nalunggil’uva neihet diu kakinem’e .
47005012	Nahenguva hung kiseipha ki tkahipouve , mihem lungthim lam velouva maivet’a ki song ho chu nadeh jouna diuva kei ho neikisonpi theina diuva phat kapehjoh-u nahiuve .
47005013	Ajeh chu kangol’ule Pathen ding ahin , kachihule nang ho ding ahi .
47005014	Christa ngailutnan eituh khom jeng jeh-uva japi khel’a khat athitah jeh a , japi thisoh dol’a ki-ngaito ahin ,
47005015	hijeh a chu ahing ho chu amahoding mai maiya hing hilouva , amaho dia thia thoudoh kitpa dinga chu ahin theina diuva amaho khel’a Ama chu thia ahitai .
47005016	Hichejeh chun tukal’a lhah koima tahsa dol’in kahetapouve ; Christa jong tahsa dol’a kanahet nau um jongle tukal’in vang chutin hetapou vinge .
47005017	Hijeh a chu koi hi le Christa to hingkhom chu thilsem thah soh ahitan , atil’a kisem masa chengse kitolmang ahitai , ven thil thah asohtai .
47005018	Hiti ijakai hi Christa jal’a keiho le ama kihouchamna boldoh a , chule hiche kihouchamna dinga lhacha kin eibolsah-uva , Pathena hungkon jeng ahi .
47005019	Ijeh-inem itile Pathenin Christa hinkho sunga chu vannoi le ama kihoutohna asem’a , asuh khelna chengseu asimpeh daa , chule hiche kihouchamna thu chu keiho sunga eikhumpeh-u ahi .
47005020	Hijeh a chu keiho Christa dinga palai kahiuvin , Pathenin eimanchah-uva a-ngeh ahin , keihon Christa jal’a kathum nahiuve , pathen to kicham’un .
47005021	Chonset helouhelpa chu , Ama hinkhoa Pathen dihna ichan theina diuvin eiho khel’in , Pathenin chonsen asemtai .
47006001	Amato tongkhom kahijeh-uva Pathen lungsetna namu’ chu mohseh nahisah louna diuva katem nahiuve ;
47006002	ajeh chu Pathen lekha bun : “ Lah phat chan nataona kasangin , Huhhing nikhon nangma kahui , ” ati . Ven tu hi lah phat mong ahin , ven tu hi huhhing nikho ati .
47006003	Lhacha kinbolna hi nolnabei ahina dinga koima masanga kipal lhuhna dingkikoi lou ahi .
47006004	Ahin Pathen lhacha kinbol kahinauva keiho le keiho ijakaiya kipah chaa , lung dehat tah a hesoh genthei jou se le thoh hahsa , tosetna tin cheng ,
47006005	eikivohna jouseu , songkul lutna ho gei , japi eikitilset pehna jouseu hi le , choldo lou , ihmu lou le nelou chalou kahiuvin ;
47006006	lung thengsel le hetna , thoh hatna , khotona , Lhagao Theng vangin ngailutna giltah-in kaneiyun ,
47006007	thudih le pethen tha hat’in kapngun , dihna galvonin kamangun , jel le vei kahongui ;
47006008	jabolna hihen jumso na hijongle , seiphatna ahiya seisetna ahiya , thudih kaseiyu jongle jouseiyin eiki bol’uve ;
47006009	suhmilsa kabah vangun kihedoh thouvui ; athisa kabah vangun , ven kahing jinguve ; eikibolgeh lheh kabangun , eikithat paipouve ;
47006010	lunghem tah eikibahsah vangun kakipah jingui ; vaicha lheh kabangun ahila mi tamtah kahaosah tauve ; imacha neilou kabanguvin ahinla ijakai kanei kimsoh nauve .
47006011	Vo Corinth mite kalungthimu lentah a kihonga , nahenguva kambem bema thu kaseiyu ahi .
47006012	Nasunguva lungnoh phahna ima kibol lou ahin , nang ho kilhaset sum’a kisunoh phah lou nahiuve .
47006013	Chate henga thusei banga kasei ahi , keiho bol lethuh nan nalungu hong len’uvin .
47006014	Atahsan lou ho to namkoljon khat pokhom hih-un , ajeh chu adih le dan dih lou ipia kikop theiya , o-le khovah-in muthim to ipi aneikhom beh am ?
47006015	Christa le thilha ipia kihou theiya , O-le atahsan le atahsan lou ipi chan kihom theibeh am ?
47006016	Pathen Houin le doilim sem thu ipia kihoutoh theiyem ? Ijeh-inem itile eiho Pathen hing Houin ihiuve . Ajeh chu Pathenin hitin aseiyin : “ Keima alah-uva kachen’a ka lhat le ding , A-Pathenu kahiya , amaho kamite hidiu ahi .
47006017	Hijeh chun miho lah a konin hung potdoh-un , Amaho chu dalhauvin , ” tin Pakaiyin aseiye . “ Thilboh chu tongkha hih-uvin , Keiman kalamto ding nahiuve .
47006018	Keima na-Pau hing ting , Nang ho kachate nahi diu ahi , ” tin Hatchungnung Pakaiyin aseiye .
47007001	Ngaitahte , thutep hicheng hi ineijeh-un tahsa le Lhagao suboh thei jousea konin kisuthengu hitin , Pathen ging’a then chamkimsoh a hin ding ngaitou hite .
47007002	Nalung neihonpeh-un , koima adih louvin kabol pouvin , koima kasuse pouvin , koima kichungtoh lapnan kabol pouve .
47007003	Nang ho mosona dinga kasei ahipoi , ithiu le thisap ding ihin’ule hingsap dia kalunga kavop jingo thu kasei ahitai .
47007004	Nahenguva ngamtah tah a kasei ahin , kisonpitah tah ajong avumval’in kakipah lheh jeng’e .
47007005	Macedonia kahungu chun tahsaa choldona neilou kahiuvin , muntin , a gentheina jeng ahin , polama mito kinahna jeng lung sunga kichatna jeng ahi .
47007006	Ahivangin lung lhadaisa ho tilkhou kit thei Pathenin titus hung lhun chu tilkhou nan eineiyui .
47007007	Ahung mai mai jeh hilouva , nang hoa kona lungmon thu ahin lhut , itobanga neimu nom’uva , neigimpi dol’u chule neihuh nom dol thuu aseijeh ahiye . Hiti chun eikihapasah cheh jeng’e .
47007008	Lekha kahin thot chun nalunghemsah jengu jongle kakisih dehpoi ; hiche lekha thot chun phat chom khat’a ding hijongle nalunghemsahu kahetdoh a chu nommo kasha ding sol ahitan ,
47007009	tun vang kakipah tai ; amavang nalunghemu kakipapi ahipon , nalunghemu chun lungheina asosah jeh ahi ; Pethen deilama lunghemna chu natoh-u ahitan , kei ho jeh a manthahna ima naneipouve .
47007010	Pathen deiya lunghem chun lungheina asojin huhhinga nasodoh jin ahi ; leiset thudol’a lung gim nan vang thina asodohji ahibouve .
47007011	Pathen deiya lunghem nan itobang tah a nachunguva na atoh ham ven , lunghanna , kichatna , nagichatna , tom ngaina , thu adih lama kitan ding deina asosah tai . Hiche thu dol’a chun themmonabei nahiu akichetsahtan ahi .
47007012	Hijeh chun lekha chu kahin thot jeng vangun , adih lou bolpa le adih bolpa jeh a kahin thot ahipoi , Pathen maiya keiho dinga itobang gunchu nahiu phondohna dingjoh kati ahibouve .
47007013	Hichejeh a chu eikitilkhou chom’uva ahi . Keiho cheng kitilkhouna chungvuma Titus lhagao nakidosah jehuva akipa jeh chun keiho jong kakipah chom lheh jenguvin ahi .
47007014	Ama koma chu nang ho kakisonpiuva ahile nang hon neijumso dauvin , ajeh chu nahenguva thutah jeng kaseiyu ahin , hiche Titus henga kakison nau chu atahje kiphonchen ahitai .
47007015	Itobangtah a thua nung dia kigosadema um nahiule kithing thinga gingkhen cha ama nalamtou ageldoh chanin nakhoto nau akhang khang jeng’e .
47007016	Nachunguva ijakaiya kakisonpi thei jeh-uvin kakipah lheh jengin ahi .
47008001	Sopite , Mecedonia Houbung ho kipe Pathen lungsetna hi nahet diu kadeiye ;
47008002	ajeh chu gim genthei nasatah thoh a patepna atokhah vangun hitobang lah a hin akipanau achung chonjo nalaiyin , avaichat lheh vangun teptena val’in hongphal tah-in thil apejengui .
47008003	Hetoh a kasei ahi athauvin ajochan , akalval geiyin jong apeuvin , achamtah-uvin
47008004	mithengte dia lungsetna lhacha kinbolnaa chu pankhah tei deinan kahenguva a-ngeh-uve .
47008005	Hiche hi kaginchat kalval’u ahitan , amasan amaho tah Pakaiya akiphaldohuvin , chuin Pathen di bangin keiho henga akipedoh jengui .
47008006	Hijeh a chu hiche lungsetna kin anabol pansa Titus chun nang ho lah ajong abol molsoh dinga katilkhou jingo ahi .
