47008007	Keihon katildoh-uva ijakaiya nahaodoh-uva tahsan , thusei , hetna lengailutna tilkhouna tin chenga nabulhin banguvin , hiche lungset thilpeh a jong hin bulhingsoh-uvin .
47008008	Chondan dungjuiya kasei ahipoi , na-ngailut nau atahbeh ahidol kholdoh teina di amidnag ho mi kithopinaa athanop dol’u kasei ahibouve .
47008009	I-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa lungstna chu naheuve ; haotah ahin , avaichatna chu nang hon nahaolo nadiuvin nang hojal’in amatah vai chan ahung umdoh tai .
47008010	Hiche thua hin kagel seipehung’e : ningkum chun nang ho mi kithopi nom le akithopi masapen nahiuve .
47008011	Tua hi natoh patsau chu nachaisoh ngal diu ahi . Nang ho mi kithopi tha nom nahiuvin , hijeh chun nathauvin ajochanin bulhitsoh jenguvin .
47008012	Mihem khat’in kithopina thilpeh apeh nomten le Pathenin apeh ding jet mong teptena aneipon , apeh ding jat bep chu asanpeh ahibouve .
47008013	Midang ho pohgih ngai janga nang ho pohgih punsah dingngaito kahipoi . Chamgol’a tetph chet ding ahijoi .
47008014	Tulai nang ho neival chu amaho lhahsam hunan kimangle nang ho nalhahsam tengu amaho neival’a kidit thei ding , hitia chu chamgaol’a kisutoh dingahi .
47008015	Pathen lekhabun : “ Atam kilopan jong aval’in akilah dehpon , Lhomcha kilodoh pan jong lhasam chomin akilah dehpoi , ” ati bang chu hi ding ahi .
47008016	Titus lungthim sunga nang ho khoto theina tilkhouna chutobang khumpeh Pathen chu thangvah-in um hen !
47008017	Nahenguva hung dinga ka-ngeh-u le nom’a ahitan , hiche jong hi achamtah a nahenguva hung dia kigosademsa anahitai .
47008018	Houbung tin’a Kipana Thupha asei phong jeh a minthangtah sopi khat jong titus ti kahinsol thauve .
47008019	Chutijeng goh ahipon , Pakai ama tah loupina dinga hiche thilpeh lakhom ding le keihon jong kakithopi nom’u vetsahna ding monga kalhonpi le diuva Houbung hon alhendohdau ahiye .
47008020	Hongphal tah a kitohdoh hiche thilpeh kabol lenauva hi koiman eidem louna diuva chingthei tah a thilbol kahiuve .
47008021	Thilpha bol katup’u hi Pakai mitmu maiya hilouva mihem mitmua jong ahi .
47008022	Keihon mun tamtah a aguncheje kaphottohsau isopiu khat jong amani to kahinsol thauve , nachunguva ginchatna lentah aneijeh a tujenga jong kitlkhoujah jeng’ah ahitai .
47008023	Titus vang hi nang ho dinga kapankhompi le katoh khompi ahin , isopite niu hi Houbung ho solchah , Christa loupina ahilhon’e .
47008024	Nang hokakisonpiu adih dol Houbungho maiya phot chet ahina din amani hi na-ngailut nau kichentah-in chansah-uvin .
47009001	Mithengte kinbol thudol vang hinahenguva lekha hinsut ding valjo din bon kagel’e .
47009002	Ajeh chu mi nakithopi nomjeu kahenai ; hijeh a chu kisongtah a Macedonia mite henga jong ningkum’a apat nang ho Achaia miten thil ijakai gonsadema nakoiyu thu kasiepeh ahi . Natom nagi vauvin amaho geiya atildoh ahiye .
47009003	Nachunguva kakison nau chu thu hom keo ahilouna dinga sopi cheng hi kahinsol ahi ; kasei jing bangin nepeh diu gonsademin um’uvin .
47009004	Macedonia miho to hung lhonin lang kigo louva na-um’u hung toh kha leu , nang ho jum ding katipon , chubanga kipaopi chu kajachat lo diu ahi .
47009005	Hichejeh a chu nakitepnau thilpeh chu gonsa koi dinga hiche sopite hi nahenguva hung masa ahiuve ; thilpeh ding chu gonsan ana umle lhan lhaisel’a napeh-u kichen ding , cham louva kila hilou ding ahi .
47009006	Hiche thua hin alhom tun alhon at ding atam tuna tam at ding ahi .
47009007	Kisih pum le peh lou khoh man hilouvin mitinin along dei bang cheh a apeh ding ahi ; ijeh-inem itile lung lhaisel’a pea chu Pathenin angailui .
47009008	Imalam joousea ijakaiya bulhingsoh nahiuva , ntoh theina diuva Pathenin lungsetma lhingset , aval hel’a jong napeh theiyu ahi .
47009009	Pathen lekhabua kisun : “ Aman atheijal’in vaichate atoi . Ama dihna chu tonsot’a um jing ahi , ” ati bangin .
47009010	Muchi tupa muchi pea , anne dingpa changlhah pea Pathenin muchi napeuvin tin , akhandohsah ding , anthem chan nau ga chu apunsah ding ahinai .
47009011	Keiho jal’a nathipeh chengseu jeh a chu mi tampin Pathen athangvah theina ding le phat tin’a hongphal tah a napeh jingna diuva Pathenin hahaova nahaosah diu ahi .
47009012	Ipijeh-inem itile hiche lhacha kinbolna hin minthangte ngaichat atokeo jong ahipon , mi tamtah a kona Pathen thangvahna avum val’a umdoh lo ahitai .
47009013	Hiche lhacha kinboln ale Christa jal’a Kipana Thupha tahsan thua nanun’u to chule ipi hile nanei chasun’u ama ho le midang ho geiya nakihoppi jeng jeh-uvin Pathen achoi-an tauve .
47009014	Pathenin nachunguva lungsetna nasatah aneijeh chun amahon jong lung gilten’a nataopeh diu ahi .
47009015	Athilpeh sei thei louhel jeh hin Pathen thangvah-in um hen !
47010001	Hiche hi keima Paul , kimaitoa kimu teng moh nem nem a , naum lou nauva hakat’a kithangpan , Christa nun nem le khoto na pan’a katem nahiuve .
47010002	Tahsaphe ngaichat kihol le dol’a eiseiho’u henga hakattah a thusei ding dol’a kagel hikahung teng kamanchah louna dinga nahenguva katao tho ahi .
47010003	Tahsaphe vou pua vah le vang kahi nauvin , amavang tasaphe dinga galsat kahipouve .
47010004	Ijeh-inem itile kagal manchah ho’u hi tahsa gal manchah maimai ahipon Pathen dinga thilbol theitah kulpi suhset theina manchah ahibouve . Jouthua kinelna joouse kadeh lhauvin ,
47010005	Pathen hetdohna douna dinga insang bang kitouson son ho geiyin kaloi lhu’uvin lung gel ngaito nei jouse gal-hingin kaman’uvin Christa thun kanunsah-uve .
47010006	Nang ho thua nanun bulhinset tengule thua nung lou jouse talen pe dinga kidgosadem kahitauve .
47010007	Maikoh a thlho veuvin . Khattou Christa mia akigel le , amatah chun hiche hi gel kit hen , ama Christa mi ahibangin keiho jong kahiuve .
47010008	Nang ho suhmangna ding hilouva , nang ho sahdohna dinga Pakaiyin eipeh katha nein au hi kisonpi val jep jong leng kakisih deh poi .
47010009	Lekha thot hoa chun nang ho kichatsah go mai mai hidang’e .
47010010	Khatouvin , “ Paul lekha thot ho hi anasa theiyin ahuham theiye , ahungtengle la tahsa kamsel dol , athusei pannabei ahibouve , ” tinte .
47010011	Hitobang gelpa chun hiche hi kihet hen : lekha thot ho’a nakibol nau banga chu nalah-uva aki-um teng jongle nakibol diu ahithouve .
47010012	Amavang mi amachang kichoi sang ho to kibangin kakisei nom hih-un , tejong kakite nagp cha pouve ; amaho le amaho akitekah tengule hetna beiya ngol’a ahitauve .
47010013	Keiho vang eiteppeh nau gamgi kalval’in kisongpou ving’e , hiche gamgi chu Pathenin eitedoh peh-u ahin , gamgi chun nang ho jong nahop’u ahi .
47010014	Koima cha hung masanga nahenguva Christa jal’a Kipana Thupha hinpo lu tkeiho kahiuvin , nakithang at piu jong leng gamgi kakhokal ddeh pouvin ahi .
47010015	Hijeh chun eikitep nau gamgi kal , midang toh na chunga kithang-at kahipouvin , kagamgi kol sunguva natahsan’u akhan jinga keiho tohna jong akikeh len chehna dinga kinemjo kahibouvui
47010016	Chutile nang ho kalpeh gamdanga jong Kipana Thupha kaseiphong theiyuva , midang gamsungatohna chunga kithang-at pi louva ka-um jingdiu ahi .
47010017	Pathen lekhabun , “ Koi hile akisonga chu Pakaiya kisong hen , ” ati .
47010018	Amale ama kiseipha chu imacha ahipon , Pakai seiphat chubou thu ahi .
47011001	Ka-ngol hoi thim jeng jongle neingai them diu kadeiye ; amavang nei ngai themsau jong ahinai .
47011002	Pathen tom ngaina pan’a nang ho dia tom ngai kahi , jipa khatseh Christa tokicheng dinga nu-ngah khat banga kitepna kabolpi kaholsa nahitauve .
47011003	Hichea hin gul’in lepthol dohaa Eve lhep lhah bang chun Christa dinga nalungput dih nau lenathen nau chu asuhchat vai ding kati ajai .
47011004	Mi khattou hunga keiho seiphong khah lou Jesu chom khat hung seiphong ham , nachan khah ngai louvu lhagao chang ham , ahiloule nasan khah louvu Kipana Thupha kisan ham aum le phaten ngai them’uvin .
47011005	Hiche solchah chungnung ho sanga noinung deh-in kakigelpoi .
47011006	Thuseiyin lhachom jong leng , hetnan kalhachompoi ; hiche hi ima lam jouse ahithei lam cheh a kaseipeh sa nahiuve .
47011007	Choisanga naum theina diuva kakisuh nem’a lo beiya Pathen’a kon Kipana Thupha kaseipeh-u chu achonsea kahim ?
47011008	Nang ho kinbolna dinga Houbung dang ho kachom’a na katohpeh nahibouvui .
47011009	Nalah-uva ka-um laiyin jong kalhahsamna jousea koima din tolou khoh kahipoi ; ajeh chu Macedonia gama kona sopite ahungu chun kangaichat jose lhingkeiyin ahipouve , imalam jousea nang ho tolou khoh louva kihongdoh jing kahin , kakihondoh jing ding ahi .
47011010	Christa thutah kasunga achenjeh-in Achaia gamkol sungsea hiche kakisonna hi imachan eikhatan louhel ding ahi .
47011011	Ipijeh ham ? Nang ho ka-ngailut lou jeh ham ? Pathenin ahenai !
47011012	Keiho toh banga tonga kiseiya kisonna neiya kiseiho akison lo nau abei theina dinga ipi hile kabol banga hi kaboljom jing ding ahi .
47011013	Ijeh-inem itile amaho chu solchah lhem , lhep lhahna natong , Christa solchah banga kilep ahibouvui .
47011014	Datmo ding ahipoi , ajeh chu Satan bon Vantil vah tah limin akilep jin ahi .
47011015	Alhacha ho chu thildih kinbol lhacha bangin kilep jengu jongle datmo behseh lou ding ahi , ajeh chu atoh dungjui cheh-uva achaina amu diu ahinai .
47011016	Kaseikit ahi , koiman lungthimbeiyin eigelda hen ; eigel’a aum jongle them kha tbeh kisonna kanei theina din hiti chun neila jenguvin .
47011017	Kasei vang hi Pakaiyin eiseisah ahipoi , hiche kisonna thudol’a hi mi-ngol thusei katho ahitai .
47011018	Mitamtah bon tahsanphe dol’a akison’u le keijong kisonga kahi .
47011019	Nang ho miching nahijeh-uva mi-ngol ho nangai them’u ahi .
47011020	Ajeh chu min soh a nahen’u ham , nathin lhah-u ham , natuh chah-u ham , nakhai sangu ham , na-ngeiphe abeh-u ham geiyin nathoh ham ham’uve .
47011021	Jahchasa saa kasei ahi , keiho kadoi lheh jenguve ; mi-ngol thusei katho ahi , ahanga aumle keijong kahang’e .
47011022	Hebrew hiuvam ? Keijong kahi ! Abraham chilhah hiuvam ? Keijong kahi .
47011023	Christa lhacha hiuvam ? Mi-ngol thusei jeng inge , kei kahahi cheh-e ! Hatah-in katong gim jon , songkul kalut tam jon , teptena kal val’in eikijep tam jon , atamjon kathideh chet chet’in ,
47011024	nga vei jen Judah on som li vei jepna din khatvei lhan eijep’uvin ,
47011025	thumvei Rome mihon mol’in eijep’un , khatvei songin eikisep’in , thumvei kongke katoh khan , Twikhanglen lailunga jan khat le sun khat kachamin ,
47011026	Kakholjinna tamtah a gin’a gin ding jeng , twilet ding , gucha ho , keima mite , chiding namdang ho , khopi sung setto ding , gamthip laiya setto ding , Twikhanglen’a setto ding , sopi lhem ho gingin kamah thah-e .
47011027	Chol le nangin katongin , ihmu louvin ka-umin , gilkel dang chah kathoh-in , nelou chalouvin ka-um lhoiyin , ponsil lhasamin dap kathoh lhoiyin ,
47011028	thil dang dang kiseita hih jongle niseh-in Houbung ho kalung gimpina hin eidelpha jing’e .
47011029	Alhasam koi kahu lou um a ? Akisep lhu koi lalung natpi lou um am ?
47011030	Kithang-at mon gding hijongle kalhahsamna hoa hibou kithang-at din gkahibep’e .
47011031	Tonsot’a vahchoi jing ding Pakai Jesu Pa Pathen chun jousei kahilou ahenai .
47011032	Damascus a Aretas noiya gamvaipo pan keima matna din Damascus khopi kulpi kot a-ngah jinge .
47011033	Ahinla bangkot’a chun bom khat’in eikhai lhauvin ama khut’a konin kajamdohtai .
47012001	Phachom hih jongle kakison tei ding angaiye , amavang Pakaiya kon Themgao thilmua kimu ho thuphon ho bou seiying’e .
47012002	Keiman Christa to hingkhom mi khat kahen , kum somle li ahitai ama chu can thum channa geiyin lah touvin anaumin , tahsa puma ha , tahsa pum hilou ham kahepoi , Pathenin ahenai .
47012003	Ken hiche mihempa chu kahen , tahsaphe pum ha , tahsaphe pum hilou ham vang kahepoi , Pathenin ahenai ,
47012004	ama chu Paradise mun’a akilhoh toutan , hikoma chun tho thei louhel thucheng , mihem kama seidoh thei louhel agajai .
47012005	Hitobang mi hibou kison ping ting , kei le kei vang kalhahsamna ho tilou ima kisonpi pong’e .
47012006	Kithang-at nom leng , adih kasei idng jeh-in ngol hoi kahilou ding ahi ; hijongle min eimua kathusei ajah to kitoh lou , achungnungjoa kachunga lung gel anei lou na dingin kithang-at pong’e .
47012007	Kahenga kiphongdoh thil loupe behseh jeh a kakichoi-at val louhel na dingin katahsaa hin eidot ding satan sole lhinghem khat eikipen , kakichoi-at louna dia eichum dingin aum’e .
47012008	Hiche hi eilah mangpehna din Pakai henga thumvei kataotai .
47012009	Ahivangin aman kajah a , “ Kalungset hi nang dia lhinset ahi , ajeh chu lhahsamnaa thahat suh chamkima umjo ahi , ” ati . Hijeh a chu Christa thahat keiya achen jing theina dinga kalhahsamnaa jongkipah thou a kisong sing kahi .
47012010	Hichejeh a chu lhahsamna tin cheng , bolsetna , hesoh gentheina , bol gentheinaho , chule doubolna ho geiya christa jal’a lunglhaisel’a kasanjoh ahitai ; ajeh chu kahatmo kom le kahatjo jin ahi .
47012011	Ngol’a kanahitai ; ahinla neiseiphat jeh-uva nang honneichuti chonsah-u ahi ; ajeh chu imacha hi lou beh hijong leng chuche solchah minthanga kiseiho sanga chu noinungjo lou kahi .
47012012	Solchah khat kahina dol chu thoh hat to thoa nalah-uva melchihna ho , bolmo kidang kibol ho , chule thil kidang kibol hoa chu kichensah ahitai .
47012013	Ipipen tah a Houbung dang ho sanga kabolset chom’uvem , nahenguva kithopina ding ngeh louhel’a kakoiyu tilouva ? Hiche kitoh louva kabol jeh vang chun neingai dam’uvin .
47012014	Ven , nahenguva hung ding kakigotna hiche hi thumveina ahitai ; ahinla nangho pohgih hahsa pe dinga kigo kahipoi , ajeh chu nanei nangau hol le kahipon , nang ho bou kakhohsah ahi . Chaten nu le pa dinga sum khol ngai ahipon , nu le pan bou chate sum akholpeh ding dol ahi .
47012015	Keivang chu nang ho dinga kimang jouhel ding kahiye . Keiman kangailut behseh jeh-uva lhasamjoa neingailut diu ham ?
47012016	Nangho phgihsah lou kahidol’in kigel le , lungthim doha thuh tah a nan gho kamatdol’in nasei kit’ui .
47012017	Nahenguva kahinsol miho khattouva chu lungthim doha kabolnau umkham ?
47012018	Titus chu kahinsol tha ahi ; Titus chun nalung thim bol khattouvu ham ? Ama le kei Lhagao khat’a kilhon khom kahilon louham ? Keng kho khat lha khom kahi louvu ham ?
47012019	Hichan’a hi nahenguva keiho kithen hon beh kahiuvem ? Pathen maikoh a Christa kisonpia kaseiyu ahibouve ; ngaitah te , aboncha hi nang ho sahdohna dingahi .
47012020	Ahinla kahung tengle kadei banga nachon louvu hung tohkha get ing ting , nang hon jong nadei banguva neimu lou diu ham , ti kakiphalam lheh jeng’e . Nalah-uva kinah , kithangset , lunghan , kitumsah , kiseiset , kihoulhih , hamhoitho , kitomona um thei ahi .
47012021	Chutile kahung kit teng ka-Pathenin nang ho maiya eideh lhan tin , masanga then louna lam , jonthanhoi pan’a huh le lop pan , lung kisih louho jeh a chu kaka lo ding ham tin kati ajai .
47013001	Hiche hi nahenguva kahung thumveina ahi . Pathen lekhabun , “ Ahetoh mi ni ham thum ham jeh a bou thu tan dinga kikoi ding ahi , ” ati .
47013002	Ani veina nalah-uva kaum chun masanga chonse ho hihen koi hi le kagihsal cheh ahin , tua nang hoa kona kagamlat vangin kagih nahiuve ; ajeh chu kahung kit le kakhen louhel dingnahiuvin ahi .
47013003	Christan kei eimanchah monga thusei kahi photchetna nadei chan namudiu ahinai , nang ho dia ama chu lhasam deh ahipon , thahat tah ahibouve .
47013004	Ajeh chu lhasam tah banga thingpel’a akhetbeh vangun Pathen thahat nan ahinsah tai . Ijeh-inem itile kei Amato kahinkhom diu ainai .
47013005	Tahsan’a um mong nahi nah um nang ho kipatep’un , nang ho kikhol chil’uvin ; nasunguva Christa Jesu cheng chu nakihetdoh louvu ham ?
47013006	Keiho kathon louvu hi nahet diu kakinem’e .
47013007	Nang hon thilse nabol louna diuvin Pathen henga kataopeh jingui ; keiho lolhin phondohna ding mai hilouvin , keiho lolhing lel dol’in umu jong leng nang hon thilpha nabol theina diu ahi .
47013008	Ijeh-inem iitle keihon thutah dou nan ima kabol thei pouvin , thutah chubou kabol’u ahiye .
47013009	Nang ho naat’uva keiho kalhahsam tengule kakipah jiuve ; nang ho nachamkimsohna diuvin jong kataopeh ji nalaiyui .
47013010	Suhphatna ding hilouva sahdohna dinga Pakaiyin eipeh thaneina , hiche katha neina hi kahung tengle khoh veng vunga kamanchah louna dinga gal’a kona hiche lekha hi kahinsut ahi .
47013011	Tua lhah sopite , kipah tah nom’un , chamkimsoh keiyun , lungmongun , lung khat hiuvin , kcihamdel’un , chutile ngailut le chamna Pathenin naumpi jing diu ahi .
47013012	Thengsel’in khat le khat kibengchopto cheh-un , Mithengten nasalamui .
47013013	
47013014	Pakai Jesu Christa lungset , Pathen ngailut , chule lhagao theng kithopinan nabonchauvin umpi jing hen !
48001001	Mihema konle mihem vanga hilou , Jesu Christa jeh le athilah akona Jesu kaithouva Pa Pathen jal’a solchah keima Paul
48001002	le ka-umpi sopite chengsen Galatia gam Houbung ho henga ,
48001003	i-Pau Pathen le Pakai Jesu Christaa konin lungset le chamna hung lhung hen ,
48001004	i-Pau Pathen lungdeiya hiche khang gilouva eiho huhdoh din Jesu Christa chu eiho chonset jal’in Ama akitoh doh jengin ahi ;
48001005	i-Pau Pathen chu tonsot geiyin loupina chang jing hen : Amen .
48001006	Christa lungset jal’a nakoupauva kona tukah seha thupha chom khat’a nakihei jengu chu kadatmolheh-e ;
48001007	Thupha dang chula aum sampon ; mi phabeh vang aum’un , amaho hin nang ho suh ling laova Christa Kipana Thupha chu akaleh ahei ding agot’u ahibouve .
48001008	Hichea hin keiho hiuving lang van’a Vantil khat hijeng jongle nakiseipehsau Thupha tilou thupha chom seiphong aumle ama chu gaosap chang hen .
48001009	Kasei masah sau banga tua jong kaseikit ahi , “ Natahsansau hilouva thupha chom dang khattouvin nahung seipeh khah-u le ama chu gaosap chang jeng hen . ”
48001010	Tua hi mihemte lung lhaisah goa kahi , Pathen lung lhaisah go kahim ? O-le mihemte lungdei hol mong kahim ? Mihemte lungdei holna lai kahile Christa soh kahilou ding ahi .
48001011	Sopite , keiman kaseiphongle Kipana Thupha chu mihema kon ahilouje kahilchen nahiuve .
48001012	Mi hema kona kalah jong ahipon , koi man eihil jong ahipoi ; Jesu Christa hung kiphondoh a konjoh ahibouve .
48001013	Malai Juda hou gut kahilaiye kachon nam lhah najauvin , Pathen Houbung chu tepte na kalval’a bolsea suhmang ding go kahin ,
48001014	chu jongle kapu kapateu Houdan thua katom panjeh-in Juda hou thudol’a kakhang golpi tamtah kakho khelsoh keiye .
48001015	Ahinla ka-nu oisunga ka-um laiya pat eisepkhensa Pathen chun alungset jeh-in eikouvin ,
48001016	chidang namdangte henga Achapa kaseiphong theina din kahenga aphongdoh tan , hichea hin katoh ding dol tahsaphe le thisan pu mihem kadongpai jengpoi ,
48001017	kei sanga solchah hi masa Jerusalema umhohenga jong kachedehpoi , Arabia gama kaga chen , chuin Damascus khoa kahung kilekit bouve .
48001018	Kumthum nungin Cephas henga imahetoh din Jerusalema kaga chetouvin , amato nisom le ninga ka-um’e ;
48001019	hichepet chun Pakai sopipa Jacob tilou solchah dang kamupoi .
48001020	Nahenguva lekha kahinsut hi , ven Pathen maikoh a jou kaseipoi .
48001021	Hiche nung chun Syria le Cilicia gamkol sunga kahungtai .
48001022	Hiche geiya hi Judea gama Christa Houbungte mitmua het lou lai kahi ,
48001023	“ Masanga suhmang dia eigopau chun tun khatvei suhmang ding agot tahsan chu kipah tah-in asei phonglei , ” tibou ajah-u ahin ,
48001024	chu le keima jeh a Pathen avahchoi choi jengu ahi .
48002001	Kum som le li jouvin Titus kapui lhonin Barnabas to Jerusalema kaga chetou kitlhon’e .
48002002	Hichea chu Pathen thuphondoh jal’a chetou kahin miho jah a chun chidang namdang ho lah a Kipana Thupha kaseiphong thudol kahil chenin , lamkai dom dom ho vang chu atumbeh in kaseipeh-in , katoh masah le tulai katoh ho manlou aso lou nading ka-ngaitoi .
48002003	Chukoma ka-umpi Titus chu Greek mi ahivangin cheptansah tei ding agopouve .
48002004	Athudol hi alhema sopia kisemthu , Jesu Christa to ineikhomu jalena sumang dia mi ve-lhi dinga ilah-uva hunglut khaa , eiho sohchansah ding go ho hinpoh lut ahibouve .
48002005	Kipana Thupha tah ahidol hi nang ho chunga aum jingna din nidan khat jeng jong amaho noiya hi kikhumlut kha lou kahiuve .
48002006	Lamkai dom doma kiseihoa konin jong , ipi kihisah-u jongle ka-i aloudeh poi , Pathenin mihem maijan avepoi , ginle ja umdol’a kiseiho chun ima eibolpeh chompouve .
48002007	Chuti tah sangin cheptan ho henga Kipana Thupha seiphong dinga Peter kinganse banga chidang namdangte lah a Kipana Thupha seiphong dinga eikinganse amu’uve .
48002008	Ijeh-inem itile cheptan ho dinga Peter solchah a akisemdoh banga chidang namdang ho dinga keima solchah a eikisemdoh ahi .
48002009	Lungsetna eikipe aheuvin , Cephas le Jacob chule Johnin kapan khom’uva , kei le Branabas chidang namdang lah a chule amaho cheptan ho lah a natong dingin khut jetlamin eina sanguve .
48002010	Kageldoh jing ding adeiyu chule ken jong katoh nom jeh a hatah akagel jing vaicha gentheite ahiuve .
48002011	Antioch khoa Cephas ahung chun kichentah a themmona anei jeh-in amaichangtah a kaphoh jenge .
48002012	Ajeh chu Jacob henga kona mi phabep hung masangin chidang namdangte to an anekhomin , amaho hung phat’in cheptan ho akichat jeh-in akinung khinin akitumsah tai .
48002013	Judate mi adang hon jong ama ajop thol’un , aphat lhem nauva chun Barnabas geiyin apui manglo tauve .
48002014	Ahinla Kipana Thupha kitah dungjuiya achon louvu kamudoh phat’in japi maikoh tah a Cephas kasosal’in , “ Judate chilhah apeng nangbon Judate chondan banga um lou ibol’a chidang namdang te chu Juda te chondan thosah ham gao nahim ? ” kati .
48002015	Eiho pendol’a Juda mi ihiuvin , chidang namdang chonse hoa kon ihipouve .
48002016	Ahinla Jeu Christa tahsan tilouva Danthu dungjuiya natoh vanga mihem them achanlouje iheuve ; hijeh a chu eihon Danthu dungjuiya natoh vang hilouva Christa tahsan jal’a them ichan theina diuva Jesu Christa chu itahsanu ahi ; Ijeh-inem itile tahsa a mihing koima Danthu dungjuiya natoh vanga them chang lou ding ahi .
48002017	Themchan teina dia kihabolnaa jong Christa sunga chonse ihiu akimudoh le Christa chu chonset lhacha ham ? Ahinai saipoi .
48002018	Ajeh chu ken kaphetsa kasah phat kit le kasuh khel photchetna jo ahibouve .
48002019	Ijeh-inem itile Pathen lama kahin theina dinga Danthu jeh a Danthua thisa kahitai . Christa to kikhetbeh tha kahitan ,
48002020	Keima chu hinga ahipon , Christa joh keisunga hing ahibouve , tua tahsaphea kahin hi keima eingailua keijal’a kipedohjeng Pathen Chapa tahsan jeh a hing kahiye .
48002021	Pathen lungset hi moh kahisah poi , ajeh chu Danthu jal’a them kichang hile Christa thi chu pannabeiahi .
48003001	Vo khopolou Galatia miho Jesu Christa thingpel’a kikhetbeh dol namitmu changtah-uva kichentah a kisundoh taa , kon najol lhah-u ham ?
48003002	‘ Lhagao nakisanu chu Danthu dungjuiya natoh vang ha tahsan thu najah-uva kon ham ? ’ nanghoa konin kahet nom’e .
48003003	Iti chuti lungthimbei nahiuvem ? Lhagao thua kipan’uva tua tahsaphea chaidoh ding nagot’u ham ?
48003004	Hi chengpi hi mohjen seh a thoh gim nahiuvem ? Tah ahile mohjen seh ahi-ngut’e .
48003005	Lhagao napeuva , nalahuva thil kidang ho boljipa chun Danthu dungjuiya na natoh jeh-uva abol ha , tahsan thu najah-uva kona abol ham ?
48003006	Hichea hin , Abraham in Pathen atahsan in hichu ama din themchansah nan akisikpehtai , ” tin akiseiye .
48003007	Chuti ahijeh chun mi atahsan chengse chu Abraham chatea kisimjoh ahidol nahet diu ahi .
48003008	Pathen lekhabun tahsan jal’a chidang namdangte themchan ding ahet masah dol chu Pathenin Abraham jah a Kipana Thupha anaseiphong masan “ Nang jal’a chidang namdang jouse jong vangboh chang diu ahi , ” anati .
48003009	Hijeh a chu tahsan nei chengse chu tahsan neipa Abraham vangbohchang khom ahiuve .
48003010	“ Koi hile Danthubua kisun chengse nitjom jing lou chu gaosap chang ahi , “ tia akisut jeh-in , Danthu dungjuiya natong chengse chu gaosap chang ahiuve .
48003011	Ijeh-inem itile Danthu dungjuiya chonjeh a koima Pathen anga them chang lou hel ding ahi ; ajeh chu , “ Tahsan jal’a them changpa bou hing ding ahi , ” akiti .
48003012	Achujongle Danthu chu tahsan’a tobang ahipoi , “ Danthu ho nitpa chun Danthu ho hinna anei ding ahi , ” kiti ahibouve .
48003013	Danthua kisun chu , “ Thinga kikhai sang tapou chu gaosap chang ahi , ” kiti ahijeh-in , Christa chu eiho jal’in gaosap achangin , Danthu gaosapnaa koin eihung lhatdamtauve .
48003014	Hiche hi Abraham vang kiboh chu Jesu Christa jal’a chidang namdangte jong achan theiya tahsan vanga tepsa Lhagao chu ikisan theina diu ahi .
48003015	Sopite , mihem ngaidol’a kasei ahi , mihem ngaidol mongin jong suhdetsa kitepna chu koiman isah louvin abolpon , koijong akoibe ngaipoi .
48003016	Thutep chengse chu Abraham le achilhah kipea ahi . Mi tampi kiseina banga , “ Chule nachihlhah ho din , ” kiti louvin , khatseh seina bangin , “ Chule nachilhahpa din , ” akitin , Ama chu Christa ahi .
48003017	Hiche hi kisei ahi : Pathenin asuhdet’a aphondohsa kitepna chu kum ja li le somthum nunga umdoh Danthun thutep chu man mo asosah a ason amang thei ahipoi .
48003018	Goulo ding chu Danthu jal’a ahile thutep jal’a hilou ahin , ahinla Pathenin thutepsa jeh a Abraham apeh ahibouve .
48003019	Danthu hi ipi ding ba ham ? Suhkhel phondohna dia kikoibe , thutep kipe chilhahpa hung kah a ding ahin , Vantilte kimanga palaipa khut’a kitungdoh ahi .
48003020	Khatseh dinga thupo le ngailou ahin , Pathen chu khat ahi .
48003021	Achutile Danthu hi Pathen thutep to kikal ham ? Ahinai saipoi ; micho hing theina thaneiya Danthu kipe hile hiche Danthua chu them chan na um ding ahi .
48003022	Ahinla Jesu Christa tahsan jal’a atahsan chengse thutep chu akipeh theina diuva Pathen lekhabua thun ijakai chon set noiya akhumchah ahitai .
48003023	Tahsan thu hung lhun kah , ahung lhung ding tahsan kiphondoh kah a chu Danthu noiya ki hen kikhakhum ihiuve .
48003024	Hitia chu tahsan vanga them ichan theina diuva Danthun eina kaihoiyuva Christa henga eipui naiyu ahi .
48003025	Tahsan thu hung lhun kalvang eikaihoi nau noiya chu ihitapouve .
48003026	Ijeh-inem itile Jesu Christa tahsan jal’a Pathen chate nahiu ahitai .
48003027	Ajeh chu Christa sunggil’a baptize changsa nang hon Christa chu nakivon’u ahi .
48003028	Hiche a hin Juda mi le Greek mi kidatna , soh le chamlhat kikhena , pasal le numei kibahlouna aum tapoi , ajeh chu Christa sung gil’a nabonchauva pumkhat nahiu ahitai .
48003029	Hitia chu Christa mi nahijeh-un , Abraham chilhah nahiuvin , thutep goulo jong chu nang hon chan ding ahitai .
48004001	Goulo dingpa chu thil ijakai neipa ahivangin aneo laisen soh to imachom ahipoi kati ahi .
48004002	Apan atep phat lhin kahsen akaihoi ho le in-ngah ho thu noiya bou aume .
48004003	Hitobanga chu eiho jong ipilhin masanguva vannoi leiset lekhajembul noiya soh chang inahiuve .
48004004	Ahinla phat alhinset phat’in Pathenin a-Chapa ahinsol lhan , Danthu dungjuiyin numei sunga ahungpengin ,
48004005	Danthu noiya umho lhatdoh a eiho chalam thu ihina diuvin ahung’e .
48004006	Chate nahiu kichetna dinga Pathenin a-Chapa Lhagao chu i-lung sunguva ahinlha lut’a , “ Abba hepa , ” tia ikoujiu ahi .
48004007	Hiti ahijeh chun soh nahitapon , chapa nahitan , chapa nahijeh chun Pathen jal’a gouloa pang ding jong nahitai .
48004008	Pathen nahet masnguvin aumdol monga Pathen hilou ho lhachan napangui ;
48004009	tun vang Pathen nahetauvin , lamkhat’a Pathen het jong nahituvin , i-atile sonlel um lhasam tah Danthu lekha jembul lam’a kihei kit’a , abul lama sohna toh nom kit nahiuvem ?
48004010	Nang hon nikho phabep le lha phabep chule kum kiheichin ho pou nanit jiuve .
48004011	Nang ho dinga katoh gimna jouse moh nahisah diu kati ajai .
48004012	Sopite , keitobang hiuvin , keijong nang ho tobanga um kahi ; nang hon adih louvin neibol pouve .
48004013	Katahsa dammo jeh a Kipana Thupha kahung seipeh masah lo’u nahetsau ahi ;
48004014	katahsa veiset chu nang ho dinga patepna ahijeng vangin thei le hot’in neibol pouvin , Pathen Vantil bang tah le Jesu Christa bang tah-in neisang jo’uve .
48004015	Chubanga nakipa nau hoilamba hitam ? Hithei le namit chang te ni geiya kaldoh a neipeh nom leu jengu kichentah a kahettoh jing ahi !
48004016	Thutah kaseipeh jeh-uva nagal’u kahi ngap hitam ?
48004017	Miho chun thilpha dinga natom ngaipiu ahipoi , pamse dinga bou nadeiyu ahin , hiti ho dinga chu natompanpi bol’u ahibouve .
48004018	Keiman ka-umpi pet maiya hilouvin thil ijakaiya thilpha ding jenga tompan ding aphai .
48004019	Kachate , nasunguva Christa lim le mel akigondohsoh masangsea numei naoso nat thoh banga kathohgimpi kit nahiuve .
48004020	Tugeiya na kom’uva um’a ka-oso chombeh a hou ding kadei lheh jeng ahi , ajeh chu nachung thu’u kalung agim’e .
48004021	Vo Danthu noiya um nom ho na seipeh-un , Danthu najah khah louvu ham ?
48004022	“ Abrahamin chapa ni aneiyin , khat sohnu sunga peng ahin , khat jalen nu sunga peng ahi , ” tin akisun’e .
48004023	Sohnu sunga peng vang chu tahsaphe pen ngaidol’a peng ahin , jalen nu sunga peng vang thutep guiya peng ahi .
48004024	Hiche hi tekah a kihilna thei ahi ; Numei te ni hi kitepna ni vetsahna ahin , khat nu hi Sinai molsanga hung kon ahin , hiche nu chate chu soh natong ding ahiuve , hiche nu chu Hagar ahi .
48004025	Hagar hi Arabia gama Sinai molsang lim’a um ahin , tuali Jerusalem vetsah apang , achate to soh chang ahitauve .
48004026	Jalen nu vang chu chunga Jerusalem lim’a um ahin , ama chu inu’u ahiye .
48004027	Ijeh-inem itile “ Vo ching-a cha neilou nu kipah-in , Naoso nat thoh khalou nu kipa othongin kho samin ; Ijeh-inem itile jipa luppi sangin , Don lou dailouva kikoinu chate atamjoi , ” tin akisun’e .
48004028	Sopite , nang ho jong Isaac banga thutep chate nahiuve .
48004029	Chulaiya tahsaphe dol’a pengpan Lhagao lama pengpa asumang got banga tua jong chuti ahi .
48004030	Ahinla hichea hi Pathen lekhabun ipi aseiyem ? “ Sohnu chu achapato kaidoh than , ajeh chu sohnu chapan jalen nu chapa to gou lokhom theiponte , ” ati .
48004031	Sopite , hichea hin eiho sohnu chate ihi pouvin jalen nua joh ihibouvui .
48005001	Jalenna inei theina diuva Christan eilhatdoh-u ahitai . Hijeh chun dingdet jingun , soh namkol jona chun kihen oh kit tahih-un .
48005002	Ven , nahenguva thusei hi keima Paul kahi , nanghon chaptan thu najop’u le Christan imacha naphat chomsah lou diu ahi .
48005003	Cheptan thu jop chengse kahettohsah nahiuve , hitobang mi chun Danthua kisei chengse atohdoh ding abat nalaiye .
48005004	Danthu juiya themchan go ho chu Christaa kona kisat lhaa , lungsetnaa pul lha nahitauve .
48005005	Keiho vang Lhagao chun tahsan jal’a them chang dia kinem’a ei ngasah-u ahi .
48005006	Ijeh-inem itile Jesu Christa to hinkhomnaa hin chaptan le tan lou imachom ahipoi , ngailutnaa tong hat jing tahsan thupi ahi .
48005007	Nalhai toh lheh meu ! Thutah na-ngai nauva koiham nasu tanguvah ?
48005008	Hiche kijol lhahna hi nakoupauva kon ahipoi .
48005009	Chol themchan changlhah lhon pumpi achansohji ahi .
48005010	Pakaito hinkhomnaa imachan nasuhmo lou diuva nang ho hi kason lheh jeng nahiuvin , koi hijong le akhohpoi , nasumo pen penu chu athu kitantei ding ahi .
48005011	Sopite , keiman chaptan thu kaseiphong lai hile ibol’a eikibolse se ding ham ? Kaseiphong tahbah hile Thingpel thudol hi kipal lhuhna hilou ding ahi .
48005012	Nang ho suling lao ho chu amaho kisumangsih seh leu kadei lheh-e .
48005013	Sopite , nang ho jalen dia kikou nahiuvin , hiche jalenna hi tahsaphe lama jaothauna mai din mang hih-un , khat le khat ngailut’a kijento nan mang jo’uvin .
48005014	Ijeh-inem itile Danthu jouse jong hi thugol khat , “ Nangma naki-ngailut bangin naheng nakom ngailun , ” kitia hi bukimsoh ahibouve .
48005015	Amavang khat le khat kiketto sao sao le kibahgamto sao sao nahi khah-u jong le nakisuhmang hel louna diuvin ching theiyun .
48005016	Kenvang , “ Lhagaovin chon’un chutile tahsaphe lunggul chu namolso lou diu ahi , ” kati ahi .
48005017	Ajeh chu tahsaphe lunggul chu Lhagao lama to kidouva , Lhagao lama chu tahsa phea to kidou ahin , nang hon nabolnom nom nabol louna diuva hicheng chu kidouto ahiuve .
48005018	Hichea hi nang ho Lhagaovin napuiyu le Danthu noiya um nahipouve ,
48005019	tahsaphe lam natoh chengse chu kichentah a : jonthanhoi , thenlou , huh ,
48005020	limsemthu doi hou , doichoi , kidou , kinah , thangthip , lunghan , kiloset , loitumsem , kilangkhen ,
48005021	sumsel , jukham , eltol hitobang ho hi ahi . Kahilchah masah banguva kahilchah nahiuve , hitobanga chon ho chun Pathen lenggam alo lou dingu ahi .
48005022	Lhagao ga vang chu ngailut , kipa , cham , thothat , mi khoto , phat , kitahna ,
48005023	nunnem , kitimthem hiti ho hi ahi . Hitobang ho doudal ding Danthu aumpoi .
48005024	Christa Jesu to hinkhom chengsen tahsaphe chu alunggul le angaichat chengse pum a thingpel’a akhetbeh-u ahitai .
48005025	Eiho Lhagaova hing ihiule Lhagaovin chon’u hite .
48005026	Ikiletsah louhel diu , khat le khat kiphin lunghang ahiloule khat le khat kithang settoa ium louhel diu ahi .
48006001	Sopite , mi khattou suhkhel nei , athemmona kimandoh aum jongle Lhagao mi nang hon Lhagaova nunnema nasemphat diu dol ahi ; kivephan .
48006002	Khat le khat pohgih kipoh hun , chuti chun Christa Danthu nit chamkimsoh-un .
48006003	Khattou ikhat khat’a kigel’a , atahbeh a la imacha hilou chu ama le ama jeng jong kijoulhep ahibouve .
48006004	Min ama ama natoh cheh kikholtoh hen , anatoh chu aphatnah le midang titah louva ama le ama jeng jong kipah chaa kichoi an thei ahi .
48006005	Ajeh chu mitinin ama ama pohgih cheh akipoh ding ahibouve .
48006006	Thua kihil’a mi chun ahilpa chu thilpha chengse chankhompi hen .
48006007	Nang ho kilhem chavai hih-un , Pathen chu nelpeh dan ahipoi ; ajeh chu mihemin atu tu a-at ding ahi .
48006008	Ijeh-ienm itile tahsa dol’a tupan tahsaphea kona kemmang theiga alo ding , Lhagao dol’a tupan jong Lhagaova tonsot hina aloding ahi .
48006009	Thilpha bolna lama chimtih neipouhite , i-lhah dah louvu le aphatcha tohga ilo diu ahi .
48006010	Hijeh chun hungun aphat gomkom inei dungjuiyun mitin chunga thilpha bol’u hitin , ahideh-in eima insung mi atahsan ho chunga habol deh-u hite .
48006011	Veuvin , keima kakhut tah-in nahenguva lekha jemkhou tah-in kahin sun’e .
48006012	Tahsa vet-hoisah ding go chengsen chaptan sah ding nagot hamu chu imacha ding ahi pon , Christa thingpel jal’a thoh hesohna apeldohna diuva abol’u ahibouve .
48006013	Cheptan mong hon jong Danthu anit pouve , chep natansah nom nau chu tahsaa hiche melchihna naneisah jeh-uva chu hoithonom ahiuve .
48006014	Kenvang I-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa thingpel ti lou thildang ima song hih inge ; ajeh chu hichea chu vannoi kei dinga , keima vannoi dinga kikhetbeh kahitai .
48006015	Ajeh chu cheptan le tan louvin koima ima asochompoi , thilsem thah hiding bou chu khoh ahi
48006016	Hiche Dan mang jouse , Pathen Israelte chunga chamna le hepina um hen .
48006017	Tukal vang koiman eisulunggim ta hih hen , ajeh chu kati chunga hi Jesu melchihna polea kahitai .
48006018	I-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa lungset chun na-lhagaovu umpi hen , sopite : Amen .
49001001	Pathen lungdeiya Jesu Christa solchoh Paul’in Ephesus khoa cheng tahsan’a Jesu Christa to hingkhom mithengte henga ;
49001002	I-Pau Pathen le Pakai Jesu Christaa kon lungsetna nahenguva um hen !
49001003	I-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa Pa le Pathen jal’a van muntin’a Lhagao vangbohna tin chenga vang eibohPau chau thangvah-in um jing hen ;
49001004	Pathenin ngailutna jal’a Ama mitmua athengle nolnabei ihina diuva , Christa sunggil’a eiho hi vannoi kisemdoh masanga eina lhendohsau ahin ;
49001005	Aman adeile atup duing juiya Jesu Christa vanga a-lamthu chapate ihi theina diuva Ama dinga eina chom khendoh-u ahi .
49001006	Hiche angailut tah achapa jal’a manbeiya eipeh-u thilpeh loupi chu i-vahchoi diu adoi ahi .
49001007	Christa thisanjal’a i-chonsetnau ki-ngai-dam’a lhatdam chang i-hitauve ; alungset bulhing dungjuiya
49001008	ichunguva abuh lhah a , chihna le hetkhenna jal’a
49001009	Ama lungdeiya thil kiselguh chu eihetsah-uva , Christa sunggil’a athilgon masah dungjuiy
49001010	Leiset khang lhin’a phat ahung lhun teng Christa hong sunga chu thil i-jakai , vanmun jousea hihen leiset chunga hi jongle Ama sunga chu gopkhomsoh ding ,
49001011	Ama hong sunga chu Pathenin keiho Judate eina lhendoh-uva eina gonsau ahin , agonsa dungjuiya thil ijakai hin na atoh cheh a , Ama ngaito le dei dungjuiya um jing ahi .
49001012	Christa hongsunga dia kinem jing keihon Ama loupina chu kavah choina diuva chuti ahi .
49001013	Ama jal’a chidang namdang nang hon jong huh hing nachan nau Kipana Thupha , thudih chu najah-uva , Ama vanga na tahsan’uva , tepsa Lhagao Thenga mohor kinamsa nahitauve .
49001014	Pathen vahchoina ding le amiten jalen i-muna dinguva , Lhagao Theng chu eiho goulo ding khamgahna ahi tai
49001015	Hichejeh hin Pakai Jesu natahsanu le mithengte chengse na ngailutnau kajah a pat ,
49001016	kataochanin tang louhel’in nang ho ding kathang vah jinge .
49001017	Hichu I-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa dinga Pathen , loupina Pa chun chihna leh Ama hetna phondohna thei Lhagao napeh theiyuva ,
49001018	nakou nau kinepna hi nahet theina diuva nalungthim mit’u ahasah theiya , mithengte dinga goulo anei loupina thalhinje ,
49001019	atahsan ei ho sunga natong athahat natsatje so-phah hoi ahi lou het theina ding ahi . Hiche athahat thilbol theina kidangtah hi
49001020	amanchah a Christa-a thiho lah a akaithouva , van gamsunga ajetlama atou sah ahi .
49001021	Hikoma chu Aman vaipo thunei jouse chung , thahat le piputna jouse chunga loupipen minchang ahitai .
49001022	Pathenin thil ijakai Christa kengto noiya akoi soh a , Houbung dinga Ama chu ijakiya ima jouse luchang ahisah ahitai .
49001023	Houbung chu Christa tahsa ahin , tahsa chu aluchang to akijop teng thil ijakai subukimpa chu bulhingset ding ahi tai
49002001	Masanga chu nasuh khel nau le nachonset nauva thisa nahiuve ;
49002002	hiche laiya chu hiche vannoi leiset khang um chan dungjuiya na chonuva , vanlai jol’a thunei vaipo ho nung juiya , tulai Pathen ngaisah loute lah a natong lhagao thusah a chon’a nahiuve .
49002003	Phat khat laiya Juda mi keiho jong hitobang chu kahiuvin , katahsapheu ngaichat lamjenga chon , tahsaphe lunggul le lungtup a chon kahiuvin , midang banga keiho jong lunghanna chate kanahiuve .
49002004	Ahinla Pathen he-pina bulhingset , ami-ngailut ning lhing sel’in eingailuvin ,
49002005	suh khelna-a ithi laitah-un Christa to eicho hing khomtauve , lugnset vanga huhhingchang nahiuve .
49002006	Amato ei kaithou thauva , vangam , Jesu Christa hongsunga eitou sah-u ahi tai .
49002007	Hichu ahung lhung ding khanga Jesu Christa sunggil’a eikhoto nau lungsetna letset jeng chu eivetsah theina diu ahiye .
49002008	Ijeh-inem itile tahsan jal’a lungset man’a huh hing chang nahiuvin , hichehi nang hoa kona hilouva Pathen thilpeh ahibouve .
49002009	Natoh vanga ahilou jehhin kisonna thei jong ahi poi .
49002010	Eiho Pathen semsa ihiuvin , Pathenin ichonna diuva ana gon masah chengsea chu ichon theina diuva natoh pha chengse tong dia Jesu Christa sunggil’a kisemdoh ihiuve
49002011	Tahsa phea chidang namdang nahilaiyu , tahsa khut’a cheptan mihon cheptan lou nahi sah laiyu khang chu geldoh-uvin ;
49002012	hiche laiya chu Christa to kimat lou , Israel lhangpi kiloikhomnaa pang lou , thutep jal’a kimu kitepnaa pangkhalou , hiche leiset’a hi kinepna bei le Pathen helouva um nahiuve .
49002013	Tua vang Jesu Christa sunga na umtah jeh-un masanga na gamlat vangun Christa thisan jal’a ngai dam nahitauve
49002014	Christa chu eiho kichamna ahi . Aman kikhena bang lai chu aphe lhan , kidouna chu atahsa phen asumangin , Judate le chidang namdang te pumkhat asotai .
49002015	Aman namnia kona Amato hingkhom dinga mithah khat asemdoha chamna asemdoh na dinga Danthu chu athupeh chengse le adan jouse toh asuhmangtha ahi tai .
49002016	Thingpel’a athi chun Christan kidouna chu atahsa tah-in asumangin , jat ni chu asuchamin , Pathen henga tahsa pumkhatseh asemdoh tai .
49002017	Hiti chun ahungin Pathen to kigamlat namdang nang ho heng le Pathen to kinai Judate henga hiche chamna Kipana Thupha hi ahung seiphong tai .
49002018	Hijeh a chu Christa jal’a chidang namdang le Judaten iloi niuva Lhagao khat’a Pa henga lut theina ineiyu ahi je .
49002019	Hichejeh chun nang ho maljin le khopem nahi tapouvin , Pathen mithengte chan khompi le a-insung mite nahitauve .
49002020	Jesu Christa chu inning song khomdet ahin , sholchahho le Themgao ho songset chunga nang ho kisadoh nahiuve .
49002021	Christa chun in kisa chengse chu aloikhomsoh keiya , Pakai Houin theng hi dinga akhantousah ahi ;
49002022	Ama sunga chu nang ho jong adang chegse to kisakhom Pathenin Lhagaova chenna anei theina dia kisa doh nahiuve
49003001	Hichejeh a chu chiding namdang nang ho jal’a soh changa kihen keima Paul ,
49003002	Pathen lungset vanga nang ho dinga hiche kinbolna eikipeh hi najahsau ahi tan ,
49003003	thil kiselguh kahenga kiphongdoh a kihetsah dungjuija paltan’a kahinsutsa jong ahitai ;
49003004	simpou pou leu chun Christa selguh thil kahet themdol hetauvin nate .
49003005	Tulaiya Lhagaovin Christa solchah theng ho le Themgao ho henga aphondoh bang hin khang masa laiyin mihem chate akihetsahpoi .
49003006	Athuguh chu Jesu Christa jal’a Kipana Thupha hung lhun hin chidang namdang ten jong Judate to gou lokhomna le tahsan khat hikhomna chule thutep chankhomna aneitauve
49003007	Athilbol thei thahat le Pathen lungset manbeiya thilpeh eikipe dungjuiya hiche Kipana Thupha lhachaa eikipansah ahitai .
49003008	Mitheng te jouse lah a alhumpen kahi vangin Christa haoje akhona bei Kipana Thupha hi chidang namdangte henga seiphongna ding lungsetna hi eikipei ;
49003009	hichu thil ijakai sempa Pathenin ama sunga tonsot’a akoi thilgon kiselguh chu mitin kamusah a ,
49003010	tulaiya Houbung jeh a Pathen chihna jat chom chom ahidol hi vanlaijol’a vaihom thuneite hetsahna ding ahi .
49003011	Hiche hi i-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa chunga kimolso tonsot’a gonsa thilgon dungjuiya um ahiye .
49003012	Ama itahsan jal’u le Amato ihinkhom jeh-uva lung ngamna le hanna neiya ahenga lut ngam ihitauve .
49003013	Hichejeh chun nang ho jeh a hesoh genthei kathoh hi lung thoi hih-un , hiche hi naloupinau joh ahibouve
49003014	Hichejeh a chu dilsua Pa henga taoji ka hin ,
49003015	hiche Pa vanga hi vanmun jouse le leiset chunga phungtinin kiminvo na aneiyu ahi ;
49003016	Aman aloupi haoje akhonna beiya kona thahat le thilboltheina a-Lhagao vanga nami-sung nunguva dia napeh theiyuva ,
49003017	tahsan jal’a Christa chu na lungthim sunguva achen theiya ,
49003018	hitia chu mithengte chengse to Christa ngailutna jaoje le saoje , chule asanje le athuhje het khen jouna na nei theiyuva ,
49003019	hetna jouse khokhelsoh hel Christa ngailutna nahet theiyuva , ijakai chamkimsoh hel Pathen chamkimna nabulhin thei na dingu ahije
49003020	I-sunguva natong jing athahat dungjuija ithum sangule igel sanguva thil ijakai thahat tah a bolthei Pa ,
49003021	Ama henga chun Houbung sung le Jesu Christa hongsunga akhang khangin tonsot geiyin loupina um jing tahen : Ame
49004001	akai dia sohchang keiman na kikounau to kitoh a chon dia ka-ngeh nahiuve ;
49004002	phat jousen nunnem in , chonnem jingun , thohhat to thon , ngailutnan khat le khat kingai themun ;
49004003	Lhagaova pumkhat hina chu tuhchah jing din kihabol’un , cham nan kikan khom jingun ,
49004004	nakikounau kinepna khatseh ahibangin tipum khat , Lhagao khat ahi ;
49004005	Pakai khat , tahsankhat , baptize channa khat ,
49004006	mi jouse Pa , ijakai chunga um , ijakaiya natong , ijakai ya umsoh Pathen khatseh ahi
49004007	Christa thilpeh tepte na dan dungjuija eiho mi khat cheh hi lungsetna thilpeh khat cheh eipeh-u ahi .
49004008	Hijeh chun Pathen lekhabua : “ Ama chung sanga akaltou chun Gal-hing kiman tampi akaitouvin ; Mihemte jong thilpeh Tampi apei , ’ ati
49004009	“ Ama akaltouvin , ” kiti hi , ‘ Leiset noinung geiya akumlhai , ’ tilou adang ipi kiseina ham ?
49004010	Akum lhapa chu ijaki asuh bulhitsohna dinga vanmun jouse chungvum’a kaltoupa ma ma chu ahi .
49004011	Chule Aman miho thil apehho chu : abang sohchah hi na , abang Themgao hi na , abang evangelist hi na , abang Pastor hi na le mihil hi na ahin ,
49004012	ama ho hin mithengte chu lhacha natohna lam le Christa tahsa sahdohna ding lama agontoh-uva ,
49004013	eiho chengse hi tahsan’a pumkhat ihikahseu le Pathen Chapa ihet kahseu , mi kikhan lhit ihiuva chule Christa pilhin dung chan iphah kah seuva abol diu ahi .
49004014	Hichu ei ho chapang banga mi suhmangna dinga doha thuh a kipodoh ho le mihem lungthim gilouva kon kihilna lhem ho chu kipui chatvaisah a hui nung jousen amut ling le alhoh mang theibep tobang ihilouna diu ahi .
49004015	Chuti sanga aluchang hiya Christa chu thil ijakaiya ikhantouna diu va ngailut neiya thuttah isei jing diu ahi ;
49004016	Amaa kona tahsa pumpi hi kitoh chet’a kisuto khoma kisolmat cheh , tahsa pumpi hi tibah dang chengse hin atuhmat soh keiya , atoh ding dol cheh abol’uva ngailutnaa asahdoh a akhantousah-u ahi je
49004017	Pakai pan’a hiche hi seiya kahettohsah nahiuve : chidang namdang ten lung chatvai aput’uva achon bangun chon hih-un ;
49004018	amaho kho pholouhel le alungtah behseh jeh-uva ahetnau lung thimsoh a Pathen hin naa chu kipaidoh ahitauvin ,
49004019	jumle ja helouva um’uva acham cham’uva huh lam le thil theng lou tinchang to chule lop lam bolna dinga kipedoh ahitauve
49004020	Nang ho vang Christa chu hitobanga hi kihil nahipouve ;
49004021	Jesu laigil’a cheng thutah banga Ama chu najah-uva chule Amaa kihila nahiule
49004022	nang hon masang chonna dol’a chon , joulhep ding ngaichatna lunggul’a ha set cheh cheh milui chu napai lhah-uva ,
49004023	nalungthimu Lhagaova kisemthah a ,
49004024	chule thutah dungjuiya adih le athenga Pathen lim banga kisemdoh mithah chu nakivon diu ahi
49004025	Hijeh chun jou pailhan , nangho khat cheh chu aheng akomto thutah jengin kihou hen ; ijeh-inem itile eiho khat cheh hi tibah khat ihi bouvui .
49004026	Lung hangkha tajong leu chun chonse hih-un ; nalung han u chu nisan lhumkhum hih hel hen
49004027	Chule agilou pa chu mun ot hih hel’uvin .
49004028	Gucha chu gucha kit ta hih hen , chusangin alhasam ato theina din akhut tah-in napha tong gim hen .
49004029	Nakam’uva konin thuse khat cha potda hen , amavang ajah ho lung lhaina din khantou theina dinga akhoh dungjuija thupha potjo hen .
49004030	Lhatdoh nikhoa dinga mohor nakinam nau Pathen Lhagao Theng chu lung phatmosah hih-un .
49004031	Thukha jouse leh lungsat , lunghan , kinah , kitaitom , chule gitlounajouse nang hoa konin pai mangun .
49004032	Nang ho khat le khat kihepito cheh-un , lung nemun , Pathenin Christa sunggil’a na-ngaidam bangun ki-ngaidam’uvin
49005001	Hichejeh chun Pathen sahtah chate nahijeh-un Amato bah ding ngaitouvin .
49005002	Christan eiho eingailut’uva eiho jal’a Pathen henga maicham thilpeh gimnamtui banga Ama akipehdoh jeng bang chun ngailutnan chon’uvin .
49005003	Mithengte umdol’in jong thule then louna jouse chule papset thudol nalah-uva kiphapoh hih hel hen ;
49005004	chule jamo le thumotsei , tothanghoi hicheng jong chu umda hen lang , chusangin thangvahna thu kiseijo hen .
49005005	Ijeh-inem itile nang hon hiche hi nahetdiu ahi , koi hile jonthanhoi bol , thilthengloubol , chule papsea le doilim semthu houva chun Christa le Pathen lenggam sunga mun aneipoi
49005006	Koima thu homkeovin kilhep lhahsah dauvin , hiche ho jeh taha chu thua nung lou chate chunga Pathen lunghan hung chuji ahi .
49005007	Hiteho chutoh imacha kikop hih-un .
49005008	Nangho muthima na umsa nahiuvin , tua vang Pakai hongsunga khovah changkha nahitauvin , hijeh chun khovah chate bangin chon’un .
49005009	Ijeh-inem itileh khovah ga chu phatna jouse le adih chule thutah ahin ,
49005010	Pakai lung lhaina ding chu pho toh-uvin ;
49005011	muthima um tohga beiho chuto imacha kikop hih hel’un , amaho chu sosal’un phohsal jou’uvin .
49005012	Ijeh-inem itile amaho guthim natohho chu seidoh ding jongjachat umleo ahi .
49005013	Ajeh chu ijakai hi isosal’a iphonjal teng le khovah chun aphong doh jitai .
49005014	Ijeh-inem itile ijakai phong doh a chu khovah ahi . Hichejehchun : ‘ Vo ihmumil khangin , Athi lah a konin thoudoh-in : Chuteng Christan nasalvah ding ahi , ’ tin akiseiye
49005015	Hijeh chun iti nachon’um ching theiyun , lungthimbei ho banga um louvin , michingho bangin um’un ;
49005016	phat hi kitup keiyin mangun , ajeh chu tulai nikho hi apha tapoi .
49005017	Hijeh chun lungthimbeiyin umdauvin , Pakai lungdei ipiham het ding ngaitouvin .
49005018	Lengpituiyin kham hih-un , hichea chun manthahna aum’e ; chusangin Lhagaovin dimsetjo’uvin ;
49005019	tumging to thon Lhagao lan khat le khat kihou limun , tumging tumin kitohdel’in Pakaiya nalunggil’in la sauvin .
49005020	Imatih chanin ima lam jouse a dingin i-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa minin Pa Pathen thangvah jingun ;
49005021	Christa ja nan khat thun khat nung uvin
49005022	Numeiho Pakai thua nung bangin napasal teu thun nungun ;
49005023	ajehchu Christa chu atahsa Houbung huhhinga le aluchang ahi banga , pasal chu numei luchang ahi .
49005024	Houbung Christa thua anun banga numei ho jong ima lam jousea apasal teu thua nung diu ahi .
49005025	Pasal ho , Christan Houbung angailut’a , adinga Amatah akipeh doh jeng bangin najiteu ngailu’vin .
49005026	Christan angailut Houbung chu twiya asilngim’a thua asuh thengna dinga abol ahi ,
49005027	hichu Houbung hi Ama angsunga loupitah leh thengsel , nolnabei le avonkom beihela adinsahna ding ahi .
49005028	Hijeh a chu pasal hon ajiteu chu ama ho tahsa banga angailut diu ahi . Ajinu ngailupa chu ama kingailua ahiye .
49005029	Ajeh chu koiman imatih chanin atahsa ahokhahpoi , Christan Houbung abolna bangin , avah khangin ahebolji bouve .
49005030	Eiho hiChrista tahsa tibah ihiuve .
49005031	“ Hichejeh a hi mihemin anu apa lhakanga ajinu akolchahjoh ding chule amani tikhat hilhon dinga hi , ” akiti .
49005032	Hiche thu hi giltah ahin , keiman Christa le Houbung thudol’a bou ka sei ahiye .
49005033	Ahinla nang ho amichang cheh a ding jong ahin , hijeh chun mi ama aki-ngailut bangin ajinu ngailu chehhen , chule numeiyin jong ajipa jabolcheh hen
49006001	Chate Pakai jal’in nanu napa thun nungun , hichu adih ahi .
49006002	“ Nanu napa jabol’in , ” kiti hi thutep lah a thupeh masapen ahin ,
49006003	“ Naphat theiya leiset chunga nahinkho sotna dingin , ” jong akati .
49006004	Pate ho , nachateu sulung hang hin-un , Pakai deiya gahchah le tilkhouna lamjoh a seiletsah jo’uvin
49006005	Sohho , Christa thua nanun banguvin , kichat le kihot pumpum in lung jangkeiyin tahsa lama napakaiteu thua nungun ;
49006006	mihem vethoiding maiya hilouvin , hinkhopumpin Christa soh hiuvin , Pathen lungdei chu tonguvin ;
49006007	mihema hilouvin Pakai lama lunggel’a soh natong hiuvin ;
49006008	ajeh chu soh hihen chamlhat hile thilpha bol chanin Pakaiya kona kipaman asancheh diu naheuve .
49006009	Pakaiya pang ho , sohho chu tobangma chun bol’un , hutum gihsal bol dauvin , ajeh chu ama ho le nang ho nagom’u va Pakai chu van’a aumin , Aman koima dat le langkaina aneilou na heuve
49006010	Achaina keiyin Pakaiya pansan athahhat athilbol thei nan kitilkhouvun .
49006011	Diabol lungthim gilou chengse masanga napan jouna din Pathen galvon lhingkeiyin kivon’un ;
49006012	Ijeh-inem itile eiho thisan le tahsaphe to kibon ihipouvin , van mun tin’a lhagao gilou engse ho , hiche vannoi muthimvaipo ho , thu neiho , vaihom ho to kidou ihiubouvui .
49006013	Hijeh chun nikho phalou nia nadin jouva , akhonna geiya dingdet’a nanan jouna diuvin Pathen galvon lhingkeiyin pan’uvin .
49006014	Hijeh chun thutah chu konggah bang in kigah un , adih chu ompho bangin panin dingun ;
49006015	cham na Kipana Thupha chu kengchot kisesa bangin gotsan kikoiyun ,
49006016	hicheng chunga chun agiloupa thalpi meikong tobang chu nasuhmit jouna diuvin tahsan chu lum bangin kidal nan neiyun ;
49006017	chu le huhhingna chu thih-lukhuh bangin kikhuh-un , Lhagaova kon Pathen Thu chu chemjam bangin mangun ;
49006018	hiche na ding hin Lhagao mang chan ijakaiyin phat jousen tao jing un lang , chujongle tantih neilouvin phat jousen kiging jingun , mithengte din jong taopeh jinguvin ;
49006019	chule keima din jong Kipana Thupha thugil hi paodoh a thu ka sei teng kichentah a het theiya kaseidoh theina dingin neitaokop jingun ,
49006020	hiche dinga hi thihkhaova kihen’a leng palai kahin , hiche laitah a hi kasei dingdol lom hangtah a kaseina ding ahi
49006021	Pakai hinkhoa lhacha tahsan um sopi deitah Tychicus-in keima umchan ipi kabol nahetnom chengseu nahetsah nauvinte .
49006022	Keiho thudol nahet nom chengseu hetsah ding le nalungthim til khou ding ngaitoa ama hi nahenguva kahinsol ahi .
49006023	Pa Pathen le Pakai Jesu Christaa konin ngailut le tahsan chule chamna sopite henga um jing hen .
49006024	I-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa ngailut ho chengse chu kemthei louvin lungset nan umpi jingu hen
50001001	Jesu Christa soh te ni Paul le Timothyn Philippi khoa um Jesu Christa tahsan mithengte le Houbung lamkai chengse , lhacha chengse henga :
50001002	i-Pau Pathen le Pakai Jesu Christa konin lungset le chamna nachunguva um hen .
50001003	Nang ho kageldoh phat le imatih chanin ka-Pathen kathangvah jinge ;
50001004	Phat jousen thangvah to thon nang ho chengse dingin katao jing jengin ,
50001005	akipat nia pat tuni geiya Kipana Thupha kinbol thudol’a neikithopi jeh-un hitia chu kabol ahi .
50001006	Hichea hin nang ho sunga thilpha bolpa chun Jesu Christa nikho geiya amolso tei ding dettahin katahsan’e .
50001007	Nabonchauva thudol’a hitia lung kagel hi adih-e ; ajeh chu kalungthim’a kavop jing nahiuve . Nanghon eikipe lungsetna thudol’a kabulput kahen lhahna hihen lang Kipana Thupha lama kihonna thusei le phudetna ding dol hijongle neichankhompi cheh-u ahiye .
50001008	Nabonchauva lung gil’a ka-ngailut nau kisei hi Jesu Christa lainatpina ka-ngaiyu eihettohpia Pathen ahijenge .
50001009	Hiche kataona lopen chu : ngailut naneiyu chu agil cheh cheh a , hetna gelkhenna aletsetna ding kati ahi .
50001010	Chutile nanghon thilpha datchilje nahet-uva , Christa nikho ni le thengsel le nolnabei nahi diu ,
50001011	Jesu Christa vanga Pathen loupina le vahchoina dinga thildih ga chu nadim dingu ahi .
50001012	Sopite , keima chung chang thusoh hi Kipana Thupha machal na joh ahidan nahet diu kadeiye .
50001013	Hichejeh hin kabulput kahen lhah hi Christa seijui kahijeh ahi Pretorian sepai ho le midang jouse henga aphongdoh tai .
50001014	Chu le kabulput henlhah hi sopite atamjon amun , hanlo na cheh-in aneiyun , gin bei hel’a thusei ding angamlotauve .
50001015	Atahbeh-in mi abangin thangset sum le kinahna bep’in Christa aseiphong leuvin , phabep’in vang thilpha deina aseiphongu ahinai .
50001016	Kon khat’in jong Kipana Thupha panhuna thusei kahi ahetjeh uva ngailutna aneiyu ahi .
50001017	Kon khatsen vang kabulput henlhah na hi genthei kathoh be cheh ding dei naa lung theng louva Christa asei phongu ahibouve .
50001018	Ipijeh mong ham ? Phat lhemna hihen atahbeh hijongle , ipi lam ahiya Christa chu kiseiphong thou ahin , hijeh chun kakipah-e , chule kakipa jing ding ahi ;
50001019	Ijeh-inam itile nang ho tao kop jing jeh le Jesu Christaa kona Lhagao panpina jeh a hiche hi huhhinga kahung umna ding ahi kahei .
50001020	Kadei gilpen le kakinepna chu katoh dingdol kin pel louva kabol jing theiya , a-itih phat hihen tutah jeng hijongle hakattah a kapan ngam’a hinna hihen thina hijongle katahsa pumpia hi Christa choi-at nading hi ahipen’e .
50001021	Ijeh-inem itile keima din hin chu Christa ahin , thi chu hamphatna ahi .
50001022	Ahinla tahsaphea hin hi tohga pha sona joh ahile , hoijoh lhen kah ding kahepoi .
50001023	Ni kaha lhenjoh ding helouva moh lunggim kahi , kitel doh a Christa to umkhom ding kadei lheh jenge , hichu kei dinga gam chenga phajo ding ahi .
50001024	Ahin la tahsaphea kahin nah lai ding hi nang ho dia khoh jo nalai ahi .
50001025	Hijeh chun um nalai ing ting nabonchauva ka-umpia kipana le tahsan dol’a nakhantou be na diuva kakithopi ding hi kaginchat’a kahet ahi .
50001026	Hichu nahenguva kahung kit teng keima jeh a Jesu Christa to nahinkhom nauva kisonna nanei be chehna dingu ahi .
50001027	Keima na henguva hung ing , hung mun , muhih jong leng , Kipana Thupha tahsan lam’a lung khat tah a napan khom’uva , Lhagao khat’a na din khom jing u kajah theina din nanun nakhan , nakhosah dol’u chu Christa Kipana Thupha to kitoh pou pou hen ;
50001028	Nakidoupi-teu masanga kicha louhel’a napan’u chun amaho dinga manthahna ahi-dol aphotchetsah a , nangho dia huhingna ahije amusahding , hiche hi Pathena hungkon ahin ,
50001029	Christa jal’a Ama tahsan mai hilouva Ama ding jong nathohgimpi diuva chan kipe nahiuve ;
50001030	hijeh a chu masanga thohgim’a gal kasat chu namu’vin , tun jong najauvin ahi .
50002001	Christa to hinkhomnaa hi kitil khounaa , um dia , haldoh theina ngailut a um dia , Lhagaova kiloi khomna a um dia , dipdam le kilai natpina a um ding le ,
50002002	kakipana hi suchamkimun , lungthim kitha khat-in , ngailutna chu neicheh-in , thu khat kisauvin , lung khat hiuvin ;
50002003	Moh hamhoitho le kiletsah man’a imacha bol louvin , lung nem heo chan khat’in khat chu ama sanga phajoa gel cheh hiuvin .
50002004	Koiman ama changseh ding mai gel louvin midang ding jong gelkhoh cheh hiuvin .
50002005	Jesu Christa sunga cheng lungput chu nang ho sung gil a jong cheng ding ahi .
50002006	Aman Pathen lim le mel aput jing jeng vangin , Pumhat’a Pathen to kibah ding agel naisaipoi ;
50002007	Ama chamtah-in keohel’in akilhan , Soh lim le mel akivon jon , Mihem khat bangin mihem mel’in ahung kilah-in ,
50002008	Thina chan geiyin achamtah-in akineosah-in , Thingpel’a thina chan geiyin thun anunge .
50002009	Hijeh a chu Pathenin Ama chu munsangpen chungvuma akhansanga , Min jouse sanga minthangpen apeh ahin ;
50002010	Hijeh a chu van le leiset chule leiset noiya cheng jousen Dilsua Jesu min’a chibai aboh diu ;
50002011	Chule lei jousen Pa Pathen loupina dinga Jesu Christa chu , ’ Pakai ’ tia aphondoh cheh diu ahi .
50002012	Hiti ahijeh chun kadeitahte , sei na-ngai jing banguvin keima umpet maiya hilouvin , tu ka-umlou pet jengin jong kicha cheh-in ki thing thingin huhhing nachan nau molsona dingin na tongun .
50002013	Ijeh inem itile alungnachim ding deichat-na le toh nomna dinga nasunguva natong chu Pathen ma ma ahibouve .
50002014	Ima jouse phunchel louhle le kinel baotam louhel’in bol’un ;
50002015	chutia chu hiche khang lamvai le vah koiho lah a hi nolnabei le themmona neilou , themmona bei Pathen chate nahiuva , vannoiya nisa banga navah theina diuvin ,
50002016	Amaho chu hinna thu seipeh-un ; chutile Christa Nikho teng kison-naa kanei theiya , kagimna le kacholna chengse hi moh ahilouje kichen ding ahi .
50002017	Natahsan jal’uva Pathena thilpeh le natohnaa hin kahinna thisan hi kisung lhahel jongle kakipah-in nabonchauva chunga kakitai piuve .
50002018	Hiti chun kipah-un lang keijong neikipa piu-vin .
50002019	Nachung chang thuu kajah teng kitilkhouna kanei theina dinga nahenguva Timothy hinsol vah ding Pakai Jesu jal’in kakinem lheh jenge .
50002020	Nachung chang thuu lung thengsel’a gel khoh a ama tobang midang kaneipoi .
50002021	Ajeh chu midang hon amaho ding jeng bou akihol’uvin , Jesu Christa thudol’a imacha agelkhoh pouve .
50002022	Timothy vang aphat chomje naheuve , ajeh chu chapan apa akithopi banga Ki-pana Thupha thua hi soh na tong banga keima eitoh hu ahiye .
50002023	Hijeh chun keima umchan ding dol akihet phat phat le ama hi hinsol ding kinem jing kahi .
50002024	Keima tah jong kahung loi ding hi Pakaiya konin kagingcha lheh jenge .
50002025	Ka-ngailutna kinbol dia na-solchah-u , kaseipai chanpi le toh khompi , sopi Epaphroditus hi na-henguva hinsol loi ding khoh kasa-tai ;
50002026	ama dammo thu najah-u chu nommo asa lheh jengin , hijeh chun nabonchauvin namu nom lheh jenguve .
50002027	Ijeh-inem itile anan athideh chet jenge , ahivangin Pathenin akhoton , amaseh hilouvin keijeng jong lunggimna sangson kanei louna din eikhotoi .
50002028	Ama namu tengu nakipa kit theiyuva kalunggimna jong alhom dom theina dinga ama hi kahinsol loi jeng ahi .
50002029	Hichejeh chun Pakai jal’in Kipana tincheng to thon anasangun lang , hitobang mi hi jabol’uvin ;
50002030	ijeh-inem itile aman keima neijen nauva abang khai jouse bulhitna din ahinkho geiyin atohdoh jengin , Christa ding natohnaa athilo deh chet jenge .
50003001	Kasopite , tukalse vang Pakai chunga kipah jingun . Nang ho dia aphat chomjeh-in kasutsa velsut kit ding kachimdehpoi .
50003002	Uichate chu kivet phat’un , thilse bol ho chu kivet phat’un lang cheptan lou khohsah ho chu kivetphet’uvin .
50003003	Ijeh-inem itile Pathen Lhagaova Pathen chibai boh a Christa Jesu jal’a kisonna nei , tahsaphea kisong lou eiho hi cheptan dihtah ihiuve .
50003004	Tahsaphea cheptan kisonpi ding hijongle kiphat lamna kaneipoi . Khattouvin tahsaphea cheptan chu akisonpi dingle ken kakheljoi .
50003005	Niget nia chep kitan , Israel chilhah , Benjamin phung Hebrew chilhah Hebrew mi , Danthu dungjuiya Pharisee kahin ,
50003006	tompan jeh a Houbung bolsea pang , them channa dia Danthu lamdol’a nolnabei kahi .
50003007	Ahinla hitobang phatchomna kanei hi aboncha Christa jal’a pannabei thil’a kagel ahitai .
50003008	Ka-Pakai Jesu Christa hetna hin akhokhelsoh hel phat’in thildang jouse hi manthahna , imacha hilouva ka-ngaito ahin , Ama jal’a thil ijakai hi kapaidoh a , Christa chu kaphatchompi theina dinga adang hi eh tobanga kagela
50003009	Ama sunggil’a keima kakimudoh a , themchanna chu Danthu vanga kanei hilouva , tahsan jal’a Pathena hungkon them channa , hiche themchanna chu Christa tahsan vanga kanei theiya ,
50003010	Ama le athokit thahatna kahet’a athohgimna chu kathoh khompia , athina banga chu kathi nom ahin ,
50003011	kajo pou le thinaa kona jong katho doh ding ahi .
50003012	Keiman kalahsa ahiloule chamkimsaa jong kahipoi ; Christa Jesun keima eimat khah banga ken jong mat khah tei ding kagot joh ahibouve .
50003013	Sopite , keiman mankha taa keiya hisah mongin kagelpoi , kagel khat vang hi achesa thil jouse chu kasumil jin , masang lama thil ho kadeljoi ;
50003014	Jesu Christa jal’a chunga Pathen kouna dungjuiya hatman sanna dia abidoi mun chu hadel’a del kahi .
50003015	Hijeh chun eiho apilhingsa sen hitobang hin lung gel’u hitin , ijemtia khattouvin thilchom agel jongle hijong chu Pathenin nahenguva phongdoh nante .
50003016	Hijongle eihon iphah sau chan geihin chon’u hite .
50003017	Sopite , nabonchauvin keima umchan jom’uvin . Navetkah diuva chon keiho umchan jop ho vechen’uvin .
50003018	Ijeh-inem itile mitampi achon nau hi najah-uva tamtah vei kaseisa ahitan , tua jong kap puma kasei ahi , amaho hi Christa Thingpel douva ahiuve .
50003019	Hijeh chun akikhon nau chu manthahna ahin , a-pathenu chu agilpiu ahi ; akithang at nau chu jumna ahin , leiset thil ho jeng bou agel’uve .
50003020	Eiho vang igammi hinau chu van chunga hung kipan ahin , hichea kona chu Huhhingpa Pakai Jesu Christa hung ding kinemtah a i-ngau ahi ;
50003021	Aman athilbol thei thahatna chu thil ijakai hi anoiya akoisoh a , eiho tahsa manmo hi Ama tahsa loupi tah lim’a akhel doh ding ahi .
50004001	Hichejeh chun kasopi ngaitah le deitah te , kakipana le kalal lukhuh ho , hibang tah hin ngaitahte Pakai hinkhon dingdet jinguvin .
50004002	Euodia le Syntyche chu Pakai jal’a kihoutoh dinga deichom tah a ka-ngeh ahi lhon’e .
50004003	Ahi , kanamkoljon put khompi ginchat umtah nang jong ka-ngeh nahi , hiche numei ho hi kithopin , ajeh chu amaho ahiuvin , ment ahin , adang dang katoh khompi chengsen Kipana Thupha thudol’a hatah a eitoh khompiu ahin , hinna lekhabu sunga hicheng min hi aumtai .
50004004	Pakai chunga kipah jingun , tikit leuvinge kipah-un .
50004005	Nachon nem’u chu mihem jouse het hihen . Pakai ahung naiye .
50004006	Imacha lungkhamna nei hih hel’un , ahin ima lam jousea taona le thumna mangin thangvah to thon nathum jouseu Pathen hetsah-uvin .
50004007	Chuteng hetna jouse kho-khelsoh Pathena hungkon cham nan Christa Jesu to nahinkhom nauva nalung thim’u le nalunggel jouseu ahonbit ding ahi .
50004008	Sopite , tukalsen vang ipi hile thutah dia kilompen , ja-thei doltah , adih dia ginchat pen , thengpen dia kilom , santhei doltah , thucheng ngei pen , ipi hile phatna dia lom auma pachat na thei aumle , hiti ho hi gel them’uvin .
50004009	Chule keiya kona nakihil’uva nalahsau , najahsau chule namusau chengse chu nang hon jong bol’uvin , chuteng cham konna Pathenin naumpi jing diu ahi .
50004010	Hitih nunga kaphatna ding nahin thah bol kit leuvu hi Pakai chunga hapan kakipah lheh jenge ; nagot jingsau vang ahinan , phat kitup kom namu loujeh-u ahi .
50004011	Kalhahsam man a kasei ahipoi , ajeh chu keima hi kahi bang bep’a lung lhaiya umje kihil themsa kahintai .
50004012	Vaicha tah a umje kahen , neng jeng junga umje jong ka hei ; ima jouse le ijakaiya oivaset a umje le gilkel tah a umje , ning lhingset le vaicha tah a umje thuguh kihil them kahitai .
50004013	Eihatsahpa Christa vanga ijakai bol thei kahi .
50004014	Ahinla kagenthei pet tah a neikithopiu hi nabolpha lheh-ui .
50004015	Kipana Thupha kipat til , Macedonia kadalhah chun nang ho tilou Houbung koimacha peh le lah thudol’a eikithopi aum louje Philippi mi nang hon nahet’u ahi .
50004016	AjehchuThessalonica khoa ka-umpet jeng jong chun ka-ngaichat hunnan avel vel’in neihin thot’uve .
50004017	Thilpeh chu kadei man ahipoi , nangho dinga aga apun ding joh chu kadei joh ahibouve .
50004018	Ijakai neipeh nau lekha hiche hi ahin , kaning lhingin , nang hoa kona santhei doltah , kikilhaina tobang thilpeh gimnamtui , Pathen lungdei lamtah kamun , kanei bulhingsettai .
50004019	Nang ho jong ka-Pathenin ahao dungjuiyin loupinan Jesu Christa hinkhon na-ngaichat chan’u subulhit nante .
50004020	I-Pau Pathen chu tonsot , tonsot geiyin loupi jing jeng hen : Amen .
50004021	Christa Jesu hinkhoa hing mitheng josue salam’uvin , Kaumpi sopiten nasalam’uve .
50004022	Mitheng jouse ahideh chun Caesar insung miten nasalam’ui .
50004023	Pakai Jesu Christa lungsetnan nalhagaovu umpi jing hen .
51001001	Pathen lungdeiya Jesu Christa solchah a pang Paul le sopi Timothyn
51001002	Colossae khoa um Christa sunggil’a mithengte le tahsan um ho , i-Pau Pathena konin lungset le chamna na chunguva um jing hen .
51001003	Keiho phat jousen nang ho din kataovun , i-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa Pa Pathen kathangvah jingui .
51001004	Ajeh chu Jesu Christa hinkhoa natahsanu le mitheng jouse na-ngailut’u ka jauvin ,
51001005	nang ho dinga kinepna chu van’a kholsa ahitai , hichu Kipana Thupha thutah thudol’a chun najatauvin ,
51001006	hiche nahenguva ahung lhun a pat nalah-uva aumdol bangin vannoi pumpia aga pung lheh jengin , najah niuva pat Pathen lungsetna chu thutah-in amachal jingin ahi .
51001007	Hitia hi nang hon kangailut tah-u le sohna katoh khompiu Ephras a kona nahetdoh-u ahin , ama hi Christa dinga keiho cheng thalhenga tahsan umtah le lhachaa pang ahin ,
51001008	ama hin lhagao vin napeh-u ngailutna naneiyu chu eiseipeh-u ahi .
51001009	Hijeh a chu hiche kajah niuva pat chihna tincheng le Lhagao jal’a Ama lungdei lam hetna le datkhen dol nadimsetna diuvin nang ho din taopeh le thumpeh na tang louhel kahiuve ;
51001010	hichu imalam jousea Pakai lung lhaina to kitoh a nachon theiyuva , thilphalam natohana jouse a naga theiyuva , Pathen hetna lama jong nakhan touvuva ,
51001011	aman athahatna loupi tah a kona thil ijakai thoh hat tah a na thoh theina diuva kidang tah a nahatsah-uva kipah tah a
51001012	nang ho chengse khovah laiya leng amithengte to lengkhom dinga lomtah a gongtoh Pa chu nathangvah theina diu ahi .
51001013	Aman muthim khojin tha neinaa kona eihuhdoh-uva , a-Chapa deitah lenggam sunga eipuilut’u ahitai .
51001014	Achapa jal’a chu lhatdohna le chonset ngaidamna ineiyu ahi .
51001015	Chapa chu mu theilou Pathen limpu ahin , thilsem jouse sanga masajo ahi ;
51001016	ijeh-inem itile ama jal’a thil ijakai , van a hihen leiset chunga hijongle , muthei le mumo ho , laltouna ho le loinehna gam ho gei , vaihom thu neina ahin , thil ijakai hi Ama jalle Ama dinga kisem ahi ;
51001017	chule Ama chu thil jouse masanga anaum jing ahin , thil ijakai hi Amato akijopmat teng ding det ahiuve .
51001018	Ama chu atahsa Houbung luchang , abul ahin , ima lam jousea amasat jingna din athiho lah a jong athoudoh masapen’e .
51001019	Ijehinem itile Chapa sunga hi Patheinin chamkimkeiya chenpha adei ahi ;
51001020	ajeh chu Ama jal’a thil ijakai aboncha ahenga suhchamsoh a , Ama vangle a-Thingpel thisan jal’a leiset chunga um jouse le vanlaijol’a um jouse kah a chamna asem ahitai .
51001021	Masang laiya thilse nabol’uva lunggel’a nadou laiyun Pathena kona pamse nahiuvin ,
51001022	tua vang Ama angsunga nolna beihel le boh beh lou , athenga dinsah dinga tahsaphe pua athina tahsa jal’a chu nakicham piu ahitan ;
51001023	tahsan’a nadindet jinguva , dettah le longlouva , najahsau Kipana Thupha kinepnaa chu long louhel’a napandet jing dingu ahi . Hiche Kipana Thupha chu vannoi thilsem jouse henga kiseiphongsoh ahitan , keima Paul jong hiche lhachaa chu pang ka hi .
51001024	Tun nang ho dinga hesoh genthei kathoh jouse hi kakipapi . Ajeh chu katahsaphea thohna hin atahsaa kisim Houbung thalhenga Christa gimgentheina bangkhai jouse asuh bulhit ahi .
51001025	Hiche dinga chu Pathen gouching kahiya , na henguva Pathen thu lhingkeiya seiphong dinga eiki-ngense dungjuiya keima lhachaa pang kahi ;
51001026	hiche thuguh hi tonsot tonsot , akhang khanga ki-im ahin , tua vang amithengte henga kiphongdoh ahi tai .
51001027	Pathenin hiche thuguh thalhinje le loupije itobang lom ahi chu namtin henga hilchet ding adeitan , hiche kinepna loupipen nasunguva Christa achen hi ahi .
51001028	Amabou hi kaphonjal’uva mitin kathumop’uva , chihna top’a mijouse kahilchah-u ahi ; ajeh chu amitakip hi Christa dinga pilhingsaa kadinsah nom’u ahi .
51001029	Hiche nadinga hi Aman kasunga eikhumpeh thahat tah a natong jing ahatna chu mangchaa kiseh tah a tonggim ka hi .
51002001	Nang ho ding le Laodicea khoa um ho ding chule tahsaphea kamai mukha lou hel ho ding geiya itobang tah a kihabol kahije hi nahetdiu kadeiye .
51002002	Hichu alung thimu akilhep bi theiya , ngailtunaa akikankhom’uva , hetkhenna lhingset , neng jeng junga aneiyuva , Pathen selguh Christa chu ahetdohna diu ahi .
51002003	Ama sunga chun chihna le hetna gou jouse akisel’e .
51002004	Hiche hi koiman seithem’a nanel lhah louna diuva kasei ahi .
51002005	Tahsa hin nalahuva lha hih jong leng lhagaovin nang ho to kalhahkhomin , kigah chah tah a napan det jeu le Christa natahsanjeu kipah-in kaseijinge .
51002006	Jesu Christa chu Pakai dinga nakisan’u ahitah jeh-in , Amato hingkhom’un ;
51002007	Ama sunga jung khouvin , kisadoh-un , nakihil banguvin tahsan nan kiphutdet’un , thangvah nan bulhingset’uvin .
51002008	Koiman chihgut lekha themna le mihemte pehson doha lhep lhahna thei moh thu homkeiuva gal-hing banga nakai mang louna diuvin ching theiyun , hichu vannoi leiset chondan dungjui bou ahin , Christa-a tobang ahipoi .
51002009	Ajeh chu Christa sung , atahsa sunga chu Pathen , a-Pathen hina chamkimsoh a pansa ahin ,
51002010	vaipoh thu neina jouse luchang Christa to na hinkhom tengu le nang ho jong chamkimji nahiuve ;
51002011	Ama sunga chu nang ho khut’a kitan hilou , cheptan nahiuvin , tahsaphe pu tahsa chu ponse selhah banga napaiyuva , Christa dinga chep kitan nahiutauve .
51002012	Ijeh-inem itile baptize nachan’uva chu amato kivuitha nahitauvin , Pathenin Ama chu thinaa athodoh kit , hiche thokitna chu tahsan jal’a amato thoukhom kit nahiutauve .
51002013	Nang ho chonset’a thisa , natahsapheu jong cheptan lou nahiuvin , Pathenin Christa to nachohing khom’uva ichonsetna jouseu angaidamsoh ahitai .
51002014	Eidou dal’uva pang khut’a kisun kihilna lhongpi Danthu chu Christan anoi manga , hichu asumangsoh-in Thingpel’a akhetbeh tai .
51002015	Christan vaipoh thu neina jouse ahoh lhasoh-in , atahsa chun abonchan ajousoh-in , kichentah-in aphongjal’e .
51002016	Chuti ahijeh-in koiman anneh thu , donthei thu , kut thudol , lhathah nit dol ham le Choldo Nikho thudol hamin nachung thuu khol da hen :
51002017	hichengse chu ahung lhung ding thil ho lim’a um ahin atahsa tahbeh chu Christaa umjo ahibouve .
51002018	Themgao thilmu bang mukisaa , ale lama kichonnemsah , Vantilte ho pou chibai boh nom mi koimacha nasan diu kipaman chu lahmangsah hih hel’un , hitobang miho hi mihem lunggel lam jeng agel jeh-uvin huilhoh mang theibep ahiuve .
51002019	Amaho chu atahsa pumpi Pathen thilgon banga akhantouna dinga tuhgom’a kilmatsoh guchin thagui chengse kigopsohna aluchang chutoh kimat lou ahitauve .
51002020	Vannoi leiset bulpi lhagao hoa kona ontholna dia Christa to thikhom nahitah-u le ibol’a leiset kihilna lhongpia pansat’a hing ding goa nahiuvem ?
51002021	“ Tham hih , tep hih , tongkha hih , ” kiti ho chu .
51002022	Hicheng hin akimanchah teng mangthahji thilho aseidoh ahin , aboncha hi mihem thupeh le thuhil jeng ahibouve .
51002023	Hiche ho hin ki engbol’a hougutna le kichon nemsah chule tahsa tibah engtim’a kitimna jal’in chihna gong apun , ahinla tibah ho kitiman dinga imacha phachom louhel ahibouvui .
51003001	Nang ho Christa to kaithou tha nahitah-u le chunglam Pathen jet lama Christa kitousahna mun’a thil ho jeng bou hol’un .
51003002	Leiset chunga thil ho hilouvin chung lam thil ho jeng gel’uvin .
51003003	Ijeh-inem itile nang ho athisa nahitauvin nahinnau chu Pathen sunggil’a Christa to kiseltha ahitai .
51003004	Nahin nau Christa ahung kilah teng , nang ho jong Amato loupi tah a nakilah khom diu ahi .
51003005	Hijeh chun leiset chunga natibah chengseuva natong jonthanhoi , thenlou , huh , lungtup gilou , milim hou tobang papset hicheng hi that gam’uvin .
51003006	Hicheng jeh hin thua nung lou chate chunga Pathen lunghan achujin ahi .
51003007	Masanga nang ho jong hichenga hi ana chon’a ana hing nahiuve .
51003008	Tun vang lungsat , lunghan , mitthip , taitom , nakamsunguva kona thujahmo sei jouse hi aboncha napai mangsoh diu ahij .
51003009	Khat le khat thujouvin kihou hih-un ; ijeh inem itile mihem lui chu achonna jouse pum’a ponse lelhah banga nale lhahsau ahitai .
51003010	Ama limtobanga Sempa chu kichentah a na hetna diuva tang louhel’a semthah jing jeng limthah chu nakivon joh-u ahi .
51003011	Hichea hin Greek hihen Juda hile , cheptan le cheptan lou , koito kisamkai khah lou le khosuh khotou helou , soh , chamlhat aum thei poi Christa chu imajouse hisoh a , ijakaiya umsoh ahitai .
51003012	Hijeh chun Pathen lhentum mitheng , angailute nahijeh-un lainatna , khotona , kineosah nunmen , thohhat hicheng chu kivonjou’vin .
51003013	Khat le khat kidemdaito cheh-un , khat’in khat chunga kiphinna anei jongle kingaidamto jengun ; Christan nang ho na-ngaidam bangun nang ho ki-ngaidam’uvin .
51003014	Hicheng jouse chunga hin kikankhomna chamkimpen ngailutna neiyun .
51003015	Christaa hungkon cham nan nalung sunguva vai homhen , hiche dinga chu tipumkhat’a kikou nahiuve . Chule thangvah jinguvin ,
51003016	Christa thu nasunguva dimset’in cheng jing hen , chihna tin chengin kihilto kithumop to’uvin , tum ging to thon , houlan , thangvah to thon Lhagao lan nalung sunguva Pathen din sauvin .
51003017	Chule ijakai nabol jouse thu lam ahin natoh lam ahin abonchan Pakai Jesu minin bol’uvin , Ama jal’in Pa Pathen thangvah jingun .
51003018	Numeiho Pakai dia lomtah-in pasalte thun nunguvin .
51003019	Pasal hon numeite chu ngailuvin , nunbol dauvin .
51003020	Chate , imalam jousea nu le pa te thun nunguvin , ajeh chu hiche hi Pakai lung lhaina ahi .
51003021	Pate , nachateu alungbei lo louna diuvin sulung hang hih-un .
51003022	Sohte , mihem mitvet maiya hilouvin , Pakai gin nan lung jangkeiyin imalam jousea tahsa lamdo’a pakaite thun nunguvin .
51003023	Ipi hile nabolchan’u chu mihemte dia hilouvin Pakai dinga bol bangin lung thim pumpin bol’uvin .
51003024	Ijeh-inem itile Pakai koma kona goulo ding kipaman nasan diu naheuve . Sohna natoh nau chu Pakai Christa ahi .
51003025	Ajeh chu thildih lou bol’an a thildih lou bol man asan ding ahin , hichea hin maipha vetna aumpoi .
51004001	Pakaite , yan’a Pakai khat naneiyu heuvin lang sohte chu dih kei le jangkeiyin bol’uvin .
51004002	Tao nan phangdet jingun , hichea chun kiging jinguvin thangvah to thou’uvin .
51004003	Pathenin keiho dinga thu seiphongna ding kot ahondoh a , songkul’a eikihenlo na Christa thuguh seiphong theina dingin keiho din jong neitaokop jinguvin .
51004004	Chutile kasei ding dol chu kichentah a kasei thei ding ahi .
51004005	Polam miho koma chihna mangchan chon’un , phat chu kitup keiyin mang chauvin .
51004006	Nathuseiyu chu phat jousen onemheo le kitoh chet , thanop um jing hen , chule thu nadong jouseu kitoh chet’a donbut din kigosadem hiuvin .
51004007	Pakai dinga tahsan um lhacha le soh , sopi deitah Tychicus hin kachung chang thu nahetnom chan naseipeh nauvinte .
51004008	Ama hin kaumchan thuu nahetsah-uva nalung thimu atilkou ding deinaa nahenguva ama kahinsol ahi .
51004009	Amato lhonin tahsan umle dei umtah sopi Onesimus , naloipau hin hikoma thilsoh nahetnom chan nahil nauvinte .
51004010	Kasoh chanpi Aristarchus-in nasalam’ui , Barnabas inkopa Markin jong , ama thudol hi thupeh namusau ahitan , nahenguva ahung jeng khat le ana lamtouvin .
51004011	Justus Jesun jong nasalam’uve ; chepten holah akona Pathen lenggam thudol’a kanatoh khompi hicheng hi bou ahiuvin , amaho hi kalungmonpi lheh jengin ahi .
51004012	Nang ho lah a mi khat Epaphras Jesus Christa soh , ama jong chun nasalam’ui ; ama hi Pathen lungdei pumpia bulhingset’a nanun theina diuva nang ho dinga gunchu tah a tao jinga , nadindetna diuva thum jing ahi .
51004013	Ijeh-inem itile amahin nang ho ding le Laodicea a um ho chule Hierapolis a um ho dinga hatah a athohgima na atoh hi keima mongin kahettohsah ahiye .
51004014	Ngailuttah louthem Luke le Demas-in jong nasalam’ui .
51004015	Laodicea um sopite Nympha chule a insunga kikhom Houbung chu salam’uvin .
51004016	Hiche lekha hi nahenguva akisimjou teng Laodicea Houbung henga jong akisimdohna din ngaitouvin , chutobangman Laodicea kona lekha thot jong nang hon nasim’uvin .
51004017	Chule Archipus jah a , “ Pakai vanga nangman lhacha panmun namu chu namolso theina dingin chingtheiyin , ” tin hil’uvin .
51004018	Hiche salam thu hi keima Paul khut’a hungkon mong ahi . Kabulput hi geldoh jinguvin . Lungset nan umpi jingun .
52001001	Paul le Silvanus chule Timothyn Pa Pathen le Jesu Christa to hingkhom Thessalonica khoa Houbung mite chunga lungset le chamna hung lhung hen .
52001002	Keihon phat jousen nang ho din Pathen kathangvah jingun , katao nauva tang louhel’in nang ho kamin phah jinguve .
52001003	Itobang tah a natahsan’u natoh a napoh doh theiyuva , ngailut jal’a iti natoh hat’uva , chule i-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa jal’a nakinep nauvin itobanga nathoh hatsah-u chu i-Pau Pathen angsunga kageldoh jinguve .
52001004	Pathen ngailut sopi deitah le alhentum nahiu kaheuve .
52001005	Ijeh-inem itile nahenguva Kipana Thupha kahung lhut’a chu thuhomkeova ahipon , thahat le Lhagao Theng vanga ahin , kaseiyu chu chamkimsoh ahi ; nang hojal’a hiche hin keiho itobang kahiu ahetsah chu nang hon naheuve .
52001006	Ajeh chu thu kisei chun gim genthei tamtah nahin pohlut peh vangun Lhagao Theng jal’in kipah tah-in nasangun , keiho le Pakai umchan banga umtei ding nago ham’uve .
52001007	Hijeh chun Macedonia le Achaia gam’a tahsan mite vetkah ding doltah-in naumdoh tauvin ahi .
52001008	Ijeh-inem itile nang hoa konin Macedonia le Achia gamsunga Pakai thu akiphonjal keovin akingapon , Pathen lam’a natahsan detjeu chu gamtin’a akithangsoh tan , hijeh chun keiho sei sei angaipoi .
52001009	Nang ho kahung vil’uva , nang hon neisan jeu , doilim semthu nahou nauva kona itobang Pathen lama nakiheiyuva , Pathen hing jing dihtah hou dia hungkihei nahiu mi tamtah-in jong aseiyuve .
52001010	Chule ahung lhung tei ding lunghannaa kona eihuhdoh-uva Jesu thinaa kona kaithouva umpa , Achapa van’a kona hung dingpa na-nga jeu chu aseiyu ahi .
52002001	Sopite , nangho kahung vil’u chu mohjenseh ahilou nahenauve .
52002002	Nahetsau bang chun Philipi khoa hesoh genthei tah le jachat umleuva eikibol vangun ka-Pathen’uva kitilkhouna neiyin , Pathen a hungkon Kipana Thupha chu adouvah atam lheh jeng vangin nahenguva seidin kapangui .
52002003	Ijeh-inem itile ka-ngeh nau hi pannabei ahipon , athenglou jong ahipon , lheplhah na jong ahipoi .
