52002004	Chuti malah Pathenin Kipana Thupha thua nganse lom eisah-uva eiphasah jeh-uva kaseiyu ahin , mihem lung lhaisah ding golouva , kalungthimu patep tohsa Pathen joh kalung lhaigot’u ahibouve .
52002005	Imatih chan’a pachat lhem thu mang lou kahiuvin , nahetsa bangun papset khu nan jong ima kamangji pouve . Pathen ahetoh a pang ahi .
52002006	Nang hoa hihen midanga kon hijongle mihema kona pachat kahol pouve .
52002007	Christa solchah kahi jeh-un pohgih hahsa pohsah jeng theiyu jong leng ; ahinla minu them tah-in achate akhoukhah them bangin nang ho din nun nem tah kahiuve .
52002008	Ka-ngailut nau agil behseh jeh-in Pathen Kipana Thupha kachanpi nom keova ahitanpon , kahinkho geiyuva kahop nomi ahitai ; ajeh chu nang ho ka ngai lu lheh jenguve .
52002009	Hijeh chun sopite , itobang tah a nang ho koima cha dinga pohgih kahilouna diuva chol le nang , a sun le jan’a na katoh-uva , nang ho Pathen Kipana Thupha seipeh ding kagot’u chu geldoh jingun .
52002010	Atahsan mi nang ho henga kachon nau athenje adihje chule nolnabei ahije ahetoh-a nang ho le Pathen nahiuve .
52002011	Pan achate abolna banga nang ho khat cheh kabol’u chu nang hon naheuve .
52002012	Katilkhouvun , kalhamon’un , aloupina le alenggam chan khompi dinga nakoupau Pathen lungdei dol’a nahin theina diuvin khat cheh-in kahettosah-uve .
52002013	Chujongle atahbeh monga Pathen thu ahijeh chun kathuseiyu chu mihem thu banga gel louva Pathen thua najah jeh-uvin Pathen kathangvah jing jengui ; hiche thu chun atahsan nang ho lah a na atong jinge .
52002014	Ijeh-inem itile sopite , Jesu Christa to hingkhom Judea gama Pathen Houbung mite umchan jom nahitauve , ajeh chu ama hon Juda mite khut’a athoh banguva nanghon jong nagam miteuva kona nathoh gim’u ahitai .
52002015	Judamiten Pakai Jesu le Themgao ho athat’un , keiho einodoh jengun , achunguva Pathen alung lhai nai saipon , chu le mitin doumah chang ahiuve .
52002016	Chidang namdangte huhhinga aum theina diuvva thu kaseipeh diu geiyin eisutang go’uve ; hichu achonset nau pilhin molsona ahitai . Hijeh chun akhon nan Pathen lung hanna achunguva achutan ahi .
52002017	Sopite , chomkhat ikikhen kangu hi , lungthim mit’a milmo nahivangun , ka-ngai lut’un namaiyu mukal ka-ngah lel lheh-uve .
52002018	Hijeh chun nahenguva hung din kakigouvin , ahideh chun keima Paul’in jong hung ding kagot loi ahitan , Satanin eisumo jiuve .
52002019	I-Pakaiyu Jesu ahung kit teng le a-angsunga keiho kinepna , kipana , kichoi-atna lallukhuh ding nang ho nahilouvuham ?
52002020	Ijeh-inem itile nang ho hi keiho loupina le kipana nahiuve .
52003001	Hichejeh chun kathoh jou loutah phat’un Athen khoa kachunga eidalhah diu pha kasauvin ,
52003002	Christa Kipana Thupha jal’a Pathen kinbolnaa tohkhompi isopiu Timothy chu nang ho dinkhompi ding le natahsan thudol’uva natil khou diuvin kahinsol’uve ,
52003003	chutile hiche thoh gim gentheinaa hin koiman nasuh lung ling lao lou diu ahi . Hiche hesoh genthei hi ithoh tei diu ahi nahenauve .
52003004	Ijeh-inem itile nakom’uva ka-um laiyuva hiche hesoh genthei kathoh diu hi kaseipeh masah dem nahitauvin , hitia chu hung lhung ahi naheuve .
52003005	Hijeh a chu lhepna chun lhem lha taleu chun katohna jouseu moh ahikhah ding hi kathoh jou lou phat’a natahsan’u hechen dinga nahenguva Timothy kahinsol jeng ahi .
52003006	Tun vang nakom’uva kona kahenguva Timothy ahung lhungin , natahsan’u le na-ngailut nau kipana thupha , phatjousea phatah-a neigeldoh jinguva keihon kamu nombang uva neimu nom’u thu ahin lhuttai .
52003007	Hichejeh chun sopite , hesoh genthei nan eichup jeng vangun natasan’u chun kakitilkhou lheh jengui .
52003008	Ajeh chu nang ho Pakai dia nadindet jeh-un tun keiho din jong hinlo aumtai .
52003009	Nang ho jeh le nachung chang thu’va i-Pathennu angsung kipana le thanopna hijatpi kaneiyu hitoh kitoh chet’in Pathen chu iti kathangvah tadiuvem ?
52003010	Namaiyu kamu’uva natahsan’u lhahsam kabulhit theina diuvin sunle janin giltah-in katao jing jenguve .
52003011	I-Pau Pathen le i-Pakaiyu Jesun nahenguva kalampiu hinlhungjang hen .
52003012	Nang ho khat le khat ki-ngailutna le mitin na-ngailut nau chu Pakaiyin khantousah jing hen , nang ho ka-ngailut nau to bahsah hen .
52003013	Hiti chun nalungthimu phudet hen lang , i-Pakaiyu Jesu amithengte jouse to lhon’a ahung kit tengle i-Pau Pathen angsunga nolnabeiyin nakoiyuhen .
52004001	Sopite , tukalse vang Pathen lungdeilama iti chon ding dol keihoa kona nalahsau banga nachon theijuva , hitia chu nabol be chehna diuva Pakai Jesu jal’a kathumu’va ka-ngeh nahiuve .
52004002	Ijeh-inem itile Pakai Jesu vanga itobang thupeh kapeh-u nang hon nahenauve .
52004003	Pathenin nanghoa kona adei chu then ahin , hijeh a chu jonthanhoiya kona nakitim diu ahi .
52004004	Nang ho amitakip chun atibah cheh chu itobanga kitim thema , theng le jabol’a umsah ding nahet diu dol ahi .
52004005	Pathen helou chidang namdangte banga huh napat lou diu ahi .
52004006	hiche thudol’a hin koimachan asopi dohan bolda hen , masanga kaseipeh-uva chule kahttosahsau bang chun hitobanga chonho chunga hi Pakaiyin phu alah tei ding ahi .
52004007	Ijeh-inem itile Pathenin athenglou dia eikouvu ahipon , atheng dia eikoujoh-u ahibouve .
52004008	Hijeh a chu hiche jop lou chun mihem ajop lou ahipon , a-Lhagao Theng napepau Pathenjoh ajop lou ahibouve .
52004009	Kisopi , ngailut thudol’a hin nahenguva hinsut khoh angaipoi , ajeh chu khat le khat ki-ngailutje Pathena kona kihilsate nahitauve .
52004010	Chujongle Macedonia gam pumpia sopite abonchauva hitia chu nabolsau jong ahitai . Nahabol be chehna diuva ka-ngeh-u ahi , sopite .
52004011	Kangkhen cha umje kihil’un , nakin cheh kibol’in , kahilsau bangin nakhut cheh-in na ki tohgim’uvin .
52004012	Chuti bol leu chun polam mite sei phat nachan’uva , lhahsamna nanei lou diu ahi .
52004013	Sopite , kinepna bei miho banga naum louna diuvin a-ihmumilte thudol helouva naum diu kanompouve .
52004014	Ijeh-inem itile Jesu athia athodoh kit itahsan jeh-un , Jesu tahsan’a ihmumilte chu Pathen in Amato ahinpui kit ding jong itahsan’ui .
52004015	Hiche hi Pakai thusah akona kaseipeh nahiuve , ipijeh-inem itile Pakai hungkit ni geiya eiho ahinga kidalha chengse hi itinama jong le a-ihmumilte sanga masajo lou ding ihiuve .
52004016	Ijeh-inem itile Pakai ama tah ogin to , Vantil pipu ogin to chule Pathen sumkon gin to kithoa van’a kona hung kumlha ding , chu tengle Christa jal’a thisa chengse thoudoh masa diu ahi .
52004017	Chujoutah le eiho ahing nalai amoh chengse hi amaho chutoh vanlaijol’a Pakai lamto dinga meilom’a ikitoltou dingu ahi ; hitia chu imatih chan’a Pakai to iumkhom jing diu ahitai .
52004018	Hiti ahijeh chun hiti thu ho hin nang ho khat le khat kitilkhou jingun ,
52005001	Sopite , aphat le achang thudol hi nahenguva hinsut angaipoi ,
52005002	ajeh chu janlaiya gucha ahung banga Pakai nikho chu ahung lhun ding nang hon kichentah a nahetsau ahi .
52005003	Mihon , ‘ Chamle lungmon aum’e , ” atilai tah-u le numei naoso nat banga photlot louva manthahna chu achunguva hung chuphung jeng ding , koimacha hoidoh louhel diu ahi .
52005004	Sopite , nang ho vang muthima um nahitapouvin hiche nikho chun gucha banga nahinlap den lou diu ahi .
52005005	Ajeh chu nang ho nabonchauva khovah le sunlai chate nahiuve . Eiho hi janlai muthim lah a um ihipouve ;
52005006	hijeh chun midang ho banga ihmu louvin , lung limgeh chan kihong jingu hite .
52005007	Ijeh-inem itile a-ihmua jong janin bou a-ihmun jukham ho jong janin bou akham’ui ,
52005008	eiho vang sunlaiya limgeh ihiuvin , tahsan le ngailut ompho bangin kivon’u hitin , huhhing dia kinepna chu thih lukhuh bangin kikhuh-u hite .
52005009	Ajeh chu eiho hi Pathenin lungsat khum dinga ei lhenu ahipon , i-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa jal’a huhhing chang ding joh a eikouvu ahibouve .
52005010	Eiho hah jingu hen ihmu jongleu hen Amato ihinkhom jingna diuva Ama eiho khel’a thia ahitai .
52005011	Nang hon nabol ngai banguvin khat le khat hiti hin kitilkhou to’uvin kihuto’uvin .
52005012	Sopite , ka-ngeh nahiuve , Pakai jal’a nalh-uva mi phabep kikoiya , nalamkai diu le nahilchah diuva natong ho chu ja lomtah-in ja’uvin .
52005013	Anatoh nau jal chun ngailut nan hajan jabol’uvin . Nasunguva kichamdel’un .
52005014	Sopite , thase ho phohsal’un , lung lhachom tilkhouvun , alhasam kithopiuvin , mi jouse dia thoh hat dinga ka-ngeh-u ahi .
52005015	Chingtheiyun , koiman setna chu setna thuh louvin , chusangin phat jousen khat le khat din jong chule mi jouse din jong thilpha bol ding go jinguvin .
52005016	Ki pah jingun ,
52005017	tang louvin taovin ,
52005018	imalam jousea thangvah jingun ; ijeh-inem itile hiche hi Jesu Christa jal’a nang ho dia Pathen lungdei lam ahi .
52005019	Lhagao chu pheltan dauvin ,
52005020	gao thusei jong nahsah modauvin ;
52005021	amavang ima jouse patep soh keiyun apha chu kolchah jingun ;
52005022	thilse tapou peldoh soh keiyuvin .
52005023	Chamna bulpi Pathenin nang ho nasuthengsoh keiyu hen ; i-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa hungkit teng nolnabei nahina diuvin nalhagao , nahinkhou , natahsau bitkeiyin koi hen .
52005024	Nakoupau tahsan umtah ahin , nabolpeh tei diu ahi .
52005025	Sopite , keiho din jong neitaopeh-uvin .
52005026	Kibengchop thengin sopite jouse salam’un .
52005027	Hiche lekha hi sopite jouse henga nasimna diuva Pakai thahat’a kathugah nahiuve .
52005028	I-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa milungset nan umpiuvin .
53001001	Paul le Silvanus chule Timothyn i-pau Pathen le Pakai Jesu Christa jal’in Thessalonica khoa Houbung henga :
53001002	Pa Pathen le Pakai Jesu Christa konin chamna le lungsetna nachunguva um hen .
53001003	Sopite , natahsanu seithei louhel’a akhantou jeh le nabonchauva khat le khat ki-ngailutna apunjal jeh-in keihon tang louhel’a nang ho dia Pathen thangvah vah jeng ding hi akitoh lheh-e .
53001004	Nang hon thohgim le bolsetna hichengpi douva hi natahsan jom jeh-un Pathen Hou bung dang ho henga nang ho kaki thang-at pi lheh jengui .
53001005	Hicheng nathoh jeh-uva hi nathoh lo na pen’u Pathen lenggam dinga lah thei lom nahi diu , hichun Pathen thutan dihje photchetna aphondoh ding ahi .
53001006	Pathen dihtah chun nabol gen theiteu chu kitoh chet’a thohgimna apeh ding ahi ;
53001007	hiche hi van’a kona Pakai Jesu A-Vantil thanei tah te to ahung kiphondoh teng Pathenin nang ho hi nathoh gimna jouseuva kona keiho puma eilhadoh diu ,
53001008	meikou deuje ju apat’a Pathen heloute le i-Pakaiyu Jesu Kipana Thupha jop lou jouse chunga phu alah ding ahi .
53001009	Amaho talen mat ding chu tonsot’a thoh ding man thahna , Pakai angsung le aloupina thanei tah akona tolmang hel ding ahiuve .
53001010	Hiche hi amithengtea kona loupina le atahsan jousea kona jabolna kisan dinga Pakai ahung nikho le chuti ding ahin , keiho hettohsah tahsan nahijeh-un atahsan lah a nang ho jong napangui .
53001011	Hichea hin i-Pathen’uvin akouna to kitoh a nasan’uva , thilpha ding nadei jouseu le tahsan vanga natoh chu athahat’a amolso soh keina din tang louhel’in nang ho kataopeh jingui .
53001012	Hitobanga chu i-Pathenu le Pakai Jesu Christa lungsetna dungjuiya nang ho jal’a i-Pakaiyu Jesu min choi-at’a auma , nang ho Amasunga naum diu deina ahi .
53002001	Sopite , i-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa hungkit ding thudol le amato ikikhop khom diu thudol’a hi kangeh-u nahiuve .
53002002	Lhang kisam khat tou hihen , Lhagaova kon hihen , thu kithanga kon hihen , keiho lekha thot’a kondol’a kisei hijongle , Pakai nikho chu hung lhungsa dol’in gel’un lang lung ngaito kisuh noh phahsah le lung linglaovin um hih hel’uvin .
53002003	Imacha lamin jong koima kilhep lhahsah dauvin ; ajeh chu Pathen doumah bolna hung lhung masa ding , mangthah dia peng dan bei agiloupa hung kiphongdoh ding ahina laiye ;
53002004	amahin dou apat’a , Pathen min pu jouse le houdia kibol thil jouse chunga kichoi sanga , hitia chu acham cham’a Pahen houin geiya jong touphaa aneiya , hung kipathensah ding ahi .
53002005	Hiti jouse hi kaumpi laiyuva kaseipehsau chu nageldoh louvu ham ?
53002006	Akitep phat tah a ahung kiphon dohna dinga tua ipin atuh kih ahi naheuve .
53002007	Ijeh-inem itile Danbei chun guh thimin na atong jinge ; alailunga kona akilah mang kaha dinga bou atuhkih a chu ahen-oh ahibouve .
53002008	Danbeipa ahung chu kiphon doh tah le Pakai Jesu ahungkitna dinga hung kilah paiya akamsunga kikhong doh huiya athaa , asuh mang ding ahi .
53002009	Danbeipa hung chu Satan thahatna to hung kilhon ding , thaneina tin cheng le melchihna ho chule jouva bolmo kidang tampi bol theina to hung kilhon diu ahi .
53002010	Huhhing a aum na diuva adih ngailutna akisan loujeh-uva manthahna lut dia umsa ho chu melse tah a alhep chatvai diu ahi .
53002011	Hijeh a chu Pathenin achunguva joulhepna alhunsah ahin , hichea kon hin amahon thujou atahsan’un ,
53002012	thutah tahsan louva thujouva nomsa chengse chu athuu kitan cheh ding ahi .
53002013	Pakai dia sah tah sopite , ima-tih chan’a nang ho dinga Pathen thangvah hi kabol diu lomtah kin ahi ; ijeh-inem itile thutah tahsan jeha Lhagao Theng jal’a Pathenin nang ho hi huhhing chang masa loi dia nalhendoh-u ahitai .
53002014	I-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa loupina nachan theina diuva Aman nang ho hi , keihon Kipana Thupha kaseipeh-uva kona nakouvu ahi .
53002015	Hijeh chun sopite , kathuseiyuva kon hihen lang lekha thot’a kisun hijongle , ka hilsau chengsea chun dingdet jingun .
53002016	I-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa Amatah le i-Pau Pathen , tonsot lungmonna le lungsettah a ngailut kinepna eipepau chun
53002017	imalam jousea natoh pha le thupha seinaa nalungthimu tilkou hen lang phutdet jing hen .
53003001	Sopite , tukalse vang nang ho lah a banga Pakai thu hi gangtah a seiphonga choi-at’a aum na din keiho dingin neitaokop jingun .
53003002	chujongle mihon atahsansoh loulai jeh-un mihem gilou le engse hoa kona kahoidoh theina diuvin jong neitaokop jinguvin .
53003003	Pakai chu tahsan umtah ahin , aman naphut det’un tin agiloupa konin nachingtup jing nauvinte .
53003004	Pakai jal’a nang ho kaginchat jeh-uva natoh ngai bang natoh jingna diuva thu kapeh na hiuve .
53003005	Nalungthimu chu Pathen ngailutna le Christa thohhatna lama Pakaiyin kaihoi hen .
53003006	Sopite , sopi koi hile akahleh akalouva chon , keiho hilchahna to kitoh a chon lou mi jouse chu nakiloikhompi louna diuva Pakai Jesu Christa min pan’a thu kapeh nahiuve .
53003007	Nakom’uva tong louva ka-umlouvu , keiho umchan itobanga najop’u nang hon na heuve .
53003008	Koima an manbeiyin kanepouvin , nang ho koimacha pohgih kahi khah louna diuvin gim genthei hahsa thoh-in sun le janin na katongu’ve .
53003009	Thuneina kaneilou jeh-u ahipoi , keiho umchan najom theina diuva nang ho vetsahna monga kabol’u ahibouve .
53003010	Ijeh-inem itile i-umkhom pet’uva koi hile natong nom lou chu anjong nehsah lou dia nang ho thu kapehsau ahitai .
53003011	Ahinla nalahuva kon khat akaleh akalouva chon , natong louva mi sinmo le bep thu kajauve .
53003012	Hitobang miho hin thip beh cha na akitoh-uva an akineh diuva Pakai Jesu Christa min pan’a thu kapeh-uva katilkhouvu ahi .
53003013	Sopite , nang ho vang thilpha bol nan chimtih neilou jen’un .
53003014	Hiche lekha thot’a keiho thu ngailou chu nang hon melchih-un lang , ajachatna din kivoppi dauvin .
53003015	Hijongle melma banga bol louvin sopi bangin hilchahjo’uvin .
53003016	Chamna bulpi Pakaiyin imalam jouse le ijakaiya chamna napeu hen . Pakaiyin nabonchauvin umpiu hen .
53003017	Hiche salam hi keima Paul khut’a hungkon , lekha thot jousea melchihna a hitia kasutji ahi .
53003018	I-Pakai Jesu Christa lungset nan nabonchauvin umpiuvin .
54001001	I-kinep nau Jesu Christa le Eihuhhinguva Pathen thusah a Jesu Christa Solchah Paul’in
54001002	tahsan jal’a cha dihtah Timothy henga : i-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa le Pa Pathen’a konin lungset le hepi chule chamna hunglhung hen .
54001003	Mi abang bangin thuhil dih lou ahil louna diuva phoh tang dia Macedonia lam kajot kon’a ka-ngeh bangin Ephesus umdenin ,
54001004	amahon semthu ho pou le akhonna bei khanggui aseiho’u chun miho lung lutsah hih-in , hiche ho hin tahsan vanga ki mu Pathen gou-thilho sangin kinel baotam na jeng bou asosah-e .
54001005	Ahinla hiche thupeh kipeh lo na lungthim theng tah le ngailut lunggel chule tahsan kicheh tah a hung kon ngailutna khantousah ding thu ahibouve .
54001006	Mi kimkhat hichenga kon hin akihei mangun avah koi leuvin mohkihoulim nan akimang gamtauve .
54001007	Akison nau jong kicheh lou , thusei jong kichen lou , hejong hekhen louvin Danthu hil’in apan nom’ui .
54001008	Danthu hi adoltah a mangpa dia thilpha ahi i-heuve .
54001009	Ijeh-inem itile hitin akimui , Danthu hi midih pa ding ahipon , Dan sukeh ho le hutuh lel ho , Pathen heloute le chonse ho , atheng lou ho le aboh ho , pa that ho le nu that ho , mihem that ho ,
54001010	mito jonpan ho , ki-ngai-jong ho , mihem gumang ho , joubol ho , jouva kihahsel ho chule ipi hijongle adang adih lama kihilna to kikal jouse bol ho ding ahibouve .
54001011	Kihilna dih chu keima eikivopsah kipa umtah Pathen loupina Kipana Thupha dungjuija kihilna chu ahi .
54001012	Keima tahsan theiya eigel’a lhacha eipansah , thahat eipea i-Pakai Jesu chunga kakipah lhehjenge .
54001013	Masang chun ataitom le abolse chule pumhat jengin kana pangin , ahinla hiti ho chu atahsan lou kahijeh a hetoh louva kabol ahijeh-in Patehnin eihepin ,
54001014	Jesu Christa jal’in i-Pakaiyu milungset chu tahsan le ngailut pumin keidin alet lha jengin ahi .
54001015	Chonsete huhhing dinga Jesu Christa vannoiya ahung hi tahsan dinga lhingset thu ahi ; choset ho lah a keima akhoh pen kahin ,
54001016	Ama hintahsan’a tonsot hinna nei ding ho vetkah a pang dia Jesu Christan thoh hatna chengse chu amasapen’a kei chunga photchetna abol nom jeh a hita chu eihepi lheh jeng ahi .
54001017	Tonsot Lengpa , thi-tih neilou , mutheilo Pathen khatseh chu jabolna le loupina tonsot tonsto’in chang jing hen : Amen .
54001018	Sepai phatah banga hichenga chu gal nasat theina ding , masanga nachung chang thua kisei masa ho dungjuiya napan theina dia hiche thupeh hi kapeh nahi chapa Timothy .
54001019	Tahsan le hetkhenna pha nei jingin , mi bangin hiche hi anahsah loujeh-un tahsan asuhmang lo tauve .
54001020	Ama ho lah a hin Hymnenaeus le Alexander jong apangin , ama ni hi Pathen ataitom lhon louna dia hilchah ding in Satan koma kapeh doh tai .
54002001	Amasapen’a ka-ngeh nahiuve , thumna le taona , midang taopehna chule thangvahna ho mijouse dinga ,
54002002	leng ho le thunei vaihomte din neiyun , chuti le Pathen ging le gun che na puma chamdel le lung mongtah a hinkho iman thei diu ahi .
54002003	Hichu eihuhinguva Pathen mitmua santhei thilpha ahi .
54002004	Pathen chun mihem josue huhhinga aum’a thutah het theiya ahung um diu hi adeiye .
54002005	Pathen khatseh ahin , Pathen le mihemte kah a palai jong khat bou ahi-Mihem Jesu Christa chu .
54002006	Ama chamtah-in mi jouse lhatdoh nan a hung kipen , hettohsahna chu aphat cha um doh ahi .
54002007	Hiche dinga hi aseiphong dingle solchah dia eikipansah ahi tah kasei ahin , jou kaseipoi , thutah le tahsan thua chiding namdangte hil’a pang kahi .
54002008	Hichejeh chun muntin’a pasal hon lung hang lou hel le kinel baotam louhel’a khut theng dom’a atao diu kadeiye .
54002009	Hitobangma chun numeiho jong nihchen ponsil dol’in gingkhen le chinghtei tah-in amaho tah kivon’u hen ; sampheh hoi le sana ham , twikohchang ham , ponsil hoi ham , thil mantam pen ham a kijem louvin
54002010	Pathen ginje phong doh thei numei umdol’in thilpha bol’in kijemjou’u hen .
54002011	Numei chu imalam jousea thua nungkhen chan thip beh chan kihiljou’u hen .
54002012	Mihil dingle pasal chuang tha nei din numei kangensepoi , chusangin umthim ngit nget jou’u hen .
54002013	Ijeh-inem itile Adam kisem masa chujouva Evi ahi .
54002014	Adam chu lhep lhah a um ahipon , numei nu joh lhep lhah a um’a , themmochangkha ahibouve .
54002015	Ahinla lung lim-geh leh kisuthenga , tahsan le ngailut neiya aum jom jing le numei chu acha neinaa jong kihinso jing ding ahi .
54003001	‘ Koi hile Houbung lakai nom chun natohpha adeichat ahi , ’ ti hi tahsan theidol thu ahi .
54003002	Ahinla Houbung lamkai ding chu nolnabei , numeikhatseh jia nei , kitimthei , lung limtah , kitup tah , jin dotthem , mihil them ,
54003003	ju nelou , mideng lou , nun nema doubol lou , sum ngailu lou ,
54003004	a-insung phatea kipoh tupthei , ja umtah a achate athua nunsah thei mi hiding ahi .
54003005	Ama insung bon poh tupje helouvan Pathen Houbung iti apoh tup thei ding ham ?
54003006	Ama chu tahsan thah hilou ding ahi , ajo le kiletsah jeh a Diabol themmo chan naa ama jong chuh lo ding ahi .
54003007	Seiset achan a Diabol thanga a-o khah lou na dinga polam mite sephat jong hi ding ahi .
54003008	Houbung lhacha ding jong migin ja um ma , kamtam lou , ju lop lou , alam louva sum veikan lou ,
54003009	lung ngaito thengsel’a tahsan thua thilguh hetna nei mi hi diu ahi .
54003010	Amaho kipatep masau hen , nolnabei ahiule lhachaa pang diu ahi .
54003011	Ajiteu jong hitobanga chu migin ja um , jouva mi hehse lou , kitimthei , ijakaiya tahsan um mi hi diu ahi .
54003012	Lhacha ho chu numei khatseh jia nei hi cheh-u hen , achateu le a-insunga kitup’a po-them cheh hiu hen .
54003013	Ijeh-inem itile phatah a lhacha kinbol mihon din mun pha akisemdoh-un , Christa Jesu sunga um tahsan thudol’a hangtah-in apang ngam’ui .
54003014	Hunga nangma mu loi ding kinem’a hiche lekha hi kasut ahi .
54003015	Ijemtia kahung gei khat le thutah bul le khompi-Pathen , hing jing Houbung , hiche Pathen insunga chu iti chon ding nahetna dia kahin-sut ahi .
54003016	Pathen hou thuguh kiphongdoh aletdol chu hiche ahi : “ Ama tahsaphen akiphongdoh-in , Lhagaovin them achangtan ; Vantilte mit mun aum doh-in , Chitin namtin lah a seiphongin aumin , Vannoija min atahsan tan , Loupin lah touvin aum tai . ”
54004001	Ni nu nung lam le mi abang bang tahsan naa dailhauva jousei lhagao ho le thilha ho thuhil’a ahung lung lut diu thu , lhagaovin kichentah-in aseiye .
54004002	Hitobang phat lhem na ho hi alunggel’u kisou tahsa mijou hoa hung kon ahi .
54004003	Ama ho hin jinei ding akham’un , atahsan hon thutah hetna jeh a thangvah puma akisan diuva Pathenin asemsa neh thei dolchu neh ding ajadauve .
54004004	Ijeh-inem itile Pathen thilsem chengse aphasoh keiye , thangvah pum’a ikisan le imacha pai ding aumpoi .
54004005	Ajeh chu Pathen thu le taonaa kisuthengsoh ahitai .
54004006	Nangin nahinjuipeh thuhil pha le naki khou khahna tahsan thu ho chu sopite pe le chun Jesu Christa lhacha phatah nahi ding ahi .
54004007	Amavang thilboh , numei tehse ho loulimna ho chu pai mangin ; natahsa tah-in hou ngaisahna lam’a kichuh themjon .
54004008	Ijeh-inem itile tahsa lama kichuna jong them khat thil phachom ahinan , Pathen houlam’a kichuhna hi tu hinkho ding hinhen , kho nung hinkho dinga hijongle aphat chom na thutep umsa ahi .
54004009	Hiche thu hi tahsan um , imalam jousea san dinga kilom tah ahi .
54004010	Hing jing Pathen , mitin huhhingpu , ahideh a atahsante huhhingpa chunga ikinep jeh-un itong gim’un ikiseh lheh jengui .
54004011	Thu hicheng hi pen lang , hil’in .
54004012	nachapan jeh chun koiman noise bol da hen , hisang chun thulam , chonchan lam , ngailutna le tahsa lam chule themna lam in atahsante vetsui theiyin umjon .
54004013	Kahung kahsen Pathen lekhabu simna lam le mi tilkhou lam , chule mihil lamin anaponthon .
54004014	Themgao hon thu aseiyuva upa hon nachunga thenso khut angap’uva nakipe Lhagao thilpeh nachan khahchu nahsah mon boldan .
54004015	Mijouse anga nakhantou akiphondoh theina din hichengse hi bol’in hiche hoa hin lung lut’in .
54004016	Nachung chang ahin , nathuhil ahin , kiging phan , hichenga chun pansan , ajeh chu hiti hinbol le chun nangma tah le nathuja ho nahuhdoh ding ahije .
54005001	Upa chu phohsal hih-in , napa tobangin tilkhou thon ; khangdong ho chu sopi bol’in ,
54005002	nupi ho nubol’in , nu-ngah ho nanaote bangin thengsel’in i-lam jousea kaihoiyin .
54005003	Meithai tahbeh ho chu meithai jabol dol’in jabol’in .
54005004	Meithai chun tu le cha anei le amaho hin amasan a-insunguva Pathen hou ngaisahna kichuh-u hen , ahinvah dohho lungset thuh kihil masau hen ; ijeh-inem itile hiche hi Pathen maiya santheidol tah ahi .
54005005	Meithai kicheh tah achanga um vang chu Pathena kinem’a sun le jan’a thumna le tao naa kipe jing jeng ahi .
54005006	Tahsa nop sahnaa kimang nu vang chu ahing laiya thisa ahi .
54005007	Amaho chu seiset achan louna diuvin thupeh hicheng hi pen .
54005008	Hichea hin koi hile amite ding ngaito lou , ahideh a a-insung mite ding ngaito lou chun tahsan ataitom ahitan , atahsan loupa sanga khohjo ahitai .
54005009	Kum somgup noiya mi hilou chu meithaiya sut thei ahi , pasal khatseh jia nei mi ,
54005010	thilpha bolnaa seiphat chang , khou khahje themsa , jindot them , mithengte keng silpehsa , genthei hesoh kithopia imalam jouse a thilpha bolna kipum peh mi hi ding ahi .
54005011	Khangdong meithai ho vang pansah dan , ijeh-inem itile jinei ding adeichat tengu le Christa deimo lamtah-in aum doh jiuvin ,
54005012	atahsan masah apailhah jeh-un themmo achanlo jiuve .
54005013	Chuche tilouvin jong thaset apan’un muntin’a akholai lengun , thaset keoseh hilouvin amuh them kamjauvun , sei ding lomlou thupou aseiyui .
54005014	Hijehchun khangdong nalai ho chun ji aneiyuva cha ahindiu , insung akiphouva melma chu thilse bolna phat adei banga apeh louhel diu kadeijoi .
54005015	Mikonkhat jong Satan nung juiyin akihei mang tavue .
54005016	Atahsan numei khattouvin meithai ho anei khah le hiche ho chu kithopi hen ; chutile meithai tahbeh ho chu Houbungin akithopi thei ding ahi .
54005017	Upa lamkai pha , thu seiphong le thuhil lama hapan’a pang ho chu tohman ajat ni chan amu diu lom tah ahi .
54005018	Ijeh-inem itile Pathen lekhabun , “ Bongchal chang chilpet amuh som hih-in , ” atin , chule “ Natong’an tohman asan lomtah ahi , ” ati .
54005019	Ahetoh mi ni le thum alhin loule upa khat kihehna chu la hih-in .
54005020	Midangin kichatnaa anei theina din achonse ho chu japi masanga solsal’in .
54005021	Pathen le Jesu Christa chule lhentum Vantilte angsunga giltah a kahil chah nahi , thupeh hicheng hi mangin lang phochen louvin thu tandan , chule lang neiyin jong ima bol hih-in .
54005022	Kintheng tong ding ahi tin koima chung a thenso-khut ngamloi hihin , midang ho chonsetnaa jong pandan , thenna din nangle nang kiging jingin .
54005023	Nagilpi nat jeh le nadammo veiset jing jeh chun twisih keo jeng don louvin lengpitwi them khat mangin .
54005024	Mihem phabeppi hi achonset nau kilang tah ahin , hichun thutan na mun alhut loi jengin , phabepse chonsetna vang , khonung teng akiphongjibouve .
54005025	Hitobang hin natoh pha jong kilang tah ahin , kilangdoh lou aum jongle kisel thei ahideh poi .
54006001	Pathen min le kihilna hi taitoma aum louna din namkoljon po nalai soh chengsen leiset’a a pakai teu chu gin le jabol lomtah a anei diu ahi .
54006002	Atahsansa pakaiya neikha hon jong sopi ahi tah man’a nahsah moa abol lou diu ahi ; chusangin hajen cheh jou’u hen , ijeh-inem itile atohgau akisan nau miho chu tahsan nei le ngailutna neimi ahitauve . Hicheng hi hil’in lang tikkhouvin .
54006003	Mi khattouvin thuhil chom dang ahil’a , i-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa thudih chengse le hou ngaisahna thuhil’a lung lut lou aum le ,
54006004	ama kichoisang bou , imacha la helou , kinel kalna ding thu hol le ding hivei aveiyin , hichea chun kithangset , kitaitom , phaloutah a , kiginmo asohjin ,
54006005	kinah nah jeng leh manthahna hi thutah hepha talou mihem ho lunggel’a hung kon ahin , Pathen hou thu jeng jong sumkol veina nei ding ago’uve .
54006006	Ahinla lung lhaisel’a Pathen houlam’a gunchu hi , phatchomna lentah ahi .
54006007	Ijeh-inem itile leiset chunga imacha i-hin polut pouvin , imacha i-pohdohthei lou diu ahi .
54006008	Hijeh a chu neh le chah nihchen ponsil ineiyu le eiho dia lhingset ahije .
54006009	Hao lunggul ho chu mihemte suhgamna le manthah naa lhah mangsah hel thei ngolna tin cheng le kisuh khahna thei lung guljouse a lhah lut theina lhepna thangkol’a a-oh jiuvin ahi .
54006010	Ajeh chu sum ngailuthi setna jouse bulpi ahin , sum mu ding ngaitona kiha bolna lam’a mi kimkhat tahsan’a konin akihei mangun , amaho le amaho thoh natna tampin akisuh khah lojiuve .
54006011	Vo Pathen mi , nangman hechengse hi jamsanin ; adih , Pathen houlam , tahsan , ngailut , thoh hat , nunem hicheng joh chu hol jingin .
54006012	Ahetoh mi tampi angsunga phondoh phatah naphondohna dinga nakikouna bangin kipaman tonsot hinna san nadin tahsa kilhai tetna lam’a hatah-in pangin .
54006013	Thil ijakai hinsah Pathen le Pontius Pilate angsunga phondoh phatah neiya , hettohsahna bol , Jesu Christa jal’a hiche thu hi kapeh nahi ,
54006014	nangman i-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa hung kilah kit kahsen thupeh hi boh beh louhel le seiset na beihel’in ching jingin .
54006015	Nun nom jing , thanei khatseh , leng jouse leng le pakai jouse Pakaiyin achamtah a phat ahin phon doh ding ahi ,
54006016	ama bou thi-tih nei lou , ngailut thei hoi hilou , khovah a cheng , ama chu koiman mu khah lou , mihemin mu jong mu thei lou ahin , ama jenga chun jabolna le thahatna tonsot geiyin um jing hen , Amen .
54006017	Tu hinkhoa vannoi leiset thil’a , hao ho chu ahoitho louna diuvin hilchah-in , kichetna bei gouva ki-ngai louva , imanchah diuva thil jouse eipe jinguva Pathen joh a ki-ngaiyu hen :
54006018	thilpha aboluva , napha tohna a atha lhin theiyuva , ahongphal’uva , mito chan kikop theiya aum’uva ,
54006019	khonung hinkho dinga bul phatah gou akikhol’uva , hinkho tahbeh chu atuh chah jingna diuvin til khouvin .
54006020	Vo Timothy , nangma na kichinsah chengse chu hongtup’in ; lam dih lou tah a hetna dol’a kisei , Pathen suhmilna le kinel baotamna chu peldoh jon .
54006021	Mi phabep’in hiche chihna chu aneidol’in aseiyun , tahsan lam’a abidoiyu asuh khel lo tauve . Lungsetnan umpiuvin .
55001001	Christa Jesu sunga hina thutep dungjuiya , Pathen lungdeiya , solchah Paul’in ,
55001002	Cha deitah Timothy henga : Pa Pathen le i-Pakaiyu Jesu Christaa konin lungsetna le hepina chule chamna nachunga um hen .
55001003	Lung ngaito thengsel’a pu le patea pat kahou Pathen chung nunga kipa thanop na kaneiyin , sun le jan’a thumna kanei chanin tang louhel’in nangma kageldoh jing jenge .
55001004	Namit lhi lon kageldoh jing jeh-in kakipa chamkim theina din nangma mu kal ka-ngah lel lheh-e .
55001005	Masanga napi Loisi le nanu Eunice sunga chenga tahsanna kicheh tah nasunga cheng chu kageldoh-in , hichu nasunga achen jing ding kaging chai .
55001006	Hijeh a chu nachunga thenso-khut ka-ngap jeh a Pathen thilpeh nachan chu meibanga na-konsah kitna dinga kahin geldoh-sah kit nahi .
55001007	Ijeh-inem itile meidoi-na dinga Pathenin Lhagao eipeh-u ahipon , thahatna le ngailutna chule kitim theina ding joh ahibouve .
55001008	Hichejeh chun i-Pakaiyu thudol hettohsahnaa jong meidoi hih-in , ama jal’a sohchang kei chung thua jong jahcha hih-in , chusangin Pathen songin Kipana Thupha thudol’a hahsa thoh jon .
55001009	Pathenin eiho na-tohho vang hilouva ama thilgon dungjui le alungset jal’a kouna thengsel’a eikouvuva , eihuhhingu ahibouve , hiche lungsetna chu vannoi khang kipat masanga Jesu Christa sunggil’a eina pehsau ahin ,
55001010	tua hi eihuhhinguva Christa Jesu hung kilah a kona hung kiphongdoh ahitai ; aman thina chu asubeiyin , Kipana Thupha jal’in hinna le thi-mo na chu khovah a aphongdohtai .
55001011	Hiche Kipana Thupha hi sei-phong ding le Solchah ding chule mihil dinga eikipansah ahi .
55001012	Hijeh a chu hichengpi hi kathoh gim ahin , ahivangin kajachatpi poi ; Ijeh-inem itile katahsanpa chu kahetna , hiche nikho geiya chu chin dinga eikivop-sah jong hi ahonbit ding kasong lheh-e .
55001013	Keiya kona najahsa thuhil kicheh-a nanei , vettoh a juithei chengse chu Christa Jesu sunga cheng tahsa le ngailut nan tuh jingin .
55001014	Nakivopsah thilpha chu eiho sunga cheng Lhagao Theng panin ngah phan .
55001015	Phygelus le Hermogenes pumin Asia gamsunga mi jousen ei-nung ngatsoh hel’u hi nangman nahetsa ahitai .
55001016	Pakaiyin Onesiphorus insung mite chu hepi hen ; aman kabulput hi jachat pi louhel’in kalung asuhal mat chet jengin ahi .
55001017	Rome khoa ahungin jong eihung hol hol jengin , eimudoh teiye .
55001018	Pakaiyin hiche Nikho chule Pakaiya konin hepina musah tei hen , Ephesus khoa lhacha kin abol chengse chu nangin phatah-in nahei .
55002001	Kachapa nangma vang Christa Jesu sunga um lungset nan pan-san , hat jingin , thaphan .
55002002	Ahetoh tamtah a kona kasei najahsa chengse chu tahsan um mihemho pe-sonin , chutile amahon midang ho ahil thei diu ahi .
55002003	Christa Jesu sepai phatah bangin genthei hahsa hi thoh gim-pin .
55002004	Sepai koima apansahpa lung-dei bolnom chun hinkhosunga ding lung gelnan akisumo ngaipoi .
55002005	Gol-seh bol min jong Dan dungjuiya abol loule koiman jo na lallukhuh asang theipoi .
55002006	Loubol’a pang na-tong gim mi chun agam ga-a chan anei masah pen ding ahi .
55002007	Kasei hi ipi ahi nagel toh ding ahi , ajeh chu Pakaiyin hetkhen na napeh ding ahinai .
55002008	Kipana Thupha kaseiphong dungjuiya David guiya peng , thinaa kona thoudoh Jesu Christa chu geldoh-in ;
55002009	Hiche Kipana Thupha jeh a chu akhang gilou banga thih khaova kihen kahin , ahivang in Pathen thu chu akihen tang dehpoi .
55002010	Hijeh a chu lhen chomten Christa Jesu sunga kisel sochatna le tonsot loupina aneidoh theina diuva amaho dinga hichengpi kathohgim ahi .
55002011	Hiche thu hi tahsan umtah ahi : “ Amato ithikhom’u le amato ihinkhom diu ,
55002012	Ithoh lhumkeiyu le amato lengvai ipoh khomdiu ,
55002013	Eiho tahsan bei hijongleu hen , Ama tahsan umtah ahi ; Ajeh chu ama le ama akiseilep ngaipoi . ”
55002014	Hiti ho hi miho geldohsah jingin lang , thu homkeova akinel baotam louna diuvin Pathen ang-sunga hilchah-in , hiche ho hin ima aphat chomsah pon , aja ho akhup athal’in achuh lo ji bouve .
55002015	Kipatep them changsa banga Pathen koma , din jouna din nang le nang kiha-bol’in , kijumso na beihel natong mi hinadin thutah chu jangkeiyin mangchan .
55002016	Houthu seisetna moh thuhom keova kihoulimna ho chu peldoh-in , ajeh chu hiche hoa tha-nom ho chu Houthu ngaisahmo na lam’a haltou cheh cheh jo ahiuvin ,
55002017	chule athuseiyu jong chun masemon machal banga aneh chal tel tul diu ahi ; hiche ho lah achun Hymenaeus le Philetus jong apang lhone’e .
55002018	Amaho hin thutah aho-khel’uvin , thokitna chu akichaisan aseiyun , mi phabep tahsan alehei-peh tauve .
55002019	Ahinla Pathen khom-phu chu dettah-in ading nai , “ Pakaiyin amaa chengse ahe nai , ” tin mohor akinam khumin ; chujong le , “ Pakai min minphah chan chu adihlouva konin kikhin mang hen , ” akiti .
55002020	In lentah sunga khun sana le dangka bel jeng aumpon , thingbel le leibei ho jong aum’e ; amaho chu abang sahlut dol aumin , abang sahlut lou dol aum’e .
55002021	Seisa thilse chengsea kona kithensodoh mi chu sahlut dol tah , akisuthengsa , Pakai dinga natong thei , thilpha bol dinga kigosadem ahitai .
55002022	Khangdonglai lunggul chengsea konin jamin , lung thengsel’a Pakai min pan ho chutoh adih tahsan , ngailut chule chamna holjon .
55002023	Ngolkai le lungthimbei ho kinelna chu peldoh-in , hichea chun kinahna asohdohji nahei .
55002024	Pakai soh natong chun doubol angai ahipon , chusanga mi jouse khoto them , mi-hil them , lungde-hat hiya ,
55002025	lungnemtah a adouho chu apuijang joh ding ahi . Ijem itile Pathenin amaho chu thutah ahin hetdohna dinga lungheina phat apeh theiya ,
55002026	Dia-bol’in amat’a alungdei lamtah a ahinga ahen nau thangkol’a kona hung toldoh thei diu ahi .
55003001	Ninu nung lam le phat hahsa tah ahung lhun ding hi hen .
55003002	Ijeh-inem itile mihemten ama chang cheh ki-ngailutna , sum homthona , nom ham hoitho , kichoisang , Pathen taitom , nuthu pathu ngailou lam’a lung lut’uva , phatna ngaisah lou le aboha um gam’uva ,
55003003	khotona bei , hepina neilou , jouthua hehse hat , ti kitim lou , tuhngoi mo , phatna hotbol ,
55003004	lepche , dingchanglou , kiletsah , Pathen ngaisah sanga tahsa nopsahna ngaisahho hidiu ahi .
55003005	Hou-ngaisah lim’a um’uva , hou-ngaisah-na tha neije la janom lou , hite hoa kon jong chun kihei mangin .
55003006	Ama-ho lah a kimkhat doha lungthimin mi intin’a alut jiuvin , chonset poh-gih jeh a lung ngaichatna tampin apui lon le numei ho chu gal-hing kiman bangin aman jiuvin ,
55003007	hito-bang numeiho chula akihil jing vangun thutah hetnaa chu hung lut thei louhel ahiuve .
55003008	Jannes le Jambres chun Mose adoudal ihon banga hite ho jong hin thutah chu adoudal’uva , lungput sesa , tahsan thudol’a lolhing lel mi ahitauve .
55003009	Ahinla amaho sao tah chejou deh lou diu ahi , akisei te ni chunga thilsoh banga chu angolnau mitin koma kichenset’a kilangdoh ding ahi .
55003010	Nangin najuipehsa chu keima mihil chonchan , lungtup , tahsan thoh hat , ngailut , lungde-hat ,
55003011	bolsetna chengse le gim hesoh ho chu ahin , Antioch le Iconium chule Lystra khosung dunga chu itobang tah a bolsetna kidang dang kachung-a hung lhung hitam , hichengsea kon jong chun Pakaiyin eihuhdoh soh keiye .
55003012	Chule koi koi ahin Christa Jesu sunga Hou-ngaisah-a hinnom jousen bolsetna athoh tei ding ahi .
55003013	Migilou ho le kilep them mihem ho chu phamo cheh cheh diu , midang alhep lhah banguva amaho min alhep lhah diu ahi .
55003014	Nang vang dettah a natahsan , nakihilsa chengsea chun ding det jingin , na-hil’a pang ho chu koi ahiu nahe nai .
55003015	Christa Jesu sunga tahsanna jal’a huhhingna napui-lut thei chih-na napethei Pathen lekhabu chu nachapan laiya pat nahetsa ahitai .
55003016	Pathenin hu alhakhum Pathen lekhabu chengse chu kihilna ding , kipho na ding , kipuijang na ding le adih lam’a kichuhna dinga pha-tah ahi .
55003017	Chutile Pathen mi chu kitoh chet’a um theiya natoh pha chengse tohna kigosadem’a um ding ahi .
55004001	Pathen le mitin ahing athi thutan ding Christa Jesu maiya , chule ahung kilah kit ding le Alenggam pan’a guntah a kahilchah nahi ,
55004002	thu chu seiphong len , aphat hihen aphat lou hijongle , lung nengtah-in miho chu hilto gomin athemmo nau hetsah-in , sosal’in , tilkhouvin .
55004003	Ijeh-inem itile mihon thuhilpha kicheh chu ngai thei louva , abilkol’u thahtun tun’a ama ama lung ngai-chat dungjuiya mihil akikhop khom diu phat hung lhung ding ahi .
55004004	Chule amahon thutah akona abil-kol ahei manguva , semthu lam’a hung lung lutjo diu ahi .
55004005	Nang vang imalam jousea lung limgeh chan umin , hahsa thoh gimin , Evangelist na tongin , nalhacha na-toh chu bulhit molson .
55004006	Ije-inem itile keima hi eiki-katdoh ahitan , kapotdohna ding phat ahung lhungtai .
55004007	Golseh phatah kaseh joutan , kilhai tetna ka chaiyin , tahsan kamolsotai .
55004008	Tukal se-a vang keima dinga themchan na lallukhuh chu koisa ahitai , dih tah a thutan Pakaiyin hiche Nikho chu le eipeh ding ahi , kei keo hilouva ama hungkit ding ngailu jouse jong ahiuve .
55004009	Kahenga hungvah na din hung kihabol’in ;
55004010	ajeh chu Demas chun tulai vannoi hi angailut jeh-in eidalhan , Thessalonica a achetai ; Crescens chu Galatia lama achen , Titus ma Dalmatia lama achei ;
55004011	Luke changseh-in eiumpi . Mark hinpuiyin lang hung lhonin , ajeh chu ama chu kei dinga lhacha kinbolnaa phachom tah ahi .
55004012	Tychicus vang Ephesus lama kasoltai .
55004013	Nahung teng Troas khoa Carpus khut’a kadalhah kasangkhol len le lekhabu ho , ahidehchun savun lekhabu ho chu hinpon .
55004014	Sumsan kheng Alexander chun giloutah-in eibol’in , Pakaiyin athilbol dungyuiyin lethuh nante .
55004015	Ama chunga hin nang jong hung kigingphan , ajeh chu aman ithusei hou’u hi hatah-in adoudal’e .
55004016	Kakihonna thu kasei masah pen chun koima chan eihupon , abonchan eidalhasoh hel’uve ; hichu amaho themmon kisimpeh da hen .
55004017	Ahivangin keima jal’a thu kiseiphong chu lhingset’a akiphondoh a chidang namdangten ajahsoh keina diuvin Pakaiyin eidinpin tha eipen , chule Phaisameigeo kamsunga konin eihuhdohtai .
55004018	Pakaiyin thilse bol jousea konin eihuhdoh intin , van chunga A-lenggam sunga din eihuhhing nante . Loupina chu tonsot tonsot geiyin amaa hijing hen : Amen .
55004019	Prisca le Aguila chule Onesiphorus insung mite chu salamin .
55004020	Erastus chu Corinth a aumdentai . Trophimus adammon Miletus a kadalhatai .
55004021	Phalbi masanga hung tei din hung kihabol’in . Eubulus , Pudens , Linus , Caludia le sopi jousen nahin salam’ui .
55004022	Pakaiyin na-lhagao umpin , Lungsetnan naumpi jingu hen .
56001001	Pathen soh natong , Jesu Christa Solchah a pang Paul’in Pathen lhenchomte tansan dungjui le hou ngaisahna dungjuiya thutah ahetnau to kitoh ,
56001002	tonsot hinna dia kinepna , vannoi , khang kipat masang a pat jou seithei lou Pathen thutepsa ,
56001003	ama dei phat cha athu hung kiphongdoh a , eihuhhingpau Pathen thupeh dungjuiya keima eiki-nganse chu :
56001004	kikop khom cheh tahsan dungjuiya chatah tah Titus henga : Pa Pathen le eihuhhingpau Christa Jesua konin lungsetna le chamna nachunga um hen .
56001005	Thil kibol bulhing lou chengse naboltup soh a chule khopi jousea upa ho napansah na dinga Crete a kadalhah nahi .
56001006	Pansah ding chu koi hile nolnabei , numei khatseh jia nei , achate jong tahsan neisa , seiset chang lou , vah thai lou , thua nung khen hidiu ahi .
56001007	Ijeh-inem itile Houbung lamkai chu Pathen gouching ahijeh a nolna bei , kicham sah lou , lungsabai lou , ju nelou , mideng lou , alam louva kilose lou mi hiding ,
56001008	chusanga jindot them , thilpha dei , lung limgeh , midih , hougut mi , kitim them mi hiding ahi .
56001009	Thuhil kicheh mangchaa tilkhouna abol theiya chule adouho nelkelna chu alekhup theina dinga kihilna dunguiya ginchat umtah thu chu tuhchah mi hiding ahi .
56001010	Thua nung lou atam lheh jengun thu motsei seiya milhen chavai adim’ui , amaho chu cheptan ho lah a atamdeh-ui .
56001011	Amaho hi akam’u suhbing loiding ahi , ajeh chu alam louva phatchom ding holnan hil louhel ding thu ahil’un , miphabeh insung asucheh gamtauve .
56001012	Amahon laha khat athemgao ho’u khat’in : “ Crete miho chu mijou jeng , Gamsa gilou tah , thase neh hatte ahi , ” ati .
56001013	Hiche hettohsah hi a dih monge . Hijeh chun amaho tahsan kicheh mi ahina diuvin hatah-in phohsal’in .
56001014	Thutah pai manga . Juda miho semthu le mihemte thupeh hoa chun lung lut dau hen .
56001015	Milung theng ho dia ijakai athengin , akisubohsa ho le atahsan lou ho din imacha athengpoi , alungthimu le alung ngaito nau bohsoh ahitai .
56001016	Pathen hedanin aphongdoh nauvin , atoh nauvin la ataitom’uve ; amaho hi hot umtah le thu ngailou ahiuvin , natohpha ijat hile tongdia kiloma ahitapouve .
56002001	Nangin vang thuhil kicheh to kitoh chubou nasei ding ahi .
56002002	Upa ho chu lung neng tah , ima khohsah nei , lung limgeh , tahsan neiya kitimthem , ngailut nei , thohhat hiu hen .
56002003	Nupite jong chu jathei dol’a gingkhen cha hiu hen , jousei hat hilouva , jua kitimo hel hul’a sohchang bang lou diu thilpha hil’in pangjo’u hen ,
56002004	nutil khangdong ho chi ajiteu le achateu ngailutje kisinsah-u hen lang ,
56002005	Lung khaikhi them , atheng , insung minu pha , mipha , ajipate chengu thu noiya kunjel u hen lang , Pathen thu chu taitomin umsah dau hen .
56002006	Hitobang ma chun khangdong ho jong lung khaikhi them dia natilkhou ding ahi .
56002007	Nangman tah jeng jong imalam jousea vetkah theiya thilpha nabol ding , namihilnaa nakitahje , ja naum je ,
56002008	nathusei kichehje chu kimusah-in , chutile eidouteu chu kijumsoa ichunguva thuse seiding aneilou diu ahi .
56002009	Soh ho chu ijakaiya apakaiteu thu noiya nungjel thei , nelkel louhel’a lung lhaisahjo hiuhen .
56002010	Ima guh a kiseldoh louvin ijakaiya tahsan thei mong ahi nau thilpha chu vetsahjo’u hen ; chutile imalam jousea eihuhhinguva Pathen thuhil chu ajep hoi thei diu ahi .
56002011	Ijeh-inem itile mihem jouse huhhingna dinga Pathen milungset chu hung kilang doh ahitai .
56002012	Hichun hou-ngaisah louna le vannoi leiset ngaichat jouse pai manga , lung limgeh le adih chule Hou-ngaisah tah a tulai khanga hi ihin theina diuva eihilchah-u ahi .
56002013	Chule thanop umtah kinepna , Pathen nasatah le eihuhinguva Jesu Christa loupi tah hung kilah ding kat jinga ium diu ahi .
56002014	Christa chun gitlouna chengsea kona eisuh thenguva , tom ngaitah a thilpha bol ami lhentum tea eisemdohna diuva eiho khel’a ama kipedoh jenga eilhatdoh-u ahitai .
56002015	Hicheng se hi nasei ding , thu neina lhingset’a natilkhouva nahilchah ding ahin , koima chan nahsah mon nabolda hen .
56003001	Amaho chu vaipo ho le thunei ho thu noiya um ding , sei ngaiya thilpha jouse boldinga kigosadema um ding geldohsah jingin .
56003002	Koima taitom louhel le koima kinahpi lou , chon nem’a , mijouse chunga nun nem dingin jong hilphan .
56003003	Ijeh-inem itile eiho jong masanga chu lungthimbei le seingailou , gamvasoh a lung gul le nopsahna ding tampi noiya sohbanga kihen , thilsea um , kithangset toa hing , hotna dim’a khat le khat i-nahiuve .
56003004	Ahivangin eihuhhinguva Pathen phatna le mihem ahepina ahung kilahdoh phat’in ,
56003005	eihon adih a thil inabol’uva inatoh jeh-u hilouva , amihepi jal’a eihuhhinguva Penthahna twiya asil’a , Lhagao Thenga asemthah a ,
56003006	hiche Lhagao Theng chu eihuhhingpau jesu Christa jal’a ichunguva leiset’a abuh lhah ahitai .
56003007	Hitia chu amilungset vanga them ichan theijuva , tonsot hinna kineppi dungjuiya goulo chu ichan theina diu ahi .
56003008	Hiche thu hi tahsan umtah ahin , nangman hiti thudol’a hin Pathen tahsante chu thilpha bolna lam jenga dettah a dindet theina diuva lung nagelsah ding kadeiye . Hiche ho hi mihemte dinga pha , thil phachomtah ahi .
56003009	Amavang ngol-hoi thudol le khanggui kinel baotam , Danthu dol’a kinah hichenga kon chun kihei mangin , ajeh chu hiche ho hi phatchomna bei manthahna ahibouve .
56003010	Loitum sem mi chu khat vei nahilchah kal’in donda tan ,
56003011	ajehchu hitobang mi chu lungthim sesa chonse ahin , acham chama them mo kichan ahi .
56003012	Nahenga Artemas hihen Tychicus hile kahinsol teng Nicopolis khoa kahenga hungding hung kihabol’in , ajeh chu hikoma hi phalbi sungsea cham dinga kagel lhuh ahitai .
56003013	Danthu them Zenas le Apollos chun ima lhahsamna anei lhon louna din hinsoldoh loi dingin lungthim giltah-in kithopin .
56003014	Imiteu jong chu angaichat’u kintoh din napha tohna dingin phat manchahje kichuh-u hen , tohga beiyin mohumdau hen .
56003015	Kaumpi chengsen nasalam’ui . Tahsan jal’a igolteu chu salamin . Lungset nan nabonchauvin umpihen .
57001001	Chrita Jesu Jal’a sohchang Paul le sopi Timothyn , ingailut tah-u le itoh khompiu Philemon ,
57001002	isopi nuu Apphia , i-sepai pankhom piu Archippus le na-insunga kikhomji Houbung henga ,
57001003	i-Pau Pathen le Pakai Jesu Christaa konin lungsetna le chamna nachunguva um hen .
57001004	Katao chanin phat jousen nangma kageldoh jingin ka-Pathen kathang vah jinge ;
57001005	ajeh chu Pakai Jesu lam le mithengte chunga ngai lutna le thasan nanei thu kajai ;
57001006	natahsan jeh a kikhop khomna hin Christa jal’a ei ho sunga um thilpha jouse hi hetchetna aumdoh teina dinga kataoji ahi .
57001007	Na-ngailut thu dol’a hin hapan kakipah-in kakitil khou lhehjenge , ipijeh-inem itile nangma jeh-in mithengte lunggil jeng jong akisuhal lheh jengin ahi sopi .
57001008	Christa jal’in angaidol’a nangma thupeh jeng ding ngam jongleng ,
57001009	ngailutna jeh a ka-ngeh tho joh ahi ; hiche hi palaiya pang tu jenga jong Christa Jesu jal’a sohchang Paul kahi .
57001010	Kasoh chan naa kahinsa , kachapa Onesimus dinga kangeh ahi .
57001011	Phat khat’a chu nang dinga amahi phachom lou ahin , tua vang nang le kei dinga pha chomtah ahitai .
57001012	Ama hi nahenga kahinsol’in , hichepa hi kakhotona lung laigil’a hung ahi .
57001013	Kipana Thupha jal’a kasoh chan na muna hi nangma khel’a lhacha kinbol’a eipanpeh dinga kakihen den nom lheh jeng ahin ,
57001014	ahinla nangma lung hilounaa ima nacham louvin kabolsah nompoi , chutia chu nathilpha bol chu chamlouva hilouva , nachamtah a naboljoh ding aphai .
57001015	Ama hi tonsot geiya nanei theina dinga chomkhat dia nakoidoh jong hithei ahi ;
57001016	soh maimai ahitapon , keidin soh sanga chung nung jo sopi deitah ahin , nang din vang Pakai jal le tahsa jal’a hahi deh ahiye .
57001017	Hitia chu nangin kei hi chan khopia neigel le kei khel’in ama hi analemin .
57001018	Aman na chunga suh khel anei ham , bat anei ham ahijongle , hijong chu kei chunga del din sim jengin .
57001019	Keima Paul’in kakhut tah a kasut ahi , keiman le peh kit nange ; nangma tah-in kei neibat chu nasahna dinga kasei ahipoi .
57001020	Hiti chu ahi sopi , Pakai jal’in nangin keima neilung lhaisah jon , Christa jal chun kalung laigil suhal jingin .
57001021	Nasei ngai jing jeh a kahinsut ahin , Kasei kalval’a jong nabol ding kahei .
57001022	Chule kalhunna ding indan eina gonpeh-in , ajeh chu nataonau jeh a nang hodia eikipehdoh tei ding kakinem lheh jenge .
57001023	Christa Jesu jeh a kasoh chanpi Epaphras-in nahinsalam’e ;
57001024	katoh khompi cheng Mark , Aristarchus , Demas chule Luke hite hon jong nasalam’ui .
57001025	Pakai Jesu Christa milungset nan nalhagaovu umpihen .
58001001	Masang laiyin a Pathenin phattamtah vei lamchom chomin ipu ipateu henga Themgao ho kamin thu anasei jin ,
58001002	ninunung phat hin Chapan eiho henga thu ahinseitan , Chapa hi ijakai goulo dinga atun ahin , ama jeh a vannoi jong asemdoh ahi .
58001003	chapa chun Pathen loupi vah le alim tahbeh chu apodoh-in , thanei tah athu chenga thil ijakai hi atuh chah jing ahin , chonset’a kona suh thengna abol jou phat’in lal loupi chungnung pen jet lama atouvin ,
58001004	Vantilte sanga gamchenga minphajo gou alojeh-in , amaho sangin achungnungjotai .
58001005	Pathenin Vantilte koipen jah a itih a chu : " Nangma kachapa nahin , Tunia kahin nahi , " ati khah em ? Chujongle : " Keima apa kahi ding , Ama kachapa hiding ahi , " atim ?
58001006	chukit le ijakai sanga masapeh achapa vannoi leiset’a ahinpui ding chun aseiyin : " Pathen Vantil jousen Ama chu chibei boh cheh-u hen , " ati .
58001007	Chul vantilte chung thudol’a aseiyin : " Aman a-Vantilte chu hui asosah-in , Alhachate chu meikong asosah-e , " ati .
58001008	Chapa thudol’a vang : " Vo Pathen nalaltouna chu tonsot tonsot geiya um jing ahin , Kitahna tenggol chu Nalenggam tenggol ahi .
58001009	Nangin adih na-ngailun , Dan dih lou nahot bol’e ; Hijeh a chu Pathen , na-Pathenin thao nanua , Naloite jouse sanga nachoi sanga olive thao nanu ahi , " atibouve .
58001010	Chule : Vo Pakai , nangman semtil’in Leiset bulpi naphutdoh-in , Chule van ho jong hi nakhutsem ahi .
58001011	Hiche ho hi mangthah diu ahin , Nang vang um jing ding nahi ; abonchauva ponsil banga chulsoh diu ahi .
58001012	Aboncha hi ponlhe banga najeldoh a Ponsil banga nakheldoh ding ahi . Nang vang nabang nahi jingin , Nakum jong beitih um lou ding ahi .
58001013	Hichea hi Vantilte koipen jah a : " Keiman namelmate nakengchotpha kaneisah masangsen Kajet lam’a tou jingin , " ati beh em ?
58001014	Vantilte chu abonchauva lhacha kinbol lhagao , huhhingna goulo ding ho jenle dinga hinkisol hilou hiuvem ?
58002001	Hichejeh tah a hi ithujah chengseu hi lung nachang cheh a i-ngai diu , achutiloule ikimoh tolmang diu ahi .
58002002	Ijeh-inem itile Vantilte seidoh thu bon chubanga adet’a , asu-khel ho le angailou hon kitoh chet’a talen akisan’u le ,
58002003	hitobang huhhingna nasatah hi nahsah mo leu hen iti isochat diu ham ? Athu hi akipatnaa Pakai tah-in aseidoh a , ajahon eiho henga aphotchetsah-u ahin ,
58002004	Pathenin jong melchihna tampi le thil kidang tampi , bolmo kidang tampi to thoa adei dungjuiya Lhagao Theng ahoppeh a ahettoh sahpi ahi .
58002005	Iseiyu vannoi leiset ahung um doh got jong chun Vantilte noiya akoipoi .
58002006	Chusangin mun khat’a akihettohsah bangin aseiyin : " Mihem hi ipi hiya ama ding hibanga nagelpeh a , Mihem Chapa chu koiham hibanga navil jing ?
58002007	Phat chom khat din Vantilte sangin noi nungjon nakoiyin , Leng bangin loupina le janna najemin ,
58002008	Thil ijakai akengto noiya nakoisoh tai , " ati . Hichea ijakai aboncha anoiya akoina a hin imacha ama noiya lut lou aumpoi . Ahivangin tun thil ijakai hi anoiya lutsoh hel imudoh hih laiyui .
58002009	Imuu chu phat chom khat dia Vantilte sanga noi nungjoa akoi Jesu chu ahin , Pathen lungset jal’a mi jouse dinga thina atepkhah tei ding jeh-in thina geiyin athohin , hijeh chun loupina le jabolna lallukhuh-in akijemtai .
58002010	ijeh-inem itile ama vanga thil ijakai umsah-a , ama jal’a ijakai hinsah pan chapa tamtah loupinaa apui lut ding jeh a amaho huhhingna phutdohpa chun gim genthei athoh a asuh cham ding chu kitoh ahi .
58002011	Aje chu asuthengpau le asuh theng ho chu agom’uva Pa khatseh akon ahiuve . Hijeh a chu aman jachatna beihel’a amaho chu sopite ahisah a
58002012	asei chu : " Keiman kasopite lah a namin seiphong leng ting , Houbung ja lah a namin kavahchoi ding ahi , " atin .
58002013	Chukit le : " Keiman achunga katahsan kakoi ding , " ati . Chujongle : " Ven , Pathenin eipeh chapangte le keima hi , " atikit’e .
58002014	ajeh chu chapangte hi thisan le tahsaphe kikop ahiuvin , aman jong amaho tobangin alim’u ahung louvin hitia chu thina jal’a thina chunga thunei vaipo , hiche Diabol chu suhmang ding agot ahi ;
58002015	chule thina kichat jeh a hinkhoa soh a kihen chengse chu lhadoh ding agot ahi .
58002016	ama chun vantilte ding akhohsahjo pon , Abraham chilhahte ahujotai .
58002017	Mipi chonsetna chengse akichulnam theina dinga , Pathen henga tahsan umtah le mihepi Thempu chungnunga apan theina dinga sopite lim le mel bang banga aumdoh ding hi kilomtah ahi .
58002018	Hichea hi ama tah-in gim genthei ahoth a lhep patep’a aumjehchun , lhep patep’a umho chu akithopi theitai .
58003001	Chuti ahijeh chun van kouna changkha sopi thengte , i-hou thu’uva solchah le Thempu chungnung Jesu chu gelkhoh-uvin ,
58003002	Pathen insung pumpia Mose akitah banga ama jong apansahpa dinga kitah tah ahi .
58003003	Ijeh-inem itile in sanga , in sadohpa jabolna achanjoh banga Mose sanga Jesu chu gamchenga loupijo dia kilom ahitai .
58003004	Ajeh chu in jouse hi asadoh khat um cheh ahin , ahinla thil ijakai hi Pathenin asadoh-e .
58003005	Khonung thusoh ding kisei ding ho hettohsahnaa Mose chu Pathen insung pumpia tahsan umtah lhachan anapange .
58003006	Christa vang chu Pathen insunga Chapa thunei pen ahin , eihon i-hakat nau le ikison nau chule kinepna hi ituh chah jingu le ama insung ihidiu ahibouve .
58003007	Chuti ahijeh chun Lhagao Thengin aseiyin : " Tunia a-ogin najah-u le
58003008	Doumah bol nikhoa bang chun Nalung tahsah hih-un , Gamthip laiya kipatep nikhoa bangin :
58003009	Napu napa teuvin eipatep’un eideh-uve , Kanatoh kathilbol amu’uvin
58003010	Kum som li sungin . Hijeh a chu hiche khang mite chunga lung hanga , ‘ Amaho hi lungthim chavai mong ahiuvin , Hijeh chun kalampi jouse ahepouve , ’ kati ahi .
58003011	Hia chun kalunghan jeh a kihahsel’a : ‘ Amaho kacholdoh mun’a lut louhel diu ahi , ’ kati aihye .
58003012	Sopite , Pathen hing jinga kona pul lhahna dia nalah-uva mi koi hile tahsan louva lungthim gilou pu aum louna din ching theiyun .
58003013	Nalah-uva chonset lhep lhah a lungtah cheh cheh aum louna din , " Tuni ’ kiti aum laisen nangho khat le khat kitilkhouto jingun .
58003014	Ijeh-inem itile abul’a pat’a i-hung kison nau chu akhon nigeiya ituh chah jing pouvu le eiho hi Christa to chan kikop ihitauve .
58003015	Hichea hin akiseiyin : " Tunia a-ogin najah-u le Doumah bol nikhoa bang chun nalung tahsah hih-un , " akiti .
58003016	Ja taa doumah bol’a chu koi koi ham ? Egypt’a kona Mose vanga hung potdoh chengse hilou ham ?
58003017	Kum som li sunga koi chunga lung hang ham ? Chonsea gamthip laiya along lumden ho chung hilou ham ?
58003018	Amaho acholdo mun’a lut louhel dinga ahahsel khum ho chu hiche thu ngailou ho chu hilou ham ?
58003019	Hiti hin atahsan loujeh-uva alut thei louvu imutauve .
58004001	Hijeh chun kichau hite , achutiloule acholdo mun’a lut theina ding thutep um jeng jongle nalahuva khattou athon’a um khante .
58004002	Ijeh-inem itile eiho jah banga ama hon jong Kipana Thupha ajah-u ahinan , ahivangin athu jah-u chun amaho aphat chomsah poi , ajehchu ajahon tahsan’a asanlouvu ahi .
58004003	Atahsan eiho vang hi choldo mun’a chu lut ihiuve , hitia aseibang chun : " Kalunghan jeh-in kakihahsel’in , ‘ Amaho kacholdo mun’a lut louhel diu ahi , ’ kati , " akiti . Leiset bulpi khom kiphu til’a pat natoh thilsem chu akichaisa ahitah vangin .
58004004	Chuma le mun khat’a Ni sagi ni thudol aseiyin : " Chuin Nisagi lhin nin anatoh chengsea konin Pathen akicholdoi , " ati .
58004005	Chukit le hichea hin : " Amaho kacholdo mun’a lut louhel diu ahi , " ati .
58004006	Kipana Thupha ja masahon thu angai lou jeh-uva alut lou vangun , hichea lut ding chu mi aum jing nalaiyin ,
58004007	chuin " Tuni " kiti nikho dang khat atep kit’in , athu hi khonungin David kama aseiyin , akisei masa bang chun . " Tunia a-ogin najah-u le Nalung tahsah hih-un , " ati .
58004008	Ijeh-inem itile Joshuan amaho chu acholdosah hita le , aman kho nunga nikho dang khat um kit ding thu hi aseilou ding ahitai .
58004009	Hijeh chun Pathen mite din Choldona khat aum nalaiye .
58004010	Ipijeh-inem itile Pathen jeng jong anatoh na akona acholdo banga Pathen choldo mun’a lut pa chu anatoh akona kicholdo ahitai .
58004011	Thu ngailouna jeh a lut louho umchan jop’a alut lou ium louna diuvin , chua lut’a choldo cheh din kihabol’u hite .
58004012	ijeh-inem itile Pathen thu hi hing jing le na tong hat jing , hemto chemjam sanga jong hemjo , hinna Lhagao gu kisuhtona le lhin , hicheng geiya sukhen theihel’a sun thei , lunggel le lungthim ngaito hetoh paijen jeng thei ahi .
58004013	Pathen maiya kilang lou thilsem aumpon , ichung thu i-lhutna ding pau mitmua chu thil ijakai hi asagoh keova kijam cheh ahibouve .
58004014	Van mun jouse jotpaiya Thempulen , Pathen Chapa Jesu ineijeh-un iphondoh-u tahsan chu tuhdet jing u hite .
58004015	Ijeh-inem itile ihatmo lhahsam nauva eihu theilou Thempu chungnung nei ihipouvin , eiho banga imalam jousea lhep patepna tohsa , ahivanga chonsetna bei thempu chungnung ineiyui .
58004016	Hijeh chun panpi i-ngai kom’u le alungset vanga hepina le panpina ikilah theina diuvin hangtah-in lungset laltouna chu nailut’u hite .
58005001	Thempu chungnung jouse hi chonset jal’a thilto ho le kilheina gan tha ho Pathen koma tohdoh dinga , mihem ho thalhenga mihem te lha a kiladoh a kipansah ji ahi .
58005002	Amatah jeng jong lhahsam nan aumkimvel soh jeh chun imaheloute le lamvaite lung de-hattah a abol thei ahinai ,
58005003	ajeh chu mipi dinga kilhaina abol lou akhoh banga amatah jeng dinga jong achonset nau jeh a abol lou khoh ahi .
58005004	Chule Aaron bang chun Pathenin akouna jeh tilouvin koiman hiche jabolna kintheng hi acham chamin akilah theipoi .
58005005	Hitobang chun Christa jengin jong Thempu chungnung hi-na ding hi achamtah a kichoi-at nan aneipon amavang ajah a seipeh pan : " Nangma kachapa nahin , Tunia kahin nahi , " ati .
58005006	Hitobangma hin mun khat’a jong aseiyin : " Melchizedek themput dungjuiya Nangma tonsot’a dia thempu nahi , " ati .
58005007	Tahsaphe pua aum lai nikhon thinaa kona ahuhhing theipa henga Jesu chu o-thong leu le mit-lhi pumin thumna le taona neiya , Pathena akipeh thengjeh-in ataona aki-ngaipehin ahi .
58005008	Chapatah ahijeng vangin thoh hesoh thoh-in thua nunje akihil them’e .
58005009	Ama achamkimsoh phat’in ama thua nungte jouse din tonsot sochatna bulpin apangin ,
58005010	Pathenin Melchizedek themput dungjuiyin Thempu chungnung asahtai .
58005011	Hiche thudol’a hin sei ding tampi kaneiyun , ahinla nakolseh tah jeh-un ahilchet ahahsai .
58005012	Hitih chanpi hi mihil thei nahi diu ahitan , chutitah sangin khattouvin Pathen thubul kipatna lhongpi ho hil leu chun na-ngaikit nalaiyui , anham hilou bongnoitwi ngai nalaiyin naum’uve .
58005013	Ijeh-inem itile bongnoitwiya kivah nalai chu chapang ahijeh-in adih thudol’a hetna ima aneipoi .
58005014	Anham vang chu mi kikhan lhitsa ho ding ahin , amaho chu ahet thei nau mangchaa ase apha datkhenje themsa ho chu ahiuve .
58006001	Chuti ahijeh chun Christa thu bul kipatna lam chu dalhau hitin , philhinna ding lamjoh del’u hite ; natoh thisa hoa kona lunghei ding bul phut kit louvin , Pathen tahsan thupou ,
58006002	batize thua kihilna pou , thenso-khut ngap ham , thinaa kona thokit thu ham , chule tonsot’a dia thutan thupou velsei daute .
58006003	Hiche jong chu Pathenin pha asah le ibol diu ahinai .
58006004	Ijeh-inem itile khatvei khovah changsa ho , van’a kon thilpeh chu atep khah-uva , Lhagao Theng changkhasa ,
58006005	chule Pathen thu phat dan tep khaa , khang hung lhung dinga thaneina hesa ahiuvin ,
58006006	amaho hi alhuh tah-u le , amaho tumtah a Pathen Chapa chu Thingpel’a khen beh kit’a lhang phong tah a taitoma aumsah-u ahitan , lungheina dinga semphat kit thei hoi ahitapouve .
58006007	Ajeh chu Pathen kona phattheiboh achan jeh a leiset’in achunga ju-lha jing jeng gotwi adon’a , aphatchomna diuva lou kibolpeh ho dinga anche louhing ahinsep dohji ahin ,
58006008	amavang ling phung ho le simbiling ho asepdoh le pannabei ahitan , gaosap anaiyin , achaina govam ding ahi .
58006009	Deitahte , hitia kasei vangun thilpha cheh le huhhingna nanei jeh-un nachung thu’va kagin chat nau aum nai .
58006010	Ajeh chu mithengte kin nabolsau chu nabol jingu ahin , Ama min ngailutna naphondoh-u ahitah jeh-in , hiche natoh nau asuhmil ding chu Pathen adih lou ahipoi .
58006011	Akhonna geiya kinepna chu lhingkeiya akihetdoh kahsea natompan ngai banguva nang ho khat cheh hi napan diu kadei lheh jengui .
58006012	Chutile nathaset lou diu , tahsan le thoh hat jal’a thutep gou lo chang ho umchan jom nahidiu ahiye .
58006013	Pathenin Abraham thu atep chun ama sanga len jodang aum loujeh-in ama changseh akihahsel’in
58006014	Keiman phatthei kaboh tei tei ding , punjong kapunsah ding nahi , " ati .
58006015	Abrahamin thoh hattahin thutepga akimutai .
58006016	Chujongle mihemten amaho sanga chungnung jo chu kihahselna aneijiu ahin , chule thu kichetna dinga kihahsel na chun akah-uva kibaona jouse asuh chaiji ahi .
58006017	Thutep goulo ding ho henga chu alung ngaito chu khelkit louhel ding ahidol kichentah a avetsah nom jeh a Pathenin kihahselna chu palai banga anei ahi .
58006018	Hitia chu hiche thilbol nia kona hi Pathen kikheltih neilou le itih a jou thei lou ahi hea , hite ni jeh a ama koma kisel eiho hin imasanguva kikoi kinepna chu tuh chah dinga nasa tah a kitilkhou ihiuve .
58006019	Hiche kinepna chu hinkho dia thihhat aiya ineiyu ahin , kichentah le dettah pondal sung lam geiya lut pai ahi .
58006020	Hikoma chu Melchizedek themput dungjuiya tonsot’a dia thempu chungnunga pang Jesu chu eiho thalhenga analut masa ahitai .
58007001	Hiche Melchizedek Salem leng pa hi Chungnungpen Pathen thempu ahin , Abrahamin lengho agatha ahung kilekit lam chun Melchizedek-in agalamton phatthei aboh-e .
58007002	Ama chu Abrahamin athil chomdoh jousea konin som a khat apen , amasaa Mechizedek hi ‘ Kalengpa dih ’ tina ahin , chujongle ‘ Salem lengpa ’ jong hin chamna lengpa kiti ahi .
58007003	Ama hi nubei pabei , khanggui neilou , hinnikho kipatna le kichaina bei , Pathen Chapa tobang ahin , a-itih a thempua pang jing jeng ahi .
58007004	Lung gel’in ngaitouvin , ipului bulpiu Abrahamin athilchom hopsom a hop khat apehpa chu itobanga len hitam !
58007005	Abraham chilhah ahicheh vangun Levi chilhah thempu mun chang ho chun Danthu dungjuiya asopiteu hijongle miholah akon hopsom’a khat lahna ding thu aneiyu ahi .
58007006	Ahile Levite khangguiya kimatna bon neilou Melchizedek chun Abrahama konin hopsoma hop khat alan , chule thutep kisanpa chu phatthei aboh jenge .
58007007	Chule mineojon asanga lenjoa kona phatthei boh khat akilah uvin , khatjoh a vang hin akilahpa chu hing jing ahidol hettohsahna aum’e .
58007009	Chujongle Abraham jeh chun , hopsom’a hop khat kilahpa Levi jeng jong chun hopsom’a hopkhat apei tia sethei ai .
58007010	Ajehchu Melchizedek chun Abraham agalamto pet’a hi Levi chu apu Abraham taiguiya um nalai ahi .
58007011	Mipi dia Danthu kipeh lo na Levite themput dol’a chu chamkimsohna umthei hile Aaron themput dol’a kisei louva Melchizedek thempu chom dang khat umdoh khoh ngai ding ham ?
58007012	Hiche achung chang thudol akikhel le Danthu jong kikhel teiji ahi .
58007013	Hiche achung chang thudol kiseipa hi phung chom’a kon ahin , hiche phunga kon hin koimacha maicham phunga lhachan apang kha hih laiye .
58007014	Akichen veng tai , ajeh chu i-Pakaiyu chu Judah phunga hung kon ahin , hiche phunga themput dol hi Mosen ima aseipoi .
58007015	Melchizedek tobanga chu thempu chom dangkhat akitundoh phat hin athu hi gamchengin akichen kit tai .
58007016	Ama themputna hi tahsaphe Danthu thupeh dungjui ahipon , mantih neilou hinkho khat tha neinaa konjoh ahibouve .
58007017	Ijeh-inem itile hettohsah nan : Melchizedek themput dol’a Nangma tonsot dia thempu nahi , ” akiti .
58007018	Chujongle thupeh masa chu alhah sam jeh le aphatchom loujeh-in akinoi mangtai .
58007019	Ijeh-inem itile Danthun imacha achamkimsah lou phat’in , kinepna pha cheh khat ahung kipolut tan , hiche kinepna jeh hin Pathen kom anailut’uve .
58007020	Hiche hi kihahselna beiya ahipoi , adang ho vang chu kihahselna beiya thempua pang anahiuvin ,
58007021	Ama vang hi ajah a kihahsel na to lhon’a kiseipeh-a “ Pakai akihahseltai , Lung akhel kit lou ding ahi ; ‘ Nangma tonsot’a dia thempu nahi , ’ tin , ” ati .
58007022	Hiche dungjui hin Jesu chu Kitepna phajo phutdet’in apangtai .
58007023	Chule masanga chu thi nan asuhmoa aumden jing thei loujeh-uva mi tampi thempua anapang ahiuve .
58007024	Hichepa vang hi tonsot’a um jing jeng ahijeh-in themputna chu adang khat’a kichon thei ahipoi .
58007025	Ama hi hing jing ahijeh-in ama jal’a Pathen henga hung lut jouse chu amaho thalhenga taopeh a , abonchauva ahuhhing chamkimsoh thei ahi .
58007026	Chuti ahijeh chun chutobang thempu chungnun , athen a theng lepthol bei , boh beh lou le chonsete lah a kona kikhenhel , van mun ho jouse sanga chungnung joa kitung doh chu eiho dinga kilom mong ahi .
58007027	Thempu dang ho banga aman niseh le amasaa ama chonset then sona ding chule miho chonset then sona dinga kilhaina gantha atolou akhoh poi , ajeh chu amatah kilhai na gantha dia akitodoh jeh chun khat veiyin asubulhittai .
58007028	Danthun lhahsamna nei mihemte thempun anapansah jin , amavang Danthu nunga hung umdoh kihahselna tun vang tonsot’a dia chamkimsoh Chapa chu apansah tai .
58008001	Akisei thulu chang pen chu : eihon hitobang thempu chung nung hi ineiyun , ama chu Van’a Chungnung pen Lalatouna jet lam’a atouve ,
58008002	chukoma mihem tundoh hilouva Pakai tundoh ponbuh tahbeh , muntheng chungnung sunga achamtah a kin theng bol’a pang ahi .
58008003	Thempu chungnung jouse thilto hinchoi ding le kilhaina gantha toh dinga kitung ahin , hiche Thempu chungnung jong hin todoh thil khat aneitei ding ahi .
58008004	Ama hi leiset chunga um hile Thempu jong hilou ding ahi , ajeh chu Danthu dungjuiya Thempuho lah athilto hinchoi ding aumnauve .
58008005	Mose’n ponbuh ason ding kon’a akihilchahnaa , “ Ajeh chu ven , molsang chunga nakivetsah lim dungjui banga ijakai nabol ding ahi , ” ati banga chu leiset’a thempu ho hin van chunga thil um lim le ale thoa kintheng bol’u ahibouve .
58008006	Tun vang Jesu chu kintheng bolna pha chungnung achangtai ; ajeh chu hiche hi ama palainaa kisemdoh kitepna pha cheh le thutep pha jo chunga kiphutdoh ahi .
58008007	Kitepna masa chu nolnabei hile ni lhinna pamun ding kihol khoh ponte .
58008008	Ahinla Pathenin miho chunga nolna amujeh-in aseiyin : “ Ven , keiman Israel insung chung , Judah insung chunga Kitepna thah khat kasemdohna ding Nikho ho ahung lhunge , ” tin Pakaiyin aseiye .
58008009	Hiche kitepna chu Apu apateu kakhuttah a katuh a Egypt gam’a kona kahin puidoh nikhoa Amaho to kasemdoh tobang chu hilou ding ahi . Ajeh chu amaho kakitepnaa aum jing pouvin , Kenjong amaho kadonlou ahi , tin Pakaiyin aseiye .
58008010	Nikho hijat nunga keiman Israel insung kakiteppiding Kitepna chu hiche hi ding ahi , tin Pakaiyin aseiye : Alunggil’uva Kadanthu ho peng ting , Hiche ho chu alungthim’uva kasut’a , Amaho dia a-Pathenu kahi ding , amaho kamite hidiu ahi .
58008011	Koi hile tolsung khat’a achenpi le Koi ahiya asopi jah a , ‘ Pakai hen , tia Ahil lou diu ahitai . Ajeh chu aneopen’a alenpan geiya Abonchauva eihetsoh diu ahitai .
58008012	Ijeh-inem itile asuh khel nauva jong kahepia , achonset nau jong kageldoh kit lou ding ahitai .
58008013	Hichea ‘ Athah ’ kiti hin amasa chu aluisah tan , ipi hile luiya , tehse chu abei ding kon ahitai .
58009001	Kitepna masa jong chun kintheng bolna Danthu le leiset’a muntheng ananeiye .
58009002	Ijeh-inem itile houbuh akisondoh teng indan masapen’a chu thaomei khom le do khang chule Pathen um hetna changlhah to aumin , hilai chu " Muntheng " akiti .
58009003	Hiche ban’a Houbuh pondal dan ni na chu " Muntheng chung nung " akitin ,
58009004	asunga chu gimnamtui halna sana maicham le kitepna thingkong-sana kitomkhum chu um ahin , kitepna thingkong sunga chu manna umna sana bel le Aaron tenggol pahmum chule kitepna songpheng ni chu um ahi .
58009005	Achunga chu Cherubim loupitah ni uma , alhaving hoa chonset ngaidam kinbolna mun chu ale lhon ahin , hiti ho hi achen achaiya tua seijou ahipoi .
58009006	Hitobang hin akisemin , hiche houbuh dan masa sunga chun lhacha kinbol molsoh dingin thempuho alut jing jiuve .
58009007	Asung nung dan nina avang chun kumkhat sungin thempu chungnung changseh khat vei bou , thisan choilou hilouva , amatah le mipin hettoh louva achonset na ho’u thenso dinga galutji ahi .
58009008	Lhagao Thengin kichentah a asei chu ahile , Houbuh dan masa adin laisea muntheng’a lutna lampi chu kilangdoh lou ding ahi .
58009009	Hiche hi tulai phat sunga thilsoh ding tekahna ahin , thil to kilhaina gantha kichoijia kitoh ho hin kilhaina neiho het khenna lunghtim umdol bangin asuchamsoh theipoi .
58009010	Neh le don chule twiya kisil theng thudol jatchom chom thubou ahin , kisemthah phat hung lhun kah a tahsaphe danthu jeng ahibouve .
58009011	Ahinla Chrita chun khut’a kisem jong hilou , hiche thilsem lah a pang lou , Houbuh lenjo le chamkimjo ding jal’in thilpha hung lhung ho thempu chungnungin ahung pangin ,
58009012	kelchal ho le bongnou ho thisan vanga hilouvin , amatah thisan jal’in munthenga chun khat veiseh alut’in tonsot lhatdamna aphutdohtai .
58009013	Ijeh-inem itile kelchal ho le bongchal hi thisan , chule kella ho pumgo vutvam kithekhum chun tahsaphe bohna neiho chu asuh theng le ,
58009014	tonsot Lhagao jal’a ama chamtah a nolnabeiya Pathen henga kilhaina gantha dinga kikat doh jeng Christa thisan chun Pathen hing jing lhacha kinbol dinga , athisa natoh chengsea kona , eihet khen nau lungthim ho hi gamchenga asuh thengjoh ding ahi .
58009015	Hichejeh a chu Christa chu Kitepna Thah palaiya pang ahin , Kitepna masa chung changa suh khelna neiho lhatdoh dinga athina jeh a akikouho tonsot goulo ding thutep chu akisan thei diu ahitai .
58009016	Ajeh chu Kitepna aum teng kitepna sempa thina phot chetna boltei ngai ahi .
58009017	Ijeh-inem itile Kitepna chun kitepna sempa hinlaisen ima thu aneipon , athi nungle bou kiphutdetji ahi .
58009018	Hijeh a chu kitepna masa jong thisan beiya kiphutdet lou ahi .
58009019	Hichejeh chun Mose’n jong Danthu dungjuiya thupeh chengse mipi aseipeh soh phat’in , kella ho thisan le twito , ponsandup le hyssop alan lekhabu le mipi abonchauvin athe khumin ,
58009020	" Hiche hi Pathenin nang ho nathupehsau Kitepna jal’a thisan chu ahi , " ati .
58009021	Hitobanga chun houbuh le kintheng bolnaa kimang manchah jouse chu thisan athekhumtai .
58009022	Danthu dungjuiya ijakai chu thisan’a suhthengsoh hel ahimaiyin , hijeh chun thisan solouvin ngaidamna aumdoh poi .
58009023	Hitobanga hi van mun hoa thil ho lim vetsahnaa um thil ho jong suh theng tei ding ahin , ahin van thil tah tah ho dia kilhaina gantha phajo cheh ngai ahi .
58009024	Atah beh lim tobang khut’a kisa mun theng phunga Christa lut ahipon , amatah van’a lut’a tua hi eiho tha lhenga Pathen angsunga kilah jing dia um ahi .
58009025	Thempu chungnungin ama thisan hilou choiya kumseh a muntheng phung alut banga Christa amatah kikatdoh dinga lut matchet ji ahipoi .
58009026	Chuti hile vannoi bulkiphua pat aman hesoh genthei athoh matchet ding ahin , tun vannoi khag kichai kon hin chonset suhmangna din amatah kilhaina gantha din khatvei bou ahung kilahtai .
58009027	Mihemte dia khatvei thia chujou teng thutanna lut ding hi gotsa ahi ,
58009028	hitobanga chu Christa jong mi tamtah chonset suhmangna dinga khatvei kitohdoh ahitan , chonset thua hilouva kinemtah a ama galdot jing ho huhhingna pe dia aniveina hung ding ahi .
58010001	Danthu chu thilpha hung um ding ho ale mai mai , alim tahbeh jeng jong ahiloujeh-in , kumseh a kilhaina gantha chu avel vel’a alha vangun kilhaina bol ho dingin imacha asubulhit joupoi ;
58010002	asuh bulhit hihen , khatvei seh kisuh thenga chu kilhaina bol ho het khenna lungthim sunga chonsetna ho chu chin jingna um lou hel hile ibol’a tang louva ahinchoi jing diu ham ?
58010003	Chuti tah sangin hiche ho chun kumseh-in chonsetna ageldohsah jotai ;
58010004	ajeh chu bongchal ho le kelchal ho thisana konin chonset ngaidamna aumpoi .
58010005	Hijeh chun leiset’a ahung chun Christan aseiyin ,
58010006	“ Kilhaina gantha le thilto nadeipon , Keidin tahsapum joh neigonpeh tai ; Ganpumgo thilto ho le chonset thensona thilto hoa jong Nalung lhaideh poi .
58010007	Hichun keiman kaseiyin : “ Vo Pathen ven , Lekhabu sunga kachung thu jempia kisun bangin Nangma lungdei bol dingin kahung’e kati , ” tin aseiye .
58010008	Masanga chu Danthu dung juiya kitohji hijongle , aman aseiyin " Nangma kilhaina gantha ho le thilto ho , ganpumgo thilto ho le chonset thensona thilto ho chunga nakipah pon , lung jong nalung lhaipoi , " atin ;
58010009	chujouvin aseipaiyin , " Ven , nalungdei lam bol din , hikoma ka-ume , " ati . Hiti hin ani channa chu tundohna din amasa chu asumangtai .
58010010	Hiche Pathen lungdeiya chu Jesu Christa tahsapum , a-itih a dinga khat vei akitodoh jeng jeh chun eiho eisutheng tauve .
58010011	Thempu jouse chu niseh a ding jinga kilhaina gantha thilto chu ato jing vangun hiche ho chun chonsetna ala mang thei dehpoi .
58010012	Jesu Christan vang chonset thensona din , a-itih a dinga khatvei , kilhaina thilto chu atoh-in , Pathen jel lam’a atoutai .
58010013	Chukelsen vang amelmate chu akeng chotpha akoipeh ding angah jinge .
58010014	Ijeh-inem itile Aman thilto khatseh a asuh theng ho chu tonsot’a dingin achamkimsah soh tai .
58010015	Lhagao Thengin jong eihettohsah nauve ; ijeh-inem itile hiche jou hin aseiyin .
58010016	" Ni nu nung teng le keiman amaho to Kakitepna ding chu hiche ahi , ati Pakaiyin ; ‘ Alungthim’uva Kadanthu ho kakhumpeh ding , Hiche ho chu alung gil’uva kasut ding ahin ,
58010017	chule achonset jouseu le Danthu asuh keh nau jouse Kageldoh kit louhel ding ahitai , " ati .
58010018	Chonsetna ho jal’a ngaidam umnaa chun chonset jeh a thilto ding angaitapoi .
58010019	Sopite , Jesu thisan jal’in eihon muntheng phung jot’a , sung lhah ngamna ineiyui ;
58010020	ajeh chu aman pondal banga amanchah atahsaphe eiho din lampi thah le ahing jing chu eihondoh peh tauve .
58010021	Ama Pathen insunga Thempu lenin ahung pangin ;
58010022	hijeh chun lung dih tah le tahsan bulhingset’in chule het khenna lungthima thilse jouse kisop thengsel le tahsa kisil thengin nailut’u hite .
58010023	Thutep chu tahsan umtah ahijeh-in iphondoh sau kinepna hi dettah-in tuh det jingute .
58010024	Chule ngailutna le thilpha bolna lam’a khat le khat kisuh lip jing ding phate chan gel’u hite .
58010025	Mi kon khat’in akikhop nau donda achon nau banga bol louvin , Nikho chu ahung nai dol namu ahitan , hatahin kitilkhou to chehjo’u hite .
58010026	Ajeh chu thutah hetna kisan nung hin eihon chonset henasan boljom jing leu hen , chonset suh mangna ding kilhaina gantha kikhenlou ahitan ,
58010027	doumah bol jouse bahgam hel ding le kavam hel ding tom ngaina meikong le thutanna ngah a kicha jinga um ding ahitauve .
58010028	Koi hile Mose Danthu nahsah lou chu mi ni hihen thum hile hettohsah jeh a hepina beihel’a kithat ding ahi .
58010029	Chuti ahile Pathen Chapa keng chotpha nei , akisuh thengna Kitepna thisan suhboh a chule lungsetna Lhagao daithang ho chun itobang khohjo cheh talen amat diu kilom nasah um ?
58010030	Ijeh-inem itile : " Phulah chu kei kin ahi , Keiman lethut nange , " Chukit le : " Pakaiyin amite chung thu atan ding , " tipa chu koi ahi keihon kaheuve .
58010031	Pathen hing jing khut te nia chuh khah ding chu kichat umtah ahi .
58010032	Masanga khovah nachan nung geiyuva jong hesoh genthei hahsa tah thoh a napan laiyu nikho ho geldoh-uvin .
58010033	Hichea chun genthei thoh pum puma japi vetchah din naum’un , ahinla nang hon jong hitobang thoh ho chu nathoh piu ahiye .
58010034	Ijeh-inem itile songkul lut ho geiya nathoh piuva , chule apha cheh le a-itih a um jing ding gou nanei nahet jeh-uvin naneiyu kichom jeng jong kipah tah-in nathoh jo’uve .
58010035	Hiche hin kipaman lentah nasodoh peh jeh-uvin nakison nau chu paimang hih hel’uvin .
58010036	Ipijeh–inem itile Pathen lungdei bol’a thutep kisan na din thoh hat jing ding angaiye .
58010037	Ajeh chu : " Chomcha khat jou teng Ahung ding pa chu hunga Geisang lou dig ahi ;
58010038	Tahsan jal’a kei dia midih changa chu hing ding , Anung chon vang achunga kahinkho kapeh lou ding ahi , " ati .
58010039	Eiho vang manthahna dinga nung chon ho ihipouvin , tahsan jal’a hinkho hoidoh a um ho ihibouvui .
58011001	Tahsan hi kinepna atahbeh a lah a , muthei lou thil ahisa koi ding hi ahi .
58011002	Hijeh a chu tahsan jal’a upate chu hettohsah a kipansahji ahiuve .
58011003	Tahsan na jeh a Pathen thusah a vannoi kisem le akilangdoh kha lou thil hoa kona muthei thil hung umdoh dol ihet’u ahi .
58011004	Tahsan na jeh a Abel’in Cain sanga Pathen henga kilhaina gantha thilto phajo atojeh-in , amidih hi na hettohsahna amun , Pathen jengin jong athilto ho chu ahettohsah tan , chule athi nung geiyin thu asei thei nalaiye .
58011005	Tahsan na jeh-in Enoch chu thina mulouvin atahsa akheldoh peh-in , Pathenin atasan akheldoh peh jeh-in koiman aholdoh joutapoi ; tahsa kheldoh a aum masanga Pathen koma lung lhaina kimu ahi hettohsahna aum’e .
58011006	Hijeh chun tahsan beiya Pathen lung tohoi ahipoi ; ijeh-inem itile Pathen aum je le ama holte chengse tohphat man apeh dol hi ama kom nailutten atahsan tei diu dol ahi .
58011007	Tahsan na jeh-in Noah chun kho nung thilsoh ding muphah lou thua hilchahna thu angaiyin , ama le a-insung huhhingna din kong innei khat asem’e , hichea hin vannoi themmo achanin , tahsan’a them channa jal’in goulo chu achangtei .
58011008	Tahsan na jeh-in Abraham chu potdoh a goulo dia akisan ding mun’a lut din akikou chun thun anungin , hoilam jot ding ahet lou vangin apotdoh jenge .
58011009	Tahsan na jeh-in tepna gamsunga hung kholjin bangin apem len , tepna gam alopi ding Isaac le Jacob chutoh ponbuh sunga acheng leuve .
58011010	Ajeh chu Abrahamin Pathen gontoh le asah doh bul dettah chu akat jing’e .
58011011	Tahsan na jeh-in athuteppeh pa chu tahsan umtah ahidol ahetjehin acha nei phat akilet tah vangin Sarah-in naovopna thei tha aneitai .
58011012	Hiti chun mithikonsa paa kon chun van’a ahsite jat le Twikhanglen kama neldi jat hel simsen lou chilhah apeng doh tai .
58011013	Amaho chengse hi tahsan ahitauvin , thutep chengse chu akisan man louvu ahitai ; ahinla gamla tah a konin amu’uvin alem’un , chule amaho chu leiset chunga kholjin le khopem ahiu aphongdoh tauve .
58011014	Hichea hitobang thusei ho hin pugam pagam ahol dol’u aphondoh u ahibouve .
58011015	Amaho ahung kondoh nau gam chu geldoh kit hileu kilekitna ding phat gomkom jong anei diu ahi .
58011016	Tua la amahon aphajo cheh khat , van gam chu atup’u ahijeh-in , Pathen jeng jong amaho Pathen a kikou ding jahcha lou ahi ; ijeh-inem itile aman amaho dinga khopi khat agonpeh ahitai .
58011017	Tahsan na jeh-in Abrahamin patep’a aum chun thutep changpa tahsan vangin achapa chang khatseh , Isaac chu kilhaina gantha banga todoh jeng din agoi .
58011018	Ama chule Isaac a kon ahi nachilhah kisim ding ahi , " tia kiseipeh ahin ,
58011019	Pathenin athisa jong akaithou kit thei chu agel jon , tekah a seidin Isaac chu anung chankit nai .
