58011020	Tahsan na jeh-in Isaac chun kho nung teng phatthei chang din Jacob le Esau phatthei aboh-e .
58011021	Tahsan na jeh-in Jacob-in athi ding konin Joseph chapate ni phatthei aboh gol’in , atenggol chunga aki-ngamin Pathen alhaiye .
58011022	Tahsan na jeh-in Joseph chun athi ding konin Egypt gama kona Israel chate potdoh ding ageldoh-in , ama gu le chang thudol’a thu apei .
58011023	Tahsan na jeh-in anu le apan Mose apen nungin lha thum asel lhonin , ama chu naosen mel-hoi tah ahidol amu lhonin , lengpa thu peh jong kicha louvin aum lhon’e .
58011024	Tahsan na jeh a Mose’n akhan lhit phat’a Pharoah chanu chapa kiti ding da ahi .
58011025	Chonset’a chomkhat nopsah sangin Pathen mite to gim hesoh thoh khom ding akilhenjoi .
58011026	Tohman san ding avetjoh jeh chun Egypt gama gou jou se sangin Messiah kihousetna chu thupijon agel’e .
58011027	Tahsan na jeh-in lengpa lung han ding ging louvin Egypt gamadalhan , mit muthei loupa chu amu bangin abol’e .
58011028	Tahsan na jeh-in kalchuh kut aphutdoh-in , cha peng masa sumang Vantil chun amahoa asuh khah louna din thisan chu athekhumsah-in ahi .
58011029	Tahsan na jeh-in Israel chaten Twikhanglen chu tolgo jot’in ajot galkaiyun , Egypt miten chutia bol agot’u le twiyin achup lih gamtauve .
58011030	Tahsan na jeh a Israelten Jericho khopi ni sagi avel’u le , khopi pal achimtai .
58011031	Tahsan na jeh a Rahab notinun gam ve-lhi ho lung monga alhunsah jeh chun thu ngailou ho to akisuh mang tha tapoi .
58011032	Ipi kaseibe ding ham ? Gideon , Barak , Samson , Jepthah , David , Samuel chule themgao ho chengse thudol seisoh kei ding phat’in toh ponte .
58011033	Tahsan na jel’in lenggam tampi ajouvun , adih aphutdet’un , thutep akisan’un , Phaisameigeo kam asingun ,
58011034	meikou laipi aphel mit’uvin , chemjem hem’a konin ahoidoh un , lhahsam na konin ahatdoh-uvin , galmun’a hatah ahiuvin , gamdang sepaite adeljam tauve .
58011035	Numei hon amithi sa ho’u thoudoh kit akisan’uvin adang ho jong thokitna phajo cheh aneina diuvin huhdoh a aum diu anom pouvin , hesoh genthei thoh-in aumjotaove .
58011036	Abang bang jong elbol le jepna thoh , bulput le songkul lut’in aum’uve .
58011037	Amaho chu songin asep’un , thing-at’in a-attan’un , chemjamin athat’uvin , kelngoivun le kelcha vun kisil’in avah leuvin , vaichat le bolset thoh , genthei hesoh bolset’in aum’uve ;
58011038	vannoi leiset hi amaho umna hoi ahitapon , gamthip lai le mol le lhanga avah leuvin , songko dung le leiko dunga akisel’ui .
58011039	Mi hijat chu tahsan na jeha hettohsah a apan vangun thutep ga chu alopha pouve ;
58011040	eiho beiya achamkimsoh thei louna diuva Pathenin ibonchauva dinga thilphajo cheh khat amu masah ahi .
58012001	Hettohsahna hijat pin meilhang banga eiumkimvel jehuvin einoh phahsah jouseu le ichunguva kaijing chonsetna hi pailhan , thoh hat tah-in imasanguva kilhai tetna lama hin lhaiyu hite .
58012002	Tahsan bulpi le kikhomna Jesu lam kat jingute ; aman amasanga koisa um kipana jeh chun jum le jachatna nahsah louvin thingpel’a thina geiyin athoh-in Pathen laltouna jet lam’a atoutai .
58012003	Nahinkhouva nalhah dah-uva nalel louna diuvin , chonseten amadouna a thuse chujatpi aseiyu dou lhumkeipa chu geldoh jingun .
58012004	Chonset louna lam’a nang ho thisan long leuvin napang hih laiyuve .
58012005	Tilkhouna dinga nang ho chapate dol’a nakisei nau chu nasuhmil’u ahitai : " Kachapa , Pakaiyin nabolgimna chu isah louvin geldan , Aman naphosal teng jongle lung lhadeh hih-in ;
58012006	Ijeh-inem itile Pakaiyin angailut chu abolgim’a , Chapa dia akisansa chu ajepji ahibouve , " kiti chu .
58012007	Bolgimna chu thoh tun tun’un , Pathenin chapate banga nasungse nau ahibouve ; Pan chapa koipen gahchah louva akoiyem ?
58012008	Chate louvin um leu chun chapa tahbeh hilouva bolamcha nahi diu ahi .
58012009	Hiche kalval’in jong tahsaphea eigah chah diuvin pate ineiyun amaho chu ijabol lheh-ui ; achutile Lhagao ho thudol’a Pa koma chu ihinna diuva i-halut cheh joh lou diu ham ?
58012010	Amaho chun aphasah lam lam’uva ni chom khat kahseh a dinga bou eigah chah jiu ahin , Pathenin vang eiho phatna ding , ama thenna ichan theina diuva eithoh gimsah jiu ahibouve .
58012011	Gahchah na hi apet tah le lung nopna ahipoi , lhaset nan akigel bouve ; ahinla kho nung teng le hita bolgimna thoh ho ding hin them channa din cham nan ahung gadoh jin ahi .
58012012	Hijeh chun khut ngoi hon domsangun lang , khup ngoi ho jong ding janguvin ;
58012013	Kengbaiya chu chatmoa um louva , adamjohna dingin nalampiu kisem jenguvin .
58012014	Mi jouse to kichamna ding le thenna ding hadel’un , hiche tilouva chu koiman Pakai amu louhel ding ahi .
58012015	Koima Pathen lungsetna changlel aum louna ding le thingkha jung dondoh a tamtah asuhmo banga nasuhboh louna dingin ching theiyun .
58012016	An neh khat man dinga a-upat kijoh Esau banga alop’a le chonthanghoi bol naum louna diu vin ching theiyuvin .
58012017	Ijeh-inem itile kho nunga goulo tei ding adei chat vanga lunghei kitna ding mun anei tah lou jeh-in mit lhi puma ahol vangin vangbohna akipeh lou naheuve .
58012018	Ijeh-inem itile nang ho toh khah thei molvum , meisi pah lah lah lai , muthim lai , thimpi lah , chule khopihui lah a hungvah lut nahipouvin ,
58012019	sumkon gin le thu kisei gin ki thong lah jong ahipoi ; hiche japha ho chun ajah-uva thu chu akisei kit louna din ataojo tauve .
58012020	Ajeh chu , " Molvum dung chu gancha ho jeng jong atongkha chan songa selih ding ahi , " tia thu kisei chu athoh jouhel’u ahi .
58012021	Chule hiche thil hung kilah chu kichat um behseh jeng ahin , Mose’n jong aseiyin , " Keima kakichan kakihot hot jenge , " ati .
58012022	Nang ho vang Zion molvum , Pathen hing jing khopi , Van Jerusalem , Vantil asang sang lah hung lhunga , kipah thanom
58012023	le van’a kisun lutsah apeng masa chengse kikhopna , mi jouse thutan Pathen kom , them changsa ho Lhagao suh chamkimna mun ,
58012024	Jesu palainaa kisemdoh Kitepna Thah a chu hung nahitauvin , hiche thisan kitheikhum na chun Abel thisan sangin thilpha jo cheh sei ding aneiye .
58012025	Ching theiyun thuseipa chu jopda khauvin nate ; ajeh chu leiset’a thuseipa thujop louho bon ahoidoh jou lou le , van’a kona thuseipaa konin kiheimang leu hen ihoidoh louhel diu akichen jenge .
58012026	Hichea ogin chun leiset seh bou aholingsoh ahin , tun aman athu tep’in aseiye , " Keiman leiset keoseh hilouva Van geiya khatvei seh akaho ling ding ahi , " ati .
58012027	Hikoma , " Khatvei seh , " kiti hin thilsem jouse kiholingsah a kitolmang ding kichentah-in aseiyin , hitia chu suh ling theilou chengse umden ding ahi .
58012028	Hichejeh chun suh longhoi hilou Lenggam ikisan jeh-un thangvahna neiyu hitin , ginna le jabolna pumin alungdei lamtah-in Pathen lhachan pangu hite .
58012029	Ijeh-inem itile i-Pathennu chu mi kavamhel thei meikou tobang ahi .
58013001	Kisopi ngailutna um jing hen .
58013002	Maljin lhunsah ding hailou jen’un , hitobang hoa hin abangin jong Vantilte geiyin alhunsah tauve .
58013003	Sohchang kihen ho chu toh kihentha bangin kigel’in lang , tahsaphea um jing nahi heuvin lang genthei hesoh thoh te chu geldoh jinguvin .
58013004	Kichen hi mi jousen jabol cheh hen , jalkhun jong kisuhboh da hen ; jonthanhoi bol le mijito jonga chu Pathenin athu atan ding ahi .
58013005	Sum ngailut hinkhon kimang hih-un , nanei chengsen lung lhai jo’uvin ; ajeh chu aman , " Keiman kadonda louhel ding , dajong kada lhah louhel ding nahi , " ati .
58013006	Hijeh a chu eihon kisongtah a isei theiyu chu : " Eipanpia chu Pakai ahin kicha ponge , Mihemin i-eilo ding ham ? " ti hi ahi .
58013007	Nalamkaiteu nakom’uva Pathen Thu naseipeh teu chu geldoh-un lang , anun akhan’u phatah-in geldoh-uvin , atahsan’u chu tho’uvin .
58013008	Jesu Christa chu janhi tuni chule tonsot’in abang ahijinge .
58013009	Thuhil gotchom chom kilhoh mangsah loujen’un , lung hi lungsetna aphudet aphan , neh le chah a phu ding ahipoi , hiti neh le chah thua chonte chun phat chom nan aneideh pouve .
58013010	Houbuh a lhacha kintheng bol hon aneh thei lou nau maicham aneiyui .
58013011	Thempu chungnung hon chonset thensona ding gancha ho thisan chu muntheng chungnunga ahin choilut jiuvin , atahsapum ho vang chu polama agouvamji tauve .
58013012	Hijeh chun ama thisan’a mipi suh thengna dingin Jesun khopi kelkot polam’a thina athoh tai .
58013013	Chuti ahijeh-in ngahmun polam , ama henga potdoh-u hitin , ahouset nau chu gathoh hu hite .
58013014	Ijeh-inem itile hikoma hin eihon khopi det inei pouve , ahung lhung ding khopi joh chu i-hol’u ahibouve .
58013015	Hijeh chun Jesu jal’in vahchoina ho chu Pathen henga kilhaina bangin bol jingu hite , hiche hi ama min phongdoh ho kamsungsoh aga ahi .
58013016	Kikhoto them’a chule ima kikop del chu hai hih-un , hitobang hi Pathen lung lhaiselna kilhai na ahi .
58013017	Nalmakaiteu thun nungun lang athu ngaiyun , nang ho ding thua mopo ahijeh-un , nahinkhou avettup jing jengu ahi ; hiti hin bol leu chun kipah diu ahin , achuti loule lungna diu , nang ho dia phachom lou ding ahi .
58013018	Keiho neitaokop jingun , ima lam jousea hoikom hijongle adih kabol nom jeh-un hetkhanna lungthim phatah neiya kigingcha kahiuve .
58013019	Nang ho henga dia eikilhadoh vahna dinga neitaopehna diuva atumbeh a kahin ngeh nahiuve .
58013020	Chamna Pathen , tonsot kinepna thisan jal’a kelngoite ching minthang i-Pakaiyu Jesu thinaa kona hinpuidoh kit pan
58013021	alungdei lam bol dingin thilpha jousen navon kimsoh-u hen ; Jesu Christa jal’in amasanga alung lhaina bol din ichunguva bol hen , Christa chu tonsot tonsot geiyin loupi jing hen : Amen .
58013022	Sopite , kitilkhouna thu hi angaije them dia ka-ngeh nahiuve , ajehchu keiman paltan’a nahenguva kahinsut ahi .
58013023	Isopiu Timothy alhadoh-u anaheuvin , ahungvah le nang ho vea kahung teng hinpui nange .
58013024	Nalamkaite jousen le mithengte chengse salam’un ; Italy gam miten nasalam’ui .
58013025	Lungset nan nabonchauvin umpi hen .
59001001	Pathen le Pakai Jesu Christa soh Jacob-in gamtin’a kithecheh phung som le phung ni henga salam .
59001002	Kasopite , patepna tin chenga nachuh tengule kipanan geljo’uvin ;
59001003	ajeh chu natahsan’uvin amolso tengle thoh hat asosah chu naheuve .
59001004	Ima lhahsamna beihel’a apumpia nachamkimsoh theina diuvin , thoh hatna natoh chun tong molso hen .
59001005	Nalah-uva chihnaa lhasam aum le it louhel le house louva peji Pathen henga thum hen , chutile kipe ding ahi .
59001006	Amavang athum’an lung opkaina beihel’in tahsanna jal’in bou thum hen , lung opkaina nei vang chu Twikhanglen twi hui mut lonle tobang ahibouve .
59001007	Hitobang mihem chun Pakaiya kona ima mu ding kiholda hen ,
59001008	lungtho nei pasal , akiheina lam jousea lung det lou ahi .
59001009	Sopi lhachomin choi-at’a aum chu kithang-atpi hen .
59001010	Mihaovin jong suhnem’a aum kithang-atpi hen , ajeh chu hao hi hampa banga pulloi ding ahi .
59001011	Ijeh-inem itile nisa hamvevua ahung sat teng hampa agop jin , pahcha ho apul’in , apahhoi jong amoljitai ; hitobanga chu mihao chu akiheina lam jousea molmangji ahitai .
59001012	Lhepna thoh ham hampa chu anun nom’e ; ijeh-inem itile aman athot doh tengle Pathenin ama ngailute peh dinga athutepsa hinna dinga lallukhuh chu akisan ding ahi .
59001013	Lhepna toh khapan , " Pathen in eilhem pate’e , " ti da hen ; ajeh chu Pathen hi thilsen alhemjou pon , aman jong koima alhem patep poi .
59001014	Mi ama ama lunggul chun ajol lhah a akaimang jia lhep patep’a umji ahibouve .
59001015	Hiche lung gul phalou chu naovop banga avop’a , chonset ahindoh a , chonset chu apilhin tengle thina asohdohji ahi .
59001016	Kasopi deitahte , dohan lha hih-un .
59001017	Thilpeh pha chengse le thil-hoi chamkim josue chu chunga kon ahin , khovah Pa Pathena hung kumlha ahi , ama chu kikhel lou , ale jeng jong kihei mang lou ahi .
59001018	Athilsem chengse lah a aga masapen ihi theina diuva aman adei banga thutah a eihin’u ahitai .
59001019	Hiche hi heuvin sopi deitahte . Mitin thu ngaiyin jangkhai cheh hen , thuseiyin ngai kham cheh hen , lungsat’in jong ngai kham cheh hen .
59001020	Ijeh-inem itile mihem lunghan hin Pathen din adih atong doh poi .
59001021	Hijeh chun thilboh jouse le git louna ho letset thil ho pai lhauvin , nahinkhou huhhung thei lung sunga kiphut lutsa thu chu lung nemin kisanjou’vin .
59001022	Ama le ama kilhem lhaa , thu chu moh ngai mai mai hilouvin atongjoh hiuvin .
59001023	Ijeh-inem itile thu chu ngaiya abol’a hilouv mi chu phatvet’a ahinkho umdol kivet mai mai tobang ahin ,
59001024	ama le ama akiven , ache mangjin , apettah chun itobang ahi asumiljitai .
59001025	Amavang chamkimsohna Danthu chamlhatsah thei chu vechenkeiya hichu bol jinga , aja mai hilouva , sumil lou hel’a natoh a podoh jing jeng , hitobang mi chu athilbolnaa nun nom ding ahi .
59001026	Mi khattou hougut’a kigel’a , aleituh tang lou , alungthim kilhep lhah a chu ahougut jong chu moh ahi .
59001027	Chagate le meithaiho agenthei hesoh nau vil’a , vannoi leiset’a kona boh beh louhel’a ama le ama kihongdoh jing thei mi chu Pa Pathen dinga hougut theng le boh beh lou ahi .
59002001	Kasopite , loupi tah i-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa tahsan mi nahijeh un langnei , sihnei nabol lou diu ahi .
59002002	Ijeh-inem itile nakikhop nauva chun ponhoi lul tah sil’a sana khutjem kibu pasal khattou hung lut hen , chule ponse dildel kisil vaicha khutdo khat jong hung lut le ,
59002003	nang hon ponsil lul kisilpa veuvin lang ajah a , " Nangma hikoma hin phatechan touvin , " tivuin ; chule khutdo pa jah a , Nangma dingto , " ahiloule , " Hikoma kakeng khop dop a khun touvo , " tileu chun ;
59002004	nalah-uva dat neiya thu gilou lamtah a vaihom nahilou diu ham ?
59002005	Kasopi deitahte , ngaiyuvin . Vannoi leiset’a vaichate hi Pathenin tahsanna hao ding le ama ngailute dinga athutepna goulo ding lenggam chu chang dia alhendoh hilou ham ?
59002006	Ahinla nang hon vaichate chu nahsah mon naboltauve . Thu tanna phunga nakailut’uva , nabol gentheiyu chu mihao ho hilou ham ?
59002007	Nakikounau Min phatah taitoma jong amaho hilou ham ?
59002008	Amavang Pathen lekhabua leng Danthu dungjuiya , " Nangma nakingailut bangin naheng nakom ngailun , " kit banga bulhit na hiule , nabol pha jengui .
59002009	Dat naneiyu vangle chonset bol nahiuvin , Danthu sukeh dol’a themmo chang nahiutauve .
59002010	Koi hile Danthu apumpia nitsoh a kigel , ahivanga khatseh sukhel’a chu aboncha chunga themmo chang ahi .
59002011	Ijeh-inem itile , " Jonthanhoi bol hih-in , " tipa chun , " Tol that hih-in , " jong ati ahi . Jonthanhoi bolda jong le chun tol natha le Danthu sukeh nahitai .
59002012	Mihem jalensah ji Danthu a athu kitan ding miho bangin hiti chun thu seiyun , hitobang chun na tongun .
59002013	Ijeh-inem itile hepina neilou chu thutanna a hepina beihel’a kibol ding ahi , hepi nan vang thutanna ajoji mong ahi .
59002014	Kasopite , khattou tahsan neiyin kisei hen , natoh la nei hih le ipi phachom em ? Hitobanga tahsanna chun ama ahuhhing thei lou ding hilou ham ?
59002015	Sopi pasal ham sopi numei ham khat chu ponbei le nikho khat an neh ding lhasamin um hen ,
59002016	nalah-uva khat chun , " Chamdel’in kile kit’in , lumsan lang vasettan , " ti hen , tahsa ngaichat thil ima pelouvin um le hichu ipi phachom em ?
59002017	Hitobang hin natoh beiyin tahsan chu achangseh a athisa ahi .
59002018	Hichea jong hin khattouvin , " Nangman tahsan naneiyin , keiman vang natoh kaneiye , " tinte . Natoh bei natahsan chu neivetsah temin , kenjong tahsan jal’a kanatoh chu vetsah inge .
59002019	Nangman Pathen khatseh ahidol natsahsan ahi ong ? Aphai tahsanin ; ahinla thilha hon jong atansan’uva kihot hot jeng ahiuve .
59002020	Vo , pannabei mihem , natoh bei tahsan phatchom lou hi nahet nom mong em ?
59002021	Ipuluiyu Abraham in achapa Isacc maicham chunga atodoh jeng jeh a hiche natoh chu them achanlo hilou ham ?
59002022	Ajeh chu atahsan le athilbol chengsen na atoh khoma , tahsan chu natoh-in asuh chamkim joh ahi ;
59002023	chule hichea hi Pathen lekhabu thusei ; " Abraham in Pathen atahsanin , hichu ama din themchan nan akisimpeh tai , " kiti hi agui lhunge , chujongle ama chu Pathen jol kisah ahitai .
59002024	Hichea kon hin tahsan keoseh jal hilouva , toh molso jeh a mihem them kichansah dol namutauve .
59002025	Hitobang chun Rahab notinun lamthamho alhunsah a lamchom’a asolmang , hiche natoh jeh a chu them kichansah hilou ham ?
59002026	Hiti hin Lhagao bei tahsa athisa ahibangin , natoh bei tahsan jong athisa ma ahibouve .
59003001	Kasopite , nang ho tampi mihil’in pan dauvin , ajeh chu mihil ho hi ichung thuu khoh cheh a akitan ding naheuve .
59003002	Ajeh chu eihon kisuhmona tampi itoh khajiuve . Thusei naa kipal lou mi chu pasal lolhingtah , atahsa geiya apumpia tuh tang thei ahiye .
59003003	Ithu’va anun theina din sakolte khu akamsunguva kamdal ivopeh-u le atahsa pumpia igot gotna kihei ahiuve .
59003004	Ven , kong innei ho khu , lentah ahiuvin , hui hattah-in atol ahivangin , ahehna neocha khat’a aheh pan adeina lam’a aheile ahibouve .
59003005	Hitobanga chu Lei jong hi tibah neocha ahivangin thil lentah a kichoisang ji ahi . Ven , gamkang iten len jongle meisi hal khat’in iti akahvamji hitam !
59003006	Lei hi meikou , adih lou dimset , vannoi leiset ahi ; Lei hi itibah lahuva anakiphut lut ahin , tahsa pumpi hi asuhboh jia , khang lhum keiya , mei banga akah velkol’a hiche meikou hi Damun’a hung kon ahi .
59003007	Ganhing namkim , vacha namkim , tol’a kithol ho , twiya cheng ho ahiuvin vah-ngoi thei ahin , mihemin avah ngoi jiuve .
59003008	Leivang hi mihemte koiman avah ngoi joupoi , um thim thei lou thilse , thina gu dimset ahi .
59003009	Eihon hiche lei hi Pakai le Pathen thangvah nan jong imangun , chule Patheinin ama lim tobanga asem mihemte gaosap nan jong imang jiuve .
59003010	Thangvahna le gaosapna hiche kamsung khat’a hi hung kondoh khomji ahi . Kasopite , hiche ho ahitiji hi adol ahipoi .
59003011	Twisam phung khatseh kosunga kona twi lhum le twikha putkhomji mong em ?
59003012	Kasopite , theichang phunga olive ga theiya , lengpiguiya theichang ga theiyem ? Chitwiyin jong twitheng asemdoh theipoi .
59003013	Nalah-uva aching le hetna nei koi ham ? Ama chun chihnaa hungkon nunnem nan a nun akhan le anatoh phan vetsah hen .
59003014	Amavang nalungthimu’va kithangset kilungdou , kichang chuna aumle nakichoiat lou diu thutah douna jong thujo nasei lou diu ahi .
59003015	Hitobang chihna chu chunga hungkon ahipon , leiset’a kon , Lhagao thudol hilou , thilhaa kon ahibouve .
59003016	Ajeh chu kithangset le kichang chuna umna chan’a kinahna le khansetna jong um tei ahi .
59003017	Chunga kona hung chihna vang chu amasan athengin , chuin kichamdel , kitohdel , nun nemheo , thu nungjel , hepina dimset’a ngailutna gadohji , phat lhemna le lang neina beihel ahi .
59003018	Chule themchanna ga chu chambolte dinga chamnaa kitu ahi .
59004001	Nalah-uva gal kisat le kinah ho hi hoiya hungkon ham ? Natibah dunguva kona nomsahna ding ngaichatna ho kisattoa hungkon hilou ham ?
59004002	Nahagut lheh-un , neila nanei pouvin ; thangset sumin tol na that jiuvin , ahinla nanei theideh pouve ; hijeh chun nakinauvin , nakisat’uve . Nanei lounau hi Pathen henga nathum loujeh-u ahibouve .
59004003	Nathum vangun namu theipouve , ajeh chu natahsa nopsahna ding jenga nagot’uva nathum dol’u aphat loujeh ahi .
59004004	Jonthanhoi bol ho ! Vannoi to kihouthei hi Pathen to kigalna ahi nahet louvu ham ? Hijeh a chu koihile vannoi to kijol’a chu Pathen douva ama le ama kisemdoh ahi tai .
59004005	O-le Pathen lekhabua kisei , " Aman i-sunguva achensah Lhagao hi thengse ten’a ahol jing ahi , " kiti hi mohseh a nagel’u ham ?
59004006	Ahin lungsetna apeh hi alenjjo cheh-in hijeh chun : " Pathenin kiletsahte chu adoudal’in , Anun nem ho chu lungsetna apejie , " ati .
59004007	Hijeh chun Pathen koma kipe lut’un , Diabol chu kidinte piuvin , chutile ama nakom’uva konin jamtante .
59004008	Pathen kom nailut’un , chutile ama nakom’u hung nailut ding ahi . Nakhut’u suthengun , chonseho ; nalungthim suthengun , lungthoneiho !
59004009	Kisih-un , lunghem’un chule kap’un ; nanuiyu chu ka-na chule nakipau chu lungkhamna soh hen !
59004010	Pakai mitmun kisunem’un , chutile aman nachoisang diu ahi .
59004011	Kasopite , khat le khat kisei seto hih-un ; koi hile asopi seisea ham , ahiloule asopi thu tan’a ham chun Danthu aseiset’a chule Danthu chunga thu atan ahi . Nangin Danthu chung thu natan vang le anit’a hilouva athu tanjoh nahibouve .
59004012	Danthu pea le thutan khatseh bou ahin , ama hin ahuhhing theiya , suh jong asuh mang thei ahi ; naheng nakom chung thu tan’a pang nang koi nahim ?
59004013	Tun ngaitem’un , nang ho kimkhatsen , " Tuni ham jing ham le eiho khopi khatpen a cheu hitin kum khat gatham’u hitin , gakiveiyu hitin , sum veikan’u hite , " tin naseiyui .
59004014	Jing teng nahinkhou itobanga aum ding bon helou hel’uva . Ajeh chu nang ho hi twimei chomcha khat hung kilahjia mangkit loiji tobang bou nahiuve .
59004015	Hisanga chu , " Pakai lungdei ahia ihin nah-u le hiche hihen khuche hile bol’u hite , " natijoh diu ahi .
59004016	Tunla nang ho nahamhoitho na jouseu pi chu nakithang-at pi lheh-ui ; hitobang kithang-atna ho hi phalou ahi .
59004017	Hichejeh chun thilpha bolje he naa bol lou mi chu achonse ahi .
59005001	Tun mihao hon ngaiyuvin , nachunguva hesoh genthei hung lhung ding ho jeh hin kap’un lang maovun .
59005002	Nanei jouseu amon mang tan , naponsil jouseu lungin anetai .
59005003	Nasana nadangkau thih-eh souvin anehengsoh tan , hiche thih-eh chu nang ho douna hettohsah a panga , meikah machal banga natahsau jong aneh gam ding ahi . Nang hon la ni nu nunga din gou nakhol’uvin ne !
59005004	Ven , nalou laiyuva chang-at sum thalah ho doha nabol’uva tohman napeh louvu chun kho asamin , hiche chang-at ho khosap ogin chu Hatchungnung Pakai nabeng’a aluttai .
59005005	Nang ho leiset chunga nomsa le ninglhingin nachengun , kilhaina gantha nikhoa tha ding bangin nakivah thao cheh’uve .
59005006	Nang hon midihpa chu themmo nachan’un , nathat tauve . Aman la nadou thuh pouve .
59005007	Sopite , Pakai hungkit kahsen thoh hat’uvin . Ven , loubol min ga pha manlu tah asodohna dingin leiset chun twilha masa le lha nukhah chu thoh hattah-in angah ngah jeng jie .
59005008	Nangho jong thoh hat jingun ; Pakai hungkitna ding anai tah jeh hin , nalungthimu phutdet’uvin .
59005009	Sopite , nathuu kitan louna din khat le khat kiphun hih-un , ven Thutanpa chu kotphunga adingtai .
59005010	Sopite , Pakai min’a thuseiya pang Themgao ho hesoh genthei le thot hatna jouse chu vettoh a jui din kilah-uvin .
59005011	Ven , eiho athoh lhumkei ho chu nun nom ihiu ahi . Nang hon Job thohhat najauvin , achaina Pakaiyin ipi abolpeh jong naheuve ; ajeh chu Pakai hi hepina le khotona dimset ahi .
59005012	Kasopite , ima jousea akhohpen chu : kihahsel hih-un , vanpan in jong kihahsel hih-un , leiset panin jong kihahsel dauvin , ipi pi hi jongle panin kihahsel hih-un ; thutanna noiya nachuh khah louna diuvin " Henge " natiu le tijengun , " Ahipoi , " natiu jongle tijengun .
59005013	Nalah-uva hesoh genthei thoh um am ? Ama chu taohen . Kipah thanom’a um am ? Vahchoi la sahen .
59005014	Nalah-uva adammo um am ? Ama chun Houbung upate kouhen , amahon ama chu Pakai minin thao nu’hen , taopeh-u hen .
59005015	Chutile tahsan jal’a taona chun adammopa chu ahuhdoh a , Pakaiyin ama akaithou ding , chonsetna abol khah jongle hichu ngaidam chang ding ahi .
59005016	Hijeh chun nadam theina dingun khat’in khat koma nachonset phongun lang , khat le khat kitaopeh to’uvin . Midihmi tao peh na chu nasatah a natong thei ahi .
59005017	Elijah chu eiho pendol banga mihem ma ahivangin , gojuh louna dinga lung luttah a atao le , kum thum le lhagup sungin leiset chunga go ajupoi .
59005018	Chuin ataokit le Vanin gotwi ahinpen leiset’in anche louhing ahinsepdoh tai .
59005019	Kasopite , nalah-uva thutah a kona lamvai aum a , ama chu khat touvin ahinlepui kit le ,
59005020	hitobang chonse khat alamvainaa kona hinlepui kit a chu lamvaipa lhagao chu thinaa kona ahuhdoh a chule chonset tampi jong akhupeh ding ahi , hethem’uvin .
60001001	Jesu Christa Solchah Peterin Pontus , Galatia , Cappadocia , Asia chule Bithynia gama kithecheh lhenchom sohchang ho ,
60001002	Pa Pathenin ahet masah dungjuiya Lhagaova kisuthengsa , thua nung dinga Jesu Christa thisan kithekhum ho henga lungset le chamna nachunguva pung jal hen .
60001003	I-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa Pa , ahepina bulhin dungjuiya thina a kona Jesu Christa thodoh jal’a hing jing kinepnaa eihing thah kit’uva Pathen chu nun nom hen ;
60001004	kemthei lou le boh beh lou chule
60001005	nang ho jong tahsan jal’a phat chaina teng phondoh dia gotsa kikoi huhhing na chu chang dia Pathen thahatnaa nakihongbit’u ahi .
60001006	Hichea hin phat chomkhat din patepna lamchom choma lung hem tah a nathoh tei diu hi jong le , hatah-in kipah tahnom’un ;
60001007	hichun meiya patep nung jenga jong mangthei nalai sana sanga munlujo natahsan’u aphot chensah a , Jesu Christa hung kiphondoh teng vahchoina le loupina chule jabolna namupeh diu ahi ,
60001008	Ama chu mu louva ngailua , tuchan geiya jong mu louhel’a tahsan’a seithei louhel’a hapa kipah a loupina dimset nahiuve ;
60001009	ajeh chu natahsan lou na pen’u nahinkhou huhhingna nakimu’u ahitai .
60001010	Nang ho kipe ding lungsetna thudol gaothu anaseidoh Themgao hon hiche huhhingna thudol hi gunchutah a ahol’uva akholtohsau ahitai .
60001011	Koipen tah-in itobang dol’a itih phat laiya , asunguva cheng Christa Lhagaova kona , Christa thohgim ding le nunga aloupina ding ho chu ahettohsah masah a aphondoh ahidol , amahon akholtoh-u ahi .
60001012	Alhacha kinbol ho’u hi achang tum diuva hilouva , nang ho ding ahije ahenguva akiphongdohin , athudol hi tun van’a kona hinkisol Lhagao Theng jal’in Kipana Thupha nahung seipeh ho’uvin nahetsah tauve , hiche ho hi Vantilte jengin jong vetgun atup lheh jengui .
60001013	Hijeh chun kong kigah bangin nalungthim gil’in kigingun lungnemin Jesu Christa hung kiphondoh teng nakipe diu lungsetna a chun lhingset’in kinem jingun .
60001014	Sei ngai chate bangin um’un , masang na-ngol laiyu lunggul’a chonna chu jom hih-uvin ,
60001015	chusangin nakoupau athen bangin nang ho jong nun le khan thengun ,
60001016	ijeh-inem itile , “ Keima kathenjeh-in nang ho jong thengun , ” tin akisun’e .
60001017	Mi anatoh dungjui cheh a langneina beihel’a thutanpehji pa chu Pa nasah ngal’u ahile hikoma nakhopem sung seuvin ama chu ging lhumkeiyuvin .
60001018	Napu napateu hinpehson chonna homkeova kona mangthei sana le dangkaa kilhatdoh nahi louvu naheuve .
60001019	Nolna beihel le bohbeh louhel kelngoi nou Christa thisan lu tah a kilhatdoh nahibouvui .
60001020	Ama chu vannoi leiset bul kiphu masanga hetsa ahin , phat kichai kona hi nang ho khohsahna jeh a phondoh ahung um ahibouve .
60001021	Ama jal’a natahsan’u le nakinep nau chu Pathen koma aum theina dinga Christa thinaa kona kaithouva loupi sah Pathen tahsante nahiu ahitai .
60001022	Kisopi ngailut thengsel dinga thutah thua nunga nahinkhou nasuh thengu ahitah le khat le khat lungthim giltah-in ki-ngailuvin .
60001023	Nang ho hi tonsot’a um jing Pathen Thuhing jal’a athi thei hilouva thimo chilhah akona avel’a pengkit nahitauve .
60001024	Ajeh chu : “ Tahsa mihing jouse hampa tobang ahin , Aloupina jouse jong hampa tobang ahi ; Hampa agop jin , apah apuljitai ;
60001025	Pakai thu vang tonsot’in aum jingnai , ” akiti . Hiche thu hi nahenguva Kipana Thupha kiseiphong chu ahi .
60002001	Gitlouna jouse le doha lhep lhahna jouse phat lhemna ho le thangsetna ho chule kiseisetna jouse pai lhauvin ,
60002002	naosen pengthah bangin huhhingna lama khantouna nanei theina diuvin , halpi beihel Lhagao bongnoi chu ngaicha jingun .
60002003	Ajeh chu nang hon Pakai mi khotona chu natep khahsau ahitai .
60002004	Chule Pakai , hing jing , Songpi , mihemten apai vanga Pathen dia lhentum manlu tah henga chun hunguvin ,
60002005	nang ho jong song hing jing tobanga Lhagao in khat’a kisadoh a Thempu thengloi hiding , Jesu Christa jal’a Pathen santhei dol’a kilhaina Lhagao thilto toh ding nahiuve .
60002006	Ijeh-inem itile Pathen lekha bua hitin akisun’e : “ Ven , Zion a Songpi katun khu , Inning khompi lhentum manlu tah ahi ; Ama tahsan chan chu Jum kimusah louhel ding ahi , ” ati .
60002007	Hijeh chun nang ho atahsante din manlu tah ahin , athasan lou ho din vang : “ Insa hon deimoa apaiyu Songpi chu Inning khompipenin apangtai , ” akiti .
60002008	Chule : “ Kisuh khahna Song , Kipal lhuhna Songpi asohtai , ” akiti . Thu chu angai loujeh-uva kipal lhu ahitauvin , hiti dinga chu umdoh ahitauve .
60002009	Nangho vang nam lhentum , Lengpa dia thempu , namtheng , Pathen mite nahiuvin , hitia chu muthima kona ama khovah kidangtah a nakoudoh Pau phatna chengse chu naphondoh diu ahi .
60002010	“ Phat khat chun Pathen mite nahipouvin , Tunvang amite nahitauve ; Hepina chang lou nahiuvin , Tun vang hepina nachangtauve , ” akiti .
60002011	Deitahte , kholjin le sohchang bangin Lhagao to kigalto jing tahsepha lunggul jousea kona kihei mang dinga ka-ngeh nahiuve .
60002012	Chidang namdang ten nang ho thilse bol’a naseina jenguva jong nanun nakhanu chu phatsah-uvin , chutile natohphatna jouseu amu’va , athudol akikhol toh nikho le Pathen avahchoi diu ahi .
60002013	Pakai jal’in mihem phudoh thuneina jousea nungun ; lengpa chu aboncha chunga vaipo ahin ,
60002014	gamvaipo ho chu thilse bolte talen matsah ding le thilpha bol ho seipha dinga Pakai sol ahiuve .
60002015	Ijeh-inem itile thilpha kiboldoh chengsea lungthim beiho ngolna kasanmo hel’a lha ding hi Pathen lungdei lam ahi .
60002016	Jalente bang hiuvin , amavang jelenna chu gitlou khuna neilouvin , Pathen sohte bangin um’uvin .
60002017	Mi jouse jabol cheh-un , kisopitna ngailu’uvin , Pathen gingun , lengpa chu jaboluvin .
60002018	In mun lhachate ijakaiyin naPakaiteu gingun athu’uvin nunguvin , mipha ho le anun nem ho keo jong hilouvin , milungkhohho thun jong nungun .
60002019	Ijeh-inem itile mikhattouvin Pathen ahet khen them jeh a athoh ding lom lou gim genthei hesoh athoh le hichu ama dinga vangbohna hijo ahi .
60002020	Ajeh chu chonsetna jeh-in min deng hen lang thip beh-in thoh thoh jeng leu chun ipi phachom am ? Chusangin thilpha bolna chunga hesoh genthei thoh thoh leu chun hichu Pathen dia kipana ahi .
60002021	Christan nang ho dia hesoh genthei athoh a vetkah ding khat nadalhah peh-uva , nang hon ama khonung najui diu deinaa , hiche dinga chu kikou nahiuve .
60002022	“ Aman chonset abolpon , Akamsunga jong doha lhep lhahna akimudohpoi , ” akiti .
60002023	Houset achanin ahouse thuh pon , athohgim pet’in jong agihsalpoi ; dihtah a thutanpa koma akipedohjoi .
60002024	Aman eiho chonset jouse atahsaphen apon , thingpel chunggeiyin apodoh-in , chonsetna jousea i-thiuva , themchanna a ihin theina diuvin aboltan , ama kijepna mahan eidamsah tauve .
60002025	Nang ho kelngoite banga vahcheh gam nahitauvin , tua nahinkhou vettuppeh Pa le na chingpau henga hung kilekit nahitauve .
60003001	Hiche bang chun numei jouse najipateu noiya kunjel’uvin , chutile thu ngailou ho jeng jong chu numeiho khanthem jeh a thu phalouva kihinsojo ding ahi ;
60003002	nagin themjeu le nakhan themu , boh beh louhel chu vetsah-uvin .
60003003	Sampheh hoi le sana khi-o , leiset ponsil nihchen hoiya , polam thil’a kijem louvin ,
60003004	Pathen angsunga manlu tah , chul thei lou , Lhagaova nunnem le lungnem , lungthimgil’a mihem giltah joh chun kijem’un .
60003005	Ijeh-inem itile masang laiya numei theng , Pathen’a kinem jing ho jong chu hitia hi anakijem ahiuvin , ajipateu thu thun anung’ui .
60003006	Sarah jong chu Abraham thun anungin , amapa chu Pakaiti geiyin aseiye ; nang hon imacha ginglouhel’a amanu thilpha bol tobang chu nabol’u le achate nahiuve .
60003007	Hitobangma chun pasal hon jong numei ho chu alhasamjo , bel kehbai tobang ahi heuvin , jabol chansah-un lang , lungsetna hinkho naneikhomu jong ahijeh-in , chenkhompiuvin , chutile nataokhom nau suh noh phah a um lou ding ahi .
60003008	Achai nan nabonchan lungkhat hiuvin , kilainatto cheh-un , kisopi ngailut’un , kidipdap to’uvin , nun nem’un lang ,
60003009	setna chu setnan thuh dauvin , houset chu house thuh hih-un , chusangin phatthei bohjo’uvin , ajeh chu phatthei boh lo dinga kikou nahibouvui .
60003010	Ijeh-inem itile : “ Hinna ngailut ding deiya , Nikho phaho mu ding nom’an Gitlouna akonin alei tuh tang hen , Akamin jong doha lhep lhahna seida hen .
60003011	Ama chu agilouva konin kihei mang hen thilpha boljo hen . Chamna hol hen lang hichu jui jing hen .
60003012	Ajeh chu Pakaiyin midihte ave-lhi jingin , Atao nau angai lhi jing jenge ; Thilse bolte Pakaiyin avesal jinge , ” ati .
60003013	Nang ho thilpha bolna dinga tom ngaitah nahiule , kon nabolset diu ham ?
60003014	Ahinla adih jal’in hesoh genthei thoh tahbeh jong leu chun anun nom nahiuve . Amavang hite ho ginna chun kicha loujen’un , lung jong lungkham hih-un .
60003015	Amavang nalungthim’uva Christa chu Pakai ahina bangin athengin geljingun , nasunguva um kinepna thudol chu adonga aum le kitoh chet’a donbut din phat jousen kigosademin um’uvin .
60003016	Lungnem le ginggeh chan bol’un , ima datkhenna pha neiyun , chutile Christa jal’a nachonphat nau seise ho chu athuseiyuva kijumso diu ahi .
60003017	Thilse boljeh a hesoh genthei thoh sanga , Pathen lungdei lam ahile thilpha boljeh a genthei hesoh thoh chu gamchenga phajo ahi .
60003018	Ajeh chu chonset jeh a nang ho dia Chritan hesoh genthei khatvei thoh a athoh a , midih lou ho dinga midih chun athoh a , nang ho Pathen kom na lhut theina diu abol ahin , tahsaphea thia Lhagaova hing ahitai .
60003019	Lhagaova chea , Lhagaova songkul lut ho henga thu agahil lhang lea ,
60003020	Noah nikho laiya Pathenin lungde hattah a angauva , Kong innei kisui laisea Pathen thu ngailou lhagao ho chu agahil ahi ; twisanglet’a kong sunga sohchaa chu mihem themcha , get seh bou ahiuve .
60003021	Tua chuche twisanglet lim’a kibol Baptize chan hin tahsaphe nen suhthengna hilouva , lungthim gelkhen themna phaa Pathen henga kitepna kisem’a , thinaa kona Jesu Christa thodoh jal’a nahuhhingu ahitai .
60003022	Jesu Christa chu van’a akaltouvin Pathen jetlam’a atouvin , Vantil jouse le thuneina , thahatna jouse ama noiya alutsoh tai .
60004001	Christan tahsphea athohgim bang chun nang ho chutobang din kivon’uvin , ajeh chu tahsaphea thohgima chu chonset’a kona ong doh del ahi .
60004002	Chuti ahijeh-in tahsaphea nahinna dingu phat um nalai sea jong hin , mihem lunggul lama hilouvin , Pathen lungdei lamjoh-in hungun .
60004003	Ijeh-inem itile khohsa louhel’a phat sotpi hi chidang namdangten atohnom lam jonthanhoi , huh , jinuh hat , nopsahna , julop , dan neiloule semthu doilim houlam’a kimang nahiuvin , hichu pha set tante .
60004004	Hichea hi nang hon amaho chonval manthahna chu najop lou phat’uva kidang saa natai pongjiu ahibouve .
60004005	Mihing le mithi thutan dinga kigosadempa ang’a amahon achung thuu akipeh lut diu ahinai .
60004006	Hichejeh a chu mithi ho jeng jong tahsaphea ahin laiyun , mihemdol’in athuu kitanta jong le , Pathen lama Lhagaova ahinna diuva Kipana Thupha agaseipeh ahiuve .
60004007	Thil jouse kichaina ding anai tai . Hijeh chun tao dingin lunglimgeh le kitim themin um jingun .
60004008	Imajouse chungvuma nang hon khat le khat ki-ngailutna giltah neiyun , ajeh chu ngailut nan chonset tampi jong akhujol theiye .
60004009	Phunchel louhel’in khat le khat kilhunsah to’uvin .
60004010	Pathen lungsetna Jatchom chom gouching phatah bangin , amitakip Lhagao thilpeh akisan cheh chu khat le khat kijento nan mang chauvin .
60004011	Koi hile thuseiyan Pathen thubou seihen ; lhacha kinbol’an jong Pathenin apeh thahat dungjuiyin bol hen ; chutile ima jousea Jesu Christa jal’a Pathen chu vahchoiya um jing ding ahi , Jesu Christaa loupina le thahat tonsot’a um jing jeng ahi : Amen .
60004012	Deitahte , nang ho patepna dia nalah-uva meikou banga hung um chu , thil kidang nachunguva soh bangin datmo hih-uvin .
60004013	Chusangin ama loupina ahung kiphondoh teng le lhingset’a nakipana diuvin Christa thohgimna chu thoh khompijo’uvin .
60004014	Nang ho Christa min jal’a houset nachan’u le anun nom nahiuve , ajeh chu loupina le Pathen Lhagao nachunguva hung chua ahitai .
60004015	Nalah-uva koi hile toltha jeh ham , guhchat jeh ham , mi tohna chunga khut lhah jeh ham jeh-in thohgim da hen .
60004016	Amavang Christian hijeh a thohgim’a chun jachatnan neida hen , Christian min chun Pathen choi-anjo hen .
60004017	Ajeh chu thutanna ding phat hung lhunga Pathen insunga kipanding ahitan , eiho chunga akipat masah le , Pathena kon Kipana Thupha ngailoute akichaina ding chu ipi hitan tem ?
60004018	Ajeh chu : “ Midih dinga huhinga um ahahsat le Pathen ngaisah loule chonseten hoilam asuh diu hitam ? ” akiti .
60004019	Hijeh a chu Pathen lungdeiya hesoh genthei thoh ho chun hitobanga chu thilpha abol jinguva ahinkhou tahsan umtah Asempau khut’a apehdoh diu ahi .
60005001	Christa thohgimna hetoh le ahung kiphongdoh ding loupina chankhompi chule na-upat piu khat kahijeh a nalah-uva upate ka-ngeh nahiuve ;
60005002	nalah-uva Pathen kelngoi hon um chu chingphauvin , bol lou phamoa vetup hilouvin , Pathen deidol’in lung chamtah-in boljo’uvin , alam louva phatchom ding deina jong hilouvin , lung guttenin bol’un .
60005003	Nakichinsah ho chunga kipiput sah louvin , kelngoi honin avetsuiya , ajui thei din umjo’uvin .
60005004	Ajeh chu kelngoi Chingpipu ahung kilah teng le nang hon chul thei lou loupina lallukhuh chu nasan diu ahi .
60005005	Hitobang chun khangdong ho jong upate thun nunguvin . Nabonchauvin khat’in khat chunga din kineosahna chu ponsil bangin kivon’un ; ijeh-inem itile : “ Pathenin mi kiletsahte adoudal’in , Kineosate chu lungsetna apei , ” akiti .
60005006	Hijeh chun Pathen ban-gol kha tah noiya kisunemsoh keiyun , chutile aman aphat cha nachoisang thei diu ahi .
60005007	Nalungkhamna jouseu Ama chunga sep lhauvin , ajeh chu aman nakhankho diu agel nai .
60005008	Lung limgeh-un , kigingphauvin . Nakidoupi Diabol chu Phaisameigeo kitumlet lut banga , koi hijongle val lhum jeng dia vah lea ahol ahi .
60005009	Nadoupau chu tahsan nan kidinte piuvin , vannoiya nasopite jousen jong hitobang hesoh genthei thoh hahsa hi athohsoh keiyu nahetsau ahi .
60005010	Lungsetna tin cheng kimsoh Pathen , Christa jal’a aloupina dinga tonsot’a dia nakoupauvin , chom khat gim genthei nathoh jou tengu le nasem phat’uva , nasuhdet diu ahi .
60005011	Ama chu tonsot geiyin tha hatna chang jing hen : Amen .
60005012	Kageldol’a tahsan umtah sopi Silvanus kamanchah a hichelekha thot chomcha hi kahinsut’a , Pathen lungsetna atahbeh ahidol hi tilkhouva kahettohsah nahiuve ; hichea chun dingdet jingun .
60005013	Lhenchom nahipiu Babylon gama um nu le kachapa Mark-in nasalam’ui .
60005014	Ngailut nan kichopto’uvin , khat le khat kisalam’uvin . Christa to hingkhom jouse nachunguva cham leng hen .
61001001	Jesu Christa soh , solchah a pang Simon Peterin , huhhingpa Jesu Christa le i-Pathen’u dihna jal’a keiho to kibang cheh a tahsanna chang jouse henga :
61001002	Pathen le i-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa nahet nauva konin lungsetna le chamna nachunguva lhingset’in pungjal hen .
61001003	Ama loupina le aphatna chankhompi dinga eikoupau ihet jehuva , Pathen ngaisah a hintheina dia , thil ijakai aboncha a Pathen thahatna kona eipeh-u ahitai .
61001004	Vannoiya umsa tahsa lunggul manthahnaa kona jamdoh a , hichea kona chu Pathen hinna lim chu ichankhompi theina diuva , hiti thudol’a chu thutep chung nung pen manlu tah chu eipeh-u ahi .
61001005	Hichejeh tah chun najo chanin bol’un lang phatna chu natahsan’u belap sah-un , phatna chu hetna be lap sah un ,
61001006	hetna chu kitim themna belap sah-un , kitim themna chu thoh hatnan belap sah un , thohhat na chu Pathen ngaisah nan belap sah-un ;
61001007	Pathen ngaisahna chu kisopi ngailutnan belapsah un , kisopi ngailut chu ngailut nan belap sah-uvin .
61001008	Ijeh-inem itile nang hon hicheng hi bulhingset’a naneiyule , hichun i-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa nahet nauva chatmo le ga beiya nakoi louhel diu ahi .
61001009	Hicheng neilou mi chu mitcho , khomu lou ahin , masang achonsetna chengsea kona kisop thengsa ahichu asumiljitai .
61001010	Hijeh chun sopite , nakikou nau le nakilhendoh nau chu kichetsahna din kihabol cheh kit’un ; chuti bol leu chun itih chan ajong nakipal lhuh lou diu ahi .
61001011	Hiti dol’a chu i-Pakaiyu le huhhingpa Jesu Christa tonsot lenggam sunga lutna thei lhingset’a nanei diu ahiye .
61001012	Nang hon nahetsau le naneisau thutah achu dettah a pangdet hita jong leu chun hiti hohi geldohsah jing dinga kagot ahi .
61001013	Hiche pon-in tobang tahsaphea kahin laisea , hiti thudol hea nang ho geldohsah jinga , mit hah jinga umsah ding hi dih kasai .
61001014	Ajeh chu i-Pakaiyu Jesu Christan eihetsah dungjuiyin pon-in tobang hiche katahsa hi kadalhah loiding kahetai .
61001015	Kapotdoh nung teng geiya hiche ho hi nageldoh jing theina diuva kajochan’a na habola kabol ding ahi .
61001016	Keihon i-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa le ahung kit ding thu nang ho kahetsah-uva chu semthu pou mangchaa seikahipouvin , alal loupina mittah a mua kaseiyu ahibouve .
61001017	Ijeh-inem itile aman Pa Pathena kona jabolna le loupina akisan’a , lal loupi chungnungpen a kona ahenga hung ging O-chun “ Nangma kachapa deitah nahin , nachunga ka lung alhai ta-ngeiye , ” atipet tah chun
61001018	ama le keiho molvum theng chunga ka-umkhomuve , hiche ogin chu van’a kona hung ahi kajauve .
61001019	Hijeh chun Themgao thusei chu ginchatna dettah kaneiyun , nang hon jong khoh sah leu chun aphai , ajeh chu hiche hi munthim laiya khovah lhah geiya kivah tobang le nalungthim sunguva dia Jingvalpa vah tobang ahi .
61001020	Amasa hiche hi nahet diu ahi , Themgao thusei kisundoh jouse hi koiman achamtah a aledoh a ahilchet theidol ahipoi ;
61001021	ajeh chu gaothusei khat cha beh jong hi mihem lungdeiya hung um doh ahipoi , Lhagao Theng cho-thouva mihemhon Pathena kona aseidohji ahibouve .
61002001	Mipi lah a Themgao lhem ho anaum banga chu , nang ho lah a jong mihil lhem ho hung sohdoh diu ahi ; amaho hin manthahna thuhil lhem ahinpoh doh-uva , amaho chodoh Pakai jeng jong aseilep diu , man gangtah a achunguva manthahna akilhut khum diu ahi .
61002002	Tampin ahuh nau nung ajuiyuva , amaho jeh a chu thutah lampi jeng jong taitom’a hung um ding ahi .
61002003	Jou thua kiloset sumkolveina nahin nei dingu ahi ; ahinla masanga pat achung thuu kitansa chu akipel hih laiyin , asumang pau jong alulhu hih laiye .
61002004	Pathenin Vantil chonse ho jeng jong khen louhel’in Damun’a aleh lut jengin , hikoma chun Thupi tan ngah din muthim lah a thih khaovin ahen’e .
61002005	Pathen helou leiset , leiset masa , twisang alet khumsah a asuh mang chun khen aneipoi , them channa thuseiphonga pang Noah le adang mihem sagi chubou akhendoh-e .
61002006	Sodom le Gomorrah khopi te ni chung thu atan jong chun vutvam asosah jengin , Pathen ngaisah lou ding mite chunga thu soh vetkah nan asumangtai .
61002007	Huh lama kipe , chonseho jal’a hesoh gentheiya um midih Lot chu ahuhdoh-e .
61002008	Ijeh-inem itile hiche midih chu alah-uva chenga , danbeiya athilbol ho’u ani nia amua , ajah le them changa um ahinkho jeng jong hesoh genthei thoh a um ahitai .
61002009	Pakaiyin Pathen ngaisahte patep’a aum nauva kona huhdohje ahen , adih lou ho thutan nikhoa talen matsah dinga koije jong ahei ;
61002010	ahideh chun tahsaphe lunggul lam jenga kipea chon ho , Vaipopa nah sah lou ho ahiuve . Amaho hi angol han’un , alung chamin achon’uvin , loupina changsa ho jeng jong taitom ding akicha pouve .
61002011	Ahinla Vantilte chu amaho sanga thunei le thaneijo ahi vangun , Pakai ang sunga amaho houset’a taitomna ima ahinlhut pouvin ahi .
61002012	Hiche miho vang hi lungthimbei , gamsa tobang , amangthah dinga mihem ngaiya pang mai mai ahiuvin , hetna beiya taitom ahiuve ; hijeh a chu amanthahna diuva mangthah tei diu ahi .
61002013	Alam louva abol man’u adih lou akisan diu ; sun chang laiya aning anop’a chonjeng hi lung nachimna ageluva , boh beh le nolna um ahiuvin , doha nalhep’uva nopsahna dinga nang ho to ankong aumkhomjiu ahi .
61002014	Amit’u la jongthanhoi na ding adimset’in , chonset bol la atang theipouve ; hinkhoa dindetna beiho chu ajol lhauvin , sumselna lam jenga kihil themsa lungthim aneiyun , sapset chang chate ahiuve .
61002015	Amahon lam jang adalhauvin , lamhilouva akihei mang gam’un , athil dih lou bolnan sum deichaa Besor chapa Balaam lampi joh ajuitauve .
61002016	Ahinla Balaamin Dan asuh khel jeh chun pho na achangtan , Paomosa-nganin mihem paovin thu aseiyin Themgaopa ngolna chu asutang tai .
61002017	Amaho hi twi kangsa , twisamphung ho le khopi huiyin alhoh mangji meilhang ho tobang ahiuvin , amaho dinga muthim lhangkhal jing lai chu kikheh khol ahitai .
61002018	Ajeh chu amahon hamhoi tho nan , manlou pou aseiyun , vahthai ho lah a um , hung jamdoh nah nah ho jong tahsaphe ngaichat , huhna lama ajol lhajiuve .
61002019	Ajol lhah ho’u chu jalen din atepeh-un , amaho tah jongla kemmang thei soh a kihen joh ahi tauve , ajeh chu galjoupan ajosa chu soh a anei ngai mong ahinai .
61002020	Ijeh-inem itile i-Pakaiyu le huhhing pa Jesu Christa hetna jal’a vannoi leiset kisuhbohna tin chenga jamdohsa mihem chu , hichenga akihen-oh kit’a hicheng chun ajokit teng le aum chan’u chu amasaa sangin gamchengin akhoh cheh jitai .
61002021	Hi jeh chun ahet nunguva , amaho kipe , thupeh thenga kona akihei mang sangun , dihna lampi chu ahet’a ahet lou hel’u hile pha jotading ahi .
61002022	“ Uiyin aloh anehkit jin , silngimsa vohcha bonlhoh lah a akibol kitji , ” kiti paochamtuh hi amaho chung thua adih lheh jengin ahi .
61003001	Deitahte , hiche hi kalekha thot ni lhin na ahitai , lekha te nia hi , thoh hatna jeh a lung ngaito thengsel nanei theina dinguva geldohsah a kahinsuh thoujiu ahi .
61003002	Masang laiya Themgao theng ho thuseina le Pakai le huhhingpa thupeh solchahhoa kona najahsau chu geldohsah kitna ding jong ahiye .
61003003	Amasan hiche hi heuvin , ni nukhah teng mi jontai hatten jontai jeng apat’uva , ama tahsaphe lunggul lam jenga hung chon diu ,
61003004	amahon , “ Ahung kitna ding thutep chu hoi lamba hitam ? Ajeh chu ipu ipateu la athisoh tan , thilsem jouse hi la semtila’ bep bep’in aum jingin , ” atiu diu ahi .
61003005	Ijeh-inem itile amahon Pathen thusah a kona masang laiya pat van umsa ahile , twi lah a kon , twi jeh a leiset kisemdoh jong hi henasa kihetmo sah ahiuve .
61003006	Hichejeh a chu chulai vannoi leiset chu twisanglenin achup’a manghel ahitai .
61003007	Hiche Pathen thu ma maa chu tulaiya van le leiset jong hi Pathen hephalou te chung thu kitan’a kisuhmang nikhoa dinga kikhen’a , meiya halvam dinga kikheh khol ahi .
61003008	Vo deitahte , Pakai dia nikho khat hi kum sang khat tobang ahin , kum sang khat jong nikho khat tobang ahidol hi sumil loujenun .
61003009	Mi kon khat’in ngongkaiya agel vangun , thutep dol’a Pakai chu angongkaipoi ; koima manthah ding adeilou jeh a abonchauva lung aheisoh manna diuva , nang ho jeh a , kho-ngaisot ahibouve .
61003010	Ahinla Pakai nikho chu gucha banga hung ding ahin ; ahung ni le chun van ho chengse ging lul lul’a , kitolmang hel ding , thilbul chengse meikouva jol mangsoh ding , vannoi lseiset le asunga um na kitong jouse jong kavam soh hel ding ahi .
61003011	Hitobanga hi thil jouse hung kisumang ding ahitah jeh-in , itobang dol ham’a nakigot diu akhoh tai , nun le khan , thenna lam , Pathen ngaisahna ,
61003012	Pathen hungkitna ding nikho ho ngah jingle sunai jinga naum diu ahi ; ahung lhun nikho le van ho chengse meiya kouva vamhel ding , thilbul chengse jong meiyin akah a jolmangsoh ding ahi .
61003013	Eihon ama thutep , adih jenga umna , vanthah le leiset thah chu i-ngau ahi .
61003014	Hijeh chun deitahte , hicheng hi kat jinga naum nauva , ama henga nolna beihel le boh beh louva nahung mudoh theina diuvin , chamdel’a um din kihabol’un .
61003015	Chule sopi deitah-u Paul’in ama kipe chihna dungjuiya nahenguva ahinsutsa bang chun , huhhing channa dia i-Pakaiyu mi kho ngaisotje hi gel’uvin .
61003016	Alekha thot ho sunga chu hiche thudol ho asei ahin , asunga chun het hahsa tah tah jong aumin , hiche ho hi lungdet lou hon Pathen lekhabu dang abolna bangun ahilkon le jiuvin , amaho manthahna akiboldoh lo jiuve .
61003017	Hijeh chun deitahte , nang hon vang hemasauvin lang , kiging phauvin , achutilou le Danbeiho manthahna chun nalhoh mang thauva , panmundetsa chu nalhaso khah diu ahi .
61003018	Chusangin i-Pakaiyu le huhhingpa Jesu Christa lungsetna le hetnan khangtou jingun , Amaa chun loupina tu le tonsot kum khon um jing hen : Amen .
62001001	Hiche hi semtil’a umsa , kajahsau , keihon mit’a kamusau , chule khut’a kathamsau chuche hinna thudol chu ahin ,
62001002	hiche hinna chu ahung kilangdoh tan , chuche tonsot hinna , Pa koma um jingsa , keiho henga hung kilangdoh chu vechen’a hettohsah a , nahenguva kaphondoh-u ahi .
62001003	Keiho to ikiloikhom theina diuva kamusau le kajahsau chu nahenguva kaphondoh-u ahi . Keiho kiloikhomna hi Pa le Achapa Jesu Christa to kiloikhomna ahi .
62001004	Kakipa nau achamkimsohna dinga hicheng hi kahinsut ahi .
62001005	Pathen hi khovah ahiye , ama sunga muthim aum louhel hi keihon amaa kona kajah-uva , nahenguva kaphondoh-u thu kithot chu ahi .
62001006	Eiho amato kiloikhom’a kiseiya muthim sunga ivale vangule , jousei ihiuvin , thutah dungjuiya na tong lou ihiuve .
62001007	Ama khovah sunga aum banga , eiho jong khovah sunga ivale vangule , eiho khat le khat kiloikhomna nei ihiuvin , Acha pa Jesu thisanin chonsetna chengsea kona eisop thengsoh-u ahi .
62001008	Eiho chonset neilouva ikisei vangule , eiho le eiho kilhem lhaa , thutah chu isunguva um lou ahi .
62001009	Eihon ichonsetna jouseu iphondoh vangule , ichonsetna jouse ngaidam ding le then louna jousea kona eisutheng diuva , ama chu tahsan umtah le dihtah ahi .
62001010	Eiho chonse louva ikiseiyule , ama chu ijoubol’uva athu eiho sunga umlou ahi .
62002001	Kachate , nachonset louna diu vin hicheng hi nahenguva kahinsun’e . Ahin khattou chonse jeng tajongle , Pahenga eisei champeh diu , dih tah Jesu Christa ineinauve .
62002002	Aman chu eiho chonset jouse thoina ahi , eiho chang jenga jong hilouva vannoi pumpi ding jong ahi .
62002003	Athupeh chengse init’u le ama ihetsau ahidol kichen ding ahi .
62002004	Khattouvin , “ Ama kahetai , ” atia , athupeh chengse la anit loule mijou ahin , asunga thutah umlou ahibouve .
62002005	Athu nit’a vang chu , hiche anitna jeh a chu Pathen ngailutnaa kisuchamkimsoh ahitai . Hichea hi ama sunga um ihiu iheuve .
62002006	Ama sunga um jinga kiseiya chu Christa chonchan banga chontei ding ahi .
62002007	Deitahte , nahenguva thupeh thah kahinsunpoi , semtil’a pat nanei sau thupeh lui chu ahibouve ; na jahsau chu hiche thupeh lui thu hi ahi .
62002008	Muthim beisoh deh deh a , khovah tah beh hung vah pan thudol , nang ho le Christa sunga um thutah thudol thupeh thah jong nahenguva kahinsun nai .
62002009	Khovah sunga um’a kiseiya , asopi hotbol nalai chu tugeiya muthim sunga um ahibouve .
62002010	Asopi ngailua vang chu khovah sunga umah ahitan , ama sunga hin kipal lhuhna aumpoi .
62002011	Asopi hotbol nalai vang chu muthim sunga um , muthim sunga vah le ahin , muthimchun amit te ni achotsah jeh-in , hoilam ajot jong ahepoi .
62002012	Chate , Ama min jal’a nachonset jouseu ngaidam ahijeh a Nahenguva kahinsut ahi .
62002013	Pate , semtil’a pat ama chu nahetsau ahijeh a Nahenguva kahinsut ahi . Khangdong ho , agiloupa nanan jou phat’uva Nanghenguva kahinsut ahi .
62002014	Chapangte , Pa chu nahet phat’uva Nahenguva kahinsutsa ahi . Pate , Ama chu semtil’a pat nahetsau ahijeh a Nahenguva kahinsutsa ahitai . Khangdong ho , nathau aphat’a Nasunguva Pathen thu aum jinga , Agiloupa chu nanan jou phatu’va Nahenguva kahinsutsa ahitai .
62002015	Vannoi leiset le leiset sunga um thil ho ngailu hih hel’un ; koi hile vannoi leiset ngailua chu Pa-ngailutna asunga um lou ahi .
62002016	Ijeh-inem itile vannoi leiset’a um chengse tahsaphe lung ngaichat le mit te nin jon lunggul’a amu , chule hinkhoa kimoh vahchoi-hiti ho hi Paa hungkon ahipon , vannoi leiset’a konjoh ahibouve .
62002017	Vannoi leiset le athil ngaichat lunggul abeikon ahitan , Pathen lungdei lam nol’a vang chu tonsot’a um jing ding ahi .
62002018	Chapangte , nidan nukhah ahitan , Christa doupa hung ding najah banguvin , tun Christa douho tampi asohdoh tauve ; hichea kon hin nidan nukhah ahi ihetauve .
62002019	Amaho hi ilah-uva kona potdoh ahiuvin , eiho lah a vang apang pouve ; eiho lah a pang hileu iumkhom jing diu ahi ; ilah-uva apan louvu akiphondoh theina dia potdoh ahitauve .
62002020	Nang ho vang Athengpa thaonu changkha nahiuvin , hijeh chun ijakai nahesoh keiyui .
62002021	Thutah nahet loujeh-uva nahenguva kahinsut ahipon , hiche nahet’uva , thujou ho hi thutah akon ahilou nahet jeh-uva kahinsut ahibouve .
62002022	Jesu chu Christa hisah louva seileppa , jousei ahiloule koi dangba hiding ham ?
62002023	Chapa seilep jousen Pa aneilou ahin , Chapa phongdoh jousen vang Pa anei ahi .
62002024	Nang hon semtil’a pat najahsau chu nasunguva um jing hen ; semtil’a pat najahsau nasunguva aum vang le , nang ho jong Chapa le Pa sunga um jing nahiuve .
62002025	Amatah-in eitep’u athutep chu tonsot’a hinna hi ahi .
62002026	Hicheng hi nang ho lhem lhaji ho thudol’a kahinsut ahitai .
62002027	Nang hon vang ama thaonu chu nakisan’uva , nasunguva aum jeh-in , nahil diu midang koima na-ngaicha pouve ; amaa kona naneiyu thaonu chu thutah hiya , jousei ahilou jeh-in , ijakai thudol nahilsoh nauve . Hejih chun aman nahil bangun amasunga um jinguvin .
62002028	Chule tun chate , ama ahung kilah teng kisonna ineiyuva , ahungkit tengle maimohna ineilouna diuvin , ama sunga um jing jenguvin .
62002029	Ama chu adihje nahet’ulle , adih bol jouse hi amaa kona pengdoh ahidol jong nahet diu ahi .
62003001	Veuvin , Pathen chate i-kisah thei na diuva Pan eipeh-u ngailutna hi iti natsat hitam ! Chule hichu hijong ihitauve . Hijeh a hi Vannoiyin eihet louvu ahi , ajeh chu Pathen jong ahepouve .
62003002	Deitahte , tun eiho Pathen chate i-hitauvin , ahivangin ipi ihung hidiu akichen hih laiye . Ama ahung kilah teng le eiho jong ama to ibah diu vang iheuve , ajeh chu ama ahi na banga imu diu ahi .
62003003	Ama jal’a hiche kinepna nei chan chu ama atheng banga ama jong kisuhtheng ahi .
62003004	Koi hile chonset bol’an Danthu to kikal abol ahi , ijeh-inem itile Danthu to kikal chu chonset ahi .
62003005	Ama sunga chu chonset beihel ahijeh a chonset pomang dinga ama hung kilah ahi naheuve .
62003006	Koi hile ama sunga um jouse achonsepoi ; achonse jousen ama chu mujong amukhah lou , het jong ahet khah louvu ahibouve .
62003007	Chate , koima kilhep lhahsah hih-un ; koi hile thildih bol’a chu Christa adih banga ama jong midih ahi .
62003008	Chonset bol’a vang chu Diabol’a kon ahi , ajeh chu Diabol chu semtil’a pat hung chonse jing ahi . Hichejeh tah a chu Diabol natoh sumang dinga Pathen Chapa hung kilah ahi .
62003009	Pathen’a kona pengdoh jousen chonset aboljom jing poi , ajeh chu Pathen muchi chu ama sunga aum jingin ahi . Chujongle Pathen’a kona pengdoh ahi jeh in achonset jing ding chu ahitheipoi .
62003010	Hichea hin Pathen chate le Diabol chate umdol akichen’e . Thildih bol lou jouse le asopi ngailu lou jouse chu Pathen’a kon ahipoi .
62003011	Eiho khat le khat iki-ngailut diu hi najahsau semtil’a pat thu thot chu ahi .
62003012	Agiloupaa kon , asopi that’a pang Cain to ibah lou diu ahi . Ipijeh pen a aman asopi atha ham ? Ajeh chu ama natoh chengse agilou jeng ahia , asopipa a jouse adih jeng ahijeh ahi .
62003013	Vo sopite , vannoiyin nahot’u le kidang sahih hel’un .
62003014	Ijeh-inem itile eihon isopiteu ingailut jeh-uva thinaa kona hinna galkai i-hi tauve . Angailu lou vang chu thinaa um jing nalai ahi .
62003015	Koi hile asopi hotbol tol that ahin tolthat lung sunga tonsot hinna aum lou iheuve .
62003016	Aman eiho dia ahinkho apeh jeng jeh hin , hichea hin ngailutna ihetauve ; hijeh a chu eihon jong sopite dinga hinkho ito doh diu thil khoh tah ahi .
62003017	Khattou hinkhoa ning lhingin um hen lang chule asopi ngaichat neiya um amu nasan achung changa lainatpi da le , ama sunga chu Pathen ngailut na iti um thei ding ham ?
62003018	Chate , eihon thuhom keo le kamsung jengseh hilouvin , natoh le thutah in ngailu hite .
62003019	Hichea hi eiho thutah apang ihidan’u ihet’uva , ama angsunga ilungthima ikison diu ahi .
62003020	I-lung thim’un ei-oi mo tengu jongle , Pathen chu eiho lungthim sanga lenjoa ima jouse hesoh ahiye .
62003021	Deitahte , ilungthim’un ei-oi mo louvu le Pathen henga lung ngamna ineiyun ,
62003022	hijeh chun thum inei tengu jongle athupeh jouse init’uva , a-angsunga alungdei lam jeng ibol jeh-un , amaa konin akisan jiuve .
62003023	Athupeh chu achapa Jesu Christa min’a itahsan’uva , aman eipeh-u thupeh banga khat le khat ikingailut diu hi ahi .
62003024	Koi hile athupehho nit’a chu Christa sunga um ahin , Christa jong ama sunga um ahi ; hichea hin aman eipeh-u Lhagao jal’in ama isunguva aum i-heuve .
62004001	Deitahte , Lhagao tapou tahsan dauvin , lhagao ho chu Pathen’a kon hinam patep masauvin ; ajeh chu vannoi leiset chunga Themgao lhem tampi asohdoh tai .
62004002	Pathen Lhagao chu hichea hi nahet diu ahi . Jesu Christa tahsaphe pua ahungna phongdoh Lhagao tapou chu Pathen’a kon ahin ,
62004003	hitia Jesu phong doh lou lhagao jouse chu Pathena kon ahipoi , hiche tah chu Christa doupa , ahung ding najahsau chu ahin , tutah a jong hi vangnoiya um-ah ahitai .
62004004	Chate , nang ho Pathen’a kon nahiuvin , hiche ho chu nanang joutauve ; ijeh-inem itile nasunguva umpa chu vannoiya umpa sangin achungnungjoi .
62004005	Amaho hi vannoi ya kon ahiuvin , hijeh achu vannoi thudol jeng aseiyule , vannoi athua nung ahi .
62004006	Eiho vang Pathen’a kon aihiuvin , Pathen hepan ithuu angaiye , Pathen helouvan vang ithuu angaipoi . Hichea hi eihon Lhagao tah le lhagao lhem ihetdoh-u ahi .
62004007	Deitahte , eiho khat le khat ki-ngailu hite , ajeh chu ngailut hi Pathen’a kon ahi ; hijeh chun ngailut neiya chu Pathen’a kona peng ahin , Pathen ahei .
62004008	Ngailut neilouvin Pathen ahepoi , ajeh chu Pathen hi ngailut ahi .
62004009	Chapa jal’a eihon hinna inei theina diuva Pathenin Achapa chang khatseh vannoiya ahinsol , hichea hi eiho sunga Pathen ngailutnachu kiphongdoh ahitai .
62004010	Hichea hi ngailut um ahi , eihon Pathen ingailut’u ahipon , amajoh-in eingailut’uva , eiho chonset thoina dinga Achapa ahinsol ahibouve .
62004011	Deitahte , Pathenin eiho chutia eingailut’u le eiho jong khat le khat iki-ngailut diu dol ahi .
62004012	Koiman imatih-in Pathen amukhapoi , eiho khat le khat iki-ngailut’u le Pathen eiho sunga uma chule amingailut chu eiho sunga chamkimsohji ahi .
62004013	Pathenin eipeh-u ama Lhagao jal hin eiho ama sunga i-um’uva chule ama eiho sunga aum iheuve .
62004014	Pan Chapa vannoi huhhing dinga ahinsol hi keihon kamu’uva kahet tohsah-u ahi .
62004015	Koi hile Jesu chu Pathen Chapa ahi phongdoh chan asunga Pathen um ahin , ama Pathen sunga um ahi .
62004016	Chule Pathenin eiho sunga ngailutna anei hi eihon iheuvin itahsan’uve . Pathen chu ngailut ahin , ngailut sunga um michu Pathen sunga um ahin , chule ama sunga Pathen um’a ahi .
62004017	Thupi tan nikhoa lungngamna inei theina diuva hichea hi eiho chunga ngailutna kisuchamkim ahi ; ajeh chu hiche vannoiya hi eiho jong ama tobanga um ihiuve .
62004018	Ngailut sunga kichat aumpoi , ngailut chamkim chun kichat anodohji ; kichat hin talen mat ding aneijeh ahin hijeh chun kichajing mi chu ngailut sunga achamkim theipoi .
62004019	Aman eingailut masah jeh a eihon ingailut’u ahibouve .
62004020	Khattouvin , ” Pathen ka-ngailui , ” ti hen , asopi hotbol le , mijou ahi . Ijeh-inem itile amusa asopibon angailut loule , amulou Pathen chu angailut thei lou ding ahi .
62004021	Koi hijongle Pathen ngailu chun asopi angailut tei ding thupeh Christaa kona ineiyu ahi .
62005001	Koi hileh Jesu hi Christa ahidol tahsan jouse chu Pathen’a kona peng ahi ; chule koi hile ahingpa ngailua chun ahinsa acha jong angailui .
62005002	Eihon Pathen ingailutuva , athupeh chengse init’ule hichea hin Pathen chate ingailut’u iheuve .
62005003	Ijeh-inem itile athupeh chengse init’u hiche laitah chu Pathen ngailutna ahi , chule athupeh ho chu pohgih hahsa jong ahipoi .
62005004	Ajeh chu Pathena kona peng jousen vannoi hi anan jou ahitan , hiche vannoi nang joupen tah chu itahsan’u hi ahiye .
62005005	Jesu chu Pathen Chapa ahina tahsan mi chun vannoi ajo ahitai .
62005006	Twisih le thisan jal’a hungpa chu Jesu Christa ahi , twisih keoseh hilouvin , twisih le thisan jal ahi . Hiche hettosah chu Lhagao ahi , ajeh chu Lhagao hi thutah ahi .
62005007	Ijeh-inem itile hettohsah thum aumin ,
62005008	Lhagao le twisih chule thisan ahi , hicheng thum hi khat’a longkhom ahi .
62005009	Eihon mihem hettohsah bon isan’u le Pathena hettohsahna chu achungnungjoi , ajeh chu aman Achapa thudol ahettohsah ahi .
62005010	Pathen Chapa tahsan chun asunga hettohsahna anei ahin , Pathen tahsan lou vang chun Pathen ajousah ahi ; ajeh chu Pathenin Achapa thudol ahettohsah , hiche hettohsahna chu aman atahsan tapoi .
62005011	Hiche hetohsahna chu Achapa sunga um hinna , hiche tonsot hinna , Pathenin eipeh-u hi ahi .
62005012	Koihile Chapa neiyan hinna aneitan , Pathen Chapa neilou chun hinna aneipoi .
62005013	Nang ho Pathen min’a tahsan chengsen tonsot hinna naneiyu nahetna diuva hicheng hi kahinsut ahi .
62005014	Eihon ipi hijongle ama lungdei lama ithum chan’u aman eingai peh jeh-uva , hiche hi eihon ama koma lung ngamna ineiyu ahi .
62005015	Ipi hijongle ithum chan’u eingaipeh ihet jeh-uvin , ipi tobang hileh akithum chan chu amaa kona ineisan ihetauve .
62005016	Khattouvin asopi chu thi lo hel theina chonset ahilou vanga chonset bol amu le taopeh hen lang hinso hen ; thi lo hel theina hilouva chonse chubou kisei ahi . Thi lotheina hel’a chonset aumin , hitobang dia chu tao dinga kasei ahipoi .
62005017	Adih lou jouse chu chonset ahin , ahinla thi lo theina hel lou chonset jong aum’e .
62005018	Koi hile Pathena kona penga chu achonse jom jing poi , Pathena kona peng chun ama angah jingin , hijeh chun agiloupan atongkhapoi .
62005019	Eiho Pathena kona ihiuva , vannoi pumpi agiloupa noiya aum iheuve .
62005020	Pathen Chapa thutah ihet theina diuva thil hetkhen themna lungthim eihungpeh-u chu iheuve ; eiho thutah , Achapa Jesu Christa sunga chu um ihiuve . Ama chu Pathen tahbeh le tonsot hinna ahi .
62005021	Chate doilim semthu hou lah a kihong phauvin .
63001001	Upa keiman lhentum Numei lalnu chule achate changse , thutah a ka-ngailut , kei chang hilouva , thutah heho jousen jong angailut ho heng ,
63001002	eiho sunga um jing , tonsot geiya eiumpi jing diu thutah jal’in :
63001003	Pa , Pathen le Pa Chapa Jesu Christa konin thutah le ngailut jal’a lungsetna le hepina , chamnan eiumpi jing diu ahi .
63001004	Nachate konkhatse Paa kona ikisan’u thupeh dungjuiya chon kamun , kakipah lheh jengin ahi .
63001005	Chule tua hi hung tao kahi-lalnu , nahenga thupeh thah jong hinsun louva , khat le khat iki-ngailutto chehna diuva , semtil’a pat ineisau chu ahibouve .
63001006	Athupeh chengse dungjuiya ichon theiyu le hichu ngailut ahi . Semtil’a pat thu um najahsau bangin chonleu chun , hichu ngailut ahi .
63001007	Ajeh chu vannoiya hin doha mi-lhem lha tampi asohdohtai , amaho hin Jesu Christa tahsanphea ahung hi aphongdoh nompouve ; doha mi lhemlha , Christa douva chu ama hi ahi .
63001008	Natohsa chu na-ngah louva tohga lhingset’a nasan na diuvin , nang ho ching theiyun , kivephauin .
63001009	Koi hile Christa thuhil’a um louva , akalval’a chon’a chun Pathen aneipoi . Thuhil’a um jing vang chun Pa le Chapa anei kop ahitai .
63001010	Koi hile hiche thuhil keng louva nahenguva hunga chu san dauvin , na-in’uva lhunsah hih-uvin , kam phan jong hou dauvin .
63001011	Ijeh-inem itile ama kamphaa houva chun ama toh gitlou jouse jong achankhompi ahitai .
63001012	Nahenguva hinsut ding tampi kanei vangin , lekhapheng le lekhatwi maiya sut kanompoi , nakipa nau achamkimsohna dinga nahengu hungphah a kimaitoa kamchenga ikihoulim diu kakinem’e .
63001013	Lhentum nasopi nu chaten nasalam’uve .
64001001	Upa keiman thutah beh a kangailut , kadeitah Gaius henga :
64001002	Ngaitah , nahinkhoa phatthei nachan banga , ima lam jousea naphat theiya , nadam jingna din kataopeh jie .
64001003	Sopite phabep ahung uva nangma thutah a nachon hetsahjing banga , nathutah dol eihung hetsah-u iti kakipa hitam !
64001004	Kachate thutah a achon kajah a kakipa sanga chungnungjo kipana kaneipoi .
64001005	Ngaitah , hetphah lou maljin hung hijongleu , sopite nabolna , natohna chu nakitah lheh jenge :
64001006	amahon jong ngailut nanei chu Houbung angsunga ahettohsah-uvin , Pathen deidol bangin amaho hi ajin nauva anathahson le chun pha lheh inte .
64001007	Ijeh-inem itile Christa min khohsah jal’a hungpot jeng ahiuvin , chidang namdangtea konin imacha akilah pouve .
64001008	Thutah a atohnau hi ikithopi theina diuva hite ho tobang hi ilem diu thil khoh tah ahi .
64001009	Houbung henga thu them khat kahinsun’in , ahinla alamkaiyuva pang nom Diotrephes chun ei nahsah pouve .
64001010	Hijeh a chu kahung le athilbol , achonna , eiseiset nauva thu gilou asei jouseu kasosal ding ahi ; hicheng abol jong hi achim hih laiyin , sopite chu alhunsah dan lhunsah dia go ho geijin aja da nalaiyin , amaho chu Houbunga konin anodoh jenge .
64001011	Ngaitah , ase jom louvin , apha chubou jomin . Thilpha bol’a chu Pathena kon ahin , thilse bol’an vang Pathen amu loulai ahi .
64001012	Demetrius chu mi jousen aseiphan , thutah-in jong aseiphai ; chule keihon jong ama kaseiphauvin , kahettohsah nau thutah ahidol nangin nahenai .
64001013	Nahenga hinsut ding tampi kanei vangin , lekhatwi le lekhamol maiya sut ding kadeipoi .
64001014	Nangma muloi ding kakinemin , chutengle kimaiton kamchengin kihou nau hi te .
64001015	Nachunga cham leng hen . Goldei jousen nasalam’ui . Goldeite chu amin cheh-in panin salamin .
65001001	Jacob naopa , Jesu Christa soh natong Jude chun , Pa Pathen ngailu jouse le Jesu Christa dinga kikouva kikheh khol ho henga ;
65001002	Hepina le chamna chule ngailutna nachunguva hapunin pung hen .
65001003	Deitahte , nahenguva ineikhom cheh-u huhhingna thudol lekha hinsut kagot pettah-in khatvei mi thengte kipedohsa , tahsan thua napot tho diu deina tilkhouna joh a , hinsut ding khoh kasajotai .
65001004	Ijeh-inem itile eiho lah a hin hitobang thudol’a achung thu tan’a themmo chang dinga koisa Pathen helou mi phabep guh thimin ahung lut’uvin , amaho hin Pathenin eipeh-u lungsetna chu huhna lamin aheidoh-un , chule ipipu le i-Pakaiyu Jesu geiyin aseilep tauve .
65001005	Khatvei chu nahetsau hitajongle , Pakaiyin mipi chu Egypt’a kona ahuhdoh a , anichan naa atahsan lou jeh-uva asuh mang hel thudol hi nang ho kageldohsah kitnom nahiuve .
65001006	Atha neinau panmun tuh det louva , apanmun dalhaa Vantilte jeng jong aman , ni loupi chungnung ni le athuu tan dinga tonsot thihkhaova ahen’a , muthim lah a akoi ahi .
65001007	Hitobanga chu Sodom le Gomorrah chule akimvel dunga khopi ho , alam loutah a huh le jonthanhoi lam a kipeuva , japi hilchahna dinga tonsot meikouva kihalvam’a achung thuu kitan talen kimatsah chu geldohuvin .
65001008	Hitobang hin hite hon mudih lou anei jeh-un tahsa asuboh-un , Pathen thunei vaipohna asan dauvin , loupina chengse ataitom jiuve .
65001009	Vantil pipu Michael jengin bon Mose long chung thua Diabol to akinel chun taitoma houset ding , chule achung thu tan ding angam pon , “ Pakaiyin nahouse hen , ” atijoi .
65001010	Amaho hin ahettoh lou ataitom jiu ahin , gancha ho banga atichunguva hetna ho hin amaho asuhmang gamjoh ahitai .
65001011	Achung’u thu akhoh-e ! Amaho Cain lampi kijot’a tohman duchatnaa Balaam lampia cheuva , Korah-in doumah abolnaa chu mangthah gam ahitauve .
65001012	Amaho hi kidei golvah nabolnauva nolna um ahiuvin , kiphalam louhel hel’in akideitouvin , amaho le amaho akive tup’un , twi kotlou meilhang huiyin alhoh lonle , chavang laiya thingga bei , nivei thia ajung geiya kibotdoh tobang ahiuve .
65001013	Twikhanglen twi kinongsuh kinong tou tobang , achonthang nau twiphon banga hung phondoh bep ahiuvin , muthim lhangkhal kiheh leiloi kikoipeh , ahsi vah thai ho tobang ahiuve .
65001014	Adam’a pat khang sagi lhinna , Enoch chun hite ho chung chang thudol’a hi gaothu anaseiyin , “ Ven Pakai chu amitheng asang sang to hunga ,
65001015	Mitin chunga thutanna abol ding , chule Pathen helouten a-Pathen hetlou jeh-uva athilbol anatoh chengseu le Pathen hephalou chonseten ama douna thuse asei jouseu themmo ahinchan ding ahi , ” ati .
65001016	Amaho hi phunchel le seiset hat , alunggul lam cheh a kihei , akamsunguva ham , hoitho seival val sei , phatchom ding deina mi maiya kamthem le ahiuve .
65001017	Deitahte , nang hon vang tu masanga i-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa solchahten aseisau thu ho chu geldoh jing jengun ;
65001018	ajeh chu amahon naseipeh-un , “ phat nu nung lam le Pathen ngaisah lou , alunggul lam jenga chon , mi jontai hatte hung sohdoh diu ahi , ” atiuve .
65001019	Amaho hi loitum sem ho , tahsa hing mai , Lhagao nei lou ahiuve .
65001020	Deitahte , nang ho vang natahsan’u thengtah chunga chun kisadoh-un lang , Lhagao Thengin tao jingun ;
65001021	Pathen mi-ngailutnaa kihong jinguvin , i-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa hepina jal’a napeh diu tonsot hinna chu kat jinguvin .
65001022	Kihol lel lung opkaina neiho chu hepiuvin .
65001023	Abang bang jong meikouva konin loidoh loiyun , huhhinguvin , abang jong kiphalam khen’a nahepi diu ahi ; tahsaphe nen be-na ponsil nihchen geiyin theuvin .
65001024	Nakipal lhuh louna diuva nahongbit theiyu , aloupina masanga nolnabei le kipah thanom tah a napuilut theipau ,
65001025	I-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa jal’in , loupina le chungnun na thahat le thuneina jouse , phat um masang le tun , chule tonsot geiyin jong eihuhhingpau Pathen khatseh , amaa hijing jeng hen : Amen .
66001001	Thil hung sohvah ding ho , asohte hetsah dinga Pathenin Jesu Christa apeh a , a-Vantil asol’a asoh John henga ahetsah , Jesu Christa Thuphondoh chu ,
66001002	Johnin amu chengse le Jesu Christa hettohsah thudol to Pathen Thu ahettohsah-e .
66001003	Hiche Themgao thuseidoh chengse hataha simphonga le ajahho chengse , asunga kisun nit ho chu anun nom’ui ; ijeh-inem itile phat ahung naiye .
66001004	Johnin Asia gamsunga Houbung sagi henga ; Lungsetna le cham nan unpiuvin , aum jing , asumsa chule ahung um dingpaa kon , alaltouna maiya lhagao sagi hoa kon ,
66001005	hettohsah tahsan umpen , thinaa kona peng masapen , leiset leng jouse chunga vaihompaa konin . Eingailu’uva athisan jal’a ichonsetna jouseuva kona eisut lham’uva ,
66001006	lenggam khat’a eisem doh-uva a-Pa Pathen kintheng bol dia Thempua eisemdoh pau , Ama chu loupina le vaihomna tonsot tonsot geiyin chang jing hen : Amen .
66001007	Ven , meilhang lah a ahunge , Mit jousen Ama amusoh keidiu ; Ama teng’a sun ho geiyin jong amu diu , Ama jeh a leiset’a phungtin le namtinin Adip alai akidop diu ahi ; hihen Amen .
66001008	Aum jing , aumsa , ahung um ding Hatchungnung Pakai Pahtenin , “ Keima Alpha le Omega kahi , ” ati .
66001009	Keima Jesu jal’a gim hesoh thotna le lenggam jeh le bolsetna jal’a nathoh khompiu , nasopiu John kahin , Jesu hettohsahna jal le Pathen thu jal’a Patmmos kisah twikol’a hi eikikoiya ahi .
66001010	Pakai nikho nin keima Lhagavin kana umtan , chuin kanung lama konin sumkon gin tobang ogin sangtah khat kajai ;
66001011	hichun , “ Nathilmu chu lekhabua sunin lang , Houbung sagi-Ephesus le Smyrna , Perga-mum le Thyatira , Sardis le Philadelphia chule Laodicea henga thot’in ” eiti .
66001012	Keijong kahenga thusei ogin chu vedin kakiheiyin , hitia kakiheinaa chun sana thaomei khom sagi kamui ;
66001013	chule khomho lah a chun Mihem Chapa tobang khat , aponsil khophang te nia lenglhaa , a-opkonga sana khaopeh kivei ,
66001014	aluchang le asam kelngaoi mul ban’a bang buhbang tobang , amit te ni meikong tobang hiya
66001015	akengto te ni chu , meilhum sunga kisoujolsa , sum-eng kinotval tobang ahin , chule a-ogin chu twi tamtah gin tobang ahi .
66001016	Akhut jet lama ahsi sagi achoiyin , akamsunga kon in hemto chamjam hemtah ahungdoh-in , chule amaivah chu sunlai nisa sat-ham pettah tobang ahi .
66001017	Ama kamu phat hin akhophang te ni bul’a kalhun , athi tobang in ka-umtai . Hichun aman akhut jet lamin eithamin , “ Kicha hih-in , Keima akipatna le akichaina ,
66001018	ahing jingpa , kanathin , ahinla ven , Keima tonsot tonsot’a dingin ka hing jinge ; thina le thikhol khul kot-heh kaneiye .
66001019	Hijeh chun nathilmu chengse , aum ho hi le tu nung teng hung um ding ho hi sunin .
66001020	Kakhut jet lama ahsi sagi namu ho hi le sana thaomei khom sagi ho thuguh chu ; ahsi sagi chu Houbung sagi sole ho ahiuvin , sana thaomei khomsagi chu Houbung sagi chu ahi .
66002001	“ Ephesus Houbung solle henga chun hitin sunin : ‘ Akhut jet lama ahsi sagi choiya , sana thaomei khom sagi lah a vah le chun hitin aseiye ,
66002002	“ Keiman nanatohjouse le thohgim thohda nathoh jouse kahei ; solchah la hilouva solchah kihisah ho jong napatep’in , ajou nau namandoh-in , hiti hin migilou ho chu nathoh nom hih hel’e .
66002003	Nangman thoh hahsa chu Keim amin jal’in nathoh thoh jengin nalha dah deh sampoi .
66002004	Ahnla amasa na-ngailutna chu nalha tahjeh-in nachunga demna kaneiye .
66002005	Hijeh chun hoikoma kisep lhu nahim , geldoh-in , chule lung heiyin lang , natoh masah chengse chu tong kit’in ; chutia lung nahei loule nahenga hung ing ting nathaomei khom chu akitunnaa kona kachon mang ding ahi .
66002006	Hijongle Nicolai mi ho natoh keiman kathet ho chu , nangin jong nathen , phatna hiche vang hi naneiye .
66002007	Angaina ding na neiyan Houbung ho henga Lhagao thusei hi ngai hen . Galjouva chu Pathen honsunga keh hinthing ga chu neh dia kapeh ding ahi .
66002008	“ Smyrna Houbung solle henga chun hitin sunin : ‘ Akipatna le akichaina , thia hingkit chun hitin aseiye :
66002009	“ Keiman nathohgim hesoh navaichat kahenai , ahinla nahaove ; Juda midan a kiseiyuva hila hi-ngal lou , Satan kikhopna hungkon hon taitomna aneiyujong kahei .
66002010	Nahin thot gimna ding ho hi kicha hih hel’in . Ven , nang ho patepna dinga nalahuva abang bang Diabol’in songkul’a ahinkhum ding , ahivang nisom bou nathothgim diu ahi . Thina geiyin thot-in tahsanin , Keiman hinna lallukhuh kapeh ding nahi .
66002011	Angaina ding na neiyan Houbung ho henga Lhagao thusei hi ngai hen . Galjouva chu thi ni nan asuh nat louding ahi .
66002012	“ Pergamum Houbung solle henga chun thitin sunin : ‘ Hemto chemjam hemtah neipan hitin aseiye :
66002013	“ Keiman nachenna mun , Satan laltouna chu kahei ; Kei dinga tahsan um , kadinga hettohsah pha Antipas atha laiyu nikhon jong Keiya um tahsan nadalha pon , kamin natuh det jinge ; Antipas chu Satan chenna mun , nang ho lah a athau ah .
66002014	Ahivang in na chunga demna phabep kanei ye , ajeh chuIsreael chate masanga kipal lhuhna ding koiya , doilim semthu houna sa nehsah a , chule jonthanhoi patsah dinga go Balak hilchah a Balaam thuhil choiya mi phabep naneiye .
66002015	Hitobang hin nangin jong Nicolai mi ho thuhilchoiya mi phabep naneiye .
66002016	Hijeh chun lung heiyin , achutiloule nahenga kahungvah jel’a kakamsung chemjam them’a amaho chu kasat gam diu ahi .
66002017	Angaina ding na thuseina neiyan Houbung hohenga Lhagao thusei hi ngai hen . Galjouva chu selguh manna kapeh ding , chule che songval chunga chu minthan khat kijih ahi , akisanpa tilou koima ding in asimthei lou hel ding ahi .
66002018	“ Thyatira Houbung solle henga chun hitin sunin : ‘ Amit te ni meikou pah lah lah tobang , akengto te ni sum-eng kinotval tobang Pathen Chapan hitin aseiye , “ Keiman natoh josue le na ngailut je , natahsan le nalhacha natoh , chujongle nathot hatje , natohna jouse amasa natohsanga aphatjoh kahenai .
66002020	Ahinla nachunga cemna kaneiye , ajeh chu Jezebel kithemgaosah nu chu nacham lhan , aman kasohte jonthanho lam ahil’in , doilim semthu houna sa nehsahdin ajol lhai .
66002021	Ken amanu chu along heina ding phat kapen , hila aman ajon thanhoinaa konin lung aheidehpoi ,
66002022	Ven , keiman amanu hi jalkhun chng se na kanei ding , hiche jonthanghoi thilbol josue a kona lung ahie louvu le ajonpi chenrsen jong thoh gentei chungnung athoh diu ahi .
66002023	Thina kaman a achate jouse kathagam ding , chuteng le Houbung jousen lung ngaito chengse le lungthim josue hethei kahi ahet diu , chujong le anatoh dung jui cheh-uva amitakip kalethuh ding nahiuve .
66002024	Ahila Thyatira a um amoh cheng , hiche thuhil jop lou , Satan thugil kiti helou chengse nachunguva pohgih dang koibe peh pouvinge .
66002025	Ahin nanei sun’u chu kahung kahsen tuhdet jingun .
66002026	Chule galjouva , kanatoh ho achaina geiya nit jing chu namtin vaipi chunga thu neina kapeh ding ,
66002027	aman amaho chu kelngaoi chin bang thih tenggol’a achin’a , leibel kivochip banga abol ding ,
66002028	Keman ka-Paa kona kalah thu neina jal’a am chu Jingvalpa kapeh ding ahi .
66002029	Angaina ding na neiyan Houbung ho henga Lhagao thusei hi ngaihen .
66003001	“ Sardis Houbung solle henga hitin sunin : ‘ Pathen Lhagao sagi le ahsi sagi neipan hitin aseiye , “ Keiman nanatoh josue kahen , amin’a hinga nahin , athisa nahibouve .
66003002	Khangin lang hah jing jengin , amoh cheng , athikon ho dindetsah-in ; ajeh chu ka-Pathen mitmua nanatoh ho achamkimsoh kamudoh poi .
66003003	Hichejeh chun atil’a itobanga nakisan’a , iti najah-em geldoh jingin , nit phan , lung heiyin . Hijeh a chu nahajing loule gucha banga kahung ding , itih phat le naheng kahinsuh ding nahet lou ding ahi .
66003004	Amvang aponsil’u kisuh nen lou mi phabep Sardis a aum’un , amaho hi ponbang vamleh sil’a Keito kilhon le ding ahiuve , ajeh chu amaho chutidia limtah ahiuve .
66003005	Galjouva chu amaho kivonna ponbang vamleh a kivon ding , chule hinna lekhabua kona Keiman amin kathai mang louding , ka-Pa angsung le a-Vantilte angsunga ama min chu kasei doh ding ahi .
66003006	Angaina ding na neiyan Houbung ho henga Lhagao thusei hi ngai hen .
66003007	“ Philadelphia Houbung solle henga thitin sunin : ‘ Atheng le atahbeh , David kanglongheh neiya , aman ahon le koiman khah thei lou , aman akha le koiman hong thei lou , ama chun hitin aseiye .
66003008	“ Keiman nanatoh jouse kahenai , ven , koman akha thei lou na-angasunga kot honsan kakoiye ; tha them khat vang naneiyin , kathu nanit’in , kamin nasei leppoi .
66003009	Ven , Satan kikhpna pang ho phabep , acham cham’a Juda mi kihisah a , hila hilouhel , jousei ho chu kapehdoh ahin , ven keiman nang ka-ngailut hi ahetdoh theina diuva , na-anga sung , nakhophang bul’a boh khup’a chibai kahung bohsah ding ahiuve .
66003010	Nangin thoh hat dinga kasei nanit jeh a vannoi leiset pumpi chunga patepna ahung lhun’a , leiset chung cheng jouse akipatep phat teng le ken jong nang kahuhdoh ding nahi .
66003011	Kahungvah jet ding ahi , nalal lukhuh koman nalahpeh louna din nanei sun tuuhdet jingin .
66003012	Galjouva chu keiman ka-Pathen Houin khom’a kasem ding , hikoma kona chu potdoh louhel ding ahitan , achunga ka-Pathen min le ka-Pathen khopi Jerusalem thah , van’a ka-Pathen koma kona hung kitol lha , min kasut ding ahi .
66003013	Angaina ding na neiyan Houbung ho henga Lhagao thusei hi ngaihen .
66003014	“ Laodicea Houbung solle henga chun hitin sunin : ‘ Amen , Hettohsahpa , Tahsan um , Atahbeh , Pathen thilsem jouse Bulpi chun hitin thu aseiye .
66003015	“ Keiman nanatoh jouse kahen , vot la navot pon , sa la nasapoi . Navot le votngal’in lang , nasat le san gal le chun pha kasai .
66003016	Hitia hi lumheo bep nahiya , sa la san gal lou , vot la votngal lou nahijeh hin kakamsunga kona kakhondoh ding kon nahitai .
66003017	Ijeh-inem itil nangin , ‘ Kahaove , sum kaneiye , imacha ngaichat kaneipoi , ’ natin ; nang tah chu adapen le khoto umpen , vaichatah le micho chu le sagohkeio nahilam nakihet poi .
66003018	Nahaona dia kakoma , kilha thengsel sana kichoh ding le , nakisil’a najamo kimudoh lou na dia nakhu jol ding pon bangle kichoh a , kho namu theina dia mitlou kichoh dinga kathu mop nahi .
66003019	Keiman kalungset chan kaphosal’a kaoblgimji ahi , hijeh chun tompan in lang lung heiyin .
66003020	Ven , kotkha bul’a ka dingin kakiu jinge , khattouvin ka-ogin ajah a kot eiho leh , ahenga kahung sung lhah a ama chu an kaneh khompia , aman jong eineh khompi ding ahi .
