66003021	Galjouva chu ken jong kajoa ka-Pa to alaltouna katoukhom banga hi keito kalaltouna toukhomna thei thu kapeh ding ahi .
66003022	Angaina ding na neiyan Houbung ho henga Lhagao thusei hi ngai hen ! ” tin aseiye ” ati .
66004001	Hicheng jou hin vetan , van’a kot khat honsa um kamun , chule kajah masat pen ogin chu sumkon gin tobang ahin , kahenga thu aseiyin , “ Hilama hung kaltouvin , hicheng nunga soh tei ding thil ho chu kavetsah ding nahi , ” eiti .
66004002	Apettah chun Lhagaovin kaumtan , hichun ven , van’a laltouna khat akidon , laltouna chunga chun koiham khat atouve ;
66004003	atoupa chu jasper song le sardis song bangin alange , chule laltouna kimvel’a chun lhagui aumin , emerald song tobangin akimui .
66004004	Laltouna kimvel’a chun laltouna som ni le li akidon , laltouna ho chunga chun ponbang jeng kisil’a alua sana lal lukhuh jeng kikhuh , upa som ni le li atouvui .
66004005	Laltouna a kon chun kolphe avah lap lap’in , o-agingin , van akithinge ; laltouna maiya chun mei kou jing jeng thaomei sagi aumin , hiche ho chu Pathen Lhagao sagi ho ahiuve .
66004006	Lalouna maiya chun Crystal song tobang , phatvet banga kimu , Twikhanglen aumin , chule laltouna lailung le akimvel’a chun , anung le amaa amit jeng amit jeng dimset ganhing li aum’ui .
66004007	Ganhing masapen chu Phaisammeigeo tobang ahin , ganhing ni na chu Bongnou tobang ahin , ganhing thumna chun mihem mai tobang aneiyhin , gang hing li lhinna chu Muvanlai lengpet tobang ahi .
66004008	Ganhing li ho chun lhaving gup cheh aneiyun , akimvel le anung lam amite jeng ahiuve ; chule sun le janin choldo louhel’in la asauvin : “ Atheng , Atheng , Atheng , Pakai Pathen Hatchungnung ahin , Aumsa le aum jing chule ahung um ding , ” atiuve .
66004009	Hiche ganhing li ho chun tonsot’a hing jing jeng , Laltouna kitousah Pa chu achoi-at’a , ajabol’uva chule athangvah tengu le ,
66004010	upa som ni le li jong chu laltouna kitousah Pa angsunga chu lhujiuva , tonsot’a hing jing jeng Pa chu chibai abohuva , laltouna maiya chu alal lukhuh-u aselhah-uva , hitia asei yuva :
66004011	“ Ka-Pakaiyu le ka-Pathenu , Nangma bou loupina le jabolna chule tha neina changa lomtah nahi ; Ajeh chu nangin thil ijakai nasemin , Nangma deiya kisem doh a um ahiuve , ” Atiuvin ahi .
66005001	Laltouna Toupa khut jetlama chun , asung lam apolam , alangtoa kisun , mohor sagi jen jinamkhum , lekhajol khat kamui .
66005002	Chuin Vantil hattah ogin sang tah a samphong lea , “ Hiche lekhajol mohorkinam ho sut lhaa lham jou dinga lom chu koipen ham ? ” ti khat kamui .
66005003	Ahinla van’a hihen leiset’a hijongle , leiset noi geiyin lekhabu chu ahongdoh theiya le avetheiya aumtapoi .
66005004	Hichun lekhabu phong doh thei le avetheiya akimudoh lou phat’in hakan kakaptai .
66005005	Hichea chun upaho lah akhat’in kajah a , “ Kap hih-in , ven , Juda phunga phaisameigeo , David Jung chu hiche lekhabu phongdoh ding le amaohor sagi chu lhamla didnga galjousa ahitai , ’ eiti .
66005006	Hichun ganhing li ho le upahon aumkimve’u laltouna lailunga chun Kelngoinou kithatsa lheh lheh khat ding kamun , ki le mit sagi gi aneiye ; chule hiche ho chu leiset chun gpumpia hung kisol lha Pathen Lhagao sagi ho ahiuve .
66005007	Ama chu ahingin laltouna Toupa khut jetlama konin lekhajol chu alai .
66005008	Alah phat’in ganhing li ho le upa som ni le li chu kelngoinou angsunga chun abohkhup cheh-uvin amaho khat cheh-in akhut’uva selangdah khat le sana sumlheng dung’ah , mithengte taona chu , gimnamtui bangin akichoi cheh-ui .
66005009	Amaho hin lathah khat asauvin : “ Lekhabu kilah ding le Mohor ho lhamlha hong din nangbou nakilom’e ; Ajeh chu nangma kithatsa nahin , Nathisan’a phungtin le paotin tanga kon Mitin mitanga kona Pathen mi hi dinga nachohdohsa ahitan ,
66005010	Nangin amaho chu i-Pathenu dia Thempu Lenggam’a nasemdoh ahitan , Hijeh a chu leiset chunga lengvai aph diu ahi , ” atiuve .
66005011	Hichun kagah vet leh laltouna le ganhing ho chule upaho kemvel’a ding , Vantil tampi ogin kajan , amaho chu ajat sangsom jet tamtah sang jat alhinguve .
66005012	Amaho hin ogin sangtah-in aseiyun : “ Akithatsa Kelngoinou chu Boltheina tha , haona , thahat , Jabolna , loupina chule Vahchoina kisan dinga lomtah ahi , ” atiuve .
66005013	Chuin van , leiset chung , leiset noiya , Twikhanglen sunga , thilsem kiti jousen aseiyu kajah chu : “ Laltouna chung Toupa le Kelngoinou , Tonsot tonsot geiyin vahchoina le choi-atna , Lopina le thunei vaipohna chang jing hen , ” kiti ahi .
66005014	Hitah chun ganhing li hon , “ Amen , ” atiuvin , upa chengsen jong abohkhup’un chibai abohtauve .
66006001	Keima Kelngoinou chun mohor sagi ho lah a khat alhap lhah a ahondoh kamun , chule ganhing li lah a khat’in ogin sangtah a asap’a , “ Hungin , ” ati kajai .
66006002	Hijeh chun vetemin , sakol kang khat kamun , achunga toupan gophel khat achoiyin , ama chu lallukhuh khat apeuvin , galjouva jousoh peh din akondohtai .
66006003	Mohor ni na alhap’a ahondoh phat’in ganhing ni nan , “ Hungin , ” ati kajan ahi .
66006004	Hichun sakol chom , asan khat ahungdoh-in , achunga toupa chun leiset chung chamna alah manga , mihem khat le khat kithatona thu aneina akipen , chemjam lentah khat jong apeuve .
66006005	Mohor thumna alhap’a ahondoh paht’in , ganhing thum lhin nan , “ Hungin , ” ati kajai . Hichun vetemin , sakolvom khat kamun , achunga toupan thil tena khat achoiye .
66006006	Hichun ganhing li ho lah a kona hung ging tobanga kajah ogin khat chun , “ Suhlou chang khai khat’in denarii khat amanin , sakolchang khai thumin denarii khat aman’e ; hijongle thao le lengpitwi chu suboh hih-in , ” ati .
66006007	Mohor li na alhap’a ahondoh phat’in ganhing li lhin nan , “ Hungin ” ati kajai .
66006008	Hichun vetemin , sakol engdang khat kamun , achunga toupa min chu “ Thina ” ahin , chule thikhol khul’in anung ahinjuipeh-e . Chemjam le gilkel , gamna hise chule leiset gamsaho mangchaa , leiset hop lia hop khat thatgam dinga thahat kipe ahiuve .
66006009	Mohor nga lhin na alhap’a ahondoh phat’in , maicham phung noiya chun Pathen thujeh le nettoh sahna jal’a kithatsa lhagao ho kamui .
66006010	Amaho chun going tah-in asamun , “ Vo pipu , Atheng le kitah , leiset chung chengte chunga keiho phulaa thutan louva itih chan um ding nahim ? ” atiuve .
66006011	Amaho khat cheh chu poncho bangle apeuvin , asohchanpi chengseu le adopiteu , upaho kitha banga kithat ding ho akimsoh kahsea chom khat kho-ngai dingin akiseipeh tauve .
66006012	Mohor gupna chu alhap’a ahondoh phat’in ling nasatah kihot kamun , nichang khaodippon vom bangin avomtan lhachang pumpi jong thisan bangin asan jenge ;
66006013	van’a ahsite chu huipi hattah-in theichang phung amut’a , apul lhah bangin tol’a apul lhatai .
66006014	Chule-van chu lekhajol kijel mang bangin amanghel tan , mol le lhang jose , twikol gam jouse pumin aumna mun cheh a koninakichon mangtauve .
66006015	Hichun leiset leng jouse le milen milalte , sepai lamkai pipu ho , mihao hole thahat ho , soh jouse le chamlhat ho geiyin songko dung le mol dunga songpiho khi kah dunga akiseltauve .
66006016	Amaho hin mol le lhang chule songpiho jah a , “ Nei opkhum ” un lang , laltouna Toupa maikoh le Kelngoinou lungsatnaa konin neisel mangun ;
66006017	ajeh chu alungham nau nikho nasatah ahung lhungtan , hichea pang jou dding koi ham ? ” atiuve .
66007001	Hiche nung hin leiset chung le Twikhanglen chunga chule thingphung khat cha chunga jong huianun louhelna dinga , leiset ning lia kon huipi tuh tang din , leiset ning lia Vantil li adin kamui .
66007002	Chuin Pathen hing jing mohor choiya , niso lama hung kaltou Vantil chom khat kamun , ama chun going tahin asamin , leiset le Twikhanglen suhsetna dinga thu kipe Vantil li ho jah a chun ,
66007003	“ Keihon i-Pathenu sohte chalpanga melchihna mohor kanamsoh kahseuvin leiset le Twikhanglen chule thingphung ho hi suse hih-un , ” ati .
66007004	Chuin mohor kinamsa mijat kajah le , Israel phungtin’a kona mohor kinamsa chengse chu sang jakhat le sangsom li le sang li alhing’e .
66007005	Judah phunga kona mohor kinamsa sangsom le sang ni , Reuben phunga kona sangsom le sangni , Gad phunga kona sangsom le sang ni ,
66007006	Asher phunga kona sangsom le sang ni , Naphtali phunga kona sangsom le sang ni , Manasseh phunga kona sangsom le sang ni ,
66007007	Simeon phunga kona sangsom le sang ni , Issachar phunga kona sangsom le sang ni ,
66007008	Zebulun phunga kona sangsom le sang ni , Joseph phunga kona sangsom le sang ni , Benjamin phunga kona sang som le sang ni .
66007009	Hicheng nung hin mipi kihon lel lul jeng , simjou lou , chitin namtin le phung tin’a kon , mitin mitang le paotin paotanga kon , abang jenga kivon’a , akhut’uva lusu na kichoiya , laltouna masanga , kelngoinou angsunga ding kamui .
66007010	Amahon ogingtah-in asam’un : “ Hunhingna chu laltouna Toupa , I-Pathenu le Kelngoinouva ahi , ” atiuve .
66007011	Laltouna le upaho chule ganhing li ho kimvel’a ding jing Vantil jouse , laltouna masanga chun amaiyu tol’a asulut’uvin Pathen alhaiyun ,
66007012	asei cheh-un : “ Amen , phattheina le loupina , Chihna , thangvahna jousea , jabolna Thuhatna thu neina jouse tonsot tonsot geiya I-Pathen’uva ahijinge , Amen , ” atiiuve .
66007013	Hichea hin upa ho lah a khat’in eihin houvin kajah a , “ Hiche ponabng jenga kivon ho hi koi hiuva , hoiya hungkon hiuvam ? ” tin eidonge .
66007014	Kenjong ajah a , “ KaPakai nangin nahenai , ” kati . Chuin aman kajah a , “ Hite ho hi bolgen thei hesoh hahsa hinthoh doh a Kelngoinou thisan’a avon jouseu kisop bang ho vhu ahiuve .
66007015	Hijeh a chu Pathen laltouna masanga um’iva , asun ajan’a a-Houin sunga lhacha kin abol’u ahi ; chule laltouna Toupa khun amaho hi ponbuh kison khum banga alekhu diu ahi .
66007016	Amahon gilkel dangchah athoh kit louhel diu , nisan jong san gtalou diu , asa jong thoh lou iddng ahiuve .
66007017	Ijeh-inem itile laltouna lailunga um Kelngoinou khu achinguva pang , hintwi nah dunga apuihoi le ding , Pathenin amit lhi jouseu atheh hulsoh ding ahi , ” ati .
66008001	Kelngoinouvin mohor sagi na alhap’a ahondoh phat’in van chunga nidan keh khat set athip chet’e .
66008002	Hichun Pathen masanga ding jing Vantil sagi chu kamun , amaho chu summon sagi apeuve .
66008003	Chuin gimnamtui halna sana lhengkong khat choiya , Vantil chom khat ahungin maicham phunga chun adinge . Ama chu , mithengte taona belap peh dinga laltouna mai , maicham phunga chu todoh dingin , gimnamtui tampi apeuve .
66008004	Hichun Vantil khut’a konin gimnamtui khu chu mithengte taona kilhonin Pathen angsunga akikhotoutai .
66008005	Chuin Vantil’in gimnamtui halna lhengkong chu alan , maicham phunga mei-al chu aham dimin , leiset chunga athe lhah le , van aginglul lul jengin , ogin akithongin , kol aphen , ling akihottai .
66008006	Sumkon sagi choi Vantil sagi ho chu sumkon mut din akigotauve .
66008007	Vantil masapenin sumkon amut le , thisan to kihal , gel le meikou ahung umdoh-in , leiset chunga alhai ; hichun leiset chung hop thum’a hop khat akavamin , thingphung ho jong hop thum’a hop khat akavamin , chule hampa louhing jouse akavamsoh tai .
66008008	Vantil ni nan sumkon amut le , meikou alleng lung , molsang lentah tobang khat Twikhanglen lailunga akileh lut jengin , Twikhanglen hop thum’a hop khat thisan asoh-in ,
66008009	Twikhanglen lailunga ganhing hop thum’a hop khat athin , kong ho jong hop thum’a hopkhat asumang tai .
66008010	Vantil thum nan sumkon amut le , kolphe meivah banga vah leng lung ahsi lentah khat van’a konin ahung lhan , luidung ho hop thum’a hop khat chung le teinah ho chunga achui .
66008011	Hiche ahsi chu amin Gamsai akisah-e . Chuin twihop thum ; a hop khat Gamsai bangin akhatan , hijeh chun mihem tamtah hiche twikhat jeh chun athitai .
66008012	Vantil li nan sumkon amut le , nisa hop thum’a hop khat , lha hop thum’a hop khat , ahsi ho hop thum’a hop khat akivosen , abonchauva hop thum’a khat athimtan , sunlai jong hop thum’a hopkhat athimtan , janlai jeng jong hop thum’a hop khat athimtai .
66008013	Hichun kavet le vanlaijol’a leng le lea Muvanlai khat kamun , hichun going tah-in asamin , “ Hiche Vantil thum sumkon mut dia kigo ho khun amut tengu le leiset chung chengte dinga , Ohe da na ahi , da na ahi , da na ahi ! ” ati .
66009001	Chuin Vantil nga na sumkon amut le , van’a kona ahsi khat leiset chunga hung lha kamun , hi che chu akhonbei thamko kot heh apeuve .
66009002	Aman akhonbei thamko chu ahondoh le , tham ko sunga konin lhumpi kideng khu bangin meikhu ahung kitungdoh leng lung jengin , nisa le vanlaijol atimtai .
66009003	Chuin meikhu lah a kon chun khaokhopi tamtah leiset chung ahung dimtan , hiche ho chu leiset chunga aipi tha neina tobang apeuve .
66009004	Hiche ho hi leiset chunga hampa louhing le anche dong chule thingphung khat cha jong asuhset lou didu , achalpanguva pathen mohor kinamkhum lou mihem ho chubou asuhset diuva kiseipeh ahiuve .
66009005	Hiche ho hi hitobang thu neina kipeuva ahi . Chule hiche ho mihem bolgentheina chu aipin mi ade teng anat tobanga na ding ahi .
66009006	Hiche nikho lai le hin hiche mihem ho hin thina ahol tho diu , ahivanga amu louhel diu ahi ; thi nom ten ten un tin , ahivanga thina chu akom’uva kona jamdoh didng ahi .
66009007	Hiche khaokhopite limso dol chu galsat dinga kigotohsa , sakolte tobang ahin , aluchunguva sana lallukhuh tobang jeng akhuh-un , amaichangu mihem mai tobang
66009008	Asam’u numei sam tobnag ahin , ahau chu Phaisameigeo ha tobang ahi .
66009009	Hiche ho hin thil a kisem ompho tobang cheh ompho aneiyun , alhaving gin’u galmun jon’a lhai sakol tamtah khotogin tobang ahi .
66009010	Aipi bangin mei aneiyun , eipi bangin jang aneiyui : ameiyuva chu lha nga geiya mihem suhsetna thei tha aneiyu ahi .
66009011	Hiche ho hin akhonbei thamkoa Vantil chu lengvaipon aneiyun , Hebrew paovin misumang tin an , apollyon ahi .
66009012	Da na masa akichaitan , ven , hicheng nunga hi da na ni hung nalai dingahiye .
66009013	Vantil gup nan sumkon amut le , Pathen angsung , sana maicham nin glia selki chengsea konin ogin khat kajan ,
66009014	Vantil gup lhinaa , sumkon choipa jah achun , “ Luipi lentah Euphrates dunga kihen Vantil li ho chu lhadoh tan , ” ati .
66009015	Hichun mihem hop thum’a hop kkhat that dinga chuche nidan le nikho , lha le kum’a dia gotsadem’a um Vantil li chu akilhadohtai ,
66009016	chule sakol galmi jat eikiseipeh chu sang ja ni jatni dol’in kajai .
66009017	Sakolte le achunga touho luchang tobang , akamsunguva konin meikou le meikhu chule kath jeng ahung kikhodoh doh jenge .
66009018	Meikou le meikhu , kath , gama hicheng thum akamsunguva hungkondoh chun mihem hop thum’a hop khat athat gamtai .
66009019	Ijeh-inem itile sakolte chu athahat nau akamsungu le ameiyuva um ahin , ameiyu chun gul bangin luchang aneiyin , hiche hoa chu mi abolgim’u ahi .
66009020	Gamna hichenga kithat lou , mihem amoh chengsen jong akhutsem athilsem’uva konin lung aheideh pouvin , kho muthei lou , kho jathei lou , vah le thei lou , sanaa kisem doilim ho le dangkaa kisem , sum-eng , thing , song pouva kisem doilim ho , chule thilha ho ahouvu jong atangdeh pouve .
66009021	tol athau , mitpheldoi achoi nau , jonthanhoi abolnau chule aguh chat nauva lung aheidoh pouve .
66010001	Vantil chom , tha neitah khat , meilom’a kivon’a van’a kona hung kumlha kamun , aluchanga lhagui akiveiyin , amaichang nichang tobang ahin , akeng te ni chu meikou lom kitungdoh tobang ahi ;
66010002	akhut’a lekhajol neocha phoh kehsa khat achoiye . Akeng jetlamin Twikhanglen achotphan , veilamin leiset chung achon’e .
66010003	Chule Phaisameigeo kitum bangin ogin tah-in kho asamin , hitia kho asap chun van-gin sagi ahung gingtai .
66010004	Vangin sagin thu asei chun keijong lekhaa sutdoh kagoi ; “ Van-gin sagi thusei chu melchih thon lang lekha sutdan , ” eiti .
66010005	Hichun Twikhanglen le leiset chung chontoa ding Vantil kamu chun akhut jetlamin van lam asangin ,
66010006	van le asunga um jouse , leiset le asunga um jouse , Twikhanglen le asunga um jouse Sempa , tonsot tonsot’a hing jing jeng Pa min panin akihahsel’in , “ Phat sotta lou ding ahi ;
66010007	Vantil sagi lhinna ogin phat , sumkon amut teng le , aman asohte Themgao ho henga aphondoh banga Pathen thilgon kiselguh chu hung guilhung ding ahi , ” ati .
66010008	Chuin van’a kona ogin kaijah chun kahenga thu ahinsei kit leuvin , “ Chen lang Twikhanglen le leiset chun chontoa ding Vantil khut’a phoh kehsa um lekhajol khu galan , ” eiti .
66010009	Hijeh chun Vantil henga chun kachen lekhajol neo chu eipeh din kaseiye . Aman kajah a , “ Kilah-in lang nen , na-oisunga thuh-in tin , nakamsunga vang khoiju lhum banga lhum ding ahi , ” eiti .
66010010	Ken jong Vantil khut’a kon chun lekha jol chu kalan kaneh jeng le , kakamsunga khoiju lhumin alhumin , ahila kaneh jou chun ka-oisunga athuh cheh chuh jenge .
66010011	Hichun kajah a , “ Nangman mitin mitang , chitin namtin , paotin paotang chule leng ho thudol’a gaothu naseikit ding ahi , ” eikiti .
66011001	Hichun tenggol lheh lheh thil ten a mol-lhon khat eikipen , : Kipatdoh-in lang Pathen Houin le maicham khu tedoh-in , khukoma Pathen houho chengse jong simtoh-in .
66011002	Amavang Houin polam leitol khu khenni lang tedoh dan , ajeh chu iche lai khu chiding namdangte kipedoh ahitan , amahon khopi theng chu lha som li le lha ni sunga kengto chotpha anei diu ahi .
66011003	Chule kathu hettohsah te ni chu thu neina kapeh a , ama nin khaodip pon kisil’a , nikho sang khat le ja ni to somgup sunga gaothu asei lhon ding ahi , ” ati .
66011004	Hiche te ni chu leiset Pakai ang’a ding jing Olive thingphung te ni le Thaomei khom te ni chu ahi lhon’e .
66011005	Hiche te ni hi khattouvin bolset ding agot jousea akamsunglhon’a meikou hung deujah jia , amelmate chu akahvam jengji ahi ; amani bolset go jouse chu hitobanga hi kithat tei ding ahijenge .
66011006	Amani hi gaothu asei lai sungse lhon’a go juh louna dinga vanlaijol geiya khah chah jeng thei tha nei ahi lhon’e . Chu jongle amani hin twiho geiya thisan sosah theina tha anei lhon’e , chule adei phat phat lhon’a leiset’a jong gamna hise alansah nom nom lansah theina tha anei lhon ahi .
66011007	Hite ni hin hettohsah abolchai lhon teng le akhonbei thamkoa hung potdoh sahem chun achung lhon’a gal abol’a , ajoa ani lhon’a atha ding ahi .
66011008	tekah a Sodom le Egypt kisah khopi lentah , a-Pakaiyu Thingpel’a kikhetbeh na khopi sung lamlen a chu along lhon kijam ding ahi .
66011009	Mitin mitang , phungtin , paotin tang le chitin namtin’a kon miten nithum le akeh geiya along lhon chu avet ve jeng diu ahi ; along lhon chu lhan a vui ding nom lou diu ahiye .
66011010	Leiset chung chengte jouse amani chunga kipah thanomuva , khat le khat deichom thil kithot to ding ahiuve ; ijeh-inem itile hiche Themgao te ni hin leiset chung chengte abolgim lheh jeng lhon’e .
66011011	Ahinla nithum le akeh nungin Pathen’a konin hinna hu ahungin asung lhon’a alut phat’in , amani mupha chan akicha lheh jenguve .
66011012	Hichun , “ Hikoma hung kaltou lhonin , ” tia ajah lhon’a thu sei van’a kon ogin nasatah khat aja lhonin , amelmateuvin avet vet pet tah-in van jonin meilom khat’in akitoltou lhontai .
66011013	Hiche pettah hin ling nasa tah akihot’in , khopi hop som’a hop khat achimtan , ling kihot chunmihem sang sagi athin , athimoh cheng atijat lot’uvin Pathen avahchoilo tauve .
66011014	Gamna ni na akicahitan , ven , gamna thumna chu hung lhung vahjet ding ahi .
66011015	Vantil sagi nan sumkon amut le van’a konin ogin nasatah tah tampin ahinjomin : “ Vannoi leiset chunga lengvaipohna chu I-Pakaiyule a-Christa chang ahitan , Aman tonsot tonsot’a lengvai apoh ding ahi , ” atiuve .
66011016	Chutah chun Pathen angsung , laltouna tou , upa som ni le li ho chu bohkhup’in tol’a mai asulut’un Pathen alhaiyun ,
66011017	aseiyuvin : “ Vo Pakai Pathen Hachungnung , Aum jingsa le aum jing jeng , Keihon nangma kathangvah-ui ; Ajeh chu nangin nathahat chungnung mangchan lengvai napotai .
66011018	Ipijeh-inem itile namtin vaipi along hangun , Hichun nangma lunghan ahung lhung paiye ; Mithi ho thutanpeh phat , Nasoh Themgao ho , naming gangkhen cha um namithengte , Alen hihen aneo hijongle kipaman peh phat , Leiset sumang ho suhmang phat ahungtai , ” atiuve .
66011019	Hichun van’a Pathen Houin akihongin , , chule a-Houin sunga um kitepna thingkong chu akimui ; chuin kolaphen , ogin akithongin , van aging lul lul’in , ling akihot’in , gel len nasatah alhai .
66012001	Van’a melchihna lentah kha ahung kilah-in , nisaa kijem , akengto te nia lhachang um , aluchunga ahsi som le ni lallukhuh a kikhuh numei khat ahi .
66012002	hiche nu hi agaiyin , naoso nat thohgimin hapenin apenge .
66012003	Van’a melchihna achom khat jong ahung kilah-in , vetan , Dragon san , lentah , ameiyin vanlaijol’a ahsite hop thum’a hop khat ajep’in , leiset chunga asep lhai .
66012004	Chule nao aso lhah lhah le val lhum jeng din Dragon chu numei nu masanga ading jinge .
66012005	Chuin amanun naosen pasal khat ahingin , naosen hin namtin vaipi chung thih tenggol choiya vai apoh ding ahi . Hichun naosen chu akisalhah peh-in Pathen heng , alaltounana maiya akilhoh toutai .
66012006	Chuphat’in numei nu chu gamthip lama ajam mangin , hikoma chu nikho sang khat le ja ni to somgup geiya akivahna ding mun Pathenin agonpehsa ahi .
66012007	Hichun Van’a gal asoh-in , Michael le a-Vantilte chu Dragon to akisat tauve . Dragon le a-Vantilten jong asat thuh-uvin ,
66012008	aivangin Dragon ahatjou tapon , akhon nan van’a amaho ding mun akiholmotai .
66012009	Chutah chun Dragon len , khangluipeh a gulpi , Diabol le Satan kiti , vannoi pumpi lhemlhapa chu leiset chunga akisonlhan , a-Vantilte jong ama pumin akisot lhah thai .
66012010	Chuin van’a konin ogin nasatah khat kajan , hichun aseiyin : “ Akhon nan i-Pathenu huhhingna le tha neina , Lenggam , chule a-Christa thu neina akiphongtai ; Ijeh-inem itile isopiteu hehsepa , I-Pathenu angsunga sun le jan’a amaho hehsepa chu akisonlhatai .
66012011	Amahon ama chu Kelngoinou thisan jal le Ahettohsah nau thu vanga ajou ahitai ; Ajeh chu amaho hinkho geiya Itcha louhel’a thi geiya pang lhumkei ahiuve .
66012012	Hichejeh hin vanmun jouse le asunga cheng jouse kipah-un , Ohe , leiset le Twikhanglen ada nahiuve , Ajeh hcu lungsat chungnung neiya phat chomcha anei hea Lunghang tah a Diabol nahenguva hung kumsuh ahitai , ” ati .
66012013	Leiset chunga akisot lhah amu phat’in Dragon chun naosen pasal khat hing’a numei chu anung adel le jenge .
66012014	Chuphat’in numei nu chu gulpi masanga akikhindal’a , kumthum le akeh geiya akivahna ding mun gamthip lama alen mang theina din Muvanlai lentah khat lhaving te ni apeuvin ahi .
66012015	Ahin gulpin akamsunga twi vadung long bangin alondoh dah-in , numei nu nung adelsah-in , lhoh mangsah din agoi .
66012016	Ahivangin leiset’in numei chuakithopin , hiti hin leiset’in kam akan , Dragonin akamsunga alondohsah twi chu achopkang hel’e .
66012017	Chutah-in Dragon chu numei nu chunga along hangtan , hijeh chun Pathen thupeh chengse nit’a , Jesu thu hettohsah nei , amanu chate amoh chengse chutoh kisat din akondohtai .
66013001	Chuin Twikhanglen neldi chunga agadingtai . Twikhanglen’a kona sahem khat hung kaldoh kamun , ki , som , luchang sagi aneiyin , aki som chunga chun lallukhuh khat cheh aumin , chule aluchang ho chunga taitom min apui .
66013002	Sahem kamu chu lutnu to abangin , akeng te ni chu savom a tobang , akam chu Phaisameigeo kam tobang ahi . Dragonin sahem chu atha neina le alaltouna chule athu neina nasatah apetai .
66013003	Aluchang ho khat chu thi thei hel’a kimavo tobang ahin , ahinla akimavona chu damdoh kit’a ahitai . Vannoi pumpin kidang san aveuvin , sahem nung hcu ajuiyui .
66013004	Athu neina sahem apeh jeh-in mihon Dragon chu ahouvun , sahem jong chu ahouvun , “ Hiche sahem ti kibang koi hiya , kon adouva akisatpi thei ding ham ? ” atiuve .
66013005	Sahem chu hamhoithona le taitom thuseina kam apeuvin , lha som li le lha ni geiya thilbolna ding thu neina apeuve .
66013006	Chuin Pathen taitom thu seinan kam akeh pantan , amin le achen mun chule van’a chedng jouse ataitomtai .
66013007	Mithengte to kisat’a abonchauva ajo na din thilbol theina apeuvin , phung tin le mitin tang , paotin tang le chitin namtin chunga thu neina jong apeutauve .
66013008	Chutah le leisetchung chedng , leiset bul kiphudoh til’a pat kithatsa Kelngoinou hinna lekhabua amin kisut lou chengsen sahem chu ahou diu ahi .
66013009	“ Angaina ding na neiyan ngai hen !
66013010	Sohchang ding chu sohchang tei ding , chemjam hema lou ding jong chu chemjam hem’a lou tei ding ahi . Hichea hi mitheng dinga thot hat le tahsan ngai ahi , ” ati .
66013011	Hichun leiset’a kona sahem chomdang khat hung kaltou kamun , hichun kelngoi ki tobang ki ni aneiyin , Dragon thusei bangin aseiye .
66013012	Hichun sahem masa thu neina lhingset’in aneiyin , sahem masa masanga thil abol’e . Hiche hin sahem kasa , thi thei hel’a kimavoa damdoh kit chu leiset le asunga chengte jouse ahousah tai .
66013013	Hichun thil bolmo kidang nasatah tah , mihemte mitmu changtah a , van’a kona leiset chunga meikou lenlhahsah geiyin abol theiye .
66013014	Sahem maiya thil bolmo kidang bol theina kipea chu leiset chung change jouse apui chatvaiya , leiset chung chengte chu chemjam’a kisat khaa , ahivanga hing nalai sahem lim sem ding aseipeh thu asei theiya ,
66013015	sahem lim hou chun thu asei theiya , sahem lim hou lou jouse akitha theina dinga , sahem lim sunga hu khumlut peh theina jong kipea ahitai .
66013016	Sahem chun mihem jouse , aneo alen , ahao avai , jalen le soh , abonchauvin acham louvin akhut jetlam ham , achalpanguva ham a melchihna abol’e .
66013017	Hijeh chun chuche sahem melchihna , amin ham ahiloule amin mohor neilou chun imacha cho thei lou , joh jong joh thei lou ahi .
66013018	Hichea hin chihna angaiye . Lungthim’a hethem’an sahem mohor chu sutoh hen , ijeh-inem itile hiche hi mihem mohor ahin , mohor number chu jagup le gup ahi .
66014001	Ven , Zion molsang chunga Kelngoinou ding kamun , ama min le a-Pa min achalpanguva kijih cheh mi sang ja khat le sang som li le sang li to adding khom’e .
66014002	Chuin van’a konin twipi tamtah gin tobang le van-gin nasatah tobang ogin khat kajan , ogin kajah chu selangdah salhon aselangdah cheh asaigin’u to abange .
66014003	hiche ho hin laltouna mai le ganhing li ho chule upate masang chun lathah khat asauvin , leiset’a kona lhatdamsa mi sang ja khat le sang som li le sang li tilou koima hiche la chu kichuh thei lou ahi .
66014004	Hiche ho hi numeito kisuboh louhel , suhset lou na-ngah tobang ahiuve . Ache na chan a kelngaoinou nungjui ahiuvin , Pathen ding le Kelngoinou dinga aga masaa pang dinga , mihemete lah a kona kilhatdo ahitauve .
66014005	Akamsunguva thujou pot lam kihekha louhel , nolnabei ahiuve .
66014006	Vanlaijol’a Vantil chom khat leng le le kamun , ama chun leiset chung cheng chitin namtin , phungtin , pao tin paotang le mitin mitang henga phonjal ding tonsot Kipana Thupha aneiye .
66014007	Aman ogingtah-in aseiyin , “ Pathen gingun lang , alou , aloupina vahchoiyun , ijeh-inem itile aman thu atanna ding phat ahung lhung tai ; van le leiset , Twikhanglen le twisamphung jouse Sempa chu chibai boh-uvin , ” ati .
66014008	anina Vantil chom khat man anung juiyin aseiyin , “ Ajonthanhoi lunghanna lengpitwi ji chitin namtin jouse donsah nu , Babylon khopi chungnung chu achimtai , achimtai ! ” ati .
66014009	Thum lhin na Vantil chonkhat man anung juiyin ogingtah-in aseiyin , “ koi hi le sahem alim hijonle houva , achalpang ham , akhut ham a mohor kinam’a chun
66014010	Pathen lunghanna lengpitwi ju , imacha to hal louhel , gotsa kikoi chu adon khat tei ding , Vantil theng ho mang sang le Kelngoinou angsunga mei kou le kath a hesoh gentheiya kibol ding ahi .
66014011	Hitobang ho kibolgimna chun tonsot tonsot’a kitung cheng chung jeng ahin , chuche sahem le alim chibai boh ham , ahiloule amin mohor kinam khum ham chu sun le jan’a oltih nei lou ahitauve , ” ati .
66014012	Hichea hin Jesu tahsan’a Pathen thupeh chengse nit , mintheng te din thot hat angaiye .
66014013	Hichun van’a hungkon ogin khat kajan , “ pakai dinga thiho chengse chu tua lhah a anunnom ahitauve , tin sunin ; ahiye , Lhaggaovin aseiyin , ‘ Amaho chu atohgim nauva kona choldo ahitauvin , atoh phat jouseuvin anungu ajuiye , ’ tin , ” ati .
66014014	Vetan , meibang lhang khat kamun , meilhang chunga chun Mihem Chapa tobang khat atouvin , alua lallulkhuh akhuh-in , akhut’in koite hemtah khat achoiye .
66014015	Chuin Houin’a kon chun Vantil chom khat ahungdoh-in , meilhang chunga tou pa henga ogingtah-in asamin , “ Nakoite panin chang at tan , a-at phat ahung lhungin , leiaet chang akoijoutai , ” ati .
66014016	Hijeh chun meilhang chunga Toupan akoite leiset chunga alamtan , leiset chung-at’in aki-at tai .
66014017	Van’a Houin sunga kon chun Vantil chomdang khat ahung potdoh-in , aman jong koite hemtah khat aneiye .
66014018	Chuin meikou chunga thu nei Vantil chom khatma Maicham phunga konin ahung potdoh-in , koite hemtah kichoipa henga chun ogingtah-in asamin , “ Nakoite hemtah chu lamin lang leiset’a lengpiga ho khu aminsohtai at khomtan , ” ati .
66014019	Hijeh chun Vantil’in akoite alamin leiset chung lengpiga boh ho chu a-at khom khomin , Pathen lunghan lengpiga hehna lentah khuh sunga chun asep luttai .
66014020	Khopi polam , lengpiga chilna mun’a chil’u len , lengpiga chilna mun’a konin thisan ahung putdoh-in , sakol kamdalgeiyin achuptan , kilometer jathum geiyin anal’e .
66015001	Van’a datmo umtah le lentah melchihna khat kamun , gamna kichaina sagi neiya Vantil sagi ahiuvin , hiche hoa hi Pathen lungsat kichai ahitai .
66015002	Hichun meikou tokihal , phatvet tobang Twikhanglen , sahem le alim , amin mohor kinam nang jou chengse akhut’uva Pathen selangdah choiya , phatvet tobang Twikhanglen panga ding kamui .
66015003	Amaho hin Pathen lhacha Mose le Kelngoinou la asauvin : “ Vo Hatchungnung Pakai Pathen , Nathilbol ho hi anasan akidange ; Chitin namtin dinga Lengpa , Nalampi jouse adih-in akitah-e !
66015004	Vo Pakai , koiham nagging louva Namin vahchoi lou idng chu ? Ajeh chu athenga nang bou nahi . Hijeh a chu chitin namtin hunguva Na-angsunga bohkhup’uva chibai naboh diu ahi ; Ajeh chu nathilbol dihho akiphongdohtai , ” atiuve .
66015005	Hicheng nung hin van’a hettohsahna Houbuh muntheng kihondoh kamun ,
66015006	muntheng phunga konin gamna sagi neiya Vantil sagi ahungdoh tauve . Amaho chu tupat ponnem , abangleh-in akivon’un , sana pheh-in a-opkongu akiveiyui .
66015007	Hichun ganhing li ho lah a khat’in Vantil sagi ho chu tonsot tonsot’a hing jing jeng Pathen lungsetna demset cheh , sana lhengkong sagi apei .
66015008	Chuin Pathen loupina le athu neina jeh-in muntheng chu meikhu adimset jengin , Vantil sagin gamna sagi abulhitsoh masangsen koimacha muntheng phunga chun alut thei tapoi .
66016001	Houin’a kona Vantil sagi ho henga ogingtah a thu kisei kajan , “ Cheuvin lang Pathen lungsetna dimset lhengkong sagi chu leiset chung gabung lhauvin , ” ati .
66016002	Hichun Vantil masapen achen leiset chunga alhengkong chu agasun lhan le , sahem melchihna neiya alim hou , mihem ho chunga netna hoisetah , uilut nat alangtai .
66016003	Vantil ni nan alhengkong chu Twikhanglen chunga asun lhan le , tolthi thisan bangin thisan asoh tan , Twikhanglen sunga um ganhing jouse athisoh tai .
66016004	Vantil thum nan alhengkong chu luididng jouse le twinah phung jousea asun lhah le , thisan asoh gamtai .
66016005	Hichun twipi jouse thu nei Vantil chun asei kajan , “ Hicheng thu natan naa hin nadih-in nathenge , Aum jing le aumsa Nangma ;

66016007	Chuin maicham phunga kona thu kisi kajan , “ Ahinai , Vo hatchungnung Pakai Pathen , Nathutan ho hi akitah-in , adih cheh-e , ” ati .
66016008	Vantil li nan alhengkong chu nichang asun khum le , mihemte chumeisaa ahugot dingin thu akipetai .
66016009	Mihem ho chu nisa save vun ahulgot gam phat’in , gamna ho chung geiya thu neipa , Pathen min geiyin ataitom’un , Pathen vahchoi din jong lung aheidoh pouve .
66016010	Vantil nga nan alhengkong chu sahem laltouna chunga asun lhah le , sahem lenggam sung athimsoh-in , anat thoh lel jeh-un , mihon aleiyu apet den’un ,
66016011	anat thohgim jeh-u le ti-na ho jeh chun Van Pathen geiyin ataitom’uvin , anatoh athilbol’uva konin lung aheipouve .
66016012	Vantil gup nan alhengkong chu luipi len Euphrates a asun lama hung kon leng ho din lampi akihong doh tai .
66016013	Hichun Dragon kamsung , sahem kamsunga kona hungdoh , ephoh ho tobang lhagaoboh thum kamui .
66016014	Hiche ho hi thilha lhagao ahiuvin , melchihna aboljiu ahi ; hiche ho hi cheuva , Hatchungnung Pathen nikho ni le galsat dinga leiset pumpia leng jouse gapuikhom agot’u ahi .
66016015	“ Ven , gucha bangin kahunge , ponbeiya vah lea , asagohkeo akimudoh louna dinga hah jinga aponsil kivet phat jing mi chu anun nom’e ” ati .
66016016	Chuin amaho chu Hebrew paova , “ Armageddon ” kiti laiya chun apuikhomsoh tauve .
66016017	Vantil sagi nan alhengkong chu vanlaijol’a asun lhah jeng le , Houin laltouna phunga konin nasa-tah-in o ahung gingdoh-in , “ Aki-chaitai , ” ati .
66016018	Chutah chun kol aphen , ogin akithongin , van aging lul lul jengin , leiset chunga mihem kilahdoh a pat jingpi jouse lah a jong um kha lou lai , lingpi nasatah khat ahung kihottai .
66016019	hichun khopi jouse achomsoh tai . Khopi lentah Babylon chu Pathen angsunga akigeldoh tan , alunghan na lengpiga ju-khon donsah dinga peh din aumtai .
66016020	Hichun twikol gam jouse jong akihomosoh tai .
66016021	Chutah-in gel len , khatseh agih dol jong talent khat to kibang hel , van’a konin mihemte chunga ahung lhan , hiche gamna hi anatsat behseh jeh-in mihemten gel lhah gamna jal hin Pathen ataitom tauve .
66017001	Lhengkong sagi choiya Vantil sagi holah a khat ahungin kajah a thu aseiyin , “ Hungin , twitampi chunga tou , noti len nu chunga thu kitan vetsah inge ;
66017002	leiset leng hon noti nu toh jonthanhoi na leng piga ju chu leiset’a chengte jouse khamsoh ahitauve , ” ati .
66017003	Hichun aman lhagaovin gamthip eipuitai . Hichea hin achunga taitomna min jeng kikun , alu sagi , akisom nei , sahem danthip khat chunga numei khat touva kamui .
66017004	Numei nu chun pon sandup le pon santhip asil’in , sana , khisong mantam jeng le twikoh changing akijemin akhut’a chun thet umtah tah thil ho le ajonthanhoi na nen demset sana khon khat achoiye .
66017005	Achalpanga chun selguh min akisunin , “ Babylon len , noti jouse le leiset’a thil thet um jouse konna nu , ” akiti .
66017006	Chule numeinu chun mithengte thisan le Jesu thu hettohsahte thisan adonkhamset kamui . Hiche nu kamu chu kidang kasa behseh jenge .
66017007	Ahin Vantil chun kajah a , “ Ibol’a kidang nasah ham ? Khuche numei le apolea , aluchang sagi , aki som nei , sahem thuguh khu keiman seipeh inge .
66017008	Namu sahem , anu umsa hiya , umtalou khu , akhonbei thamkoa kona hung kaltouva , manthahna vah lut ding ahin , chu teng leiset chung chengte , vannoi bul kiphudoh a pat hinna lekhabua min kisun lou hon , aumsa hiya , umta lou , hung kit ding , sahem chu amu tengu adatmo lheh jeng diu ahi .
66017009	Hichea hin lungthim le chihna angaiye . Aluchang sagi chu molsang dsagi ahin , hiche ho chunga hi numei ni kitousah ahi . Hiche ho hi leng sagi jong ahiuve .
66017010	Nga alhutan , khat aumnalaiyin , khat ahung hih laiyin , ahung tang le phat chom khat beh umtei ding ahi .
66017011	Aumsa hiya , umtalou sahem , sagi lah a khat chu get lhin na ahin , manthahna vah lut ding ahi .
66017012	Aki som namu ho chu leng som ahiuvin , lengvaipohna anei lou laiyu ahi , nisan kah khat sunga sahem chutoh thakhat tah a , lengte banga , thu neina aneikhom diu ahi .
66017013	Amaho hi doi kitha khat ahiuvin , athahat athu nei nau sahem chu apetauve .
66017014	Amaho Kelngoinou to kisat diu , ahivanga Kelngoinouvin amaho ajo ding ahi ; ijeh-inem itile am apakaiho Pakai le leng ho Leng ahi ; aumpi chengse jong koudodhsa le lhenchom , chule tahsan nei ho ahiuve , ” ati .
66017015	Hichun kajah a , “ Noti nu kitousahna twipi namu ho chu mitin mitang , lhangpi kikhom khom , chitin namtin le paotin paotanga mi ahiuve .
66017016	aki som namu le sahem chun noti nu chu ahot diu , achom keohel’uva , asagoh keova akoiyuva , atahsa geiya aneh chaiyuva , meiya ahalvam diu ahi .
66017017	Ijeh-inem itile Pathen thusei chengse guilhunsoh masangsea dinga , amaho chu lungdoi kitoh tah a alengvai neinau sahem apehdoh-uva , Pathen lungdoi atohdohna diuva , hi tobang lunggel chu Pathenin alungthim’uva akhumpeh ahi .
66017018	Chule nangin namu numei nu chu leiset leng ho jouse chunga lengvaipoa pang khopi len chu ahi , ” ati .
66018001	Hicheng nung hin Vantil thu nei tah khat van’a kona hung kumlha kamun , leiset hi aloupi nan asalvahsohjenge .
66018002	Ama chun going leng lung tah-in asamin aseiye : “ Achimtai , achimtai Babylon len , Thilha ten chen nan aneitauve ; Lhagaoboh jouse kikholna , Vacha bohjouse le thet um jouse kikholna asohtai .
66018003	Ajeh chu aman ajonhuhna lengpiga ju chu Chitin namtin jouse adonsah tai ; Leiset leng jouse amanu to ajonguvin , Amanu nopsahna val’a konin leiset’a kiveihon ahaolotauve , ” ati .
66018004	Hichun van’a kona thu kisei ogin khat kajan : “ Hiche nua kon chun potdoh-un kamite , Ajo le amanu chonsetna ho changkhauvin natin , Ajo le athoh ding gamna ho thoh khauvin nate .
66018005	Ajeh chu amanu chonsetna ho Van geiyin akikhangdoh tan , Athemmona jouse Pathenin ageldohtai .
66018006	Amanun napeh bangin pethuh-un , Athilbol achonna dungjuiyin ajat nin lethuh-uvin . Chih tah a ahhalkhomna khon’a chun Ajat nin chih cheh-in halkhompeh-uvin .
66018007	akiloupisah a kinopsah val bangin Sugentheiyun lang sulung hem’uvin ; Aman alungthim sunga ‘ Lengnu banga toukahin , Meithai kahipoi , itih chan hijongle Lunghemna muponge , ’ atijeh chun
66018008	Gamna jousen nikhat’in lhunden hen , Thi lunghemna chule kelle chah nan , Amanu meikouvin leolih jeng hen . Ajeh chu achung thu tan Pakai Pathen chu thanei tah ahi , ” ati .
66018009	Amanu to jonga nom sakhom , leiset leng hon agovamna meikhu amudoh tengu le dip le lai akidop’a , amanu akacham diu ahi .
66018010	Amanu thoh genthei akichat jeh-un , gamla tah a dingun tin : “ Ohe , ohe , khopi len , Bebylon khopi dettah , Nidan kha khat sungin nachung thu akitan chaitai ! ” atidiu ahi .
66018011	Leiset’a kiveimihon jong koiman athil’u achohpeh lou phat’in amanu chu lhase tah-in akauve .
66018012	Sana , dangka , song mantam , twikohchang ho , tupat ponnem , ponsandup , lungpon , ponsanthip , thing namtui mantam jouse , saiha le thing mantam a kisem thil ho , sum-eng , thih le songval’a kisem ho ,
66018013	thingthal , eisanga , gimnamtui , thaonamtui , bego , lengpitwi le thao , changbongnal , suhlou chang bong le kelngoi , sakolte le kangtalai jouse , soh ho le mihem dang hinkho geiya chohpeh louva um gam ahitai .
66018014	“ Nalhan angaichat , aga chu Nanga konin apotdoh tai ; Na-ning lhin na le nahaona jouse kitolmang ahitan , Kimudoh kit louhel ding ahitai , ” atiuve .
66018015	Amaa kona gaodoh kivei mihon , akhopi thoh genthei hesoh akichat jeh-un , gamla tah a dingin akacham’un , alhaset piuvin

66018018	amanu kigovamna meikhu aveuvin , going tah-in asam’un , “ Hiche khopi lem tobang ipi khopi um didng ham ? ” atiuve .
66018019	Chuin aluchunguva leivui akithe khum’un , kap le maovin kho asam’un : “ Ohe , ohe khopi len minthang , Twikhanglen’a kitolle kong jouse Ama ninglhing jal’a haodohna Nidan kah khatseh sungin abeitai , ” atiuve .
66018020	Vo van le mithengte , Solchah ho le Themgaoho , amanu cunga hin kipah thanom’un , ajeh chu nang ho din Pathenin amanu chunga thu atantai !
66018021	Hichun Vantil tha nei tahkhat hin sumhri song tejen songkhat alan , Twikhanglen’a aleh lut’in : “ Hitobanga hi khopi len Babylon chu Tolse na kineiya kimudoh ki tlouhel ding ahi .
66018022	Nasung hi selangdah saiho sangin , Lathem ho lasah gin , theile mut themho mutgin , Nasunga kijakit louhel ding ; Khut themna jatchom chom’a them Khut them ho jong kimudoh louhel ding ahi ; Sumhei gin jong nasunga kija louhel ding ahitai .
66018023	Nasunga thaomei vah jong kimukit lou ding , Nasunga jineipa le jinei nu ogin kija louhel ding ahi ; Kivei mi nanei ho chu leiset’a lamkai jeng ahiuvin , Mitpheldoi nachoi chun chitin namtin apui chavaitai .
66018024	Ijeh-inem itile nasunga hin Themgaoho le mithengte , Leiset chunga kithat ho jouse thisan akimudoh tai , ” ati .
66019001	Hicheng nung hin van’a kona hung kisei , mipi tamtah ogin tobang khat kajan : “ Hallelujah ! Huhhingna , loupina , tha neina i-Pathenu achangtai ;
66019002	Ajeh chu Ama thutan jouse akitah-in adih cheh-e ; Aman noti len nu chunga thu atanin , Ajonthanhoi jeh a leiset suchavai nu , Akhut’a thi asohte thisan phu Amanu chunga hin alatai , ” atiuve .
66019003	Ani veinan asei kit’un : “ Hallelujah ! amanu kigovamna meikhu chu tonsot tonsot’a din akitungdoh tai , ” atiuve .
66019004	Chutah-in upa som ni le li ho , ganhing li ho chun , laltouna kitou-sah Pathen chu boh khup’in chibai aboh-un : “ Amen , Hallelujah ! ” atiuve .
66019005	Laltounaa konin ogin khat ahung kithongin : “ Pathen soh , ama gingkhen , alen aneo nabonchauvin I-Pathenu vahchoi cheh-uvin , ” ati .
66019006	Chuin mihonpi tamtah ogin tobang le twipi tamtah lon gin tobang , van ginthong tobang kajan : “ Hallelujah ! Hatchungnung Pakai i-Pathenun Lengvai apotai ;
66019007	Kipah thanomin aloupina vahchoiyute ; Ajeh chu Kelngoinou jinei golvah phat ahung lhungtan , Ajinu ding jong kigosadem ahitai ;
66019008	Ajinu ding chu tupat ponnem thengsel , vamleuva Kivon dingin apetauve ; Hiche tupat ponnem chu minthengte tohphatna ahi , ” atiuve .
66019009	Chuin ogin chun kajah a , “ Kelngoinou ji kipui golvah a kikou ho chu anun nom’ui , tin sunin , ” eiti . Kajah a aseiyin , “ Hicheng hi Pathen thu tahbeh ahi , ” ati .
66019010	Hijeh chun keijong ama chibai boh din akengbul’a kaboh khuptai . Ahinla aman kajah a , “ Bol hih-in ; keima Jesu thudol hettohsah sopite lah a khat , nasoh natoh khompi khat kahibouve ; Pathen bou chibai bohin . Ijeh-inem itile Jesu thudol het tohsah hi gaothu seidohna Lhagao ahi , ” ati .
66019011	Hichun van akihondoh kamun , ven , sakol kang khat aumin , achunga Toupa chu tahsan le kitah akitin , tah-inthu atanin , gal abol’e .
66019012	Amitchang te ni chu meikou pah lah lah ahin , aluchanga lallukhuh tampi akhuh-in , min khat akisunin , Ama tilou koima danginahepoi .
66019013	Aponsil chu thisan kithekhum ahin , amin chu Pathen Thu akiti .
66019014	Tupat ponnem thengsel le vamleh kisil’a sakol kangte chunga tou , van’a sepaiten anung ajuiyui .
66019015	Akamsunga konin chemjam hemtah khat ahung potdoh-in , hichea chu chitin namtin asatgam sing , achunguva thih tenggol’a vai ahom ding , Hatchungnung Pathen lunghanna lengpiga chilna tobanga chu aman jong achil ding ahi .
66019016	Aponsil chunga akhelbuh laiya , ‘ Leng ho Leng le Pakai ho Pakai , tin min khat akisun’e .
66019017	Hichun nichang chunga ding Vantil kha tkamun , vanlaijol’a leng lea vachate jouse jah a ogingtah-in aseiyin , “ Pathen golvah lentah a hung kikhom’uvin ;
66019018	leng ho tahsaphe le sepai lamkai ho tahsanphe , sepaiho tahsaphe , mihem jouse , jalen hihen doh hile , aneo hihen alen hile , atahsaphe hung neuvin , ” ati .
66019019	Chuin sahem le leiset leng ho , asepaiteu hung kikhom’a , sakol chung Toupa le asepaite douna galbol goa kamui .
66019020	Sahem le sahem masanga datmo kidang melchihna tampi boljia , hotobang melchihna hoa hi sahem mohor kinam khum , alim houho chu pui chavaiji Themgao lhem chu aman’un , anigel lhon in ahing laiyin kath meikou deuje ju lah a a leh lut tauve .
66019021	Chule amoh chengse chu sakol chunga Toupa kamsunga kona hung potdoh chemjam chun athat gamin , vachate jousen atahsapheu chu achim avan aneuve .
66020001	Akhonbei thamko hehna le thih khao akhut’a choiya Vantil khat van’a kona hung kum lha kamui .
66020002	Vantil chun khangluiya gulpi , Diabol , Satan Dragon chu aman in kum sang khat din ahentai .
66020003	Hiti chun akhonbi thamko sunga aleh lut’in , akandenin , kum sang khat kichai kahsea namtin apui chatvai louna din mohor anamkhumtai . Hiche nung hile phat chom khat dinga kilhadoh tei ding ahi .
66020004	Hichun laltouna phabep le achunga touva , thutan ding kipedoh ho le Jesu thudol hettohsah jeh le Pathen thu jeh a alu kitanho , sahem le alim chibai boh louhel , achalpangu le akhut’uva melchihna moho kinam lou ho lhagao kamun , amaho hi hingdoh a Christa to kum sang khat lengvai apoh khomu ahi .
66020005	Kum sang khat kichai kahsea vang chu mithi amoh cheng thoudoh lou ding ahiuve .
66020006	Hiche thodoh masaa pang kha chu anun nomin athenge ; thi ni nan achunguva thu anei lou ding , Pathen le Christa Thempua panguva , Ama to kum sang khat lengvai apoh khom diu ahi .
66020007	Kum sang khat alhin teng Satan akihenna a kona kilhadoh a ,
66020008	leiset ning lia cheng chitin namtin Gog le Magog , Twikhanglen neldi jat pi chu gal bolsah dial hem chavaiya puikhom dinga kondoh ding ahi .
66020009	Amaho chu leiset kho khongin ahung kon’un , mithengte Ngahmun le Pathenin a-it tah khopi chu aumkimvel tauve . Ahinla van’a konin meikou ahung leng lhan amaho chu akavamtai .
66020010	Chutah chun sahem le themgao lhempa kiselutna kath le meidil sunga chun miho lehm chavai Diabol chu asep lut tauve , hikom a chu amahon sun le jan , tonsot tonsot geiya gim hesoh chungnung athoh diu ahitai .
66020011	Hichun laltouna lentah , akang khat le achunga Toupa kamun , amasanga konin van le leiset ajam mangin , van le leiset din mun akihol motai .
66020012	Chuin laltouna masanga mithi ho alen aneo adinu kamun , chule lekhabu ho akiphongtai ; hichea hin lekhabu achom khat , ahinna lekhabu kit chu akiphong doh-e ; hiche lekhabu hoa kisun dungjuiyin mitho ho chu anatoh dungjui cheh-in athuu atan tauve .
66020013	Twikhanglenin asunga um mithi ho ahinleh doh-in , thina le thina gamin jong asung lhona um mithi ho ahinleh doh lhonin , amichang cheh anatohdungjui cheh-uvin athuu atanpeh tauve .
66020014	Chuin hina le thina gamchu meidil sunga aleh lut tauve , meidil hi thini na ahi .
66020015	Hinna lekhabu sunga amin kiholdoh louse chu meidil sunga aleh lut lut jenguve .
66021001	Chujouvin Vanthah le leiset thah kamui ; ajeh-inem itile van masa le leiset masa chu kitolmang ahitan , Twikhanglen jong aumtapoi .
66021002	Chuin aji ding pa henga dia kigosadem , jinei din gnu banga jijem , Pathen kom , van’a hung kitol lha khopi theng Jerusalem thah chu kamui .
66021003	Laltouna a kona ogingtah a thu kisei khat kajan , “ Vrn , Pathen chenna in chu mihemte lah ahitai , Pathenin amaho achenpia , amaho amite hidiu , Pathenin amaho achen pia a-Pathenu hiding ahi .
66021004	Amit’uva kona amit lhi jouseu atheh hul peh ding , thina umta lou ding , lung hem na le ka-na , thohgimna jong umta louhel ding ahi ; ajeh chu thil masa chengse kitolmangsoh ahitai , ” ati .
66021005	Laltouna Toupan aseiyin , “ Ven ijakai kasemthahsoh ahitai , ” ati . Chujongle aseiyin , “ Hicheng thu hi tahsan umtah , thutah cheh ahi , sunin , ” eti .
66021006	Chuin kajah a , “ Akichaitai , Keima Alpha le Omega , akipatna le akichaina kahi , Adang chah a chu hinna twinah a twi don ding manbeiyin penge .
66021007	koi hile gal jouva chuthil hichengse hi chang ding , keima a-Pathen kahiya , ama kachapa hi ding ahi .
66021008	Ahin meidoi ho , tahsan bei ho , thet um ho , tolthat ho , jonthanhoi bol ho , doichoi ho , doilim houho , chule jousei ho jouse kath le meikou dil deuje ju sunga chu um siu ahi ; hiche hi thi ni na ahiye , ” ati .
66021009	Gamna nukhah sagi dimset , lhengkong sagi choi , Vantil sagi lah a khat chu ahungin kajah a thu aseiyin , “ Hungin , Kelngoinou jinu ding mouthah chu setsah inge , ” eiti .
66021010	Hichun Aman Lhagaovin molsang lentah khat chungvuma eilhoh touvin , Pathen kom van’a kona hung kumlha Jerusalema eilhoh touvin , Pathen kom van’a kona hung kumlha Jerusalem khopi theng chu eivetsah-in ,
66021011	Pathen loupi nan akijemin ahi ; avahje dan chu song mantam , jasper song le crystal val vah abange .
66021012	Apal chu lentah le sangtah ahin , kelkot som le ni ahin , kelkot ho chunga hcun Vantil som le ni aumin , chule kelkot ho chungma chun Israel phung som le ni min akisun’e .
66021013	Nisdo lama kelkot thum , sah lama kelkot thum , lhanglama kelkot thum , nilhum lama kelkot thum aum’e .
66021014	Khopi pal chu akhombul som le ni ahin , achunga chun Kelngoinou solchah som le ni min akiun’e .
66021015	Kahenga thuseiya chun khopi le kelkot ho chule apal te-na didng sana tenglhon khat achoiye .
66021016	khopi chu aning li kitoh a , adung avai kibang , Aman thil te-na tenglhon’a khopi chu ate le , kilometer sang ni le ja ni to som nga asaovin , adung avai , asandol kibangsoh kei ahi .
66021017	Chuin apal ate le tong ja khat le tong som li le li alhinge ; mihem thil te-na chu Vantil’in jong aman ahi .
66021018	Pal chu jasper song jenga kigen ahin , khopi jeng jong chu phatvet then’a theng , sana thengseh a kisa ahi .
66021019	Khopi pal khombul song chu khisong mantam jatchom chom’a kijem ahi ; khombul masapen chu jasper , ani na sapphire , athumna chalcedony , li lhina emerald ,
66021020	nga lhinna sardonix , gupna sardis , sagi lhinna chrysolite , getna beryl , ko lhina topaz , som na chrysoprase , som le khatna jacinth , som le ni na amethyst song jeng ahi .
66021021	kelkot som le ni chu twikoh chang jenga kisem ahi , kelkot khat khat chu twikohchang khat cheh akisem ahi ; kho pi sung lamlen chu phatvet banga lim kimudoh thei sana thengsel ahi .
66021022	Pakai Pathen Hatchungnung le Kelngoinou Houin a apantah jeh in kho pi sunga chun Houin kamupoi .
66021023	Pathen loupe nan asalvah jinga , Kelngoinou chu thaomei vah a apanjeh-in khopi chun asalvah ding nisa le lha jong angai chapoi .
66021024	Chitin namtin khopi vah a chu vah leuva , leiset leng jousen jong aloupi nau asunga ahinpoh lut diu ahi ;
66021025	jan jong aumchom tah loujeh chunkelkot ho chu sun laiya jong kikhah chom lou ding ahitai .
66021026	Mihon chitin namtin loupina le jabolna asunga ahinpoh lut diu ahi .
66021027	Itina ma jong le aboh jouse le thet umtah thilbol’a , jousei ho , khopi sunga chu lut louhel diu , kelngoinou hinna lekhabu sunga amin kisunsa ho chubou lut diu ahi .
66022001	Vantil chun Pathen le Kelngoinou laltouna a kona hungput , crystal song val’a val , hintwilui dung chu eivetsah-e .
66022002	Luidung chu khopi lamlen lai lunga alongin apang langto gel’a hinthing akeh-in , lhaseh le aga jin jat chom chom ga somle ni aneiye ; chujongle athingna ho chu ahitinnamtin boldamna ahi .
66022003	Gaosap changsa jouse beisoh ding ahi . Khopi sunga chu Pathen le Kelngoinou laltoina bouuma , asoh ten ama ajenle diu ,
66022004	amahon amai amu’va , achalpanguva ama min um ding ahi .
66022005	Jan jong umta lou didng , thaomei vah le nisa vah jong angaichat louhel diu ahitai ; ijeh-inem itile Pakai Pathenin amaho asalvah jing ding , tonsot tonsot geiya lengvai apoh diu ahitai .
66022006	Vantil chun kajah a aseiyin , “ Hicheng thu hi tahsan um le thutah jeng ahi , Themgao ho Lhagao Pakai Pathen chun ahungso loi ding thil asohte vetsah dinga a-Vantil ahinsol ahi .
66022007	“ Ven , kahung loi ding ahi . Hiche lekhabua gao thusei ho nit’a chu anunnom ahi , ” ati .
66022008	Thil hicheng jaa mua chu keima John kahi . Kajah a kamu phat’in thil hicheng eivetsah a Vantil chu chibai boh din akengphang bul’a kaboh khuptai .
66022009	Ahinla aman kajah a aseiyin , “ Bol hih-in , keijong nang le nasopite Themgaoho , chule hiche lekhabua thu ho nit ho lah a nasoh natoh khompi khat kahibouve . Pathen bou chibai boh-in , ” eiti .
66022010	Vantil chun kajah a , “ Hiche lekhabua gaothu seidoh hi imchah hih hel’in , ajeh chu phat anaitai .
66022011	Adih lou chun adih lou bol jing hen , aboh a chun thilboh bol jing hen , midih chun thildih bol jing hen , mintheng chu theng jing hen .
66022012	“ Ven , kahungloi ding ahi , mitin atoh dungjui cheh a peh ding keiya tohman chu kahinpoi .
66022013	Keima Alpha le Omega , amasa le anukhah , akipatna le akichaina kahi , ” ati Jesun .
66022014	Hinna thingga neh theina le khopi kelkot dunga lut le theina dinga avon’u kisop theng ho chu anun nom’ui .
66022015	Uicha ho le doichoi ho , jonthanhoi bol ho , tol that ho , doilim semthu hou ho , chule jouva thilbol nom jouse polama um diu ahiye .
66022016	“ Keima Jesun hicheng thu hi Houbunga um nang ho hettohsah dinga ka-Vantil kahinsol ahi ; Keima David Jungpi , achilhah , jingvalpa vahtah chu kahi , ” ati .
66022017	Lhagao le Mouvin , “ Hungin , ” ati . Ajapha chanin , “ Hungin , ” ti hen . Adangchah chan hungun ; angaicha chanin hinna twi chu manbeiyin kilah hen .
66022018	Hiche lekhabua gao thuseidoh ho japha jouse henga kahettohsah ahi : koi hile hicheng belap a aum le , hiche lekhabua kisei gamna ho chu Pathenin achunga abelap peh ding ,
66022019	hiche gao thusei hoa kona alamanga aum jongle , hiche lekhabua kisei Khopi Theng le hinna thingphunga kona Pathenin achan alahmang ding ahi .
66022020	Hiche thu hettohsah pan , “ Henge , kahungvah ding ahi , ” ati . Amen Vo Pakai Jesu hungin !
66022021	Pakai Jesu milungset’in mitin umpi jing hen !
